column2: Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai sɨgunyasɨ kwaakesɨ wakyaa'. Tɨvi wakakegaa' kwaaka kuneva' warɨna kyaa', sagaa' Gotɨyare Kuryai aalɨbunyavɨ munyaba yɨlayamarina yaa'. Yuyaba jɨhɨnya' yadɨsɨ Gotɨyai wɨjaa' “Yɨrɨke'gɨ dɨvu'!” Mi'na kujaa' yɨrɨka purɨna yaa'. Gotɨyai yɨrɨke' wanganaka wɨjaa' “Tewaanyasɨra. Yɨrɨkegaakɨ.” Gotɨyai yɨrɨke' gavi wakɨna, jɨhɨnya' gavi wakɨna yaa'. Wakɨna yaka “Jɨhɨnya' sawɨsasɨra,” wɨjaa'. Mi'na kujaa' yɨrɨka pɨrɨ' mi'nanyɨra.
Yɨrɨka mudɨke' kavuryaa' Gotɨyai wɨjaa' “Aalyamwavɨdaasɨ yɨraaya bilaawana!” Wɨdɨna kyaa' yɨraaya bilaawɨna yaa'. Gotɨyai wɨjaa' “Munya ke'ba sɨgunyasɨ.” Yɨrɨka pɨryaai mi'nanyɨra, sagaa'.

Yɨrɨka mudɨke' kavuryaa' aalya naange' yunebanna wa'dɨsɨ Gotɨyai wɨjaa' “Aalya naanga da' avaala pɨba warana!” Gotɨyai sara kujaa' aalya maalɨka wannyɨna yaa'. Sagaa' sɨla, mugunya, kwaaka warɨna yaa'. Mi'na warɨna kyaa' Gotɨyai wɨjaa' “Yɨta, maye, sɨgya, kure, kɨnna, wapaaya yuya yɨma'nyɨna yana!” Sara kujaa', sagaa' yɨma'nyaakengɨ. Sinakejɨ tainakejɨ yɨma'nyaa'. Yɨrɨka daryaai darɨ' mi'nanyɨra.

Yɨrɨka mudɨke' kavuryaa' Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Baaka naange' (Nyɨlyai), baaka maalɨke' (lawei), sɨlɨngaamɨnya warana!” Sara wɨdɨna kyaa' nyɨlyai, lawei, sɨlɨngaamɨnya yɨma'nyɨna yaa'. Gotɨyai wɨdɨna yaa' “Yɨrɨkegaa' nyɨla wɨdɨna yana! Sawɨsagaa' lawei, sɨlɨngaamɨnya wɨdɨna yana!” Savɨdaasɨ kwaakevakɨ yɨrɨkesɨ wanyɨwanyasɨ warɨ'. Gotɨyare sɨmunya nyɨlyalyɨ lawelyɨ saraarɨna wawɨnya yanya'ne sa' gavi wakɨna, burɨkegaa'ne sa' gavi wakɨna yaa'. Yɨrɨka daryaai daryaai mi'nanyɨra, sagaa'.

Yɨrɨka mudɨka kavuryaa' sagaa' Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Jawɨnya, buta, waalabya aalyavɨ wɨlarya'ne pɨnɨ mwaalana!” Mi'na wɨdɨna kyaa' jawɨnya, waalabya, buta yuya aalyavɨ mwaalɨna yaa'. Mwaalɨna yeva aalyavɨ kusawɨ jawɨnya, waalabya bwaranya wɨlayariwannyɨna yaa'. Nabaai Gotɨyai yuta ge ge munyawɨnnera wɨmwaaihɨna, kwaakewɨnnera wɨmwaaihɨna yaa'. Yusara sara wɨmwaaihakeraavɨdaasɨ naanga mɨjayariwannɨguna yaa'. Sagaa' yɨrɨka daryaai daryaai darɨ' mi'nanyɨra.

Yɨrɨka mudɨke' kavuryaa' Gotɨyai yagaala wɨdɨna “Jɨlɨkyaawarya, yɨkurɨyaawia yuya yɨma'nyɨna yana!” Sara wɨdɨna kyaa' kwaakevɨ yɨma'nyɨna yaakengɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyai kamaala, maa'nyaanna sara wakɨna yaa'. Yuya yɨma'nyaakengɨdaasɨ naanga yariwannɨguna yaa'. Sagaa' Gotɨyai sɨgya, waanga tɨka nya'ne sɨmudɨnya yadɨvɨsaraavɨna wɨjaavɨna yaa'.

Gotɨyai yuyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihakere. A'mwelyɨ a'mwesɨ sawaarɨ yavɨkaryɨna. Gamɨ kwaibɨsawaarɨ yavɨkaryɨna ya'. Gotɨyai kwaake' lɨvɨna yaka lɨvɨgɨrɨ'mwanna yaka a'mwerɨ yavɨkarina ya'. A'mwere kɨlaakejɨ' yavɨkaryaka Gotɨyai gamɨre sɨnnyɨkɨ pwa'nyɨ kamakura' sagaa' a'mwei yɨma'nyɨna kya' “Ataamɨma gɨmɨre yaya' gɨthɨwana,” Gotɨyai sara wɨdɨna ya'.

Gotɨyai wawɨnya naange' burɨnna burɨnna ya'. Burɨnna burɨnna yaka Ataamɨmɨ maarɨna yaka wawɨnyavɨ wɨlamarakɨna ya'. Kwaaka Yɨthenɨ aalɨmaangevɨ wawɨnya sa' wara'. A'mwe pwai yɨsarɨdaa'nyɨ yɨsɨla maranajɨ kwajɨ gazagaasagaa' kamwaaladɨka. Nabaai yɨta pwai sɨduta nawɨ'nya' sɨduta kayaa'nanya' yawɨrya'nei waaya'. Gotɨyai Ataamɨmɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨ wawɨnya davɨ dɨmaremwaaideigɨnyɨ. Yɨsɨla wawɨnya davɨdaasa da dɨnadengɨ,” wɨda'. “Wawɨnya davɨ tɨnnyaba yɨsai sɨduta yawɨrya'nei waayɨkerɨdaa'nyɨ yɨsɨla na'gɨzɨ, gɨmɨ sɨduta tewaanya yawɨ'na jɨthesɨ. ‘Nabaai gɨmɨ sɨduta kayaa'na yawɨ'na jɨthesɨra,’ gɨthɨwa. Yɨsɨla sa' gɨmɨ manɨnnesɨ,” wɨdɨna. “Gɨmɨ na'gɨzɨ dɨvaidesɨ,” wɨdɨna ya'.
Yuta jɨlɨkyaawarya yuya Gotɨyai kwaakevɨdaa'nyɨ yavɨkaryakera Ataamɨ mwaaidɨsɨyaba makwasaaba'. Kamakwasaaba' Ataamɨ yuyaraavɨ yaya wɨda'.

Sagaa' Gotɨyai da' “Ataamɨ gavei mwaalya sa' kayaa'nanyabwi yɨ'. Nɨmɨ a'mwe gamɨnyɨne' yavɨkarima! A'mwe sa' gamɨnyɨ wɨgaimwagathesɨra,” da' Gotɨyai. Sara daka Gotɨyai Ataamɨmɨ se naanga marakakei wa'dɨ'nyɨ Ataamɨmɨre laasarɨ' galalɨvɨ'mwagamaa'na yaka gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' yɨhula yajɨda'na ya'. Yajɨda'na yaka a'mwevɨ laasarɨ' yavɨkarya'. Kyavɨkarya' Ataamɨ kadɨkaava' Gotɨyai a'mwe' wɨmaarina ya'. Wɨmaarina kya' a'mwevɨ Ataamɨ wanganaka “Nɨmɨjɨ avaalya'gɨnyɨra,” wɨdɨna. “Gotɨyai nɨmɨre laasarɨ' nyɨlɨvɨ'mwagakaka gyavɨkariwake'ne' ‘A'mwe'gɨ,’ gɨthɨdeinyɨra,” wɨdɨna ya'. Sayabadaa'nyɨ dahaa' a'mwe pwai ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ sawaaryabadaasɨ yagalya'makuna yojɨ a'mwe' kwala maarɨna yojɨ gamɨre a'mwesɨ mwaalɨna yakɨlyɨyagaa' kɨyoi yune kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai wɨdɨna ya' “Kɨrɨmɨre kaimɨraaya jawakɨnyidewaaihɨlyɨra. Nabaai yɨkurɨyaawiarajɨ mala kayaawaryarajɨ jɨlɨkyaawaryarajɨ yuyangɨ dɨmaremwaalyidewaaihɨlyɨra.” Kannyɨmaayawaarɨ sawaarɨ wagɨla muvwa'nya'.
Gotɨyai gamɨ yavɨkaryakengɨ tɨnna dara wanganake' tewaanya naanga wa'dɨsɨ wanganakengɨra. Yɨrɨka ata pwina ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwai mi'nanyɨra sagaa'.
Yɨrɨka mudɨke' kavura' Gotɨyai gannya wawɨnya mi'na yaka kwazaaka mwaala'. “Yɨrɨka daryaai daryaai daryaai darɨ' sagaa'ne sa' gavinya'nesɨra,” wɨda' Gotɨyai.

Kamaala sai sɨdu'nakei a'mwevɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai jɨhɨthaka? ‘Kɨrɨmɨ yɨsɨla yɨta dangɨdaa'nyɨ mamaranyɨkanesɨ,’ jɨhɨthako?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe' wɨdɨna “Yɨsɨlya nakajanga yawɨ'manɨgoi. Yɨsɨla yɨta wawɨnyavɨ tɨnnyaba waayɨkerɨdaa'nyɨ naarɨmɨ mamaranakanesɨ. Yɨta darɨ yɨme'nakwoihɨjɨ balɨna yakade'naalyɨ,” wɨdɨna. Wɨdɨna kya' kamaalyai wɨdɨna “Kɨrɨmɨ dɨvalyidewaaihi mɨka. Kɨrɨmɨ kayaa'nanya pɨnɨnna tewaanya pɨnɨnna yawɨ'na jidewaaihɨlyɨra,” wɨdɨna. “Kɨrɨmɨ Gotɨyaibɨ' jɨma'nyidewaaihɨlyɨ. Sa'na nabaai Gotɨyai yawɨ'manɨ',” wɨdɨna. Kamaalyai mi'na wɨdɨna kya', sagaa' a'mwe' tɨnna wanganake' “Yɨsɨla maranyɨna yɨma!” da'. Sara daka maranyɨna ya'. Nabaai gamɨre kwalaangerɨ kumarya' a'mwei yɨsɨlyai maranyɨna ya'. Tɨvi'na maranyɨna kya' kɨrɨmɨ sawaai kunya yawɨragi. Yawɨragɨla dara yennagɨlya' “Kannya maaya'naai daaka!” Dahɨlegaa' wagɨla kuvwa'na' yɨkɨwasa gipwaina, kannya yɨra'nyɨna yagi.

Sawɨsaburɨ Gotɨyai wawɨnyavɨ kaanya yamaryɨna. Yamaryɨna yadaa'nyɨ Ataamɨjɨ gannya a'mwesɨ sawaai gamɨnyɨ wɨ'nagɨla yɨkaavɨlyavɨ kɨma'nyawɨ lɨka yulya'na yagi. Yulya'dakɨlyɨ Gotɨyai jaka wɨdɨna “Gawɨ mwaaihɨlo?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwei wɨda' “Purinya kiwaa gu'nɨwa. Kannya maayainyɨ lɨka yulyake,” wɨda'. Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Sa'na aai kagɨthɨwakaka? ‘Yɨsɨla mamaranɨnnesɨra,’ gɨthɨwa'de' danɨwaana?” wɨdɨna ya'. Wɨdɨna kya' Ataamɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe nyɨjaavagɨne da' yɨsɨla kanyɨmaariwa' nɨwana.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe' wɨda' “Nɨmɨnyɨ kamaalyai kwaasɨyagaala kanyɨdɨwa' yɨsɨla maranyɨna yɨwana.”

Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' kamaalyarɨ Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Sayaba kamaala sɨvɨlata maaya daigɨ labwatavamarina jaho'deigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara kwarajɨ savɨre kaimɨraayara kwarajɨ sɨmɨlɨka winadɨvɨ' mala tannɨpɨ'de'na wɨjɨwaakɨderera,” wɨdɨna. “Gamɨre sɨvidaahunnyavɨ kayaaka yɨgaidɨza'ne' gɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ gɨvɨza'jɨvaladeigɨnyɨ,” wɨdɨna ya' kamaalyarɨ.
Gotɨyai a'mwevɨ wɨdɨna “Mudangegaa' gɨnnya kaimɨraayai ma'daa'giyagaa' daanga naanga gɨvɨnade'gɨnyɨra. Sara yɨja' gɨnnya a'mwerɨ yɨlaaya jɨhaidesɨ. Nabaai gamɨ gɨmaremwaaladelyɨ,” wɨdɨna ya'.

Gotɨyai Ataamɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Sayaba ada' gɨmɨ sara yɨwaanya sa'ne' nɨmɨ kwaakevakɨ kurɨvaarɨya wakɨdeinyɨ. Kwaka'muri gɨmɨ wapaaya nya'ne wawɨnya naanga yadɨ sagaa' gɨmɨnyɨ maa'na naanga ginadeigɨnyɨ. Yuyagaa' kwaihwaainakeigɨ mwaala'gɨzɨyagaa' gɨmɨ sara jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Kwaakejɨsɨ gyavɨkaryagɨnyaigɨ gɨmɨ bala'giyagaa' gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' kwaaka ayɨna yɨma'nadezɨkɨ,” wɨdɨna ya'.

Mi'na wɨdɨna yaka Gotɨyai yaawɨhɨlaake' maarɨna yaka kannya yavɨkarina yakewaai maarɨna yagɨla kannya marira'nyɨna yagi. Ataamɨ a'mwevɨ wɨda' “Yɨva' gɨthɨwe sa' gɨnnya yaya naange' gɨthɨwa.” A'mwe yuyaraavɨ kuvɨnaange' yɨma'nade'nanyɨra. Ataamɨjɨ Yɨvasɨ sawaai kunya kayaa'na yawɨ'na, tewaanna yawɨ'na yadi' mwaalagi. “Yɨsɨla gaalya'ne' nyɨna yakɨri gazagaasagaa' namwaalyɨkadɨka!” daka Gotɨyai wɨdaasɨna. Sara wɨdaasɨna yaka “Yɨta tewaanyarɨna maremwaaipɨ'deraava,” daka wawɨnyavɨ mwasɨlaa ejelɨya dameraavɨ wɨmwaaiha'.

Ataamɨjɨ Yɨvasɨ sawaai kaimaleraarɨ wɨmwaaihagi. Kenɨ gannya wawɨnyavɨ yadaasɨ Aivelɨ jɨlɨkyaawaryaraavɨ maremwaalɨna. Pɨgaa' Kenɨ wawɨnyavɨdaasɨ wapaaya maarɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨmaaryɨna. Aivelɨ sipɨzipɨya tewaanyai maaraka Gotɨyarɨ wɨmaaryɨna. Kumaaryagi tawanakei wɨmaaryaka Aivelɨmɨna Gotɨyai yɨlaaya yɨna ya'. Wapaaya wɨmaaryaka Kenɨmɨna jɨkurya yɨna ya'. Jɨkurya yɨna kya' Kenɨ sɨnna tɨka kudava' sagaa' Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Kenɨ sɨnna tɨka magɨthavanna! Kayaa'nanyabwi minnera!” Wɨla dɨvi wawɨnyavɨ a'mwera mamwaalyaba Kenɨjɨ Aivelɨjɨ saraai mwaaidakɨri Kenɨ Aivelɨmɨ tamakɨna. Tamakɨna kya' dɨvi sagaa' Gotɨyai Kenɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Jɨhwaalaangei gazɨyaka?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Kenɨ wɨdɨna “Mwanganyɨweinyɨ. Gamɨnyɨ maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ daaka!” Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Jɨhwaarɨ baarɨ' yɨwaa? Jɨhwaalaangare tawejɨ' kwaakevakɨ warɨ'. Dɨvi sagaa' kwaakevakɨ wawɨnya ya'gɨzɨyagaa' wapaaya maalɨke dakanadeigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ gazabazaba yamarina jɨtheigɨnyɨ.” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' sagaa' Kenɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ mala kanyɨramaasa'gɨzɨ gazabazaba mwalamarina yɨdeinyɨ. Yamaryadaa'mujɨ a'mwei nyanganojɨ mala nyɨramakadeinyɨ.” Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Aawano. Sasare' mika.” Wɨdɨna yaka Gotɨyai “Kenɨmɨ mala narabɨka!” daka Kenɨmɨre yamevɨ pɨkarya ya'. Sagaa' Gotɨyaryabadaasɨ Kenɨ kwaaka Nothɨnei kaanna wɨna ya'. Gamɨre kaimɨraayara kwaaka mudɨkeba mwalaaweva kwaari'masannajɨ, pɨradaazannajɨ yuya kunnya saburana yawɨreva yavɨkarye'.

Kwarame naangegaa' 130 Ataamɨ wavɨlavakei gannya kaimale pwai yawakɨna. Yɨva' gawaalɨ' Ataamɨ ganɨmaangeibɨ'nanyai mɨlaka gannya kaimalerɨ ganaange' wɨdɨna “Satai gɨnnya yaya' gɨthɨwana.” Dɨvi sagaa' Satai naanga mena yɨma'nakegaa' kaimale Yɨnozarɨ yawakɨna. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyarɨna majɨ, mwaalɨna yesara Yɨnozai yɨma'nakegaa' ayɨna Gotɨyarɨna dadɨvɨ' mwaale'. Ataamɨjɨ Yɨvasɨ sawaare kaimale taaya mɨlagi. Kwarame 930 kwavɨlava' Ataamɨ bala'. Yɨnozai kaimale Kenanɨmɨ kyawakɨna', Kenanɨ kaimale Maalalelɨmɨ kyawakɨna', Maalalelɨ kaimale Jaaretharɨ yawakɨna'. Jaarethai kaimale Yɨnokɨyarɨ kyawakɨna', Yɨnokɨyai kaimale Metuzalaamɨ yawakɨna'. Gotɨyareburɨ Yɨnokɨyai tewaanna yɨna yaka mabalyakei Gotɨyai maraabɨna ya'. Metuzalaa kaimale Lamekerɨ yawakɨna'. Kwarame 969 wavɨlavakei Metuzalaa bala'. Lamekei kaimale Nowaarɨ yawakɨna'. A'mwe pwara kaimale taaya yawakɨne'. Nowaai kaimale Samɨ, Aamɨ, Jaivetai saraavɨ yawakɨna'.

A'mwerajɨ a'mwejɨ kwala naanga kima'ne' “A'mwengɨ nemɨ kwala maraana!” deva Gotɨyare kuvɨbwaalɨvava maarɨna. Maarɨna kye' kunnya kaimɨraayara a'mwe dɨragɨnya naangera yɨma'ne'. Gotɨyai tɨnna dara wanganake' kayaa'nanyaraavɨ wangana'. “Kayaa'nanyabwi sara yaana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨsara yuyagaa' yesa'na Gotɨyai dɨna “A'mwe atina ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwainanyaraavɨ kwarame ata sɨvɨlɨraai (120) kwavɨlavojɨ wakɨdengɨra kunnya balya'negaa'.” “A'mwera, a'mwe, yaawarya, jɨlɨka, yaawia, yuta, yuya tamakɨdengɨra,” dɨna. Mi'na dɨna yaka Gotɨyai da' “Nowaai a'mwe tewaanyarɨna yɨvainɨdelyɨra.”

Nowaai a'mwe tewaanyai Gotɨyarɨ gya'mwei. Gotɨyai Nowaarɨ wɨdɨna “Sɨpɨya' ange'bɨ' sa' aalyavɨ a'ba yɨlarade' javɨkarideigɨnyɨ. Sɨpɨya maalɨka javɨkaride'na mi'. Sɨpɨya naange' javɨkarideigɨnyɨ. Sɨpɨyavɨre yɨda'na saamɨnaange' anga naangebabɨ' javɨkari! Sɨpɨya' angajɨna lalangyagɨnya'bɨ' javɨkari! Yɨda'na kekina laalayagɨnya'bɨ' sa' duthaakwia! Sɨpɨya' mɨnye'na amwi pɨrɨ' tɨnnyaba pɨrɨ' dakineba pɨrɨ' javɨkari! Yɨrɨtɨnna munyaba yunebanna yunebanna jɨthaakwia! Tɨkurya tɨnnyaba pɨrɨ' a'mwera bulya'ne' kaanya' javɨkari!”

“Aalya naange' yunebanna pɨdɨravadesɨ. Sɨmudɨnya yadɨvɨsaraavɨ yuyaraavɨ aalya naange' wakɨwɨja' maramɨladere. Kɨrɨ' kɨrɨmɨyoihi kɨrɨbwaalɨvavajɨ saraavɨre a'mwengɨjɨ sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlɨna jidengihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨre yagaala gɨthɨdeinyɨ. Sa' jɨlɨkyaawarya yɨkurɨyaawia kɨmaaka pɨyoina pɨyoina sɨpɨyavɨ dɨmarulakɨdengɨ. Jɨlɨkyaawarya yɨkurɨyaawia pɨnɨ pɨyoina ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraaina kɨmaaka mi'. Sa sɨpɨyavɨ dɨmarulakɨdengɨ. Wapaaya ge ge gɨmɨnyɨne sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlapɨ'dengɨne wapaaya jovɨrawakya!” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Nowaai sara yɨna. Mi'na yɨna kya' Gotɨyai Nowaarɨ wɨda' “ A'mwe pwara a'mwe pɨnɨ kayaa'na yadɨvɨsangɨna gɨmɨ tewaanya yadɨnyaigɨnna sarɨmɨ sɨpɨyavɨ dulyidera. Sawɨta ata yuyi ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraai mi'na kajɨnnojɨ burɨke' wakɨdeinyɨra. Yuya baihɨrinɨpɨ'dengɨra,” wɨda' Gotɨyai.

Kwarame naangegaa' 600 sagaa' Nowaarɨ kwavɨlava', gamɨjɨ gannya balaangesɨ sawaare kaimɨraayarajɨ kumɨre balaangejɨ sɨpɨyavɨ kule' Gotɨyai kaanya' tihɨra'. Sɨpɨyavɨ kaanya' mena karihɨra' sawɨta a'mweraare ata sɨvɨlɨraai jɨnna'daa'nyɨ aalɨburɨka naanga yadaa'nyɨ aalɨyɨmɨnya naanga yɨrɨvakegaa' aalya yɨlaabaka kwaakevakɨ aalɨbunya naange' dɨ'na'. Burɨka naanga tɨvi kavawɨra' sagaa' aalɨbunya naange' yunebanna mugunyangɨ kamarulaka' yuya bale'. Sɨpɨya' aalyavɨ a'ba yɨla'dɨsɨ Nowaalyɨ sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlareta yuyajɨ tewaanya mwaale'. Lawe dɨkaai dɨkaai dɨ' kwaakevakɨ aalɨbunya dɨ'nara'.

Nowaai sɨpɨyavɨ wɨla'dɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyai sɨmunya yawɨra'. Yawɨraka yɨhuta wakɨna kya' aalya' walyuina yadaasɨ lawe dɨkaai dɨkaai dɨ' kwavɨlava' aalya maalɨka warɨna kya', sɨpɨya' Ararata mugunyavɨ wara'. Kwara' sawɨta a'mwe pwaraare ata sɨvɨlɨraai kajɨnna' Nowaai sɨpɨyavɨya yɨrɨtɨnnyarɨkɨ baasaka mwasawɨ kaamyaakerɨ marapɨlakwaasɨna ya'. Kwaakevakɨ aalɨbunya wa'dɨsɨ kaamyaakei pɨlakuna. Pɨlakuna kya' Nowaai “Aalya tɨvi kye'nɨgwaimwaawɨ' daa'?” daka mwasawɨ kwaamɨryarɨ marapɨlakwaasɨna ya'. Aalɨbunya' kuna wa'dɨsɨ kwaamɨryai mwalaawia'neba kunewɨ wanganaka ayawɨnna sɨpɨyavɨna bulamwaaina. Bulamwaaina kya' sawɨta ata pwi yaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraai kajɨnna' pɨgaa' Nowaai kwaamɨryarɨ marapɨlakwaasa'. Kamarapɨlakwaasa' sawɨsɨrɨ kwaamɨryai yɨta wolivɨyare kɨwasa' mudɨ'mɨlamaraawɨna ya'. Kamakaba' Nowaai tɨnna wanganaka “Kwaakeva' yaalɨka menanyɨra,” yawɨra'. Kyawɨra' sawɨta ata pwi ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraai kajɨnna' pɨgaa' Nowaai kwaamɨryarɨ kamarapɨlakwaasa' sa' kwaamɨryai yuna kaanna wɨna ya'. Wɨna kya' Nowaai sɨpɨyavɨya kaanya' baasaka wanganaasa'. Tɨnna dara wanganake' kwaake' yaalɨkevɨ wangana'. Mena kwangana' lawe pu'na kwavɨlava' Gotɨyai Nowaarɨ wɨdɨna, “Sarɨmɨ mwasabanna jɨkwalyaabila! Jɨlɨkyaawaryaraavɨ yɨkurɨyaawiaraavɨ dɨvuradɨhalamakwalyaama! Kumɨ sara kwaakevakɨ kwala naanga yariwannɨpɨ'derera.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' sɨpɨyavɨdaa'nyɨ Nowaalyɨ gamɨre gawaalɨsɨ yuya mwasabanna walyaabɨna ye'. Walyaabɨna kye' Nowaai sɨmunya yawɨraka “Gotɨyai neyɨvainɨwake'na nɨmɨ Gotɨyai tewannyarɨna yɨlaaya yɨgalɨde'na jɨlɨkyaawarya yɨkurɨyaawia wɨjaawɨwɨnabɨsa' dɨkevɨ gaayadɨka yɨravɨma!” yawɨraka Gotɨyarɨne simɨnye' lɨvalaaba'. Lɨvalaabaka dɨka marira'na yaka “Jɨlɨkyaawarya yɨkurɨyaawia kɨmaaka mwarikera,” daka maarɨna yaka simɨnye lɨvalaabakevɨ dɨkevɨ marakɨna ya'. Sɨmahurɨka wɨvwasɨ'na yakevɨdaa'nyɨ tɨrɨnya wabatɨrɨnya winnaka Gotɨyai da' “Dɨvi yunegaa' nɨmɨ ye'na sɨmudɨnya yadɨvɨsangɨ maramuneinyɨra.”

Gotɨyai Nowaalyɨ gawaalɨvaanga kwarajɨ kɨnɨdakaavɨ yagaaihɨwɨnya wɨda' “Sarɨmɨ kwala naanga jɨma'nyideihɨlyɨra. Nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaakevakɨ gazabazaba mwalamarina jideihɨlyɨra. Kwaakevakɨ mwaaidɨvɨsajɨ aalyavɨ mwaaidɨvɨsajɨ yuya dɨmaremwaalyidengɨra. Sarɨmɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsa dɨnyideihɨlyɨra. ‘Yɨkurɨyaawia naana!’ dapɨjɨ karamapɨri gamɨre tawe kabwalaawojɨ tɨka nyɨna jideihɨlyɨra.” Gotɨyai sara wɨda'.

“A'mwe pwai a'mwe pwarɨ karamakori gamɨnyɨ tamakɨna jidelyɨra. Malakayaawaryai a'mwe pwarɨ tɨka kadavori gamɨnyɨ tamakɨna jidelyɨra. Nɨmɨ a'mwera nɨmɨbɨsaraavɨ yavɨkarye'na sara dɨramakyideihɨlyɨra,” wɨda' Gotɨyai.

“Yɨraayavɨ nɨmɨre akume yɨlakɨdeinyɨra. Akume wage'bɨsavɨ wanganapɨjɨ da' jawɨryidesɨra. ‘Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨjɨ mwaaidɨvɨta yuyangɨjɨ gannya kɨwɨnya' neda',’ sara jawɨryidesɨra. Aalɨbunya kwaakevakɨ dɨ'narake'bɨsa' nɨmɨ wake' dɨvi mulaabyɨ yadesɨra. Kwaakevakɨ mwaaibɨzangɨ mamaramɨlyɨ yadesɨra,” wɨda'.

Nowaai wɨla gɨraipɨwawɨnya burɨda'. Burɨnna yaka gɨraipɨzɨla maarɨna, gɨraipɨzɨla aalya' gulyavɨ ma'mwagikɨna aalya yɨrɨke' waainɨya' maranyɨna ya'. Aalya yɨrɨke' maranaka sɨmunya myawɨrya'. Sara yaka angevɨ kannya maayai se warɨna ya'. Se kwara' Aamɨ, Kainanɨmɨre ganɨmaangei, Nowaai kannya maayai warakerɨ wangana'. Wanganaka gannya kɨdaraarɨ mwasawɨ mwaalagɨlyaraarɨ sa' wɨda', Aamɨ. Kuda' Samɨjɨ Jaivetalyɨ saraai yɨvɨta maarɨna, kɨrɨnɨmaangerɨ bwakakɨna tɨnna mwanganyɨ yagi. Dɨvi sagaa' Nowaai dɨkaa'na yaka Aamɨ gawaalɨvaangei yake'na yawɨra'. Sɨmunya yawɨ'na “Aamɨ kayaa'nanya maalɨka yɨvanɨka kɨrɨ' gawaalɨvaangei kayaa'nanya naanga yadengɨra,” yawɨraka wɨda' “Kainanɨmɨre avaalyara Kainanɨmɨ wɨmwaaihakera wɨmaremwaaibɨ'delyɨra. Samɨmɨna dɨvi nɨmɨre Gotɨyai tewaanya wiadelyɨra. Yɨ Gotɨyai Jaivetare kaimɨraaya kwala naanga yɨma'nyɨna, yɨ a'mwe naangera yɨma'nyɨna yɨpɨ'derera. Kainanɨmɨre kaimɨraayara Samɨmɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨne Jaivetare kaimɨraayaraavɨne wawɨnya wɨdaayɨpɨ'derera,” wɨda' Nowaai.
Nowaare mudangegaa' kwarame naanga (950) kwavɨlava' Nowaai bala'.

Jaivetai kuvɨnɨmaangei Gomajɨ Maahohɨlyɨ Mathalyɨ Jaavanɨjɨ Tuvalɨjɨ Mesekalyɨ Tɨraazɨlyɨ saraavɨ yawakɨna'. Aamɨ kuvɨnɨmaangei Kuzɨlyɨ Yɨzɨpɨyalyɨ Putɨyalyɨ Kainanɨjɨ saraavɨ yawakɨna'. Kuzi ganɨmaangei Nɨmɨrothɨ yawakɨna'. Dɨvi sagaa' Nɨmɨrothɨ a'mwe dɨragɨnyai, malyai yɨma'na'. Anga naangeba Baivelɨ, Erekɨ, Aakathɨ, Kalɨne kwaaka Sinaa mannakeba Nɨmɨrothɨ maremwaalakebera. Maremwaalaka kwaaka Azɨrɨya anga naangeba Ninɨva, Rewavothɨ-Yɨya, Kaala, Rezanɨ anga sa mada'.

Kainanɨ kɨrɨnɨmaangei Saaithonɨjɨ Etɨlyɨ saraarɨ yawakɨna'. Kainanɨmɨrera Jevuzɨyara, Amoyara, Gihaazɨyara, Ivayara, Aakayara, Sɨnɨyara, Aavathɨyara, Semaarayara, Aamaatɨyara Kainanɨmɨrera sara yɨma'nyɨna ye'.
Samɨ kuvɨnɨmaangei Elamɨ, Azu, Aapakɨzathɨ, Lutɨ, Aaramɨ yawakɨna'. Sa' Nowaarɨ gawaalɨvaangera a'mwe yuyaraavɨ kwaakevakɨ mwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ yawakɨne'.

Kwaakevakɨ a'mwe mwaalesara yagaala avaala pɨrɨ'na dɨne'. Kumɨ sara kwaaka Sinaana kaanna wɨna ye'. Wɨna yeva dɨne' “Gotɨyai sara neda' ‘Yuyaba dɨmwalamaryɨla!’ nedaka kɨrɨ' nemɨ kwaaka gazabazaba mamwalamaryaanna! Dava nemɨ a'mwe naangaina yɨma'nyɨna yaadeine. Nemɨ anga naanga madaathe' nabaai anga saamɨnaange' sɨlya'bɨsa' madaathera,” dɨne'. Mi'na dɨneva anga madaapɨjɨ Gotɨyai daka “Nɨmɨ walanganaawɨma!” daka walaaba'. Walaabaka wanganaka “A'mwera kunnya yawɨ'na yapɨjɨyavɨ sara nyɨpɨdɨka!” daka “A'mwera yagaala ge' ge' dɨpɨ'de'nana,” daka taalɨta kagɨnyɨwaga' sagaa' yagaala avaalya' desara sagaa' yagaala ge' ge' dɨna ye'. Yagaala ge' ge' dɨna yeva “Anga naangeba madɨna yɨvanɨgo' warana!” deva mamaje'. Anga mamajara kye' Gotɨyai wɨdaasɨna kya' anga gazabazabanna mwalamaryɨna ye'. Anga naangeba yosɨnna yeva sara yagalya'ma'nɨka sabanne' dɨnɨkesɨ Baivelɨ. Yagaala ge' ge' yɨma'nyɨna yakebanne yaya' Baivelɨ sara wo'nyɨna ya'.

Samɨmɨre gawaalɨvaangei Aapakɨzathɨyai ganɨmaangei Kainanɨmɨ yawakɨna'. Yɨ Kainanɨ ganɨmaangei Selaamɨ yawakɨna'. Yɨ Selaa ganɨmaangei Eva, yɨ Eva ganɨmaangei Pelehɨ, yɨ Pelehɨ ganɨmaangei Rewɨ, yɨ Rewɨ ganɨmaangei Seruhɨ, yɨ Seruhɨ ganɨmaangei Naawo, yɨ Naawo ganɨmaangei Teraamɨ yawakɨna'. A'mwe dara kuvɨbwaalɨvava kuvɨraayava yawakɨne'.

A'mwe Teraa kuvɨnɨmaangei Evɨramɨ, Naawo, Aaranɨ yawakɨna'. Aaranɨ ganɨmaangei Lotɨmɨ yawakɨna'. Gamɨre kwaaka Kalɨthɨya saba Aaranɨ bala'. Kabala' Naawo Aaranɨmɨre garaavaanga' Milɨkaavɨ maara'. Nabaai Evɨramɨ Saraaya' maara'. Kamaara' Saraaya' kaimɨraavɨmaaya' mwaala'. A'mwe naanga Teraajɨ, Evɨramɨjɨ, Saraayasɨ, Lotɨjɨ, sa angeba E kwaaka Kalɨthɨya mannɨkebadaa'nyɨ wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yeva “Kwaaka Kainanɨnennava,” deva angeba Aaranɨ bɨna yeva mwaalɨna. Mwaalɨna kye' saba Teraa bala'.

Gotɨyai Evɨramɨmɨ jaka wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya angebadaa'nyɨ dɨwona! Gɨmɨjɨ avaalyaraavɨ jahalya'makwo! Kwaaka anga dɨmwaaide pɨbanna kagivwarɨdaakwa'mujɨ dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ gɨnnya kaimɨraayangɨ maremwaalɨdeinyɨ. Gɨmɨrera kwala naanga yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere. Gɨmɨ a'mwe naangei jɨma'nadeigɨnyɨ. Yɨ gɨmɨnyɨ jɨwaalɨvavaavɨna a'mwe kwaakevakɨ yuneba mwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ tewaanna yɨdere. Kumɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne tewaanna kyapɨjɨ kumɨnyɨne tewaanna yɨdeinyɨ. Kumɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne kayaa'na kyapɨjɨ nɨmɨ kumɨnyɨne kayaa'na yɨdeinyɨra,” wɨda' Gotɨyai.
Gotɨyai Evɨramɨmɨ sara kuda' Evɨramɨ angeba Aaranɨdaa'nyɨ wɨna. Kwaaka Kainanɨnei gannya balaanga Saraayasɨ Lotɨ gathaakaangare gawaalɨsɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuyajɨ kaanna makuna ya'.

Evɨramɨ angeba Sekemɨ kwaaka Kainanɨ mannɨkeba wavɨla'na yaka yɨ'darya More mwaalɨna. Mwaalɨna kya' Gotɨyai Evɨramɨmɨ wɨda' “Kwaaka Kainanɨ yuneba jɨwaalɨvaangeraavɨ kɨnɨdakaavihɨrɨne yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨra.” Mi'na kuda' Evɨramɨ “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yɨgalɨma! Jɨlɨkyaawaryarɨ wɨjaavɨma!” daka simɨnye' lɨvalaanna yaka jɨlɨkyaawarya gaayadɨka mariravake' dɨke' nasɨ'na yakevɨdaasɨ Gotɨyarɨ sɨmatɨrɨnya winna'.
Dɨvi sagaa' Evɨramɨ mugunyavɨ angeba Betelɨ adaihɨsabanna wɨna. Sabanna wawaka angeba Betelɨ angeba Aayɨ yaareba gannya selɨ-anga madaka Gotɨyarɨna yɨlaaya ya'.

Pɨgaa' wapaaya kunegaa' mɨjɨkegaa' Evɨramɨ Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨna wɨna. Yɨzɨpɨna wawaka gannya balaangevɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨ tewaanya'gɨnyɨ. Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyara gwanganapɨjɨ ‘A'mwe sa' maraana!’ dapɨjɨ nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨra. Gɨmɨ duthathera ‘A'mwe sai nya'mwelyɨra.’ ‘Naramakɨpɨka!’ da'gɨzɨ sara duthathe'gɨnyɨ. Sara kuda'gɨzɨ kave wanganakɨna nyɨpɨ'deinyɨ,” wɨda'.

Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyara kunnya maremwaalakerɨ wɨdɨna yadɨvɨ' “Peroyaigɨ, nemɨre a'mwe naangeigɨnyɨra.” Peroyare a'mwe naangera Saraayavɨ wanganeva Peroyarɨ wɨde' “A'mwe sa' tewaanyasɨra.” Mi'na kude' A'mwe Pero Saraayavɨ gannya angevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ya'. Wɨmwaaihɨna yaka Evɨramɨmɨne a'mwerajɨ a'mwejɨ sangɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsangɨ wɨjaavɨna ya'. Nabaai jɨlɨkyaawarya naanga wɨjaava'.

Gotɨyai Peroyalyɨ gamɨre maremwaaiderajɨ saraavɨ Saraayavɨna kayaaka yɨgaina ya'. Kayaaka yɨgaina kya' Pero Evɨramɨmɨ “Dulaamo!” kuda' Evɨramɨ angevɨ wɨlɨna kya' Pero wɨda' “Baa'na yɨvanɨgɨna? ‘A'mwe' nɨmɨresɨra,’ manyɨjɨwa'dɨnyaigɨ. Dahaa' gɨnnya a'mwevɨ dɨmakwo!” Sara wɨdaka “Evɨramɨjɨ gamɨrerajɨ yarai wɨpɨka!” Pero gannya wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ “Evɨramɨmɨ wɨdasaawɨna jɨla!” wɨda'.
Evɨramɨ angeba Betelɨna gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ jɨlɨkyaawaryajɨ maryagalaawɨna ya'. Yagalaawɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨna “Yɨlaaya yɨgalɨma!” daka “Su!” wɨda'.

Evɨramɨ bulɨmakaawoya gɨlyɨvɨta naangejɨyai mwaala'. Nabaai Lotɨ bulɨmakaawoya gɨlyɨvɨta kɨnɨjɨyai avaalyaba mwaala'. Mwaalagɨlyaraare jɨlɨkyaawarya wapaaya nya'ne maalɨka wara'. Sa'na Evɨramɨmɨre jɨlɨkyaawarya maremwaaidɨvɨsara Lotɨmɨre jɨlɨkyaawarya maremwaaidɨvɨsara maanga dɨnyɨna ye'. Maanga dɨnyɨna kye' Evɨramɨ Lotɨmɨ wɨda' “Mayagaala madakanera! Pɨba kwaaka naanga warɨka. Gɨmɨ tuta pimagɨna dɨwona! Nɨmɨ pimagɨna wɨdera.” Sara kuda' Lotɨ waraata aalya Jothanɨ saba aalɨnakeba dara wangana' “Ai, Gotɨyare kwaaka tewaanyaba wa'dɨsɨ kɨrɨ' mwaaidɨ daaka? Gotɨyare wawɨnyabɨsabe,” daka Lotɨ walaawaka angeba Sothomɨ angeba Gamora aya kɨba mwaala'. Sothomɨ mwaalyarajɨ Gamora mwaalyarajɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanaangera mwaale'. Lotɨ kwalaawa' Evɨramɨ kwaaka Kainanɨ mwaalɨna ya'.

Evɨramɨ mwaalɨna kya' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Pina pina dɨmaranganamarya! Yuyaba dangadeva gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ. Gɨmɨ tɨnna kwangana'gɨzɨ saba gɨmɨrebe. Nabaai gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara a'mwe naanga yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera. A'mwera kwaatɨrya ata gibɨ'de' mɨka. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraaya kwalaalya mwaaibɨzangɨ ata gibɨ'de' mɨka.” Mi'na kuda' Evɨramɨ kaanna yamarina yaka yɨ'darya Maamɨre yɨ'darɨgidɨkusaba mwaalaka Gotɨyarɨne simɨnye' lɨvalaaba'.

Pɨgaa' a'mwe naanga kingɨya daraai daraalyarajɨ kumɨrerajɨ beva angeba Sothomɨ mwaalyarajɨ anga pɨbanyarajɨ saraavɨ baramakɨna. Baramakɨna kye' a'mwe kwalaalyara kabale' pwara mugunya pɨnɨngɨna lɨkaanya wɨna ye'. Lɨkaanya wɨna kye' a'mwe naangera “Nedaayadɨvɨsarera,” deva Lotɨjɨ pwarajɨ saraavɨ wɨla galyɨrakɨna ye'. Galyɨrakɨna yeva anga yuyabadaa'nyɨ gɨlyɨvɨta naanga yɨpalamaa'na. Yɨpalamaa'na kye' a'mwe pwai Evɨramɨmyawɨnna kaanyɨve'na wɨna yaka Evɨramɨmɨ wɨda' “Malyara anga Sothomɨ mwaalyaraavɨ baramakeva Lotɨmɨ wɨla yɨrakɨwaa'.” Sara kuda' Evɨramɨ gannya aawɨlasaraavɨ jaka wɨdaka malyaraavɨ mɨdɨnna ya'. Mɨdɨnna kya' sawɨta kujɨnna' malyaraavɨ tamɨna kye' pwara lɨka wɨna kye' pwaraavɨ tamɨna ye'. Tamɨna kye' Evɨramɨ Lotɨjɨ a'mwe pwarajɨ gɨlyɨvɨta naangejɨ ayawɨnna makabɨna ye'.

Sothomɨ maremwaalakelyɨ Melɨkɨzɨthekɨ anga Saalemɨ maremwaalakelyɨ saraai Evɨramɨmɨ wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yagi. Melɨkɨzɨthekɨ Evɨramɨmɨ wapaaya wɨjaavɨna yaka Gotɨyarei yagaala wɨda' “Gotɨyai sɨgunyasɨ kwaakesɨ wakyaakei gɨmɨnyɨ tewaanya gyɨnɨkelyɨra. Gamɨzai gɨmɨjɨ yagɨla gɨmɨnyɨne yɨkamaangeraavɨ ye'mwannaramyawaaihɨ. Gotɨyai tewaanyalyɨra.” Kuda' Evɨramɨ gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa gazabazaba kwala marapɨgɨla'na kya' gɨlyɨvɨta naanga atɨraalya wa'dɨ'nyɨ Evɨramɨ gɨlyɨvɨta pɨrɨ' Melɨkɨzɨthekɨ sarɨna yanga wɨjaavɨna ya'.

Sothomɨ maremwaalakei Evɨramɨmɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨ ma'mwaanyangɨdaasɨ a'mweraavɨjɨ a'mwengɨjɨ yanga nyɨjaama! Gɨlyɨvɨsa gɨmɨrengɨra.” Kuda' Evɨramɨ wɨda' “Nemɨ wapaaya pɨnɨ nɨwo. Mi'na nɨwo'na warana! A'mwe daraai dalyarajɨ kumɨrerajɨ pwara nɨmɨnyɨ marɨgaidaa'na nyawaaihasaraavɨ gɨlyɨvɨta pɨnɨ dumaarya! Sa' Gotɨyai nyɨgaimwadelyɨra. Gɨmɨnyɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa mamaari yɨdeinyɨra. Nɨmɨ sara ya'mujɨ gɨmɨ nadɨthɨka ‘Nɨmɨ Evɨramɨmɨ a'mwe naangei wɨmwaaihe!’ dɨwa,” wɨda'.

Dɨvi sagaa' Evɨramɨ waja kya'na' Gotɨyai Evɨramɨmɨ wɨda' “Lɨka nadɨkwosɨ'dɨka! Nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨ mwata tinya'na saabyainyɨbɨsainyɨ gɨmaredaavɨdeinyɨra. Gɨlyɨvɨta naanga gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ.” Kuda' sa' Evɨramɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Nyɨbwaalɨ' nyɨjaadeinyɨ daaka? Kanyɨjaava'gɨzɨ nɨmɨ kabala'mujɨ Elɨyaizai nyɨdaayadei nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya mamaari yadelyɨra.” Mi'na kuda' Gotɨyai wɨdɨna ya' “Elɨyaizai gɨlyɨvɨsa mamaari yadengɨra. Jɨwaalɨ' kaimɨraaya pwai kyawakɨna'gɨzɨ gamɨzai maaradengɨra. Sɨlɨngaamɨnyangɨ jɨlanganaawa! Sɨlɨngaamɨnya kwalaalya warɨka ke'nɨngɨ jɨlanganaawa! Gɨmɨre kaimɨraaya kwalaalya avaaina yɨma'nɨpɨ'dengɨra.” Sara kuda' Evɨramɨ “Gotɨyai nebwi nyɨdɨwa',” yawɨraka wɨlɨmwagara'. Sara kulɨmwagara' Gotɨyai dɨnyɨna ya' “A'mwe sai sara yawɨ'manɨkei dahaa' a'mwe yɨda'maraangei wɨmwaaihɨwe'na dɨwana.” Sara dɨnyɨna yaka Gotɨyai wɨda' “Gɨmɨnyɨ kwaaka Kalɨthɨyadaasɨ gɨmakulaabena kwaaka dava gɨzaave.” Kuda' Evɨramɨ wɨda' “Gotɨyaigɨ, kwaake' nɨmɨre' be yawɨta'na yawɨrɨde'neka?” Wɨdɨna kya' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Jɨlɨkyaawaryara dɨnyɨmakulaama!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Evɨramɨ sara yɨna ya'. Mi'na makulaabaka bulatamaworipu'na yaka wakɨna ya'. Yuta maalɨkeraavɨ tamakɨna ya'. Yuta pwara pɨlavamarina “Mɨwɨta tɨka nyɨna yaana!” deva sagaa' Evɨramɨ tɨnna wanganna yaka marirɨgalaasɨna ya'. Dɨvidaasɨ nyɨlyai walakya'negaa' nyɨla daavɨna kya' Evɨramɨ pɨgasaai waja ya'nyɨna yaka lɨka yɨna ya'. Mi'na lɨka yɨna kya' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Evɨramɨ, gɨmɨ a'mwe nei jɨma'nadeigɨ sagaa' dɨvaideigɨnyɨ. Dahaa'na mɨ'. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara kwaaka pɨbanna wɨna yapɨjɨ saba mwaaibɨ'derera. Kwaaka saba mwaalyara ‘A'mwera kumɨzara wawɨnya nedaayɨpɨ'dera yaadeinaava,’ kadapɨjɨ yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera. Wawɨnya wɨdaayɨpɨ'dera kyapɨjɨ kwarame naanga 400 kwavɨlavojɨ sara yɨkamaangera yɨpɨ'derera. Nɨmɨ karama'mujɨ yɨ gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara ayawɨnna wɨdasaabɨdere. Yɨ gɨlyɨvɨkɨraya kɨnɨjɨ kaanna makabɨna yɨpɨ'dere,” wɨda'. Mi'na kuda' sawɨsa' mena kajɨnna' Evɨramɨ dara wanganake' “Ai, dɨke' mɨwɨsangɨ tɨnnyaba danapɨraala'manɨka!” Kada' Gotɨyai gannya kɨwɨnya' wɨda' “Kwaaka davakɨ sarɨmɨnɨdakaavihɨrɨna yɨhɨzaawevakɨ,” wɨda' Gotɨyai.

Saraaya' Evɨramɨmɨre balaanga' kaimɨraavɨmaayasɨra. Gamɨre wɨdaayade' Yɨzɨpɨ kwaakebadaa'nyɨ mwaalake' Ehaasɨra. Mwaalɨna kya' Saraaya' Evɨramɨmɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨ Ehaavɨ dɨmaaka! Kamaara'gɨzɨ gamɨ nɨmɨnyɨne kaimɨraayangɨ mɨladengɨra.” Sara kuda' Evɨramɨ Ehaavɨ maarɨna. Maarɨna kya' Ehaa' kaimɨraavɨmunya yaka “Nɨmɨ munya'nyɨ a'mwe naange'nyɨ Saraaya' kaimɨraavɨmaaya' maalɨkesɨ,” yawɨ'na. Sara yawɨ'na kya' Saraaya' Evɨramɨmɨ wɨda' “Ehaa' nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Saraaya' maalɨkesɨ,’ kunya yawɨ'na yɨwa'dɨ'.” Kuda' Evɨramɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨresɨra. Gɨnnya kunya yawɨra'gɨzɨ sara ja!” Mi'na kuda' Saraaya' Ehaavɨna sɨmɨlɨka wɨlɨna yaka “Wawɨnya naanga ja!” dade' kya' Ehaa' “Saraaya' kayaa'na nyɨvanɨ'. Nɨmɨ kaanna wɨma!” daka wɨna ya'.

Kaanna wɨna yaka a'mwera mamwaalya kuneba aalɨyɨmɨnyavɨ sabanna Ehaa' mwalaawɨna ya'. Kamwalaawa' Gotɨyare mamaayai ejelɨyai wanganaka “Ehaa' aaga' kamwaalɨka,” daka wɨda' “Ehaa', gazɨne'gɨnaka?” Sara kuda' Ehaa' wɨdɨna “Saraayavɨna lɨka bena bamwaaihena.” Wɨdɨna kya' wɨda' “Saraayayawɨnna jahalaawa! Yagalaawa'gɨzɨ gamɨ savɨ du'nadera. Kale gyɨwake'gɨnyɨ gwangamanɨkelyɨra Gotɨyai. Nabaai kaimɨraayai Yɨzɨmelɨ dɨmide'gɨnyɨ. Gamɨzai kavɨdaayai malakayaawaryaibɨsai yuyaraavɨ mala tamɨna yadelyɨra. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara kwala naanga yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera.” Sara kuda' Ehaa' dɨna ya' “Gotɨyai nyangadelyɨra.” Dɨvidaa'nyɨ Evɨramɨ kwarame 86 kwavɨlava' sagaa' Ehaa' Yɨzɨmelɨmɨ mɨla'.

Evɨramɨ kwarame 99 wavɨlavakerɨ Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyainyɨ dɨragɨnyainyɨra.” Gotɨyai sara wɨdɨna kya' “Gotɨyai naangelyɨra,” daka walaruta'nyɨna. Walaruta'nyɨna kya' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Nɨnnya kɨwɨnya' gɨzaavɨde' gazagaasagaa' nebwi waragothesɨra. A'mwe gera geraavɨ kuvɨnɨmaangeigɨ jɨma'nade'na gɨnnya yaya' Evɨraamɨ wo'nadeigɨnyɨra. Gɨmɨrera pwara a'mwe naangera yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera. Sarɨmɨre Gotɨyainyɨra. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ Kwaaka Kainanɨ gɨmɨnyɨnajɨ gɨmɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨnajɨ yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨ. Gɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨnyɨ kaimɨraayarajɨ wawɨnya gɨthaayadɨvɨsarajɨ saihi kɨlaakejɨkɨ pɨkarya da'nyɨna jideihɨlyɨra. Bwaranyai sawɨta atina ata purɨdaaasɨ dawaai kajɨnnojɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ pɨkarya davɨna jideihɨlyɨra. Pɨkarya wanganapɨjɨ nɨmɨre kɨwɨnya' jawɨridesɨra. A'mwe pwai ‘Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ pɨkarya madapɨnera!’ kadozɨ ‘Namwaaladɨka!’ dapɨjɨ Evɨraamɨjɨyaraavɨ yuyagaa' yagalya'mavaderɨ duthaasidelyɨra. Gɨnnya balaanga' Seraa' yaya mudɨka kwo'nojɨ gɨmɨnyɨna kaimɨraayai mɨladesɨra. Gamɨ sa' kuvɨnaange' a'mwe gera geraavɨ yɨma'nadesɨra.” Sara kuda' Evɨraamɨ jɨka gyaka wɨda' “Yuya'naai a'mwe ne'naalyɨ. Seraa' kaimɨraayai gara mɨladevaka? O, Yɨzɨmelɨmɨna jawɨ'delyɨra.” Tɨvi'na kuda' Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Yɨzɨmelɨmɨ tewaanya yɨde'na a'mwe naangeraavɨre kuvɨnɨmaangei yɨma'nadelyɨ. Sa'na kɨrɨ' kwarame pɨrɨ' kwavɨlavojɨ Seraa' kaimɨraayai gɨmɨnyɨna kamɨlojɨ ‘Aazakɨ,’ duthatheigɨnyɨ. Nabaai gamɨnyɨna nɨmɨre kɨwɨnya' wɨjaavɨdeinyɨ.” Tɨvi'na wɨdaka Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yagalya'ma'na ya'.
Yagalya'ma'na yakegaa' sagaa' Evɨraamɨjɨ a'mwe yuyarajɨ kunnya kɨlaakejɨkɨ pɨkarya da'nyɨna ye'.

Evɨraamɨ Maamɨre yɨ'daryawɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyai bwangana'. Evɨraamɨ gannya tɨkuryaba mwaalaka a'mwe daraai dalyaraavɨ wanganaka walyuna yaka ata bwa'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨjɨ dava dalamwaalyɨla! Wapaaya aalya sarɨmɨnyɨne maarɨdeinyɨ. Aalya yɨnapɨjɨ wapaajɨ napɨjɨ dɨwideihɨlyɨra.” Kumɨ “Yo,” sara kude' Evɨraamɨ gannya angevɨ yarai wɨlɨna, Seraavɨ wɨdaka “Wapaaya yɨdɨka ja!” kaanyɨve'na wawaka jɨlɨkyaawarya maalɨka dɨwɨnyai maarɨna. Maarɨna kya' wɨdaayadei gurya davɨna yɨdɨka yɨna yake' Evɨraamɨ wapaaya kumaarya' kumɨ nyɨna. Mi'na nyɨna yeva a'mwera Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨde' “Gɨmɨre balaange' Seraa' gawɨ mwaalɨka?” Sara kude' Evɨraamɨ wɨda' “Angevɨ wɨlarɨ'.” Kuda' pwai wɨdɨna “Kwarame mudɨke' kwavɨlavojɨ nɨmɨ yagalaawɨdehaa' Seraa' kaimɨraayarɨ mɨladesɨra.” Mi'na kuda' Seraa' yagaala davɨ wɨ'naka yɨmunna jɨka gyaka dɨna “Naarɨmɨ sayoinaai a'mwe neyoinaalyɨra. Kaimɨraayai gara mɨlɨde'nanaka! Nɨmɨ a'mwe ne'nyɨra.” Sara yawɨ'na kya' Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨda' “Seraa' jɨka baa'na gyɨwaka? Gotɨyainyɨ yuyangɨ yɨdeinyɨra. Gamɨ sa' dɨwɨja' kwarame pɨrɨ' kwavɨlavojɨ kaimɨraayarɨ mɨladesɨ.” Mi'na kuda' Seraa' lɨka yaka “Ai, nɨmɨ jɨka magyɨwa.” Sara kuda' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Gɨmɨ jɨka gyɨwaano.”

A'mwe daraai dai Evɨraamɨmɨ angevɨdaa'nyɨ “Sothomɨ angebanneinera,” deva kaanna wɨna. Evɨraamɨjɨ pwalyɨ maalɨkebanna wɨna. Maalɨkebanna wɨna kyagi Gotɨyai wɨda' “ ‘Sothomɨ mwaalyarajɨ Gamora mwaalyarajɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanaangerera,’ sara wɨ'nadɨnyarera. Nɨmɨ walanganɨma! A'mwe kayaa'nanaangeraavɨ sara wangana'muri nɨmɨ tamakɨdeinyɨra.” A'mweraai “Naarɨmɨ walaawaka!” dahɨla walaawɨna kyagi Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨda' “A'mwe tewaanyarajɨ mwaaipɨjara nabaai dɨramakɨdeigɨ daaka? A'mwe tewaanya nɨmɨre ata sɨvɨlɨraai a'mwe pware ata sɨvɨlɨraai a'mwe pware atɨraaina (50) mwaaidapɨjɨ anga naanga yuyaburaavɨ dɨramakɨdeigɨ daaka? Gɨmɨ kwaaka yuyavakɨ maremwaaidɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ gazagaasagaa' tewaanna yadɨnyaigɨnyɨra.” Sara kuda' Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “A'mwe nyɨdɨwaanyara mwaaidapɨjɨ anga naanga yuyaburaavɨ maramaki yɨdeinyɨra.” Sara kuda' Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ a'mwe tewaanya ata sɨvɨlɨraai, ata sɨvɨlɨraai ata pwina saraavɨna kuda' Gotɨyai “Maramaki yɨdera,” wɨda'. Sara wɨdɨna kya' Evɨraamɨ a'mwe tewaanya ata sɨvɨlɨraai, ata sɨvɨlɨraalyaraavɨna kuda' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Angeba maramaki yɨdera.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Evɨraamɨ a'mwe tewaanya ata sɨvɨlɨraai, atɨraalyaraavɨna ayawɨ kuda' Gotɨyai ayawɨ wɨda'. Sara wɨdɨna kya' Evɨraamɨ a'mwe tewaanya ata sɨvɨlɨraalyaraavɨna ayawɨ kuda' Gotɨyai ayawɨ wɨda'. Kuda' Evɨraamɨ aayagaa' wɨda' “Nɨmɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka magɨthavannera! Nɨmɨ gave pɨgaa'na gɨthɨma! A'mwe tewaanya nɨmɨre atɨraalyara mwaaidapɨjɨ anga naangangɨ dɨramakɨdeigɨ daaka?” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Aawano. A'mwe tewaanya atɨraalyara mwaaidapɨjɨ anga naangengɨ maramaki yɨdeinyɨra.” Mi'na wɨdaka Gotɨyai kaanna wɨna ya'. Wɨna kya' Evɨraamɨ gannya angewɨnna yagalaawɨna ya'.

Sawɨsaburɨ Sothomɨ angeburɨnna ejelɨyaraai walaabahi. A'mwe Lotɨ tɨkuryaba mwaaidɨ'nyɨ ejelɨyaraai kulaabahi Lotɨ wɨda' “Ata bwa'naana! Nɨmɨre angevɨna kaanya wawaajɨ anga savɨ wa'mwaraana!” Kuda' ejelɨyaraai wɨdahi “Aala, mwasaba se wa'mwaraka!” Sara wɨdɨna kyagi Lotɨ “Nɨmɨre angevɨ waraana! ‘Aala,’ be'na dɨwaala? Nɨmɨre angevɨ wa'mwaraana?” Sa' kuda' gamɨjɨ wɨlɨna yeva wapaaya nyɨna ye'.

Ejelɨyaraai “Naarɨmɨ se wa'mwaraka!” dahɨla yamaze yɨna'na yadakɨlyɨ Sothomɨ mwaalyara kaanna bɨna yeva Lotɨmɨ jaka wɨdɨna “A'mweraai gawɨ mwaaihɨla? Dɨmakwalyaama! Nemɨ saraarɨ ata lɨmwanna yaana!” Sara kude' Lotɨ walyuna yaka kaanya tihɨ'na ya'. Tihɨraka kumɨnyɨ wɨda' “Sarɨmɨ kayaa'na mipɨnera! Nɨmɨre taayawaai saaigɨ'nyawaai mwaaihɨlyawaarɨ dɨmaarila! A'mweraarɨna myawɨpɨnera!” Mi'na kuda' Sothomɨ mwaalyara wɨde' “Gɨmɨ maaveigɨnyɨra. Nemɨnyɨna gɨmɨ dɨnemaremwaaideigɨ daaka! Gɨmɨnyɨna naangeva'na kayaa'na yaana! Baa'na nedɨwaana!” Sara kude' ejelɨyaraai Lotɨmɨ angevɨdaa'nyɨ mwagi'namaata yagɨla kaanya tihɨ'na yagi. Tihɨ'na yagɨla Sothomɨ mwaalyaraavɨ tɨnna galapɨnyɨwanna kyagi Sothomɨ mwaalyara tɨnna mwanganyeva “Kaanya' gavanaka?” deva deva tɨnna wanganyɨ'maa'na ye'.

Ejelɨyaraai Lotɨmɨ wɨdahi “Gotɨyai ‘A'mwe anga davanyara kayaa'na yadɨvɨsara daaka?’ daka yawɨra'. Anga davɨdaa'nyɨ kɨnɨdakaavihi dɨwila! Naarɨmɨ wo'daaina yakadera.” Mi'na kudahi Lotɨ a'mweraai gamɨre taayawaarɨ maarya'neraarɨ kaanna wɨna yaka yagaala wɨda' “Nemɨ yarai lɨkaanya wawaana! Anga dava kayaaka yadevera.” Sara kuda' sa' a'mweraai kadɨka mu'nyɨ yagɨla saba mwaalagi.

Yɨrɨke' gaai pu'daasɨyagaa' dɨkaa'na, ejelɨyaraai Lotɨmɨ yagaala naanga wɨdɨna “Dahaasagaa' nemɨ yarai kaanyaana!” Wɨdɨna kyagi Lotɨ kave mwaalɨna kya' saraai Lotɨmɨjɨ gannya a'mwevɨjɨ kɨrɨnnya taayawaarɨjɨ “Yarai kaanyaana!” wɨdahɨla magapɨrina yagɨla angebadaa'nyɨ kaanna makuna yagi. Ejelɨyaraai wɨdɨna “Yarai, yarai, ayahi tɨgɨnyɨma'nya mipɨnera! Mugunyavɨna lɨkaanya jɨlaawila! Nabaibɨthɨka!” Sara wɨdɨna kyagi Lotɨ wɨda' “Mugunyavɨna kaanya yɨlaawia'na lɨka yɨwana. Angebanna yaya' Sawa nɨmɨ wɨlaawɨjɨwana?” Kuda' ejelɨyaraai wɨdahi “Yo, yarai.”

Yarai kaanna wɨna yaka Lotɨ nyɨlyai gaai bilapijɨ'daa'nyɨyagaa' anga Sawa wɨlɨna ya'. Wɨlɨna kya' Gotɨyai dɨkesɨ sɨla dɨ'nakesɨ sangɨ burɨke sɨrɨmya'bɨsa' Sothomɨ angebanna Gamora angebanna wasɨ'na kya' angeba kayaaka yɨna ya'. Wasɨ'na kya' Lotɨmɨre balaanga' tɨgɨnyɨma'nya kya' a'mwevɨ galyewaa'mwanna kya' a'mwe' saala yɨma'nyɨna ya'. Mwanyagaa' Evɨraamɨ Sothomɨ Gamora angeba dara wanganake' “Ai, yunebanna jɨsa' jimwa'!”

Dɨvi sagaa' Lotɨ Sawa angeba mwaalya'nei lɨka yadaa'nyɨ gamɨjɨ gamɨre taayawaalyɨ mugunyangɨna kaanna waweva simaangeyawɨ mwaalɨna. Mwaaidapɨjɨ a'mwe sɨraange' gya'mwevɨ wɨda' “A'mweraai nehɨmaarikade'naai mamwaalyɨgoi. Nehɨrɨnɨmaangerɨ aalya waainɨya' wɨjaavakadera. Mi'na wɨjaavakwoihɨri kaimɨraaya mɨlakade'naarɨne' sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨjɨ gamɨjɨ se waraka! Dɨvi gɨmɨjɨ se darila!” Sawɨsavɨ sɨraange' sara kya' sa' myawɨrya' Lotɨ. Sawɨta pɨri ganyaabulaangesɨ waragɨla sagaa' sɨmunya myawɨrya'. Kɨnadaai sara yɨ sɨraange' kaimɨraaya Mawaavɨrɨ mɨla'. Yɨ ganyaabulaange' kaimɨraaya Amonɨmɨ mɨla'. Savɨdaa'nyɨ Mawaavɨrava Amonɨmɨvava yɨma'nyɨna ye'.

Evɨraamɨ Yɨ'darya Maamɨredaa'nyɨ Kwaaka Geraanei kaanna wɨna ya'. Wɨna yaka ayagaa' a'mweraavɨne'na lɨka yaka wɨda' “Seraa' nya'mwesɨra.” Sara kuda' Avimɨlekɨ Geraa maremwaaidei Seraavɨ gannya angevɨ waka'. Sawɨta sagaa' waja' kya'na' Gotɨyai wɨda' “A'mwe pware balaange' ma'mwaana. Sayaba dɨvaideigɨnyɨra.” Avimɨlekɨ Seraavɨ kwala mamaaryaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨda' “Nɨmɨnyɨjɨ nɨmɨre maremwaaidɨnyaraavɨjɨ dɨramakɨjɨwaana? Evɨraamɨ nyɨdɨwa'dɨ' ‘Gamɨ nya'mwesɨra.’ Nabaai Seraa' nyɨdɨwa'dɨ' ‘Evɨraamɨ nya'mwelyɨra.’ ” Wɨdɨna kya' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Sa' yawɨ'mwa. Gɨmɨnyɨne ‘Avimɨlekɨ kayaa'na nyadɨ'! Seraavɨ mamaarannera!’ dena navɨka gɨmwaaihe. Evɨraamɨmɨne Seraavɨ ayawɨ dumaarya! Gamɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨne wɨdadelyɨra. Gamɨ ‘Avimɨlekɨ nabaladɨka!’ dozɨ Gotɨyainyɨ yagaala nyɨdathera,” wɨda' Gotɨyai.

Mwanyavɨ Avimɨlekɨ Evɨraamɨmɨ jaka wɨda' “Kaajo!” Evɨraamɨ kaba' wɨda' “Nemɨ gɨmɨnyɨne kayaa'na myadaanyainera. Sa' baa'nebwi yɨvanɨgɨna?” Sara kuda' Evɨraamɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘A'mwe davanyara Gotɨyareburɨ myadɨvɨsarera,’ dena ‘Seraa' nya'mwesɨra,’ yɨhɨthɨwa'deinyɨ. ‘Nyɨramakɨpɨ'de'na Seraavɨ maapɨ'dera,’ dena yɨhɨthɨwa'deinyɨ. Gamɨza' nɨmware taaya' mwaalaka nɨwaavɨre taaya' mamwaalyɨ kya' nɨmɨ maare.” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Avimɨlekɨ Evɨraamɨmɨna Seraavɨ wɨjaavɨna ya'. Nabaai wawɨnya yadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ jɨlɨkyaawaryaraavɨjɨ wɨjaavɨna ya'. Wɨjaavaka wɨda' “Dava nɨmɨre kwaake' warɨkeba gɨmɨre kunyavɨdaa'nyɨ ‘Gɨmɨre kwaaka warɨkeba mwaalɨma!’ da'gɨzɨ dɨmwaala!” Avimɨlekɨ sara kuda' Evɨraamɨ Avimɨlekɨmɨna Gotɨyarɨ kuda' Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨjɨ gannya a'mwengɨjɨ tewaanna ya'. Mi'na kya' aya'na Avimɨlekɨmɨre a'mwe kaimɨraayangɨ mɨle'.

Evɨraamɨ kwarame 100 (waanɨ aadɨretɨ) wavɨlavakei kaimɨraayarɨ kyawakɨna' Gotɨyai sara wɨdake' Evɨraamɨ “Gannya yaya' Aazakɨ,” wɨda'. Aazakɨ sawɨta daryaai daryaai daryaai darɨ' kajɨnna' ganɨmaangai gamɨre kɨlaakevɨ pɨkarya ya'. Seraa' wɨda' “Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanna yɨnɨkelyɨra. Nɨmɨjɨ nɨmɨre a'mwelyɨ sa'naai a'mwe ne'naai kaimɨraayarɨ maaroi. A'mwe a'mwera jɨka maregyɨpɨ'delyɨra,” wɨda'.
Seraa' Aazakɨmɨ aamunya mujaayɨ yakegaa' Evɨraamɨ munne naange' ya'.

Ehaavɨre kaimalei Yɨzɨmelɨ Aazakɨmɨ maanga dada mala tamɨna yadaa'nyɨ Seraa' wanganaka Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨda' “Ehaasɨ gamɨre kaimɨraayalyɨ sawaarɨ duthaaso! Gɨmɨ bala'gɨzɨ ‘Yɨzɨmelɨ nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa namaaradɨka!’ da'gɨzɨ duthaaso!” Mi'na kuda' Evɨraamɨmɨ gannya kaimɨraayaryaba kale wia'. Kale wiadaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Ehaasɨ Yɨzɨmelɨjɨ sawaarɨna kale magyannera! Dɨvi sagaa' gɨmɨre kaimɨraaya Yɨzɨmelɨmɨre kwala naanga yɨrɨvadengɨ. Sa' Aazakɨ jɨwaalɨvaanga nebulyai naangelyɨra.” Yɨrɨka kavura' Evɨraamɨ Ehaavɨne wapaajɨ aalyasɨ wɨjaavaka wɨda' “Dahaa' dɨwila!” Kuda' kɨnaai yagalya'ma'na yagɨla kaanna kaanna yamaryagɨla kwaaka kayaa'na naanga Bɨyazivana yɨ'ma'na. Yɨ'ma'na kyagi dɨvidaasɨ aalɨtala kune' wa'dɨsɨ yɨta maalɨkikɨ yɨkaavɨlyavɨ Ehaa' Yɨzɨmelɨmɨ yagalya'mavaka pɨba mwaalɨna ya'. Mwaalakebadaa'nyɨ dɨna “ ‘Nɨmɨre kaimalei baladerɨ tɨnna nangamudɨka!’ dena yɨkaavɨlyavɨ mwaaidɨsɨ pɨba mwaaimwa.” Sara dɨna kya' Gotɨyare mamaayai ejelɨyai Ehaavɨ jaka wɨdɨna “Lɨka minnera! Yɨzɨmelɨ kɨnna dadaasɨ wɨ'nɨwa. Gamɨ mwaalajare kwala naanga yadengɨ.” Sagaa' Gotɨyai aalɨyɨmɨnyavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwa'. Kyɨbwarɨdaakwa' Ehaa' aalya yɨrɨna yaka gawaalɨvɨ wirina ya'. Yɨzɨmelɨ a'mwei yɨma'naka Kwaaka Paraanɨ mwaala'. “A'mwe Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalya' maarana!” Ehaa' daka maaraka Yɨzɨmelɨmɨna wɨjaava'.

Avimɨlekɨjɨ gannya a'mwe naangelyɨ saraai Evɨraamɨmyawɨnna bahɨla wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai gɨhaimwadelyɨra. Gɨmɨnyɨne ja'mweinyɨ yɨma'nɨgeinyɨra. ‘Yuyagaa' ja'mwei yɨma'nɨdeinyɨ,’ nebwina nyɨdana! Kwaasɨ nadɨthɨka!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Evɨraamɨ wɨda' “Avimɨlekɨ, ja'mweinyɨ. Sara dɨwaanya' gɨmɨre gɨthaayadɨvɨsara nemɨre aalɨbunyavɨ kuka ma'mwaava.” Kuda' Avimɨlekɨ “Nɨmɨ mujɨweinyɨra,” yawɨraka wɨda' “Yagaala da' myawɨriwana.” Sara kuda' Evɨraamɨ jɨlɨkyaawarya Avimɨlekɨmɨne wɨmaarya'. Nabaai sipɨzipɨya dɨwɨnya dawaai dawaai dawaai da' gavinya pɨba wɨmwaaihɨna ya'. Wɨmwaaihɨna kya' Avimɨlekɨ wɨda' “Sa gavinya pɨba be'na wɨmwaihɨwaana?” Mi'na kuda' Evɨraamɨ wɨdɨna “Sipɨzipɨya sa dɨmaa'dengɨna a'mwe pwara yawɨpɨ'de' ‘Evɨraamɨ aalɨhavi’ nɨnnya’ lɨkɨnɨkesɨra,’ ” wɨda'. Savɨdaasɨ kwaakavɨne yaya' Bɨyaziva wɨdɨna ya' Evɨraamɨ.

Evɨraamɨ mi'na kya' Avimɨlekɨjɨ gamɨre a'mwe naangelyɨ saraai kɨrɨnnya Kwaaka Pɨlɨzɨtɨyana wɨna. Kaanna wɨna kyagi Evɨraamɨ “Gotɨyai gazagaasagaa' mwaaladelyɨra,” daka Bɨyaziva yɨta dɨragɨnya burɨnna yaka Gotɨyarɨna yɨleyagaala wɨda'.

Dɨvidaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai daka “Evɨraamɨ gara yadelaka?” wɨda' “Aazakɨmɨna yɨlaaya naanga yadɨnyaigɨnyɨra. Gamɨnyɨ Moraaya kwaakevɨna dɨmakwodeigɨnyɨra. Mugunya savɨ Aazakɨmɨ dɨkevɨ dɨmarira'delyɨra. ‘Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavɨdeinyɨ,’ dɨthadeigɨnyɨra.” Mi'na kuda' yɨrɨke' kavura' Evɨraamɨ jɨlɨkyaawarya dogiyavɨ dɨkɨraya yɨlakɨna kya' Aazakɨjɨ wawɨnya wɨdaayadisaraalyɨ gamɨjɨ wɨna. Kaanya kuna yadaa'nyɨ sawɨta pɨryaai kajɨnna' Moraayana kwaaka yɨ'mavaawɨna ye'. Yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' Evɨraamɨ wawɨnya wɨdaayadisaraarɨ wɨdɨna “Dava jemwaalyɨla! Nɨmɨjɨ kaimɨraayalyɨ sainaai mugunyavɨna yɨlaawaka! Gotɨyarɨna wɨdakadera. Mi'na wɨdakwoihɨri naarɨmɨ yagalaawakadera.” Sara wɨdɨna yaka Evɨraamɨ kwaari'matasɨ dɨkesɨ yengwɨtavamakuna ya'. Aazakɨ dɨkɨraya makuna ya'. Kaanna yɨlaawɨna yadaakɨri Aazakɨ Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨda' “Nɨmwai, jɨlɨkyaawarya Gotɨyarɨne wɨjaavakadei gavanako?” Kuda' Evɨraamɨ wɨda' “Nyɨbwaalɨ', Gotɨyai jɨlɨkyaawaryarɨ nehɨzaavadelyɨra.” Sabanna yɨlyɨ'mavaawɨna kyagi Evɨraamɨ simɨnye' lɨvalaabaka dɨke yabɨlɨngaka Aazakɨmɨ wɨla marapwɨyɨna yaka dɨka yabɨlɨngakevɨ a'badaa'nyɨ yɨlamaarakɨna yaka kwaari'mata maarɨna yaka dɨna “Nɨmɨ daakwɨma kwaari'mata dasɨ!” Kada' Gotɨyare ejelɨyai jaka wɨda' “Jɨwaalɨvɨ maramakɨnnera! ‘Dahaa' Evɨraamɨ nɨmɨrebwi yadelyɨra,’ daka Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'mwa'.” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Evɨraamɨ tɨnna dara wanganake' “Jɨlɨkyaawaryarɨ yɨsɨkɨ gɨla'mwanna'na yɨwake' daaka!” Gawaalɨvɨ wɨlya' yaarɨna yaka gɨla'mwanna'dɨ'nyɨyai maarɨna yaka tamɨna yaka simɨnyevɨ yɨlamarakɨna yaka dɨka yɨra'na yaka Gotɨyarɨ wina ya'. Evɨraamɨ yɨleyagaala wɨda' “Dava Gotɨyai nejaavaderyaba.” Nabaai Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ jaka wɨda' “Nɨnnya yaya'na gɨthɨvanɨge' ‘Nyɨbwaalɨ' Aazakɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavɨma!’ dɨwaanya'na gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara sɨlɨngaamɨnya yuyabɨsara kwala naanga naanga yɨrɨpɨ'derera. Yɨ kumɨ sara kunnya y’ kamaangeraavɨ maremwaaibɨ'derera. Yɨ kumɨnyɨna nɨmɨ a'mwe kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨne tewaanna yɨderera,” wɨda' Gotɨyai. Mi'na kuda' Evɨraamɨjɨ Aazakɨjɨ walaabɨna kyagi Evɨraamɨmɨre wawɨnya yadisaraalyɨ ayawɨ Bɨyazivana bɨna ye'.

Dɨvi sagaa' Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨ'na' “Naawo jɨthaakaangei gawaalɨvaanga a'mwere sɨvɨlɨraai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ yawakɨna'. Gawaalɨvaanga pwai Betɨyɨwelɨ taaya Revekaavɨ yawakɨna',” wɨ'na' Evɨraamɨ.

Seraa' kwarame 127 kwavɨlava' Evɨronɨ angeba bala'. Kabala' Evɨraamɨ kɨnna dɨna. Mi'na kɨnna dɨna yaka Evɨraamɨ Etɨyaraavɨ wɨda' “Kwaaka da' nɨmɨre' daaka! Mudɨkeinyɨra. Nɨnnya a'mwe' wakɨde'na kwaaka pɨrɨ' nyɨjaayɨla!” Sara kuda' Etɨyara wɨde' “A'mwe naangeigɨ, nemɨre gɨlaaya wakadaanyaba saba gɨnnya a'mwe' dakya tewaanyaba!” Sara kude' Evɨraamɨ “Su!” daka wɨda' “Simaanga Maakɨpela sabanna nɨgwɨmubya yɨhidera.” Kwaaka savɨ gyakwai Epɨronɨ Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨda' “Gazare wɨjaavɨna yɨdeinyɨra.” Mi'na kuda' “Kwaaka'na nɨgwia gɨzaavɨdera. Nɨgwia gara gara gɨzaavɨjɨwano?” Epɨronɨ wɨda' “A'mwera ‘Gɨlaaya wakaana!’ dadɨvɨ' 90 kinaaya mubadɨvɨsasɨra. Nya'mweigɨ nɨgwia warana! Gɨnnya a'mwe' dakya!” Sara kuda' Evɨraamɨ Epɨronɨmɨne nɨgwia wɨjavadaa'nyɨ a'mwe yuyara banganara'. Kwaaka mi'na mubaka Maamɨre kwaaka saba simaangevɨ Seraavɨ waka'.

Evɨraamɨ a'mwe nei mwaalaka gannya wawɨnya wɨdaayade naangerɨ jaka wɨdaka wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayarɨne a'mwe' dumaaridera. Kainanɨ mwaalyaraayawɨnna munnera! Nɨmɨre avaalyaraayawɨnna kaanya wawa'gɨzɨ dɨmaraawɨde. Yagaala naanga' Gotɨyaryaba ‘Evɨraamɨgɨ nyɨdɨwaanya' sara yɨdeinyɨra,’ nyɨdana!” Wɨdɨna kya' wawɨnya wɨdaayadei yagaala Evɨraamɨ wɨdake wɨda' “A'mwe' ‘Sabanna kaanna mwɨyɨ yɨde'nyɨ,’ kanyɨdozɨ gamɨre kwaakevɨna Aazakɨmɨ makabɨna yɨdeinyɨ da?” Sara kuda' Evɨraamɨ wɨdɨna “Arɨkawɨnyɨra. Nɨnnya kaimɨraayai mamakunnera! Gotɨyai gannya mamaayarɨ yaasɨna kyojɨ gamɨ gɨmɨnyɨne tewaanna yadelyɨra. A'mwe' ‘Aalo,’ kadozɨ, ‘Kaanya muwɨnera!’ kagɨthozɨ gɨmɨre wawɨnya mi'nanyɨra. Waramaryana!” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' wawɨnya wɨdaayadei wɨda' “Gɨmɨ dɨwaanyabwi yɨdeinyɨra.”

Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadei kaanya wawaka narɨnna, nɨgwia, gɨlyɨvɨta naanga maaraka kaamelɨya atɨraalyangɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa yɨlamarakaka kaanna makuna. Makuna yaka kwaaka Mezapotemɨyana yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka angeba Aaranɨ aalɨkavi'nɨnnyayaba mwaalɨna. Gamɨre kaamelɨyara sɨvɨla tɨka'na aalɨkavi'nɨnnyayaba mwaalɨna. Mwaalɨna kya' Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadei Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyaigɨ, Evɨraamɨmɨne tewaanna yɨja' gɨmɨre asɨrɨna wɨma! Davanya sɨdɨraaya aalɨkavi’ nɨnnyavɨna kulaabapɨjɨ sɨdɨraaya pɨrɨ' kulaabozɨ ‘Aalya' dɨnyɨrya!’ sara kuda'mujɨ aalya' nyɨryojɨ nabaai nɨmɨre kaamelɨyaraavɨne aalya' kwiryojɨ yawɨ'na yɨdera ‘Aazakɨmɨne' daaka a'mwe dava!’ dɨdeinyɨra,” wɨda'.

Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaa'nyɨyagaa' sɨdɨraaya Revekaa' aalya'na bɨna. Sɨdɨraaya sa' nawɨ'nya' kwala mamaarya' mwaalɨna yakesɨ. Evɨraamɨmɨre wawɨnya wɨdaayadei wanganaka wɨda' “Aalya' nyɨryaama! Nɨma!” Mi'na kuda' Revekaa' aalya' yarai yɨrɨna yaka wɨjaavɨna. Sara yaka wɨda' “Nabaai gɨmɨre kaamelɨyaraavɨne aalya' pɨrɨsɨ wirima!” Sara wɨdake' yadaa'nyɨ Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadei tɨnna wangana'. Revekaavɨne sɨnna kadɨtaavarya gɨlɨraka wɨjaavɨna yaka wɨda' “Gɨmaamaangei aaihware'gɨnaka? Gɨmaamaangere angevɨ gavinyavɨ nɨmɨ mwaalɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka?” Kuda' Revekaa' wɨda' “Betɨyɨwelɨmɨre'nyɨra. Naawomɨ balaange' Milɨkaa' gamɨzai mɨla'. Nɨmware anga wapaaya wa'devɨ dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨra,” wɨda'.
Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadei “Gotɨyai naangeigɨnyɨ,” daka tuta'nyɨna yaka wɨda' “Evɨraamɨ gu'nadelyɨra. Nyɨmaremwaaiderɨne tewaanna yagɨna gamɨjɨ avaalyaraavɨna nyɨbwarɨdakɨwaana,” wɨda' Gotɨyarɨ.

Revekaa' “Nɨwaavɨ wɨdɨma!” daka kaanyɨve'na wɨna. Dɨvi gathaakaangei Laivanɨ aalɨbunyayabanna baka wɨda' “Ata bwa'naka! Kaajo! Nemɨre angevɨ tewaanya yɨwevɨ dɨmwaalo!” Sara kuda' Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadelyɨ Laivanɨjɨ wawagi.

Laivanɨ kaamelɨyaraavɨne wapaaya wɨmaarina yaka aalya yɨnya'nesɨ wapaayajɨ maarɨna yaka Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayaderɨ wɨjaavɨna ya'. Wɨjaavɨna kya' sa' wɨdaayadei wɨdɨna “Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' ‘Nɨmɨ wɨlaabena nɨmɨre wawɨnya' berɨvaka?’ dena dɨnyu'nyi! Nɨmɨre dɨwɨjavɨ kanyu'napɨjɨ nɨmɨ wapaa nɨdera. Evɨraamɨmɨre wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨnyainyɨ naangeinyɨ Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨne tewaanna kya' gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakelyɨra. Seraasɨ Evɨraamɨjɨ a'mwe neyoi kyɨma'nagi Seraa' kaimalei kamɨla' kaimalerɨ Aazakɨ yaya' wo'na'. Evɨraamɨ kabalojɨ Aazakɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuya maaradelyɨra. Evɨraamɨ nyɨda' ‘Kaanna wɨja' nɨmɨjɨ avaalyaraavɨreba Aazakɨmɨne a'mwe' dɨvɨramaa'! Gotɨyai gɨhaimwagadeigɨnyɨra. A'mwe' kagɨthozɨ “Kaanna mwɨyɨ yɨde'nyɨ,” wawɨnya gɨmɨre' mɨ',’ sara nyɨda' Evɨraamɨ. Nɨmɨ aalɨbunyayabanna bena Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨwa ‘Aazakɨmɨre balaanga' yɨma'nadevɨ nyɨbwarɨdaakwia!’ Kudɨwa Gotɨyai Revekaavɨ nyɨbwarɨdaakwɨwa'. Evɨraamɨmɨre gawaalɨvɨne a'mwe' Revekaa' dumaarijɨwaai? ‘Nɨmɨ yawɨrɨde'na kɨrɨmɨre sɨmunya yawɨ'dita nyɨjɨla!’ Nɨmɨ yɨhu'nɨma!” wɨdɨna ya'.

Revekaavɨre ganɨmaangei Betɨyɨwelɨjɨ Laivanɨjɨ sanɨdaai wɨdahi “Gotɨyai dara yake' naarɨmɨ yagaala madakanera! Revekaavɨ dɨmakwona!” Mi'na kudahi Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadei gɨlyɨvɨta naanga yanga muda'. Mwanyavɨ “Nɨmɨ wɨma!” dadaa'nyɨ Revekaavɨre ganaangesɨ gathaakaangelyɨ wɨdahi “Dava sawɨta atɨraai mwaalakɨri dɨwidewaaihɨlyɨ.” Sa' Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadei wɨda' “Aala. Dahaa' kaanna wɨdera.” Sara kuda' Revekaavɨ wɨdahi “Dahaa' gamɨjɨ dɨwijɨwaai?” Revekaa' wɨda' “Nɨmɨ kaanna wɨdera.” Sara kuda' gya'mwelyɨ ganaangesɨ sawaai wɨdahi “Gɨmɨ kaimɨraaya kwala naanga maa'dɨzara kunnya yɨkamaangeraavɨ maremwaaibɨ'derera.” Mi'na kudahi Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayadei Revekaavɨjɨ gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsangɨjɨ maarɨna kya' kumɨ kaanna wɨna ye'.

Pɨgaa' sawɨsaburɨ Aazakɨ wawɨnyavɨ mwaalaka dara wanganake' “Kaamelɨyara keibanna jɨnɨgava!” Aazakɨ wangadaa'nyɨ Revekaa' gamɨzarɨ wanganaka bwalaawɨna yaka Evɨraamɨmɨre wɨdaayaderɨ wɨda' “A'mwei aaihwalaka?” “Aazakɨ gɨmɨre kwalaangelyɨra.” Sara kuda' Revekaa' kawaaka yɨ'na'. Wɨdaayadei Aazakɨmɨ gamɨ yake' wɨda'. Mi'na kuda' Aazakɨ Revekaavɨ gannya angevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna kya' a'mweyoi mwaalagi.

Evɨraamɨ a'mwe pɨrɨ' Keturaaya' kamaara' gawaalɨvaanga daraai daraai daraai mɨla'. Gawaalɨvavaavɨ yaya ge' ge' wɨda' “Pwai Sɨmɨranɨ, pwai Jokɨzaanɨ, pwai Methaanɨ, pwai Mɨthɨyanɨ, pwai Yɨzɨvaakɨ, pwai Sɨwaa.” Yaya wo'nɨkera kamwaale' dɨvidaasa' Keturaayavɨreraavɨ Evɨraamɨ gɨlyɨvɨta pwarɨ pɨrɨ'na, pwarɨ pɨrɨ'na wɨmaaryaka wɨdaasaka gannya gɨlyɨvɨta yuya Aazakɨmɨna wɨjaava'.

Evɨraamɨ kwarame 175 kwavɨlava' bala'. Kabala' gawaalɨvaangeraai Aazakɨjɨ Yɨzɨmelɨjɨ saraai Maakɨpela simaangevɨ Evɨraamɨ Seraavɨ wakakevɨ wakagi. Yɨ Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨne tewaanna sara yake' yɨ Aazakɨmɨne tewaanna sara ya'. Tewaanna yadaa'nyɨ Aazakɨ aalɨbunya Laa'eroi saba mwaala'.
Yɨzɨmelɨ kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ pimagɨ mwaalyai kuvɨnɨmaangei gawaalɨvaanga sɨvɨlɨraai ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ wɨmwaaiha'. Yɨzɨmelɨ mwaalakei mwaalakei bala'.

Aazakɨmɨre a'mwe' Revekaa' kaimɨraavɨmaaya' mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Aazakɨ Gotɨyarɨ Revekaavɨna kuda' a'mwe kaimɨraavɨmunnake' mwaala'. Kaimɨraavɨmunnaka' kamwaala' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Bwaranyaraai pwaraainesɨ. A'mwe saraai yɨ pwai a'mwe pwaraavɨ kuvɨnɨmaangei yɨma'nadelyɨ. Yɨ pwai a'mwe pwaraavɨ kuvɨnɨmaangei yɨma'nadelyɨra. Pwai dɨragɨnna kamwaalojɨ pwai kɨbawana mwaaladelyɨra. Sɨraangei dɨviyarɨne wawɨnya wɨdaayadelyɨra,” wɨda' Gotɨyai. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ Revekaa' avaalagaa' bwaranyaraai pwaraai maara'. Kamaara' “Sɨraangarɨne yaya' Yɨzoi dɨviyai Jaikopɨ,” sara dahi.

Kɨdaraai a'mweraai kyɨma'nagi yɨ Yɨzoi yɨkurɨyaawɨhaya'na yakelyɨ. Yɨ Jaikopɨ gannya wawɨnyanna yɨwaainada angebanna mwaaidelyɨ. Yɨkurɨyaawia kamaara' waburya'na wiakei Aazakɨ Yɨzorɨ yɨlaaya marina ya'. Revekaa' Jaikopɨmɨ yɨlaaya marya'. Pɨgaa' Jaikopɨ yɨwaadabe yɨraaina yakegaa' Yɨzoi mɨjɨka wiakei yɨ'daryavɨdaasɨ wɨlaaba'. Wɨlaabaka Jaikopɨmɨ wɨda' “Wapaaya wayaaka pɨrɨ' nyɨjaama!” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' sɨraangebwina gɨmubɨma! ‘Nɨmɨ a'mwe naanga yɨma'nɨdeinyɨ,’ dena gɨthɨwa.” Yɨzoi wɨda' “Mɨjɨka naanga nyɨwake'na nɨmɨ kabaimudɨkeinyɨra. Nɨmɨ a'mwe naangeinyɨ dadɨnyainyɨ dahaa' aawano. Nɨmɨ a'mwe naangeinyɨ mamwaalyɨ yɨdeinyɨra. A'mwe naangannya' waramaryana! Sa' maalɨkesɨra.” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Kwaasɨ yagaala nanyɨdɨthɨka! Naange'na nyɨdana!” Sara kuda' Yɨzoi sara ya'. Mi'na kya' Jaikopɨ wapaaya kujaava' Yɨzoi na'.

Kwaaka Kainanɨ Aazakɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ mɨjɨka wiadaa'nyɨ Kwaaka Pɨlɨzɨtɨya wawaka Geraa angebanna yɨ'mavaawɨna ya'. Sagaa' “Avimɨlekɨ kwaaka da' maremwaaidelyɨ,” wɨdesalyɨ. Gotɨyai Aazakɨmɨ wɨda' “Dava dɨmwaai! Yɨzɨpɨna munnera! Nɨmɨre yagaala gɨmaamaangei Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨdei tewaanna yakerɨne yagaala sa' gɨmɨjɨ kaimɨraayarari gɨmɨnyɨnajɨ tewaanna yɨhyɨdeinyɨra.”

Aazakɨ mwaalaka Avimɨlekɨmɨ wɨda' “Revekaa' nya'mwesɨra.” Dɨvidaasɨ Avimɨlekɨ dara wanganake' “O, Revekaa' gannya balaange' daaka!” daka Avimɨlekɨ wɨda' “Revekaayaba be'na nedahɨna! Kwaasɨ yagaalya' ‘Nya'mwesɨreva,’ nedahɨ.” Mi'na sara kuda' “A'mweraavɨna lɨka yena yɨhɨthe.” Mi'na kuda' Avimɨlekɨ gannya maremwaaideraavɨ yagaala naanga wɨda' “Aazakɨmɨjɨ Revekaavɨjɨ sawaarɨ mipɨnera!”

Aazakɨ Pɨlɨzɨtɨya mwaalaka witɨzɨla burɨnna kya' savɨdaasɨ sɨla naanga kyɨ'na' maara'. Nabaai gamɨre jɨlɨkyaawarya kwala naanga yɨma'nyɨna ye'. Pɨlɨzɨtɨya mwaalyara dara wanganesa' “Ai, Aazakɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta naangengɨra.” Deva aalɨbunyavɨ kwaake' maryabɨsɨ'na ye'. Maryabɨsɨ'na kye' Avimɨlekɨ Aazakɨmɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨ dɨragɨnyaigɨnyɨra. Dava dɨhalya'maka!”

Avimɨlekɨ ‘Dɨhalya'ma'!” kuda' Aazakɨ kaanna wawaka Geraa taawalyawɨ mwaala'. Saba Evɨraamɨ mwaalakegaa' gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsara aalɨbunya lɨke'. Sɨnnawɨ Evɨraamɨ kabala' Pɨlɨzɨtɨyara kwaaka maryabɨsɨ'na ye'. Aazakɨ ayawɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ jɨrɨpwasɨ'na'. Aazakɨmɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsara aalɨbunya lɨkeva dara wanganesa' “Aalya' dalyuvanɨka!” desagaa' Geraa mwaalyaraavɨ sɨnna tɨka naanga wɨdava'. Kudava' Geraa mwaalyara wɨde' “Aalya da' nemɨresɨra.” Sara kude' Aazakɨmɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsara aalɨbunya pɨrɨ' lɨke'. Kalɨke' Geraa mwaalyara ayaba “Nemɨresɨra,” kude' Aazakɨ wawaka aalɨbunya pɨrɨ' lɨka'. Mi'na kalɨka' sagaa' a'mwera kave mwaalɨna ye'. Kave mwaalɨna kye' Aazakɨ da' “Gotɨyai tewaanya nemwaaihakebanyɨra.” Dɨvidaasɨ Aazakɨ kwaaka Bɨyazivana wawaka kamwaala' Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨne tewaanna ya'. Aazakɨ tewaanya mwaalaka simɨnye' laabaka dɨke' yɨravaka jɨlɨkyaawaryarɨ wakaka Gotɨyarɨna yɨleyagaala da'.

Dɨvidaasɨ pɨgaa' Avimɨlekɨjɨ gannya a'mwe naangelyɨ saraai wawagɨla wɨdahi “Gotɨyai gɨmɨjɨ yuyagaa' mwaimwaai. Nemɨ nya'mwana dɨnaadera,” wɨdahi. Mi'na kudahi Aazakɨ tɨka munne naanga yavɨgala'. Mwanyavɨ sagaa' nya'mwana dɨne'. Kadɨne' Avimɨlekɨjɨ a'mwe naangelyɨ saraai kaanna kwawagi Aazakɨmɨre wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsara Aazakɨmɨ wɨde' “Aalɨbunya pɨrɨ' kalɨkɨwo aalya yɨrɨ'na yɨvanɨ'.” Aazakɨ wɨ'naka “Nɨmɨjɨ Avimɨlekɨjɨ yagaala tewaanya dɨmwaai,” daka “Aalɨbunya sa' Siva dɨdeinyɨra,” wɨda'.
Yɨzoi Etɨyaraavɨrebanna wawaka Bɨyarɨyare garaavaanga' Juthitɨ maarɨna. Nabaai Elonɨmɨre garaavaanga' Baazɨmatɨ maarɨna. A'mwewaai maavewaarɨ kamaara' Aazakɨmɨjɨ Revekaavɨjɨ sawaarɨ kale wia'.

Aazakɨ a'mwe nei tɨnna mwanganyɨna, Yɨzorɨ jaka wɨdɨna kya' Yɨzoi wɨlaabɨna kya' wɨda' “Nɨmɨ a'mwe neinyɨ maalɨkegaa' balɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Naangegaa' balɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Mwata mwaryagɨnya dɨmaa'! Yɨ'daryawɨnna wawa'gɨzɨ yɨkurɨyaawia nyɨbalayaawa! Yɨkurɨyaawia maara'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnyɨne waburya'na mɨwɨta tewaanya dɨvɨraaya! Nɨmɨ mi'na na'mujɨ gɨmɨnyɨne yagaala tewaanya' gɨthɨdera.”

Yɨzoi yɨkurɨyaawɨhaya'nei kaanna kwawa' Revekaa' Jaikopɨmɨ Aazakɨ wɨdake' aya wɨda'. Mi'na wɨdaka wɨda' “Nɨmɨre dɨwɨja'na ja! Jɨlɨkyaawarya maalɨkewaarɨ memeyawaarɨ dɨmaa'de'na nɨmɨ mɨwɨta tewaanya gɨmaamaangerɨne pɨraayɨdera. Kavɨraaya'mujɨ gɨmɨ maara'gɨzɨ duzaade. Gamɨ nojɨ yagaala tewaanya' gɨthathelyɨ.” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Nyɨdaakaangei Yɨzoi kwazaaki'nakelyɨ. Nɨmaamaangei awaarimaayainyɨ nyɨmwanganojɨ ‘Jaikopɨ kwaasɨ yɨvanɨka,’ dozɨ yagaala tewaanya' manyɨjɨ nanyadɨka! Yagaala kayaa'nanaange' nanyɨdathɨka!” Sara kuda' Revekaa' wɨda' “Yagaala kayaa'nanaange' gɨthozɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨdathesɨ. Nɨmɨresɨra. Sa' dɨwɨja'na ja!” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ sara kya' mɨwɨta pɨraayɨna ya'. Pɨraayɨna yaka Yɨzore kannyɨla tewaanya maaraka Jaikopɨmɨ marirakuna ya'. Marirakuna yaka memeyavɨ kɨlaake' asawaarɨ tɨlɨnnyavɨ marabaazɨ'makwɨna ya'. Mi'na yaka Jaikopɨmɨ Aazakɨmɨne wapaaya wɨmaarya'.

Wapaaya kumaarya' Jaikopɨ Aazakɨmyawɨnna wawaka wɨda' “Nɨmwai!” Mi'na kuda' Aazakɨ wɨda' “Nyɨbwaalɨ' aaihwaigɨna'?” “Yɨzoinyɨ gɨmɨre sɨraangeinyɨ gɨmɨ sara nyɨdɨwaanya' sara yɨwa. Dahaa' nɨmɨre yɨkurɨyaawia dɨnana! Mi'na na'gɨzɨ yagaala tewaanya' nyɨdatheinyɨ.” Mi'na kuda' sa' Aazakɨ wɨda' “Yɨkurɨyaawia yaraina yaraina gara tamwaana?” Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Gotɨyai kanyɨjaawa' tamwengɨ.” Aazakɨ wɨda' “Davanna dɨvama! Gɨmwanganɨma!” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ bɨna kya' Aazakɨ ata mwanganna yaka wɨda' “Jaikopɨmɨre maanguraaya' gu'nena gɨmwangamwa. Gɨmɨre asa' Yɨzore'bɨ'nanyasɨra. Yɨzoigɨ daaka?” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Sahwainyɨra.” Aazakɨ wɨda' “Nyɨdɨwaanya' yɨkurɨyaawia nyɨjaama! Nɨmɨ nɨma! Mena na'mujɨ yagaala tewaanya' gɨthɨdero.” Aazakɨ kuda' Jaikopɨna kujaava' Aazakɨ mɨwɨtajɨ aalya waainɨyasɨ naka wɨda' “Dava dɨvama! Yɨlaaya marinaka!” Mi'na kuda' kɨnɨdaai yɨlaaya marinagi. Aazakɨ gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya kannyɨla tɨrɨnya winnaka yagaala tewaanya'na wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre baazɨ'ma'nya kannyɨla Gotɨyai wapaaya tewaanya yɨrɨvadɨwakebadaasɨ wawɨdɨrɨnyavɨ winnɨwa. Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨne burɨke' wɨjaavɨna, sɨlɨja wɨjaavɨna, kwaaka tewaanya wɨjaavɨna gyadeigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨre wawɨnyavɨ tɨka munne naanga gɨryadengɨ. A'mwe pwara gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthaayɨpɨ'dera yɨma'napɨjɨ ‘A'mwe naangeigɨ,’ gɨthɨpɨ'deigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ naangeigɨ jɨma'nadeigɨnyɨ gɨmɨjɨyara maalɨka yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere. Nabaai gɨmɨjɨyara ‘A'mwe naangeigɨ,’ gɨthɨpɨ'deigɨnyɨra. A'mwe pwai yagaala kayaa'nanaange' kagɨthozɨ gannyasɨra. A'mwe pwai yagaala tewaanya' kagɨthozɨ gannyasɨra,” wɨda' Aazakɨ.

Aazakɨ kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨna kya' avaalyagaa' Yɨzoi wapaaya maarɨna yaka bɨna yaka ganɨmaangerɨ wɨda' “Yaawia gɨmɨnyɨne maa'mwe dɨnana! Mi'na na'gɨzɨ yagaala tewaanya' nyɨdathera.” Sara kuda' ganɨmaangei wɨda' “Aaihwaigɨnaka?” “Yɨzoinyɨra. Gɨmɨre sɨraangeinyɨra.” Sara kuda' Aazakɨ bɨ'bɨta wida wɨda' “Wapaaya aai nyɨjaawaka? Nena wɨdɨwa yagaala tewaanyawo. Sɨnnawɨ yagaala tewaanya mi'na wɨdena dɨvidaa'nyɨ mudɨka wɨja sa' aawano.” Mena kuda' Yɨzoi kɨnna daka wɨda' “Nabaai yagaala tewaanya pɨnɨ nyɨdana!” Sa' Aazakɨ wɨda' “Jɨhwaalaangei kwaasɨ kanyɨdɨwa' wɨdɨwa ‘Gɨmɨ a'mwe naangeigɨnyɨ. Ja'mwei wabelyɨ. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara gamɨreraavɨ maremwaaibɨ'dere,’ wɨdɨwa. ‘Nabaai gamɨre wawɨnya tewaanna yadengɨ,’ wɨdɨwa.” Sara kuda' Yɨzoi kɨnna maredɨna yaka wɨda' “Nɨmɨnyɨne yagaala tewaanya pɨrɨ'na nyɨdana!” Aazakɨ wɨda' “Kwaaka kayaa'nanaangeba burɨka maalɨka yadeva saba dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨnne wapaayanna mala dɨradeigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ jɨhwaalaangerɨne duthaayɨdeigɨnyɨ. Sa' dɨvidaasɨ yagalya'makuna jɨtheigɨnyɨ.”

Jaikopɨ sara kya' Yɨzore sɨnna tɨka naanga kudava' da' “Jaikopɨmɨ mala tamɨdeinyɨra.” Yawɨta sara kya' Revekaa' dara wanganake' “Yɨzoi Jaikopɨmɨ mala tamadei daaka!” Daka “Jaikopɨmɨ pɨbanna wɨdaasɨma!” da'. Mi'na daka Aazakɨmɨ wɨda' “ ‘Yɨzoi a'mwe Etɨyawaarɨ maarake'ne' Jaikopɨ sara nyadɨka!’ dena gɨthɨwano.” Tɨvi'na kuda' Aazakɨ Jaikopɨmɨ jaka wɨdɨna yaka yagaala tewaanya' wɨdaka wɨdɨna “Kainanɨ mwaalyavɨ mamaa'dɨnnera! Laivanɨ jaakaangere kaimɨraaya' dɨmaa'deigɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai kaimɨraaya naanga gɨzaavadeigɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨda' ‘Kwaake' gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ.’ Wɨdaka kwaaka dava gɨmɨnyɨjɨ gɨmɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨjɨ saihɨrɨne yɨhɨzaavadesɨra.” Aazakɨ mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Jaikopɨ kwaaka Aaranɨ sawɨ Laivanɨ mwaalakewɨnna wawa'.
Yɨzoi sara wɨ'naka “Nɨmaamaangei Kainanɨ mwaalyanna ‘A'mwe tewaanya mɨ',’ sa'bɨta yawɨ'mwa,” daka Evɨraamɨre gawaalɨ' Yɨzɨmelɨmɨre taaya' maara'.

Jaikopɨ “Kwaaka Aaranɨ sawɨnneinyɨ,” daka kaanna wɨna yakegaa' pɨba se wa'mwaraka waja ya'nyɨna yaka dara wanganake' “Kɨnnaanya yɨravamakinɨke' kwaakevɨdaasa' yune sɨgunyavɨnanya' daaka!” Gotɨyare mamaaya ejelɨyara walaabɨna, yɨlaabɨna yadaapi wangana'. Sara kwangana' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyainyɨra. Evɨraamɨjɨ Aazakɨjɨ saraai nyu'nagi. Kwaaka da' gɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨre kaimɨraayarajɨ yɨhɨzaavɨdesɨ. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayara kwala naanga yɨma'napɨjɨ kwaaka davɨ yunebanna mwaaibɨ'dengɨ. Gɨmɨjɨyaraavɨna a'mwe kwaakevakɨ mwaaibɨzaraavɨne tewaanna yɨdeinyɨ. Gɨmɨjɨ wawakwoihɨri dava ayawɨnna yagalaawɨna yakwolyɨ bakadeinaalyɨ. Nɨmɨre yagaalya' nebwi gɨthɨwa.” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨ dɨkaa'na yaka da' “Gotɨyai dava mwaaidɨsɨ myawɨriwana. Davadaasɨ sɨgunyavɨnanyasɨra. Nɨmɨ lɨka yɨwana.” Yɨrɨke' kavura' Jaikopɨ daavaka sɨla yɨrɨ'mata dɨhaihɨsai yawɨta'nei yɨda'na marɨdaakwa'. Marɨdaakuna yaka “Dava Betelɨ (Gotɨyare angeba dɨnɨkesɨ),” daka welivananya' dɨngɨna ya' Gotɨyarɨna. Sara yaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨda' “Nɨmɨjɨ kwawakwolyɨ, wapaaya nɨgwɨlalaaka yɨvɨta nyɨjaava'gɨzɨ nɨmware angewɨnna ayawɨnna kanyɨmakaba'gɨri gɨmɨrebwi yɨdeinyɨ. Gɨlyɨvɨta ata yuyɨraai kanyɨjaava'gɨzɨ ayawɨ pɨrɨ'na gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ. Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' pɨrɨ'na, pɨrɨ'na gɨzaavɨdeinyɨra.”

Jaikopɨ nyɨla bilyɨrɨ'devannei Kwaaka Aaranɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna ya'. Aalɨbunyavɨ jɨlɨkyaawarya kwala naanga mwaaidapɨjɨ wanganaka kaanna bɨna yaka jɨlɨkyaawarya maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨda' “A'mwe Laivanɨ jawɨ'mwaava?” “Yo, yawɨ'mwo. Nabaai garaavaanga' Rasala' ganɨmaangere sipɨzipɨyajɨ makabɨvanɨke',” wɨde'. Aalɨbunyavɨ sɨlya' maratangɨrakɨna wa'dɨ'nyɨ Jaikopɨ sɨlya' maarɨna yaka pɨba marakɨna yɨna yaka aalya yɨrɨna, gamɨre sipɨzipɨyangɨna wɨjaavɨna ya'. Mi'na wɨjaavaka Rasalavɨ ata wɨbwa'naka wɨda' “Laivanɨ nyaakaangelyɨ.” Sara kuda' Rasala' gannya angevɨna yarai wɨna yaka ganɨmaangerɨ kuda' kaanyɨve'na wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yaka ata wɨbwa'nyɨna yaka gannya angevɨna makaba'. Jaikopɨ angevɨ bwina kya' Laivanɨ wɨda' “ ‘Nɨmɨreigɨnyɨ,’ nebwi gɨthɨwa.” Tɨvi'na kuda' Jaikopɨ saba mwaala'.

Lawe pu' wavɨla'daa'nyɨ Jaikopɨ gyaakaangere wawɨnya yɨna kya' Laivanɨ wɨda' “Dahaa' nɨgwɨwawɨnya mivanɨgɨnyajɨ gɨthɨwana. Berɨ' gɨzaavɨjɨwano?” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Kwarame dawaai dawaai dawaai da' sagaa' gɨthaayɨdeinyɨra. Nɨmɨ mena kya'mujɨ jɨraavaanga dɨviya' Rasalavɨ nyɨjaadeigɨnyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' “Dɨwaanya' tewaanyasɨra. Gɨzaavɨdesɨra,” wɨda'. Savɨdaasɨ Jaikopɨ yɨlaaya yada wawɨnya ya'.

Kwarame dawaai dawaai dawaai da' kwavɨlava' Jaikopɨ Laivanɨmɨ wɨda' “Rasala' nyɨjaama!” Sara kuda' Laivanɨ tɨka munne yɨlɨna yaka sa' sawɨsavɨ garaavaanga Lɨyaa' Jaikopɨmɨna wɨjaava'. Mwanyavɨ Jaikopɨ dara wanganake' “A'mwe Lɨyaa' damwaalɨ'!” Daka Laivanɨmɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨdava'. Sɨnna tɨka kudava' Laivanɨ wɨda' “ ‘Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe sɨraange' wɨjavaana!’ do' sɨmunya nemɨresɨra. Gɨmɨ Lɨyaasɨ sawɨta ata yuyi ata purɨdaasɨ pɨrɨwaai dɨmwaaidera. Mwaala'gɨzɨ sagaa' Rasala' gɨzaavɨde'na kwarame ata yuyi ata purɨdaasɨ pɨrɨwaala pɨnɨ nɨmɨre wawɨnya nyɨdaayadeigɨnyɨ.” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ sara ya'. Nabaai Laivanɨ a'mwe Sɨlɨpaavɨ wawɨnya wɨdaayadevɨne' garaavaangevɨne' Lɨyaavɨne' wɨjaavɨna, a'mwe Bilaavɨ wɨdaayadevɨne' garaavaanga pɨrɨvɨna wɨjaava'.

Lɨyaa' kaimɨraayai sɨraangei Ruvanɨ mɨlaka kaimɨraayai Sɨmɨyanɨ mɨlaka kaimɨraayai Livaai mɨlaka kaimɨraayai Juthai mɨla'. Rasala' kaimɨraavɨmaaya' mwaalake' Jaikopɨmɨne wɨdaayadevɨ Bilaavɨ wɨjaava'. Mi'na kujaava' Bilaa' kaimɨraayaraai mɨla'. Kamɨla' Rasala' “Nɨmɨrelyɨ,” daka sɨraangere yaya Denɨ, dɨviyai Napɨtalaai wɨda'. Dɨvidaasɨ Lɨyaa' dara wanganake' “Nɨmɨ kaimɨraaya pɨnɨ mɨlɨde'nyɨ daaka!” Daka wɨdaayadevɨ Sɨlɨpaavɨ Jaikopɨmɨnevɨ wɨjaava'. Mi'na kujaava' Sɨlɨpaa' kaimɨraayaraai mɨla'. Kamɨla' Lɨyaa' kɨrɨmɨre yaya' pwai Gethɨ, pwai Azai wɨda'.

Pɨgaa' Ruvanɨ yɨsɨla maaraka ganaanga Lɨyaavɨ wɨjaava'. Kujaava' Rasala' wɨda' “Yɨsɨla pɨrɨ' nyɨjaama!” Mi'na kuda' Lɨyaa' wɨda' “ ‘Ganɨmaangerɨ maa'dɨnya'gɨ yɨsɨla' maarɨma!’ dathɨwaana?” “Yɨsɨla mi'na nyɨjaava'gɨzɨ sawɨsavɨ nɨmɨre a'mwerɨ dɨmaa'dera,” wɨda' Rasala'. Nyɨla kwalaka' Jaikopɨ gannya angevɨna kulaaba' Lɨyaa' wɨda' “Nɨmɨre angevɨna wɨlaabɨza'na nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨ yɨsɨlanna mi'na gɨmubɨwa. Naarɨmɨ mwaalaka!” Sara kamwaalagi Lɨyaa' kaimɨraayai Yɨzakaai mɨla'. Dɨvidaasɨ kaimɨraaya pwai Sevulanɨ mɨla'. Aayagaasa' taaya Daaina' mɨla'. Lɨyaa' yuya mi'na kamɨla' Gotɨyai Rasalavɨna tewaanna kya' Rasala' kaimɨraayai Jozepɨyai mɨla'.

Rasala' Jozepɨyai kamɨla' Jaikopɨ “Nemɨ sanɨdakana wɨna yawaajɨ nɨnnya angevɨ mwalaana!” kada' Laivanɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ dava mwaala'gi wawɨnya ja!” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨnyɨna gyɨdeigɨnyɨ. Mi'na gya'mujɨ jɨlɨkyaawarya jaane yuya maarɨdeinyɨ.” Laivanɨ wɨ'naka wɨda' “Tewaanyasɨra.”

Dɨvi Jaikopɨ yɨsarɨkaavɨ dapaina, kɨlaaka woipɨra'na ya'. Sara yaka dara wanganake' “Jɨlɨkyaawarya tewaanya yawakɨmanɨga',” daka jɨlɨkyaawarya wanganya'ne yɨsarɨkaavɨ marakɨna ya'. Dɨvidaasɨ jɨlɨkyaawarya tewaanya bwaranya jaane mɨle'. Jɨlɨkyaawarya tewaanya jaane yɨma'nyɨna kye' Jaikopɨ maarɨna ya'. Jɨlɨkyaawarya wabe Laivanɨmɨre mwaale'. Jaikopɨ gɨlyɨvɨta naangejɨyai mwaalɨna. Gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨta naangejɨ jɨlɨkyaawarya naangejɨ mwaalɨna ya'.

Jaikopɨ dara wɨ'nake' “Laivanɨmɨre gawaalɨvava ‘Nenɨmaangere gɨlyɨvɨta yuya maa'delyɨra,’ dathɨvanɨgava!” Mi'na daka nabaai dara wanganake' “Laivanɨ jɨkurya nyɨvanɨkei daaka!” Sara kada' Gotɨyai Jaikopɨmɨ wɨda' “Gɨnnya angewɨnna ayawɨnna dɨwodera. Nɨmɨjɨ wawakadera.” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨ Rasalavɨjɨ Lɨyaavɨjɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ kɨrɨnɨmaangerɨne wawɨnya naanga yadɨnyainyɨ. Wawɨnaangeinyɨ yadaari gamɨ kwaasɨ nyɨdadelyɨ. Kwaasɨ kanyɨda' Gotɨyai kɨrɨnɨmaangere jɨlɨkyaawarya kwalaalyara nyɨjaawa'dɨ'. Nabaai Gotɨyai nyɨdɨwa' ‘Gɨnnya angewɨnna dɨwona!’ ” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Rasalasɨ Lɨyaasɨ sawaai wɨdahi “Gotɨyai sara gɨthɨwake' sara jɨ!”

Mi'na kudahi Jaikopɨ “Nɨmaamaanga Aazakɨ Kainanɨ mwaalyaryawɨnna wɨma!” daka gannya balaangengɨ gannya kaimɨraayangɨ jɨlɨkyaawaryangɨ maarɨna yaka wawa'. Sa' Rasala' ganɨmaangere sɨvuya'bɨsa' kuka maarɨna. Kuka maarɨna kya' Laivanɨ navɨka mwaala'.

Laivanɨ “Jaikopɨ kaanna wɨna kyɨwa'dɨ',” wɨ'naka Jaikopɨmɨ mɨdɨnna ya'. Kaanna wɨna wɨna, sawɨta ati ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraai kajɨnna' tusavɨ mɨjaahalaka wɨda' “Baarɨ' yɨwaana? Kwaasɨ baa'na yagɨna nyɨraavaangewaarɨ wɨla yɨrakɨnɨkewaarɨ baa'na makwasɨwaabɨna? Nabaai nɨmɨre sɨvuya'bɨsa' kuka baa'na maryawalyaadɨna? Lɨka be'na yulyaragɨna wɨwa'dɨ? ‘Nɨmɨ Jaikopɨmɨ mala tamɨma!’ dena sawɨsavɨ waja ya'nyawaaihe. Gɨmɨre Gotɨyai waja nyɨjawaalɨ' ‘Jaikopɨmɨna kave duthana!’ ” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre sɨvuya'bɨsa' kuka mamaryɨwa'de. Lɨka yulyarena dɨwa'de ‘Laivanɨ garaavaangewaarɨna nanyɨpalamaaradɨka!’ ” Mi'na kuda' Laivanɨ Jaikopɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ tɨnna wanganaka sa' gamɨre sɨvuya'bɨsa' Rasala' lɨka yulyakake' mabɨrɨmaarya'. Mabɨrɨmaaryakegaa' Jaikopɨ Laivanɨmɨ maanga wɨda' “Baa'neka! Gɨmɨre wawɨnya yadaari gɨmɨre jɨlɨkyaawarya kwala naanga yɨma'nyɨna kye' nɨmɨ mamaranyena. Gɨmɨre jɨlɨkyaawarya kunewɨ bɨrena bɨrena nɨmɨre gɨzaave. Sa' yuyagaa' nɨmɨnyɨne kwaasɨ yagɨ. Gɨmɨ kwaasɨ kyagɨ nɨmɨre Gotɨyai nyɨgaimwagaka sawɨsavɨ mayagaala gɨzawaalɨ',” wɨdɨna ya'.

Laivanɨ wɨda' “Nyɨraavaangewaalyɨ, aataasɨ, aataravajɨ nɨmɨre jɨlɨkyaawaryajɨ mwaaiha'. Sa' baarɨ' yɨjɨwa?” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨjɨ Laivanɨjɨ yagaala naanga kadɨnagi Laivanɨ wɨda' “Naarɨmɨ geva geva kamwaalakwolyɨ Gotɨyai nehwanganadelyɨra. Nyɨraavaangewaarɨna kayaa'na kamaremwaala'gɨzɨ Gotɨyai gwanganadeigɨnyɨra. Gɨmɨ a'mwe pɨrɨvɨ kamaara'gɨzɨ gwanganadelyɨra.” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨjɨyara sɨla marakɨna kye' Laivanɨ wɨda' “Sɨla naanga tɨhwawɨnya maramadakɨwaasa' gɨmɨnyɨna malya'na nɨmɨ mwavɨlayɨ yɨdeinyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna malya'na gɨmɨ mwavɨlayɨ jɨtheigɨnyɨra. Gotɨyarɨna gɨthɨwe' nebulyasɨ.” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda', “Sɨla naanga mwavɨlayɨ yɨdeinyɨ malya'nesɨ.” Jaikopɨ nebwina wɨdaka jɨlɨkyaawaryarɨ Gotɨyarɨna tamaka yɨdɨka yɨna kya' Jaikopɨjɨ Laivanɨjɨ nagi. Yɨrɨke' kavura' Laivanɨ se wa'mwarakei dɨkaa'na yaka garaavaangewaarɨjɨ kɨrɨmɨre kaimɨraayangɨjɨ sangɨ yɨlaaya yɨgala'. Yɨlaaya yɨgalaka yagaala tewaanya wɨdaka gannya angewɨnna wawa'.

Jaikopɨ kaanna wɨna yakegaa' dara wanganake' “Nɨmɨjɨ Gotɨyare mamaayara ejelɨyarajɨ mwaaiho.” Sara daka Jaikopɨ sɨhumale yaasadɨvɨsaraavɨ gathaakaanga Yɨzorɨna wɨdaasa'. Yaasadɨvɨsara kaanna waweva Yɨzorɨ wɨde' “Jaikopɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨvanɨ'. Gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta naanga warɨka.” Yaasadɨvɨsara Yɨzorɨ wɨ'neva kaanna bɨna yeva Jaikopɨmɨ wɨde' “Yɨzolyɨ a'mwe kwala naangerajɨ sara bɨvanɨgava.” Mi'na kude' Jaikopɨ lɨka yaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨda' “Gɨhaimwagɨdeinyɨ nyɨdahɨnya' ‘Gɨmɨre kaimɨraaya kwala naanga yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere.’ Nyɨgaimwadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Nabaai dahaa' nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta naanga warɨ'. ‘Gɨnnya angewɨnna dɨwodera,’ nyɨdahɨnya' sa' nyɨdaakaanga Yɨzorɨna nɨmɨ lɨka yena ‘Yɨzoi naneramakadɨka!’ dena ‘Nyɨgaimwana!’ gɨthɨwa.”
“Yɨzorɨ sɨnna tɨka nudavadɨ'! Jɨlɨkyaawarya naanga yanga wɨjaavɨma!” daka Jaikopɨ Yɨzorɨne jɨlɨkyaawaryangɨ maryaasaka gamɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ mɨdɨna'.

Jaikopɨ gamɨrengɨ kudaasa' kumɨza gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨtajɨ Aalya Javokɨ maraga'makuna. Maraga'makuna kya' Jaikopɨ gave kwai mwaala'. Sawɨsavɨ pwai baka Jaikopɨmɨ asangɨ galalɨmwanna ya'. Mala tannadaakɨri yɨrɨka purɨna kya' pwai Jaikopɨmɨ wɨda' “Nyɨmakwaasa!” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Yagaala tewaanya' nyɨda'gɨzɨ dɨwodera.” Pwai wɨda' “Gɨnnya yaya' Jaikopɨ (kwaasɨ yadei) sa' Gotɨyarɨjɨ a'mweraavɨjɨ yagaala bazɨwaimanaawɨgɨnyaigɨ, malya' gɨmɨnna dathɨvalaradɨnyaigɨ, gɨnnya yaya mudɨke' Yɨzɨrelɨmo.” Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Gotɨyarɨ wanganena kwaihwaainakeinyɨ mwaaimwa.” Nyɨla bilaawɨna yadaa'nyɨ Jaikopɨ tu'mudɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ yɨgala yɨgala kaanya wawa'.

Jaikopɨ dara wanganake' “Yɨzolyɨ gamɨre a'mwerajɨ sara jɨnɨgava!” Daka gannyangɨ wavɨla'na ya'. Wavɨla'na kya' Lɨyaasɨ Rasalasɨ kaimɨraayajɨ a'mwe wɨdaayadisawaalyɨ sa mɨdɨnna ye'. Mɨdɨnna kye' Jaikopɨ gathaakaangeryawɨnna bɨna. Bɨna kya' Yɨzoi tewaanya mwaalaka “Jaikopɨjɨ ata bwa'naka!” daka kaanyɨve'na bɨna kya' kɨnna maredɨnagi. Mi'na kamaredɨnagi Jaikopɨmɨva bɨna yeva Yɨzorɨna “Ata bwa'naana!” dɨna yeva ata bwa'nyɨna ye'. Tɨvi'na bwa'nyɨna kye' Yɨzoi wɨda' “Jɨlɨkyaawarya nɨmɨnyɨne makabɨwaanya waramaryana!” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ “Nɨmɨ kuneinyɨ daaka!” kuda' Yɨzoi maara'. Yɨzoi mi'na maaraka wɨda' “Nemɨjɨ sarɨmɨjɨ sanna kaanyaana!” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Nɨmɨre jɨlɨkyaawaryajɨ nɨmɨre kaimɨraayajɨ kave kave wɨna yɨna yaadennera.” Tɨvi'na kuda' Yɨzolyɨ gannya wɨdaayadɨvɨsarajɨ sara Jaikopɨ yagalya'ma'na yeva Kwaaka Sɨyaana wawe'. Kaanna kwawe' angeba Sekɨmɨ Kwaaka Kainanɨ mannɨkebanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka kwaaka mubaka saba mwaala'. Mi'na mwaalaka Yɨzɨrelɨ Gotɨyarɨne simɨnye' lɨvalaaba'.

Lɨyaavɨre taaya' Daaina' “Angeba Sekɨmɨ mwaalyangɨ angirɨ'maata yɨma!” daka kaanna wɨna ya'. Anga saba A'mwe Aamo maremwaaida mwaala'. A'mwe sare gawaalɨ' Sekɨmɨ Daainavɨ wanganaka “Sɨdɨraaya tewaanya' maa'mujava,” yawɨ'na. Sara yawɨ'na yaka ata lɨmwanna ya'. Ata lɨmwanna yaka Sekɨmɨ ganɨmaangerɨ wɨda' “Sɨdɨraaya da' nɨmɨre a'mwevɨna ganɨmaangerɨ duthana! ‘Gɨmɨre taaya' nɨmɨre mɨgɨnyarɨne' nyɨjaama!’ ” wɨda'.

Jaikopɨ dara wɨ'nake' “Sekɨmɨ nɨmɨre taaya' ata lɨmwanna jɨwaka!” Dɨna kya' gawaalɨvava pɨba yɨbwa'nadapɨjɨ navɨka mwaala'. Jɨlɨkyaawarya maremwaaidɨvɨsara gawaalɨvava bɨna yeva ku'ne' sɨnna tɨka naanga wɨdava'. Sɨnna tɨka kudava' sa' Aamo Jaikopɨmɨre gawaalɨvavaavɨ wɨda' “Sekɨmɨ nyɨbwaalɨvɨne Taaya Daaina' nyɨjaama! Gannya a'mwe' maaradelyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yagaala sara nyɨjide' sara yɨhɨzaavɨdesɨra.” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨmɨre gawaalɨvava kwaasɨ wɨdɨna “Nemɨ yuyaina kɨlaaka pɨkarya neyɨnɨkeinera. Sarɨmɨ kɨlaaka pɨkarya kada'napɨjɨ Daaina' Sekɨmɨmɨne' yɨhɨzavaadesɨra.” Sara wɨdɨna kye' Aamojɨ Sekɨmɨ gawaalɨsɨ saraai yɨlaaya yagi. Kɨrɨnnya angewɨnna wawagɨla kɨrɨmɨre a'mweraavɨ wɨdahi “Jaikopɨmɨre gawaalɨvava sara nehɨthɨwaasa' sara yaana! Dɨvidaasɨ Jaikopɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa maraadengɨra.” Sara dɨneva angeba Sekɨmɨ mwaalyara kunnya kɨlaaka pɨkarya da'ne'. Kada'ne' kɨlaaka daanga wɨvɨdaa'nyɨ Daainavɨre gya'mweraai Sɨmɨyanɨ Livaai saraai wɨlaabahɨla Sekɨmɨ mwaalyaraavɨ tamakɨna yagi. Tamakɨna kyagi Jaikopɨmɨ gawaalɨvava beva Sekɨmɨmɨre angevɨdaasɨ Daaina' makuna ye'. Nabaai a'mwejɨ kaimɨraayajɨ Sekɨmɨ mwaalyaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ makwawe'. Jaikopɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨna lɨka yaka gawaalɨvavaavɨ mayagaala wɨdɨna. Mayagaala wɨdɨna kya' “Sekɨmɨ neya'mwevɨ kayaa'nanaanga yakelyɨra,” wɨde'.

Gawaalɨvava sara kye' Gotɨyai Jaikopɨmɨ wɨda' “Betelɨ sawɨnna dɨmwaaidera. Mwaala'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnyɨne simɨnye' dɨlɨvalaama!” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨ gamɨrebadaa'nyaraavɨ wɨda' “Sarɨmɨre sɨvuya yuya sabɨsa dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla! Sarɨmɨre kuryara tewaanyara mwaaibɨka! Nabaai kɨlaakejɨka gɨrɨka'nana aalya dɨzɨnyɨla! Aalya jɨnapɨjɨ kwaabɨhannya baazɨ'ma'nya tewaanya yaaka dakyɨla! Betelɨ sawɨnna nemɨ kaanyaana! Saba Gotɨyai nɨmɨjɨ mwaaiderɨna nɨmɨ simɨnye' lɨvalaabɨdera!” Jaikopɨ sara wɨdɨna yake' gamɨjɨyara sara ye'. Mi'na kye' wodaapɨjɨ Gotɨyai a'mwe pwara yuyaraavɨ Jaikopɨjɨyaraavɨna, “Sarɨmɨ a'mwe saraavɨ mipɨnera!” kada' a'mwe yuyara lɨka yɨna ye'. Jaikopɨ Betelɨ mwaalaka Gotɨyarɨna yɨleyagaala wɨdɨna ya'.

Jaikopɨ Gotɨyai yaya' Yɨzɨrelɨ wo'nɨkei dara wanganake' “Gotɨyai damwaalɨ'!” Kada' Gotɨyai wɨda' “Nɨmɨ Gotɨya dɨragɨnyainyɨ. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraavɨzɨmya kwala naanga yɨma'nyɨna yɨpɨ'dengɨ. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraavɨzɨmya pwara a'mwe naanga yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera. Kwaaka Evɨraamɨjɨ Aazakɨjɨ saraarɨna wɨjaaveba gɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨre kaimɨraavɨzɨmyajɨ sangyɨhɨrɨna yɨhɨzaavɨnɨke'.” Sara kuda' Jaikopɨ sɨla naangei daa'dɨ'nyɨyaba Gotɨyarɨna welɨya' dɨngɨna ya'.

Betelɨ sabadaasa wodaapɨjɨ Rasala' kaimalei mɨlaka bala'. Kabala' sagaa' Jaikopɨ kaimɨraayarɨna yaya' Bejaminɨ wo'na'. Jaikopɨ kale wiadaasɨ Betɨlemɨ sangineba Rasala' wakaka kwaaka saba mwaalɨna. Saba mwaalɨna yadɨsɨ Ruvanɨ ganɨmaangere balaanga Bilaavɨ ata lɨmwanna kya' Jaikopɨ sara yawɨra'. Jaikopɨmɨre gawaalɨvaanga sɨvɨlɨraai ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyara yuyara mwaale'.
Angeba Maamɨre mwaalyai Jaikopɨmɨre ganɨmaangei Aazakɨ mwaaidɨsɨ Jaikopɨ ba'. Aazakɨ a'mwe nei kwarame naanga 180 kwavɨlava' bala'. Kabala' gawaalɨvaangeraai Yɨzolyɨ Jaikopɨjɨ saraai wakagi.

Yɨzolyɨ Jaikopɨjɨ saraare jɨlɨkyaawarya mwaaidapɨjɨ kumɨre tɨka munne maalɨka wa'dɨsɨ Yɨzoi gannya balaangejɨ kaimɨraayajɨ jɨlɨkyaawaryajɨ makuna yaka Sɨyaa mugunyavɨ maremwaala'. Maremwaalaka Yɨthomɨyaraavɨ ganɨmaangei yɨma'na'.

Jaikopɨ Kwaaka Kainanɨ mwaalakegaa' Jozepɨyarɨ kwarame atɨraai sɨvɨla pwi yuya yaka sɨvɨla purɨdaasɨ pwaraaina kwavɨlava' sagaa' mwaala'. Kamwaala' Jozepɨyadaraka sipɨzipɨya yɨ'dɨvaidɨvɨ' mwaale'. Jozepɨyare ganaange' maarakegaa' Yɨzɨrelɨ a'mwe nei mwaalake'na Jozepɨyarɨ yɨlaaya naanga marina ya'. Gawaalɨvava pwaraavɨ yɨlaaya maalɨka marya'. Yɨlaaya naanga maryaka Jaikopɨ Jozepɨyarɨna baazɨ'ma'nya tewaanya' yavɨkarya'. Jozepɨyai gaverɨna kyavɨkarya' gya'mwera “Maraajava kale newɨla'mwaka,” kade' sɨnna tɨka davɨna wia'.

Jozepɨyai waja ya'nyɨna yaka gya'mweraavɨ “Nɨmɨre waja yɨvanɨge' yɨhɨzɨwaakɨ,” wɨda'. “Wawɨnyavɨ witɨya lɨlaajabɨsa maramurɨta'na yadaawojɨ nɨmɨre witɨpwɨya' dɨkavedaa'na yaka daavɨna yadɨsɨ sarɨmɨre witɨpwɨya dɨkavedaa'na gɨ'du'na yaka ‘A'mwe naangeigɨnyɨ,’ ” wɨda'. Jozepɨyai sara kuda' gya'mwera “Kwaasɨ nedɨwa',” deva “Nemɨnyɨna dɨnemaremwaaijɨwaa?” wɨde'. Dɨvi pɨgaa' Jozepɨyai waja mudɨka pɨrɨ' ya'naka ganɨmaangelyɨ gya'mwerajɨ saraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'. “Nyɨlyalyɨ lawelyɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya sɨvɨlɨraai ata purɨdaasɨ pwaina sara nɨmɨnyɨna gɨ'dura'na yawaaihava.” Mi'na kuda' Jaikopɨ wɨda' “Baa'na dɨwaana? ‘Nɨmaamaangelyɨ nyɨnaangesɨ nya'mwerajɨ sa nɨmɨnyɨna gɨ'du'na yɨpɨ'dera,’ dathɨwaana?” wɨda'. Jozepɨyare yagaala'na gya'mwera sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ ganɨmaangei kave yawɨra'.

Kwaaka Sekɨmɨ Jaikopɨmɨre gawaalɨvava jɨlɨkyaawarya yɨ'dɨvaidaapi Yɨzɨrelɨ Jozepɨyarɨ “Ja'mwera tewaanya damwaaihava?” wɨdaka wɨdaasa'. Kudaasa' Jozepɨyai kaanna kaanna Sekɨmɨ sawɨnna ba'. Mi'na baka dara wanganake' “We', nya'mwera pwara mamwaalyɨjɨhava!” Daka wanganamaryɨna. Wanganamaryɨna yadaasɨ a'mwe pwai wanganaka wɨda' “Nɨmɨ ja'mweraavɨ wɨ'nɨwa'de ‘Kwaaka Dothanɨ sabanna kaanyaana!’ dɨdaapi.” Sara kuda' Jozepɨyai kaanna wɨna ya'.

Badaa'nyɨ Jozepɨyarɨ gya'mwera wanganeva dɨne' “Waja yadei yɨnɨkerɨ tamakaana! Tamakawaajɨ ‘Kavɨjɨlɨkei tamakɨwakelyɨra,’ wɨdaathera. Tamakawaajɨ ‘Gamɨre waja nebulya' daaka!’ daathe'na,” dɨne'. Kadɨne' Ruvanɨ sɨraangei “Jozepɨyarɨ yɨvalɨma!” daka “Maramaki jide. Kavi'nɨnnyavɨ marirakɨna jidelyɨra,” wɨda'. Tɨvi'na kuda' Jozepɨyai yɨ'mavaawɨna kya' lɨmwanna yeva gannya baazɨ'ma'nya tewaanya' yɨraipurasɨ'na yeva kavi'nɨnna kunevɨ yɨrake'.

Jozepɨyai kavi'nɨnnyavɨ wɨla'dɨsɨ gya'mwera wapaaya nadaapi Mithɨyanɨ mwaalyara badaapi Juthai gya'mweraavɨ wɨda' “Neya'mwe Jozepɨyarɨna a'mwe saraavɨne mubaana! Nennya neya'mweryaba maramakaannera!” Sara kuda' kavi'nɨnnyavɨdaasɨ Jozepɨyarɨ wɨlyabaalyɨ marayɨ'dɨvaina yeva maramwagi'namaa'na yeva kinaaya ata sɨvɨlɨraaina mube'. Kamube' Mithɨyanɨ mwaalyara Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨna makuna ye'.

Jozepɨyarɨ gya'mwera jɨlɨkyaawaryai tameva gamɨre tawe maareva Jozepɨyare baazɨ'ma'nya' tawevɨ maradɨvaina. Maradɨvaina yeva kuvɨnɨmaangerɨ “Baazɨ'ma'nya da' yakɨnɨke' maa'mwosɨ. Jɨwaalɨvaangere' daaka?” wɨdaawɨna ye'. Wɨdaawɨna kye' Jaikopɨ wanganaka wɨda' “Yo. Nyɨbwaalɨvaangere baazɨ'ma'nyasɨ. Kavɨjɨlɨkei dawakɨwakerɨnera.” Sara kuda' kale naanga wiadaasɨ Jozepɨyarɨna kɨnna naanga bazɨwɨna ya'.

Sagaa' Juthai Kainanɨ mwaalya' kamaara' gannya a'mwe' kaimɨraaya daraai dai mɨla'. A'mwe Ei, sɨraangei Taimaa' kwala maara'. Kamaara' gamɨrebwi kayaa'nanaangebwi kya' Gotɨyai “Gamɨ balya'negaa' wakɨdeinyɨra,” dɨnɨke'na Ei bala'. Kabala' Juthai kutabanyai Wonanɨmɨ wɨda' “A'mwe Taimaa' dɨmaa'!” Sara kuda' maarɨna yaka “Kaimɨraayanna waramaryana!” daka kayaa'na ya'. Kayaa'na yake'na Gotɨyai dɨna “Balya'negaa' wakɨdeinyɨ.” Mi'na dɨnɨkevɨ Wonanɨ balɨna ya'. Kabala' Juthai Taimaavɨ wɨda' “Navɨka dɨmwaala! A'mwe pwarɨ mamaa'nɨnnera! Gɨmaamaangeryawɨnna kaanna wɨna jɨ! Saba dɨmwaai! Nyɨbwaalɨ' aaya wɨryaakei Silaa naanga gɨrina kyojɨ gamɨzarɨ dɨmaa'nana!” Wɨdɨna kya' Taimaa' kaanna wɨna ya'. Sa' Silaa naanga gɨrina kya' Juthai “Nyɨbwaalɨvaanga dai gannya gya'mweraalyɨ nabaai nabaladɨka!” daka Silaamɨ “Taimaa' dɨmaa'!” muja'. Yagaala mujɨ yaka mwaalɨna yakere balaange' balɨna ya'. Balɨna kya' Taimaa' kwaasɨ kya' “Juthai Taimaavɨ ata lɨmwamwaka,” dɨnyɨna ye'. Dɨnyɨna kye' Taimaa' kaimɨraayaraai pwaraai avaalyagaa' maarɨna ya'. Maarɨna kya' “Sɨraangei Perezɨ, dɨvidaasai Jeraa,” wo'na'.

Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨna Mithɨyanɨ mwaalyara Jozepɨyarɨ makuna yeva A'mwe Potipaarɨna mubye'. Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ saba maremwaalakei Peroyalyɨra. Potipaai Peroyare a'mwe naangelyɨra. Gotɨyai Jozepɨyarɨ wɨgaimwanna yada Jozepɨyai gannya wawɨnya nayaa yɨna ya'. Nayaa yɨna yadaasɨ Potipaai dara wanganake' “Gamɨre wawɨnya tewaanya jɨvanɨka!” Sara daka gannya angasɨ gannya gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ maremwaaiderɨ wɨmwaaiha'. Wɨmwaaihɨna kya' Gotɨyai Potipaarɨna tewaanna ya'.

Jozepɨyai tewaanyai angevɨ wɨla'dɨsɨ Potipaare a'mwe' “Tewaanyarɨna maarɨma!” daka wɨda' “A'mwaagaigɨ, avaanna wɨlakade'nanyɨ.” Sara kuda' Jozepɨyai “Aala,” wɨdɨna ya'. “Potipaai gannya gɨlyɨvɨsa maremwaaina yadɨnyainyɨ nyɨmwaaihɨna ya'. Gamɨre'gɨnyɨra. Nɨmɨre'gɨ daaka! Sara nɨmɨ myɨwɨnera! Sabwi kya'mujɨ Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunya kayaa'na nanyawɨradɨka!” wɨdɨna ya'.

Gazagaasagaa' Potipaare a'mwe' sana sana wɨdade' Jozepɨyai “Aala,” sara wɨda'. Pɨgaa' sara wɨdakei “Nɨmɨre wawɨnya yɨma!” daka angevɨ wɨla'na ya'. Wɨla'na yadɨsɨ Potipaare a'mwe gave' mwaalaka gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nyavɨ lɨmwanna yaka “Kwala nyɨmaa'!” wɨda'. Sara yaka sara wɨdɨna kya' Jozepɨyai yɨraipɨvalakɨna yaka lɨkaanya wɨna ya'. Lɨkaanya wɨna kya' Potipaare a'mwe' sɨnna tɨka kudava' wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ jaka wɨdɨna ya'. “Yɨvɨruyarajɨyai sai kwayagaala nyɨdɨvanɨ'. Nɨmɨ ‘Aaka, aaka,’ dɨwe'nyɨ gamɨ lɨkaanya wɨna yɨwa'. Danganyɨla! Gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya' warɨkaagavaakana!” wɨda'. Sara wɨdaka navɨka mwaala'. Potipaai gannya angevɨ wɨlaabaka gannya a'mwe' wɨdake' kwɨ'na' sɨnna tɨka davɨna wia'. Davɨna kwia' Jozepɨyarɨ kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ya'. Wɨmwaaihɨna kya' Jozepɨyai wɨla'dɨsɨ Gotɨyai baihana'dɨsɨ kalavuzavɨ damei Jozepɨyarɨ tewaanya ya'. “Kalavuza mwaaidɨvɨsara pwaraavɨ dɨmaremwaaideigɨnyɨ,” Jozepɨyarɨ wɨda'.

Jozepɨyai kalavuzavɨ mwaaidɨsɨyagaa' pɨgaa' gamɨre wawɨnya wɨdaayadisaraarɨna A'mwe Pero sɨnna tɨka davɨna kwia' kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ya'. A'mwe pwai Peroyare wapaayajɨ aalyasɨ wɨmaarina yadei, yɨ a'mwe pwai Peroyare gɨrɨkula yɨdɨka yadei saraalyɨ Jozepɨyalyɨ kalavuzavɨ mwaale'.

A'mwe pwaraai sawɨsavɨ waja yɨna yagi. Waja yɨna kyagi mwanyavɨ Jozepɨyai wɨlaabɨna kya' jɨkurɨna mwaalɨna yagɨla “Sawɨsavɨ naarɨmɨ waja ya'nyawaaiholyainaalyɨra. Waja bewaja yɨvanɨgolya'na aai nehɨzɨwaakajɨwaka?” wɨdahi. Sara kudahi Jozepɨyai “Nɨmɨre Gotɨyai waja yawɨ'delyɨ. Kɨrɨmɨre waja nyɨji! Gotɨyai nyɨjɨwaakadeinyɨ,” wɨda'. A'mwe pwai Peroyare wapaaya wɨmaarina yadei gannya waja Jozepɨyarɨ wɨda' “Gɨraipɨwɨla taanya dawaai da' wa'dɨsɨ nɨmɨ wangamwa. Wangadaari purɨrya yɨ'nadaasɨ wanganyawaaihe' dahaa' mya mena yimwake' wangamwa. Mena kyimwa' Peroyare gulyavɨ marama'mwagikɨna yena wɨjaavɨna yɨwana.” Mi'na kuda' Jozepɨyai wɨdɨna “Waja sa' gɨzɨwaakɨ! Taanya dawaai dasa' sawɨta daryaai darɨ' sa'bɨsasɨra. Sawɨta daryaai darɨ' kajɨnnojɨ Pero ‘Nɨmɨre wapaaya dɨnyɨmaryaama! Aya' jɨthera,’ gɨthathera. Gɨmɨ sara ya'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnyɨna jawɨ'deigɨnyɨ. Yawɨra'gɨzɨ ‘Jozepɨyai kayaa'nanya' myakerɨ kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihava,’ duthathera.” wɨdɨna. A'mwe pwai Peroyare gɨrɨkula yɨdɨka yadei sara wɨ'naka Jozepɨyarɨ wɨda' “Nabaai nɨmɨ waja ya'nyawaaihe. Soigɨlya dawaai da' kinya yɨlamarina yɨvanɨgeinyɨ. Soigɨlya aaya a'banyavɨ gɨrɨkula ge ge mihɨnɨke yusara gɨrɨkula dapanadaapi baihanakeinyɨ,” wɨda'. Tɨvi'na kuda' Jozepɨyai “Gɨmɨre waja' gɨzɨwaakɨ! Soigɨlya akwalamwai sawɨta daryaai darɨ' sa'bɨsasɨra. Sawɨta daryaai darɨ' kagɨzɨnnojɨ Peroyai yɨsarɨ wɨla tɨdavojɨ gɨmɨnyɨ pɨgaa' wɨla kamaragɨrɨdavojɨ yusara gɨnɨpɨ'deigɨnyɨ,” wɨda'.

Sawɨta daryaai darɨ' kajɨnna' Peroyai gannya wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨne tɨka munne ya'. Sagaa' Jozepɨyai sara wɨdake'na Pero sara ya'. A'mwei gamɨre wapaaya wɨmaarina yaderɨna jaka wɨdɨna yaka “Gɨmɨre wawɨnya sɨnnawɨnya' jɨ!” wɨda'. A'mwei gamɨre gɨrɨkula yɨdɨka yaderɨ wɨla mararɨdava'. Peroyare wapaaya wɨmaaryadei gannya wawɨnya yɨna yada Jozepɨyarɨna Peroyarɨ mujaka navɨka mwaala'.
Kwarame pɨrɨwaai kwavɨlava' sawɨta pɨrɨkɨ Pero waja pɨrɨwaai ya'na'. Ya'nyɨna yaka mwanyavɨ kave yɨdaakuna kya' a'mwe kwai a'mwe kɨrɨ' waja sawaarɨna kunnakai mamwaalya'.

Kunnakei mamwaalyɨ kya' Peroyare wapaaya wɨmaaryadei Peroyarɨ wɨdɨna “Dahaasagaa' Jozepɨyarɨna yawɨ'mwa. Nɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨre gɨrɨkula yɨdɨka yadelyɨ sainaarɨna sɨnna tɨka kagɨthava' kalavuzavɨ maranehɨmwaaihagɨ. Sawɨta pɨgaa' waja ya'nɨgolyainaalyɨra. Jozepɨyai Yɨvɨruyarajɨyai saba mwaalaka naarɨmɨre waja nehɨzɨwaaka'. Nehɨtha' ‘Pero “Gɨmɨre wawɨnya sɨnnawɨnya' jɨ!” gɨthathera,’ sara nyɨda'.
