Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kotɨya marya'ne yɨrɨkerɨkɨ Anga Sothomɨ Anga Gomora kayaa'nanyabanyaai mwaalyaraavɨne' tɨvɨkɨsavɨ anga naanga dazaba mwaalyaraavɨre tɨvɨkɨsa' wavɨlavadesɨ.

Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmɨ kavɨjɨlɨkeraavɨ tɨnnyawɨnna sipɨzipɨya kwaamusaihɨrɨ marayɨhyaasɨwa. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ sɨmunya' nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨ' nayaa jideihɨlyɨ. Nabaai kwaamɨryarebwibɨ' kave mwaaidɨvɨ' pwaraavɨ kayaa'na mipɨnera! Nayaa duzɨwaakyɨla!
A'mweraavɨna mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kunnya kaajolɨyaraayabanna kotɨya yɨhɨmaripɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Kunnya lotuangengɨ kusawɨ wɨlyabaalyɨ dɨka yɨhɨhɨdapɨ'deihɨlyɨ.

Nɨmɨnyɨna “Walamarakaana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Ga'maanɨyaraayawɨnnajɨ Kingɨyaraayawɨnnajɨ yɨhɨmakupɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Sagaa' sahwaraavɨ kadɨka mu'nyadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨjɨ nɨmɨnyɨne'na jalɨkurakya'neihi duzɨwaakyide'nanyɨ.

Kotɨyavɨ kyɨhɨmarɨmwangapɨjɨ yawɨta kwalaalya myadɨvɨ' dara nyawɨpɨdɨ'! “Nemɨ gara wɨdaazɨwona? Nemɨ be yagaalya' wɨrɨvɨkɨraanneka?” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaasagaa' yunegaa' yagaala duzɨwaakyide' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai yɨhwakadelyɨ.
Yune sarɨmɨ saihina duzɨwaakyideihi mɨ'. Aawa. Sɨrɨnɨmaangere Kuryai wɨlayɨhɨmwaaida yagaala sa' sarɨmɨre maangikaavɨdaasɨ wɨjɨwaakadelyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwei Gotɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadei gahwaalaangerɨ Gotɨyare lɨmwade'na kotɨya kumarɨmwaaihojɨ yɨnahu tamakɨpɨjai. Yɨ nabaai ganɨmaangei gannya kaimɨraayarɨ avaala sana yadelyɨ. Nabaai kaimɨraayara kɨrɨnaangewaarɨ yɨkamaanga yɨma'nyɨna yapɨjɨ tamakya'na kotɨyavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna.
Nɨmɨre yayavɨne'na yuyara sɨmɨlɨka widere sarɨmɨnyɨna. Kɨrɨ' aaya yune naangegaa'na a'mwe dɨragɨnna daavajai Gotɨyai padaihasamaaradelyɨ.

Nabaai anga naanga pɨba Gotɨyarɨne yawɨsaihɨrɨ kayaaka juwɨ'nyɨna kihyapɨjɨ anga naanga pɨbanna lɨkaanya yɨkuna jideihɨlyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ wawɨnya' Yɨzɨrelɨ anga naanga yuyabanya yarai mi'mwannyadapi A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai bathehaa'nanyɨ.
Mɨdɨdei gannya wɨjɨwaakyarɨ wavɨlavadei mɨ'. Nabaai yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai gamɨre naangei wavɨlavadei mɨ'.

Yɨ mɨdɨdei gamɨre wɨjɨwaakyai mwaaidevaaibɨ' yɨma'naja' sa' wikɨra. Nabaai wawɨnya wɨdaayadei gamɨre maremwaalyai mwaaidevaaibɨ' yɨma'naja' sa' wikɨra. Nɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'na yɨpɨja' sarɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'na yɨhyɨpɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ angevɨ maremwaaidɨnyainyɨna dara dɨwa'daa' “Yɨmaka Naangere dɨragɨnyavɨna yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨvanɨ'.” Sara dɨna “Biyelɨzɨvulɨgɨ Yɨmaka Naangeigɨnyɨ,” dɨna yɨwa'daasa'na sarɨmɨnyɨna nɨmɨre angevɨyaihɨrɨna kayaa'na gatha'dara dɨpɨ'de'neka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨnyɨna lɨka mipɨnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuyaburaavɨjɨ yuyangɨjɨ bwakakɨnɨke ku'maayaba waraabathengɨ. Yuya kulaa'nya lɨka yulyarɨke a'mwera yawɨrangabɨ'dengɨ.

Sarenna jɨhɨnyavɨ lɨka yulyarɨkevɨ yagaala yɨhɨthɨvanɨge daza yɨrɨkegaa' a'mweraayaba duzɨwaakyidengɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨ kave kadɨki'na wɨ'nakɨvanɨgasa angevɨ munya ke'ba daa'dɨvɨ' naanna duzɨwaakyidengɨ.

Sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ a'mwe yɨnahu tamakɨpɨ'deraavɨna lɨka mipɨna! Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre kuryaraavɨjɨ tamakɨpɨnera mɨ'. Aawa. Dɨka Kayaa'nanaangevɨ Gotɨyai kuryarɨjɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨjɨ yuyaraarɨ kayaaka yɨgalannerɨna lɨka jide'nanyɨ.
Yuta maalɨka pwaraai nɨgwia pu'nanyɨsɨ mubadɨvɨsɨ' midaa'! Kɨrɨ' Sɨrɨnɨmaangei “Aala!” kadozɨ yuta maalɨka sarei mabalyojɨ kwaakevakɨ bwalaraawadei mɨ'.
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨne'na sarɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ mɨjata yuyangɨ ata mena ginɨkengɨ. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨna mena yuna yawɨ'nɨkeihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ lɨka mipɨna! Dare' jawɨryɨla! Yuta maalɨkeraavɨ Gotɨyai nayaa maremwaaide kwalaalyaraavɨ nemɨ dɨragɨnna mena wavɨla'mwoinera! Sara jawɨryɨla!
Sarengɨdaa'nyɨ yɨhɨthɨma! Gazaizai Kwaaka davakɨ a'mweraayaba jalɨkurakɨvanɨkei “Nɨmɨ Jizaazareinyɨ,” yɨ sahwarɨna aayagaa' Sɨgunyavɨ Nɨmaamaangerɨ jalɨkurakɨdeinyɨ “Sahwai nɨmɨrelyɨra.”
Kɨrɨ' gazaizai a'mweraayaba wɨjɨwaakajai “Jizaazareinyɨ mɨka!” yɨ sahwarɨna Sɨgunyavɨ Nɨmaamaangerɨ wɨjɨwaakɨdeinyɨ “Sahwarɨna myawɨriweinyɨ.”

Sarɨmɨ sɨmunya myawɨpɨna! “Kwaaka davakɨna Jizaazai mala yuya yɨga'mwagakya'najɨ narya wakya'najɨ bɨwakelyɨ.” Nɨmɨ narya wakya sa'na bɨweinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Kwaari'masɨramɨnya' makabeneinyɨ. A'mweraavɨ tangɨvalya'na bɨweinyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨkamaanga yɨma'nya'nevɨna bɨweinyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨne'na a'mwelyɨ ganɨmaangelyɨ sɨmunya ge' ge' tangɨvalakɨlyɨ maanga dɨnyɨna. Yɨ sɨdɨraayasɨ ganaangesɨ sɨmunya ge' ge' tangɨvalakɨlyɨ maanga dɨnyɨna. Yɨ a'mwesɨ ganyaalɨmaangesɨ sɨmunya ge' ge' tangɨvalakɨlyɨ maanga dɨnyɨna.
Yɨ a'mwelyɨyara avaaimwaalya kwara yɨkamaanga mwaalɨna yɨpɨ'derera.

A'mwei ganɨmaanga pwarɨna ganaanga kɨrɨvɨna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'na yada nɨmɨnyɨna maalɨ'na yawɨ'na yade sahwai nɨmɨrei wi'nanyai mɨka. Nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanyai mɨ'. Nabaai gawaalɨvaanga pwarɨna garaavaanga kɨrɨvɨna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'na yada nɨmɨnyɨna maalɨ'na yawɨ'na yade sahwai nɨmɨrei wi'nanyai mɨka!
Nabaai yɨta yovihɨrarannɨke' kanyɨjaavapɨjɨ makwawa'mujɨ yɨta savɨ balɨdevaaibɨ' nɨmɨnyɨne taanginyanna bɨraizɨkanna “Aala!” dada kuna manyɨmɨdɨnyajai nɨmɨrei wi'nanyai mɨka.

A'mwei gannya gaala yune kaveya sabwina yawɨ'da nɨmɨnyɨna “Aala,” dazai gamɨre kuryai kayaaka yɨnadelyɨ. Yɨ a'mwei nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'da gamɨre mwaalyabwi yagalya'mavajai nɨmɨnyɨna balajai gamɨre kuryai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' tewaanna mwaaladelyɨ.

Nɨmɨre yagaalya' jamaryadaapɨjɨ a'mwei wɨgaimwange'na yɨhɨmaarajai yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ gaveihɨrɨ mamaari yɨhyadelyɨ. Avaalyagaa' nɨmɨnyɨjɨ nyɨmaaradelyɨ. Nabaai nyɨmaarajai, yɨthaanyi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nyɨmaryasaabakerɨ maaradelyɨ. Tewaanya maaradelyɨ.

A'mwei yawɨ'na “Sahwai pɨropetɨyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei mwaalɨke'na wɨgaimwagɨma! Pɨropetɨyarɨ nɨmɨre angevɨna marakaabɨwɨjarɨ nayaa maremwaalɨma!” Yɨ a'mwe dazarɨ Gotɨyai pɨropetɨyarɨ yanga wɨrɨvɨkɨradevaaibɨ' yanga tɨvɨkɨta nawɨ'nya' wɨjaavadelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwei yawɨ'na “Sahwai yɨda'maraangei mwaalɨke'na wɨgaimwagɨma!” Yawɨ'na yojɨ gannya angevɨna maarajai Gotɨyai yɨda'maraangerɨ yanga wɨrɨvɨkɨradevaaibɨ' yanga wɨrɨvɨkɨta wɨjaavadelyɨ.

Nabaai pwai a'mwe maalɨkeraavɨ tɨnna wanganna yojɨ yawɨ'na “Jizaazare mɨdɨderɨ wɨgaimwagɨma!” Yawɨ'na yojɨ kaapɨvananyavɨ aalya nya'ne gave' yanga wɨjaavajai, yɨthaanyi, nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe dazarɨne yanga wɨrɨvɨkɨta yaasɨwa'na yɨwawode' mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ.
Jizaazai gannya sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala saraavɨre wawɨnya'na kɨwɨnya daza' tɨvi'na jɨku'na yaka sabadaa'nyɨ kumɨre anga naanga sawɨnna kaanna wɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwɨryada wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna ya'.
Jonɨ kalavuzavɨ mwaalɨna yada Kɨraazɨtɨyai yadaa'nyɨya yuya sanna Jonɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka gannya mɨdɨdisaraarɨ gamɨnyawɨnna maryaasɨna.
Dara wɨdaasɨna “Nemɨ ‘Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ bathelyɨra,’ dadaanyaigɨ dahwaigɨ dɨngaka? Pwarɨna yemwalaadei dɨngaka?”
Sara wɨdaasɨna yakeraai Jizaazarɨ yɨdaanganna kyagi yagaalyavɨ tɨvɨkɨ'na “Jonɨmyawɨnna kɨrɨmɨ yuya kadɨka wɨ'nagɨla tɨnna wangamanɨgɨla sannajɨ duthɨthaakwila!

Tɨbɨnyara tɨnna yenyɨna, sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyara kaanya yamarina, samatanakera nawɨ'nya yɨma'nyɨna, a'mwe kadɨka mu'nyɨmu'nyara yagaalyangɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna, bainɨkera ayɨna yɨdɨkaa'na, a'mwe nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna yadɨnyainyɨ.
Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna pwai sɨmunya pɨrɨwaalyɨyai mamwaalyɨ yajai dɨragɨnya nyɨlɨmwagazai yɨ dazai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkelyɨra.” Jizaazai Jonɨmɨna sara wɨda'.

Jonɨmɨre saraai mena wɨna yadaakɨlyɨ sagaa' Jizaazai Jonɨmɨna kwala bwa'naanyavɨ dara wɨdɨna “A'mwera maayabanna sarɨmɨ kaanna wɨna yeva bewarɨ wanganaaweva? Suya pɨrɨkɨ yɨhusa' galalɨwihɨrakerɨ'bɨsarɨ dahawanganaawe'?
Aawa. Sarɨmɨ tɨnna bewarɨ wanganaaweva? Baazɨ'ma'nya wolata baazɨ'ma'nɨkerɨ dahawanganaawe'? Aawa. Yɨthaanyi! Baazɨ'ma'nya wolata baazɨ'ma'nadɨvɨ' kingɨyaraavɨre angengɨ mwaaidɨvɨsare.
Kɨrɨ' bewarɨna waweva? Pɨropetɨyarɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakaderɨ wanganya'neihi dɨngaka? Yo, yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Dazahwai pɨropetɨyai yaka kɨrɨ' pɨropetɨyaraavɨrebwi wavɨlavɨkelyɨ.
Yune a'mwe sahwarɨna dɨnɨkerɨnesɨ. Gotɨyai dara wɨjaa'
‘Yɨthaa, nɨmɨre wɨjɨwaakya'nei maryasaabɨdelyɨ.
Gɨmɨnyɨna sɨnnawɨ waanyɨna yadelyɨ.
Gɨmɨnne tutaanya maryovɨrawakɨna yadelyɨ.’

Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei a'mweraavɨdaa'nyara Kwaakevakɨ yɨma'nɨgata yuyaraavɨ wavɨlavɨkelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Sɨgunyavɨya Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨne a'mwe yune maalɨkei yɨ sahwai Jonɨmɨ wavɨlavɨkelyɨ.
Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yaderegaa' dahaa' kuna yɨvanɨga'. A'mwera Sɨgunyavɨya Gotɨyai maremwaaide' dɨragɨnna yawɨramaa'manɨgasa'nanyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe dɨragɨnaangera dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'manɨgasa'nanyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pɨropetɨya yuyara dɨnɨkejɨ Kɨwɨnya kɨnɨjɨ dara dɨnɨ' ‘Naangei yuyaraavɨ maremwaaladelyɨ.’ Sara dɨnɨke' nabaai aayaangei Jonɨ nɨmɨnyɨna sara wɨdakelyɨ. Sagaa'nanyɨra.
Nabaai ‘Maremwaalade' myɨma'nyɨ kyojɨ sɨnnawɨ pwai bathelyɨ. Sahwai Yɨlaajare wawɨnya' yaake' makabathelyɨ.’ Sara dɨnɨkesɨ. Sarɨmɨ ‘Kadɨka wɨ'naajaina,’ yawɨrapɨjɨyaihi du'nyɨla! Jonɨ Yɨlaajalyɨ.
A'mwe kadɨ'nakei yagaala daza' nayaa wɨ'nana!
A'mwe dahaasaraavɨna benɨbɨtaraavaka! Darebaaibɨsarera. Angwaasabanna avaannya'ne kaimɨraayara mwaaleva kaimɨraaya pwaraavɨna jaka wɨdangamanɨga'
(Jonɨmɨne'na)
‘Avaannya'na mudɨkangengɨne gware maku'manɨgo
Kɨrɨ' “Kwarame aala!” dɨvanɨgave!’
(Nɨmɨnyɨne'na wɨdangamanɨga')
‘Nemɨ baryangɨne kɨdaata dɨvanɨgo
Kɨrɨ' “Kaladaata aala!” dɨvanɨgave!’
Sare aaya kaavɨlya' da'daresɨ. Jonɨ bakegaa' wapaaya ge gejɨ waainɨyasɨ ‘Aala!’ dada mwaalake'na dara dɨna yɨvanɨga', ‘Yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.’

A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai bɨwa'dɨkegaa' wapaaya ge gejɨ waainɨyasɨ nada mwaalɨke'na dɨna ‘Yɨthaanyi! A'mwe sahwai munaanga naangesɨyai nɨvanɨkelyɨra. Nabaai waainɨya kwalaalya nɨvanɨkelyɨra. Taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ kɨwɨnya galazekɨvaidɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ kwɨya'mwelyɨra.’ Jonɨjɨ sainaai Gotɨyare sɨdusabwina maarola wawɨnya nawɨ'nya yɨvanɨgolyainaalyɨ. Wawɨnya sa sɨdu'nakera dara yawɨranganna ‘Gotɨyare sɨduta tewaanyabwina sara yɨvanɨgi. Yɨda'maraangesɨra.’ ”
Sagaa' anga pɨbanyaavɨ Jizaazai gamɨre dɨragɨnya kwalaalya yaka kɨrɨ' sɨmunya mudɨkebwi myawɨryeva. Sare'na dazagaa' sahwai maanga gaai dara wɨdɨna

“We'! Korazinɨ mwaalyaihɨle! Betɨzaaitha mwaalyaihɨle! We'! We'! Kayaa'na yɨhyadeihɨlyɨ. Menyaraavɨreba Taayaa mwaalyarajɨ Saaithonɨ mwaalyarajɨ nɨmɨ dɨragɨnaanga sa sarɨmɨre angeba yɨwa'dengɨ tɨnna wangabɨzɨ kwajɨ yɨ kɨgaakuna sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yarai kyawɨramaapɨdɨka! Kumɨrebwina kale wiadaa'nyɨ baazɨ'ma'nya kɨrɨkɨrɨnakera mwaaidɨvɨ' kwaagɨsasɨ kavu'nɨpɨdɨka! Sare'na kayaa'na yɨhyadeihɨlyɨra.
Sare kɨrɨ' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kotɨya marya'ne yɨrɨkerɨkɨ Taayaa mwaalyarajɨ Saaithonɨ mwaalyarajɨ saraavɨre taanginya' naanga sabɨta mɨ'. Taanga yɨhɨvɨramaarade sa' wavɨlavadesɨ.
Nabaai Kaapanɨyamɨ mwaalyaihi Sɨgunyavɨna yɨhɨmakɨladeihi dɨngaka? Aawa. Dɨkevɨ dalaawideihɨlyɨra. Anga Sothomɨ nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya da sarɨmɨre angeba yɨwa'dengɨ yɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ dahaasagaa' kuna kamannadɨka!
Kɨrɨ' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kotɨya marya'ne yɨrɨkerɨkɨ Sothomɨ mwaalyaraavɨre taanginya maalɨka yaka sabaaibɨ' yɨhyade'na mɨ'. Taanga sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhyade' wavɨlavadesɨ.”

Dazagaa' Jizaazai dara dɨna “Nɨmwai! Sɨgunyavɨnajɨ Kwaaka davakɨnajɨ Naangeigɨnyɨra. Su! Su! Yuya dazanna ‘A'mwe sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'daanyaina sɨdu'nakeinera. Gotɨyarɨ myawɨraanna!’ yawɨ'dɨvɨta saraavɨna lɨka yulyakɨvanɨgɨ. Sara yagɨna ‘Nemɨ yune kaimɨraaya maalɨkeina. Sɨdu'maayaina,’ yawɨ'dɨvɨsaraavɨna wibwarɨdaakuvanɨgɨnya'na ‘Su! Su!’ gɨthɨvanɨge.
Yo, Nɨmwai, gɨmɨre sabwi sasarebulyɨ. Gɨmɨre yawɨta ‘Sare' wabahɨlaaka nawɨ'nya' nyɨwa',’ dahɨna sara yɨvanɨgɨnya'nanyɨ.

Nɨmaamaangei yuyajɨ yuyaburajɨ nyɨmarɨmwangakeinyɨ saza maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ. Gawaalɨkɨ nayaa yuna yawɨrangadei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmwai gave sahwaina Gawaalɨkɨ nayaa yawɨrangadelyɨ. Nabaai Nɨmwarɨ gazaizai nayaa yawɨrangadei pwai mɨ'. Aawa. Gawaalɨ' gave sahwaina Nɨmwarɨ nayaa yawɨrangadelyɨ. Yɨ Gawaalɨ' pwai kwarɨna dara yawɨ'na ‘A'mwe sahwarɨna Nɨmwarɨ yawɨranganya'na wibwarɨdaakuma!’ Yɨ sara yawɨraja' sahwara Nɨmwarɨ yawɨrangabɨ'derera.
A'mweihi yagɨyagɨ yadɨvɨ' taanga naanga maa'manɨgasaihi yuyaihi nɨmɨnyawɨnna dɨvila! Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne kuryaraavɨ kwazaake'neihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihɨdeinyɨra.

Kwaamu'nanyainyɨ sɨmɨlɨka yarai manyulyade'najɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ walamarakɨdɨnya'najɨ nɨmɨrebwi maa'dɨvɨ' nɨmɨreihi yɨma'nadɨvɨ' nɨmɨre yagaala jawɨramaarila! Sara yapɨjɨ sarɨmɨre kuryara kwazaake' bɨramaa'dɨvɨ' kwaamu'nanyaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨrebwi tewaanyabulyɨ. Taange'na mɨ'. Sare' yɨhɨhaimwagɨdeihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨre taange' naange' mɨ'. Sare' nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' yɨhɨzaavɨdeihɨlyɨ.”
Sagaa' Kwazaaka pɨrɨkɨ witɨwawɨnyavɨ tɨnnyabanne tusavɨ Jizaazai kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yadaa'nyɨ gamɨrera mɨdɨdɨvɨsara mɨjɨka wiadaa'nyɨ witɨzɨlya maarɨna yeva tɨka nyɨna.
Tɨka nyɨna yadaapɨjɨ Perɨzɨyara dazavɨ tɨnna wanganna, sarɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa! Gɨmɨdɨdɨvɨsara wawɨnya yɨvanɨgasa'na nemɨre kwazaakevɨ kɨwɨnya' galazekɨvaimanɨgasarera gɨmɨrera!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' wɨdɨna “Kayaa'na myɨwaava. Ne Devitɨ yaake dɨnɨka dazavɨ madanganyadɨvɨtaihi daa! Nɨmɨ dɨwe dazagaa' sahwalyɨ yeva gamɨrerajɨ mɨjɨka mwaalesagaakɨ.

Yɨ sagaa' sahwara Gotɨyare angevɨ wɨlɨna yɨna yeva gɨrɨkula Gotɨyarɨne warɨke tɨka nyɨna ye'. Gɨrɨkula tewaanya sa Devitɨjɨ gamɨrerajɨ tɨka nya'ne mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta gavera tɨka nya'nengɨra. Tɨka nyɨna yesa'na kɨwɨnya sa' galazekɨvaina yeta kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yagaala mujakelyɨ.

Nabaai Kɨwɨnyavɨ dɨnɨka pɨrɨvɨ madanganyadɨvɨsaihi daaka! Sare' dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Kwazaakegaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨsara wawɨnya yɨpɨnerera. Yagaala mwarika! Kwazaakegaa'ne kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨ pari'ma'dɨvɨsarera. Kɨrɨ' yɨwetawakya maayare.”
Gamɨnyɨna ke'ba'na wɨdɨna “Datha' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kwaaka davakɨ pwai Gotɨyare Ange' wavɨlavɨkelyɨ.
Yɨ Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨ'
‘Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ yaasɨwa'na manyɨjaavɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Aala!
Pwaraavɨna kale gaimwange'na nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'.’
Sara dɨnɨke' nayaa yawɨrangabɨzɨ kwajɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanya maayaraavɨna ‘Sahwara Kɨwɨnya' galazekɨvaimwaa',’ majɨ kyɨpɨdɨka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai Kwazaakegaa'ne' maremwaalɨkelyɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨre yagaala dazavɨ dɨmɨdɨnyɨla!”
Sabadaa'nyɨ Jizaazai kaanna wɨna yaka kumɨre lotuangevɨ wɨlɨna.

Yɨthaanyi, saba a'mwe pwai gamɨre asa' yaalɨka mena yɨnɨkei mwaalɨna. Sahwarɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' dɨnyɨna “Kwazaakebwi kayaaka kyojɨ Jizaazarɨ kotɨya jaana!” dɨneva sarɨ yɨdaanganna “Kwazaakegaa' nalaavɨnakeraavɨ nawɨ'nya yavada'galaadevwi dɨngaka? Kɨwɨnya' galazekɨvalaadevwi dɨngaka?”
Sara kude' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai kwazaakegaa' kavi'nɨnna pɨrɨvɨ gamɨre sipɨzipɨya pwai walaraawɨna yajarɨ malɨmwagyada mamwagi'namakilyɨ yadei gawalaka!
Sarɨmɨjɨyai yarai mwagi'namakidaavadelyɨ. Kwazaakegaa'na maanga aawana! Sipɨzipɨyai maalɨkelyɨra. A'mwei naangaangelyɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kwazaakegaa' a'mweraavɨne wɨgaimwange' Kɨwɨnyavɨna tewaanyasɨ.”
Sara wɨdaka asa' yaalɨka mena yɨnɨkerɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya asa' dɨvyaasɨbwa'nana!” Sagaa' gamɨre ata yɨwɨbwa'nyɨna yada asi ayabaaibɨ' ata pwibɨ' maamɨdaryi yɨma'nyɨna ya'.
Kɨrɨ' Perɨzɨyara bwalyuna yɨna yeva “Jizaazarɨ tamakaana!” deva yagaalya' jamungajɨna ye'.
Jizaazai kumɨre tamakya'ne savɨna mena yawɨ'na yaka saba yagalya'ma'na, kaanna wɨna. Nabaai a'mwe kwalaalyara mɨdɨnna ye'. Sara kye' a'mwe nalaavɨnaka yuyaraavɨ tewaanya yavada'gaina yɨna ya'.
Yavada'gaina yɨna yaka dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨnyɨne'na yɨwe' pwaraavɨ mujɨwaakɨnna!”
Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaakei Aazaayai dɨnɨke' “Yunebanna yɨ'mwannana!” Gotɨyai kada' sara yɨna ya'. Sahwai kave yabwina dare' dɨnɨkesɨ. Gotɨyai sahwarɨna dara jaa'
“Yɨthaanyi! Wɨdahɨlakɨwei nyɨdaayade tewaanyalyɨ.
Sahwarɨna nɨmɨnyɨ tewaanya nyɨvu'nadelyɨ.
Nɨmɨre sɨmunya yɨlaaya yadelyɨ.
Nɨmɨre Kuryarɨ sahwarɨna yɨlawɨmwaaihɨdelyɨ.
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ yawɨbwasa'nebwina wɨjɨwaakadelyɨ.
Maiyagaala majada jaka dathei mɨ'.
Tuta naangengɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨ'dei mɨ'.
Gamɨre maanguraaya' jaka damaryadei mɨ'.
Suyarɨ' walagɨ'dura'nɨkerɨ' mwagalɨvɨpaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ'
Dɨragɨmaayaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgaladei mɨ'.
Laamɨvananyavɨre wikɨya' maalɨ'na nade' yɨgaa'mwadɨvɨtabaaibɨ'
Sɨmunyavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna maalɨ'na yawɨ'nɨkeraavɨ yɨgaa'mwagathei mɨ'.
Kuna yadaawori yɨda'maraangebwi yunebanna waradehaa'nanyɨ.
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara sahwarɨ lɨmwabɨ'delyɨ.
Padaihasamaarya'nerɨ sahwara yemwaaibɨ'delyɨ.”
Pɨropetɨya Aazaayai sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Dazagaa' gamɨnyawɨnna a'mwe pwarɨ makabɨna yɨna ye'. A'mwe dazarɨ yɨmakei wɨlamwaalɨkei. Yɨmakei wɨlamwaaidɨsɨya'na sahwai tɨbɨnyai yɨma'nyɨna, maanga bɨpainɨkei yɨma'nyɨna yakelyɨ. Sahwarɨ Jizaazai nawɨ'nya yavada'gaina yakevɨdaa'nyɨ maanga bɨpainɨkei yagaala dɨna yaka tɨnna wanganna.
Yɨ a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya yuya lɨka yɨwainɨgulɨna yɨna yeva dɨnyɨna “Dazai Ne Devitɨmɨre Kaimɨraayarɨ yemwaaimanɨgo sahwai dɨngaka!”
Kɨrɨ' Perɨzɨyara sa' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva dɨna “A'mwe dazai yɨmakeraavɨ maremwaaidei Biyelɨzɨvulɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' maaraka yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨvanɨkelyɨ.”

Sara dɨna yadaapi kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ mena yawɨranganna yaka wɨdɨna “Maremwaaide gave pɨbadaa'nyara pɨvakaai mararangɨvainadɨvɨ' mala bwa'nɨpɨja' maremwaaide daza' kayaaka yɨma'nadesɨra. Nabaai a'mwe anga pɨbanyara anga kɨrɨvɨyara tɨnnyaba mararangɨvainadɨvɨ' mala bwa'nɨpɨjaraavɨreba warade' mɨ'.

Sabaaibɨ' Saataanɨmɨrera jaapainyɨna yadɨvɨ' pwara Saataanɨmɨre pwaraavɨ wɨdaasɨpɨjavɨdaa'nyɨ Saataanɨmɨre maremwaaide' gara daavadevaka! Aawa. Kayaaka yɨnadevaakɨra. Kɨrɨ' Saataanɨ manyɨgaimwagyada yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨvanɨge.

Nabaai nyɨdɨwaasa'na Saataanɨmɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ sarɨmɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasadɨvɨsara dɨragɨnyavɨ aaihwarevɨ wɨdaasɨvanɨga'! Sare'na mɨ'. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨrera sarɨmɨnyɨ yawɨbwa'na ‘A'mwera Saataanɨmɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ yɨmakeraavɨ mudaasɨvanɨgava! Sabwi aawaawa!’ Sara yawɨbwapɨ'derera sarɨmɨrera.

Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare Kuryai nyɨgaimwadaawojɨ yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨwɨja' yɨ sarɨmɨ jawɨranganyide ‘Nemɨnyawɨnna Gotɨyai maremwaaide' mena bɨwaka! Sare'na yɨmakeraavɨ sahwai wɨdaasɨvanɨkelyɨ.’ Sara jawɨranganyide.”

Gamɨnyɨne'na ke'ba'na wɨdɨna “Pwai kwai yawɨrajai ‘Dɨragɨnyare gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ gara maarɨdeinyaka?’ Dɨragɨnyare angevɨ wɨlɨna yaka Dɨragɨnyarɨ wɨla yune'na yɨrapwekaka yɨ sagaa' gɨlyɨvɨsa maragɨ'mwagamaa'na yɨwakelyɨ.
Pwai manyɨgaimwagyɨvanɨkei sahwai nɨmɨre yɨkamaangelyɨ. Sai nɨmɨreraavɨ mye'mwannayɨ'bwaramwaaihyɨvanɨgolyai pɨwɨ pɨwɨ nɨmɨreraavɨ tamaasɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sarevɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kayaa'nanya yuyajɨ bɨrala saza dadɨvɨsajɨ Gotɨyai marasɨ'nadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Kurya Tewaanyarɨna yagaaibɨraizɨka dazare wagɨlya' marasɨ'nadei mɨ'.

Gazaizai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨna yagaala kayaa'nanya' bɨrala dazai yɨ gamɨre wagɨlya' Gotɨyai wɨmarasɨ'nadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' gazaizai Kurya Tewaanyarɨna yagaala kayaa'nanya' dazai yɨ gamɨre wagɨla daza' marasɨ'nadei mɨ'. Aawa. Dahaa' kɨgaasɨ dɨvi yɨma'nade kɨgaasɨ waragwothesɨ. Kurya Tewaanyai yadengɨna pwai bɨralya' dazai ‘Saataanɨmɨre dɨragɨnyasɨreva,’ wagɨla daza' Gotɨyai marasɨ'nadei mɨ'.

Nabaai sarɨmɨ yawɨrangabɨneihɨlyɨ ‘Yɨsɨ' tewaanyɨkɨ,’ dɨpɨja' ‘Yɨ gamɨre yɨsɨla kɨnɨjɨ tewaanyangɨra,’ dɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Nabaai ‘Yɨsɨ' kayaa'nanyɨkɨ,’ dɨpɨja' ‘Yɨ gamɨre yɨsɨla kɨnɨjɨ kayaa'nanyangɨ,’ dɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨsɨlanna a'mwera wangadɨvɨ' yɨsɨlyangɨne yɨsɨkana yawɨ'dɨvɨkɨ. (Nabaai “Jizaazai tewaanyanna yadevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwai tewaanyalyɨreva.”)
Naawɨnaanyarɨdaa'nyaihi, a'mwe kayaa'nanyaihi mwaaihasa'na yagaala nawɨ'nya gatha'dara dɨpɨneihɨlaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwere sɨmunya yunevɨ yawɨ'de daza maangevɨdaa'nyɨ dadelyɨ.

A'mwe nawɨ'nyai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yawɨta tewaanya wɨlawa'delyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala yuna tewaanyabwina dadelyɨ. A'mwe kayaa'nanyai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yawɨta kayaa'nanya wɨla'delyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala kayaa'nanyabwina dadelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kotɨya marya'ne yɨrɨkerɨkɨ Gotɨyai yagaala gazaza yaasɨwa'na damaryadɨvɨsanna maryawɨbwaradengɨra.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yune gɨmɨre yagaala dadɨnya dazahɨrɨvɨna Gotɨyai ‘A'mwe yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨra,’ gɨthathelyɨ. Nabaai gɨmɨre yune yagaala dadɨnya sahɨrɨvɨna ‘A'mwe kayaa'nanyaigɨnyɨra,’ gɨthathelyɨ.”

Dazagaa' Kɨwɨja pwarajɨ Perɨzɨya pwarajɨ sara ma'maa'na “Wɨjɨwaakyaigɨ, nevu'nɨvanɨke'na tɨnna wanganya'nevɨna atɨka maru'nasa' wɨjɨwaainya' ja! (Wanganawaajɨ ‘Jizaazai nebulya' nedɨvanɨkelyɨ,’ yawɨraadera.)”

Wɨdɨna kye' sai ja'nawɨdɨna “Dahaasaihi kayaa'nanyaihɨlyɨ. A'mwei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ a'mwe' pwaraavɨ tidavamaryadevaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨ nayaa mi yadɨvɨ' gevwi yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sareihi nyɨdɨwaa' ‘Wɨjɨwaainya' wanganawaajɨ gyawɨranganaadeinera.’ Kɨrɨ' wɨjɨwaainya pɨnɨ myɨhibwarɨdaakwɨwɨna! Aawa. Wɨjɨwaainya pɨropetɨya Jonaamɨre'na yune sahɨrɨ'na yɨhibwarɨdaakwɨdeinyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨgaa' Jonaa jawɨnya naangevɨre munyɨkɨ wɨla'dɨ'nyɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨ' wavɨlavakabaai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai kwaakevɨ kusawɨ wɨla'dozɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨ' wavɨlavadelyɨ.

Kotɨya marya'nevɨ Menya Ne sɨnnawɨnya Ninɨva mwaalyarajɨ dahaasa daihɨlyɨ daavapɨjɨ sahwara sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyabwina yɨhɨzɨdapɨ'derera. Sahwara Jonaa yagaala wɨjaakevɨ kadɨka nayaa wɨ'neva sɨmunya mudɨkebwina yawɨramaryaasa'nanyɨ. Yɨthaanyi, dahaa' dava pwai mwaalɨ' Jonaamɨ wavɨlavɨkei. Sahwarɨ sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva malɨmwagaryɨgasa'na sahwara yɨhɨzɨdapɨ'deihɨlyɨ.

Kotɨya marya'nevɨ a'mwe naange' kwinɨya' kwaaka aayawɨdaa'nyavɨjɨ dahaasa daihɨrɨjɨ kihithɨkaavojɨ kwinɨya daza' sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyabwina jalɨkurakadesɨ. Tuta saamɨnaanga kɨrɨvɨ Solomonɨmɨre kunya nawɨ'nyaange' wɨ'nya'ne' byaake'nanyɨ. Yɨthaanyi, dahaa' dava pwai mwaalɨ' Solomonɨmɨ wavɨlavɨkei. Sahwarɨ sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva mamɨdɨnyɨvanɨgasa'na kwinɨya daza' yɨhɨzɨdavadeihɨlyɨ.”

Ke'ba'na wɨdɨna “Nabaai yɨmakei a'mwe pware munyɨkɨdaa'nyɨ bwalaawɨna yaka anga a'gaaye pɨbanna bɨrya'nei yaalɨkɨryabanna kaanya yɨwɨnama'na. Kaanya yɨwɨnama'na yada kɨrɨ' mwaalya'ne saba mabɨramaari yajai
dɨna ‘Nɨnnya angevɨdaa'nyɨ bwalaawɨna yɨwebanna ayɨna wɨdeinyɨ.’ Sai wɨna, anga savɨ tɨnna wanganna ‘Mena tɨrɨmaaya bwakɨreva aaraare yɨdakɨwaata kune' daaka! Yune kunesɨ. Wikɨra.’

Sara dazai kaanna wɨna, yɨmaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ wɨjɨma'naawɨna. Yɨmaka gazaizare kayaa'nanyabwi yɨmaka sɨnnawɨnyare kayaa'nanyaburɨ wavɨlavɨkerera. Sareraavɨ wɨjɨma'naawɨna yaka a'mwere munyɨkɨ yuyara bulamwaaina. Sɨnnawɨ yɨmaka pwarɨna a'mwe sai kayaa'na mwaalɨna, dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨmaka kayaa'nanaangeraavɨna sai kayaa'na naanna mwaalɨna. Nabaai yune sasare sahɨbwina dahaasa a'mwe kayaa'nanyaihɨrɨne' yɨma'nadesɨ.”
Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ yagaalya' kuna wɨdadaa'nyɨ, yɨthaanyi, mwasawɨ gamɨre ganaangesɨ gya'mwerajɨ bathaa'na. “Gamɨjɨ yagaala ye'mwannadaana!” deva bathaa'na yɨna ye'.
Bathaa'na yɨna yadapɨjɨ pwai tɨnna wanganna yaka Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi, gwaangesɨ ja'mwerajɨ ‘Yagaala ye'mwannadaana!’ deva mwasaba bathaakava!”
Sara kuda' kɨrɨ' sahwarɨ ma'maa'na “Nɨmɨnyɨ nɨwaa' aaihɨrɨvaka? Nɨmɨnyɨ nya'mwera aaihwaravaavaka?”
Wɨdɨna yaka gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ ata yɨda'na yaka wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi, dazahwara kumɨre kuryaraavɨna nɨmɨnyɨ nɨwaasɨ nya'mwerajɨ sanaka mwaaiha'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨgunyavɨ Nɨmaamaangei mwaalɨkere sɨmunyabwi mɨdɨnajai sahwai nya'mwelyɨ. Sahwai nya'mwesɨ. Sahwai nɨwaasɨ.”
Yɨrɨka sarɨkɨ angevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai walyuna yaka aalɨbunyavɨna wɨna yaka maangebaarɨ walamwaaina.
Walamwaaina yadɨ'nyɨ gamɨnyawɨnna kwala bwa'naanya naanga yɨ'bwa'naabɨna. Sara yesa'na botɨya pukɨ yɨladɨkwosɨ'na yaka yɨlamwaaina yadɨ'nyɨ aalɨbumaangebaarɨ kwala bwa'naanya yuya' daavɨna.
Daavɨna yadapi ke'ba'nanyangɨ yagaala kwalaalya dara wɨjɨwaakɨna “Yɨthaanyi, gannya wawɨnyavɨ a'mwe pwai witɨzɨla pɨraihɨrakya'nei wɨna.
Wɨna yaka pɨraihɨrakadaa'nyɨ witɨzɨla pɨnɨ tutaanyavɨ bwalaraawɨna. Sarengɨ yusara bamaranyɨna.
Nabaai pɨba amwi sɨla naangejɨ' wa'dɨ'nyɨ a'ba kwaaka maalɨkejɨ' warɨkeba witɨzɨla pɨnɨ bwalaraawɨna. Kwaaka samwinari' maayabanne'na sa yarai yɨrɨ'na.
Kɨrɨ' nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'na yada baihinyɨna. Sara yadaa'nyɨ sa pwipula dɨragɨnya maaya warɨna yadevɨ yɨnahu yawaka baidaa'nyɨna yada baihɨ'na.
Kwaakevɨ lannake wa'dɨ'nyɨ a'ba witɨzɨla pɨnɨ bwalaraawɨna yaka yɨrɨ'na kya' lange yɨrɨ'na yaka langa sabara naanga bilaawɨna yada witɨzɨla yɨrɨ'dengɨ dathɨwaaina.
Kɨrɨ' witɨzɨla pɨnɨ kwaaka mɨnarɨnaka nawɨ'nyavaakɨ bwalaraawɨna yɨna yada tɨka munne yɨma'nyɨna. Yɨ pɨnɨ 100 yɨma'nyɨna, yɨ pɨnɨ 60 yɨma'nyɨna, yɨ pɨnɨ 30 yɨma'nyɨna.
A'mwe kadɨ'nakei kadɨka wɨ'nana!”
Gamɨnyawɨnna gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara yɨkabɨna yeva dara buthɨna “A'mweraavɨ ke'ba'nanya be'na wɨdɨvanɨgɨna?”
Sara buthɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨne yoimavajalɨkurakyanna Gotɨyai mena yɨhivwarɨdaakuwake'nanyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sahwaraavɨ yawɨta sa' mujaayɨwake'nanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pwai nɨmɨnyɨne sɨmunya kɨnɨnnakei nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa yawɨrojɨyarɨ Gotɨyai sɨmunya kwalaalya kujaavojɨ sahwai sɨmunya nawɨ'nya naanga naanga kɨnɨnnakei yɨma'nade'nanyɨ. Pwai kadɨka nyu'najai nɨmɨnyɨna navɨka mwaalojɨ nɨmɨnyɨne sɨmunya maayarɨ Gotɨyai sɨmunya maalɨka daza kɨmɨlɨ' marasɨ'nade'nanyɨ.
Sarevɨ ke'ba'nanya wɨdɨvanɨge. Dara dɨnɨ'
‘Tɨnna wangadaapi kɨrɨ' myawɨranganyɨvanɨga'.
Kadɨka wɨ'nadaapi kɨrɨ' mu'namaarivanɨga'.
Aaya kaavɨlya' myawɨramaari yɨvanɨga'.’
Sare'na ke'ba'nanya wɨdɨvanɨge.
Sareraavɨna Pɨropetɨya Aazaayare yagaala pɨrɨ' wɨjaake' nebulya'na yune'na yɨma'nɨnɨkesɨ. Dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Gotɨyai dara wɨjaa'
‘Kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' kaavɨlyavɨ jawɨramaaryideihi mɨ'.
Tɨnna baihana'dɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' kaavɨlya' jawɨranganyideihi mɨ'.
A'mwe dazaraavɨre sɨmunya mena jɨnnɨnɨke'nanyɨ.
Kadɨka maa'na widera kadɨka wɨ'nɨwaasa'nanyɨ.
Kumɨre tɨnnyai tɨbarya dɨragɨnna yɨwaasa'nanyɨ.
“Tɨnna nayaa nanganaadɨka!” deva
“Kadɨka nayaa nu'naadɨka!” deva
“Sɨmunya nayaa nyawɨraadɨka!” deva
Sahwara sara myɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ
Nɨmɨnyɨna gɨnyɨwannɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ
Tewaanya yavada'galamwaaihɨna kyɨwɨdɨka!’
Aazaayai sara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨre tɨnnyai yawɨrangamanɨgasa'nanyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨre kadɨki' wɨ'namaa'manɨgasa'nanyɨ. Sare'na yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkeihɨlyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kɨgaakuna Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaata pɨropetɨya kwalaalyarajɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraanga kwalaalyarajɨ tɨnna wanganya'neraavɨ wɨvu'nakera tɨnna mwanganyɨ. Sarɨmɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgasangɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨgasangɨna sahwaraavɨ wɨvu'nakera kadɨka mu'nyaasare. Tɨnna sara wangamanɨgasa'najɨ kadɨka sara wɨ'nɨvanɨgasa'najɨ yɨlaaya yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ ke'ba'nanya witɨzɨla pɨraihɨrakamaryadevɨ aaya kaavɨlyavɨ du'namaarila!

Witɨzɨla tusavɨnya daresɨ. Gazaizai, Gotɨyai maremwaalade yagaalya' kadɨka yaasɨwa'na wɨ'nada aaya kaavɨlya' myawɨramaaryaderyawɨnna Kayaa'nanyai widaavada gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yagaala wɨlaburɨnnɨke' yarai yɨpalamarasɨ'delyɨ.
Witɨzɨla sɨla naanga kɨnɨnnakebanne daresɨ. Pwai yagaalya' wɨ'nada yɨlaaya yɨna yada yɨme'nya'bɨ' maarɨna.

Kɨrɨ' sahwai witɨya pwipula dɨragɨnya maaya waayɨkabaaibɨ' dɨragɨmaayai maalɨkegaa' yagaalya' yagalya'ma'na. Pwara nɨmɨre yagaalya'na maanga wɨdɨna, taanginya wɨjaavɨna. Kayaa'na yadɨvɨsa'na yɨme'nya'bɨ' yagalya'ma'delyɨ.

Witɨzɨla lannakebanne daresɨ. Pwai yagaalya' wɨ'nyɨna yada lɨmwanna yada dahaa'ne sɨmunya kwalaalya kuna yawɨ'da Kwaakevakɨya gɨlyɨvɨsanna nɨgwia kwalaalya mari'bwarakya'na yawɨ'da yɨ daza nɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ dathɨvaidelyɨ. Yɨ sare'na tɨka munne yɨ'nade mɨ'.

Witɨzɨla nawɨ'nyavaakɨne daresɨ. Pwai yagaala kadɨka wɨ'nada aaya kaavɨlya' nayaa yawɨrangada tɨka munne yɨ'nadevaaibɨ' tewaanya naanga yadelyɨ. Pwai waanɨ aadɨretɨyai wana nawɨ'nyaanga yadelyɨ. Pwai sɨkɨzɨtiyai wana nawɨ'nya yadelyɨ. Pwai tetiyai nawɨ'nya yadelyɨ.”
Ke'ba'nanya pɨrɨ' wɨjaavada dara wɨdɨna “Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaide' a'mwe pwai sɨla nawɨ'nya gannya wawɨnyavɨ pɨraihɨrakakabaaibɨ'nesɨ.
Kɨrɨ' a'mwera se wa'dapiyavɨ sarɨne yɨkamaangei bɨna yaka kurɨvaarɨya kayaa'nanyangɨre sɨla witɨyangɨ a'ba bwasɨ'na yaka kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna wɨna kya' dɨvi witɨya yɨrɨ'na yaka sɨla yɨ'nyɨna kya' dara wanganesa' ‘O! kurɨya kayaa'nanyajɨ waayɨke daaka!’
Mi'na deva yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara wɨna yeva gyakwarɨ wɨdɨna ‘Maremwaaidɨnyaigɨ, gɨnnya wawɨnyavɨ sɨla nawɨ'nya pɨraihɨrakagɨnya midaaka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kurɨvaarɨya kayaa'nanya wangamwoya gawɨdaa'nyangaka?’
Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna ‘Yɨkamaanga pwai kyakɨra.’ Wɨdɨna kya' yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara wɨdɨna ‘Wawaajɨ kurɨvaarɨya yuya daza guvɨlayɨ'bwarakɨna yaajɨwona?’
Kɨrɨ' sai wɨdɨna ‘Aala. Sarɨmɨ kurɨvaarɨya mari'bwarakɨpɨja' witɨyajɨ nyelaapɨdɨka!

Waayana! Yuyawaai mena kirɨvamwannakɨlyɨ sɨla yune yabwaryagaa'nannengɨra. Witɨzɨla yabwaryagaa' a'mwe wawɨnya dazavɨyaraavɨ wɨdɨdeinyɨra “Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨ kurɨvaarɨya kayaa'nanya mena mari'bwarakapɨjɨ dɨka mariraya'ne wɨla dɨmaramurɨtawakyi! Kɨrɨ' witɨya mari'bwarapɨjɨ anga wɨlarya'nevɨ nɨmɨre tɨka munne dɨmarakyidengɨ,” wɨdɨde,’ wɨda'.”

Ke'ba'nanya pɨrɨ' wɨjaavɨna. Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaide' da'bɨsasɨ. Maazɨtetɨya yɨsɨkɨdaa'nyɨ yɨsɨla yɨrɨ'da saamɨnyɨ' gɨryadevaaibɨ' sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai pwara pwaraavɨ maarɨna yojɨ dɨvi a'mwe kwala naanga naanga wɨmaremwaaladevɨnanyɨ. A'mwe pwai yɨta maazɨtetɨya sɨkɨdaa'nyɨ yɨsɨlyamɨlɨ' maarɨna yaka gannya wawɨnyavɨ maraburɨnna.

Maazɨtetɨyɨkɨre yɨsɨlya', yɨsɨla tɨka munne pukaavɨrebɨta mɨ'. Aawa. Sa' wana maalɨkesɨ. Kɨrɨ' dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨsɨ' naanga yɨma'nyɨna, yuya tɨka munne wawɨnya savɨya sangɨ wavɨla'na yadikɨra. Yɨsɨ' yɨma'nadaa'na yadɨ'nyɨyɨkɨ yusara sɨgunyavɨyara gamɨre taanyabaraavɨ bamwaaina yesɨkɨra.

Ke'ba'nanya pɨrɨ' wɨdɨna “Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaide' yɨzɨya'bɨsasɨ. A'mwe pɨrɨ' yɨzɨya daza' maarɨna yojɨ gɨrɨkulya'ne pɨlawaaya naanga yegɨnyɨwanna. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ gɨrɨkula yuya daza lɨwɨnya mɨlamakina yakesɨ.”
Yagaala yuya sa Jizaazai kwala bwa'naanyangɨ yune ke'ba'nanya yagaalyavɨna wɨjɨwaakakengɨ. Yagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' ku'maayaba wɨjalɨkurakakei mɨ'. Aawa. Yune ke'ba'nanyavɨna wɨjɨwaaka'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pɨropetɨyai dɨnɨke' yunebanna yɨ'mwannyɨna. Jizaazarɨna dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Maange' taava'mujɨ ke'ba'na dɨdeinyɨ.
Kwaaka dava' wakyaakevɨdaa'nyɨ
Lɨka yulyarɨkenajɨ yoimavɨdeinyɨ.

Sagaa' Jizaazai kwala bwa'naanyangɨ yagalya'ma'na yaka angevɨ wɨlɨna. Wɨlɨna kya' gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara gamɨnyawɨnna yɨkabɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Ke'ba'nanya dazavɨne aaya kaavɨlya' wawɨnyavɨ kurɨvaarɨya kayaa'nanya pwa'nɨka daza'na dɨnejɨwaakya!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' dara wɨrɨvɨkɨ'na “A'mwei witɨzɨla nawɨ'nya pɨraihɨrakakei sai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ.
Wawɨnya sa' Kwaaka davakɨ. Yɨ witɨzɨla nawɨ'nya sa maremwaaidevɨne kaimɨraayarera. Yɨ kurɨvaarɨya kayaa'nanya sa Kayaa'nanya Saataanɨmɨre kaimɨraayarera.
Yɨkamaanga kurɨvaarɨyangɨre pɨraihɨrakaka dazai Kotɨya Maryadelyɨ. Tɨka munne yabwarya'negaa', Kwaaka dava' aayagaa'nesɨ. Wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsara yabwarya'nera sahwara Gotɨyare mamaayarera.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kurɨvaarɨya kayaa'nanya mari'bwarapɨjɨ dɨkevɨ marirapɨ'devaaibɨ' Kwaaka davakɨ yɨrɨka aayarɨkɨ yuna sasara yɨpɨ'dere.

A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ nɨnnya ejelɨyaraavɨ maryasaabɨdeinyɨ. Kwaaka davakɨ nɨmɨre maremwaaidɨnyaba pwaraavɨre sɨmunya kayaaka yɨgaidɨvɨta yuyaraavɨjɨ yaasɨwa'na kayaa'na yadɨvɨta kwaraavɨjɨ maryɨ'bwarapɨjɨ
dɨka naangevɨ marasɨpɨ'dere. Dɨka dazavɨ kɨnna naanga dadɨvɨ' kunnya maangerɨka kɨdɨkɨvainya yɨpɨ'dere.
Dazagaa' Kuvɨnɨmaangere maremwaaidevɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraangera nyɨlyaibɨ' baaka naanga bavɨwɨna yɨpɨ'derera. A'mwe kadɨ'nakei kadɨka pada'galawɨ'nana!

Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaide', nɨgwɨbukuta pɨrɨ' wawɨnya pɨrɨvɨ lɨka yulyakɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. A'mwe pwai wawɨnya savɨ lɨkɨna yaka ‘Nɨgwɨbukusa' daaka!’ daka ayɨna lɨka yulyakɨna. Sai yɨlaaya naanga yɨna, gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨsangɨna kale mwi yakei yuya marayaasɨna yaka nɨgwia naanga maaraka nɨgwɨbukusa' maarya'nei wawɨnya sajɨ' yasaawɨna.
Nabaai Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaide' a'mwei kwaalɨturyaanga nawɨ'nyanna nawɨ'nyanna mubada ayɨna mubade sabaaibɨsasɨ.

Sai bɨrɨna bɨrɨna yada kwaalɨturyaanga wana nawɨ'nyaanga pɨrɨ' tɨnna wanganna yaka nɨgwia naanga wɨgainakei gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya marayaasɨna yaka kwaalɨturyaanga nawɨ'nya daza' mubaawɨna, ‘Nɨmɨresɨra,’ dɨna.
Nabaai Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaide' saalaalyavɨ jawɨgɨlya naange' waketabaaibɨsasɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' kusawɨ jawɨnya dala nabinabinya wɨlamwaaina yeva
yune warɨna kye' aalɨmaangebaarɨ tɨyawɨnna makulaabɨna. Makulaabɨna yeva jawɨnya nawɨ'nyanna nawɨ'nyanna tɨwɨnya naangevɨ marakɨna. Kɨrɨ' jawɨnya kayaa'nanya marasɨ'na.
Kwaaka davakɨya yɨrɨka aayarɨkɨ sasara yɨma'nadehaakɨ. Gotɨyare mamaayara walaabapɨjɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraangeraavɨ tɨnnyawɨ mwaaihata a'mwe kayaa'nanyaraavɨ jaapaina yapɨjɨ
kayaa'nanyaraavɨ dɨka naangevɨ maralɨvarabɨ'dere. Dɨka dazavɨ kɨnna naanga dadɨvɨ' kunnya maangerɨka kɨjɨvainɨpɨ'dere.”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka gamɨreraavɨ yɨdaanganna “Yagaala yuya dangɨne aaya kaavɨlya' mena dahayawɨ'mwaava?” Sagaa' kumɨ wɨdɨna “Yo, yawɨ'mwona.”

Sai wɨdɨna “Sarevɨ Kɨwɨja gazaizai Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨne mɨdɨdei yɨma'nyɨna yakei angevɨ gyakwalaanga pwai mwaalakabaaibɨsalyɨ. Angevɨ gyakwai gannya yovɨravemwaalyavɨ wɨlɨna yaka gɨlyɨvɨta aya pɨnɨjɨ mudɨka pɨnɨjɨ makwalyaabɨna. Sabaaibɨ' nɨmɨrei Kɨwɨnyavɨ sɨdu'nakei Gotɨyare yagaala ayajɨ nɨmɨre yagaala mudɨkejɨ yawɨramaa'delyɨra.” Jizaazai sara wɨda'.
Jizaazai ke'ba'nanya sa mena wɨdɨna yaka anga dazaba yagalya'makuna.
Sara yaka gannya angebanna wɨlaawɨna yaka kumɨre lotuangevɨ wɨlɨna yaka wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ lɨka yɨwainɨgulaawɨna yɨna yeva dɨna “Yawɨta dazajɨ dɨragɨnya dazajɨ a'mwe dazai gawɨ maarakengaka!
A'mwe dazai kaa'madaayarei midaaka! Nabaai Maarɨyaa' ganaange' midaaka! Jemɨzalyɨ Jozepɨyalyɨ Saaimonɨjɨ Juthaazalyɨ gamɨnyɨ gahwaalaangera midaaka!
Nabaai gamɨre gya'mwe yuya nemɨjɨ mye'mwannemwaalyadɨvɨsa daaka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨduta dazasɨ dɨragɨnya dazajɨ yuya gawɨ maarakengaka?”

Sara dɨna yevegaa' sahwarɨna jɨkurya yɨna yadɨvɨsare. Jɨkurya yadɨvɨsaraavɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Pɨropetɨyarɨna anga yuyabanna ‘A'mwe naangelyɨ,’ dɨdɨvɨkɨ. Kɨrɨ' gannya angebannajɨ gannya angevɨnajɨ ‘A'mwe naangelyɨ,’ majadɨvɨkɨ.”
Sagaa' anga dazaba dɨragɨnya ya kwalaalya mya' kumɨ sahwarɨ malɨmwagyadaapiya'na.
Sagaa' naanga Erotɨyai Galɨli maremwaalakei Jizaazarɨna yɨhusɨrɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna ya'.
Kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka gamɨre wɨgaimwadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨda' “Dazai Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei Jonɨ. Sai lɨkirakɨnɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna dɨkaavakelyɨ. Sarevɨ dɨragɨnya naanga daza' mi'na maaraka nawɨ'nyangɨ yɨvanɨkesɨ.”

Sa' darevɨnyɨ. Erotɨyai Jonɨmɨ galalɨmwanna yaka wɨla senɨyabaalyɨ yɨrɨna yaka kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna. Erotɨyaaza' kɨgaa' Erotɨyare gya'mwei Pilipɨmɨre a'mwevɨnesɨ. Pilipɨ kuna mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Erotɨyai gya'mwere balaangevɨ yaasɨwa'na maarake'nanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jonɨ Erotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe pware daza' maa'mwa'dɨnya sa' Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya' galazekɨvaimanɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ.” Wɨdɨ wɨja yade'na Erotɨyaaza' sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ kuda' Erotɨyai kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna.

Wɨmwaaihɨna yaka “Jonɨmɨ tamakɨma!” daka yaka kɨrɨ' a'mwe yuyaraavɨna lɨka yɨna. A'mwe sahwara yawɨ'na “Jonɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadelyɨ. Pɨropetɨyalyɨra.” Sahwara sara yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' sahwaraavɨna lɨka yɨna navɨka mwaalɨna yakelyɨ.

Pɨgaa' yɨrɨkerɨ' Erotɨyarɨ ganaange' mudanga yaka sarɨkɨna yawɨremwaalya'na a'mwe pwara Erotɨyalyɨ yɨ'bwa'nemwaaina. Tɨka munnevɨ yɨ'bwa'nemwaaleva Erotɨyaazavɨre taavɨzɨdɨraaya' kumɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba kwarame yɨwɨlaabɨna. (Juyaraavɨrebwi “A'mwe tewaanya' a'mweraayaba kwarame myannera!” dɨnɨkebulyɨ.) Kwarame yɨwɨlaabɨna kya' Erotɨyai wabahɨlaaka yɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala dɨragɨnaanga wakɨna “Gotɨyarɨna naanga nebulya'na gɨthɨma! ‘Gɨmɨnyɨ gɨvu'najanna kanyɨdaangana'gɨzɨ gɨmɨnyɨ wɨjaavɨna gideinyɨ. (Nyɨgɨvɨna!)’ ”

Sara wakɨna kya' sɨdɨraaya dazavɨ ganaange' gamɨnyɨ sɨmunya' wɨjaavɨna yɨna kya' sɨdɨraaya' wɨdɨna “Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadere mɨnyagɨnya' tɨwɨnya nyegalanya pukɨ dɨ'gwala'gɨzɨ dava nɨmɨnyɨna dɨnyɨjaadeigɨnyɨ.”

Wɨdɨna kya' maremwaaidei Jonɨmɨna kale wiadaa'nyɨ yawɨ'na “A'mwe yuya dathara nɨmɨre yagaala dɨragɨnya' kadɨka kanyu'nɨwaakɨra.” Sara daka gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Taaya' sara nyɨdɨwake' sara jɨla!”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera kalavuzangevɨ walaawɨna yeva Jonɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnya' wopuramaa'na yeva
tɨwɨnya nyegalanya pukɨ gamɨre mɨnyagɨnya' dɨ'gwalamakabɨna, sɨdɨraaya dazavɨna wɨjaavɨna. Wɨjaavɨna kye' ganaangeyawɨnna makuna.
Ganaangeyawɨnna makuna kya' sare' Jonɨmɨrera kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva gɨlaayarɨ bamaa'na yɨna yeva lɨkirakɨna. Mena lɨkirakɨna yeva Jizaazarɨ wɨdaawɨna ye'.

Jizaazai yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yakegaa' anga saba yagalya'ma'na yaka sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina yaka a'mwera mamwaalyɨgata pɨbanna kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yadaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya anga naangengɨdaa'nyara kadɨka sara wɨ'nesara kwaakaanya gamɨnyɨ mɨjamakuna.

Mɨjamakuna kye' dɨvi Jizaazai tɨyawɨnna bularaawaka a'mwe kwalaalya naangera bamwaaidapi sai tɨnna wanganna. Kwalaalyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganna yaka kale wina kwia' nabaai kumɨre nalaavɨnakeraavɨ yavada'gaina.

Sara yada sawɨtɨrɨnyaburɨ gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Dazɨmagɨ a'mwera maayɨmagɨnyɨ. Nabaai yɨrɨkerɨ' mena buwa'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mweraavɨ dɨmarayaasa! ‘Angebanya yunewɨnna yamaryapɨjɨ wapaaya mubɨpɨka!’ da'gɨzɨ dɨmarayaasa!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Be'na wɨpɨneraavaka? Sarɨmɨ saihi wapaaya duzaayɨla!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera wɨdɨna “Nemɨ dava tɨka wapaaya kwalaalya manewarika. Gɨrɨkula atinanya gave pɨnɨjɨ jawɨnya gave pwaraalyɨna warɨka.”
Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Daza nɨmɨnyaba davanna dɨmakabila!”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kaabinnyavɨ dalamwaalyɨla!” Wɨdɨna yaka gɨrɨkula ata pwinanyajɨ jawɨnya pwaraalyɨ maarɨna yaka Sɨgunyavɨ maranganna yɨna yaka “Wapaaya naanga nyɨjawaanya'na yɨlaaya gyɨwa!” Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna. Wɨdɨna yaka wapaaya sa maragunyɨna yaka gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨjaavɨna. Wɨjaavɨna kya' sahwara a'mweraavɨ yanga mudɨna.
Yanga mudɨna kye' yuyara yunebanna nyɨna yeva munya yɨnyɨna. Munya yɨnyɨna kya' gamɨrera wapaaya pɨnɨ nagihesa mari'bwa'na yɨna yeva soigɨlya tinɨka sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pukaalyangɨ maanga yeku'nyɨna.
A'mwe gavera paaivɨ taawɨzanɨyara nɨnɨke'na. Nabaai a'mwe kwalaalyajɨ kaimɨraayajɨ nɨnɨkengɨ.

Sagaa' yɨme'nya'bɨ' mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sɨpɨyavɨ dɨkwosɨ'napɨjɨ yɨlamwaalapɨjɨ aalɨbunyavɨ pimagɨnna sɨnnawɨ sahwaihidaa'nyɨ daanyɨla! Kwala bwa'naanyangɨ maryaasa'mujɨyagaa'na yɨhɨzɨma'naawɨdeinyɨ.”
Mi'na wɨdɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ mena maryaasɨna yɨna yaka sai gavei mugunyavɨna yɨlaawɨna, Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna. Kuna wɨdɨna yadaa'nyɨ sawɨta maalɨka jɨnnyɨna kya' mugunya savɨ yuna gavei mwaalɨna.

Mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ sɨpɨya' aalyavɨ naangebanna wɨlaawɨna yaka widawadaa'nyɨyagaa' yɨhusa' sɨnnyɨmagɨdaa'nyɨ wɨlaabɨna yaka aalɨmavajɨnaake' sɨpɨyavɨ galarɨvɨkɨ'na yadaa'nyɨ sɨpɨya' mihɨla'mihɨla' kaanya wɨna.
Kuna galarɨvɨkɨ'na yadaa'nyɨ yɨrɨkunyagaa' Jizaazai aalɨbunyavɨ a'ba wɨlaabɨna yaka kumɨnyawɨnna yɨ'ma'na.
Yɨ'ma'na kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara tɨnna wanganna yadɨvɨ' “Akai, sai gɨlaaya pwalyɨra,” dɨna yeva lɨka yɨwainɨgulaawɨna yɨna yeva “Aaka! Aaka!” jaka dɨna.
Jaka dɨna kye' sahwai yɨme'nya'bɨ' wɨdɨna “Dɨragɨnna dɨmwaalyɨla! Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨra. Lɨka mipɨnera!”
Pitai gamɨre yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'naka ja'nawɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ yune saigɨ mwaaidɨzaigɨ ‘Aalyavɨ a'ba nɨmɨnyawɨnna dulaama!’ dɨragɨnna dɨnyɨdana!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwai wɨdɨna “Dulaama!” Wɨdɨna kya' Pitai sɨpɨyavɨ walyuna yaka aalyavɨ a'ba wɨlaawɨna yɨna yaka Jizaazaryawɨnna wɨlaawɨna.
Kɨrɨ' yɨhusa' wanganaka lɨka yɨna yada aalyavɨ kusawɨ kɨbaweba gaai walaawɨna. Sara yada jaka dɨna “Naangeigɨ dɨnyɨvadaihasamaako!”
Jaka sara kuda' yɨme'nya'bɨ' Jizaazai ata yɨwɨbwa'na yaka yɨrɨ'bwa'na yaka wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ lɨmwangebwi yuna maalɨkebulyɨyaigɨnyɨra. Sɨmunya pɨrɨwaalya' be'na yawɨ'manɨgɨ!”
Wɨdɨna yaka saraai sɨpɨyavɨ dɨkwosɨ'na kyagi yɨhusa' mi'na yɨwɨna.
Mi'na yɨwɨna kya' sɨpɨyavɨ mwaalesara gamɨnyɨ kwadaai gɨlɨna yeva yɨlaaya wina yeva wɨdɨna “Naanga yuna nebulyasɨ. Gɨmɨ Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangeigɨnyɨra!”
Aalɨbunyavɨ mena lɨvajulaga'maveva Ganezaaretɨ sɨmagɨnna yɨ'mavaawɨna yɨna ye'.
Yɨ'mavaawɨna yɨna kye' a'mwe anga dazɨmagɨnyara yawɨ'na “Sai Jizaazalyɨra.” Yawɨ'na yeva anga yuyabanya daza yagaalya' wɨdaasɨna yɨna ye'. Sara kye' gamɨnyawɨnna nalaavɨnaka yuyaraavɨ makabɨna.

Sara makabɨna yeva a'mwe nalaavɨnakera tewaanya yɨma'nya'nera gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nyavɨ maangebaarɨ asa'na wɨdathɨwabɨ'de'na yɨdaanganna wie'. Sara yɨdaanganna kwie' sahwara sara yeva yuyara ayɨna tewaanya yɨma'nesarera.
Sagaa' Perɨzɨya pwarajɨ Kɨwɨja pwarajɨ Jeruzaalemɨ yagalya'maveva Jizaazaryawɨnna kaanna bɨna yeva wɨdɨna

“Gɨmɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara Ne sɨnnawɨnyara nejaavɨnɨka sabwi marasɨta yadɨvɨsa' gatha'darevɨnaka? Sare' dare'nesɨ. ‘Tɨka wapaaya naana!’ dadɨvɨ' Ne sɨnnawɨnyara dɨnɨkabaaibɨ' kunnya asa aalya yɨdɨvɨtara mɨka! Gɨrɨkita'nanyara tɨka nadɨvɨsare. Be'neka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨrɨvɨkɨ'na “Sarɨmɨ yune sarɨnnyaburɨna mɨdɨmanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨjɨ galazekɨvaimanɨgasa' gatha'darevɨnaka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai dɨnɨ' ‘Gɨmaamaangelyɨ gwaangesɨ sawaare yaya makidɨ duhaimwana!’ Yɨ nabaai dɨnɨ' ‘A'mwei ganɨmaanga pwarɨ ganaanga kɨrɨvɨ bɨraiyagaala wɨdade sai yɨnahu balana!’

Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' mamɨdɨnyadɨvɨ' Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre gavebwi mɨdɨdɨvɨ' dara dadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ ‘Gazaizai nɨgwia kɨnɨnnakei gannya ganɨmaanga pwarɨ ganaanga kɨrɨvɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨnyɨne gaimwange'ne daza' Gotɨyarɨ wɨjaaya'ne' dahɨlakɨwesɨ. Sare'na yɨhɨzaavɨwɨneinyɨ mɨ'.’”

A'mwei sara wɨdazai sarɨmɨ dɨna ‘Sahwai ganɨmaanga pwarɨna ganaanga kɨrɨvɨna mugaimwagannera!’ Sara dɨna yadɨvɨta sasare dazaburɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' walamarakadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' yune sarɨnnya sabwine'na munyabanna makidɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.
Kwaasɨyaihi! Sarɨmɨnyɨna Pɨropetɨya Aazaayai yɨda'na wɨjaa'. Dara dɨnɨ'
‘A'mwe dara maangejɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makidɨvɨ'
Kɨrɨ' kumɨre sɨmunya nɨmɨnyɨ menyaba warɨkengɨ.
A'mweraavɨre yune kɨwɨnyanna wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsangɨna
“Gotɨyare yagaalya'na dɨmɨdɨnyɨla!” wɨdadɨvɨsare.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨlaaya yaasɨwa'na nyadɨvɨsare.’
Sarɨmɨnyɨna nayaa sara dɨnɨkesɨ.”
Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ gamɨnyawɨnna jaka wɨjɨvwaramaa'na yɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'napɨjɨ nayaa jawɨrila!
Yuya maangevɨ kusawɨ wide'na a'mwerɨ gɨrɨka yɨgalakade' mɨ'. Aawa. Maangevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala walyaabya' yune sahɨrɨ'na gɨrɨkita'nanyai yɨma'nadesɨra.”
Sagaa' gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara gamɨnyɨ buthɨna “A'mwe Perɨzɨyara gɨmɨre yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'neva jɨkurya yɨvanɨgasaraavɨna jawɨ'manɨgɨna?”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai ke'ba'na wɨrɨvɨkɨ'na “Nɨmaamaangei Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei gazavɨzavɨ maburɨjake' yune a'mweraavɨre' pwipula kɨnɨjɨ laavadesɨ.

Perɨzɨyaraavɨna yawɨta kwalaalya mipɨnera! Sahwara tɨbɨnyara tɨbɨnya pwaraavɨ wibwarɨdaakwadɨvɨsare. Kɨrɨ' tɨbɨnya pwai tɨbɨnya pwarɨ tusarɨ' wibwarɨdaakwajai yuya saraai kwaraai kavi'nɨnnyavɨ walaraawɨna yɨkaderaalyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pitai wɨdɨna “Maangevɨ widevɨne ke'ba'nanya dazavɨya kaavɨlya' dɨnejalɨkurakya! Sara kya'gɨzɨ wɨ'naadeinera.”
Wɨdɨna kya' wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ wana sɨmumaayaihi kuna jɨvanɨgava!

Dare'na myawɨrijɨhyɨvanɨgava! Gazaza kwaa'nakejɨ kwaa'maayajɨ maangevɨ kusawɨ wide sa munyɨkɨ wɨlaminada dɨvidaa'nyɨ lɨkavi'nɨnnyavɨna kewɨnɨ marasɨ'de. (Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wapaaya saza gɨrɨkita'nanyarɨ mumwaaihyadengɨ.)
Kɨrɨ' yagaala maangevɨdaa'nya walyaabya daza sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'nɨvanɨkengɨ. Yɨ dazahɨnɨza a'mwe gɨrɨkita'nanyarɨ wɨmwaaihadengɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'nade sa darengɨ. Sɨduta kayaa'na yawɨ'na, a'mweraavɨ tamakɨna, a'mwengɨ ata lɨmwanna, wagɨla maarya'ne gɨrɨkita'nanya yɨna, kukebwi yɨna, kotɨyavɨ kwaasɨ jalɨkurakɨna, bɨraiyagaala dɨna. Yuya sabwi sɨmunyavɨ mi'na yawɨ'na yeva sara yadɨvɨsangɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuya daza a'mwe gɨrɨkita'nanyarɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yɨnɨkengɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwei gannya asi aalya minyajai tɨka wapaaya nojɨya'na sahwai gɨrɨkita'nanyai Gotɨyarɨna yɨma'nadei mɨ'.”
Sahɨba Jizaazai yagalya'ma'na yɨna yaka anga Taayaajɨ anga Saaithonɨjɨ sɨmagɨnna kaanna wɨna.

Kaanna wɨna yaka keiba yamaryadaa'nyɨ, yɨthaanyi, Kenaanɨ mwaalya pɨrɨ' menya' dazɨmagɨ mwaaide' bɨna yaka jaka buthɨna “Naangeigɨ, Ne Devitɨmɨre Kaimɨraayaigɨnyɨ nɨmɨnyɨna kale dɨnyɨgaimwana! Nɨnnya taayavɨ yɨmakei yuna kayaaka nyɨgalakivanɨka!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' yagaala pɨrɨ' ja'naja' mi. Ja'naja' mi kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna yeva dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “A'mwe daza' yune jake'na jake'na nedamɨdɨnɨka. Savɨ ayɨna dɨmaryaasa!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai dara wɨdɨna “Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨre yɨsavaakɨdaa'nyɨ sipɨzipɨyara yɨwɨnadaa'na yɨnɨkeraavɨna gaveraavɨna nyɨmaryasaabakeinyɨ. (A'mwe da' Yɨzɨrelɨya' mɨka. Menyasɨra.)”
Wɨdɨna kya' sa' wɨlaabɨna yaka kwadaai bulagina yɨna yaka bularuta'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ dɨnyɨgaimwana!”
Kɨrɨ' sai ayɨna ja'nawɨdɨna “Kaimɨraayangɨre tɨka wapaaya marawaajɨ jɨlɨkeraavɨ namaralɨvaramaadɨka!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sa' wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ nebulya'na dɨwaana. Kaimɨraayara tewaanya mwaaidɨvɨsare. Nabaai jɨlɨkera wapaaya tɨrɨdɨrɨnya kwɨyakwaravaavɨre yɨ'bɨnyavɨ bwala'daawade maribwaranadɨvɨsare.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ, nɨmɨnyɨna gɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi sa' naangesɨ. Nyɨdɨwaanyavɨna gɨvu'nɨvanɨkabaaibɨ' sa' yɨma'nyɨna gyana!” Sara kuda' sagaasagaa' gamɨre taaya' ayɨna tewaanya yɨma'nyɨna yakesɨ.
Anga saba Jizaazai yagalya'ma'na yɨna yaka Galɨli aalɨbumaangebaarɨ aya kɨbanna wɨlaawɨna yaka mugunyavɨ yɨlaawɨna, yɨlamwaaina.

Yɨlamwaaina yadɨ'nyɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara gamɨnyawɨnna bi'bwa'nyɨna. Bi'bwa'nyɨna yadɨvɨ' sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyarajɨ yagɨnya yadɨ'mwannɨkerajɨ tɨbɨnyarajɨ maanga jɨnɨnɨkerajɨ, nabaai a'mwe nalaavɨnaka kwalaalya pwarajɨ saraavɨ makabɨna yeva gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨryaba gidɨku' yarai wɨmwaaihɨna. Sara yadapi tewaanya yavada'gaina wia'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya atɨka maru'na'na. A'mwe maanga yɨnahu jɨnɨnɨkera yagaala dadaapi tɨnna wanganna, yɨ yagɨnya yadɨ'mwannɨkera maamɨdarya yɨma'nyɨna, yɨ sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyara kaanya yamarina, yɨ tɨbɨnyara tɨnna yenyɨna yadaapi tɨnna wanganna yeva atɨka maru'na'na. Atɨka maru'na'na yeva Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ Gotɨyarɨna yaya' byaannake' munya ke'banna makina ye'.

Jizaazai gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ jaka wɨdɨna yɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Kwala bwa'naanyavɨna kale naanga nyɨvanɨka. Nɨmɨjɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨ' mena nye'mwannamwaaleva wapaaya maayaraavɨna. Ayɨna mɨjɨkaanya maryaasa'na ‘Aala!’ dɨvanɨge. Tutaanyavɨ nabalapɨdɨka!”
Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna “Dathimagɨ a'mwera maayɨmagɨnyɨra. Sare'na nemɨ kwala naanga davɨ wapaaya sara wɨjaaya'ne gɨrɨkula kwalaalya gawɨ maraajɨwona?”
Wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨnyɨne gɨrɨkula gara gara warɨka?” Wɨdɨna kya' wɨdɨna “Nemɨnyɨ gɨrɨkula ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraaina newarɨka. Jawɨnya maalɨka pwaina pwaina warɨka.”
Wɨdɨna kye' kwala bwa'naanyavɨ wɨdɨna yɨna kya' kwaakevɨ walamwaihulɨna. Kwala bwa'naanya' walamwaihulɨna kye'
gɨrɨkula ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala sajɨ jawɨnyarajɨ maarɨna yɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨna yaka gunyɨna, gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨjaavɨ wɨjaaya yɨna kya' sahwara a'mweraavɨ yanga bumumulɨna.

Yanga bumumulɨna kye' yuyara yunebanna mi'na nyɨna. Sara yeva munya kwina' nagiheta bwalaraawake ayɨna mari'bwa'na yɨna yeva soigɨlya tinɨka naanga ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pukaalyangɨ ayɨna yunebanna maanga yeku'nyɨna ya'.
A'mwera tɨka nya (4,000) po taawɨzanɨyare. Nabaai a'mwejɨ kaimɨraayajɨ tɨka nesangɨ.
Soigɨlyangɨ mari'bwarakɨna kye' kwala bwa'naanyangɨ maryaasɨna yaka sɨpɨyavɨ yɨladɨkwosɨ'namwaaina yɨna yaka Maahathanɨ sɨmagɨnna kaanna wɨna ya'.

Perɨzɨyarajɨ Sazuzɨyarajɨ sara Jizaazaryawɨnna bɨna yeva yɨjɨwaalya'na yaamɨjɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai gɨmaryasaabakeigɨ dɨngaka? Sɨgunyavɨ dɨragɨnya' maara'gɨzɨ atɨka maru'nata wɨjɨwaainya' kya'gɨzɨ gɨmɨnyɨna yawɨraade'nanyɨ.”
Kɨrɨ' sahwai yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka wɨrɨvɨkɨ'na “Sawɨsaburɨna dara dadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ ‘Sɨgunya' wayaaka yɨrarakɨwake'na nawɨ'nyagaa' yɨma'nadera.’

Nabaai pɨgaa' mwanyavɨna dara dadɨvɨkɨ ‘Yɨraayange' tɨnga mɨla'naraka sɨgunya wayaakesɨra. Sare'na dahaa' yɨhusasɨ burɨkesɨ waradera.’ Sara dadɨvɨkɨ. Yo, sasare' sarɨmɨ sɨgunyavɨreburɨ wangadɨvɨ' nayaa maryawɨbwa'dɨvɨkɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa'ne sangɨjɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvanɨgengɨjɨ wangadɨvɨ' nayaa mamaryawɨbwaryɨvanɨga'. ‘Gotɨyai naangegaa' wakadehaa' yarai yɨma'nadesɨ,’ majɨvanɨga'.

Dahaasaihi kayaa'nanyaihɨlyɨ. A'mwei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ a'mwe' pwaraavɨ tidavamaryadevaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yagalya'ma'na yeva gevwi yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sareihi nyɨdɨwaa' ‘Dɨragɨnya' wɨjɨwaainya' wanganaana!’ Kɨrɨ' wɨjɨwaainya' mihibwarɨdaakwɨwɨna! Aawa. Dɨvi pɨropetɨya Jonaamɨ yaake' wɨjɨwaainya sa' danganyideihɨlyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna yaka yagalya'ma'na yaka kaanna wɨna. (Matɨyui 12:39,40)
Aalɨbunyavɨ Jizaazalyɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsarajɨ lɨvajulaga'ma'na yeva gamɨrera gɨrɨkula pɨnɨnna navɨka yɨna, mamakabi.
Mamakabi kye' sagaa' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Perɨzɨyarajɨ Sazuzɨyarajɨ saraavɨre yɨzɨya'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' sahwara dɨnyɨna “Sai dara dɨwa' ‘Nɨmɨrera gɨrɨkula lɨwɨnya pamidakya mamakabi yɨwaa'.’”
Sara dɨnyɨna kye' Jizaazai kumɨre yagaalya' yawɨranganna yaka wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ maalɨ'na lɨmwagakava. ‘Sahwai negaimwagathelyɨ,’ majɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' ‘Gɨrɨkulya maayainera,’ be'na dɨmanɨga'!
Sarɨmɨ sɨmunya maayaihi dɨngaka! Gɨrɨkula ata pwinanya sa a'mwe 5,000 maaresanna myawɨrijɨvanɨga'! Sara yeva soigɨlya tinɨkengɨ maange' yunebanna gara garengɨ yekure'?
Nabaai sarɨmɨ myawɨrijɨvanɨga' gɨrɨkula ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala daza a'mwe 4,000 ma'mwa'daasanna! Sara yeva soigɨlya naanga tinɨkengɨ gara garengɨ maramihɨwa'daa'?
Myawɨrivanɨgasa' gatha'darevaka! Nɨmɨ gɨrɨkula pamidakyanna myɨhɨzɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla Perɨzɨyarajɨ Sazuzɨyarajɨ saraavɨre yɨzɨya'na!”
Sagaa' sahwara sɨmunya nayaa yawɨramaa'na “ ‘Gɨrɨkula pamidakyavɨne yɨzɨya'na yɨpɨ'de'na,’ dɨnɨka mɨ'. Aawa. ‘Perɨzɨyarajɨ Sazuzɨyarajɨ saraavɨre wɨjɨwaakyanna nadapamaapɨdɨka!’ daka dɨnɨkesɨ.”
Sizaarɨya Pilipaai sɨmagɨnna Jizaazai bi'mavaawɨna yaka gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ yɨdaanganna “A'mwera A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨna dadɨvɨta aaihwalaka?”
Yɨdaanganna kya' kumɨ dɨna “Pwara dara dɨna ‘Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadelyɨra.’ Pwara dɨna ‘Sai Ne Yɨlaajalyɨ.’ Nabaai pwara dɨna ‘Sai Ne Jeremaayai dɨngaka? Sai ne pɨropetɨya pwai dɨngaka?’”
Mena dɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ saihi ‘Aaihwala?’ nyɨdɨvanɨgava.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Saaimonɨ Pitai “Gɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakeigɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai yuyagaa' gaala mwaaidere Gawaalɨvaangeigɨnyɨra.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai “Saaimonɨ Jonaamɨre kaimɨraayaigɨ yɨlaaya yadɨ tewaanaanga yɨnɨkeigɨnyɨ. A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara mɨwɨsajɨ tawesɨ kɨnɨnnakera givwarɨdaakwetara mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmaamaangei Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei sahwai givwarɨdaakwɨwakelyɨ. Sare'na tewaanaanga yɨnɨkeigɨnyɨ.

Nabaai nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthɨvanɨge. Gɨmɨ Pitaigɨnyɨ. Yagaala dara dɨnɨ' ‘Sɨlyaigɨnyɨ.’ Yɨ gɨmɨ nyɨdɨwaanya' sɨlaange'bɨsavɨ munyaba nɨmɨre kusɨlaanyara ange'bɨsaraavɨ dɨragɨnya wɨmwaaihɨdeinyɨ. Sahwara dɨragɨnyara sara mwaaidɨvɨ' balyabwine dɨragɨnyasɨ saza dɨragɨnyaraavɨ dathɨwanna yade mɨ'.

Gotɨyarera yɨma'nya'nebwina Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨne dɨragɨnya' kaanya baasa'ne' gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ. Kwaakevakɨ yangɨna ‘Kayaa'nanyangɨ,’ kada'gɨzɨ yɨ sangɨna Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyai mena sara yawɨ'na. Kwaakevakɨ yangɨna ‘Tewaanyangɨ,’ kada'gɨzɨ yɨ sangɨna Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyai mena sara yawɨ'na yɨnɨkelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka sagaa' gamɨreraavɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwaraavɨ ‘Gamɨ sai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨra,’ nudɨpɨdɨka!”

Sagaa'daa'nyɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ gaai yɨbwarɨdaakuna “Jeruzaalemɨna wɨwɨneinyɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ Gotɨyarɨne tamira'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ sara daanga naanga nyɨjaavɨpɨ'deinyɨ. Nabaai nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨ. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨrɨka darɨkaai darɨkɨ ayɨna nyɨdɨkaavadeinyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pitai maanga tɨyabaarɨna makuna yaka maanga wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, aawa nebulyasɨ. Gotɨyarɨ gɨmɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'devwi magyɨma'nannera!”

Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' gamɨnyawɨnna sai gɨnyɨwannyɨna yaka Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Saataanɨgɨ, nɨmɨnyɨ dusɨmagɨ bulaawa! Nɨmɨre tusavɨ kaanya nanyɨrihɨ'dɨka! Gotɨyare sɨmunya' myawɨramaarivanɨgɨ. Aawa. Yune a'mweraavɨre' yawɨramaa'manɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ.”

Wɨdɨna yaka sagaa' Jizaazai gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Gazaizai nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Mɨdɨnɨma!’ dazai gamɨrebulyɨ gamɨre yayasɨ kwaakewɨ walamarakojɨ a'mwera kayaa'na nyapɨjɨ yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨri nyɨramakɨpɨ'devaaibɨ' sahwai kayaa'nanya maarya'nei ‘Jizaazarɨna wikɨra!’ dozɨ nyɨmɨdɨnaabana!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai ‘Jizaazarɨna nanyɨramakɨpɨdɨka!’ dazai nyɨmarasɨ'najai padaihasamaa'nade kɨrɨ' gamɨre gaalyabwi yɨwɨna yadevulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwai nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨrojɨyai balya'nei dɨragɨnna nyɨlɨmwagazai gamɨre gaalyabwi bɨramaaradevulyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai Kwaakevakɨya gɨlyɨvɨta yuya maarajai kɨrɨ' gamɨre gaalyabwi yɨwɨna yadevulyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨlyɨvɨta sa gatha'dara wɨgaimwagathelaka! Sahwai gamɨre gaalyabwi ayɨna mubamaarya'nei be nɨgwia wɨjaavadelaka!
Dare'nanyɨ. A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai Ganɨmaangere byaannyasɨ gannya ejelɨyara kwarajɨ ye'mwannɨgwalaabathelyɨ. Yɨrɨka dazagaa' a'mwe yuyara yadɨvɨta yune sabwine'na wɨrɨvɨkɨrade'nanyɨ.
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Dava daakata pwara mabalyadapiyara kuna mwaaidɨvɨ' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalya'nei nawɨ'nyarɨ tɨnna nayaa wangabɨ'dehaa'nanyɨ.”

Yɨrɨka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨ'na mena wavɨla'na kya' mugunya ke'mwewɨ yɨnaawɨnɨkevɨ Jizaazai Pitarɨjɨ Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨ gamɨre gahwaalaangelyɨ saraarɨjɨ gaveraavɨ makɨlaawɨna. Sagaa' yune kumɨnna mwaalɨna.
Yadapi Jizaazare kɨlaakejɨ' kumɨre tɨmyɨralyarɨ pɨjɨ'bɨ' yɨma'nyɨna yaka nabinna yɨma'nyɨna. Nabaai gamɨre sɨnnyɨ' nyɨlya'bɨ' lɨvamwadɨna, gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya sa baake'bɨ' yaaka naanga mwadɨna.
Sara yada, yɨthaanyi, Ne Mozɨzalyɨ Ne Yɨlaajalyɨ saraai yɨma'naabɨna yagɨla Jizaazalyɨ yagaala ye'mwannadɨna yadaakɨlyɨ tɨnna wanganna wie'.

Pitai tɨnna wanganaka Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ dava mwalaaja' sa' tewaanyasɨra. Sara yawɨ'dɨza'na dava sɨmɨnya dawaai dasa marɨdaakudengɨ. Pɨrɨ' gɨmɨnne', pɨrɨ' Ne Mozɨzarɨne', pɨrɨ' Ne Yɨlaajarɨne'.”

Sai yagaalya' kuna dadaasɨ, yɨthaanyi, yɨraaya pɨrɨ' wanyɨwanya naanga yɨna yaka kumɨnyɨ bwaakɨna. Yɨthaanyi, yɨraaya savɨdaasɨ maanguraaya pɨrɨ' yagaala dara dɨna “Dai nɨmɨre Nyɨbwaalɨvaangelyɨ. Darɨ kurya wɨkadɨnyalyɨ. Yɨlaaya nyɨgaimanɨ'. Dahwarɨ kadɨka du'nyɨla!”
Wɨdɨna kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva kwaakewɨnna walaruta'nyɨna, kumɨre sɨnnyɨ' kwaakevɨ tutawa'na yɨna yadɨvɨ' sahwara lɨka naanga yenayɨna.
Lɨka naanga yɨna yadɨvɨ' Jizaazai kumɨnyawɨnna wɨlaabɨna yaka ata yɨme'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Sahwaihi dɨthɨkaayɨla! Lɨka mipɨnera!”
Wɨdɨna kya' tɨnna maradɨhaihɨranganna yeva aane pwai kwarɨ mamaranganyɨ. Aawa. Jizaazai yune gaverɨ maranganna.

Sagaa' mugunyavɨ yagalya'ma'na yeva kewɨnɨna kuna waidaawadɨvɨ' Jizaazai dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwaata dazanna a'mwe pwaraavɨ nudɨpɨdɨka! A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨ balojɨyarɨ yɨdɨkaavojɨyagaa'na duzideihɨlyɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara yɨdaanganna “Kɨwɨja sɨdu'nakera dara gatha'dara dadɨvɨtavɨnaka? ‘Yɨlaajai mena kabozɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Gotɨyai wɨdahɨlakyaakei walaabathelyɨ.’ ”
Yɨdaanganna kye' sai ja'nawɨdɨna “Yo, nebulya'na wɨdadɨvɨsasɨ. Yɨlaajai sɨnnawɨ bɨna, yuya byavada'galawɨmwaaihya'nelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yɨlaajai mena bake kwarɨ kɨrɨ' a'mwera myawɨranganyesalyɨ. Aawa. Yune kunnya saburɨna mɨdɨdɨvɨ' dala nabinabinyabwi wiesalyɨ. Wɨramakesalyɨ. Nabaai sasare sahɨrɨsavɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨ wana kayaa'na wipɨ'delyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera yawɨ'na “Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yaderɨna danedɨvanɨka! Sahwai Yɨlaajalyɨra.”
A'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naangeraayabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' a'mwe pwai gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna yaka kwadaai bahina yaka

wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, nɨmɨre kaimɨraayarɨna gɨmɨ kale'na dɨnyɨgaimwana! Yɨmaka wida gannya kɨlaakejɨ' yuna kayaa'na mwaaidelyɨra. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwalaalyagaa' dɨkevɨ wala'daawadelyɨ. Nabaai aalyavɨ wala'daawadelyɨ.
Gɨmɨre gɨmɨdɨdɨvɨsaraayawɨnna makabɨwei tewaanya mi kiwaakɨra.”

Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ a'mwe dahaasaihi naangegaa' mwaaidɨ dɨragɨnna nyɨlɨmwadɨvɨsaihi mɨka. Nabaai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyasɨ tewaanya' mɨka! Nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa myawɨryaihi sarɨmɨjɨ kuna gatha'daregaa' yɨhye'mwannemwaalɨdehaa'nanaka! Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya yawɨramaarya'neihɨrɨna kuna gatha'daregaa' nyadehaa'nanaka! Kaimɨraaya sarɨ dava nɨmɨnyabanna dɨmakabila!”
Wɨdɨna yaka Jizaazai yɨmaka sarɨ maiyagaala wɨdɨna kya' kaimɨraaya dazarɨ yagalya'makuna kya' sarevɨ yuna sagaasagaa'daasɨ tewaanya mwaalɨna.
Tewaanya mwaalɨna kya' Jizaazaryawɨnna yune gamɨrerana bɨna yeva, pwara yagalya'mavesagaa' wɨdɨna “Nemɨ yɨmaka dazarɨ yɨnɨga wi'na mudaasɨya' gatha'dara yaannevɨnaka?”

Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyarɨ yɨnɨga wi'na malɨmwagyɨvanɨgasa'nanyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Maazɨtetɨya savɨre yɨsɨlya' maalɨtaayasɨ. Maalɨke' gɨrinɨkabaaibɨ' dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga maalɨtaaya daza' kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaibɨzaihi mugunya daza' kudapɨjɨ ‘Keibanna dɨwona!’ yɨ nabaai sa' kaanna wɨna yadesɨ. Nabaai aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mi jide' mɨ'. Yuyanna jideihɨlyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' yɨmaka sasarera wɨdaasa'ne' davwi jɨla! Tɨka wapaaya kɨmaakɨya wakɨna yapɨjɨ, Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna jɨthaanganyidevulyɨ. Sabwi gavebwi yapɨjɨ yɨmaka dazaraavɨ duthaasideihɨlyɨ.”
Anga Galɨli sabanna ye'mwannɨguna yesagaa' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ a'mwe pwai makabozɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨna kanyɨmarɨmwangojɨ
nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨ. Nɨmɨ mi'na balɨna kya'mujɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ ayɨna nyɨdɨkaavadeinyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera kale naanga wiadaa'nyɨ sɨmunya yawɨri'maa'na yɨna yeva sana mwaalɨna.
Dɨvi anga Kaapanɨyamɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yɨna kye' Gotɨyare Angevɨne taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsara Pitaryawɨnna buthɨna “Sarɨmɨre yɨhɨzɨwaakadei Gotɨyare Angevɨna taakɨzɨya wakadei midaaka?”

Buthɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Yo.” Sara wɨdaka angevɨ wɨlɨna kya' sɨnnawɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Saaimonɨgɨ dare'na gara yawɨ'manɨgɨna? Kingɨyara Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara nɨgwɨtaakɨzɨya saza aaihwaravaavɨ maa'dɨvɨtaraavaka? Kunnya jɨlɨkaimɨraayaraavɨ maa'dɨvɨsara dɨngaka? A'mwe pwaraavɨ maa'dɨvɨsara dɨngaka?”

Wɨdɨna kya' Pitai wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwaraavɨre nɨgwia maa'dɨvɨsare.” Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwaraavɨre jɨlɨkaimɨraayara taakɨzɨya wakadɨvɨtara mɨ'. (Sabaaibɨ' Gotɨyare Kaimɨraayainyɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨna taakɨzɨya wakadɨnyainyɨ mɨ'.)

Kɨrɨ' ‘Taakɨzɨya mwaki kyakwoihɨjɨ naarɨmɨnyɨna jɨkurya nyawɨpɨdɨka!’ dena gɨthɨma! Sare'na wawo'gɨzɨ aalɨbunyavɨ jawɨwɨkɨya' dasɨ'naawa! Sara wasɨ'na'gɨzɨ jawɨnya aaya mudɨ'na wɨravabwa'dɨzai maarɨna ya'gɨzɨ maange' galaraa'mwanna ya'gɨzɨ nɨgwia pu' kusawɨ wɨla'dozɨ dɨvɨramaa'deigɨnyɨ. Nɨgwia dazahu' maarɨna ya'gɨzɨ yuya kwainaarɨne taakɨzɨya' dumaarideigɨnyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna ya'.

Dazagaa' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara Jizaazaryawɨnna bɨna yeva “Kwaaka davakɨ Jizaazai nemɨre Kingɨyai yarai yɨma'nadelyɨ,” deva wɨdɨna “Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨne gɨmɨre mɨdɨdaanyainajɨyai yuna naangei aaihwalaka? Yuyainaavɨ wavɨla'manɨkei aaihwalaka?”
Wɨdɨna kye' kaimale pwarɨ jaka jɨvwaramaa'na yaka tɨnnyaba marɨdaakuna yaka
dara wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ kaimɨraaya maalɨkerabɨ' mima'nyɨ yɨpɨja' Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨ dulyideihi mɨ'. Arɨkewɨnyɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pwai yune gamɨ sai kwaakewɨ walamarakɨnojɨ kaimɨraaya dazaibɨ' yɨma'najai, yɨ Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨne'na a'mwe dazai pwaraavɨ wavɨlavadelyɨ.
Nabaai pwai kwai nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨrojɨ kaimɨraaya dareibɨsarɨ maarajai yɨ sarevɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaaradelyɨ.

Pwara kaimɨraaya maalɨkera kwaamu' mwaaidɨvɨsarabɨtara nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨzarajɨya pwarɨ a'mwei walapapalakya'na wɨdɨna kyojɨ nɨmɨrei kayaa'nanyabwi yaja' yɨ a'mwe dazarɨna yɨhɨthɨma! Sahwai sara yajai Gotɨyarɨna yagaainakei kyɨma'nojɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'na dɨragɨnaanna wiadelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨrerɨ kayaa'na mujahaa' sɨla naangei gamɨre tɨlɨnnyavɨ lɨvarɨdapɨjɨ kwajɨ saalaalyavɨ kewewɨnɨ maralɨvarabɨzɨ kwajɨ tewaanya' kwaradɨka! Gotɨyai kayaa'na dɨragɨnaanna wiade'ne'na sabwi tewaanya' kwaradɨka!

We', a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara pwaraavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi walapapalakyaraavɨna Gotɨyai taangebwi wɨrɨvɨkɨraderaavɨna kale nyɨwaka. Pwara nɨmɨnyɨ yagalya'mapɨja'na sahwaraavɨ Gotɨyai dɨragɨnaanna wiadelyɨ. We', sare'na sahwaraavɨna kale nyɨwa'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kayaa'nanya dazabwi yɨma'naabathevulyɨ. Nebulyasɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe sasare sabwi makabade sarɨna, we', Gotɨyai kayaa'nanaanga wɨrɨvɨkɨrade'nanyɨ.

Nabaai gɨmɨre asɨlyɨ kayaa'nanya yɨjaigɨ gɨmɨre sɨmunya' kayaaka kyɨgalojɨ ‘Kayaa'nanyaba namwaaimudɨka!’ dɨzaigɨ sasare gɨnnya asɨrɨ daku'nyɨna ya'gɨzɨ lɨvaranna ja! Ata gave pwina kɨnɨnnakeigɨ yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwina dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨne'na tewaanyasɨ. Ata puraai kɨnɨnnakeigɨ Dɨka myɨgaaya'nevɨ maragɨlɨvarabɨ'de'na kayaa'nanyasɨ. Sare'na sabwina minna! Nabaai gɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨlyɨ wawa'gɨzɨ kayaa'nanya yɨjaigɨ sɨmunya' kayaaka kyɨgalojɨ ‘Kayaa'nanyaba nanyɨmwaaihadɨka!’ dɨzaigɨ sasare sɨvɨlyɨrɨ daku'nyɨna ya'gɨzɨ lɨvaranna ja! Sɨvɨla gave pwina kɨnɨnnakeigɨ yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwina dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨne'na tewaanyasɨ. Sɨvɨla puraai kɨnɨnnakeigɨ Dɨka myɨgaaya'nevɨ maragɨlɨvarabɨ'de'na kayaa'nanyasɨ. Sare'na ayɨna dɨragɨnna gɨthɨma! Sasarebwina minna!

Nabaai gɨmɨre tɨnnyalyɨ kayaa'nanya wangadɨzaigɨ sɨmunya' kayaaka kyɨgalojɨ ‘Kayaa'nanyaba nanyɨmwaaihadɨka!’ dɨzaigɨ sasare tɨnnyarɨ jɨwa'mwanna ya'gɨzɨ lɨvaranna. Tɨnna gave pwaina kɨnɨnnakeigɨ yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwina dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨne'na tewaanyasɨ. Tɨnna pwaraai kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ Dɨka Naangevɨ maragɨlɨvarabɨ'de'na kayaa'nanyasɨ. Dazasare'na sabwina minna!

Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sarɨmɨ sɨmunya kaimɨraaya daraavɨna dara nyawɨpɨdɨ'! ‘Dazarajɨya pɨmɨlɨ' wana yaasɨwa'nanyalyɨra.’ Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Ejelɨyara kaimɨraayaraavɨ nayaa maremwaaidɨvɨsarera. Sahwaraavɨ daanga wina yadaa'nyɨ taanga maarɨna yɨpɨja yuyanna ejelɨyara Nɨmwai Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkerɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsare.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ tusavɨ yadakunɨkeraavɨ padaihasamaarya'neinyɨ bɨweinyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ dare'na gara yawɨ'manɨgava? A'mwe pwai sipɨzipɨya waanɨ aadɨretɨyara kɨnɨnnakei mwaalajai sipɨzipɨya pwai kyadaavojɨ bɨrɨbɨrya'nei wawadei midaaka! Sai mugunyangɨ sipɨzipɨyara 99 mwaaidapi yagalya'ma'na yojɨ sipɨzipɨya gave pwainanya yadaavaja dazaina bɨrɨbɨrya ya'nelyɨ.
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sai mena bɨramaarajai sipɨzipɨya gave pwainanya dazarɨna yɨlaaya naanga yadelyɨ. Yɨ sipɨzipɨyara 99 myadaayɨ yadaapiyaraavɨna yɨlaaya maalɨka yadelyɨ.
Sasare sabaaibɨ' Sɨrɨnɨmaanga Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei maalɨka dazarajɨyarɨna sɨmunya' dɨna ‘Kaimɨraaya dazai myadaavanna! Aala!’ dada bɨramaa'manɨ'.

Nabaai ja'mwei kayaa'nanya pɨbwi gyazaryawɨnna wɨna ya'gɨzɨ yune kɨrɨmɨnna mwaalɨna yakɨlyɨ gamɨre kayaa'nanyabwi jalɨkurakɨna. Nabaai sai kadɨka nayaa gu'najai yɨ tewaanna yavada'galamwaaida gɨmɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya je'mwannamwaalyideraaihɨlyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨre yagaalya' kadɨka magu'nyajai yɨ a'mwe pwaina a'mwe kwaraaina maarɨna ya'gɨzɨ gɨmɨjɨ wɨna. Wɨna kyapɨjɨ a'mwe pwaraaihi daraai dala kwaihi gamɨre yagaala jalɨkurakya'neihi dɨthɨnyideihɨlyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' sahwaraare yagaalya' kadɨka mu'nyɨ yajai nɨmɨre kusɨlaanyaraavɨ wɨdɨna. Nabaai kusɨlaanyaraavɨre yagaalya'na kadɨka mu'nyɨ yajai sarɨna dara jawɨ'delyɨ. Anga naanga pimagɨnyai menyai yɨma'nadei daaka! Taakɨzɨya maa'da kuka maa'dei daaka! Sareraavɨ yɨvanɨgevaaibɨ' sahwarɨ sara yɨdeinyɨ.

Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨreihi sɨrya'mweraavɨna Kwaaka davakɨ dɨmaremwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Sahwaibɨsaraavɨna Kwaaka davakɨ ‘Sabwi kayaa'nanyabulyɨ. Kusɨlaanyainaayawɨ dɨwona!’ wɨdapɨjɨyagaa' yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyai ‘Sabwi kayaa'nanyabulyɨ,’ mena sara yawɨ'na. Nabaai Kwaaka davakɨ ‘Sabwi tewaanyabulyɨ,’ dapɨjɨyagaa' Sɨgunyavɨ ‘Sabwi tewaanyabulyɨ,’ mena sara yawɨ'na yadelyɨ.
Nabaai yagaala ayɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kwaaka davakɨ gazazangɨna sarɨmɨjɨyaraai avaaizɨmunya'na yakɨlyɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨdaanganyɨkaja' yɨ sasare' Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei Nɨmaamaangei sahwaraarɨna yannelyɨ.
Yo, nɨmɨnyɨna a'mwe pwaraaihi daraai dala kwaihi anga pɨba yɨ'bwa'nemwaaibɨzaihi sarɨmɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba mwaalɨde'na Nɨmwai sara yɨhɨgaimwagathe'nanyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna ya'.

Dazagaa' Pitai gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna yɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, nya'mwei kayaa'nanya yɨya kanyojɨ gamɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nya'neinyɨ kayaa'nanya sa gara gara nyadengaka? Yɨnɨga wi'na ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraainanya'na dɨngaka?”
Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai dara wɨdɨna “Ata purɨdaa'nyɨ yune pwaraainanya'na gɨthɨwe'na mɨ'. Aawa. Yɨnɨga wi'na kwala naanga naangenna gɨthɨwa.”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka savɨna ke'ba'nanya' dara wɨdɨna “Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨ a'mweraavɨre kayaa'nanyanna marasɨ'nya'nebwi dare'bɨsabulyɨ. Pɨgaa' a'mwe pwai Kingɨyai maremwaaidei yawɨ'na ‘Nɨnnya nyɨdaayadɨvɨtaraavɨre nɨgwɨtɨvɨkɨta yavada'galamaarɨma!’
Sara yawɨ'na kya' nɨgwia gaai yamaasagaa' dinaaya naanga naange' (10 milɨyonɨ kinaaya) kɨnɨnnakerɨ makabɨna.

Makabɨna kye' kɨrɨ' dinaaya yɨnɨga tɨvɨkɨrya'ne' sai nɨgwia maayalyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kingɨyai dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna ‘A'mwe dazalyɨ gamɨre a'mwesɨ kaimɨraayajɨ gannya gɨlyɨvɨta yuyajɨ marayaasɨpɨka! Sara mi'na yaasɨna yapɨjɨ nɨgwia daza nɨmɨnyɨne'na dinaaya tɨvɨkɨrya'ne maapɨka!’
Sara wɨdɨna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ wɨdaayade dazai kingɨyaryaba kwadaai bulagina yaka kɨnna dɨna yaka wɨdɨna ‘We', nɨmɨnyɨna kale kagyozɨ nɨmɨnyɨna yemwaala dɨnya! Nabaai dinaaya yuya' gɨrɨvɨkɨrɨdeinyɨra.’

Kadɨka sara wɨ'naka wɨdaayade dazare naangei sahwarɨna kale wina kya' wɨdɨna ‘Wikɨra. Gɨmɨre dinaaya' manyɨjaayɨ dɨnyɨdeigɨnyɨ. Wi'nanyɨra. Mi'na gɨmarasɨ'nyɨwana.’ Sara wɨdɨna yaka dinaaya sa' yɨnahu marasɨ'nyɨna.

Sara kya' mwasawɨnna wɨdaayade dazai walyuna yaka gamɨjɨya wɨdaayade pwarɨ walyanganna. Sahwai sɨnnawɨnyarɨna dinaaya maalɨke' (100 kinaaya) kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨthaanyi, sɨnnawɨnyai avaaiwawɨnya dazarɨ walyanganna yaka galalɨmwanna yɨna yaka gamɨre tɨlɨnnyavɨ galagɨraa'dɨwanna yada wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨnyɨne' gɨmɨre dinaaya yuya yunebanna dɨrɨvɨkɨka!’
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre avaaiwawɨnyai kwadaai gɨlɨna yaka dɨragɨnna yɨdaanganna ‘Nɨmɨnyɨna kale kagyozɨ nɨmɨnyɨna yemwaala dɨnya! Nɨmɨre dinaaya gɨrɨvɨkɨrɨdeigɨnyɨ.’
Kɨrɨ' sai ‘Aala!’ dɨna. Aawa. Sarɨ kalavuzavɨ marɨmwaaihɨna yaka ‘Sahwai dinaaya sa' nɨmɨnyɨna tɨvɨkɨradehaa'na yagalya'mavadelyɨ.’
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre avaaiwawɨnyara sasare sabwi wanganeva kale naanga wiadaa'nyɨ kumɨre naangerɨ yagaala yuya daza wɨjɨwakaawɨna.

Sara wɨjɨwakaawɨna kye' a'mwe naangei wɨdaayade dazarɨ jaka wɨdɨna yaka dara wɨdɨna ‘Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya kayaa'nanyaigɨ! Aayagaa' nɨmɨnyɨ kɨnna kanyɨdɨwaa sare'na gɨmɨre dinaaya yuya yaasɨwa'na gɨmarasɨ'nyɨweigɨnyɨ.
Nɨmɨ kale gɨhaimwamwebaaibɨ' gɨmɨre avaaiwawɨnyarɨ kale kugaimwadɨka! Sara yɨjɨ kwajɨ sabwi nawɨ'nya' kwaradɨ'!’
Wɨdɨna yaka gamɨre naangei sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ a'mwe daangita wɨjaavadɨvɨsaraayawɨ marɨmwangakɨna. Gamɨre dinaaya yɨnɨga wi'na yɨ'mwannya'nerɨ marɨmwangɨna yakelyɨ.
Nabaai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihi sɨrya'mwe gazarazaraavɨre kayaa'nanya mamarasɨpɨja' yɨ Nɨmaamaangei Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei avaaina sana yɨhyathelyɨ.” Sara wɨda'.
Jizaazai yagaala daza jɨ'mwannyɨna yakegaa' anga Galɨli yagalya'ma'na yɨna yaka Aalya Jothanɨ pimagɨnna anga naanga Juthɨyanna wɨna.
Wɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya naanga sahwarɨ mɨdɨnyɨna kye' dazɨmagɨ kumɨre nalaaya tewaanya yavada'gaina wia'.

Nabaai gamɨnyawɨnna Perɨzɨya pwara bɨna yeva “Kayaa'na ja'nanedazɨwaka?” yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaaina ya'nera wɨdɨna “Nemɨre kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkeburɨ gazannazanna a'mwei gannya a'mwevɨ yɨnahu wɨdaasa' tewaanya' dɨngaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai ja'nawɨdɨna “Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dɨnɨka datha' madanganyadɨvɨsaihi daaka! Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai yuya wakyaakegaa' kwalyalyɨ balyasɨ sawaarɨ yavɨkarina yaakeyolyɨ.

Sara yaka sai dɨna ‘Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwei ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ sawaarɨ yagalya'mavojɨ gannya a'mwesɨ yɨraku'na yɨkadeyolyɨ. Nabaai sayoi kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'nanyayoi yɨma'nyɨkadeyolyɨ.’ Yagaala dazavɨ myawɨryadɨvɨsaihi daaka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sayoi kɨlaaka pɨjɨkaaina ayawɨ yɨkadewaai mɨ'. Aawa. Sayoi yune kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'nanyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sasare sabwi Gotɨyai mena ye'mwannemwaaihɨnɨkelyɨ. A'mwera nadahaaibwapɨdɨka!”

Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna “Nedɨwaanya'na Ne Mozɨzai kɨwɨnya' dara be'na dɨnɨkavaka? ‘A'mwei gamɨre balaangevɨ wɨdaasa'nei pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ yɨda'na yojɨ a'mwevɨ wɨjaavojɨ yunakaanna wɨdaasadelyɨra.’ Be'na dɨnɨkevɨnaka!”

Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ galarɨlavɨmwaaihɨnyɨna kiwaakɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Mozɨzai sarɨmɨre a'mwengɨ wɨdaasa'na baihana'na yɨhyaakelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna sasare dazabwi waryaakebwi mɨ'.

Nabaai dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Pwai kwai gamɨre a'mwe' mudɨkerɨ maridaayɨ yaja' sahɨrɨvɨ yaasɨwa'na wɨdaasadevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pɨrɨvɨ nayaa yɨdaanganojɨ kwala maarajai yɨ sahwarɨna Gotɨyai dɨna ‘A'mwe sai ata lɨmwangebwi kayaa'na yɨwakelyɨ.’”
Sagaa' gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara wɨdɨna “A'mwei gannya a'mwevɨ sara mudaasɨ yaja'na nemɨ kwala namaraadɨka! Nemɨ a'mwe maayaina mwalaadevwi nawɨ'nyasɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Yagaala daza' yɨnɨga wi'na yawɨramaarya'nera yuyaraavɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai kwala mamaarya sasareburɨne dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavojɨya pwaraavɨnanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨ kwala yɨnɨga mamaarya'nera a'mwe dala pwarana pwarananyavɨnyɨ. Pwara kuvɨnaange maarɨna yesagaa' kwala maarya'nera mamwaalyɨ yɨpɨnerera. Pwaraavɨ a'mwera munya da'nɨkera kwala yɨnɨga maapɨ'dera mɨ'. Pwara Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨne wawɨnya' yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kumɨ sara kɨmaakɨya dakadɨvɨ' kwala mamaaryadɨvɨsare. A'mwei yagaala daza' yɨnɨga wi'na yawɨramaarannei sai yawɨramaa'na yana!”

Sagaa' gamɨnyawɨnna kaimɨraaya maalɨka pwaraavɨ makabɨna. “Kumɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ gamɨre asa' wɨdathɨwada Gotɨyarɨ sahwaraavɨna wɨdana!” deva makabɨna. Mi'na makabɨna kye' kɨrɨ' gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kumɨnyɨ maanga wɨdɨna.

Maanga wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyawɨnna kaimɨraayaraavɨ dɨmaryasaabila! Sarɨmɨ darihɨralɨmwagata mipɨnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨnera maalɨka sasareraavɨna Gotɨyai yanga wɨjaavade'nanyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna kye' asa' mɨnyagɨnyangɨ dathɨwanna wia'. Sara wiaka dɨvidaa'nyɨ dazɨmagɨ yagalya'ma'na yaka kaanna wɨna ya'.
Yɨthaanyi, a'mwe pwai gamɨnyawɨnna bi'ma'na yaka wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakyaigɨ, ‘Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maarɨma!’ da'mujɨ tewaanya gare'na yɨdeinyaka?”

Wɨdɨna kya' ja'nawɨdɨna “Tewaanya'na nɨmɨnyɨna be'na nyɨdaangamanɨgɨna? Tewaanyai yune gave sahwainanyalyɨra. Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ ‘Gaala nebulyaburɨ mwaalya'neinyɨ,’ yawɨ'dɨza' kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨ nayaa dɨmɨdɨna!”
Sai wɨdɨna “Kɨwɨnya garengaka?” Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Datha'darenna ‘A'mwe maramakɨnnera! Pware a'mwevɨ ata malɨmwadɨnnera! Kuka minnera! A'mwe pwaraavɨna kwaasɨ yagaala majalɨkurakɨnnera!
Gɨmɨre gɨmaamaangelyɨ gwaangesɨ sawaare yaya munyaba makidɨ duhaimwana! Gɨmɨnyɨna gɨvu'nadevaaibɨ' pwaraavɨna avaaina nawɨ'nya gɨvu'nana!’”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' mɨgɨnya sai wɨdɨna “Kɨwɨnya yuya daza mena mɨdɨdɨnyangɨra. Nɨmɨnyɨ kuna gare' nyɨgainɨvanɨkevaka?”

Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ ‘Yune nebulya'nanyainyɨ yɨma'nɨma!’ dɨzaigɨ gɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya yasaawa'gɨzɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨ nɨgwia duzaama! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Sɨgunyavɨ gɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakeigɨ jɨma'nadeigɨnyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨ dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!”
Wɨdɨna kya' mɨgɨnyai yagaala daza' kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna yaka kale wiadaa'nyɨ kaanna wɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sai gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
Sagaa' Jizaazai gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaidevɨ a'mwe nɨgwɨhɨravɨnakei yagɨyagɨ wɨladelyɨ. Yaasɨwa'na mɨ'.

Ayahi yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kaamelɨyai ‘Langa kwaabɨhannya gipwaidɨvɨta sarɨkɨre daibu'nyavɨ wɨlɨma!’ dozɨ sa' yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya maayasɨ. Nɨgwɨhɨravɨnakei ‘Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨ wɨlɨma!’ dozɨ sa' yagɨyagɨ wawɨnyasɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna yeva lɨka yɨwainɨgulaawɨna yɨna yeva wɨdɨna “ ‘Nɨgwɨhɨravɨnakei aawa!’ daakajɨ aaihwarɨ padaihasamaarannelaka?”
Wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai tɨnna baihana'na wiaka wɨdɨna “A'mwera wi'na mɨka! Kumɨ sara Gotɨyaryawɨnna mabi yɨpɨnerera. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yuyabwi yɨnɨga wi'na yannelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sagaa' Pitai ja'nawɨdɨna “Yɨthaa, nemɨ yuyangɨ yagalya'mavona gɨmɨdɨmwona. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ tɨvɨkɨrya'ne benɨ maraadengaka?”

Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai kumɨnyɨ dara wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yuya mudɨka yɨma'nadehaa' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai dɨragɨnyasɨ byaannyasɨ kɨnɨnnakei kingɨyarɨ namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nyavɨ mwaalade dazahɨgaa' sarɨmɨ nyɨmɨdɨdɨvɨsaihi kwaihɨlyɨ namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nya sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala sangɨ dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' yawɨbwarya'neihi Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨre yɨsavakaavɨ sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala savakaavɨ dɨmaremwaalyideihɨlyɨ.

Nabaai gazaizai nɨmɨnne yayavɨna yawɨ'da nɨmɨre wawɨnya yada yɨ sahwai gamɨre angevɨ yagalya'ma'na. Yɨ gya'mwe pwaraavɨ gya'mwe kɨnɨngɨ yagalya'ma'na. Yɨ ganɨmaanga pwarɨ ganaanga kɨrɨvɨ yagalya'ma'na. Yɨ gamɨre kaimɨraayangɨ yagalya'ma'na. Yɨ aawawɨnyangɨ yagalya'ma'na. Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwai tewaanya kwalaalya naanga maaradelyɨ. Nabaai sara yojɨ Ganɨmaangere yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maaradelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' dahaa' a'mwe kwalaalyara kumɨre yaya munyaba warɨkera dɨvi nɨmɨnyɨne'na kumɨre yaya kwaakeba waraderera. Nabaai dahaa' a'mwe kwalaalyara kumɨre yaya kwaakeba warɨkera dɨvi nɨmɨnyɨne'na kumɨre yaya munyaba waraderera.
Sare' da'daresɨ. Sɨgunyavɨya maremwaaide' a'mwe pwai aawawɨnya kɨnɨnnakei yɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. Wana mwanyavɨ (6 kɨlokɨ) gamɨre gɨraipɨwiwawɨnyavɨ wɨdaaya'ne pwaraavɨ maarya'nei kaanna wɨna.

Kaanna wɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨre gɨraipɨwiwawɨnyavɨ nyɨdaaya'neihɨrɨ nemɨre sabwine'na pwarɨ dahaa'ne kinaaya' pwarɨ dahaa'ne kinaaya' yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨ.’ ‘Yo, wikɨra,’ ja'nawɨdɨna kye' gamɨre wawɨnyavɨna wɨdaasɨna.
Wɨdaasɨna yaka mwanyɨzɨrɨgwajahaa' maaketɨyaba ayahi wɨna yaka a'mwe pwara yaasɨwa'na yadapiyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganna.
Tɨnna wanganna yaka wɨdɨna ‘Sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ nɨmɨre wiwawɨnyavɨna kaanna wawopɨjɨ jaawila! Yɨ nabaai nɨgwia yɨda'nanya yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨra.’ Kuda' sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna wɨna kye' dɨvidaa'nyɨ sɨrɨgwajahaasɨ sɨvɨraryagaasɨ gyakwai ayahi wɨna yaka avaaina sana yɨna.
Nabaai sawɨsaburɨ (5 kɨlokɨ) ayahi kaanna wɨna yaka a'mwe pwara daa'dapiyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganna yaka wɨdɨna ‘Dava nyɨlaanga davɨ yaasɨwa' gatha'darevɨna daakava?’
Sahwara ja'nawɨdɨna ‘Nemɨnyɨ wawɨnya nejaaya'nei pwai midaakajɨnyɨra.’ Ja'nawɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna ‘Sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ nɨmɨre wawɨnyavɨna dɨwila!’

Sara wɨdɨna kya' yuyara wawɨnya yɨna kye' nyɨla walakyagaa' mena kyɨma'na' wiwawɨnyavɨ gyakwalaangei gamɨre maredaasarɨ dara wɨdɨna ‘Wawɨnyavɨ nyɨdayɨwaasaraavɨ jaka wɨda'gɨzɨ nɨgwia duzaama! Wawɨnya aaya dɨvidaa'nyaraavɨ sahwaraavɨdaa'nyɨ duzaama! Nɨgwia sahwaraavɨ kuna kuna wɨjaava'gɨzɨ yune wawɨnya sɨnnawɨ wɨdaayaraayabanna jɨ'mwannadesɨra.’

Sara wɨdɨna kya' maredaasai sara yɨna yada a'mwera wawɨnya' yamaa'dɨvɨ' yune sawɨsaburɨ (5 kɨlokɨ) yesara bi'ma'na yɨna yeva pwai kinaaya pɨrɨ' pwai kinaaya pɨrɨ' maarɨna. Sagaa' yɨrɨka yunevɨna wawɨnyavɨ nɨgwia kinaaya pukɨra.

Maarɨna kye' wawɨnya aayagaa'daa'nyɨ yamaa'nɨka sara tɨnna wanganna yeva yawɨ'na ‘Dɨvidaa'nyara pwai kinaaya pɨrɨ' pwai kinaaya pɨrɨ' ma'mwaasa'na nemɨ pɨnɨjɨ maraadeinera.’ Sara yawɨ'na kye' kɨrɨ' sara kwarajɨ pwai kinaaya pɨrɨ' pwai kinaaya pɨrɨ' maarɨna.
Sara maarɨna yeva jɨkurya yɨna yeva wawɨnyavɨ gyakwalaangerɨ maanga wɨdɨna

‘A'mwe dazara aaya dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'naabadɨvɨ' wawɨnya' yune waanɨ aawaaya'na wavɨla'derera. Gɨmɨ nɨgwia saraavɨ wɨjawaanya' nemɨ maraanne' wɨjawaana! Kɨrɨ' nemɨ wawɨnya naanga yadaa mwanyavɨdaa'nyaina yune nyɨla walakyagaa'na yɨ'mwannɨvanɨgoinera. Sara yadaawori nyɨla naange' nebaihinɨvanɨkeinera.’
Maanga sara wɨdɨna kye' wawɨnyavɨ gyakwalaangei kumɨjɨya pwarɨ ja'nawɨdɨna ‘Nya'mweigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨna kayaa'na magivanɨge. Naarɨmɨ kinaaya pɨrɨ'na “Tewaanyasɨra,” myawɨrijɨhyɨwola?
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨnnya nɨgwia' maarɨna ya'gɨzɨ kaanna wɨna jɨ! Nyɨvu'nɨvanɨka daresɨ. Gɨzaavanɨgevaaibɨ' a'mwe aaya dɨvidaa'nya dazarɨ avaala wɨjaawa.
Sare' yune nɨmɨresɨ. Nɨnnya nɨgwia yune sangɨna yɨnɨga mi yɨwɨneinyɨ dɨngaka? Nɨmɨ tewaanyabwina yadɨnyainyɨne'na sɨmunyavɨ jɨkurya yawɨ'dɨ wabarɨnna yɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨ dɨngaka?’ wɨda'.

Ke'ba'na yɨhɨthɨwe da'daresɨ. A'mwe dɨvidaa'nyara sɨnnawɨnyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera. Nabaai a'mwe sɨnnawɨnyara yune dɨvidaa'nyɨna yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera. (Gotɨyai gannya gaalyabwi aaya dɨvidaa'nyaraavɨna avaaina sɨnnawɨ wɨjaavaderera. Nabaai gannya gaalyabwi sɨnnawɨ aayagaa'daa'nyaraavɨna dɨvidaa'nyɨ wɨjaavaderera.)”
Jeruzaalemɨna kaanya yɨlaawia'nei woda gamɨre sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara gavera gamɨnyabanna jɨ'bwaramakuna yaka tutaanyavɨ kavena wɨdɨna

“Yɨthaanyi, dahaa' Jeruzaalemɨneina yimanaawɨgo. Sahɨba a'mwe pwai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangeraavɨnajɨ Kɨwɨjaraavɨnajɨ nyɨmarɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Marɨmwaaihɨna kanyojɨ kotɨyavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna wɨdɨna ‘Kayaa'nanyai balana!’

Sara wɨdɨna yapɨjɨ ajɨmya pɨnɨngɨyaraavɨna Menyaraavɨna nyɨmarɨmwangɨpɨ'deinyɨ. Wɨmarɨmwangɨna kanyapɨjɨ yagaaibɨraizɨka nyɨdanganapɨjɨ wɨla kayaa'nanyabaalyɨ mala naanga nyɨramapɨjɨ yɨsavɨri maranyɨramarɨmupɨ'deinyɨ. Sara kanyapɨjɨ yɨrɨka darɨkaai darɨkɨ ayɨna nyɨdɨkaavadeinyɨ.”

Dazagaa' Sevathiyare balaangesɨ gamɨre gawaalɨvaangeraalyɨ kɨnɨdaka ye'mwannɨguna yeva Jizaazaryawɨnna bɨna. Mi'na bɨna yeva kwaakevɨ kɨrɨnaange' walaruta'nyɨna yaka “Pɨrɨ'na githaanganɨjɨwana?” wɨdɨna.

Wɨdɨna kya' wɨdɨna “Gɨvu'nɨvanɨke' berɨvaka?” Wɨdɨna kya' wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre dɨmaremwaaidevɨ nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya datharaai, pwai gɨmɨre aangasɨmagɨ, pwai gɨmɨre kwanaamimagɨ mwaalyɨkade'na sara dɨnyɨdana! Sare'na nyɨvu'nɨvanɨkesɨ.”

Wɨdɨna kya' ja'nawɨdɨna “Yɨdaangamanɨgata daza' nayaa myawɨranganyɨvanɨga'. Kaapɨvananyavɨ nɨdevaaibɨ' maalɨkegaa' taanga naanga nyadesɨ. Taanga naanga sa kyɨhyojɨ kɨrɨmɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yɨkaneraaihi daaka?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' kɨdaraai wɨdɨna “Naarɨmɨ wi'na yakaneinaalyɨra.”

Wɨdɨna kyagi wɨdɨna “Nebulyasɨ. Nɨmɨre kaapɨvananyavɨ dɨnyideraaihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' ‘Nɨmɨre aangasɨmagɨ sahwai mwaalana! Nɨmɨre kwanaamimagɨ sahwai mwaalana!’ wɨja'ne' nɨmɨre' mɨka! Aawa. Sahɨbanyaarɨ mwaalya'neraarɨna Nɨmaamaangei mena dahɨlakɨna, sara yawɨ'mwakelyɨ.”
Nabaai atɨraalyara yagaala daza' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva sadaraarɨna sɨnna tɨka davɨna.

Sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ kɨrɨ' Jizaazai gamɨnyawɨnna jaka jɨvwaramaa'na yaka wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨga' ‘Kingɨyara ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨrera kunnya a'mweraavɨ dathɨwanna yadɨvɨ' dɨragɨnya wɨmaremwaaidɨvɨsarera. Nabaai kumɨre a'mwe naangera dɨragɨnya yadɨvɨsare. A'mwera a'mwemɨlɨka kumɨre yagaalya mɨdɨnya'na dɨragɨnya yadɨvɨsare.’
Kɨrɨ' sasare dazabwi sarɨmɨnyɨ myɨhwarannera! Aawa. Pwai kwai sarɨmɨjɨyai ‘Naanga mwaalɨma! A'mwe naangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!’ wɨvu'najai sarɨmɨre yɨhɨthaayadei mwaalana!
Nabaai pwai kwai sarɨmɨjɨyai ‘Aaya sɨnnawɨnyainyɨ mwaalɨma!’ wɨvu'najai yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yadeibɨ'nanyai mwaalana!

Sabaaibɨ' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ ‘Nyɨdaayɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ,’ majɨ yena bɨweinyɨ. Aawa. ‘Yune kumɨnyɨ wɨdaayɨde'nanyɨ. A'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨneba ayɨna mubamaarya'neinyɨ balɨdeinyɨ,’ dena bɨweinyɨ. Nɨmɨ yadɨnyabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ duthaayideihɨlyɨ.”
Sagaa' anga Jeriko yagalya'ma'na yɨna yeva kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yadaapi kwala bwa'naanya naange' mɨdɨnyɨna.

Mɨdɨnyɨna yadaapi, yɨthaanyi, tu'maangebaarɨ a'mwe tɨbɨnyaraai mwaalɨna yadi' “Jizaazai bɨvanɨkerɨnera,” kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yagɨla jaka dɨragɨnna dɨna “Naangeigɨ, Ne Devitɨmɨre Kaimɨraayaigɨ, naarɨmɨnyɨ kale'na dɨnehɨhaimwana!”

Jaka sara kudahi kwala bwa'naanya' “Jaka sa' maku'nyɨka!” deva maanga wɨdɨna. Maanga wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' saraai jaka naanga dɨragɨnna kuna wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, Ne Devitɨmɨre Kaimɨraayaigɨ naarɨmɨnyɨ kale'na dɨnehɨhaimwana!”
Sara wɨdɨna kyagi Jizaazai muda'na yaka saraarɨ jaka wɨjɨvwaramaa'na yaka wɨdɨna “Kɨrɨmɨnyɨ gara yɨhide'nanaka? Berɨvɨna yɨhɨvu'nadevaka?”
Wɨdɨna kya' “Naangeigɨ ‘Naarɨmɨre tɨnnyara tewaanya yavada'galana!’ kadakwoihɨjɨ dɨnehya! Sare'na yawɨ'manɨgoi.”

Kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna yaka Jizaazai kale naanga wina kya' sagaa' kɨrɨmɨre tɨnnyaraavɨ asa dathɨwanna. Sarevɨ wana sagaasagaa' kɨrɨmɨre tɨnnyara nawɨ'nya wanganna. Nawɨ'nya wanganna yeva saraai gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨnna yɨna yagi.

Jeruzaalemɨnera wɨna yeva Jeruzaalemɨ kɨbaweba anga Bepaaza aya kɨbanna yɨ'mavaawɨna. Anga maalɨka sa' Mugunya Wolivɨ gidɨkusaba mannɨkebe. Aya kɨbanna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' Jizaazai gamɨre mɨdɨdita pwaraarɨ wɨdaasɨna

“Kɨrɨmɨ anga maalɨka dazaba sangihɨrɨ wɨlakɨlyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' dogiya pɨrɨsɨ gamɨre dɨwɨnyai kwalyɨ wɨlyabaalyɨ galyɨrakɨnɨkenaarɨ danganyideraaihɨlyɨ. Sanaarɨ wɨla yaramaa'na yakɨlyɨ nɨmɨnyawɨnna dɨmakabyideraaihɨlyɨ.
Nabaai a'mwe pwai kwai yagaala pɨrɨ' yɨhɨthazai dara duzideraaihɨlyɨ ‘Naangerɨ wana kunerɨ kɨnaarɨna wɨgainɨvanɨke'nanyɨ.’ Sara kudakɨlyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' sanaarɨ marayɨhyasaabathelyɨra.”
Sara yeta daza' Gotɨyai “Pɨropetɨyare yagaala dɨnɨka dazavɨ yunebanna ya'ne' yɨma'nana!” kada' sara ye'. Yagaala sa' dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Mugunya Saayonɨ mwaalyaraavɨ dara duzɨla!
“Yɨthaanyi, sarɨmɨnyawɨnna sarɨmɨre kingɨyai bɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sahwai kwaamu'nanyai nawɨ'nyabwi yɨna yadelyɨ.
Sagaa' dogiyarɨ a'ba yɨlamwaalaka bɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sai dogiyavɨre dɨwɨnyarɨ a'ba yɨlamwaalɨkelyɨ.”
Pɨropetɨyare yagaalya' sara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Jizaazai gamɨre mɨdɨdisaraarɨ sara wɨdaasɨna kya' saraai sara yɨna.
Dogiya ganaangesɨ dɨwɨnya kwalyɨ sanaarɨ makabɨna yagɨla kɨrɨnnya baazɨ'ma'nya dɨragɨnya dogiyarɨ a'ba yɨlakɨna kyagi sai munyaba yɨlamwaaina kya' makuna.

Makuna yadaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya naange' tutaanyavakɨ yɨlaaya'na kumɨre baazɨ'ma'nya yɨraipu'nyɨna yeva kwala pɨgɨlavajɨrɨ'bwarakɨwɨlaawɨna yɨna ye'. Nabaai pwara yɨtaanya paayɨna yadɨvɨ' tutaanyavɨ yɨlaaya'na wakɨwɨlɨna.
Kwala bwa'naanya pɨnɨ Jizaazarɨ sɨnnawɨ yɨma'nyɨna yadɨvɨ' waanyɨna, kwala bwa'naanya pɨnɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ mɨdɨnyɨna, yuyara jaka wɨdamɨdɨnna
“Ne Devitɨmɨre Kaimɨraayarɨ yɨlaaya maryaana!
