Yawɨrangadaapi yɨme'nya'bɨ' Jizaazai gannya sɨmunyavɨ yawɨ'na “A'mwe dara sara jawɨ'manɨgava!” daka wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ sare' baa'na yawɨ'manɨgava!

Darewaai naangewaai midaaka! Pɨrɨ' dare'. Yagɨnya bainɨkerɨ wɨdɨde' ‘Gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya gɨmarasɨ'mwa.’ Pɨrɨ' dare'. Wɨdɨde' ‘Dɨthɨkaaka! Yɨ'bɨnya' maara'gɨzɨ dɨmakwalyona!’ Yagaala yuya sawaai naangewaai midaaka! Nɨmɨ kuda'muri ‘Dɨthɨkaaka! Yɨ'bɨnya' maara'gɨzɨ dɨmakwalyona!’ sara yade'na
sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na ‘Ai, Kwaaka davakɨ a'mwe sai kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nya'nei dɨragɨnnakelyɨ,’ jawɨryideihɨlyɨ. Sara jawɨryide'na A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai yagɨnya bainɨkerɨ sara wɨdana!”
A'mwerɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨthɨwa, ‘Dɨthɨkaaka! Gɨnnya yɨ'bɨnya' marikwava'gɨzɨ gɨnnya angevɨna dɨmakwalyona!’ ”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' daavaka yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨ'bɨnya' marikwa'na yaka kaanya walyodaa'nyɨ sare'na a'mwe yuyara tɨnna wanganna yeva atɨka maru'nakulɨna yeva Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yeva “Sabwi nemɨ sara mwanganyainera,” dɨnyɨna ye'.
Jizaazai ayɨna walyoka aalɨbumaangevɨ mwaaidɨsɨ a'mwera yuyara yɨ'bwa'nyɨna yeva mwaaidapi Jizaazai wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'.
Livaayai Alɨpɨyaazarei taakɨzɨya maa'dei taakɨzɨya maa'deva mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Jizaazai wangamabaka wɨdɨna “Nyɨmɨdɨnaama!” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' daavɨna yaka mɨjɨwɨna ya'.

Livaayare angevɨ Jizaazai namwaaidɨsɨ taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsarari a'mwe kɨwɨnya maalɨ'na yadɨvɨsarari sara Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerari saraayaba mwaalɨna ye'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨ sara kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨnesara.

Namwaaidapi Kɨwɨjara Perɨzɨyara “Gamɨ salyɨ kɨwɨnya maalɨ'na yadɨvɨsarari taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsarari je'mwannanɨvanɨgava!” deva gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsarajɨ kɨwɨnya maalɨ'na wɨyadɨvɨsarajɨ saraayaba baa'na nɨvanɨka!” wɨdɨna.

Yagaala sa' wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨ'nakei wɨdɨna “Dotarɨna nabalɨmaayara wɨgainadera mɨ'. Aawa. Nabalɨnakera wɨgainadere. Sare'na nɨmɨ sainyɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraangebulyɨyainajɨyaraavɨ jɨvwaramaarya'neinyɨ mabye. Aawa. Kɨwɨnya maalɨ'na yadɨvɨsaraavɨne'nanyɨ.”

Pɨgaa' Jonɨmɨrerajɨ Perɨzɨyarajɨ “Gotɨyarɨna wapaaya manaannera!” deva navɨka mwaaidapi pwara wɨlaabɨna yeva Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Be'neka? Jonɨmɨrerari Perɨzɨyaraavɨrerari sara wapaaya manyara mwaalɨna yadapi kɨrɨ' gɨmɨrera wapaaya baa'na nɨvanɨgava!”
Wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna ya' “Mudɨkangeyabanne munne yadɨvɨsagaa' a'mwe' maarade mɨgɨnyai mwaaidozɨ a'mwe a'mwera tɨka munne manɨpɨne yɨpɨjara daaka!

Mɨgɨnyai mwaaidoriyagaa' wapaa nɨpɨ'dengɨra. Pɨgasa kima'nojɨ kumɨnyabadaasai a'mwe' maarade mɨgɨnyai yɨpalasɨ'na kyapi sagaa' kumɨ sa wapaa tɨka manyɨ yɨpɨ'dengɨra. Sare' kanyɨpalasɨ'napɨri nɨmɨrera wapaaya manyɨ yɨpɨ'dengɨra.”

Sare' Jizaazai gamɨre yagaala mudɨke'na wɨdɨna “Yɨvɨta gaalya' a'mwe pwai dakurojɨ ‘Yɨvɨta ayɨkɨ mɨwɨrɨma!’ myawɨryajai tewaanyalyɨra. Sara mɨwɨ'na yajɨ kwajɨ mɨwɨta'ne yɨvɨta yɨvɨsɨkɨ kayaaka kyadɨka! Yɨvɨta gaalyamɨlɨ' yɨvɨta ayɨkɨ kayaaka yade'na naanga lihɨ'na yadesɨra.

Nabaai memekɨlaaka waainɨtalya' a'mwe aane pwai kwai waainɨtala ayavɨ waainɨya gaalya' mamaradɨngiki yadelyɨ. Sara maradɨngikaja' aalɨmaagwala bilamari'bwarakadaawori waainɨya' memekɨlaakevɨ kayaaka kyojɨ waainɨya' bwalaraawɨna yadesɨra kɨlaaka yuya tɨ'mɨwɨrojɨya. Sare' aawa. Waainɨya gaalya' memekɨlaaka mudɨkevɨ maradɨngikɨna yaja' tewaanya warɨna yadesɨra.”

Juyaraavɨre Kwazaaka pɨgaa' lɨlaajabɨta witɨziwawɨnyavɨ tɨnnyaba tusavɨ sai widavadaasɨ gamɨrera mɨdɨnaabɨna, mɨjɨka wiadaa'nyɨ witɨzɨla gimujɨna ye'. Sa'na kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' “Kwaakaanya yamaryadɨvɨ' tusavɨ a'mwera witɨzɨla maapɨka!” dɨnɨkesɨra.
Gimujɨna kye' Perɨzɨyara Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa, Kwazaakegaa' dahaa' baa'na gimujɨvanɨgava! Kɨwɨnya sare'na warɨkesɨra. Sa pɨgaa' dɨhimujidengɨra. Kwazaakegaa' mipɨnera sabwi!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Baa'na nyɨdɨwaava! Ne Devitɨ yaake pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ tɨnna mwanganyadɨvɨsaihi daaka? Devitɨjɨ gamɨjɨyarajɨ sara wapaaya kunera mɨjɨka wiadaa'nyɨ

sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei Avaayathai mwalyaakegaa' Devitɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'de pwarɨ gɨrɨkulya'na wɨdaka Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlaabɨna kyaa' Gotɨyai tɨnna wanganya'ne gɨrɨkula wakyaasa kujayaa' maranyɨna yaa'. Gɨrɨkula sa mi'na kwaryaa' ‘Gotɨyare yɨra'dɨvɨsara gavera maranadɨvɨsarera,’ kɨwɨnya' sara dɨnɨkesɨra. Devitɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dei mamwalyaakei maranyɨna yaka nabaai gamɨjɨyaraavɨna wɨmaryaa'. Sare' Gotɨyai maiyagaala mujaa'.”

Sara wɨdaka wɨdɨna ya' “Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ yavɨkaryaka dɨvidaasɨ a'mweraavɨne'na Kwazaakegaa' wakyaa'. Sɨnnawɨ Kwazaakegaa' mwaryaka dɨvidaasɨ Kwazaakegaa'ne'na a'mweraavɨ myavɨkaryaa'. Arɨkewɨ.
Sara yaake'na A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai Kwazaakegaa'ne Naangei ‘A'mwera sara sara yɨpɨ'derera,’ wɨdadelyɨra,” wɨda' Jizaazai gamɨnyɨne'na.
Lotuangevɨ ata pimagɨnyi yaalɨka mena yɨnɨkei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Jizaazai ayɨna wɨlamwaaina.

Wɨlamwaaina kya' “Jizaazai Kwazaakegaa' a'mwere asa' tewaanya yavada'gaina yajɨwaka?” deva A'mwe Perɨzɨyara bangana'na ye'. “Asa' tewaanya yavada'gaina yaja' nemɨ kotɨya wɨmwaaihɨna yaadeinaava,” deva bangana'na ye'.
Nayaa bangana'na yadapi Jizaazai ata kayaa'nanyarɨ wɨdɨna “Tɨnnyabanna dɨthaaka!”

A'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kwazaakegaa'na kɨwɨnya gara dɨvanɨka? Kwazaakegaa'na tewaanya yɨja'nebwi sara dathɨvanɨka? Kwazaakegaa'na kayaa'nanya yɨja'nebwi sara dathɨvanɨka? Nabaai ‘A'mweraavɨ tewaanya mwaaibɨ'de'na dɨhaimwana!’ dathɨvanɨka? ‘A'mweraavɨ dɨramakya!’ kɨwɨnya sara dathɨvanɨka?” wɨdɨna. Sara wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ sara yagaala mujɨ, maadɨnna mwaalɨna ye'.

Maadɨnna mwaalɨna kye' kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ ata yaalɨka yɨnɨkerɨna kumɨnyɨ kale mwiadaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wangamabɨna. Wangamabɨna kya' saraavɨne'na kale wiadaasɨ avaalyagaa' maadɨnna mwaaidapiyaraavɨna gamɨre sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ a'mwerɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya asa' jɨwɨbwaka!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' ata yɨna kya' ata kayaa'nanya' maamɨdarya' yɨma'nyɨna.
Maamɨdarya' yɨma'nyɨna kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' Lotuangevɨ Perɨzɨyara bwalyuna yeva Erotɨyarerajɨ yɨ'bwa'nyɨna kye' jamungaje' “Jizaazai balade'na nemɨ gara yaadelaka?”
Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerajɨ saba yagalya'ma'na yeva Aalɨbunya Galɨlina wɨna. Nabaai kwala naanga kaanna wɨna. Kwaaka Galɨli mwaalyarajɨ Kwaaka Juthɨya mwaalyarajɨ

Anga Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyarajɨ Kwaaka Yɨthumɨya mwaalyarajɨ Aalya Jothanɨ pimagɨ mwaalyarajɨ Anga Taayaa Anga Saaithonɨ sabanyaai mwaalyarajɨ yuya sara “Jizaazai sana sana yɨvanɨkelyɨra,” deva gamɨnyawɨnna kaanna bɨna.
Kaanna bɨna kye' kwala bwa'naanya naange'na gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kwala bwa'naanya da' bule nanyɨnadɨka! Botɨya' nɨmɨnyɨne' jovɨrawakyɨla! Aalyavɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨ botɨyavɨdaa'nyɨ wɨjɨwaakɨdeinyɨ.”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sara wɨdɨna yake'ne' Jizaazai a'mweraavɨ tewaanya yavada'gaina kya' nalaavɨnakera “Jizaazarɨ yɨmetavɨma!” dɨneva yɨmeta'na yesa'na wɨdɨna ya'.
A'mwe pwara yɨmaka widɨvɨsara Jizaazarɨ tɨnna wanganeva gamɨnyawɨ wala'na yeva “Aakayɨ,” jaka dɨna “Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangeigɨnyɨra,” wɨdɨna.
Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai yɨmakeraavɨ yagaala dɨragɨnɨnaanga wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨ,’ madɨpɨnera!”
Jizaazai mugunyangɨ wɨlaawɨna yaka “A'mwera nɨmɨrera yɨma'nɨpɨ'dera,” dakeraavɨ jaka wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ wɨlaabɨna ye'.
Wɨlaabɨna kye' a'mwe atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ dahɨlakɨna yaka “Nɨmɨnyaba dɨmwaalyɨla! Nabaai yagaala wɨjɨwakamarya'na yɨhɨthaasɨdera!
Yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasa'ne dɨragɨnya' yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨ,” wɨdɨna ya'.
A'mwe atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala sareraavɨne yaya darengɨra. Yɨ pwai Saaimonɨ yaya pɨrɨ' Jizaazai wɨdake' Pitai,
yɨ pwaraai Jemɨzai Sevathiyare gawaalɨvaangelyɨ Jonɨ Jemɨzare gahwaalaangelyɨ sadaraai yaya pɨrɨ' wɨdake Bawanezɨzɨ (aangyagaalya'na Yɨ'muyagaainakeraai),
yɨ pwai Edɨruyai, pwai Pilipɨ, pwai Baatolomyui, pwai Matɨyui, pwai Tomaazai, pwai Jemɨzai Alɨpɨyaazarei, pwai Tathɨyaazai, pwai Saaimonɨ “Kumɨreba Romɨyara wɨpɨka!” dadei,
pwai Juthaazai Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyai dɨvidaasɨ Jizaazarɨ yɨkamaangeraavɨna wibwarɨdaakwia'nei.

Jizaazai gannya angevɨ wɨlaabɨna. Mi'na wɨlaabɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya yɨ'bwa'namwaaina kye' Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerajɨ sara yɨna yɨna yeva “Wapaaya warana! Gotɨyare wawɨnya yaana!” deva wapaaya manyɨ ye'.
Wapaaya manyɨ kye' Jizaazai yake'na gamɨre jɨlɨkaimɨraaya sara wɨ'neva “Nemɨ gamɨnyɨ marawaana!” deva kaanna bɨna ye'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. “Sɨmunya maayai mwaalɨka,” desa'nanyɨ.

Kɨwɨjara Anga Jeruzaalemɨdaasara dɨna “Jizaazarɨ munyɨkɨ yɨmaka Biyelɨzɨvulɨ kɨnɨnnakelyɨra.” Nabaai dɨna “Yɨmakeraavɨ maremwaala naangei gannya dɨragɨnya' kujaava' Jizaazai yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨna yadelyɨ.”
Sara dɨna kye' Jizaazai a'mweraavɨ “Kaajɨla!” wɨdaka ke'ba'na yagaala wɨdɨna “Saataanɨ Saataanɨmɨ gara yojɨ wɨdaasɨnannelaka?
Kingɨyare a'mwera anga kɨba mwaalyara jaapaina yɨpɨja' mala bwa'nyɨna yɨpɨja' sahwara dɨragɨnya daapɨne' mɨka!
A'mwe pɨnɨdaka kajapalemwalamaryapɨjɨ sanɨdaka dɨragɨnya daapɨne' mɨka!
Savɨne'na Saataanɨjɨ gamɨrerajɨ jaapaina yɨpɨja' mala bwa'nyɨna kyapɨjɨ Saataanɨ maremwaaideva dɨragɨnya madaayɨ yannesɨ. Aawa. Savɨne'na Saataanɨ mi'nanyɨ.
A'mwe aane pwai kwai a'mwe dɨragɨnyare gɨlyɨvɨsa kuka yɨpalamaasa'na gamɨre angevɨ mulaawi yannelyɨ. Arɨkewɨnyɨra. Sɨnnawɨ sai a'mwe dɨragɨnyarɨ wɨla pwɨyaja' dɨvi kuka yɨpalamaaradelyɨra.

Yagaala da' jawɨka! Nebwina gɨthɨma! A'mwera kayaa'nanyabwi yɨvanɨgasabwi sabulyɨ Gotɨyarɨna yagaaibɨraizɨka ge ge dɨza yɨvanɨgasajɨ yɨvanɨgasara Gotɨyarɨ kudapɨjɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'nanya sa wɨmarasɨ'nadelyɨra.

Sare kɨrɨ' Kuryai Tewaanyarɨna yagaaibɨraizɨka wɨdɨvanɨgasa yuyagaa' Gotɨyai mumarasɨ'nyɨ yadelyɨra. Aawa. Kurya Tewaanyarɨna bɨrala sabwina yɨwetawakya sabwi yuyagaa' yuyagaa' waragothevulyɨra. Sabwi Gotɨyai mamarasɨ'nyɨ yadelyɨra!” wɨdɨna ya'.
Jizaazarɨna “Yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Gotɨyare Kuryai kɨnɨnnakei mɨka,” dɨnesa'na Jizaazai sara wɨda'.
Sagaa' Jizaazarɨ ganaangesɨ gahwaalaangerajɨ bi'ma'na. Mi'na bi'ma'na yeva angevɨ mwasawɨ daaveva gamɨnyɨna pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘Gɨmɨjɨyarajɨ gwaangesɨ mwaaihava,’ duthaawila!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' kwala bwa'naanya' gamɨnyaba wɨlamwaaleva wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa! Gwaangesɨ ja'mwerajɨ ja'mwejɨ sa mwasaba bamwaaleva gɨmɨnyɨna jaka dɨvanɨga'.”
Jizaazai wɨ'naka ma'maa'na “Nɨnnya nɨwaa' berɨvaka? Nyɨgwaalaangera bewaraavaka?”
Wɨdaka gamɨnyaba bamwaihwodapiyangɨ tɨnna wanganaka wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi! Dathara nɨwaasɨ nyɨgwaalaangerajɨ mwaaiha'.
A'mwe pwara kwara Gotɨyai wɨdɨnɨke' sara yɨvanɨgasara sahwara nɨwaasɨ nyɨgwaalaangerajɨ nyɨnyaabulaangejɨ mwaaihava.”

Pɨgaa' Jizaazai aalɨbumaangebaarɨ gaai wɨjɨwaakɨna. Wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaasɨ kwala yɨ'bwa'nemwaalesa'na sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaina kya' sɨpɨya' aalyavɨ a'ba yɨla'na yadɨsɨ kwala bwa'naanya yuya aalɨbumaangebaarɨ mwaalɨna.
Sara mwaalɨna yadapi Jizaazai wɨjɨwaakya kwalaalya kumɨnyɨne'na yagaala ke'ba'na wɨdɨna ya'
“Dɨnyu'nyɨla! Yɨthaanyi, pɨgaa' a'mwe witɨzɨla pɨraihɨrakya'nei kaanna wɨna ya'.
Wawaka gannya wawɨnyavɨ sɨla kavɨraihɨraka' sɨla pɨnɨ tu'maangeba bwalaraawɨna kya' yusara bamaranyɨna ye'.
Pɨba amwi sɨla naangejɨ' wa'dɨ'nyɨ a'ba kwaaka maalɨkejɨ' wa'dɨ'nyɨyaba sɨla pɨnɨ pɨraihɨrakake witɨzɨla yarai yɨrɨ'na ya'.
Yɨrɨ'na kya' gannya mɨwɨrinya naanga magɨri kya' nyɨla naanga wɨdɨna yakegaa' yawaka baihinyɨna yaka yuya balɨna ya'.
Kwaakevɨ lannake wa'dɨsɨ a'ba sɨla pɨnɨ pɨraihɨrakake yɨrɨ'na kya' lannake kɨnɨjɨ yɨrɨ'na yaka naanga gɨrina yaka kayaaka galadathɨwanna kya' kurɨjɨrɨka dɨna yaka gamɨre sɨla mi'nyɨ ya'.

Sɨla pɨnɨ kwaaka tewaanyavɨ kavɨraihɨraka' sɨla sa tewaanya yɨrɨ'na yaka naanga gɨrina, sɨla tewaanya yɨ'nyɨna ya'. Yɨ'nyɨna yake pɨnɨ sɨla pɨrɨvɨdaa'nyɨ kɨbawe (30) yɨ'nyɨna ya'. Sɨla pɨnɨ sɨla pɨrɨvɨdaa'nyɨ naanga kɨbawe (60) yɨ'nyɨna ya'. Sɨla pɨnɨ sɨla pɨrɨvɨdaa'nyɨ naanga (100) yɨ'nyɨna ya',” sara wɨdɨna ya' Jizaazai.
Yagaala ke'ba'na mi'na wɨdaka Jizaazai wɨdɨna ya' “Kadɨ'nakeinyɨ daakajɨ nayaa dɨnyu'nana!”
A'mwe kwala bwa'naanya mena wɨna yesagaa' Jizaazare atɨraai yaka sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraai sarajɨ a'mwera gamɨjɨ mwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ sa Jizaazarɨ yɨwaara'na “Yagaala ke'ba'na dɨwaanya' dɨnejɨwaakya!”

Sara yɨwaara'na kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Yagaala nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya' Gotɨyai maremwaaide'ne' Gotɨyai yɨhɨzɨwaainɨwaka. A'mwe pwara mwasɨlaanyara yagaala yuya ke'ba'nanya gave pɨrɨvɨna wɨ'nɨvanɨga'.
Sa'na yɨma'nya'ne' dɨnɨkesɨra.
Tɨnna sara wangadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' sɨmunya myawɨranganyɨvanɨga'.
Kadɨka sara wɨ'nadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' sɨmunya myawɨramaarivanɨga'.
Yawɨrapɨjɨ mudɨkebwi yawɨramaapɨjɨ kwajɨ
Gotɨyai kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwi kamarasɨ'nadɨka!
Sai wɨdɨna “Yagaala ke'ba'nanya sa' myawɨryijɨwaava? Yagaala sa' myawɨri yeva yagaala ke'ba'nanya pɨnɨ gara jawɨryideihɨlaka?
A'mwei yɨhɨthɨwei yɨsɨla pɨraihɨrakakei Gotɨyare yagaala wɨjɨwaakadelyɨra.
Sɨla pɨnɨ tu'maangevɨ pɨraihɨrakake bwalaraawɨna kya' yusara maranyɨna yeta pwara Gotɨyare yagaala ku'napɨjɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' Saataanɨ yarai bɨna yojɨ yagaala wɨ'nɨpɨja' yarai marasɨ'na yadengɨra.
Sɨla amwi wa'dɨsɨ kwaaka maalɨkejɨkɨ yɨsɨla pɨraihɨrakake pwara sabaaibɨ' Gotɨyare yagaala yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨlaaya'na wɨ'nyɨna yapɨjɨ
kumɨ sara dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakera mamwaalyɨ. Aawa. Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' a'mwera Gotɨyare yagaalya'na maanga wɨdɨna, taanginya wina kyapɨjɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' Gotɨyarɨna yagalya'ma'na yɨpɨ'dengɨra.
Kwaakevɨ lannake wa'dɨsɨ sɨla pɨnɨ pɨraihɨrakake pwara Gotɨyare yagaala nayaa wɨ'nyɨna yɨpɨ'dengɨra.

A'mwe sara Kwaaka davakɨna yawɨ'na, nɨgwɨlalaakenna yawɨ'na, gɨlyɨvɨta naangenna yawɨ'dɨvɨsara sara yɨpɨ'de'na Gotɨyare yagaalya' kayaaka galadathɨwanna kyojɨ a'mwera navɨka mwaaipɨjara Gotɨyare yagaala navɨka yɨpɨ'dere waryaanyara.

Kwaaka tewaanyavɨ sɨla pɨnɨ pɨraihɨrakake pwara Gotɨyare yagaala nayaa wɨ'nyɨna, daapɨna yɨpɨ'dengɨra. A'mwe sara Gotɨyarɨne tewaanya yɨpɨ'derera. Pwara tewaanya kɨbawe (30) yɨpɨ'de, pwara tewaanya naanga kɨbawe (60) yɨpɨ'de. Pwara tewaanya naanga (100) yɨpɨ'desɨra.”

Sagaa' sai wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwai laamuyai maa'gulya' marirɨ'mwagakɨnɨkerɨ lɨka marulyakadei daaka! Nabaai se warya'ne yɨ'bɨnya dalaangevɨ laamuyai lɨka marulyakadei daaka! Aawa. Yɨ'bɨnyavɨ yɨlakade'nesɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨre yagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' lɨka yulya'nɨke' dɨvi nayaa yɨbwarɨdaakwadesɨ. Dahaa' wɨjɨwaakɨyagaala wɨdadɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' bwakakɨnɨke' a'mwera myawɨrivanɨgasa' ‘Dɨvi ku'maayaba yɨma'naabana!’ dena bwakake'nanyɨ.
Kadɨ'nakeinyɨ daakajɨ nayaa du'nana!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨgasa' nayaa jawɨrila! Yawɨbwasa' dɨrɨvɨkɨ'de' sa' gɨrɨvɨkɨradesɨ. Nabaai pɨrɨ' gye'mwagahɨzaavadesɨ.

Sare' dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe pwai ‘Jizaazare yagaala waburya nyɨwaka! Wɨ'nɨma!’ kadozɨ Gotɨyai yagaala pɨnɨ wɨjɨwaakadelyɨra. Pwai ‘Jizaazare yagaalya taanga nyɨwaka. Waramaryana!’ dazai Gotɨyare yagaalya myawɨri yajai nɨmɨre yagaalya' wasɨ'najarɨ Gotɨyai yagaala pɨnɨ mujɨwaaki yadelyɨra.”
Yagaala pɨrɨ' wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' naanga yɨma'nya'ne'na daresɨ. A'mwei wawɨnyavɨ sɨla pɨraihɨrakadevaaibɨsasɨ.
Pɨraihɨrakadevɨ a'mwei sawɨsavɨ se wa'da yɨrɨka pu'daasɨyavɨ dɨkaa'na yada navɨka mwaaidɨ'nyɨ sɨla pɨraihɨrakadengɨdaa'nyɨ bilyɨrɨ'na. Bilyɨrɨ'na yadevɨ naanga sara bilyɨrɨ'daa'nyɨya'na myawɨri.
Kwaaka gamɨ savɨdaasɨ yɨlaabɨna. Sɨnnawɨ witɨya maalɨke bilyɨrɨ'na, dɨvi purɨrya yɨ'nyɨna, dɨvi sɨla yawaka yɨna yadesɨ.

A'mwei dara wangade' ‘Yawaka mi'na yɨwake' daaka!’ dada yɨme'nya'bɨ' kwaari'mata yadɨ'mwagakɨnɨkesɨ marawɨdɨlavamaa'na yade sɨla maaryagaa'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' naanga yɨma'nya'ne'na sahɨrɨsɨra. Sare'na a'mwera myawɨryarera.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide'na be yagaala yɨhɨzɨwaakɨjɨwana? Sa'na ke'ba'nanya berɨvɨ wakaadevaka?

Darebaaibɨsasɨ. Gotɨyai maremwaaide' sɨnnawɨ maalɨka warɨna, dɨvi naanga yɨma'nya'ne'na yɨsɨ' maazɨtetɨ wo'nɨkikɨne sɨla maazɨtetɨ maalɨkesɨra. Yuya pɨnɨ Kwaakevakɨ naangengɨra. Yɨsɨ' maazɨtetɨ aranya naange'bɨsɨkɨra.

Yɨsɨla maalɨka sa' pwai kwaakevɨ maraburɨnna yada yɨsɨla maalɨtaayamɨlɨkɨdaa'nyɨ yɨsɨ' yɨrɨ'na yada naanga gɨrina yada sɨgya naange' waayadɨ'nyɨ yutara sɨgunyavɨyara gamɨre taanyangɨ arɨta yɨlyalaanna yadɨvɨ' kɨma'nyawɨ mwaaidɨvɨsare. Gotɨyai maremwaaide' sahɨrɨsɨra.”
Jizaazai yawɨ'na “Kumɨre yawɨsa navɨla'mudɨka! Nayaa yawɨpɨnebaaibɨ' wɨjɨwaakɨma!” daka ke'ba'nanya kwalaalyangɨ gamɨre yagaala wɨdɨna.
Wɨdɨna yakevɨ a'mweraavɨ ke'ba'nanyanna wɨdɨna. Kɨrɨ' kɨma'nyawɨ gannya gaveraavɨ aangyagaala nayaa wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'.
Yɨrɨka savɨ nyɨla kabwalaawa' aalɨbumaangevɨ Jizaazai gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Aalɨbunya davɨ kengihɨrɨ ga'makwawaana!”
Wɨdɨna kya' kwala naangengɨ yagalya'ma'na yeva gamɨrera sɨpɨyavɨ Jizaazai wɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaina kye' gamɨ kwarɨjɨ makuna ya'. Nabaai sɨpɨya pɨnɨ aalyavɨ yɨlarake wɨna ye'.

Kaanna kaanna wodaapi yɨhu'maanarya' kya' aalɨmavajɨnaaka sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlawɨresɨ'naabɨna kya' sɨpɨyavɨ aalya buladɨ'nyɨna ya'. Aalya naange' buladɨ'nyɨna kya' gamɨrera dara wanganesa' “O, we', nemɨ balaajɨwona!”

Deva Jizaazai sɨpɨyavɨ lɨkimagɨ mwaalakei dɨhaihɨsavɨ se warakerɨ. Deva dɨthɨkavɨmwaaihɨna yeva yarai wɨdɨna “Aaka, Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, nemɨ yarai nyɨwawaadɨka! Nemɨnyɨna ‘Nabaipɨka!’ myawɨrijɨvanɨgɨ?”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai dɨkaa'na yaka yɨhusavɨ maanga wɨdaka “Mi'nanyɨra,” aalyavɨ wɨdɨna “Aalya'gɨ jaka madɨnna! Kave warɨna ja!” Wɨdɨna yakevɨ yɨhu'maanarya' mi'na muda'na kya' aalya' kave warɨna ya'.
Aalya' kave warɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Lɨka baa'na yɨvanɨga'! Gotɨyarɨ malɨmwagyɨvanɨga' lɨka yɨwaasa'!”
Gamɨrera sara wanganeva lɨka naanga yeva dɨne' “Yɨhusasɨ aalyasɨ sawaai gamɨre yagaalya' wɨ'nɨwaalya' be a'mwelaka!”
Aalɨbunya pimagɨnna A'mwe Geraaza mwaalyara mwaaidapɨjɨyabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye'
sahwai sɨpɨyavɨdaa'nyɨ walamwaaina yadɨ'nyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' a'mwe pwai simaanga gɨlaaya wakesabadaa'nyai yɨmaka widei gamɨnyɨna wɨjɨma'naabɨna ya'.
A'mwe sai yuyagaa' gɨlaaya wakesaba mwaalakelyɨ. A'mwe aane pwai kwai gamɨnyɨ senɨyabaalyɨ wɨla mavwɨyɨ yannei.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kwalaalyagaa' a'mwera senɨyabara maareva asɨraarɨ wɨla pwekɨpwekya sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ wɨla pwekɨpwekya kye' gamɨ sai asɨraarɨ wɨla pwekɨnɨke galayesɨwɨ'na yaka sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ wɨla pwɨyɨnɨke sɨlyalyɨ lɨvatamayesɨ'nyɨna ya'. Sare' aane pwai kwai dɨragɨnnakei sahwarɨ madathɨvalyɨ yannelyɨ.
Yuyagaa' yɨrɨkevɨ sawɨsavɨ gɨlaaya wakadɨvɨsabajɨ mugunyabajɨ kaanya yamaryada jaka naanga dada gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨ sɨlyajɨ lɨvadaidaarivainyɨna ya' yɨmaka widei.
Sai saamɨnyabadaa'nyɨ daavakei Jizaazarɨ tɨnna wanganakegaa' yarai kaanyave'na walyaabɨna yaka “Sahwai naangelyɨ,” daka gamɨnyawɨ kwadaai gɨlaka
jaka naanga wɨdɨna “Jizaazai, Gotɨyai Sɨgunyavɨ munya ke'mwɨ mwaaidereigɨ midaaka! Nɨmɨnyɨna berɨ' jɨzɨwaana? Gotɨyarɨne'na naange' gɨthɨvanɨge. Daanga manyɨjaavɨnnera! Mala manyɨradɨnnera!”
Sare' dare'nesɨ, Jizaazai “Yɨmakaihi, a'mwere munyɨkɨdaa'nyɨ dɨwila!” wɨdake'na.
Sai yɨwaara'na yawalyaadɨ' “Gɨmɨnyɨne yaya' berɨvaka?” Yɨwaara'na yawalyaadɨke' yɨmaka widei wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨne yaya' Kwala Naangeinyɨ. Sare' nemɨ kwala naangeina mwaaiho'nanyɨ.”
Sara wɨdaka yagaala dɨragɨnna dɨza ya' “Kwaaka davɨdaasɨ yɨmakeraavɨ mudaasɨnna!”
Mugunya sakyavɨ yaawaryara kwala naanga nɨdaa'nyɨna yadaapɨjɨ
yɨmakera dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Yaawaryaraayabanna dɨnedaasa! Yaawaryaraavɨre munyɨkaavɨ wimɨlaade'na dɨnedaasa!”

Yɨmakera sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai “Yo, dɨwila!” Wɨdɨna kya' yɨmakera a'mwerɨdaa'nyɨ bwalyuna yeva yaawaryaraavɨ wɨlɨna kye' yaawaryara kwala naanga (2,000) mwaaidapiyara davaanyavɨ yarai walaawɨna yeva aalɨbunyavɨ wala'na yeva yuyara balɨna ye'.

Saba yaawaryaraavɨ yɨ'dɨvaidɨvɨsara dara wanganesa' “O, akai, nemɨre yaawaryara mena davaimwaava!” Deva yarai wɨna yɨna yeva angebajɨ wawɨnyangɨjɨ saraavɨ wɨde' yagaala sa'. Wɨdesa'na a'mwera dɨnyɨna “Sara yɨma'nɨwake' nemɨ walyanganaana!” dɨneva walyaabɨna.
Jizaazaryawɨnna walyaabɨna yeva dara wanganesa' “A'mwei kwaabɨhannya marira'nakei sɨduta nayaa yawɨ'manɨkei kɨgaa' yɨmaka kwalaalyara mwaalesai tewaanyai damwaalɨka!” Deva lɨka naanga ye'.
Lɨka kye' a'mwera yuya wanganesara mudɨkeraavɨ yɨmaka wɨlakerɨ sara yɨma'nakevɨnajɨ yaawaryaraavɨnajɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Sara wɨjɨwaakɨna kye' sabanyara sarɨ naanga wɨdɨna “Nemɨreba davɨ namwaaidɨka! Dɨwona!”
Wɨdɨna yesavɨ sai sɨpɨyavɨ yɨladaa'dɨ'nyɨ yɨmaka wɨlakei naange' widaanganna “ ‘Gɨmɨjɨ mwaaimuneinyɨ wɨma!’ gɨthɨwa.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Aawa. Sare kɨrɨ' gɨnnya angevɨna wawa'gɨzɨ gɨnnya jɨlɨkaimɨraayangɨ Gotɨyai sara nayaa gyɨwakenna gɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyare kale yɨwake'na sara duzɨwaakya!”
Wɨdɨna yake'na sai kaanna wɨna yaka Angaba Atɨraalyaba saba Jizaazai gamɨnyɨna sara yakenna sara kujɨwaaka' a'mwe yuyara atɨka maru'na'na yɨna ye'.
Jizaazai sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaidɨsɨ ayɨhɨrɨna sɨpɨya' ayɨna makuna yakegaa' gamɨnyawɨnna kwala bwa'naanya naange' yɨ'bwa'namwaaina yadapi sai aalɨbumaangevɨ mwaalɨna.
Mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ Lotuangevɨ maremwaaide pwai Jaarazai wo'nɨkei bwanganna yaka gamɨre sɨvɨlyaraaryaba kwadaai gɨlɨna yaka
yagaala dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Nɨnnya taaya nabalɨnake' balade'na. ‘ “Tewaanya' yɨma'nana! Gaala mwaalana!” da'mujɨ “Nɨmɨre asɨraai dathɨwagaawɨma!” ’ da'gi dulaama!”
A'mwei sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨjɨ wawagi. Kaanya wodaakɨlyɨ kwala naange' wawesara gamɨnyawɨ galyɨtata ye'.
Galyɨtata kye' a'mwe nalaavɨnake' mwaalake' baizaaka ma'nade' yuyagaa' kwarame atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨwaalya wavɨla'nɨke' mwaalakesɨra nalaavɨnake'.

Nalaaya maalɨka wa'dɨ'nyɨ nalaavɨnakevɨ dotarava yaamɨjɨ yɨya kye' daanga naanga wɨvɨnake'. Gamɨre yuyajɨya mena wɨjaavɨna yake'. Tewaanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mi wiake'. Aawa. A'mwe nɨgwɨmaaya' sɨnnawɨ nalaaya maalɨke' kɨnɨnnake', sagaa' nalaaya naange' kɨnɨnnake'.
Sare' Jizaazarɨne'na wɨ'naka kwala naangevɨ dusɨdaa'nyɨ lɨka yulyaraabɨna yaka gamɨre kwaabɨyɨvɨsavɨ yɨme'nyɨna.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. “Gamɨre kwaabɨyɨvɨta gavevɨ yɨme'nɨwɨja' nɨmɨ tewaanya yɨma'nɨma!” dake'nanyɨ.
Yɨme'nya'bɨ' kurabala yaalɨka mi'na yɨna. Mi'na yɨna yaka dara wanganake' “Nɨmɨre nabalya' mi'na daaka!”
Sare' yɨlaaya kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' Jizaazai sahwai dara wanganake' “Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya' nyalyɨwake' daaka!” Dakegaa' kwala naangevɨ yarai gɨnyɨwannaka wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre kwaabɨyɨvɨsavɨ aai yɨme'nɨwaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' “Kwala bwa'naanya datha' gɨmɨnyɨ galyɨtata yɨvanɨgasa'na gara nedɨwaa? ‘Aai yɨme'nɨwa'?’ ” wɨde' gamɨrera.
Wɨdesa' sahwai sare' yake' tɨnna wanganya'nei tɨnna wanganaasɨna.
Wanganasadaa'nyɨ a'mwe sa' “Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' tewaanya' yɨma'nɨwaka,” daka lɨka yɨna, bɨ'bɨta yaka gamɨnyabanna bula'na yaka yuya sanna wɨdɨna.
Yuya sanna wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Nyɨraavɨ, nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa yawɨralɨmwamwaanya'na gɨmɨ maamɨdarya yɨma'nɨwaa. Gɨmɨre kɨlaake' kuna warade' kwaamu'na dɨmwaihwode'gɨnyɨ,” wɨdɨna ya'.

Kuna wɨdɨna yadaa'nyɨ Lotuangevɨ maremwaaiderera angevɨdaasɨ bwalyuna yeva kaanna bɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya taaya' mena baimwaka. Gotɨyare yagaala wɨjɨwaakaderɨ wawɨnya naanga kuna minna! Taanga wɨjaavanɨgɨnya' kabaimwakɨra.”
Sahwara wɨdadaapi Jizaazai yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nada Lotuangevɨ maremwaaiderɨ wɨdɨna “Lɨka minna! Nɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwana!”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka a'mwe pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ dɨmwaalyi! Nɨmɨjɨ Pitalyɨ Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨ Jemɨzare gya'mwelyɨ gave saina wawaana! Aane pwaigɨ kwaigɨ aawa.”
Wɨdɨna yaka kaanna wɨna yeva Lotuangevɨ maremwaaidere angevɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' dara wanganake' “A'mwemɨlɨka yagaala naanga bazɨwodaapi pwara kɨnna dathɨvanɨgava! Jakɨnna dathɨvanɨgava!”
Mi'na wanganaka angevɨ wɨlɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Yagaala naangesɨ jakɨnnyasɨ baa'na dɨvanɨgava! Taaya' balya myɨwa'. Aawa. Se warɨ'.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨnyɨna mayagaaijɨka kamaregye' kɨrɨ' sahwai yuyaraavɨ mwasawɨnna maratɨvatawaasɨna yaka taayavɨ ganaangesɨ ganɨmaangelyɨ gamɨnyawɨ mwaalesarajɨ sa makuna kya' taayayabanna wɨlɨna ye'.
Mi'na wɨlɨna kye' gɨlaayavɨ ata lɨmwanna yaka kunnya yagaala wɨdɨna ya' “Talitha kumi!” aangyagaala dɨna “ ‘Taaya'gɨ dɨthɨkaaka!’ gɨthɨwa.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' taaya' dɨkaa'na yaka kaanya dɨkavayamarina ya'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Taaya sa' kwarame atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraalya wavɨlavakesɨra. Kaanya dɨkavayamarina kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' atɨka kamaru'nare'
sai dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna ya' “Sarɨmɨ nayaa dɨnyu'nyɨla! Nɨmɨ yɨwe sa' a'mwe pwai kwai a'mwe pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nyu'nadɨka! Dahaa' taayavɨne wapaaya nya'ne dumaarila!”
Sabadaasɨ sai gannya angebanna wɨya'nei wɨna. Gamɨrera mɨdɨnna.

Gamɨre angebanna kyɨ'mava' Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakegaa' yɨma'nakegaa' Lotuangevɨ buladaa'na yakegaa' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sara wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara wɨ'neva atɨka maru'nareva dɨnyɨna “Yagaala daza' a'mwe dai gawɨ maa'mwaka! Bewai yɨwɨrivanɨka! Dɨragɨnya yɨya wɨ'nɨwa'do gamɨre asɨraalyɨ gara yɨwaka!

Kaa'madaayai midaaka! Maarɨyaa' gawaalɨ' midaaka! Jemɨzalyɨ Jozɨzalyɨ Juthaazalyɨ Saaimonɨjɨ saraavɨre kwɨya'mwei midaaka! Dava nemɨjɨya ganyaabulaanga damwaaihava! Nemɨjɨ avaalyalyɨ. A'mwe naangei mɨka,” dɨnyɨna ye'. Sara dɨnyɨna yeva Jizaazare sɨmunya myawɨri kye' sagaa' gamɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka davɨna.

Sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Pwara Gotɨyare wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyarɨne yaya' yɨlaaya makimanɨga'. Kɨrɨ' gamɨre kwaakeba mwaalyarajɨ kwɨya'mwerajɨ gannya angevɨ mwaaihasajɨ sa gamɨre yaya' mamakɨlyɨvanɨga'.”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka angeba saba dɨragɨnya ya'ne aane pɨnɨ kɨnɨ mya'. Kɨrɨ' nalaavɨnaka pwaina pwaina, pɨrɨ'na pɨrɨ'na ata kudathɨwaga' tewaanya mwaalɨna ye'.
Sara yesa'na dɨna “A'mwe kwalaalyara nɨmɨnyɨna manyɨlɨmwagyɨwaava!” Sara yesa'na maru'na'na ya'.
Sabanne angebanna wɨjɨwakamarina ya'.

Sara yakegaa' atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraalyara bɨna kye' “Nɨmɨre yagaalya'na a'mwe pwaraaihi pimagɨnna dɨwila! A'mwe pwaraaihi pimagɨnna dɨwila! A'mwe yuyaihi sana sana jɨla! Nɨmɨre dɨragɨnyabwi kyɨhɨzaava'mujɨ a'mwe yɨmaka widɨvɨsaraavɨ wanganapɨjɨ yɨmakeraavɨ gɨrɨ'nakeraavɨ duthaasideihɨlyɨ.
Tusavɨne gɨlyɨvɨta maayaihi yadisarɨkananyaihi dɨwila! Tɨka wapaaya, gɨlya', nɨgwɨgɨlyɨ' mamaapɨnera!
Aawa. Kwaari'masɨvɨla dɨvaazɨ'ma'nyɨla! Baazɨ'ma'nya pɨrɨwaai mabaazɨ'ma'nɨpɨnera! Sare'na yarai dɨwideihɨlyɨra.”
Nabaai gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Angebanna yɨ'mavaawapɨjɨ anga gave pɨrɨvɨ dɨmwaalyɨla! Wapaaya'na myɨrɨ'maranamaripɨnera! Anga gave saba se wapɨjavadaasɨ kaanna dɨwideihɨlyɨ.

Anga pɨbanyara ‘A'mweraaihi kaajɨla!’ mihɨza pwara ‘Kɨrɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨ'naana!’ mihɨza kwara kamwaalapɨjɨ kaanna wɨyagaa' ‘Anga gɨrɨkita'nanyababɨsaba midaaka!’ dɨna yakɨlyɨ tɨrya saraaihɨre sɨvɨla warojɨya purakɨrasɨ'na yakɨlyɨ kaanna dɨwide'na angebanyara kunnyabwi yawɨpɨ'derera. Sare' jalɨkurakya'nesɨ.”
Gamɨrera mi'na wɨ'neva pina pina yɨwɨnadaa'na yeva a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi mudɨkebwi jawɨramaarila!”
Sara wɨdɨna yesagaa' yɨmaka kwalaalyaraavɨ wɨdaasɨna yeva a'mwe nabalɨnakeraavɨ yɨsiwelivananya' mɨnyagɨnyangɨ dɨngɨna yeva tewaanya wɨmwaaihɨna ye' gamɨrera.

Yuyaba a'mwera gamɨ yakengɨ dɨnyɨdɨnya yadɨvɨsa'na pɨba maremwaaidei Erotɨyai dara wɨ'nake' “Sahwai nawɨ'nya jɨvanɨka!” Wɨ'nake' daresɨ. Pwara Jizaazarɨna dɨnyɨna “Gamɨ sai Jonɨnyɨra. Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei balaka Gotɨyai yɨdɨkaavaka savɨna kwaihwaainakei dɨragɨnya dɨvanɨgɨnya' maaraka tewaanya saza yɨvanɨkelyɨra.”
Sara dɨnyɨna kye' pwara dɨne' “Gamɨ sai Yɨlaajai kɨgaakuna balyaakelyɨra.” Dɨnesavɨ pwara dɨnyɨna “A'mwe sai wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'neva a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwakyaasarabɨsalyɨ.”
A'mwe pwara sana sana kadɨne' Erotɨyai wɨdɨna “Jonɨ sahwalyɨra. A'mwerɨ wɨde ‘A'mwe Jonɨmɨ tɨlɨnnya' doripuka!’ Kude balakei dahaa' tewaanya mwaalɨ',” wɨda'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwai Erotɨyaaza' gya'mwe Pilipɨmɨre balaanga' kwala maara'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jonɨ wɨdɨna “Ja'mwere a'mwe' baa'na ma'mwaana! Sabwina Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyabwi galazekɨvaimwaa,” wɨdɨna.

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Erotɨyaazavɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ Erotɨyai Erotɨyaazavɨ yɨlaaya maryaka yake'na Erotɨyai a'mweraavɨ kudaasa' Jonɨmɨ wɨla marirakɨna yeva kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ye'. Jonɨ kalavuzangevɨ kamwaala' Erotɨyaazavɨ sɨnna tɨka kuna wɨda'daa'nyɨ “Jonɨmɨ tamakɨma!” dada Erotɨyarɨ kuda' “Aawa,” wɨdɨna.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sai dɨna “Jonɨ a'mwe naangelyɨra. Sahwai yɨda'maraangei. Tewaanyaburɨ mwaaidei,” daka “Erotɨyaaza' naramakadɨka!” daka Jonɨmɨ kalavuzangevɨ nayaa maremwaaina. Maremwaaina yakei Jonɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨ'nada sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'na yada yɨlaaya ya'.

Pɨgaa' Erotɨyaazavɨnegaa' yɨma'nakegaa' Erotɨyai daka “Nɨwaa' nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaarakegaa' jɨma'nɨwaka!” daka gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Yarala, dahaa' Kwaaka maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta naangerajɨ Galɨli mwaalya naangerajɨ saraavɨna tɨka munne jovɨrayɨla dahaa' sagaaka!” Wɨdɨna kya' Erotɨyaaza' dara wanganake' “Dahaa' Jonɨmɨre balyagaa' daaka!”

Sara kada' tɨka munne nadaapi Erotɨyaazavɨre garaavaanga' bulaawɨna yaka kwarame yɨna. Taaya' kwarame sara kya' Erotɨyalyɨ a'mwerari yɨlaaya yɨna. Yɨlaaya yɨna kye' Erotɨyai taayavɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘Sare nyɨjaama!’ kanyɨda'gɨzɨ gɨzaavɨdeinyɨra.
Nebulya' gɨthɨwa ‘Nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta naange warɨ'. Gɨlyɨvɨta sa Kingɨyainyɨreba yune tɨnnyabanna gɨzaapalyɨdeinyɨ,’ ” wɨdɨna.
Sara wɨdake' walyuna yaka ganaangevɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ berɨ'na wɨdɨjɨwana?”
“ ‘Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadere mɨnyagɨnya' dɨnyɨmaryaama!’ sara duthana!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' taaya sa' yarai bulaawɨna yaka Erotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna “Dara yawɨ'manɨge. Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadere mɨnyagɨnya' maara'gɨzɨ paletɨyavɨ waka'gɨzɨ yarai nyɨjaama!”
Wɨdakevɨ Erotɨyai kale naanga wiadaa'nyɨ “Nebulya' gɨthɨwa,” wɨdake'na nabaai tɨka munne nesara sara wɨ'nesa'na “ ‘Aala,’ nudɨwɨdɨka!” daka
yɨme'nya'bɨ' damerɨ wɨdaasa' “Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadere mɨnyagɨnya' dalamaralɨngipuramaraawa!” Wɨdaasakei walyuna yaka kalavuzangevɨ Jonɨmɨre tɨlɨnnya' woripu'na yaka
mɨnyagɨnya' paletɨyavɨ wakɨna yaka makulaabaka taayavɨna bulawɨjaava'. Kabulawɨjaava' taaya' ganaangevɨna wɨjaavɨna.
Sagaa' Jonɨmɨrera dara wɨ'nesa' “We', Jonɨ mena davaimwaka!” Deva kaanna wɨna yeva kɨlaakejɨ' maarɨna yeva kaanna makwaweva simaangevɨ wakɨna ye'.
Jizaazai wɨdasaawakera yagalaaweva ayɨna beva gamɨnyɨ kumɨ yuya sara yesa'na nabaai wɨjɨwaakesa'na wɨdɨna.
Wɨdɨna yesara mwaaidapi kwalaalyara bulawɨ'nyaagaidɨvɨ' wodaapi pwara bulawɨ'nyɨna yadaapi Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerajɨ wapaaya nya'negaa' mwarina.

Wapaaya nya'negaa' mwari yake'na gannyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Gaveina a'mwera maayawɨnna kwawaajɨ pɨgaa' kwazaaka dɨmwaalyɨla!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwara gavera sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaidapi pɨwɨ a'mwera maayawɨnna makuna ya'.

Makuna yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara tɨnna wanganeva “Jizaazai gamɨrerari damakuvanɨka!” deva anga yuyabanyara aalɨbumaangevɨ kaanyave'na kaanyave'na sahwaraavɨ wavɨlaveva a'mwera maayabanna yɨ'ma'na ye'.

Yɨ'ma'na yevera aalɨbumaangevɨ mwaaidapi gamɨ kwaakevakɨ bwalamwaaina yaka dara wanganake' “Kwala bwa'naanya naange' daaka!” Daka “O, a'mwe dara a'mwe da jɨlɨkyaawarya sipɨzipɨya yɨ'dɨvaidei maaya yaasɨwa'na mwaaihava.” Sara dɨna yake'na gamɨre kale wiadaa'nyɨ yagaala kwalaalya gaai wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna ya'.
Wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna kya' sawɨtɨrɨnyaburɨ gamɨrera bɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Sawɨsaburɨ menanyɨra.
Dava anga mamannyɨka dava a'mweraavɨ duthana! ‘Davadaasaihi, angeburajɨ wawɨnyaba anga mannɨkebajɨ wawopɨjɨ sarɨmɨnne wapaaya nya'neihi dɨnyide dɨmubyɨla!’”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ saihi wapaaya dumaarila!” Wɨdɨna kya' “Nemɨ gara yaajɨwo? Nɨgwia kwalaalya (200 kinaaya) maraajɨ kwajɨ gɨrɨkula mubaawɨna yawaajɨ a'mwe yuyara wapaaya maalɨka kanɨpɨdɨka!” wɨdɨna gamɨrera.
“Wapaaya gara gara warɨ'? Danganamarila!” wɨdɨna. Sai wɨdɨna yakera tɨnna wanganamaryaaweva ayawɨnna beva wɨdɨna “Gɨrɨkula dawaai dawaai da' jawɨnya pwaraalyɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨ wangamwona,” buthe' gamɨnyɨ.
Buthɨna kye' a'mwe sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kurɨvaarɨyangɨ yuyaraavɨ nayaa geva geva jawɨbwaramwaaihila!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' pɨba kumɨ kwala naanga (100) mwaalɨna, pɨba kwala naanga (50) mwaalɨna, sana sana ye'.

Sana sana mwaalɨna kye' Jizaazai gɨrɨkula atɨlya dazajɨ jawɨnya pwaraalyɨ maaraka sɨgunyavina maranganaka Gotɨyarɨna “Su! Wapaaya danna gɨmɨre yaya' makimwa,” wɨdaka gɨrɨkula gunyɨna gunyɨna yaka gamɨreraavɨna wɨmaarina a'mwe kwala naanga mwaaidapɨjɨyaraavɨna yanga wɨmuja'ne. Nabaai jawɨnya pwaraai mɨlɨkɨna mɨlɨkɨna yaka yuyaraavɨna yanga jaapalawɨmuda'.
Kajaapalawɨmuda' tɨka nyɨna kye' munya yunebanna kwina'
pɨnɨ warɨna nɨganakesa warɨna kya' gamɨrera maarɨna yeva jawɨnya sara nɨganaketa maarɨna yeva gɨlya atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pukaalyangɨ maramihyeku'na ye'.
Wapaaya nesamɨlɨkaavɨdaasara a'mwe gavera (5000) paaivɨ taawɨzanɨyara mwaaleva nyɨna ye' wapaaya.

Yɨme'nya'bɨ' gannyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Yarala, sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaalapɨjɨ angeba Betɨzaaitha aalɨbunyavɨ pimagɨ mannɨkebanna dɨwideihɨlyɨra. Wodaapɨjɨ kwala bwa'naanya davɨ wɨdɨdehaa'nanyɨ ‘Sarɨnnya angengɨ dɨwila!’ Dɨvi nɨmɨ wɨlaabɨdera.”
Sara wɨdakera wɨna kye' kwala bwa'naanyavɨ “Tewaanya dɨwila!” wɨdaka “Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨma!” daka mugunyangɨ yɨlaawɨna ya'.
Yɨlaawɨna kya' sawɨsa' kajɨnna' gamɨrera sɨpɨyavɨ mwaaidapi aalɨbunyavɨ tɨnnyaba sɨpɨya' wɨla'dɨ'nyɨ gavei kwaakevakɨ mwaalɨna.

Mwaalɨna yakei wanganake' “O, yɨhuta naange' tɨvaata'mwake'na nɨmɨrera aalyavɨ yɨsɨkari yarai yarai makwɨya yadaapi sɨpɨya' kavena damakuvanɨka!” Daka yɨrɨkunyagaa' aalɨbunyavɨ a'ba ga'nɨguna yaka sɨpɨya' wa'dɨsɨyaba “Nɨmɨreraavɨ wavɨlavɨma!” yawɨ'na.
Yawɨ'na yakei aalyavɨ a'ba ga'nɨguna yakerɨ gamɨrera wanganeva “Ai, gɨlaayai daaka!” deva “Ewɨ,” jaka wɨdɨna.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Yuyara gamɨnyɨna tɨnna wanganna yadɨvɨ' lɨka naanga yɨna. “Ewɨ,” jaka wɨdɨna kye' yɨme'nya'bɨ' wɨdɨna “Dɨragɨnna dɨmwaalyɨla! Nɨmɨnyɨra. Lɨka mipɨnera!”
Sara wɨdɨna yakei sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kya' yɨhusa' mi. Yɨhusa' mi kya' gamɨrera kumɨ sara tɨnna banganakulɨna ye'. Atɨka naanga maru'na'na ye'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gamɨre dɨragɨnya'na myawɨri ye'. Sahwai wapaaya gunyadaa'nyɨ wapaaya kwalaalya yɨma'nyɨna yakevɨ wanganyawalyaadaasara myawɨri ye'. Aawa.
Aalɨbunyavɨ ga'makuna yeva Kwaaka Ganezaaretɨna yɨ'mavaaweva sɨpɨya' wɨla marirakɨna ye'.
Marirakɨna yeva sɨpɨyavɨdaasara waidavadaapi yɨme'nya'bɨ' a'mwe a'mwera gamɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganeva
kaanyave'na waweva anga yuya dangɨ a'mwe nabalɨnakeraavɨ maramarina. Sai mwaaidɨsɨyabanna yɨ'bɨnnakeraavɨ makabɨna “O sahɨbanna damwaalɨka!” deva sahɨbanna makabɨna.

Sahwai anga naanga kɨba anga maalɨka pɨba gazabazaba wɨlyɨrɨ'maa'na kya' kumɨ wapemubya yadɨvɨsabanna nabalɨnakeraavɨ makabɨna ye'. Makabɨna yeva yagaala naanga wɨdɨna “Nabalɨnakera gɨmɨre kwaabɨhannyavɨ maangebaarɨ yɨme'nyɨna yɨpɨka!” deva wɨdɨna kye' nabalɨnakera gamɨre kwaabɨhannyavɨ yɨme'nyɨna yeva yuya sahwara tewaanya mwaalɨna ye' nabalɨnakera.
A'mwe Perɨzɨyarajɨ yagaaikɨwɨjara Jeruzaalemɨdaasara pwarajɨ sara gamɨnyawɨnna yɨbwaramakabɨna yeva
dara bwanganesa' “Gamɨre pwara ata gɨrɨkita'nanyara asangɨ aalya minyara wapaaya danɨvanɨgava!”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Perɨzɨyarajɨ Juya yuyarajɨ sara dɨnyɨna “Ne sɨnnyawɨnyara sara dɨnɨke'na nemɨ sara yaana!” Dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' asangɨ aalya minyara wapaaya nadɨvɨtara mɨ'.

Sara wapemubyasɨyara kunnya angevɨ wɨleva aalya minyevera wapaaya manyɨ ye'. Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrebwi kumɨre sɨmunyangɨdaasɨ maalɨkebwina mɨ'. Naangebulyɨ pɨburajɨ lɨmwadɨvɨ' “Nemɨre kuryara gɨrɨkita'nanya nyɨpɨdɨka!” deva kaapɨvananya maa'gula paletɨya aalya yɨna ye'.

Sara yadɨvɨsara Perɨzɨyarajɨ yagaaikɨwɨjarajɨ sara yɨkabɨna yeva yɨwaara'na “Gɨmɨrera ‘Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrebwi yaana!’ majara ata gɨrɨkita'nanyajɨ nɨvanɨga'. Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨreburɨ kaanya myamarivanɨga'. Aawa. Ata gɨrɨki'nakera wapaaya nɨvanɨga'. Sabwi be'na yɨvanɨgava?”
Tɨvi'na yɨwaara'na kye' wɨda' “Aazaayai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei pɨropetɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨna kwaasɨyabwi yadɨvɨsaihɨrɨna nayaa dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨra.
A'mwera nayaa maangi'na nyɨdɨvanɨgasa'
Kumɨre sɨmunyabwi menyaba warɨ'.
Gazare yɨlaaya nyɨdɨvanɨgasangɨ mu'nyɨvanɨge.
A'mweraavɨrebwi yaasɨwa'na wɨjɨwakadaapɨri
‘Gotɨyarebulyɨra,’ yawɨ'na yɨvanɨga'.
Sara dɨnɨkesɨra.
Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaaikɨwɨnya yagalya'ma'manɨgasa' a'mweraavɨrebwi nayaa lɨmwamanɨga'.”
Nabaai wɨdɨna “Nawɨ'nyɨna Gotɨyare yagaaikɨwɨnya wasɨ'na yadɨvɨ' sarɨnnyabwi mɨdɨnya'neihi yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨra. Be'na yɨvanɨgava!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Mozɨzai wɨjaa' ‘Gɨmaamaangelyɨ gwaangesɨ sayorɨ nayaa kadɨka dɨvada'galawɨ'nana!’ Nabaai ‘Pwai yuyagaa' ganɨmaangerɨna ganaangevɨna bɨrala yadei yuna balana!’
Mozɨzai sara wɨdɨna yaaka kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ dadɨvɨ' ‘Pwai wɨdaza' “Nɨmwai pwai nɨwaa' kɨrɨ' kamaaradɨke nɨmɨre Kovanɨya' warɨkengɨra.” ’ (Kovanɨya' yagaala sa' “Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaaya'neva dɨnɨke'.”)

Sara kudozɨ ‘Kovanɨya' mi'na waka'gɨzɨ gɨmaamaanga pwarɨna gwaanga kɨrɨvɨna mujaavɨnna!’ sarɨmɨ sara dakadɨvɨ' a'mwe sai navɨka mwaaladelyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' ‘Nemɨrebura nemɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨ wɨjɨwakaana!’
Sara dadɨvɨsa'na ‘Gotɨyai wɨjaake' gesɨra,’ yawɨ'dɨvɨtabaaibɨsasɨ. Nabaai avaalyabɨta kwalaalya sana sana yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨra.”
Sagaa' kwala bwa'naanyavɨ jaka ayɨna jɨvwaramaa'na yaka wɨdɨna “Yuyangihi, nyu'napi sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila!
Mwasɨmagɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwarɨ kulaabozɨ gɨrɨka yɨma'nannei mɨka. Aawa. Yuya a'mwe sare kusɨmagɨnyavɨdaasa kwalyaabozɨ gɨrɨka yɨma'nadengɨra.
A'mwei kadɨ'nakei nayaa wɨ'nana!”
Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ yagalya'mavaka angevɨ wɨlɨna yakegaa' gamɨrera yagaala ke'ba'nanya'na wɨdɨna.
Sara wɨdɨna kye' wɨdɨna “Nabaai pwarajɨ sarɨmɨjɨ sara myawɨrijɨwaava! ‘Yuya kamaranojɨ mwasɨmagɨnya a'mwerɨ kulaabozɨ gɨrɨka yɨma'nannei mɨka,’ myawɨrijɨwaava!
Wapaaya sa sɨmunyavɨ mulyɨ yade'nanyɨ. Aawa. Gamɨre sɨngwalɨkerɨ bwalaawɨna kyojɨ lɨka wɨrasɨ'na yadengɨra.” Sara wɨdake' “Tɨka wapaaya yuya kɨmaaka mɨka.”
Sai wɨdɨna “A'mwere kusawɨnyavɨdaasa' walyaabɨna kyojɨ sa' gɨrɨka yakadesɨra.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mweraavɨre sɨmunyavɨdaasɨ yawɨta kayaa'na naanga yɨna, gamɨ marɨdaakunyɨna, kuka yɨna, a'mwerɨ tamakɨna,

a'mwevɨ ata lɨmwanna, gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ wabarɨnna yɨna, yɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya'nebwi yɨna, kwaasɨ yɨna, jɨlɨkera yadɨvɨsabaaibɨ' yɨna, tɨganaarya yɨna, pwarɨna kwaasɨ yagaala dɨna, bɨrala yɨna, pihadɨka yɨna, yɨ yaasɨwa'yamarya yɨna yadɨvɨsangɨra.
Kayaa'nanya yuya davura kusawɨnyavɨdaa'nyɨ walyaabɨna, a'mwere sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walyaabɨna kyojɨ gɨrɨka yakɨna yadengɨra,” Jizaazai wɨdɨna ya'.

Sabadaasai angeba Taayaa sabannei wɨna. Anga saba Kwaaka Sɨrɨya mannɨkeba. Sai wɨna yakei “Aane pwai kwai aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nanyanganadɨka!” daka angevɨ kave mwaalɨna yada lɨka yulya'dɨ'nyɨ kɨrɨ' a'mwera dara wangane' “O, dava sahwai damwaalɨka!” Mi'na kade' lɨka myulyari yakelyɨ.
Yɨme'nya'bɨ' taaya' yɨmaka widevɨ ganaange' “Sahwai mwaalɨka,” wɨ'naka bɨna yaka gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraaryaba a'mwe sa' bularutawa'na ya'.
A'mwe sa' Gɨrikɨyagaala dade' Kwaaka Sɨrɨya mwaalya Pɨnɨzɨyaraavɨre' a'mwe sa' naanga yɨwaara'na “Nyɨraavaangavɨre munyɨkɨ yɨmakerɨ duthasaawadeigɨ daaka?”

Yɨwaara'na kya' Jizaazai Juyaraavɨ wɨgaimwadei wɨjɨwaakɨyagaala wɨdɨna “Sɨnnawɨ kaimɨraayangɨna wapaaya wɨjaavɨpɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ jɨlɨkeraavɨna kaimɨraayangɨre wapaaya namarasɨ'nɨpɨdɨka!” Sa'na wɨdake' sɨnnawɨ Juyaraavɨ wɨgaimwadelyɨra.

Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe sa' daka “Juya'nyɨ mɨka. Maave'nyɨra. Jɨlɨka sarabɨsa'nyɨ,” daka wɨdɨna “Yo, Naangeigɨ sa'na kaimɨraayangɨre wapepwaka kabwalaraawojɨ jɨlɨkera yɨ'bɨnyavɨ dalaangevɨ mwaalapɨjɨ maribwaranɨpɨ'derera.”
“Gɨmɨ nyɨdɨwaanyavɨna gɨnnya angebanna wawo'gɨzɨ taayavɨ dangadera. Dahaa' yɨmakai taayavɨre munyɨkɨdaa'nyɨ mena wɨwaka.”
A'mwe' wɨ'naka gannya angebanna wɨna kya' taaya' yɨ'bɨnyavɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨ dara wanganake' “Yɨmaka marawɨnaangɨ'dei mena davwalyuwaka!”
Anga Taayaa sabadaasai Saaithonɨ angeburɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka pina lavɨta'na yaka Atɨraalyaba angeburaavɨ gɨ'mavamaryaka aalɨbunya Galɨlina yɨ'ma'na ya'.
Yɨ'ma'na kya' gamɨnyawɨnna a'mwe pwara a'mwe kadɨkɨryai taalɨ'mabyarɨ jɨvwaramakabɨna yeva naanga wɨdɨna “Kadɨkɨryare mɨnyagɨnyavɨ ata dɨthathɨwana!”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' sahwai kadɨkɨryarɨ sangineba makuna kya' gaveraai mwaaidakɨlyɨ Jizaazai gamɨre kadɨkikaarɨ asɨraai tɨlavalɨmwaga'nyɨna yaka asɨrɨ maagwala yɨnyɨna yaka kadɨkɨryare taalɨsarɨ dathakɨna yaka
sɨgunyayɨna maranganaka sɨmudɨngwaimale yaka wɨdɨna Juyaraavɨre yagaalyavɨ “Epaata!” Yagaala sa' “Kadɨka dɨvaaso!” kadɨka tewaanya wɨ'nya'na dɨnɨkesɨ.
Wɨdɨna kya' kadɨkɨryare kadɨka tewaanya wɨ'nyɨna yaka gannya taalɨsalyɨ yagaala tewaanya dɨna sagaa'.

Kadɨkɨryai tewaanya mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Jizaazai a'mwe pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ yɨwe'na aane pwarɨ kwarɨ yagaala mudɨpɨnera!” wɨda' yagaala naanga. Dɨragɨnna sara wɨdake sa'na wɨdɨwɨja yesara dɨragɨnaanga sara ye'.
Pwara wɨ'neva atɨka maru'nareva “Sahwai yuyangɨ tewaanya yɨwakelyɨra. Kadɨkɨryara nayaa wɨ'nya'neraavɨ wɨmwaaihada taalɨ'mabyara nayaa wɨja'neraavɨ wɨmwaaihadei,” dɨne'.
Yɨrɨka sangɨ gamɨnyawɨnna kwala naange' yɨ'bwa'nyɨna yeva tɨka wapemaayara mwaaidapi Jizaazai gamɨreraavɨna jaka jɨvwaramaaraka wɨdɨna
“Kwala bwa'naanya dasɨ nɨmɨjɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨ' mwaaidori ya'na dahaa' wapaaya maayaraavɨna kale nyɨwa'.
Kumɨ mɨjɨka wiadaasɨ ‘Sarɨnnya angebanna dɨwila!’ wɨdɨwɨja' a'mwe pwara maave keiba mwaalyarajɨ a'mwe pwarajɨ tusavɨ mɨjɨka nabalapɨka!”
Wɨdɨna yakevɨ gamɨrera yagaala ma'maa'na “Dava a'mwera mamwaalyadɨvɨsaba aane pwai kwai a'mweraavɨne wapaaya gawɨ maarajɨwa'!”
Sai yɨdaangana' “Gɨrɨkula gara gara warɨka?” Sara kyɨdaangana' “Ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraaina.”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' kwala bwa'naanyavɨ wɨdɨna “Yuyangihi, kwaakevɨ dalamwaalyɨla!” Wɨdɨna yaka gɨrɨkula ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyangɨ maaraka Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdaka gunyɨna gunyɨna yaka a'mwengɨne wapaaya wɨjaaya'nera gamɨreraavɨ wɨjaavɨna kya' sara kwala bwa'naanyavɨna wɨjaavɨna.
Mi'na wɨjaavɨna yesara jawɨnya pɨrɨ'na pɨrɨ'na wa'dɨsɨya wɨmaarina kye' Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Gɨmɨre yaya' makimwa,” wɨdaka gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Jawɨnya dajɨ a'mweyuraavɨna yanga dumaarila!”
A'mwe yuya maranyɨna kye' munya yɨnyɨna kya' wapaa pɨnɨ nɨganakɨna yeta bwakuna wapaaya pɨnɨ gɨlya ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pukaalyangɨ maramihe' gamɨrera.
Tɨka wapaaya neta kwala naanga naanga (4000) mwaalesare. Mwaalesaraavɨ sai wɨdɨna “A'mweihi, wapaa mi'na nɨvanɨgasaihi, sarɨnnya angebanna dɨwila!”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka yɨme'nya'bɨ' wɨdaasɨna, gamɨrerari sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaina kya' Kwaaka Dalɨmaanutaneraavɨ makuna ya'.

Saba Perɨzɨya pwara gamɨnyawɨnna wɨlaabɨna yeva “Gamɨ sarɨ kayaa'nanya'na yaamɨjɨ wɨdaana!” yawɨreva “Yɨdakwasanganaana!” deva wɨdɨna “Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' maara'gɨzɨ wɨjɨwaainya dɨragɨnya' ja! Wanganaade'na Gotɨyareigɨ dɨngaka?”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ kale wiadaa'nyɨ sɨmudɨngwaimale yaka wɨdɨna “Dahaa' mwaaihasara ‘Wɨjɨwaainya dɨragɨnya' ja!’ baa'na nyɨdɨwaava! Nebwi yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Wɨjɨwaainya dɨragɨnya' mwanganyɨ jideihɨlyɨra dahaasaihi. Arɨkawɨnyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna yakei kumɨ saraavɨ yarai yagalya'mavaka sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaina kya' aalɨbunyavɨ pimagɨnna makuna ya'.
Gamɨrera wapaayanna navɨka yɨna kye' kumɨjɨ sɨpɨyavɨ gɨrɨkula gave pɨrɨ'na wara'.
Gɨrɨkula gave pɨrɨ'na wa'dɨ'nyɨyagaa' gamɨ “Dɨnyu'nyɨla! Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Perɨzɨyaraavɨre lɨwɨnya pamidakya'nesɨ Erotɨyare lɨwɨnya pamidakya'nesɨ nayaa jawɨrila!”
Wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera dɨnyɨna “Wapaaya mamaariwo'na nedɨwaka.”
Dɨnyɨna yesa'na Jizaazai yawɨraka wɨdɨna “ ‘Nemɨ wapemaayainere',’ baa'na dɨmanɨga'! Kunya' myawɨrijɨvanɨga'! Sɨdu'maayaihi daa!
Tɨnnakeihi, tɨnna mwanganyɨjɨvanɨga'! Kadɨ'nakeihi, kadɨka mu'nyɨjɨvanɨga'! Nɨmɨ sɨnnawɨ ye'na nayaa myawɨrijɨvanɨga'!

Sagaa' gɨrɨkula atina gunyɨna kye paaivɨ taawɨzanɨyara mi'na kane' wapaa bwakuna yake sarɨmɨ gɨlya gara garengɨ maramihe'?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' wɨdɨna ye' “Atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pukaalyangɨ maramiho.”

Wɨdɨna kye' wɨdɨna “Gɨrɨkula ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyangɨ po taawɨzanɨyara kanɨwa'daa' wapaaya pɨnɨnna yunebanne gɨlya gara gara maramihɨwa'daa'?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' wɨdɨna “Ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pukaalyangɨnyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yesaraavɨ wɨdɨna ya' “Sa'na dahaa' kunya kuna myawɨrijɨvanɨga'?”
Kumɨ Anga Betɨzaaithana kyɨ'mave' gamɨnyawɨnna a'mwe pwara a'mwe tɨbɨnyarɨ jɨvwaramakuna yeva naanga wɨdɨna “A'mwe darɨ ata dɨthathɨwade'nanyɨ!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai tɨbɨnyare asavɨ maaraka angebadaasɨ jɨvwaramakuna yaka gamɨre tɨnnyaraarɨ maagwala wopɨna yaka gamɨre tɨnnyaraarɨ ata dathɨwagaka yɨdaanganna “Pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' dangamwaana?”
Yɨdaanganna kya' maranganamaryaka wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨ dahawangamanɨge? Yɨsara kaanya yamaryɨvanɨkabaaibɨ' sahwaraavɨ wanganaasɨwana.”
Sagaa' wɨdakere tɨnnyaraarɨ ata ayɨna dathɨwanna kya' a'mwei dɨragɨnna kwangana' gamɨre tɨnna tewaanya kyɨma'na' yuyangɨ tɨnna nayaa wangana'.
Nayaa wangadaa'nyɨ sai wɨdaasɨna ya' “Gɨnnya angevɨna dɨwona! Anga dava ayɨna mulaawɨnnera!”
Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerari sara Sizaarɨya Pilipaai angeburaavɨna gɨ'mavamarina yadaapi gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨna a'mwera aaihwala nyɨdɨvanɨgava?”
Gamɨrera wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨnyɨna ‘Jonɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yakei dɨkaavakela,’ pwara dɨmanɨga'. ‘Ne Yɨlaajai dɨkaavakela,’ pwara dɨmanɨga'. ‘Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaaka pwai dɨkaavakela,’ pwara dɨmanɨga'.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' yɨwaara'na “Sahwaihi, nɨmɨnyɨna baarɨva dɨmanɨgataihɨlaka?”
“Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨnyɨra. Gotɨyai gɨthasaabakeigɨnyɨra.”
Pitai sara wɨdɨna kya' sai “Naange' yɨhɨthɨwa. Sa'na nɨmɨnyɨna aane pwarɨ kɨrɨvɨ mudɨpɨnera!” wɨdɨna ya'.

Sai gamɨreraavɨ gaai wɨjɨwaakɨna “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ daanga naanga nyɨvɨnadeinyɨra. Juyaraavɨre a'mwe naangerajɨ sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ sara nɨmɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe kayaa'nanaangelyɨra,’ dɨnapɨri nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨra. Kanyɨramakapi yɨrɨka daryaai darɨ' kanyavɨlavojɨ baryainyɨ ayɨna dɨkaavɨdeinyɨra.”
Yagaala sa' ku'maayaba aangyagaala wɨdɨna kya' Pitai sahwarɨ sangyɨnebanna jɨvwaramakwoka maanga wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, sabwi myawɨ'dɨnna!”

Sara maanga wɨdɨna kya' gɨnyɨma'naka gamɨreraavɨ tɨnna wanganaka Pitarɨ maanga wɨdɨna “Saataanɨgɨ, nɨmɨnyɨ dusɨmagɨnna dɨwona! Gotɨyai sara yawɨ'manɨkebura myawɨrivanɨgɨ. Aawa. A'mwera sara yawɨ'manɨgasabura yawɨ'manɨgɨnya'nanyɨ.”

A'mwe kwala bwa'naanyavɨjɨ gamɨreraavɨjɨ jaka wɨjɨvwaramaa'na kya' gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna kye' wɨdɨna “A'mwe kɨrɨ' a'mwe kwai ‘Jizaazareinyɨ. Mɨdɨnɨma!’ yawɨraja' ‘Nɨmɨnyɨne'na myawɨ'munera!’ dathe'na pwara ‘A'mwerɨ yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨri tamakaana!’ kadapɨri sai ‘Jizaazarɨna balɨdeinyɨra,’ dozɨ nɨmɨrebwi yawɨ'dei nyɨmɨdɨnadelyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨ a'mwe pwai lɨka yojɨ ‘Nanyɨramakɨpɨka! Nɨmɨre gaalya' padaihasamaa'nɨma! Jizaazarɨ wasɨ'nɨdeinyɨra,’ dozɨ navɨka mwaalajai gamɨre kuryai kayaaka yadelyɨra. Kɨrɨ' pwai ‘Jizaazarɨna nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨra. Nɨmɨre gaalya' kayaaka yana!’ yawɨ'da nɨmɨre yagaala tewaanya'na yawɨraja' yuyagaa' gamɨre kuryai nayaa padaihasamaa'delyɨra.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai Kwaaka davakɨ gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ yuyajɨ sangɨ maarojɨ manyɨlɨmwagari kyojɨ gamɨre kuryai yɨwɨna yadelyɨ. Sa' tewaanya' daaka! Arɨkewɨnyɨra!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwere kuryai kayaaka yɨma'nyɨna kyojɨ gannya kuryarɨna a'mwe sai Gotɨyarɨ berɨsɨ mubathelaka! Aawa.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaaka davakɨ mwaaidɨvɨsara Gotɨyarɨna navɨka yadɨvɨ' a'mwe' a'mwe pwarɨ ata lɨmwanna yade'bɨsarera. Kayaa'nanaangera nɨmɨnyɨnajɨ nɨmɨre yagaalya'najɨ sangɨna ‘Wagɨla nanevwa'nadɨka! Sahwarɨ wasɨ'nɨma!’ deva yɨvanɨgasara. Nabaai dɨvi A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai Ganɨmaangere byaanna dɨragɨnya' kamaarojɨ Gotɨyare mamaayara ejelɨya tewaanyarajɨ kwalaabori wagɨla wɨvwa'nɨvanɨkeraavɨna gamɨ sarɨ wagɨla wɨvwa'nadelyɨra. Saraavɨ wasɨ'nadelyɨra.”

Sai a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nebwi yɨhɨthɨwa. Dava mwaaihasarajɨya pwara dɨvi kwaihwaainakera kuna mwaalapɨjɨ mabalyɨ yapɨjɨ dara wangabɨ'de' ‘Ai, Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna damaremwaalɨka!’ Sara wangabɨ'dehaa'nanyɨ.”

Yɨrɨka daryaai daryaai daryaai kwavɨlava' Jizaazai Pitalyɨ Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraavɨ maarɨna kya' mugunya naangevɨ yɨlaawɨna yɨlaawɨna yeva gavera daavɨna kye' pwara mamwaalyɨ kye' gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' nawɨ'nyajɨ' gavinyajɨ' kyalɨngɨna' kumɨ tɨnna wanganna.
Tɨnna wanganna yadaapɨjɨ gannya kwaabɨhannya yaaka naange' yɨma'nakevɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaaidɨvɨsara yaaka sa' sara myalɨngɨnyadesɨra.
Yaaka naange' kyɨma'na' Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraai Yɨlaajalyɨ Mozɨzalyɨ saraai Gotɨyarebadaasaraai yɨma'naabɨna, daavɨna yagɨla Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna kyagi dɨnyɨna.

Sara dɨnyɨna kye' gamɨrera tɨnna wanganna yeva Pitai Jizaazarɨ yaasɨwa' wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, nemɨ dava mwaaiho' tewaanyasɨra. Sɨmɨnya dawaai dasangɨ yarɨlaana! Pɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨne', pɨrɨ' Mozɨzarɨne', pɨrɨ' Yɨlaajarɨne' yarɨlaana!”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pitai “Nɨmɨ gara dɨjɨwa?” dɨna yakelyɨ. Nabaai sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwalyɨ gamɨreraalyɨ sara lɨka naanga yesa'nanyɨ.
Sagaa' yɨraaya' kumɨnyɨ gɨ'dala yɨrɨna kya' yɨraayavɨdaasɨ maanguraaya' “Dathai nyɨbwaalɨvaangelyɨ. Yɨlaaya yadɨ kurya wɨkadɨnyalyɨra. Dahwarɨ nayaa du'nyɨla!”
Yagaala sa' wɨ'neva yɨme'nya'bɨ' dara wanganesa' “Ai, aane pwai kwarɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ, Jizaazai gavei nemɨjɨ damwaalɨka!”

Sɨlyarɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨrerari waidavadaapi sai naanga wɨdɨna “Wangamwaasa'na a'mweraavɨ mudɨpɨnera! Dɨvi A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ bala'muri bainɨkeraayawɨdaa'nyɨ dɨkaa'mujahaa'na yɨ sagaa' duzideihɨlyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ sara a'mweraavɨ yagaala sa' mujɨwaaki. Mujɨwaakya'nera dɨnyɨna “ ‘Bala'muri bainɨkeraayawɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna dɨkaavɨdeinyɨra,’ nedɨwake'na be yagaalavaka?”
Sara dɨnyɨna yeva gamɨnyɨ yɨwaara'na “Yagaaikɨwɨjara nedɨvanɨga' ‘Sɨnnawɨ Ne Yɨlaajai kabozɨ dɨvi Kɨraazɨtɨyai bathelyɨra.’ Savɨne'na baa'na nedɨvanɨga'?”

Sara wɨ'naka wɨdɨna “Yo, dɨnɨke' sɨnnawɨ Yɨlaajai bozɨ yuyangɨ yavada'galadelyɨra. Nabaai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨna dɨnɨke' ‘Yɨ Kwaaka davakɨ daanga naanga wɨvɨnadelyɨra. Yɨ yɨlaaya mamari yɨpɨ'delyɨra.’ Sare' gara yɨda'nɨkevaka?
Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sainyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yɨlaajai mi'na bakelyɨra. Mi'na bakerɨ kayaa'nanaangenna wiesa' Gotɨyare bukuya' sara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsa'nesɨra.”
Gamɨre pwaraavɨ wɨjɨma'naaweva dara wanganesa' “Kwala bwa'naanya naange' kumɨnyaba mwaaidapi Yagaaikɨwɨjarajɨ nemɨrerajɨ maanga dathɨmanɨgava!”
Dɨna kye' yɨme'nya'bɨ' bwa'naanya yuya' gamɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganesagaa' atɨka maru'nareva gamɨnyawɨnna kaanyave'na beva “Naangeigɨ,” wɨdɨna.
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai yɨwaara'na “Maanga be'na dɨmanɨgataihɨlaka?”
Yɨwaara'na kya' bwa'naanyavɨdaa'nya pwai wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ nyɨbwaalɨvaangei yɨmaka widei yagaala majarɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna makabɨwa.

Yɨmakei galalɨmwanna yada kaimalerɨ kwaakevɨna bwalamarakɨna yadehaa' gamɨre maangevɨ maagwaitala yɨma'nada maangerɨka maagɨlaku'gɨlakuta yadaasɨ gamɨre kɨlaaka yuneba dɨragɨnya yɨma'nade sagaa'. ‘Yɨmakei duthaasɨla!’ dena gɨmɨreraavɨ kudɨwa sahwara yɨna yɨna kyɨwaa' yɨmakei kuna widelyɨra. Myɨ yɨpɨnere.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai ma'maa'na “Dahaasaihi, malɨmwagyadɨvɨsaihi sarɨmɨnyaba mwaala'mujɨ yɨhɨzɨwaaka'mujɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne'na taanga kuna gathɨngaa' maarɨdeinyaka! Kaimale dai nɨmɨnyawɨnna dɨmakabyɨla!”

Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' makabɨna kye' yɨmakei Jizaazarɨ wanganaka yɨme'nya'bɨ' kaimalerɨ yɨkɨlaaka galyɨma'na kya' kwaakewɨ bwala'na yaka gɨnyɨwannyɨ gɨnyɨwannya yɨna kya' gamɨre maangevɨ maagwaitala yɨma'nyɨna.
Sara yɨma'nyɨna kya' sai ganɨmaangerɨ yɨwaara'na “Sa' garegaa' yɨma'nakavaka?” Yɨwaara'na kya' ganɨmaangei wɨdɨna “Kaimale maalɨkegaa' sara yɨma'na'.

Kyɨma'na' yɨmakei kwalaalyagaa' kaimalerɨna ‘Tamakɨma!’ daka dɨkevɨ marasɨ'na yada avaala kwai aalyavɨ marapaihɨna yadei. Sare' kɨrɨ' ‘Nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' darɨka!’ dɨza' naarɨmɨnyɨna kale kagyozɨ nehɨgaimwana!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “ ‘Nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' darɨka!’ dɨza' pwai nayaa nyɨmɨdɨmanɨkei sahwai yuya yannelyɨra.”
Dɨragɨnna sara kuda' yɨme'nya'bɨ' ganɨmaangai yarai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨdɨmanɨgevwi maalɨka warɨke'na naanga yɨma'nya'ne' dɨnyɨgaimwana!”

Jizaazai dara wanganake' “O, kwala bwa'naanya' kaanyave'na jɨkabɨvanɨgava!” Daka yɨmakerɨ maanga wɨdɨna “Yɨmakeigɨ kadɨkɨryaigɨ yagaala majaigɨ kaimalerɨ be'na wɨmwaaihɨna! Gamɨre munyɨkɨdaasɨ yunakaanna dɨwona! Ayɨna nabwidɨka!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' yɨmakei jaka dɨna yaka kaimalerɨ naanga galyɨma'na yaka bwalyuna. Sara bwalyuna kya' kaimalei baryaibɨ' warɨna kya' pwara dɨnyɨna “Mena baimwaka.”
Sara dɨnyɨna kye' Jizaazai gamɨre asavɨ yɨrɨ'bwa'na kya' kaimalei sagaa' tewaanya dɨkaa'na yaka daavɨna ya'.
Angevɨ mi'na wɨlamwaaina kya' gamɨjɨ gamɨrerari gavera mwaaidapi gamɨrera yɨdaanganna “Sahwaina yɨmakerɨ wɨdasaanne' gara yawaajɨ wɨdasaannekajɨnyɨra?”
Yɨdaanganna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Yɨmaka darɨna Gotɨyarɨ tɨbarɨyagaala kadapɨri bwalyawodelyɨra. Aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ'na mɨka!”
Sabadaa'nyara Kwaaka Galɨli wavɨla'na. Wavɨla'na yadaapi “A'mwera nanyangabɨthɨka!” daka sai kave wɨna.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. “Nɨmɨreraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨma!” daka wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ pwai nɨmɨnyɨ yɨkamaangeraavɨna kwibwarɨdaakwojɨ yɨkamaangera kanyɨramakapɨri balɨdeinyɨra. Mi'na bala'mujɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ ayɨna dɨkaavɨdeinyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' yagaala sa'na myawɨryadɨvɨ' nabaai, yɨdaanganya'na lɨka yɨna ye'.
Angaba Kaapanɨyamɨna yɨ'maveva angevɨ ayɨna kabulamwaale' sai gamɨreraavɨ yɨwaara'na “Tusavɨ wɨvanɨgasaihi be yagaala dɨmanɨgatavaka?”
Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara yagaala majara mwaalɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Tusavɨ dɨnyɨna “Nemɨjɨyai a'mwe naangei aaihwalaka? Nɨmɨ dɨngaka?”

Majara mwaalɨna kye' walamwaalaka gamɨre atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ jɨvwaramaa'na yaka wɨdɨna “Pwai gannya sɨmunyavɨ ‘Sɨnnawɨnyainyɨ yɨma'nɨma!’ yawɨrajai sai yuyaraavɨne aayaangei yɨma'nana! Yuya saraavɨna wɨdaayadei yɨma'nana! Sai yawɨ'na ‘Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨra. Yuyaraavɨre wɨdaayɨdeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!’ dozɨya sahwai naangei yɨma'nadelyɨra Gotɨyarɨna.”
Wɨdɨna yaka kaimɨraayamɨlɨ' maaraka tɨnnyaba mwaaidapiyaba gannya tɨ'munyavɨ maramujɨ'na yaka wɨdɨna

“Pwai kwai nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨrojɨ kaimɨraaya daibɨsamɨlɨ' maaraja' nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaaradeinyɨra. Nabaai sai sara nyɨmaarajai nɨmɨnyɨ gaveinyɨ nyɨmaaradeinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmaamaangei nyɨdasaabakerɨjɨ maaradelyɨra.”

Jonɨ wɨdɨna, “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, nemɨ dara wangamwo' ‘A'mwei gɨmɨre yaya' wɨdaka yɨmakeraavɨ a'mweraavɨre munyɨkaavɨdaasɨ dathasɨvanaabɨka!’ Sai nemɨjɨyai mɨ'. Savɨdaasɨ nemɨ wɨdɨwo ‘Sabwi minnera maaveigɨ!’ ”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “ ‘Sabwi minnera!’ mudɨpɨnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Aane pwai kwai nɨmɨre yaya' wɨdozɨ dɨragɨnaange' yojɨ maalɨkegaa' nɨmɨnyɨna kayaa'na wɨdathei mɨ'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe nemɨre yɨkamaangei mamwaalyɨkei nemɨnyɨnelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pwai sarɨmɨnyɨna ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyarerɨ mɨjɨka'na aalya tɨka nya'ne' wɨjaavɨma!’ dozɨya'na nɨmɨnyɨna yɨhɨzaavajai. Yɨ sahwarɨna nebwi yɨhɨthɨwa. Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨne tɨvɨkɨta tewaanya mujaayɨ yadei mɨka! Arɨkewɨ.”

“Pwai kaimɨraaya damɨlɨ'bɨsamɨlɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨlɨmwaga'demɨlɨ' pwarebwi kujaawa' wala'mwaake' kayaa'nanaangesɨra. A'mwei sara yajarɨna Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka naanga wɨdavadelyɨra. Sɨnnawɨ sahwai pwarebwi mujaayadɨ'nyɨyagaa' a'mwe darɨ maapɨjɨ kwajɨ sɨla naange' gamɨre tɨlɨnnyavɨ tɨmupɨjɨ kwajɨ aalɨbunyavɨ wɨvaihɨna kyɨpɨke'na wabana yɨnɨkesɨra.”

Jizaazai yawɨraka “Kayaa'nanya nyɨpɨdɨka! Dɨkevɨ nulaawɨpɨka!” daka ke'ba'na wɨdɨna “Nabaai gɨnnya asasɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yɨjɨ kwajɨ gɨnnya asavɨ woripu'na'gi ata gavesɨyaigɨ Gotɨyarebanna jɨlaawade'na tewaanyasɨra.
Kayaa'nanyabwi yɨjɨ kwajɨ asawaalyɨyaigɨ yaayebanna gazagaasagaa' Dɨke' yɨda'nɨvanɨkevɨna dulaawade'na kayaa'nanaangesɨra.
Nabaai gɨnnya sɨvɨlyasɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yɨjɨ kwajɨ woripu'na'gi sɨvɨla gavesɨyaigɨ Gotɨyarebanna dulaawade'na tewaanyasɨra.
Kayaa'nanyabwi yɨjɨ kwajɨ sɨvɨlyawaalyɨyaigɨ Dɨkevɨna dulaawade'na kayaa'nanaangesɨra.

Nabaai gɨnnya tɨnnyalyɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yɨjɨ kwajɨ gɨnnya tɨnnyai galajɨwa'mwanna'gɨzɨ tɨnna gavelyɨyaigɨ Gotɨyai maremwaaidevanna dulaawade'na tewaanyasɨra. Kayaa'nanyabwi yɨjɨ kwajɨ tɨnnyaraalyɨyaigɨ Dɨkevɨna dulaawade'na kayaa'nanaangesɨra.
Dɨka savɨ yuyagaa' gumɨlɨka gɨlaayangɨ tɨka nadɨvɨsa mabalyɨ yɨpɨ'dengɨra. Dɨka myɨgaakuri yadesɨra.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨ'nadɨvɨsara tewaanna mwaaibɨ'dere. Kayaa'nanyabwi dɨke'bɨsabwi kyɨma'nojɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyabwi kujaavojɨ dɨragɨnya tewaanna mwaaibɨ'dere.

Saalya' nawɨ'nyasɨra. Sa'na saalya' gɨrɨngwɨta yɨma'nojɨ nawɨ'nya ayɨna gara yadevaka? Aawa. Nawɨ'nya mima'nyɨ yadesɨra. ‘Nemɨ saala gɨrɨngwɨsa'bɨsaina nyɨma'naadɨka!’ dapɨjɨ nayaa dɨmwaalyidera. Gazaizai gamɨnyɨ pwarɨna kwaamu'na mwaalana!”
Sabadaasai sai Kwaaka Juthɨya wavɨlavaka Aalya Jothanɨ ga'mavaka kwaaka saba kamwaala' gamɨnyawɨ kwala bwa'naanya mwaaidapi wɨjɨwaakadevaaibɨ' aya kɨnɨ nayaa wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Sara wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaa'nyɨ Perɨzɨya pwara wɨlaabeva “Sahwai kayaa'nanya' yana!” deva yaamɨjɨ yɨwaara'na “Pwai gannya balaangevɨ wasɨ'naja' sabwi tewaanna yadevwi daaka? Kayaa'na yadevwi daaka?”
Sara yɨwaara'na kye' wɨdɨna

“Savɨne' Ne Mozɨzai sɨrɨnɨmaangeraavɨ yagaala berɨvɨ wɨjaihɨlaka?” Sahwara wɨdɨna “Mozɨzai da' dɨnɨ' ‘A'mwe pwai yawɨrojɨ “Nɨnnya a'mwe' wasɨ'nɨma!” dozɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ yagaala sa' yɨdavojɨ gannya balaange' yunakunyavɨ wasɨ'nadelyɨra.’ ”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ galarɨlavɨmwaaihɨnyɨna yɨwaata sabwina kɨwɨnya sa' Ne Mozɨzai dɨnɨkesɨra.
Dɨnɨke' sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Gotɨyai yuya wakyaakegaa' Gotɨyare yagaala dɨnɨ' ‘Gotɨyai kwalyalyɨ gannya balyasɨ yavɨkaryaake'na
a'mwe pwai ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ sawaarɨ yagalya'makuna yojɨ a'mwe' maarɨna yojɨ
gamɨre a'mwesɨ mwaalɨna yakɨriyagaa' kɨyoi avaalyawaalyɨ. Kɨlaaka gavejɨ' yɨma'nikadewaalyɨ.’ Sa' dɨnɨke'na a'mwe pwalyɨ a'mwe pɨrɨsɨ sawaai mɨka. Aawa. Kɨlaaka gavejɨsɨyawaalyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai kɨlaaka gavejɨsɨyawaarɨ wakake'na kwalaangei gannya balaangevɨ mwasɨ'nannesɨra.”
Salyɨ gamɨrerari angevɨ bulamwaaina kye' gamɨrera a'mwevɨ wasɨ'nya'na yɨwaara'na.
Savɨne' yɨwaara'na kye' wɨdɨna “Pwai kwai gannya balaangevɨ wasɨ'nojɨ a'mwe mudɨkevɨ kamaarojɨ Gotɨyai wanganojɨ ‘Gannya balaanga ayavɨna a'mwe mudɨkevɨ ata lɨmwamwakelyɨra,’ dathelyɨra Gotɨyai.
Nabaai a'mwe' gannya kwalaangerɨ byenɨda'makwalyuna yaja' a'mwe pwarɨ kamaa'nojɨ ‘Gannya kwalaangerɨna a'mwe mudɨkerɨ ata lɨmwamwakesɨra,’ dathelyɨra Gotɨyai.”
A'mweyura “Sahwai ata yɨmetavana!” deva gamɨnyawɨnna kunnya kaimɨraayaraavɨ makabɨna kye' gamɨrera maanga wɨdɨna “Mipɨnera!”

Jizaazai dara wanganake' “Ai, nɨmɨrera maanga duthɨvanɨgava!” Daka sɨnna tɨka kudava' wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyawɨnna kaimɨraaya bɨpɨka! Kumɨnyɨna kaanya maribɨnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai maremwaaideva pwara kaimɨraaya darabɨsara Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsara mwaaibɨ'dengɨra.
Nebwi yɨhɨthɨwa. Pwai kwai ‘Gotɨyareba mwaalɨma!’ dazai ‘Kaimɨraayai Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yadeibɨsainyɨ yɨma'nɨwɨjainyɨ,’ majɨ kyori Gotɨyare maremwaaide nawɨ'nyaba mulaabi yadelyɨra. Arɨkawɨnyɨra.”
Sara wɨdaka kaimɨraaya gannya asawaalyɨ mujɨ'na yaka ata yɨmeta'na yaka “Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨ tewaanna gyathelyɨra,” wɨdɨna wɨdɨna ya'.

Angebadaasai kwaakaanya wodaa'nyɨ a'mwei gamɨnyawɨnna kaanyave'na wawaka “Naangelyɨra,” daka kwadaai gɨlaka yɨwaara'na “Nejɨwaakadɨnya tewaanyaigɨ, ‘Gotɨyare yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maarɨma!’ da'mujɨ gara yɨdeinyaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “ ‘Tewaanyaigɨ,’ nyɨdɨwaanya' baa'na nyɨdɨwaa? Pwara kayaa'nanyara, Gotɨyai gavei tewaanyalyɨra.

Yagaaikɨwɨnya dara yawɨ'mwaa. A'mwe maramakɨnna! A'mwengɨ ata malɨmwadɨnna! Kuka minna! Kwaasɨ yagaala majalɨkurakɨnna! Kwaasɨya ya'gɨzɨ pwarengɨ kuka mamaa'dɨnna! Gɨmaamaangelyɨ gwaangesɨ gɨzɨkaja sara jɨthengɨra. Kɨrɨmɨre yaya' dɨmakɨla!”
A'mwei sare wɨ'naka wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, yagaaikɨwɨnya sangɨ kawe'nyagaa'daa'nyɨ sara mɨdɨdɨnyainyɨ.”

Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wanganaka gamɨnyɨna wɨvu'nakerɨ wɨdɨna “Gave pɨrɨ'na gɨhainɨvanɨ'. Wawa'gɨzɨ gɨnnya gɨlyɨvɨsa yaasa'gɨzɨ nɨgwia maara'gɨzɨ gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨ yanga wɨjaava'gɨzɨ Gotɨyareba warade gɨlyɨvɨsajɨyaigɨ nyɨmɨdɨnaadeigɨnyɨra.”
Sara wɨdake'na a'mwere kale wiadaa'nyɨ “Aala,” dɨna jɨkurya yaka kavena wɨna ya'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
Mi'na wɨna kya' Jizaazai a'mweraavɨ maranganaka gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨlyɨvɨkɨraya naangejɨyara wawɨnya naanga yɨna yɨna yɨpɨjara kwajɨ Gotɨyai maremwaaideva tewaanyaba kupɨdɨkerera.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera atɨka maru'nakulɨna. Atɨka maru'nakulɨna kye' Jizaazai ayɨna ma'maa'na “Kaimɨraayaihi, Gotɨyai maremwaaidevanna wɨlya'na wawɨnya naangesɨra.
Langa lɨlɨtavalo'ma'nɨkerɨkɨ jɨlɨkyaawarya kaamelɨyai wɨlaawade'na wawɨnya maalɨkesɨ. Gotɨyai maremwaaideva gɨlyɨvɨta naangejɨyai wɨlaawade'na wawɨnya naangesɨra.”
Sara kuda' atɨka maru'na'muluna yeva dɨnyɨna “Gotɨyarebanna aai yɨlaawadevanaka? Aarɨ padaihasamaaradelaka?”
Dɨnyɨna kye' Jizaazai kumɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganaka wɨdɨna “A'mwera yapi mulaawi yɨpɨ'dera. Aawa. Gotɨya gavei kyojɨ wɨlaawɨpɨ'derera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai yuyanna yadelyɨra.”
Pitai sarɨ gaai wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa, nemɨ yuyangɨ ya'mawakona gɨmɨdɨnaabɨho.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nebwi yɨhɨthɨwa. Aane pwai kwai nɨmɨnyɨne'najɨ yagaala tewaanya'najɨ gannya ange' gya'mwera gya'mwe ganaange' ganɨmaangei gannya kaimɨraaya gannya wawɨnya ya'mawakojɨ

kɨrɨ' dahaasagaa' anga kwalaalya, gya'mwe kwala naange, ganaanga kwalaalya, kaimɨraaya kwala naanga naanga, wawɨnya naangeva' mamaari yadei midaaka! Kwaaka davakɨ naanga naanga maarade kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨne'na pwara taanginya wɨjaavɨpɨ'de dɨvi yɨma'nadehaa' Gotɨyare nawɨ'nyaba yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maaradelyɨra.

Sa'na Kwaaka davakɨ pwarɨna ‘A'mwe sɨnnawɨnyalyɨra,’ dɨmanɨgasarɨna Gotɨyareba ‘O, aayaangemɨlɨkɨra,’ dɨnɨpɨ'delyɨra. Yɨ pwarɨna ‘A'mwe aayaangemɨlɨkɨ,’ dɨmanɨgasarɨna Gotɨyareba ‘O, sɨnnawɨnyalyɨra,’ dɨnɨpɨ'delyɨra. Yɨ kwalaalyaraavɨna sara dɨnɨpɨ'derera.”

Jeruzaalemɨnera tusavɨ kaanya widawadaapi Jizaazai kaanya wodaa'nyɨ pwara “Sabannei lɨka myɨwaka,” deva atɨka maru'nakulɨna yeva mɨdɨnna yesara lɨka yɨna. Lɨka yɨna kye' sai gamɨreraavɨ pɨba wɨmwaaihaka gamɨnyɨna yɨma'nya'ne'na wɨdɨna

“Yɨthaanyi! Jeruzaalemɨneina yimanaawɨgo. Saba A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ maarapi sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ yagaaikɨwɨjarajɨ saraavɨ kanyɨmarɨmwaaihori a'mwe sara nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Sai baladelyɨra,’ jɨdavapi anga naanga pimagɨnyaraavɨ (Romɨ mwaalyaraavɨ) nyɨmarɨmwaaihɨpɨ'derera.

Kanyɨmarɨmwaaihapi bɨrala nyapɨri maagwala nyopwasɨ'napɨri lannaka wɨlyabaalyɨ mala nyɨramapɨri nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨ. Kabala'muri yɨrɨka daryaai darɨ' kwavɨlavojɨ kwaihwaainakeinyɨ ayɨna dɨkaavɨdeinyɨra.”
Sagaa' Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ kɨdaraai Sevathiyare gawaalɨ' kwaraai saryawɨnna wɨlaabahɨla wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, gɨthakade' naarɨmɨnyɨne'na sara jɨtheinaalyɨra. Sara yawɨ'mwoi.”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kyagi wɨdɨna “Kɨrɨmɨnyɨna baarɨ' yɨjɨwa?” wɨdɨna ya'.
“Naarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanyaba maremwaala'gɨzɨ gɨmɨre byaannakevɨ ‘Pwaigɨ aangasavɨ pwaigɨ kwanaamevɨ namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nyawaarɨ kwalamwaalakɨlyɨ nemɨ maremwalaadeinera,’ sara nehɨthana!”

Sa' wɨdɨna kyagi Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nyɨdaangamanɨgɨlya' myawɨriwaai. Daanga nyɨvɨnade'na kaapɨya sa' dɨnyideraaihi daaka? Nabaai daanga kihɨvɨnojɨ dɨragɨnyaraaihi daa'? Nɨmɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨkɨ daanga nyɨvɨnade'na nɨmɨre bavɨtaazɨya' nyɨma'nadesɨreva nabaai kɨrɨmɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨkɨ daanga kihɨvɨnojɨ kɨrɨmɨ dɨragɨnna dɨmwaalyideraaihi daaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' wɨdɨna “Naarɨmɨ dɨragɨnyainaai wikɨra. Wi'na yakaneinaalyɨ.” Jizaazai wɨda' “Kaapɨyavɨ aalya nɨde' savɨ aalya dɨnyideraaihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨ bavɨtaazɨya' nya'de' kɨrɨmɨnyɨ yɨhwaradesɨ.
Sare kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre aangasavɨjɨ nɨmɨre kwanaamevɨjɨ walamwaalya'na nɨnnya wawɨnya' daaka! Aawa. Gotɨyai yawɨrojɨ gamɨ sahwai namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nyawaai yovɨrawakyaakewaarɨna pwaraarɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨra.”
Gamɨrera pwara atɨraalyara sadaraai wɨdahɨlya' wɨ'nyɨna kye' Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ sadaraarɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨdavɨna.

Sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨjɨvwaramaa'na “Yuyaihi, kaajɨla!” wɨdɨna “Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨrebwi yawɨ'mwaa'. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara ‘Nemɨ a'mwe naangeinera,’ dɨdɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨ marulawakɨna yadɨvɨ' mwaaiha'. Nabaai kumɨre a'mwe naangera kumɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna yadɨvɨsarera.
Sabwi mipɨnera! Sarɨmɨjɨyai pwai ‘Nɨmɨ a'mwe naangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!’ yawɨrojɨ pwaraavɨ wɨdaayojɨ a'mwe naangei yɨma'nadelyɨra.
Pwai kwai ‘Pwaraavɨne sɨnnawɨnyainyɨ yɨma'nɨma!’ yawɨrojɨ pwaraavɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai yɨma'nojɨ sɨnnawɨnyai yɨma'nadelyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwainyɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ pwara nyɨdaayɨpɨ'de'na mabyɨwa. Aawa. Pwaraavɨre wɨdaayɨde'na bɨweinyɨ. A'mweraavɨre kayaa'nanyabwina mubya'na kabala'mujɨ a'mwera tewaanna mwaaibɨ'de'na bɨweinyɨ. Kwalaalyaraavɨna a'mwamɨnɨgwiainyɨra.”

Anga Jeriko yɨ'mavaaweva sahwalyɨ gamɨrerari kwala bwa'naanyasɨ sara Jeriko ya'ma'daapi Baatɨmayaazai, Tɨmayaazare gawaalɨ', tɨbɨnyai a'mweraavɨ “Nɨgwia nyɨjaama! Tɨbɨnyainyɨ,” dadei tu'maangebaarɨ mwaalɨna.
Mwaalɨna yaka dara wɨ'nake' “Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyai daaka!” Daka jaka wɨdɨna “Ne Devitɨmɨreigɨ, Jizaazai, nɨmɨnyɨ kale dɨnyɨgaimwana!”
Sara jaka wɨdɨna kya' pwara maanga wɨdɨna “Madɨnna! Kave dɨmwaala!” Maanga wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' jaka naanga naanga wɨdɨna “Ne Devitɨmɨreigɨ, nɨmɨnyɨ kale dɨnyɨgaimwana!”

Jizaazai sara wɨ'naka mudaraka pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyawɨnna duzɨvwaramaarila!” Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' sahwara tɨbɨnyarɨ jaka jɨvwaramaa'na, wɨdɨna “Wikɨra. Jɨvaimwanna! Gɨzɨvwaramaa'mwake' yarai dɨthɨkaaka!”
Wɨdɨna kye' gannya yɨvɨta tapalasɨ'naka yarai dɨkwosɨ'nadaavaka Jizaazaryawɨnna wɨlaabɨna.
Wɨlaabɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨnyɨna berɨ' yɨjɨwa? Gara yawɨ'mwaa?” Tɨbɨnyai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ (Ravuni), ‘Nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganɨma!’ dena gɨthɨwa.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨlɨmwamwaanya'na gɨmɨre tɨnnyaraai tewaanya yana! Kaanya dɨwona!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨre tɨnnyaraai tewaanya kyɨma'na' tusavɨ Jizaazai kwawa' a'mwei mɨdɨnna ya'.
Jeruzaalemɨ adaihɨsaba Anga Bepaaza Anga Betaani mannɨkeba Mugunya Wolivɨ yɨ'ma'na kye' gamɨre pwaraarɨ wɨdaasɨna
“Angeba sakyɨrɨ' sakyaba wɨlaawakɨlyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' dogiya naanga saadɨwɨnyai wɨla pwekɨnɨkerɨ wanganakɨlyɨ dogiyarɨ a'mwe aane pwai kwai milamwaalyarɨ wɨla yaarakɨlyɨ nɨmɨnyawɨnna dɨmakabyɨla!
A'mwe pwai kwai ‘Sabwi baa'na yɨvanɨgi?’ yɨhɨthaza' dara duzɨla! ‘Naangei sarɨna kugainɨvanɨkɨra. Nabaai mi'na kyojɨ sagaa' yɨme'nya'bɨ' dogiyarɨ ayɨna maryasaabathelyɨ.’ ”
Mi'na wɨdaasɨna kya' saraai kaanya wawagɨla adusavɨ dogiya naanga saanyai tɨkuryaba mwasawɨ wɨla pwekɨnɨkerɨ wanganagɨla wɨla yaarɨna.
Wɨla yaarɨna kyagi saba pwara daavɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Baarɨ' yɨvanɨgi? Dɨwɨnya sarɨ baa'na yaa'manɨgi?”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' saraai Jizaazai wɨdake' kudahi “Wikɨra. Dɨmakwila!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazaryawɨnna dogiya saanyarɨ makabɨna kyagi yɨvɨta mararaapaleva dogiyarɨ yɨlakɨna kye' sahwai yɨvɨsɨkaavɨ a'ba yɨlamwaaina.

Sara yɨlamwaaina kya' a'mwe kwalaalyara “Sahwai naangerɨ yɨlaaya yaana!” dɨnyɨna yeva kunnya yɨvɨsa tusavɨ marakɨna kye' pwara “Tɨnna tewaanya wanganya'nengɨ,” deva taanya kɨwa'nake peda'na yeva tusavɨ nayaa marakɨna.

Nayaa marakɨna kye' sai yɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨ sɨnnawɨnyarajɨ dɨviyarajɨ sara yɨlaaya yeva jaka wɨdanganna “Naangeigɨ, Gotɨyai padaihasamaarana! Gotɨyai Naangei gɨthasaabake'na gamɨnyɨne yayavɨ bɨwaanyaigɨnyɨ tewaanna gɨzaavana!
Sɨnnawɨ Ne Devitɨ tewaanya nemaremwalyaakabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨna dɨnemaremwaala! Maremwaala savɨ Gotɨyai tewaanna wiana! Menya ke'mwewɨnyaigɨ dɨnevadaihasamaaka! Su! Su!”

Sai Anga Jeruzaalemɨ wɨlaawɨna yaka Gotɨyare angevɨ wɨlaawaka saba yuyangɨ tɨnna wangamabɨna yaka sagaa' sawɨsɨrɨna mena yɨma'nakegaa' Betaani anga maalɨkevɨna gamɨrera atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyarajɨ kaanna wɨna ya'.
Mwanyavɨ dɨkaaveva Betaanidaasara wodaapi gamɨnyɨ mɨjɨka wina.

Mɨjɨka wina yadaa'nyɨ keiba yɨta pihɨyai kɨwa'nakerɨ tɨnna wanganaka “Yɨsɨlya daaka?” daka kaanna wɨna. Yɨsaryabanna baka sagaa' dara wanganake' “O, kɨwata gave daaka?” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨta yuya yɨsɨla mya mɨlyadɨ'nyɨ.
Daka yɨsarɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨsimaayaigɨ yuyagaa' aane pwai kwai gɨmɨre yɨsɨla manyɨ gyatheigɨnyɨ.” Sara wɨdadaasɨ gamɨrera wɨ'nyɨna ye'.

Jeruzaalemɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' Gotɨyare angevɨ saba Jizaazai wɨlaabɨna yaka yaasaraavɨ marirɨgalaasɨna ya'. Nɨgwia yanga yɨnya'neraavɨre yɨ'bɨnyangɨjɨ kwaamɨrya yaasadɨvɨsaraavɨre namwaalɨsangɨjɨ marapuratawasɨ'na yaka
a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyare anga davɨ aane pwaigɨ kwaigɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa mamwa'nalota'dɨnnera!”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka wɨjɨwaakɨna “Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨke' ‘Gotɨyai dara wɨdake'na daaka! “Nɨmɨre ange' tɨbarɨyagaala ja'nesɨra. A'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyara angevɨ wɨlaabapi tɨbarɨyagaala nyɨdɨpɨ'desɨra.” ’ Sara dɨnɨke' pwara wɨlaabɨna kyɨwaa' sahwaraavɨre nɨgwia mwagi'nya'neba daa dava!”

Sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ yagaaikɨwɨjarajɨ sara wɨ'nadɨvɨ' Juya naangera gamɨnyɨna “Balade'na gara yaadeinaavaka?” dɨnyɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwarɨna lɨka naanga yesa'nanyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwala bwa'naanya' wɨjɨwaakɨyagaalya'na atɨka maru'na'muluna ye'.
Sara dɨnyɨna kye' sawɨsa' kajɨnna' angebadaa'nyɨ salyɨ gamɨrerajɨ bwalaawɨna ye'.
Mwanyavɨ tusavɨ kaanya wodaapi yɨta pihɨya' pwipulyajɨ taanyajɨ yuya yawaka balake' tɨnna wanganna.
Tɨnna wanganna kye' Pitai mi'na yawɨraka sarɨ wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakyaigɨ, dangana! Yɨta pihɨyai yagaala dɨragɨnya' wɨdɨwa'dɨnyai mena baimwaka.”
Wɨdɨna kya' kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyarɨ dɨlɨmwagarila!
Nebwi yɨhɨthɨwa. Pwai mugunya' wɨdozɨ ‘Mugunyaigɨ dɨkaava'gɨzɨ saalaalyavɨ dɨvaihɨnana!’ Nabaai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ ‘Mugunyai sara yadelyɨra,’ kalɨmwagarojɨ Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨna sara yadelyɨra.
Savɨne'na yɨhɨthɨwa. Tɨbarɨyagaala duthathe gɨnnya sɨmunyavɨ ‘Gotɨyai mena sara nyɨjaawa',’ kada'gɨzɨ gɨzaavadengɨra.

Tɨbarɨyagaalya'na daava'gɨzɨ yawɨ'dɨza' ‘Ai, pwai kwai kayaa'na nyɨwaka! Sɨnna tɨka nyɨda'mwa',’ sagaa' ‘Gamɨre kayaa'nanya' mi'na marasɨ'nɨwa,’ jawɨka! Nabaai Gɨmaamaangei Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nade'na sara ja!
Kɨrɨ' pwara kayaa'na gyɨwaasa'na kumɨre yɨwetawakya mamarasɨ'nyɨ yɨja', yɨ gɨmɨre yɨwetawakyanna Gɨmaamaangei Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei mamarasɨ'nyɨ yadelyɨra.”

Jeruzaalemɨna ayɨna wɨlaabɨna. Mi'na wɨlaabɨna kye' sahwai Gotɨyare angevɨ kaanya bulayamaryadaa'nyɨ gamɨnyawɨnna sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ yagaaikɨwɨjarajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ wɨlaabeva
wɨdɨna “Sa be dɨragɨnya yawaaihɨnyavaka? Yawaaihɨnya'na sa ya'neigɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya' aai gɨzaavakasɨyaka?”
Jizaazai sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Yagaala pɨrɨ' yɨhiwaaravɨma! Savɨ kaja'nanyɨdapi sara yawaaihe'ne dɨragɨnya' yɨhɨzɨwaakɨdeinyɨra.
Jonɨ aalya bavɨtaazɨyabwina Sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ Gotɨyai duzɨwaakaka? Kwaakevakɨ a'mwera duzɨwaakeva? Dɨza'nanyɨjɨla!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' yagaala dɨnyɨna “ ‘Sɨgunyavɨdaasasɨra,’ kudawaajɨ ‘Jonɨ nɨmɨnyɨna wɨjɨwaaka'. Baa'na mu'nyetaihɨlaka!’ nanedathɨka!
Sare' kɨrɨ' ‘A'mweraavɨdaasasɨ,’ madaanna! Kwala bwa'naanya' nanerabɨka! Sahwaraavɨna lɨka yadaa mwaaiho.” Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe yuyara yawɨ'na “Nebulyasɨ. Jonɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nanejɨwaakadelyɨ.”
Sara dɨnyɨna yeva Jizaazarɨ ma'maa'na “Sa'na myawɨrivanɨgo.” Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nabaai manyɨjɨvanɨgasa'na nɨmɨ yawaaihe'ne dɨragɨnya'na mihɨzɨwaakɨwɨnesɨ.”

Sahwai ke'ba'na wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwai wawɨnyavɨ gɨraipɨzɨla maarya'na burɨnna ya'. Sai kurɨta yavɨkaryaka gɨraipɨwɨla burɨdaka kavi'nɨnnyavɨ gɨraipɨzɨla mwa'mwagikya'ne' lɨkaka anga maalɨki' wawɨnyaba banganarya'ni' madɨna. Mi'na madɨna yaka pwaraavɨ wɨda' ‘Nɨmɨre wawɨnya' maremwaalapi gɨraipɨzɨla pɨnɨ yɨhɨzaavɨde.’ Sahwara wawɨnya' kamaremwaale' a'mwe sai kwaaka pɨbanna kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna wɨna kya' gɨraipɨzɨla mya yakegaa' sai gannya wawɨnyawɨnna wɨdaayaderɨ wawɨnyavɨne sɨla pɨnɨnna wɨdaasɨna.
A'mwe wɨdaasɨna yakei kaanna wɨna kya' wawɨnya' maremwaaidɨvɨsara wɨdaayade sarɨ galalɨmwanna yeva mala wɨrameva ayɨna wawɨnya' gyakwaryawɨnna simaayarɨ wɨdaasɨna.
Sara wɨdaasɨna kye' gyakwai wɨdaayade pwarɨ wɨdaasɨna kya' gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ kayaaka yeva bɨrala yɨna.
Sara kye' wɨdaayade pwarɨ wɨdaasɨna kya' sarɨ mena tamakeva wɨdaayade pwaraavɨ wɨdaasakeraavɨ pwaraavɨ mala tamɨna yeva pwaraavɨ mena tamakɨna ye'.
Sara kye' wawɨnya gyakware pwai gawaalɨvaangei yɨlaaya wɨmaryadei kuna mwaala'. Ganɨmaangei daka ‘Nyɨbwaalɨvaangerɨna tewaanna yawɨpɨ'derera,’ daka wɨdaasɨna.
Wɨdaasɨna kya' widavadaa'nyɨ wawɨnya' maremwaaidɨvɨsara tɨnna wanganeva dɨne' ‘Sai gawaalɨ' dɨvi ganɨmaangere yuya maaradelyɨra. Yarala, tamakawaajɨ gamɨre wawɨnya' namaaradɨ'de'na maraadeinera.’
Sara dɨnyɨna yeva galalɨmwanna yeva tamakɨna yeva gɨraipɨziwawɨnyavɨdaa'nyɨ marasɨ'na ye'.
Gɨraipɨwawɨnyavɨ naangei berɨ' yadelaka? Sahwai wɨlaabozɨ a'mwe saraavɨ kayaaka wigalakojɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨ ‘Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨre wawɨnya' dɨmaremwaalyideihɨlyɨra,’ wɨdathelyɨ.
Gotɨyai dɨnɨke' pɨkarɨyɨkwia tɨnna mwanganyɨ yadɨvɨsa' daaka?” wɨdɨna ya'. Wɨdɨna yaka sahwai yawɨ'na “Sɨlaangeinyɨra,” yawɨraka wɨdɨna “Dara dɨnɨke'
‘Anga madɨvɨsara sɨlaangerɨ wanganeva
“Kayaa'nanyai,” dɨneva marasɨ'na yesai
Simɨjamaanga nawɨ'nyai yɨma'nyɨna ya'.
Gotɨyare sara wakɨna yake'
Tɨnna wanganona “Tewaanya',” dɨno.’
Gotɨyare bukuya' sara dɨnɨkesɨ.”
Juya naangera dara wangane' “O, nemɨnyɨna ke'ba'nanya' duthɨwaka!” Deve'na “Jizaazarɨ wɨla yɨrakaana!” dɨneva kwala bwa'naanyavɨna lɨka yeva gamɨnyawɨ yagalya'mavaawɨna ye'.
A'mwe naanga sara Perɨzɨya pwarajɨ Erotɨyare pwarajɨ saraavɨ wɨdaasɨna “Jizaazai kayaa'na wɨdathe'na dɨwila! ‘Kayaa'na kudozɨ kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaihaana!’ dapɨri dɨwila!”

Sara wɨdaasɨna yesara kaanna bɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, ‘Nebulya' dade' midaaka!’ gyawɨ'mwo. A'mwe aane pwai kwai gɨmɨnyɨna dɨvanɨke'na lɨka myɨvanɨgɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mweraavɨre sɨnna gavevɨ tɨnna mwanganyadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Aawa. A'mwe naangeraavɨjɨ a'mweraavɨjɨ avaaina wɨdadɨ Gotɨyarebwi gavebwi nayaa wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨnyɨra. Romɨ maremwaaidei Sizaarɨ taakɨzɨya wɨjaaya'na nemɨre yagaaikɨwɨnya berɨ' dɨnɨkavaka? Tewaanya' daaka? Aawa daaka? Taakɨzɨya wɨjavaadeina daaka? Mujavaanneina daaka?”
Sara wɨdesara kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdesaraavɨna yawɨraka wɨdɨna “ ‘Sahwai kayaa'nanyabwi yana!’ yawɨreva yaamɨjɨ baa'na nyɨdɨwaava! Mone' tɨnna wanganya'neinyɨ dɨnyɨmaryaama!”
Wɨdɨna kya' mi'na makabɨna kye' wɨdɨna “Pikɨzaaya dasɨ pɨkarya dajɨ aaihwarengaka?”

“Maremwaaidei Sizaarengɨra,” wɨde' sahwara. Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sizaarɨ Sizaare ayɨna duzaayɨla! Gotɨyarɨ Gotɨyare ayɨna duzaayɨla!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨnyɨna “Nawɨ'nyabwina dadele!” dɨnyɨna ye'.
A'mwe Sazuzɨyara, “A'mwera kabalapi yuna madɨkaayɨ yɨpɨ'dera,” yawɨresarajɨya pwara gamɨnyawɨnna beva yɨwaara'na
“Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, Ne Mozɨzai nedɨnɨke' ‘A'mwe pwai kware gya'mwei balajai kaimɨraavɨmaayai a'mwevɨ bwasɨkwoja' a'mwei a'mwe savɨ maarojɨ kaimɨraaya maryawakɨnna, yaya' baryarɨne' wɨdɨna yadengɨra.’
Sa'na dɨnɨke' a'mwe ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyadaraka mwaale'. Kamwaale' sɨraangai a'mwevɨ maaraka kaimɨraavɨmaayai gamɨre sɨvigwa'jɨkerɨnei kunei bala'.
Kabala' dɨviyai a'mwe savɨ maaraka kaimɨraavɨmaayai bala'. Kabala' dɨviya pwai avaaina ya'.
Sana sana yuyara ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyadaraka a'mwe savɨ maareva kaimɨraavɨmaayadaraka bale'. Kabale' aayagaa' a'mwe sa' bala'.
Dɨkaasagaa' sahwaraavɨ kyɨdɨkaavojɨ a'mwe gaware' mwaaladevaka? Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ata purɨdaasɨ daraalyara yuya sadaraka balaanga sa' maaresa'nanyɨ.”
Sara yɨwaara'na kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre sɨmunya kayaa'na yawɨ'manɨga'. Gotɨyare bukuyasɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyasɨ myawɨrivanɨgasavɨ kayaa'na yawɨ'manɨgasa'na midaaka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Baryara dɨkaapɨ'dehaa' a'mwera a'mwengɨ mamaarina, a'mwe a'mweraavɨ mamaa'nyɨ yɨpɨ'dengɨ. Aawa. Sɨgunyavɨ balaangengɨ mamaaryadɨvɨsara mamaayara mwaaihatabaaibɨsarera.

Nabaai baryara dɨkaapɨ'de'na Ne Mozɨzai yɨdayaake' yɨsɨ' dɨka nyaake' yagaalyavɨ mwanganyɨjeva! Yɨsɨkɨdaasɨ Gotɨyai Mozɨzarɨ wɨjaa' ‘Dahaa' Evɨraamɨmɨre Gotɨyainyɨ. Dahaa' Aazakɨmɨre Gotɨyainyɨ. Dahaa' Jaikopɨmɨre Gotɨyainyɨ.’

Mozɨzai sara yɨdayaake' a'mwera baleva Gotɨyareba mwaaihasa'na Gotɨyai wɨdɨna ‘Kumɨre Gotɨyainyɨ.’ A'mwera yawɨ'na ‘O, a'mwe bainɨkera.’ Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yawɨ'na ‘Nɨmɨnyɨne'na gaala mwaaihasara.’ Sarɨmɨre yagaala kwaasɨ yagaalyasɨra,” wɨdɨna ya'.
Yagaaikɨwɨja pwai baka dɨnyɨna yesa' wɨ'naka dara wanganake' “Sahwai nayaa duthɨvanɨka!” Daka yɨwaara'na “Yagaaikɨwɨnya kwalaalya warɨ'. Yagaaikɨwɨnya aaya sɨnnawɨnya' berɨvaka?”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Yagaaikɨwɨnya sɨnnawɨnya' dara dɨnɨke' ‘Yɨzɨrelɨyaihi du'nyi! Naangei nemɨre Gotɨyai Naanga gave pwainanyalyɨra.
Naangei gɨmɨre Gotɨyarɨna naanga gɨvu'nana! Gɨmɨre sɨmunya yuyavɨjɨ gɨmɨre kurya naangeinajɨ gɨmɨre yawɨta yuyangɨjɨ, gɨmɨre dɨragɨnya yuyangɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨna naanga gɨvu'nana!’

Yagaaikɨwɨnya aya kɨrɨ' dara dɨnɨke' ‘Gɨmɨ saigɨ gɨmɨnyɨna kale gyɨvanɨke' a'mwe gɨmɨre angeba mwaalɨkerɨna sara kale gyana!’ Yagaaikɨwɨnya dawaai naangewaalyɨra. Yagaaikɨwɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yuya sawaarɨ wavɨla'manɨka pɨrɨ' mɨ'.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Yagaaikɨwɨjai wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, tewaanya dɨwaana. Nayaa dɨwaa ‘Gamɨ gave pwainanyalyɨ. Gotɨya aane pwai kwai mamwaalyɨ'.’

Gamɨnyɨna sɨmunya yuyasɨ, munyɨ' yuyɨsɨ, yawɨta yuyasɨ, dɨragɨnya yuyajɨ, naanga nevu'nade'na tewaanyasɨra. Nabaai nemɨnyɨna kale neyɨvanɨke' a'mwe nemɨre angeba mwaalɨkerɨna kale sara neyana! Sa' tewaanyasɨra. Sawaai naangewaalyɨra. Gotɨyarɨne sipɨzipɨya bulɨmakaawoya yuyara dɨka nasɨ'na yadejɨ yuya yanga wɨmaarina yadaanyajɨ sa maalɨkengɨra.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai dara wanganake' “Gamɨ sai tewaanya dathɨvanɨka!” Daka wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai maremwaaideva maavewɨ mamwaalyɨgɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe aane pwai kwai myawɨramaari “Nɨmɨ lɨka myɨvanɨge. Yagaala pɨnɨ yɨwaaravɨdeinyɨra,” myawɨramaari ya'.
Gotɨyare Angevɨ Jizaazai wɨjɨwaakakei wɨdɨna “ ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai, Gotɨyai wɨdasaabathei Ne Devitɨmɨ Gawaalɨkɨra,’ Yagaaikɨwɨjara sara be'na wɨdɨvanɨgava?
Gotɨyare Kuryarɨ Devitɨ sahwai pɨkarya yɨdayaa'
‘Nemɨre Naangei nɨmɨre Naangerɨ wɨda'
“Naarɨmɨ yuyaraavɨ maremwaalakadeinaalyɨ.
Nɨmɨre aangasabanna dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ.
Gɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ yɨkamaangeraavɨ marulawakɨdehaa'nanyɨ.” ’
Devitɨ sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna ‘Naangelyɨra,’ sara dɨnɨke'na gamɨre gawaalɨvaangei gara mwaalɨka!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya wɨ'neva yɨlaaya ye'.

Sara wɨjɨwaakɨna “Yagaaikɨwɨja pwaraavɨrebwi mipɨnera! Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Kumɨ sara yɨlaayabwi ‘A'mwera yawɨpɨka! “Sara sɨdu'nakera mwaaihava!” ’ deva yɨvɨta gaala saamɨnya' marabwaayeva kaanya yamaryɨvanɨgasabwi. Mubyabanna a'mwera ‘Naangeigɨ. Tewaanyaigɨ,’ wɨdɨvanɨgasabwi.
Lotuangevɨ naangeraavɨre namwaalyɨsangɨ mwaaimanɨgasabwi. Tɨka munnegaa' nawɨ'nyaba gaveba nɨvanɨgasabwi. Sabwina yɨlaaya marivanɨga'.

Sara yɨvanɨgasara yaanyɨwaakengɨre angengɨ kuka yuna maa'manɨgasara. A'mwera ‘Kumɨ sara tewaanyarera,’ yawɨrya'nera tɨbarɨyagaala naanga kwaasɨ wɨdɨvanɨga'. Sara yɨvanɨgasaraavɨ Gotɨyai naanna jɨdavadera daanga naanga wɨvɨnaderera,” wɨdɨna ya'.
Gotɨyare angevɨ nɨgwia wakya'neba aya kɨba Jizaazai mwaalaka a'mwera nɨgwia wakesangɨ tɨnna wanganna. Tɨnna wangadaa'nyɨ a'mwera gɨlyɨvɨta naangejɨyara nɨgwia naanga kwake'
yaanyɨwaake' gɨlyɨvɨ'maaya' baka nɨgwia maalɨkikaai wakɨna.
Sara wakɨna kya' sai gamɨreraavɨ jɨvwaramaa'na yaka wɨdɨna “Nyu'nyɨla! Nebwi yɨhɨthɨwa. Yaanyɨwaaka gɨlyɨvɨ'maaya da' Gotɨyarɨna naanga wɨjaawaka. Pwara maalɨ'na wɨjawaava.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwara nɨgwia naange wakɨwaasa Gotɨyai wanganaka nabaai nɨgwia naanga naanga kumɨre angengɨ kuna warɨke wanganaka dɨvanɨ' ‘Yanga maalɨkesɨra.’ A'mwe' nɨgwia maalɨkikaai wakɨwakevɨ Gotɨyai wanganaka dara wangamwake' ‘Ai, a'mwe sa' wɨgainɨwake' gannya yuya dakɨwaka! Nɨgwia pɨnɨ wapaaya mubya'na mwarijɨka!’ Daka dɨvanɨ' ‘Yanga naangesɨra.’ ”
Sai Gotɨyare angevɨ bwalyodaa'nyɨ gamɨre pwai wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, dangana! Sɨla anga tewaanya sangɨ dangana!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Anga tewaanya dangɨ mwanganyɨjɨvanɨgɨna? Sɨlaanga a'ba yɨla'dɨ'nyɨya' kunewɨ mwari yadesɨ. Arɨkewɨ. Yuya wo'dalayɨwɨnasɨpɨ'dengɨ.”
Dɨvi sagaa' Mugunya Wolivɨ sai mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyare Ange' pihɨrɨ mannadɨsɨ wangadaa'nyɨ a'mwera mamwaalyaba Pitalyɨ Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ Edɨruyalyɨ sara yɨwaara'na
“Dɨnedana! Dɨwaanya sa' Gotɨyare angevɨna gathɨhaa' yɨma'nadevaka? ‘Jizaazai sara nedake' yarai yɨma'naabazɨ!’ be wɨjɨwaainya' wanganawaajɨ yawɨraadevaka?”
Mi'na yɨwaara'na kye' Jizaazai gaai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Pwai kwai kwaasɨ yagaala nayɨhɨthathɨka!
A'mwe kwalaalyara nɨmɨnyɨne yaya' maarapɨjɨ wɨdɨpɨ'dera ‘Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨra. Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨra.’ Sara kadapɨjɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara ‘Nebulyasɨra,’ dapi kumɨnyɨ a'mwe kwaasɨyaraavɨ mɨdɨbɨ'derera.
Nabaai malyangɨnajɨ malyangɨne yɨhukyagaalyangɨnajɨ wɨ'napɨjɨ yawɨta kwalaalya mipɨnera! Aawa. Sa yɨma'nanne'na kɨrɨ' Kwaakevakɨ aaya' yarai yade' mɨ'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Anga naanga pimagɨnyara anga naanga pimagɨnya pwarajɨ mala bwa'nɨpɨ'derera. A'mwe naanga kingɨya pwarera a'mwe naangai kingɨya pwarerari mala bwa'nɨpɨ'derera. Kwalaalyaba wɨnɨnya yadengɨra. Mɨjɨka naanga yɨma'nadengɨra. Yuya yuya sa yɨbwasɨnapi dɨvidaasɨ kayaa'nanya yɨma'nadehaakɨra.

Kayaa'nanyara kayaaka nayɨhigaibɨ'de'na nayaa jawɨrila sarɨmɨ saihi! Pwara sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨla yɨrakapɨjɨ kaajolɨyaraavɨ yɨhɨmaaripɨ'dere. Lotuangengɨ yɨhɨrabɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨna Ga'maanɨyaraavɨjɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨ kingɨyaraavɨjɨ kihɨmwangapɨjɨ sarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' nebulya'na dɨzalɨkurakyide'nanyɨ!
Gotɨyai yawɨrake'na a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyara gazabazaba mwaaihasaraavɨ Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' sɨnnawɨ kujɨwaakapɨjɨ dɨvi aaya'na yɨma'nadehaakɨra.

Wɨla yɨhirapɨjɨ kotɨya yadɨvɨta angevɨna yɨhɨmarɨmwaaihya'nera kihɨmakabapɨjɨ sarɨmɨ yawɨta kwalaalya mipɨnera! ‘Nɨmɨ gara wɨdɨdeinyaka?’ myawɨpɨnera! Aawana. Sagaa' Gotɨyai yagaalya' sara kyɨhɨzaavojɨ dathaza' sara duzideihɨlyɨra. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaa' sarɨmɨ duzideihi mɨka. Aawa. Kurya Tewaanyai sara wɨdathelyɨra.

A'mwe pwai dɨna ‘Nya'mwerɨ tamakɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ,’ dozɨ gya'mwerɨ kotɨya yadɨvɨsabanna wɨmarɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Nabaai ganɨmaanga pwai gannya kaimɨraayarɨ wɨmarɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Kaimɨraaya pwara kuvɨnɨmaangeyuraavɨ kotɨyabanna makuna yɨpɨ'de yuya baibɨ'dengɨra.
Nɨmɨre yayavɨna yɨhyawɨ'dɨvɨ' saihɨrɨna a'mwe yuyaraavɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨdavaderera. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwai nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna daavajarɨ aayagaa' gannya barya'negaa' Gotɨyai padaihasamaaradelyɨra.”
