Yagaala da' yɨdavɨde'na nayaa jawɨrila! Sahwai wɨdɨna “Kayaa'nanaangei kayaaka yɨgaidei saba madaayɨ yajava kadaavojɨ danganyideihɨlyɨ.” Pɨkarya savɨ wangana'gɨzɨ Jizaazare yagaala sa' jawɨramaaka! “Daa'dɨsɨ Juthɨya mwaalyara mugunyangɨna yarai lɨkaanya wɨpɨka!
A'mwe pwai namwaalɨkwaasavɨ mwaalojɨyai ‘Angevɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kɨnɨ wɨlamaarɨma!’ majai yarai lɨkaanya wɨna yana!.
A'mwe pwai wawɨnya yɨvanɨkei gannya angevɨna yɨvɨta maarya'nei ayɨna mabannelyɨ.
Dazagaasagaa', we', a'mwe kaimɨraavɨmunnakenge! We', aamunya wɨjaavanɨgave sagaake!
‘Burɨke' nabwalaradɨka! Yɨrɨlya' nanedathɨka!’ dapɨjɨ tɨbarɨyagaala duzɨla!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaa'na a'mweraavɨ daanga naanga wɨvɨnadehaakɨra. Daanga naanga nevɨnaja sagaa' kayaa'nanyagaakɨra. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai wakyaakegaasɨ kɨgaasɨ dahaa' kɨgaasɨ wɨla dɨvi kɨgaasɨ daanga sabwi aawano. Arɨkewɨ.

‘Yɨrɨka sa daanga naangegaa' yesɨmavadɨma!’ Gotɨyai yagaala sara majɨ yaja' a'mwe yuya kɨlaa'nake mamwaalyɨ yɨpɨ'dengɨra. Aawa. ‘ “Nɨmɨre dahɨlakɨwera nabaibɨthɨka!” dena nɨmɨ yesɨmavadɨma!’ Gotɨyai dɨna ya'.
Sagaa' pwai kwai gɨthaza' ‘Dangana! Dava Kɨraazɨtɨyai mwaalɨ',’ nabaai gɨthaza' ‘Dangana! Keiba mwaalɨ',’ sarɨmɨ mu'nɨpɨnera!

Dɨvi kwaasɨ kwaasɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyara, Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta kwaasɨ kwaasɨyara kumɨ sara kwaasɨ yawɨradɨdɨvɨ' wɨlaabapɨjɨ dapɨjɨ ‘Gotɨyai dahɨlakakera yawɨpɨ'de' dɨngaka? Kwaasɨ yagaala wɨ'nɨpɨka! Kayaa'na yɨpɨka!’ wɨjɨwaainyajɨ atɨka maru'natajɨ kwaasɨ yɨpɨ'derera.
Sara yɨpɨ'de'na sarɨmɨ saihi tewaanna nayaa dɨvaihanaryɨla! Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Dɨvi yuya sa yɨma'nyɨna yadengɨna sɨnnawɨ sagaa' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.
Sare' kɨrɨ' sagaa' daanga naanga wɨvɨnade sasa' tɨvi'na kyojɨ yɨrɨka sangɨ nyɨlyai mujɨ kyojɨ jɨhɨnya yɨma'nyɨna, nabaai lawei mujɨ yadelyɨ.
Sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyarɨka pɨrɨ' bwala'na, pɨrɨ' bwala'na, sɨgunyavɨ dɨragɨnya warɨkevɨ wɨnɨnya naange'na yɨma'nadesɨ.
Wɨnɨnya kyojɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai yɨraayavɨ dɨragɨnya naange', tewaanya naange', byaanna naange' wa'dozɨyavɨ kwalaabozɨ wangabɨ'delyɨra.
Sahwai ejelɨyaraavɨ wɨdaasɨna ‘Nɨmɨre dahɨlakengɨ Kwaakevakɨ yuneba pimagɨ pimagɨ akyamwidaa'nyɨ akyamwidaa'nyɨ kwala dalamari'bwaraawila!’ wɨdasaabɨna yadelyɨra.”
“Yɨta pihɨya wanganapɨjɨ ke'ba'nanya sa' jawɨrila! Pihɨtaanyavɨ wɨvya naanga kyojɨ sedala pwa'nyɨna yojɨyagaa' sarɨmɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' ‘Pihɨya' lɨ'mwa'. Nyɨlyagaa' aya kɨgaa' yɨma'nadehaakɨ.’
Sara yawɨ'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ dɨwe sangɨ yɨpɨ'dengɨ wanganapɨjɨ dara jawɨrila! ‘Gamɨ mi'na yarai walaabathei. Tɨkuryavɨ daavɨ'.’
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨwa. A'mwe sagaa' mwaalyara kuna myɨmanɨgwiadapi yuya dɨwe sa yɨma'nadehaa'nanyɨ.
Sɨgunyasɨ Kwaakevasɨ savakaai dɨvi sagaa' kiwawojɨ kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yagaalya' yɨwawode' mɨ'. Waragothesɨra.”
“Yɨrɨka walaabɨde sagaa'na aane pwai kwai yawɨradehaa' mɨ'. Ejelɨyara Gotɨyareba mwaaihasara myawɨrivanɨga'. Gotɨyarɨ Gawaalɨvaangai myawɨrivanɨ'. Nɨmwai gavei yawɨ'manɨ'.
Sarɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sare' dare'nesɨ. ‘Sagaa' gathɨhaa' yɨma'nade' dɨngaka?’ myawɨrivanɨgo. Sare'na dɨvaihanaryɨla!

A'mwe daibɨsainyɨra. A'mwe sai pɨwɨnnei gannya wawɨnyangɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ maramwaaihɨna kumɨre wawɨnya'na, pwai gannya wawɨnya wɨjɨwaakɨna, pwai gannya wawɨnya wɨjɨwaakɨna sana sana yaka tɨkuryaba mwaaidei damerɨ wɨdɨna ‘Nayaa dɨvaihana'!’ wɨdɨwakelyɨ. Sahɨbaaibɨ' yɨhɨthɨma!

‘Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨreihi, nabaai nayaa dɨvaihanaryɨla!’ Sare' dare'nesɨ. Angevɨne naangerɨna yawɨ'na ‘Gamɨ gathɨngaa' bathei dɨnga'!’ myawɨrivanɨgo. ‘Sawɨsavɨ bathei dɨngaka? Kalawawegaa' bathei dɨngaka? Yɨrɨkunyagaa' bathei dɨngaka? Yɨrɨke byaaka gaai yadaaworiyagaa' bathei dɨngaka? Nemɨ myawɨrivanɨgo,’ dapi nayaa dɨvaihanaryɨla!
‘Nɨmɨ yɨme'nyabɨ' yɨma'naaba'mujɨ yarai walaabɨde'na se wa'dapi nayɨhwangamudɨ'!
Nabaai nɨmɨrerajɨ kayaa'na nabaibɨthɨka!’ dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge sa'na a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨvanɨge ‘Nayaa dɨvaihanaryɨla!’ ” wɨdɨna ya' Jizaazai.

“Sawɨta daryaai kajɨnnojɨ tɨka Pari'ma'munne'najɨ tɨka munne Gɨrɨkula lɨwɨnya pamidakɨna myade'najɨ naadengɨra,” Juyara dɨnyɨna. Sara dɨnyɨna kye' sagaa' sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Juyaraavɨre Yagaaikɨwɨjarajɨ dɨnyɨna “Nemɨ lɨka gavabɨ' yulyarawaajɨ wɨla yɨrawaajɨ tamakaade'na sahwarɨ?” dɨnyɨna ye'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwara dɨna “Tɨka munne sagaa' a'mwera mala nanerabɨka! Sagaa' sarɨna mwaalana!”

Sai Anga Betaani mwaalaka Saaimonɨ Samatanakere angevɨ wɨlɨna wapaaya nya'nei walyamwaaidɨsɨ a'mwe' wɨlaabɨna. A'mwe' simaa'gula nawɨ'nya wabatɨrɨnya naathɨ tɨrɨnya winya'ne mubya naange yake' yɨ'nɨkesɨ makulaabɨna. Makulaabɨna yaka simaa'gulya' tɨngɨ'na yaka gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ dɨngɨna ya'.
Tɨvi'na dɨngɨna kya' pwara sɨmunyangɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ dɨnyɨna “Wabatɨrɨnya winya'ne' be'na wasɨ'nɨwaka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Wabatɨrɨnya sa' kinaaya kwala naanga naanga (yɨrɨka 300 wawɨnya'ne nɨgwia) mubazɨ kwajɨ a'mwe nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨ nɨgwia kujaavadɨka!” Dɨnyɨna yeva “A'mwemɨlɨ'gɨ baa'na yɨwaa!” maanga wɨdɨna.
Maanga mi'na wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “A'mwe' mwaalana! Sara baa'na wɨdɨvanɨgava! Nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nawɨ'nya' nyɨwakesɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyaba yuyagaa' a'mwe nɨgwɨmaayara mwaaidɨvɨ' ‘Wawɨnya maayaraavɨ tewaanya wideinyɨ,’ yawɨrapiyagaa' tewaanya jideihɨlyɨra. Wawɨmaayara yuna mwaaidɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyaba yuyagaa' mamwaalyɨ yɨdeinyɨra.
A'mwe sa' yanne'na yɨwa'. Dahaa' nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ kanyɨdɨngɨwa' dɨvidaasɨ wabatɨrɨnakeinyɨ balɨdeinyɨra.
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨwa. Kwaaka yuyavakaavɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨdɨpɨ'devakaavɨ a'mwe' nyɨnɨke' gamɨnyɨ yawɨpɨ'de'na wɨjɨwaakɨpɨ'desɨra.”

Sagaa' gamɨre a'mwe ata yuyɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraalyara mwaaidɨvɨ' a'mwe gavei Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyai Juthaazai wo'nɨkei mwaaida “Kumɨ wɨla yɨrakɨpɨ'de'na wɨdɨma!” daka sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨne tamira'dɨvɨta naangeraayawɨnna wɨna.

Mi'na wawaka yagaala wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ yɨlaaya marina yeva “Gɨmɨnyɨna nɨgwia gɨzavaana!” wɨdɨna ye'. Mi'na wɨdɨna kye' yawɨ'na “Kumɨ Jizaazarɨ wɨla yɨrakɨpɨ'de'na nɨmɨ gara yɨdeinyaka?” Yawɨraka kuna yawɨ'na ya'.

Munne Gɨrɨkula lɨwɨnya mamɨlyade' gaai yɨma'nyɨna kya' sagaa' Pari'ma'munne sipɨzipɨya dɨwɨnyarɨ Juyara tadɨvɨsagaa' gamɨrera wɨdɨna “Nemɨ kwawaajɨ gɨmɨ Pari'ma'munne sipɨzipɨyarɨ dɨnade'na gava yovɨrawakaajɨwona?”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' gamɨreraarɨ wɨdaasɨna ya' “Angeba wɨlakɨri a'mwe pwai aalɨtalya' kinya marina yɨwakerɨ duzɨma'naawila! Wɨjɨma'naawakɨri angevɨ wɨlaawadevanyarɨ dɨmɨdɨnyɨla!
Saba angesɨyarɨ duzɨla! ‘Gotɨyare yagaala wɨjɨwaakadei gɨthɨvanɨ' “Gavi ku'dɨka yarinɨkevɨ se wa'deva gavanaka? Pari'ma'munnevɨ nɨmɨjɨ nɨmɨrerari naadevanyɨra.” ’
Kɨrɨmɨ sara kudakɨri gavi ku'dɨka naanga munyaba yarinɨkevɨ nemɨnyɨne namwaalyɨtajɨ taivolɨyajɨ warɨkevɨ yɨhibwarɨdaakwadevɨ nemɨnyɨna wapaaya jovɨrawakyɨla!”
Tɨvi'na wɨdaasɨna kya' gamɨreraai wawagɨla angeba wɨlaawɨna yagɨla dara wanganagɨlya' “Jizaazai sara nehɨthɨwake darɨ'!” Mi'na yawɨragɨla Pari'ma'munne yuya yovɨrawakɨna yagi.
Sawɨsa' mena kajɨnna' sahwai gamɨrerari bɨna ya'.

Bɨna kya' wapewakamaranyavɨna asɨrajɨ dɨhaihɨ'na yadɨvɨ' namwaaidapi Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨwa. Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai nɨmɨnyɨna yɨkamaangera wɨla nyɨrakɨpɨ'de'na nyɨmarɨmwaaihadei nɨmɨjɨ wapaa nɨvanɨgolyai nɨmɨnyɨna yɨkamaangeraavɨ wɨdathelyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kumɨnyɨ kale wiadaa'nyɨ pwai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ daaka? Nɨmɨ dɨngaka?” pwai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ daaka?” yuyara sana sana wɨdɨna.
Mi'na wɨdɨna kye' sahwai wɨdɨna “Atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraalyaihɨlyɨya pwalyɨ gɨrɨkula maa'gula gavevɨ dɨwɨlavanɨvanɨgolyalyɨra.

Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨkabaaibɨsa'na ‘A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai barya'nei wawadelyɨra.’ We', a'mwei A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨna yɨkamaangeraavɨ wɨdathele! Sara kyojɨ a'mwe sarɨ ganaange' mamaari yajɨ kwajɨ tewaanya kyadɨ'!”
Kumɨ nadaapi Jizaazai gɨrɨkula maaraka Gotɨyarɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨre yaya' makimwa. Su! Su!” Mi'na wɨdaka gunyɨna gunyɨna yaka wɨjaavaka wɨdɨna “Dɨmaaryɨla! Da' nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨra.”
Wɨdaka kaapɨvananya' maaraka Gotɨyarɨ “Su!” wɨdaka wɨjaavɨna kya' kumɨ sara yuyara pwai nyɨna pwai nyɨna ye'.
Mi'na nyɨna kye' wɨdɨna “Waainɨya' mi'na nɨwaasa' yɨ, wɨlɨmwagarɨkeburɨne nɨmɨre tawe' nɨwaasasɨ. Nɨmɨre tawe sa' gɨragɨre a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨna bwalaravadesɨ.
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Aalya waainɨya' gɨraipɨwɨlyavɨdaasa' ayɨna manya'mujɨ Gotɨyai maremwaaideva waainɨya mudɨke' nɨdehaa'nanyɨ. Arɨkewɨnyɨ.”
Tɨvi'na wɨdɨna kya' yɨledaata pɨrɨ'na deva Mugunya Wolivɨna kaanna wɨna ye'.
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ lɨka yapi nɨmɨnyɨ dɨnyagalya'makwideihɨlyɨra. Gotɨyai dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Sipɨzipɨya yɨ'dɨvaiderɨ karamaka'mujɨ sipɨzipɨyara lɨkaanya yɨwɨnadaapɨ'derera.
Sara jide kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ kabala'mujɨ kanyadɨkaavojɨ Galɨlineinyɨ sɨnnawɨ yɨhibwaramakwaanɨdeinyɨ waanɨdera.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pitai wɨdɨna “A'mwe yuyara kyagɨhalya'makwopi nɨmɨ aawa!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na gɨthɨwa. Sawɨta dahaasagaa' nɨmɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe sarɨ mwanganyainyɨra,’ duthatheigɨnyɨra. Dahasaai dahaa' kada'gɨzɨ kukuraayai yagaala pɨgasaai dathelyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' yagaala dɨragɨnna bazɨwɨna “Gɨmɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe sarɨ mwanganyainyɨ,’ majɨ yɨwɨja' nehɨramakɨpɨ'deinaalyɨra. Arɨkawɨ.” Gamɨ sara wɨdake' yuyara sara wɨdɨna ye'.
Yaayeba Gazamani wo'nɨkebanna wɨna kye' sai gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ tɨbarɨyagaala wɨdadaa'mujɨ dava dalamwaalyɨla!”
Pitalyɨ Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraavɨ pɨbanna makuna yaka lɨka kya' gamɨre kale dusɨna gɨnyɨwanna'na kya'
kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre kale dusɨna nyɨgɨnyɨwanna'mwake' balɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Dava mwaalapɨjɨ dɨvaihanaryi!”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka sangirɨ'na wawaka kwaakevɨna wala'na yaka tɨbarɨyagaala wɨdɨna “Daanga nyɨvɨnadehaa'na gɨthɨwa. Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Daanga mavɨnannera!’ dɨza' daanga nyɨvɨnya'ne' myɨma'nyɨ yana!
Tataai, Nɨmwai, dɨragɨnaangeigɨ, yuya nayaa yɨnneigɨnyɨra. ‘Daanga nuvɨnadɨka! Sabwi marasɨ'nɨma!’ dɨza' dɨmarasɨ'na! Kɨrɨ' sɨmunya nɨmɨreburɨdaasɨ minnera! Aawa. Gɨnnyaburɨdaasɨ ja!”
Ayɨna baka dara wanganake' “Se dakava!” Daka Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Saaimonɨ, se dakɨ? Maalɨkegaa' mabaihanarijɨwaa?
Sarɨmɨ tɨbarɨyagaala dɨthavaihanarila! ‘Saataanɨ kayaa'na naneyadɨka!’ majaihi ‘Nemɨ nayaa baihanaraana!’ kuryaraavɨ yawɨ'manɨga'. Sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ maa'na naanga yɨhimanɨke'na se wa'mwaa'.”
Sara wɨdaka ayɨna wawaka tɨbarɨyagaala wɨdake' ayawɨdaasɨ wɨdɨna.
Mi'na wɨdɨna yaka ayɨna baka dara wanganake' “Se dakava!” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨre tɨnnya se'na yɨdaakwe'. Sara kada' kumɨ dɨna “Nemɨ berɨ' wɨdaazɨwona?” deva navɨka mwaalɨna ye'.

Dahasaai dahaa' yagalaawaka wɨdɨna “Kwazaaka se wa'manɨgasaihi daaka? Mi'nanyɨra. Yɨthaanyi, dahaa' kyɨma'nɨwa' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ tamakya'na pwai kayaa'nanyaraavɨ malya'neraavɨ mena wibwarɨdaakuwaka!
Dɨthaayɨla! Nemɨ wɨrata'naana! Yɨthaanyi, nɨmɨnyɨna yɨkamaangeraavɨ wibwarɨdaakwakei yɨnɨ'.”

Sagaa' wɨdadaa'nyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' Juthaazai a'mwe atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraalyarajɨya pwai bɨna. Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Juyaraavɨre Kɨwɨjarajɨ Juya naangerajɨ sara wɨdaasɨna kye' kwala naanga mwaalevera kwaari'masɨramɨnya, kɨlɨyɨ'gwahaalya lɨmwanna yevera Juthaazalyɨ bɨna ye'.
Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' yɨkamaangeraavɨ wibwarɨdaakwakei wɨjɨwaakakei “Nɨmɨ yɨlaaya mariwɨjai sahwalyɨ. Nayaa lɨmwagapɨjɨ nayaa baihana'dɨvɨ' dɨmakwila!”
Sara wɨjɨwaakakei baka yɨme'nya'bɨ' gamɨnyawɨnna wɨjɨmaatavaka wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ!” Tɨvi'na wɨdaka yɨlaaya marina ya'.
Yɨlaaya marina kya' aawɨlasara ata galalɨmwanna yeva wɨla yɨrɨna.
Wɨla yɨrɨna kye' daavesarajɨya Jizaazarei akwai, kwaari'masɨramɨnya' maaraka sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangere yaasɨwa'wawɨnyarɨ yɨrɨ'gainyɨna yaka gamɨre kadɨkikɨ lihɨwɨ'na ya'.
Sara kya' Jizaazai malya'neraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kuka yɨpalamaa'dɨnyainyɨ daaka! Kwaari'masɨramɨnyajɨ kɨlɨyɨ'gwahaalyajɨ lɨmwanna yeva ‘Yɨpalamaa'deibɨsarɨ wɨla yɨraana!’ deva davɨvanɨga'!
Gazagaasagaa' yɨrɨkeryaavɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ sarɨmɨjɨ mwaaidɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨnyagaa' wɨla manyɨryadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Sa'na kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai dɨnɨke' yune'na yɨma'nana!”
Tɨvi'na wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera yagalya'ma'na yeva lɨkaanya wɨna ye'.
Mɨgɨnya akwai kwaabɨhannya pɨrɨ'na yewaa'bwa'nakei mɨdɨnna kya' pwara kwaabɨhannya' galamwagi'nyɨna kye'
kamagaduyɨvale' kannyɨmaayai kaanyave'na wɨna ya'.
Jizaazarɨ Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangeryawɨnna makuna yadaapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Juya naangerajɨ Juyaraavɨre Kɨwɨjarajɨ yɨ'bwa'nɨgavɨna.
Yɨ'bwa'nɨgavɨna yadaapi Pitai menyaba mɨdɨnaawɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangere angwaasavɨ wɨna kya' damerari mwaaleva dɨka yimwannyɨna.

Dɨka yɨmwannyɨna yadaapi Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ kaajolɨya yuyarari sara dɨnyɨna “Nemɨ tamakaade'na a'mwera dɨna ‘Jizaazai kayaa'na yakevɨ wanganena,’ dɨpɨ'dera gawɨ mwaaihava?” Dɨnyɨna kye' kɨrɨ' a'mwe sahwara mamwaalyɨna.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pɨjaakuna gamɨnyɨna kwaasɨ yagaala jalɨkurakesa' kɨrɨ' kumɨre yagaala avaainanya' majasɨ.
Pwara daavɨna yeva kwaasɨ yagaala dara wɨjalɨkurakɨna
“Gamɨ dake' nemɨ wɨ'no. Dara da' ‘Gotɨyare anga da' a'mwera yavɨkaryaasa' kayaaka yɨgala'mujɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ anga pɨrɨ' a'mwera mamajɨ yɨpɨ'de' madɨdeinyɨra,’ sara wɨ'no.”
Sare kɨrɨ' kumɨre yagaala ge' ge' dɨna yesa' avaainanya' mɨka.
Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei tɨnnyaba daavaka Jizaazarɨ yɨwaara'na “Yagaala pɨrɨ' mama'maa'dɨnneigɨ daaka? A'mwe dara jalɨkurakya aane pɨbwi kɨbwi mama'maarijɨwaana?”

Sara yɨwaara'na kya' sahwai yagaala majai aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' marɨvɨkɨri ya'. Pɨgasaai Sipɨzipɨya Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei yɨwaara'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨ daaka? Gotɨyai tewaanaanga yɨnɨkere kaimɨraayaigɨ daaka?”

Sara yɨwaara'na kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sahwainyɨra. A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai Gotɨyai dɨragɨnnakere aangasɨmagɨ kamwaalojɨ Gotɨyalyɨ maremwaalyɨkaderaarɨ danganyidelyɨra. Nabaai yɨraaya sɨgunyavɨ wa'dengɨ gamɨ walaabathelyɨra.”

Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangerɨ sɨnna tɨka kudava' baazɨ'ma'nya' maralihɨvainyɨna yaka yuyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nemɨ tɨvi'na wɨ'nɨwo' gamɨnyɨna yagaala jalɨkurakya'ne pwaraavɨna nemudaasɨwakeina daaka!
Gotɨyarɨna yagaaibɨraizɨka dɨwake' sarɨmɨ mi'na wɨ'nɨwaava. Berɨ' dɨzijɨwaa'?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' yuyara jɨda'na “Kayaa'nanyabwi yɨwake'na balana!”

Pwara gamɨnyɨ maagwala wopwakɨna yeva gamɨre sɨnnyavɨ bwakakɨna yeva asɨlyɨ gwamwagaranna yeva wɨdɨna “Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'na'gɨzɨ dɨnejɨwaakya! ‘Aai gɨramwaka?’ ” Mi'na wɨdɨna kye' damera gamɨnyɨ araraalyajɨ tamamakuna ye'.
Kwaakeba angwaasaba Pitai mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangere wawɨnya wɨdaayade' baka
Pitai dɨka yimwannakerɨ tɨnna wanganaka baihana'na ya'. Baihana'na yaka wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨjɨ Naazaretɨ mwaalyai Jizaazaryaba mwaaidɨnyaigɨnyɨra.”
Sa' wɨdɨna kya' Pitai “Nanyɨrabɨka!” daka kwaasɨ wɨdɨna “Arɨkawɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ nyɨdɨwaanya' myawɨryadɨnyainyɨra.” Mi'na wɨdaka adɨkurya savɨna mwalaawɨna.
Mwalaawɨna kya' wɨdaayade' wanganaka a'mwe yaasɨwa'mwaalyaraavɨ ayahi wɨdɨna “A'mwe dai kumɨjɨyalyɨra.”
Pitai nabaai wɨdɨna “Arɨkawɨnyɨ.” Dɨvi sagaa' kɨbawegaa' a'mwe yaasɨwa'mwaalyara Pitarɨ ayahi wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na gɨthɨwaka. Kumɨjɨyaigɨnyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Galɨli mwaalyaigɨnyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' yagaala dɨragɨnya wɨdɨna “(Daaina!) Gotɨyaryaba nebulya'nanyasɨra. Kwaasɨya'na mɨka! Sarɨmɨ dɨwaata a'mwe sarɨ mwanganyadɨnyainyɨra.”

Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' kukuraayai yarai pɨgasaai dɨna ya'. Dɨna kya' Pitai yawɨ'na ya' “Jizaazai sara nyɨdɨwa' ‘Kukuraayai pɨgasaai jaka majɨ kyojɨ nɨmɨnyɨna dahasaai dahaa' julyakɨdeigɨnyɨ.’ ” Pitai sara yawɨraka “ ‘Jizaazareinyɨ mɨka,’ be'na wɨdɨweinyaka!” kale kwia' kɨnna bazɨwɨlaawɨna ya'.

Mwanyagaa' yɨrɨke' gaai pu'daa'nyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' Gotɨyarɨne tamira'dɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ Juyaraavɨre Kɨwɨjarajɨ kaajolɨya pwarajɨ sara gamɨnyɨna jamungajɨna. Mi'na jamungajɨna yeva Jizaazarɨ wɨla pwɨyɨna, Ga'maanɨyai Kwaaka Juthɨya maremwaaide Paailatɨmyawɨnna makuna yeva sarɨ marɨmwaaihɨna.
Marɨmwaaihɨna kye' Paailatɨ gamɨnyɨ yɨwaara'na “Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨnyaigɨ kingɨyaigɨ daaka?” Yɨwaara'na kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ nyɨdɨwaanya' nebulyasɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera “Gamɨre kayaa'na yade sanna Paailatɨmɨ wɨjɨwakaana!” deva kwaasɨ yagaala kwalaalya wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Mi'na wɨjɨwaakɨna kye' Paailatɨ ayɨna yɨwaara'na “Tɨvɨkɨta pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' ja'nadɨna jɨtheigɨ midaaka? Yɨthaa, gɨmɨnyɨna kayaa'nanya kwalaalya nyɨjɨwakɨwaasange!”
Yɨwaara'na kya' Jizaazai yagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' majai mwaalake'na Paailatɨ atɨka maru'na'na ya'.
Kwazaaka naanga munne yanyagaa' yuyagaa' Juyara Paailatɨmɨ wɨdadɨvɨsare “Ayabaaibɨ' kalavuzarɨ yunakaanya duthaasa!” Sara dɨnɨke'na Paailatɨ sara yakelyɨ.
Sagaa' a'mwera kwaakevakɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ mala bwa'daaveva a'mweraavɨ karamake' naangera kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna. Kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaiheta pwai Baaravaazai wo'nɨkei mwaalɨna.
Mwaalɨna kya' kwala naange' beva Paailatɨmɨ gaai wɨdɨna “Dahaa'na nemɨnyɨna ayɨna yɨyabwi yagɨnya' sara ja!”
Wɨdɨna kye' Paailatɨ wɨdɨna “A'mweihi, Juyaraavɨ maremwaaiderɨ wɨla yaarɨjɨwa?”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Paailatɨ dara yawɨrakelyɨ “A'mwe kwalaalyara Jizaazarɨ yɨlaaya wɨmariwaasa'nanyɨ. Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera tɨganaarya yadɨvɨ' kotɨyavɨ marɨwɨmwaaihɨna yɨwaava.”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera kwala naangevɨ wɨjɨwɨrina “ ‘Jizaazai waramaryana! A'mwe Baravaazarɨ nejaavana!’ yarai duzɨla!” Sara wɨjɨwaakɨna kye' sara yɨna.
Mi'na yɨna kye' Paailatɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Nyɨdɨwaasa'na ‘A'mwe sai Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidela,’ dadɨvɨsarɨna gara yɨjɨwa?”
Wɨdɨna kya' ayɨna jaka danganna “Yɨsavɨri tamakya'na nilɨya dɨramo!”
“Baa'nevaka? Be kayaa'nanya yɨwakalaka?” Sa'na wɨdɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya' jaka naanga danganna “Tamakya'na yɨsavɨri nilɨya dɨramo!”
Sara danganna kye' Paailatɨ “Kwala bwa'naanya nɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yɨpɨka!” daka Baravaazarɨ wɨla yaaraka dameraavɨ wɨdɨna “Jizaazarɨ wɨla nilɨnakebaalyɨ tamapɨjɨ yɨsavɨ nilɨya jeramyɨla!”
Kwaaka Juthɨya maremwaaide angwaata Pɨraitorɨyamɨ (kotɨ ange') wo'nɨkewɨnna damera Jizaazarɨ jɨvwaramakwaweva aawɨlata yuya pwaraavɨ jaka jɨvwaramaa'na.
Jaka jɨvwaramaa'na kye' yuyara yɨkabeva “Jizaazai kwaasɨkingɨyai yɨma'nana! Bɨrala yaana!” deva kingɨyɨvɨta wayaake' egwevɨ marajɨkɨreva wɨla lannakesɨ gɨhɨpaleva gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ maramwaaihɨ'na.
Maramwaaihɨ'na yeva bɨralya'na wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨnyaigɨ yuyagaa' dɨmwaaideigɨne!”
Sara wɨdɨna yeva yɨsarɨsɨ mɨnyagɨnyavɨ tamɨna yeva gamɨnyɨ maagwala wopwakɨna yeva “Naangelyɨra,” kwaasɨya' deva kwadaai gɨle'.
Bɨralya' sara yɨna yeva yɨvɨta wayaake' mararaakurasɨ'neva gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya' marajɨkɨreva “Yɨsavɨ nilɨya wɨramaana!” deva jɨvwaramakuna ye'.

Tusavɨ Saaimonɨ Anga Saairini mwaalyai, Alekɨzaadalyɨ Rupaazalyɨ saraarɨ kɨrɨnɨmaangei wawɨnyabadaa'nyai Jeruzaalemɨnei wɨrata'nyɨna yeva aawɨlasara naanga wɨdɨna “A'mwe sare yɨsa' dɨmakɨlaawa!” Mi'na naanga wɨdɨna kye' Saaimonɨ yɨsa' makɨlaawɨna.
Makɨlaawɨna yadaa'nyɨ Mugunya Golɨhotabanna Jizaazarɨ wɨjɨvwaramakuna. Golɨhota “Gɨlemɨnyagɨnyabanna,” dɨnɨkesɨ.
Saba “Daanga naanga nuvɨnadɨka!” deva aalya waainɨyavɨ kɨwata mɨrɨya wo'nɨke yɨkeva “Da' dɨnana!” wɨdɨna kye' “Aala!” wɨdɨna.

“Aala!” wɨdɨna kya' aawɨlasara Jizaazarɨ maareva yɨsavɨ nilɨya wɨrameva “Gamɨre yɨvɨta baazɨ'ma'nya saza japalaana! Saatuya yawaajɨ ata gɨlyavɨ wanganawaajɨ japalamakwawaana!” deva saatuya yeva gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya jaapaina.
Sagaa' yɨsavɨ nilɨya wɨramesagaa' mwanyavɨ naainɨ kɨlokɨyagaakɨra.
Tamakya'ne pɨkarya “Kingɨyai Juyaraavɨre maremwaaidei,” yɨdaveva yɨsavɨ munyaba yɨlakɨna.
Yɨlakɨna yeva gamɨre aangasɨmagɨ a'mwe pwarɨ kwanaamimagɨ pwarɨ nilɨya wɨrame' kuka yɨpalamaa'disaraarɨ.
Sa'na wɨramɨna kye' sagaa' Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨke' yuneba yɨma'na'. Yagaala sa' “Kayaa'nanyaraavɨ sara yɨpɨ'de' gamɨnyɨjɨ sara yɨpɨ'delyɨra,” dɨnɨkesɨra.
A'mwe a'mwera wavɨlavesa kunnya mɨnyagɨnyara wɨnaangɨ'nyɨ wɨnaangɨ'nya yadaapi bɨrala dara wina. “A'a! ‘Gotɨyare Angevɨ kayaaka yɨgala'mwi yɨrɨka dawaai dasangɨ mamwɨneinyɨ,’ nedahɨnyaigɨ,
sahwaigɨ gɨmɨ saigɨ gaimwanna'gɨzɨ nilɨya lawasɨ'na'gɨzɨ yɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ dalaama! Dɨvadaihasamaa'nana!”
Sara bɨrala wɨdɨna kye' nabaai sabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera Juya yagaaikɨwɨjarajɨ Jizaazarɨna bɨrala dɨne' “Pwaraavɨna dɨragɨnna padaihasamaarakele! Gamɨ sahwai padaihasamaa'nannele!

Kɨraazɨtɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidei kingɨyai yɨsavɨdaasɨ kwalaabozɨ wanganawaajɨ gamɨnyɨ nayaa lɨmwagaraade'nanyɨ.” Bɨrala sara dɨnyɨna kye' gamɨnyawɨ pwaraai nilɨya wɨramesaraai bɨrala wɨdɨna yagi.
Sɨrɨgwajahaa' kyɨma'na' kwaakeva' yuyava' yɨrɨka kɨgaa' jɨhɨnya' jɨnnaka tɨri kɨlokɨyagaa' jɨhɨnya' mi'na jɨnnakegaa'nanyɨ.
Sagaa' tɨri kɨlokɨyagaa' Jizaazai jaka naanga gannya yagaalya' danganna “Eloi, Eloi lama savakɨtaani.” Yagaala sa' aangyagaala “Nɨmɨre Gotɨyaigɨ, nɨmɨre Gotɨyaigɨ be'na nyagalya'ma'mwaana?”
Jaka sara danganna kya' saba daaveta pwara wɨ'neva dɨnyɨna “Yɨthaanyi, Yɨlaajarɨ jaka wɨdɨwaka.”

Dɨnyɨna kye' pɨbanna pwai kaanyave'na wawaka aalya waainɨya yɨrɨkevɨ saalaalyavɨya jɨ'mɨnya' marapaihaka aalɨnake' yɨsarɨkɨre sɨnnyarɨkɨ wakaka “Aalya' nana! Pɨzɨ'gwa mwaalana!” daka makɨlaawaka pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kavaayɨla! Yɨlaajai bozɨ yɨsavɨdaasɨ makwalaabaza' wanganaadera.”
Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai jaka naange' wɨdaka sɨmudɨnya yɨnahu yekɨ'na ya'.
Gotɨyai Gotɨyare Angevɨ janne naange' jɨkɨ'nɨke' munyabadaasɨ kwaakewɨnna kayaaka dabura' yuneba.
Jizaazarɨ nilɨya tameta yɨsavɨ aawɨlata naangei Anga Romɨ mwaalyai maredaavakei dara wanganake' “Sara davaimwaka!” Daka wɨdɨna “Nebulyasɨra. A'mwe dai Gotɨyarɨ gawaalɨvaangelyɨra.”
Wɨdadaa'nyɨ keiba a'mwe daaveva tɨnna wanganna. A'mwe sa, Maarɨyaa' Maahɨthaala mwaalyasɨ Maarɨyaa' Jemɨzai dɨviyalyɨ Jozɨzalyɨ kɨdaraarɨ kɨrɨnaangesɨ Saalomiyasɨ sa
Jizaazai Kwaaka Galɨli mwaalakegaa' kaanya ye'mwannayamaryeva wapaaya aalya wɨjaavesajɨ a'mwe pɨnɨjɨ Jizaazalyɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨna yɨlaabeta a'mwe pɨnɨjɨ sangyɨneba mwaalɨna yeva tɨnna wanganna ye'.
Sawɨsaburɨ kyɨma'na' Jozepɨyai Aarɨmathɨya mwaalyai bɨna.

Bɨna yakei a'mwe tewaanyai Kaajolɨyai sagaa' Gotɨyai Kwaaka yuyavakɨ maremwaaidehaa'na kave yemwaalakelyɨ. Jizaazai balakegaa' Pɨraaidehaa' Jozepɨyai “Kwazaakegaa' gɨlaayai enana narɨbainadɨka!” daka Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakegaa' yovɨra'daapiyagaa'na dɨragɨnna yɨvaimwanna yaka Paailatɨmyawɨnna baka Jizaazare kɨlaakejɨkɨna wɨdɨna “Gɨlaayai walyamarirakɨma! Nyɨmaryaama!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Paailatɨ maru'na'na “Ai, dahaa' mi'na davalɨka?” daka aawɨlata naangerɨna jɨvwaramaa'na. Sara jɨvwaramaa'na kya' naangei kulaaba' yɨdaanganna “Jizaazai mena baimwakei daa'?”
Yɨdaanganna kya' sai “Yo. Mena baimwa',” wɨdɨna kya' Jozepɨyarɨ wɨdɨna “Wikɨra. Gɨlaayarɨ dulamaraawa!”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jozepɨyai wawaka kwaabɨyɨvɨta saamɨnya yaake' mubyawalyaadɨkei yɨsayabanna baka gamɨnyɨ makwalaabaka yaakesɨ yewa'mwagapwɨyaka makulaawaka kavi'nɨnnyavɨ simaangevɨ lɨlɨvɨdaakunɨkevɨ wɨlakaka sɨla naangei simaangevɨ tihɨrakɨna ya'.
Jozepɨyai sara yadaa'nyɨ Maarɨyaa' Maahɨthaala mwaalyasɨ Maarɨyaa' Jozɨzarɨ ganaangesɨ gamɨre wakya'neba tɨnna wanganna yagi.
Kwazaakegaa' mi'na kwavɨlava' Maarɨyaa' Maahɨthaala mwaalyasɨ Maarɨyaa' Jemɨzarɨ ganaangesɨ Saalomiyasɨ sa “Nemɨ Jizaazare kɨlaakejɨkɨ puraana!” deva marazɨnanya wabatɨrɨnnake' mubɨna.
Mena mubɨna kye' Saadehaa' mwanyavɨ yɨrɨke' gaai pu'daa'nyɨyagaa' simaangevɨne a'mwe kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna kuna wɨna yesa dɨnyɨna “Sɨlaangei kavi'nɨmaangevɨ warɨkerɨ nemɨnyɨna aai baasadelaka?”
Sara dɨneva maranganna yadɨvɨ' dara wanganesa' “Ai, sɨlyai mena davaasɨnɨka!” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨla sai wapemɨnnakei warakelyɨ.
Mi'na deva simaangevɨ wɨlaawɨna yeva kumɨnyɨ aangasɨmagɨ mɨgɨnyai kwaabɨhannya yaaka nawɨ'nya' yɨra'nakerɨ tɨnna wanganna. Tɨnna wanganna yeva lɨka yɨna yeva atɨka maru'na'na.

Atɨka maru'na'na yadaapi mɨgɨnyai wɨdɨna “Lɨka mipɨnera! Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyarɨ yɨsavɨri nilɨya wɨramwa'daasarɨna bɨ'manɨgava. Sara yawɨ'mwa. Kyɨdɨkaa'mwa' dava mamwaalyɨka. Yɨthaanyi! Wakɨwa'daasaba danganyɨla!
Sare kɨrɨ' wawopɨri gamɨrerajɨ Pitalyɨ saraavɨ duthaawila! ‘Sɨnnawɨ Kwaaka Galɨli kwaana'mujɨ sarɨmɨ nyɨmɨdɨnaabyidera! Mi'na yɨhɨthevaaibɨ' saba dɨnyanganyideinyɨra,’ sahwai sara nyɨdɨwa'.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' simaangeyabadaa'nya kaanyave'na walyaweva lɨkaanya wɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Bɨ'bɨta yadɨvɨ' lɨka yeva sɨmunya nayaa myawɨri. Lɨkaanya wɨna yeva aane pwarɨ kwarɨ aane pɨrɨvɨ kɨrɨvɨ mujɨ ye'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Lɨka naanga wiake'na sahɨnɨ kunna marinaawɨna yesangɨ.
Saadehaa' yɨrɨkunyagaa' Jizaazai dɨkaavaka sɨnnawɨ Maarɨyaa' Maahɨthaala mwaalyavɨdaasɨ yɨmaka ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ marasɨ'nakevɨ gamɨnyɨna wɨjɨwaaina'.
Wɨjɨwaainakegaa' a'mwe sa' wawaka gamɨjɨyara yɨkwaraamaya dadaapiyaraavɨ buthɨna “Jizaazai kwaihwaainakei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ wangamwerɨnera.”
Sara kadɨka wɨ'neva “Kwaasɨ yagaala nedɨwaka,” dɨnyɨna yeva sa'na malɨmwagi ye'.
Sara yɨna yesagaa'daasɨ a'mweraai wawɨnyanneba kaanya kyamaryagi sahwai mudɨkeibɨsai wɨlaabaka pɨgasaai wɨjɨwaaina'.
“Jizaazalyɨ,” sara yawɨragɨla ayɨna wawagɨla gamɨre pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna kyagi sahwaraare yagaalya'na “Kwaasɨya',” dɨnyɨna yeva sa'na malɨmwagi ye'.

Dɨvidaa'nyɨ angevɨ gamɨrera atɨraai yaka sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaina sarera wapaaya tɨka nadaapi sahwai wɨlaabaka gamɨ mena dɨkaavakerɨ pwara tɨnna wanganeva gamɨre pwaraavɨ wɨdesa' malɨmwagyesa'najɨ sɨmunya myawɨryesa'najɨ maanga wɨdɨna.
Maanga mi'na wɨdaka wɨdɨna “Yuyabanna Kwaaka yuyavakɨna wawopɨjɨ yagaala tewaanya' Gotɨyai wakyaaka yuyaraavɨ duzɨwaakyideihɨlyɨra.

Savɨne'na pwai kanyɨlɨmwagarojɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya kyapi Gotɨyai kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nada padaihasamaaradelyɨ. A'mwe pwai manyɨlɨmwagaryojɨ gannya kayaa'nanya yɨnahu waragothengɨra. Sahwarɨ jɨdavadelyɨ.
A'mwera kanyɨlɨmwagarapi wɨjɨwaainya dara yɨma'nade. Nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' maarapɨjɨ nɨmɨnyɨne yayavɨ yɨmakeraavɨ a'mweraavɨre munyɨkaavɨdaasɨ wɨdaasɨpɨ'de. Nabaai Maaveraavɨre yagaala wɨdɨpɨ'de.
Naawɨnaanyarɨ maarapɨjɨ aalya nabaidɨvɨsa' napɨjɨ mabalyɨ yɨpɨ'de. Arɨkawɨnyɨra. Nabalɨnakengɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ ata kadathɨwagapɨjɨ nabalɨnake tewaanya mwaaibɨ'de. Sara yɨma'nɨpɨ'dengɨra,” wɨdɨna ya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ mi'na wɨdɨna yakegaa' Gotɨyai Naanga Jizaazarɨ makɨlaawɨna. Sara makɨlaawɨna kya' Gotɨyareba Sɨgunyavɨna Jizaazai yɨlaawaka Gotɨyare aangasɨmagɨ walamwaaina.

Mi'na walamwaaina kya' gamɨrera waweva yuyaba wɨjɨwakadaapɨjɨ Naangei wɨgaimwaga'. Kugaimwaga' gamɨjɨ nawɨ'nya kye' a'mwera tɨnna wanganya'nera dara wɨja'na “Yagaala sa' Gotɨyaresɨra,” sahwai wɨjɨwaainya ya'.
A'mwe naanga Tɨyopɨlaazaigɨ, yagaala davɨ du'nana!
Kɨgaa' a'mwe kwalaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna nayaa yɨdavesa' nemɨnyawɨ Gotɨyai sara yake'na yɨdavesasɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' a'mwe pwara yuya sa tɨnna nayaa wangadɨvɨ' nayaa jalɨkuraketabaaibɨta yɨdave'. A'mwe kwaraavɨre tɨnnyasɨ wanganɨkeraavɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨ' yɨdave'. A'mwe sara Gotɨyare yagaalyasɨyara sahwaraavɨre maangikɨ mɨdɨne'.

Tɨyopilaazaigɨ, dɨragɨnyaigɨ, nɨmɨ sara yɨdavesavɨjɨ sara nyɨdesavɨjɨ yawɨramaarena Naangerɨne yagaala aaya kaavɨlyangɨ sabura bɨramaarena “Sare'na yavɨkaride'na tewaanyasɨ,” yawɨrena yagaala da yavɨkarivanɨgeinyɨ. Sɨnnawɨnyasɨ tɨnnyabanyasɨ dɨviyasɨ yagaala yuya sa yavada'galakena gɨmɨnyɨne nayaa yavɨkarivanɨge.
Savɨdaa'nyɨ tɨnna wangana'gɨzɨ jawɨka! “Yagaala sa' nɨmɨ kadɨka mi'na wɨ'ne' naanga nebulya'na yawɨramaarɨma!” da'gi jawɨka! Sare'na gyavɨkarivanɨge.

Naanga Erotɨyai Kwaaka Juthɨya maremwaalakelyɨyagaa' Sekaraayai mwaalɨna. Sai Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'delyɨ pɨrizɨyai sahwai. Gamɨjɨyara pɨrizɨyara yɨta pɨvaakɨya Avaazarera. Nabaai gamɨre balaange' Yɨlɨzavetɨya' Eronɨmɨ yɨsavaakɨdaasasɨ kɨrɨsɨ. Eronɨ sai Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei aaya sɨnnawɨnyalyɨ.
Sayorɨna Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Tewaanna mwaaidisawaalyɨ. Nɨmɨre kɨwɨnyajɨ yagaalyajɨ nayaa mɨdɨdisawaai,” yawɨ'na yakeyolyɨ.
Sayoi kaimɨraaya kunewaai. Yɨlɨzavetɨya' kwazɨka mwaaidɨ'nyɨya'na kunewaai. Nabaai kɨrɨmɨ sawaai newaai.
Pɨgaa' Sekaraayalyɨyara Gotɨyare Angevɨ yadaapiyagaa' Sekaraayai sai Gotɨyarɨna yɨna.
Pɨrizɨyara kunnya wawɨnyanna dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' Sekaraayai dahɨlakesai “Wabatɨrɨnya'ne yɨkunaabɨthɨka mariravɨma!” daka Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlɨna.
Sagaa' pɨrizɨyai yɨkunaabɨthɨka yɨra'na yadehaa' Juya pwara mwasawɨ yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨvɨsabulyɨ.
Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlɨna kya' yɨkunaabɨthɨka yɨra'nɨke dɨ'bɨnyavɨ Gotɨyare mamaayai ejelɨyai yɨma'naabɨna yaka dɨ'bɨnyavɨ tewaanyaba aangasɨmagɨnna daavɨna.
Daavɨna yadɨsɨ Sekaraayai tɨnna wanganaka sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨraka lɨka naanga yɨna.

Lɨka naanga yɨna kya' sagaa' mamaayai wɨda' “Sekaraayai lɨka minnera! Gotɨyai gɨmɨre yɨdaanganya' gu'nɨwake'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨre a'mwe' Yɨlɨzavetɨya' gɨmɨre kaimalei maaradesɨ. Gamɨre yaya' ‘Jonɨma,’ duthathelyɨ.
Sai kima'nojɨ yɨlaaya naanga jɨtheigɨnyɨ. A'mwera a'mwe yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'dengɨ sahwarɨna.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai tɨnna wangada sarɨna dathe ‘A'mwe naangelyɨ.’ Sai aalya waainɨyasɨ bɨyaaya'bɨsasɨ aawa, manyɨ yadelyɨra. Ganaangevɨre munyɨkɨ mwaaidori aayawɨdaasɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai yune'na wɨlamwaaladelyɨ.
A'mwei yɨma'nojɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna kyojɨ Yɨzɨrelɨya kwala naanga sɨmunya mudɨka maarapɨri kunnya Gotɨyai Naangerɨ yɨlaaya ayɨna yɨpɨ'dengɨra.

Kɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei pɨropetɨyai Yɨlaajai dɨragɨnna yaakabaaibɨ' sai waanyɨna, wɨdɨna kyojɨ dɨvi Naangei bathelyɨ. Dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwakamaryadaawori kuvɨnɨmaangera kumɨre kaimɨraayangɨ tewaanya yɨpɨ'derera. Nabaai Gotɨyarebwi myawɨryaraavɨ mwagi'namaarojɨyara yɨda'maraangeraavɨre sɨmunyaburɨ mɨdɨbɨ'de'nanyɨ. Sara jovɨrawakɨna kyojɨ Naangerɨna yemwaaibɨ'dere.”
Sekaraayai ejelɨyarɨ wɨda' “Nyɨdɨwaanya' gara yojɨ nyɨdɨwaanya sare' yawɨramaarɨdeinyaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ neinyɨ. Nɨmɨre a'mwevɨ kwarame naanga naanga wavɨla'nɨkesɨ.”
Ejelɨyai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ Gevɨrɨyelɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨ daa'dɨnyainyɨ. Gotɨyai kanyɨdasɨwaabɨ' walaabena yagaala tewaanya' gɨmɨnyɨ gɨza'neinyɨ makwalaabeneinyɨ.

Sara yɨwe' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yagaalya' malɨmwagiwaa. Dɨwe sa, nebulya yɨma'nadengɨ kumɨregaa'. Yɨthaa, nɨmɨre yagaalya' manyu'nyɨwaanya'na yagaala majɨ yɨnneigɨnyɨ. Yagaala majaigɨ kuna mwaala'gɨri gɨthɨwe kima'naabozɨyagaa'na dɨthatheigɨnyɨra.”
Sara dɨdaakɨlyɨyagaa' mwasawɨ a'mwera Sekaraayarɨ yemwaaidɨvɨ' yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Gotɨyare Angevɨ naangegaa' be'na wɨlamwaalɨ'?” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' atɨka maru'na'na yadɨvɨ' mwaalɨna.
Mwaalɨna yadapi walyuna yaka yagaala majɨ yannei kamwaala' dara wanganesa' “O, Gotɨyare Angevɨ a'mabaaitɨnna wanganakei daaka!” Mi'na kade' yagaala majai asa'na yɨna yakelyɨ.
Gotɨyare Angevɨ Sekaraayai gannya wawɨnya' mi'na yakegaa' gamɨre angevɨna wɨna.
Angevɨna wɨna kya' dɨvi gamɨre a'mwe' Yɨlɨzavetɨya' kaimɨraavɨmunnake' mwaalɨna. Kaimɨraavɨmunnake' mwaalɨna yada gannya angevɨ lawe atina kave wɨlamwaaina.
Wɨlamwaaina yada dakesɨ “Naangei nɨmɨnyɨna kale wiadaa'nyɨ tewaanna dara nyaka a'mweraayawɨnna nɨmɨre wagɨla maare sa' nyɨmarasɨ'mwa'.”
Lawe ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pukɨ Yɨlɨzavetɨya' kaimɨraavɨmunnake' mwaaidɨ'nyɨyagaa' Gotɨyai Ejelɨya Gevɨrɨyelɨmɨ wɨdasaaba' “Kwaaka Galɨli Anga Naazaretɨna dalaawa!
Nɨmɨre yagaalya' sɨdɨraayavɨ duthana! Sɨdɨraaya Ne Devitɨ yɨta savaakɨdaa'nyai Jozepɨyarɨna dakɨnɨkesɨ. Sɨdɨraaya sa' Maarɨyaasɨ.”
Gotɨyai kudasaaba' ejelɨyai taayayawɨ wɨlaabɨna yaka wɨda' “Kwaamu'nanyabwi gwarana! Gotɨyai gɨmɨjɨ mwaalɨ'. Gotɨyai tewaanya naanga gyɨwake'gɨnyɨ.”
Ejelɨyai sara wɨdake'na Maarɨyaa' sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'da dɨna “Sa' be yagaala nyɨdɨwake'nyaka?”
Dɨna yaka ejelɨyai wɨda' “Maarɨyaa', lɨka minnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai tewaanya gyɨvanɨ'.
Yɨthaa, kaimɨraavɨmunnake'gɨ mwaala'gɨzɨ kaimɨraayai mɨla'gi gamɨre yaya' ‘Jizaazala,’ dɨthathelyɨ.

Sai naangei yɨma'nadelyɨ. A'mwera gamɨnyɨna dɨna ‘Gotɨyai munya ke'mwewɨnyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨreva.’ Naangei Gotɨyai kingɨyarɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Kɨgaa' Ne sɨnnawɨnyai Devitɨ gamɨre gyakwalaangei kingɨyai mwalyaakabaaibɨ' mwaaladelyɨ.
Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' Jaikopɨjɨyaraavɨ maremwaaladelyɨ. Sai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalagwothe' kayaaka mi yadesɨ.”
Maarɨyaa' ejelɨyarɨ yɨdaangana' “Kwala manyɨmaarya'nyɨ mwaaihevɨ gara yɨma'nade'na dɨwaana?”

Mamaayai ja'nawɨdɨna “Kuryai Tewaanyai gɨmɨnyawɨ walaabathelyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' gɨvwakalɨmwagarade'gɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai sara kyojɨ kaimɨraaya tewaanyarɨna ‘Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨ,’ dɨpɨ'delyɨ.
Yɨthaa, gɨmɨnyɨ jɨnyɨwanaanga Yɨlɨzavetɨya' ne' mwaaida ‘Kaimɨraaya mamaaryadesɨ,’ deta kɨrɨ' dahaa' kaimɨraavɨmunnake' mwaaidɨ'nyɨ lawe ati wavɨla'mwakesɨ.
Gotɨyai mi yade pɨnɨ aawa; mwarika! Sare'na gamɨre yagaala gazasa' sara yɨma'nadesɨ.”
Maarɨyaa' wɨda' “Gotɨyare wɨdaayadɨnya'nyɨ. Gotɨyare yagaalya' sara nyɨdɨwaanyabaaibɨ' nyɨma'nade'nyɨ.” Mi'na kuda' mamaayai kaanna wɨna ya'.
Yɨrɨka sangɨ Maarɨyaa' yarai kaanna wɨna. Kwaaka Juthɨya sabanne mugunyangɨna kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna wɨna yaka angebanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka Sekaraayare angevɨ wɨlɨna yaka Yɨlɨzavetɨyavɨ wɨda' “Aama!”
Mi'na kuda' sagaa' Yɨlɨzavetɨya' kadɨka ku'na' gamɨre munyavɨ bwaranyai yarai yɨta'na. Bwaranyai yarai yɨta'na kya' Kuryai Tewaanyai Yɨlɨzavetɨyavɨ sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna wɨlamwaaina kya'

jaka naanga wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai gamɨre bwaranyarɨ maarya'ne'gɨnyɨ dahɨlakake'na a'mwe yuya pɨnɨngɨna Gotɨyai tewaanya naanga yanga gyade'nanyɨ. Nabaai bwaranyai gɨmɨre munyavɨ minɨkerɨ Gotɨyai tewaanya naanga yanga yadelyɨ.
Nɨmɨre Naangerɨ ganaange'gɨ nɨmɨnyɨ angyɨrɨ'maata nyɨwaa. Nɨmɨ a'mwe naange'nyɨ daaka! Maalɨke'nyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨthaa, ‘Aama,’ kanyɨdɨwaa nɨmɨre munyɨkɨ bwaranyai yɨlaaya yada yarai nyɨta'mwake'nyɨ.
Gɨmɨ dahɨna ‘Naangei nyɨdɨwake' nebulya' yɨma'nadesɨ,’ dahɨna yɨlaaya yadɨ tewaanaanga yɨnɨke'gɨnyɨra.” Wɨda' Yɨlɨzavetɨya'.
Maarɨyaa' wɨda'
“Nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ Naangerɨ yɨledaata dɨvanɨge.
Gotɨyai nɨmɨre padaihasamaarya'nerɨ sahwarɨ
Nɨmɨre kuryai yɨlaaya yɨwa'.
Gotɨyare wɨdaayadɨnya' nyɨ maalɨke'nyɨ nyawɨ'mwake'na
Nɨmɨ sa'nyɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨvanɨge.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dɨragɨnyai nawɨ'nyabwina nyɨwa'.
Mɨjayɨma'nɨgwɨyara ‘Maarɨyaa' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkesɨra,’ maredɨmwɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Dɨragɨnya Naangei naangenna nyɨwakenne' dɨwɨpɨ'desɨ.
Gotɨyarɨna yaya' tewaanya' makɨlaana!
Gotɨyarɨna ‘Naangelyɨra,’ dadaanyainaavɨnajɨ
Dɨvi mɨjayɨma'nɨgwɨyara mɨjayɨma'nɨgwɨpɨ'deraavɨnajɨ dɨwɨpɨ'deraavɨnajɨ
Yuyainaavɨna Gotɨyai kale'na negaimwadelyɨ.
Gamɨre atasɨ dɨragɨnna yɨna yada
Pihadɨkeraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ ‘Tewaanyainyɨ,’ yawɨ'dɨvɨsaraavɨ,
Sara yɨpɨ'dera dɨngakajɨ
Gazawɨzawɨ marasɨ'namarina yadelyɨ.
Gotɨyai maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ kwaakeba marulawakadelyɨ.
A'mwe kwaamu'nanyaraavɨ munyaba makɨladelyɨ.
A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ' maaya kuneraavɨ yanga wɨjaavade
A'mwe kwalaalyajɨyaraavɨ mujaayɨ yojɨ
Kuneraavɨ wɨdaasɨna yadere gɨlyɨvɨ'nakeraavɨ.
Nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ wɨjaake' yawɨ'da
Yɨzɨrelɨyaina wɨdayadaanyainaavɨ kale'na negaimwamwa'.
Evɨraamɨmɨnajɨ neyakwalaangeraavɨnajɨ kale wiada
Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ nayaa wɨjaakabaaibɨ'
Yuyagaa' Evɨraamɨmɨrevaakɨdaa'nyainaavɨ tewaanna negaimwadelyɨ.”
Maarɨyaa' sara daka Yɨlɨzavetɨyayaba lawe dɨkaai dɨ' mwaalɨna yaka gannya angebanna ayɨna wɨna ya'.
Yɨlɨzavetɨya' kaimɨraaya maarya yunegaa' yɨbwakɨnaka kaimɨraayai maarɨna.
Kaimɨraayai maarɨna kya' anga avaalyabanyarajɨ gamɨjɨyarajɨ dara wɨ'nesa' “Ai, sare'na Naangei Yɨlɨzavetɨyavɨna kale naanga wiwakei daaka!” Mi'na deva gamɨjɨ yɨlaaya yɨna ye'.
Sawɨta ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ dawaai kwavɨlava' bwaranyare kɨlaaka pimagɨnyajɨ' dawasɨ'nya'na beva yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Ganɨmaangere yaya Sekaraayai wɨdaana!”
deva sa' ganaange' ja'nawɨdɨna “Aawa, gamɨre yaya' Jonɨ.”
Kumɨ wɨde' “Gɨmɨjɨya aane pwai kwai yaya savɨ mamwaalyɨka.”
Sara wɨdeva ganɨmaangerɨ yaya'na asa'na yɨna ye'.
Sekaraayai yagaala majai pɨkarɨyɨkwiasɨ pɨkarɨyɨsarɨsɨ makabya'neraavɨ ata akwebwata kya' mi'na wɨjaavɨna kye' pɨkarya yɨdava' “Gannya yaya' Jonɨ.” Sara kidava' atɨka maru'na'na.
Atɨka maru'na'na kye' sagaa' Sekaraayai maanga tavadɨna, Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wiada yɨleyagaala wɨdɨna.
Yɨleyagaala wɨdɨna kya' anga avaalyabanyara lɨka yɨna yeva dɨvi Kwaaka Juthɨya mugunya yunebanna dɨwɨna yagaala sa'.

Dɨwɨna yeva yuyara savɨ wɨ'neva sɨmunyavɨ nayaa yawɨrakɨna yeva dɨnyɨna “Kaimɨraaya sai bewaibɨtai yɨma'nadelaka?” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Tɨnna dara wanganesa' “Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyabwi gamɨjɨ damwaaimwaka!” Deva sara dɨnyɨna ye'.
Jonɨmɨ ganɨmaangei Sekaraayare sɨmunyavɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai yune'na wɨlamwaaina yadɨ'nyɨ Sekaraayai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨna yada wɨda'
“Naangerɨ yɨlaaya wiaana!
Naangerɨ yɨledaata wɨdaana!
Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨre Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaana!
Gamɨreinaavɨ negaimwamwake'na
Wiwawɨnyabwi neyɨpalasɨ'naka
Nemaa'mwake'na yɨlaaya yaano!
Wɨdaayadei Devitɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨdaasarɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨ.
Ayawɨ nevadaihasamaaraderɨ Dɨragɨnyarɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨ.
Aayawɨdaasɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨjaakabaaibɨ'
Sahwara tewaanyara nemɨnyɨna yɨdayaasa'
Naange'nanya' yɨhɨthɨwa'
‘Yɨkamaangeraavɨ yɨhɨvadaihasamaarɨde
Sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaiderera.
Sahwaraavɨre dɨragɨnya marasɨ'nɨderera.’
Nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨna wɨda'
‘Nɨmɨre lɨmwagaka tewaanya' yawɨ'dɨ
Sarɨmɨnyɨ kale yɨhɨgaimwamanɨge Gotɨyainyɨ.
Ne Evɨraamɨmɨ dɨragɨnya' wɨdena
Yune naanga nebulya' wɨde
“Yɨkamaangeraavɨ yɨhɨvadaihasamarɨde
Lɨka myadɨvɨsaihi dɨnyɨdaayideihɨlyɨ.
Yuyagaa' mwaaibɨzagaa' tewaanyaihi
Nɨmɨnyɨna yɨda'maraangebwi yawɨ'dɨvɨsaihi
Nɨmɨnyaba tewaanna dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.” ’ ”
Sekaraayai daka gawaalɨ' Jonɨmɨ wɨda'
“Nyɨbwaalɨ', gɨmɨnyɨna pwara dɨpɨ'de'
‘Gotɨyai munya ke'mwewɨ mwaalɨka
Sahwarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadelyɨ pɨropetɨyai.’
Gɨthɨwe sare' da'dare'nesɨ.
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ Naangei bathevɨna
Sɨnnawɨ waanyɨna ya'gɨzɨ
Tusa' javada'galakya jɨthesɨra.
Sarevɨna gamɨreraavɨ duthathe'nanyɨ,
‘Naangei sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyabwi yɨhɨmarasɨ'nojɨ
Yɨhɨvadaihasamaarojɨyai gannya tewaanyabwi yɨhyadelyɨ.’
Nemɨre Gotɨyai kale'na negaimwadelyɨ;
Nawɨ'nya tewaanyabwi nemaremwaaidelyɨ.
Sɨgunyavɨya yɨrɨkerɨ nemɨnyɨna yasaabathe.
Baakei walaabozɨ jɨhɨnyawɨ mwaidaanyaina
Balya'na lɨka yadaanyabwi marasɨ'nojɨ
Kwaamusagaa' tewaanya mwalaadevwi nejaavadelyɨ.”
Sekaraayai sara wɨda'.
Kaimɨraaya sai gɨrina yada gamɨre kɨlaakejɨsɨ kuryalyɨ naanga ya'. A'mwera mamwaalyaba mwaalaka dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mwe Yɨzɨrelɨyaraayawɨ ku'maayaba gamɨre wawɨnya' yakegaa'nanyɨ.
Yɨrɨka sangɨ Romɨ Ga'maanɨya Maremwaaidei Sizaa Wohazɨtaazai wɨda' “Kwaaka yuyavakaavɨ mwaalyaraavɨre yaya bukuyavɨ maapɨka!”
Sagaa' yaya mudɨ'na maaryagaa' Kwirɨnɨyaazai Kwaaka Sɨrɨya maremwaaidehaakɨ.
“Yaya maapɨka!” kuda' sare'na kuvɨnɨmaangeraavɨre angewɨnna yuyara kaanna wɨna ye'. Gazaizai gannya abwaibwalaasavɨna wɨna.

Ne Devitɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨdaasai Jozepɨyai mwaalakelyɨ. Ne Devitɨmɨrei Kwaaka Galɨli Anga Naazaretɨdaa'nyai Kwaaka Juthɨya Anga Betɨlemɨna kaanna wɨna. Anga savɨ kɨgaakuna Kingɨya Devitɨmɨre angebanyɨ. Saba Devitɨmɨ ganaange' maryaakebanyɨ.
Jozepɨyarɨne taaya' dakɨnɨke' Maarɨyaa' kaimɨraavɨmunnake' kɨrɨsɨ “Naarɨmɨre yaya maapɨka!” dahɨla kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna wɨna yagɨla Betɨlemɨ mwaaidakɨlyɨ Maarɨyaa' kaimɨraaya maaryagaa' yɨbwakɨna'.

Sara yaka gannya sɨraangei maarɨna. Maarɨna yaka kwaabɨhannya maryewaa'mwanna yaka bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨre wapaaya nadɨvɨsavɨ maradɨ'gwalakɨna ya'. Anga pwara waraawia'nevɨ yuneba gɨrasɨ'nake'na bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨrevɨ maradɨ'gwalakɨna yakelyɨ.
Saba angeba mwasɨlaa sipɨzipɨyangɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara mwaaidɨvɨ' sawɨta savɨ kaabidaryawɨ sipɨzipɨyangɨ maremwaaina ye'.
Sipɨzipɨyangɨ maremwaaina yadapi Naangere ejelɨyai yɨma'naabɨna kya' Naangere byaanna dɨragɨnya' wannyɨna yakesɨ kumɨnyaba. Wannyɨna kya' lɨka naanga kye'
mamaayai wɨda' “Lɨka mipɨna! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨthaanyi, yagaala tewaanya' makwaimanaabɨhe. Yagaala sa' yuyara wɨ'napɨjɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨpɨ'de' makwaimwaabe.

Dahaasagaa' Ne Devitɨmɨre angeba kaimalerɨ maa'mwakei. Sai sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyaburɨjɨ pwaraavɨre kayaa'nanyaburɨjɨ yɨhɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ. Sarɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka maryasaabɨwakei Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Naangelyɨ. Sare'na kwalaalyara yɨlaaya naanga yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ wawapɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨjɨwaainya'ne' dara wangabɨza' ‘Ai! Bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨre wapaaya nadɨvɨsavɨ kwaabɨhannya yewaa'mwannɨkei daaka!’ Tɨnna mi'na wanganapɨjɨ jawɨryide ‘Nebulyasɨ. Sai nemaaradelyɨ.’”
Ejelɨyaryaba ejelɨya kwala naange' yarai yɨma'naabɨna yeva Gotɨyare aamiyara Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' yɨledaata pɨrɨ' naanna de'
“Gotɨyai Sɨgunyavɨ munya ke'mwewɨ mwaalɨ'.
Sarɨna nemɨ yɨlaaya naanga yaana! Su!
Kwaakewɨnyaraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ kale wiada
‘Kwaamu'nanyabwi wɨwakɨma!’ dɨna yadelyɨ.”
Mamaayara Sɨgunyavɨnera ayɨna yɨlaawɨna kye' sipɨzipɨyangɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara dɨnyɨna ye' “Betɨlemɨna kaanyaana! Sara yɨma'nɨwakevɨna Gotɨyai sara nedɨwake'na tɨnna wanganaade'na kaanyaana!”
Dɨnyɨna yeva yarai kaanna wɨna yeva wanganna ye'. Maarɨyaasɨ Jozepɨyalyɨ bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨre wapaaya nadɨvɨsavɨ kaimɨraayai wɨla'dɨsɨyaba tɨnna wangane'.
Gamɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganeva yagaala mamaayai wɨdake' wɨde' kaimɨraaya bwaranyarɨna.
Kumɨ sara yagaala kade' pwara wɨ'nyɨna yeva atɨka wɨ'nare'.
Maarɨyaa' gannya sɨmunyavɨ yagaala sa wakɨna yaka yawɨramaremwaaina yadesɨ.

Sipɨzipɨyangɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara ayɨna wodɨvɨ' “Ejelɨyai sara nedɨwake' nebulyasɨra. Nemɨ kadɨka wɨ'nona tɨnna wangamwo naange'nanyasɨ,” dɨwɨna yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yaya' byaannake' munyaba makina yeva Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨwɨna ye'.

Dɨvi sawɨta ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨwaai mi'na kajɨnna' kɨlaaka pimagɨnyajɨ' dawasɨ'na yadɨvɨsagaa' kaimɨraayare kɨlaaka dawasɨ'na yeva “Jizaazala,” wɨdɨna ye'. Kɨgaa' Maarɨyaa' kaimɨraavɨmunya kune' mwaaidɨ'nyɨ mamaayai yaya sa' wɨdake' “Jizaazala,” wɨdɨna ye'.
Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke'na (yɨrɨka 40) Jozepɨyalyɨ Maarɨyaasɨ sayoi mudange'ne gɨrɨkita'nanya' wasɨ'nya'ne'na Angeba Jeruzaalemɨna kaanna wɨna.
Nabaai Naangere Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. Bwaranya sɨnnawɨnyai Naangerɨnelyɨ. Sara dɨnɨke'na Jeruzaalemɨna kaimɨraayarɨ wɨjɨwaainya'na kaanna makuna.

Nabaai Naangere Kɨwɨnya' dɨnɨ' “ ‘Kwaamɨryawaai dahamwaaihi? Gulɨkwaamɨrya tihɨnyawaai dahamwaaihi?’ da'gɨzɨ dɨka yɨra'na yɨja' dɨka nasɨ'na yadesɨ Gotɨyarɨne'. Mudange'ne gɨrɨkita'nanya marasɨ'nya'nebwinanyɨ.”

Yɨthaa, Angeba Jeruzaalemɨ a'mwei Sɨmɨyonɨ wo'nɨkei mwaalɨna ya'. Sai a'mwe tewaanyai Gotɨyare yagaala dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dei Sɨmɨyonɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ tewaanya yɨvaimwaderɨna yemwaaina yakelyɨ. Gotɨyare Kuryai Tewaanyai gamɨnyɨ mwaaida yagaala naanga wɨda'
“Sɨnnawɨ Naangere wɨdahɨlakyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ tɨnna wangana'gɨzɨ dɨvi dɨvaideigɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ dɨvaide' mɨka!”

Sarei mwaalɨna kya' Kuryai Tewaanyai Gotɨyare Angevɨ wibwarɨdaakuna kya' sai kaanna wɨlaabɨna. Kaanna wɨlaabɨna yaka Gotɨyare Angevɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ sayoi kaimɨraaya Jizaazarɨ makabɨna. “Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya' dɨnɨke'na sara wɨjɨwainaawɨna yaka!” dahɨla makabɨna.
Mi'na makabɨna kyagi Sɨmɨyonɨ kaimɨraayarɨ asɨrɨ yɨlamarayagalakɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨna yɨlaaya yada wɨdɨna
“Naangeigɨ, dahaa' naanga nyɨdahɨnya' yɨwaa.
Gɨthaayadɨnyainyɨ nɨmɨre munya tewaanya wa'deinyɨ
Tewaanna yawɨ'na yadɨnyainyɨ nayaa balɨdeinyɨ.
Nayaa balɨde sare' dare'nanyɨ.
Nɨnnya tɨnnyaraai dara wangamanɨge'
‘Gotɨyare nemɨnyɨ Nevadaihasamaaraderɨ dangamanɨge!’
Sai tewaanyarɨ dahɨlakagɨna wɨmwaihɨwaa.
A'mwe yuyara wanganya'nerɨ wɨmwaihɨwaa.
Sai baakei ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakada
Gɨmɨreburɨ mudɨkera nayaa tɨnna wangabɨ'dere.
Gɨmɨreina Yɨzɨrelɨyaina byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ mwalaadeine.”
Sɨmɨyonɨ kaimɨraayarɨna wɨdake'na kaimɨraayare ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ sawaai atɨka maru'na'na yagi.
Atɨka maru'na'na yadaakɨlyɨ Sɨmɨyonɨ wɨda' “Gotɨyai tewaanya yanga yɨhyadelyɨ.” Wɨdaka ganaanga Maarɨyaavɨ wɨda'
“Gotɨyai kaimɨraaya darɨ dahɨlakakelyɨ.
Yɨzɨrelɨya pwara ku'napɨjɨ munyaba makɨladerera.
Pwara mu'nyɨ yɨpɨjara kwaakeba marulawakaderera.
Sai Gotɨyare sɨmunya' wɨjɨwaainada
Kwalaalyara sahwarɨ maanga wɨdɨpɨ'devɨne'na
Yawɨta kayaa'nanya lɨka yulya'dɨvɨsaraavɨna
A'mwe yuyara nayaa yawɨrangabɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Kale naanga gyade'na
Kwaari'masɨramɨnya sɨnnake' gɨthavadevaaibɨsa'na
Kɨnna naanga dɨthathe'gɨnyɨ.”

Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakade' pɨropetɨya' Ana' mwaala'. Sa' Panyɨwelɨmɨre garaavaanga', Ne sɨnnawɨnyai Aazarevaakɨdaa'nyasɨ. A'mwe sa' nesɨ. A'mwerɨ maa'naka a'mwelyɨyagaa' kwarame ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨwaai mwaalaka

yaanyɨwaake' kwarame 84 (a'mwe daraai daraalyaraavɨre atɨzɨvɨlɨraai yaka dawaai dawaai) wavɨla'nɨke' a'mwe ne' mwaala'. Gotɨyare Angevɨ yagalya'mata mi, yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna yɨdaangade' wapaayajɨ manyɨ, kɨmaaka mwaaida Gotɨyarɨ wɨdada mwaalakesɨ.

Sɨmɨyonɨ kuna wɨdadaa'nyɨyagaa' a'mwe sa' bɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdaka kaimɨraayarɨna pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna. Gotɨyai Anga Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyaraavɨ wiwawɨnyabwi yɨpalasɨ'nya'na yemwaalesara sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna ya' a'mwe sa'.
Naangere Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka yuya mi'na yeva Kwaaka Galɨli kunnya Anga Naazaretɨna ayɨna wɨna yeva mwaalɨna ye'.
Kaimɨraayai naanga gɨrina yaka dɨragɨnya yakelyɨ. Sai sɨmunya nayaa yawɨrakei Gotɨyare yanga wɨgaimwangebwi wa'delyɨ.

Kwarame yuyagaa' Angeba Jeruzaalemɨna Jizaazare ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ kaanna wɨna. Kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ maramyɨ yaka pari'ma'na yaake'na Juyara Pari'ma'munne' nyɨna yadɨvɨsa'na sawaai kaanna wɨna yagɨlyawaalyɨ.
Jizaazarɨ kwarame atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨwaai kwavɨlava' sagaa' ayabaaibɨ' munne tɨka nya'na Jeruzaalemɨna wɨna yadi' Jizaazarɨ makilaawɨna.
Mi'na makilaawɨna yagɨla munne nyɨna yagɨla kɨrɨnnya angevɨna kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yadaakɨlyɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨ kaimale Jizaazai mwaalɨna. Sa'na ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ myawɨri yagɨla
“Pwarajɨ wɨwaka,” dahɨla yɨrɨka sari kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yagɨla sawɨsɨrɨ “Gawɨ mwaalɨka?” dahɨla kɨrɨmɨjɨyaraayaba kɨrya'mweraayaba bɨrɨna bɨrɨna.
Aawa. Kunewɨ wanganagɨla Jeruzaalemɨna ayɨna wɨna yagɨla

yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ Jizaazarɨ bɨramaa'na. Gotɨyare Angevɨ Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsara Juyaraayaba bɨramaa'na yagi. Saba Jizaazai walamwaaina yada wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨre yagaala wɨ'naka kumɨnyɨ yɨwaara'na ya'.
Sai sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'da yagaala nayaa wɨdake'na a'mwera wɨ'nyɨna yeva atɨka maru'na'na ye'.

Nabaai ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ tɨnna wanganagɨla atɨka maru'na'na yagɨla ganaange' wɨdɨna “Kaimɨraayaigɨ, naarɨmɨnyɨna baa'na yɨwaa? Yɨthaa, gɨmaamaangelyɨ nɨmɨjɨ sa'naarɨ taanga nehyadaa'nyɨ gɨmɨnyɨna bɨ'manɨgoi.”
Sai wɨda' “Nɨmɨnyɨna be'na bɨ'manɨgɨla? Nɨmware angevɨ mwaaimuja'na be'na bɨramarivanɨgɨla? Kɨrɨmɨ myawɨrijɨwaai?”
Sara kuda' kɨrɨ' sawaai myawɨramaaryagi wɨdake'.
Anga Naazaretɨna kɨrɨmɨjɨ walaawaka mwaalaka kɨrɨmɨ sawaarɨ kwaakewɨ nayaa mwaala'. Jizaazai yuya yake'na ganaange' gannya sɨmunyavɨ nayaa wakaka kave maremwaala'.
Sɨmunya dɨragɨnna yawɨ'daa'nyɨ Jizaazare kɨlaakejɨsɨ sɨmunyasɨ tewaanna yada Gotɨyalyɨ a'mwerajɨ tɨnna wanganeva yɨlaaya yadaapɨjɨ mwaala'.

Taaivɨrɨyaazai Sizaai yuyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨ'nyɨ kwarame potinɨya (14) wavɨla'daa'nyɨyavɨ Anga Juthɨya sɨmagɨ Podɨyaazai Paailatɨ Ga'maanɨya naangei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Galɨli saba Erotɨyai maremwaalaka maalɨkei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Yɨturɨyanajɨ Tɨrakonaaitazɨnajɨ sabanyaai Erotɨyarɨ gya'mwei Pilipɨ maremwaalaka maalɨkei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Aavɨlinɨ saba Laazanɨyaazai maremwaalaka maalɨkei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ

nabaai Anaazalyɨ Kaayapaazalyɨ sanyalɨdaai Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'dita Naangeraai mwaaidakɨlyɨ yɨ dazagaa' a'mwera mamwaalyɨgasaba Jonɨ Sekaraayare gawaalɨvaangei sahwaryawɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' bi'ma'na.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai Aalya Jothanɨyavɨ yunewɨ yuyaba yamaryada “Gotɨyai a'mweihɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nya'na sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaa'na kyapɨjɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yɨhide'nanyɨ,” sara wɨdamaryakelyɨ.
Sare' kɨgaakuna Aazaayarɨ Gotɨyai kujaa' bukuyavɨ pɨkarya yavɨkarinɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. Dara dɨnɨ'
“Wawɨmaayaba pware maanguraaya' jaka yɨmanɨ'
‘Naangerɨne tusa' nayaa yavada'galakɨna jɨlo!
Gamɨre tusangɨ yɨda'na nayaa jamakwilo!
Taawala yuyangɨ yunebanna nayaa marajɨngɨrapɨjɨ
Mugunya naangejɨ maalɨkejɨ sa dɨthavapɨraalayɨlo!
Tuta kayaa'na naadɨya yɨda'na javada'galyɨlo!
Tutaanya sɨla yaasɨwa'na waramarike dɨmarasɨ'nyɨlo!
Sarevɨ Gotɨyai padaihasamaaryabwina yuyara wangabɨ'derero.’”
Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

A'mwe kwala bwa'naanyara Jonɨmɨre bavɨtaazɨya maarya'nera yɨkabadaapɨjɨ sasarei saraavɨ wɨdɨna “Naawɨnaanyara kave kwaasɨ neyadɨvɨtabaai sarɨmɨ sɨmunya ayabwina kɨnɨnnakeihi bavɨtaazɨya yaasɨwa'na maarya'neihi bɨvanɨgasaihi daa! ‘Gotɨyai kayaa'nanyanna taanga nyɨhɨzaavadɨka! Yaasɨwa'na bavɨtaazɨya maapɨjaihi tewaanna dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨra,’ kwaasɨ sara aai yɨhɨthɨwaka!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ taanga naange'na sɨmunya mudɨkebwina nayaa yawɨramaa'na jɨla! Sara yapɨjɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebulyɨyaihi yɨsɨla nawɨ'nyabɨta nayaa sara jideihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ saihi dara madɨbɨnera! ‘Evɨraamɨmɨ gyakwalaangeina mwaaiho'na Gotɨyai taanga sa mujaayɨ neyade'nanyɨ.’ Sara myawɨpɨna! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nayaa yɨhɨthɨma! ‘Sɨla daza Evɨraamɨmɨre kaimɨraaya yɨma'nana!’ Gotɨyai sara wɨdazai yɨ sahwai yɨnɨga wi'na yannelyɨ. ‘Evɨraamɨmɨ gyakwalaangeinera,’ dɨmanɨgasa' naange' daaka!
Dahaasagaa' Gotɨyai yɨsarɨ kaavɨlyawɨ dapalya'nei gannya saajɨngei mena lɨmwagɨkelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨta gazarazara yɨsɨla tewaanya mi'nyɨ yajara sare sara dapalojɨ dɨkevɨ marasɨ'naderera.”
Sai sara wɨdadaa'nyɨ yɨ kwala bwa'naanyara yɨdaanganna “We'! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ gara yaadeinaavaka?”
Sara yɨdaanganna kye' ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwei baazɨ'ma'nya pɨrɨwaai kɨnɨnnakei a'mwe pwarɨ baazɨ'ma'nya' maayarɨ pɨrɨ' wɨjaavana! A'mwei wapaaya kɨnɨnnakei sai kwalyɨ wapaayanna avaaina sana yɨna yana!”
Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨta pwarajɨ bavɨtaazɨya maarya'nera gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, nemɨ gara yaadeinaavaka?”
Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Ga'maanɨyai yɨhɨthɨvanɨkabaaibɨ'na taakɨzɨya nɨgwia yɨnɨga wi'nanya dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ. Nɨgwia kwaala pɨnɨjɨ mamwagi'nɨpɨnera!”

Wɨdɨna kya' nabaai aawɨlata pwarajɨ sahwarɨ yɨdaanganna “Nabaai nemɨ sahwaina gara yaadeinaavaka?” Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ kwaasɨ kotɨyajɨ myadɨvɨ' kumɨre nɨgwia mwagi'nya'neihi mipɨna! Nɨgwia mwagi'nya'neihi a'mweraavɨ mala maramamaripɨnera! Sarɨmɨre maremwaaidei nɨgwia yɨhɨzaavanɨka sahɨnɨnna ‘Wikɨra!’ dɨthɨnyɨla! Nɨgwia pɨnɨjɨna mudɨpɨna!”
A'mwe yuyaraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ Jonɨmɨna dɨragɨnna dara yawɨ'na “Bewalaka? Berɨ'na yadelaka?” Yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' dara yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai pwarɨ dahɨlakojɨ maryasaabathei Kɨraazɨtɨyai dɨngaka Jonɨ?”

Sara yawɨ'na yadaapɨjɨ Jonɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ sainyɨ aangaalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yɨhyadɨnyainyɨ. Dɨvi a'mwe pwai bathei yɨ gamɨre dɨragɨnya' nɨmɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ nyavɨlavɨkelyɨ. Gamɨre mamaayainyɨ nɨmɨ nebulya'nanyainyɨ mɨka! Sahwarɨna nɨmɨ wana maalɨkeinyɨra. Wɨgaimwagya'neinyɨ gamɨre kwaari'masɨvɨlya' galyaa'mune' nɨmɨ a'mwe nawɨ'nyainyɨ mɨ'. Sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨ pwaihɨrɨna Kurya Tewaanyarɨ kusawɨ bavɨtaazɨya yɨhya'nei Kurya Tewaanyarɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Nabaai pwaihɨrɨ mu'nya'neihɨrɨ daangevɨ bavɨtaazɨya yɨhya'nei dɨkevɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨ.

Sai gannya saavolɨya parɨnake' gannya asɨrɨ lɨmwada witɨya yɨlamarasɨ'na yɨlamarasɨ'na kyojɨ yagɨnya kɨlaake kurɨvaarɨya yɨhuta bamakuna kyojɨ witɨzɨla gamɨre witɨzɨlangevɨ marakadelyɨ. Gamɨre mɨnyevɨ witɨya kune kwarojɨ kurɨvaarɨya dɨka migaaya'nevɨ mariravadengɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jonɨ sara wɨdɨna yaka nabaai kumɨre sɨmunyarɨ yɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya ya'nei yagaala kwalaalya pɨnɨjɨ dɨna yɨna ya'. Nabaai sasare dazabwi a'mweraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakadevulyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sai A'mwe Erotɨyarɨ kumɨre maremwaala maalɨkerɨ maanga wɨdɨna. Erotɨyare gya'mwere a'mwe' Erotɨyaazavɨ kuka maarake'najɨ nabaai kayaa'na yɨwetawakya yuya sara yake'najɨ maanga wɨdɨna.
Maanga wɨdɨna kya' Erotɨyai kayaa'na yɨwetawakya yaka yuya daza yɨwetawakya pɨrɨsɨ ye'mwanna yakesɨ. Sahwai Jonɨmɨ kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yakelyɨ. Sara yakesɨ.
Jonɨ tewaanya mwaalakegaa' a'mwe yuyaraavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yakegaa' yɨ Jizaazai kwarɨjɨ bavɨtaazɨya kya' Jizaazai Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaa'nyɨ, yɨthaa, sɨgunya' mujaangɨna kya'

Kurya Tewaanyai walaabɨna. Kurya Tewaanyai yuta kwaamɨryaibɨsai sahwaryawɨnnei walaabɨna. Mi'na walaabɨna yaka bwalamwaaina kya' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ maanguraaya pɨrɨ' jaka yɨnyɨna “Gɨmɨ nɨmɨre Nyɨbwaalɨvaangeigɨnyɨra. Gɨmɨnyɨna tewaanna nyɨvu'nadeigɨnyɨ. Kurya tewaanya gukadɨnyaigɨnyɨ.”
Jizaazai gamɨre wawɨnya aaya mudɨ'na yamaata yakegaa' gamɨre kwarame a'mwere sɨvɨlatɨraalya pware atɨraalya (30) pɨnɨjɨ mena kwavɨlava' kɨrɨ' a'mwera yawɨ'na “Sai Jozepɨyare gawaalɨkɨra.”
Sahwai Yɨlaarelyɨ.
Sahwai Maatatɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Livaayarelyɨ. Sahwai Melɨkaarelyɨ.
Sahwai Janaarelyɨ. Sahwai Jozepɨyarelyɨ.
Sahwai Matataayazarelyɨ. Sahwai Emozɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Nayaamɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Ezɨlaarelyɨ.
Sahwai Nahaarelyɨ.
Sahwai Mayaatɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Matataayazarelyɨ. Sahwai Semenɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Jozekɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Jotharelyɨ.
Sahwai Jowaananɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Rezarelyɨ.
Sahwai Seravaavelɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Sɨyalɨtiyalɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Neraarelyɨ.
Sahwai Melɨkaarelyɨ.
Sahwai Ethaarelyɨ. Sahwai Kozaamɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Elɨmathaamɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Erɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Jozuwaakɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Elɨyazarelyɨ.
Sahwai Jorimɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Maatatɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Livaayarelyɨ.
Sahwai Sɨmɨyonɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Jutharelyɨ. Sahwai Jozepɨyarelyɨ.
Sahwai Jonaanɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Elaayakimɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Melɨyarelyɨ. Sahwai Mennaamɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Matatarelyɨ. Sahwai Netaanɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Devitɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Jeziyarelyɨ.
Sahwai Wovetɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Bowaazarelyɨ.
Sahwai Saalɨmonɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Naazonɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Aminɨthapɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Athɨminɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Anaarelyɨ. Sahwai Ezɨronɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Perezarelyɨ. Sahwai Jutharelyɨ.
Sahwai Jaikopɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Aazakɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Evɨraamɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Teraamɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Naaworelyɨ.
Sahwai Seruhɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Rewɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Pelehɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Evemɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Selaamɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Kainaanɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Aapakɨzathɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Samɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Nowaarelyɨ.
Sahwai Lamekɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Metuzalaamɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Yɨnokɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Jaaretharelyɨ.
Sahwai Maalalelɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Kainaanɨmɨrelyɨ.
Sahwai Yɨnozarelyɨ. Sahwai Satarelyɨ.
Sahwai Aataamɨmɨrelyɨ. Sahwai Gotɨyarelyɨ.
Kurya Tewaanyai Jizaazarɨ yuneba wɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨ Aalya Jothanɨyavɨ yagalya'ma'na yɨna yaka ayɨna kaanna wɨna. Sarevɨ a'mwamaayabanna Kurya Tewaanyai sahwarɨ yɨbwarɨdaakuna yadaa'nyɨ

sai a'mwera mamwaalyɨgata dazaba mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ yɨrɨka a'mwe pwaraare sɨvɨla atɨraalya (40) bwodaa'nyɨyagaa' Kotɨya Maryadei kayaa'nanya'na yaamɨjɨ walapapalakɨna. Yaamɨjɨ walapapalakɨna yadaa'nyɨyagaa' sai wapaaya aane kɨrɨ' pɨrɨ' tɨka manyɨ kya' dɨvidaa'nyɨ mɨjɨka wina.
Mɨjɨka wina yadaa'nyɨ sagaa' Kotɨya Maryadei wɨdɨna “Nabaai gɨmɨ ‘Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangeinyɨ daakajɨ,’ yɨ sɨla dazarɨ duthana! ‘Sɨlya'gɨ bɨretɨya jɨma'nana!’ ”
Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Bukuya' dara dɨnɨ' ‘Yune bɨretɨya'nanya' sa' a'mwerɨ gaala yɨnɨga wɨjaavade' mɨka! (A'mwerɨ kuryarɨ yɨvaimwagathe' mɨ'!)’ ”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' mugunya naangevɨna makilaawɨna yaka sare' yɨme'nya'bɨ' Kwaakevakɨya maremwaaidɨvɨta kingɨyaraavɨne yuya sangɨ wibwarɨdaakuna.

Yɨna yaka Kotɨya Maryadei wɨdɨna “Maremwaaidɨvɨta yuya dɨragɨnya daza gɨmɨnyɨ gɨzaavɨdeinyɨra. Dazahɨnɨngɨne byaanna dɨragɨnyajɨ gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ. Yuya gɨthɨwe daza nɨmɨre yuya mena yɨma'nɨnɨkengɨra. Sare'na nɨmɨ ‘A'mwe pwarɨ wɨjaavɨma!’ dɨwɨja', yɨ nɨmɨ wɨjaavɨna yɨdeinyɨra.
Nabaai gɨmɨ walaruta'na'dɨzaigɨ nɨmɨnyɨ lotuya nyɨmaryɨjaigɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuya daza gɨmɨre yɨma'nadengɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨrɨvɨkɨ'na “Bukuya' dara dɨnɨ'
‘Gɨmɨ Naangerɨ gɨmɨre Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya nayaa dumarya!
‘Yune gave sahware wawɨnyanna nayaa lɨmwaga'na jɨtheigɨnyɨ.’ ”

Wɨdɨna kya' Jeruzaalemɨna yɨbwarɨdaakuna yɨna yaka Gotɨyare Angevɨ yuna munya ke'bevanna yɨlamarakaawɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Nabaai gɨmɨ ‘Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangeinyɨ daakajɨ,’ davadaasɨ kewɨnɨnna dɨthɨkwosɨka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Bukuya' dara dɨnɨ'
‘Gamɨre ejelɨyaraavɨ kudozɨ gɨmɨnyɨ nayaa gɨmaremwaaibɨ'derera.’
Nabaai
‘Sɨla pwai gɨmɨre sɨvɨlyarɨ nagɨmwinadɨka!
‘Sahwara kumɨre asajɨ maragɨlɨmwagapɨ'derera.’
Sara dɨnɨke'nesɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Yagaalya' dara dɨnɨ' ‘Gɨmɨ Naangerɨ gɨmɨre Gotɨyarɨ yaamɨjɨ minnera! Gotɨyare sɨmunya' wa'dori yune gɨnnya sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ sara minnera!’ Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Kotɨya Maryadei walapapalakya dala pɨnɨnnanya yaamɨjɨ mena yaka Jizaazarɨ yagalya'ma'na yaka pɨgaa'nei yemwaaina ya'.
Kurya Tewaanyare dɨragɨnyavɨ Jizaazai Galɨlinei ayɨna wɨna ya'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨnyɨne yagaalya' anga saba yuyaba yɨ'namarya'.
Sarevɨ yuyagaa' a'mweraavɨ kumɨre lotuangengɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sara wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe yuyara gamɨnne yaya' byaannake' munyaba makina yadɨvɨkɨ.

Jizaazai Naazaretɨnei kaanna wɨna. Sɨnnawɨ maalɨkegaa', sai anga naanga dazaba mwaalakelyɨ. Sara mwaalaka naanga yɨma'nakelyɨ sahɨba. Sai yuyagaa' yadevaaibɨ'na kwazaakegaa' lotuangevɨ wɨlaawɨna. Wɨlaawɨna yaka Gotɨyare yagaalya' tɨnna danganya'nei daavɨna.
Sarerɨ bukuya pɨropetɨya Aazaayai wɨjaake' dɨnɨke' wɨjaavɨna. Wɨjaavɨna kya' bukuya' maratɨlaayɨna yaka yagaalya' dara yɨda'nɨkevɨ wanganna
“Naangere Kuryai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmwaalɨka.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨna yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakya'neinyɨ
Welivananya' dɨngɨna nyadevɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨdahɨlakakeinyɨ.
Kalavuzɨyaraavɨ dara wɨjɨwaakya'neinyɨ nyɨmaryasaabakeinyɨ
‘Kalavuzɨwawɨnyavɨ yagalya'mavapi kaanya dɨwila!’
‘A'mwe tɨbɨnyaihi tɨnna ayɨna danganyɨla!’
Taanga yɨhyadeihi taanga sa' marasɨ'nya'neinyɨ
Nayaa tewaanyaihi yɨhɨmwaaihya'neinyɨ nyɨdasaabakeinyɨ.
Naangere tewaanyagaa' na padaihasamaaryagaa'na wɨjɨwaakya'neinyɨ.”
Sara tɨnna wanganna, wɨdɨna yaka
bukuya' marabuku'na yaka maremwaalyarɨ ayɨna wɨjaavɨna yaka wɨjɨwaakya'nei walamwaaina. Sarevɨ a'mwe yuya lotuangevɨ mwaaidapiyara tɨnnya' yune gave sahwarɨna yɨ'bwaranganna yesalyɨ.
Walamwaaina yaka sahwaraavɨ gaai wɨdɨna “Dahaasagaa' Gotɨyare pɨkarya daza' yuna nebwina yɨma'nɨwaka. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ kadɨka mena wɨ'nɨwaasagaa' nebwina yɨma'nɨwaka.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwarɨne yayavɨ munyaba makidɨvɨ' yagaala nawɨ'nya gamɨre maangikɨdaa'nyɨ wɨdakevɨna atɨka maru'na'na yeva dɨnyɨna “Ai, a'mwe dazai Jozepɨyare kaimɨraayai midaaka!”

Dɨnyɨna kye' sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Naanga nebulyasɨ. Sarɨmɨ yagaala ke'ba'nanya datha' dɨnyɨjideinyɨ ‘Dotaigɨ gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ nayaa javada'gainadeigɨnyɨ.’ Anga Kaapanɨyamɨ yagɨnyabaaibɨ'na, sa kadɨka mena wɨ'nongɨ nabaai gɨmɨre anga dava gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ'bɨsaba avaala sahɨbaaibɨ'na ja!”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gannya angeba pɨropetɨya aane pwai kware yagaalyavɨ kadɨka mu'nyadɨvɨsarera.

Yɨthaanyi, naanga nebulyavɨnyɨ. Yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Pɨropetɨya Yɨlaajaregaa' Yɨzɨrelɨ saba yaanyɨwaaka kwalaalya mwalyaasangɨra. Dazagaa' kwarame dawaai da' yaka lawe ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pu'na wavɨla'daa'nyɨ nyɨla naangegaa' yada burɨka mi yada anga yuyaba yuneba mɨjɨka naange' yɨma'nyɨna yaakegaakɨra.

Kɨrɨ' Yɨzɨrelɨdaa'nya yaanyɨwaaka pɨrɨyawɨnna Gotɨyai Yɨlaajarɨ mamaryaasɨ yɨna ya'. Aawa. Sai Sarepaatɨ Saaithonɨ sɨmagɨnnerɨ yune menyabanya' yaanyɨwaaka pɨrɨvɨ mɨjɨke'na wɨgaimwagya'nerɨ maryaasɨna.

Sabaaibɨ' Pɨropetɨya Yɨlaazare sahɨgaa' Yɨzɨrelɨ saba a'mwe samatanaka kwalaalyara mwaalɨna yadapi kɨrɨ' sahwaraavɨ myavada'galawɨmwaaihi kyaa' tewaanyara mima'nyaasare. Aawa. Yune menyabanyarɨ Sɨrɨyadaa'nya Nemaanɨ sahwarɨ yavada'galawɨmwaaihɨna yaakelyɨ.”
Jizaazai sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe yuyara lotuangevɨ mwaaleva yagaala savɨ kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna yeva sɨnna tɨka yune davɨna.

Sɨnna tɨka yune davɨna kwia' daavɨna yeva anga naanga saba mwasɨlaa maryaasɨna. Kumɨre anga naanga dazaba mugunya pɨrɨvɨ yɨlamannaawodɨ'nyɨyaba. “Davaanyavɨ kewɨnɨ sahwarɨ lɨvaramaana!” deva sahwarɨ kumɨre anga yɨlamannadɨ'nyɨya davaamaangebaarɨ kaanya makuna.
Kaanya makuna kye' kɨrɨ' sahwai kumɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba pɨraaihɨ'nyɨna yaka kaanya mena wɨna.
Sai Kaapanɨyamɨna walaawɨna. Anga naanga sa' Galɨli mannɨkesɨ. Walaawɨna yaka Juyaraavɨre kwazaakegaa' wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna.
Sare savɨ sahwara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva atɨka maru'na'muluna. Sai dɨragɨnya naange' kɨnɨnnakei wɨjɨwaakya nawɨ'nya' wɨdake'na atɨka maru'na'muluna.
Lotuangevɨ a'mwe pwai mwaalɨna. Sahwarɨ yɨmakei wɨmwaaidɨ'nyɨyalyɨ. Sai mwaalɨna yada jaka naanga danganna

“Akai! Naazaretɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazaigɨ, nemɨnyɨ gara ya'neigɨ bahɨneka? Nemɨnyɨ kayaaka neyɨgalya'neigɨ bahɨneigɨ daaka? Gɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunya mena gyawɨ'mwa. ‘Gɨmɨ Gotɨyare tewaanya nawɨ'nyaangeigɨ daaka!’ yawɨ'mwa!”

Jaka sara danganna kya' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai maanga wɨdɨna “Yɨmakeigɨ maange' bɨpala'gɨzɨ a'mwe sarɨ jahalya'makwona!” Sara maanga wɨdɨna kya' a'mweraayaba yɨmaka dazai a'mwe sarɨ kwaakewɨ yɨvatawakɨna yɨna yaka sarɨ kayaaka migalyɨ yaka sarɨ yagalya'makuna.

Sara yagalya'makuna kya' a'mwe yuyara lɨka yɨwainɨgulɨna yadɨvɨ' kumɨ sara dara dɨnyɨna “Yagaala sasare sa' be yagaalavaka? A'mwe naangeibɨsai dɨragɨnnakei yɨmakeraavɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdɨwake' sahwara kadɨka wɨ'neva a'mweraavɨ yagalya'maveva kaanna wɨwaasarera.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazarɨne yagaalya dazɨmagɨ anga yuneba yamarina ya'.

Sagaa' Jizaazai daavɨna yaka lotuanga savɨ yagalya'ma'na yaka Saaimonɨmɨre angevɨna wɨlaawɨna. Saaimonɨmɨre ganyaalɨmaangevɨ bɨ'bɨ'nalaaya' wiadaa'nyɨyavɨ. Wɨlaawɨna kya' “Sahɨrɨvɨ wɨgaimwagana!” yawɨreva gamɨnyɨna yɨdaanganna.

Yɨdaanganna kye' sahɨrɨyaba aya kɨba gaidavaabɨna yɨna yaka bɨ'bɨ'nalaaya sa' maanga wɨdɨna. Sare' bɨ'bɨ'nalaaya sa' yagalya'makuna. Yuna sagaasagaa' a'mwe daza' dɨkaa'na yɨna yaka kumɨnne wapaaya yovɨrawakɨna ya'.

Nyɨlyai gaai walakyagaa' Juyaraavɨre kwazaake' mena yɨwawakegaa' sawɨtɨrɨnyaburɨ a'mwe kwɨya'mwanakera nalaaya dala nabinabinyajɨyaraavɨ sahwaryawɨnna makabɨna. Mi'na makabɨna kye' sai gamɨre asa' a'ba yɨlakadaa'nyɨ a'mwe yuya sare saraavɨ tewaanya ayɨna yavada'gaina.

Nabaai yɨmakera a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ yagalya'ma'dɨvɨ' yuna kaanna wɨna. Yɨmaka dazara jaka naanga danganna “Gɨmɨ Gotɨyare Gawaalɨ'gɨnyɨra.” Sahwara sɨdu'naka dare'na yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'na “Sai Kɨraazɨtɨyai daaka! Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka maryasaabakei daaka!” jaka sara danganna. Jaka danganna yadaapɨjɨ sahwai mayagaala wɨdɨna kya' sahwara maanga bɨpaina yeva kaanna wɨna.

Yɨrɨka gaai pu'daa'nyɨ anga saba yagalya'ma'na yɨna yaka a'mwera mamwaalyɨgasɨmagɨnna kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya sahwarɨna bɨrɨbɨrya yɨna yeva gamɨnyawɨnna yɨkuna. “Nemɨnyɨ neyagalya'mavojɨ nawodɨka! Gamɨnyɨ dahalalɨmwagaana!” yawɨreva yɨkuna.
Kɨrɨ' sahwai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai maremwaaide yagaala tewaanya' anga naanga pɨbanyajɨ wɨjɨwaakɨma! Wawɨnya daza' ya'neinyɨ Gotɨyai nyɨdasaabakeinyɨ.”
Sarei nabaai Juyaraavɨre lotuangengɨ yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'.
Pɨgaa' aalɨbunya Ganezaaretɨ maangebaarɨ daavɨna. A'mwe kwala bwa'naanya' gamɨnyɨ yuneba gɨhɨpalemwaaina Gotɨyare yagaalyavɨna kadɨka wɨ'nya'nere.
Aalɨbumaangebaarɨ botɨya pukaai wa'dɨ'nyɨ kɨrɨ' a'mwe jawɨnya maarya'nera botɨyɨkaarɨ yagalya'ma'na yɨna yeva jawɨnya mwagi'nya'ne jawɨgɨlya aalya lɨvayɨna yesarera.

Daavɨna yaka kwala bwa'naanya' yuneba gɨhɨpalemwaalesaraavɨ tɨnna wanganna yada botɨya pukɨ dɨkwosɨ'na. Botɨya sɨ' Saaimonɨmɨrikɨ. Sara yaka botɨyɨkɨ gyakwalaangerɨ wɨdɨna “Botɨya dɨkɨ kengina maalɨkɨbaweba jɨtawaasa!” Sagaa' botɨyɨkɨ yɨlamwaaina yaka kwala bwa'naanyangɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Yagaala mena wɨjɨwaakɨna yakegaa' Saaimonɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Botɨyɨ' aalyavɨ tɨnnyaba pɨzɨ'gwana jɨtavamakulaawa! Sara ya'gɨzɨ kɨrɨmɨ jawɨnya maarya'ne jawɨgɨlya' dakyɨla!”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Saaimonɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ dahaa' sawɨta darɨkɨ nemɨ yuyaina yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya yɨvanɨgoine. Sara yadaa kɨrɨ' jawɨnya aane pɨnɨ kɨnɨ maa'manɨgoina mɨ'. Sare' kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ dɨwaanya'na jawɨgɨlya' marakɨma!”
Sara yɨna yagɨla jawɨnya kwalaalya naanga bulaminyɨna yadaapiyagaa' jawɨgɨlya' maramumwɨnyɨrɨjɨ yɨna.

Sara kya' sagaa' botɨya pukɨ mwaaidakiya kumɨjɨyaraarɨ jaka wɨdɨna yagɨla kɨrɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na akwebwata yɨna kyagi sara yɨkabɨna kyagi botɨya sɨkaarɨ jawɨnya yunebanna yeku'nyɨna. Sagaa' botɨya sɨkaai kewɨnɨ makwalaawɨjɨ yɨna.
Sara yɨna yadaa'nyɨ Saaimonɨ Pitai tɨnna wanganna yaka Jizaazaryawɨ sɨvigɨ'nyɨryawɨ walaruta'nyɨna yɨna yaka dɨna “Naangeigɨ, nɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨna nyagalya'mava'gɨzɨ dɨwona!”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwai jawɨnya yuya maareta sangɨ tɨnna wanganaka lɨka yɨwaainyɨna. Nabaai a'mwe gamɨjɨ ye'mwannamwaaleta kwarajɨ sara kwara lɨka yɨwaainyɨna.

Nabaai sabaaibɨ' Sevathiyare kaimɨraayaraai Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraai Saaimonɨmɨ ye'mwannayadisaraai kwaraalyɨ lɨka yɨwaainyɨna. Pitai lɨka yɨwaainyɨna yaka sara wɨdɨna. Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai Saaimonɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Lɨka minnera! Dahaa'daa'nyɨ a'mweraavɨ gaala mwaalya'neraavɨ maarɨ maarya jɨtheigɨnyɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' maangebaarɨ tɨyawɨnna botɨyɨkaai yɨtavamakulaawɨna yɨna yeva yuya sa saba yovɨgaipwakɨna yeva sahwarɨ mɨdɨnyɨna ye'.

Jizaazai anga naanga pɨba mwaaidɨ'nyɨ, yɨthaa, a'mwe pwai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ yunebanna samate wa'dɨ'nyɨyai mwaalɨna. Sai mwaalɨna yaka Jizaazarɨ tɨnna wanganna, gamɨre sɨnnyɨkɨ kwadaai walaruta'nyɨna yaka sahwarɨ dɨragɨnna yɨdaanganna “Naangeigɨ, gɨnnya sɨmunyavɨ sara yawɨ'dɨza' yɨnɨga wi'na tewaanya nyavada'gaidɨnneigɨnyɨ.”
Sara yɨdaanganna kya' asa' yɨwɨbwa'na yaka sahwarɨ asa' dathɨwanna yaka wɨdɨna “Sɨmunyavɨ sara yawɨ'mwa. Tewaanya jɨma'nana!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' samate sa' mena yɨwɨna.

Mena yɨwɨna kya' “A'mwera nɨmɨnyawɨnna yaasɨwa'na nabɨpɨdɨka!” daka dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Sarevɨ a'mwe aane pwai kwarɨ nujɨwaakɨdɨka! Aawa. Gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'derɨ pɨrizɨyarɨ duzɨwainaawa! Sara ya'gɨzɨ Mozɨzai dakabaaibɨ' yɨra'nade' dɨka nasɨ'nade gɨmɨnyɨna girayadelyɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera gyawɨrangabɨ'derera ‘O, sare samate' mena jɨwɨwaka!’ ”

Sara dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' sanna yɨhusɨnna yɨnnagɨ'mavaka kuna naangeba yɨ'namarina. Sara yadaa'nyɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya kwalaalya gamɨnyawɨnna yɨkabɨna. Gamɨre yagaalyavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nya'nera kumɨre nalaaya marasɨ'nya'najɨ yɨkabɨna.
Yɨkabɨna yadaapi kɨrɨ' yuyagaa' sai a'mwera mamwaalyɨgasaba woda gavei Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadelyɨ.

Pɨgaa' sai wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaa'nyɨ Perɨzɨya pwarajɨ kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨna maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ sara mwaalɨna. Anga yuyabanyadaasɨ Galɨli sɨmagɨdaasɨ Juthɨya sɨmagɨdaasɨ Jeruzaalemɨ sɨmagɨdaasɨ yɨkabevere. Sarevɨ Naangere dɨragɨnya' Jizaazarɨ wɨla'dɨ'nyɨ nalaavɨnakeraavɨ tewaanya yavada'galya'nei mwaalɨna.

Sara mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ, yɨthaa, a'mwe pwara a'mwe pwarɨ yɨ'bɨnyavɨ makabɨna. A'mwe dazare yagɨnya yuya mena bainɨkei. Sare sarɨna “Angevɨ marikwavamakulaawɨna yawaajɨ gamɨnyawɨ aya kɨba gidɨku'nawakaana!” deva

kɨrɨ' kwala bwa'naanya'na yesarera. Kwalaalyara mɨjahɨbalakɨna yadapi nalaavɨnaka sarɨ makulaawia'ne tutaanya aane pɨrɨ' minyadɨ'nyɨ bɨrɨbɨrya yɨ'maareva. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ angevɨ munyabanna bamaraga'nɨgilaawɨna yɨna yeva angevɨ munyabanna daburaabɨna. Mena daburaabɨna yeva yɨ'bɨnyavɨ yɨla'dɨ'nyɨyarɨ maralaa'mwanna yɨna yeva wɨlyabaarɨ a'mweraayaba tɨnnyaba kewɨnɨ kave yɨbwa'mwagaasɨna yeva Jizaazarɨ kusɨmagɨ walakɨna.
Walakɨna kye' kumɨre gamɨnyɨne'na lɨmwanga saburɨ yawɨranganaka wɨdɨna “A'mweigɨ, gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya mena gɨmarasɨ'mwana.”

Wɨdɨna kya' Kɨwɨjarajɨ Perɨzɨyarajɨ kumɨ sara yagaaikwalaalya dɨnyɨna “A'mwe dazai yuna bewai dɨngaka! Gotɨyarɨna yagaaibɨraizɨka yɨvanɨka sala! Kayaa'nanya sangɨ yɨnahu marasɨ'nadei a'mwei pwai mɨka. Sa' Gotɨyai wawɨnya' yune gave sahwaresɨra.”
Dɨnyɨna yadaapi Jizaazai kumɨre sɨmunya yawɨ'daapiyangɨ mena yawɨranganna yaka kumɨnyɨ dara ja'nawɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ sɨmugwalaalya yaasɨwa'na yawɨ'manɨgasa' be'neka!
Kaveya ya'ne pɨrɨwaai berɨwaalaka! Nabaai nɨmɨ dɨwɨja' dɨngaka? ‘Gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya mena marasɨ'mwana?’ Nabaai nɨmɨ dɨwɨja' dɨngaka? ‘Gɨmɨ daava'gɨzɨ kaanya dɨwona?’ Aawa. Yuyawaai naangewaalyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨna ‘Sahwara nayaa dara yawɨpɨka! “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai Kwaaka davakɨne'na kayaa'nanyanna yɨnɨga wi'na marasɨ'nya'nei dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakelyɨ,” ’ dena yɨma!” A'mwe gannya yagɨnya yuya mena bainɨka sarɨ dara wɨdɨna “Gɨthɨwa. Gɨmɨ daava'gɨzɨ gɨnnya yɨ'bɨnya' maara'gɨzɨ gɨnnya angevɨneigɨ kaanya dɨmakwona!”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe dazaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ yuna sagaasagaa' sai daavɨna yaka kɨgaa' yɨlarake' maarɨna yɨna yaka gannya angevɨna kaanna wɨna. Sarevɨ sai Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makina yada kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna wɨna kya' yuyara atɨka maru'nakulɨna yeva Gotɨyarɨne yaya' byaannake' munyaba makina yadɨvɨ' lɨka yɨwainɨgulɨna yeva dɨna “Dahaa' nemɨ nabinya pɨburɨ wangamwona!”
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ yagalya'ma'na yada taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨta angevɨ taakɨzɨya maa'de pwai Livaayai wo'nɨkei mwaaidɨ'nyɨyarɨ tɨnna wangamabɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!”
Wɨdɨna kya' daavɨna yaka yuya sa saba yagalya'mawakɨna yɨna yaka Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨnyɨna.

Sara yakei Livaayai gannya angevɨ gamɨnyɨne tɨka wapaaya yɨdɨka naanga yɨna. A'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨta kwalaalyarajɨ a'mwe kwalaalya pwarajɨ walamwaaina yɨna yeva saraalyɨ tɨka wapaaya ye'mwannanyɨna.

Sahwarajɨ ye'mwannanyɨna yadaapi Perɨzɨyarajɨ kumɨrera Kɨwɨjarajɨ sara gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ maamayagaala wɨdɨna. Sahwara wɨdɨna “A'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsarajɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyarajɨ sarɨmɨ tɨka wapaayajɨ aalyajɨ be'na ye'mwannanɨvanɨgava!”
Maanga wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨrɨvɨkɨ'na “A'mwe maamɨdaryara dotaayaraavɨna wɨgainadera mɨka. Aawa. Yune nalaavɨnaka sarana wɨgainadere.

Nɨmɨ a'mwera ‘Nemɨ yɨda'maraangeinera,’ dɨdɨvɨsara sɨmunya mudɨke' yawɨramaapɨkajɨ jaka jɨvwaramaarya'neinyɨ bɨweinyɨ mɨka! Aawa. A'mwe gɨrɨkita'nanyara sɨmunya mudɨke' yawɨpɨ'de'na jaka jɨvwaramaarya'neinyɨ bɨweinyɨra.”

Sagaa' gamɨnyɨ dara wɨdɨna “Jonɨmɨrera tɨka munnengɨ kɨmaakɨya dakadɨvɨsare. Sara yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ saamɨnyagaa' wɨdadɨvɨsare. Sabaaibɨ' Perɨzɨyainaavɨre kwarajɨ avaala sara yadɨvɨsare. Sare' kɨrɨ' gɨmɨrera kɨmaakɨya madakyadɨvɨ' tɨka wapaayajɨ aalyajɨ tɨka nɨvanɨgave!”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Mudɨkangegaa' a'mwe pwaraavɨre kwɨya'mwei kwala maarya'nei a'mwe dazai sarajɨ kuna ye'mwannemwaaidori sarɨmɨ tɨka munne yɨnɨga kɨmaakɨya dakɨpɨneihi daaka! Aawa.
Kɨrɨ' dɨvi sagaa' kumɨnyɨ a'mwe kwala maarya'ne dazarɨ kipalamakwopɨjɨ yɨ dazagaa' kuna tɨka munne kɨmaakɨya dakɨbɨ'derera.”

Wɨdɨna yaka ke'ba'nanya' sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Baazɨ'ma'nya gaalyavɨdaa'nyɨ pɨmɨlɨ' davamaarojɨ baazɨ'ma'nya lihɨ'nɨka yawakevɨ mɨwɨrya'nei a'mwei aane pwai kwai mɨka! Aawa. A'mwe pwai sasara yaja' baazɨ'ma'nya mudɨke' kayaaka yɨgaladelyɨ. Nabaai kwaabɨyɨvɨta davamaaraja gaala mudɨkemɨlɨ' baazɨ'ma'nya yawaka daza'bɨ' avaaina wannadewaai mɨ'.

Nabaai a'mwe aane pwai kwai aalya waainɨya mudɨke' meme kɨlaaka aya yawakevɨ maradɨngi'dei mɨ'. Aawa. Pwai sara yajai waainɨya gaala mudɨke' aalɨmaagwala bilamari'bwarakada kɨlaake' maramumwɨnyɨrojɨ kwaakevakɨna bwaladɨma'naawɨna. Sara yojɨ nabaai meme kɨlaaka kɨrɨsɨ kayaaka yɨnyɨna.
Kɨrɨ' a'mwei meme kɨlaaka yune gaala mudɨkevɨna waainɨya gaala mudɨke' maradɨngikadelyɨ. Yɨ tewaanyasɨ.”

Gamɨre wɨjɨwaakya mudɨkevɨna sai wɨdɨna “Nabaai yuyagaa' a'mwei aalya waainɨya aya yawake' mena nadei aalya mudɨke'na wɨvu'nade' mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuyagaa' aya yawake'na yawɨ'na yada dadelyɨ ‘Aya yawake' waburyasɨra.’ ”
Kwazaaka pɨgaa' witɨwawɨnyavɨ tusavɨ kaanya yamarina yadaa'nyɨ gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara witɨzɨla pɨnɨ gimujɨna yɨna yeva kumɨre asangɨ lɨlɨvɨwanna yeva tɨka nyɨna.
Tɨka nyɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Perɨzɨya pwara dɨna “Gimujɨna yeva lɨlɨvɨwanna yɨwaasa' Kwazaakegaa'na kɨmaakesɨra. Sarɨmɨ be'na yɨvanɨgava!”
Sara dɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨrɨvɨkɨ'na “Ne Devitɨ yaka dazanna pɨkarya dɨnɨkevɨ madanganyadɨvɨtaihi daaka! Dɨvanɨge dazagaa' sahwalyɨ gamɨrerari saraavɨ mɨjɨka yesagaa'.

Devitɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlaawɨna yɨna yaka bɨretɨya' Gotɨyaryaba wakyaasa' maarɨna yaka tɨka nyɨna. Bɨretɨya daza' a'mwe yuyaraavɨna kɨmaakɨya dakɨnɨkesɨ. Yune pɨrizɨyarana tɨka nya'nesɨ. Yɨ sare' kɨrɨ' Devitɨ tɨka naka gamɨre kwaraavɨjɨ wɨjayaakesɨ. Dazahɨrɨvɨ madanganyadɨvɨtaihi daaka! Sai yaasɨwa'na manyaake'na Gotɨyai maanga majaakelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai kwazaakegaa'ne Naangelyɨ. (Kwazaakevɨ ‘Sa' nawɨ'nyabulyɨ. Sa' kayaa'nanyabulyɨ,’ dakannelyɨ.)”
Kwazaaka pɨrɨkɨ Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ wɨlaawɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sagaa' a'mwe pwai gamɨre aangasɨmagɨnya asi yaalɨka yɨnnɨkei mwaalɨna.

Sarei mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ Perɨzɨyarajɨ Jizaazarɨ yawɨrabangana'na. “Yawɨranganaana! Kwazaakegaa' nalaavɨnakeraavɨ tewaanya yavada'galadei dɨngaka? Sara yaja' kotɨya' marya'neina yaana!” deva yawɨrabangana'na.
Sara yadaapi kɨrɨ' kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ mena yawɨranganna yaka a'mwe dazarɨ asi yaalɨka yɨnnɨkerɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ daava'gɨzɨ tɨnnyaba dɨthaaka!” Wɨdɨna kya' sai dɨkavedaa'na.

Sara yɨna kya' Jizaazai kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨhithaanganɨde'nanyɨra ‘Nabaai kwazaakegaa' tewaanyabwina yadaanya' yɨda'nanya' dɨngaka? Kayaa'nanyabwina yadaanya' yɨda'nanya' dɨngaka? Nabaai a'mweraavɨ padaihasama'daanyabwine' dɨngaka? A'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgaidaanyabwine' dɨngaka?’ ”
Wɨdɨna yaka a'mwe yuyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganamarina yaka a'mwe dazarɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre asa' jɨwɨbwaka!” Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwei sara yɨna kya' gamɨre asa' ayɨna maamɨdarya yɨma'nyɨna.
Yɨma'nyɨna kya' kɨrɨ' sahwara sɨnna tɨka yuna naanga davɨna yadaa'nyɨ kumɨ sara dɨnaawɨna “Nemɨ Jizaazarɨ gara yaadeinaavaka?”
Dazagaa' “Nɨmwarɨna wɨdɨma!” daka mugunyavɨna yɨlaawɨna yɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna. Sawɨta dazagaasa sarɨkɨ Gotɨyarɨna kuna yɨdangadaa'nyɨ yune yɨrɨke'na mɨdaihɨrakɨna.

Nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'na kya' gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ jaka wɨdɨna kya' yɨkabɨna. Sara yɨkabɨna kye' sahwarajɨya sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ dahɨlakɨna yɨna yaka “Yaya' Apozelɨyaihɨlyɨ. (Nɨmɨre yagaalya'na yɨhɨthaasɨdeihɨlyɨra,)” wɨdɨna.
Pwai Saaimonɨnyɨ. Sarei sarɨ Jizaazai “Pitaigɨnyɨ,” yaya sa' wɨdɨna. Nabaai Edɨruyai, Saaimonɨmɨ gahwaalaangelyɨ. Nabaai Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ Pilipɨjɨ Baatolomyulyɨ
Matɨyulyɨ Tomaazalyɨ. Nabaai Jemɨzai Alɨpɨyaazare gawaalɨkɨ. Nabaai Saaimonɨ yaya pɨrɨ' Selotɨma wo'nɨkelyɨ. (Selotɨ - gannya kwaakevakɨna yawɨ'dei.)
Nabaai Juthaazai Jemɨzare gawaalɨkɨ. Nabaai Juthaazai Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyalyɨ. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ sai Jizaazarɨ gamɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨna wibwarɨdaakwiai yɨma'nakelyɨra.

Dahɨlakakegaa' kewɨnɨ kumɨjɨ ye'mwannɨgwalaawɨna yeva kwaaka waraasaba daavɨna. Sahɨba gamɨre pwara kwalaalyarajɨ a'mwe kwala naangera, yuya Juthɨya sabadaasarajɨ Jeruzaalemɨdaasarajɨ saalaalyavɨ maangebaarɨ Anga Taayaajɨ Anga Saaithonɨjɨ sawaarɨ aya kɨbadaasarajɨ mwaalɨna.

Gamɨre yagaalyavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nya'nera “Sahwai nemɨre nalaaya nemarasɨ'nade'nana! Nemɨnyɨ pwaraavɨ, yɨmakera taanga wɨjaayaraavɨ yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasade'nana!” yawɨreva yɨkabɨna. Sarera yɨkabɨna kye' tewaanya yavada'gaina.
Sagaa' gamɨre dɨragɨnya' yɨna yaka yuyaraavɨ tewaanya wima'nake'na kwala bwa'naanya' yuyara “Gamɨnyɨ yune asa'na kime'nawaajɨ tewaanya neyavada'galade'nana!” Sara deva sara yeva tewaanya mwaalɨna.
Gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ tɨnna maranganna yɨna yada wɨdɨna
“Yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkeihɨlyɨ gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaihi.
Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨ sarɨmɨ sahwaihɨre warɨke'nanyɨ.
Yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkeihi,
Dahaa' mɨjɨka yɨhivanɨkeihi
Dɨvi yunebanna napɨjɨ
Sarɨmɨnyɨ munya yɨhinade'nanyɨ.
Yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkeihi,
Dahaa' kɨnna dɨwaainɨvanɨgasaihi
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ jɨka dɨhide'nanyɨ.

A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ nyɨmɨdɨdaapiya'na a'mwera sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka wɨladere. Sara kwɨyojɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthaasadɨvɨ' navaruyagaala yɨhɨthadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya yuna kayaa'na marihɨlaasɨna yɨhipɨ'dere. Nɨmɨnyɨne'na sara kihyapɨjɨ sare sa'na yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkeihɨlyɨ.

Sagaa' sasare sa' yɨhipɨja' yɨ yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨ' yɨlaaya nebwina kwarame jideihɨlyɨ. Yɨthaanyi! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyaryaba sarɨmɨre wɨrɨvɨkɨsa' yuna naangesɨ. Nabaai sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kwɨyakwarava kuvɨdaarava Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨ pɨropetɨyaraavɨ avaaina sasara yaasare tɨvɨkɨta nawɨ'nya maarya'neraavɨ.
Sare kɨrɨ'
‘We'! Gɨlyɨvɨ'nakeihi sɨmunyangɨ tewaanya yɨhya'ne
Sarɨmɨ mena maaresa'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!
Sareihi Gotɨyarɨ myawɨrya'neihi taanga wɨjaavɨna yɨhyadeihɨlyɨ.
We'! Dahaa' yunebanna neva munya yɨhimwakeihi
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ mɨjɨka yɨhyade'na sarɨmɨ mala jɨwannyɨla!
Sareihi Gotɨyarɨ myawɨrya'neihi taanga wɨjaavɨna yɨhyadeihɨlyɨ.
We'! Dahaa' jɨka givanɨgasaihi mala jɨwannyɨla!
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ kɨnna dadɨvɨ' kɨdaraalya naanga bwalayɨhɨravaawadengɨ,
Sareihi Gotɨyarɨ myawɨrya'neihi taanga wɨjaavɨna yɨhyadeihɨlyɨ.

We'! Yuyara sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya munyaba makibɨza'na yɨ nabaai mala jɨwannyɨla! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kwɨyakwarava kuvɨdaarava pɨropetɨya kwaasɨyaraavɨne yaya munyaba avaaina sasara makɨlyaasare tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya maarya'neraavɨna.’
Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yagaalya' kadɨka nyu'nɨvanɨgasaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨna kale yɨhyana! A'mwera sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka widaaworiyaraavɨ tewaanyabwina jideihɨlyɨ.
A'mwera sarɨmɨnyɨ paasɨyagaala yɨhɨthɨpɨjaraavɨ gaimwangebwina duzideihɨlyɨ ‘Gotɨyai tewaanna yɨhyana!’ A'mwe bɨraiyagaala yɨhɨthɨpɨjaraavɨ gaimwange'na Gotɨyarɨ duzideihɨlyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwe pwai gɨmɨre maangwɨdaanya pimagɨ kagɨramojɨ yɨ gɨmɨre maangwɨdaanya pimagɨ tamya'na gɨnyɨwannyɨna jɨtheigɨnyɨ. A'mwe pwai gɨmɨre yɨvɨsa' kagɨmwagi'nojɨ gɨmɨre baazɨ'ma'nya' maaraja'na kɨmaakɨya madakɨnnera!
Nabaai gazaizai gɨlyɨvɨta pɨnɨnna kagithaanganojɨ sarɨ wɨjaavɨna jɨthelyɨ. A'mwe pwai gɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa kagɨmaarojɨ ‘Ayɨna dɨnyɨjaama!’ dɨragɨnna mudangadɨnna!
Sasare sabwi sarɨmɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨsabwina ‘A'mwera sara nyɨpɨka!’ dapi sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' kumɨnyɨ sara jideihɨlyɨ.

Nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨna kale wiadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨna kale yɨhyaja' Gotɨyarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yanga gaimwanga ya'ne benɨ dɨmaaryideihɨlaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe kayaa'nanya kwarajɨ sahwaraavɨna kale wiade saraavɨna kale wiadere. Sareihi sahwaraavɨ wavɨla'manɨgasaihi daa!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ a'mwera tewaanna yɨhipɨjaraavɨ tewaanyabwina wiadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwanga ya'ne benɨ dɨmaaryideihɨlaka! Yɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanya sara kwarajɨ sasare sabwi yɨna yadɨvɨsare.

Sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yaamata wɨjaaya'neihi yawɨ'na ‘Sa ayɨna nyɨjaavadelyɨ,’ Gotɨyarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwanga ya'ne benɨ dɨmaaryideihɨlaka! ‘Avaalya ayɨna maarɨma!’ dadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanya kwarajɨ kayaa'nanya kwaraavɨ yaamata wɨjaavadɨvɨsare.

Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ sarɨnnya yɨkamaangeraavɨna kale yɨhyana! Sahwaraavɨ nayaa tewaanyabwina jɨla! A'mweraavɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yaamata nayaa duzaayɨla! ‘Ayɨna nyɨrɨvɨkɨpɨ'dengɨra,’ sanna sɨmunya nyawɨpɨdɨka! Sarɨmɨ sara yɨpɨja', Gotɨyaryaba sarɨmɨre wɨrɨvɨkɨsa' yuna naangesɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨ Gotɨya Munya Ke'bevanyare kaimɨraayaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Sahwai a'mwera gamɨnyɨ ‘Su! Su!’ mujadɨvɨsaraavɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanya kwaraavɨ naange'na wiade'nanyɨ. Sarei yadevaaibɨ' tewaanna yɨpɨjaihi sasare sare kaimɨraayaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.
Sɨrɨnɨmaanga Sɨgunyavɨyarɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨna kale wiadevaaibɨ' a'mweraavɨna kale nayaa yɨhyana!

Sarɨmɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨ mamaryawɨbwaryadɨvɨ' ‘Kayaa'nanyarera,’ madɨpɨna! Sara majɨpɨjaihɨrɨna Gotɨyai kwalyɨ ‘Kayaa'nanyarera,’ dathei mɨka! Arɨkewɨ. Nabaai pwaraavɨ majɨdapɨnera! Sara majɨdayɨpɨjaihɨrɨ Gotɨyai kwalyɨ jɨdavadei mɨka! Arɨkewɨ. A'mweraavɨre kayaa'nanya sarɨmɨnyɨne dɨmarasɨ'nyideihɨlyɨ. Sara yɨpɨjaihɨre kayaa'nanya Gotɨyai yɨhɨmarasɨ'nadelyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ gɨlyɨvɨsanna yanga nayaa duzaayideihɨlyɨ. Sara yɨpɨjaihɨrɨ Gotɨyai yanga nayaa yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ. Yanga naanga naanga yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ. Maanga yunebanna yeku'nya'ne wɨjaavɨna, tɨvɨpalamihya yɨna, purata'nyɨna, naanga naanga wɨjaavɨna, kuneba mwari yada pɨnɨ bwalaraawɨna yade sabaaibɨ' yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨnɨga wi'nanya sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ wɨrɨvɨkɨ'dɨvɨsa yanga wɨjaaya dazahɨnɨngɨ Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ ayɨna yɨhɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ.”

Ke'ba'na yagaala pɨrɨ' wɨjɨwaakɨna “A'mwe pwai tɨbɨnyai a'mwe tɨbɨnya pwarɨ tusarɨ' yɨnɨga yɨbwarɨdaakwannei dɨngaka! Aawa. Yuyaraai kavi'nɨnnyavɨ walaraawɨna yɨkaneraalyɨ. (Gotɨyarɨ myawɨryai Gotɨyareburɨ pwarɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwannei mɨka!)
Nabaai sɨkulɨya yadei gamɨre wɨjɨwaakyarɨ wavɨlavadei mɨka! Gazaizai sɨkulɨya' mena yɨ'mwannojɨ gannya wɨjɨwaakyaibɨ' avaaina yɨma'nadelyɨ.

Gɨmɨnyɨ ja'mwere tɨnnyarɨ yɨtɨrɨdɨrɨnya maalɨkemɨlɨ' wa'dɨ'nyɨ tɨnna wanganna. (Sare' daresɨ. Ja'mwere yɨwetawakya maalɨkemɨlɨ' wa'dɨ'nyɨyasɨ.) Tɨnna wanganna yaka kɨrɨ' gɨnnya tɨnnyarɨ yɨta naangewa' gwa'dɨ'nyɨyaigɨ nayaa be'na myawɨryaigɨnaka!

Gatha'dara ya'gɨzɨ ja'mwerɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wɨdɨnneigɨnaka! ‘Nya'mwei, gɨmɨre tɨnnyarɨ yɨtɨrɨdɨrɨnya maalɨka gwarɨka sa' gɨthɨhaa'mwagɨdeinyɨra.’ Gɨmɨ tɨnna nayaa myennyaigɨ gɨmɨre tɨnnyarɨ yɨta naanga gwarɨka savaa'na sara gatha'dara duthatheigɨnaka! Kwaasɨyaigɨ, aayagaa' gɨmɨre tɨnnyarɨ gwarɨka yɨta naanga savaa' yune'na papurasɨ'na'gɨzɨ dɨvi tɨnna nayaa pada'galangana'gɨzɨ yɨtɨrɨdɨrɨnya maalɨka pɨmɨlɨ' ja'mwere tɨnnyarɨ warɨke' dɨvapurasɨ'deigɨnyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨta tewaanyɨ' yɨsɨla kayaa'nanya yɨ'nadi' mɨka! Nabaai yɨta kayaa'nanyɨ' yɨsɨla tɨka munne tewaanya yɨ'nadi' mɨka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera yɨta gazɨsɨkɨ tɨka munnengɨ mena yawɨranganapɨjɨyara sahwara yawɨ'na ‘Sɨkɨre yɨsɨla nawɨ'nya yɨ'nɨwake'na yɨta tewaanyɨkɨra.’ Yɨta pukɨna yawɨ'na ‘Sɨkɨre yɨsɨla kayaa'nanya yɨ'nɨwake'na yɨta kayaa'nanyɨkɨra.’ Tɨka munnengɨ mena yawɨranganna yadɨvɨ' yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera yɨta pihɨyɨkɨre yɨsɨlya lannakengɨ maa'dɨvɨtara daa! Nabaai wɨla gɨraipɨwɨlyavɨ yɨsɨlya mubwawɨlyabaarɨ gimujadɨvɨta daa!

A'mwe tewaanyai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ nawɨ'naange wɨwarɨkei. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai tewaanyabwina yadelyɨ. A'mwe kayaa'nanyai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ kayaa'nanaange wɨwarɨkei. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai kayaa'nanyabwina yadelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yawɨta sasare sa' sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna wɨla'de', yɨ sa' maangi' dadevulyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ ‘Naangeigɨ! Naangeigɨ!’ be'na nyɨdangadɨvɨsaihɨlaka! ‘Naangeigɨ!’ nyɨdangadɨvɨta kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yagaalyangɨ mamɨdɨnyɨ yɨpɨjaihɨlyɨ.
Nabaai gazaizai nɨmɨnyawɨnna bozɨyai nɨmɨre yagaalyangɨ kadɨka nyu'nada yagaalyangɨ mɨdɨnajarɨ, gamɨrebwina sɨmunya jawɨryide'na yɨhibwarɨdaakwɨdeinyɨ.

A'mwe dazai a'mwe pwai ‘Ange' madɨma!’ dada yadevaaibɨsalyɨ. Aayagaa' kavi'nɨnnya' lɨkɨwaidaawada kwaakevɨ kusawɨ yune sɨla naangevaakɨ gɨrɨkwidelyɨ.
