Sara yada nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ ange' sahɨvaakɨ a'badaa'nyɨ yɨlamadesɨ. Nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ aalyaaka naange' pu'da aalya' anga dazavɨ tɨvɨtawakɨna yadaasɨ kɨrɨ' mwalaraawi yɨna yadesɨ. A'mwe dazai ange' tewaanya madevɨna mwalaraawi.

Kɨrɨ' pwai nɨmɨre yagaalya' kadɨka nyu'nada mamɨdɨnyɨ yajai, yɨ sai a'mwe pwai ange' kwaakevakɨ yaasɨwa' madathɨhɨdaakuna yadevaaibɨsalyɨ. Aayagaa' kwaakevɨ kusawɨ yune sɨla naangevaakɨ gɨrɨkwidei mɨ'. Dɨvi aalya sa' anga savɨ tɨvɨtawakɨna yadaa'nyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' walaraawɨna yada yɨnahu kayaaka yɨma'nyɨna.”
A'mwera kadɨka wɨ'nya'ne gamɨre yagaalya mena wɨdaka sabadaa'nyɨ anga Kaapanɨyamɨ sabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna.

Saba a'mwe atɨlyaraavɨre sɨvɨla atɨraalya aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide akwai mwaalɨna. Sare sai gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai sarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nadei. Yɨ wɨdaayade dazai sagaa' nalaaya' kɨnɨnnakei mena balya'neba yadaa'nyɨ
aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidei “Jizaazai bamwaalɨka!” kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka Juyaraavɨre a'mwe naanga pwaraavɨ dara wɨdaasɨna “Gɨmɨ ba'gɨzɨ nɨmɨre nyɨdaayaderɨ tewaanya javada'gaideigɨ daaka?”
Wɨdaasɨna kya' sahwara Jizaazaryawɨnna yɨ'mavaawɨna yɨna yeva sahwarɨ wɨdɨna yeva yagaala dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Sai a'mwe tewaanyarɨnera. Gɨmɨ yɨnɨga wi'na dɨhaimwaderɨnera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sai nemɨ Juyainaavɨna tewaanya wɨvu'naderɨnera. Sai yune gamɨ sai nemɨre lotuange' madakerɨnera.”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' sahwarajɨ Jizaazai ye'mwannɨguna yaka angeyaba aya kɨbanna mena yɨ'mavaawɨna kya' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide dazai gya'mwe pwaraavɨ maryaasɨna yɨna kya' Jizaazarɨ yagaalya' dara wɨja'nera makabɨna “Naangeigɨ, nɨmɨnyawɨnna bya'neigɨnyɨ taanga nagɨzaavɨwɨdɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ a'mwe tewaanyainyɨ daaka! Nɨmɨre angevɨ bwidɨza'na nɨmɨ yɨnɨga wi'na nawɨ'nyaigɨbɨsainyɨ daaka! Tewaanyaigɨnyɨnera.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨ yawɨ'mwa ‘Nɨmɨ a'mwe nawɨ'nyainyɨ daaka! Nabaai gɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨnɨga wi'na wɨdeinyɨ daaka!’ Aawa. Gɨmɨ yune yagaalya'na kada'gɨzɨ nyɨdaayadei ayɨna tewaanya yɨma'nana!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ kwainyɨ a'mwe naangera nyɨmaremwaaidɨvɨ' wawɨnya nyɨjaavadɨvɨsainyɨ. Sareinyɨ mwaaidɨ nabaai nɨmɨre aawɨlasara kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ kwaakewɨ nyɨmwaaihasara. Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ pwarɨ kuda'mujɨ ‘Gɨmɨ dɨwona!’ yɨ sai kaanna wɨna yadelyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨ pwarɨ kuda'mujɨ ‘Gɨmɨ kaaja!’ sai kaanna bɨna yadelyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyarɨ wɨdɨna ‘Gɨmɨ wawɨnya sasare sa' ja!’ Sara kuda'mujɨ yɨ sai wawɨnya sa' yɨna yadelyɨ. (Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yune yagaalya'na kada'gɨzɨ nyɨdaayadei tewaanya yɨma'nadelyɨ.)”

Sara wɨdasaabɨna kya' Jizaazai yagaala dazavɨ kadɨka wɨ'naka atɨka maru'na'na yaka gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka kwala bwa'naanya' mɨdɨdapiya saraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨnyɨ anga menyabadaa'nya sarɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yune Yɨzɨrelɨ kɨbadaa'nyɨ yawɨralɨmwanga sasare sabwi kɨnɨnnaka a'mwe pwarɨ mabɨramaaryainyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidei maryasaabaka a'mwe dazara angevɨna ayɨna wɨna yeva wawɨnya wɨdaayaderɨ maamɨdaryai mena yɨma'nakerɨ tɨnna wanganna.
Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' mwanyavɨ anga naanga pɨbanna Nenɨ wo'nɨkebanna kaanna wɨna. Gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨta kwarajɨ kwala bwa'naanya naangerajɨ ye'mwannɨguna.

Ye'mwannɨguna yadaapi sai kaadihɨta anga naangeyabanya dazayaba aya kɨbanna badaa'nyɨ, yɨthaa, a'mwe bainɨka pwarɨ makabɨna. A'mwe bainɨka dazarɨ ganaange' kaimɨraaya yune gave dazahwainanyalyɨyasɨ. A'mwe sa' yaanyɨwaakesɨ. Anga naanga dazabadaa'nya a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naangera a'mwe dazasɨ ye'mwannɨgavɨna.
Sara yɨna kye' Naangei a'mwe dazavɨ tɨnna wanganna yaka gamɨnyɨna kale yenyɨ'nyɨna yaka a'mwevɨ wɨdɨna “Kɨnna madɨnnera!”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka aya kɨba gidɨku' wɨlɨna yaka a'mwe bainɨkei yɨla'dɨ'nyɨya yɨ'bɨnya savɨ asa' dathɨwanna kya' a'mwe barɨyɨ'bɨnya sa' makabadaapiyara sana dakulɨna yɨna yadapi wɨdɨna “Mɨgɨnyaigɨ gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthɨvanɨge. Dɨthɨkaaka!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' mena bainɨka dazai dɨkaa'na yaka dɨkavamwaaina yaka yagaalya' gaai dɨna. Sara yadaa'nyɨ sai a'mwe dazarɨ ganaangevɨna wɨmaarina.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe yuyara lɨka naanga yɨna yeva Gotɨyarɨne yaya' byaannake' munya ke'beva makina. Sahwara dɨna “Nemɨnyɨ pɨropetɨya naangei Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei mena kima'naabɨka!” Nabaai dɨna “Gamɨre a'mweinaavɨ gaimwanga ya'ne Gotɨyai mena bakelyɨreva.”
Dɨna kye' a'mwera Juthɨya yuyabajɨ yuya bularaawia kɨbajɨ yamaryadɨvɨ' gamɨ yaka sanna yagaaikɨwɨnya bathɨwɨna.
Jizaazai yaka yuya dazangɨna Jonɨmɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kalavuzangevɨ Jonɨmɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna.

Sarevɨ Jonɨ gamɨre pwaraarɨ jaka wɨdɨna yaka Naangerɨ wɨja'ne yagaala pɨrɨ' makwɨya'neraarɨ wɨdaasɨna. Sai saraarɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘A'mwe bathelyɨra,’ Juyaina dadaanyaigɨ sahwaigɨ bahɨnyaigɨ dɨngaka? Pwarɨna yemwalaadeina dɨngaka?”

Wɨdasaabɨna kya' a'mwe pwaraala dazaraai gamɨnyawɨnna mena yɨ'ma'na yɨna yagɨla wɨdɨna “Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei gɨmɨnyawɨnna nehɨmaryasɨwaabɨkeinaalyɨra. Sai dara dɨwa' ‘ “A'mwe bathelyɨra,” dadaanyaigɨ sahwaigɨ bahɨnyaigɨ dɨngaka? Pwarɨna yemwalaadeina dɨngaka?’ ”

Wɨdɨna kyagi dazahɨgaa' a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ tewaanya yavada'gaidaa'nyɨyagaa'. Nalaaya dala nabinabinya kɨnɨnnakeraavɨjɨ nabalya taanga wɨjaaya'ne kɨnɨnnakeraavɨjɨ yɨmakera kɨnɨnnakeraavɨjɨ tewaanya yavada'gaina. Nabaai tɨbɨnya kwalaalyara, yange'na yavada'gaidaa'nyɨ tɨnna yenyɨna.

Sara yavada'gaina yaka Jonɨmɨreraarɨ yɨwaarasa'na ja'nawɨdɨna “Kaanya wawokɨlyɨ Jonɨmɨ duthɨthaakwila! Dahaa' tɨnna wangadi' kadɨka wɨ'nɨwaalyangɨna duthaawila! A'mwe tɨbɨnyara tɨnna ayɨna yenyɨna, sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyara kaanya yamarina, samatanakeraavɨre kɨlaakejɨka nawɨ'nya yɨma'nyɨna. Nabaai a'mwe kadɨka mu'nyɨmu'nyara yagaalyangɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna, a'mwe bainɨkera ayɨna dɨkaa'na, a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna yadɨnyainyɨ. Sasarera sara yɨvanɨga'.
Nabaai a'mwei nɨmɨnyɨ lɨmwangebwina yawɨta kwalaalya myaja sare sai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkelyɨ.” Jizaazai Jonɨmɨna sara wɨda'.

Jonɨ maryasaabaka saraai mena kaanna wodaakɨlyɨ kwala bwa'naanyaraavɨ Jonɨmɨna wɨdɨna “A'mwera maayabanna tɨnna bewarɨ wanganya'neihi wɨwa'daataihɨlaka? Suya pɨrɨ' yɨhusa' galalɨwihɨrakerɨ'bɨsarɨ tɨnna wanganya'neihi wɨwa'daasaihi dɨngaka?

Aawa. Tɨnna bewarɨ wanganya'neihi wɨwa'daataihɨlaka? Baazɨ'ma'nya wolasa baazɨ'ma'nɨkerɨ wanganya'neihi wɨwa'daasaihi daaka? Yɨthaanyi! Baazɨ'ma'nya nawɨ'nyɨnaangenna wakadɨvɨ' kɨlaakejɨkɨne gɨlyɨvɨta nawɨ'nyanna kɨnɨnnaka sasara a'mwe dazara kingɨyaraavɨre angengɨ mwaaidɨvɨsare. Sasarerabɨtarɨ mɨ'.
Aawa. Tɨnna bewarɨ wanganya'neihi wɨwa'daataihɨlaka? Pɨropetɨya Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei dɨngaka? Yo, sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sai pɨropetɨyai yaka kɨrɨ' yɨ pɨropetɨyaraavɨreburɨ wavɨlavɨkelyɨ.
Nabaai a'mwe yune dazahwarɨna Bukuya' yɨda'nɨkerɨnera. Dara dɨnɨ'
‘Yɨthaa, nɨmɨre yagaalya' makwɨya'nerɨ maryasaabɨdeinyɨ.
‘Sɨnnawɨ gɨmɨnyɨ yɨbwaramakwaanna gyathelyɨ.
‘Sai gɨmɨnyɨna tusa' maryovɨrawakɨna yadelyɨ.’
Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Jonɨ Kwaakevakɨ a'mweraavɨdaa'nyara yɨma'nɨgata yuyaraavɨ wavɨlavɨkelyɨ. A'mwe Gotɨyai maremwaalademɨlɨ' yɨma'najamɨlɨ' yuna maalɨkemɨlɨ' mwaaloriyamɨlɨ' kɨrɨ' Jonɨmɨ wavɨlavademɨlɨkɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwara kadɨka wɨ'neva a'mwerajɨ a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsarajɨ sahwara dɨna “Yo, Gotɨyare sabwi yɨda'maraangebulyɨ.” Jonɨmɨ sahwara bavɨtaazɨya maaresare.
Kɨrɨ' nabaai Perɨzɨyarajɨ kɨwɨnyangɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨta sɨdu'nakerajɨ Jonɨmɨ bavɨtaazɨya maaretara mɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwara Gotɨyai wibwarɨdakwadaa'nyɨya nawɨ'nya savɨ bule'na wɨjaavesare.
Jizaazai dɨna “Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ dazagaa'ne a'mweraavɨna ke'ba'nanya berɨ' yɨhɨthɨma! Sahwara gatha'dara a'mweraavaka!
Sarera darebaaibɨsamɨlɨke. Avaannya'ne kaimɨraayamɨlɨka angwaasabanna mwaaidɨvɨ' kaimɨraaya pɨmɨlɨkaavɨna jaka dangadɨvɨsamɨlɨke (Jonɨ yaasɨwakebwi myaderɨna)
‘Kwala maa'nya'ne gware maku'manɨgo.
Kɨrɨ' “Kwarame aala!” dɨvanɨgave!’
(Nɨmɨ angyɨrɨ'maasabwi yadɨnyainyɨna)
‘Nemɨ baryangɨne kɨdaata dɨvanɨgo.
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre kɨdalaala mabwalayɨhɨravaawivanɨke!’
Sare' da'dare'nesɨ. Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei bɨna yɨna yaka pɨgasa bɨretɨya tɨka manyɨ, yuyagaa' waainɨya tɨka manyɨ. Sare'na nabaai sarɨmɨ dɨna ‘Yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.’

A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai bɨna yɨna yaka tɨka wapaa nada waainɨyasɨ nadaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ dɨna ‘Yɨthaanyi! Sai a'mwe tɨka kwalaalya nadelyɨra. Sara yada waainɨya kwalaalyajɨ nadelyɨ. Yaawaryaibɨsalyɨ. Sai a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ a'mwe kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanyaraavɨjɨ sahwaraavɨ kwɨya'mwelyɨra.’ Sara dadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' Jonɨjɨ sainaai Gotɨyare sɨdusabwine kaimɨraayainaai wawɨnya nawɨ'nya yɨvanɨgolyainaalyɨ. Wawɨnya sa sɨdu'nakera dara yawɨranganna ‘Gotɨyare sɨduta tewaanyabwina sara yɨvanɨgi. Yɨda'maraangesɨra.’”
Perɨzɨya pwai gamɨjɨ tɨka wapaaya bye'mwannanya'na Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna. Sara wɨdɨna kya' Perɨzɨya dazare angevɨna kaanna wɨna yaka tɨka munne savɨ mwaalɨna.

Yɨthaa! Anga naanga dazaba a'mwe kayaa'nanya yade' mwaalɨna. Sare sa' “Jizaazai anga Perɨzɨya dazare angevɨ tɨka wapaaya nɨvanɨkeva,” wɨ'nyɨna. Sarevɨ a'mwe daza' gamɨre kayaa'nanyanna yawɨraka sitala (sɨla alɨvezɨta) saadaaya nawɨ'nyaange' yɨ'nɨke' makabɨna yɨna yaka

wɨlaabɨna yɨna yaka Jizaazaryaba bulyɨmagɨ aya kɨba sɨvigɨ'nyɨryawɨ gidɨku' bulagaidaa'na yɨna yaka kɨnna dɨwaainyɨna. Kɨnna dɨwainadaa'nyɨ gamɨre kɨdalaalya Jizaazare sɨvɨlyɨrɨ bwalaravaawɨna kya' gannya mɨjata saamɨnyasɨ yaalɨka yɨmwanna. Sara mi'na yaka gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨrɨ bu'buta kwalaalya biwɨna yaka welivananya saadaayasɨ sɨvɨlyɨrɨ yevu'na.

Sara yɨna yadaa'nyɨ Perɨzɨya gamɨnyɨ wɨjɨvwarɨjɨmaa'naka dazai sasarevɨ tɨnna wanganaka sɨmunyavɨ dara yawɨ'na “A'mwe dathai sai pɨropetɨya nebulyai mwaalajɨ kwajɨ a'mwe gamɨnyɨ ata dathɨwamanɨka savɨ kyawɨranganadɨka! Nabaai gamɨre kɨburɨjɨ kyawɨranganadɨka! Yɨ daza' a'mwe kayaa'nanya yade' mwaalɨke'nanyɨ.”
Sara yawɨ'na kya' Jizaazai gamɨre sɨmunyaburɨna ja'nawɨdɨna “Saaimonɨ, yagaala pɨrɨ' gɨthɨde' warɨ'.” Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ dɨnyɨdana!”
Sara kuda' wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwaraai a'mwe pwarɨ dinaaya' kɨnɨnnakeraai. Pwai dinaaya' naanga naanga (K500) wɨwarɨkei, nabaai pwai yune kɨbawe (K50) wɨwarɨkei.

Saraai dinaaya daza' yɨnɨga wi'na yɨkaderaai mɨka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe sai ‘Saraaihɨre dinaaya maarɨderaaihi mɨ',’ wɨdɨna yadelyɨ. Nabaai sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dazahwaraarɨdaa'nyɨ pwai sahwarɨna tewaanya naanga wɨvu'nɨvanɨkei aaihwalaka?”
Wɨdɨna kya' Saaimonɨ dara ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨge. A'mwe dazai dinaaya naange' mi'nanya' dakɨwakei dɨngaka!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwarɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre yawɨbwata yɨwaanya' yɨda'nanyasɨra.”

Wɨdɨna yaka a'mwe dazayɨmagɨnna gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka Saaimonɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ a'mwe dathava davɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨjɨwaana! Angyɨrɨ'maasaraavɨna Juyaina yadaanyabaaibɨ' gɨmɨre angevɨ kabwimwa nɨmɨre sɨvɨlyavɨ aalya yɨnya'ne' nyɨjawaanyaigɨ mɨka. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe datha' gamɨre kɨdaraaibɨrɨkesɨ nɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ nyɨwakesɨra. Sara yaka gannya mɨjasasɨ yaalɨka nyimwamwakesɨra.
Gɨmɨ bu'buta maranyɨwaanyaigɨ mɨka! Kɨrɨ' nabaai nɨmɨ bwimwegaa'daasɨ yaka kuna dahaakɨgaasɨ a'mwe datha' nɨmɨre sɨvɨlyawaarɨ bu'busa' kuna maranyɨvanɨka.
Nɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ welivananyasɨ nyɨvu'mwaanyaigɨ mɨka! Kɨrɨ' a'mwe datha' nɨmɨre sɨvɨlyawaarɨ welivananya saadaayasɨ nyɨvu'mwakeinyɨra.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthɨvanɨge. Dazahɨrɨ' kayaa'nanya kwalaalyabwi yadevɨ gamɨre kayaa'nanya daza marasɨ'mwe'na, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna yuna nebwina wɨvu'nɨvanɨkesɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwei kayaa'nanya maalɨkemɨlɨ' yaderɨ nɨmɨ marasɨ'nɨwɨja sa' yɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨna yuna maalɨ'na wɨvu'nadelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka sahɨrɨvɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya mena gɨmarasɨ'mwengɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwera gamɨjɨ wapeyɨ'bɨnyavɨ ye'mwannemwaalesara kumɨ sahwaraavɨ gaai dɨnyɨna “A'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'mwaka dazai bewai dɨngaka?”
Sarevɨ Jizaazai a'mwe savɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna nyɨlɨmwamwaanya'na gɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'nanyabwina gɨvadaihasamaa'mwe'gɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ kaanna wawo'gɨzɨ gɨmɨre munyɨ' kwaamu' kave nayaa gwarana!”

Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' anga naangebanyajɨ anga maalɨkebanyajɨ Jizaazai kaanya yamarina yada Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨne yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sagaa' sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara gamɨjɨ ye'mwannayamarina.

Nabaai a'mwe pɨnɨ, sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Jizaazai kumɨjɨya pɨnɨngɨ yɨmakera marasɨ'naka pɨnɨngɨre nalaaya marasɨ'nake, sa kɨnɨjɨ sahwalyɨ ye'mwannayamarina. A'mwe pɨrɨ' Maarɨyaasɨ. Sahɨrɨvɨna Maahɨthaala mwaalyava wɨdadɨvɨsasɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Jizaazai sahɨrɨvɨ yɨmaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraainanyara marasɨ'nakesɨ.

Nabaai pɨrɨ' Jowaana', Erotɨyare angevɨ maremwaaide Suzaamɨre a'mwesɨ. Pɨrɨ' Suzanasɨ. Nabaai a'mwe yuya kwalaalya pɨnɨjɨ sahɨnɨjɨ sahwalyɨ ye'mwannɨguna. A'mwe daza Jizaazarɨjɨ gamɨreraavɨjɨ kumɨre gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ wɨgaimwagesangɨ.
Sarevɨ a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naangera bi'bwa'nemwaaina yadɨvɨ' anga pɨnɨngɨdaa'nyara gamɨnyawɨnna yɨkabɨna yɨkabɨna. Yɨkabɨna yɨkabɨna yɨna kye' yagaala ke'ba'nanya' wɨdɨna

“Pɨraihɨrakade pwai witɨzɨla pɨraihɨrakya'nei wɨna. Wɨna yaka wawɨnyavɨ witɨzɨla pɨraihɨrakamarivanɨkelyɨ. Sai pɨraihɨrakɨwodaasɨ nabaai witɨzɨla pɨnɨ tusavɨ bwalaraawɨna. Sare sangɨ nabaai a'mwera sɨvɨlyajɨ paihɨramarina yadaapi yusara sɨgunyavɨyara tɨka maranyɨna.
Nabaai witɨzɨla pɨnɨ sɨlaangevɨ kwaaka maalɨkevɨ bwalaraawɨna. Sa yɨrɨ'na yaka kɨrɨ' kwaakeva' aalya tɨ'gɨrya maayavakɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨla sasare daza yɨnahu yawaka baidaa'na yaka balɨna.
Nabaai witɨzɨla pɨnɨ wɨla lannakebaraayaba bwalaraawɨna. Sare sa wɨla lannakebarajɨ ye'mwannayɨrɨ'na yɨna yaka a'nɨngɨ dathɨwaaina.

Nabaai witɨzɨla pɨnɨ kwaaka nawɨ'nya mɨnarɨnakevakɨ bwalaraawɨna yɨnɨke sa yɨrɨ'na yaka tɨka munne kwalaalya yɨ'nyɨna. Darebɨsa yɨ'nyɨna, gavemɨlɨkɨdaa'nyɨ waanɨ aadɨretɨya yɨ'nyɨna.” Sara wɨdɨna yaka jaka dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “A'mwe kadɨ'nakei yagaala dathavɨ kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana!”
Gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara gamɨnyɨ ke'ba'nanya dazavɨne'na yagaala kaavɨlya'na yɨdaanganna.

Yɨdaanganna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyai gannya maremwaaidevwina yulyakɨyagaala dɨnɨka aaya kaavɨlyavɨ yawɨranganya'neihɨrɨ mena yɨhibwarɨdaakuwakelyɨ. Sarevɨ kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwara yune ke'ba'nanya yagaalyavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨga'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ
‘Tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' yawɨrangadɨvɨ' mɨ'.
Kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' wɨ'namaa'dɨvɨ' mɨ'.’
Ke'ba'na yagaala dazavɨne aaya kaavɨlya' yɨ daresɨ. Witɨzɨla daza yɨ sa Gotɨyare yagaalyasɨ.

Nabaai witɨzɨla pɨnɨ tusavɨ bwala'daawade, yɨ sa a'mwera yagaalya kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨsa'nesɨ. Kɨrɨ' dɨvidaa'nyɨ Kotɨya Maryadei badehaa' kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ yagaala daza' marasɨ'delyɨ. Sai ‘Gotɨyarɨ nalɨmwabɨka! Sara kyapɨjɨ Gotɨyai nuvadaihasamaaradɨka!’ daka marasɨ'nadelyɨ.

Nabaai witɨzɨla pɨnɨ sɨlaangevɨ kwaakejɨkɨ bwalaraawɨna, yɨ sa a'mwera yagaalyavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' wɨ'namaa'na yadɨvɨ' savɨne'na yɨlaaya naanga yɨna. Sahwara pwipula maayara maalɨkegaa'na lɨmwadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' yɨjɨwaala pɨgasa lɨka sangina yɨgɨ'daa'dɨvɨsare.

Nabaai witɨzɨla pɨnɨ wɨla lannakebaraavɨ bwala'daawade yɨ sa a'mwera yagaalya kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' kaanya yamaryadaapɨjɨ taanginya dala nabinya pɨburajɨ nɨgwia gɨlyɨvɨta sajɨ Kwaaka davakɨya yɨlaaya dala nabinya saburajɨ wɨdathɨvaidere. Yuya sa Gotɨyarɨ mwagi'nadengɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨre tɨka wapaaya sa yɨ'nabaladengɨra. Bwɨyangɨra.

Kɨrɨ' witɨzɨla kwaaka nawɨ'nya mɨnarɨnakevakɨ bwala'daawade daza, yɨ sa a'mwera kumɨre sɨmunya nawɨ'nyaangevɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' yuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'na. Sara yadɨvɨ' taanginya wiadaa'nyɨ dɨragɨnna kuna yadɨvɨ' tɨka munne naanga yɨma'nadaa'nyɨ mwaalɨna.

A'mwe aane pwai kwai laamɨvananya' yewɨta'da maa'gulyavɨ amwidaa'nyɨ yulyakadei mɨ'. Nabaai se warya'ne yɨ'bɨnyavɨ dalaangevɨ marulyakadei mɨ'. Aawa. Laamɨvananyavɨne yɨ'bɨnyavɨ a'ba munyaba yɨlɨmwaaihadesɨ. ‘A'mwera angevɨ bulapɨriyara dɨ'baaka dazavɨ tɨnna wangabɨka!’ dada munyaba yɨlɨmwaaihadesɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuya lɨka yulyakɨnɨke dɨvi nabaai sa ku'maayaba yuna yalɨku'naraabathengɨ. Yuya bwakakɨnɨke dɨvi nabaai sa ku'maayaba jalɨku'naraabathengɨ. Sare sangɨ nabaai a'mwera yuna yawɨrangabɨ'dengɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sara yapi nɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ kadɨka nayaa dɨnyu'nyideihɨlyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai nɨmɨre yagaalya' lɨmwagarojɨyarɨ sare sarɨ nabaai Gotɨyai lɨmwanga pɨbulyɨ yanga kuna wɨjaavadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' pwai nɨmɨre yagaalya' malɨmwagaryajai nebulya'na kwaasɨ yawɨ'manɨke ‘Mena lɨmwamanɨgena,’ yawɨ'manɨke'na, yɨ sa Gotɨyai marasɨ'nadengɨ.” Jizaazai sara wɨdakesɨ.
Sagaa' gamɨnyawɨnna ganaangesɨ gahwaalaangerajɨ yɨkabɨna. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naangera kwala yɨ'bwa'nyɨna yadaapɨjɨyavɨna gamɨnyaba aya kɨbanna gidɨku' mulaabi.
Mulaabi kye' sahwarɨ a'mwe pwara wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨnyɨ gwaangesɨ gɨmɨre jɨhwaalaangerajɨ tɨnna gwanganya'nera mwasawɨ bathaakava.”
Wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' sahwai sahwaraavɨ ma'maa'na “A'mwera Gotɨyare yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' mɨdɨbɨzara, yɨ dazara nɨmɨnyɨ nɨwaavajɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨgwaalaangerera.”
Yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ sɨpɨya pɨrɨvɨ gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsarajɨ yɨladɨkwosɨ'namwaaina yaka kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Nemɨ aalɨbunyavɨ pimagɨ, kengimagɨnna bwalyawaadeinera.” Sara wɨdɨna yaka kaanna wɨna.
Sɨpɨya' kaanya wodaa'nyɨyagaa' sai se warɨna. Se warɨna yadɨ'nyɨ aalɨbunyavɨ yɨhu'maanarya' yɨma'nyɨna kya' sɨpɨyavɨ bwaladɨ'naawɨna yadɨ'nyɨ kewɨnɨ walamaradathata'neba aya kɨba mena yɨma'nyɨna kya'

bulaawɨna yeva gamɨnyɨna bulyɨdɨkavaawɨna yevegaa' wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ! A'mwe naangeigɨ! Yuna dahaasagaa' nemɨ yaraina yɨwawaade'na yɨwoneva.” Wɨdɨna kye' daavɨna yaka yɨhuta sasɨ aalɨmavajɨnaaka naanga sasɨ maanga wɨdɨna. Sara wɨdɨna kya' yɨhuta yɨnahu muda'na kya' aalya' ayɨna aalɨmavajɨnaaka mima'nyɨna.

Sara kya' sagaa' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi gawɨ warɨka!” Sagaa' sahwara lɨka yɨna yadɨvɨ' atɨka maru'na'na yadɨvɨ' dɨnyɨna “Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ be a'mwelaka! Sai yɨhusasɨ aalyasɨ maanga kudɨwa' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yɨwaai!”
Dɨvi sɨpɨyɨhuselɨya' makuna yaka Geraaza sɨmagɨnna yɨ'mavaawɨna. Anga dazaba aalɨbunya Galɨli pimagɨ warɨkeba.

Yɨ'mavaawɨna kya' Jizaazai sɨpɨyavɨ yagalya'mavaka tɨyawɨnna wɨlaawɨna kya' a'mwe anga naanga dazabnne mwaalyai sahwarɨ wɨrata'nyɨna. A'mwe dazarɨ yɨmaka pwara wɨmwaaidapiyai. Saamɨnyagaa' sahwai kwaabɨhannya kuna mira'nyadei. Sahwai anga aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨvɨ mwaaidei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai gɨlekavi'nɨnnyabanya mwalamaryadelyɨ.

A'mwe dazai Jizaazarɨ tɨnna wanganaka jaka danganna yɨna yaka gamɨre sɨvigɨ'nyɨryaba aya kɨba wɨlaabɨna yaka kwaakevakɨ bula'na yaka jaka naangave'na danganna “Jizaazai, Gotɨya yuna munya ke'bevanyareigɨ! Nɨmɨnyɨ gara dɨnyɨde'na bahɨneigɨnaka? Akai, dɨragɨnna yɨdaanganna gima! Nɨmɨnyɨ daanga manyɨjaavɨnnera!”

Sara wɨdake' dare'nesɨ. Jizaazai yɨmaka dazarɨna mena wɨdɨna “A'mwe dazarɨ yagalya'makuna yɨna ja!” Nabaai sare' dare'nanyɨ. Saamɨnya kwalaalyagaa' yɨmaka dazai a'mwe dazarɨ galalɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera yuyagaa' sahwarɨ asawaalyɨ wɨla senɨyabaalyɨ yapwekɨna yadɨvɨ' sɨvɨlyaraalyɨ wɨla yapwekɨna yadɨvɨta sahwarɨ maredaa'dɨvɨsalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sahwai yuya kwaari'mawɨla kɨbara yesɨvalakɨwɨna yada sarevɨ yɨmaka dazai a'mwera mamwaalyɨgata pimagɨnna yɨdangɨramakwodelyɨ.

“Daanga manyɨjaavɨnnera!” jaka kuda' Jizaazai sahwarɨ yɨdaanganna “Gɨmɨnne yaya' aaihwaigɨnaka?” Yɨdaanganna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Kwalaalyainyɨ.” Yɨmaka kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ wɨlamwaainɨkerɨna “Kwalaalyainyɨ,” wɨdɨna.
Wɨdɨna yaka yɨmaka dazara jaka dɨragɨnna danganna “Gɨmɨ nemɨnyɨ dɨka kewewɨnneinaavɨna mamaraneyaasɨnnera!”

Sara dɨragɨnna danganna yevegaa' yaawarɨkwala naange' mugunyavɨ aya kɨba kurɨvaarɨya nɨdaa'nyɨna yadaapi yɨmaka dazara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Daanga naangeba nalarawaadɨka!” jaka dɨragɨnna danganna “Yaawarɨkwala naanga dazaraayawɨnna kanedaasa'gɨzɨ yuimɨlaana!” Dɨragɨnna sara danganna kye' wɨdanganaasɨna yɨna.

Wɨdanganaasɨna yɨna kya' yɨmaka dazara a'mwe dazarɨ yagalya'ma'na yɨna yeva yaawaryaraavɨre munyɨkaavɨ wiminna. Sara kye' yaawarɨkwala daza' davaanyavɨ kaanyave'na dɨragɨnna walaawɨna. Sare sara aalɨbunyavɨ walakuna yɨna yeva aalya mihuna yɨna yeva yuya kwalya' baihɨrirɨ'na ye'.
Yaawaryaraavɨ yɨ'dɨvaidɨvɨsara sasara yɨma'naka dazangɨ tɨnna wanganna yeva lɨkaanya wɨna. Lɨkaanya wɨna yeva anga naangebanyavɨjɨ wawɨnangengɨjɨ mwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨna yagaala daza' wɨjɨwakamaryaawɨna.

Sara yɨna kye' a'mwera dazangɨ tɨnna wanganaawia'nera Jizaazaryawɨnna bi'ma'na yɨna yeva a'mwerɨ yɨmakera mena yagalya'makwawesarɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sai kwaabɨhannya' yɨra'nɨkei gamɨre sɨmunyai nawɨ'nya yawɨ'da Jizaazare sɨvɨlyɨryaba gidɨku' aya kɨba mwaaidɨ'nyɨ. A'mwera dazavɨ tɨnna wanganeva lɨka naanga yɨna.
Nabaai a'mwera sasare dazangɨ tɨnna wanganesara sɨnnawɨ a'mwe dazarɨ yɨmakera wɨlamwaaidapiyarɨ ayɨna tewaanya yavada'galakerɨna sara wɨjɨwaakɨna.

Wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna kye' a'mwe yuya anga Geraaza sɨmagɨdaa'nyara gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Nemɨnyɨ neyagalya'mava'gɨzɨ kaanya dɨwona!” Kumɨ lɨka naanga yadɨvɨsa'na sara wɨdɨna. Sara yadaapi sɨpɨyavɨ dɨkwosɨ'na yaka ayɨna kaanna wɨna.
Kuna mwaaidɨ'nyɨyagaa' a'mwe yɨmakera mena yagalya'makwaweta dazai dɨragɨnna yɨdaanganna “Nɨmɨ gɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannɨguma!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' sahwarɨ wɨdaasa'nerɨ wɨdɨna

“Gɨnnya angebanna ayɨna kaanna dɨwodeigɨnyɨra. Sara wawo'gɨzɨ Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨ giwaka yuya sanna duzɨwaakɨdeigɨnyɨra.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe dazai kaanna wɨna yaka gamɨre anga naangebanya yuyaraavɨ yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Jizaazai gamɨnyɨ wɨvada'galaka yuya sanna wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Jizaazai ayɨna kaanna bakevɨ a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya' wɨjɨma'naabɨna yeva yɨlaaya yɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuyara sahwarɨna yemwaaina yadɨvɨ' yɨlaaya yɨna.

Yɨlaaya yɨna yadaapi a'mwe pwai sahwarɨne yaya' Jaairazai bi'ma'na. Sai Juyaraavɨre lotuange' maremwaaide pwalyɨ. Sai bi'ma'na yaka Jizaazare sɨvigɨ'nyɨrɨ bula'na yaka dɨragɨnna yɨdaanganna “Nɨmɨre angevɨna dɨvama!
Nɨnnya taaya' yune gave kɨrɨ'nanyasɨra. Yɨ gamɨre kwarame atɨraai sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraaibɨsasɨ. Sare'na sa' balade'na nebawa mɨka. Sare'na yarai dɨvama!”
Jizaazai kaanya wodaa'nyɨ a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naange' gamɨnyɨ yunebanna bathakwamwadakuna.

Bathakwamwadakuna yadapi a'mwe pɨrɨ' mwaalɨna. Dazahɨrɨ' yuyagaa' baizaaka ma'nada kuna mwaaidɨ'nyɨ kwarame sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraaina mwaainɨke'. Nabaai gamɨre nalaaya sasare daza' a'mwe tewaanya yavada'gala ya'nei aane pwai kwai mamwaalyɨna.

A'mwe daza' gamɨnyɨ dusɨ bulyɨmagɨnna wɨlaabɨna yɨna yaka gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nyavɨre maangebaarɨ asa' dathɨwagaavɨna. Asa' sara dathɨwagaavɨna kya' sagaasagaa' gamɨre tawe' yaalɨka yɨlɨna yaka ayɨna mima'nyɨ.

Ayɨna mima'nyɨ kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ asa' aai nyɨdathɨwamwaabɨka!” Wɨdɨna kya' sare'na yuyara mɨjadɨwɨlɨna “Nɨmɨ aawa. Nɨmɨ aawa.” Sara yɨna kye' Pitai wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naangera gɨmɨnyɨ gyahɨhɨpaledaakava. Yɨ sara yeva yunebanna gɨhɨpaledaakava!”
Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Pɨmɨlɨ' ata nyɨdathɨwamwakeinyɨra. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ yɨbwakɨmanɨge. ‘Nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya pimagɨnya' mena wɨwakeinyɨ daaka!’ yawɨ'manɨge.”

Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe daza' yawɨ'na yaka “Gamɨnyɨna lɨka myulyaki yɨde'nyɨ daaka!” yawɨraka. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sa' lɨka naanga yɨna yada gamɨnyɨ aya kɨba kwaakevakɨ kwadaai bulagina. Sara yaka a'mwe yuyaraayaba gannya nalaaya'na asa' dathɨwagake' wɨjɨwaakɨna yaka nabaai wɨdɨna “Sara yena sagaa' nɨmɨre nalaaya' yarai yɨwɨwake'nera.”
Dɨna kya' sahɨrɨvɨ wɨdɨna “Nyɨraavɨ, gɨmɨre dɨragɨnna nyɨlɨmwamwaanyabwi gɨmɨnyɨ ayɨna tewaanya gyavada'gaimwake'gɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨre munyɨ' kave kwaamu' wa'dozɨ kaanya dɨwona!”
Sai yagaalya' kuna dadaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai maremwaaidere angevɨdaa'nyai bɨna yɨna yaka maremwaaiderɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre jɨraavaange' mena kabaimwakɨra. Nejɨwaakaderɨ yaasɨwa'na mamakunnera!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai daza' kadɨka wɨ'naka ganɨmaangerɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ lɨka minnera! Gɨmɨ yune dɨragɨnna dɨnyawɨralɨmwagaka! Sare'na gɨmɨre kaimɨraaya' ayɨna tewaanya yɨma'nadesɨ.”

Wɨdɨna yaka maremwaaidere angevɨna kaanna wɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ mwanganaki, gamɨjɨ angevɨna ye'mwannɨgulya'na. Aawa. Sahwai yune Pitarɨjɨ Jonɨmɨjɨ Jemɨzarɨjɨ taayavɨ ganɨmaangeyorɨjɨ maarɨna yaka gamɨjɨ ye'mwannɨgwina.
Nabaai a'mwe yuyara kaimɨraaya dazavɨna kɨnna jakɨnna bazemwaihuna yadaapi kɨrɨ' wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ kɨnna madɨpɨnera! Sa' mena baimwaka' mɨka. Aawa. Sa' se warɨka.”
Wɨdɨna yadaa'nyɨ gamɨnyɨ jɨka maregina. Kumɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Sa' mena baimwakesɨra,” bɨrala wɨdɨna.
Bɨrala wɨdɨna kye' sarevɨ kɨrɨ' kaimɨraayavɨre asɨrɨ lɨmwaga'na yɨna yaka jaka wɨdɨna “Kaimɨraaya'gɨ dɨthɨkaaka!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' taaya dazavɨre kuryai gamɨnyawɨnna ayɨna bɨna yaka bulamwaaina kya' sagaasagaa' taaya' dɨkavamwaaina. Mi'na dɨkavamwaaina kya' sarevɨna sayorɨ wɨdɨna “Sahɨrɨvɨ wapaaya dumaarila!”
Taayavɨ ganɨmaangeyoi atɨka maru'na'na yadaakɨlyɨ sahɨyorɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ yɨwe daza'na kɨrɨmɨyoihi a'mwe pwaraavɨ nujɨwaakikadɨka!”

Sagaa' gamɨre sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ jaka wɨjɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yɨna yaka sare saraavɨ dɨragɨnya naangesɨ naangaangenna ya'neraavɨne dɨragɨnyabulyɨ wɨjaavɨna. Yuya yɨmakeraavɨjɨ nalaaya dala nabinanyangɨjɨ marasɨ'nya'nebwi wɨjaavɨna.
Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨjɨ wɨjɨwaakya'neraavɨ nabaai nalaavɨnakeraavɨ tewaanya yavada'galya'neraavɨ wɨdaasɨna.

Wɨdaasɨna yakegaa' wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kaanya yamarya'ne aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' namaapɨdɨka! Yadisarɨkajɨ gɨlya yɨvɨlyajɨ wapaayajɨ nɨgwiajɨ wana yuna namaapɨka! Nabaai sarɨmɨ baazɨ'ma'nya pɨrɨwaaina namaapɨdɨka!
Nabaai sarɨmɨ anga pɨrɨvɨ wɨlapɨjɨ yɨ yune anga dazahɨrɨvɨna dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Anga saba wɨjɨwaakɨna jideihɨlyɨ. Dɨvi anga dazavɨ yagalya'mavapɨjɨ yɨ kaanna dɨwideihɨlyɨ.

Pwara kumɨre angengɨna mihɨmakwi yɨhipɨjaraavɨ anga naanga dazaba jahalya'makwideihɨlyɨ. Sara yapɨjɨyaihi sarɨmɨre sɨvɨlyangɨ kwaatɨrɨdɨrɨnya dɨvurakɨrasɨ'nɨgwideihɨlyɨ. Sahwara tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ kumɨre sabwinajɨ Gotɨyai taanga wɨjaaya'najɨ yawɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. Kumɨnyɨne jalɨkurakya'nesɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara anga yuyabanya kaanya yamarina yadɨvɨ' yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna yadɨvɨ' gazabazaba nalaavɨnakeraavɨ nawɨ'nya yavada'galamwaaihɨna ye'.
Galɨli saba maremwaalaka maalɨkei Erotɨyai yuya dazangɨne'na kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka yawɨta kwalaalya yɨna. Jizaazarɨna a'mwe pwara dɨna “Jonɨ kavi'nɨnnyavɨdaa'nyai ayɨna dɨkaa'mwakerɨnereva.”
Nabaai pwara dɨna “Ne Pɨropetɨya Yɨlaajai yɨma'naabɨvanɨkerɨnereva.” Nabaai pwara “Pɨropetɨya sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakunanya pwai ayɨna dɨkaa'mwakerɨnereva.” Sara wɨdesa'na yawɨta kwalaalya yɨna.
Sarevɨ Erotɨyai dɨna “Nɨmɨ Jonɨmɨre tɨlɨnnya' mena woripuragerɨnera. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe dazai yagaala dazavɨ sasara wɨ'nɨvanɨgei bewalaka?” Sara dakei “A'mwe sahwarɨ tɨnna wanganɨma!” daka yakelyɨ.

Wɨdaasakera apozelɨyara yagalaawɨna yeva yuya kumɨ yageta sanna gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna. Mena wɨdɨna kye' sahwai sahwaraavɨ maarɨna yaka a'mwe pwaraavɨ yagalya'ma'na yɨna yaka yune kumɨ sarana anga naanga pɨbanna Betɨzaaitha wo'nɨkebanna kaanna makuna.

Makuna kya' kɨrɨ' dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mwera dazavɨna yawɨ'na yeva sahwarɨ mɨjamakuna. Sara yevera gamɨnyawɨnna yɨkabɨna kye' gamɨnyawɨnna bahesa'na sahwai yɨlaaya yɨna. Yɨlaaya yɨna yaka Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sara yada a'mwe nalaavɨnakeraavɨ nawɨ'nya yavada'gaina.

Sara kya' sawɨtɨrɨnyaburɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna yɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ kamaryaasa'gɨzɨ anga yuyabanyajɨ wawɨnangejɨ sawɨnna ‘Wawopɨjɨ wapaaya napɨjɨ se wa'mwaraawɨpɨka!’ da'gɨzɨ dɨmaryaasa! ‘Nemɨ mwaaihoya dimagɨ a'mwera maayɨmagɨnyɨra,’ gɨthɨwo'nanyɨ.”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' wɨdɨna “Yune sarɨmɨ saihina tɨka nya'ne duzaayɨla!” Kɨrɨ' sahwara wɨdɨna “Nemɨ wapaaya kwalaalya manewarika. Bɨretɨya atina yaka jawɨnya pwaraalyɨna warɨka. A'mwe yuya datharaavɨne'na nemɨ tɨka munne mubawaade'na sara dahayawɨ'mwaana?”
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mwe paaivɨ taawɨzanɨya (5,000) darerabɨ' mwaaidapi. Gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ duzɨla! ‘Pivɨti pivɨtiyara avaala pɨba yɨ'bwa'napɨjɨ nayaa walamwaaina jɨla!’”
Wɨdɨna kya' sara wɨdɨna yeva a'mwe yuyaraavɨ nayaa sara waladɨmwaaihɨna.

Waladɨmwaaihɨna kye' bɨretɨya atɨlya sajɨ jawɨnyaraalyɨ maarɨna yaka Sɨgunyavɨna maranganna yaka “Wapaayanna yɨlaaya gɨmaryɨwa!” wɨdɨna. Sara mena yakegaa' gunyɨna yaka a'mwe kwala bwa'naanyaraavɨ yanga bumumulaawia'ne gamɨreraavɨ wɨmaarina.
Wɨmaarina kya' yuyaraavɨna wɨjavaawɨna kye' yunebanna mena nyɨna yeva. Yuyara munya mena yɨnyɨna kwia' nɨganamudɨwɨraketa yuya sa kuna bwakwodɨ'nyɨ soigɨlya sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pukaalyangɨ maramihɨna.
Pɨgaa' sahwai gavei Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaa'nyɨ gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara gamɨjɨ ye'mwannemwaaina. Sagaa' sahwai sahwaraavɨ yɨdaanganna “Kwala bwa'naanya nɨmɨnyɨna nyɨdɨvanɨgata aaihwainyaka?”

Sarevɨ nabaai sahwara ja'nawɨdɨna “Pwara ‘Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadelyɨra,’ gɨthɨvanɨgasaigɨnyɨ. Nabaai pwara ‘Yɨlaajalyɨra,’ gɨthɨvanɨgasaigɨnyɨ. Nabaai pwara dɨna ‘Pɨropetɨya sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakunanya pwai gɨlekavi'nɨnnyavɨ ayɨna dɨkaa'mwakelyɨreva.’ ”

Sara ja'nawɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Nabaai yune sarɨmɨ saihi nɨmɨnyɨna nyɨdɨvanɨgata bewainyaka?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pitai ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ Gotɨyai gɨthahɨlakaka maryasaabakeigɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨnyɨra. Gotɨyareigɨnyɨra.”
Kɨrɨ' kumɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! A'mwe pwara kwaraavɨ yagaala daza' wɨjɨwaakya'na kɨmaakɨya mi'na dakɨwana!”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai taanga kwalaalya maaradelyɨra. Sarevɨ nabaai a'mwe naangerajɨ Gotɨyarɨne tamira'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ sahwarɨ bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨ'delyɨra. Sara yapɨjɨ sahwarɨ tamakɨpɨjai yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ sahwarɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavadelyɨ.”

Sahwai yuyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai a'mwe pwai kwai nɨmɨnyɨ ‘Mɨdɨnɨma!’ yawɨrajai gamɨ sai gannya sɨmunyavɨ wiekɨrakada yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ gannya yɨta yovihɨrarannɨke' nayaa marikwavade'bɨ'na ‘Nɨmɨ Jizaazarɨna baimuja' tewaanyasɨ. A'mwera Jizaazarɨna kayaa'na nyɨpɨ'de' wikɨra,’ yawɨ'da nɨmɨnyɨ sɨvigɨ'nyɨrɨ nayaa nyɨmɨdɨnadelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai ‘Jizaazarɨna nanyɨramakɨpɨdɨka!’ dazai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmarasɨ'najai kuna mwaalade kɨrɨ' gamɨre gaala mwaalyabwi yagalya'mavadevulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' pwai nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨrojɨ balajai dɨragɨnna nyɨlɨmwagazai yɨ yɨnɨga wi'nanyɨra. Sahware gaalyabwi tewaanna padaihasamaa'nadelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai nɨgwia gɨlyɨvɨta saza Kwaakevakɨya yuya sa maarajai sarevɨ gamɨ sai yuna kayaaka yɨma'nada nabaai gamɨre gaala mwaalyabwi yagalya'mavojɨ gamɨ yuya maarɨna yaja sasare daza gamɨnyɨ gatha'dara gaimwagathengaka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai nɨmɨnyɨnajɨ nɨmɨre yagaalyavɨnajɨ sangɨna ‘Wagɨla nanyɨvwa'nadɨka! Sahwarɨ wasɨ'nɨma!’ dazai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai gannya byaanna naangevɨjɨ Nɨmwarevɨjɨ ejelɨya tewaanyaraavɨrevɨjɨ walaabathehaa' yɨ sahwai ‘A'mwe dazai kwarɨna wagɨla nanyɨvwa'nadɨka! Bule wɨjaavɨma!’ wɨdathelyɨ.
Sare' kɨrɨ' nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nabaai a'mwe pwara dava daakata dara yarai mabalyadapi Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨ tɨnna wangabɨ'dehaa'nanyɨ.”
Yagaala daza mena dakegaa', dɨvi yɨrɨka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraai mena kwavɨlava' sahwai Pitarɨjɨ Jonɨmɨjɨ Jemɨzarɨjɨ maarɨna yɨna yaka mugunyavɨna Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'nei yɨlaawɨna.
Yɨlaawɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ kuna wɨdɨvainadaa'dɨ'nyɨ gamɨre sɨnnyɨ' mudɨka pwaibɨ' yɨma'nyɨna yaka nabaai gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya' yuna yaake' wannyɨna, kɨmihɨmɨla yɨna.
Sara kya', yɨthaa, a'mwe pwaraai sahwalyɨ yagaala ye'mwannadɨna. Pwai Ne Mozɨzalyɨ. Pwai Ne Yɨlaajalyɨ.
Yɨ sahwaraai byaanna naangevɨ yagɨleraai yɨma'naabɨna yagɨla sare saraai Jizaazai Jeruzaalemɨ yune'na ya'na sanna dɨnyɨna. Sahwai Kwaaka davakɨ yagalya'mavojɨ wawodelyɨra.

Wɨdɨna yadaapi Pitalyɨ pwaraai gamɨjɨyaraalyɨ seyɨvɨta kwima'na' kɨrɨ' yaaka dɨkavayɨma'nyɨna yeva byaanna naange' sahwarɨdaa'nyɨ kima'na' tɨnna nayaa wanganna. Nabaai a'mwe dazaraai kwaraalyɨ sahwalyɨ ye'mwannadaa'dakɨlyɨ tɨnna wanganna.

Saraai “Gamɨnyɨ yagalya'mavakwoihɨlyɨ wawaka!” dahɨla yadaakɨlyɨ Pitai Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, nemɨ dava mwaaihoya' tewaanyasɨra. Sɨmɨnya dawaai dasa yarɨlaadeinera. Pɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨne', pɨrɨ' Mozɨzarɨne', pɨrɨ' Yɨlaajarɨne'.” Pitai sahwai sɨmunya nayaa myawɨryakei yagaala daza' sara wɨdɨna.
Kuna wɨdɨna yadaa'nyɨ yɨraaya pɨjɨ' galayewaa'mwanna. Yɨraayajɨ' galayewaa'mwanna yadaa'nyɨ sahwara lɨka naanga yɨna.
Lɨka yɨna yadaapi yɨraaya savɨ kusawɨdaa'nyɨ maanguraaya pɨrɨ' jaka yɨnyɨna “Dathai nɨmɨre Nyɨbwaalɨvaangelyɨra. Nɨmɨ mena wɨdahɨlakelyɨra. Gamɨre yagaalyavɨ kadɨka du'nyɨla!”
Maanguraaya daza' mena kabinɨgwawa' Jizaazai yuna gavei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sara yeva kumɨre maange bɨpaina. Nabaai dazagaa' a'mwe aane pwai kwarɨ sahwara tɨnna wanganeta sanna mujɨna.
Yɨrɨka ayawɨdaasarɨkɨ mugunyavɨ yagalya'maveva walaawɨna kye' a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naange' gamɨnyɨna burata'nyɨna.

Burata'nyɨna kye', yɨthaa, a'mwe pwai kwala bwa'naanya dazavɨdaa'nyai jaka danganna, “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, dɨragɨnna githaanganɨma! Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayarɨ tɨnna dɨnyanganya! Nɨmɨ kaimɨraaya yune gave dazahwainanyainyɨra.

Sare sarɨ, yɨthaa, yɨmakei galapwelɨmwaga'delyɨra. Sara wiadaa'nyɨ sahwai jaahwasa'bɨ' kayaa'jaka dadelyɨra. Nabaai sara yada yɨmaka dazai yuna kayaa'na galarɨvɨtawakadelyɨra. Sara wiadaa'nyɨ gamɨre maangevɨdaa'nyɨ maagwaitala yaake' yɨma'naabadelyɨ. Gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ yuna kayaaka wigalakada yarai yagalya'makwodei mɨ'.
Nabaai ‘Yɨmaka dazai marasɨpɨka!’ dena gɨmɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdena yagɨnna yɨdangadaari kɨrɨ' yuna aawaawa. Myɨ yɨpɨnere.”

Jaka sara danganna kya' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ a'mwe dathahaasaihi dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi kuneihi, sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' nayaa yɨda'na mwarikeihi, sarɨmɨjɨ kuna gatha'daregaa'na yɨhye'mwannemwaala'mujɨ sarɨmɨre taanginya maarɨdeinyaka! Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayai davanna dɨmakulaama!”

Wɨdɨna kya' gamɨre kaimɨraayai kuna widavadaa'nyɨ yɨmaka dazai kwaakewɨ marawɨnangɨrakɨna yaka yuna kayaa'na yawɨnangɨrakɨna. Sara wiadaa'nyɨ kɨrɨ' Jizaazai yɨmaka dazarɨ maanga wɨdɨna yaka kaimɨraayarɨ tewaanya yavada'gaina yɨna yaka ganɨmaangerɨ ayɨna wɨjaavɨna.
Sarevɨ a'mwe yuyara Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' byaanna savɨ tɨnna wanganeva lɨka yɨwainɨgulɨna.
A'mwe yuyara Jizaazai yaka yuya dazanna atɨka kuna maru'na'na yadaapi gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna
“Sarɨmɨ yagaala dathavɨne'na gɨthɨde' kadɨkikɨ nayaa dakyɨla! Da'daresɨ. Dɨvi kɨbawe maalɨkegaa' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ nɨmɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨna nyɨbwarɨdaakwadeinyɨra.”

Kɨrɨ' sahwara yagaala dazavɨ nayaa myawɨramaari. Yagaala dazavɨne aaya kaavɨlya' sahwaraavɨna kuku'nya wɨla'na. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwara sahɨrɨvɨna nayaa myawɨramaari. Sarevɨ nabaai sahwara yagaala dazavɨna yɨdaanganya'na lɨka yɨna.
Sagaa' gamɨrera gemarasɨ'nyɨyagaala pɨrɨ' “Nemɨjɨya naangei aaihwalaka? Nɨmɨnyɨra. Nɨmɨnyɨra,” ge' bivɨkɨ'nɨguna.
Ge' bivɨkɨ'nɨguna yadaapi Jizaazai kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ gemarasɨ'nyɨyagaalyavɨ yawɨranganna. Yawɨranganna yaka sarevɨ sahwai kaimɨraaya maalɨka pɨmɨlɨ' maarɨna yaka gamɨjɨ marye'mwannadaa'na.

Sara yaka sai wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwai kaimɨraaya maalɨka dathamɨlɨkɨ nɨmɨnyɨne yayavɨna maarajai sai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaaradelyɨ. Nabaai sai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaarajai yɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaryasaabaka dazarɨ maaradelyɨ. Sarebwi dare'nebulyɨ. A'mwei sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨrɨne'na tɨnnyabanyai yuna maalɨka mwaalajai yɨ Gotɨyarɨna sai yuna naangelyɨ.”
Jonɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, a'mwe pwai gɨmɨnyɨne yayavɨ yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdasadaa'nyɨ tɨnna wangamwoine. Sara yada kɨrɨ' nemɨnyɨ manemɨdɨnyɨvanɨke'na sahwarɨna kɨmaakɨya dakɨwolyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai sahwarɨ wɨdɨna “Sahwarɨna kɨmaakɨya madakɨpɨnera! Sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mwei sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨkamaanga mihivanɨkei sai sarɨmɨnyɨnelyɨra. Yɨkamaangei mɨka!”
Jizaazarɨ Sɨgunyavɨna makilaawia ya'ne Gotɨyaregaa' aya kɨgaa' mena kima'na' gamɨre sɨmunyai yovɨrawakɨna yaka Jeruzaalemɨna kaanya wɨya'na.
Sarevɨ gamɨnyɨ sɨnnawɨ yovɨrawakaawia'na pwaraarɨ yagaalya' wɨdaasɨna. Mi'na wɨdaasɨna kya' dazaraai kaanna wɨna yeva Samerɨya mwaalyaraavɨre anga pɨbanna wɨlaawɨna.

Sabanna wɨlaawɨna kyagi kɨrɨ' anga dazabanyara Jizaazarɨ kumɨre angengɨna makwɨya'na “Aala!” dɨna, mamaari. Sahwara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Sahwai Jeruzaalemɨna wawade'nanyɨra. Nemɨre naangebanna mɨ'.” Sahwara gevwi yadɨvɨsa'na “Aala!” dɨna.

“Aala!” dɨna kye' gamɨre mɨdɨdisaraai Jemɨzalyɨ Jonɨjɨ sahwaraai sasare saburɨ wanganagɨla wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, kayaa'na sara yɨwaasa'na Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ dɨke'na kudawaajɨ dɨke' walaabozɨ a'mwe datharaavɨ dɨke' nakade'na sɨmunya myawɨrijɨwaana?”
Wɨdɨna kyagi kɨrɨmɨnyɨmagɨ gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka maanga wɨdɨna.
Maanga wɨdɨna yaka sahwara anga pɨbannera kaanna wɨna.
Sahwara tutaanyavɨ kaanya wodɨvɨ' a'mwe pwai gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ kaanya yamarija anga yuya sabanya nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ gɨmɨdɨnamarideinyɨ.”

Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Kavɨjɨlɨkera kwaakevakɨ kumɨre daibu'nya kɨnɨnnakerera. Nabaai sɨgunyavɨne yuta kwarajɨ arɨsa kɨnɨnnakerera. Sare' kɨrɨ' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyɨ' yɨladɨhaihɨta ya'neba kunelyɨra.”

Wɨdɨna yaka a'mwe pwarɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!” Kɨrɨ' sai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Ya,’ majɨ jɨtheigɨ dɨngaka? Nɨmɨnyɨ nɨmaamaangerɨ tɨvi'na maralɨkirakaawa'mujɨneinyɨra. (Mi'na kabalojɨ bɨdeinyɨra.)”

Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' sahwarɨ wɨdɨna “Baa'nana! Pwara, Gotɨyarɨna majadɨvɨsara, kurya bainɨkera baryaraavɨ maralɨkirakɨpɨ'derera. Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ kaanya wawa'gɨzɨ Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨna a'mweraavɨ duzɨwakaawa!”
Wɨdɨna kya' nabaai a'mwe pwai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨ gɨmɨdɨmune kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Ya,’ kyawɨra'gɨzɨ nɨmɨ wawo'mujɨyagaa' nɨmɨjɨ avaaimwaalya yuyaraavɨ ata yune'na bwa'naawɨdeinyɨ.”

Sarevɨ Jizaazai sarɨ wɨdɨna “Pwai nɨmɨre wawɨnya yadei kwai kɨrɨ' yuyagaa' dusɨmagɨnna gamɨre ayabwina gɨnyɨma'nangadei sasare sai Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide'na wɨjɨwaakya'nei yɨnɨga wi'na yadei mɨka.”

Sa yaka dɨvidaa'nyɨ Naangei a'mwe sevedituya (72) pwaraavɨjɨ dahɨlakɨna yaka pwaraarɨna pwaraarɨna maryaasɨna. Gamɨnyɨne'na sahwaraavɨ sɨnnawɨ wɨdaasɨna. Anga naanga yuyabanyaavɨnajɨ anga maalɨka yuyabanyaavɨnajɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ yune gamɨ saina wɨya'nebanyana sahwaraavɨ maryaasɨna.

Sarevɨ sai sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Tɨka munne kwalaalya wawɨnyavɨ mena yovɨgaipwakɨnɨkengɨra. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Tɨka munne maarya'ne a'mwera kwalaalyara mɨka. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ wawɨnyavɨ Naangerɨ kidaanganapɨjɨ gamɨre tɨka wapaaya mari'bwarakya'nera gamɨre wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ yarai wɨdaasaderera.
Nabaai sarɨmɨ kaanya dɨwila! Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmɨ yɨhɨmaryaasɨweihi kavɨjɨlɨkeraavɨ tɨnnyabanna sipɨzipɨya maalɨkebɨsaihi dɨwideihɨlyɨra.
Sarɨmɨ nɨgwɨpaawɨzɨyasɨ gɨlyasɨ kwaari'masɨvɨla pɨrɨwaalyɨ namaapɨdɨka! Tutaanyavɨ a'mwera badaapiyaraavɨ aangaa'na dɨvainadaasa'na ‘Nya'mwei! Nya'mwei!’ mudɨpɨna!
Nabaai sarɨmɨ anga pɨrɨvɨ wɨlapɨjɨ yɨ sɨnnawɨ aayagaa' dara duzideihɨlyɨ ‘Anga davɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨsangihɨrɨ kave kwaamu' tewaanya yɨhwarana!’

Nabaai a'mwe pwai kave kwaamu' maa'dei anga dazavɨyai mwaalajai yɨ sarɨmɨ kwaamu' wɨjaavɨpɨja sa' dazarɨ wɨlawɨwaradesɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai a'mwe pwai sasara mi yaja' yɨ sabwi sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna bozɨ kwɨyakwaihɨrɨ bihwaradesɨ.

Kɨrɨmɨnyɨ maarɨna yɨpɨjara sahwaraavɨre yune anga gave pɨrɨvɨna dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Sara yapi tɨka wapaajɨna aalyajɨna yɨhɨzaavɨpɨja dɨnyideihɨlyɨ. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Wawɨnya wɨdaayadei gannya wawɨnya'na gannya nɨgwia yɨnɨga wi'na maarannelyɨ. Sarebaaibɨ'na yɨhɨzaavɨpɨja dɨnyideihɨlyɨ. Anga pɨrɨvɨdaa'nyɨ anga pɨrɨvɨna tɨka wapaaya maarya'neihi yaasɨwa'na nyamaripɨka!
Nabaai sarɨmɨ anga naanga pɨba kulaawopɨjɨ sahɨbanyara yɨhɨmaarapɨjɨ kunnya angengɨna kihɨmakwopɨjɨ yɨ wapaaya yanga yɨhɨzaavɨpɨja dɨthaapyideihɨlyɨ.

Nabaai anga dazabanya a'mwe nalaavɨnakeraavɨ ayɨna tewaanya yavada'gaina jideihɨlyɨ. Sara yapɨjɨ duzideihɨlyɨ ‘Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' yɨma'naabathehaa' sarɨmɨnyɨna mena aya kɨgaa' yɨma'naabɨwaka.’ Sara duzideihɨlyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ anga naanga pɨbanna kulaawapɨjɨ sahɨbanyara kunnya angengɨna mihɨmakwɨyɨ kihyapɨri yɨ anga dazabadaa'nya tu'maangeba davaawapɨjɨ dara dɨzideihɨlyɨ

‘Sarɨmɨre anga dazabadaa'nyɨ kwaatɨryamɨlɨka naarɨmɨre sɨvɨlyangɨ nehɨmɨwɨ'nɨwake sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna yɨhɨpurakɨrasɨ'naabakadengɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' sɨmunya nayaa dara jawɨrila! “Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' yɨma'naabathehaa' mena aya kɨgaa' yɨma'naabɨwaka!”
Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yɨrɨka aaya sarɨkɨ anga naanga dazahɨbanyaraavɨ taanginya naanga wɨjaavadere. Taanginya daza' kayaa'nanyara Sothomɨ mwaalyaraavɨ taanginya naange' wɨjaavade' wavɨlavadesɨ.

We'! Korazinɨ mwaalyaihɨle! We'! Betɨzaaitha mwaalyaihɨle! We'! Nɨmɨ anga Taayaajɨ anga Saaithonɨjɨ sabanyaai nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' yɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ sarɨmɨre angeba nɨmɨ yebaaibɨ' yɨ sarevɨ sɨnnawɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' sabanyaalyara kale'na baazɨ'ma'nya mumunyɨ'nɨka baazɨ'ma'nadɨvɨ' kwaagɨsavɨ mwaalapɨjɨ sɨmunya mudɨke' kyawɨpɨdɨka!
Sare kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maryawɨbwata yadehaa' taanginya naange' Taayaajɨ Saaithonɨjɨ sabanyaalyaraavɨ wɨjaavadere. Taanginya naanga sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨzaavade' yɨ sahwaraavɨrevɨ wavɨlavadesɨ.
Nabaai Kaapanɨyamɨ mwaalyaihi ‘Nemɨ Sɨgunyavɨnna nennya yaya makɨlaana!’ dadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' yune Dɨkevɨna dalaawideihɨlyɨ.

A'mwei sarɨmɨre yagaalya kadɨka nayaa yɨhu'najai yɨ sai nɨmɨre yagaalya kadɨka nyu'nadelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwei sarɨmɨnyɨ bule'na yɨhɨzaavajai yɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨ bule'na nyɨjaavadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ bule'na nyɨjaavajai yɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaryasaabaka sai kwarɨjɨ bule'na wɨjaawakelyɨra.” Jizaazai sara wɨda'.

Dɨvi a'mwe sevedituyara ayɨna beva sahwara yɨlaaya naanga yɨna yadɨvɨ' wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, nemɨ gɨmɨnne yaya' kumɨnyɨ wɨdaasa'neina wɨdadaawori yɨmaka kwarajɨ nemɨre yagaalyangɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨ yagalya'makuna yesarera.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨwa'daasagaa' nayaa dara wangamwa'de ‘Yɨraayavɨ yɨ'munya pidevaaibɨ' Saataanɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' yarai bwalarakelyɨ.’

Yɨthaanyi, sarɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya' mena yɨhɨzaawa. Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ naawɨnaanyaraavɨjɨ marayɨnɨgaawalyaraavɨjɨ sɨvɨlya' yɨnɨga bɨza'jɨvaibɨneihɨlyɨ. Nabaai Yɨkamaangerɨne dɨragɨnya yuya sangɨ yɨnɨga wi'na davɨlayideihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ kayaaka yɨgalakya'ne yuya pɨnɨ sa kayaaka yɨnɨga wi'na yɨhigalakade mɨ'.

Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya myadɨvɨ' dara yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ ‘Yɨmakera nemɨre yagaala dɨvanɨgo dangɨ mɨdɨnna kyɨwaa' wɨdaasɨvanɨgorera.’ Aawa. Sabwi maalɨkebulyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya Sɨgunyavɨ mena yavɨkaryakɨwakebwi naangebulyɨ. Sare'na Gotɨyarɨna yɨlaaya nayaa jɨla!”

Dazagaasagaa' Kurya Tewaanyai Jizaazare sɨmunyavɨ yɨlaaya yɨwagɨmwaaihɨna yɨna kya' sahwai wɨdɨna “Nɨmwai, gɨmɨ saigɨ Sɨgunyavɨnajɨ Kwaakevakɨnajɨ yuna Naangeigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨre yaya' munyaba makimanɨge. ‘Su! Su!’ Gɨmɨ a'mwe daraavɨ sɨkulɨya myaraavɨna yuya da wibwarɨdakuwaanyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe sɨmunnakeraavɨnajɨ sɨkulɨya yaraavɨnajɨ yuya da lɨka yulyakɨwaanyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ sare'na gɨmɨre yaya' munyaba makimanɨge. Yo, Nɨmwai gɨmɨre sɨmunya sabwi yune sasarebulyɨ. Sare'na sara yadɨnyaigɨnyɨ.”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmaamaangei sɨmunya yuya nyɨmarɨmwangakeinyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gawaalɨvɨ aaya kaavɨlya' yawɨrangadei a'mwe aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwarɨ Nɨmwai yune gave sahwaina yawɨrangadelyɨ. Sarevɨ nabaai Nɨmwarɨ yawɨrangadei a'mwe aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwarɨ yune Gawaalɨ'na yawɨrangadelyɨ. Nabaai a'mweraavɨ Gawaalɨ' Nɨmwarɨ wibwarɨdaakwajara, sara Nɨmwarɨ yawɨrangabɨ'dere.”

Yune gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsarana Jizaazalyɨ ye'mwannamwaaleva yɨ sahwai kumɨnyɨmagɨnna gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ wangamanɨgasangɨ pwara wangadɨvɨ' sahwara yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winadere.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Ne pɨropetɨya kwalaalyarajɨ ne kingɨya kwalaalyarajɨ yuyangɨ sarɨmɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgata sangɨ ‘Wanganaana!’ deva yeta kɨrɨ' sahwara tɨnna mwanganyɨna. Nabaai yagaala sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨgata dazangɨ ‘Kadɨka wɨ'naana!’ deva yeta kɨrɨ' sahwara kadɨka mu'nyɨna. Sare'na yɨlaaya jɨla!”
Sagaa', yɨthaa, kɨwɨnyangɨ wɨjɨwaakade pwai Jizaazarɨ yaamɨjɨ walapapalakya'nei daavɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, gara ya'mujɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaala mwaalyabwi maa'muneinyaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Kɨwɨnyavɨ be yagaalya' dɨnɨkevaka? Gɨmɨ gatha'dara dangamanɨgɨ?”

Wɨdɨna kya' sahwai ja'nawɨdɨna “Naangei gɨmɨre Gotɨyai sahwarɨna gɨmɨre sɨmunya yunevɨ yuna tewaanya gɨvu'nadeigɨnyɨra. Nabaai gɨmɨre kurya yuyarɨ yuna tewaanyarɨnajɨ gɨmɨre dɨragɨnya yuyavɨ yuna tewaanyarɨnajɨ gɨmɨre sɨduta yuyavɨ yuna tewaanyarɨnajɨ gɨvu'nadeigɨnyɨ. Nabaai yune gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nadevaaibɨ' a'mwe pwarɨna avaaimwaalya kwarɨna tewaanya nayaa gɨvu'nada duhaimwadeigɨnyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ yagaala nebulya' ja'nanyɨdɨwaanya'. Yɨ sasara ya'gɨzɨ yuyagaa' gaala dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ.”
Sare' kɨrɨ' sɨdu'nakei yawɨ'na “Pwara nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨpɨka! ‘Sahwai sasarebwine yɨda'maraangei mwaaidelyɨ.’ ” Sara yawɨ'na yaka Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ avaaimwaalyai bewalaka?”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai sahwarɨ dara ja'nawɨdɨna “Juya pwai Jeruzaalemɨ yagalya'mavaka Jerikonei kaanya waidawadaa'nyɨ tutaanyavɨ a'mwe yɨpalamaa'dɨvɨsara sahwarɨ bɨramaareva sahware gɨlyɨvɨta yuya yɨpalamaa'na yɨna yeva yɨraipɨvalakɨna yɨna yeva mala naanga mi'na tameva balya'neba yagalya'ma'na yɨna yeva kaanna wɨna. Sarei sai tutaanyavɨ warɨna yadɨ'nyɨ sai mena balya ya'neba.

Dazagaa' tutaanya dazavɨ Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dei pɨrizɨya pwai kaanna wɨna. Kaanya sara wodehaa' a'mwe sarɨ tɨnna wanganalɨkɨmawakaabɨna yaka sarɨ wangamabɨna yɨna yaka tutaamaangebaarɨ yaaikaanna wɨna yaka wavɨlakuna.

Sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' nabaai Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨdaayadei Livaaya pwai sahimagɨ bi'ma'na yɨna yaka a'mwe sarɨ kave wanganyɨkɨmawakaabɨna yaka sarɨ wangamabɨna yakegaa' tutaamaangebaarɨ yaaikaanna wɨna yaka wavɨlakuna.

Nabaai a'mwe Samerɨya mwaalya pwai Juyara jɨkurɨtɨnna yadɨvɨsaraavɨdaa'nyai tutaanyavɨ kaanya badehaa' a'mwe sai wa'dɨsɨyaba bi'ma'na. Mi'na bi'ma'na yaka sahwarɨ tɨnna wanganna yaka kale naanga yenyɨ'nanganna.

Sara yakei sahwaryabanna wɨlaawɨna yaka gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ mala tamagɨthaaihɨresangɨ welivananyasɨ waainɨyasɨ dɨngavu'na yaka wa'waaya sangɨ wɨla pwɨyɨna. Sara mena yaka a'mwe sarɨ dɨhaa'bwa'na yaka gamɨre dogiyarɨ munyaba yɨlamaramwaaihɨna yaka kaanna makwalaawɨna, angavaavɨhaanya wodɨvɨsara waraawia'ne angevɨna marakaawɨna yaka nayaa maremwaaina.

Sarevɨ yɨrɨka dɨvidaa'nyarɨkɨ gamɨre gɨlyavɨ nɨgwia pukaai daapɨna yaka a'mwe anga angavaayara warya'ne savɨ gyakwarɨ wɨjaavɨna yaka wɨdɨna ‘A'mwe datharɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaaidelyɨra. Nabaai gɨmɨre nɨgwia pɨnɨjɨ a'mwe darɨna yɨgainamayɨ'dɨza' yɨ ayɨna ba'mujɨyagaa' nɨmɨre nɨgwia bahɨzaavɨdeinyɨ.’ ”
Jizaazai sara wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Dahaa' gɨmɨ gara dahayawɨ'mwaana? Daraai dala saraavɨdaa'nyɨ pwai a'mwe yɨpalamaa'dɨvɨsara sara kye' kayaaka yɨnaka dazarɨna avaaimwaalyai yɨma'nakei bewai dɨngaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwai wɨdɨna “A'mwe kale kwia' gaimwanga yaka dazalyɨ.” Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ wawo'gɨzɨ avaaina sasara jɨtheigɨnyɨ.”
Kaanya wodɨvɨsagaa' Jizaazai anga pɨbanna kaanya wɨlaawɨna. Kaanya wɨlaawɨna kya' a'mwe pɨrɨ' gamɨnne yaya' Maatha' sahɨrɨ' gamɨre angevɨna “Dɨneyɨrɨ'marɨmwaaihya!” wɨdɨna.
A'mwe sare' gamɨnyɨ ganyaabulaange' sahɨrɨvɨne yaya' Maarɨyaa' kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Maarɨyaa sa' Naangere sɨvigɨ'nyɨryawɨ bulamwaaina yaka sahware yagaala dadaa'nyɨyangɨ kadɨka bulawɨ'bale'na.

Kadɨka bulawɨ'bale'na yadɨ'nyɨ Maatha' tɨka wapaaya yovɨrawakya' wawɨnya kwalaalya biwɨna. Sara biwoda gamɨre sɨmunyai kewi kewi sɨmunya yawɨ'daa'nyɨna. Sara yawɨ'daa'nyɨna yake' gamɨnyawɨnna wɨlaabɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨnyaabulaange' nɨmɨnyɨ gave'nyɨ nyagalya'makuwake'nyɨra. Sare'nyɨ tɨka wapaaya yovɨrawakɨvanɨgena. Ai, gɨmɨ dazavɨne'na sɨmunya myawɨrijɨvanɨgɨna? Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Wɨgaimwagana!’ da'gɨzɨ sara duthana!”
Kɨrɨ' Naangei sahɨrɨvɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Maatha', Maatha', gɨmɨ sɨmugwalaalya yawɨ'dɨ gɨmɨre sɨmunya' yawɨta kwalaalyangɨna yɨwa'nadɨkaata yɨvanɨkesɨ.
Kɨrɨ' gave pɨrɨ'nanya' wɨmudaasɨvanɨ'. Sare'na dare'nanyɨ. Maarɨyaa' tewaanya daza' maa'manɨke'nanyɨra. Sahɨrɨvɨ sa' tewaanya daza' mamarasɨ'nɨwɨna!”

Pɨgaa' Jizaazai gave pimagɨnna bulamwalaawaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna. Dɨvi sai mena wɨdakegaa' gamɨre mɨdɨde pwai gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, Jonɨ gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakakabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaathevwina dɨnejɨwaakya!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai saraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna ‘Wɨdaana!’ yawɨrapɨjɨyagaa' yɨ dara duzideihɨlyɨ,
‘Nɨmwai, gɨmɨnne yaya' gɨrɨ'maaya' yɨma'nana!
Gɨmɨre maremwaaidɨnya' yuneba nayaa yɨma'nana!
Gazagaasagaa' nemɨnne mwanyagaa'ne nyɨnya'ne dɨnejaama!
Nemɨre kayaa'nanya dɨnemarasɨka!
Sare' darevɨnyɨra.
Kayaa'na neyade gazaizare
Wɨrɨvɨkɨta marasɨ'daanyabaaibɨsasɨ.
Yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaala ya'ne saburɨ
Maneyɨbwarɨdaakunnera nemɨnyɨ!’
Gotɨyarɨ sara duzideihɨlyɨ.”
Nabaai sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai gya'mwe pwai kɨnɨnnakei mwaalajai sawɨta naanga kalawawegaa' kaanna wɨna yojɨ gya'mwe dazarɨ wɨdaawɨna ‘Nya'mweigɨ, bɨretɨya dawaai data pɨnɨ dɨnyɨjaama!
Nɨmɨnyɨ nya'mwe pwai kaanya yamarivanɨkei nɨmɨnyawɨnna kabi'ma'mwa' sahwarɨ wɨjaaya'ne wapaaya kuneinyɨ yenanyɨra.’

Nabaai a'mwe anga dazavɨ kusawɨdaa'nyai ja'nawɨdɨna ‘Taanga manyakɨnnera! Kaanya' mena tihɨ'nɨwakesɨra. Sarevɨ nabaai nɨmɨre kaimɨraayamɨlɨka kuvɨnɨmaangeinyɨjɨ yɨ'bɨnyavɨ mena ye'mwanna'mwaasainyɨ. Nɨmɨ madɨkaayɨ ya'mujɨ magɨmaari yɨwɨneinyɨra,’ wɨda'. Sarevɨ gatha'darevaka!

Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Angevɨ gyakwai a'mwe sarɨna gya'mwe kwai mwaalajai kɨrɨ' mujaayɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' a'mwe sai jake'na jake'na kudozɨ sahwai yuna maa'na wida sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai gamɨnyɨ wɨmudaasa yuya sa wɨmaarina yannelyɨ.

Nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ kuna nayaa kidaanganapɨri yɨhɨzaavadelyɨra. Yɨdaanganya' kuna nayaa bɨrapɨri yɨ dɨvɨramaaryideihɨlyɨ. Kaanyavɨ mala kuna karamapɨri Gotɨyai kaanya' yɨhɨvasamaraabathelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe gazaizai Gotɨyarɨ maarya'nei sahwarɨ yɨdaangada maa'delyɨra. Bɨrɨbɨrya yadei bɨramaa'delyɨ. Nabaai kaanyavɨ mala tamaabaderɨ Gotɨyai kaanya' wɨbasamaraabathelyɨ.
Sarɨmɨjɨya ganɨmaanga pwarɨ gawaalɨvaangei kidaanganojɨ ‘Nɨmwai, jawɨnya pɨrɨ' nyɨmaryaama!’ naawɨnaanyarɨ wɨmaaryadei daaka!
‘Yukwaraka pɨrɨ' nyɨmaryaama!’ kidaanganojɨ marayɨnɨgaawalya' wɨmaaryadei daaka! Arɨkewɨnyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyaihi mwaaidɨvɨ' sarɨmɨre kaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨ tɨka nya'ne nawɨ'nyanna wɨjaavɨpɨjaihi sasare sahɨbwi Gotɨyai wavɨla'dei daaka! Sahwai Nɨmwai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe gamɨnyɨ yɨdangadaapiyaraavɨna Kurya Tewaanyarɨ wɨjaavadere.” Sara wɨdɨna.

Yɨmaka pwai a'mwe pwarɨ wɨlamwaaina yada a'mwe sare maange' mena bɨpainɨkelyɨ. Jizaazai yɨmaka sahwarɨ wɨdaasɨna kya' sare sarɨ yɨmakei mena wɨna kya' a'mwe maanga bɨpainɨka dazai yagaala wɨdɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya atɨka maru'na'na.
Atɨka maru'na'na kye' kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwara dɨnyɨna “Sahwai yɨmakeraavɨ marasɨ'manɨke'na Biyelɨzɨvulɨmɨre dɨragɨnyasɨ marasɨ'manɨkelyɨ. Yɨmakeraavɨ maremwaaidere dɨragɨnyasɨnyɨra.”
Nabaai a'mwe pwara “Yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwalaana!” yawɨreva sarera wɨdɨna “ ‘Gotɨyai gamɨjɨ dahamwaalɨka?’ yawɨta'neina dara gɨthaana! Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya dɨragɨnya pɨrɨ' kya'gɨzɨ tɨnna wanganaana!”

Sara yawɨ'na yadaapi kɨrɨ' kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ yawɨranganna yaka wɨdɨna “Maremwaaide gave pɨbadaa'nya pwara pɨvakaai tangɨvalapɨjɨ mala bwa'nɨpɨja' maremwaaide daza' kayaaka yɨnyɨna yadesɨ. Nabaai gave kɨnɨdaka tangɨvainapɨri mala bwa'nɨpɨja' dazanɨdaka kayaaka yɨma'nyɨna yɨpɨ'denɨdakera.
Nabaai Saataanɨmɨre yɨsavaa' pɨvakaai tangɨvainapɨri mala bwa'nɨpɨja' gamɨre maremwaaide' gara warannevaka! Sarɨmɨ kanyɨdɨwaakɨra ‘Biyelɨzɨvulɨmɨre dɨragɨnyasɨ wɨdaasɨvanɨkelyɨreva.’
Nabaai Biyelɨzɨvulɨmɨre dɨragɨnyasɨ yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ yɨ sarɨmɨrera dɨragɨnya aaihwaresɨ wɨdaasadɨvɨtavaka? Sarevɨ kumɨ sara sarɨmɨre kwaasɨ yagaala dazangɨ yɨhyawɨbwapɨ'dere.
Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare a'jawɨnyai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨgaimwadaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasɨwɨja' yɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Gotɨyai maremwaaide' mena bɨvanɨ'.
A'mwe dɨragɨnaanga kwai mwaryagɨnyɨsɨ mwasaagalyajɨ yune lɨmwadei damei gannya angwaasaba nayaa dɨragɨnna maredaa'na yadɨ'nyɨ gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya sa nayaa dathɨvaina waradengɨ.

Kɨrɨ' dɨragɨnaanga pwai sɨnnawɨnyare dɨragɨnya' wavɨla'dei bɨna yaka dathɨvaina yaka gamɨre mwaryagɨnya mwasaagala kɨlɨka gamɨnyɨ yɨvaimwade sa yuya tamipalamaa'na. Sara tamipalamaa'na yaka gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya sa yanga mudɨna.

Pwai yaasɨwa'na ‘Yɨmakeraavɨ maremwaaidere dɨragɨnyasɨnyɨra,’ yawɨ'de sai nɨmɨnyɨnei mwaaidei mɨ'. Yɨ sahwai nɨmɨnyɨna yɨkamaangelyɨ. Pwai nɨmɨjɨ sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ mye'mwannamwaaihyɨ yada sahwai yaasɨwa'na tamayɨwɨnasamaryadelyɨ.

Yɨmakei a'mwe pwarɨ mena yagalya'mavaka nawɨ'nya pɨba bɨramaarya'nei a'gaaye mwaalya'nei yaalɨkɨryabanna lo'mavamarina. Nabaai sasare pɨba mabɨramaari yaka yɨ dara dɨna ‘Anga sɨnnawnnaɨ nɨmɨ mwaale dazavɨdaa'nyainyɨ ayɨna kaanya wɨde'nanyɨra.’
Sare sai kaanna wɨna yaka anga dazavɨ tɨnna wanganaawɨna, dara yake' ‘Mena pada'galabwakɨraka mena nayaa warɨke' daaka! Kune' daaka!’

Sara dozɨ kaanna wɨna yojɨ yɨmaka gamɨre kayaa'nanya' wavɨlaveta ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraainanyaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakya'neraavɨ wɨjɨma'naawɨna. Sara yaka yuyara bɨna yeva sare sara kusawɨ wɨlɨna yeva wɨlamwaaina. Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe dazai kayaa'na mwaalakelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' aayagaa' yuna kayaa'nanaangei mwaalɨna. (Sasarebaaibɨ' a'mwere sɨmunya' kune' wa'dɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyai mulamwaalyadɨ'nyɨ sahwai kayaa'nanaangei mwaalɨna yadelyɨ.)”
Yagaala daza kuna wɨdɨna yadaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanyavɨ a'mwe pɨrɨ' jaka wɨdanganna “A'mwe sɨnnawɨ gɨmɨnyɨ mudanga gyaka aamunya gɨzaavaka sa' yɨ sahɨrɨ' yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkesɨra.”
Jaka wɨdanganna kya' kɨrɨ' sai wɨdɨna “Aawa, a'mwera Gotɨyare yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' mɨdɨbɨzara sahwara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkerera.”

Kwala bwa'naanya kuna bi'bwa'nemwaaidapi sai dara wɨdɨna “Dathahaasara a'mwe kayaa'nanyarera. Sahwara ‘Dɨragɨnya wɨjɨwaainya pɨrɨvɨ tɨnna wanganaana!’ yawɨreva jaka wɨdɨna. Sara kanyɨdɨwaa' kɨrɨ' sahwaraavɨ dɨragɨnya wɨjɨwaainya pɨrɨ' wɨjɨwaainɨdeinyɨ mɨka. Aawa. Ne Jonaamɨre dɨragɨnya wɨjɨwaainya yune dazahɨrɨ'nanyawɨku' wɨjɨwaainɨdeinyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Jonaa Ninɨva mwaalyaraavɨna Gotɨyare wɨjɨwaainya'ne' yɨma'nyaakabaaibɨ' yɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai dathahaasaraavɨnei Gotɨyare wɨjɨwaainya'ne' yɨma'nadelyɨ. (Sare'na sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na ‘O, Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ maryasaabakelyɨ.’)

Dɨvi Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ yawɨbwaradehaa' saawɨtɨyɨmagɨdaa'nyɨ kwinɨya' maremwalyaakevɨ a'mwe dathahaasa daraavɨjɨ yɨdɨkaa'na kyojɨ kwinɨya sahɨrɨ' kumɨre kayaa'na yadɨvɨsabwine yagaainakeraavɨna jalɨkurakaabathesɨ. Kwinɨya daza' Kwaakevakɨ tɨyawɨnnanyawɨ Solomonɨmɨre sɨdusabwi kadɨka wɨ'nya'ne' bɨna. Yɨ sahɨrɨ' bɨna kyaa', yɨthaanyi, dahaa' Solomonɨmɨ wavɨla'dei dava mwaalɨka dalaaka! Mwaalɨka kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ manyu'nyɨvanɨgasa'ne'na kwinɨya sa' nayaa wɨ'nyaake' sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyabwi jalɨkurakaabathesɨ.

Nabaai maryawɨbwaradehaa' a'mwe Ninɨva mwaalyaraavɨ dathahaasaraavɨjɨ yɨdɨkaa'na kyojɨ dathahaasaraavɨre kayaa'nanyabwina jalɨkurakaabɨpɨ'derera. Ninɨva mwaalyara Ne Jonaa wɨjɨwakadaa'nyangɨ kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' sɨmunya mudɨke' yawɨramaa'na. Sahwara sara yɨna kyaa', yɨthaanyi, dahaa' Jonaamɨ wavɨla'dei sai dava mwaalɨka dalaaka! Mwaalɨka kɨrɨ' mu'nyɨvanɨgasa'ne'na Ninɨva mwaalyara nayaa wɨ'nyaasara kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwi jalɨkurakaabɨpɨ'derera.

A'mwe aane pwai kwai laamɨvananya' yewɨta'da lɨka yulyarya'neba wɨlakada mɨ'. Nabaai maa'gula pɨrɨvɨ amwihidaa'nyɨ wɨlakada mɨ'. Aawa. Yɨ'bɨnyavɨ munyaba yɨlakadesɨ. Sarevɨ a'mwera kusawɨnna bwidɨvɨ' ‘Dɨ'baaka wanyɨwanya dazavɨ tɨnna wangabɨka!’ dada saba yɨlakadesɨ.

Gɨmɨre tɨnnyai kɨlaakejɨkɨna laamɨvananyalyɨ. Tɨnnyai baake' maa'delyɨ. Tewaanyabwi baake'bɨsabwi sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'dɨ yɨ gɨmɨre yuya kɨlaakejɨ' baaka padezɨkɨ. Kɨrɨ' kayaa'nanyabwi jɨhɨnya'bɨsabwi sɨmunya yawɨ'dɨ yɨ gɨmɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨ' yuna jɨhɨnya yɨma'nadezɨkɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaainyɨla! Baaka gɨmɨnyɨ wɨlagwarɨka daza' jɨhɨnya nyɨma'nadɨka! Nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa jawɨka!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨ' baaka kɨnɨnnakejɨ' yajazɨ' pimagɨnya pɨjɨ' jɨhɨnya pɨjɨ' myajazɨ' yɨ sarevɨ laamɨvananyavɨre baake' gɨlɨvamwadadevaaibɨ' gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' yunebanna baaka padezɨkɨ.”
Jizaazai yagaala mena jɨ'mwannaka yadɨ'nyɨ Perɨzɨya pwai gamɨre angevɨ wapaaya tɨka nya'na sahwarɨ jaka jɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nyɨna. Sarei sai angevɨna wɨlaawɨna yaka wapaaya nya'ne yɨ'bɨnyavɨ mwaalɨna.
Sare yaka sɨnnawɨ ata aalya minyai wapaaya nadaa'nyɨ Perɨzɨya sai tɨnna wanganna yaka aalya minya'na nɨ'nɨka yɨna.
Nɨ'nɨka yɨna kya' Naangei wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ Perɨzɨyaihi kaapɨvananya paletɨyangɨ mwasɨmagɨnna aalya yadɨvɨkɨ. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ kusawɨ kukebulyɨ kayaa'nanya gɨrɨkita'nanyabulyɨ yuna wɨlayɨhwarɨkeihɨlyɨ.
A'mwe sɨdu'maayaihi! Gotɨyai yune mwasawɨnya yavɨkaryaka nabaai kusawɨnya yavɨkaryaakei daaka! (Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨjɨ pada'galamaremwaaina jɨla!)

Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨsanna wɨgainɨvanɨkeraavɨ yanga nayaa duzaayɨla! Kwaasɨya'na mujaavɨpɨna! Nabaai sasara tewaanya yɨpɨja' a'mwera dara yawɨpɨ'de' ‘O, a'mwe sasarei gamɨre sɨmunya' yune'na tewaanya warɨke' daaka! Yuya gɨrɨkita'nanya maaya daaka!’

We'! Perɨzɨyaihi mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sarɨmɨ yɨmaasajɨ jɨsajɨ sɨgya yuya dala nabinyajɨ mɨlɨkɨvaidɨvɨ' atɨraai yɨma'nadaa'nyɨ pimagɨnyavaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨjaavadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sara nayaa yadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' yɨda'maraangeburɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nyaburɨjɨ wavɨla'dɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sasare sabwi yadɨvɨ' pɨbwi sɨgyajɨyabulyɨ myagalya'mayɨ yɨpɨja' sa' tewaanyasɨ. (Sare'na Gotɨyai daanga wɨjaaya'neihi mala jɨwannyɨla!)

Perɨzɨyaihi, we'! Sarɨmɨ lotuangengɨ a'mweraavɨ sɨnnyɨkaavɨ, tewaanyaba walamwaalya'na tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nadeihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨ nabaai a'mwera kwala yɨ'bwa'nadɨvɨsaba ‘A'mwe naangeigɨ!’ wɨja'na nawɨ'nya yɨhɨvu'nadeihɨlyɨ. Sare'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!

Sarɨmɨ we'! Gɨlekavi'nɨnnya kwaakevɨ kusawɨ lɨka yulyarɨkebɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sara yulya'dɨ'nyɨ a'mwera tɨnna mwanganyadɨvɨ' gɨrɨkita'nanya'na myawɨryadɨvɨ' sahɨnɨngɨ a'badaa'nyɨ yɨlayamaryadɨvɨsare. Sarɨmɨre gɨrɨkita'nanya lɨka yulya'dɨvɨsa'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!”
A'mwe kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨ sɨdu'naka pwai gamɨre yagaalyangɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, sara wɨdadɨ gɨmɨre yagaala taanga nemɨ kwainaavɨjɨ dɨragɨnna nedangamanɨgɨna!”

Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨsaihi, we'! A'mweraavɨ taanginya yɨlakadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Naanga dakadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sara wiadaapi yagɨyagɨ makidɨvɨsarera. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ saihi taanginya maakata dazangɨ ya'neihi ata pwi wakya yadɨvɨtaihi mɨ'. Sare'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!
Sarɨmɨnyɨ we'! Sarɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara pɨropetɨyaraavɨ tamakesarera. Sarevɨ sahwaraavɨre gɨleange madɨvɨsaihɨlyɨra. Sare'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!

Sasare dazabwi a'mweraavɨ dare'bɨ' yɨbwarɨdaakwadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ ‘Ne sɨnnawɨnyara sasara yaata sabwina nawɨ'nyasɨ.’ Yɨ, pɨropetɨyaraavɨ tamakadaapɨjɨ sarɨmɨ gɨleange madɨvɨsa'na ‘Ya, tewaanyabulyɨ,’ jalɨkurakɨdɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyare sɨduta naangesɨyai sai mena dara dɨnɨ' ‘Pɨropetɨyaraavɨjɨ wɨdaasadɨnyaraavɨjɨ maryaasɨwɨjaraavɨ pwaraavɨ tamayɨwɨnasamaryadɨvɨ' pwaraavɨ tamakɨpɨ'derera.’

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe dathahaasaihi sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna pɨropetɨya yuyaraavɨ tamakyaasaihɨre mɨnya maarya'ne sangɨjɨ dahaa' kɨgaasɨ kuna yɨvanɨgasaihɨre mɨnya maarya'ne sangɨjɨ dazahɨrɨvɨne taanginya' dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ.

Yɨ sɨnnawɨ Aivelɨmɨre tawe' bwalaawɨna yaakelyɨ sareibɨsara dɨvidaa'nyɨ tɨnnyabanyaraavɨre tawe bwalaawɨna yaakerajɨ aayagaa' Sekaraayare tawe' bwalaawɨna yakelyɨ saraavɨne tawevɨnanyɨra. Aayai Sekaraayarɨ kwaraanyabajɨ (taangejɨ marewɨja'nebajɨ) anga nawɨ'nyavɨjɨ tɨnnyaba tamakesalyɨ. Yo, sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yuya dazavɨne'na dathahaasaihɨrɨ mɨnya maarade'nanyɨ tawe sa'.

Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨ sɨdu'nakeihi, we'! Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨne yagaalyavɨ sɨduta yawɨramaarya'ne sɨmunya' kiya'bɨ' kuka marasɨ'mwaasasɨ. Sarɨmɨ saihi sɨmunya dazavɨ kaanyavɨ mabaasadɨvɨ' kusawɨ mulyɨvanɨga'. A'mwe pwara ‘Kusawɨ wɨlaana!’ dadɨvɨ' yadaapi sahwaraavɨ kaanya' tihɨ'manɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sare'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!”

Anga dazavɨdaa'nyɨ walyuna yadaa'nyɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ Perɨzɨyarajɨ saraavɨ sɨnna tɨka naanga wɨda'daa'nyɨ gamɨnyɨ kwaasɨ yagaala jɨdaya'ne'na yagɨyagɨ bɨrɨna. “Gamɨnyɨ yaamɨjɨ walapapalakaana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yaamɨjɨ yɨna yɨna.
Sahwarɨ kotɨya yɨnɨga marya'ne sa'na “Gamɨre maangikɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala pɨrɨ' kinori bɨramaraana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sahwarɨ nayaa baihanaramarina.

Sarevɨ a'mwe kwala bwa'naanyavɨne taawɨzanɨya naangera yɨ'bwa'nyɨna yeva pwaraavɨre sɨvɨlyangɨ dɨhɨbainadɨvɨ' yuneba mɨjahɨbalakɨna. Yuneba mɨjahɨbalakɨna yadapi sɨnnawɨ gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ gaai wɨdɨna “Perɨzɨyaraavɨre yɨzɨyavɨna nayaa javada'galayawɨrila! Kumɨre kwaasɨya sabwina yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. (Bɨretɨya yavɨkaryadɨvɨ' yɨzɨya' yuneba pamidakɨna yadevaaibɨ' Perɨzɨyaraavɨre kwaasɨya sabwina sarɨmɨnyɨ yuneba nulayɨhwaradɨka!)
Yuya sa bwakakɨna yɨnɨke yɨ ku'maaya yama'mawakɨna yadengɨ. Nabaai yuya kuku'nyɨ yagaalya yawɨrangabɨ'dengɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ yagaala yuya jɨhɨnyavɨ dadɨvɨsa yɨrɨkevɨ a'mwera kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨ'dere. Nabaai yagaala yuya sarɨmɨ angengɨ kusawɨ kadɨkengɨ yuna kavena a'mabyahaala dadɨvɨsa, yɨ sare sa angevɨ munyaba yɨladaavapɨjɨ wɨjɨwaakɨpɨ'dengɨ.
Nɨnnya nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨ dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwera sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' yuna baimwagakya ya'na lɨka mipɨnera! Sare'na nabaai dɨvi ayahi pɨnɨjɨ yɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.

Sarɨmɨ lɨka jiderɨna yɨhibwarɨdaakwɨdeinyɨ. Sai Gotɨyai tamakojɨ dɨvi dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakei a'mweraavɨ Dɨkevɨ kewɨnɨ maralɨvaramanne dazarɨna lɨka jideihɨlyɨ. Yo, sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Dazahwarɨna lɨka nayaa jideihɨlyɨ.
Binna atɨlyara nɨgwia maalɨka pukaalyɨna mubadɨvɨsɨkaai daaka! Sare'na kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yuta sasare gave saina navɨka yadei mɨ'.
Aawa. Sarevɨ sahwai sarɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨya mɨjata yuyangɨ ata mena gimanɨkengɨ. Sare'na lɨka mipɨnera! Binna kwalaalyaraavɨne nɨgwiangɨ sarɨmɨ mena wavɨla'nɨkeihɨlyɨra.

Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe gazaizai nɨmɨnyɨna a'mweraayaba jalɨkurakajai ‘Sahwarɨ mɨdɨdɨnyainyɨ,’ yɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai sai kwai dazarɨna Gotɨyare ejelɨyaraayaba jalɨkurakadelyɨ ‘Sahwai nɨmɨrelyɨra.’
Kɨrɨ' pwai nɨmɨnyɨna a'mweraayaba jalɨkurakajai ‘Mamɨdɨnyadɨnyainyɨ,’ yɨ dazarɨna Gotɨyare ejelɨyaraayaba ‘Nɨmɨrei mɨka,’ jalɨkurakadelyɨ.

Gazaizai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨna bɨraizɨka wɨdazai, yɨ Gotɨyarɨ kudozɨ gamɨre kayaa'nanya sa' marasɨ'nadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Kurya Tewaanyarɨna yagaaibɨraizɨka dazai, yɨ Gotɨyai gamɨre kayaa'nanya sa' marasɨ'nadei mɨ'.

Nabaai kotɨya'na lotuangengɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraayabajɨ ga'maanɨyaraayabajɨ yawɨbwa'dɨvɨsaraayabajɨ yɨhɨmakwodɨvɨ' sarevɨ yawɨta kwalaalya mi yadɨvɨ' sɨmunya dara myawɨpɨnera! ‘Nemɨ yagaalya' gara wɨrɨvɨkɨraadeinaavaka? Be yagaala wɨdaatheinaavaka?’
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Dazahɨrɨsavɨ dazahaasagaa' Kurya Tewaanyai sarɨmɨre yagaala wɨdɨpɨne' kihɨzaavojɨ duzideihɨlyɨ.”

Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ a'mwe pwai wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ nehɨrɨnɨmaangei kabaimwa'dɨ' nyɨdaakaangei gɨlyɨvɨta yuya maa'mwa'dɨkelyɨ. Sahwarɨ duthathe'na gɨthɨwana. Gɨlyɨvɨsa tɨnnyaba jaapalojɨ pimagɨnyavaa' nyɨjaavade'na.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Gatha'darevaka! Kɨrɨmɨnyɨ yawɨbwata'neinyɨ aaihwai nyɨdahɨlakɨwakainyaka! Gɨlyɨvɨsa jaapala yɨhɨthaaya'neinyɨ daaka!”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ mala jɨwannyɨla! Nayaa javarannemwaalyɨla! Gɨlyɨvɨsangɨna tɨganaarya nyɨpɨdɨka! A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨta naanga kwalaalyajɨyai, sai gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta dazangɨna gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakei daaka!”
Wɨdɨna yaka ke'ba'nanya pɨrɨ' wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwai gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakei gamɨre wawɨnyajɨ' tɨka munne kwalaalya maarakejɨkɨ.
Sarevɨne'na a'mwe dazai gannya sɨmunyavɨ dara yawɨrakelyɨ ‘Aka, nɨmɨ dainyɨ gara yɨwɨneke! Nɨmɨre tɨka munne yuya yɨnɨga mari'bwarakɨde ange kuneinyɨre!’

Dɨna yaka sai dɨna ‘Yɨ, nɨmɨ dara yɨdesɨ. Nɨmɨre anga yuya tɨka munne marikwakadɨnya sa wo'daala'mujɨ yune naangenna naangenna madɨdeinyɨra. Sara mada'mujɨ nɨmɨre witɨya yuyajɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuyajɨ anga dazangɨ mari'bwarakɨdeinyɨra.

Sara ya'mujɨ nabaai nɨmɨre kuryarɨ wɨdɨna “Kuryaigɨ, kwarame kwalaalyangɨne tɨka munne yɨnɨga waradengɨra. Sarevɨ dahaa' kave a'gaaye dɨmwaaide'nanyɨ. Tɨka wapaajɨ nadɨ waainɨyajɨ nadɨ yɨlaaya yadɨ dɨmwaaide'nanyɨ.” ’

Sara dɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai sahwarɨ wɨdɨna ‘A'mwe sɨmumaayaigɨ! Yuna dahaasagaa' sawɨta davɨ dɨvaideigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨre kuryarɨ maarɨdelyɨ. Sare'na gɨlyɨvɨta yuya yovɨgaipwakɨvanɨgɨnya yɨ sa aaihwai maaradengaka! Gɨmɨ aawa!’
Sasarebaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨna nawɨ'nya naangebura maayai, Gotɨyarɨna gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakei mamwaalyɨ yajai gɨlyɨvɨta gannyanne kwalaalya naanga mari'bwarakadei gamɨre kuryai waryaanyai yɨma'nadelyɨra.”

Gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨre mwaalyabwina sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨpɨnera! Sara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' dara nadɨpɨka! ‘Nemɨ tɨka munne benɨ naadeinaavaka?’ Nabaai sarɨnnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨna sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨpɨnera! Sara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' dara nadɨpɨdɨka! ‘Nemɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ be yaawiajɨ baazɨ'ma'naadeinaavaka?’
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gaalyabwi sabwi naangebulyɨ. Tɨka nya'nennanya sa maalɨkengɨ. Nabaai kɨlaaka sajɨ' naangejɨkɨra. Baazɨ'ma'nya sa maalɨkengɨra.

Yusaraavɨna jawɨranganyɨla! Witɨya wia burɨdɨvɨtara mɨ'. Tɨka munne gimujayɨ'bwarakaabadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Kumɨre tɨka munne angejɨ anga yuhwakamaarya'nejɨ kunere. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai tɨka wapaaya wɨjaavadere. Sare'na sarɨmɨ a'mweihi yusaraavɨ yuna naanga wavɨla'dɨvɨsaihi midaaka!
Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨrajai sangirɨ' kɨbawamaalɨ'na pɨrɨsɨ gamɨre mwaalyagaa'na yɨbwa'mwagannei daaka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ sare maalɨka samɨlɨ' mi yɨpɨneihi mwaaibɨza' yɨ yuya pɨnɨnna sɨmunya kwalaalya be'na yawɨ'manɨga'!

Sarɨmɨ mayawaa' pwasangɨna jawɨranganyɨla! Tɨretɨya mihwiadɨvɨsangɨ. Kwaabɨyɨvɨta marɨlyadɨvɨsangɨ. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kɨgaakuna Kingɨya Solomonɨ gamɨre nɨgwɨlalaaka byaannaka yuya yɨwaala yɨwannyaakelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' mayawaa' pwata dazabaaibɨ' sahwai gamɨre yɨwaala tewaanya kɨnɨnnakei mɨ'!

Wawɨnyangɨ dahaa' kurɨvaarɨya waayɨke sare sa yune mwanyagaa' davapɨjɨ dɨkevɨ sɨtovɨyavɨ marirapɨ'dengɨ. Nabaai yaasɨwakurɨvaarɨya sa, yɨ sangɨ Gotɨyai yɨwaala yɨwagɨthaakwadengɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna maalɨ'na lɨmwadɨvɨsaihi kurɨvaarɨya sa yuna naanga wavɨla'dɨvɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhɨvaazɨ'makwadei daaka!
Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ yawɨrɨkwaasa kwalaalya myɨpɨnera! ‘Nemɨ tɨka wapaaya benɨ naadeinaavaka? Aalya benɨ naadeinaavaka?’ Nabaai sɨmudaadaanya myawɨpɨnera!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaaka davakɨ Naangerɨna malɨmwagyadɨvɨsara ajɨmya yuyangɨyara wapaaya aalya gɨlyɨvɨta sazanna bɨramaarya'nera sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Sarɨmɨ yuya sasarenna yɨhɨmudaasada sanna Sɨrɨnɨmaangei mena yawɨ'manɨkelyɨ.
Sare kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' bɨramaasa'na sɨmunya jawɨryide'nanyɨ. Sara kyawɨrapɨri yuya daza kɨnɨjɨ yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ sipɨzipɨya maalɨkevaasɨyaihi lɨka mipɨnera! Gamɨre maremwaaide' yɨhɨzaaya'nei Sɨrɨnɨmaangei yagaalya' mena jamungajakelyɨ. Sare' yɨlaaya yakelyɨ. Sare'na lɨka mipɨnera!

Sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa mubya yapɨjɨ sare nɨgwianna wɨmudaasɨvanɨkeraavɨ gaimwange'na yanga duzaayidengɨ. Sara kyapɨri Sɨgunyavɨ gɨlyɨvɨta nawɨ'nyanna nawɨ'nyanna sarɨmɨnyɨne warade'nanyɨ. Sɨgunyavɨya gɨlyɨvɨsa yuneba dɨmari'mwanade mɨ'. Sara kyapɨri Sɨgunyavɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne nɨgwɨpaawɨzɨya kayaaka minyɨ yade waradengɨ. Sarevɨ nabaai kukera kuka mamaraabyadɨvɨsangɨ. Saba maa'nyaannyɨkera tɨka manyadɨvɨsangɨ.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta nawɨ'nyanna nawɨ'nyanna warɨkebanna yɨ dazahɨbanna sarɨmɨre sɨmunya yawɨrɨbainyɨna jidevera.
Tavaravanane'na sarɨmɨre kwaabɨhannya ke'banna gɨ'mwagayɨra'napɨjɨ munnaanya dɨvadathɨvainyɨla! Sara yapɨjɨ laamɨvananya' yewɨtawakapɨjɨ tavaravana dɨmwaalyɨla!

A'mwera kunnya naangerɨna mudɨkangeyaba munne naangeyabadaa'nyai bazarɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yemwaaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ'na jemwaalyɨla! Nabaai ‘Sai bozɨ kaanyavɨ mala kabaramojɨ kaanya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' basamaraana!’ dapi jemwaalyɨla!

Naangei bozɨ gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsara nayaa baihana'dɨvɨ' se mwaryadapi wanganojɨ yɨlaaya yada sarevɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨta dazara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkerera. Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Naangei sai gamɨ sai kwaabɨhannya' tu'na gɨ'mwagayɨra'nojɨ munnaanya' padathɨvainojɨ gamɨreraavɨ ‘Yɨ'bɨnyavɨ walamwaaibɨkajɨ,’ wɨdathelyɨ. Sara yojɨ gamɨ sai tɨka wapaaya buzaavadelyɨ.
Nabaai sai sawɨsavɨ kalawawegaa' bathei dɨngaka? Yɨrɨ'jɨhɨnyagaa' bathei dɨngaka? Sara bazai tɨnna dara wanganaja' ‘O, se mwarijɨhava!’ Yɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨta sara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winaderera.
Da'dare' jawɨrila! ‘Angevɨ gyakwalaangei mena yawɨrajɨ kwajɨ “A'mwe kukei sagaa' bathei daaka!” a'mwe kuka dazai angevɨ kadavalɨvɨramakula' sahwarɨ kwanganakadɨka!’

Nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ nayaa tavaravana dɨmwaalyɨla! A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai gave pɨgaa' bathehaa'na sarɨmɨ jawɨryidehaa' ‘Dahaasagaa' mabi yadelyɨra,’ yɨ dazagaasagaa' bathelyɨra. Sare'na tavaravana dɨmwaalyɨla!”
Sagaa' Pitai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, ke'ba'nanya daza'na yune nemɨnyɨne' dahanedɨvanɨgɨna? A'mwe yuya kwaraavɨjɨne' dahanedɨvanɨgɨna?”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Naangei wɨdɨna “Yɨ, maremwaaide sɨmunya nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakei gannya wawɨnyavɨ nayaa lɨmwaga'dei aaihwalaka? Dazahwai sarɨ gannya naangei gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ maremwaalya'nerɨ dahɨlakadelyɨ. Maremwaalya sahwai sahwaraavɨnegaa' kima'nojɨ wapaaya saza yanga wɨjaaya'nelyɨ.
Gamɨre naangei ayɨna kaanya bya'negaa' sɨnnawɨ wɨdakabaaibɨ' sara yaderɨ yɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnya dazarɨ tɨnna dara kwanganori yɨ sarevɨ yɨlaaya naanga yada tewaanaanga winadelyɨ.
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Naangei gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuyangɨ maremwaala ya'nerɨ dahɨlakadelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' yaasɨwa'wawɨnya dazare sɨmunyavɨ dara yawɨrajai ‘Nɨmɨre naangei yarai mabi yannei dɨngaka,’ wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsangɨjɨ mala tamɨna. Sara tamɨbainadaa'da tɨka munne naangejɨ biyaayajɨ nyɨna yada yɨmaka wɨlɨbainadaa'na.

Sahwai sasara yɨbainadaa'dori yaasɨwa'wawɨnya dazare naangei yɨrɨka pɨgaa' ayɨna bɨna yadelyɨ. Baza sagaa' sarɨkɨ wɨdaayadei yemwaala yadei mɨ'. Nabaai yɨrɨka gave pɨgaa' sahwai yawɨrangadei mɨ'. Kayaa'na yɨna yadaawori naanga dazai sahwarɨ yuna woripu'na yadelyɨ. Sara yada a'mwe malɨmwagyadɨvɨsaraavɨre tɨvɨkɨsaburɨ ye'mwagamwaaihɨna yadelyɨ.
Wɨdaayade dathai gamɨre naangere saburɨ mena yawɨ'da kɨrɨ' tavaravana myada naangere saburɨ mamɨdɨnyade sarerɨ naangei mala dɨragɨnna tamɨna yadelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' wɨdaayadei sɨmunya myawɨryai naangere saburɨ gamɨnyɨ mala yɨnɨga tamannerɨna, sa'na naangei mala maalɨ'na tamɨna yadelyɨ. A'mwe kwalaalya maa'dɨvɨsara ayɨna kwalaalya wɨrɨvɨkɨradere. Nabaai a'mwera a'mwe pwarɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya wɨjaavɨpɨjai yɨ sare sarɨ ‘Gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya pɨnɨjɨ nerɨvɨkɨrana!’ yawɨrapɨjɨ jaka wɨdɨpɨ'delyɨ.
Dɨke' kurɨya yaaye yɨngakɨnɨke nadevaaibɨ' a'mweraavɨ maratangɨvalya'neinyɨ Kwaakevakɨna bɨweinyɨ. Sarevɨ tewaanna yawɨ'manɨge dɨka daza' yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨdathe'na.
Taanginyavɨ (bavɨtaazɨyavɨ) nyɨvaihade' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Dahaa' sara manyainyɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya' taanga nyɨna'manɨke'na ‘Yarai yɨma'nade' tewaanyasɨ,’ yawɨ'manɨge.
Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna dahayawɨ'manɨgava? ‘Kwaakevakɨya yuyaraavɨ avaaizɨmunya wakya'nei bɨwakei dɨngaka!’ Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ maratangɨvalya'neinyɨ bɨweinyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dahaasɨ dɨvi kɨgaasɨ anga pɨrɨvɨ a'mwe atɨlya mwaalapɨriyangɨ pɨvakaai tangɨvainɨpɨ'dengɨ. Dawaai dasamɨlɨka pɨrɨwaarɨna sɨmunya ge' kɨnɨnnake mwaaibɨ'dengɨ. Nabaai pɨrɨwaai dawaai dasangɨna sɨmunya ge' kɨnɨnnakewaai mwaalyɨkadewaalyɨ.

Kɨnɨdaai jaapainakɨlyɨ ganɨmaangei gevwi yawɨ'na, gawaalɨvaangei gevwi yawɨ'na yadi' mwaalyɨkaderaalyɨ. Nabaai kaimɨraayai gannya ganɨmaangerɨna gevwi yawɨ'na yadelyɨ. Kɨnaai jaapainakɨlyɨ ganaange' gevwi yawɨ'na, taaya' gevwi yawɨ'na mwaalyɨkadewaalyɨ. Nabaai kɨyataai jaapainakɨlyɨ a'mwe naange' gyaaya' gevwi yawɨ'na, gyaaya' gevwi yawɨ'na yadi' mwaalyɨkadewaalyɨ.”

A'mwe kwala bwa'naanyangɨjɨ wɨdɨna “Nyɨlyai walakadimagɨ yɨraaya tɨnga yemina yadaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ tɨnna sara wangadɨvɨ' yɨme'nya'bɨ' dara dadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ ‘Ai, burɨke' bwalarade'nanyɨra.’ Sara deva yadapi yɨ sara yɨma'nyɨna.
Nabaai yɨhuta dɨragɨnya' saawɨtɨyɨmagɨdaa'nyɨ badevɨ tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ dadɨvɨkɨ ‘Nyɨlya' tɨrɨkwaa'dɨka nade'na yɨwaka.’ Yɨ sare sa' yɨma'nyɨna yadesɨ.

Kwaasɨ yadɨvɨsaihi, Kwaakevakɨya saburɨjɨ sɨgunyavɨya saburɨjɨ tɨnna nayaa yawɨrangadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨdaa'nyɨ kɨrɨ' dahaasa sabwine'na Gotɨyai yɨvanɨka aaya kaavɨlya'na sɨmunya myawɨranganyɨvanɨgasa' baa'na yadɨvɨkaka!
Sarɨmɨ saihi nɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunya nayaa mamaryawɨbwaryadɨvɨ' ‘Sai yɨda'maraangelyɨ,’ be'na yadɨvɨkaka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kotɨya'neigɨ a'mwe pwalyɨ tutaanyavɨ kaanya ye'mwannɨgwodi' a'mwe sai kotɨya gɨmarya'nelyɨ saraaihi tutaanyavɨ kaanya kuna wodi' yɨ dazagaa' yagaalya' yune'na jamungajakya' jideraaihɨlyɨ. Sahwai yawɨbwa'deryawɨnna nagɨmakwodɨ'de'na. Sara kagɨmakwawojɨ yɨ yawɨbwa'dei pɨlɨzɨmaanɨyarɨ kagɨmaaryojɨ pɨlɨzɨmaanɨyai kalavuzangevɨ nagɨmwaaihadɨka!
Gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthɨvanɨge. Kalavuzanga dazavɨ yarai jahalya'makwodeigɨ mɨka! Aayagaa' gɨmɨre yadɨnya naanga sannajɨ maalɨka sannajɨ yune'na tɨvɨkɨra'gɨzɨyagaa'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai nagɨmaryawɨbwaradɨka!”

Sahɨgaa' a'mwe pwara bamwaaina yeva a'mwe Galɨli mwaalya pwaraavɨna wɨdɨna. Sahwaraavɨ Paailatɨ tamakaka Naangerɨna Pɨrizɨyara sɨmakurɨ'dɨka tamira'mwa'daata sangɨre tawesɨ sahwaraavɨre tawesɨ waramwannyɨna kyɨwa'dɨ' balɨna yɨwa'daasaraavɨna wɨdɨna.

Wɨdɨna kye' sai ja'nawɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ dahayawɨ'manɨga' ‘O, a'mwe Galɨlidaa'nya dazara taanginya sara maa'mwa'daasa'na nemɨ yawɨ'mwo “Galɨlidaa'nya yuya pwaraavɨre yuna kayaa'nanya gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi wavɨlakasarera.” ’ Sara dahayawɨ'manɨga'?
Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sasarebwi mɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi myawɨramaari yɨpɨja' sarɨmɨ yuya kwaihi yuna kayaaka avaaina sasara jɨma'nyideihɨlyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwe (18) eitinɨyara kɨgaa' anga saamɨnaanga Silowamɨne' kumɨnyɨ dɨthɨngɨta tamaka tamakɨna yakere. Sa'na sarɨmɨ dara dahayawɨ'manɨga'? ‘Baihɨraka saraavɨre tɨvɨkɨsabwina a'mwe pwara anga Jeruzaalemɨ mwaaihata saraavɨre kayaa'nanyangɨne saburɨ wavɨlavɨkebwi dɨngaka!’
Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sasarebwi mɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨ sɨmunyabwi mudɨkebwi myawɨramaari yɨpɨja' sarɨmɨ yuya kwaihi yuna kayaaka sa'bɨ'na jɨma'nyideihɨlyɨ.”
Ke'ba'nanya da' wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna “A'mwe pwai gamɨre gɨraipɨwiwawɨnyajɨkɨ yɨta pihɨya' waayɨkesɨ. Sara waayɨkevɨ pɨgaa' tɨka munne pɨnɨ yɨ'najanna bɨramaarya'nei kaanna bɨna. Aawaawa, pɨnɨ mi'nyɨna.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wawɨnyavɨ wɨdaayaderɨ wɨdɨna ‘Yɨthaa, kwarame dawaai dasangɨ yɨta pihɨya savɨ yɨsɨla yɨ'najanna bwanganya'neinyɨ, kɨrɨ' mi'nyɨ yadesɨ. Sare'na yɨta sa' dawasɨ'na jɨthesɨ. Kwaakevakɨya mɨnarya sajɨ' yaasɨwa'na be'na yɨgainamayɨ'dezɨkaka!’

Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai ja'nawɨdɨna ‘A'mwe naangeigɨ, kwarame dahaasa davɨ wanganakɨna jɨthelyɨ. Pɨzɨ'gwa waayadelyɨ. Yɨta sɨkɨ kaavɨlyawɨ kwaakejɨ' lɨka'mujɨ bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨre lɨkejɨ marakaabɨdehaa'nanyɨ.
Kwarame ayawɨdaasa pɨrɨvɨ yɨsɨlya tewaanya yɨ'nadi' dɨngaka? Sarevɨ nabaai mi'nyɨ yajɨ' dapalasɨ'na jɨthikɨ.’ ”
Kwazaakegaa' lotuanga pɨrɨvɨ a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna.

Yɨthaa, sagaa' a'mwe pɨrɨ' nalaaya yɨmakei mwaaidɨ'nyɨya' mwaalɨna. Sarevɨ yɨmaka dazai nalaaya' kuna wɨjavadaa'nyɨ kwarame (18) eitinɨya wavɨla'nɨkesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe dazavɨre bulayagɨnyarɨ' naadɨya gɨhaarɨ'nɨkerɨkɨ. Sara yɨnɨkevɨ yɨda'na nayaa madaayɨ yadesɨ.
Jizaazai wɨjɨwaakɨna yada a'mwe sahɨrɨvɨ tɨnna wanganna yɨna yaka jaka jɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yakegaa' wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ, gɨmɨre nalaaya' mena wɨla gyaa'mwesɨra.”
Sara wɨdaka a'mwe dazavɨ asa' yɨladathɨwanna kya' jaahwasa'bɨ' yɨda'na tewaanna daavɨna. Yɨda'na tewaanna daavɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makida yɨlaaya naanga yɨna.

Yɨlaaya naanga yɨna kya' lotuangevɨ maremwaaidei Jizaazai kwazaakegaa' tewaanya yavada'gaidaa'nyɨya'na sɨnna tɨka davɨna. Sarevɨ maremwaaidei kwala bwa'naanyavɨ wɨdɨna “Wawɨnya ya'ne yɨrɨterɨka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaina. ‘A'mwera nemɨre nalaaya nemarasɨpɨka!’ yawɨpɨjaihi wawɨnya ya'ne yɨrɨka dazarɨkaavɨ dɨvideihɨlyɨ. Sasare sa ya'neihi kwazaakegaa' mikabɨpɨnera!”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Naangei ja'nawɨdɨna “Kwaasɨ yadɨvɨsaihi! Kwazaaka sagaa' sarɨmɨ yuyaihi wodɨvɨ' bulɨmakaawoya pwaraavɨjɨ dogiya kwaraavɨjɨ pwɨyɨnɨkeraavɨ yɨralawaasadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' aalya nya'neraavɨ aalyayawɨnna makwodɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sa' tewaanyabulyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe datha' a'mwesɨ. Ne sɨnnawɨnya Evɨraamɨmɨresɨ. Sarevɨ Saataanɨ, yɨthaanna, kwarame (18) eitinɨyangɨ dathɨwagamaremwaaidesɨ. Sare' pwɨyɨnɨkesɨ. Kwazaakegaa' sasare pwɨyɨnɨka daza' wɨla yaa'muja', yɨ sa' kayaa'nanya' dɨngaka!”
Sai sara kuda' sagaa' gamɨre yɨkamaangera wagɨla maarɨna. Nabaai sai nawɨ'nya byaannaka yaka sangɨ kwala bwa'naanya yuya' wanganeva yɨlaaya naanga mɨjɨwɨlɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ayahi pɨnɨjɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' berɨ'bɨtavaka! Nɨmɨ gatha'dara yɨhɨzɨwaakɨwɨnevaka!

Davaaibɨsasɨra. A'mwe pwai arajɨla pɨrɨ' maaraka gannya wawɨnyajɨkɨ maraburɨnna. Sara maraburɨnna yaka savɨ naanga yɨrɨ'na yaka yɨsɨ' yɨma'nyɨna. Sara yakikɨ sɨgunyavɨya yusara taanyabaraavɨ bamwaaina. Sabaaibɨsasɨra.”
Sarei ayɨna wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨna gatha'dara yɨhɨzɨwaakɨwɨnevaka!
Davaaibɨsasɨra. A'mwe pɨrɨ' yɨzɨya' maaraka gɨrɨkwimaa'gula naangevɨ yegɨnyɨwanna kya' dɨvidaa'nyɨ gɨrɨkula yuya sa lɨwɨnya pamidakɨna. Sa'bɨsasɨra.”
Sahwai Jeruzaalemɨ sabannei kaanya woda anga naanga pɨbanyajɨ anga maalɨka pɨbanyajɨ sabanyaavɨ lotavamarina. Kaanya sara lotavamaryadehaa' yuyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Lotavamarina yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai yɨdaanganna “Naangeigɨ, Gotɨyai a'mwe pwaina pwainanyaraavɨna padaihasamaaradei dɨngaka?” Sara yɨdaanganna kya' yuyaraavɨ wɨdɨna

“Kaadihɨta maalɨka dazarɨkɨ wɨlya'nevɨ sarɨmɨre yagɨnya nayaa dɨragɨnna taabɨrɨwala dɨthaayɨla! Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe kwalaalyara ‘Kusawɨ wɨlaana!’ dapɨjɨ yɨpɨjara kɨrɨ' yɨnɨga wi'na wibɨ'dera mɨ'. Sare'na sarɨmɨre yagɨnya nayaa dɨragɨnna taabɨrɨwala dɨthaayɨla!

Dɨvi sagaa' anga savɨ gyakwalaangei angevɨya kaadihɨsa' kaanya maratihɨ'na yajavɨ. Sarɨmɨ mwasaba bathaa'na yapɨjɨ kaanyavɨ mala baramɨdaa'nadɨvɨ' jaka dara dɨna jideihɨlyɨ ‘Naangeigɨ, nemɨnyɨ kaanya' dɨnebasamaraama!’ Sara kudapɨjɨ sai sarɨmɨnyɨ dara yɨhɨthathelyɨ ‘Nɨmɨ mayɨhwanganyadɨnyainyɨra. Sarɨmɨ a'mwe anga gavadaasaihɨlaka!’
Sare'na nabaai sarɨmɨ gaai duzideihɨlyɨ ‘Nemɨ gɨmɨjɨ tɨka wapaaya aalya ye'mwannanoneinera. Nabaai gɨmɨ nemɨre tusabanyaavɨ nemɨnyɨ nejɨwaakagɨnyaigɨnyɨra.’
Kɨrɨ' sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨ ayɨna yɨhɨthathelyɨ ‘Nɨmɨ mayɨhwanganyadɨnyainyɨra. Sarɨmɨ a'mwe anga gavadaasaihɨlaka! Sarɨmɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyabwina yadɨvɨsaihi, sareihi yuyaihi nɨmɨnyɨ dava ganyɨla!’

Sarɨmɨ Ne Evɨraamɨmɨjɨ Ne Aazakɨmɨjɨ Jaikopɨmɨjɨ pɨropetɨya yuyaraavɨjɨ tɨnna danganyideihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sahwara Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨ mwaaidapɨjɨ kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ saihi yɨnahu mwasɨlaa yɨhɨmarasɨ'najaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ kɨnna dadɨvɨ' sarɨnnya maangerɨkaavɨ dɨhɨzɨvainyidesɨra.
Yɨ, a'mwerajɨ a'mwejɨ nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'dimagɨdaa'nyarajɨ nyɨlyai walakadimagɨdaasarajɨ akyamwidaa'nyarajɨ sahwara Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨ tɨka munne nyemwaaibɨ'dere.
Yɨthaanyi, a'mwe pwara kumɨre yaya kwaakeba warɨkera dɨvi kumɨre yaya munyaba waraderera. Nabaai pwara kumɨre yaya munyaba warɨkera dɨvi kumɨre yaya kwaakeba waraderera.”
Sagaasagaa' gamɨnyawɨnna Perɨzɨya pwara yɨkabɨna yɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Erotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨ gɨramakade'na anga dathava yagalya'mava'gɨzɨ pimagɨnna dɨwodeigɨnyɨra.”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Kavɨjɨlɨka kayaa'nanya dazarɨ dara duthaawila! ‘Yɨthaanyi! Dahaasɨ mwanyagaasɨ nɨmɨ yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasadɨ a'mwe nalaavɨnakeraavɨ tewaanya yavada'gaimanɨgehaakɨ. Sarevɨ yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ nɨmɨre wawɨnya' yuneba yɨ'mwannɨdehaakɨ.’
Sare' kɨrɨ' dahaasɨ mwanyagaasɨ alyɨjɨ nɨmɨ kaanya wɨdehaakɨ. Anga pɨba pɨropetɨya aane pwarɨ tamakɨpɨ'dei mɨ'. Aawa. Yune Jeruzaalemɨ sahɨbanna nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨ.

Jeruzaalemɨgɨ, Jeruzaalemɨgɨ pɨropetɨyaraavɨ tamakadɨnyabagɨnyɨ. Sara yadɨ Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna maryasaabaderaavɨ sɨlyajɨ lɨwakadɨnyabagɨnyɨ. ‘Kukuraaya' gannya pɨyayawɨ bwaranyangɨ marulakamaremwaaidevaaibɨ' saamɨnya kwalaalya naangegaa' gɨmɨre kaimɨraayangɨ mari'bwarɨma!’ dena yɨweinyɨ. Sarɨmɨ ‘Aala,’ dadaapɨjɨnyɨ.

Yɨthaanyi! Gɨmɨre angevɨ Gotɨyai mena yagalya'ma'mwakesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨwɨ dɨpɨja sagaa'na ‘Naangerɨne yayavɨna bɨvanɨka dazarɨ yaya' munyaba makɨlaana!’ dɨnyanganyideinyɨ. Pɨgaa' nɨmɨnyɨ ayawɨdaa'nyɨ dɨnyanganyideinyɨ mɨka! Arɨkewɨnyɨ.”
Kwazaaka pɨgaa' pɨrɨkɨ Perɨzɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidere angevɨ Jizaazai tɨka wapaaya nya'nei wɨna. Wɨna yaka sara nadaa'nyɨ kumɨ nayaa baihana'na.
Nayaa baihana'na yadaapi, yɨthaa, a'mwe pwai, gannya kɨlaakejɨ' mɨlamakinɨkei, sare sai gamɨnyaba aya kɨba bamwaaina.
Aya kɨba bamwaaina kya' Jizaazai kɨwɨnyangɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ Perɨzɨyaraavɨjɨ yɨdaanganna “Kwazaakegaa' nemɨ nalaavɨnakeraavɨ tewaanya yavada'galaanne' tewaanya' dɨngaka? Aawa dɨngaka?”
Yɨdaanganna kya' sahwara kadɨka wɨ'nabalakulɨna yadapi a'mwe sarɨ maarɨna yɨna yaka tewaanya yavada'gaina yaka gannya angebannerɨ wɨdaasɨna.
Wɨdaasɨna yaka sarevɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai kavi'nɨnnyavɨ gamɨre kaimɨraaya pwai bulɨmakaawoya kwai kwalyɨ'naraawojɨ kwazaakegaa' a'mwe sai yɨme'nya'bɨ' malɨvamakɨlyɨ yadei daaka!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna muja'nawɨjɨ yɨpɨnerera.
A'mwera tɨka munne dazavɨnera badaapi namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nyangɨna “Mwalaana!” dadɨvɨ' yadaapi sahwai tɨnna wanganna yaka sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ke'ba'na yagaala pɨrɨ' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sai wɨdɨna

“Nabaai a'mwe pwai mudɨkangegaa'ne munne naanga savɨna jaka gɨthɨjɨmaa'najaigɨ namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nyavɨ mamwaaidɨnnera! A'mwe mudɨkanga sahɨrɨsɨyai a'mwe pwarɨ gɨmɨnyɨne yayavɨ gwavɨlavɨka pwarɨ jaka nujɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nadɨka!

Nabaai sasara yaja' yɨ a'mwe yuyaraaihɨrɨ jaka yɨhizɨvwarɨjɨmaa'najai dara gɨthathelyɨ ‘A'mwe daahawai namwaalyɨta daaha' maarana!’ Sara kyojɨ gɨmɨ wagɨla naange' maarɨna ya'gɨzɨ gamɨnyɨ dusɨmagɨdaasɨ kewɨnɨna walyamwalaawɨna jɨtheigɨnyɨ.

Namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nyavɨ yarai mwaalya'nebwi jɨtheigɨ mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe pwai jaka gɨthazaigɨ munne savɨna wo'gɨzɨyaigɨ yune aaya tɨyawɨnna dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ.
