Gɨmɨ sara yɨja' a'mwe gɨmɨnyɨ jaka gɨthazai sai bɨna yojɨ gɨthathelyɨ ‘Nya'mweigɨ, namwaalyɨta naanga nawɨ'nya dava davɨ bilamwaala!’ Sai sasara kyojɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ yaakima'nyaigɨ mwaala'gɨzɨ tɨka wapaaya je'mwannanadeigɨnyɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gazaizai yune gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlajai Gotɨyai dalaangewɨ marulawakɨna yadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' pwai yaya' gamɨnyɨna mamakinyɨ yajai yɨ sarɨna Gotɨyai gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨladelyɨ.”

Sagaa' sai tɨka munne savɨna jaka jɨvwarɨjɨmaa'naka a'mwerɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai gɨmɨ tɨka munne naanga pɨrɨ' yɨdɨka yɨjaigɨ gɨmɨnyɨ gwaja'mweraavɨjɨ jɨthaa'jɨhwaaravaavɨjɨ gɨmɨre avaaitawejɨkɨyaraavɨjɨ gɨmɨre angebanya avaaimwaalya gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakeraavɨjɨ Gotɨyai tɨvɨkɨta gɨzaaya'neigɨ jaka mudɨnneigɨnyɨ. Nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ gɨmɨnyɨ jaka kagɨthapɨjɨ kumɨre angengɨ gɨmɨre tɨka wapaaya yɨdɨka wɨdaayɨja sanna nanaawɨdɨka! Sara kya'gɨzɨ Gotɨyare wɨrɨvɨkɨta dɨmaa'deigɨ mɨ'!
Aawa. Gɨmɨ tɨka munne yɨdɨka naanga ya'gɨzɨ yɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨjɨ a'mwe kɨlaaka kayaaka yɨma'nɨnɨkeraavɨjɨ sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyaraavɨjɨ a'mwe tɨnna tɨbɨnyaraavɨjɨ duzɨmaa'nadeigɨnyɨ.

A'mwe sasare sara tɨka munne gɨmɨre sanna ayɨna gɨrɨvɨkɨpɨ'dera mɨ'. Sare'na yɨlaaya yadɨ tewaanaanga gyɨnadeigɨnyɨ. Sare' dathare'nesɨ. Dɨvi a'mwe yɨda'maraangeraavɨ kavi'nɨnnyavɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavajahaa' Gotɨyai tɨka munne daza gɨrɨvɨkɨradeigɨnyɨ.”

A'mwe saraavɨdaa'nya pwai gamɨjɨ tɨka wapaaya ye'mwannanyɨna yada yagaala dazavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nakei sahwarɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨ tɨka munne najai sai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnadelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sahwai wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwai ‘Tɨka munne naanga yɨdɨka yɨma!’ daka a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ tɨka munne savɨna yɨkabya'neraavɨ jaka mena wɨdakere.

Nabaai tɨka munne sa nya'negaa' mena kɨbawa kima'na' gamɨre wɨdaayaderɨ wɨdaasɨna kya' a'mwe sɨnnawɨ jaka wɨjɨvwarakeraavɨ wɨdaawɨna. Sai dara wɨdɨna ‘Sarɨmɨ kaajɨla! Yuya tɨka wapaaya sa tɨvi mena yovɨgaipwakɨwona.’
Kɨrɨ' a'mwe yuya dazara sɨmunya pɨrɨvɨ yagaalya' dɨna yeva wɨdɨna ‘Nemɨ mwawaanneinera.’ A'mwe pwai wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨ wawɨnya pɨjɨ' mena mubena tɨnna wanganaawɨdera. We', munne savɨ yuna wɨdeinyɨ mɨka!’
Nabaai pwai wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨre wawɨnya ya'ne bulɨmakaawoya mena mubeneinyɨra. Sara mubɨwe sa yaamɨjɨ yaawɨde'nanyɨ. We', munne savɨ yuna wɨdeinyɨ mɨka!’
Nabaai pwai wɨdɨna ‘Yuna dahaasagaa' mudɨkange' madeneinyɨra. Sɨdɨraaya' mena maareneinyɨra. Sareinyɨ yuna wɨdeinyɨ mɨka!’

Yuyara avaaina ‘Aala!’ wɨdɨna kye' wɨdaayade dazai ayɨna wɨna yaka sasare sabwine'na gamɨre a'mwe naangerɨ wɨdɨna. Wɨdɨna kya' angevɨ gyakwalaangei sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ gamɨre wɨdaayaderɨ wɨdɨna ‘Yarala! Tutaanya naangebanyana yarai wawa'gɨzɨ anga naangebanna yɨnɨguka tutaanya maalɨka yuyabanyanajɨ dɨwodeigɨnyɨ. Sara wawa'gɨzɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨjɨ a'mwe kɨlaaka kayaaka yɨma'nɨnɨkeraavɨjɨ a'mwe tɨnna tɨbɨnyaraavɨjɨ a'mwe sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyaraavɨjɨ sasare sara mari'bwaramarya'gɨzɨ nɨmɨre angevɨna dɨmakadeigɨnyɨ.’
Sara wɨdɨna kya' wɨdaayade dazai sara yaka dɨna ‘Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ mena gɨmɨdɨmwana. Kɨrɨ' namwaalyɨta pɨnɨ sɨhumale pɨnɨ yaasɨwa' warɨna.’

Wɨdɨna kya' naangei gamɨre wɨdaayaderɨ wɨdɨna ‘Tutaanya yuya naangebanya wawa'gɨzɨ wawɨnyabanya wawɨdɨvɨmaangebaraavɨ yamaryadɨ a'mweraavɨ a'mwemɨlɨkaavɨ bulamari'bwarɨmwaaihya! “Nɨmɨre ange' yunebanna yana!” dena yawɨ'manɨgena.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe yuya dazara sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' nɨmɨ jaka jɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nera nɨmɨre tɨka wapaaya yɨnɨga wi'na nagaangabɨ'dera mɨka.’ ”
Jeruzaalemɨna kuna woda kwala bwa'naanya naangera gamɨjɨ kaanya yamarina yadaapi sahwai gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna

“Gazaizai nɨmɨnyawɨnna bazai, kɨrɨ' sai ganɨmaangerɨjɨ ganaangevɨjɨ gannya a'mwevɨjɨ kaimɨraayangɨjɨ gathaa'gahwaaravaavɨjɨ gya'mwengɨjɨ nabaai gannya gaala kɨrɨvɨjɨ sangɨna tewaanya naanga wɨvu'najai nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya maalɨ'na wɨvu'najai yɨ sahwai nɨmɨre nyɨmɨdɨdei myɨma'nyɨ yannelyɨra.
A'mwei balya'nei gannya yɨta yovihɨrarannɨke' mamarikwayɨ yojɨyai nyɨmɨdɨnajai yɨ sahwai nɨmɨre nyɨmɨdɨdei myɨma'nyɨ yannelyɨra.

Sare' da'dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai ‘Anga saamɨnaanga ke'mwewɨnya pɨrɨ' madɨma!’ dozɨyai yɨ sai kave kwaamu' mwaalojɨ anga dazavɨne nɨgwia'na sɨmunya nayaa yawɨradelyɨ. Sai yawɨrade ‘Nɨgwia anga savɨne' yɨnɨga wi'na majɨ'mwannya'ne' dɨngaka?’

Nabaai yune'na sasara mi yaja', yɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ simɨnye' mena laabozɨya kɨrɨvɨ anga sa' yunebanna majɨ'mwannade' mɨ'. Sarevɨ a'mwe yuyara tɨnna wanganna yɨna yapɨjɨ a'mwe dazarɨ yagaaibɨraizɨka buthangamuna nyɨpɨdɨka!
Dara wɨdɨna ‘A'mwe dazai anga daza' madɨthaakuna yɨna yaka nɨgwia'na majɨ'mwannya'nei mi yannelyɨra.’

Nabaai kingɨya pwai kingɨya pwalyɨ mala bwa'nya'nei, yɨ sarei nayaa kwaamu' mwaalojɨ sɨmunya nayaa yawɨradelyɨ. Gamɨ sare aawɨlasara (10,000) tenɨ taawɨzanɨyarajɨyai dara yawɨ'na ‘Kingɨya sahware aawɨlasara (20,000) tɨwedi taawɨzanɨyarajɨyalyɨ malya' yɨnɨga wi'na bwa'nɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Aawa dɨngaka?’ Sare savɨne'na yune'na yawɨrojɨyai

sai yawɨ'na ‘Malya' yɨnɨga wi'na mwavɨla'muneinyɨ daaka!’ yawɨrojɨ, yɨthaanyi, gamɨre yɨkamaangei mena saamɨnyaba kuna yɨdori, sai a'mwe pwara maryaasɨna yadelyɨ. Maryaasajara wawapɨjɨ malyavɨ woyagaala dahidɨwagaawia ya'nera.
Sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' sarɨmɨjɨya gazaizai gannya gɨlyɨvɨta yuya sangɨna bule'na mujaayɨ yajai, yɨ sahwai nɨmɨre nyɨmɨdɨdei myɨma'nyɨ yannelyɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨhɨthɨma! Saala sa yuna nawɨ'nyaangengɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai saalya' gamɨre yɨrɨla mi'na kadozɨ yɨ ayɨna gannya saalya' nawɨ'nya' nemɨ gara kyawaajɨ yɨma'nannevaka!

Sasare saala sa' wawɨnyangɨ nemɨ yɨnɨga wakaanne mɨ'. Nabaai bulɨmakaawoyangɨre lɨkejɨ yɨnɨga wi'na marirakurakaanne mɨ'. Nemɨ yaasɨwa'na bwakɨrasɨ'daanyangɨ. A'mwei kadɨ'nakei yagaala daza' sai kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana!”
Pɨgaa' a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe gɨrɨkita'nanyarajɨ gamɨre yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nya'nera gamɨnyawɨnna yɨkabɨna yɨna.
Yɨkabɨna yɨna yeva Perɨzɨyarajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ mayagaala yawɨ'na, dɨnyɨna “A'mwe dazai a'mwe gɨrɨkita'nanyarajɨ ye'mwannemwaaida tɨka ye'mwannanɨvanɨkelyɨreva.”
Sai sarevɨ yawɨ'na yaka ke'ba'na yagaalya' wɨdɨna

“A'mwe pwai sarɨmɨjɨyai sipɨzipɨya (100) waanɨ aadɨretɨya kɨnɨnnakei, nabaai sipɨzipɨya pwai sangineba yadaa'na kyojɨ sipɨzipɨyangɨ gyakwalaangei (99) naaidi naainɨyangɨ pimagɨ a'mwamaayaba yagalya'ma'na yojɨ kurɨvaarɨya nɨda'nadaapi kaanna wɨna sipɨzipɨya pwai yadaavajaina bɨramaarajahaa'na. Sarɨmɨjɨyai sara yadei midaaka!
Mena bɨramaarojɨ gamɨre egwevɨ yɨlamarakwojɨ yɨlaaya naanga yada marikwavamakuna.

Nabaai gamɨre angevɨ bamari'mavojɨ gamɨre gya'mweraavɨjɨ avaaimwaalyaraavɨjɨ jaka wɨjɨ'bwa'na kyojɨ sarera bi'bwa'nyɨna. Bi'bwa'nyɨna kyapɨjɨ sai wɨdɨna ‘Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨjɨ yɨlaaya dɨnye'mwannayɨla! Nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨya pwai yadaa'nɨkei nɨmɨ bɨrena mena bɨramaa'mwana!’ Sara wɨdathelyɨ.

Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sasarebaaibɨ', Sɨgunyavɨ mwaaidɨvɨsara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsarera. A'mwe naaidi naainɨyara ‘ “Nemɨ yɨda'maraangeina,” dadaa sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaarya'neina mamwaalyɨgoinera!’ yawɨ'dɨvɨsara yɨ sahwaraavɨna yɨlaaya myadɨvɨsasɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe kayaa'na yade pwai sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaarajarɨna yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨsasɨ.

Nabaai a'mwe pɨrɨ' nɨgwia atɨraalya kɨnɨnnake' dɨvi nɨgwia pu' yɨmaanyɨna. Da'dara yade' midaaka! Laamɨvananyai yewɨta'na yɨna yojɨ nɨgwi'na bwakɨranganna, bavuralangasɨwalyuna, kuna bɨrɨna yada yune bɨramaarajahaa'na.

Mena bɨramaa'na yojɨ gamɨre gya'mwengɨjɨ gamɨre avaaimwaalyayuraavɨjɨ jaka wɨdɨna kyojɨ bi'bwa'nemwaaina kyapɨjɨ wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨjɨ yɨlaaya dɨnye'mwannayɨla! Nɨmɨre nɨgwia nawɨ'nya pu' yɨwɨwaki' mena bɨramaarena ayɨna mena maa'mwana!’ Sara wɨdathesɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sasarebaaibɨ' a'mwe kayaa'na yade pwai sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaaraja'na Gotɨyare mamaayara yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'dere.”
Nabaai wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwai mɨgɨnya pwaraai kɨnɨnnakei.

Sarevɨ gahwaalaanga aaya wɨryaakei ganɨmaangerɨ wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmwai, nɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuyangɨna dara yawɨ'mwa “Naarɨmɨ yuya darainaarɨ dɨnehɨzaapalya! Sara jaapala'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnyɨnevaa' dahaa' yune'na dɨnyɨjaapalya!” ’ Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨnɨmaangei gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya sadaraarɨ wɨjaapalyɨna.

Wɨjaapalyɨna yaka aaya wɨryaakerɨna wɨjaavɨna kya' sahwai saba maalɨkegaa' mwaalɨna yaka gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya mari'bwa'na yaka anga saamɨnya menya pɨwɨ pwaraavɨrewɨnna mwalaawɨna. Anga dazaba kuna mwaaida gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa yaasɨwa' mariwɨnama'na yɨna yaka gannya kayaa'nanya yade saburɨdaasɨ yuna gɨlyɨvɨ'maayai mwaalɨna.
Sahwai gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya mena wasɨ'nakei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ anga dazaba mɨjɨka naanga pɨrɨ' yɨma'nyɨna. Sara yɨma'nyɨna kya' sai gɨlyɨvɨta aane pɨmɨlɨ' muwaryadɨsɨ.

Sarei anga dazabadaa'nya a'mwe pwarɨ wawɨnya' wɨdaayɨna. A'mwe sai gamɨre yaawarɨkurɨsabanna wɨdaasɨna yɨna yakei yaawaryaraavɨ maremwaaida yɨ'dɨvaina. (Juyaraavɨne wawɨnya sa' gɨrɨkita'nanya' warɨka kɨrɨ' yɨna.)
‘Yaawaryara nadɨvɨsa nɨmɨre munya wi'na wiana!’ daka yakelyɨ. Sahwarɨ wapaaya wɨjaaya'nei a'mwe aane pwai kwai mɨ'.

Sagaa' gamɨ kayaa'na mwaalake sabwine'na sɨmudaadaanya kwalaalya yawɨraka gamɨnyɨne'na nayaa yawɨ'na yaka dɨna ‘Nɨmɨnyɨ nɨmware yuya wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsara tɨka munne kwalaalya nadaapi kɨrɨ' dava yune nɨmɨ mwaaihe dainyɨ mɨjɨka naange' yuna jɨvanɨgena!

Baa'nana! Nɨmɨ wɨladaa'na ya'mujɨ nɨnnya nɨmwaryawɨnna ayɨna wɨde'nanyɨ. Sara ya'mujɨ nɨmwarɨ dara wɨdɨdeinyɨ. Nɨmwai, nɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabwi sana yɨweinyɨ. Sɨgunyavɨya Gotɨyarɨjɨ gɨmɨnyɨjɨ kayaa'nanyabwi sana yɨweinyɨ.
Dahaa' nɨmɨ a'mwe nawɨ'nyainyɨ mɨ'. Sare'na nɨmɨnyɨna ayawɨdaa'nyɨ “Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayalyɨra,” nyɨdɨnneinyɨ mɨka. Gɨmɨre wawɨnya gɨthaaya'neinyɨ dɨnyɨdahɨlakɨdeigɨnyɨra.’

Sarevɨ sai ganɨmaangeryawɨnnei kaanna wɨna. Sara kaanna wɨna yake sai menya keiba kuna widavadaa'nyɨ ganɨmaangei tɨnna maranganna. Tɨnna maranganna yɨna yaka ganɨmaangere kale sahwarɨna yenyɨ'nanganna wiadaa'nyɨ kaanyave'na walyuna yaka gannya kaimɨraayarɨ walyagalamujɨraawɨna yɨna yaka maangwɨdaanyaba bu'buta marina.

Bu'buta marina yadaa'nyɨ gawaalɨvaangei wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmwai, nɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabwi sana yɨweinyɨ. Sɨgunyavɨya Gotɨyarɨjɨ gɨmɨnyɨjɨ kayaa'nanyabwi sana yɨweinyɨ. Dahaa' nɨmɨ a'mwe nawɨ'nyainyɨ mɨ'. Nɨmɨnyɨna ayawɨdaa'nyɨ “Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayalyɨra,” nyɨdɨnneinyɨ mɨka!’

Kɨrɨ' ganɨmaangei gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨ wɨdɨna ‘Yarala! Sarɨmɨ baazɨ'ma'nya nawɨ'nyaangesɨ maarapɨjɨ makabapɨjɨ dɨvaazɨ'makwila! Sara mi'na yapɨjɨ nɨgwɨlalaaka nawɨ'nya dɨrɨmwila! Nabaai kwaari'masɨvɨlyai maarapɨjɨ dɨvaazɨ'makwila!
Sara mena yapɨjɨyagaa' bulɨmakaawoya dɨwɨnya sɨgunnakei galyɨramakabapɨjɨ baramila! Nemɨ tɨka munne yabwakɨlanadaa yɨlaaya yaade'nanyɨ.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya dathai mena bainɨkei, kɨrɨ' dahaa' sai gaala ayɨna mwaalɨka. Mena yadakwokei, kɨrɨ' nemɨ ayɨna bɨramaa'mwolyɨra.’ Sara daka wapeyɨdɨka naanga pɨrɨ' yɨna.

Yɨlaaya yadaapi aaya sɨraangei wawɨnyawɨ yɨbwa'nyɨna yaka dɨvidaa'nyɨ angebanna bɨna yaka anga kwala bwa'naanya bwamwaihodapiyabanna wɨlaabɨna yaka kadɨke' wɨ'nyɨna ‘Pɨradazajɨ tadɨvɨ' kwarame dahɨ'ma'manɨgava!’
Kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka wɨdaayade pwarɨ jaka jɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yɨna yaka sahwarɨ yɨdaanganna ‘Gatha'dara yɨvanɨgava?’

Yɨdaanganna kya' sai wɨdɨna ‘Jɨhwaalaangei ayɨna mena bɨwakerɨnereva. Sara bɨwakerɨna gɨmɨnyɨ gɨmaamaangei bulɨmakaawoya dɨwɨnyai maratamaka sahwarɨna yɨdɨka yakevɨnyɨra. Gannya kaimɨraayai kɨgaakuna mena yɨwɨnɨka kwai ayɨna mena maaraka maamɨdarya mwaaimwakerɨna yo'dakwɨya miwakerɨna yɨwake'nanyɨ.’
Nabaai sare kɨrɨvɨ aaya sɨraangei sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ angevɨ wɨlya'na ‘Aala!’ yawɨ'na. Sara yawɨ'da'nadaa'nyɨ gannya ganɨmaangei mwasawɨnna bwalyuna yɨna yaka yagaala nawɨ'nya' bwalyawɨdɨna.

Sara wɨdadaa'nyɨ ganɨmaangerɨ ja'nawɨdɨna ‘Yɨthaa, kwarame kwalaalya bodaa'nyɨyangɨ nɨmɨ gɨmɨre wawɨnya' lɨmwaga'dɨnyainyɨ. Yuyagaa' nɨmɨ gɨmɨre yagaalya' galagɨzekɨvaidɨnyainyɨ mɨka! Sare'na kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ memedɨwɨnyai pwai nɨmɨ nya'mwerajɨ yɨlaaya yadɨ yɨdɨka yanɨwɨnei nyɨ'daalyadɨnyainyɨ mɨka! Yuna aawaawa.

Sarevɨ da gɨmɨre kaimɨraaya dathazai gɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya dazaza a'mwe kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsamɨlɨkaavɨ yanga yaasɨwa'na wɨjavamaryada yuya gɨlyɨvɨsa yɨmɨngaasɨnakelyɨ. Sara yakei ayɨna bakerɨ, gamɨnyɨna kale kagiwa' bulɨmakaawodɨwɨnyai maratamagɨna yɨdɨka yɨvanɨgɨ.’
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna ‘Kaimɨraayaigɨ, gazagaasagaa' naarɨmɨnɨdainaai ye'mwannemwaaidasanɨdainaalyɨ. Sarevɨ nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya sa yune gɨmɨnyɨnannengɨ.

Sare kɨrɨvɨ dahaasagaa' nemɨ yɨlaaya yaade'nanyɨ. Yɨlaaya sara yawaajɨ nemɨre munyɨ' tewaanya nawɨ'nya yɨma'nade'na. Gɨmɨre jɨhwaalaanga dazai mena yɨnahu bainɨka kwai, kɨrɨ' dahaa' gaalyai mwaaimwa'. Sai mena yagalya'makwokei kwai, kɨrɨ' dahaa' nemɨ ayɨna bɨramaa'mwolyɨ. Sare'na yɨlaaya davwi yakade' tewaanyasɨra.’ ”

Nabaai Jizaazai gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnaka pwai gamɨre wawɨnyavɨ maremwaaidei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwe pwara gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnaka saryawɨnna yɨkabɨna yeva wawɨnyavɨ maremwaaide sarɨna jɨda'na ‘Gɨmɨre wawɨnyavɨ gɨmaremwaalyadei gɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa yaasɨwa'na mariwɨnama'na yɨvanɨkelyɨra.’

Sara jɨda'na kye' sai gamɨre wawɨnyavɨ maremwaaiderɨ jaka jɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna ‘Gɨmɨnyɨna yagaala wɨ'nɨwe' gatha'darevaka! Kaanya wawa'gɨzɨ gɨmɨre wawɨnya'ne pɨkarɨyɨkwia yavada'galakaawɨna ja nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya maremwaaidɨnya sanna! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ maremwaalya' ayahi pɨrɨsɨ jɨtheigɨ mɨka!’

Sarevɨ maremwaala dazai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ dara dɨnyɨna ‘Aka, nɨmɨre naangei nɨmɨre maremwaala yadɨnya savɨ nyɨdaasade'na nyɨwake'na gara yɨdeinyaka? Nɨmɨ kwaakeva' yɨnɨga malɨki yɨwɨneinyɨ dɨragɨnya maayainyɨra. Sare'na nabaai a'mwe pwaraavɨ wapejanna damaasa'na, nɨmɨnyɨ wagɨla nyɨvwa'nadeinyɨra.

Kɨrɨ' dahaa' nɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨge. Nɨmɨ gara ya'mujɨ yɨdeinyaka? O, mi'na yawɨramaa'mwana! Naangei maremwaala savɨ nyɨdaasajahaa' “A'mwera kumɨre angengɨ wɨwɨjahaa' nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaapɨka!” dadɨ mena yawɨ'mwa.’

Sara yawɨ'na yaka sarevɨ sai a'mwe gamɨre naangerɨ dinaaya damaa'dɨvɨsaraavɨ jaka wɨdɨna kya' sare sara pwaidaa'nyɨ pwaidaa'nyɨ gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna. A'mwe pwaidaa'nyɨ sɨnnawɨ wɨlaabɨna kya' maremwaaidei yɨdaanganna ‘Nɨmɨre naangerɨ dinaaya gara gare gwarɨkaigɨnaka?’

Yɨdaanganna kya' sai wɨdɨna ‘(100) Waanɨ aadɨretɨ kwadɨka naanga welivanatainakengɨra.’ Wɨdɨna kya' maremwaaidei wɨdɨna ‘Gɨmɨre dinaaya daza'ne pɨkarɨyɨkwia' maara'gɨzɨ sarevɨ walamwaaina ya'gɨzɨ yune (50) pivɨtiya'na yarai jɨthaka! Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa sara jawɨka!’

Nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai bi'ma'na yɨna kya' sahwai yɨdaanganna ‘Gɨmɨre dinaaya gara garengaka?’ Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna ‘Gɨlya naanga (100) waanɨ aadɨretɨ witɨyangɨra.’ Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna ‘Gɨmɨre dinaaya'na pɨkarɨyɨkwia da' maara'gɨzɨ yune (80) eitiya'na jɨthawakya!’ Sana sana yɨna.

Sana sana yɨna kya' naangei sare' yawɨranganna yaka maremwaala kayaa'nanya kukebwi yaka kɨrɨ' dazai a'mwe sɨduta yawɨ'nɨkeibɨ' yade sabwine'na yɨ sahwarɨ wɨdɨna ‘Gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨ gaimwannya'neigɨ sɨdu'nakeigɨne!’ A'mwe naangei sara yɨna. Sare'na dare'nanyɨ. Kumɨregaasaraavɨna a'mwe Kwaaka dathavakɨyabwinera kumɨre wawɨnya yabwina dɨragɨnya yadɨvɨsare. Sara yadɨvɨ' a'mwe baakevɨyabwineraavɨ wavɨla'dɨvɨsare.

Nabaai nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwera nɨgwia maa'dɨvɨ' dazajɨ kayaa'nanya dala nabinabinyanna marayadɨvɨsare. Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ daza maarapɨjɨ dazajɨ nawɨ'nyanna kamarayapɨjɨ sarɨnnya sɨrya'mwe yɨma'nɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. ‘Dɨvi nɨgwia lɨmwagasagaa' mena kiwawojɨ yɨ anga yuyagaa' yuyagaa' nayaa kwaamu' mwaalya'nebanna Gotɨyai nemaramwaaihana!’ dapi sara jideihɨlyɨ.

A'mwe kwai gɨlyɨvɨta wana maalɨke'na nayaa pada'gainemwaaina yajai yɨ sai gɨlyɨvɨta naanga kɨrɨvɨnajɨ nayaa pada'gainemwaaladelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwei gɨlyɨvɨta wana maalɨke'na kayaa'na yɨna, yɨda'na myajai yɨ sai gɨlyɨvɨta naanga kɨrɨvɨna kayaa'na yɨna, yɨda'na mi yadelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ Kwaaka davakɨya nɨgwiajɨ kayaa'na marayadɨvɨta sanna mavada'gainemwaalyɨ yɨpɨja' nebula nawɨ'nya maremwaala ya'neihɨrɨ aaihwai yɨhɨzaavadeihɨlaka!
Nabaai sarɨmɨ pware gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ nayaa mamaremwaalyɨ yɨpɨja' yɨ nebula nawɨ'nya sarɨnnyannanya' Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna dake' yɨhɨzaavade' daaka!

Angevɨ wɨdaayadei maremwaala yuyaraare wawɨnyawaai lɨmwagaradei aane pwai kwai mɨka. Aawa. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Maremwaala pwarɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaina yojɨ pwarɨna tewaanna wima'nyɨna yadei dɨngaka! Pwarɨ lɨmwaga'na yada pwarɨ bule'na wɨjaavɨna yadei dɨngaka! Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨnajɨ gɨlyɨvɨsangɨnajɨ saburaarɨna wawɨnya wɨdaayɨpɨneihi mɨka!”
Perɨzɨyara nɨgwianna tewaanya wima'nadere. Sare sara Jizaazai dadaa'nyɨya yagaala yuya dazangɨ kadɨka wɨ'nevera gamɨnyɨ bɨraiyagaala wɨdɨna.

Sara yɨna yadaapi sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na ‘A'mwera nenganapɨjɨ nemɨnyɨna yawɨpɨka! “A'mwe yɨda'maraangerera.” ’ Yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨra. Sara yadɨvɨta sabwina sarɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨ Gotɨyai mena yɨhyawɨrangamanɨkelyɨ. A'mwera yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsanna yɨ Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya kayaa'nanyabulyɨra.

Mozɨzare yagaala Kɨwɨnyavɨnesɨ pɨropetɨyaraavɨre yagaalyasɨ yune Jonɨmɨregaa'na wa'mwa'dɨkengɨ. Kɨrɨ' yune Jonɨmɨregaa'daasɨ yaka dahaakɨgaasɨ Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨne yagaala tewaanya' anga yuyabanya yɨma'nɨvanaabɨkesɨ. Nabaai a'mwe yuyara maremwaaide dazavɨ wɨlamwaalya'na dɨragɨnya kuna yɨvanɨgasare.
Sɨgunyavasɨ Kwaakevasɨ yɨwawode' wawɨnya maalɨkesɨ. Kɨrɨ' kɨwɨnyavɨya maalɨka pimagɨnyamɨlɨ' sa' yɨwawode' wawɨnya naangesɨ. Yunenna yɨma'nadengɨ.

Gazaizai gannya a'mwevɨ wɨdaasada a'mwe mudɨka pɨrɨvɨ maarajai ba'dalavalɨmwangebwi yɨna. Ata lɨmwangebwi yɨna. Nabaai a'mwei a'mwe pɨrɨvɨ sɨnnawɨ gannya wasɨ'najavɨ kwala maarajai sai ba'dalavalɨmwangebwi yɨna.

A'mwe pwai gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakei mwaalɨna yakelyɨ. Yuyagaa' baazɨ'ma'nya taaihɨja tewaanyanna tewaanyanna, baazɨ'ma'nya wayaakejɨ wakadelyɨ. Sara yada yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ tɨka wapaa tewaanyanna tewaanyanna yovɨgalamaa'delyɨ.
Gamɨre angevɨne tɨkuryaba a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maaya pwarɨ walawɨmwaaihɨna yesalyɨ. Gamɨnne yaya' Lazaarazai wo'nɨkei gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ yunebanna wa'waaya wa'dɨsɨyai.

‘A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnaka dazare yɨ'bɨnya wapewakyaba wapaaya tɨrɨdɨrɨnya yɨ'bɨnyavɨ dalaangewɨ bwala'dawadaa'nyɨya maranɨdeinya. Sa maranadɨ munya nyɨnadeinya,’ yawɨ'da nabaai jɨlɨkera wɨlaabɨna yadɨvɨ' gamɨre wa'waayangɨ kumɨre taalɨsajɨ yanyɨna.
Dɨvi a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maaya dazai balɨna yɨna kya' sare' ejelɨyara maarɨna yɨna yeva makuna yevera Evɨraamɨjɨ ye'mwannamwaihaawɨna. Nabaai a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnaka sai kwalyɨ balɨna yɨna kya' lɨkirakɨna.
Sai Dɨkevɨ mwaalaka daanga naanga wɨvɨnyɨna. Sara wɨvɨdaa'nyɨ munyaba kekina tɨnna maranganna. Evɨraamɨ saamɨnya menyaba mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Lazaarazai sahwalyɨ ye'mwannemwaaidɨ'nyɨ tɨnna wanganna.

Tɨnna wanganna yaka gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakei jaka danganna ‘Nɨmwai, Ne Evɨraamɨ, dɨka davɨ daanga naanga kayaa'na nyɨvɨmanɨke'na nɨmɨnyɨna kale kagyozɨ “Gamɨre a'jawɨnyai aalyavɨ bwalapaihojɨ a'mwere taalɨsarɨ kudathɨwagaavojɨ yɨrɨla maalɨ'na wɨdana!” da'gɨzɨ Lazaarazarɨ dɨmaryasaama!’

Sara danganna kya' kɨrɨ' Evɨraamɨ wɨdɨna ‘Kaimɨraayaigɨ, dahaa' gɨmɨ pɨnɨnna jawɨka! Sɨnnawɨ gɨmɨ gaala mwaalagɨnegaa' gɨlyɨvɨta yuya tewaanya maaragɨ. Nabaai Lazaarazai yuya kayaa'nanya maarakelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' anga dava gamɨre munyɨ' tewaanna wa'manɨka. Sara yadaa'nyɨ gɨmɨ daanga kayaa'nanya' maa'manɨgɨ.

Nabaai pɨnɨjɨyavɨ nemɨnyɨ tɨnna dava sarɨmɨnyɨjɨ nemɨnyɨjɨ Gotɨyai sitɨkulala naanga pɨrɨ' wakakesɨ. Sarevɨna a'mwe dava mwaaihasara sitɨkulala savɨ mavɨralavaabyapɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨya'na wɨpɨnera mɨ'. Nabaai a'mwe kengimagɨ mwaaihasara sitɨkulalyavɨ mavɨraalayapɨjɨ nemɨnyawɨnna wɨlaabɨpɨnera mɨ'.’
Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna ‘Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Nɨmwai, gɨmɨnyɨ githaangamanɨge. Nɨmaamaangere angevɨna Lazaarazarɨ dɨmaryaasa!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ atɨla nyɨdaa'nyɨgwaaravaava mwaaihasara kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. “Saraayawɨnna Lazaarazai wawojɨ yagaala jalɨkurakɨna yana! Nabaai daanga naanga maarya'ne davanna sara kwarajɨ nabɨpɨdɨka!” dena githaangamanɨge. Sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaapɨja' daanga wɨvɨnadera mɨka!’
Wɨdɨna kya' Evɨraamɨ wɨdɨna ‘Mozɨzare yagaalyajɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasaraavɨrejɨ warɨka. Sare sangɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨka!’

Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna ‘Aawaawa, Nɨmwai Evɨraamɨ, sa' yɨnɨga wi'nanne' mɨka! Aawa. A'mwe bainɨka pwai bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna dɨkaavojɨ kumɨnyawɨnna kwawojɨ sahwara sɨmunya mudɨkebwina yawɨramaa'na yɨpɨ'derera.’

Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' wɨdɨna ‘Nabaai Mozɨzare yagaalyangɨjɨ wɨjaata pɨropetɨyaraavɨrengɨjɨ kadɨka mu'nyɨ yɨpɨja' yɨ nabaai a'mwe pwai bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna dɨkaavaja'na nabaai sa' kɨrɨ'najɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨ'dera mɨka!’ ”

Sagaa' sahwai gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya sabura a'mweraavɨ kayaa'nanyabwina walapapalakya'na yɨma'naabathengɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe walapapalakyabwi sasara wɨjaavaja sarɨna we', mala nayaa yɨwannana!

Nabaai kaimɨraaya maalɨkemɨlɨkaavɨdaa'nya pɨmɨlɨkɨ kayaa'nanyabwina walapapalakadelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai sara kayaa'na myɨ yojɨyagaa' sɨla naanga lɨlɨ'nɨka pwai gamɨre tɨlɨnnyavɨ maryegipwɨyapɨjɨ saalaalyavɨ kewɨnɨ maralɨvarabɨ'de' yɨ gamɨnyɨna tewaanyasɨra. Pɨmɨlɨkɨ kayaa'nanyaburɨ marulawakajarɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'na yade'na yɨ gamɨnyɨna kayaa'nanaangesɨ.
Sarɨmɨ sahwaihɨrɨna mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Gɨmɨnyɨ jɨthaa'jɨhwaai kayaa'nanyabwi kagyozɨ sarɨ maanga duthatheigɨnyɨ. Nabaai sai mudɨkebwi kyawɨramaarojɨ gamɨre kayaa'nanyabwi dɨmakwaasa!

Nabaai yɨrɨka gave pɨgaa' pɨrɨkɨ sai kayaa'nanyabwi gɨmɨnyɨ ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pɨgasaaina kagyozɨ nabaai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pɨgasaaina gɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna bozɨ wɨdɨna ‘Kale nyɨwaka! Mudɨkebwi yawɨramaarɨma!’ Sara kagɨthozɨ gamɨre kayaa'nanyabwi dɨmakwaasa!”
Naangei maryaasadera apozelɨyara Naangerɨ wɨdɨna “Pwaraavɨre kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'nya'neburɨna gɨmɨnyɨna nemɨre lɨmwangebwi naanga jahɨriwana! Nemɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yaanneina daaka!”

Sara wɨdɨna kye' Naangei wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre lɨmwangebwi aranyavɨre sɨla maalɨkemɨlɨ'bɨsabwi gɨrya'nebwi warajɨ kwajɨ yɨta mɨjamaanga da' dara duzideihɨlyɨ ‘Gɨmɨre pwipula lɨkalaa'na'gɨzɨ saalaalyavɨ ayɨna dɨthavaawa!’ Yɨ sara kudapɨjɨ sarɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ yɨhu'nojɨ kihɨmɨdɨnadɨka!

Nabaai a'mwe sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwai yaasɨwa'wawɨnya pwai kɨnɨnnakei mwaalajai gamɨre wawɨnyai kwaaka budawakɨwodei dɨngaka? Sipɨzipɨyarajɨ maremwaaidei dɨngaka? Sare sai dɨvidaa'nyɨ wawɨnyavɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna bɨna kyojɨ maremwaalyai sahwarɨ dara wɨdathei daaka! ‘Yɨme'nya'bɨ' kaanya ba'gɨzɨ bamwaala'gɨzɨ tɨka munne dɨnana!’ Sara wɨdathei daaka!

Aawa. Sai wɨdɨna yadelyɨ ‘Munnaanyasɨ marila'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnne wapaaya jovɨrawakya! Sara ya'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnne wapaaya lɨvadɨ'gwala'gɨzɨ dɨmakulaama! Tɨka wapaajɨ waainɨyasɨ mena kana'mujɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ gɨmɨ tɨka wapaajɨ waainɨyasɨ dɨnadeigɨnyɨ.’
Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya dazai gamɨre yagaalya' nayaa yade'na a'mwe naanga sai yɨlaaya yada ‘Kaimala! Su!’ wɨdadei dɨngaka! Aawa.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaihi Gotɨyai yɨhɨthathengɨ sara yapɨjɨ nayaa dara dɨzi! ‘Nemɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnya waryaanyainera. Wawɨnya sara yɨwo sa, yɨ sa yuna nemɨre wawɨnya'na yɨwongɨra. Wawɨnya kwaala myɨwo.’ ”
Jizaazai anga Jeruzaalemɨnei woda anga Samerɨyanajɨ anga Galɨlinajɨ tɨnna yaareba wɨna.
Wɨna yada anga pɨba yɨ'mavaawɨna yɨna yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe samatanaka atɨraalyara tutaanyavɨ bavɨramaa'na yeve kwara menyaba sangirɨ' daavɨna yeva
jaka dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Jizaazai, a'mwe naangeigɨ, nemɨnyɨna kale'na dɨnegaimwana!”

Jaka sara wɨdɨna kye' sai sahwaraavɨ tɨnna wanganna yɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Pɨrizɨyara Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsara ‘Tewaanyaihɨlyɨra,’ wɨja'neraayawɨnna sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' makwopɨjɨ duzɨwainaawila!” Sara kudaasa' sahwara kaanna yɨkuna yɨna yeva yadaapi kumɨre kɨlaakejɨ' tewaanya yɨma'nyɨna.

Sarevɨ nabaai sahwaraavɨ tɨnnyabadaa'nya a'mwe pwai gannya kɨlaakejɨ' tewaanya yɨma'nɨwakejɨkɨ tɨnna yennaka sai ayɨna kaanna bɨna. Sara yake sai jaka naanga dada Gotɨyarɨne yaya' byaannake' munyaba makina.
Makina yada Jizaazare sɨvigɨ'nyɨryawɨ yarai walaruta'nyɨna yaka “Kaimala! Su!” wɨdɨna. A'mwe dazai Juyai mɨka. Sahwai anga Samerɨya mwaalyai.
Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai yagaala dɨna “Nɨmɨ yawɨ'mwe' ‘A'mwe atɨraalyara tewaanya dahayɨma'nɨwaava.’ Kɨrɨ' a'mwe ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraai daraalyara pwara gazɨ mwaaihava!
Ayɨna bozɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨladei a'mwei pwai mɨka! A'mwe anga pimagɨdaa'nya dazai yune gave pwainanyai dɨngaka!”
Nabaai sai wɨdɨna “Daava'gɨzɨ kaanna dɨwona! Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨralɨmwangebwi tewaanya ayɨna gyavada'gaimwaka.”

Pɨgaa' Perɨzɨyara sahwarɨ yɨdaanganna “Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalade' gathɨngaa' bi'mavadevaka?” Sara yɨdaanganna kye' sahwai ja'nawɨdɨna “Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalade' bathehaa'na a'mwera a'mwemɨlɨka tɨnnyarajɨ baihana'dɨvɨsara mɨka.

Sahwara dara dadɨvɨsara mɨ'! ‘Yɨthaa! Dava dahawarɨka! Aagaiba dahawarɨka!’ Yɨthaanyi! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalade' sarɨmɨnyɨ kusawɨ mena yɨhɨmwaalɨka!” (Gamɨ sahwarɨna “Mena yɨhɨmwaalɨka!” wɨdɨna ya'.)

Sagaa' gamɨre wɨmɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Dɨvi pɨgaa' yɨma'najahaa' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayare yɨrɨka pɨrɨ' tɨnna wanganya'neihi sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' tewaanna kuna yɨhɨvu'nadeihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ tɨnna danganyideihi mɨ'.
Nabaai yɨhɨthɨpɨ'desɨ. Yɨthaanyi, aagimagɨ mwaalɨka! Pwara yɨhɨthɨpɨ'desɨ. Yɨthaanyi, dava mwaalɨka! Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ mupɨnera! Sahwaraavɨ mamɨjamakupɨnera!
Sasarevɨ dare'nesɨ. Sɨgunyavɨ yuneba, pimagɨdaa'nyɨ sɨmagɨnna yɨnamɨraata yadevaaibɨ' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai bi'mavadehaa' yuyara wangabɨ'delyɨra.
Kɨrɨ' sahwai taanga kwalaalya maarojɨyarɨ a'mwe dahaasa dathara bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨ'delyɨra.
Nowaare yɨrɨkeryaavɨ yetabaaibɨ' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayaregaa' yɨma'nade yɨrɨkeryaavɨ yɨ sara yɨpɨ'dere.

Tɨka munnejɨ nɨwainadaapi, waainɨyajɨ nadaapi, kwala ma'daapi, kwala ma'nadaapi yune Nowaai sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlaka sagaa'na. Yɨthaanyi, sagaa' burɨka naange' bwala'na yaka aalɨbunya naange' padɨ'nyɨna yakegaa' yuya a'mweraavɨ yuna kayaaka yɨgalakɨna.
Nabaai Lotɨmɨre yɨrɨkeryaavɨ avaaina sasare yesare. Tɨka munne nyemwaaina, waainɨyajɨ nadaapi, gɨlyɨvɨsa mubɨna, ‘Gɨlyɨvɨsa pwara mubya neyɨpɨka!’ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' mubɨna, wawɨnyajɨ yɨna, angejɨ madɨna.

Kɨrɨ' anga Sothomɨ Lotɨ yagalya'mavaka kaanna wɨna yaakegaa' nabaai yɨrɨka yune dazahɨgaasarɨkɨ sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ burɨke'bɨ' dɨkesɨ sɨla dɨ'nakesɨ anga saburɨna wasɨ'naabɨna kya' yuya a'mweraavɨjɨ a'mwengɨjɨ yuna kayaaka baihɨrakɨna.
Yɨ avaaina sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathe yɨrɨkerɨkɨ yɨma'nadesɨ.

Yɨrɨka dazarɨkɨ a'mwe pwai gannya angevɨ munyaba yɨlamwaalojɨ, nabaai angevɨ kusawɨ gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa wa'doriya gɨlyɨvɨsanna angevɨ nulamaaradɨka! Nabaai sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' a'mwe pwai wawɨnyawɨ mwaalojɨyai ayɨna nawodɨka!
Lotɨmɨre a'mwe' gɨlyɨvɨsanna tɨgɨnyɨma'nya yɨwiaakevɨna sarɨmɨ sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila! Lɨkaanya jɨla!

A'mwe gazaizai gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨne mwaalyabwina yɨlaaya yawɨ'da lɨmwagarajai yɨ gamɨre gaalyabwi yɨwawodevulyɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ', nabaai a'mwe gazaizai gannya mwaalyabwi yagalya'mavojɨyai yɨ gamɨre gaalyabwi tewaanna nayaa wɨvadaihasamaaradesɨ.
Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sawɨta dazarɨkɨ a'mwe pwaraai yɨ'bɨnya pɨrɨvɨ se warɨna yadakɨlyɨ Gotɨyai pwarɨ maarɨna yojɨ pwarɨ saba yagalya'ma'na.
A'mwe pɨrɨwaai witɨzɨla lɨlɨka yɨma'nya'ne yadaakɨlyɨyagaa' Gotɨyai pɨrɨvɨ maarɨna yojɨ pɨrɨvɨ saba yagalya'ma'na.
A'mwe pwaraai wawɨnyawɨ mwaalɨna yadakɨlyɨ Gotɨyai pwarɨ maarɨna yojɨ pwarɨ saba yagalya'ma'na.”

Yagaala daza' kadɨka wɨ'neva sahwara wɨdɨna, “Naangeigɨ, nedɨwaanya dazasa' gawɨ yɨma'nade'nevaka?” Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Bainɨkeraavɨre kɨlaakejɨ' warɨkeba yune dazahɨbeva yuta kaamyaakera kwala bi'bwa'dɨvɨsabera.”
Sagaa' yuyagaa'na Gotɨyarɨna yɨdaangabɨ'de', maa'na nyunadɨ'de'na Jizaazai ke'ba'na dara wɨjɨwaakɨna
“Anga naanga pɨba yawɨbwa'de pwai mwaalɨna. Yawɨbwa'de dazai Gotɨyarɨna myawɨri yada nabaai a'mwe kwaraavɨnajɨ sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨryadei.

Nabaai a'mwe pɨrɨ' yaanyɨwaake' anga naanga dazaba mwaalɨna. Yuyagaa' yawɨbwa'de dazaryawɨnna bɨbya yɨbainadaa'dehaa' wɨdadesɨ ‘Nɨmɨre yɨkamaangei kayaaka nyɨgalakade'nanyɨ. Sahwarɨ gɨmɨ kotɨyavɨ nayaa dɨnyɨgaimwade'nanyɨra.’

Sara wɨdɨwɨja yada sɨnnawɨ sagaa' yawɨbwa'de dazai sahɨrɨvɨna kotɨyavɨ gaimwange'na ‘Aala,’ yawɨ'na. Sara yawɨ'na yaka kɨrɨ' dɨvi sai gannya sɨmunyavɨ dara yawɨ'na ‘Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna lɨka mivanɨgeinyɨ. Nabaai a'mwe kwaraavɨnajɨ sɨmunya yawɨrɨkwaasa mivanɨgeinyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe dathava datha' yaanyɨwaaka datha' nɨmɨnyɨ taanga nyɨjaavadeinyɨra. Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' bɨbya yɨbainada'davadaawori dɨvi nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' yuna maa'na nanyɨma'nadɨka!’ daka gamɨre kotɨya'na gaimwanna wina yakelyɨ.”
Naangei sara wɨdɨna yaka dara wɨdɨna “Yawɨbwa'de kayaa'nanya dazare yagaalya' nayaa jawɨrila!

Yawɨbwa'de kayaa'nanyai kave kave yawɨbwarakelyɨ. Gotɨyai avaalyai daaka! Gotɨyare dahɨlakakera yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨjɨ yuya sawɨsarɨkaavɨjɨ sahwarɨ yɨdaangadɨvɨsaraavɨ kotɨya'na yarai gaimwanna mwi yadei daaka! Sahwaraavɨ kave kave gaimwanna mwi yadei daaka! Aawa.
Yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sai kotɨya'na yarai wɨgaimwagathelyɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' dɨvi A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai bathehaa' dazagaasagaa' a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganaja' dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨ' dɨngaka!” wɨdɨna.
A'mwe pwara yaya' yune kumɨ saraavɨne'na makinadɨvɨ' “Nemɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraangeinera. A'mwe pwara yuna kayaa'nanaangerera,” dadɨvɨsaraavɨ ke'ba'na dara wɨdɨna
“A'mwe pwaraai Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'neraai Gotɨyare Angevɨna kaanna wɨlaawɨna. Pwai Perɨzɨyai. Nabaai pwai a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'delyɨ.

Perɨzɨyai dazai daa'da yune gannya sɨmunyavɨna Gotɨyarɨna dara dɨna ‘Gotɨyaigɨ, nɨmɨ a'mwe pwarabɨtainyɨ mɨka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨnyɨna “Su! Su!” gɨthɨwa. Pwara kwaasɨ yɨna yadɨvɨ' kuka yɨna yadɨvɨsare. Nayaa yɨda'maraangebwi myadɨvɨsare. Pwaraavɨrengɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨsare. Nabaai nɨmɨ a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'de dazaibɨtainyɨ mɨka. Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ aawa.
Yuya wikɨyarɨkaavɨ yɨrɨka pɨrɨkaarɨna tɨka wapaaya kɨmaakɨya dakadɨnyainyɨ. Nabaai yuya maa'dɨnya ata yuyɨraai jaapaidɨ pimagɨnyavaa' gɨmɨnyɨ gɨzaavadɨnyainyɨ.’

Sara wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dei menya saamɨnya keiba daavɨna yaka Sɨgunyavɨna kekina mamaranganya'. Aawa. Sai gamɨre kayaa'nanyabwina kale wiada gannya kɨhɨsaba mala tannyɨna yaka dɨna ‘Gotɨyaigɨ, nɨmɨ a'mwe kayaa'na yadɨnyainyɨ. Sareinyɨna kale'na dɨnyɨgaimwana! Nɨmɨnyɨna gɨmɨre sɨnna tɨka wɨda'devwi dɨnyɨmarasɨ'na!’

Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'de dazai, Gotɨyai gamɨre kayaa'nanyanna marasɨ'naka ‘Tewaanyaigɨnyɨra,’ wɨdakei sarei gannya angevɨna ayɨna wawakelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai a'mwe pwai aawa. A'mwei yaya' yune gamɨnne'na munyaba makɨlajai, Gotɨyai dalaangewɨ marulawakadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwei gamɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba mamakinyɨ yajai, yɨ Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba makɨladelyɨ.”

Kaimɨraaya maalɨkemɨlɨkaavɨjɨ gamɨnyawɨnna makabɨna yɨna. Sahɨyura yawɨ'na “Tewaanya'na asa' dathɨwagathe'na gamɨnyawɨnna makwawaana!” deva makabɨna yadaapi kɨrɨ' gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara dazavɨ tɨnna wanganna yeva sahɨyuraavɨ maanga wɨdɨna.

Maanga wɨdɨna yadaapi Jizaazai kaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨ gamɨnyabanna jaka jɨvwarɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Kaimɨraayamɨlɨka yune nɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨpɨka! Sarɨmɨ magaladalɨmwabɨnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide', yɨ sasaremɨlɨkaavɨnesɨ.
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Pwai kwai Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' kaimɨraaya maalɨkemɨlɨ'bɨ' mamaaryajai, yɨ sai kusawɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wɨladei mɨka. Arɨkewɨ.”
A'mwe naanga pwai gamɨnyɨ yɨdaanganna “Wɨjɨwaakya tewaanyaigɨ, nɨmɨ gara ya'mujɨ gaala yuyagaa' yuyagaa' tewaanya mwaalya'ne' maarɨdeinyaka?”
Yɨdaanganna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “ ‘Tewaanyaigɨnyɨreva,’ be'na nyɨdɨwaana? Tewaanyai, Gotɨyai yune gave sahwainanyalyɨra. Pwara aawa.

Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkevɨ mena yawɨ'dɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Dara dɨnɨ' ‘A'mwe pwaraavɨrengɨ ata malɨmwadɨnna! A'mweraavɨ maramakɨnna! Kuka mamaa'dɨnna! A'mwe pwarɨne'na kwaasɨ majalɨkurakɨnna! Gɨnnya gɨmaamaangelyɨ gwaangesɨ sawaare yagaalyangɨ nayaa dɨmɨdɨna! Kɨrɨmɨre yaya' dɨmakɨla!’ ”
Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Kɨgaa' yune kawe'nyagaa'daa'nyɨ dahaakɨgaasɨ kɨwɨnya yuya dazangɨ mɨdɨmanɨgeinyɨ.”

Jizaazai yagaala daza' kadɨka wɨ'naka sahwarɨ wɨdɨna “Yune gave pɨnɨnne'na kuna gɨmudaasɨvanɨkeigɨnyɨra. A'mwera mubya gipɨ'de'na gɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya duzaama! Nɨgwia maara'gɨzɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨ gɨmɨre nɨgwia duzaama! Gɨmɨ sasara yɨja', Sɨgunyavɨne nawɨ'nyaange kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨra. Sareigɨ dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!”
Wɨdɨna kya' dazai yagaala daza' kadɨka wɨ'naka gamɨre sɨmunyai taanga yɨma'nyɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwai a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakei.
Gamɨre sɨmunyai taanga yɨma'nyɨna kya' Jizaazai sahwarɨ tɨnna wangada wɨdɨna “A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalyajɨyara Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨ yagɨyagɨ wibɨ'derera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kaamelɨya' ‘Langerɨkɨre daibu'nyavɨ wɨlɨma!’ dozɨ yaja' sara mi yadesɨ. Sahɨbaaibɨ' a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakei ‘Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨ wɨlaawɨma!’ dada yagɨyagɨ yɨna yaja' yadei mɨ'.”
Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwera daza' kadɨka wɨ'nevera wɨdɨna “Nabaai sasara yaja' aarɨ wɨvadaihasamaaradelaka? Gaala yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaalya'ne' maarojɨ mwaaladei aaihwalaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “A'mwera yuya mi yɨpɨne sangɨ, sa Gotɨyai yɨnɨga wi'na yadengɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' Pitai wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa, nemɨre angebanyajɨ gɨlyɨvɨsangɨjɨ mena yagalya'mavoneinera. Sara yona gɨmɨnyɨ gɨmɨdɨdaanya'nanyɨ.”

Wɨdɨna kya' sai kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe aane pwai kwai, Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨna yawɨ'da angevɨjɨ a'mwevɨjɨ gathaa'gahwaaravaavɨjɨ ganɨmaangeyorɨjɨ kaimɨraayangɨjɨ yagalya'mavakerɨna,
nabaai dahaasavɨ Gotɨyai kwalaalya sanna mibwa'mwagi yadei daaka! Nebulyasɨ. Nabaai sarei dɨvi naanga yɨma'najahaa' gaala yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaalya'ne' maaradelyɨra.”

Sagaa' gamɨre atɨraai sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ maarɨna yɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi, dahaa' Jeruzaalemɨna wimanaabɨho. Sahɨba A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨna Gotɨyai pɨropetɨyaraavɨ kujaa' yagaala yuya sa yɨdayaasangɨ yuna yɨma'nyɨna yade'nanyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwainyɨ a'mwe Anga Naanga Pimagɨnyaraavɨna nyɨmarɨmwangɨpɨ'deinyɨra. Sara yapɨjɨ yagaaibɨraizɨkejɨ nyɨdangadɨvɨ' yuna kayaa'na nyɨgaidɨvɨ' nɨmɨre sɨnnyɨkɨ maagwala nyura'mwawakɨpɨ'deinyɨra.
Wɨlyabaalyɨ dɨka nyɨlɨ'bwarapɨjɨ maratamanyɨrɨmupɨ'deinyɨra. Bala'muri yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ ayɨna dɨkaavɨdeinyɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' yagaala daza' myawɨrina. Yagaala dazavɨne aaya kaavɨlya' kumɨnyɨ lɨka yulya'na. Sahwara sɨmunya' nayaa myawɨri yagaala wɨdaka dazavɨ.
Sahwai anga Jeriko aya kɨbanna yɨ'ma'na yaka, yadaa'nyɨ tu'maangebaarɨ a'mwe pwai tɨbɨnyai walamwaaida a'mweraavɨ nɨgwianna jaka wɨdangadelyɨ.
Sarevɨ sahwai a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya' yɨkabɨvanɨgaveva, kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka sai a'mwe pwaraavɨ yɨdaanganna “Gatha'dara yɨvanɨgaveva?”
Yɨdaanganna kya' ja'nawɨdɨna “Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyai kaanya bɨvanɨkeva.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai jaka wɨdanganna “Jizaazai, Devitɨmɨ gawaalɨ'gɨ nɨmɨnyɨna kale gyana!”

Jaka wɨdangadaa'nyɨ a'mwe aaya sɨnnawɨ yɨkwaadɨvɨsara maanga dara wɨdɨna “Maange' bɨpaina ya'gɨzɨ dɨmaku'nana!” Kɨrɨ' jaka naanga kuna danganna yada wɨdɨwɨja yɨna “Devitɨmɨ gawaalɨ'gɨ, nɨmɨnyɨ kale'na dɨnyɨgaimwana!”

Sara wɨdɨwɨja yɨna yadaa'nyɨ Jizaazai bathaa'na yɨna yaka saraavɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Davanna nɨmɨnyabanna dɨmakabila!” Wɨdɨna kya' sai mena aya kɨbanna wɨlaabɨna yɨna yaka yadɨ'nyɨ sai sahwarɨ yɨdaanganna
“Nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨ berɨ' gara gide'nanaka?” Yɨdaanganna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, ‘Nɨmɨ tɨnnya' ayɨna wanganɨma!’ dena yawɨ'manɨgena.”
Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre tɨnnyai ayɨna danganna! Gɨnnya dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi gɨmɨnyɨ tewaanya gyavada'gaimwaka.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' jaahwasa'bɨ' gamɨre tɨnnyai tewaanya yɨma'nyɨna yaka yennyɨna. Sarei Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨnna yɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨne yaya' byaannake' munyaba makina. Sarevɨ a'mwera dazavɨ tɨnna wanganeva Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makina ye'.
Jeriko sawɨnna wɨlaawaka adutaanyavɨ kaanna wɨna.
Yɨthaa, sagaa' saba a'mwe pwai, Sakɨyaazai wo'nɨkei mwaalɨna. Sai a'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'dɨvɨsaraavɨ maremwaaide a'mwe naangelyɨ. Sare sai nɨgwia kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
Sahwai “Jizaazai bewai dɨngaka? Yawɨranganɨma!” daka yakelyɨra. A'mwe kwala bwa'naanya' mwaaidapi Sakɨyaazai sahwai a'mwe tu'nanyalyɨ. Sare sai gamɨnyɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨna.

Sara mwanganyɨ yakegaa' sɨnnawɨ gamɨdaa'nyɨ kaanyave'na wɨlaawɨna yɨna yaka “Sahwarɨ tɨnna yɨwarɨma!” yawɨ'na yaka yɨta mɨgɨlyarɨ ke'mu yɨ'nɨgina. Sahwai yawɨ'na “Sarei tutaanyarɨ' darɨkɨ bathei daaka!” yɨladaa'na.

Yɨladaa'na yaka yemwaaidɨ'nyɨyɨmagɨnna Jizaazai bi'ma'na yɨna yaka kekina maranganna yaka wɨdɨna “Sakɨyaazai, yɨta sarɨ yarai yagalya'ma'na ya'gɨzɨ dalaama! Yuna dahaasagaa' nɨmɨ gɨmɨre angevɨ mwaalɨdera.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' wɨ'nyɨna yaka yarai walaabɨna yɨna yaka gamɨre sɨmunya' yɨlaaya yɨna yakegaa' gamɨre angevɨnerɨ kaanna makuna.
Nabaai a'mwe yuyara daza' tɨnna wanganeva kɨnɨmyagaala dɨna “A'mwe kayaa'na yade pware angevɨ angyɨrɨ'maata yɨvanɨkelyɨra.”

Kɨnɨmyagaala sara dɨna kye' Sakɨyaazai daavɨna yaka Naangerɨ wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, yɨthaa, nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya sa yune tɨnnyabanna jaapalɨde'nanyɨra. Sara jaapala'mujɨ pimagɨnyavaa' a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨ yanga wɨjaavɨdeinyɨra. Nabaai nɨmɨ a'mwe gazarɨzarɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdena gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨta pɨrɨ' kuka sara maarena yɨ gamɨnyɨ gɨlyɨvɨta dawaai dawaalya sanna ayɨna wɨrɨvɨkɨrɨdeinyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai sahwarɨ wɨdɨna “Yuna dahaasagaa' a'mwe anga dathavɨyarɨ Gotɨyai mena wɨvadaihasamaa'mwakelyɨra. A'mwe dazai kwai Ne sɨnnawɨnya Evɨraamɨmɨrei nebwina yɨma'nɨwake'nanyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai a'mwera yagalya'ma'nɨkeraavɨ ayɨna bɨramaarya'nei nabaai padaihasamaarya'nei bɨwakelyɨra.”

Sagaa' sahwara yagaala daza' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva yawɨ'na “Yuna dahaasagaa' Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalade' ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathe'na yɨwaka! Gotɨyai nevadaihasamaarojɨ Jizaazai nemɨre kingɨya naangerɨ yarai wɨmwaaihade'nanyɨ.” Sara yawɨ'na yɨna yesa'najɨ nabaai anga Jeruzaalemɨna aya kɨba mena yɨ'mata ya'neba yɨdɨ'nyɨya'najɨ ke'ba'na yagaala pɨrɨsɨ wɨdɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara wɨdɨna “A'mwe naanga akwai anga saamɨnya menya pɨwɨnna kingɨyai yɨma'nya'nei yagalaawɨna ya'nei wɨna.

Sɨnnawɨ sare sai gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnya atɨraalyaraavɨ jaka jɨ'bwa'na yaka nɨgwia kinaaya jaapaina yaka sɨvɨlatɨraala pwarɨ sɨvɨlatɨraala pwarɨ sana sana avaaina yanga wɨjaavɨna. Sara yakegaa' wɨdɨna ‘Sarɨmɨ nɨgwia daza makwawopɨjɨ nɨmɨnyɨneba bɨzɨnɨzɨya pɨnɨ javɨkaryaawila! Yune nɨmɨ ayɨna bɨwɨjahaa'naneihɨlyɨra.’ Sara wɨdɨna yaka kaanna wɨna.

Kaanna wɨna kya' kɨrɨ' a'mwe anga dazabanyara dazalyɨya avaaimwaalyara sahwarɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaina. Sɨmɨlɨka sara wimwaaina yadɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mwe marewɨjaraavɨ maryaasɨna kye' sahwarɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ mɨjamakuna. Sara yevera sahwara dɨna ‘Nemɨ yawɨ'mwo. A'mwe dazai nemɨre kingɨyai namwaaladɨka!’

Yagaala sa' mɨjamakuna kye' kɨrɨ' sarɨ kingɨya dahɨlakɨna yesai dɨvi ayɨna bɨna yɨna yakei. Sai wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨre nyɨdaayadɨvɨta sɨnnawɨ nɨgwia wɨjaavena maryaasage dazaraavɨ jaka duzɨla! Nɨmɨ yawɨranganɨde'na a'mwe yuya pwaina pwainanyara nɨgwia kwaala gara gare ma'mwaata dɨngaka?’

Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwara bɨna yeveraavɨdaa'nyɨ pwai aayagaa' maarakei wɨdɨna ‘Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨre nɨgwia tɨwedi kinaaya (20) dazangɨdaa'nyɨ bɨzɨnɨzɨya yavɨkaryena nɨgwia kwaala tu aadɨretɨ kinaaya (200) maa'mwana.’

Sara wɨdɨna kya' kingɨyai wɨdɨna ‘Nyɨdaayadɨnya tewaanyaigɨ, wawɨnya tewaanaange'na yadɨnyaigɨnyɨra. Gɨlyɨvɨta maalɨkengɨne'na nayaa yavada'gainadɨnyaigɨnyɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dahaa' anga atɨraalyangɨ dɨmaremwaaideigɨnyɨ gɨthahɨlakɨweigɨnyɨra.’
Nabaai ayawɨdaa'nyɨ pwai bɨna yaka buthɨna ‘Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨre tɨwedi kinaayajɨ (20) nɨmɨ bɨzɨnɨzɨwawɨnya yadɨ dahaa' nɨgwia kwaala waanɨ aadɨretɨ kinaaya (100) maa'mwana.’
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kingɨyai wɨdɨna ‘Nabaai sabaaibɨ' anga atɨlyangɨ dɨmaremwaaideigɨnyɨ gɨthahɨlakɨweigɨnyɨra.’
Nabaai wawɨnya wɨdaayade pwai bɨna yɨna yaka wɨdɨna ‘Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨre nɨgwia tɨwedi kinaaya (20) dava warɨka dangaakana! Kwaabɨyɨvɨ'bubunya pɨrɨvɨ yewaa'mwagena wake davaakana!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ gwangadɨ a'mwe kɨrɨ'mɨryaigɨnyɨ. Gɨlyɨvɨta a'mwe pwara wakamaremwaaidɨvɨsa, sa gɨmɨ maarɨna yadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Nabaai tɨka wapaaya a'mwe pwara burɨdɨvɨsa, sa gɨmɨ yabwarina yadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Sare'na nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨna lɨka naanga yadɨnyainyɨ.’

Sara wɨdɨna kya' kingɨyai wawɨnya wɨdaayade dazarɨ wɨdɨna ‘Nyɨdaayadɨnya yuna kayaa'nanyaigɨ, yune gɨnnya yagaala dazahɨrɨvɨne'na kotɨya' gɨmarideigɨnyɨra. Gɨmɨ yawɨ'dɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ a'mwe kɨrɨ'mɨryainyɨ. Nabaai gɨlyɨvɨsa a'mwe pwara wakamaremwaaidɨvɨsa nɨmɨ maa'dɨnyainyɨ dɨnga'! Nabaai tɨka munne a'mwe pwara burɨdɨvɨsa, sa nɨmɨ yabwaryadɨnyainyɨ dɨngaka! Sasareinyɨ dɨngaka!
Nɨnnya nɨgwia “Bengɨyavɨ wakɨma!” maja'neigɨ be'na yadɨnyaigɨnaka? Sara yɨjɨ kwajɨ nabaai ayɨna bena nɨgwia kwaalyajɨ yɨlakɨpɨja kabamaa'mudɨka!’
Nabaai a'mwe aya kɨba gaida'daavadapiyaraavɨ dara wɨdɨna ‘Dazahware tɨwedi kinaaya (20) daza' wɨdamaarapɨjɨ a'mwe tu aadɨretɨ kinaayajɨya (200) dazarɨ dumaarila!’
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna ‘Naangeigɨ, sai mena tu aadɨretɨ kinaaya kɨnɨnnakelyɨra.’

Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna ‘Yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe gazaizai tewaanya kɨnɨnnakei lɨmwagaza' nabaai nɨmɨ naanga pɨnɨjɨ yanga wɨjaavɨdeinyɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwai tewaanya malɨmwagaryajai, sai yune maalɨkenna lɨmwagaraja' sasare sa' marasɨ'nɨdesɨ.
Sare kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yɨkamaanga dazara, sahwara yawɨ'na “Sai nemɨre kingɨyai namwaaladɨka!” Sara yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'na sarɨmɨ nɨmɨre tɨnna daryabanna makabapɨjɨ baramakila!’ ”
Jizaazai yagaala daza' mena jɨ'mwannaka sɨnnawɨ anga Jeruzaalemɨna kaanya waanyɨna.
Waanyɨna yadehaa' anga Bepaaza anga Betaani sabanyaaina aya kɨbanna yɨ'ma'na, mugunyavɨ Wolivɨ wo'nɨkebanna, sare sabadaa'nyɨ gamɨre mɨdɨdita pwaraarɨ dara wɨdaasɨna

“Kɨrɨmɨ saraaihi anga akyamwina dulaawideraaihɨlyɨra. Sara wɨlaawakɨlyɨ dogiya dɨwɨnya pwai wɨla yɨrakɨnɨkerɨ bɨramaa'na jideraaihɨlyɨ. Dogiya sai aaya mudɨ'na a'mwe aane pwai kwai milamwalɨbwaayarɨ. Sare sai wɨlya' yarɨmakwaasakɨlyɨ dɨmakabidelyɨ.
Sare savɨ nabaai a'mwe pwai kwai dara yɨhithaanganajai ‘Dogiya sarɨ be'na yɨrala'manɨgɨleva!’ yɨ kɨrɨmɨ ayɨna dara duzideraaihɨlyɨ ‘Naangerɨ kumudaasɨwa' bamaa'mwoi.’ ”
Saraarɨ sara mena maryaasɨna kya' saraai kaanna wɨna yagɨla kɨrɨmɨnyɨ yuya sara wɨdaka sanna bɨramaa'na.
Bɨramaa'na yagɨla dogɨya dɨwɨnya sarɨ wɨla'nya yɨ'dɨvalakɨnɨke' yaarɨna yadaakɨlyɨ dogɨya sahwarɨ kwɨyakwarava saraarɨ yɨdaanganna “Dogiya dɨwɨnya sarɨ wɨlya' be'na galyaa'manɨgɨleva?”
Sara yɨdaanganna kye' saraai wɨdɨna “Naangerɨ kumudaasɨwakɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kyagi “Wikɨra,” wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazaryawɨnna saraai dɨwɨnya sai makabɨna yagɨla kɨrɨmɨre baazɨ'ma'nya saamɨnya dogiyarɨ a'ba yɨlakɨna kyagi Jizaazai a'ba bulevɨ yɨlamwaaina.
Dogiyarɨ yɨlamwaaina yadɨ'nyɨ makuna yadaa'nyɨ a'mwera a'mwemɨlɨka yɨlaaya'na kumɨre baazɨ'ma'nya saamɨnya tutaanya kaanya widavadaa'nyɨyavakɨ kwala pɨgɨlawakɨwɨlaawɨna.

Kwala pɨgɨlawakɨwɨlaawɨna yadaapi sahwai aya kɨba tu'adaihɨsaba Mugunya Wolivɨ mena wɨlaabɨna. Mena wɨlaabɨna yakegaa' aaya walaraimwannasaba gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kwala bwa'naanya yuyara Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨna. Yuya dɨragɨnya yɨjɨwakadaa'nya tɨnna wanganeta sanna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' jaka dɨragɨnna dɨna yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yaya' munyaba makina.
Jake' dara dɨna
“Naangerɨne yayavɨna bɨwaka Kingɨyarɨ
Tewaanya naanga yanga yana!
Sɨgunyavɨne narya' yarai yɨma'nana!
Munyawɨnyarɨne yaya' byaannake' makɨlaana!”
Jaka sara dɨna yadaapi Perɨzɨya pwara kwala bwa'naanyavɨdaa'nyara gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, gɨmɨre gɨmɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ mayagaala duthathe'nanyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' ja'nawɨdɨna “Yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kumɨre maange bɨpaibɨza', yɨ sɨlyara kumɨ sara yagaala jaka dɨpɨ'dera daaka!”
Jeruzaalemɨ aya kɨbanna sai yɨ'mavaka anga naangeba tɨnna wanganna yɨna yaka savɨna kɨnna maredɨna.

Sai dɨna “Dahaa' yɨrɨka darɨkɨ nabaai gɨmɨ kave mwaalya sabwina, naryavɨne mena kyawɨ'dɨkebagɨ - we'! Kɨrɨ' dahaa' nɨmɨnyɨna myawɨryadɨnya'na naryavɨ wakya'nebwi myawɨramaarivanɨgɨ. (Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Aala!’ dadɨvɨ' daza gɨmɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨvanɨgɨ.)

Pɨgaa' yɨma'najahaa' mala bwa'nya'ne gɨmɨre yɨkamaangera gɨmɨnyɨ yunewɨnna kurɨta ke'beva saamɨnya gyamaapɨ'de'gɨnyɨra. Kurɨta dazavɨ yunebanna bamwada'narapɨjɨ yunebanna akyamwi akyamwi maragɨhɨpaledaa'na gyɨpɨ'de'gɨnyɨ. Akyamwidaa'nyɨ akyamwidaa'nyɨ mala makulaabɨpɨ'devagɨnyɨ.

Sara yapɨjɨ gɨmɨnyɨ kayaaka kuna gihalakapɨjɨ gɨmɨjɨ gɨnnyarajɨ sanaaihɨrɨ kayaaka yɨhigalakɨpɨ'denaaihɨlyɨ. Sare'na gɨmɨnne sɨla pwarɨ wanganakɨpɨ'dei mɨ'. Kurɨkavɨne sɨla pwarɨ a'ba yɨlamwaalɨkei mwari yadelyɨ. Aawa. Yuya wo'dalasɨ'nɨpɨ'dere. Aane pwai kwai waradei mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai maryasaabakei gɨvadaihasamaarya'nerɨ gɨmɨ sɨmunya myawɨri yagɨna bule wɨjaavanɨgɨnya'gɨnyɨ.”
Sai sara kɨnna maredɨna yada sara dɨna yakegaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlaawɨna yaka sahɨba kusawɨ nɨgwia mwagi'nadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨlatamabwakɨraasɨna yada
wɨdɨna “Gotɨyare Bukuya' dara yɨda'nɨkesɨ. Nɨmɨre ange' nɨmɨnyɨ wɨja'ne' mannadesɨra. Sara dɨnɨka kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ yɨwaasa'na a'mwe kukera lɨka yulyarya'nebabɨsaba yɨma'nɨwakebera.”
Yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨjɨwaakada mwaalɨna. Sare sarɨna Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Gotɨyare Kɨwɨjarajɨ a'mweraavɨre a'mwe naangerajɨ “Sahwarɨ tamakaana!” deva yesare.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe yuyara gamɨre yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nya'na dɨragɨnna yɨvanɨgasaraavɨne'na.

Yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ pɨgaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ sai a'mwemɨlɨka a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna yada yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sara yadaa'nyɨyaba gamɨnyawɨnna Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ nabaai a'mwe naangerajɨ yɨkabɨna.
Sara yɨkabɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Nemɨnyɨ dɨnedana! Daza yɨvanɨgɨnyanna be dɨragɨnyasɨ yɨvanɨgɨnyavaka? Dɨragɨnya daza' aaihwai gɨzaawakavaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai kumɨnyɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Nabaai nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ yagaala pɨrɨ'na yɨhithaanganɨde'nanyɨra. Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨnyɨjɨla!
Jonɨmɨre bavɨtaazɨya yade' Sɨgunyavɨya' dɨngaka? Sa' a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyaburɨdaa'nya' dɨngaka?”
Sara ja'nawɨdɨna kya' sarevɨ kumɨ sara dɨnyɨna “Nabaai nemɨ wɨdaaza' ‘Sabwi Sɨgunyavɨyabulyɨra,’ sai nedathe ‘Jonɨmɨre yagaalyavɨna dɨragɨnna malɨmwagyaihi be'na yadɨvɨtaihɨlaka!’

Nabaai nemɨ wɨdaaza' ‘Sabwi yune a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyaburɨdaa'nyabulyɨra,’ sara wɨdaaza'na a'mwe yuyara sɨla nanelɨwakɨpɨdɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuyara ‘Jonɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei, pɨropetɨyalyɨra,’ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'nanyɨra.”
Sara dɨnyɨna yeva ja'nawɨdɨna “Nemɨ myawɨrivanɨgo. Jonɨmɨre bavɨtaazɨya' gawɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'nake' dɨngaka?”
Ja'nawɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Sasare savɨdaa'nyɨ ‘Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya gatha'daresɨyainyɨ yadɨnyainyakeva,’ mayɨhɨzɨ yɨhideinyɨ.”

A'mweraavɨ ke'ba'na yagaala datha' gaai wɨjɨwaakɨna “A'mwe pwai gɨraipɨwawɨnya pɨjɨ' yaburɨdakɨna yajazɨkɨ. Gɨraipɨwawɨnya sajɨ' ‘A'mwe pwara maremwaaibɨkajɨ,’ wɨjaavɨna yakei gamɨ sai anga menya pɨwɨ saamɨnyagaa' mwaalya'nei.

Gɨraipɨwawɨnyajɨkɨ tɨka munne yabwaryagaa' gamɨre wawɨnyavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraayawɨnna gamɨre wɨdaayade pwarɨ maryasaabɨna. ‘Wawɨnya maremwaaidɨvɨta sangɨdaa'nyɨ tɨka munne pɨvaa' wiabwaripɨkajɨ,’ maryasaabɨna. Sara yɨna kya' kɨrɨ' a'mwe wawɨnyavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara wɨdaayaderɨ mala tamɨna yeva kunerɨ ayɨna maragaibwakɨrasaabɨna.
Sara yɨna kye' nabaai wawɨnya wɨdaayade pwarɨ ayɨna ayawɨnna maryaasɨna. Maryaasɨna kya' nabaai sai kwarɨjɨ mala tamɨna yeva bɨralyabwi yɨna yeva maragaibwakɨrasaabɨna.
Nabaai ayɨna ayawɨnna pwarɨna maryaasɨna. Sarerɨ yɨnahu tamɨna yeva ga'bwarala naanga yɨnɨkerɨ mwasɨlaa marasɨ'nyɨna kye' sai kunei ayɨna bɨna.
Sara yadaapɨri wawɨnyavɨ gyakwai dɨna ‘Gatha'dara yɨdeinyaka? Nɨnnya nyɨbwaalɨvaangei nawɨ'nyɨna tewaanna wivanɨgei maryaasɨdera. Sahware yagaalyavɨ kadɨka yɨnɨga wi'na wɨ'nɨpɨ'dei dɨngaka?’

Maryaasɨna kya' kɨrɨ' wawɨnya dazavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta dazara gamɨre gawaalɨvaangei badaaworiyarɨ tɨnna wanganna yeva kumɨ sara dɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe dazai dɨvi ganɨmaangere yuya sa maaradelyɨra. Yarala, tamakaana! “Wawɨnya dazɨ' yune nemɨ saina lɨmwagaraana!” dawaajɨ tamakaana!’
Sara dɨnyɨna yeva gɨraipɨwawɨnya sajɨkɨ mwasɨlaa makwalyuna yeva yɨnahu tamakɨna. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨraipɨwawɨnya sajɨkɨ gyakwai sahwaraavɨ gatha'dara wiadelaka!

A'mwe wawɨnyavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨna bɨna yojɨ kayaaka wigalakadelyɨ. Sara yojɨ gɨraipɨwawɨnya sajɨ' a'mwe mudɨka pwaraavɨ wɨjaavadezɨkɨ.” Jizaazai sara wɨdɨna kya' sa' kadɨka wɨ'nevera wɨdɨna “Sasare sabwi myɨma'nanna! Arɨkawɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sahwai kumɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganaka wɨdɨna “Bukuyavɨ yagaala dazavɨ be kaavɨla' warɨkavaka?
‘Sɨla dazai anga madɨvɨsara yawɨbwarasɨ'nesai,
Angevɨ simɨjamaanga yuna naangei yɨma'nɨwakelyɨra.’

Sara dɨnɨke' a'mwe gazaizai sɨla dɨragɨnaanga dazarɨ walatannojɨyai, yuna kayaaka wɨsɨ'nadelyɨ. Nabaai sɨla dazai a'mwe pwai kwarɨ a'badaa'nyɨ walaramajai dazai yuna kayaaka mɨlɨki'nyɨna yojɨyai yune surɨnya yɨwagakɨna yadelyɨra.”

A'mwe Kɨwɨjarajɨ Gotɨyarɨne tamira'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ sahwara yawɨ'na “Yuna dazagaa' sahwarɨ galalɨmwagaana!” dɨnyɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. “Sahwai yagaala daza' nemɨnyɨne'na kwaasɨ dɨvanɨkeva.” Kɨrɨ' a'mwe yuyara mwaaidapiyavɨna lɨka naanga yɨna yeva kave mwaalɨna.

Sagaa' gamɨnyɨ baihana'na yadɨvɨ' a'mwe pwaraavɨ gamɨreburɨ kwaasɨ yawɨramaata'neraavɨ maryasaabɨna. A'mwe dazara kwaasɨ darebwi yadɨvɨ' “Nemɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe yɨda'maraangerera,’ yawɨrana!” yawɨresaraavɨ “Gamɨre yagaala kayaa'nanya' wɨ'nawaajɨ Ga'maanɨya naangeryaba kotɨyavɨ marakaana!” deva maryasaabɨna.

Sarera kwaasɨ dara yɨdaanganna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, nemɨ nayaa yawɨ'manɨgo ‘Gɨmɨre yagaalya' yɨda'maraangesɨra. Sara yadɨ gɨmɨ saigɨ a'mwemɨlɨkaavɨ a'mweraavɨ yagaala nebulya'na wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨnyɨra. A'mwe naangeraavɨna lɨka myadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Aawa. Yuyaraavɨ Gotɨyarebwi yune nebulyabwina wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨnyɨra.’
Sareigɨ gara yawɨ'manɨgɨna? Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya' berɨ' dɨnɨkavaka? Sizaarɨ taakɨzɨya wɨjavaadeina dɨngaka? Mujaayɨ yaadeina dɨngaka?”
Sara yɨdaanganna kye' sahwai kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdadaapiya dazabwina mena yawɨ'na. Sarevɨ sai wɨdɨna
“Taakɨzɨnɨgwia pɨrɨ' dɨnyɨjɨwaainyɨla! Nɨgwia dazavɨ pɨkaryasɨ pikɨzaayasɨ warɨke' aarɨnevaka?” Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna “Sizaarɨnesɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Yɨ Sizaarɨne sa, Sizaarɨ duzaayidengɨra. Nabaai Gotɨyare sa, yɨ Gotɨyarɨ duzaayidengɨra.”
Sara nayaa wɨdɨna kya' a'mweraayaba gamɨre yagaalyavɨna magalalɨmwagi ye'. Yagaala kumɨnyɨ wɨrɨvɨkɨ'daasɨya dazanna atɨka maru'na'na. Sara yeva yagaala majɨna.
A'mwe pwara Sazuzɨyaraavɨre yɨsavaakɨdaasara gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna. Sahwara Sazuzɨyara yuyara dara dadɨvɨsare “A'mwe baidɨvɨsara ayɨna madɨkaayɨ yɨpɨ'derera.”

Sarera bɨna yeva yɨdaanganya' wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, nemɨnyɨna Mozɨzai yagaala pɨrɨ' dara yɨdayaakesɨra ‘A'mwe pwai kwai kwala maarojɨyai dɨvidaa'nyɨ kaimɨraavɨmaayai balɨna yaja' nabaai gamɨjɨya gathaa'gahwaai pwai a'mwe savɨ kwala maarɨna yojɨ baryarɨne kaimɨraayai yɨmavɨdaakuna yana!’
Sara yɨda'nɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ avaalyadaraka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara mwaalɨna. Sareraavɨdaa'nyɨ pwai aaya sɨraangei a'mwevɨ kwala maarɨna. Sarei sai kaimɨraavɨmaayai balɨna.
Sara balɨna kya' ayawɨdaa'nyɨ gahwaalaanga pwai a'mwe dazavɨ kwala maarɨna, balɨna.
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ ayawɨ gahwaalaanga pwai avaaina sana yɨna. Sasare savɨ ata purɨdaa'nya pwaraala yuya sadaraka a'mwe savɨ kwala maareva yuyara kaimɨraavɨmaayara balɨna.
Yuyara sara balɨna kye' dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mwe sa' kɨrɨsɨ balɨna.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe baidɨvɨsara ayɨna dɨkaapɨjahaa' a'mwe daza' a'mwe aaihware' mwaaladevaka? Yɨdaanganya sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara a'mwe savɨ kwala maareva kumɨre a'mwe' mwaalake'nanyɨra.”
Jizaazai kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Yuna dahaasara kwala maa'dɨvɨ' kwala maa'nadɨvɨsare.
Kɨrɨ' dɨvi nawɨ'nya sagaa' kurɨnakera mwaaibɨnera, ayɨna dɨkaapɨnera yɨ dazara kwala mamaari yɨna, kwala mamaa'nyɨ yɨna yɨpɨ'derera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ayawɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna mabalyɨ yɨpɨ'dera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ejelɨyarabɨ' mwaaibɨ'derera. Gotɨyai baryaraavɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavaja'na gamɨre kaimɨraayara mwaaibɨ'derera.

Nabaai a'mwe bainɨkera ayɨna dɨkaapɨ'de' Mozɨzai kwalyɨ nejɨwaakadelyɨ. Yɨta maalɨkikɨ dɨtaalɨta yɨdadaa'nyɨya'najɨ kɨwɨnya dara dadelyɨ ‘Dahaa' Naangei Evɨraamɨmɨre Gotɨyalyɨ. Aazakɨmɨre Gotɨyalyɨ. Jaikopɨmɨre Gotɨyalyɨ.’ Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Sasare savɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai yune a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨna Gotɨyai mɨka. Aawa. Sai Gotɨya a'mwe gaala kurɨnakeraavɨnelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai yawɨ'na ‘A'mwera yawɨ'na “Bainɨkerera,” kɨrɨ' yuyara gaala kurɨnakerera.’ ”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Kɨwɨja pwara gamɨnyɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ gɨmɨ tewaanya dɨwaana.”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera ayɨna yɨdaanganya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨsɨ wɨja'ne' lɨka naanga yesa'nanyɨ.
Kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gatha'darevɨ dadɨvɨtavaka? ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai, Gotɨyai dahɨlakakei, Devitɨmɨre kaimɨraayalyɨreva.’
Yɨdaanganya sare' dare'nesɨ. Bukuya Saamɨyavɨ Devitɨ gamɨ sai dara wɨjaa'
‘Naangei nɨmɨre Naangerɨ dara wɨda'
“Gɨmɨ nɨmɨre aangasɨmagɨ dɨragɨnyaba mwaaida'gɨzɨ
Yɨkamaangeraavɨ gɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ marulawakɨdehaa'nanyɨ,” ’
Sara dɨnɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ Devitɨ gamɨ sai dɨna ‘Naangelyɨra.’ ‘Sai gamɨre kaimɨraayala,’ gatha'darevɨnaka?”
A'mwe yuyaraayaba, yuyara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaapi, sai gamɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna

“A'mwe Kɨwɨja daraavɨna yawɨrapɨjɨ nayaa javada'gainyideihɨlyɨra. Mala nayaa jɨwannyideihɨlyɨra. Dareraavɨnesɨ. Baazɨ'ma'nya saamɨnya baazɨ'ma'nadɨvɨ' kaanya yamarya'na tewaanna wɨvu'naderera. A'mwe a'mwera kwala yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidɨvɨsaba wabwiwayagaala ‘A'mwe naangeigɨ!’ wɨjavwina tewaanna wɨvu'naderera. Lotuangevɨ nawɨ'nyaba a'mweraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ walamwaalya'na tewaanna wima'naderera. Sara yadɨvɨ' tɨka munne naangengɨ namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nyarɨ yɨlamwaalya'na tewaanna wɨvu'naderera.

Sarera a'mwe yaanyɨwaakengɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdadɨvɨ' kunnya angengɨya kuka yuna maa'dɨvɨsarera. ‘A'mwera nemɨnyɨna “Tewaanyarera,” yawɨpɨka!’ deva Gotɨyarɨ wɨjavwina saamɨnyabwi mɨje'mwamwodɨvɨsarera. Sara yadɨvɨta sabwine'ne' wɨrɨvɨkɨrya'negaa' taanginya naange' pwaraavɨ wavɨlasa' kuna maapɨ'derera.”
Maranganna yaka baihana'dɨ'nyɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨta naangejɨyara Gotɨyarɨne nɨgwia wakadɨvɨta bukusarɨ nɨgwia sɨhumale wakɨ wakya yɨna.
Wakɨ wakya yɨna yadaapi tɨnna baihana'na yada a'mwe yaanyɨwaaka wɨgainaka pɨrɨvɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sahɨrɨ' bukusarɨ nɨgwia maalɨka pukaainanyɨkaai yɨrakakesɨ.
Tɨnna wanganna yaka wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe yaanyɨwaaka wɨgainada daza' nɨgwia yɨrakɨvanɨke' a'mwe pwaraavɨ wavɨla'mwakesɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuya dazara nɨgwia naanga kɨnɨnnakera, sarera Gotɨyarɨne wɨjaaya'ne pimagɨnya maalɨkemɨlɨ'na wɨjaavanɨgasarera. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe daza' yuna wɨgainadaa'nyɨ kɨrɨ' gamɨre nɨgwia yuya yɨrakɨna yɨvanɨke', gamɨnne tɨka wapaaya mubya'ne pɨnɨ mivainyɨ yɨwakesɨra.”
A'mwe pwara Gotɨyare Angevɨna dɨna “Anga dazavɨ sɨla tewaanya paidapaide yɨ'dejɨ mannɨkesɨra. Nabaai Gotɨyarɨne yuya nawɨ'nya, sɨhumale sajɨ aaraare yawakadɨvɨsasɨra.” Sara dɨna yadaapi sai wɨdɨna
“Dahaa' sarɨmɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgata daza pɨgaa' yɨma'najahaa' sɨla pwai sɨla pwarɨ a'badaa'nyɨ yɨlamɨwɨ'naradei mɨka! Yuya budawasɨ'na yɨpɨja kewɨnɨ bwalaraawadengɨra.”
Sahwarɨ yɨdaanganna wie' “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, dazaba gathɨhaasagaa' yɨma'nadevaka? Sarevɨ nemɨ yawɨranganaade ‘Sarevɨ sa' yɨma'nadehaa' aya kɨgaa'ne wɨjɨwaainya' berɨvaka?’ ”

Sara yɨdaanganna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Kwaasɨyabwina nayɨhɨthɨpɨka! Sarevɨ dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna a'mwe kwalaalyara badɨvɨ' nɨmɨnyɨne yaya' yɨhɨthadɨvɨ' wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sahwainyɨra.’ Nabaai sahwara yɨhɨthɨpɨ'de ‘Aya kɨgaa' mena yɨma'nɨwakegaakɨra.’ Sara yɨhɨthɨpɨjaraavɨ namɨdɨbɨthɨka!

Mala naanga bwa'nadɨvɨ' dadaapiya sangɨna sarɨmɨ kadɨka du'nyideihɨlyɨ. Sare sanna sarɨmɨ lɨka nyɨwaainɨpɨdɨka! Aawa. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sasare dazaza sɨnnawɨ mena yɨma'nojɨ kɨrɨ' yɨrɨka aayarɨ'negaa' yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨma'nade' mɨka!”
Sagaa' sahwai wɨdɨna “A'mwe anga naanga pimagɨnyarajɨ a'mwe anga naanga pimagɨnya pwarajɨ mala bwa'nɨpɨ'derera. Nabaai kingɨya pware savaasɨ kingɨya pware sarajɨ mala bwa'nɨpɨ'derera.

Kwaakevakɨ wɨnɨnya naangenna naangennanya lavirɨ'mwagakadevakɨra. Anga pimagɨdaa'nyɨ anga pimagɨnna a'mweraavɨ mɨjɨka naangejɨ nabalya naangejɨ yɨma'naderera. Sɨgunyavɨ dala nabinabinya naangenna naangennanya wɨjɨwaainya yɨma'naabazangɨ lɨka yɨrɨ'galamihya'ne danganyideihɨlyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' yuya daza mima'naabyadozɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ ata galayɨhɨlɨmwagapɨjɨ yuna kayaa'na yɨhipɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Lotuangengɨ kotɨya yɨhɨmaryadɨvɨ' kalavuzavɨ yɨhɨmwangɨmwaaihɨpɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨnne yaya savɨna ‘Marulawakaana!’ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kingɨyarajɨ Ga'maanɨya naangerajɨ saraayawɨnna yɨhɨmakabadɨvɨ' yɨhɨmarɨdaakupɨ'deihɨlyɨ.
Sasare savɨ nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa jalɨkurakɨna jide'nanyɨ.
Sare savɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ yagaala kumɨnyɨ ayɨna wɨja'ne sarɨmɨre sɨmunyarɨ myawɨramaremwaaibɨna!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨre maangikaavɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ nɨmɨre yagaalya yɨhwakadɨ sɨmunya tewaanya yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨra. Sare'na sarɨmɨre yuya yɨkamaanga kwara nɨmɨre yagaala yɨhɨzaavɨwɨja dazavɨ marayɨhɨrɨvɨkɨpɨ'dera mɨka!
Sɨrɨnɨmaangerajɨ sɨrɨdaasɨrɨgwaaravajɨ avaalyarajɨ sɨrya'mwerajɨ sara yɨkamaangeraayawɨnna yɨhɨmaaripɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Sara yadaapi sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwaraavɨ tamakɨpɨ'derera.
Nabaai a'mwe yuyara nɨmɨnne yaya savɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaalade'nanyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨya mɨjata aane pwai kwai samwi yala'daavadei mɨka. Arɨkewɨ.
Sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna daavapɨjɨyavɨ sarɨmɨre gaalyabwi dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨra.
Dɨvi Jeruzaalemɨna aamiyara aawɨlasara bapɨjɨ bahɨhɨpaidapi sarɨmɨ danganyidehaa' jawɨryide ‘Anga naangeba kayaaka yɨgalakya'negaa' mena nebawa mɨka!’

Dazagaa' a'mwe anga Juthɨya mwaaibɨzara mugunyangɨna lɨkaanya yɨlaawɨpɨka! Nabaai a'mwe Jeruzaalemɨ mwaaibɨzara yarai yagalya'mavapɨjɨ pɨwɨnnera wɨpɨka! Yɨ anga naangeba mwasɨlaa mwaaibɨzara sahɨba kusawɨ mulaawɨpɨna!
Dazahɨgaa' yɨ Gotɨyaregaa' kayaa'nanyabwina tɨvɨkɨta ya'negaa' yɨma'nadehaakɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala yuya Gotɨyare Bukuyavɨ yɨda'nɨke sa yuna nebwina yɨma'nadennanyɨra.

Yɨrɨka sasarerɨkaavɨ a'mwe kaimɨraavɨmunnakenna we'! Nabaai kaimɨraayangɨ aamunya ya'daapɨjɨyanna we'! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaaka dazavakɨ taanginya naange' yɨma'nadevakɨra. Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨke' a'mwe dazaraavɨ a'mwe dazamɨlɨkaavɨ waradesɨra.

Kwaari'masɨramɨnya' yuneba tamaasaderera. Yɨkamaangera kalavuza maa'dɨvɨ' ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ marɨmwaaihɨpɨ'dere. A'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨre sɨvɨlyajɨ Jeruzaalemɨ paihɨ'dɨvɨ' dathɨwagemwaaibɨ'derera. Sara yapɨjɨyaraavɨregaa' dɨvidaa'nyɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨya saraavɨregaa'na yɨnahu mi'na kyɨma'nojɨ Jeruzaalemɨ Juyara ayɨna nayaa maremwaaibɨ'desɨra.

Nyɨlyarɨjɨ lawerɨjɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyarɨkaavɨjɨ sɨgunya yunevɨ dala nabinabinya wɨjɨwaainya'ne yɨma'nadengɨ. Nabaai Kwaakevakɨ saalaalyavɨre aalɨmavajɨnaake' yɨ'munya'bɨ' wɨlapida gazamɨlɨsamɨlɨ' wɨlamujangɨ'daawori a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ yuna kayaaka wigaida lɨka naanga yɨpɨ'derera.

A'mwera Kwaakevakɨ yɨma'nade sanna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kumɨre kɨlaakejɨ'na lɨka naanga yɨpɨ'derera. Sare'na kumɨre tɨnnyara jɨhɨmihɨta kɨrɨbɨbɨnya wɨbwaa'naderera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨgunyavɨya dɨragɨnya dɨ'nake sa yonyɨ yonyɨ yɨma'nade'nanyɨra.
Daza' kima'nojɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ yɨraaya pɨjɨkɨ waidavadaa'muri dɨragɨnya naangesɨ byaanna naangesɨyainyɨ nyangabɨ'deinyɨ.

Dɨvi yuya daza gaai yɨma'nadaawori ‘Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ ayɨna maarya'negaa' aya kɨba menanyɨra,’ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sara yɨma'nya'ne'na nayaa dɨragɨnna daavapɨjɨ sarɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyɨ' kekina dɨhaihɨta jideihɨlyɨ.”
Sahwai ke'ba'na yagaala pɨrɨ' kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨta pihɨyɨkɨjɨ yɨta pukaavɨjɨ tɨnna wangadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.
Yɨkwarake' yɨnarɨwaala kya'nojɨ tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ sarɨmɨ saihi jawɨryide ‘Nyɨlyai gaai damaarojɨ tewaanyagaa' aya kɨgaa' yɨma'nade' daaka!’
Sasare sahɨbaaibɨsa' sasare sahɨnɨ kima'nojɨ tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ jawɨryide ‘Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide' mena aya kɨba daaka!’
Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarevɨ a'mwe sagaasara mabalyɨ kyapɨri yuya daza mena yɨma'nadehaa'nanyɨ. Arɨkewɨ.
Sɨgunyasɨ Kwaakesɨ mena yɨwɨna yojɨ kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yagaalya' yɨwode' mɨka. Arɨkewɨ.

Sarɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Biyaaya nyawaaihasa'na mɨnyagɨnyɨ' kɨrɨbɨbɨnya nyɨhima'nadɨka! Biyaaya yuyagaa' yaasɨwa'na nadɨvɨ' yɨmaka nyuibɨthɨka! Kɨlaakejɨkɨne sanna sɨmudaadaanya nyawɨ'mwaainɨpɨdɨka! Sasare sabwi sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kuna dathɨvaina yɨhyojɨ yɨ sagaa' naanya' yaawiarɨ lɨvavu'dɨhɨ'devaaibɨ' Naangere yɨrɨkerɨ' yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨhɨbɨramaaradeihɨlyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨrɨka dazarɨ' a'mwe Kwaakevakɨ yuneba mwaaihata yuyaraavɨ yɨma'naderɨkɨ.

Gazagaasagaa' sarɨmɨ nayaa dɨvaihanaryɨla! Sara yadɨvɨ' ‘Nemɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya nejaavana!’ dapi Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna jɨthaanganyɨla! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ yɨma'naabathe yuya dazangɨ davɨlayideihɨlyɨra. Sara yapi A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyaba dɨthaayide'nanyɨra.”
Yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakakelyɨ. Sawɨsavɨ Mugunya Wolivɨ wo'nɨkevɨna se yɨla'daawadelyɨ.
Sarevɨ yuya a'mwera yuna mwanyavɨna dɨkakwalyodɨvɨ' Gotɨyare Angevna gamɨre yagaalyangɨ kadɨka bu'nya'nera badɨvɨsarera.
Gɨrɨkula lɨwɨnya mavamidakya'ne munnegaa' nawɨ'nyagaa' aya kɨgaa' mena yɨma'nyɨna. Yɨ “Pari'ma'munneva! Gotɨyai Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ yɨvainyaakegaaka!” dadɨvɨsagaakɨ.
Aya kɨgaa' mena yɨma'nyɨna kya' Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ sahwara aanga'mweraavɨna lɨka yɨna yeve'na kuna dɨnyɨna “Nemɨ sahwarɨ kave gatha'dara yawaajɨ tamakaadelaka?”
Sagaa' Kayaa'nanyai Saataanɨ Juthaazare sɨmunyavɨ wɨlamwaaina. Sai Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyala wo'nɨkei, sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨdaa'nyai.
Sarei wawokegaa' Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨtara pɨrizɨya naangerajɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta naangerajɨ yagaalya' jamungajɨna. Sahwarɨ kumɨnyɨneba wɨmaarya'ne tusarɨ'na bɨrya'nei.
Sara mena jamungajevera yɨlaaya yeva Juthaazarɨ nɨgwia wɨjaaya'ne'na jamungajakɨna.
Sarevɨ kumɨre yagaalyavɨna Juthaazai “Ya!” wɨdɨna yakei sahwarɨ kumɨnyɨneba wɨmaarya'ne tusarɨ'na bɨrɨna bɨrɨna. Sarei yune gave pɨgaa'nei, a'mwera a'mwe gamɨjɨ mye'mwannamwaalyadapiyagaa'nei.
Gɨrɨkula lɨwɨnya mavamidakya'ne yɨrɨke' yɨma'nyɨna. Yɨrɨka dazarɨkɨ Pari'ma'munne sipɨzipɨya dɨwɨnyai tadɨvɨsagaakɨ.
Sarevɨ sai Pitarɨjɨ Jonɨmɨjɨ saraarɨ maryaasa'neraarɨ wɨdɨna “Kɨrɨmɨ wawokɨlyɨ nemɨnne tɨ'munne tɨka naade jovɨrawakaawila!”
Wɨdɨna kya' saraai wɨdɨna “Naarɨmɨ gawɨ yovɨrawakade'na nehɨthɨwaana?”

Wɨdɨna kyagi sai wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi! Anga naangebanna wɨlaawakɨlyɨ a'mwe pwai kwadɨka naangevɨ aalya' makwojɨyai tutaanyavɨ kɨrɨmɨnyɨ yɨhurata'najai. Yɨ kɨrɨmɨ sarɨ mɨjamakuna yakɨlyɨ anga gamɨ wɨlaja savɨna kwaraaihɨlyɨ wɨlɨna jidesɨra.
Sara yakɨlyɨ anga dazavɨ gyakwalaangerɨ nayaa dara duzideraaihɨlyɨ ‘Nejɨwaakadei gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthɨwakeigɨnyɨ “Nɨmɨrerajɨ tɨ'munne naade' nɨmɨnne ku'dɨke' gava warɨka?” ’
Sara kudakɨlyɨ sai ku'dɨka yarinɨka naange' munyawɨ, wapeyɨ'bɨnyajɨ namwaalyɨsajɨ kɨnɨnnakevɨ yɨhibwarɨdaakwadelyɨ. Ku'dɨka dazahɨrɨvɨ tɨ'munne jovɨrawakyideraaihɨlyɨ.”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' maryaasakeraai kaanna wɨna yagɨla gamɨ wɨdaka kɨbaaina sana yɨna yagi. Sara yagɨla Pari'ma'munne yovɨrawakɨna.
Tɨka nya'negaa' mena kima'na' yɨ'bɨnyavɨ sai walamwaaina yadaa'nyɨ wɨdaasadera apozelɨyara walaye'mwannemwaaina.
Sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨjɨ Pari'ma'munne da' ye'mwannanya'na tewaanya dɨragɨnna nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Sara ya'mujɨyainyɨ dɨvi daanga maarɨdeinyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨjɨ tɨ'munne ayawɨdaa'nyɨ sasara yɨhye'mwannanɨdeinyɨ mɨka. Arɨkawɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalade sa yune nebwina yɨma'najahaa'na yɨ sagaa' ayɨna nɨdeinyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka kaapɨvananyai maarɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ suya wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ datha' maarapɨjɨ yanga dɨmunɨgulaawila!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Dahaasɨ dɨvi kɨgaasɨ waainɨwɨlyabaarɨdaa'nya yɨsiaalya manyɨ yɨdeinyɨra. Arɨkawɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalade sa' yune' nebwina yɨma'najahaa'na yɨ sagaa' ayɨna nɨdeinyɨ.”

Wɨdɨna yaka gɨrɨkulya' maarɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ suya wɨdɨna yaka gunyɨna yaka wɨjaavɨna yakegaa' wɨdɨna “Daza' nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨra. Sarɨmɨnyɨne'na wɨjaavɨnɨdezɨkɨra. Sarɨmɨ yuyagaa' sasara yadɨvɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna ayɨna jawɨryidevwinesɨ.”

Wɨdɨna kya' mena nevegaa' kaapɨvananya sahwarɨ avaaina sana yɨna, “Kaapɨvananya dathai nɨmɨre tawevɨya yagaala wɨlɨmwagarɨke mudɨkesɨra. Sarɨmɨnyɨneba nɨmɨre tawe' yɨhɨthɨngikɨdesɨra. Nyɨramakɨpɨ'desɨra.
Kɨrɨ' yɨthaanyi, a'mwe nɨmɨnyɨ yɨkamaangeraavɨna nyɨbwarɨdaakwia'nei yɨ'bɨnya dava davɨ nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannamwaaihola dalaakana!
A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayainyɨ sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai tuta yawɨbwarakakevɨ mɨdɨmanɨge. Kɨrɨ' we'! Yɨkamaangeraavɨna nyɨbwarɨdaakwia'ne dazarɨ kayaaka gara yɨgainadei dɨngaka! We'!”
Sai sara daka yadɨ'nyɨ kumɨ sara yɨdaanganyɨ yɨdaanganya binɨgulɨna “Sasare sabwi aaihwai yade'nevaka?”
Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' sahwara gavamarasɨ'nyɨyagaala dɨnyɨna, “A'mweraayaba nemɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨre a'mwe naangei aaihwalaka? Nɨmɨ dɨngaka!”

Sara wɨdesavɨna sai wɨdɨna “Ajɨmya yuyangɨya kingɨyara kwaakewɨnna a'mweraavɨ marulawakadɨvɨsara. A'mweraavɨ maremwaalyabwine dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakera yawɨ'na ‘A'mwera nemɨnyɨna yawɨpɨka! “Sahwara yanga neyadɨvɨsarera.” ’
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ sasare sabwi nyɨpɨdɨka! Aawa. A'mwe sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ pwai naanga yɨma'najai sai aaya dɨviyai yɨma'nana! Nabaai sarɨmɨre maremwaalyai sara yɨhɨthaayadei mwaalana!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe naangei aaihwalaka? A'mwei yɨ'bɨnyavɨ namwaalyɨsarɨ mwaaidei dɨngaka? A'mwei wapaaya bulawɨjaaya'ne wɨdaayadei dɨngaka? Namwaalyɨsarɨ yɨlamwaalaka tɨka munne nada a'mwe dazai sahwalyɨra. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwanga ya'neinyɨ yɨhɨthaayadeibɨsainyɨra.”
“Nɨmɨnyɨ yɨjɨwaala'ne yɨma'nakegaa' sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ kuna nye'mwannamwaaimanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Nyagalya'makuvanɨgataihi mɨka.
Sarevɨ nɨmɨnyɨna Nɨmaamaangei maremwaalyaburɨ nyɨjaavakabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨna maremwaalyabwi yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨra.

Nɨmɨre maremwaaidɨnyainyɨre yɨ'bɨnyavɨ tɨ'munne nye'mwannanadɨvɨ' aalya nye'mwannanya'neihi yɨhɨzaavɨdeihɨlyɨ. Nabaai kingɨyaraavɨre namwaalyɨsaraavɨ mwaalapɨri a'mwe Yɨzɨrelɨya yɨta savakaavɨya sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nya pwaraalyaraavɨne yawɨbwa'dɨvɨsaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.”
“Saaimonɨ! Saaimonɨ! Yɨthaa! Kayaa'nanyai Saataanɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ maarya'na mena wɨdɨwakeihɨlyɨ. Witɨya asasɨ gɨrɨdavalɨlɨvaidevaaibɨ' yɨjɨwaalya'neihɨrɨ walayɨhɨvapalakadeihɨlyɨra.

Sare kɨrɨ' Gotɨyarɨ gɨmɨnyɨna dara yɨdaangamweigɨnyɨ ‘Saaimonɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwagasabwi mimaananna!’ Sareigɨ nɨmɨnyɨna ayɨna gɨnyɨma'naawa'gɨzɨ ba'gɨzɨyaigɨ gɨmɨjɨya ja'mweraavɨ jɨvaimwadeigɨnyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨjɨ kalavuzangevɨna ye'mwannɨgwɨya'najɨ gɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannabalya'najɨ mena yawɨma'nɨweinyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Pitaigɨ gɨthɨvanɨge. Sawɨta datharɨkɨ yɨrɨkunyagaa' kukuraayai jaka majadoriyagaa'na dahasaai dahaa' ‘Jizaazarɨ mwanganyainyɨra,’ duthatheigɨnyɨra.”

Sai yuya sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' nɨmɨ yɨhɨmaryaaseihi, nɨgwɨpaawɨzɨyajɨ gɨlyajɨ kwaari'masɨvɨlyajɨ mamakwɨyɨ yesaihɨlyɨ. Dazahɨgaa' sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yɨhɨmudaasakeihi daaka?” Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna “Aawa. Nemɨnyɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mɨka!”

Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Kɨrɨ' dahaa' a'mwei nɨgwɨpaawɨzɨya kɨnɨnnakei sai sa' nayaa maarana! Gɨlya kɨrɨsɨ avaala sara jɨla! A'mwei kwaari'masɨramɨnya maayai gannya yɨvɨsa' nɨgwianna mubɨna yojɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnya pɨrɨ' mubathelyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ yɨda'nɨke' yunebanna nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨma'nana! Dare' dɨnɨ' ‘A'mwe kɨwɨnyangɨ galazekɨvaidɨvɨsarajɨ ye'mwagakɨpɨ'delyɨra.’ Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuna dazahɨrɨsa'na nɨmɨnyɨna yɨda'nɨke daza', sa' yunebanna dahaa' nebwina nyɨ'mwannade'nanyɨ. (A'mwera nɨmɨnyɨna kayaa'na yawɨ'manɨgatabaaibɨ' nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨpɨ'devɨna yɨhɨthɨwa.)”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, yɨthaa, kwaari'masɨramɨnya pɨrɨwaai dathawaalaakana!” Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sa' yɨnɨga wi'nanyɨra!”
Anga naangebadaa'nyai walyawoka yuyagaa' ayabanna widaawadeva Mugunya Wolivɨnei kaanna wɨna yadaa'nyɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsara sahwarɨ mɨdɨnna.
Sara yadaapɨjɨ sɨmagɨ kɨba mena yɨ'mavaka sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Naangerɨ nayaa duzɨla! Yɨjɨwaala'ne kayaa'nanyabwi sarɨmɨnyɨ nyɨhɨbɨramaaradɨka!”
Wɨdɨna yaka saraavɨ yagalya'ma'na yaka menya sangirɨ' a'mwei sɨla lɨwakadaa'nyɨ wa'daawadevanna wɨna. Mi'na wɨna yaka kwadaai walagina yaka wɨdɨna
“Nɨmwai, gɨmɨ tewaanna nyawɨra'gɨzɨ kaapɨvananya dai dɨmarasɨ'devaaibɨ' balya'ne da' dɨmarasɨka! Sare' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨrebwi mamɨdɨdɨnna! Aawa. Yune gɨnnyabwina dɨmɨdɨna!”
Wɨdɨna kya' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya ejelɨya pwai gamɨnyawɨnna walaabɨna yaka dɨragɨnna yɨvaimwanna.

Sagaa' Jizaazai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ taanga naanga widaa'nyɨ yɨbwakɨda Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna naanga kuna wɨdɨna. Sara wɨdadaa'nyɨyavɨ gamɨre dɨkwagɨlya' tawe'bɨ' yɨma'nyɨna yaka kwaakevakɨna bwalaravaawɨna.
Bwalaravaawɨna kya' mena wɨdakegaa' daavɨna yaka gamɨreraayawɨnnei kaanna wɨna. Sarei gamɨreraavɨ tɨnna dara wanganake' “Se dakava!” Sɨmunyai taanga wina'daa'nyɨ, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wa'dapi.
Sara daka wɨdɨna “Se da' be'ne' wakava! Dɨkaavapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ duzɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨjɨwaala'ne kayaa'nanyabwi bozɨ nayɨhɨlɨmwagathɨka!”

Sahwai yagaalya' kuna dadaa'nyɨyagaa', yɨthaa, kwalaalyara yɨkabɨna. A'mwe dazai Juthaazai wo'nɨkei, sai sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨdaa'nyai, yɨ sahwai wibwarɨdaakuna. Sarei maangwɨdaayɨlaaya ya'nei Jizaazaryaba aya kɨbanna wɨlaabɨna.
Wɨlaabɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Juthaazaigɨ, A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨ maangwɨdaayɨlaaya yɨwaanya' yɨ daza' nɨmɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨ nyɨmarɨmwangɨde'na daaka!”
Wɨdɨna kya' gamɨnyaba daavesara yɨma'nyavɨna yawɨranganna yeva dɨna “Naangeigɨ, dahwaraavɨ nemɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnyasɨ tamakaade'na gɨmɨ gara yawɨ'mwaana?”
Dɨna kye' gamɨre pwai Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangere wɨdaayaderɨ mala yarai tamɨna yaka kadɨka aangasɨmagɨnyɨ' yuna daku'na kya' bwalaraawɨna.
Sare savɨ Jizaazai tɨnna wanganaka ja'nawɨdɨna “Sabwi mipɨna!” Sara wɨdaka a'mwe dazare kadɨkikyaba ata dathɨwanna yɨna yaka a'mwerɨ ayɨna tewaanya pada'galawɨmwaaihɨna.

Tewaanya pada'galawɨmwaaihɨna yaka Jizaazai Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ sara gamɨnyɨ galalɨmwange'na yɨkabesaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kuka yɨpalasɨ'naderɨ yɨravɨmaarya'neihi badɨvɨtabaaibɨ' kwaari'masɨramɨnya darɨkajɨ kɨlɨka dajɨ makabɨwaata daihi bɨwaasaihi daaka!

Yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannemwaaidɨnyainyɨra. Sare sagaa' galanyɨlɨmwadɨvɨtainyɨ mɨka. Aawa. Dahaa' sagaa' yuna sarɨmɨregaakɨra. Dahaa' jɨhɨnyavɨre dɨragɨnya' wavɨlavadehaakɨra.”
Sarɨ galalɨmwanna yeva makuna. Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangere angevɨna makwina. Sagaa' Pitai kwalyɨ mɨdɨnna yake kwai kɨrɨ' menyaba sangirɨ' mwaalɨna.
Angwɨrɨka byarihwinaakevɨ dɨke' yɨra'na yeva mwaihulɨna. Sara mwaaidapiyaba dɨvidaa'nyɨ Pitai walaja'nagaimwaaina.
Sarei dɨkevɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ wɨdaayade a'mwe pɨrɨ' tɨnna wanganna. Wɨdaayade daza' baihana'na yaka wɨdɨna “A'mwe dazai kwalyɨ sahwalyɨ ye'mwannemwaaidakɨlyɨ wangamwa'delyɨra.”
Dɨna kya' kɨrɨ' sai “Aawa,” wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ nɨmɨ mwanganyainyɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' dɨvi maalɨkegaa' a'mwe pwai tɨnna wanganakei wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ kwaigɨ sahwarajɨyaigɨnyɨra.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pitai wɨdɨna “A'mwaagaigɨ, nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ mɨka!”
Dɨvi kɨbawa nyihaanya pɨrɨ' mena kabwawa' a'mwe pwai dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Naanga nebulyasɨ. A'mwe dazai kwalyɨ ye'mwannemwaaidelyɨra. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sai a'mwe Galɨlidaasalyɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Pitai wɨdɨna “A'mwaagaigɨ, yagaala dɨwaanya savɨ nɨmɨ myawɨryainyɨra.” Sai kuna dadaa'nyɨ jaahwasa'bɨ' kukuraayai jaka dɨna.

Jaka dɨna yakegaa' Naangei gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka Pitarɨ maranganna. Pitarɨ maranganna kya' sai ayɨna yawɨ'na yagaala Naangei wɨdaka sa'na. Sagaa' dara wɨdake'na “Sawɨta dazarɨkɨ kukuraayai jaka majadori gɨmɨ dahasaai dahaa' dɨthatheigɨnyɨ ‘Jizaazarɨ mwanganyainyɨra.’ ”
Sara yawɨ'na yaka mwasɨlaanna walyuna yaka kɨnna walyadɨna.
A'mwera gamɨnyɨ galalɨmwanna yeva bɨraiyagaala wɨdadɨvɨ' mala tamɨna
yadɨvɨ' kwaabɨyɨvɨsasɨ gamɨre tɨnnyarɨ kawaaka yɨrakɨna yeva yɨdaanganna “Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨdadɨnyabaaibɨ' dɨnedana! Malya' aai gɨramanɨka!”
Yagaala kayaa'nanya kwalaalya pɨnɨjɨ bɨraizɨka wɨdɨna ye'.

Nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'daasɨyagaa' a'mweraavɨre a'mwe naangera savaakɨyara, Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naanga kwarajɨ Kɨwɨja kwarajɨ sara yɨ'bwa'nemwaaina. Sarera gamɨnyɨ kumɨre kaajolɨyaraayawɨnna makuna yɨna yeva wɨdɨna
“Gɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨ mwaaidɨzaigɨ dɨnedana! Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨ daaka?” Dɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Nabaai nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨwɨja' sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna myawɨralɨmwagi jideihɨlyɨ.
Nabaai yagaala pɨnɨnna yɨhithaangamuja', nɨmɨre yɨhɨthɨwɨjavɨ dɨnyɨja'najideihi mɨka! Arɨkewɨ.
Kɨrɨ' dahaasɨ yuya dɨvi kɨgaasɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai Gotɨyare aangasɨmagɨ dɨragɨnya naangesɨyaba walamwaaladelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' yuyara wɨdɨna “Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuna gɨmɨ saigɨ Gotɨyare Kaimɨraayaigɨ daaka?” Dɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ saihi dɨwaasa'. Yɨ nɨmɨ sahwainyɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara dɨnyɨna “Yagaalya' jalɨkurakyaraavɨre' kadɨke' ayɨna be'na wɨ'naajɨwona! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gamɨre maangikɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala daza' kadɨwa' nemɨ mena wɨ'nɨwona.”
A'mwe yuyara daavɨna yeva gamɨnyɨ maarɨna yeva Paailatɨmyabanna makuna.

Sara yeva kotɨya' gaai marina yadɨvɨ' wɨdɨna “Nemɨ a'mwe dazarɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgolyɨ. Nemɨjɨya yɨta savaakɨyaraavɨrebwi yɨpalasɨ'da gamɨrebwi yɨvanɨkelyɨra. Sizaarɨ taakɨzɨya wɨjaaya'najɨ kɨmaakɨya nedakɨvanɨkelyɨra. Nedadelyɨ ‘Nɨmɨ sainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨra. Kingɨyainyɨra.’ ”
Wɨdɨna kye' Paailatɨ sahwarɨ yɨdaanganna “Gɨmɨ Juyaraavɨre kingɨyaigɨ daaka?” Wɨdɨna kya' Paailatɨmɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ saigɨ sara dɨwaanya' sahɨrɨsɨra.”
Wɨdɨna kya' Paailatɨ Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ kwala bwa'naanyavɨyarajɨ saraavɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe datharɨ gamɨre yɨwetawakya aane pɨmɨlɨ' mabɨramaariwana!”

Sarevɨ kɨrɨ' sahwara naanga dɨragɨnna kuna wɨdɨna “Sahwai a'mweraavɨ a'mwemɨlɨkaavɨ yagaala wɨjɨwaakada Juthɨya sɨmagɨ yunebanna lɨka yɨwainɨgwimanaawɨgasalyɨra. Galɨli sabadaa'nyɨ yamaa'dei sasare sabwi mɨjɨmabada yune davannanyɨra.”
Paailatɨ kadɨka sara wɨ'naka sahwaraavɨ yɨdaanganna “A'mwe dazai Galɨli mwaalyai daaka?”

Yɨdaanganna yaka kumɨre ja'nawɨja' “A'mwe kwaaka Erotɨyai maremwaaide sɨmagɨdaa'nyalyɨra,” kadɨka wɨ'naka yawɨbwarya'nei Erotɨyaryawɨnnerɨ maryaasɨna. Dazagaa' kɨgaa' Erotɨyai kwalyɨ Jeruzaalemɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ.

Maryaasɨna kya' Erotɨyai Jizaazarɨ tɨnna wanganaka yɨlaaya naanga yɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwarɨna yagaalya'na kadɨka wɨ'nadei, saamɨnyagaa' kuna “Sahwarɨ yɨwarɨma!” yawɨ'dei. Nabaai “Sahwai atɨka maru'nata pɨrɨ' wɨjɨwaainya' kyojɨ wanganɨma!” yawɨ'dei.
Sare sagaa' Erotɨyai kwalaalyanna bithangamuna. Sare' Jizaazai gamɨre yagaalyangɨna yagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' muja'na muraayɨ.
Muja'na muraayɨ kya' Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ sara gamɨnyaba bahaidaa'na yɨna yeva kotɨya' dɨragɨnna marina.

Sara yadaapi Erotɨyai gamɨre aawɨlasarajɨ yuna kayaa'na jɨwɨ'nyɨna yada bɨraiyagaalyajɨ wɨdɨna. Mi'na wɨdɨna yeva bɨralya'na kingɨyare yɨvɨta nawɨ'nyaanga pɨrɨ' maarɨna yeva marabwakaabɨna yeva Paailatɨmyawɨnna ayɨna maryaasɨna ya'.
Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Erotɨyai Paailatɨjɨ yɨkamaanga yɨma'nagɨlyaraalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' saraai nya'mwana dɨnagɨla nawɨ'nyɨna mwaalɨna.
Paailatɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangeraavɨjɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨjɨ a'mweraavɨjɨ jaka wɨdɨna kya' sarera bi'bwa'nyɨna.

Bi'bwa'nyɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “A'mwe nɨmɨnyawɨnna nyɨmakabɨwaata dazarɨna sarɨmɨ dɨwaa' ‘A'mweraavɨrebwina nemaruwɨnakadelyɨra.’ Sare'na nabaai sarɨmɨre tɨnnyarɨ yɨdasaba yagaala dazahɨrɨ'ne'na yɨdangadaari. Yɨthaanyi! Sarɨmɨ kotɨya marivanɨgata daza'ne' nɨmɨ gamɨre yɨwetawakya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mabɨramaariwelyɨra.
Aawa. Erotɨyai kwalyɨ avaala sana yɨwakelyɨra. Sara yaka nemɨnyawɨnna nemaryasɨwaabɨkelyɨra. Yɨthaanyi! A'mwe dazai nemɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maratamarɨmwaade' yɨwetawakya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yadei mɨka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wɨlyabaalyɨna lɨ'bwara'mujɨ wɨdaasɨdelyɨ.”
Kumɨrebwi sasarebwi yadɨvɨsara “Yuya Pari'ma'munne tewaanya sarɨkaavɨ Paailatɨ a'mwe kalavuzarɨ kumɨnyɨna wɨmaaryadelyɨ.”
Sagaa' kwala bwa'naanyasɨ jaka naanga'na dara dɨna “Yɨsavɨri dɨmaratamarɨmwia! Sara ya'gɨzɨ Baravaazai nemɨnyawɨnna dɨnejaama!”
Baravaazai sai anga naangeba ga'maanɨyaraavɨ mala bwa'delyɨ. Sara bwa'da a'mwerɨ tamakadaa'nyɨ kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihɨnɨkelyɨ.
Jaka sara kade' Paailatɨ “Jizaazarɨ wɨdaasɨde'nana,” yawɨraka ayɨna jaka wɨdɨna.
Sara yadaa'nyɨ jaka wɨdɨna ye' “Maara'gɨzɨ yɨsavɨri jeramo! Yɨsavɨri jeramo!”

Jaka sara wɨdɨna kye' dahasaai dahaa' wɨdɨna “Be'nanaka! A'mwe dazai be kayaa'nanyabwi yɨwakalaka! Nemɨ gamɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maratamarɨmwaade kayaa'nanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨvɨ mabɨramaariwelyɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wɨlyabaalyɨ lɨ'bwara'mujɨ maryaasɨma!”
Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' jaka dɨragɨnna naanga'na dɨna yɨna yeva jaka naanga dɨragɨnna kuna dɨna, “Sahwarɨ maara'gɨzɨ yɨsavɨri jeramo!” Kumɨre jaka naanga bathɨwaweta sa Paailatɨmɨre yagaalya' dathɨwanna.
Sara kye' Paailatɨ kumɨre yagaalyangɨ mɨdɨnna.

A'mwera jaka wɨdɨna a'mwe kalavuzavɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨya sarɨ ayɨna maarya'na ga'maanɨyaraavɨ mala bwa'da a'mwerɨ tamakakerɨ sagaa' Paailatɨ kumɨre asɨrɨna wɨmaarina. Kumɨreburɨ mɨdɨnna yaka Jizaazarɨ aawɨlasaraavɨre asɨrɨna wɨmarɨmwaaihɨna.

Gamɨnyɨ makwodɨvɨ' a'mwe pwarɨ Saaimonɨ Saairini mwaalyarɨ galalɨmwanna. Sai anga naangeba wɨlaawia'nei tutaanyavɨ kaanya yɨdɨ'nyɨ. Galalɨmwanna yeva yɨta yovihɨrarannɨke' gamɨre egwevɨ yɨlamarakɨna kye' yɨkwavamakwoda Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨnna.
Mɨdɨnna yadaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya naanga, a'mwerajɨ a'mwejɨ gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨnna. A'mwe sa kale wiadaa'nyɨ kɨnna dadɨvɨ' kaladaasajɨ damɨdɨnna.
Damɨdɨnna yadaapi Jizaazai gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “A'mwe Jeruzaalemɨdaasangihi, nɨmɨnyɨna kɨnna madɨpɨnera! Aawa. Kɨnnya' yune sarɨmɨnyɨne'najɨ sarɨnnya kaimɨraayangɨnajɨ dɨzide'nera.
Yɨthaanyi! Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Dɨvi pɨgaa' yɨma'najahaa' dɨpɨ'de ‘A'mwe kaimɨraayanna yagɨnyajɨ bwaraminya kwazɨka kɨnɨnnakejɨ aamunya myaayadɨvɨsajɨ kumɨ sa yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winadengɨra.’

Dazagaa' a'mwera mugunyangɨ dangabɨ'dengɨ ‘Mugunya ke'nɨngihi bwalanelamwaalyɨla!’ Mugunya maalɨkerɨkaavɨ wɨdɨpɨ'de ‘Mugunya ketɨrɨkaavihi bwalanelamwalabaihɨrakyɨla!’ Lɨka naanga yadɨvɨ' sara dɨpɨ'dere.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Yɨta gaalyarɨ dɨke' navɨridevaaibɨ' tewaanyainyɨ kɨrɨ' nyɨramakɨpɨja' yɨ yɨta yawakerɨ dɨke' yarai nasɨ'devaaibɨ' kayaa'nanyaihɨrɨ gatha'dare' yɨhima'nadeihɨlaka!”
A'mwe pwaraai kwaraarɨjɨ makuna. A'mwe saraai kayaa'nanyabwi yadisaraarɨ. Saraai gamɨnyɨjɨ yeramya'neraarɨ.

Kaanya makuna yadɨvɨ' pɨba Gɨlemɨnyagɨnyaba wo'nɨkebanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yevegaa' dazahɨba gamɨnyɨ yɨsavɨri wɨrame'. Nabaai a'mwe kayaa'nanya saraai kwaraarɨjɨ yerame'. Pwarɨ gamɨnyɨ aangasɨmagɨ tamɨna, pwarɨ kwanaamimagɨ tamɨna.

Yɨsavɨri kurame' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmwaigɨ, kumɨre kayaa'na yɨwaata davurɨ tɨvɨkɨta dɨmarasɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨvanɨgata dahɨbwina myawɨryarera.” Wɨdɨna kya' aawɨlasara gamɨre kwaabɨyɨvɨta saza maramunyɨna yeva saatuyara gɨrɨda'gɨrɨdata yeva pwai wavɨlavakei pɨvaa' maarɨna. Sana sana yeva yuyara yunebanna maarɨna.

Sare savɨ a'mwera bathakuna yeva baihana'na. Sahwara baihana'na yadaapi a'mwe naangera gamɨnyɨ bɨraiyagaala wɨdanganna “Sai a'mwe pwaraavɨ padaihasamaa'na mena yakelyɨ. Gotɨyare Kɨraazɨtɨyai, Gotɨyai dahɨlakadei mwaalaja' yɨ sarei gamɨ sai padaihasamaa'nana! Nabaladɨka!”
Bɨraiyagaala wɨdanganna yadaapi aawɨlata kwarajɨ bɨraiyagaala wɨdɨna yadɨvɨ' gamɨnyabanna wɨlaabɨna yɨna yeva “Waainɨya yɨrɨke' wɨjavaana!” deva yaamɨjɨ makina yeva
dara dɨna “Juyaraavɨre kingɨyaigɨ mwaaidɨzaigɨ gɨmɨ saigɨ dɨvadaihasamaa'na!”
Pɨkarya pɨrɨ' gamɨnyɨ munyaba yɨda'nɨke' dɨna “A'mwe dazai Juyaraavɨre Kingɨyalyɨra.”
A'mwe kayaa'nanya tamarɨmweta saraarɨdaa'nya pwai gamɨnyɨ bɨrala wɨdɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨ daaka! Gɨmɨ saigɨ dɨvadaihasamaa'nana! Nabaai naarɨmɨ kwainaarɨjɨ dɨnehɨvadaihasamaaka!”
Bɨrala sara wɨdɨna kya' kayaa'nanya pwai yagaala daza' kadɨka wɨ'naka maanga wɨdɨna “Sahwalyɨ daange' avaaina ma'mwaanya'na Gotɨyarɨna lɨka mijɨwaana!

Naarɨmɨnyɨ nehɨramwaasa', sa' tewaanya yɨdasabwi yɨwaasasɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Naarɨmɨ taanga maa'mwola davwi naarɨmɨ yadata yuna yɨdata sabwina maa'mwoi. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe dava dai yɨwetawakya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' myadelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Jizaazaigɨ, dɨvi dɨragɨnna maremwaala'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa dɨnyawɨ'deigɨnyɨ.”
Dɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na gɨthɨwa ‘Yuna dahaasagaa' nɨmɨjɨ anga Tewaanyaba dɨmwaaide'nanyɨ Parathaazɨ.’ ”
Nyɨlyagaa' sɨrɨgwajahaa'bɨsagaa' yɨma'nyɨna kya' nyɨlyai balɨna. Sarevɨ jɨhɨnya' anga yuneba jɨnnaraka yune sawɨ'jɨhɨnya' tɨri kɨlokɨyagaa'na sawɨsɨrɨ.
Yɨrɨke' yɨmaanyɨna yaka dɨvidaa'nyɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨya kwaabɨyɨvɨta naange' jɨkɨ'nadaa'dɨ'nyɨya janne sa' yuneba kayaaka lihɨ'na yɨna yaka pɨvakaai yɨma'nyɨna.
Sagaasagaa' Jizaazai jaka naanga dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Nɨmwai nɨmɨre kuryai gɨmɨre asɨrɨ gwakɨwana.” Sai sara wɨdɨna yaka gannya kuryarɨ yaasɨna.
Yaasɨna kya' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidei dazangɨ tɨnna wanganaka Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaka sai dɨna “Yuna nebulyasɨ. A'mwe dazai yuna yɨda'maraangelyɨra.”
Dɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya baihanasa'na bi'bwa'nesara yɨma'naka sangɨ tɨnna wanganeva kunnya kɨhɨsangɨ kale'na mala tannadɨvɨ' kaanna ayɨna yɨkwawe'.
Sarevɨ gamɨre yuya gya'mwerajɨ a'mwe Galɨlidaa'nyɨ yawɨma'neva gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨnaabesamɨlɨkajɨ sangirɨ' menyaba daaveva yuya yɨma'naka dazangɨ tɨnna wangane'.
Yɨthaa! A'mwe pwai Jozepɨyai wo'nɨkei Juyaraavɨre Anga Aarɨmathɨya sabadaa'nyai mwaalɨna. Sarei Juyaraavɨ kaajolɨyai, a'mwe tewaanyai yune yɨda'maraangei
kaajolɨya pwaraavɨre sɨmunyabwinajɨ kumɨrebwinajɨ aala wɨvu'nadei, sai Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevɨna yemwaaidelyɨ.
A'mwe dazai Paailatɨmyawɨnna kaanna wɨna yaka sahwarɨ Jizaazare kɨlaakejɨ' maarya'na yɨdaanganna.
