Sara yaka yagaalya' maarɨna yaka wɨna yaka yɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' makwalaabɨna yɨna yaka kwaabɨyɨvɨta yaakesɨ yewaa'bwa'na yɨna yaka simaangevɨna wɨlakaawɨna. Simaanga daza' sɨla naangevɨ lɨlɨsɨwinɨke'. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' a'mwe bainɨka aane pwai kwarɨ mulakɨbwaayavɨ, mudɨ'na waka'.
Sagaa' yɨrɨka tɨka munne yovɨrawakya'nerɨkɨra. Kwazaakegaa' maalɨkegaa' yɨma'nya'negaakɨ.
Jozepɨyai sara yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe Galɨlidaa'nyɨ yawɨma'neva Jizaazarɨ mɨjɨmabesa sahwarɨ mɨjamakuna. Yevemɨlɨka simaanga dazavɨ tɨnna wanganna yeva gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' sara wakɨnɨkejɨ' tɨnna wanganna.
Tɨnna mena wanganna yeve sagaa' kunnya angengɨna ayɨna kaanna wɨna. Saremɨlɨka marazɨnanyajɨ welivananya wabatɨrɨnnaka nawɨ'nyajɨ yovɨrawakɨna ye'.
Sara yevemɨlɨka kwazaakegaa' kɨwɨnya' sara dɨnɨkevɨna kave mwaalɨna ye'.
Wikɨya mudɨkerɨkɨ Saadehaa', byaaka wanyɨwanya yakegaa' simaangeyabanne kaanna wɨna. Sɨnnawɨ mena tɨvi'na yovɨrawaketa welivananya nawɨ'nya tɨrɨnnaka sajɨ maarɨna yeva makuna.
Sare dara wanganesa' “O, sɨlyai kengimagɨ mena mwarangɨramwaihɨwaasai daaka!” Simaangevɨre tɨkuryavɨ marihɨ'naryadɨ'nyɨ sara dɨna.
Dɨna yeva kusawɨ wɨlɨna yeva dara wanganesa' “O, Naanga Jizaazare kɨlaakejɨ' mwarijɨka!”

Sara deve sa'ne'na sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'daa'nadɨvɨ' navɨ'navɨka yɨdaa'nyɨna. Sara yadɨvɨ', yɨthaa, a'mwe pwaraai kumɨnyabanna yɨma'naabahɨla daa'dakɨlyɨ wanganna. Saraai kɨrɨmɨre baazɨ'ma'nyawaarɨdaa'nya lɨvamwadadaa'nyɨyaraai.
Wanganna yeva lɨka naanga yadɨvɨ' kumɨre mɨnyagɨnya samwina tuta'nareva kwaakeyɨna baihana'na yadapi saraai wɨdɨna “A'mwe bainɨkeraavɨreba a'mwe gaala kɨnɨnnakerɨna be'na bɨ'manɨgatangihɨlaka!
Dava mwarika. Aawa. Mena yɨdɨkaa'mwakerɨnera! Sɨnnawɨ sai Galɨli kuna mwaalakegaa' yɨhɨthaka daza'na ayɨna jawɨrila!
Sai dara yɨhɨtha' ‘A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai a'mwe kayaa'nanyaraavɨre asɨrɨ kumarɨmwangapɨjɨ yɨsavɨri tamarɨmupɨ'delyɨ. Sarei yɨrɨka darɨkaai darɨkɨ ayɨna dɨkaavadelyɨ.’ ”
Sara wɨdɨna kyagi sa gamɨ kɨgaa' yagaala wɨdaka sanna yawɨ'na yɨna yeva
simaangeyaba yagalya'makuna yeva sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwainanyaraavɨjɨ a'mwe yuya pwaraavɨjɨ yuya wanganeta dazanna wɨdaawɨna.
A'mwe sa, Maahɨthaala mwaalya' Maarɨyaasɨ Jowaanasɨ Maarɨyaa' Jemɨzare ganaangesɨ sajɨ a'mwe pɨmɨlɨka ye'mwannamwaaina yesamɨlɨkajɨ sa apozelɨyaraavɨ yagaala daza' wɨdaawɨna.
Sara wɨdaawɨna kye' kɨrɨ' sahwara yawɨ'na “A'mwe da kɨrɨbɨbɨyagaala dahanedɨwaava!” Sara yawɨ'na yeva kumɨre yagaalyangɨ myawɨralɨmwagina.

Sara yadaapi Pitai simaangeyabannei yarai kaanyave'na wɨna yaka walaruta'nyɨna yaka ke'mu kusawɨnna wanganaasɨna yakei kwaabɨyɨvɨsanna gavenna wa'dɨ'nyɨ wanganna. Sarei angebanna ayɨna wɨna yaka mena wanganaka sanne'na sɨmugwalaalya yawɨ'na.

Yɨthaa, yɨrɨka dazahɨrɨka sagaa' kumɨnyɨdaa'nya pwaraai, saraai anga maalɨka pɨba Emayaazɨ wo'nɨkebanna kaanya wɨna. Tuta sa' yune Jeruzaalemɨdaa'nya' Emayaazɨna yɨnamudarɨke' levenɨ kilomitaayababɨsaba.
Saraai kaanya wodi' yuya yɨma'naka dazanna yagaalya' dɨnɨguna.
Kɨrɨmɨ saraai yɨdaanganyɨ yɨdaanganya yadi' wɨna. Sara yɨnɨgodaakɨlyɨ Jizaazai gamɨ sai aya kɨbanna yɨma'nadavaabɨna yɨna yaka saraalyɨ ye'mwannɨgwaanna.
Saraalyɨ ye'mwannɨgwaanna yadaa'nyɨ kɨrɨ' kɨrɨmɨre tɨnnyangɨ nabinya pɨnɨ bɨ'jɨralɨmwaga'dɨ'nyɨ saraai myawɨri “Sai Jizaazai daaka!”
Sara myawɨri kyagi sai wɨdɨna “Saraaihi, benna dɨnɨgodi' wɨvanɨgɨla?” Sara wɨdaka sa'na saraai daavɨna yagɨla sɨmunya' taanga wina'dɨ'nyɨ sɨnnyɨ' gwaraku'na.

Sara yagɨla a'mwe pwai Kɨlayopaazai wo'nɨkei ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwe kwalaalya anga pɨbadaa'nya pɨbadaa'nyara dahaa' Jeruzaalemɨ yune sabanna mwaaihava. Sare'na nabaai gɨmɨ gaveigɨ yune yɨrɨka dahɨnɨngɨ anga naanga Jeruzaalemɨ yɨma'nɨwaka savɨ myawɨryaigɨ daaka!”

Sai sara daka yadɨ'nyɨ sahwai saraarɨ yɨdaanganna “Benɨnneka?” Yɨdaanganna kya' saraai wɨdɨna “Yɨma'nɨwaka sa Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyarɨnera. Sahwai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨjɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨjɨ wawɨnya dɨragɨnyajɨ yada yagaala dɨragɨnyajɨ dadelyɨ.
Sarerɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ nemɨre maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ Ga'maanɨyare asɨrɨ marakesarɨnera. Sarerɨ Ga'maanɨyai balya'nerɨna yagaala jamungajakerɨnera. Sarerɨ tamarɨmwɨwa'daasarɨnera.

Sare kɨrɨ' kɨgaa' nemɨ dɨragɨnna dara lɨmwagoine. A'mwe dazai Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨ ayɨna nevadaihasamaaradei daaka! Yo, nabaai yagaala pɨrɨsɨ kuna warɨ'. Sasare daza mena yɨma'nɨwa'dɨkevɨ yɨ dahaa' yɨrɨka gamɨnne darɨkaai yaka darɨkɨnyɨ.
Sarevɨ yuna dahaasagaa' nemɨnyɨdaa'nya a'mwe pɨnɨ nemɨnyabanna kabathɨwaa' lɨka yɨwaainɨwoinera. Yuna mwanyavɨ simaangeyabanna wawevemɨlɨka
gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' mwanganyɨwaasamɨlɨkera. Sara mwanganyɨ yeva ayɨna beva dara nedɨwaa' ‘Nemɨ ejelɨya pwaraarɨ wangamwo. Sahwaraai nedɨwaai “Sai gaala mwaalɨ'.” ’
Nabaai nemɨnyɨdaa'nya pwaraai simaangeyaba wawogɨla a'mwe nedɨwaatabaai avaaina sarengɨ wangamwaalyaraalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' yune gamɨ sarɨ miwariwaala.”
Sara wɨdɨna kyagi wɨdɨna “Kɨrɨmɨ sɨmunya maayaraaihi! Yagaala yuya pɨropetɨyara dɨhata sangɨna kɨrɨmɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya' yawɨralɨmwadi' mɨ'.
Gatha'darevɨnaka! Kɨrɨmɨ myawɨriwaai ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai daange' aayagaa' mena maarojɨyai dɨvi gannya byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ wɨlamwaaladei daaka!’ ”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka Mozɨzare yagaalyangɨnajɨ pɨropetɨya yuyaraavɨre yagaalyajɨ sare' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Yune gamɨ sarɨna dɨnɨka Bukuyavɨ yuya aaya kaavɨlyajɨ maridɨna.
Sarera saraai pu'nɨgohɨla anga saba aya kɨbanna yɨ'ma'na. Sarevɨ gamɨ “Sangirɨ' kɨbawa wɨma!” yawɨrakei sara yɨna.

Sara yɨna yadaa'nyɨ saraai dahalalɨmwanna yagɨla wɨdɨna “Naarɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannamwalaana! Nyɨlyai gaai waladathakadaa'nyɨyagaa' sawɨta mɨlyɨnɨgubala ya'ne kɨbawa yadɨ'nyɨ.” Sara dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna kyagi sai kusawɨ wɨlɨna yaka saraalyɨ wɨlye'mwannamwaaina.
Sara yɨna yeva dɨvi “Tɨka wapaa naana!” deva saraalyɨ walamwaaina yaka ayabaaibɨ' bɨretɨya' maarɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ “Wapaayanna gɨmɨre yaya' makimwa!” wɨdɨna yaka gunyɨna yaka saraarɨ wɨjaavɨna.
Sai sara kya' kɨrɨmɨre tɨnnya pada'galayenna yɨna yagɨla sagaa' sahwarɨ yɨwaranganna. Sara mena kyagi sawɨ sai kaanna yɨmamajɨna'na kya' saraai ayawɨ mwanganyɨ yagi.

Sarevɨ saraai dɨnyɨna “Naarɨmɨ tutaanyavɨ badaakwoihɨlyɨyagaa' yagaalya' nehɨzɨwaakada Bukuyavɨre yawɨta aaya kaavɨlyabwi nehɨzɨwakadaa'nya yɨ dazagaa' naarɨmɨre sɨmunya' yuna nebwina nehidɨkaa'mwake' daaka!”
Sara dɨnyɨna yagɨla dazagaasagaa' kuna Jeruzaalemɨneraai ayɨna kaanna wɨna yagi. Wawogɨleraai yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidapi sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwainanyaraavɨjɨ kɨrya'mwe pwaraavɨjɨ bɨramaa'na.
Sara kyagi saraarɨ wɨdɨna “Naangei nebwina ayɨna dathɨkaa'mwaka! Saaimonɨmɨ mena yɨma'naabɨwakelyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' saraai tutaanyavɨ wodi' wanganagɨlyanna wɨjɨwaakɨna. Saraai wɨdɨna “Sai gunyadaa'nyɨ naarɨmɨ yawɨrangamwolyarɨnera.”
Yagaalya' kuna dɨnɨbainadaa'dapi sahwai kumɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba yɨma'nadavaabɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Kwaamu' dɨmwaalyɨla!”
Sa'ne' lɨka yɨwaaineva lɨka naanga yɨna. “Kurya pwarɨ dahawangamwona,” yawɨreva lɨka yɨna kye'
sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyai be'ne' yɨwɨnakɨvanɨgava! Nabaai sɨmunyangɨ yawɨta kwalaalya be'na yawɨ'manɨgava!
Nɨmɨre asɨraalyɨ sɨvɨlyɨraalyɨ dɨnyanganyɨla! Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sahwainyɨra. Asa nyɨmwangadɨvɨ' dɨnyanganyɨla! Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨ nyangamwaatabaaibɨ' kuryai mɨwɨta yagɨnya kunelyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka kumɨnyɨ gamɨre ata sɨvɨla wɨjɨwaainyɨna.
Tɨvi'na wɨjɨwaainyɨna kya' yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨsa'najɨ atɨka maru'na'dɨvɨsa'najɨ sare' myawɨralɨmwagi yadaapi sai wɨdɨna “Dava sarɨmɨre tɨka wapaaya pɨnɨ mwarijɨka?”
Wɨdɨna kya' yɨdɨka yakɨnɨka jawɨnya pimagɨnyavaa' wɨmaarina kye'
sai maaraka nadaa'nyɨ tɨnna wanganna.

Sai kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Kɨgaa' sarɨmɨjɨ kuna mwaalena yagaala da mena yɨhɨthe. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' nɨmɨnyɨna yuya yɨdaveta sa Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnyavɨjɨ pɨropetɨyaraavɨre bukuyangɨjɨ Saamɨyangɨjɨ yuya daza yɨ yunebanna sara yɨma'nya'nevɨnyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka sagaa' Gotɨyare Bukuyavɨ yawɨranganya'nera kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ yɨwɨrinya'ne sɨmunya wakɨna yaka
wɨdɨna “Bukuya' dara dɨnɨ' ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai daange' maarojɨyai yuna baladei yɨrɨka darɨkaai darɨkɨ ayɨna dɨkaavadelyɨ.

Sarerɨne'na nabaai gamɨnne yayavɨ yuya ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ wɨjɨwakadaapɨri pwara sɨmunya mudɨkebwi kyawɨramaarapɨri Gotɨyai kumɨre gɨrɨkita'nanya duimwagasɨ'naderera. Wawɨnya daza' Jeruzaalemɨdaa'nyɨ yamaapɨ'derera.’
Yuya dazanna a'mweraavɨ jalɨkurakyaihɨlyɨ.

Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmwai yune naanga nebulya'na dake' yɨhɨzaaya'nerɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨhyasaabɨde'nanyɨ. Kɨrɨ' anga naanga dathahɨba kuna mwaalapɨjɨ yune ke'mwewɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya dɨragɨnya' walaabazahaa'nanneihɨlyɨ.”
Gamɨreraavɨ Betaani sabanna makuna yaka. Sara yakei gamɨre asɨraai munyaba makɨlaka Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya yanga wɨjaaya'nei kumɨnyɨ tewaanaange' winade' wɨdɨna.
Kuna wɨdɨna yada kumɨnyɨ yagalya'makuna kya' Gotɨyai Sɨgunyavɨnerɨ makilaawɨna.
Makilaawɨna yadaa'nyɨ sahwara gamɨnyɨ yɨlaaya wɨmarina yeva Jeruzaalemɨna ayɨna wawesara yɨlaaya naanga yɨna.
Sarera yuyagaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ mwaaidɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makidɨvɨsare.
Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Kwaaka dava' mima'nyawɨ Gotɨyarɨne Yagaalyai mwalyaakewɨnyɨ. Nabaai, Gotɨyai mwaalakewɨ gamɨnyawɨ Gotɨyarɨne Yagaalyai mwaalɨ'. Gotɨyarɨne Yagaalyai sahwai Gotɨyai.
Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna aayawɨdaasɨ Gotɨyalyɨ sahwai mwalɨbainyɨna yaakelyɨ.
Gotɨyai sara kyawɨra' sahwai yuyangɨ sara wakɨnɨkengɨ. Aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' gamɨ saba yɨma'naka' mɨ'. Aawa, sahwai wakakengɨ yuya sa.

Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' sahwarɨ gaalyabwi warakelyɨ. Gaala sabwi a'mwe yuyaraavɨre Baakelyɨ. Yɨnɨka sai a'mweinaavɨna kunya tewaanya yawɨrya'ne nejaavɨnɨkerɨna. Kunya tewaanya yawɨrya'ne wɨjaavɨna kaneya' baaka savɨ nayaa mwaidaanyaine. (Gotɨyarɨna nayaa yawɨ'daanyaine.)
Saburɨdaasɨ jɨhɨnya kayaa'nanyaburɨ Gotɨyare baake' wannyɨna. Nabaai jɨhɨnya sa' baakevɨ mwavɨlayɨnɨkesɨ.
Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “A'mwera baakevɨ mwaaibɨka!” yawɨraka sɨnnawɨ a'mwerɨ wɨdaasakelyɨ. Sai Jonɨ (Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei) wɨdaasakelyɨ.
A'mwe sahwai jalɨkurakya'nei bɨna. “A'mweraavɨ a'mwengɨ Jizaazai Baakerɨna wɨjalɨkurakana!” daka wɨdaasakei bɨna. “Kadɨka wɨ'napɨjɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwagapɨka!” dakei bɨna.
Jonɨ gamɨ sai Baakei mɨka! Aawa. “Baaka nawɨ'nya sarɨna jalɨkurakana!” dakelyɨra.
Dɨvi Baakei Kwaaka davakɨna walaabaka a'mwe gazainazainaavɨna Baaka nebulya'nanyalyɨ. A'mwe yuyainaavɨ kunya tewaanya yawɨrya'ne nejaavadei.
Nabaai, Kwaaka davakɨ sai bamwaaina ya'. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai kyawɨra' sahwai Kwaaka dava' sara wakɨna. Sara wakɨna yaka bamwaaina kya' kɨrɨ' Kwaaka davakɨ mwaalyara gamɨ sahwarɨ myawɨramaari yesalyɨ.
Gannya Anga Yɨzɨrelɨna bɨna yaka bamwaaidɨsɨ gamɨjɨyara mamaari.

Sara yɨna yeva mamaari kye' kɨrɨ' a'mwera pwara “Nebulyasɨra. Naangelyɨra,” deva maarɨna ye'. Maarɨna kye' sai yuya saraavɨna gannya dɨragɨnyabwi wɨjaavɨna ya'. Gannya dɨragɨnya sabwi sahwara Gotɨyare kaimɨraayara yɨma'nya'nebulyɨ. Gamɨ sahwarɨnajɨ gamɨre yayavɨnajɨ lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsaraavɨnebulyɨ. Yɨ sahwara mudɨkera yɨma'nyɨna ye'.

A'mweraavɨre yɨsavakaavɨdaasɨ tawengɨna mudɨkera mima'nyɨna. Aawa. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨdusaburɨ mudɨkera mima'nyɨna. Aawa. A'mweraavɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ mudɨkera mima'nyɨna. Aawa. Gotɨyai gevwi yawɨ'na “Sahwara nɨmɨre kaimɨraayara mudɨkeraavɨ yawakɨnɨma!” kadɨnɨ' yɨma'nɨgavɨnɨkengɨ.

Gotɨyarɨne Yagaalyai a'mwe kɨlaa'nakei yɨma'nyɨna yakei nemɨnyawɨ gannya selɨ ange' yɨladaakuna. Gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ wɨlamwaaina yɨna yada tɨnna dara wangano' “O, Nawɨ'nyai dɨragɨnaangei daaka!” Sara dadaa gamɨre byaannyavɨ tɨnna wangano. Ganɨmaangerɨdaa'nyai gavei yamakɨnarɨkabaaibɨta byaanna sasɨ. Sahwarɨ yuneba yanga gaimwangebulyɨ nebulyabulyɨ maanga yeku'nɨkelyɨ.

A'mwe Jonɨ gamɨnyɨna nejalɨkurakada jaka dara danganna “A'mwe dazarɨna yɨhɨthelyɨ. Nɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaala kyɨhɨthɨwa dɨviya pwai bozɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakadei Naangelyɨ. Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ mɨka! Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨra. Nɨmɨ mima'nyagaa' kuna mwalyaake'na Sɨnnawɨnyalyɨ.”
Sahwai maanga yeku'nɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ yuyainaavɨna wana nawɨ'nya nejaavade'na tewaanna mwaaiho. Nemɨnyɨna gamɨre yanga gaimwagaimwange' nejaavada nejaavɨnɨkelyɨ.

Sare' Gotɨyai kujaa' Ne Mozɨzai Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya tewaanya' wɨjaavɨna. Wɨjaavɨna neyɨnɨke' nemɨnyawɨnna Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazarɨ wɨdasaabɨna. Wɨdasaabɨna kyɨnɨ' sahwarɨ nemɨnyɨna yanga gaimwangebulyɨ nebulyabulyɨ yɨma'nɨnɨke'nanyɨ.
Gotɨyarɨ a'mwe Kwaaka davakɨyaina wangadaanyarɨna mɨ'. Aane pwai kwai tɨnna mwanganyɨ. Aawa, Gotɨyai gavei Ganɨmaangeryaba kusɨmagɨnna mwaalɨkei nemɨnyɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia neyɨkelyɨ.

Jonɨmɨre jalɨkurakya daresɨ. Jonɨmyawɨnna Juyara Anga Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalya naangera a'mwe pwaraavɨ wɨdaasɨna. Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsara Livaayaraavɨjɨ wɨdaasɨna. Mi'na wɨdaasɨna kye' wɨna yɨna yeva Jonɨmɨ yɨwaara'na “Gɨmɨ bewaigɨnaka?”
Yɨwaara'na kye' Jonɨ “Yagaala sa' madɨwɨnera!” myawɨri yaka aangyagaala nebulya' kave nayaa wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyai Nyɨdahɨlakyaaka Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨ mɨka!”

Sara yɨwaara'na “Nabaai, bewaigɨnaka? Ne Yɨlaajaigɨ daaka?” Sara yɨwaara'na kye' Jonɨ wɨdɨna “Aawa, nɨmɨ mɨka!” Sahwara wɨdɨna “Gotɨyarɨ nayaa wɨ'nanejɨwaakade naangerɨna yemwaaiho sahwaigɨ daa?” Wɨdɨna kye' ma'maa'na “Aawa!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Dɨnedana! Bewaigɨnaka? ‘Nedasɨwaasaraavɨ ja'nawɨja' nayaa wɨdaana!’ dona gyɨwaara'manɨgo. Sahwaigɨ gɨmɨnyɨna be yagaala dɨmanɨgɨnyavaka?”
Wɨdɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ sainyɨ dareinyɨra
“A'mwamaayaba maanguraayainyɨ jaka wɨdangadɨnyainyɨra.
“Naangei tuta tewaanyavɨ wawode'na
“Tusa' yɨda'na nayaa jamakwila!” ’
Wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya Aazaayai nɨmɨnyɨna sara dɨnɨkesɨ.”
Yɨwaaraveveraavɨ a'mwe Perɨzɨyara wɨdaasɨna yesare.
Sahwara gamɨnyɨ yɨwaara'na “Gɨthahɨlakɨnɨka Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨ mɨka! Gɨmɨ Ne Yɨlaajaigɨ mɨka! Wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya naangerɨna yemwaaiho sahwaigɨ mɨka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mweraavɨ aalya' baa'na yɨvanɨgɨna?”
Jonɨ ma'maa'na “Aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yadɨnyainyɨ. A'mwe pwai sarɨmɨnyaba tɨnnyaba daavɨkerɨ myawɨranganyɨvanɨgava.

Gamɨ sai a'mwe naangelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ bɨweinyɨ, sahwai dɨviyai yarai bathei naangei mwaalɨka. Nɨmɨ gaimwange'na naangere kwaari'masɨvɨlya' yɨraipurɨdeinyɨ mɨka. Sahwarɨna nɨmɨ a'mwe nawɨ'nyainyɨ daaka!” sara wɨda' Jonɨ.
Yuya sa Aalya Jothanɨ kengihɨrɨ Anga Betaani Jonɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yadaa'nyɨyaba yɨma'nyɨna yakengɨ.

Mwanyagaa' Jonɨ mwaalaka Jizaazai bakerɨ tɨnna wanganaasɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi, dazai Gotɨyarei Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyala! Kayaa'nanyanna a'mwera sipɨzipɨyarɨ tamɨna yadɨvɨ' kwaraanyaba Gotɨyarɨna dɨka nasɨ'na yadevaaibɨ' sai Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyainaavɨre kayaa'nanyanna marasɨsa'na baladelyɨ.
Sahwarɨna yɨhɨthadɨnyalyɨ. Nɨmɨ bɨweinyɨ, dɨvi a'mwei bathelyɨ. Nɨmɨ mima'nyagaa' sai kuna mwalyaakelyɨ. Sai sɨnnawɨnyai Naangelyɨ. Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨra.
‘Bozɨyai Naanga kwarɨnera,’ yawɨrena gamɨnyɨ myawɨranganyainyɨ. Aawa. ‘Sahwarɨna Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia'na yɨma!’ dena bɨwa. Aalya yɨhyadɨnya savɨ dara jawɨryide' ‘O, sai Naangei daaka!’ ”
Jonɨ tɨnna mena bahanaraka a'mwe Juyaraavɨ wɨjalɨkurakɨna “Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyarebadaa'nyɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai kwaamɨryaibɨsai walaabɨna yaka a'mwe sarɨ mwalɨbainɨkerɨ tɨnna wanganerɨnera.

Sɨnnawɨ gamɨnyɨ myawɨranganyainyɨ. Aawa. Bavɨtaazɨya'na nyɨdasaabakei sahwai nyɨda' ‘Dɨvi dara dangadeigɨnyɨ. Kurya Tewaanyai a'mwe pwarɨ bwalamwaaina yaja' wangana'gɨzɨ dara jawɨ'de' “Ai, sai a'mweraavɨna Kurya Tewaanyarɨ yanga wɨjaavadei daaka!” Gɨmɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya' jɨthe' sai Kuryarɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yadelyɨ.’
Sara wɨdɨna nyake' tɨnna nayaa wangamweinyɨ yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Sai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨ.”
Mwanyagaa' Jonɨjɨ gamɨreraalyɨ sara ayaba daa'dapi Jizaazai kaanya yamarina.
Kaanya yamarina yada Jonɨ wanganaasaka gannyaraarɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi! Sai Gotɨyarei Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyala!”
Wɨdɨna kya' Jonɨmɨreraai kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yagɨlyaraai saraai Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨnna.

Sara mɨdɨnna yɨna yadaakɨlyɨ gɨnyɨma'naka saraai mɨdɨnaabɨna yagɨlyaraarɨ tɨnna wanganaka yɨwaara'na “Berɨ'na bɨ'manɨgɨla?” Saraai wɨdahi “Ravaai, anga garɨvɨ mwaaihɨna?” Yɨvɨruyagaalya' “Ravaai,” yagaalya' “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ,” wɨdɨnɨkesɨ.

“Ravaai, anga garɨvɨ mwaaihɨna?” wɨdɨna kyagi sai wɨdɨna “Kaanya bakɨlyɨ danganyɨla!” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨjɨ wɨna yagɨla gannya anga mwaaidevɨ tɨnna wanganna yagɨla sagaa' gamɨnyaba mwaalɨna yagi. Bɨna yɨna yagɨlegaa' sawɨtɨrɨnyagaakɨ (4 kɨlokɨ).
Saraai Jonɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nagɨla Jizaazalyɨ wawagɨla pwai Edɨruyalyɨ. Edɨruyai sai, Saaimonɨ Pitare gya'mwelyɨ.
Edɨruyai sai sɨnnawɨ wɨna yaka Saaimonɨ gya'mwerɨna bɨrɨkaanya yɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Ai! Nemɨ Mezaayarɨ mena bɨramaa'mwona!” Yaya sa' “Mezaayai,” dɨnɨ' “Kɨraazɨtɨyai.”

Wɨdɨna yaka Saaimonɨmɨ gamɨnyawɨnna makuna. Makuna kya' Jizaazai tɨnna wanganaka wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ Jonɨmɨre gawaalɨ'gɨnyɨ Saaimonɨgɨ. Gɨmɨre yaya' Sipaazai gɨthɨvanɨgesɨ.” Juyaraavɨre yagaala “Sipaazai,” Gɨrikɨyagaala “Pitai,” aangyagaala “Sɨlaangei,” dɨnɨkesɨ.
Mwanyagaa' Jizaazai “Pwarajɨ Galɨlineinera,” daka Pilipɨmɨ bɨrɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!”
Pilipɨ sai Anga Betɨzaaitha mwaalyalyɨ. Anga saba Edɨruyalyɨ Pitalyɨ sadaraai mwaaidisaba.

Pilipɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka Nataanyalɨmɨ bɨramaa'na yaka wɨda' “Kaanyaka! Ne Mozɨzai kɨwɨbukuyavɨ pwarɨna yɨda'nɨke' nabaai, Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyara sarɨna pɨkarya yɨda'nɨkevɨne sarɨ mena bɨramaa'mwona. Sai, Jizaazai Jozepɨyare gawaalɨ' Naazaretɨ mwaalyalyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' Nataanyalɨ yɨwaara'na “Naazaretɨdaa'nyara tewaanyara daaka! Savɨdaa'nyɨ tewaanyai dalyaabɨwaka!” Pilipɨ wɨda' “Sahwaigɨ bwangana! Nebulya'na gɨthɨwana. Bwangana!”
Nataanyalɨ badaa'nyɨ Jizaazai tɨnna wanganaka sarɨna wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi! Sai Yɨzɨrelɨya tewaanyalyɨ. Kwaasɨ yadei mɨka!”
Nataanyalɨ savɨ kadɨka wɨ'naka yɨwaara'na “Nɨmɨnyɨna gara yawɨ'mwaana?” Yɨwaara'na kya' sai wɨdɨna “Sagaa' Pilipɨ gɨmɨnyɨna mabɨriwakegaa' yɨta pihɨya kaavɨlyavɨ mwaaida'gi gwangamweigɨnyɨra,” wɨda'.
Nataanyalɨ wɨdɨna “Ravaai, Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨna dɨwa. Gɨmɨ Gotɨyare Gawaalɨkɨ. Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨ nemaremwaaidɨnyaigɨne!”
Wɨdɨna kya' sagaa' sai wɨdɨna “ ‘Yɨta pihɨyavɨ mwaaida'gi gwangamwa,’ gɨthɨwe'na nɨmɨnyɨna danyɨlɨmwamwaana! Sabwi maalɨkebwi, dɨvi naangengɨ dangadengɨra.”
Gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Nebulya' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sɨgunya' basɨnadaa'dozɨ Gotɨyare mamaayara ejelɨyara A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayaryawɨnna walaabɨna, yɨlaawɨna yadaapɨri danganyideihɨlyɨra,” wɨdɨna ya'.
Yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ Kwaaka Galɨli Anga Kena savɨ kwala maarya yɨna. Kwala maarya yɨna kye' tɨka munnevɨ Jizaazarɨ ganaange' mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ nabaai,
Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerari saraavɨ munne'na jɨvwaramaa'na.
Sara yɨna kye' munne' nyɨna yadaapɨjɨ aalya waainɨya'na wɨgainyɨna yadaa'nyɨ ganaange' Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Aalya waainɨya' maayarera.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ ‘Sana sana ja!’ baa'na nyɨdɨwaana? Nɨmɨregaa' mɨka!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' ganaange' wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sara yɨhɨthathe'na sara jɨla!”
Juyara aalya yɨnyabwina wa'dɨ'nyɨ si-aalɨtala atina ata purɨdaa'nyɨ nyɨdala kune warakengɨ. Aalɨtala gazasa' maanga kyeku'na' aalya naanga (80, 100 litaaya) dɨ'na'nɨkesɨ.
Si-aalɨtala sa kune warake, sahwai wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Aalɨtala sa aalya maanga yunebanna yeku'nade dɨmaradɨngikaabyɨla!” Wɨdɨna kya' maanga yeku'nya'ne aalya maradɨngikɨna maradɨngikɨna kye'
wɨdɨna “Aalya pɨrɨ' yɨrapɨjɨ tɨka munnevɨ maremwaaiderɨna dumaryaawila!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' makuna yeva wɨjaavɨna kye' sai yaamɨjɨ nyɨna.

Aalya sa' sɨnnawɨ aangaalya' dɨ'na'dɨ'nyɨ dɨvi aalya waainɨya' yɨma'nyɨna yɨnɨkesɨ. Yaamɨjɨ nyɨna yaka dɨna “Waburyasɨ. Waainɨya da' gawɨdaa'nyavaka?” Sai myawɨri yada sare'na wɨdaayadɨvɨsara yawɨreva aalya wɨjaavɨna yesarera. Kuna myawɨri yada mɨgɨnyai taaya' maarakerɨ munnevɨ maremwaalakei wɨdɨna “Kaajo!”

Wɨdɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Nemɨnyɨna tewaanya yɨwaana! Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe pwara gazarazara aalya waainɨya nawɨ'nya' munne wɨjaavɨna yadɨvɨ' dɨvi a'mwera waainɨya naanga nadɨvɨ' nayaa myawɨryaraavɨna aalya waainɨya yɨrɨke' wɨjaavɨna yadɨvɨsare pwara. Sare'na yadɨnyaigɨ mɨka! Kwaigɨ aalya waainɨya nawɨ'nya' navɨka yɨ'nadɨ'nyɨ, waainɨya pɨrɨ' mi'na kanɨwo dɨvi nawɨ'nya' wɨjaavɨna neyɨwaanyaigɨnyɨ,” wɨdɨna ya'.

Kwaaka Galɨli Anga Kena saba Jizaazai wɨjɨwaainya'ne sa' yɨna ya'. Wɨjɨwaainya'ne sɨnnawɨnya' yakesɨ. Gannya byaanna dɨragɨnyabwi wɨjɨwaainake'na wɨjɨwaainya'ne sa' yakesɨ. Gamɨrera naangebwi wanganeva gamɨnyɨ lɨmwanna ye'.
Mena yakegaa' sagaa' Anga Kaapanɨyamɨ sabanna gamɨjɨ ganaangesɨ gya'mwerari gamɨrerari walyuna yeva yɨrɨka pɨrɨ' pɨrɨ' saba bamwaaina ye'.

Juyara dɨna “Aya kɨgaa' Pari'ma'munne' naadera Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna kavadaihasamaryaa' yaasɨwa'wawɨnya Yɨzɨpɨ saba yagalya'mayaawo' yawɨta'negaa'.” Juyara dɨdaapi Anga Jeruzaalemɨ sabanna yɨlaawɨna.

Yɨlaawɨna yaka Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlɨna yaka dara wanganake' “O, a'mwera bulɨmakaawoyarajɨ sipɨzipɨyarajɨ kwaamɨryarajɨ damubɨvanɨgava! Nɨgwia nawɨ'nya Gotɨyarɨ wɨjaaya'na nɨgwia pɨmɨlɨka yanga yɨnyɨna yadɨvɨsara kunnya yɨ'bɨnyangɨ damwaaihava!”

Dɨna yaka “Sabwi mipɨnera!” daka wɨlyabaai maarɨna yaka mala lɨ'bwarya'ne' yavɨkarina yaka Gotɨyare Angevɨdaa'nyɨ sipɨzipɨyarajɨ bulɨmakaawoyarajɨ saraavɨ tamaasɨna yaka nɨgwia mariwɨnasɨ'na yaka yanga yɨnyɨna yadɨvɨsaraavɨre yɨ'bɨnya yarai marapuratawasɨ'na.
Sara mi'na yaka kwaamɨryaraavɨ mubadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sa dɨmakwalyula! Nɨmware ange' mubange'na mɨka. Dɨmakwila!”
Wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera yawɨ'na “Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnyɨna ‘Gotɨyaigɨ gɨmɨre angevɨna yɨlaaya dɨka nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nyɨnadevaaibɨsasɨ.’ Dɨnɨkesɨ Gotɨyare bukuya', sahwarɨna.”
Sara yakevɨdaa'nyɨ Juya naangera sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ yɨwaara'na “Yɨwaanya'na aai gɨthɨwaka? Gotɨyai naangeigɨnyɨ gɨmwaaihɨwake' yawɨraade'na dɨragɨnya wɨjɨwaainya' ja!”
Yɨwaara'na kye' wɨdɨna “Gotɨyare anga nawɨ'nya darɨ kayaaka kyɨgalapɨri yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavɨdesɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara wɨdɨna “Sa' be'na dɨwaana! ‘Yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ yarai madɨdesɨ,’ dɨwaa' kɨgaa' kwarame pɨjaakuna (46) sara wavɨlavakesɨ anga da' madaapi. Yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ gaverɨkaavɨ dɨmadeigɨ dathɨwaana!”
Wɨdɨna yesa'na kɨrɨ' sahwai gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨna wɨdɨna sɨlangavɨna mɨ'.
Sara wɨdɨna kye' dɨvi Jizaazarɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaa'na kya' gamɨrera yagaalya' wɨdake'na yawɨ'na yeva dɨna “Gotɨyare bukuya' sara dɨnɨke'na kɨgaakuna Jizaazai wɨdake' nebulyasɨ,” dɨna, lɨmwanna ye'.
Anga Jeruzaalemɨ sagaa' Pari'ma'munnegaa' mwaalɨna yada nawɨ'nyajɨ dɨragɨnyajɨ yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara tɨnna sara wanganeva gamɨnyɨna dɨna “Sahwai naangelyɨ,” gamɨnne yaya' lɨmwanna.
Sara lɨmwanna kye' a'mweraavɨrebwina a'mwera yaasɨwa'wɨ'nya yesa'na nayaa yawɨ'da kumɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yarai myɨna.
A'mweraavɨre yawɨta'najɨ kumɨre sɨdusa'najɨ nayaa yawɨ'dei. Sarebwi pwai mujɨwaakyɨ ya'. Sarebwi wɨgainadei mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwai a'mweraavɨne sɨdu'nakei nayaa yawɨralɨmwagarɨkelyɨ.
Juya pwara Perɨzɨkɨwɨnya yadɨvɨ' mwaalɨna yeve pwai Nikothimaazai wo'nɨkei Perɨzɨyai mwaalɨna yakelyɨ. Sai a'mwe naangei Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidei mwaalakelyɨ.

Mwaalɨna yaka sawɨta pɨrɨvɨ Jizaazaryawɨnna bɨna yaka bamwaaina yaka wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakyaigɨ, ‘Gotɨyai gɨthasɨwaabɨkeigɨ bahɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna neyɨvanɨgɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera wɨjɨwaainyangɨ yɨvanɨgɨ. Dɨragɨnya yɨvanɨgɨ. Gotɨyai magɨhaimwagyazɨ kwajɨ sara mi kyɨdɨ' dɨragɨnya davwi,’ sara yawɨ'mwona.”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Naanga nebulya'na gɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe pwai kwai ayahi mudɨkei mima'nyɨ yajai Gotɨyai maremwaaladeva tɨnna mwanganyɨ yannelyɨ.”
Nikothimaazai wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangei mudɨkei yɨma'nade'na gara yojɨ yɨma'nadelaka? Pɨgasaai a'mwei ganaangevɨ munyɨkɨ ayɨna wɨlaminyɨna kyojɨ ganaange' gara maaradelaka ayahwala!”
Sai ja'nawɨdɨna “Naanga nebulya'na gɨthɨvanɨge. Kurya Tewaanyai a'mwerɨ aalya myɨ kyojɨ mudɨka mumwaaihi kyojɨ sai Gotɨyare maremwaaideva wɨladei mɨka!
A'mweyore kaimɨraayai mɨwɨ'naka yagɨnnakalyɨ. Gotɨyarei, gamɨre munyɨkɨ Kurya Tewaanyai bulamwaaina kyojɨ sai a'mwe Gotɨyare Kuryai kɨnɨnnakelyɨ mudɨkei.
Gɨthɨwe'na ‘Sarɨmɨnyɨ mudɨka ayahi yɨhɨmwaaihana!’ gɨthɨwe'na atɨka maru'nata myɨnnera!

Yɨhuta gamɨ sa' kaanna wɨna yadevaaibɨsasɨ. Yɨhusa' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨnyaigɨ ‘Sawɨnna wawade' daaka! Sabadaa'nyɨ bathe' daaka!’ dadɨnyaigɨ mɨ'. Aawa, sare'na Gotɨyare Kurya Tewaanyai gazaizare munyɨkɨ bulamwaaina yɨnɨkei mudɨka yɨma'nɨ'. Mudɨkei tewaanna yada a'mwera tɨnna wangamanɨga'. Kumɨ mwanganyɨvanɨga' aaya kaavɨlyavɨ.”
Nikothimaazai ma'maa'na, “Nyɨdɨwaanya' gara yɨma'nɨnɨkavaka?”
Sai wɨdɨna “Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨre nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ sabwi myawɨrivanɨgɨnyaigɨ daa?

Naanga nebulya'na gɨthɨvanɨge. Nayaa yawɨrama'daanya yawɨ'daa yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Tɨnna nayaa wangadaanya yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Sara yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo'na nemɨre jalɨkurakyavɨ mamaaryɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sabwi kadɨka myɨvanɨgata sa' baa'na yɨvanɨga'.
Kwaaka davakɨ yɨnɨkengɨna kyɨhɨthɨwa malɨmwagyɨvanɨga' ‘Nebulyasɨ,’ sara majɨ yɨwaasa' Sɨgunyavɨ yɨnɨkengɨna yɨhɨthɨwɨja' gara dɨlɨmwagyideihɨlaka!
Sɨgunyavɨna yɨlaawakei a'mwei pwai kwai mɨka. Sɨgunyavɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai mwaalaka savɨdaa'nyɨ sai gavei walaaba'.”
Kɨgaa' a'mwamaayaba Ne Mozɨzai kwaari'makamaalya' yɨsavakɨ pwɨyaka daakuna yaa'. Kamaalyarɨ makilyaakabaaibɨ' yɨsavakɨ tamakya'na A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨ sara makibɨ'delyɨra.
Sahwai “Gazaizai nyɨlɨmwagarori gaala yuyagaa'nebwi maarana!” kadozɨ sara makibɨ'delyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaaka davakɨyainaavɨna Gotɨyarɨ kale naanga kwia' Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna Gawaalɨvaanga gaverɨ nejaavakelyɨ. “Gazaizai sahwarɨ wɨlɨmwagarojɨ myɨwawanna! Aawa. Gaala yuyagaa'nebwi maarana!” daka nejaavakelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai dɨna “Nyɨbwaalɨvaangei a'mweraavɨ kotɨya'na maryawɨbwaradela!” daka myasaabya'. Aawa. “Nyɨbwaalɨvaangerɨ a'mweraavɨna padaihasamaata yɨma!” daka kwaaka davakɨ yasaabɨna ya' Gotɨyai.

Gawaalɨvaangerɨna lɨmwagaza pwarɨ Gotɨyai kotɨya' maryawɨbwa'dei mɨ'. Malɨmwagyaza pwai kotɨya' mena yawɨbwa'nɨkelyɨ. Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaanga gaverɨna gamɨre yayavɨnajɨ malɨmwagaryaja'na kotɨya' mena dɨnɨkesɨ.

Kotɨya'na dara dɨnɨ' “Nemɨre kwaaka davakɨ pwai nebulya' nejɨwaakake'na Baakei walaabɨna yaka kɨrɨ' a'mwera kayaa'nanya yadɨvɨsara kayaa'nanyabwi jɨhɨnyaburɨna wɨvu'nakere. Baakerɨna wɨvu'nakara mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨ yadɨvɨsa kayaa'nanyangɨra,” sare'na dɨnɨkesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gazaizai kayaa'nanya yadei Baakerɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimanɨkei Baakeryawɨnna mabi yɨvanɨ'. “Baakeryaba pwara nɨmɨre kayaa'nanyabwi nanyangabɨka!” daka mabyɨvanɨ'.
Sara yada kɨrɨ' pwai nebulya'na tewaanna yadei Baakeryawɨnna nayaa bɨvanɨ'. “Baakeryabanna kwawa'mujɨ pwara yawɨta'na ‘Gotɨyarɨ yuya sa tewaanna jɨvanɨka!’ ” daka kaanna bɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sangɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ Kwaaka Juthɨya sawɨ Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerari kaanna. Mi'na kaanna yaka saba kumɨjɨ mwaalaka bavɨtaazɨya' aalya yɨna.

Bavɨtaazɨya' yadaa'nyɨ nabaai aalya naange' wa'dɨ'nyɨya'na Jonɨ Kwaaka Yɨnonɨ Anga Selimɨ pimagɨnna wawaka bavɨtaazɨya' yɨna. Bavɨtaazɨya' yɨna yada gamɨnyawɨnna a'mwera a'mwe samɨlɨka badaapi kumɨnyɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yɨna ya'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaa' tewaanna mwaalaka kalavuza mumwaaihyagaa' Jonɨmɨ.
Sagaa' Juyai yawɨ'na “Aalya yɨnya'nebwi yɨnɨga wi'na daaka? Be bavɨtaazɨyavaka nawɨ'nya'?” Dɨna yaka Jonɨmɨreraavɨ yagaala naanga wɨdɨna kya' maanga dɨnyɨna.

Mi'na dɨnyɨna kye' Jonɨmyawɨnna gamɨrera bɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakyaigɨ, kɨgaa' Aalya Jothanɨ pimagɨ pihɨrɨ mwaalagɨna a'mwe pwalyɨ mwaalagɨna sarɨna nejalɨkurakagɨnyalyɨ. Yɨthaa, dahaa' sai bavɨtaazɨya' yɨvanɨke' gamɨnyawɨnna yuyara wɨvanɨga'.”

Jonɨ ma'maa'na “Sarɨna sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨpɨnera! Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai a'mwerɨ mujaayɨ yaja' aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mamaari yannelyɨ. Gotɨyai dɨna ‘A'mwe pwai naangelyɨ. Pwai maalɨkelyɨ,’ sana sana yɨna yadelyɨ Gotɨyai.

Sarɨmɨ sahwaihi nɨmɨre yagaala kadɨka nyu'nesaihɨlyɨ. Dara yɨhɨthe. Gotɨyai dɨnɨka Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨ mɨka! Aawa. Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨdaasɨ nyɨdaasakeinyɨ. Dɨvi sahwai bathelyɨ, sara yɨhɨthe. Ke'ba'na yɨhɨthɨma!

Mɨgɨnyai taaya' maa'mwakelyɨ. Mudɨkangegaa' mɨgɨnyaryawɨnna taaya' wɨna. Wɨna kyɨwa' mɨgɨnyai yɨlaaya yɨna yaka wɨdɨna. Wɨdɨna kyɨwa' gya'mwei mwaalaka gamɨre maanguraayavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka yɨlaaya naanna yɨna. Taaya' gya'mweryawɨ mwaalɨke'na yɨlaaya yɨna yɨwa'. Sa'bɨsa'na a'mwera Jizaazaryawɨnna wɨna yɨvanɨgasa'na yɨlaaya yuna yɨvanɨge.
Gamɨ naangei nyavɨlavɨkelyɨ. Nɨmɨ naangeinyɨ myɨma'nɨwɨneinyɨ. Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨ yɨma'nɨdeinyɨ,” wɨdɨna ya' Jonɨ.

Munyabadaasɨ dɨragɨnyai walaabakei yuyainaavɨ nevɨlavɨkelyɨ. Kwaakevakɨdaasɨ pwaina Kwaakevakɨyaina kwaakevakɨyabwi wɨdɨna, kwaasɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdɨna yadaanyaine. Sɨgunyavɨdaasai yuyainaavɨ nevɨlavɨkelyɨ.
Sai Gotɨyaryaba tewaanyabwi tɨnna wanganakengɨ kadɨka wɨ'nakengɨ sangɨna jalɨkurakɨna. Sare jalɨkurakɨna kya' kɨrɨ' aane pwai kwai kadɨka wɨ'naka gamɨre yagaalya' mu'nya'. Aawa.
Pwai gamɨre jalɨkurakya' daapɨna yake' yɨ, “Gotɨyai nebulya'nanyai!” dɨragɨnna dɨna ya'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwarɨ Gotɨyai yasaabɨna kya' Gotɨyare yagaalyangɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai sahwarɨna gamɨre Kuryarɨ wɨjaavɨna ya'. Gotɨyai gamɨre Kuryarɨ maalɨ'na wɨjaavakarɨna mɨ'. Naanga yuyabwi wɨjaavakerɨna. Gotɨyai gamɨre Kuryarɨ yɨnahu wɨjaavake'na sai Gotɨyare yagaalya' nayaa wɨdɨna neya'.
Gawaalɨvaangerɨna Ganɨmaangerɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nada yɨlaaya yada dɨragɨnyajɨ yuyajɨ mwangɨna yada wɨdɨna “Yuya dɨmaremwaala!” wɨdakerɨna.

Gawaalɨvaangerɨ nayaa lɨmwaga'dei gaala yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nebwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Kwai Gawaalɨvaangerɨ malɨmwagaryadei gaalyabwi tɨnna mwanganyɨ. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨdayabwi sahwarɨ kuna wɨwarɨkelyɨ.
A'mwe Perɨzɨyara dara wɨ'nesa' “Ai, a'mwe kwalaalyara Jizaazarera yɨma'nyɨna yeva a'mwe pwai pwai Jonɨmɨrera yɨma'nyɨna. Jizaazai a'mwe kwala naangevɨ bavɨtaazɨya' jɨvanɨka!”
Sara wɨ'neta kwaraavɨ Jizaazai bavɨtaazɨya' mya'. Aawa. Gamɨrera gavera bavɨtaazɨya' yɨna ye'.
Perɨzɨyara sara dɨdaapi sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai sa'na wɨ'naka Kwaaka Juthɨya ya'ma'na yaka “Kwaaka Galɨlina ayɨna wɨma!” daka
Kwaaka Samerɨya lotaya'nei kaanna wɨna ya'.
Wawakegaa' Kwaaka Samerɨya Anga Saaika wo'nɨkebanna yɨ'mavaawɨna. Kɨgaakuna Ne Jaikopɨ gawaalɨvaanga Jozepɨyarɨne kwaake' wɨjayaakeba anga sa' mannɨkebe.

Nabaai saba Ne Jaikopɨ aalɨkavi'nɨnnya' lɨkyaakeba kavi'nɨnnya' kuna dɨ'na'dɨsɨyaba. Jizaazai kaanna kaanna wodaa'nyɨ maa'na naanga wiadaa'nyɨ sɨrɨgwajahaa' aalɨkavi'nɨnna sayabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka walamwaaina ya'.
Aalya yɨrya'ne' Kwaaka Samerɨya mwaalya' bɨna yɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Aalya' dɨnyɨryaama!”
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gamɨrera “Wapaaya mubaana!” deva anga savɨna wɨlaawɨna yesai gavei sara wɨdɨna ya'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe sa' wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ Juyaigɨ, nɨmɨ a'mwe'nyɨ Samerɨya mwaalya'nyɨ aalya'na nyɨwara'mwaanya'na gɨthɨwa.” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Samerɨya mwaalyara gwarewakɨ aalya' nyɨna yadɨvɨ' Juyara gwarewakɨna “Aala!” dadɨvɨsa'na wɨdɨna ya' a'mwe'.
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “ ‘Gotɨyare sɨhumale' nyɨjaavana!’ yawɨ'dɨza' a'mwe sai gɨthɨwaka sa' ‘Aalya' dɨnyɨryaama!’ gɨmɨ wɨdɨzɨ kwajɨ sai aalya' a'mwera gaala mwaaibɨne' kagɨzaavadɨka!”
A'mwe' wɨda' “A'mwe naangeigɨ, aalɨkavi'nɨnna da' saamɨnaange' warɨke' kebanɨ aalya' dɨ'nɨ'. Aalɨgware' maayaigɨnyɨ. Aalya' a'mwera gaala mwaaibɨ'de' gawɨ dɨmaa'jɨwaa?

Nemɨre Ne Jaikopɨ aalɨkavi'nɨnna da' nemɨnyɨne' kalɨkyaa' aalya kuna nadaanyannera. Gamɨjɨ gawaalɨvaangerari gamɨre jɨlɨkyaawaryarari aalya da' nyɨna yaa' aalɨkavi'nɨnna tewaanya davɨ. Sarei nemɨre Nei a'mwe naangelyɨ aalya naanga nejayaakei. ‘Aalya tewaanya naange' gɨzaavɨma!’ dahɨna gamɨnyɨ wavɨla'mwaanyaigɨ daa?”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwe yuyara aalya da' nadɨvɨ' dɨvi mɨjɨka ayɨna wiade' kɨrɨ'

a'mwe dai aalya' wɨjaavɨde' nojɨ yuyagaa' mɨjɨka mwi yadelyɨ. Arɨkewɨ. Aalya' wɨjaavɨde' gamɨre munyɨkɨ wɨlarojɨ nabaai yimɨnya' yɨma'nadelyɨ. Yimɨnyavɨdaasɨ aalya nawɨ'nya' bilyɨrɨ'na yada a'mwe savɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne' gaala wɨmwaaihadelyɨ.”
A'mwe' wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, aalya sa' nyɨjaama! ‘Na'muri mɨjɨka ayɨna manyojɨ davanna mabi ya'mujɨ aalya' myɨri yɨde'nyɨ,’ dena gɨthɨwa.”
Sai wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya a'mwerɨna duzɨma'naawa!”
Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe' ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwamaaya'nyɨ.” Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Naange' nyɨdɨwaana ‘A'mwamaaya'nyɨ.’
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Kɨgaa' a'mwe atɨlyaraavɨ maa'nagɨna kɨgaa' pɨgaa' yuyaraavɨ byenɨdakwawagɨ. Dahaa' a'mwe mwaaihɨlyai gɨmɨreina mɨka! Nebulya' sara nyɨdɨwaa.”
A'mwe' wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨna dara wangamwe' ‘O, a'mwe dai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei daaka!’
Mugunya davɨ nɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara Samerɨya mwaalyara Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yɨna. Sara yɨna kyaa' kɨrɨ' Juyaihi sahwaihi wɨdɨna ‘Aawa, Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya Jeruzaalemɨ yɨpɨ'deva.’ Sara nedɨvanɨga'.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ, gɨthɨde'na du'nana! Dɨvi pɨgaa' yɨma'nadehaa' mugunya davɨ a'mwera Nɨmwarɨ yɨlaaya mi yɨpɨ'de' Anga Jeruzaalemɨ yɨlaaya mi yɨpɨ'dehaakɨ. Aawa, yawɨta sabwi.

Kwaaka Samerɨya mwaalyaihi sɨduta maalɨka' yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya kwaasɨ kwaasɨ yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Juyainaavɨdaasɨ dakɨnɨkei bɨwaka, a'mweraavɨ padaihasamaa'de'na Gotɨyarɨ nayaa yawɨ'na yadaa yɨlaaya tewaanna yadaanyaine Juyaina.

Sare' kɨrɨ' sagaa' yɨma'nadehaa' gɨthɨwegaa', dahaa' mi'na yɨma'nɨwakegaa' a'mwera, a'mwe Nɨmwarɨ yɨlaaya nebwina yɨpɨ'dera. Kumɨre kuryara yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'de' nabaai, nebulya'na yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'dera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sara yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'deraavɨna Gotɨyai dɨna ‘Sahwara yɨlaaya nyɨpɨka!’ dadelyɨ.
Gotɨyai Kuryalyɨ. A'mwei mɨka. Sare'na a'mwera kumɨre kuryaraavɨjɨ nebulyaburɨjɨ yɨlaaya yɨpɨnerera. Yaasɨwa'na yɨlaaya mipɨna!”
A'mwe sa' wɨdɨna “Dara yawɨ'mwa. Dɨvi Mezaayai yaya pɨrɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai wo'nɨkei bathelyɨ. Sai bazai yuyabwi, yuyangɨ nedathelyɨ.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Dahaa' gɨthɨvanɨge dainyɨ nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ.”

Sagaasagaa' Jizaazarera yagalaawɨna yeva dara wanganesa' “Ai, a'mwevɨ wɨdɨvanɨkei daaka!” Deva atɨka maru'na'na yeva kɨrɨ' kumɨjɨya aane pwai kwai savɨ mujɨna “Baa'na bahɨneka?” sarɨ myɨwaarayɨna “A'mwe savɨ baa'na wɨdɨvanɨgɨna?” Sara mujɨ, navɨka mwaalɨna ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe' gannya aalɨgware' wakɨna yaka gannya angebanna ayɨna wɨlaawɨna yaka a'mwe anga sabanyaraavɨ wɨdɨna
“Ai, a'mweihi kaajɨla! A'mwe pwarɨ danganyɨla! Yuya yadɨnyanna nyɨdɨwakelyɨ. Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakei Mezaayai dɨngaka?”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' anga saba ya'ma'na yeva sahwaryawɨnna wɨna ye'.
Angebanna a'mwe' wodaa'nyɨ gamɨrera Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, wapaa dɨmaranana!”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' wɨda' “Aala, wapaa pɨnɨjɨyainyɨ sarɨmɨ mwanganya.”
Mi'na wɨdɨna wɨyakevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨrera yɨwaara'nyɨna “Pwai wapaaya dahamakabɨwaka?”

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre wapaaya pɨrɨsɨ. Da'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nyɨdasaabakei sara nyɨdɨvanɨkebwi gamɨre sɨmunyabwi sara yɨvanɨge'na nɨmɨre wapaayasɨ. Gamɨre wawɨnya' mi'na yɨ'mwannya'ne' nɨmɨre wapaayasɨ.

Sarɨmɨ wawɨnya tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' dara dɨdɨvɨ' midaaka! ‘Lawe dɨkaai dɨkaai kwavɨlavojɨ wapaaya mɨlaadera.’ Yɨhɨthɨwa. Dahaa' sa' madɨpɨna! Yɨthaanyi! Wawɨnya keinɨngɨ nayaa danganyɨla! Kɨgaa' pwara burɨnna yeva witɨzɨla yawaka yɨ'nɨkabaaibɨ' a'mwera nɨmɨnyɨna yarai nyu'nɨpɨ'derera.

Pwai wapaaya mɨlojɨ mɨlojɨ kave yovɨrawakade' gamɨre tɨvɨkɨta mena maa'manɨ'. Yɨ witɨzɨla yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwine mena yovɨrawakɨvanɨ'. Sɨla pɨraihɨrakadelyɨ wapaaya yovɨrawakadelyɨ ‘Witɨzɨla mena warɨke'na yɨlaaya yaka!’ dahɨla sara yovɨrawakɨvanɨ'. Sa'na pwai Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨna yadelyɨ pwai a'mwera Gotɨyareraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yadelyɨ saraai sare'na yɨlaaya yɨkaderaalyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Darevɨ nebulya' dɨdɨvɨ' ‘A'mwe pwai burɨnna yadelyɨ. A'mwe pwai midelyɨ.’ Yɨ sa' nebulyasɨ.

Wawɨnya pɨrɨvɨ sarɨmɨ myesavɨna ‘Wapaaya dɨmaaryɨla!’ yɨhɨthɨwe. Wawɨnya savɨ pwara mɨraagɨkɨ'na kye' sarɨmɨ kumɨre wapaaya dɨmaaryidengɨ. Sɨnnawɨ pwara a'mweraavɨ Gotɨyare yagaala wɨjɨwaakɨna yadɨvɨ' dahaa' sarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' kudapɨjɨ a'mwera nɨmɨrera yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera,” wɨdɨna ya'.

Anga saba mwaalyara Kwaaka Samerɨya mwaalya kwalaalyara a'mwevɨre jalɨkurakya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna “Yuya yadɨnyanna nyɨdɨwakelyɨ.” Sara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva Jizaazarɨ lɨmwanna yadɨvɨ' “Mezaayai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakelyɨ,” dɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kwaaka Samerɨya mwaalyara gamɨnyawɨnna wɨna yeva dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna “Nemɨnyawɨ se da'mwaka!” Wɨdɨna kye' savɨ yɨrɨka daryaai mwaalɨna.
Mwaalɨna yada gamɨre yagaala wɨdɨna yake'na pwara kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ lɨmwanna yeva dɨna “Mezaayalyɨ. Gotɨyai dahɨlakakelyɨ!”

Dɨna yeva a'mwevɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai, dahaa' gamɨnyɨ lɨmwamanɨgo. Nedɨwaanya'na mɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ sahwaina kadɨka wɨ'nona dara yawɨ'manɨgo' ‘O, nebulya', Kwaaka davakɨ mwaalyaraavɨna Naangei padaihasamaaradei daaka!’ Sara dona gamɨnyɨ lɨmwamanɨgo.”
Anga saba sawɨta daryaai Jizaazai wa'mwaraka saba ya'ma'na yaka Kwaaka Galɨlina wɨna.
Jizaazai sahwai wɨdake' “Gannyaba mwaalyara a'mwe pɨropetɨyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakaderɨ mujɨ ‘A'mwe naangeigɨnyɨ,’ mujɨ yadɨvɨsalyɨ.” Wɨdake'na Galɨlina wɨna.

Mi'na wɨna kya' saba mwaalyara gamɨnyɨna maarɨna. Anga Jeruzaalemɨ Pari'ma'munne'na kaanna yeva munnegaa' Jizaazai yuyangɨ tewaanna yadaa'nyɨyangɨ tɨnna wanganeva “Tewaanyasɨ,” desa'na gamɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yɨna ye'.

Kwaaka Galɨli Anga Kena mannɨkebanna Jizaazai ayɨna wɨna. Saba kɨgaa' dɨragɨnna kya' aangaalya' wa'dɨ'nyɨ aalya waainɨya' yɨma'nɨkebe. Anga pɨba Kaapanɨyamɨ kingɨyare a'mwe naangei mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ gamɨre kaimɨraayai nabalɨnakei warɨna ya'.

Jizaazai Anga Kenana ayɨna wɨna kya' kingɨyare sai dara wɨ'nake' “Galɨlina Juthɨyadaa'nyai Jizaazai damwaalɨ'!” Mi'na daka gamɨnyawɨnna wɨna yaka yɨdaangana' “Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayai yarai balade'na nɨmɨjɨ wawa'gɨzɨ nabalya sa' dɨmarasɨ'nana! Yarala!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre yawɨ'dɨvɨsabwi yawɨ'mwa. Nɨmɨre yɨjɨwaainyajɨ dɨragɨnyajɨ sarɨmɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨpɨja' nɨmɨnyɨ manyɨlɨmwagyɨ jideihɨlyɨ.”
Kingɨyarei kave wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, nɨnnya kaimalei nabaladɨka! Naarɨmɨ yarai wawaka!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya angevɨna kaanna dɨwona! Gɨnnya kaimalei mabalyai mwaalɨ'. Nabalya' maayai mwaalɨ'.”
Jizaazai wɨdake' a'mwe sai lɨmwanna yaka dɨna yada “Nebulyasɨ,” kaanna wɨna.
Gannya angevɨna kuna kaanna wɨna yadaa'nyɨ gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayai tewaanya mwaalɨ'. Nabalya' aawa.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai yɨwaara'na “Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayarɨna gathɨngaa' yɨwɨwaka?” Sara yɨwaara'na kya' wɨdɨna “Wona sɨrɨgwajahaa' waanɨ kɨlokɨyagaa' kɨlaaka dɨka menanyɨra.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ganɨmaangei yawɨ'na “Yo, sagaasagaa' Jizaazai nyɨjawaalɨ' ‘Gɨnnya kaimalei tewaanyai mwaalɨ'.’ ” Sara yawɨ'na yaka kɨnɨdaka sahwarɨ lɨmwanna yesanɨdakera.
Kwaaka Juthɨyadaasɨ Kwaaka Galɨlina yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka Kwaaka Galɨli yɨjɨwaainya' kaimalerɨna yake' dɨragɨnya pɨrɨwaalya' ya'.
Sare mena kyɨma'na' Juyara Gotɨyarɨna tɨka munne' nadɨvɨsagaa' kyɨma'na' Anga Jeruzaalemɨna Jizaazai kaanna wɨna ya'.
Jeruzaalemɨ saba Sipɨzipɨtɨkurya' wo'nɨkevɨ pimagɨnyavɨ aalɨbunya' dɨ'na'na ya'. Aalɨbumaangevɨ yɨhulɨvɨlɨya ati mannɨ'. Aalɨbunya sa' “Bethezɨtha,” Yɨvɨruyagaala wo'nɨkesɨ.
Yɨhulɨvɨlɨyangɨ nalaavɨnaka kwala naanga mwaalɨna ye'. Nalaavɨnakera pwara tɨbɨnyara, pwara sɨvɨla nadɨya yɨnɨkera, pwara kɨlaaka bainɨkera mwaalɨna ye'. Savɨ yuyara aalya' kwaayakwaaya'na yemwaaina.

Pɨgaa', pɨgaa' aalyavɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaasai Naangere mamaayai ejelɨyai walaabɨna yaka aalya' gɨnyɨwanna. Sara gɨnyɨwanna kya' sagaa' sɨnnawɨnyai nalaavɨnakei aalya sɨnaapwipulyavɨ yarai walaawɨna, yɨthaa, maamɨdaryai yɨma'nakelyɨ.
Yemwaaina yadɨvɨ' nabaai, a'mwe akwai yemwaaina yada kwarame naanga naanga (kwarame 38) wavɨla'daa'nyai nalaavɨnakei mwaalɨna.
Sai mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ Jizaazai bɨna yaka yawɨ'na “We', a'mwe sai nalaavɨnakei kwarame kwalaalya mwaaidelyɨ,” yawɨ'na yaka wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre sɨmunya ‘Maamɨdaryainyɨ yɨma'nɨma!’ yawɨ'dɨnyaigɨ daaka?”

Nalaavɨnakei ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, aalya' kwaaya yadaa'nyɨyagaa' ‘Aalɨbunyavɨ nyɨmarapaihana!’ dena a'mwe bewai yanneka? Walaawɨna yadaazɨ sɨnnawɨ pwai yarai wavɨla'na nyada aalyavɨ paihɨnyɨna yadelyɨ.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Daava'gɨzɨ nalabwarya' pwala'gɨzɨ kaanya dɨmakwo!”
Sara kuda' yɨme'nya'bɨ' a'mwei maamɨdaryai yɨma'naka gannya nalabwarya' pwalaka kaanna wɨna ya'.
Sagaa' Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakegaa'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara naangera nalaavɨnakei tewaanyai yɨma'nakerɨ wɨdɨna “Juyainaavɨre Kwazaakegaakɨ. Nemɨre kɨwɨnya' dɨnɨ' ‘Kwazaakegaa' nalabwarya' mamakunnera!’ Sara dɨnɨkegaa' be'na makuvanɨgɨna?”
Sai wɨdɨna “A'mwei maamɨdarya nyɨdɨkaa'mwakei nyɨdɨwa' ‘Gɨnnya nalabwarya' pwala'gɨzɨ kaanya dɨmakwo!’ Sara kanyɨdɨwakɨra.”
Kumɨ yɨwaara'na “ ‘Gɨnnya nalabwarya' pwala'gɨzɨ dɨmakwo!’ gɨthɨwakei aaihwalaka?”
Yɨwaara'na kye' kɨrɨ' tewaanya yɨma'nakei myawɨrina. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Aalɨbunyavɨ kwala naanga mwaaidapi Jizaazai kave wɨna kya' sai sahwarɨna wɨda' “Aaihwai dɨngaka?”

Dɨvi sagaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ Jizaazai gamɨnyɨ bɨramaaraka wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa, dahaa' maamɨdaryaigɨ mwaaihɨ. Kayaa'nanyabwi minna! Kɨgaa' nabalya kayaaka gihaideigɨnyɨ. Aya kayaa'nanaanga gyade'bɨta naanga pɨrɨ' nagyathɨka! Gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya minna!”
A'mwei Jizaazarɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yakegaa' Juyara naangeraayawɨnna wɨdaawɨna “A'mwei maamɨdarya nyɨdɨkaa'mwakei Jizaazalyɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ naangera dara yawɨresa' “Nɨwaava, Juyainaavɨre Kwazaakegaa' kayaaka'na a'mwe sai sabwi yadei daaka!” Sara deva Jizaazaryawɨnna kaanna yeva sagaa' Kwazaakegaa' sara yake'na “Balana!” deva maanga gaai wɨdɨna.
Maanga gaai wɨdɨna yadɨvɨ' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Dahaa'na nɨnnya Nɨmwai yɨvanɨkegaa'nanyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨ yɨvanɨgeinyɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai sara wɨdakegaa' Juya naangera dɨnyɨna “Nemɨre kɨwɨnya' Kwazaakegaa'na kayaaka yɨwa'. Sa' kayaa'nanyasɨ. Kayaa'nanya' kɨrɨ' nedɨwa' ‘Gotɨyai nɨnnya Nɨmwalyɨ,’ sa' kayaa'nanaangesɨ. Yarai balana!” Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai nɨnnya Nɨmwalyɨ,” yaka “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ avaalyainyɨ,” dɨnɨke'na dɨnyɨna ye' Juyara.

Juya naangera dɨnyɨna yesagaa' Jizaazai gamɨnyɨna wɨda' “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gawaalɨvaangei gamɨre sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yannei mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmwai yadaawori wanganajanna yadelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuya Nɨmwai yade Gawaalɨ' yɨvanɨke sahɨnɨngɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmwarɨ Gawaalɨvaangerɨna wɨvu'nade'na Nɨmwai sahwai wawɨnya yɨvanɨka yuya sa yɨbwarɨdaakwadelyɨ. Gawaalɨ' nabalɨnakerɨ tewaanya yaka wawɨnya maalɨkesɨ. ‘Sarɨmɨ atɨka maru'na'na jɨla!’ daka Nɨmwai wawɨnya naange wibwarɨdaakwojɨ Gawaalɨ' sana yadelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmwai bainɨkeraavɨ yɨdɨkaa'da gaala wɨjaavadevaaibɨ' Gawaalɨ' ‘ “Sahwaraavɨ yɨdɨkaavɨma!” da'mujɨ wɨmwaaihɨma!’ dozɨ gaalyabwi wɨjaavadelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmwai aane pwarɨ kwarɨ kotɨya' mujadelyɨ. Aawa. Wawɨnya savɨna dɨragɨnya' Gawaalɨvaangerɨ kujaawa' sai kotɨya yuyanna wɨdathelyɨ.

Sarevɨ ‘A'mwe yuyara Nɨmwainyɨne yaya' munyabanna makimanɨgatabaaibɨ' Nyɨbwaalɨvɨne yaya' makibɨka!’ daka wɨjaawakelyɨ. Gawaalɨvaangerɨne yaya' munyaba mamakɨlyadei yɨ sai Nɨmwai wɨdasaabakerɨne yaya' mamakɨlyadelyɨ.

Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwei yagaalyavɨ kadɨka nyu'najai Gotɨyai nyɨdasaabakerɨ lɨmwaga'na yojɨ sagaasagaa' yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Sai kotɨya' jɨdaya'neba wɨlaabathei mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwai balyaburɨdaa'nyɨ gaalyaburɨna mena ga'ma'na yɨwakelyɨ.
Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Pɨgaa' yɨma'nya'negaa' dahaa' bainɨkera balyabwi yadɨvɨsara Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangere maanguraaya' kadɨka mena wɨ'napɨjɨ nabaai, kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨjara gaala mwaaibɨ'dere.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmwai dɨragɨnna mwaalɨkei gamɨ sahwai gaalyabwine aaya kaavɨlyai mwaalɨkabaaibɨ' Gotɨyai Gawaalɨvaangerɨna dɨna kya' Gawaalɨvaangei gamɨ sahwai gaalyabwine aaya kaavɨlyalyɨra.
Sahwai, A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai mwaalɨke'na Gotɨyai wɨda' ‘Dɨragɨnya' kagɨzaawa a'mweraavɨna kotɨya' jawɨbwa'deigɨnyɨ.’
Sara wɨdaka sa' atɨka mamaru'napɨna! Dɨvi pɨgaa' yɨma'najahaa' wakadɨvɨsangɨdaa'nyɨ baryara gamɨre maanguraayavɨ wɨ'napɨri

kunnya wakɨnɨkeba yagalya'ma'na, walyaabɨna yɨpɨ'dere. Pwara mwaalyagaa' tewaanna mwaaibɨzara dɨkaavapɨjɨ gaalyabwi maapɨ'dere. Pwara mwaalyagaa' kayaa'na mwaaibɨzara kadɨkaavapɨjɨ kotɨya' jɨdasabwi maapɨ'dere.

Nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mi yɨwɨneinyɨ. Yagaala Nɨmware wɨ'nɨwebaaibɨ' maryawɨbwa'manɨge a'mweraavɨ kotɨya'na. Nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ mabɨramaarivanɨge. Aawa. Nyɨdasaabaka sare sɨmunya' maa'manɨge'na nɨmɨre yawɨbwata sa' yɨda'maraangesɨ.
Sahwainyɨ gaveinyɨ ‘Naangeinyɨ,’ jalɨkurakɨmujɨ kwajɨ pwara ‘Nebulya' mɨka!’ kadɨpɨdɨka!
Nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa jalɨkurakadei pwai mwaalɨ'. Yagaala sara yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨke' ‘Jalɨkurakya sa' nebulyasɨ,’ yawɨ'mwa.
Jonɨmyawɨnna sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ kudaase' Jonɨ nebulyaburɨna yɨhɨzalɨkuraka'.
Sare'na a'mwe gaveraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna jalɨkurakyabwina mamaaryadɨnyainyɨ. Aawa. ‘Sarɨmɨnyɨ nayaa yɨhɨvadaihasamaarɨma!’ dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Jonɨ yɨhɨthake'na

Jonɨ dɨ'baakelyɨ. Dɨ'baaka sai naka a'mweraavɨna wanyɨna yakelyɨ. Jonɨ mwaalaka gannya baake' sarɨmɨnyɨna wanyɨna yake', maalɨkegaa' baaka savɨna gamɨre yagaalyavɨna yɨlaaya yesaihɨlyɨ. Jonɨ nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa yɨhɨthakelyɨ.

Nabaai, nɨmɨnyɨna jalɨkurakya pɨnɨ warɨke Jonɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ wavɨla'na yaka dɨnɨkengɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuya yɨvanɨge Nɨmwai ‘Sana ja!’ nyɨdade wawɨnya sa yɨvanɨge tɨnna wanganeva dara yawɨ'mwaasa' ‘O, Jizaazai sara yade'na Ganɨmaangei wɨdasaabakei daaka!’ Jalɨkurakya sahɨrɨsɨ.

Nɨmɨre wawɨnya sa nɨmɨnyɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨka nabaai, Nɨmwai nyɨdasaabakei nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa jalɨkurakɨwakelyɨ. Sare'na sarɨmɨ gamɨre maanguraaya' kadɨka mu'nyadɨvɨ' gamɨre sɨnnya' tɨnna mwanganyadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Arɨkawɨ.
Sarɨmɨre sɨdusangɨ gamɨre yagaalya' mwarɨbainyɨ'. Sahwai nyɨdasaabakeinyɨ dainyɨ manyɨlɨmwagyadɨvɨsa'na gamɨre yagaalya' mwarɨbainyɨna.

Sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na ‘Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ mwaalɨma!’ yawɨ'na yadɨvɨsa'na Gotɨyare bukuya' kave bɨrɨna bɨrɨna yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨke sahɨnɨ nɨmɨnyɨna jalɨkurakɨnɨkeinyɨra.
Nɨmɨnyɨna dɨnɨke'na kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ ‘Gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ mwaalɨma!’ deva nɨmɨnyawɨnna dɨvide' sarɨnnya sɨmunyangɨ myawɨrivanɨga'.
Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Yɨlaaya yaadeina daaka!’ dɨpɨja' sarɨmɨresɨ. A'mweraavɨ byaannya' mamaarivanɨge.
Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'mwa. Sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nadevwi mwari'. Sare' yawɨ'mwa.
Nɨmware dɨragɨnya' maarena gamɨnyɨne yayavɨ bɨwa. Kabɨwa kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ mamaari. Pwai gannya dɨragɨnya' maarojɨ gannya yayavɨ bazai, yɨ sahwarɨ dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ.

Sahwaihi sarɨmɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe tewaanyalyɨ,’ deva yɨlaaya marivanɨgasa' byaannya' wɨjaavanɨgasa'na ‘Gotɨyai gavei yɨlaaya neyana!’ majaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ sara yadɨvɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna gara dɨnyɨlɨmwagyideihɨlaka? ‘Naangeigɨnyɨ,’ gara dɨzideihɨlaka?

Sare'na myawɨri yadɨvɨ' dɨvi sarɨmɨ dɨnyɨna yɨpɨ'de ‘Ganɨmaangerɨ nemɨnyɨna kotɨya' jɨna yadei daaka!’ Sara myawɨpɨna! Aawa, nɨmɨ kotɨya' jɨna myɨwɨna! Sarɨmɨ Ne Mozɨzarɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Sai nevadaihasamaaradelyɨ,’ dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' Ne Mozɨzai sarɨmɨnyɨna kotɨya' jɨna yɨhyathelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Mozɨzai nɨmɨnyɨna bukuya' yɨda'nɨke'na sarɨmɨ Ne Mozɨzarɨ nayaa lɨmwanna yɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ kanyɨlɨmwabɨthɨka!
Kwaasɨ yadɨvɨ' Mozɨzai yɨda'nɨke malɨmwagi yeva yagaala yɨhɨthɨwe gara dɨnyɨlɨmwagyideihɨlaka?”
Sare mena kyɨma'na' Aalɨbunya Galɨli (yaya pɨrɨ' Aalɨbunya Taaivɨrɨyaazavɨ) Jizaazai sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaina kya' pimagɨnna makuna.
Makuna kya' kwala bwa'naanya' mɨdɨnna. Yɨjɨwaainya naange Jizaazai nalaavɨnakera tewaanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yake tɨnna wanganna yesa'na Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨnna yeva gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna.
Mi'na bɨna kye' mugunyavɨ yɨlaawɨna yaka saba gamɨrerari walamwaaina.
Sagaa' Juyaraavɨre Pari'ma'munne'negaa' aya kɨgaa' yɨma'nakegaakɨ.

Walamwaaina yaka Jizaazai wanganaasɨna yaka tɨnna dara wanganake' “Nɨmɨnyawɨnna kwala naanga davɨvanɨga'!” Sara dake'na Pilipɨmɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘A'mwe dara wapaaya nɨpɨka!’ dona gɨrɨkula yuyaraavɨne gawɨ mubaazɨwona?”
Jizaazai Pilipɨmɨna dɨna “Gara nyɨdazɨhyɨwaka? Yaamɨjɨ wɨdɨma!” Sare' dare'nesɨ. “Sara yɨdeinyɨ,” mena yakei.
Pilipɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “We', ‘Gazaizai maalɨke' maarana!’ dona kinaaya 200 (tu aadɨretɨ) wapaaya bɨretɨyanne mubaazɨ kwajɨ wi'na yɨma'nade' mɨ'.”
Gamɨre pwai Edɨruyai Saaimonɨ Pitare gahwaalaangei Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna
“Dava kaimale pwai yɨsɨla baali bɨretɨya atɨlyajɨ jawɨnya pɨrɨwaalyɨ sa kɨnɨnnakei mwaalɨ'. Sare kɨrɨ' a'mwe kwalaalya darera tɨka nya'ne wapaaya sa benɨngaka!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨ a'mwengɨ duzɨla! ‘Dalamwaalyɨla!’ ” Saba kurɨdarya naangebe. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera a'mwe walamwaaina. A'mwera gavera kwalaalyara (5,000) mwaalɨna yeva walamwaaina.

Yuya, a'mwera a'mwe walamwaaina kye' Jizaazai bɨretɨya sa maarɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨna kya' bɨretɨya naanga yɨma'nadaa'nyɨ a'mwe walamwaaina yadapiyangɨna yanga wɨjaavɨna. Wɨjaavɨna yaka bɨretɨya wɨjaavakabaaina jawɨnyawaai wɨjaavɨna kya' “Sare' nɨma!” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sara nyɨna kye' munya wina'.
Munya kwina' sai gamɨreraavɨ wɨda' “Nagihɨwaasa yaasɨwa' warya nyadɨka! Wapaaya wa'mwaka yuya dɨmaaryi!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨrera sara yeva soigɨlya atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨwaalyangɨ mihɨna mihɨna kye' maanga yeku'nyɨna. A'mwera a'mwe yɨsibaalibɨretɨya nagihesa soigɨlya sangɨ maanga yeku'nyɨna ya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera Jizaazai yɨjɨwaainya sa' yake' tɨnna wanganna yeva dɨnyɨna “Gotɨyai wɨjaaka ‘Kwaakevakɨ nyu'nawɨjɨwaakadei bathelyɨra,’ wɨjaakei sahwalyɨ. Nebulyasɨra. Sahwalyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai dara wanganake' “ ‘Kingɨyai nemaremwaaladei yɨma'nana!’ dapi yarai galalɨmwanna nyɨpɨ'dera daaka!” Sara daka mugunyavɨ ayɨna yɨlaawɨna ya' gavei.
Sawɨtɨrɨnyagaa' aalɨbumaangebaarɨna gamɨrera walaawɨna yeva
sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kye' aalɨbunyavɨ Anga Kaapanɨyamɨna makuna. Sawɨsa' kajɨnna' kumɨnyawɨnna Jizaazai kuna mabya'.
Sɨpɨya' makuna yadaa'nyɨ yɨhuta naange' yaka aalɨmavajɨnaaka naanga yɨna yadaa'nyɨ

naangeba (5 kilomitaaya pɨnɨ, 6 kilomitaaya kɨnɨ) gamɨrera sɨpɨya' yɨsajɨ aalyavɨ maarɨmaarya yɨna. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aalyavɨ a'ba Jizaazai ga'nɨguna yaka sɨpɨyavɨ aya kɨbanna yɨ'ma'na yakerɨ tɨnna wanganna yeva lɨka naanga yɨna.
Lɨka naanga yɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨra. Lɨka mipɨnera!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera dɨna “Sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaalana!” Dɨna kye' sahwai yɨlamwaaina kya' sagaa' “Sabanna yɨ'mavawaana!” desabanna sɨpɨya' yarai yɨma'naabɨna ya'.

Mwanyavɨ aalɨbunya pimagɨ kwala bwa'naanya' kuna mwaalɨna yeva dara yawɨresa' “O, wona sɨpɨya pɨnɨ mwari kyɨwa'dɨ' gave' yɨla'mwa'dɨke' daaka!” Nabaai, dara yawɨresa' “Sɨpɨya' gannyarajɨ Jizaazai milamwaalyɨ yawaalɨ'. Aawa. Sahwarɨ ya'ma'na kyawaaiha' sɨpɨya' gavera damakwiawaalɨka!”
Dadaapi Anga Taaivɨrɨyaazɨdaa'nyɨ aalɨbumaanga sabaarɨna sɨpɨya pɨnɨ bɨna. Naangei Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨna kya' kwala bwa'naanya' bɨretɨya nesaba samwinebanna sɨpɨya sa bɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya' dara wanganesa' “O, Jizaazai pwai midaaka! Jizaazarera pwara midaaka!” Mena deva sɨpɨya sangɨ yɨlamwaaina yeva “Jizaazarɨna bɨraana!” deva Anga Kaapanɨyamɨna wɨna ye'.
Aalɨbunyavɨ a'mwera ga'ma'na yeva Jizaazarɨna bɨrɨna bɨrɨna yeva bɨramaa'na yeva yɨwaara'na “Wɨjɨwaakyaigɨ, dava gathɨngaa' bɨwaa?”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna yadɨnyangɨna yɨjɨwaainyangɨna sɨdusa' nayaa myawɨryadɨvɨ' nyɨbɨ'manɨga'. Aawa. Bɨretɨya neva munya yɨhinyawaalɨke'na nyɨbɨ'manɨga'.

Wapaaya bwia bu'denna wawɨnya' minna! Aawa. Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalya'ne wapaaya ge waragwode sanna wawɨnya' jɨ! Wapaaya sa A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai gɨzaavadengɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai Ganɨmaangei gannya dɨragɨnya' kujaava' baavanaka sahwai sara yadelyɨra.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘Nemɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnyanna yaana!’ dona gara yawaajɨ yaadeinaavaka?”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Gotɨyare wawɨnya sa'na daresɨ. Sahwai wɨdasaabakerɨna dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwagarila!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai, ‘Nemɨ tɨnna wanganawaajɨ gɨlɨmwagaana!’ dawaajɨ yɨjɨwaainya' garɨvɨ dɨneyɨdevaka? Berɨ' jɨzɨwaana?
A'mwamaayaba Ne sɨnnawɨnyara sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya wapaaya manaaya nyaasare. Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. Sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ wapaaya tɨka nya'ne wɨjaava'. Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Mozɨzai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya wapaaya' mena yɨhɨzayaakei mɨka! Aawa. Nɨmaamaangei yuyagaa' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya Wapaaya Nebulyarɨ yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare Wapaayai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyai Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨna gaalyabwi wɨjaavadelyɨ yuyagaa'.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, yuyagaa' wapaaya nedɨwaanya' dɨnejaadeigɨnyɨ.”

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gaalyabwine wapaaya sai sahwainyɨ. A'mwera aawapaaya tɨka nyɨna yadɨvɨ' ayawɨ mɨjɨka yɨna. Aalya nyɨna yadɨvɨ' ayawɨ mɨjɨka yadɨvɨtara. Pwai nɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨlaabozɨ gannya kuryai mɨjɨka mwi. Arɨkewɨ. Sai nyɨlɨmwagozɨ aalya'na mwinyɨ yadelyɨ. Arɨkawɨ.
Aawa. Nabaai, pɨrɨwaaina dara yɨhɨthɨwa. Tɨnna nyangamwaasainyɨ. Manyɨlɨmwagyɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ.
Nɨmwai nyɨjaavajara yuyara nɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨpɨ'deinyɨ. Nɨmɨnyawɨnna sara bozɨyarɨ mwasɨmagɨnna marasɨ'nɨdei mɨka. Arɨkewɨ.
Nɨmɨ ‘Nɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi miwɨna! Aawa. Nyɨdasaabakere sɨmunyabwi yɨma!’ dena Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walaabeinyɨ.
Nyɨdasaabakere sɨmunyabwi daresɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨna yuyaraavɨ nyɨjaavake aane pwarɨ kwarɨ myagalya'mayainyɨ. Aawa. Yɨrɨka Aayagaa' sahwarɨ tewaanna yɨdɨkaavɨdelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmaamaangere sɨmunyabwi dara yawɨ'manɨkesɨ. Gazaizai Nyɨbwaalɨvɨ wanganojɨ sahwarɨ lɨmwagarojɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maarana! Sara kanyɨda' Yɨrɨka Aayagaa' sahwarɨ yɨdɨkaavɨdelyɨ.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Wapaayainyɨ walaabeinyɨ.” Wɨdɨna yake'na Juyara pwara jɨkurya yeva kɨnɨmyagaala dɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dɨnyɨna “Baa'na nedɨwa'? A'mwe dai Jizaazai Jozepɨyare gawaalɨvaangei daaka! Ganɨmaangerɨnajɨ ganaangevɨnajɨ yawɨ'mwo. ‘Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walaabeinyɨ,’ gara nedɨwakelaka!”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Jɨkurya yeva kɨnɨmyagaala dɨmanɨgasa'na mipɨnera!
Nɨmwai nyɨdasaabakei nɨmɨnyawɨnna aane pwarɨ kwarɨ mamwagi'nya yaja' sai nɨmɨrei yɨma'nya'nei mabyɨ yannelyɨ. Nɨmwai sahwarɨ mwagi'nyɨ yajarɨ Yɨrɨka Aayagaa' tewaanna mwaalade'na yɨdɨkaavɨdeinyɨ.

Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyara yɨdayaasangɨ dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakadelyɨ. Sara dɨnɨke' gazaizai Nɨmwarɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yojɨ gamɨre wɨjɨwaakya' maarɨna yada sahwai nɨmɨnyawɨnna bathelyɨ.
A'mwe pwai kwai Nɨmwarɨ mwanganyadei mɨ'. Gotɨyaryawɨdaasai dazahwai gaveina wangana' Nɨmwarɨ.
Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe nyɨlɨmwagarajai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
Sahwainyɨ gaalyabwine Wapaayainyɨ.
A'mwamaayaba sarɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara wapaaya manaaya' nyaata kwara balɨna.
Balɨna yaasa' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Wapaayai walaabɨna yake' daresɨ. Pwai kwai Wapaaya sarɨ maranajai mabalyɨ yadelyɨ.

Wapaaya sai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walaabeneinyɨ sahwainyɨ. A'mwe pwai kwai Wapaaya sainyɨ nyɨnajai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' tewaanya mwaaladelyɨ. Wapaaya nɨmɨ wɨjaavɨwɨja' nɨmɨre mɨwɨsajɨ'na nabaai Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨna mɨwɨta sajɨ' muba'mujɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ gaalyabwi wɨmaaridezɨkɨra.”
Sara wɨdakevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara maanga naanga dɨnyɨna yeva yɨwaara'nyɨna “A'mwe dai gannya mɨwɨsajɨ' nya'ne' gara nejaavannelaka!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayare mɨwɨsajɨsɨ gamɨre tawesɨ manyɨ yɨja' sahwaigɨnyɨ gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakeigɨ mɨ'.
A'mwei nɨmɨre mɨwɨsajɨ' nyɨna, nɨmɨre tawe' najai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨrɨka Aayagaa' sai baryarɨ yɨdɨkaavɨdelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨre mɨwɨsajɨ' wapaaya nebulyasɨ. Nɨmɨre tawe' aalya nyɨnya'ne nebulyasɨ.
A'mwei nɨmɨre mɨwɨsajɨ' nyɨna, nɨmɨre tawe' najai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlamwaaina nyadelyɨ. Sarɨ wɨlamwaaina yɨdelyɨ.
Nɨmwai yuyagaa' gaala mwaaida mwaalɨkei nyɨdasaabakeinyɨ Nɨmware dɨragɨnya'na mwaaihevaaibɨ' a'mwei nyɨnajai nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya'na mwaaladelyɨ.
Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Wapaaya sai walaabakelyɨ. Ne sɨnnawɨnyara wapaaya manaaya' neva balyaasa' wapaaya sabaaibɨta' mɨka! A'mwei Wapaaya sai najai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gaala mwaaladelyɨ.”
Anga Kaapanɨyamɨ Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yada yuya sa sara wɨda'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wɨdake' gamɨrera kwalaalyara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva dɨnyɨna “Yagaala sa' taangesɨ. Aai wɨ'nojɨ daapadevaka!”

Jizaazai gannya sɨmunyavɨ dara yawɨrake' “Nɨmɨre mɨdɨdɨvɨsara savɨna kɨnɨmyagaala yɨvanɨgasara daaka!” Sara daka wɨdɨna “Yɨhɨthɨwe'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨ navɨka galayɨgala jɨhyɨwaka! Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨnyasɨ'nyideihi daaka?
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨnnawɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai mwaalakewɨnna ayɨna yɨlaawɨna kyojɨ sarɨmɨ wangabɨza' sagaa' garevaka!

Yuyagaa'ne gaala sabwi Gotɨyare Kuryai yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ. A'mweraavɨre mɨwɨsajɨkɨ dɨmaaryidevwina mɨ'. Yagaala sa nɨmɨnyɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge sa Gotɨyare Kuryaina yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yagaala sa gaalyabwinenna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.

Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ pwaihi manyɨlɨmwagyɨvanɨgasaihi mwaaiha'.” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Aayawɨdaasɨ Jizaazai malɨmwagyɨ yɨpɨjaraavɨna mena yawɨrake' nabaai sɨnnawɨ “Yɨnagaawai yɨkamaangeraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna wibwarɨdaakwadei daaka!” mena yawɨrakelyɨ.
Sai wɨdaka wɨdɨna “Sarevɨ dara yɨhɨthɨwa. Nɨmwai aane pware kware sɨdusavɨ ‘Jizaazarɨ dɨmɨdɨna!’ yawɨta mwaki yaja' nɨmɨnyawɨnna a'mwe sai mabi yannelyɨ.”
Sarevɨ gamɨrera kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ yagalya'maveva ayɨna wɨna. Yuyagaa' gamɨjɨ ayɨna myamari ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai gamɨrera sɨvɨlyɨraai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai, sahwaihi dɨnya'mayideihi daaka?”
Saaimonɨ Pitai ja'nawɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, aaryawɨnna wawaadeinaavaka! Aawa, yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwine yagaalya kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ.
Gɨlɨmwaga'manɨgo. Gɨmɨnyɨna dara yawɨ'mwo. Gotɨyare Tewaanaangeigɨnyɨ. Gɨrɨka maayaigɨnyɨ. Sara yawɨ'mwo.”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Sɨvɨlyɨraai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaihɨrɨ dahɨlakeihi daaka! Yo, sare' sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwai yɨmakelyɨ.”

Saaimonɨ Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyarɨ gawaalɨ' Juthaazarɨna wɨdɨna ya'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jizaazarei a'mwe atɨraai sɨvɨla purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyai Juthaazai kwalyɨ mwaaleva kɨrɨ' dɨvi maalɨkegaa' yɨkamaangeraavɨna Jizaazarɨ wibwarɨdaakwadelyɨ.
Sare mena kyɨma'na' Kwaaka Galɨli saba Jizaazai kaanya yamarina. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Juya naangera dɨnyɨna “Jizaazarɨ tamakaana!” dɨnyɨna yesa'na gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ “Kwaaka Juthɨya kaanya myamari yɨdera.”
Sagaa' Juyara “Aya kɨgaa' Tɨka Munne Sɨmɨnange' munne' naadesɨ,” desagaakɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre gya'mwera gamɨnyɨna mu'nyadɨvɨ' wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ naangeinyɨ daakajɨ, dava ya'mava'gɨri Kwaaka Juthɨya dɨwodera. ‘Naange yɨvanɨgenna nɨmɨrera tɨnna wangabɨka!’ da'gɨzɨ dɨwodera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Aane pwai kwai yawɨ'na ‘Yuyara nyangabɨka!’ daka yɨnɨke' lɨka myulyarivanɨ'. Sara yɨja kwaaka yuyavakɨ ku'maayaba sara jɨthera,” wɨde'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pwara gamɨnyɨna “Naangelyɨ,” malɨmwagyesa' nabaai, gya'mwera malɨmwagyesare.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nyɨdɨwaasa' nɨmɨnyɨne tewaanyagaa' myɨma'nyɨwa'. Yuyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨne tewaanyagaa' warɨ'.
Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka mudayɨ yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ ‘Sarɨmɨre yadɨvɨsabwi kayaa'nanaangebulyɨ,’ wɨjalɨkurakɨvanɨge'na a'mweraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka davɨna yɨvanɨkere.
Tɨka munne' nɨpɨ'dewɨ jɨlaawila! Dahaa' Munne savɨ milaawɨwɨna! Nɨmɨre tewaanyagaa' yuna myɨma'nyɨwa'.”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka Kwaaka Galɨli pɨzɨ'gwa mwaalɨna ya'.
Munnevɨ gya'mwera mena wawesagaa' Jizaazai mwaalɨna yaka savɨna kave wɨna. A'mwe kwala naangerajɨ mwɨyɨ. Aawa. Dɨvi kɨma'nyɨkaanyabɨ' kave wɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Munnevɨ Juyara yaamɨjɨ bɨrɨna yeva yɨwaara'nyɨna “Gava mwaalɨka?”
Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ a'mwera gamɨnyɨna a'mabyahaala dɨnyɨna dɨnyɨna. Pwara wɨdɨna “A'mwe nawɨ'nyalyɨ.” Pwara wɨdɨna “Sare' mɨ'. Aawa, a'mweraavɨ kwaasɨ wɨdadelyɨ.”
A'mabyahaala dɨnyɨna yeve' kɨrɨ' Juya naangeraavɨna lɨka yesa'na ku'maayaba aane pwai kwai mujɨ ya'.
Munnevɨ tɨnnyagaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ Jizaazai wɨlaawɨna yaka wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaa'nyɨ Juya naangera atɨka maru'na'na yadɨvɨ' dɨnyɨna “Nemɨre sɨkulɨyangɨ myake' sɨduta naange' gara yawɨramaarakalaka?”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakadɨnya' nɨmɨre wɨjɨwaakya' mɨka! Aawa. Wɨjɨwaakya sa' Nyɨdasaabakeresɨ.

Pwai kwai gannya sɨdusavɨ dɨna ‘Gotɨyai sara kanedozɨ sara nebwina yɨma!’ Dɨna yaja' yawɨta kɨrɨ' dathelyɨ ‘Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨjɨwaakya' kujaava' Jizaazai sara nejɨwaakɨvanɨkelyɨ.’ Nabaai yawɨta pɨrɨ' dathelyɨ ‘Jizaazai gavei yawɨraka yaasɨwa'na nejɨwaakɨvanɨkelyɨ.’ Yɨ Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ mɨdɨnajai sɨdusavɨ dɨragɨnna dara yawɨ'na yade' ‘Ai, Jizaazare nejɨwaakade' Gotɨyarɨdaa'nya' daaka!’

A'mwei gannya sɨdusavɨdaa'nyɨ gannyabwi a'mweraavɨ wɨdada ‘Nɨmɨnyɨna a'mwera dɨnɨpɨka! “A'mwe sai naangelyɨ,” sara dɨnɨpɨka!’ yawɨ'delyɨ. Sara yada kɨrɨ' pwai yawɨ'na ‘A'mwera nyɨdasaabakerɨna dɨnɨpɨka! “Gotɨyai naangelyɨ. Byaannakelyɨ,” ’ yawɨ'na yada nebulyabwi dadelyɨ. Sai nadɨyabwi gamɨnyɨ mwari'.
Ne Mozɨzai Kɨwɨnya' yɨhɨzayaakei daaka! Yɨhɨzayaaka kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨjɨya aane pwai kwai Kɨwɨnya' dɨnɨkebwi myadelyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Sarɨ tamakaana!’ Sa'na baa'na dɨmanɨgataihɨlaka?”
Kwala bwa'naanya sa' ja'nawɨdɨna “Yɨmakei gɨmwaalɨkeigɨ! Aai gɨramakajɨwaka!”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Kwazaakegaa' dɨragɨnya pɨrɨ' kye yuyaihi atɨka maru'na'na yesaihɨlyɨ.

Ne Mozɨzai dɨnɨ' ‘Sawɨta ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨwaalyɨ kajɨnnojɨ gɨnnya kaimɨraayare kɨlaakejɨ' dɨthako!’ Dɨnɨke'na pɨgaa' Kwazaakegaa' kaimalerɨ davesaihɨlyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' ‘Tewaanyasɨ,’ dadɨvɨkɨ. Sabwi sɨnnawɨ Mozɨzai yakebwi mɨ'. Aawa. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' waryaakebulyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ dɨnyɨna ‘Kɨlaaka daya'na Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya kayaaka nyɨgalaadɨka! Kwazaakegaa'na yawɨta myaanna! Kwazaakegaa' kaimalerɨ kɨlaakejɨ' davaadeinera.’ Sara dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' Kwazaakegaa' nabalɨnakerɨ maamɨdarya yɨnahu yɨdɨkaaveinyɨna sɨnna tɨka be'na yɨhɨtha'mwaka!
Sare'na sarɨmɨ mwasɨmagɨnya' tɨnna wanganna yadɨvɨ' mipɨna! Aawa. Yawɨbwata yɨda'maraangebwi nayaa jɨla!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalya pwara dɨnyɨna “Sarɨna ‘Tamakaana!’ dɨmanɨgasai daaka!

Yɨthaa, ku'maayaba a'mweraayaba wɨdɨvanɨkelyɨ. Maiyagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yuyara mujɨvanɨga'. Nɨwaava, a'mwe naangera mena dɨnyɨna ‘Sai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakelyɨ,’ nayaa dɨnyɨna yɨvanɨgasara midɨngaka!
Sare'na kɨrɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai kabozɨ aane pwai kwai gamɨnyɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Gawɨdaasɨ bɨwakalaka! Aawa, myawɨryadaanyaine.’ A'mwe dai bakewɨnna yuyaina yawɨ'mwo.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ Jizaazai wɨjɨwaakakegaa' sagaa' naangave'na wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨna tɨvɨ yawɨ'mwaasainyɨ daaka! Nɨmɨ bahewɨnna jawɨ'manɨgava! Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sɨdusa' yawɨrena mabye. Aawa. Nebulyai nyɨdasaabakei sahwarɨ myawɨranganyadɨvɨsalyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sai kanyɨdasaaba' gamɨnyawɨdaa'nyɨ bahe'na sarɨ yawɨ'manɨge.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe naangera dɨna “Jizaazarɨ wɨla pwɨyawaajɨ kalavuzavɨ wakaana!” dɨna yeva yaamɨjɨ yɨna yɨna yeva Jizaazare balya'negaa' kuna mima'nyɨ yake'na aane pwai kwai magalalɨmwagi ye'.
Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ lɨmwanna yeva dɨnyɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨya kwai bozɨ dahware yɨjɨwaainya yɨvanɨke wavɨla'na yadei daaka! Aawa.”

Kwala bwa'naanya' sangɨ Jizaazarɨna a'mabyahaala dɨdaapi A'mwe Perɨzɨyara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva “Sahwarɨ wɨla yɨpɨka!” deva sahwarajɨ Gotɨyarɨne tamira'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ sara Gotɨyare Angevɨ dameraavɨ wɨdaasɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai kwala bwa'naanya' wɨdɨna “Pɨzɨ'gwa sarɨmɨnyaba mwaala'mujɨ dɨvi nyɨdasaabakeryawɨnna kaanya wɨdeinyɨ.
Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Tɨnna wanganaana!’ dɨzide' kɨrɨ' mabɨramaari dɨnyideihɨlyɨ. Sagaa' mwaaimujawɨnna mwɨyɨ jideihɨlyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara naangera dɨnyɨna “Mabɨramaari yaanne'na gawɨnnelaka? A'mwe Gɨrikɨyaraavɨre angengɨ Juyara mwaaidɨvɨsangɨna wawojɨ Gɨrikɨyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakadei daaka?
Nedɨwa' ‘Nɨmɨnyɨna “Tɨnna wanganaana!” dɨzide' kɨrɨ' mabɨranyɨmaari dɨnyidera. Mwaaimujawɨnna mwɨyɨ jideihɨlyɨ.’ Sara nedɨwake' be yagaala nedɨwaka?”
Munnevɨ aayagaa' sagaa' naangegaakɨ. Sagaa' Jizaazai daavɨna yaka naangave'na wɨdɨna “Pwai kwai aalya'na mɨjɨka wiajai nɨmɨnyawɨnna bozɨ nadelyɨra.
Gotɨyare bukuya' nɨmɨnyɨna dɨnɨkabaaibɨ' ‘Pwai lɨmwanna nyada gamɨre munyavɨdaa'nyɨ aalya gaalya'ne walaawɨna yadengɨra.’ ”

Jizaazai nabaai Gotɨyare Kuryarɨna wɨdɨna. A'mwera Jizaazarɨ lɨmwanna yadɨvɨ' maalɨkegaa' kumɨre munyangɨ Kuryai maapɨ'delyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaa' Jizaazai mabalyɨ yaka madɨkaayɨ yaka Nawɨ'nyaba byaannakei kuna myɨma'nyake'na Kuryaregaa' mɨ'. Dɨvi Jizaazai yɨlaawɨna kya' Kuryarɨ wɨjaayagaa' yɨma'nakegaakɨra.
Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ a'mwe pwara yagaala sa kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Nebulyasɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei pɨropetɨya kwarɨna yemwaaimanɨgolyɨ.”
Pwara wɨdɨna “Sai Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakei Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yesa' kɨrɨ' pwara wɨdɨna “Nɨwaava, Kɨraazɨtɨyai Galɨlidaa'nyai daaka!
Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨ' ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai Ne Devitɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨdaa'nyalyɨ. Nabaai, Devitɨ mwalyaakeba anga Betɨlemɨ saba Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ ganaange' maaradelyɨ.’ Sara dɨnɨke' daaka!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanyavɨ jaapalya' yɨma'nyɨna. Pwara Jizaazarɨna yɨlaaya yadaapi pwara yɨlaaya mi.
Pwara yawɨ'na “Kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaihaana!” yawɨ'na yeve' kɨrɨ' aane pwai kwai ata magalalɨmwagi ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ A'mwe Perɨzɨyarajɨ wɨdaaseta saraayawɨnna damera ayɨna wɨna kye' sahwara yɨwaara'na “Gamɨnyɨ mamakabyɨ be'na yɨwaava?”
Damera ja'nawɨdɨna “Pwara manejesare dahaa' a'mwe nedɨvanɨkabaaibɨ'.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Perɨzɨyara ja'nawɨdɨna “Gamɨre kwaasɨ yagaalya'na ‘Nebulyasɨ,’ dathɨwaa'!
A'mwe naangerajɨ Perɨzɨyainajɨ sainaavɨdaasai pwai kwai gamɨnyɨ lɨmwamanɨkei daaka!
Aawa. Kwala bwa'naanya da' Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya' myawɨryeva gamɨnyɨ yaasɨwa'na lɨmwamanɨgasa'na Gotɨyai Dɨkevɨ sahwaraavɨ marasɨ'naderera.”
Nikothimaazai kumɨjɨyai mwaalɨna. Sɨnnawɨ Jizaazaryawɨ sai angyɨrɨ'maata yakelyɨ. Sai mwaalɨna yada

wɨdɨna “Nabaai, ‘Yaasɨwa'na kotɨya' ja!’ madɨnyɨka nemɨre kɨwɨnya'. Dara dɨnɨ' ‘A'mwere yagaalya nayaa wɨ'nyɨna ya'gɨzɨ gamɨrebwina nayaa yawɨra'gɨzɨ dɨvi sagaa' kotɨya'na “Kayaa'nanyaigɨ,” dɨzɨda'deigɨnyɨ,’ ” wɨda'.
Kumɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Nabaai, Galɨlidaasaigɨ daaka! Gotɨyarɨna yɨda'nɨkengɨ nayaa wangana'gɨzɨ dara jawɨ'de' ‘Pɨropetɨya pwara Galɨlidaa'nyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'dera daa!’ ”
Sagaa' wɨna. Gazaizai gannya angebannelyɨ.
Kunnya angengɨna wɨna kye' Mugunya Wolivna Jizaazai yɨlaawɨna.
Yɨlaawɨna yaka yuna mwanyavɨ yɨrɨke' purakegaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨna ayɨna wɨna. Ayɨna wɨna kya' gamɨnyawɨnna a'mwe yuyara yɨ'bwa'na yɨna kye' Jizaazai walamwaaina yɨna yaka wɨjɨwaakɨna.

Wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaa'nyɨ Juyaraavɨre Kɨwɨjarari Perɨzɨyarari sara a'mwevɨ makulaabɨna. A'mwe sa' pwarɨ ata lɨmwadaa'nyɨ galalɨmwanna yesasɨ. A'mwevɨ makulaabɨna yeva a'mwe yuyaraayaba tɨnnyaba wɨmwaaihɨna.
Mi'na wɨmwaaihɨna yeva Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Wɨjɨwaakyaigɨ, a'mwe da' ata lɨmwagyawaalɨkevɨ pwara galalɨmwagyawaaiha'.
Nemɨre Kɨwɨnyavɨ Ne Mozɨzai dakɨnɨke' ‘A'mwe' ata lɨmwagaza' tamakya'na sɨlyajɨ dɨlɨwakyidesɨ.’ Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨ gara dadɨnyaigɨnaka?”

Kumɨ yawɨ'na “Jizaazarɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwalaana! ‘Sai kayaa'na wɨdɨna kyojɨ kotɨya' jɨna yaana!’ dara wɨdaana!” yawɨ'na yeva wɨdɨna. Wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai walaruta'nyɨna yaka kwaakevɨ gannya asɨlyɨ pɨkarya yɨda'na.

Pɨkarya yɨda'na yadaa'nyɨ kumɨ kwara daavɨna yeva kuna yɨwaara'na kye' sai daavɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨjɨyai pwai dɨna ‘Kayaa'nanyasɨ,’ dɨna yojɨ yuyagaa'na kayaa'nanya myade sai sahwaidaa'nyɨ sɨlya' lɨwakadelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka ayɨna walaruta'nyɨna yaka kwaakevɨ pɨkarya yɨda'na.

Pɨkarya yɨda'na yadaa'nyɨ wɨdakevɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva kunnya kayaa'nanya yawɨreva yuyara ya'ma'na. Pwai wɨna, pwai wɨna, sara ya'ma'na. Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe naangera wɨna, dɨvi a'mwera wɨna, dɨvi mɨgɨnyara wɨna. Yuyara ya'ma'na kye' Jizaazai gavei mwaalɨna. A'mwe' tɨnnyaba daavɨna yadɨ'nyɨyasɨ Jizaazai gavei mwaalɨna.
Gavei mwaalɨna yaka daavɨna yaka a'mwevɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ, gawɨ mwaaiha'! Yuyara ‘A'mwe kayaa'nanyasɨra,’ gɨzɨdaveva sɨla magɨlɨwakiwaatara daa!”
A'mwe' wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, aawa, aane pwai kwai mɨka!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nabaai, sara yɨwaasa' nɨmɨjɨ sara magɨzɨda'muna! Wawa'gɨzɨ kɨrɨ' dahaa'daasɨ kayaa'nanyabwi ayɨna minna!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ kwala bwa'naanya' mwaaidapiyaraavɨ Jizaazai ayɨna wɨdɨna “Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨre Baakeinyɨ. Pwai nyɨmɨdɨnaabozɨ jɨhɨnyavɨ kaanya myamari yadelyɨ. Arɨkewɨ. Aawa. Sahwai Gaalya'ne Baakei kɨnɨnnakei mwaaladelyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe Perɨzɨyara wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ sahwaigɨnyɨna nejalɨkurakɨwaanya' yaasɨwa'na nedɨwaa. Sabwi gaveigɨ dadɨnyaigɨre jalɨkurakya' nebula' mɨ'.”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Aawa, nɨmɨnyɨna yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨwɨja' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yɨhɨthadɨnya' nebulyasɨ. Kaanya bahevɨdaa'nya' yawɨ'mwe' kaanya wɨdewɨnnya' yawɨ'mwe'na nebulyasɨ nɨmɨre yagaalya'. Kaanya bevɨdaa'nya' sarɨmɨ myawɨriwaasa' kaanya wɨdewɨnnya' myawɨriwaasa'nanyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨrebwi kɨlaakejɨsɨyabwi yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yawɨbwa'dɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Dahaa' aane pwarɨ kwarɨ kotɨya' myawɨbwarivanɨge.
Kɨrɨ' yawɨbwa'muja' nɨmɨre yawɨbwata sa' nebulyasɨ. Gaveinyɨ mɨka. Aawa. Nɨmɨjɨ nyɨdasaabakelyɨ sainaai wɨdakade'na nebulya' wɨdadɨnyainyɨ nɨmɨ.
Nabaai sarɨmɨre Kɨwɨnya' dara dɨnɨkesɨ. A'mweraare jalɨkurakya' nebulyasɨ.
Sara dɨnɨke'na nɨmɨnyɨna yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨge', nabaai, nyɨdasaabakei Nɨmwai nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨkelyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ yɨwaara'na “Gɨmaamaangei gawɨ mwaalɨka?” Wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ myawɨriwaa'. Nɨmaamaangerɨ myawɨriwaa'. Nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨpɨja' Nɨmwarɨna kyawɨpɨdɨka!”

Gotɨyare Angevɨ ku'dɨka Gotɨyarɨna nɨgwɨbukusa wa'dɨ'nyɨyaba Jizaazai wɨjɨwaakada yagaala yuya sa wɨdɨna. Sara wɨdakerɨ aane pwai kwai kalavuza'na magalalɨmwagi. Gamɨregaa' balya'negaa' mima'nyɨ yake'na magalalɨmwagi ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai ayɨna wɨdɨna “Kaanna kwawa'muri sarɨmɨ yaasɨwa'na bɨrɨna nyapɨjɨ kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyaburɨ dɨvalyideihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ wɨwɨjawɨnna sarɨmɨ mabyɨ yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara naangera dɨnyɨna “Nemɨnyɨ ‘Nɨmɨ wɨwɨjawɨnna sarɨmɨ mabyɨ yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ,’ wɨdɨna neyɨwake'na gamɨnyɨ tamakɨnadei daaka? Gara nedɨwaka?”
Sara dɨnyɨna kye' sai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ dava kwaakewɨnyangɨdaa'nyaihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ Munyabadaa'nyainyɨ. Kwaaka davakɨdaa'nyaihɨlyɨ. Kwaaka davakɨdaa'nyainyɨ mɨ'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara yɨhɨthɨwe. Sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyangɨ dɨvalyideihɨlyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. ‘Mwaaiheinyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra,’ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge' malɨmwagyɨ yɨpɨjaihi sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyangɨ dɨvalyideihɨlyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ wɨdɨna “Bewaigɨnaka?” Sara wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Aayawɨdaa'nyɨ yɨhɨthadɨnyainyɨ.

Yagaala kwalaalya yɨhɨthɨwɨjaihɨlyɨ. Yadɨvɨta kwalaalyangɨna yɨhɨthɨwɨjainyɨ. Sarengɨna yɨhyawɨbwa'mujainyɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' nyɨdasaabakei nebulyalyɨ. Nyɨdɨwake yagaala sa kadɨka wɨ'nadɨ kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.”
Ganɨmaangerɨna wɨdake' sɨdusa myawɨrina.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨ makilarɨmwapɨjɨ dara jawɨryide' ‘O, Jizaazai neda' “Mwaaiheinyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra,” nedake' nebulya' daaka!’ Nabaai ‘O, gamɨnyɨ sɨmunyavɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mijɨvanɨka!’ Aawa. Nɨmwai sara nyɨjɨwaakɨwakabaaibɨ' nayaa sare yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.
Nyɨdasaabakei nɨmɨjɨ mwaaidelyɨ. Nyɨdasaabakei yɨlaaya yade yuyagaa' sara yadɨnya'na nɨmɨ gaveinyɨ manya'mayɨwakelyɨ.”
Yagaala sa Jizaazai wɨdake a'mwe kwalaalyara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva gamɨnyɨ lɨmwanna yesalyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara Jizaazarɨ lɨmwanna yesaraavɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ sara mwaaibɨzaihi nɨmɨreihi nebulyaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Sara yapɨjɨ nayaa dɨnyɨmɨdɨnyideihɨlyɨ.
Nɨmɨre nebulyabwi yɨpɨjaihi nebulyabwina sarɨmɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yɨhɨmarasɨ'nadengɨra.”
Kumɨ wɨdɨna “Ne Evɨraamɨmɨre yɨsɨlyaina. Gamɨre kaimɨraayainera. Yuyagaa' yaasɨwa'wawɨnya myadaa mwaaihoinera. ‘Sarɨmɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnya' yɨhɨmarasɨ'nadengɨra,’ nedɨwaanya be yagaalavaka?”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gazaizai kayaa'nanyabwi yada kayaa'nanyabwine'na yaasɨwa'wawɨnyalyɨ.
Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya kwai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' angevɨ mamwaalyadelyɨ. Gawaalɨ' yuyagaa' yuyagaa' angevɨ mwaaidelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨ Gawaalɨ' sarɨnnya yaasɨwa'wawɨnya kyɨhipalasɨ'nojɨ dɨragɨnyaihi nebwina dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.
Sarɨnnya kɨlaakejɨkana ‘Evɨraamɨmɨre yɨsɨlyaihɨlyɨ,’ yawɨ'mwa. Sa'na kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna dɨna ‘Nemɨre sɨdusangɨ gamɨre yagaalya' mulannera!’ dɨna yadɨvɨsa'na ‘Sarɨ tamakaana!’ dɨnyɨna yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ.
Nɨmwaryaba yawɨrangane sara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨrɨnɨmaangerɨ wɨ'neva sara yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨra.”
Kumɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Aawa, Ne Evɨraamɨ nenɨmaangelyɨ. Sahwalyɨ.” Wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Evɨraamɨmɨreihi mwaaibɨzɨ kwajɨ Evɨraamɨ yaake avaalyabwi kyɨpɨdɨka!
Yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ kadɨka wɨ'nena nebulya' sara yɨhɨthadɨnyainyɨ. Sara yadɨ kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Sarɨ tamakaana!’ Sabwi Evɨraamɨ myɨna.
Sɨrɨnɨmaangei yadevwi yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ yarai wɨdɨna “A'mwe yaasɨwa' maryawakɨdɨvɨ' nemwaaihɨnɨkeina mɨ'. Nenɨmaanga gavei kɨnɨnnakeine Gotɨyai.”

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai sɨrɨnɨmaangei nebwina mwaalajɨ kwajɨ nɨmɨnyɨna kyɨhɨvu'nadɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyainyɨ walaabɨna yena dava mwaaihe. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨmunya nɨmɨrevɨdaa'nyɨ bɨna yeinyɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai sahwai nɨdasaabakeinyɨ.
Yagaalya' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge' myawɨramaari baa'na yɨvanɨga'? Nɨmɨre yagaalya'na sarɨmɨ mu'nyɨ yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ dɨnyɨna ‘Kadɨka mu'naannera!’

Sɨrɨnɨmaangei Kotɨya' Jadereihɨlyɨ. Sɨrɨnɨmaangere yawɨsajɨ gamɨrebulyɨ sangɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Sabwi yaana! Nevu'nɨvanɨkebulyɨ.’ Sahwai sɨnnawɨdaa'nyɨ a'mweraavɨ tamakadelyɨ. Gamɨre sɨdusavɨ nebulya' maaya kunesɨ. Sare'na yuyagaa' nebulyaburɨ madaayadelyɨ. Sare'na yuyagaa' nebulya'na sɨnna tɨka wɨda'delyɨ. Kwaasɨ yagaalya' dadei gamɨ sahwarebwi yadelyɨ. Kwaasɨ yagaalyaburɨ gyakwalaangelyɨ. Sare'na kwaasɨ yagaalya' dada gannyangɨ dadelyɨ.
Nebulya' yɨhɨthadɨnya'na manyɨlɨmwagyadɨvɨta gamɨreihɨlyɨ.
Nɨmɨnyɨna nebwina aai wɨdɨwaka ‘Kayaa'nanyabulyɨyalyɨ!’ Aawa. Nebulya' yɨhɨthadɨ malɨmwagyɨ baa'na nyadɨvɨtaihɨlaka?
Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyai Gotɨyare yagaalya kadɨka wɨ'nadelyɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyaihi Gotɨyareihi mamwaalyɨgasa'na yagaala sa mu'nyɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨra.”
Juyara Jizaazarɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨmɨnyɨna ‘Sai kayaa'nanyai Kwaaka Samerɨya mwaalyalyɨ. Yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ,’ nebwina sara dɨnoina daaka!”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Yɨmakei maayainyɨ. Aawa. Nɨmaamaangerɨne yaya' munyaba makidɨnyainyɨ. Sara makidɨnya kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨne yaya' marulawakadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.
‘Nɨmɨ a'mwe naangeinyɨ, byaannakeinyɨ,’ majadɨ mabɨrivanɨge a'mweraavɨna. Aawa. Pwai nɨmɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe naangei byaannakelyɨ,’ dada nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Nebwina dadelyɨ,’ jawɨbwa'delyɨ.
Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Pwai kwai nɨmɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨnajai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' balyabwi mwanganyɨ yadelyɨ. Arɨkawɨ.”

Juyara wɨdɨna “Sare'na gɨmɨnyɨna ‘Sarei yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ,’ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'mwo. Ne Evɨraamɨ balɨna yaa'. Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyara pɨropetɨyara balɨna yaa'. Sare' kɨrɨ' nedɨwaa ‘Pwai kwai nɨmɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨnajai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' balyabwi myagaanganyɨ yadelyɨ. Arɨkawɨ.’
Neyakwalaanga Evɨraamɨ balyaakerɨna, ‘Evɨraamɨ maalɨkelyɨ. Nɨmɨ naangeinyɨ,’ sara danedɨwaa! Nabaai, pɨropetɨyara balɨna yaasa' gɨmɨ sahwaigɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨnyaigɨ bewaigɨnaka!”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ gaveinyɨ wɨdɨna ‘A'mwe naangeinyɨ, byaannakeinyɨ,’ sara wɨdɨna yɨwɨja' nɨnnya byaannya' yaasɨwa'na yɨma'nadesɨ. Sa' kunesɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Sai byaannakelyɨ,’ wɨdɨna yade Nɨmaamaangelyɨ. Nɨmwai sahwarɨna sarɨmɨ dɨnyɨna ‘Nemɨre Gotɨyalyɨ,’ dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨta sahwalyɨ. Sare'na nɨmɨnyɨna avaaina kadɨpɨdɨkeihɨlyɨ.

Yuyagaa' gamɨnyɨ myawɨramaarivanɨgasa' kɨrɨ' gamɨnyɨ yawɨramaa'manɨge. ‘Sarɨ myawɨrivanɨge,’ yɨhɨthɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ kwaasɨ dadɨnyainyɨ sarɨmɨbɨsainyɨ kyɨma'nɨwɨdɨka! Sare'na gamɨnyɨna yawɨ'manɨge' gamɨre yagaalya' sara mɨdɨdɨnyainyɨ.
Sɨrɨnɨmaanga Evɨraamɨ nɨmɨnyɨna dɨna ‘ “Gotɨyai dahɨlakakeregaa' wanganɨma!” da'mujɨ yɨlaaya yɨwɨjainyɨ.’ Dɨna yaka sare' tɨnna wanganaka yɨlaaya yɨna yaa'.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara wɨdɨna “Neigɨ daaka! Kwarame pwaraare sɨvɨlatɨraai pware atɨraalya gwavɨlavakeigɨ daaka! Ne sɨnnawɨnya Evɨraamɨmɨ tɨnna danganye!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sɨnnawɨ Ne Evɨraamɨ mima'nyagaa'daa'nyɨ sahwainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ “Sɨla lɨwakaana!” deva lɨvɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai yulya'na yaka Gotɨyare Angevɨna ya'ma'na yɨna ya'.
Jizaazai kaanya yamaryada a'mwe pwarɨ tɨnna wangamabɨna. A'mwe sarɨ mudangegaa'daa'nyɨ tɨbɨnyai mwaala'.

Tɨnna wangamabɨna kya' gamɨrera yɨwaara'na “Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, tɨbɨnyarɨna kayaa'nanyabwi aai yake'na yɨma'nakalaka mudangegaa'? Sahwai kayaa'nanyabwi yakei dɨngaka? Gamɨnyɨ ganɨmaangeyoi kayaa'nanyabwi yagɨlyayoi dɨngaka?”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Tɨbɨnyai mwaalɨke'na gamɨre kayaa'nanyajɨ ganɨmaangeyore kayaa'nanyajɨ sangɨna mɨka. Aawa. Tɨbɨnyai mwaalɨke'na Gotɨyai ‘Gamɨnyɨna nɨmɨre wawɨnyanna wɨjɨwaainɨma!’ daka sara ya'nesɨ.
Yɨrɨke' pu'daa'nyɨ nyɨmaryasaabakere wawɨnya kuna yaanneinera. Dɨvi aane pwai kwai wawɨnya mi yannegaa' jɨnnadesɨ.
Kwaakevakɨ mwaaidɨ kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨne Baakeinyɨ.”
Jizaazai mena wɨdɨna yakegaa' kwaake' maaraka kwaakevɨ maagwala wɨraa'mavaka maagwalyasɨ kwaakesɨ yamwaaihaka a'mwere tɨnnyaraarɨ araka marayepuraka

wɨdɨna “Aalɨbunya Silowamɨyawɨnna wawa'gɨri gɨnnya sɨnnya' aalya jɨnana!” wɨdɨna. Yaya' Silowamɨ “Maryasaawɨnɨkevɨ,” dɨnɨkesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwei wawaka gannya sɨnnya' aalya yɨnaka tɨnna nayaa wangada ayɨna bɨna ya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre ange' avaalyaba mwaalyarajɨ sɨnnawɨ sai “Nɨgwia nyɨjaama!” wɨdadaa'nyɨyarɨ tɨnna wanganesarajɨ yɨwaara'nyɨna “Walamwaaina yada a'mweraavɨ ‘Nɨgwia nyɨjaama!’ wɨdadei midaaka?”
Pwara wɨdɨna “Sahwalyɨ,” wɨdɨna yesa' kɨrɨ' pwara wɨdɨna “Aawa, sai mɨka! Saibɨsalyɨ.” Sara dɨnyɨna yadaapi a'mwe sai wɨdɨna “Sahwainyɨra.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ yɨwaara'na “Gɨnnya tɨnnyaraai tewaanyaraai wa'dɨ'nyɨ gara yɨma'nɨwaka?”

Gamɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “A'mwe Jizaazai wo'nɨkei araka yamwaaihaka nɨnnya tɨnnyaraarɨ maranyɨraka nyɨdɨwa' ‘Silowamɨyawɨnna wawa'gɨzɨ gɨnnya sɨnnya' aalya jɨnana!’ Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kaanya wɨna yena yɨnɨwegaa' sagaa' tɨnna yarai wangamweinyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ yɨwaara'na “Gawɨ mwaalɨka?” Gamɨ wɨdɨna “Aawa, sarɨna myawɨriwa. Gawɨ dahamwaalɨka?”
A'mwe Perɨzɨyaraayawɨnna a'mwera kɨgaa' tɨbɨnyai mwaalakerɨ yɨbwaramakuna.
Jizaazai araka yamwaaihaka gamɨre tɨnnyaraai “Yenana!” dakegaa' Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakegaakɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kwazaakegaa'na Perɨzɨyara yɨwaara'na “Tɨnna tewaanna wangamanɨgɨnya' gara yagɨneka?” Yɨwaara'na kye' sai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre tɨnnyaraarɨ araka pɨrɨ' kamaranyɨ'mwa' nɨnnya sɨnnya' aalya yɨnena, yɨthaa, tɨnna tewaanna wangamanɨge.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Perɨzɨya pwara wɨdɨna “Kɨwɨnya Kwazaakegaa' myade'na a'mwe sarɨ Gotɨyai maryasaabakei mɨka. Tewaanyai mɨka!” Wɨdɨna kye' kɨrɨ' pwara wɨdɨna “Sabwi yɨjɨwaainya yakebwi a'mwe kayaa'nanyai gara yannelaka! Tewaanyai dɨngaka?” Sara dɨnyɨna yeva kumɨnyɨ jaapainyɨna yadɨvɨ' maanga dɨnyɨna ye'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pɨgaa' Perɨzɨyara a'mwerɨ ayɨna yɨwaara'na “Nedɨwaa ‘Nɨmɨre tɨnnyaraai tewaanyaraai wakɨwa'.’ Nabaai, nedɨwaanya' sarɨna berɨva nedɨvanɨgɨ?” A'mwei wɨdɨna “Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyai pɨropetɨyalyɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara naangera sɨduta ge' ge' yawɨ'na yeva dara mu'nyɨ yesa' “Ai, sɨnnawɨ tɨbɨnyai mwaalaka dahaa' tɨnna nayaa wangamanɨkei daaka!” Mujevegaa'na pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe darɨ ganɨmaangeyorɨna dɨmaraawila!”
Sawɨnna bɨna kyagi a'mwe naangera yɨwaara'na “A'mwe dai kɨrɨbwaalɨvaangei daaka? Mudangegaa' ‘Tɨbɨnyai daaka!’ dathahi? Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dahaa' tɨnnya' gara yaka wangamanɨka?”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ neyoi ja'nawɨdɨna “ ‘Sahwai nehɨrɨbwaalɨvaangelyɨ. Mudangegaa' tɨbɨnyai maarolyai daaka!’ yawɨ'manɨgoi.
Sare'na dahaa' tɨnna wangamanɨke'na myawɨrivanɨgoi. ‘Tɨnna jena!’ wɨdɨwakerɨ mwanganya'naalyɨra. Gamɨnyɨ jɨwaarayɨla! Nehɨrɨbwaalɨvaangei a'mwelyɨ. Sahwai gamɨnyɨna yɨhɨthathelyɨ.”

Juya naangeraavɨna lɨka yadisa'na neyoi sara wɨdɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Juya naangera mena dɨnyɨna “Yo, pwai kwai wɨdɨna ‘Sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakelyɨ,’ wɨdɨna neyajai nemɨ wɨdɨna yaanneinera ‘Nemɨre lotuangengɨ muidɨnna! Maaveigɨnyɨ.’ ”
Mena dɨnyɨna yesavɨdaa'nyɨ lɨka yagɨla sara wɨdɨna. Neyoi wɨdɨna “A'mwelyɨ. Gamɨnyɨ jɨwaarayɨla!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pɨgasaai a'mwei mudangegaa' tɨbɨnyai yɨma'nakerɨna ayɨna jaka wɨdɨna yeva gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai gwangamanɨkerɨna ‘Byaannakelyɨ,’ duthana! Sare'na nedana! A'mwe sarɨ nedɨwaanyai ‘A'mwe kayaa'nanyalyɨ,’ nayaa sara yawɨ'manɨgo.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe sai ja'nawɨdɨna “ ‘A'mwei nawɨ'nyai dɨngaka? Kayaa'nanyai dɨngaka?’ Sare' myawɨrivanɨge. Gave pɨrɨ'na yawɨ'mwa ‘Kɨgaa' tɨbɨnyainyɨ mwaale. Dahaa' tɨnnakeinyɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgeinyɨ.’ Sara yawɨ'mwa.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ yɨwaara'na “Gɨmɨnyɨ gara gyaka? Gara yaka ‘Tɨnna jena!’ gɨthɨwake'?”
A'mwei ja'nawɨdɨna “Mena yɨhɨthɨwa. Sara yɨhɨthɨwe' kadɨka mu'nyɨwaataihi daa! ‘Savɨ kadɨka wɨ'naana!’ ayɨna baa'na nyɨdɨwaa'. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ ‘Gamɨreina yɨma'naana!’ dɨmanɨgasaihi daaka!” wɨda'.
Sara wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ sarɨ bɨrala wɨdɨna yeva wɨdɨna “A'mwe sahwareigɨnyɨ. Nemɨ Ne Mozɨzareinera. Sarɨ mɨdɨdaanyaina.
Gotɨyai Mozɨzarɨ wɨjaake'na yawɨ'mwo. ‘A'mwe pwai gawɨdaa'nyai dɨngaka!’ nemɨ myawɨriwo.”
A'mwei ja'nawɨdɨna “Sara nyɨdɨwaasa'na atɨka maru'na'manɨge. Sawɨdaa'nyai bake'na myawɨrivanɨgasai ‘Tɨnna jena!’ nyɨdɨwakelyɨ.

A'mwera kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsaraavɨ Gotɨyai kadɨka mu'nyɨ yɨvanɨke' yawɨ'mwo. Aawa. Pwai kwai Gotɨyarɨna dɨna ‘Naangelyɨ. Lɨka yadɨnyalyɨ. Sara nyɨdathe' gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ sara yɨdeinyɨ,’ daderɨ Gotɨyai kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nyɨna yɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sɨnnawɨ Kwaakevakɨ wakyaakegaa'daasɨ yuyagaa' kadɨka dara mu'nyadaanya' ‘O, pwai mudangegaa' tɨbɨnyai yɨma'nakerɨ “Tɨnna jena!” dathaka!’ Sara mu'nyadaanyainera.
Gotɨyaryawɨdaa'nyɨ mabi yajai Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kyadɨka' mɨka.”
Kumɨ wɨdɨna “Mudangegaa' yuna kayaa'nanyaigɨnyɨ. Dɨvi kuna kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Sareigɨ danejɨwakɨwaana!” Sara wɨdɨna yeva lotuangevɨ gamɨnyɨ marasɨ'nyɨna ye'.
Jizaazai kadɨka dara wɨ'nake' “Lotuangevɨ a'mwerɨna dasɨ'nɨwaa'!” Mena daka a'mwerɨ bɨramaa'na yaka wɨdɨna “A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayarɨ dalɨmwaga'manɨgɨna?”
Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwei wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, a'mwela dɨvanɨgɨnyarɨna ‘Sahwarɨ mɨdɨnɨma!’ dena dɨnyɨbwarɨdaakwia!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Gamɨ sahwarɨ tɨnna mena wangamwaa. Sai dahaa' gɨthɨvanɨkei sahwalyɨ.”
