A'mwei wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, gɨlɨmwaga'manɨgena.” Wɨdɨna yaka Jizaazaryaba kwadaai gɨlɨna yaka lotuya yɨna ya'.

Jizaazai yuyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kwaaka davakɨ nɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ yawɨbwata'na bɨna ye. ‘Tɨbɨnyara bɨ'manɨgasara, nabaai sara wangabɨka!’ dena bɨna. ‘Tɨnnakera “Nemɨ tewaanyainera,” dadɨvɨtara, nabaai, tɨbɨnyara yɨma'nɨpɨka!’ dena bɨna ye.”
Perɨzɨya pwara gamɨnyɨ mwaalesara Jizaazai wɨdake' kadɨka wɨ'neva yɨwaara'na “Nemɨnyɨna dathɨwaana? ‘Tɨbɨnyaihi Gotɨyarɨna sɨdusa' myawɨrivanɨga',’ sara dathɨwaana?”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Tɨbɨnyaihi bɨ'manɨgasaihi mwaaibɨzɨ kwajɨ kayaa'nanyaihi kuna mamwaalyɨ kyɨpɨdɨka! Sa'na ‘Tɨnna nayaa wangamanɨgo tewaanyaina,’ dadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanya kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaiha'.”
Jizaazai wɨda' “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sipɨzipɨkurɨsavɨ tɨkuryavɨ mulyɨ yaja' kɨrɨ' kukidaa'nyɨ dɨkwosɨ'na yajai yɨ sai kukelyɨ. Nabaai, kuka yɨpalamaa'delyɨ.
Tɨkuryavɨna a'mwe pwai wɨlaabɨna yajai sai sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidelyɨ.

Sahwarɨna kaanyavɨ maremwaaidei kaanya basadaawori sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaide sai gannya sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ ‘Yɨnagaawai! Yɨnagaavaiha'!’ jaka wɨdɨna yadaa'nyɨ sipɨzipɨyara gamɨnyɨ maanguraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaapi mwasɨlaanna yɨbwaramakwalyuna yadelyɨ.
Mwasɨlaa gannya yuyaraavɨ mena yɨbwaramakwalyuna yada sɨnnawɨ waanyɨna yadaa'nyɨ gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨnna yadɨvɨ' gamɨre maanguraaya' wɨ'namaa'na yadɨvɨsa'na mɨdɨdɨvɨkɨ.
A'mwe mudɨkerɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨ' mɨ'. Arɨkawɨ. Aawa. Mudɨkerɨna lɨkaanya wɨna. Mudɨkeraavɨre maanguraaya' yadɨvɨsa'na lɨkaanya wɨna yadɨvɨsarera.”
Jizaazai yagaala ke'ba'nanya sa' kuda' kɨrɨ' kumɨ dɨnyɨna “Nedɨwaka sa' be yagaalavaka? Myawɨriwona.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai ayɨna wɨdɨna “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sipɨzipɨyaraavɨne kaadihɨsainyɨ.
Yuya pwara sɨnnawɨ kukera kuka yɨpalamaa'dɨvɨsarera. Nɨmɨ mabyahaa' kwaasɨyara yɨhɨthesa' kɨrɨ' sipɨzipɨyara nɨmɨrera kadɨka mu'nyɨ ye'.

Kaadihɨsainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra. Nɨmɨnyawɨnna a'mwe pwai bazai kusawɨnna wɨlajai Gotɨyai wɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ. Sipɨzipɨkurɨsavɨ sai wɨlamwaaina yada mwasɨlaa wapaaya bwalyamaa'na yada ayawɨnna wɨlɨna yadelyɨ.
Kukei ‘Kuka maarɨma! Saraavɨ tamɨma! Saraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakɨma!’ dada badelyɨ. Nɨmɨ ‘Saraavɨ gaalyabwi maapɨka! Yɨ gaalyabwi naanga naanga maapɨka! Munya winana!’ dena baheinyɨ.
Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaide tewaanyai nɨmɨnyɨra. Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaide tewaanyai dɨna ‘Nɨmɨrera mwaaibɨka! Nɨmɨ balɨma! Nɨmɨrera nabaibɨthɨka!’ dada gamɨre gaalyabwi walakɨna yadelyɨra.

Nɨgwɨwawɨnyai kavɨjɨlɨkei bozɨyarɨ tɨnna wanganojɨ sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ ya'ma'na yojɨ lɨkaanya wɨna. Nɨgwɨwawɨnyai sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidei mɨka. Gannyaraavɨ gyakwai mɨka. Savɨdaa'nyɨ sai lɨkaanya wɨna. Lɨkaanya wɨna kyojɨ kavɨjɨlɨkei sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ tɨka davɨna kyojɨ pwara pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna lɨkaanya wɨna yapɨjɨ yɨwɨnadaa'na yɨpɨ'derera.

Nɨgwɨwawɨnyai gannya nɨgwiannajɨ gannya kɨlaakejɨ'najɨ gavenna yawɨ'na yada myawɨrina ‘Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨna yɨlaaya yɨma! Tewaanna maremwaaimujainyɨ,’ sara myawɨryori nɨgwɨwawɨnyai lɨkaanya wɨna yadelyɨ.

Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaide tewaanyai nɨmɨnyɨra. Nɨmwai nɨmɨnyɨ nyawɨ'da nɨmɨ Nɨmwarɨ yawɨ'dɨnyabaaibɨ' nɨmɨ nɨmɨreraavɨ yawɨ'dɨ kumɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyawɨ'dɨvɨsainyɨ. Kumɨnyɨ yawɨ'dɨ kumɨnyɨna nɨmɨre gaalyabwi walakɨna yadɨ baimujainyɨ.

Sipɨzipɨya pwara nɨmɨrera mwaalɨna yadɨvɨ' sipɨzipɨkurɨta davɨ mamwaalyɨ yadɨvɨsarera. Sahwaraavɨjɨ makabɨna yɨdere. Nɨmɨre maanguraaya' kadɨka nyu'napɨri dahaa' nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨyara mwaaihasarajɨ mudɨkera nɨmɨrerajɨ sipɨzipɨkwala gave' yɨma'nɨpɨ'desɨra. Yuyaraavɨ maremwaaladei gavei mwaalɨkelyɨra.
Savɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ dɨna ‘ “Nɨmɨre gaalyabwi ayɨna maarɨma!” da'mujɨ nɨmɨreraavɨna sabwi walakɨdeinyɨ,’ dadɨnya'na Nɨmwai nɨmɨnyɨna kurya nyukadelyɨ.

Aane pwai kwai nɨmɨre gaalyabwi mamaaryɨwa'. Aawa. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ kave walakɨna yɨdeinyɨ. Nɨmɨ navɨka mwaalɨna kya'muri pwara nyɨramakɨpɨ'de' mɨ'. Aawa, nɨmɨ sainyɨ dɨna ‘Pwara nyɨramakɨpɨka!’ dɨna kya'muri nyɨramakɨpɨ'deinyɨ. Sahwainyɨ dɨragɨnyainyɨ dɨna ‘Pwaraavɨna balɨma!’ nabaai Nɨmwai sara nyɨdakakeinyɨ dɨragɨnya' nyɨjaavake' dɨvi sara yɨdeinyɨra.”
Jizaazare yagaala sanna kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva Juyara maanga dɨnyɨna yeva ayɨna jaapainyɨna.
Kwalaalyara dɨnyɨna “Yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Aa'nelyɨ. Yɨmakyagaala dɨvanɨkelyɨra. Gamɨnyɨ kadɨka baa'na wɨ'nɨwaava!”
Sara dɨnyɨna yadaapi pwara wɨdɨna “Yagaala sa yɨmakei wɨlamwaaidere yagaala mɨka. Aa'nei a'mwe tɨbɨnyarɨ ‘Tɨnna jena!’ gara wɨdɨwaka?” wɨdɨna ye' Juyara.
Pɨgaa' Anga Jeruzaalemɨ Juyara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Gotɨyare Ange' tewaanya' ayɨna yɨma'nyaake'na tɨka munne naana! Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yaana!” Dɨnyɨna yesagaa' yɨrɨlyagaa' burɨkegaakɨ.
Munne sagaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ Ne Solomonɨmɨne yɨhukangevɨ Jizaazai kaanya yamarina.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨnyawɨnna Juyara yɨkabɨna, dakwamwada'na yeva wɨdɨna “Nemɨ ‘Sahwai dɨngaka? Pwai dɨngaka?’ kuna yawɨ'manɨgo'na nayaa gathɨngaa' dɨnedathevaka? Aangyagaala nebwina kavena dɨnedana! Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨ Gotɨyai gɨthahɨlakakeigɨ mwaaidɨza' naange'nanya' dɨnedana!”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Mena yɨhɨthena kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ malɨmwagyɨ yɨwaava. Nɨmaamaangere dɨragɨnyasɨ tewaanna yɨvanɨge wawɨnyanna nayaa nyɨjalɨkurakyaka kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ manyɨlɨmwagyɨvanɨga'.
Nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨyaihi mwaaibɨzɨ kwajɨ kanyɨlɨmwabɨthɨka! Nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨyaihɨrɨna mɨ'. Sare'na manyɨlɨmwagyɨvanɨga'.
Nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨyara nɨmɨre maanguraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' nɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨge sarera nyɨmɨdɨdɨvɨsare.
Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi wɨjaavadɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' myɨwɨyɨ yɨpɨ'dere. Arɨkawɨ. Nɨmɨreraavɨ a'mwe pwai kwai nɨmɨre asɨrɨ myɨpalasɨ'nyɨ nyapɨjɨ kayaa'na myɨ yɨpɨ'dere.
Nɨmaamaangei sahwaraavɨ nyɨjaavakei dɨragɨnaangelyɨ. Yuyara pwara dɨragɨmaayare. Nɨmaamaangei maremwaaimanɨkeraavɨ aane pwai kwai Nɨmware asɨrɨ mipalasɨ'nyɨ yannere.
Nɨmɨjɨ Nɨmwalyɨ sanɨdainaai avaalyainaalyɨ,” wɨdɨna ya' Jizaazai.
Sagaa' Juyara “Tamakya'na sɨlaange lɨwakaana!” deva sɨla ayɨna maarɨna.

Ayɨna maarɨna kye' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmwai nyɨda' ‘Dɨragɨnyajɨ tewaanyajɨ ja!’ Sara kanyɨda' sarɨmɨnyawɨ kwalaalya sara yɨwa. Nɨmɨre wawɨnya garɨ'na yawɨ'dɨvɨ' ‘Lɨwakaana!’ dadɨvɨ' yɨvanɨgava sɨlyajɨ?”

Juyara ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ wawɨnya tewaanyavɨna ‘Sɨla lɨwakaana!’ dɨvanɨgo'na mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨna bɨrala yɨvanɨgɨnya'na sa'na yawɨ'daa ‘Sɨla lɨwakaana!’ dɨvanɨgo'na. Gɨmɨ sahwaigɨ a'mweigɨ kwaigɨ kɨrɨ' nedɨwaa ‘Nɨmɨ Gotɨyainyɨ,’ sara nedɨwaa'na bɨrala yɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ a'mwe kwaigɨ.”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨre yagaaikɨwɨnya' dɨnɨ' ‘Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ gotɨyaihɨlyɨ.” ’
Sara dɨnɨke' nabaai, ‘Yuyagaa' Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ yagaalya' dɨnɨke' waragothesɨ,’ yawɨ'daanyainera. A'mwe saraavɨ Gotɨyai wɨdɨna ‘Sarɨmɨ gotɨyaihɨlyɨ,’ wɨdɨna yaake'nanyɨ.

Sare' Nɨmwai gamɨre wawɨnya'na nayaa yɨde'na tewaanyainyɨ nyɨdahɨlakaka Kwaakevakɨna maryasaabɨna kanya' sareinyɨ ‘Gotɨyarɨ Gawaalɨvaangeinyɨ,’ yɨhɨthɨwe'na ‘Sahwai Gotɨyarɨ bɨrala yɨwaka,’ gara dɨmanɨga'!
Yɨthaa, Nɨmwai yɨvanɨkabaaibɨ' gamɨre wawɨnyanna myɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ malɨmwagyɨ dɨnyideihɨlyɨ. Sarebwi tewaanyabulyɨ.

Sare' kɨrɨ' Nɨmwai yɨvanɨkabaaibɨ' nɨmɨ sara yɨvanɨge'na dɨnyɨlɨmwagyɨla! Nɨmɨ yagaala yɨhɨthɨwe'na malɨmwagyɨ nyɨpɨja' wawɨnya sanna yɨvanɨgevwi wanganapɨri dɨlɨmwagyɨla! Sara yapɨri ‘ “O, Nɨmwai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaalɨkei daaka! Jizaazai Nɨmwarɨ wɨlamwaaidei daaka!” yawɨraana! Kuna sara yawɨraana!’ dapɨri wawɨnya sanna dɨlɨmwagyɨla.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ yagaalya'na jɨkurya yeva ayɨna yawɨ'na “Kalavuza'na wɨla pwɨyaana!” Sara deva yesa'. Jizaazai kumɨnyabadaa'nyɨ kaanna wodaa'nyɨ tɨnna wanganeva wanganakɨna ye'.
Aalya Jothanɨyavɨ Jizaazai ayɨna ga'ma'na yaka sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Jonɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yakewɨ wɨna yaka saba mwaalɨna. Saba mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ
gamɨnyawɨnna a'mwe kwalaalyara bɨna. “Jonɨ sahwai atɨka maru'nata aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' myɨ ya'. Yuya a'mwe darɨna nedakabaaibɨsa nebulyangɨ,” dɨnyɨna yeva bɨna.
Bɨna kye' saba a'mwe kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ lɨmwaga'na ye'.
A'mwe pwai Lazaarazai wo'nɨkei Anga Betaani mwaalyai nabalɨnakei yɨma'nyɨna. Anga Betaani savɨ Maarɨyaasɨ ganaanaanga Maathasɨ sanadaai mwaalagɨlyabanyɨ.
Maarɨyaa sa' Naangere sɨvɨlyaraarɨ welivananya wabatɨrɨnya' dɨngɨna yaka gannya mɨjasasɨ yɨwaipɨwanna yake' gamɨnyɨ gathaakaanga Lazaarazai nabalɨnakei mwaalakesɨ.
Nabalɨnakei yɨma'nyɨna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ kɨnadaai Jizaazarɨ yagaalya' wɨdaasɨna “Naangeigɨ, gɨnnya ja'mwei nalaavɨnakelyɨ,” wɨdaasɨna yagi.

Jizaazai kɨrɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨdaasagɨlya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nabalya sa' yuna balyabwine'na mɨka. Aawa. Nabalya sa' yɨma'nɨwa'dɨke'na a'mwera dɨnyɨna ‘Gotɨyai Naangelyɨ. Gotɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.’ Sare'nesɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei Naangelyɨ. Byaannakelyɨ,’ daka nabalya sa' yɨma'nɨwa'dɨ'.”
Jizaazai Maathavɨjɨ gamɨre ganyaabulaangevɨjɨ Lazaarazarɨjɨ sagɨnyɨrakaavɨna wɨvu'nakelyɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ “Nabalɨnakei mwaalɨ',” wɨdaasagɨlya' Jizaazai kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka saba mwaalakeba yɨrɨka pɨryaarɨ kuna mwaalɨna.
Mena kuna mwaalɨna yaka gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kwaaka Juthɨyanna Lazaarazare angewɨnna ayɨna wawaana!”
Gamɨrera wɨdɨna “Akai, nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ kɨgaa' maalɨkegaa' Juyara dɨnyɨna ‘Jizaazarɨ sɨlaangejɨ lɨwakaana!’ Sare'na Juthɨyanna ayɨna jɨtheigɨ daaka!”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨregaa' mi'na daaka! Yɨthaa, yɨrɨkegaa' nyɨlyai dadehaa' (12 aawaaya) midaaka! Kwaaka davakɨ yɨrɨke' pu'daasɨyagaa' a'mwe pwai yɨrɨkevɨ kaanna yamarina yajai kwaaka davakɨya baake' tɨnna wangade'na mala myamaari yadelyɨ.
Sare' kɨrɨ' sawɨsavɨ sai kaanna yamarina yajai baake' gamɨnyɨ mularike'na mala yamaaradelyɨ. Dahaa' yɨrɨke'bɨsagaa' wawaana!”
Sa wɨdɨna yaka pɨrɨ' wɨdɨna “Neya'mwei Lazaarazai se wa'mwaka kɨrɨ' kaanna wawa'muri yɨdɨkaavɨdeinyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨrera wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, se wa'manɨke' tewaanyabulyɨ. Dɨvi nalaaya' mena yadelyɨ. Sare'na mawaanna!”
Jizaazai gamɨre balya'nebwina wɨdakesɨ. “Lazaarazai mena baimwaka.” Gamɨrera yawɨ'na “ ‘Se wa'mwaka,’ nedɨwakesɨ.”
Sara yawɨ'na yesavɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai aangyagaala kave wɨdɨna “Lazaarazai baimwakelyɨ.
Savɨdaasɨ kɨrɨ' gamɨnyaba mamwaalyɨwe'na ‘Nɨmɨrera nyɨlɨmwagapɨka!’ dena yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge. Sare' gamɨnyawɨnna kaanya wawaana!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ A'mwe Tomaazai Jizaazare pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Wikɨra. ‘Gamɨjɨ balaana!’ dawaajɨ yuyainajɨ wawaana!” wɨda'. Tomaazai gɨra'mɨraala maarakei mwaalaka kunnya yagaala “Dɨthimaazai,” wo'nɨkelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai kaanna wɨna yɨna yaka savɨna yɨ'ma'na yakegaa' dara wɨ'nake' “Lazaarazai kabaimwa'dɨ' yɨrɨka daryaai daryaalyavɨ simaangevɨ wakɨnɨkelyɨra.”
Anga Betaani sa' Anga Jeruzaalemɨdaa'nyɨ esabera. Jeruzaalemɨdaa'nyɨ kilomitaaya dawaai dasaba mannɨkebanyɨ Anga Betaani.
Juyara “Betaani esabera,” dɨna yeva kwalaalyara Maathavɨjɨ Maarɨyaavɨjɨ sanadaarɨna angyɨrɨ'maata yɨna. “Kɨrya'mwerɨna kale'na wɨgaimwagaana! ‘Kale nyɨwaka,’ wɨdaana!” deva angyɨrɨ'maata yɨna.
Maatha' kadɨka dara wɨ'nake' “Ai, Jizaazai davɨvanɨka!” Sara dakevɨdaa'nyɨ mwasawɨnna walyawɨjɨma'naawɨna kya' gannya angevɨ Maarɨyaa' mwaalɨna.
Maarɨyaa' mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ Maatha' Jizaazarɨ wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, dava mwaaidɨzɨ kwajɨ nyɨdaakaangei mabalyɨ kyadɨka!
Savɨna kɨrɨ' yawɨ'na ‘Nabaai dahaa' sagaa' gɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ jɨwaara'de'na Gotɨyai sara wɨjaavadelyɨra.’ Sara yawɨ'mwe'nyɨ.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Jɨthaakaangei mwaaladei dɨkaavadera.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe' wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ yawɨ'na ‘Aayagaa' Kwaaka dava' aaya' yɨma'nadehaa' dɨkaasagaa' ayɨna mwaaladelyɨ. Dɨkaavadelyɨ,’ sara yawɨ'mwana.”

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ a'mwengɨ yɨdɨkaa'dɨnyainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra. Dɨkaasabwi nɨmɨnyɨra. Nɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ a'mwengɨ wɨmwaaihadɨnyainyɨ. Gaalyabwi nɨmɨnyɨra. Pwai nyɨlɨmwagazai balajai mwaaladelyɨra.
Gazaizai tewaanna mwaaida nyɨlɨmwada yuyagaa' mabalyɨ yadelyɨra. Arɨkawɨ. Sabwina dalɨmwamanɨgɨ?”
A'mwe' wɨdɨna “Yo, Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨna dara lɨmwamanɨge ‘Gɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyaigɨ Gotɨyarɨ Gawaalɨvaangei Kwaaka davakɨna bahɨnyaigɨnyɨra.’ Sara yawɨ'na yɨwe'nyɨ.”
Sa' Maatha' wɨdakegaa' ayɨna wɨna yaka ganyaabulaanga Maarɨyaavɨ kave danganna yaka kuku'nya wɨdɨna “Dava Nejɨwaakadei bamwaalaka gɨthathelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe sa' wɨ'nyɨna, daavɨna yaka wɨjɨmaa'nya'ne' yarai walyuna.
Sagaa' anga saba Jizaazai mwɨlaabyɨ. Aawa. Maatha' wɨjɨmaa'nakeba kuna mwaalɨna yakelyɨ.

Yarai walyuna kya' angevɨ Maarɨyaayaba Juyara wɨlamwaaina yeva kale wiakera tɨnna dara wanganesa' “O, Maarɨyaa' daavɨna yaka yarai walyuvanɨke' daaka!” Sara devevɨdaa'nyɨ mɨdɨnaabɨna. Juyara yawɨ'na “Gɨlaayarɨ wakɨnɨkeba kɨnnya'na walyuvanɨka,” yawɨ'na yeva mɨdɨnaabɨna ye'.
Jizaazaryawɨnna Maarɨyaa' yɨ'ma'na yaka tɨnna wangadevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlyaraarɨ wala'na yaka avaaina wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, dava mwaaidɨzɨ kwajɨ nyɨdaakaangei mabalyɨ kyadɨka!”

Maarɨyaa' kɨnna dadaasɨ Jizaazai tɨnna wanganna. Nabaai gamɨjɨ Juyara besara kɨnna dadaapi Jizaazai tɨnna wanganna. Tɨnna wanganna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ kale naanga wiadaasɨ gamɨre kuryarɨ sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'na, a'mwera barya'na sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'na.
Sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'na yaka yɨwaara'na “Sarɨmɨ gawɨ wakɨwa'daava?” Kumɨ wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, bwanganna ja!”
Wɨdɨna kye' Jizaazarɨ kɨdaraalya walaabɨna.
Kɨnna dɨna yadaa'nyɨya'na Juyara dɨnyɨna “Yɨthaa, Lazaarazarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nakerɨnesɨ.”
Dɨnyɨna kye' kɨrɨ' pwara dɨnyɨna “Tɨbɨnyarɨ ‘Tɨnna jena!’ wɨda'. Sa'na daaka! Sarebaaibɨ' gamɨ wɨdɨna ‘Lazaarazai mabaidɨnna!’ wɨdazɨ kwajɨ sahwai mabalyɨ kyadɨkei daaka!” dɨnyɨna ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai kale naanga ayɨna wiadaasɨ gamɨnyɨ sɨmuyɨwaala ayɨna yawɨ'na yada gɨlaayai wakɨnɨkewɨnna wɨna. Gɨlaaya wakɨnɨke sa' simaangesɨ. Simaangevɨ tɨkuryavɨ sɨlaangeva' tihɨ'nɨkesɨ.

Gɨlaayai wakɨnɨkewɨnna mena wɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Sɨlaanga da' dɨvaasɨla!” Sara kuda' Maatha' gɨlaayarɨ ganyaabulaange' wɨdɨna “Aawa, Naangeigɨ, butɨrɨnya' wɨlarɨka. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨrɨka daryaai daryaalyarɨkɨ dahaa'!”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “ ‘Gɨmɨ nyɨlɨmwaga'gɨzɨ Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnyabwi tɨnna dangade'gɨnyɨ,’ gɨthɨweinyɨ midaaka!”
Sara wɨdɨna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨlaange' baasɨna. Mena baasɨna kye' Jizaazai maranganna yaka wɨdɨna “Nɨmwai, ‘Su! Su!’ gɨthɨwa. Kadɨka nyu'nɨwaanya'na ‘Su,’ gɨthɨwa.
Yuyagaa' kadɨka nyu'nadɨnyaigɨnyɨne'na yawɨ'mwe' kɨrɨ' dava kwala naanga mwaaihasaraavɨna sara gɨthɨwa. ‘ “Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ yasaabakeva,” lɨmwabɨka!’ dena sara gɨthɨwa.”
Sa mi'na wɨdɨna yaka maanguraaya naangeva'na jaka wɨdɨna “Lazaarazaigɨ, dalyaama!”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' baryai walyaabɨna. Baryare asɨraalyɨ sɨvɨlyɨraalyɨ kwaabɨhannya' gwavaaihɨ'nɨke', gamɨre sɨnnya' kwaabɨyɨvɨsa' gwavaaihɨ'nɨkelyɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' baryai walyaabɨna kya' Jizaazai a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Kaanya wawode'na jɨ'daalyɨla!” wɨda'. Kuda' sara ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyara Maarɨyaa' angyɨrɨ'maata yeta kwalaalyara Jizaazai yake' tɨnna wanganeva Jizaazarɨ lɨmwanna yadɨvɨ' “Kɨraazɨtɨya sahwalyɨ,” dɨna.
Sara dɨna kye' kɨrɨ' pwara A'mwe Perɨzɨyaraayawɨnna wɨna yeva Jizaazai yake'na wɨdɨna.
Mi'na wɨdɨna yesavɨdaa'nyɨ Perɨzɨyarajɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Juyaraavɨre Kaajolɨyarajɨ yɨ'bwa'na yeva dɨnyɨna “ ‘Gara yaadevaka?’ A'mwe dai yɨjɨwaainya kwalaalya yɨvanɨkele!

Nemɨ mujɨna ‘Sabwi minnera!’ mujɨ yaaja' yuyara gamɨnyɨ lɨmwabɨ'delyɨ. Sara kyapɨjɨ A'mwe Romɨya naangera yaasɨna kyapɨjɨ aawɨlasara bɨna yapi Gotɨyare Angevɨ kayaaka yɨgalapi yɨta davaakɨya Juyainaavɨ neramakɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.”
Kumɨjɨya pwai Kaayapaazai wo'nɨkei sagaa' Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangei mwaalɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Sɨduta maayaihɨlyɨ. Aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' myawɨriwaava.
‘Pwai a'mweraavɨna balana! Gave pwai balaja' nemɨre yɨsavaakɨya yuyaraavɨ kayaaka myɨgalakɨpɨna!’ dawaajɨ sa' tewaanyasɨ. Sara myawɨrivanɨgasaihi daaka!”
Sare' wɨdɨna yake' sai gavei sara mujakelyɨ. Aawa. Kwarame sagaa' Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei mwaainɨkerɨne' Gotɨyare yagaala wɨda' “Juya yɨsavaakɨyara mabaibɨna! Jizaazai sahwaraavɨna baladelyɨ.”
Sara dake yɨsavaakɨya sahwara gavera mɨ'. “Pwara pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna kɨgaakuna yosɨnɨgasara Gotɨyarera yɨma'nɨpɨka!” dozɨ yuyara Gotɨyare avaalyaraavɨ maryɨ'bwaramwaaihade'na Jizaazai baladelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sagaa'daasɨ Juya naangera “Sahwarɨ tamakaana!” deva dɨnyɨna “Davwina tamakaana! Pɨbwi dɨngaka? Gevwi dɨngaka?”

Mi'na jamungajakɨna yesavɨdaa'nyɨ Kwaaka Juthɨya a'mweraayaba ku'maayaba Jizaazai kaanya myamari ya'. Aawa. Ya'ma'na yaka a'mwamaayaba pimagɨnna kaanna wɨna Anga Yɨpɨremɨnei. Saba gannyarari mwaalɨna yakelyɨ.

Juyara yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai yɨkamaangeraavɨ tamakyaake' Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ maramaki yaka kave pari'mayaake'nanyɨ.” Sara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Pari'ma'munne' tɨka naana!” dadɨvɨ' yɨ'bwa'nemwaaina yesasɨra. Munne sa' aya kɨgaa' kyɨma'na' wawɨnyangɨdaa'nyɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨnera yɨlaawɨna. “Nemɨ Munne' naadeinaavɨne' kɨwɨnya' sara dɨnɨke' aalya' yɨnaana! Kwaabɨhannyajɨ baazɨ'ma'nyajɨ aalya' yaana!” deva yɨlaawɨna.
Yɨlaawɨna yesavɨdaa'nyɨ dɨna “Jizaazai damwaalɨka?” dɨna yeva Gotɨyare Angevɨ yɨkabɨna yeva dɨnyɨna “Berɨ' dɨvanɨgɨna? Munnevɨna sai mabi yadei daaka?”

Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Perɨzɨyarajɨ yagaala wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na ‘Saba sahwai mwaalɨ',’ yawɨ'na yɨpɨja' sare' yarai dɨnejɨla!” Kumɨ “Jizaazarɨ wɨla pwɨyaana!” dɨna yeva sara wɨdɨna yesare.

Juyara dɨnyɨna “Sawɨta dawaai dawaai dawaai kajɨnnojɨ Pari'ma'munne' naadera.” Dɨnyɨna yadaapi “Wɨla pwɨyaana!” desavɨdaa'nyɨ Anga Betaanina Jizaazai wɨna. Anga saba Jizaazai a'mwe baryarɨ yɨdɨkaavakei Lazaarazai mwaalakebe.
Anga Betaani sabanna wɨna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨnyɨne wapaaya yɨdɨka kye' Maatha' wapaaya wɨmaarina. Nabaai wapewakya tevolɨyavɨ gamɨjɨ walamwaaina yesarajɨya pwai Lazaarazalyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuyara nyɨna nyɨna yadaapi Maarɨyaa' Lazaarazarɨ ganyaabulaange' welivanadalya' maarɨna yaka Jizaazarɨ sɨvɨlyaraarɨ dɨngɨna yaka gannya mɨjata saamɨnyasɨ yaalɨka yimwanna. Welivananya sa' wabatɨrɨnya naange' yɨnɨke' purɨrya naathɨyangɨdaa'nyɨ welivananya nawɨ'nya' yavɨkaryadɨvɨsa' Maarɨyaa' nɨgwia naanga mubakesɨ. Dɨngɨna kya' anga yuneba wabatɨrɨnya' winnyɨna.

Wabatɨrɨnya' winnyɨna yɨnɨke' gamɨre pwai Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyai Juthaazai wɨdɨna “Welivananya naange' kinaaya naanga naanga (yɨrɨka 300 wawɨnya'ne nɨgwia) mamubi be'na yɨwaka! Nɨgwia sa nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna yanga kujaavadɨkengɨra.” Sai dɨvi maalɨkegaa' Jizaazare yɨkamaangeraavɨna Jizaazarɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwadelyɨra.
Juthaazai sai nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna kale wina yake'na mujɨ ya'. Aawa. Sai kukelyɨ. Sai kumɨre nɨgwɨgɨlya' maremwaaidei, pɨgaa', pɨgaa' nɨgwia gamɨnyɨne maa'delyɨra.
Sara wɨdakevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Madɨnna! A'mwe' sara yana! Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' nyɨrakɨpɨ'dehaa' a'mwe sa' ‘Nɨmɨ welivananya yovɨrawakɨnɨke dɨngɨma!’ daka nyɨwake'nesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gazagaasagaa' sarɨmɨnyaba nɨgwɨmaayara mwaaibɨ'de' kɨrɨ' gazagaasagaa' nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyaba mamwaalyɨ yɨdeinyɨra.”

Juyara kwala naangera kadɨka dara wɨ'nesa' “Anga Betaani savɨ damwaalɨka!” Sara devevɨdaa'nyɨ sawɨnna kaanna wɨna. Jizaazai gaverɨna kaanya' mɨ'. Aawa. Nabaai Jizaazai Lazaarazarɨ baryarɨ yɨdɨkaa'na yakerɨna “Tɨnna wanganaana!” deva kaanna wɨna ye'.

Juya kwalaalyara Lazaarazarɨ yɨdɨkaavake'na yawɨ'na yeva Juya naangeraavɨrebwi ya'ma'na yeva Jizaazarɨ lɨmwanna ye'. Sare'na Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera “Lazaarazarɨjɨ tamakaana!” deva sara jamungajakɨna ye'.
Mwanyavɨ Pari'ma'munne'na kwala naange' besara kadɨka dara wɨ'nesa' “Ai, Anga Jeruzaalemɨna Jizaazai davɨvanɨka!”

Sara deva Jizaazarɨ yɨlaaya'na aaburyabɨsangɨre kɨwasa maarɨna yeva gamɨnyɨ wɨjɨmaa'nya'na wɨna yeva jaka dɨna dɨna “Gotɨyaigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgo. Naangeigɨre yayavɨnei wɨdasaabahɨnyarɨ tewaanna dɨwio! Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨre maremwaaiderɨ tewaanna wiano!”
Jizaazai dogɨya dɨwɨnyarɨ bɨrɨna yaka yɨlamwaaina. Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨka
“Anga Saayonɨ mwaalyaihi lɨka mipɨna!
Sarɨmɨnyɨ maremwaaina yadei dogɨya dɨwɨnyarɨ
Yɨlamwaaina yaka, yɨthaa, bɨna yɨvanɨkelyɨ.”

Sara dɨnɨke' sagaa' sɨnnawɨ gamɨrera sare'na myawɨri ye'. Aawa. Jizaazai byaannakei ayɨna yɨma'nyɨna yakegaa' kumɨ dara yawɨ'na “Gotɨyare bukuya' sara dɨnɨke' Jizaazarɨ sara yawalyaadosɨ,” yawɨ'na yɨna ye'.
Sɨnnawɨ Jizaazai baryarɨ wɨlakyawɨdaa'nyai Lazaarazarɨ jaka wɨdaka baryarɨ yɨdɨkaavakeryaba kwala bwa'naanya' mwaalɨna yeva tɨnna wanganna yevevɨdaa'nyɨ sa'ne' pwaraavɨ wɨjalɨkurakɨna.
Sarevɨ kwala bwa'naanya naange' Jizaazai yɨjɨwaainya' yake'na kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva sahwarɨ wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna ye'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ A'mwe Perɨzɨyara dɨnyɨna “Danganyɨla! Sahwaraavɨna nemɨrebwine aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' negaimwagyade' mɨka! Ya'ma'na neyɨvanɨgava. Yɨthaa, Kwaaka davakɨ mwaalyara yuyara a'mwe sarɨ mɨdɨnaawɨna yɨvanɨgava.”
Anga Jeruzaalemɨna wawesarajɨya pwara Menya Gɨrikɨyara “Nemɨ Munnevɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yaana!” deva mwaalɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Pilipɨ Kwaaka Galɨli Anga Betɨzaaitha mwaalyaryawɨnna sahwara bɨna yeva yɨwaara'na “A'mwe naangeigɨ, ‘Jizaazarɨ tɨnna wanganaana!’ sara yawɨ'manɨgo.”
Pilipɨ kadɨka wɨ'naka kaanna yaka Edɨruyarɨ sara wɨdɨna ya'. Edɨruyalyɨ Pilipɨjɨ saraai Jizaazarɨna wɨdaawɨna.
Mena wɨdaawɨna kyagi Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨregaa' yɨma'nɨwakegaakɨ. Dahaa' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai byaannya' kɨnɨnnakei yɨma'nadelyɨ.

Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Witɨzɨla pwai kwaakevɨna walaawɨna yori mabalyɨ yajai gavei kuna waradelyɨ. Sai kwalaalyara mima'nyɨ yadelyɨ. Kwaakevɨ witɨzɨlyai balajai kayaaka yajai yɨ, yɨrɨvadehaa' witɨzɨla naanga naangera maarɨna yadelyɨ.
Pwai gannya gaalyabwina Kwaaka davakɨna yuna wɨvu'nadei gannya kuryai yɨgaladelyɨ. Pwai gannya gaalyabwina Kwaaka davakɨ sɨmɨlɨka yuna widei yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gannya kuryai maremwaaladelyɨ.
A'mwe pwai kwai ‘Jizaazarɨ wɨdaayɨma!’ dɨna yajai nyɨmɨdɨnaabana! Nyɨdaayadei sara yojɨ nɨmɨ mwaaimujava sahɨba mwaaladelyɨ. Pwai kwai nyɨdaayajai sahwarɨ Nɨmaamaangei gamɨnyɨne yaya' makɨladelyɨra.”

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Dahaa' sɨmuyɨwaala naanga yawɨ'manɨge. Sare' berɨ' wɨdɨjɨwana? ‘Nɨmwai, dahaa'ne savɨ dɨnyɨvadaihasamaaka!’ Sara wɨdɨjɨwa! Aawa. Sahɨrɨ'na bɨweinyɨ. Daanga sagaa'na nyade'na bɨweinyɨ.
Nɨmwai, gɨmɨre yaya' byaannake' dɨragɨnna yɨma'nana!” Sara kuda' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ maanguraaya' wɨdɨna “Sa' byaannake' mi'na wakesɨra. Nabaai byaannake' ayɨna wakɨdesɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya' daaveva maanguraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva dɨnyɨna “Ai, yɨ'munya' pimwaka!” Pwara dɨnyɨna “Gotɨyarɨne mamaayai ejelɨyai wɨdɨwaka.”
Sara dɨnyɨna kye' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Maanguraaya' dɨwake' nɨmɨnyɨne'na mɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨne'nanyɨra.
Dahaa' Kwaaka yuyavakɨ mwaalyaraavɨne maryawɨbwasabwi yɨma'nɨwaka. Gotɨyai kotɨya' maryawɨbwaradelyɨ. Dahaa' Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ maremwaaiderɨ (Kamaalyarɨ) Gotɨyai marasɨ'na yadelyɨ.
Kwaakevɨdaa'nyɨ munyaba yɨlamaranyakɨpɨjainyawɨnna yuyaraavɨ mwagi'nɨdeinyɨra. Kwalaalyara nɨmɨrera yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere.”
Sara wɨdake' gamɨre balyabwina wɨjɨwaaina'. Dara wɨdɨnɨkesɨ. Yɨsavɨri nilɨya kanyɨramapɨjɨ balɨdeinyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya' Jizaazarɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Nemɨre Kɨwɨnyavɨ nedɨnɨ' ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaalagothelyɨ.’ Sara nedɨnɨke'na ‘A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai yɨlamarakɨpɨ'delyɨ,’ be'na nedɨwaa? A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai aaihwalaka?”

Sara wɨdɨna yesavɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Maalɨkegaa' sarɨmɨjɨyaba Baakei kuna mwaaladelyɨra. Baakei kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ' kaanya jamaryideihɨlyɨ. ‘Jɨhɨnya' nanebwakalɨmwagaradɨka!’ dapi sara jɨla! Jɨhɨnyavɨ pwai kaanya yamaryada tɨnna mwanganyɨ yada ‘Gawɨnneinyaka?’ dada yaasɨwa'na kayaa'na wɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Baakei mwaaidozɨ baakerɨ dɨlɨmwagarila! ‘Nemɨ baakevɨne kaimɨraayaina yɨma'naana!’ dapi sahwarɨ dɨlɨmwagarila!”
Sa Jizaazai wɨdakegaa' kaanna wɨna yaka “Sahwara nanyangabɨthɨka!” daka lɨka yulya'na.
Gamɨre yɨjɨwaainya naanga naanga wɨlɨmwabɨne tɨnna wangadaapɨjɨ kɨrɨ' kumɨ malɨmwagyɨna.
Ne pɨropetɨyai Aazaayai dɨnɨke' nebulya' yune'na yɨma'nya'ne'na malɨmwagyɨ ye'. Aazaayai sai dara dɨnɨke'
“Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨre yagaala dɨthaakwo' aai lɨmwagaka!
“Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨre aangasa' wɨjɨwaainagɨnya' aai banganaraka!”
Sarevɨ malɨmwagyɨ yesa'na Aazaayai yagaala pɨrɨ' dɨnɨke'
“ ‘Kumɨre tɨnnyajɨ nangabɨthɨka!’ daka
‘Kumɨre sɨmunyajɨ nyawɨpɨdɨka!’ daka
‘Kumɨre tɨnnyangɨ pɨda'na yakere.
‘Kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ sɨlya'bɨ' yɨwagakaka.
‘Tewaanyabwi maapɨjaraavɨ kwajɨ tewaanyaraavɨ kumwaaihɨwɨdɨka!”
Ne Aazaayai Jizaazare byaannya' tɨnna wanganaka gamɨnyɨna dake'na sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Sare kɨrɨ' Juya naangera kwala naangera malɨmwagyɨ kye' kɨrɨ' Juya naangera kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ lɨmwanna. Lɨmwanna yevera a'mwe Perɨzɨyaraavɨna lɨka yɨna yeva dɨna “Juyainaavɨre Lotuangevɨ nanyasɨ'nɨpɨka!” dɨna yeva a'mweraayaba nayaa mujalɨkurakyɨ ye'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwara yɨlaaya'na dɨna “A'mweraavɨre tɨnna byaannakeinyɨ yɨma'nya'ne' tewaanyasɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Tewaanyalyɨ,’ dɨnɨpɨka!” Sahwara majɨ “Gotɨyai gavei nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Tewaanyalyɨ,’ dana!” majɨ yeva a'mweraayaba Jizaazarɨna lɨka yulyakɨna ye'.
Jizaazai jaka naangave'na wɨdɨna “A'mwe pwai nyɨlɨmwagazai nɨmɨ gaveinyɨ nyɨlɨmwagathei mɨka! Aawa. Nyɨdasaabakerɨjɨ lɨmwagathelyɨ.
Sahwai nyanganajai sagaa' nyɨdasaabakerɨ wanganadelyɨ.
Kwaaka davakɨna Baakeinyɨ baheinyɨ ‘Gazaizai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨlɨmwagazai jɨhɨnyavɨ kuna namwaaladɨka!’ dena baheinyɨra.

A'mwe pwai kwai nɨmɨre yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nojɨ savɨ mamɨdɨnyɨ yajai sahwarɨ kotɨya' yawɨbwarya'neinyɨ beinyɨ mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. ‘Kwaaka davakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ kotɨya'na yawɨbwarɨma!’ dena baheinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. ‘Kwaaka davakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ padaihasamaarɨma!’ dena baheinyɨra.
A'mwe pwai bule' nyɨjaavojɨ nɨmɨre yagaalya' mamaaryajai kotɨya' wɨjathe' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨrɨka Aayagaa' nɨmɨre yagaalya' sa' sahwarɨ kotɨya' wɨjathesɨ.
Yayo, nɨmɨre yagaala gave' nɨmɨ gaveinyɨ mihɨzɨvanɨge. Aawa. Nɨmwai nyɨdasaabakei kɨwɨnya' nyɨjaavaka yuya yagaala sare nyɨdake yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.
Nɨmɨ nayaa yawɨ'mwa ‘Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya sa' yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabulyɨra.’ Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ sara yɨhɨthɨvanɨgenna Nɨmwai nyɨdakabaaibɨ' sara yɨhɨthɨvanɨgengɨra.”

Juyara dɨnyɨna “Mwanyagaa' Pari'ma'munne' naadera,” dɨnesagaa' sahɨgaakɨ. Jizaazai dara yawɨrake' “Dahaa' Kwaaka davakɨ ya'mava'mujɨ Nɨmwaryawɨnna yɨlaawɨdehaa' daaka!” Sɨnnawɨ, kusagaa' Kwaaka davakɨ gamɨrera mwaalesaraavɨna Jizaazarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nada aayagaa' kumɨnyɨ ya'masagaa' tewaanya kuna wɨvu'nakelyɨra.

Sawɨsavɨ Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerari wapaaya nyɨna. Sagaa' Kotɨya' Jadei Saaimonɨ Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyarɨ gawaalɨvaangei Juthaazarɨ “Jizaazaryawɨnna yɨkamaangeraavɨ jɨvwarɨdaakwia!” wɨdaka sahware sɨmunyavɨ mena wakakegaakɨ.
Sagaa' Jizaazai dara yawɨ'na “Nɨmwai nɨmɨre asɨraarɨna dɨragɨnya yuya nyɨjaavakengɨra. Gotɨyaryawɨdaa'nyainyɨ walaabe. Gotɨyaryawɨnna ayɨna wɨdeinyɨra.”
Sara yawɨ'da “Tewaanya' yɨma!” daka wapewakya'nevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai daavɨna gannya baazɨ'ma'nya' wakaka munnaanyaba taawɨlɨya' marayewaa'bwa'nyɨna.
Marayewaa'bwa'nyɨna yaka aalɨmaa'gulyavɨ aalya' dɨngikɨna yaka gannyaraavɨ sɨvɨla aalya gaai yaka taawɨlɨya' yewaa'bwa'nyɨna yakesɨ yaalɨka yimwanna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Saaimonɨ Pitaryawɨnna bɨna kya' Pitai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, nɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ aalya jɨzɨwaana!”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Dahaa' yɨvanɨge'na myawɨriwaanya' kɨrɨ' dɨvi jawɨ'deigɨnyɨ.”
Pitai wɨdɨna “Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' nɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ aalya myɨ jɨtheigɨ. Arɨkawɨ.” Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ aalya mi yɨwɨja' nɨmɨjɨ dɨmwaaideigɨ mɨka!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Saaimonɨ Pitai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, sara nyɨdɨwaanya' nɨmɨre sɨvɨla gaveraarɨ aalya mi. Nɨmɨre asɨraarɨjɨ nɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨjɨ aalya ja!”

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Pwai aalya yɨmwakei gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' yuyajɨ' aalya ya'ne' mwɨgainyadelyɨ. Aawa. Sahwai kaanya wɨvanɨkei gamɨre sɨvɨla kwaa'naka gaviraarɨ aalya ya'nelyɨra. Sarɨmɨ tewaanyaihi gɨrɨka maayaihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' yuyaihɨrɨna mɨka!”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gamɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨna wibwarɨdaakunanyarɨna Jizaazai mena yawɨrake'na wɨdɨna “Yuyaihi gɨrɨka maayaihi mɨka.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai kumɨre sɨvɨla aalya mi'na yakegaa' gannya baazɨ'ma'nya' yɨvɨsa' ayaba marakɨna yaka tevolɨyavɨ ayɨna walamwaaina. Ayɨna walamwaaina yaka gamɨreraavɨ yɨwaara'na “Sarɨmɨnyɨ mi'na yɨhyɨwebwi jawɨ'mwaava?
Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Nejɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ, Naangeigɨ,’ nyɨdɨvanɨgasa'na tewaanna dɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sasareinyɨra.

Sarɨmɨre Naangeinyɨra. Sarɨmɨre wɨjɨwaakyainyɨ mwaaihe. Sahwainyɨ mwaalena sarɨmɨre sɨvɨla aalya kyɨhyɨwa sarɨmɨre sɨvɨla aalya yɨbɨzaihi. Pwaigɨ pware sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ aalya yɨjaigɨ. Sana sana yuyaihi jideihɨlyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ tewaanyabwi yɨhɨzɨwaainɨwa. ‘Sarɨmɨ sarebwi yɨhyɨwebaai sara jɨla!’ dena sara yɨhɨzɨwaainɨwa.

Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai maalɨkelyɨ. Gamɨnyɨ maremwaaidei naangelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwerɨ wɨdaasade a'mwe sai maalɨkelyɨ. Pwai sarɨ wɨdaasadei naangelyɨ. Sare'na nɨmɨ yɨwebwi sarɨmɨ sara jideihɨlyɨ maalɨkeihi.
Dahaa' nebulya da' yawɨ'mwaasabwi sara yɨpɨja' yɨlaaya naange' yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨhyɨnadeihɨlyɨra.

Yuyaihɨrɨna myɨhɨzɨvanɨgeihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Yɨhɨthahɨlakeihɨrɨna yawɨ'mwa. ‘Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨke' nebulya'na yɨma'nana!’ kadozɨ sara yadelyɨ. Dara dɨnɨke ‘Nɨmɨre wapaaya nadei nɨmɨre yɨkamaangai yɨma'nɨwakelyɨ. Gamɨre sɨvɨlyasɨ nyɨramadelyɨra.’
Sara dɨnɨke' dahaa' sa' myɨma'nyɨ yadehaa' sara yɨhɨthɨwa. Sara yɨma'nadehaa' sarɨmɨ ‘Ai, Jizaazai neda' “Mwaaiheinyɨ nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ.” “Nedake'na sahwarɨ wɨlɨmwagaraana!” dɨzide' yɨhɨthɨwa.’

Sarei kayaa'na yade' kɨrɨ' naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe pwai nɨmɨ pwarɨ wɨdaasɨderɨ maarɨna yada nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaaradeinyɨ. Nabaai, sahwai nɨmɨnyɨ maarɨna nyada nyɨdasaabakerɨ maarɨna yadelyɨra.”
Jizaazai wɨdakegaa' gamɨre kuryarɨ sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'da aangyagaala jalɨkurakɨna “Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai nɨmɨnyɨna yɨkamaangeraavɨ wibwarɨdaakwadelyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' gamɨrera tɨnna wanganna yɨneva yawɨ'na “Aarɨna nedɨwaka?”
Gamɨre pwai Jizaazai yɨlaaya wiakei Jizaazare kusɨmagɨ walamwaaina.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Saaimonɨ Pitai tɨdɨragɨnya wanganna yaka kavena wɨdɨna “Nedɨwakerɨna jɨwaaraka! ‘Aaihwalaka?’ ”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazare kɨhɨsavɨ yokɨna'na yaka yɨwaara'na “Naangeigɨ, aaihwalaka?”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨrɨkula maalɨke' wape-aalyavɨ yaalɨ'bwa'na ya'mujɨ wɨjaavɨwɨjai sahwalyɨra.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨrɨkula maalɨke' maarɨna yaka yaalɨ'bwa'na yaka Saaimonɨ Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyare gawaalɨvaangei Juthaazarɨ wɨjaavɨna.
Wɨjaavɨna kya' Juthaazai maranyɨna yaka dɨna “Jizaazarɨ kayaa'na yɨma!” dɨna kya' Saataanɨ wɨlamwaaina.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “ ‘Yarai yɨma!’ dɨza' yarai ja!” Tevolɨyavɨ nesara yuyarajɨya aane pwai kwai Jizaazai sara wɨdake'na myawɨri.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Juthaazai nɨgwɨgɨlya' maremwaaidei mwaalake', gamɨrera pwarana dɨna “Jizaazai wɨdɨna ‘Munne'na nemɨ nyɨnya'ne wapaaya pɨnɨ dɨmubya!’ dahawɨdɨwaka? ‘Nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna yanga dumaryaawa!’ dahawɨdɨwaka?” Gamɨrera yaasɨwa'na dɨna yeva sarebwi myawɨri ye'.
Juthaazai gɨrɨkulya' dapanyɨna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' walyuna ya'. Sagaa' sawɨsasɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juthaazai ya'ma'na yakegaa' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Dahaa' A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai byaannakei yɨma'nɨwaka. Dahaa' gamɨnyɨna Gotɨyai byaannakei yɨma'nɨwaka.
Gamɨnyɨna Gotɨyai byaannakei yɨma'najai A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai byaannakerɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Yɨme'nya'bɨ' byaannakerɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨra.
Nɨnnya kaimɨraayaihi, dɨvi maalɨkegaa' sarɨmɨnyaba kuna mwaaiheinyɨ. Bɨrɨna yapɨjɨ kɨrɨ' Juyaraavɨ wɨdɨwa'devaaibɨ' dahaa' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ wɨwɨjawɨnna dɨwideihi mɨ'.
Yagaaikɨwɨnya mudɨke' yɨhɨzaavanɨge. Sɨrya'mweraavɨna tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nana! Nɨmɨnyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨna tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nana!
Sarɨmɨ sara yɨnapɨjɨ saburɨdaasɨ a'mwe yuyara sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'na ‘Sahwara Jizaazarerera.’ Yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨvu'nyabwi waraja' sara yawɨ'na yɨhyɨpɨ'deihɨlyɨra.”
Saaimonɨ Pitai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, gawɨnneigɨnaka?” Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Dahaa' wɨwɨjawɨnna manyɨmɨdɨnya'gɨzɨ kɨrɨ' dɨvi nyɨmɨdɨnaadeigɨnyɨ.”
Pitai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, dahaa' mamɨdɨnaabyɨ gyɨwɨneinyɨ be'na gideinyaka? Nɨmɨre gaalyabwi gɨhaimwagya'na wakɨwa. Gɨmɨjɨ balɨdeinyɨra.”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨna gɨmɨre gaalyabwi dalakɨdeigɨ daaka? Naanga nebulya'na gɨthɨvanɨge. Sɨnnawɨ kukuraayai jaka majahaa' dahasaai dahaa' nɨmɨnyɨna duthathe' ‘Sarɨ myawɨriwa. Menyalyɨ.’ Ya, duthathehaa'na!”
Jizaazai gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨnnya sɨmunyangɨ sɨmuyɨwaala myawɨpɨna! Gotɨyarɨ dɨlɨmwagyɨla! Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨ dɨnyɨlɨmwagyɨla!
Nɨmaamaangere angevɨ ku'dɨka tewaanya kwalaalya yarinɨkengɨ. Sangɨ sarɨmɨ dɨmwaalyide'na yovɨgalakaawɨdeinyɨ. Sabwi mwarya' kwajɨ savɨna mujɨ kyɨhiwɨdɨka!
Kaanna wɨwɨja' saba sarɨmɨnyɨna yovɨgalakɨwɨja' ayɨna ba'muri ‘Nɨmɨ mwaaimujawɨ sarɨmɨ dɨmwaalyɨla!’ da'mujɨ nɨmɨnyɨneihɨrɨ yɨhɨmaarɨdeinyɨ.
Sawɨnneinyɨ wɨwɨja' tusa'na yawɨ'manɨgasasɨra.”
Tomaazai, gamɨrei wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, wɨjawɨnna nemɨ myawɨriwo. Sarevɨdaasɨ tusa'na gara yawɨraajɨwona?”

Wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sahwainyɨ tusa'neinyɨ. Nebulyainyɨ. Gaalyabwi aaya kaavɨlyainyɨ. A'mwe aane pwai kwai tuta pɨrɨvɨ bwawojɨ Nɨmwaryawɨnna yɨ'mavaabya'ne' tusa' pɨrɨ' minyɨka. Aawana, nɨmɨnnanyɨra.
Nɨmɨnyɨna nyawɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ Nɨmaamaangerɨjɨ kyawɨpɨdɨka! Sare'na dahaa'daasɨ Nɨmaamaangerɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' tɨnna wangamwaasaihɨlyɨ.”
Pilipɨ wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, Nɨmwarɨna dɨneyɨbwarɨdaakwia! Tɨnna wanganawaajɨ ‘Wikɨra!’ dɨnaadeinera.”

Mena wɨdɨna kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Pilipɨ, naangegaa' sarɨmɨnyaba mwaaidɨnyagaa' manyanganyadɨnyaigɨ daa! Pwai nɨmɨnyɨ tɨnna nyangamwakei Nɨmwarɨ tɨnna mena wangamwakelyɨ. Savɨdaa'nyɨ be'na nyɨdɨwaa? ‘Nɨmwarɨna dɨneyɨbwarɨdaakwia!’

Pilipɨ, dare' malɨmwagyɨjɨwaana? ‘Jizaazai Nɨmwarɨ wɨlamwaalɨ'. Nabaai Nɨmwai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaalɨ'.’ Sara malɨmwagyɨjɨwaana? Yagaalya yɨhɨthɨwe nɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya mɨka. Nɨmwai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlanyɨmwaaidei nyɨdadaa'nyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gamɨre wawɨnya yɨvanɨkengɨra.
‘Nɨmwarɨ wɨlamwaaihe. Nɨmwai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlanyɨmwaalɨ',’ yɨhɨthɨwe'na dɨnyɨlɨmwagyɨla! Sare'na ‘Aala!’ dɨna yɨpɨja' nɨmɨ Nɨmware wawɨnya yadɨnyanna dɨnyɨlɨmwagyɨla!

Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kwai nyɨlɨmwagori nɨmɨ nayaa yadɨnya sahwai nayaa sara yadelyɨ. Yayo, Nɨmwaryawɨnna wawa'mujɨ dɨragɨnaange' nɨmɨreraavɨna wɨjaavɨde'na yadɨnyangɨ nɨmɨrera wavɨlapɨ'dengɨra.

‘Jizaazai sara sara dadevaaibɨsanna wɨdɨma!’ dapɨjɨ nɨmɨnyɨ yaya'na kanyɨwaaravapɨjɨ sara yɨdesɨra! ‘Yɨ a'mwera tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ Gawaalɨvaangeinyɨna a'mwera Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makibɨka!’ da'mujɨ sara yɨdesɨra.
Nɨmɨnyɨ yaya'na pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kanyɨwaaravapɨri sa' sarɨmɨnyɨne' yɨdeinyɨra.
Nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya yɨhɨvu'naja' nɨmɨnyɨne kɨwɨnyanna sara jideihɨlyɨ.
Nɨmɨ Nɨmwarɨ yɨwaara'na kya'muri ‘Maredaa'dei yɨ, Maredadei Pwai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' sarɨmɨjɨ mwaalana!’ dozɨ yɨhɨzaavadelyɨra.

Sahwai nebulyabwine Kuryarɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara mamaari yɨpɨnere. Sahwara Kurya sarɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ, sɨduta myawɨri yadɨvɨsa'na mamaari yɨpɨ'delyɨ. Sarɨmɨ sɨduta yawɨ'manɨga'. Sarɨmɨjɨ kuna mwaalaka dɨvi sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaalade'na sahwarɨ yawɨ'manɨga'.
Sɨgɨraayaihɨrɨ mihyagalya'mayɨ yɨdeinyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna bɨdeinyɨ.
Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara tɨnna mwanganyɨ nyɨpɨ'de' kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ dɨnyanganyideihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ mwaaidɨnya'na sahwaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.
Sagaa' yɨma'nadehaa' nɨmɨ Nɨmaamaangerɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨnyɨra. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨnyɨra. Yɨ sagaa' sare' jawɨryideihɨlyɨra.

Da pwai nɨmɨre yagaaikɨwɨnya kɨnɨnnakei sa mɨdɨda sahwai nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nadelyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nade sahwarɨna Nɨmaamaangerɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nadelyɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sahwarɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nojɨ sahwarɨna nɨmɨ sainyɨ wɨjɨwaainɨnɨdelyɨra.”

Gamɨre pwai Juthaazai wo'nɨkelyɨ. Sai Juthaazai Yɨzɨkerɨyotɨyai mɨka! Juthaazai pwai mwaalakei wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, maalɨkegaa' gɨmɨreinaavɨna gɨmɨnyɨ dɨnejɨwaainade' Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨna mujɨwaainyɨ jɨthe'na be'nanaka?”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Pwai kwai nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'najai nɨmɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨnna yadelyɨ. Sahwarɨna Nɨmaamaangerɨ tewaanya kuvu'nojɨ saryabanna naarɨmɨnɨdainaai bɨna yakwoihɨjɨ saryaba ku'dɨkevɨ mwaalakadelyɨ.
Pwarɨ nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya mwɨvu'nyɨvanɨkei nɨmɨre yagaalya mamɨdɨnyɨvanɨkelyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yagaalya' kadɨka nyu'nɨwaasa' nɨmɨ gaveinyɨre' mɨka! Aawa. Nɨmwai nyɨdasaabakeresɨra.
Sarɨmɨjɨ kuna mwaaidɨ sa yɨhɨthɨwa.

Nɨmwai yawɨ'na ‘Jizaazarebwi nayaa wɨjɨwaainana!’ yawɨ'na yojɨ nɨmɨre yayavɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Maredaderɨ yasaabathelyɨ. Maredade sai Kurya Tewaanyalyɨra. Kuryai Tewaanyai yuyangɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakojɨ, nabaai, yɨhɨthɨwe yuya nayaa jawɨryideihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨra.

Dahaa' kaanyagaa' yɨhɨthɨma! ‘Tewaanna dɨmwaalyɨla!’ Sareburɨdaa'nyɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi sarɨmɨnyaba yagalya'mavɨdesɨ. Yɨ nɨnnya kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhɨzaavɨde'nanyɨ. Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara yaasɨwa'na dɨna ‘Tewaanna dɨmwaalyɨla!’ yaasɨwa'na dadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' nɨnnya kwaamu'nanyabwi mujaayɨ yɨhyɨde'nanyɨ. Nayaa yɨhɨzaavɨde'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' sɨmuyɨwaala myawɨpɨna! Sɨmunya gamɨ sa' lɨka myanna!

Yɨhɨthɨwa. ‘Kaanya wawa'mujɨ kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna bɨdeinyɨ,’ dɨwe kadɨka nyu'nɨwaa'. Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nayaa yɨhɨvu'najɨ kwajɨ Nɨmwaryawɨnna wɨde'na yɨlaaya kyɨpɨdɨka! Nɨmwai naangelyɨ. Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨra. Sare'na yɨhɨthɨwa.
Dahaa' sa yɨhɨthɨwa. Sa myɨma'nyagaa' yɨhɨthɨwa. ‘Dɨvi sara kyɨma'nori dɨnyɨlɨmwagyɨla!’ dena sara yɨhɨthɨwa.
Naangegaa' yagaala kwalaalya yɨhɨthɨdeinyɨ mɨka. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ maremwaaidei ‘Jizaazarɨ kayaa'na yɨma!’ daka bɨvanɨ'. Sai nɨmɨnyɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' maayalyɨra.
Aawa. ‘Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara “O, Jizaazarɨ Nɨmwarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nadelyɨra,” yawɨpɨka!’ dena sara yɨvanɨge. Nɨmwai sara nyɨdakakabaaibɨ' yuya sara yɨvanɨgeinyɨra,” wɨda'.
“Kaanyaana! Davɨdaa'nyɨ wawaana!”
Jizaazai gannyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ gɨraipɨwɨla nebulyainyɨra. Nɨmaamaangei gɨraipɨwawɨnya' nayaa maremwaaidelyɨ.

Sahwai nɨmɨnyɨ taanya gazabaaizabaai sɨla myɨ'nyadevaai pɨdalasɨ'na yadelyɨ. Nabaai gazabaaizabaai sɨla yɨ'nadevaai ‘Sabaai sɨla pɨnɨ yɨ'nana!’ dada nayaa pɨdaaina. Gamɨ dɨna ‘Taanya savɨ buwɨta yuya sedala waryaanya yuya pɨdaalɨma! Taanya sa' tewaanya' yɨma'nana! Yɨsɨla naanga yɨ'nadevaalyɨ.’ Dɨna yaka nayaa pɨdaaina yadelyɨ.
Yagaalya' yɨhɨthɨwe' sarɨmɨre sɨdusangɨ tewaanyaihi gɨrɨka maayaihɨlyɨra.

Nɨmɨnyɨ kuna dulanyɨmwaalyɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨ kuna wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨma! Taanya pɨbaai gɨraipɨwɨla kaavɨlyavɨ kuna mwari yajavaai yɨsɨla gamɨ sabaai myɨ'nyɨ yadevaaibɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ kuna mulamwaalyɨ nyɨpɨjaihi yɨsɨla myɨ'nyɨ jideihɨlyɨ.

Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ gɨraipɨwɨla kaavɨlyainyɨ. Sahwaihi gɨraipɨwɨla taanyabaraavihɨlyɨ. Pwai kuna wɨlanyɨmwaalajai gamɨnyɨ kuna wɨlamwaaimujai yɨsɨla naanga yɨ'nadengɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ mulamwaalyɨ yɨhyɨwɨjaihi aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nayaa mi jide'nanyɨra.
Pwai nɨmɨnyɨ mulamwaalyɨ nyajai taanyabaaibɨsarɨ mwasɨlaa wasɨ'na ya'nelyɨ. Taanya sabara wasɨ'nɨkebara yawaka baihɨ'na yɨnɨkebara, sabara mari'bwarakɨna yɨnɨkebara dɨkevɨ marira'na ya'nengɨ.
Nɨmɨnyɨ kuna wɨlanyɨmwaaibɨzaihi nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨ nɨmɨre yagaalya yɨhwarajaihi yawɨ'na ‘Sa'na maarɨma!’ yawɨ'na yapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ sara kyɨwaaravapɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨma'nadesɨra.

Sarɨmɨ yɨsɨla yɨ'nɨpɨja'na a'mwera tɨnna yɨhwanganapɨjɨ dɨna ‘A'mwe sara Jizaazarerera,’ dɨpɨ'desɨ. Sarɨmɨ tewaanna sara yapɨjɨya'na a'mwera Nɨmaamaangerɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Byaannakelyɨ. Dɨragɨnyalyɨ,’ dɨnyɨna yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Nɨmwarɨ nɨmɨnyɨna wɨvu'nadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨna sara nyɨvu'nadeinyɨ. Nɨmɨre wɨvu'nyaburɨ kuna dɨmwaalyɨla!

Nɨmɨre kɨwɨnya kuna mɨdɨbɨza' nɨmɨre wɨvu'nyaburɨ yɨnahu dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ Nɨmaamaangere kɨwɨnya mɨdɨnena gamɨre wɨvu'nyaburɨ yɨnahu mwaaiheinyɨ. Sara yɨgevaaibɨ' sara dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨra.
Sa yɨhɨthɨwa. ‘Nɨmɨre wɨvu'nyabwi sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhwarana! Sarɨmɨre yɨlaayabwi yuneba yɨhyeku'nana!’ dena sa yɨhɨthɨwa.
Nɨmɨre kɨwɨnya da' yɨhɨthɨma! Nɨmɨnyɨ gɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨwakabaaibɨ' nɨmɨre pwaraavɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nana!
A'mwe pware kware wɨvu'nyabwi gya'mweraavɨna wiadaa'nyɨ gamɨre gaalyabwi wakaja' naangebulyɨ. Naangebwi pɨbwi aane pwai kwarɨ mwarika!
Kɨwɨnya yɨhɨthɨvanɨgengɨ yɨpɨjaihi nya'mweihɨlyɨra.

Dahaa' myɨhɨzɨvanɨge. Yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihɨlyɨ. Maalɨkeihɨlyɨ. Wɨdaayadei gamɨre maremwaaiderɨna yawɨ'na ‘Berɨ' yadelaka? Nɨmɨ myawɨrivanɨgeinyɨ.’ Sara yawɨ'na yade'na ‘Nya'mweihɨlyɨ,’ yɨhɨthɨwa. Nɨmaamaangerɨ yuyanna wɨ'nena mena sara yɨhɨthɨwa. Saburɨdaasɨ ‘Nya'mweihi,’ yɨhɨthɨvanɨgeihɨlyɨ.

Nɨmɨnyɨ manyɨdahɨlakyesaihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthahɨlakeinyɨ. Yɨhɨthahɨlakena dara yɨhɨthakɨwa. Wawapɨjɨ gɨraipɨwɨlyabaai sɨla naanga yadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ sara jɨla! Nabaai sɨla sa yuyagaa' kuna waragwona! Nɨmɨrebwi yawɨramaa'na yadɨvɨ' nɨmɨre yayavɨna Nɨmwarɨ yuya sara kyɨwaaravapɨjɨ ‘Nɨmwai yɨhɨzaavana!’ dena yɨhɨthakɨwa.
Sare' kɨwɨnya' dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Pwaigɨ pwarɨna gɨvu'nana! Pwaigɨ pwarɨna gɨvu'nana! Yuyaihi sara jɨla!
Kwaakevakɨyara Gotɨyarɨ myawɨryadɨvɨsara sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka kulojɨ atɨka mamaru'napɨna! Dara jawɨryide' ‘O, sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Jizaazarɨna sɨmɨlɨka dulaka!’

Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨreihi mwaaibɨzɨ kwajɨ Kwaakevakɨyara ‘Nennya avaalyarera,’ dɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya kuvu'nadɨka! Sarɨmɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyarajɨ mamwaalyɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Dahaa' nɨmɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨdaa'nyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthahɨlakeihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'manɨkeihɨlyɨ.

Kɨgaa' yagaalya' yɨhɨthe' jawɨrila! ‘Yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai maalɨkelyɨ. Gamɨnyɨ maremwaaidei naangelyɨ.’ Sare'na yɨhɨmaremwaaidɨnyainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'na nyevera, nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'na yɨhipɨ'de'nanyɨ. A'mwera nɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ mɨdɨnevera, nabaai sarɨmɨrevɨ yɨhɨmɨdɨbɨ'de'nanyɨ.
A'mwe sara nyɨdasaabakerɨ myawɨrivanɨgasa'na nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Gamɨre yaya' kɨnɨnnakera daaka!’ dapɨjɨ yuya kayaa'na sara yɨhipɨ'derera.

Nɨmɨ kaanya mabyɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ yagaalya' mujɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ Gotɨyai majɨ kyadɨ' ‘Sɨdu'nakera kayaa'na yadɨvɨsare.’ Sare'na mena wɨdɨna ye'ne' sahwara mujɨna ‘Nɨmɨ myawɨryena yaasɨwa'na yɨweinyɨ,’ mujɨ yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Pwai nɨmɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨdavaka nabaai Nɨmaamaangerɨnajɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'manɨkelyɨ.

Kumɨnyaba dɨragɨnna myɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ sare tɨnna mwanganyɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ sahwaraavɨna Gotɨyai mujɨ ‘Kayaa'na yeverera.’ Dɨragɨnna sara kye yuyagaa' yuyara sara myesabulyɨ. Sare'na kɨrɨ' nayaa kye kumɨ tɨnna wanganna nyeva kuna kayaa'na yadɨvɨ' nɨmɨnyɨnajɨ Nɨmaamaangerɨnajɨ sanɨdainaarɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'manɨkerera.
Sahɨrɨ' warɨ'. Kumɨre Kɨwɨnya' Gotɨyai wɨjaavake' dɨnɨke' yune'na nebulya'na yɨma'nadesɨ. Dara dɨnɨ' ‘Nɨmɨnyɨna sɨnna tɨka yaasɨwa'na wɨdavakerera.’
Maredadei Kuryai walaabathelyɨ. Sai nebulyabwi yadei Kuryai Nɨmwarɨdaa'nyai walaabathelyɨ. Nɨmwarɨdaa'nya Kuryarɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yasaabɨdeinyɨ. Mena kyasaaba'mujɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨna yɨhɨzalɨkurakadelyɨ.
Nabaai, sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna pwaraavɨ duzalɨkurakyideihɨlyɨ. Aayawɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨjɨ mwaidaanya'na pwaraavɨ duzalɨkurakyideihɨlyɨra nɨmɨnyɨna.
‘Nɨmɨrera nɨmɨnyɨ nanyɨmarasɨ'nɨpɨdɨka!’ dena yagaala sa kavena yɨhɨthɨwa.

A'mwera sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka kulojɨ kumɨ yɨhɨthɨpɨ'de ‘Nemɨre Lotuangevɨdaa'nyɨ yuna dalyula!’ Yɨthaa, kayaa'nanyagaa' pɨgaa' yɨma'nadehaa' a'mwera sarɨmɨnyɨ tamakɨna yɨhyapɨjɨ kwaasɨ dɨna ‘Yɨwo' Gotɨyare wawɨnya' wɨdaayɨvanɨgoinera.’
Nɨmwarɨjɨ nɨmɨnyɨjɨ manehyawɨriwaasa'na sarɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'na sara yɨhipɨ'dere.
Sagaa' sara yapɨjɨyagaa' ‘Sarɨmɨ dara jawɨrila! “Ai, Jizaazai sara nedake yɨma'nɨwakengɨ,’ ” dena yagaala sa kavena yɨhɨthɨweinyɨ.
Sɨnnawɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨnyaba mwaale'na yagaala sa mujɨna.
Mujɨ yɨhyena kɨrɨ' dahaa' dɨvi nyɨdasaabakeryawɨnna ayɨna wɨdeinyɨ yuya sa yɨhɨthɨvanɨgeinyɨ. ‘Ayɨna wɨdeinyɨ,’ kyɨhɨthɨwa kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨjɨya aane pwai kwai manyɨdaanganyɨwa' ‘Gawɨnneigɨnaka?’
Sara kyɨhɨthɨwa sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ kale naanga yuna yɨhyɨvanɨ'. Kale naanga kyɨhyɨvanɨ' kɨrɨ'

nebulya' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨnyɨne nɨmɨ kaanya wɨde' tewaanyabulyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ kaanya mwɨyɨ yɨwɨja' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Maredadei mabi yadelyɨra. Arɨkawɨ. Sare' nɨmɨ kaanya wɨna yɨwɨja' sarɨmɨnyawɨ sarɨ yasaabɨna.

Sarɨ yasaabɨna kya'mujɨ walaabɨna yojɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ mena wɨjɨwaainade ‘Sarɨmɨ yuyaihi kayaa'nanyabwi yɨvanɨgava. Yɨda'maraangeburɨna nayaa myawɨrivanɨgava. Gotɨyai kotɨya' sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨzɨdavadelyɨra.’
Nɨmɨnyɨ manyɨlɨmwagyɨvanɨgasa'na kayaa'nanyabwi yɨvanɨgava.
Nɨmwaryawɨnna tewaanyainyɨ kwawa'mwi yuyagaa' sarɨmɨ tɨnna dɨnyanganyideinyɨ mɨ'. Sa'na Kurya Tewaanyai ‘A'mwera Jizaazarɨna nayaa yawɨpɨka!’ dozɨ yɨda'maraangebwi wɨjɨwaainade.
Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ maremwaaidei Saataanɨmɨ kotɨya' mena wɨjɨdavake'na Gotɨyai yuyaraavɨ kotɨya' wɨjathelyɨ. Sana sana Kurya Tewaanyai Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaainadelyɨ.
Yagaala pɨnɨjɨ myɨhɨzɨwa. Aawa. Dahaa' yagaala sa nayaa mamaari jideihɨlyɨ.

Sa'na kɨrɨ' dɨvi Kurya Tewaanyai nebulya' dadei sahwai walaabozɨ nebulya yuyangɨ nayaa yɨhibwarɨdaakwade. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kuryai yawɨrojɨ gannya sɨdusa' mujɨ yɨhyade. Aawa. Nɨmɨjɨ Nɨmaamaangelyɨ wɨdakaja' yɨhɨthathe. Dɨvi yɨma'nya'ne yɨhɨthathelyɨra.
Sahwai nɨmɨnyɨna dɨna ‘Naangelyɨ,’ yaka byaannakeinyɨ nyɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Nɨmɨre dɨwɨja' maarɨna yojɨ sa' yɨhɨthathelyɨ. Sara yɨhɨthozɨ byaannakeinyɨ nyɨmwaaihadelyɨra.
Yuya Nɨmware sa nɨmɨrengɨra. Yuya Nɨmware yagaala sa wɨdadɨnyangɨ. Sareburɨdaasɨ ‘Nɨmɨre dɨwɨja' maarɨna yojɨ sa' yɨhɨthathelyɨ,’ yɨhɨthɨwa.
Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' tɨnna mwanganyɨ dɨnyidera. Sagaa'daasɨ maalɨkegaa' kwavɨlavojɨ tɨnna dɨnyanganyideinyɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre pwara gamɨre pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Nedɨwake' be yagaalavaka? Nedɨwa' ‘Maalɨkegaa' tɨnna mwanganyɨ dɨnyidera. Sagaa'daasɨ maalɨkegaa' tɨnna dɨnyanganyideinyɨ.’ Nabaai nedɨwa' ‘Nɨmwaryawɨnna wɨde'nanyɨ.’
Sara nedɨwake yagaala ‘Maalɨkegaa'na,’ be yagaalavaka? Nedɨvanɨke' myawɨrivanɨgoina,” wɨdɨna ye'.
Jizaazai kumɨre yɨwaarata wɨja'na yawɨrakei, wɨdɨna “Yɨhɨthɨwa. Maalɨkegaa' tɨnna mwanganyɨ dɨnyidera. Sagaa'daasɨ maalɨkegaa' tɨnna dɨnyanganyideinyɨ. Sa'ne sarɨmɨ sara jɨwaara'nɨvanɨgava!
Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ kɨnna, kɨdaata dɨzide' kɨrɨ' Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'desɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ kale yɨhyade' kɨrɨ' dɨvi sarɨmɨre kale' yɨlaaya yɨma'nadesɨ.

Mudangegaa' a'mwe' gamɨregaa' yɨma'nake'na bwaranyaryaba daanga wɨvɨda kale wiadesɨ. Nabaai mena maa'da gannya bwaranyai Kwaakevakɨ yɨma'nade'na yɨlaaya yɨna yadesɨ. Yɨlaaya yade'na gannya kale'na ayɨna myawɨryadesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe' sara yadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ sara jideihɨlyɨ. Dahaa' kale yɨhyɨvanɨke' kɨrɨ' tɨnna ayɨna wanganna kyɨhya'mujɨ sarɨnnya kuryara yɨlaaya naanga yɨpɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨre yɨlaaya sa' a'mwe aane pwai kwai kuka mipalamaari yadeihɨlyɨ.
Yɨrɨka savɨ nɨmɨnyɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' miwaarayɨ dɨnyideinyɨ. Naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Nɨmwarɨ sara yɨwaarapɨja pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨne yayavɨ sara yadelyɨ.
Kɨgaa' nɨmɨnyɨne yayavɨ myɨwaarayɨ ye'. Dahaa'daasɨ sara yɨwaaravapɨjɨ sa' daapɨna jideihɨlyɨ. ‘Nemɨre yɨlaaya' naanga yɨnahu neyeku'nana!’ dapɨjɨ dɨthaapyideihɨlyɨ.
Yagaala da ke'ba'nanyangɨ yɨhɨthɨwa. Sara yɨhɨthena aawaaya pɨgaa' yɨma'nadehaa' ke'ba'nanyangɨ kuna mujɨ yɨhideinyɨ. Aawa. Sagaa' Nɨmwarɨna aangyagaalya' kave yɨhɨthɨdeinyɨ.
Yɨrɨka savɨ nɨmɨnyɨne yayavɨjɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ jɨwaarayidelyɨ. ‘Nɨmwarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨwaaravɨma!’ mujɨ yɨhideinyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmwai sahwarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nade'na kadɨka nayaa yɨhu'nadelyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nɨvanɨke'najɨ ‘Jizaazai Gotɨyarɨdaasalyɨ,’ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' nyɨlɨmwamanɨgasa'najɨ Nɨmwai sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Nɨmwarɨdaasainyɨ walaabena Kwaakevakɨna bɨweinyɨ. Nabaai dahaa' Kwaakevakɨdaasɨ ya'mava'mwi Nɨmwaryawɨnna ayɨna wɨdeinyɨra.”
Sagaa' gamɨrera wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa, dahaasagaa' aangyagaalya' kave nedɨvanɨgɨ. Ke'ba'nanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' manejɨvanɨgɨ.

Dahaa' dara yawɨ'mwo' ‘Ai, Jizaazai yuya yawɨ'delyɨ.’ Nemɨre yɨwaarata magɨzɨwogaa' yuya sa nayaa yawɨ'dɨ nayaa sara nedɨvanɨgɨ. Sarebwi yɨvanɨgɨnyavɨ dara gɨlɨmwamwo' ‘Ai, sahwai Gotɨyarɨdaasai daaka!’”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Dahaa' danyɨlɨmwamanɨgava!

Yɨthaa, aawaaya pɨgaa' yɨma'nadehaa' dahaakɨ. Dahaa' gazaigɨzaigɨ gɨnnya angevɨna lɨkaanya wɨna jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna yɨwɨnama'na yapɨjɨ nɨmɨ gaveinyɨ mwaalɨdewɨ dɨnyagalya'mayideihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ gaveinyɨ mwaalya'na mɨ'. Nɨmwai nɨmɨjɨ mwaalade'na gaveinyɨ mɨka.

Nɨmɨ dɨna ‘Nɨmɨrera nɨmɨnyɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi kɨnɨnnakera mwaaibɨka!’ dena yuya sa yɨhɨthɨwa. Kwaakevakɨ daanga naanga kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' kwaakevakɨya kayaa'nanya dathɨwamwenna jɨvaimwannyɨla!”

Yagaala sa Jizaazai mena wɨdakegaa' sagaa' Sɨgunyavɨ maranganna yaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmwai, dahaa' naangegaa' yɨma'nɨwakegaakɨ. ‘Nyɨbwaalɨvaangei byaannakeinyɨ nyɨmwaaihana!’ da'gɨzɨ Jɨwaalɨvaangei byaannakerɨ dumwaaihya!
Kɨlaa'naka yuyaraavɨ nyɨjaavagɨnyaraavɨna gɨmɨ dɨna ‘Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi wɨjaavana!’ dahɨna sahwaraavɨ maremwaalyabwi gamɨnyɨna wɨjaavagɨnyabaaibɨ' byaannakerɨ dumwaaihya!
Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaala sabwi daresɨra. Gotɨya Nebulyaigɨ Nawɨ'nya gaveigɨnyɨjɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨdasaabahɨnyarɨjɨ yawɨramaata'nesɨra. Sa' yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabulyɨra.
Kwaaka davakɨyavɨ a'mweraavɨ gɨmɨre byaannyabwi wɨjɨwaaine. ‘Dɨragɨnna sara sara ja!’ kanyɨdahɨ mena sara yɨ'mwannyɨna yena wɨjɨwaaine.
Kɨgaakuna Kwaakeva' myɨma'nyaakegaa' gɨmɨjɨ byaannyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Nɨmwai, dahaa' byaanna sabwina gɨmɨ sahwaigɨnyaba byaannakeinyɨ dɨnyɨmwaaihya!

Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraayawɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjaavɨna nyagɨnya sahwaraavɨ gɨmɨre sɨdusa'na gɨmɨre yaya'na wɨjɨwaainɨwa. A'mwe sara gɨmɨrera mwaale'. Gɨmɨrera mwaalesaraavɨ nyɨjaavagɨnyarera. Gɨmɨre yagaalya' mena mɨdɨmwaa'.
Mena mɨdɨmwaasaraavɨne dahaa' gɨthɨvanɨge. Yuya nyɨjawaanya sare gɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyangɨra. Nabaai sare' mena yawɨ'manɨgasarera.

Yagaalya nyɨjaavagɨnya yagaala sa sahwaraavɨna wɨjaavɨna kye a'mwe sara daapɨna yeva nebwina dara yawɨ'mwaasa' ‘Yo, Gotɨyarɨdaasai Jizaazai walaabakei daaka!’ Nabaai dara lɨmwamwaasa' ‘Ya, Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ jasaabaka!’ Yɨ sare'na mena yawɨ'manɨgasarera.

Kumɨnyɨna Gotɨyaigɨnyɨ gyɨwaara'manɨge. Kwaakevakɨyara gɨmɨrebwi myadɨvɨsare. Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨna magyɨwaarayɨvanɨge. Aawa. A'mwe nyɨjawaanyaraavɨnesɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨnera mwaaihasa'na gyɨwaara'manɨge sahwaraavɨna.
Nɨmɨre yuya gɨmɨrengɨra. Gɨmɨre yuya nɨmɨrengɨra. Sare' sahwaraavɨ byaannakeinyɨ yɨma'nɨwa.

Sare'na dahaa' gɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨvanɨge. Kwaakevakɨ kuna mamwaalyɨ yɨdera. Kɨrɨ' Kwaaka davakɨ nɨmɨrera mwaaibɨ'dera. Nɨmwai Tewaanyaigɨ gɨrɨka maayaigɨ, gɨnnya dɨragɨnya' gɨnnya yaya' yawɨra'gɨzɨ saraavɨ tewaanna dɨmaredaaka! Gɨmɨre yaya sa' kanyɨjaavagɨ tewaanna mwaaihe. ‘Nɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨjɨ avaalyainaai mwaaiholabaaibɨ' avaalyara mwaaibɨka!’ da'gɨzɨ kumɨnyɨ sara dɨmaredaaka!

Kumɨnyaba mwaaidɨ sahwaraavɨ maredaave. Gɨnnya yaya' dɨragɨnya' kanyɨjaavagɨ nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna maredaave. Dame dɨragɨnna maredaa'na yadɨ aane pwai kwarɨ myagalya'mayɨ. Sara yadɨ kɨrɨ' gave pwai yagalya'masabwi kɨnɨnnakei yagalya'mavadelyɨra. Sarerɨna kɨgaakuna gɨmɨre Bukuya' sara dɨnɨke'nanyɨ.
Dɨragɨnna maredaa'na yena dahaa' gɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨvanɨgeinyɨ. ‘Kumɨnyɨ yunebanna nɨmɨre yɨlaayabwi yeku'nana!’ dena Kwaakevakɨ yagaala sa sara gɨthɨvanɨge.
Gɨmɨre yagaalya' nɨmɨreraavɨna nayaa wɨjaawa. Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ sahwaraavɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'manɨ'. Kwaakevakɨyainyɨ mamwaalyɨgevaaibɨ' sahwara Kwaakevakɨyara mamwaalyɨgasa'na sɨnna tɨka wɨda'manɨ'.

‘ “Nɨmɨreraavɨ kayaaka nyɨgaibɨthɨka!” dena kwaaka davakɨdaa'nyɨ dɨmakilaawa!’ magɨzɨvanɨge. Aawa. ‘Kayaa'nanaangei Saataanɨ kayaaka nyadɨka! Davakɨ nɨmɨrera mwaaidapɨjɨyaraavɨ dɨmaredaaka!’ Sara gyɨwaara'manɨge.
Kwaakevakɨyainyɨ mamwaalyɨgevaaibɨ' sahwara Kwaakevakɨyara mamwaalyɨgasarera.
Gɨmɨre wawɨnya'na nayaa yɨpɨ'de'na sahwara tewaanyara gɨrɨka maayara nebulyaburɨ yɨma'nɨpɨka! Gɨmɨre yagaalya' nebulyasɨra. Yagaala sa' wɨdɨwesɨ.
Kwaakevakɨna nyɨdasaabahɨnyabaai Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakya'na wɨdaase nɨmɨreraavɨ.
‘Gɨmɨre wawɨnya'na nayaa yɨpɨ'de'na tewaanyara nebulyaburɨ yɨma'nɨpɨka!’ dena gɨmɨre wawɨnya'na nayaa yɨde'na kumɨnyɨne'na tewaanyainyɨ gɨrɨka maayainyɨ wɨmwaalyɨge.
Nɨmɨrera sahwara gaveraavɨ Gotɨyaigɨnyɨ magyɨwaarayɨwa. Aawa. Dɨvi kumɨ pwaraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna wɨdɨna kyapɨjɨ kumɨre yagaalyavɨ nyɨlɨmwabɨ'dera kwaraavɨnajɨ yawɨrena gɨthɨwa.

Nɨmwai, ‘Yuyara avaalyara mwaaibɨka!’ dena gyɨwaara'manɨge. ‘Gɨmɨnyɨ wɨlagɨmwaaihe', nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlanyɨmwaaihɨnyabaaibɨ' avaalyara mwaaibɨka!’ dena gɨthɨwa. Nabaai, ‘Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyara dara lɨmwabɨ'de'na “O, Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨdasaabakelyɨra,” sara lɨmwabɨka!’ da'gɨzɨ ‘Naarɨmɨnyɨ wɨlanehɨmwaaibɨka!’ dɨthathe'na ‘Avaalyara mwaaibɨka!’ dena gyɨwaara'manɨge.
‘Naarɨmɨ avaalyainaai mwaaiholabaaibɨ' sahwara avaalyara mwaaibɨka!’ dena byaannya' mena nyɨjaavagɨnya sa' wɨjaawa.

‘Kumɨnyɨ wɨlamwaalɨma! Nɨmɨnyɨ kuna dulanyɨmwaala!’ gɨthɨwa. Gɨmɨ nyɨdasaabahɨ. Nabaai gɨmɨnyɨ nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nadevaaibɨ' kumɨnyɨna gɨvu'naderera. ‘Yɨ Kwaakevakɨyara sare' yawɨpɨka!’ dapɨjɨ ‘Sahwara avaalyaraavɨ yune'na wɨmwaaihaka!’ dakwoihɨjɨ kumɨnyɨ wɨlamwaalɨma! Nɨmɨnyɨ kuna dulanyɨmwaala!

Nɨmwai, nɨmɨreraavɨ nyɨjaavagɨnyaraavɨna ‘Nɨmɨ mwaalɨdeva nɨmɨjɨ mwaaibɨka!’ da'mujɨ sɨmunya sara yawɨ'manɨge. Kwaaka dava' mwaki yagɨnegaa' nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nyaake'na byaanna dɨragɨnya' nyɨjaye. ‘Byaanna sa' wangabɨka!’ da'mujɨ ‘Sahwara nɨmɨjɨ mwaaibɨka!’ gɨthɨwa.
Nɨmwai, yɨda'maraangebwi kɨnɨnnakeigɨ, Kwaakevakɨyara gɨmɨnyɨ myawɨryadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sainyɨ gɨmɨnyɨ yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ. Nabaai gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨdasaabahɨnya'na a'mwe dara nɨmɨrera sara yawɨ'mwaa'.

Gɨmɨnyɨna gɨmɨre yayavɨna sahwaraavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwena nabaai, kuna yɨbwarɨdaakwɨdeinyɨ. ‘Gɨmɨnyɨ nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nadevwi kumɨnyɨ warana! Nabaai kumɨnyɨ wɨlɨmwaalɨma!’ da'mujɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwɨdeinyɨ sahwaraavɨ.”
Jizaazai sare mena wɨdakegaa' gamɨrerari saba yagalya'maveva Aalya Kidɨronɨyavɨ ga'ma'na ye'. Saba yɨwawɨnya pɨjɨ' wa'dɨsɨyaba. Aalya Kidɨronɨyavɨ ga'ma'na yeva wawɨnya savɨ wɨlamwaaina.
Kɨgaa' wawɨnya savɨ Jizaazalyɨ gamɨrerari yɨkabadɨvɨ' mwaalesa'na Juthaazai yɨkamaangeraavɨna Jizaazarɨ wibwarɨdaakwakei wawɨnya savɨ yawɨ'nɨkei.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai wawɨnya sawɨnna wɨna. Nabaai aawɨlasarajɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨne damerajɨ kwara kaanna wɨna ye'. Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Perɨzɨyarajɨ sara aawɨlasaraavɨjɨ dameraavɨjɨ wɨdasaawɨna. Wɨdasaawɨna kye' kumɨre kwaari'masɨramɨnya kɨlɨka maarɨna yeva laamuyajɨ yɨ'baaka lɨvamakuna. Lɨvamakuna yesaraavɨna Juthaazai Jizaazaryawɨnna yɨbwaramakuna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai gamɨnyɨne yuyangɨ yɨma'nya'ne yawɨ'na yakei, badaapiyaraayabanna bɨna. Badaapiyaraayabanna bɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Aarɨna bɨ'manɨgava?”
Kumɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Naazaretɨ mwaalyai Jizaazarɨna bɨwoinera.” Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Sahwainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra.” Sagaa' kumɨnyaba Juthaazai yɨbwarɨdaakwiai daavakelyɨ.
Jizaazai “Sahwainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra,” wɨdɨna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ samwi yɨgɨ'daa'na yeva kwaakewɨnna walakuna ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai ayɨna yɨwaara'na “Aarɨna bɨ'manɨga'?” Yɨwaara'na kya' kumɨ sara wɨdɨna “Naazaretɨ mwaalyai Jizaazarɨna bɨ'manɨgo.”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Mena yɨhɨthɨwa. Sahwainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra. Nɨmɨnyɨ bɨ'manɨgasavɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe dara nɨmɨrera wɨpɨka!”
Mena wɨdake' “Yune'na nebulya'na yɨma'nana!” daka sara wɨdɨna ya'. Dara wɨdakesɨ. A'mweraavɨ nyɨjaavagɨnyarajɨya aane pwai kwarɨ myagalya'mayɨwa.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ munnaanyavɨ Saaimonɨ Pitai kwaari'masɨramɨnya' maruzaainyɨna yakei. Kwaari'masɨramɨnya sa' labwa'nyɨna yaka pwarɨ davɨna. Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangere yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai damerari bɨna yaka daavɨna. Sai daavɨna kya' Pitai gamɨre kadɨki' aangasɨmagɨnyɨ' yuna daku'na. A'mwe sarɨne yaya' “Maalɨkaazala.”

Kadɨki' yuna daku'na yakevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya kwaari'masɨramɨnya' ayɨna duzaainana! Gara yawɨ'manɨgɨna! Nɨmaamaangei daanga naanga nyɨvɨnade'ne kaapɨya' nyɨjaawaka sa' manyɨ yɨdeinyɨ daa! Nɨde'nanyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aawɨlasarajɨ kumɨre maremwaaide naangelyɨ Juya damerajɨ sara Jizaazarɨ galalɨmwanna yeva gamɨre asawaarɨ wɨla pwɨyɨna yeva
sɨnnawɨ a'mwe Anaazaryawɨnna makuna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaa' Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei Kaayapaazai mwaalakei. Kaayapaazarɨ ganyaalɨmaangei Anaazai mwaalakelyɨra.
Nabaai Kaayapaazai sai Juyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Gave pwai a'mweraavɨna balaja' yɨ sa' tewaanyasɨra.” Sara wɨdɨna yakelyɨ Kaayapaazai.

Saaimonɨ Pitalyɨ Jizaazare pwalyɨ saraai Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨnna. Gamɨrei pwarɨna Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei nayaa yawɨ'na yadelyɨ. Yawɨ'na yadei angwaasavɨ kusɨlaanna Jizaazalyɨ wɨlaawɨna. Jizaazarɨ kuna mɨdɨnna yagɨlyai wɨlaawɨna.

Wɨlaawɨna kya' mwasɨlaa tɨkuryaba Pitai daavɨna. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre pwarɨna Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei nayaa yawɨ'dei sai mwasɨlaanna ayɨna walyuna yaka tɨkuryavɨ maremwaaide sɨdɨraayavɨ wɨdɨna yaka kusɨlaanna Pitarɨ makuna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ tɨkuryavɨ sɨdɨraaya' Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Pwaigɨjɨ a'mwe sahwareigɨ midaaka?” Sai kwaasɨ wɨdɨna “Aawa, nɨmɨ mɨka!”
Sagaa' yɨrɨlyagaakɨ. Sare'na damerajɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnyarajɨ dɨka marira'na yeva savɨ daavɨna yeva yɨmwannyɨna. Yɨmwannyɨna yadaapi Pitai bɨna yaka kumɨnyaba daavɨna yaka yɨmwannyɨna ya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera dɨnyɨna “Anaazai, Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naanga pwalyɨ.” Nabaai dɨnyɨna yesai A'mwe Anaazai Jizaazarɨ yɨwaara'na. Gamɨreraavɨnajɨ gamɨre wɨjɨwaakyavɨnajɨ yɨwaara'na.

Sara yɨwaara'na kya' Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Yuyagaa' Kwaakevakɨyaraayaba yuyaraavɨ ku'maayaba wɨdadɨnyainyɨra. Juyainaavɨre lotuangengɨjɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨjɨ saba wɨjɨwaakɨna. Juya yuyara yɨkabadɨvɨsaba yuna wɨjɨwaakɨna yadɨnyainyɨ. Lɨka yulya'na yagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mujadɨnyainyɨ.
Sara yadɨnyainyɨne'na baa'na nyɨwara'mwaa? A'mwera kadɨka nyu'nesaraavɨ yɨwaarava'gɨzɨ gɨthɨpɨ'derera. Yɨthaa, kumɨ yagaala sara wɨde'na nayaa yawɨ'na yesa'nanyɨra.”
Sai sara wɨdɨna yakegaa' dame pwai Jizaazare maangwɨdaanyaba asasɨ jɨrɨ'bwararanna yaka wɨdɨna “Amɨ, Gotɨyarɨne Tamira'de Naangerɨ sara baa'na ja'nawɨdɨwaana!”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ kayaa'na wɨdɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ sa'na dava yuyara mwaaihasaraavɨ duzɨwaakya! Sa'na nɨmɨ tewaanna wɨdɨwe' baa'na nyɨramwaana?”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨla kuna pwɨyɨnɨkerɨ Anaazai yaasɨna kya' Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei Kaayapaazaryawɨnna pwara makuna ye'.
Sɨnnawɨ dɨkeyaba Pitai daavɨna yaka dɨkevɨ kuna yɨmwannyɨna. Kuna yɨmwannyɨna yadaa'nyɨ pwara Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai, a'mwe sahwareigɨ midaaka?” Pitai kwaasɨ wɨdɨna “Aawa, nɨmɨ mɨka!”
Saba Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangere yaasɨwa'wawɨnya pwai mwaalɨna. Pitai a'mwere kadɨkikɨ yuna daku'na gamɨjɨyarajɨyai mwaalɨna. Sai mwaalɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Wawɨnyavɨ salyɨyaigɨnyɨ tɨnna magwanganyɨjɨwa?”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Pitai kwaasɨ ayɨna wɨdɨna “Aawa.” Wɨdɨna yakegaa' yɨme'nya'bɨ' kukuraayai jaka dɨna ya'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kaayapaazare angevɨdaa'nyɨ Ga'maanɨya naangere anga kotɨyavɨna Jizaazarɨ makuna. Sagaa' byaaka mena yakegaakɨ. Jizaazarɨ makuna yeva Juyara dɨna “Ga'maanɨyaraavɨre anga kotɨyavɨna wɨlawaajɨ nemɨ kɨmaakeina nyɨma'naadɨka! Aawa. Pari'ma'munne tɨka naade'na,” deva kotɨyavɨ mwɨlaawie'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ mwasawɨ daavesawɨnna A'mwe Paailatɨ walyuna yaka yɨwaara'na “A'mwe darɨna kotɨyavɨ be kayaa'nanya'na dɨvanɨgatavaka?”
Kumɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Sai kayaa'nanya' myajɨ kwajɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna mamakabi kyaadɨka!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Paailatɨ wɨdɨna “Sahwaihi makwalyuna yapi sarɨnnya kɨwɨnya'na kotɨya' a'mwerɨ jɨla!” Juyara wɨdɨna “A'mwe Romɨyaihi kɨwɨnya' nedakadɨvɨ' ‘Kotɨya'na aane pwai kwarɨ maramakɨpɨnera!’ Sara nedadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.”
Sɨnnawɨ Jizaazai “A'mwera nɨmɨnyɨ sara kyapɨjɨ balɨdeinyɨ,” wɨdakesɨ. “Gamɨre yagaala sa' yune'na nebulya'na yɨma'nana!” Gotɨyai kadozɨ Juyara sara wɨdɨna yesasɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Ga'maanɨyaraavɨre anga kotɨyavɨ Paailatɨ ayɨna wɨlɨna yaka Jizaazarɨna dameraavɨ wɨdɨna “Dalyamaraawila!” Sara wɨdɨna yaka Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨnya Kingɨyaigɨ daaka?”
Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nyɨwara'mwaanya' gɨnnya yagaalya' dɨngaka? Pwara nɨmɨnyɨna gɨthɨwaasa' dɨngaka?”
Paailatɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Juyainyɨ daaka! Nɨmɨnyawɨnna gɨnnya yɨsavaakɨyara Juyarajɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ sara gɨmarɨmwaihɨwaa'. Berɨ' yagɨneigɨnaka!”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Kwaaka davakɨ nɨmɨre maremwaalyabwi maayasɨra. Kwaaka davakɨ maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ kwajɨ nyɨmɨdɨdɨvɨsara dɨna ‘Juyara sahwarɨ nagalalɨmwabɨka!’ kadɨpɨka! Sara dɨna yɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ Juyaraavɨ mala karabɨthɨka! Sare' Kwaaka davakɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨre maremwaalyabwi mwarika.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Paailatɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai, sarevɨ maremwaaidɨnya Kingɨyaigɨ daaka?” Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨna nyɨdɨwaa ‘Kingɨyaigɨnyɨ.’ ‘Nebulyabwina wɨjalɨkurakɨma!’ dɨna yena nɨwaa' nyɨmaarakeinyɨ, Kwaakevakɨ yɨma'neinyɨ. Sareinyɨ nɨmɨre wawɨnyasɨ. Gazaizai nebulyavɨna wɨvu'nadei nɨmɨre maanguraayavɨ kadɨka nyu'nɨvanɨkelyɨra.”
Paailatɨ wɨdɨna “Nebulyabwi berɨvaka!”
Sagaa' mwasawɨ Juyaraayawɨnna Paailatɨ ayɨna wɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Mena yawɨrena dɨna yɨwa. Sai kayaa'nanya myɨwakelyɨ.
Sa'na kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨrebwina Pari'ma'munnegaa' kalavuzarɨ yagalya'ma'dɨnyainyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Juyaihɨre Kingɨyarɨ yagalya'mavɨjɨwa? Sɨmunya gara yawɨ'mwaa'?”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ jaka ayɨna wɨdɨna “Aawa, sai mɨka! Aawa. Baravaazarɨ nejaama!” Baravaazai sai kuka yɨpalamaa'delyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Paailatɨ sara wɨdɨna kya' aawɨlasara Jizaazarɨ maarɨna yeva wɨla lannakesɨ sara tamɨna.

Mena tamɨna yeva taanya lannaka kave gɨhɨpaina yeva yamɨngaina yeva mwaaihɨ'nya lannake' gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ yɨlakɨna. Gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ yɨlakɨna yeva kwaabɨyɨvɨta wayaake' egwewaarɨ yewaa'bwa'na yeva
gamɨnyawɨnna bɨna yeva kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ! Yuyagaa' Juyaraavɨre Kingɨyaigɨ dɨmwaala!” Sara wɨdɨna yeva kunnya araraalyajɨ gamɨre sɨnnyavɨ jɨrɨ'bwararanna ye'.

Anga mwasawɨnna Paailatɨ ayɨna walyuna yaka kwala bwa'naanyavɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa, tamakya'na gamɨre kayaa'nanya' mwari'. Nɨmɨ bɨrɨna bɨrɨna yena gamɨre kayaa'nanya' mwanganyɨwa. Dahaa' ‘ “Paailatɨ gamɨnyɨ yɨwetawakya' mabɨramaariwaka,” yawɨpɨka!’ dena sarɨmɨnyabanna makabɨvanɨge.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai mwaaihɨ'nya lannake' yɨlakɨnɨke' kwaabɨyɨvɨta wayaake' yewaa'bwa'nɨkei mwasawɨnna walyuna. Mwasawɨnna walyuna kya' Paailatɨ kumɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyɨla! A'mwe dalaakana!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ damerajɨ tɨnna wanganeva jaka dɨna “Yɨsavɨri nilɨya dɨramo! Yɨsavɨri nilɨya dɨramo!” Jaka dɨna kye' Paailatɨ wɨdɨna “Nabaai, sarɨmɨ maarapɨri yɨsavɨ nilɨya dɨramyɨla! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ gamɨnyɨ mabɨramaariwa yɨwetawakya'!”
Juyara ja'nawɨdɨna “Nemɨ kɨwɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeine. ‘Gotɨyarɨ Gawaalɨvaangeinyɨra,’ kwaasɨ sara nedɨvanɨke'na nemɨre kɨwɨnya' dara dɨnɨ' ‘Balana!’ ”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Paailatɨ yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka lɨka naanga yɨna yaka
Ga'maanɨyaraavɨre kotɨangevɨ ayɨna wɨlɨna yaka Jizaazarɨ yɨwaara'na “Gawɨdaasaigɨnaka?” Sara yɨwaara'na kya' kɨrɨ' Jizaazai maja'nawɨjɨna.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Paailatɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ manyɨjɨwaana? Jawɨka! A'mwe naangeinyɨ, gɨmɨre wɨlyabaai yaarɨna kya'muri dɨwode dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Nabaai, ‘Yɨsavɨri nilɨya dɨramyɨla!’ kuda'muri dɨvaide dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨra. Sare'na jawɨka!”

Jizaazai ja'nawɨdɨna “Gɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai magɨzaayajɨ kwajɨ dɨragɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kɨnɨnnakeigɨ mamwaalyɨ kyɨdɨka! Sarevɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna a'mwe kwai nyɨmakabɨwakei, kayaa'nanya naange' kɨnɨnnakelyɨra. Gɨmɨ kayaa'nanya maalɨke' kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨra.”

Sarevɨ Paailatɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka dɨna “Jizaazarɨ makwaasɨma!” Dɨna yaka yaamɨjɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨna. Yaamɨjɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨna yadaa'nyɨ kɨrɨ' Juyara jaka naanga wɨdɨna “Sarɨ makwaasɨja' Romɨyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmaremwaaide Sizaareigɨ mɨka! Gazaizai dada ‘Kingɨyainyɨ,’ a'mwe sai Sizaarɨna yɨkamaangelyɨra!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sa Paailatɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka kusawɨdaa'nyɨ mwasawɨnna Jizaazarɨ wɨlamaraawɨna yaka kotɨya' yadei yawɨbwa'derɨ namwaalyɨsavɨ walamwaaina. Saba Angwaata Sɨlaange' wo'nɨkesɨ. Nabaai, Yɨvɨruyagaalya' Gavaatha wo'nɨkesɨ.
Sagaa' Pari'ma'munne wona sagaakɨ. Sagaa' kumɨre yuya yovɨrawakyagaa'. Sɨrɨgwajahaa' aya kɨgaa' yɨma'nakegaakɨ. Paailatɨ walamwaaina yaka Juyaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyɨla! Dai sarɨnnya Kingɨyalyɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwara jaka naanga wɨdɨna “Dɨramakya! Dɨramakya! Yɨsavɨri nilɨya dɨrama!” Paailatɨ yɨwaara'na “Sarɨnnya Kingɨyarɨ yɨsavɨri nilɨya tamɨdei daaka! Sara danyɨdɨwaava!” Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera ja'nawɨdɨna “Nemɨre kingɨya pwai mamwaalyɨ'. Sizaai gavei kingɨyalyɨra.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sagaa' Paailatɨ “Sarɨ yɨsavɨri nilɨya tabɨka!” daka wɨmwangɨmwaaihɨna ya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aawɨlasara yɨsawa' Jizaazarɨ wɨmaarina yeva Jizaazarɨ makwalyuna.
Jizaazarɨ makwalyuna yadɨvɨ' sai gannya yɨsawa' yɨkwa'na yaka Gɨlemɨnyagɨnyaba wo'nɨkewɨnna makuna. Saba Yɨvɨruyagaalya' Golɨhota wo'nɨkesɨ.

Makuna kya' aawɨlasara yɨta savɨri nilɨya tamɨna. Nabaai, yɨsawaarɨri a'mwe pwaraarɨ nilɨya tamɨna yesaraalyɨ. Jizaazare aangasɨmagɨ pwarɨ nilɨya tamɨna, kwanaamimagɨ pwarɨ nilɨya tamɨna. Tɨnnyaba Jizaazai.

Paailatɨ pɨkarya yɨda'na yaka aawɨlasaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Jizaazarɨ yɨsavɨ yagaala da' jɨlakyɨla!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' sara yɨlakɨna. Dara pɨkarya yɨda'na “Jizaazai, Naazaretɨ mwaalyai Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidei Kingɨyai.”

Sara yɨda'nɨke' yɨsavɨri Jizaazarɨ nilɨya tamesaba Anga Jeruzaalemɨ aya kɨba wara'. Jeruzaalemɨ maalɨkeba wa'nɨke'na Juya kwalaalyara pɨkarya sa' tɨnna wanganna. Pɨkarya sa' Yɨvɨruyagaalyasɨ Romɨyaraavɨre yagaalyasɨ Gɨrikɨyaraavɨre yagaalyasɨ yɨda'nɨkesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera Juyara Paailatɨmɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidei Kingɨyai,’ pɨkarya myavɨkaryɨnnera! Aawa. Javɨkarya! ‘A'mwe dai wɨdadelyɨ “Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ Kingɨyainyɨreva.” ’ ”
Paailatɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ mena yɨda'mwe' yɨda'mwana! Mi'nanyɨra.”

Yɨsavɨri Jizaazarɨ nilɨya tamevevɨdaa'nyɨ aawɨlasara Jizaazarɨ baazɨ'ma'nya saza maarɨna yeva yanga munne'. Pɨwa' pwai maarɨna, pɨwa' pwai maarɨna, aawɨlata pwaraai pwaraalyara maarɨna. Nabaai Jizaazarɨ baazɨ'ma'nya saamɨnaange' maarɨna. Baazɨ'ma'nya sa' yavɨkaryagaa' magipwalyakesɨ. Sa' yuneba tɨlayalawakɨna yakesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ baazɨ'ma'nya saamɨnaange' maarɨna yeva dɨnyɨna “Baazɨ'ma'nya da' yuneba gave pɨrɨ'na mɨwɨ'nɨke' lihɨvalawaajɨ namunnaadɨka! Aawa. Nemɨ saatuya wasɨ'nyɨ wasɨ'nya yawaajɨ saatuya' tewaanya wavɨlavajai maaradesɨ.” Sare'na Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨre bukuya' dɨnɨke' nebulya'na yɨma'nana!” kada' sara ye'. Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨ'
“Nɨmɨre kwaabɨhannya yɨvɨta saza yanga munne'.
“Nɨmɨre baazɨ'ma'nya'na saatuya' yeva wavɨlavakei maara'.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aawɨlasara sara ye'.
Yɨsavɨri Jizaazarɨ nilɨya tamesaba maalɨkeba ganaangesɨ ganyɨwanaangesɨ Kɨlopaazare balaange' Maarɨyaasɨ Maahɨthaala mwaalya' Maarɨyaasɨ sa daavɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai tɨnna wanganna. Nabaai gamɨrerɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nakei saba daa'dɨ'nyɨ tɨnna wanganaka ganaangevɨ sarɨna wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ, yɨthaa, sai jɨvwaalɨvaangelyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka gannyarɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨthaa! Dahaa' a'mwe sa' gɨnnya gwaangesɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna yakegaa'daasɨ gannya angevɨ a'mwe savɨ maremwaala'.
Sagaa' Jizaazai dara yawɨrake' “Yuya mena daaka!” Sara kada' Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨre Bukuya' dɨnɨke' yuneba nebulya'na yɨma'nana!” kada' wɨdɨna “Aalya'na mɨjɨka nyɨwaka.”
Saba maa'gulyavɨ waainɨya kayaa'nanya' yɨ'nɨkesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ waainɨya savɨ saalaalyavɨya jɨ'mɨnya' paihɨna yeva yɨta yɨzopɨya taanyavɨ jɨ'mɨnya' baazɨ'makuna yeva Jizaazarɨ maryɨkɨ dɨhaihɨrakɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ mi'na dɨhaihɨrakɨna yesagaa' Jizaazai waainɨya' yaamɨjɨ nyɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Yuya menanyɨra.”
Gannya mɨnyagɨnya' tuta'naraka gannya kuryai wɨmwangɨmwaaihɨna ya'.

Sagaa' Juyara kunnya Kwazaakegaa'na yovɨrawakɨna yadɨvɨsagaakɨ. Nabaai, Kwazaakegaa' sagaa' Pari'ma'munnegaa' Kwazaaka naangegaakɨ. Kwazaaka naangegaa'na Juyara “Nemɨre tewaanyagaa' yɨsangɨ gɨlaayara warɨna nyɨpɨdɨka!” dɨneva Paailatɨmɨ yɨwaara'na “ ‘A'mwera baibɨka!’ nedɨwaanyaraavɨ sɨvɨla kayaaka karɨngɨrawaajɨ yarai kabalapɨri yɨsangɨdaasɨ makwalɨna yaadeina daaka?”
Paailatɨ “Yo,” wɨdakevɨdaa'nyɨ aawɨlasara bɨna. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Jizaazaryaba a'mweraarɨ tameta pwarɨ sɨvɨlyaraai tɨngɨ'na, pwarɨ sɨvɨla tɨngɨ'na.
Sɨvɨla tɨngɨ'na kye' pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Jizaazaryawɨnna bɨna yeva dara wanganesa' “Ai, a'mwe sai mena davaimwaka!” Sara deva gamɨre sɨvɨlyaraai marɨngɨrina.
Aawa. Gamɨre sɨvɨlyaraai marɨngɨri kye' kɨrɨ' aawɨlata pwai Jizaazare lɨgɨlɨgɨsaba sɨramɨnya saamɨnyasɨ lɨvadaakuna. Sɨramɨnya' lɨvadaakuna kya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' tawesɨ aalyasɨ bwalaravaawɨna ya'.
Sarɨmɨ wɨ'nɨpɨne'na nɨmɨ tɨnna sara wangane sara yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨwa. Jalɨkurakya sa' nebulyasɨ. “Sarɨmɨ dɨlɨmwagyɨla!” dena sainyɨ dara yawɨ'mwa “Nɨmɨ nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨgesɨra.”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨre bukuya' dɨnɨke' yune'na nebulya'na yɨma'nana!” kada' aawɨlasara sara ye'. Dara dɨnɨ' “Gamɨre yagɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' marɨngɨri yadesɨra.”
Nabaai Gotɨyare Bukuya gabinyaba dɨnyɨna “A'mwera pwarɨ sɨramɨnya saamɨnyasɨ lɨvadaakwapɨjɨ sarɨ tɨnna wangabɨ'delyɨ.” Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Sa mena yesagaa' Paailatɨmyawɨnna a'mwe naangei Jozepɨyai Aarɨmathɨya mwaalyai wɨna yaka yɨwaara'na “Jizaazarɨ gɨlaayarɨ maarɨjɨwana?” Jozepɨyai sai Jizaazarei mwaalakelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Juya naangera Jizaazareraavɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨdavakevɨna lɨka ya'. Sa'na Jizaazarei mwaalake' lɨka yulyarakei. Sagaa' navɨka mwaalɨna yakei yɨwaara'na “Gɨlaayarɨ maarɨjɨwana?” Sara yɨwaara'na kya' Paailatɨ wɨdɨna “Yo, gɨlaayarɨ dulamaraawa!” Wɨdɨna kya' Jozepɨyai wɨlaawɨna yaka gɨlaayarɨ makabɨna.

Makabɨna yadaa'nyɨ A'mwe Nikothimaazai Jozepɨyalyɨ bɨna. Nikothimaazai sai sɨnnawɨ sawɨsavɨ Jizaazaryawɨnna angyɨrɨ'maata yakelyɨ. Sai marazɨnanya wabatɨrɨnya' makabɨna. Marazɨnanya mesɨ marazɨnanya alozɨyasɨ yegɨrɨlya' gɨlaayaraavɨ yɨ'dɨvɨsa' Juyara. Nikothimaazai marazɨnanya taanga teti (30) kilohɨraamɨ makabɨna.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jozepɨyalyɨ Nikothimaazalyɨ saraai Jizaazare kɨlaakejɨkɨ marazɨnanya' wakɨna yadi' kwaabɨhannya saamɨnyajɨ pwɨyɨna yagi. Sara yɨna yagɨlyabwi Juyara kumɨre gɨlaayaraavɨ wakya'ne'na sara yadɨvɨsabulyɨ.
Yɨsavɨri Jizaazarɨ nilɨya tamɨna yesaba yɨwawɨnya' warɨkebera. Yɨwawɨnyavɨ gɨlaayarɨ wakya'ne' simaange' warɨ'. Sagaa' simaangevɨ gɨlaaya aane pwai kwarɨ mwaki yadɨvɨsasɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ saba simaanga mudɨke' warɨke'na, mwanyavɨ Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakegaa'na saraai Jizaazarɨ kave wɨlakɨna yagɨlyaraalyɨ.
Wikɨyavɨne yɨrɨka sɨnnawɨnya' Saadehaa' yɨrɨkunyagaa' jɨhɨnyavɨ simaangevɨna Maahɨthaala mwaalya' Maarɨyaa' wɨna yaka tɨnna dara wanganake' “O, Nɨwaava, simaadɨkuryavɨ sɨlaange' davasɨnadaavɨka!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kaanyave'na kaanyave'na wɨna. Jizaazarɨ gannya pwarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nadei salyɨ Saaimonɨ Pitalyɨ saraaryawɨ yɨ'ma'na yaka saraarɨ wɨdɨna “Simaangevɨdaa'nyɨ pwara Naangerɨ makwalyuna kyɨwaa' nemɨ yawɨ'na ‘Gazɨyaka? Gɨlaayarɨ gazɨ makuwaatabanaka?’ ”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Pitalyɨ Jizaazare pwalyɨ ya'ma'na yagɨla walyaabɨna yagɨla simaangevɨna yarai wɨna.
Saraai kaanyave'na wodaakɨlyɨ kɨrɨ' Jizaazare pwai kaanyave'na naanga yaka Pitarɨ wavɨla'na yaka sɨnnawɨ simaangevɨ yɨ'ma'na.
Mi'na yɨ'ma'na yaka walaruta'nyɨna yaka kusawɨ kwaabɨhannya saamɨnya tɨnna wanganna. Tɨnna wanganna yaka kɨrɨ' kusawɨnna mulaawina.
Kusawɨnna mulaawi yadaa'nyɨ dɨvidaasɨ Saaimonɨ Pitai bɨna yaka simaanga kusawɨnna yarai bulaawɨna. Yarai bulaawɨna yaka savɨ kwaabɨhannya saamɨnya wa'dɨsɨ tɨnna wanganna.

Nabaai Jizaazarɨ mɨnyagɨnyavɨ kwaabɨhannya saamɨnya' gwavaaihɨ'nɨke' tɨnna wanganna. Kwaabɨhannya sa' kwaabɨhannya saamɨnya pɨnɨngyaba mwari ya'. Aawa. Gabinyaba gwavaaihɨ'nɨke' wa'dɨsɨ tɨnna wanganna.
Pitai tɨnna wanganna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨnnawɨ simaangevɨ Jizaazare pwai yɨ'mavakei sagaa' wɨlɨna yaka tɨnna wanganna yada Jizaazarɨna lɨmwanna ya'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaa' Gotɨyare Bukuya' dɨnɨke' “Sai mena balori ayɨna dɨkaavadelyɨra,” sa' dɨnɨke'na kɨrɨmɨ myawɨri yagɨlyaraalyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kɨrɨnnya angevɨna saraai Jizaazareraai ayɨna wɨna yagi.
Maarɨyaa' ayɨna bɨna yaka simaangevɨ mwasawɨ daavɨna yaka kɨnna dɨna. Kɨnna kuna dɨna yadevɨdaa'nyɨ walaruta'nyɨna yaka simaangevɨ kusawɨ tɨnna wanganna yaka

Gotɨyare mamaaya ejelɨyaraarɨ tɨnna wanganna. Ejelɨyaraai baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka baazɨ'ma'nagɨleraai. Jizaazarɨ kɨlaakejɨ' warakeba saraai walamwaaina yagi. Mɨnyagɨnyayaba pwai walamwaaina, sɨvɨlyaraaryaba pwai walamwaaina yagi.
Maarɨyaa' tɨnna wanganna kya' saraai wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ, kɨnna baa'na dɨvanɨgɨna?” A'mwe' wɨdɨna “Pɨwɨnna nɨmɨre Naangerɨ makuna kyɨwaa' kumɨ wakɨna yɨwaasa'na nɨmɨ mwanganyɨwe'nyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna yakegaa' gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka saba Jizaazai daa'dɨsɨyarɨ tɨnna wanganna ya'. Sa' kɨrɨ' dara myawɨryake' “O, Jizaazai daaka!”

Sa'na majɨ kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “A'mwe'gɨ, kɨnna baa'na dɨvanɨgɨna? Aarɨna bɨ'dɨ dɨvanɨgɨ?” Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe' yawɨ'na yada “Yɨwawɨnya' yadelyɨ,” wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, gɨmɨ damakuwaana? Sara yagɨna nyɨdana! ‘Yɨnagaavaihaba sabanna wakuwana.’ Sara kanyɨda'gɨzɨ sawɨnna wawa'muri maraawɨde'nyɨ nɨmɨ.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Maarɨyaa'!” A'mwe' gamɨnyɨna gɨnyɨwanna yaka “Jizaazalyɨ,” daka Yɨvɨruyagaala wɨdɨna “Raavoni!” Yagaala sa' “Nyɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ!” dɨnɨkesɨra.

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Manyɨgalalɨmwadɨnnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmwaryawɨnna mena ayɨna yimwaaweinyɨ daaka! Sa'na nya'mweraayawɨ nɨmɨnyɨne wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmwaryawɨnna ayɨna yɨlaawɨdeinyɨ. Sai Nɨmaamaangelyɨ. Sai Sɨrɨnɨmaangelyɨ. Sai Nɨnnya Gotɨyalyɨ. Sai sarɨmɨre Gotɨyalyɨ. Saryawɨnna ayɨna yɨlaawɨdeinyɨ,’ sara duthana.”
Maarɨyaa' Maahɨthaala mwaalya' bɨna yaka gamɨreraavɨ wɨdɨna “Ai, Naangerɨ tɨnna wangamwe'nyɨ,” wɨdɨna yaka Jizaazai wɨdake' sara wɨdɨna yakesɨra.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Saadehaa' sawɨsavɨ angevɨ Jizaazarera yɨkabɨna yeva kaanya lokɨya nayaa tihɨ'na. Juya naangeraavɨna lɨka yɨna yadɨvɨ' kaanya lokɨya nayaa tihɨ'na ye'. Tihɨ'nyɨna yadɨ'nyɨ Jizaazai yɨma'naabɨna yaka kumɨnyaba daavɨna. Tɨnnyaba daavɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Nya'mweihi, kwaamu'nanya' yɨhwarana! Tewaanya dɨmwaalyɨla!”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka gannya a'araraalyawaalyɨ gannya lɨgɨlɨgɨsaba wɨjɨwaainnyɨna ya'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨrera Naangerɨ tɨnna wanganeva yɨlaaya naanga yɨna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai ayawɨ wɨdɨna “Nya'mweihi, kwaamu'nanya' yɨhwarana! Nɨmwai nyɨdasaabakabaaibɨ' sara yɨhɨthaasɨdeinyɨra.”
Sa' wɨdɨna yaka kumɨnyɨ pwa'nyɨ makuraasɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Kuryai Tewaanyai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmwaalana!

Kyɨhɨmwaalori sarɨmɨ pwara kwaraavɨre yɨwetawakya wasɨ'na kyapɨjɨ Gotɨyai sara mena wasɨ'na yadelyɨ. Kwara pwaraavɨre yɨwetawakya kuna ja'nayɨpɨja' Gotɨyai avaaina mena ja'nayadelyɨra.” Sara wɨdɨna ya'.
Kumɨnyabanna Jizaazai bakegaa' Jizaazarera sɨvɨlyɨraai ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyai Tomaazai kumɨjɨ mamwaalyɨna. Mamwaalyai Tomaazai gɨra'mɨraalyai.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sai ayɨna bɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna “Naangerɨ tɨnna mi'na wangamworɨnera.” Wɨdɨna kye' Tomaazai wɨdɨna “Kwaasɨ nyɨdɨwaa'. Gamɨre asawaarɨ nilɨya tamwa'daata yɨwihwaaryawaarɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ yɨwɨja' yɨwihwaarya sawaarɨ nɨnnya asai malakulayɨwɨja' gamɨre lɨgɨlɨgɨsaba nɨnnya asi malakulayɨwɨja' malɨmwagyɨ yɨdeinyɨ. Arɨkawɨnyɨ.” Wɨdɨna ya' Tomaazai.

Wikɨya ayawɨnyarɨkɨ angevɨ kusawɨnna Jizaazarera ayɨna yɨkabɨna yeva angevɨ bamwaaina. Nabaai Tomaazalyɨ mwaalɨna. Sagaa' kaanya yuya lokɨya nayaa tihɨ'nɨkengɨ. Yuyara mwaalɨna yadapi kaanya tihɨ'nadɨ'nyɨ kɨrɨ' Jizaazai yɨma'naabɨna yaka tɨnnyaba daavɨna yaka wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, kwaamu'nanya' yɨhwarana!”

Sara wɨdaka Tomaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Davɨ gɨnnya asai dakɨ! Nɨmɨre asɨraarɨ tɨnna dɨnyangana! Gɨnnya asi yɨwɨbwa'na ya'gɨzɨ nɨmɨre lɨgɨlɨgɨsaba dɨnyulakaa! Nɨmɨ kwaihwaainakeinyɨna kuna manyɨlɨmwagyadɨnyaigɨ mamwaaidɨnna! Aawa. Nyɨlɨmwadɨnyaigɨ dɨmwaala!”
Tomaazai wɨ'nyɨna yaka ja'nawɨdɨna “Nɨnnya Naangeigɨnyɨ. Nɨnnya Gotɨyaigɨnyɨra.”

Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Tɨnna nyanganagɨna danyɨlɨmwamwaa? Pwara tɨnna manyanganyevera kɨbanna nyɨlɨmwamwaa'. Sarera yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winɨkeraavɨ Gotɨyai wɨmwaaihaderera.” Jizaazai sara wɨdɨna yakelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Bukuya davɨ Jizaazai yɨjɨwaainya sajɨ tewaanya sajɨ yakengɨ yɨda'mwa. Gannyaraayaba Jizaazai naanga pɨnɨjɨ tewaanya pɨnɨjɨ kwalaalya yɨna ya'. Sangɨna bukuya davɨ myɨdayɨ yɨweinyɨ.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sara yɨda'mwe yawɨ'na yadɨ “Pwara yagaala da tɨnna wanganapɨri dara lɨmwabɨka! ‘Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨra. Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ dahɨlakakelyɨra. Yɨthaa, Jizaazai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨra.’ ‘Sara lɨmwabɨka!’ dadɨ yɨda'mwa.” Nabaai yɨda'mwe yawɨ'na yadɨ “Sahwara sara lɨmwaga'dɨvɨ' yuyagaa' gamɨre yayavɨ Jizaazarɨne gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakera mwaaibɨka!” Sara dɨna yadɨ bukuya da' yɨda'mwa.
Sa mena yɨma'nakegaa' dɨvi Aalɨbunya Taaivɨrɨyaazavɨ Jizaazai gannyaraavɨ ayɨna wɨjɨwaainnyɨna. Dara wɨjɨwaainnyɨna yakesɨ.
Saaimonɨ Pitalyɨ Tomaazai gɨra'mɨraalyɨyalyɨ Nataanyalɨ Kwaaka Galɨli Anga Kena mwaalyalyɨ Sevathiyarɨ gawaalɨvaangeraalyɨ Jizaazare pwaraalyɨ sara yɨkabɨna yeva aalɨbunyavɨ mwaalɨna.

Mwaalɨna yadapi Saaimonɨ Pitai pwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Jawɨnya maarya'neinyɨ wɨdeinyɨra.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨjɨ wawaana!” Sarera wɨna yeva aalyavɨ sɨpɨya' yɨla'dɨsɨ yɨlamwaaina. Yɨlamwaaina yeva sawɨta yuyavɨ jawɨnyanne gɨlya wasɨ'wasɨta yadaapi jawɨnya aane pwai kwai mabwalaminaawi yɨna.
Mabwalaminaawi yadaa'nyɨ nyɨlyai gaai byɨlyɨrɨ'daasɨyagaa' aalɨmaangevɨ Jizaazai daavɨna. Jizaazai daavɨna yadɨ'nyɨ kɨrɨ' gamɨrera dɨna “Mudɨkelyɨ. Jizaazai mɨka!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Kaimɨraayaihi, jawɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kɨnɨnnakeihi daaka?” Kumɨ ja'nawɨdɨna “Aawa.”

Sai wɨdɨna “Sɨpɨyavɨ aangasɨmagɨ jawɨgɨlya' marasɨ'na yapɨri jawɨnya bwalaminaapɨ'dengɨ.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aangasɨmagɨ jawɨgɨlya' marasɨ'na yeva jawɨnya naanga naanga minnɨke'na sɨpɨyavɨna ayɨna mamwagi'nyɨ yɨpɨnesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazarɨ gannyarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nakei Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Naangelyɨ.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Saaimonɨ Pitai “Naangelyɨ,” kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka yarai baazɨ'ma'nyɨna ya'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Baazɨ'ma'nya yɨrainakei kunei mwaala'. Sara yaka aalɨbunyavɨ dɨkwosɨ'na.

Aalyavɨ dɨkwosɨ'na kya' sɨpɨyavɨ Jizaazare pwara yɨlamwaaina yeva, jawɨnya minnɨke' mwagi'nyɨna yadaapɨjɨ aalɨbumaangevɨna sɨpɨya' makuna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaakevɨdaa'nyɨ etaba mɨ'. Aawa. Mitaaya 100 (waanɨ aadɨretɨ) sɨpɨya' makuna.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ maangebaarɨ sɨvɨla paihɨ'na yeva wapaasɨ dɨkwaagidɨkevɨ jawɨnya pɨraayakejɨ sa tɨnna wanganna.
Tɨnna wanganna kye' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Jawɨnya ma'mwaata pɨnɨ dɨmakabyɨla!”

Sɨpɨyavɨna Saaimonɨ Pitai wɨna yaka aalɨmaangevɨna jawɨgɨlya' mwagi'namaa'na. Gɨlya savɨ jawɨnya naanga minnyɨna. Jawɨnya 153 yuya sa minnyɨna yakengɨ. Jawɨnya naanga naanga sa minnaka kɨrɨ' gɨlya' mamumunyɨryakesɨ.
Pitai gɨlya' mwagi'namaa'na kya' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Kaajɨla! Wapaaya dɨnyɨla!” Gamɨrerajɨya aane pwai kwai yawɨ'na “Naangelyɨ,” yaka “Aaihwaigɨnaka?” dɨragɨnna myɨwaarayɨ, navɨka mwaalɨna.
Navɨka mwaalɨna yadɨsɨ sangyawɨnna Jizaazai bɨna yaka wapaaya maarɨna yaka wɨjaavɨna ya'. Nabaai jawɨnyajɨ wɨmaarina ya'.
Sare' dahasaai dahaa' Jizaazai gannyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaainnakelyɨ. Mena balakei ayɨna dɨkaa'na yaka dahasaai dahaa' gannyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaainnyɨna yakegaakɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ mena nesagaa' Jizaazai Saaimonɨ Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Saaimonɨ, Jonɨmɨreigɨ, a'mwe daraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Gɨmɨre gɨvu'nadevwi sahwaraavɨrebwi davɨla'manɨka?”
Pitai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, yo, gɨmɨ mena yawɨ'mwaa ‘Pitai nɨmɨnyɨ nya'mwelyɨra.’ Sara yawɨ'mwaanyasɨ.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨya maalɨkeraavɨna wapaaya duzaama!”

Wɨdɨna yaka pɨgasaai Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Saaimonɨ, Jonɨmɨreigɨ, nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nɨvanɨkeigɨ daaka?” Wɨdɨna kya' “Yo, Naangeigɨ,” Pitai wɨdɨna “ ‘Pitai nya'mwelyɨ,’ mena yawɨ'mwaanyaigɨnyɨ.” Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ dɨmaremwaala!”
Dahasaai dahaa' Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Saaimonɨ, Jonɨmɨreigɨ, nɨmɨ ja'mweinyɨ daaka?”
Dahasaai dahaa' Jizaazai “Ja'mweinyɨ daaka?” wɨdake'na Pitai kale wiadaa'nyɨ wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, yuyangɨna yawɨ'mwaa. Nabaai ‘Pitai nya'mwelyɨ,’ sara yawɨ'mwaanyaigɨnyɨ.”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre sipɨzipɨyaraavɨna wapaaya duzaama!”

Naanga nebulya'na gɨthɨvanɨge. Mɨgɨnyaigɨ mwaalagɨnegaa' gɨnnya munnaanya' marina yadɨ ‘Yuyawɨnna wɨma!’ dɨna yadɨ sawɨnna wawagɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Sare' yadɨ kɨrɨ' neigɨ jɨma'nadehaa' gɨnnya asɨraai yɨwɨbwa'nyɨna kya'gɨri pwara gɨmɨnyɨ wɨla pwɨyɨna gyapɨjɨ ‘Sawɨnna mwɨwɨnera!’ yawɨ'dɨnyawɨ sawɨnna makuna gyɨpɨ'deigɨnyɨ.”
Sa' Jizaazai wɨdake' dara dɨna “Pitai sara balɨna kyori sare'na Gotɨyai byaannakei yɨma'nadelyɨra.” Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!”

Pitai gɨnyɨwannyɨna yaka dusɨmagɨ Jizaazare pwarɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sarɨna Jizaazarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nakelyɨ. Sai kɨgaa' wapaaya tɨka nyɨna yesagaa' Jizaazaryaba walamwaainɨke', Jizaazarɨ kave yɨwaara'na “Naangeigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨ yɨkamaangeraavɨna givwarɨdaakwodei aaihwalaka?” sara yakelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Pitai tɨnna mi'na wanganna yaka Jizaazarɨ wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, dɨwaanya'na a'mwe sarɨna berɨvaka?”
Jizaazai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ sarɨna yawɨ'na ‘Kaanya ayɨna bɨdehaa'na sai kuna yemwaaladelyɨ.’ Sara yawɨ'na yɨwɨja' gɨmɨre wawɨnya' daaka! Sarebwina madɨnneigɨnyɨ. Dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!”

Jizaazai sara wɨdakevɨdaa'nyɨ neya'mwera dara dɨnesa' “Ai, Jizaazarei sai mabalyɨ yadei daaka!” Sara kade' kɨrɨ' sa'na Jizaazai majɨ “Mabalyɨ yadelyɨ,” Aawa. Majɨ yaka wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨ sarɨna yawɨ'na ‘Kaanya bɨdehaa'na sai kuna yemwaaladelyɨ.’ Sara yawɨ'na yɨwɨja' gɨmɨre' daaka!” Sara wɨdɨna yakelyɨ Jizaazai.
Jizaazarei sai dangɨna nejalɨkurakɨvanɨke', nabaai sai yagaala da yɨda'na yakelyɨ. Gamɨre wɨjalɨkurakyabwina nemɨ yawɨ'mwo “Nebulyasɨra.”

Yɨthaa, Jizaazai yake pɨnɨ kwalaalyangɨne yagaala sa warɨkengɨ. “Yagaala yuya sa pɨkarya yɨda'na yɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ Kwaaka yuyavakɨ maalɨkeba bukuya mwaki kyɨpɨdɨka! Bukuya naanga naanga kwaradɨkengɨ.” Sara yawɨ'mweinyɨ.
A'mwe Tɨyopɨlaazaigɨ, Bukuya pɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨna wi'na yavɨkarye. Jizaazai yuya yaka yuya wɨjɨwaakɨna yaka yagaala yuya sa wi'na yavɨkarye. Jizaazai aayawɨdaasɨ yaka

Sɨgunyavɨ ayɨna yɨlaawaka sanna wi'na yavɨkarye. Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' milaawiagaa' Jizaazalyɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai mwaaidori Jizaazai Wɨdaasade Apozelɨyaraavɨ kumɨre wawɨnya'na nayaa yɨjɨwaaka' ata dahɨlakɨnɨkeraavɨ.
