Sahwai balakegaa' sawɨta a'mweraare sɨvɨlatɨraalya jɨnnadaa'nyɨ sahwai bada yuya dɨragɨnya yada kumɨ yuya tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' dara yawɨresa' “O, nebulyasɨ. Sarenna Jizaazai ayɨna damwaalɨka!” Sara yawɨreva kumɨ mwaaidɨvɨ' Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaalade'na wɨdakelyɨra.
Pɨgaa' kumɨ yɨkabesagaa' wɨda' “Anga Jeruzaalemɨ myagalya'mapɨnera! Aawa. Nɨmwai gannya yangerɨ yɨhɨzaavade'na jemwaalyɨla! Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthake' nɨmɨ mena yɨhɨthe'na jemwaalyɨla!
Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yake' kɨrɨ' dɨvi maalɨkegaa' bavɨtaazɨya'bɨsa' Gotɨyare Kuryai Tewaanyai sarɨmɨnyɨ munyɨkaavɨ yunebanna wɨlamwaaina yɨhyatheihɨlyɨra,” wɨda'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pɨgaa' Apozelɨyara yɨkabesagaa' Jizaazai mwaaidɨ'nyɨ kumɨ wɨde' “Naangeigɨ, dahaasagaa' Maremwaaide' Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨna ayɨna dɨnejaade'na daaka?”
Sara kude' wɨda' “Sare'na yɨma'nade'na myawɨpɨnera! Sarɨmɨnyɨne'na mɨka! Nɨmwai sahwai sara yawɨrajai sagaasɨ yuyagaasɨ sagaa' wakadelyɨra. Sare'na gamɨre dɨragɨnya'na gavei yawɨ'manɨkesɨra.

Sa'na kɨrɨ' Kuryai Tewaanyai sarɨmɨnyɨ bayɨhɨmwaaidozɨ dɨragɨnya naange' kihɨzaavojɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨ dava Kwaaka Juthɨya yuyabanna Kwaaka Samerɨya yuyabanna Kwaakevakɨ tɨyawɨ anga yuya dawɨnna nɨmɨnyɨna pwaraavɨ duzalɨkurakyideihɨlyɨra.”
Mi'na kuda' gamɨrera baihana'dapi Sɨgunyavɨnerɨ makɨlaawɨna ya'. Makidawadaa'nyɨ yɨraaya' galayewaa'mwanna kya' tɨnna mwanganyage'.
Makidawadaa'nyɨ Sɨgunyavɨ tɨnna kuna wangadaapɨjɨ, yɨthaa, a'mweraai baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka baazɨ'ma'nagɨleraai kwaraayaba bima'nyɨna yagi.

Mi'na bima'nyɨna yagɨla wɨdahi “Kwaaka Galɨli mwaalyaihi, saba daaveva Sɨgunyavɨ tɨnna be'na baihanakava? Sare'na sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨpɨnera! Sarɨmɨnyabadaasɨ Sɨgunyavɨnei Jizaazarɨ makimwaawɨkei sahwai Sɨgunyavɨ sara yimwaakabaaibɨ' ayɨna walaabathelyɨra,” wɨdahi.
Sagaa' Mugunya Wolivɨdaasɨ Jeruzaalemɨnera ayɨna wawe'. Mugunya sa' angeba esaba kilomitaaya pɨrɨ' warɨkesɨ. (Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakevɨ kaanya wodɨvɨsabe.)

Wawesara Jeruzaalemɨ wɨleva ku'dɨkevɨ munyaba kɨgaa' aya mwaalesabanna yɨlaawe'. A'mwe sarajɨya pwai Pitai, pwai Jonɨ, pwai Jemɨzai, pwai Edɨruyai, pwaraai Pilipɨjɨ Tomaazalyɨ, pwaraai Baatolomyulyɨ Matɨyulyɨ, pwai Alɨpɨyaazare gawaalɨ' Jemɨzai, pwai Saaimonɨ gannya kwaakevɨna yawɨ'dei (Selotɨyai), pwai Jemɨzare gawaalɨ' Juthaazai, sara yuyara mwaale'.
A'mwe sahwarajɨ a'mwejɨ Maarɨyaa' Jizaazarɨ ganaangesɨ gya'mwerajɨ avaaizɨmunya yawɨreva yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'na yɨkabadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ wɨde'.
Yɨrɨka sagaa' kwɨya'mwera kwalaalyara yavɨnakera (120) yɨkabeva mwaaidapiyaraayawɨ tɨnnyawɨ Pitai daavaka yagaala wɨdɨna ya'

“Nya'mweihi, kɨgaakuna Kuryai Tewaanyai Ne Devitɨmɨ kujɨwakyaa' Devitɨ sara yɨdayaa'. Sara yɨdayaake' nebulya' yunebanna yɨma'nya'ne' mena yɨma'na'. Juthaazai kyɨbwarɨdaakwa' a'mwera Jizaazarɨ wɨla pwɨyesai Juthaazarɨna nebulya' yɨma'na'.
Juthaazai nemɨjɨyarɨ Naangei dahɨlakakelyɨ. Nemɨjɨ gamɨjɨ avaaiwawɨnya wɨdaayo, Apozelɨyaina,” wɨda' Pitai.
Kayaa'nanya'na yɨbwarɨdaakwia'ne'na Juthaazai nɨgwia tɨvɨkɨsa maarakenna wawɨnya pɨjɨ' mube'. Sajɨkɨ walaraawaka gannya munya kayaaka yɨna yaka gannya lɨ'gɨlya' mwasaba kabwalyara' sahwai bala'.
Savɨna Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyara yuyara kadɨka wɨ'neva wawɨnya sajɨ' kunnya yagaala “Akelɨthaama,” wo'nɨke' “Wawɨnya tawanake',” dɨnɨkesɨ.
Pitai wɨda' “Sare' dare'nesɨ. Bukuya Saamɨya (Yɨledaata) yɨda'nyɨna
‘Gamɨre ange' kune' yɨma'nana!
Savɨ a'mwera mulamwaalyɨ yɨpɨka!’
Nabaai yagaala pɨrɨ' yɨda'nɨka
‘Gotɨyarɨna yade' a'mwe pwai yana!’

Sara yɨda'nɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ Juthaazare wawɨnya yɨya' pwai maarana! Sahwarɨ kadahɨlakawaajɨ Naanga Jizaazai baryai dɨkaavake' tɨnna wanganakelyɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjalɨkuraadeinera. Kɨgaa' nemɨjɨyai Naanga Jizaazalyɨ kaanya yamaryorɨ dahɨlakaana! Sɨnnawɨ Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei wɨdakegaasɨ pɨgaasɨ Sɨgunyavɨ Jizaazarɨ makyimwa'daawadɨkegaa'na nemɨjɨyarɨ dahɨlakaana!”
Pitai sara kuda' pɨba a'mwera a'mweraarɨ wɨmwaaihe'. A'mwe pwai Baazavaazai Jozepɨyai wo'nɨkei yaya pɨrɨ' Jaazɨtazai wo'nɨkelyɨ. A'mwe pwai Mataayazai wo'nɨkelyɨ.
Wɨmwaaiheva dahɨlakya'na Naangerɨ wɨde' “Naangeigɨ, a'mwe yuyaraavɨre kuryarajɨ sɨdusajɨ yawɨ'mwaa. Sa'na, Naangeigɨ, a'mwe daraarɨna gawarɨ dahɨlakaajɨwona?
Sai Juthaazai gɨthaayake' apozelɨyare wawɨnya' yana! Juthaazai gɨmɨre wawɨnya' ya'mavaka gannya kayaa'nanyabanna wawaka. Wawɨnya sa' pwai yana!”

Mi'na wɨdeva kɨrɨmɨre yaya yɨdaveva Mataayazare yaya' yɨda'nɨke' wanganeva dɨne' “Sare'na Mataayazai dahɨlakɨwo. Jizaazai Wɨdaasade atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraalyai Apozelɨyaraayaba wɨmwaaihɨwo,” dɨne'.
Tɨka Munne Pedikozɨyagaa' mena kavura' anga gavevɨna Jizaazarɨ wɨ'nadɨvɨta yuyara yɨkabe'.
Kyɨkabe' sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ yɨhu'jake'bɨsa' yarai yaka anga yunevɨ buzaaimwaalesavɨ naanga ya' jaka sa'.
Sara yakegaa' dara wanganesa' “O, pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna dɨtaalɨtabɨsa wawaka nemɨ yuyainaavɨ daneyɨme'nɨwaka!”
Sara kade' Kuryai Tewaanyai kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ yunebanna wɨlamwaalaka yagaala tewaanya' wɨja'na dɨragɨnna kujaava' Maaveraavɨre yagaala ge' ge' gaai wɨde'.
Sagaa' Anga Jeruzaalemɨ Juyara ajɨmya yuyangɨya gazavasavakɨdaasara mwaale'. Pwara Juyaraavɨre kɨwɨnya lɨmwadɨvɨsarera.

Sahwara yɨhu'jake' kadɨka wɨ'neva kwala bwa'naanya yarai yɨ'bwa'naabɨna. Yarai yɨ'bwa'naabɨna yeva Jizaazarera ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨre yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsa'na kadɨka wɨ'neva yɨ gazaizai gannya yagaalya' wɨ'naka atɨka maru'na'na.
Yuyara maru'na'dɨvɨ' dɨne' “Nɨwaava, berɨvaka? A'mwe dara nemɨre yagaala ge ge nedɨvanɨgasara Kwaaka Galɨli mwaalyara yuyarera. Nɨwaava!
Garanevaka? Nemɨ yuyainaavɨ gazaizai kadɨka dara wɨ'nɨvanɨke' ‘Ai, nennya aangyagaala danedɨvanɨgava!’

Sahwaina Kwaaka Paatɨya mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Mithɨya mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Yɨlaamɨ mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Mezopotemya mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Juthɨya mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Kapaathozɨya mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Podaazɨ mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Ezɨya mwaalyainajɨ
Kwaaka Pɨrɨzɨya mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Paabɨlɨya mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Lɨvya Anga Saairini pimagɨ mwaalyainajɨ Anga Romɨ mwaalya pwainajɨ mwaaiho.

Nabaai Juyainajɨ Maaveina Juyaraavɨrebwi yadaanyainajɨ pwaina Ahu'manna Kɨritɨ mwaalyainajɨ Kwaaka Arevɨya mwaalyainajɨ yuya saina bamwaalona Gotɨyai tewaanya yakenna nennya yagaalya nedɨvanɨgasa' kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨgone!”
Sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dɨvɨ' atɨka maru'na'dɨvɨ' yɨwaara'ne' “Gara yɨwaka?”
Sara kyɨwaara'ne' kɨrɨ' pwara kadɨka wɨ'nya'ne' sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ bɨrala wie' “Biyaaya naanga neva kunya maayara mwaaihava sara dɨvanɨgasara.”

Sagaa' Pitai Jizaazai Wɨdaasadera atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwalyarajɨ daavaka kwala bwa'naanyavɨ yagaala naange' gaai wɨda' “Kwaaka Juthɨya mwaalyaihɨlyɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyaihɨlyɨ yuyaihi yɨhɨthɨwɨja' kadɨka nayaa du'nyɨla! Nɨmɨre yagaalya' jawɨrila!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nyɨdɨwaasa'na a'mwe dara biyaaya manyeva sɨdu'nakera mwaaiha'. Sawɨsaburɨ daaka! Sawɨsavɨ daaka! Mwanyavɨ naainɨ kɨlokɨyagaa' biyaaya'na a'mwera kumaayara mwaaidɨvɨsara daaka!
Arɨkawɨ. Da' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaakei Ne Jowelɨ yɨdayaake' yɨma'nɨvanɨ'.
Dara yɨda'nɨka
‘Gotɨyai dɨnɨkesɨra. Aayagaa' dara yɨdeinyɨra,
Kɨlaa'naka yuyaraavɨna Nɨnnya Kuryarɨ wɨdɨngikɨdeinyɨra.
Kujaava'mujɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ kulamwaalojɨ
Sɨrɨraavaangejɨ sɨrɨbwaalɨvaangerajɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyu'nawɨjɨwaakɨpɨ'desɨra.
Sarɨmɨre mɨgɨnyara se mwaryapɨjɨ a'mabaaitɨnna wangabɨ'derera.
Sarɨmɨre nera se warapɨjɨ waja ya'nɨpɨ'derera.
Yo, sagaa' Nɨnnya Kuryarɨ wɨdɨngikɨdengɨra,
Nyɨdaayadɨvɨta a'mwejɨ a'mwerajɨ samɨlɨka.
Kuryai mena kulamwaalojɨ sagaa'
Nɨmɨnyɨ nyu'napi pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨpɨ'derera.
Munyaba sɨgunyavɨ dɨragɨnyangɨjɨ gengɨjɨ yɨdeinyɨ.
Kwaakeba Kwaakevakɨ kujɨwaaina'mujɨ atɨka maru'napɨ'derera.
Tawesɨ dɨkesɨ jɨta naangesɨ wangabɨ'derera.
Nyɨlyai mavuri yojɨ jɨhɨnyai yɨma'nadelyɨ.
Lawei wayaaka tawe'bɨ' yɨma'nadelyɨ sagaa'.
Kwanganapɨri Naangere dɨragɨnyagaa' naangegaa' yɨma'nadehaakɨ.
Gazaizai gaimwange'na Naangerɨ jaka kadanganori
Naangei kavadaihasamaarojɨ Naangerei yɨma'nadelyɨ sahwai.’
Sara dɨnɨkesɨra.

Yɨzɨrelɨyareihi yagaala dangɨ kadɨka du'nyɨla! Gotɨyai yawɨ'na ‘A'mwera dara yawɨpɨ'de' “O, Gotɨyai Naazaretɨ mwaalyai Jizaazarɨ wɨdasɨwaabɨkei daaka!” ’ Sara yawɨraka gannya dɨragɨnya' sahwarɨ kujaava' sai dɨragɨnyajɨ atɨka maru'nasa'nejɨ wɨjɨwaainya'nejɨ yɨna ya'. Sara yada dava sarɨmɨnyaba yadaasɨya'na sahwaihi mena yawɨ'mwaasaihɨlyɨ.

Kɨgaa' Gotɨyai sɨdu'nakei dɨragɨnna yawɨraka ‘A'mweraavɨre kayaa'nanyanna Nyɨbwaalɨvaangei balade'na wɨdaasɨdeinyɨ.’ Gotɨyai sara dakei Jizaazarɨ kyɨhɨmaarya' sarɨmɨ ‘Aala!’ dɨna yeva dɨnyɨna ‘Yɨsavɨri Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya maayara sahwarɨ nilɨya tabɨka!’ Dɨnyɨna kye' Romɨyara sahwarɨ tamaketa sarɨmɨre wawɨnyasɨra.
Sarɨmɨ sara yesa' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai sarɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaava'. Jizaazai yuyagaa' baryai mwari kyadɨke'na gɨleangeba taanga kɨnɨnnakeba padaihasamaa'na yaka yɨdɨkaava'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ne Devitɨ gamɨnyɨna yɨda'nɨka wɨjaa'
‘Yuyagaa' sɨnnyɨmagɨ Naangei mwaaida wangadɨnyainyɨ.
Nɨmɨre aangasɨmagɨ mwaaide'na lɨka myɨwɨneinyɨ.
Sai “Lɨka nyadɨkajɨ,” dɨragɨnyainyɨ nyɨmwaaihɨwa'.
Savɨna nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨlaaya yadɨ
Nɨmɨre taalɨsasɨ yɨleyagaainakeinyɨ wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.
Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' wakadehaa' Gotɨyarɨ yemwaalɨdezɨkɨ.
Gɨlaayaraavɨreba nɨmɨre kuryai myagalya'mayɨ jɨtheigɨnyɨ.
Jɨwaalɨvaanga tewaanyainyɨre kɨlaakejɨ' bwia maburannejɨkɨ.
Gaalyaburɨne tusanna nawɨ'nyɨna nyɨjɨwainɨwaana.
Nɨmɨnyaba mwaaidɨnya'na yɨlaayabwi dɨnyeku'deinyɨra.’
Ne Devitɨ sara yɨda'nɨkesɨra.

Nya'mweihi, Ne sɨnnawɨnyai Devitɨmɨna nayaa nebwina yɨhɨthɨma! Devitɨ gamɨnyɨna myɨdayaa'. Aawa, sahwai kabala' kwakyaa' sai madɨkaayɨ yaa'. Madɨkaayɨ kyaa' dahaasagaa'na dava nemɨnyaba gamɨre wakɨnɨkevɨ wangadaanyainera.
Devitɨ pɨropetɨyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaakei mena yawɨryaa'. Gotɨyai Devitɨmɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya' wɨjaa' ‘Gɨmɨ kingɨyaigɨ maremwaaidɨnyabaaibɨ' gɨnnyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaladerɨ wɨmwaaihɨdelyɨ.’
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yawɨraka dara wanganyaake' ‘O, Gotɨyai sara yadei daaka!’ Daka Kɨraazɨtɨyai baryai ayɨna dɨkaasa'na dɨnɨkesɨ.
‘Gotɨyai gɨlaayaraavɨreba myagalya'mayɨ yakelyɨ.
Gamɨre kɨlaaka bwia maburyakelyɨ.’
Sara dɨnɨke'na Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ a'mwe dai baryai. Kyɨdɨkaava' nemɨ yuyaina sahwarɨ tɨnna wanganorɨna yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨgoinera.

Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyare aangasɨmagɨ dɨragɨnnakeba kamwaala' Gotɨyai Ganɨmaangei sara wɨdake' gannya Kuryai Tewaanyarɨ sara kujaava' Jizaazai Kuryarɨ yange'na nemɨnyɨna yaasɨwakevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨgasajɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgasajɨ Kuryai Tewaanyarɨna sara yɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨgunyavɨ Jizaazai yɨlaawaka kɨrɨ' Ne Devitɨ yɨda'nɨka sahwai myɨlawiaa'. Aawa. Sɨnnawɨ Devitɨ dara wɨjaa'
‘Naangei nɨmɨre Naangerɨ wɨda'
“Nɨmɨre aangasɨmagɨ dava mwaaida'gɨzɨ
Gɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ yɨkamaangeraavɨ marulawakɨdehaa'nanyɨ.
Dɨragɨnaangeigɨ nɨmɨre nawɨ'nyaba gɨmwaaihɨdehaa'nanyɨ.” ’
Ne Devitɨ sara dɨnɨkesɨra.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Yɨzɨrelɨya yuyaihi nayaa jawɨramaremwaalyɨla! Jizaazai darɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨgorɨ yɨsavɨri nilɨya wɨramesaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ sara yeta Naangerɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨmwaaiha' Gotɨyai.” Pitai sara wɨdakesɨ.
Savɨ a'mwera kadɨka wɨ'neva sɨmunyangɨ kale naanga wiadaa'nyɨyagaa' “We'!” deva Pitarɨjɨ Apozelɨya pwaraavɨjɨ wɨde' “Nya'mweihi, gara yaajɨwo? We'!”

Pitai wɨda' “Sarɨmɨjɨya gazaizai kayaa'nanyabwi myanna! ‘Sɨmunya mudɨke Gotɨyarebwi yɨwɨjainyɨ,’ kadapɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazare yayavɨna aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya' kyɨhyawaajɨ sarɨnnya kayaa'nanyabwi Gotɨyai marasɨ'nadelyɨ. Kamarasɨ'nojɨ Gotɨyare yangerɨ Kuryai Tewaanyarɨ dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ. Nabaai, Gotɨyai dɨnɨ' ‘Nɨmɨre Kuryarɨ gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ.’

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yagaala yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja savɨ gɨmɨnyɨnajɨ gɨmɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨnajɨ menyawɨnyaraavɨnajɨ dɨnɨkesɨ. Yɨ gamɨnyawɨ nemɨre Gotɨyai Naangei yuyaraavɨ jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarojɨya sahwaraavɨna gannya Kuryarɨ wɨjaavadelyɨra.”

Pitai tewaanna wɨdaka yagaala pɨnɨ dɨragɨnna wɨjalɨkurakada wɨdɨhaa'bwara' “A'mwe dahaasa dara kayaa'na yadɨvɨsaraavɨ kayaaka yojɨ gɨmɨnyɨjɨ kayaaka nyɨhyadɨka! Gotɨyarɨ jaka duthana! Yɨhɨvadaihasamaarana!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe gamɨre yagaala nayaa wɨ'nesaraavɨ Jizaazarera bavɨtaazɨya yɨna ye'. Bavɨtaazɨya yɨna kye' yɨrɨka sagaa' Naangei kurɨnaka kwala naanga 3,000 saraavɨ gannyaraayawɨ ye'mwannawɨmwaaiha'.

Sarera Wɨdaasadera Gotɨyare yagaala wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsagaa' kadɨka dɨragɨnna wɨ'nɨbainyɨna. Kadɨka wɨ'nɨbainadɨvɨ' yavada'galya'na yuyara nayaa dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' “Jizaazai nemɨnyɨneba balakelyɨ,” dadɨvɨ' gave pɨba gɨrɨkula gunyɨna, nadɨvɨ' yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨvɨkɨ.
A'mwe yuyara Gotɨyarɨna lɨka ye'. Gotɨyai gannya dɨragɨnya' Wɨdaasaderaavɨna kujaava' kumɨ dɨragɨnyajɨ nawɨ'nya wɨjɨwaainyajɨ kye' a'mwera atɨka maru'nareva lɨka ye'.
Lɨka yadaapɨjɨ wɨ'nadɨvɨsara avaaizɨmunya yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kuna yɨkabadɨvɨ' Naangerɨna dɨdɨvɨ' kumɨre wapaayajɨ gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ jaapaina yadɨvɨ' yanga yɨnyɨna.
Yanga yɨnyɨna yadɨvɨsara kumɨre kwaakejɨ gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ mubadɨvɨ' “Nɨgwɨmaayai damwaalɨka!” dadɨvɨ' nɨgwɨmaaya sahwaraavɨ wɨmudaasakeraavɨ wɨmunna.

Wɨmunna yadɨvɨ' yɨrɨka gazarɨsarɨkɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ kuna yɨkabadɨvɨ' yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' kumɨre angengɨ gɨrɨkula gunyɨna, namwaaina. Namwaaina yadɨvɨsara pwaraavɨna yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' sɨmunya yɨda'nanyangɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' wapaaya jaapalanamwaaina.

Jaapalanamwaaina yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨne yayavɨ munyaba makidɨvɨ' a'mwejɨ a'mwerajɨ sa dɨnyɨna “Jizaazarera tewaanyarera.” Dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' yɨrɨka gazarɨsarɨkɨ Naangei a'mweraavɨjɨ a'mwengɨjɨ padaihasamaa'da gannyaraayaba kusɨlaanyaraayaba wɨmwaaihada mwaale'.
Pɨgaa' sawɨsɨrɨ tɨri kɨlokɨyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨjahaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨna Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ wogi.

Saba tɨkurya pɨrɨ' “Tɨkurya Nawɨ'nyava,” wo'nɨkevɨ sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyai mudangegaa'daasɨ sarei yɨma'nakei mwaala'. Yuyagaa' tɨkurya savɨna pwara makabeva walamwaaihɨna yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyare Angevɨ widaawadaapiyaraavɨ naanga yɨdaangadelyɨ nɨgwianna.
Sarei mwaalaka dara wanganake' “O, a'mwe saraai duimanaabɨhɨla!” Daka wɨda' “A'mweraaihi, nɨgwia yanga dɨnyɨjaayɨla!”
Tɨnna baihana'na yagɨla Pitai wɨda' “Tɨnna dɨnehwangana!”
Sara kuda' sai yawɨ'na “Nɨgwia nyɨjaayɨkadera.” Yawɨ'na yaka tɨnna wanganna ya'.
Wangadaasɨ Pitai wɨda' “Nɨmɨ nɨgwia aawa! Kɨrɨ' pɨbwi tewaanyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ yanga gɨzaavɨma! Naazaretɨ mwaalyai Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazare yayavɨna gɨthɨma! Kaanya jamarya!”
Mi'na wɨdaka gamɨre aangasavɨ maaraka yɨrɨ'bwara'. Yɨrɨ'bwa'daasɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraalyɨ naba'jangeraalyɨ dɨragɨnya yarai kyɨma'na'

yɨladɨkwosɨ'naawɨna yaka gannya sɨvɨlyɨraalyɨ daavɨna yaka kaanya gaai yamarina ya'. Kaanya gaai yamaryaka Gotɨyare Angevɨ Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraalyɨ ye'mwannawɨlaka yamaryada dɨkwosɨ'nada Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya maryada mwaalɨna ya'.
Mwaalɨna yaka kaanya yamaryada Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya maryadaasɨ a'mwera bwanganeva
dara wanganesa' “Ai, a'mwe sai Tɨkurya Nawɨ'nyavɨ walamwaaina yada nɨgwianna nedadei daaka!” Sara deva sahwarɨ yɨma'nakevɨna nɨ'nɨka yadɨvɨ' atɨka maru'na'na ye'.
A'mwe sai Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraarɨ lɨmwadaasɨ a'mwe yuyara atɨka maru'na'dɨvɨ' kumɨnyawɨ yɨhulɨvɨlɨyavɨna bɨna ye'. Gotɨyare Angevɨ yɨhulɨvɨlɨya sa' Solomonɨmɨre yɨhulɨvɨlɨya' wo'nɨkesɨ.

Bɨna kye' Pitai yuyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganaka wɨda' “Yɨzɨrelɨyaihi, da'na atɨka baa'na maru'na'manɨgava? Baa'na nengamanɨgava? ‘Kɨrɨnnya dɨragɨnyasɨ tewaanyabulyɨ sasara yagɨla a'mwe dai kaanya yamaryaderɨ wɨmwaihɨwaai,’ sara jawɨ'manɨgava!

Aawa, davwina Evɨraamɨjɨ Aazakɨjɨ Jaikopɨjɨ saraavɨre Gotɨyai nemɨre sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre Gotɨyai gannya wɨdaayadei, Jizaazarɨ yɨdɨkaavaka gannyaba byaannakerɨ wɨmwaaihake'nesɨ. Sare'na yɨwolya'nesɨ. Gannya wɨdaayaderɨ Romɨyaraavɨre kotɨya'na sarɨmɨ makuna kye' a'mwe Paailatɨ yɨhɨtha' ‘A'mwe tewaanya darɨ wɨla kulayaara'mujɨ wawadelyɨ.’

Sara kyɨhɨtha' Paailatɨmyaba ‘Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Sahwai aala!’ wɨdesaihɨlyɨ. Sahwai tewaanyai yɨda'maraangei nayaa yadei kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ ‘Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Balana!’ wɨdeva Paailatɨmɨ wɨde' ‘Sai balana! A'mwe pwarɨ wɨlya' jaaka!’ A'mwe sai kɨgaa' tamakakei kayaa'nanyalyɨ.
Sara wɨdɨna yeva Gaalyaburɨne Aaya Kaavɨlyarɨ Romɨyaraavɨna wɨjaavɨna kye' tamakɨna ye'. Mi'na tamakɨna kye' dɨvi Gotɨyai yɨdɨkaavake'na tɨnna wanganolyainaai savɨna yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨgoi.

A'mwe dai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwagarakevɨna Jizaazare dɨragɨnya' sahwarɨ yavada'gaimwa'. Yɨthaanyi, tɨnna wangamanɨgasasɨ sɨduta yawɨ'manɨgasasɨ a'mwei sɨvɨla tewaanyaraalyɨyarɨna Jizaazai sara yɨwa'. Naarɨmɨ dɨna ‘Jizaazai dɨragɨnaangelyɨ,’ dɨna yola Jizaazare yaya' a'mwerɨ wɨdɨna kyɨwoi sarɨmɨnyaba dai tewaanna mwaalɨkelyɨ.
Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'mwa. ‘Juyara sɨduta myawɨri yeva Jizaazarɨ kayaa'na ye'. Sabaaibɨ' kumɨre a'mwe naangera sara ye',’ nɨmɨ sara yawɨ'mwa.

Yesa'na sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai pɨropetɨyara wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyaraavɨre maangengɨ wɨjaa'. Dara dɨnɨ' ‘Gotɨyare Kɨraazɨtɨyai, Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakerɨ daanga wɨvɨnadelyɨ.’ Sara dɨnɨke'na Jizaazarɨ sara tamake'. Sare'na Gotɨyare yagaala nebulya'na yakesɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dahaa' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi mudɨkebwi jawɨramaarila! Dɨhɨnyɨwannyɨla! Gotɨyarɨ kudapɨjɨ sahwai sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nade'nanyɨ.
Marasɨ'nojɨ gamɨnyabadaa'nyɨ tewaanyagasa sarɨmɨnyɨ maryasaabathelyɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyai yawɨraka sɨnnawɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dahɨlakakerɨ maryasaabathelyɨra Jizaazai.
Kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai pɨropetɨya tewaanyaraavɨre maangengɨ wɨjaake sara yɨda'nɨke'na ‘Sɨgunyavɨ Jizaazai yemwaaladelyɨra.’ kada' yuya mudɨke yavada'galojɨyagaa'na walaabathelyɨra.

Jizaazarɨ dahɨlakakerɨna Ne Mozɨzai yɨda'nɨka ‘Nyɨdasaabakabaaibɨ' Naangei sarɨmɨre Gotɨyai sɨrya'mwerajɨyarɨ pɨropetɨyarɨ dahɨlakojɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨdasaabathelyɨra. Sai Gotɨyare yagaala yɨhɨthathelyɨ. Yuya sa mi'na kyɨhɨthozɨ kadɨka wɨ'napɨjɨ sara jideihɨlyɨ.
Pɨropetɨya sarɨ kurɨnaka gazaizai kadɨka mu'nyɨ kyojɨ Gotɨyare a'mweraayawɨdaasɨ Gotɨyai mu'nyade sarɨ jaapaina yojɨ kayaaka yɨgaladelyɨra.’
Ne Mozɨzai sara yɨda'nɨkesɨ. Sara kyɨdava' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta pɨropetɨyara A'mwe Saamyɨwelɨjɨ yuya dɨviyarajɨ sara yɨrɨka daryaavɨ dangɨna nejaa'.

Gotɨyai sara wɨjaake nelɨmwagarake' pɨropetɨyara nejaata dɨnɨka sarɨmɨnyɨnengɨra. Gotɨyai Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ naanga wɨjaake' nelɨmwagarake' sarɨmɨnyɨne yagaalyasɨra. Yagaala sa' Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨjaa' ‘Gɨmɨre yɨsiwiai tewaanna kyojɨ sare'na Kwaakevakɨ jɨlɨkaimɨraaya yuyaraavɨna tewaanya naanga yanga wideinyɨ.’

Savɨna Gotɨyai gannya wɨdaayaderɨ dahɨlakaka sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna kudasaaba' Jizaazai yɨhɨthɨvanɨ' ‘Gazaigɨzaigɨ gɨmɨre kayaa'nanyabwi jahalya'maka!’ Sara yɨhɨthɨvanɨke' Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' yɨhɨgaimwagozɨ tewaanya naanga yanga yɨhyadelyɨ.” Pitai sara wɨda'.
Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraai a'mweraavɨ kuna wɨdadaakɨlyɨyagaa' Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsarajɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨna dameraavɨ maremwaaidelyɨ A'mwe Sazuzɨyarajɨ sara bɨna ye'.

Bɨna yeva sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨyara. Sahwara dɨnyɨna “ ‘Jizaazai balaka ayɨna dɨkaavakelyɨ,’ wɨdɨvanɨgɨlya'na a'mwera sɨmunya nyawɨpɨdɨka! ‘Sɨnnawɨ Jizaazai kadɨkaava' nemɨ kabalawaajɨ dɨvi dɨkavaade'nanyɨ,’ nyawɨpɨdɨka!” Dɨnyɨna kye' sɨnna tɨka wɨdavakerera.

Sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ nyɨlyai walakyagaa' a'mwe naangera yawɨ'na yeva “Sawɨsavɨ kotɨya' madaannera!” Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraarɨ wɨla pwɨyeva dɨnyɨna “Sawɨsa'na kalavuzangevɨ wakawaajɨ mwanyavɨ kotɨya' yaana!” Dɨnyɨna yeva kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ye'.
Wɨmwaaihɨna kye' kɨrɨ' a'mwe kwalaalyara wɨdahɨlyavɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva Jizaazarɨ lɨmwagare'. Sagaa' a'mwe sara sahwarɨ lɨmwagesara kwala naanga naanga 5,000 mwaale'.
Mwanyagaa' Anga Jeruzaalemɨ saba Juyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ Juyaraavɨre Kɨwɨjarajɨ yɨkabɨna yɨna ye'.
Yɨkabɨna yɨna kye' Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei Anaazalyɨ Kaayapaazalyɨ Jonɨjɨ Alekɨzaadalyɨ Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangere jɨlɨkaimɨraayarajɨ bamwaaina yɨna ye'.
Bamwaaina yɨna kye' tɨnnyaba Kaajolɨyara Pitarɨjɨ Jonɨmɨjɨ saraarɨ wɨmwaaiheva yɨwaarave' “Sa' gara yawaaihɨla? Be dɨragɨnyavaka? Kɨrɨmɨre jawaaihɨla sa' aarɨne yayavaka?”
Sara kyɨwaarave' Pitarɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai yunebanna wɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨ wɨda' “Nemaremwaaidɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ a'mwe naangeihɨlyɨ saihi,
sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyarɨ tewaanya yɨke' gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraai tewaanyɨraai yavada'galyawaaiholya'na danehɨthɨwaava!

Sa'na sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨlyɨ Yɨzɨrelɨya yuyarajɨ saihi dara yawɨpɨja' ‘Ai, Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyare dɨragɨnya' kyawaalɨ' a'mwe dai maamɨdaryai yɨma'naka nemɨnyaba daa'manɨkei daaka!’ Yɨhɨthɨwolyai Jizaazarɨ yɨsavɨri sarɨmɨ nilɨya karame' baryarɨ Gotɨyai ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ.
Sahwarɨna dɨnɨke'
‘Sɨlaangerɨna madɨvɨsaihi “Waryaanyasɨ,” dɨneva wasɨ'ne',
Gotɨyai simɨdaangerɨ nayaa marayɨlamwaaihakelyɨ.’
Sa' dɨnɨkesɨ sahwarɨna.

Kayaa'nanyanna Jizaazai gavei nevadaihasamaa'delyɨ. Kwaaka yuyavakɨ aane pwai kwarɨ Gotɨyai madahɨlakyaka nemɨre kayaa'nanya wasɨ'nya'nerɨ Jizaazarɨ wɨmwaaiha'. Aane pwaina kwaina mi'. Sahwai gavelyɨra,” sara wɨda' Pitai.

Kaajolɨyara dara wanganesa' “Nɨwaava, Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraai lɨka myɨvanɨgɨlyaraai daaka! Saraai a'mweraai nemɨre sɨkulɨyavɨ myadisaraai daaka!” Deva atɨka maru'nare'. Atɨka maru'nareva dara yawɨresa' “O, a'mwe saraai Jizaazalyɨ kaanya jamaryagɨla!”
Sara deva Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraaryaba a'mwerɨ yavada'gainɨkerɨ wanganeva dɨnyɨna ye' “Tewaanyai mena daa'manɨke'na saraarɨ maiyagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mudaanna!”
Mi'na dɨnyɨna yeva “Mwasawɨnna dɨmwaalyɨla!” dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna ye'. Mi'na wɨdɨna kye' kwalyawe' Kaajolɨyara dɨnyɨna ye'.

Dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' pwara yɨwaara'na yɨna ye' “A'mwe saraarɨna gara yaajɨwona? Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jeruzaalemɨ dava yuyara mwaaihasara yawɨ'manɨga' ‘Saraai tewaanya' dɨragɨnya' yawaaihɨla.’ Sara yawɨ'manɨgasa' majɨna ‘Sa' nebulya' mɨka!’ mujɨ yaanneinera.
Aawa. A'mweraayaba yuneba yagaala sa' nudɨpɨdɨka! Dɨragɨnna wɨdaathera. Sahware yayavɨna a'mwe aane pwai kwarɨ mujɨkanera! Savɨne'na mala nayɨhɨramaadɨka!”
Mi'na dɨneva saraarɨ jaka wɨdɨna kye' saraai ayɨna wɨladaa'dakɨlyɨ wɨdɨna ye' “A'mweraaihi, yuyagaa' a'mweraavɨ Jizaazare yagaala mujɨkanera! Jizaazarɨna mujɨwaakyɨkanera!”

Saraavɨ Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ ma'maaragi “Sarɨmɨ sahwaihi tewaanna jawɨbwaryɨla! Gotɨyai kanengamanɨ' Gotɨyare yagaalya' yagalya'mavakwolyɨ sarɨmɨre yagaalya' yakade'na tewaanyabwi daaka! Gara jawɨryijɨwaava?
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Naarɨmɨ sahwainaai tɨnna wanganolyajɨ kadɨka wɨ'nolyajɨ sangɨna wɨdakajainaai wɨjalɨkurakakaneinaalyɨ.”

Sara kudahi Kaajolɨyara dɨragɨnna ayɨna wɨdeva “Newɨ'nakɨlyɨ yagaala sa' mujɨwaakyɨkanera!” wɨde' “Dalyula!” Sahwara a'mweraavɨna lɨka yesare. A'mwera sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyai tewaanya yɨma'nake'na Gotɨyarɨna “Byaannakela,” dɨna ye'. Sara dɨna yadaapɨjɨ Kaajolɨyara yawɨ'na kye' “Aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mabɨramaariwo. Maramaannera!” Pitarɨjɨ Jonɨmɨjɨ saraarɨ daanga muvɨnya'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe sai wɨjɨwaainya' yɨma'naka sai tewaanna yavada'galagɨlyai mɨgɨnyai mɨ'. Kwarame a'mweraare ata sɨvɨlɨraalya wavɨla'nɨkelyɨ sagaa'.
Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ ya'ma'na yagɨla kɨrɨmɨreraayawɨnna wɨlaawɨna yagɨla Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ wɨdesa' wɨdahi.
Kudahi yuyara sɨmunya gavevɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ wɨde' “Nemaremwaaidɨnyaigɨ Sɨgunyasɨ Kwaakevasɨ saalaalyasɨ sa wakaka yuya sangɨ mwaaihasaraavɨjɨ yuyangɨjɨ wakagɨnyaigɨnyɨra.
Kɨgaakuna gɨmɨre Kuryai Tewaanyai Ne sɨnnawɨnyai Devitɨmɨ sɨmunya' wɨjaavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna. Wɨjaavɨna kyaa' Devitɨ gɨmɨre wɨdaayadei gɨmɨre yawɨsa'na pɨkarya dara yɨda'na
‘Ajɨmyangɨyaraavɨre sɨnna tɨka be'na wɨdava'?
Kumɨre a'mwera kayaa'na be'na yawɨre'?
Kwaakevakɨre kingɨyara malya' maryamihe'.
Maremwaaidɨvɨsara gaidaasa'na yɨkabeva dɨne'
“Naangerɨjɨ gamɨre Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ yɨgalaana!” ’

Sara yɨda'nɨke'na nebulya' dara yɨma'nakesɨ. Anga dava A'mwe Erotɨyalyɨ A'mwe Podɨyaazai Paailatɨjɨ ajɨmya pɨnɨngɨyarajɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyarajɨ yɨkabeva Jizaazai gɨmɨre wɨdaayadei dahɨlakagɨnyarɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Tamakaana!’
Savɨne'na dɨragɨnaangeigɨ sahwaigɨ yawɨ'na ‘Sara yɨdeinyɨ.’ Yawɨ'na yagɨnya' sara yɨkabeva kunnya sɨmunya myawɨryeva kɨrɨ' gɨmɨre sɨmunya' sara yɨna ye'.
Naangeigɨ, maiyagaala nemɨjɨyaraarɨ wɨdɨwaasa' dahaasagaa' yawɨra'gɨzɨ gɨthayadaanyainaavɨ gɨnnya dɨragɨnya' kanejaava'gɨzɨ lɨka myadaa gɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨdaathe'nanyɨra.
Gɨnnya dɨragɨnya' kanejaava'gɨzɨ nabalɨnakeraavɨ yavada'galawaajɨ nabaai gɨthaayade tewaanyai Jizaazare yaya' wɨdawaajɨ dɨragɨnyajɨ atɨka maru'narya'nejɨ yaadeigɨnyɨ.”

Gotɨyarɨ mi'na kude' Kurya Tewaanyai yɨna kya' angevɨ wɨlamwaaleta ange' yonyɨ yonyɨ yɨdaasɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai yuyaraavɨ yunebanna wɨlamwaaina yada dɨragɨnya wɨjaavɨna ya'. Wɨjaavɨna kya' Gotɨyare yagaalya' dɨragɨnna wɨdadɨvɨ' lɨka myesare.

Jizaazarɨ lɨmwaga'dɨvɨta yuyara sɨmunya avaalyasɨ kurya avaainanyasɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yuyaraavɨ kale wiadaasɨ tewaanna mwaalɨna ye'. Pwai myawɨrina “Nɨmɨre pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨnesɨ. Jizaazare pwaraavɨne' mɨka!” Aawa. Yuyara kunnya gɨlyɨvɨta yuya pwaraavɨnengɨra.

Yanga yɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' Wɨdaasadera a'mweraavɨ Naangei Jizaazai dɨkaavake'na dɨragɨnna wɨjalɨkurake'. Dɨragɨnna wɨjalɨkurakesa' Gotɨyai Jizaazareraavɨ nayaa kamaremwaala' yanga gaimwangebwi kumɨnyɨ warakesɨ.

Sare' daresɨ. Nayaa mwaalɨna kye' wɨmudaasaka aane pwai kwai mamwaalya'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pwara nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna yawɨ'na yeva wawɨnyangɨre kwɨyakwaravajɨ angengɨre kwɨyakwaravajɨ sara kunnya yaasadɨvɨ' nɨgwia makabɨna yeva
Wɨdaasaderaavɨna wɨjaavɨna kye' Wɨdaasadera nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna wɨjaavɨna ye'. Wɨjaavesa'na nɨgwɨmaayara mamwaalye'.

Sagaa' savɨna Jozepɨyai Ahu'manna Saaipɨraazɨ mwaalyai sara ya'. Gamɨ sare yɨsavaa' Livaayai wo'nɨkerɨna Wɨdaasadera yaya mudɨke' Baanavaazai wɨdesalyɨra. Baanavaazai yagaala sa' “Pwaraavɨna sɨmunya dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwadelyɨ,” dɨnɨkesɨ.
Baanavaazai gannya wawɨnya' kɨnɨnnakei savɨ yaasaka nɨgwia yuya makabɨna yaka Wɨdaasaderaavɨ wɨjaava'.
Baanavaazai sara kujaava' kɨrɨ' A'mwe Ananaayazai mwaala'. Sare balaange' Sapaaira' yaya' wo'nɨkesɨ. Sai mwaalaka kɨrɨmɨre wawɨnya pɨrɨ' yaasaka
gannya a'mwevɨ wɨdɨna “Naarɨmɨnyɨne nɨgwia pɨnɨ wakaka!” Wɨdɨna yaka Wɨdaasaderaavɨ pɨnɨ makuna yaka wɨjaavɨna.

Sara wɨjaavɨna kya' Pitai wɨda' “Ananaayazai, Saataanɨ kagɨthɨwa' sara baa'na yɨwaa? Kwaasɨ yagaala Kuryai Tewaanyarɨ wɨdɨwaa ‘Nɨmɨre wawɨnya' yaasɨwe nɨgwia yuya warɨka!’ Kwaasɨ yagaala sa' baa'na wɨdɨwaana?

Sɨnnawɨ wawɨnya myaasɨwaanyagaa' gɨmɨresɨ. Yaasa yagɨna nɨgwia gɨmɨrengɨ. Gɨnnya sɨdusavɨ kwaasɨya sarebwi baa'na wɨdɨwaana? A'mweraavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala majahɨ. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdɨwaana.”
Sara kuda' Ananaayazai kadɨka wɨ'nakegaa' balɨna yaka wala'na ya'. Wala'na yake'na kadɨka wɨ'nesara lɨka naanga yesa'nanyɨra.
Baryai wala'na kya' mɨgɨnyara daavɨna yeva gɨlaayarɨ yɨvɨ'dɨbuya pwɨyɨna yeva makuna yeva lɨkyɨrakɨna ye'.
Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' (3 aawaaya) gamɨre balaange' sa'na kadɨka mu'nyaka angevɨ wɨlɨna.
Wɨlɨna kya' Pitai wɨda' “Nyɨdana! Kɨrɨnnya wawɨnya'na nɨgwia da yuya dama'mwaai?” A'mwe' wɨda' “Yo, yuyangɨra.”

Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pitai wɨda' “Sayoihi avaaina baa'na yawɨ'mwaala? ‘Naangere Kuryai navɨka mwaaladelyɨra,’ dathɨwaala? Yaamɨjɨya'na dathɨwaala? Yɨthaa, gɨmɨre a'mwerɨ lɨkyɨrakɨwaasaraavɨre sɨvɨlyangɨ tɨkuryaba du'nɨwaana! Sara gɨmakwalyɨpɨ'de'gɨnyɨra.”

Mi'na kuda' sagaa' gamɨre sɨvɨlyaraaryaba yarai wala'na yaka balɨna ya'. Balɨna kya' mɨgɨnyara dara wanganesa' “O, mena davaimwaka!” Sara deva makwalyuna yɨna yeva gamɨre kwalaangeryaba wɨlalɨkyɨrakɨna ye'.
Wɨlalɨkyɨrakɨna kye' Jizaazare kusɨlaanyavɨya yuyarajɨ a'mwe pwara kadɨka wɨ'nesarajɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' yawɨ'dɨvɨ' lɨka dɨkwosɨ'na ye'.
A'mweraayaba Apozelɨyara Jizaazai Wɨdaasadera wɨjɨwaainyajɨ atɨka maru'nasajɨ yɨna ye'. Sagaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ Solomonɨmɨre yɨhulɨvɨlɨyavɨna Jizaazarera yɨkabɨna yadɨvɨsare.
Yɨkabɨna yadɨvɨ' lɨka wɨrɨdaasɨ pwara kumɨnyabanna myɨkabi yɨna ye'. Kɨrɨ' a'mwera a'mwemɨlɨka dɨna “Sahwara a'mwe tewaanyarera.”
Myɨkabi yɨna yadaapɨjɨ a'mwe pwara Jizaazarera yɨma'nyɨna ye'. Pɨgaa' pɨgaa' a'mwe kwara kwara a'mwe kɨnɨ kɨnɨ Naangerɨ wɨ'nesara Jizaazarera yɨma'nyɨna ye'.

Wɨdaasadera yesa'na tusangɨ nabalɨnakeraavɨ makwalyaabɨna yeva yɨ'bɨnyangɨjɨ lamulyangɨjɨ wakɨna yeva a'ba yɨlawɨmwaaihɨna ye'. A'mwera sɨmunya yawɨ'na “Pitai kaanya kyamaryojɨ gamɨre a'mabaalyai nabalɨnakeraavɨ kɨma'bwa'nya yɨrɨna kyojɨ sahwara tewaanyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera,” yawɨ'na yeva sara yɨlawɨmwaaihɨna yesarera.
Anga Jeruzaalemɨ saba anga pɨnɨngɨdaasɨ kwala naange' kunnya nabalɨnakeraavɨjɨ yɨmaka widɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ makabɨna kye' yuyara tewaanyaraavɨ yavada'gaina yɨna ye' Wɨdaasadera.
Sagaa' Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangelyɨ gamɨjɨyara Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyara Sazuzɨyarajɨ Wɨdaasaderaavɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ dɨnyɨna ye'. Mi'na dɨnyɨna yeva wɨna yeva
Wɨdaasaderaavɨ wɨla marapwɨyɨna yeva a'mweraavɨne kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ye'.
Wɨmwaaihɨna kye' kɨrɨ' sawɨsavɨ Naangere ejelɨyai mamaayai kalavuzangevɨya kaanya' baasɨna yaka mwasawɨ kumɨnyɨ jɨvwaramakwalyɨna yaka wɨda'
“Gotɨyare Angevɨna wawopɨjɨ saba daavapɨjɨ a'mweraavɨ Gaala davwina duzɨla!”
Sara kuda' sahwara yawɨ'na “Yo, sara yaana!” yawɨ'na yeva yɨrɨkevɨ Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlaawɨna yeva wɨjɨwaakɨna ye'.

Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangelyɨ gamɨjɨyarajɨ sara Juyaraavɨre a'mwe naangeraavɨna jɨvwaramakabɨna “A'mweihi, nemɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ Kaajolɨyaina yɨkabaana!” Jɨvwaramakabɨna kye' yuyara mwaaleva kalavuzavɨ dameraavɨ wɨdaase' “Davanna Jizaazare yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsaraavɨ dɨmakabyɨla!”
Kudaase' pwara kaanna wɨna yeva dara wanganesa' “O, sahwara mamwaalyɨ jɨhava!” Deva Kaajolɨyaraayawɨnna ayɨna waweva
wɨde' “Kalavuzangevɨ yɨ'mavona dara wangamwo' ‘Kaanya lokɨya mena tihɨ'nadɨ'nyɨ kaanyangyaba damera nayaa daavɨna jɨwaava!’ Sara dona kɨrɨ' nemɨ kaanya baasona dara wangamwo' ‘Ai, pwara midaaka!’ ”
Sara kude' Gotɨyare Angevɨna dameraavɨ maremwaaidelyɨ Gotɨyarɨne tamira'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva yawɨ'na “Sahwara gava mwaaihava? Gawɨnneraavaka?”
Yaamɨjɨ kuna yawɨ'daapɨjɨ pwai wɨlaabɨna yaka wɨda' “Yɨthaanyɨla! Dɨnyu'nyɨla! Sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaihyawaaihasara Gotɨyare Angevɨ daa'dɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨgava.”

Sara kuda' Gotɨyare Angevɨna dameraavɨ maremwaaidelyɨ gamɨre damerajɨ sara waweva kumɨnyɨ ayɨna makabɨna ye'. Damera Wɨdaasaderaavɨ mala maramyɨ ye'. “A'mwera sɨla nemɨnyɨna nanelɨwakɨpɨka!” deva mala maramyɨ ye'.
Angevɨna kumɨnyɨ makulaabɨna yeva Kaajolɨyaraayaba wɨmwaaihɨna ye'. Wɨmwaaihɨna kye' Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei yɨwaara'na ya'

“ ‘A'mwe darɨna mujɨwaakɨpɨnera!’ dɨragɨnna dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨwa'do kɨrɨ' gevwi gevwi yɨwaasaihɨla. Be'nana? Jeruzaalemɨ yuneba a'mwe yuyara sarɨnnya wɨjɨwaakyabwi kadɨka wɨ'nɨwaasaihɨlyɨra. Sabwina dɨna, ‘Sai balake'na Kaajolɨyara yesa'ne'. Gamɨre tawe' sahwaraavɨne tɨvɨkɨsa',’ dathɨvanɨga'?”
Mi'na kuda' Pitalyɨ Wɨdaasade pwarajɨ wɨde' “Gotɨyai sara kanedozɨ sara yaanneinera. Gotɨyarɨna a'mwera sara kanedapɨjɨ sara myaanneinera!
Yɨsavɨri sarɨmɨ Jizaazarɨ nilɨya tamarɨmwɨna kye' mena kabala' Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre Gotɨyai yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ.

Kwaihwaainakei mena kamwaala' Gotɨyai gannya aangasɨmagɨ dɨragɨnyaba wɨmwaaihɨna kya' sai maremwaaidei nabaai kayaa'nanyaburɨ padaihasamaa'dei yɨma'na'. Kyɨma'na' Yɨzɨrelɨyaina ‘Nennya kayaa'nanyaburɨna sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaraana!’ dawaajɨ Gotɨyarɨ gɨnyɨra'na kyawaajɨ nennya kayaa'nanya marasɨ'na neyadelyɨ. Sa' Gotɨyai nayaa yawɨ'manɨ'.

Sangɨna nemɨ tɨnna wanganona nayaa yawɨrona yagaala sa wɨjalɨkurakɨvanɨgo. Nabaai, nebulya'na Kuryai Tewaanyai avaaina wɨjalɨkurakɨvanɨ'. Kuryai sarɨ Gotɨyai gannya yagaala mɨdɨdɨvɨsara yuyaraavɨna yanga wɨjaavadelyɨ,” wɨde'.
Sa' Kaajolɨyara kadɨka wɨ'neva sɨnna tɨka naanga wɨda'daasɨ dɨna “Saraavɨ tamakaana!”

Sara dɨna kye' kɨrɨ' pwai Kaajolɨyaraavɨ tɨnnyaba daavɨna ya'. Sai Perɨzɨyai Gamelɨyalɨ wo'nɨkelyɨ. Juyaraavɨre Kɨwɨnya wɨjɨwaakaderɨna a'mwe yuyara sɨmunya yawɨ'na “Sai Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya nayaa wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkelyɨ,” yawɨ'na yeva gamɨre yaya' munyaba makɨlesalyɨ.
Sai daavɨna yaka wɨda' “A'mwe saraavɨ mwasawɨnna marakaana!” Kuda' Wɨdaasadera mena kwalyawe' Kaajolɨyaraavɨ wɨda' “A'mweihi, Yɨzɨrelɨyaihi, a'mwe daraavɨna jide'na nayaa jawɨrila!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨgaa' a'mwe pwai Tɨyuthaazai baka wɨdɨna ‘A'mwe naangeinyɨra.’ Wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe kwalaalyara (400) gamɨjɨ gaidaa'na kye' kɨrɨ' aamiyara Romɨyara Tɨyuthaazarɨ tamakɨna kye' pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna gamɨre mɨdɨnesara yɨwɨnama'na yɨna yeva yɨmaanyɨna ye'.

Yɨwɨnama'na yɨna kye' dɨvi Ga'maanɨyara yaya maaresagaa' dɨviyai Juthaazai Galɨli mwaalyai ‘A'mwe naangeinyɨ,’ kuda' a'mwe kwala naanga mɨdɨnaabɨna ye'. Kwala naanga mɨdɨnaabɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Juthaazarɨ tamɨna kye' sai balɨna. Balɨna kya' pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna gamɨre mɨdɨnesaraavɨ tamayɨwɨnaasɨna ye'.
Sara yesa'na yɨma'nɨke'na dahaa' yɨhɨthɨma! A'mwe daraavɨna myaanneine! Mwaaibɨka! Kumɨre yawɨsajɨ wawɨnyajɨ a'mweraavɨreburɨdaasa sara yetabaaibɨ' kayaaka yadengɨra.
Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyareburɨdaasa kayaaka myɨgalyɨ yaadeinera. Dara nyawɨraadɨka! ‘O, nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ mala wɨramwoina daaka!’ ”

Gamelɨyalɨ sara wɨdake' sara yɨna ye'. Wɨdaasaderaavɨ jaka wɨdeva pwaraavɨ wɨde' “A'mweraavɨ wɨlyabaalyɨ duramyɨla!” Mena kurame' Kaajolɨyara naanga wɨdɨna “Jizaazarɨ yaya'na yagaala mujɨwaakyɨ jideihɨlyɨra.” Wɨdɨna yeva kumɨre angengɨ yaasɨna ye'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kaajolɨyaraayawɨdaasɨ sahwara wɨna yeva dɨnyɨna “Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna dara yawɨ'mwa' ‘Sahwara tewaanyara mwaaihasa'na Jizaazarɨne yayavɨna kayaa'na yɨpɨ'de' wi'nanyaraavɨ.’ Sara daka dɨragɨnna nemwaaihɨwakeina yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgoinera.”

Sara dɨnyɨna yeva yɨrɨka gazagaasagaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨjɨ a'mweraavɨre angengɨjɨ saba Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazarɨna yagaala tewaanya' kuna wɨdadɨvɨkɨ. Nemɨnyɨna Jizaazarɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakake'na kuna wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨkɨra.

Dɨvi yɨrɨka sangɨ Jizaazare mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kwala naanga naanga yɨma'nadaapiyagaa' Gɨrikɨyagaala dadɨvɨsara Yɨvɨruyagaala dadɨvɨsaraavɨna kɨnɨmyagaala dɨnyɨna ye'. Gɨrikɨyagaala dadɨvɨsara dɨnesa'nanyɨ “Nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨ yanga wɨjaavadɨvɨsara, nemɨre sɨgɨraayangɨ wapaaya maalɨka wɨjaavadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' Yɨvɨruyagaalya' dadɨvɨsangɨ naanga wɨjaavadɨvɨsarera.”

Sara dɨdaapɨjɨ atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaasɨ pwaraalyara mɨdɨdɨvɨta yuyaraavɨ jɨvwaramaa'na “Yuyaihi, jɨkabyɨla!” Jɨvwaramaa'na kye' yɨkabɨna kye' wɨdɨna ye' “Gotɨyare yagaalya' ya'mavaaja' yɨ'bɨnyavɨ wɨdayaade' wapaaya yanga wɨjavaade' yɨlaaya myɨvanɨgo.

Aawa, nya'mweihi, nemɨre wawɨnya naange' Gotɨyare yagaalya wɨdadaanya savɨna a'mwe ati ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ kadahɨlakapɨjɨ sahwara wapaaya yange'na maremwaaibɨ'deraavɨ sara wɨmwaihaana! Sarɨmɨjɨyaraavɨna ‘A'mweraavɨ yunebanna Kuryai Tewaanyai wɨlamwaaidera sɨdu'nakera damwaaihava! Sahwara a'mwe tewaanyarera,’ jalɨkurakadɨvɨsaihi yawɨrapɨjɨ sahwaraavɨ dɨthahɨlakyɨla!
Sara kyapɨjɨ yuyagaa' nemɨ sahwaina Gotɨyarɨ wɨjavulyɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨdaayabulyɨ kuna yaadeinera.”

Wɨdaasadera sara kude' yuya kwala naange' dɨnyɨna “Yo, tewaanyasɨra.” Dɨnyɨna yeva Sɨtivenɨmɨ dahɨlake'. A'mwe sai Jizaazarɨ yuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ Kurya Tewaanyai yuna wɨlamwaaida dɨragɨnna wɨmwaaihakelyɨra. Sɨtivenɨmɨ dahɨlakeva Pilipɨmɨjɨ Pɨrokoraazalyɨ Naaikenaamɨjɨ Taaimonɨmɨjɨ Paamenaazalyɨ Nikolaazalyɨ dahɨlakɨna ye'. Nikolaazai sai Anga Aadɨyokɨ mwaalyalyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sai Maavei mwaalaka dɨvi Juyaraavɨrebwi wɨ'naka aayagaa' Jizaazarɨ wɨ'nakelyɨra.
Mi'na dahɨlakɨna Wɨdaasaderaayawɨnna makabɨna kye' sahwara Gotɨyarɨ wɨdeva kumɨre wawɨnya'na dɨragɨnya wɨmwaaihya'na kumɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ ata dathɨwanna yɨna ye'.

Jeruzaalemɨ yunebanna Gotɨyare yagaalya' kadɨka kuna wɨ'ne'. Kadɨka kuna wɨ'nadaapɨjɨ Jeruzaalemɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kwala naanga naanga yɨma'nyɨna ye'. Nabaai Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta kwalaalyara Naangerɨ lɨmwageva gamɨrebwi mɨdɨnna ye'.
Sɨtivenɨmɨ yunebanna Gotɨyare yanga gaimwangebulyɨ dɨragɨnyabulyɨ kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Sɨtivenɨ dɨragɨnaangei a'mweraayaba atɨka maru'nasa'nejɨ wɨjɨwaainya'ne dɨragɨnyajɨ yɨna ya'.

Sara yaka yagaala wɨdadaasɨ gamɨre yagaala sɨnna tɨke'na a'mwe pwara maanga wɨde'. Maanga wɨdesara kɨgaa' Romɨyaraavɨna kalavuzɨwawɨnya yesa' dɨvi kalavuzɨwawɨnya yagalya'mave'. Yagalya'maveva dɨnyɨna “Nemɨ lotuanga mudɨkevɨna yɨkabaatheinera.” Sara dɨnesara Anga Saairini mwaalyarajɨ Anga Alekɨzaadɨrɨya mwaalyarajɨ sara yɨkabadɨvɨsarera. Sara maanga wɨdadaapɨjɨ Juya pwara Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨyadaasarajɨ Kwaaka Ezɨyadaasarajɨ sara Sɨtivenɨmɨ maanga wɨdɨna ye'.
Maanga wɨdɨna kye' Kuryai Sɨtivenɨmɨna sɨduta naange' kujaava' Sɨtivenɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdaka kumɨre yagaalya wavɨla'na ya'.

Wavɨla'na yake'na sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ pwaraavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨja'na nɨgwia wɨjaavɨna kye' sahwara kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdɨna “A'mwe dai Sɨtivenɨ Ne Mozɨzarɨnajɨ Gotɨyarɨnajɨ bɨrala wɨdadaasɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwoinera.”

Kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdɨna wɨdɨna kye' a'mwerajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ Kɨwɨjarajɨ sɨnna tɨka davɨna ya'. Sɨnna tɨka davɨna yadaasɨ Sɨtivenɨmyawɨnna yarai bɨna yeva galalɨmwanna yeva Kaajolɨyaraayabanna makuna ye'.
Makuna yeva kwaasɨ yagaala wɨja'neraavɨ makulaabɨna kye' sara kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdɨna “A'mwe dai Gotɨyare Anga tewaanya davɨnajɨ Ne Mozɨzare kɨwɨnyavɨnajɨ bɨrala wɨdadelyɨra.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna ‘Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyai Gotɨyare Ange' wo'dalasɨ'na yojɨ Ne Mozɨzai kɨwɨnyabulyɨya nedɨnɨke maryovimaa'nadelyɨra,’ sara kadɨka wɨ'nɨwo.”
Mi'na wɨdɨna kye' Kaajolɨyaraavɨreba walamwaaina yesara Sɨtivenɨmɨ baihana'na yeva dara wanganesa' “Ai, dare sɨnnya' Gotɨyare mamaayare sɨnnya'bɨsa' dangamanɨgona byaanna yidaasɨ!”
Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangei Sɨtivenɨmɨ yɨwaara'na ya' “Nedɨwaasa' gɨmɨnyɨna nebulya'na dɨngaka?”

Yɨwaara'na kya' Sɨtivenɨ wɨda' “A'mwe naangeihi, nya'mweihi, dɨnyu'nyɨla! Gotɨya byaannakei Kɨgaakuna Ne sɨnnawɨnya Evɨraamɨ Anga Aaranɨ mamwalaawi yaakegaa' Kwaaka Mezopotemya kuna mwalyaakegaa' Evɨraamɨmɨ yɨma'naabɨna yaka
wɨdɨna ‘Gɨnnya kwaakevɨjɨ gɨnnyaraavɨjɨ ya'mava'gɨzɨ kwaaka pɨrɨ' givwarɨdaakwɨdevɨna dɨwodeigɨnyɨra.’

Wɨdɨna kyaa' savɨna Kwaaka Kaalɨthɨyadaasɨ Evɨraamɨ ya'ma'na yaka Anga Aaranɨ mwaalɨna. Mwaalɨna kya' Evɨraamɨmɨ ganɨmaangei mena balyaakegaa' Gotɨyai wɨdɨna ‘Givwarɨdaakwɨdewɨnna dɨwona!’ Wɨdɨna kya' kwaaka davakɨ sarɨmɨ mwaaihasawɨnna bɨna.

Mi'na bɨna kya' sagaa' Gotɨyai kwaaka yarai mujaayɨ yaa'. Kwaaka naangeva' mujaayɨ, kwaaka maalɨkejɨ' yarai mujaayɨ yaakesɨra. Mujaayɨ yake' kɨrɨ' yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdɨna ‘Dɨvi kwaaka davɨ kagɨzaava'mujɨ gɨmɨre' dɨviyara gɨmɨreraavɨre' waragothesɨra.’ Sagaa' Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na sara wɨjaakegaa' Evɨraamɨ kaimɨraavɨmaayai mwalyaakelyɨ.

Gotɨyai da' wɨdɨna ‘Menyaraavɨrewɨ gɨmɨrera mwaalɨna yapɨjɨ kalavuzɨwawɨnya' yɨpɨ'derera. Kalavuzɨwawɨnya' yadaapɨjɨ pwara kayaa'na yɨpɨ'derera. Kwarame naanga naanga (400) wavɨla'daawori kayaa'na mwaaibɨ'derera.

A'mwe anga naanga pimagɨnyara gɨmɨreraavɨ dɨragɨnna maremwaaibɨ'deraavɨ maryawɨbwarɨdeinyɨra. Sara kamaryawɨbwara'mujɨ kwaaka savakɨ gɨmɨrera yagalya'ma'na yapɨjɨ dava bamwaalapɨjɨ yɨleyagaala nyɨdɨpɨ'devanyɨ.’

Wɨdɨna yaka yagaala pɨrɨ' wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨre yagaalya'na gɨmɨnyɨjɨ gɨmɨjɨyaraavɨjɨ kɨlaakejɨ' davɨna jɨla!’ Gotɨyai sara wɨdɨna kyaa' ganaange' Aazakɨmɨ maryaakegaa' yɨrɨka ati ata purɨdaasɨ daryaai darɨkɨ Evɨraamɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' davɨna. Mi'na davɨna kyaa' dɨvi Aazakɨ gamɨrei Jaikopɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' davɨna kyaa' dɨvi Jaikopɨ Ne sɨnnawɨnya atɨraai sɨvɨla purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyaraavɨre kɨlaakejɨ' davɨna yaakebulyɨ Juyainaavɨrebwi.

Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ kumɨre kuvɨgwaalaangei Jozepɨyarɨna tɨganaarya kyaa' sɨnna tɨka kudayaa' pwaraavɨ yaasɨna kyaa' sahwara Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨna yaasɨwa'wawɨnya'na makuna. Wi'na makuna kyaa' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai gamɨjɨ mwaalɨna.

Mwaalɨna yaka Jozepɨyarɨ kayaa'na yaasagaa' Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna wɨmwaaihɨna yaa'. Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ maremwaaidei Peroyaryaba Jozepɨyai daa'dɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyai tewaanna wina kyaa' Peroyai dara wanganyaake' ‘Ai, a'mwe dai nawɨ'nyai sɨdu'nakei daaka!’ Sara daka wɨdɨna ‘Nɨmɨnyɨna Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ davakɨjɨ a'mweraavɨjɨ nyɨdaayadɨvɨsara nɨmɨre angevɨ mwaaihasaraavɨjɨ dɨmaremwaala!’

Wɨdɨna kyaa' Jozepɨyai maremwaaidɨ'nyɨ Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨjɨ Kwaaka Kenaanɨjɨ yuya sabanyaai mɨjɨka naange' yɨma'nyɨna. Mena yɨma'nyɨna kyaa' a'mwera mɨjɨka naanga wiadaa'nyɨ Ne sɨnnawɨnyara tɨka munne'na bɨrɨna bɨrɨna kyaa' mɨjɨka wina.
Mɨjɨka wina kyaa' sagaa' Jozepɨyarɨ ganɨmaangei Jaikopɨ dara wɨ'nyaake' ‘O, Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ wapaaya witɨzɨla darɨka!’ Daka pɨgaa' gawaalɨvaangera Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ wɨdaasɨna.

Yɨzɨpɨna wɨdaasɨna kyaa' ayɨna bɨna kyaa' pɨgasaai wɨdaasɨna kyaa' Jozepɨyai gya'mweraavɨ nayaa wɨdɨna ‘Jozepɨyainyɨ. Sarɨnnya sɨrya'mweinyɨ.’ ‘Jozepɨyainyɨ,’ wɨdɨna kyaa' Peroyai dara yawɨryaake' ‘Ai, Jozepɨyare yɨsavaakɨyara sara daaka!’
Mi'na dɨna kyaa' Jozepɨyai ganɨmaanga Jaikopɨmɨna yagaalya' wɨdaasɨna ‘Nɨmwai, Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ davanna gɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨre yuyajɨ saihi dɨvideihɨlyɨra.’ Sagaa' Jaikopɨmɨre jɨlɨkaimɨraaya 75 mwalyaasangɨra.
Wɨdaasɨna kyaa' Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ saba Jaikopɨ wɨna kyaa' dɨvi saba gamɨjɨ Ne sɨnnawɨnyarajɨ balɨna.
Balɨna kyaa' dɨvi ayaba Anga Sɨkemɨ kumɨrera kumɨre yagɨnya makuna yeva simaangevɨ wakɨna yaa'. Simaange' kɨgaakuna Evɨraamɨ Yɨsavaakɨya Emoyaraavɨ nɨgwia mubyaakesɨ.
Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yagaalya' wɨjaaka nebulya' yɨma'nya'na aya kɨgaa' yɨma'nyɨna kyaa' Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ nemɨrera kwala naanga naanga yarai yɨma'nyɨna.
Yɨma'nyɨna kyaa' Kingɨya gei Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ gaai maremwalyaakegaa'nanyɨ. Kingɨyai sai Jozepɨyarɨna myawɨryaakelyɨ.

Gaai maremwaaina yaka nemɨreraavɨ kwaasɨ yaka kayaa'na yɨna kyaa' Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ daanga naanga wina yadaasɨ Kingɨyai wɨdɨna ‘A'mwemɨlɨki, sarɨnnya a'mwe bwaranyaraavɨ kamaarapɨjɨ mwasawɨnna sahwaraavɨ dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla baibɨzaraavɨ! Yarai dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla!’
Mena wɨdɨna kyaa' sagaa' ganaange' Mozɨzarɨ maarɨna. Mozɨzai bwaranya nawɨ'nyalyɨ. Mozɨzarɨ maarɨna kyaa' lɨka yulyakɨna kyagi lawe dɨkaai dɨkɨ ganɨmaangere angevɨ kave mwaalɨna.
Kave mwaalɨna kyaa' gamɨre angevɨdaasɨ pɨwɨ wakɨna kyagi Kingɨyai Peroyare garaavaange' maranganna yaka ‘Nɨnnyalyɨra,’ daka gannyarɨ maremwaaina.
Maremwaaina yadɨsɨ Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyaraavɨre sɨduta yuyabwi wɨjɨwaakɨna kyaa' a'mwe naangei wawɨnya dɨragɨnya' yadei yɨma'nyɨna yaka yagaala nawɨ'nya' dadei yɨma'nyɨna yaakelyɨra.
Kwarame a'mweraare ata sɨvɨlɨraai Mozɨzarɨ wavɨla'na kya' sai sɨmunyavɨ yawɨ'na ‘Peroyare angevɨ yuyagaa' namwaaimudɨka! Nɨnnyara Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ angyɨrɨ'maata yɨma!’ dɨna yaka kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna wɨna yaka dara wanganake' ‘O, Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyai nɨmɨrerɨ kayaa'na jɨvanɨka!’ Sara daka ‘Padaihasamaasa'nana,’ daka mɨnya maaraka Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyarɨ tamakɨna.
Wi'na tamakɨna yaka yawɨ'na ‘Nɨnnya nya'mwera dara yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai Mozɨzarɨ yasaabɨna kyɨwa' Mozɨzai nevadaihasamaaradelyɨra,’ ” Sara yawɨ'na kyaa' kɨrɨ' kumɨ gamɨnyɨna sara myawɨrina.

Sara myawɨri kyaa' mwanyavɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyaraai tannyɨna yadaakɨlyɨ Mozɨzai tɨnna wanganaka. ‘Munya yɨrɨla dɨwagɨma!’ daka wɨdɨna ‘A'mweraaihi, dɨnyu'nyi! Kɨrɨmɨdaraaihi mwaaihɨlya'na be'na tannɨvanɨgɨlyaraaihɨlaka?’
Wɨdɨna kyaa' pwai gya'mwerɨ kayaa'na yakei Mozɨzarɨ yɨtavaka yɨwaara'na ‘Nemaremwaaidɨnyaigɨ, kotɨya' neyawɨbwarya'neigɨ aai gɨthahɨlakakeigɨnaka!
Wona Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyarɨ tamakyawaaihɨnyabaaibɨ' dɨnyɨramakɨjɨwaana?’

Yɨwaara'na kyaa' Mozɨzai kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna yaka ‘Yuyara sara wɨ'nɨwaasara daaka!’ daka Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨdaasɨ lɨkaanya wɨna yaka maavewɨ Kwaaka Mɨthɨyanɨ mwaalɨna. Saba mwaalɨna yada kaimɨraayaraarɨ yawakɨnyɨna yaa'.

Dɨvi kwarame a'mweraare ata sɨvɨlɨraai wavɨla'na kya' a'mwe maayaba Mugunya Saainaaya sɨmagɨ Mozɨzai mwaalɨna. Saba mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyare mamaayai ejelɨyai walaabaka yɨsɨkɨ wɨlɨna kyaa' yɨsɨ' dɨka yɨdɨna yada dɨtaalɨta wanyɨna.

Dɨtaalɨta wanyɨna yadaa'nyɨ Mozɨzai tɨnna wanganaka nɨ'nɨka yaka dɨna ‘Sa' berɨ' dɨngaka? Tɨnna nayaa wanganɨma!’ dɨna yaka yɨsɨkyabanna kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yaka kɨrɨ' Naangere maanguraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna
‘Gɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre Gotɨyainyɨra. Evɨraamɨjɨ Aazakɨjɨ Jaikopɨjɨ saraavɨre Gotɨyainyɨra.’ Kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna yaka lɨka dɨkwosɨ'nya'nei bɨ'bɨta yɨna yaka yɨsɨkɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨna.
Tɨnna mwanganyɨ kyaa' sagaa' Naangei wɨdɨna ‘Mwaaiheinyɨna kwaaka da' gɨrɨkita maaya' warɨke'na kwaabɨzɨvɨlyawaarɨ dɨlabwa'mwagakya!

Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ nɨmɨre a'mweraavɨ daanga naanga wɨvɨdaa'nyɨ wangamwa. “Aakai, aakai,” jaka kadɨwaa' kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa. Kadɨka wɨ'nena padaihasamaasa'na waimwaabe. Yarala! Sare'na Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨna gɨthaasɨdeinyɨra.’ Sara wɨdɨna yaa' Gotɨyai.

Mozɨzai darɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyara bɨrala wɨjaasalyɨ. ‘Nemaremwaaidɨnyaigɨ kotɨya' neyawɨbwarya'neigɨ aai gɨthahɨlakakeigɨnaka!’ yɨwarayaasalyɨ. Sahwarɨ Gotɨyai wɨdahɨlakaka wɨdaasɨna ya'. Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidei padaihasamaa'derɨ wɨdaasɨna yaakelyɨ. Yɨsɨkɨ dɨka yɨdadaasɨ yɨsɨkɨ mamaayai wɨlamwalyaakei Mozɨzarɨ wɨgaimwagyaakelyɨ.

Gotɨyai wɨdaasɨna kyaa' Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨdaasɨ Mozɨzai a'mweraavɨ jɨvwaramakabɨna. Kwarame a'mweraare sɨvɨlatɨraalyagaa' Mozɨzai a'mweraavɨ wɨgaimwange'na atɨka maru'narya'nejɨ wɨjɨwaainyajɨ sa yɨna yaakelyɨ. Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ sabajɨ Saalaalya Wayaake' wo'nɨkebajɨ a'mwera maayaba kayaa'nanyabajɨ saba sara yɨna yaakelyɨ.
Nabaai sai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ wɨdɨna ‘Gotɨyai nyɨdasaabakabaaibɨ' sarɨnnyai sɨrya'mwei pɨropetɨyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakaderɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨdasaabathelyɨ Gotɨyai,’ wɨdɨna yaakelyɨ Mozɨzai.

Wawɨnya maayaba sai Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyasɨ mwalyaakelyɨ. Saba Mugunya Saainaayavɨ ejelɨyai wɨdɨna kyaa' Mozɨzai Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ sara wɨdɨna yaakelyɨ. Gotɨyai yagaala gaalyabwine nejaaya'ne Mozɨzai wɨjaake nemɨnyɨna dɨnɨkengɨra.
Ne sɨnnawɨnyara Mozɨzai wɨjaake' kadɨka mu'nyɨ, mamɨdɨnyɨ yaa'. Aawa. Gamɨnyɨ galazekɨvaina yevera kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ yawɨ'na ye' ‘Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ tewaanyabanna ayɨna wawaanneinera! We'!’

Yawɨ'na yɨna yeva Mozɨzai mugunyavɨ mwaalakegaa' A'mwe Eronɨmɨ wɨdɨna ‘Nemɨnyɨne Naangei a'mwa'mwerɨ kyavɨkarya'gɨzɨ A'mwa'mwei nejɨvwaramakwona! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨdaasɨ Mozɨzai sai nejɨvwaramakabakei gawɨ mwaalɨka? Nemɨ myawɨryɨwona.’

Sara wɨdɨna yeva a'mwa'mwei bulɨmakaawoya dɨwɨnyarɨ yavɨkaryeva yɨkunaabɨthɨka wɨjaaya'ne'na kwaasɨ naangerɨ wɨdɨna ‘Naangeigɨ, yɨkunaabɨthɨka da' gɨmɨnyɨne' tamwona.’ Wɨdɨna yeva sahwara yavɨkaryaasarɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yadɨvɨ' tɨka munne nyɨna.

Tɨka munne nyɨna kyaa' Gotɨyai kumɨnyɨ gɨnyɨwanna yaka tewaanna myɨ yaka dɨna ‘Kayaa'nanyara kwaasɨya'na nyɨlyarɨjɨ lawerɨjɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyaraavɨjɨ yɨlaaya yɨpɨka! Sara yɨlaaya yapɨjɨ waryaanyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere.’ Gotɨyai dɨna yaakabaaibɨ' dɨvidaasɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyara pɨkarya yɨda'na
‘Yɨzɨrelɨyaihi, nɨmɨnyɨne mɨka!
A'mwamaayaba kwarame potiyagaa'
Bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨ tameva manyɨjayaa'.
Kwaasɨ naangei Molokɨmɨne yɨvɨkanga' yɨkwa'dɨvɨ'
Pwai Repaanɨmɨne sɨlɨngaamɨnya a'mwa'mwe' yɨkwa'dɨvɨ'
A'mwa'mwe sa yavɨkaryeva yɨleyagaala wɨdɨna yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.
Sabwine'na Anga Bavɨlonɨ aagimagɨ menyabanna yɨhɨmakudeihɨlyɨra.’
Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mwamaayaba Ne sɨnnawɨnyara Gotɨyai saraayaba mwaalake'ne jalɨkurakya'ne kwaabɨyɨvɨkange' yavɨkarina. Gotɨyai Mozɨzarɨ sara wɨjaakabaaibɨ' sara yavɨkaryaasasɨ. Gotɨyai pikɨzaaya'bɨsa' wɨjɨwaainyɨna yaake' Mozɨzai tɨnna wanganyaakabaaibɨ' yavɨkaryaasasɨ.

Yavɨkarina kyaa' dɨviyara Ne sɨnnawɨnyara kwaabɨyɨvɨkange' yɨkwavaabɨna. Sagaa' Gotɨyai ajɨmya pɨnɨngɨyaraavɨ yɨrawaasɨna kyaa' dɨviyarajɨ Jozuwaasɨ sara Maaveraavɨre kwaaka maarɨna yaasara davanna Gotɨyare kwaabɨyɨvɨkange' yɨkwavaabɨna ye'. Yɨkwavaabɨna kyaa' kwaaka dava kuna wa'dɨ'nyɨ Ne Devitɨ mwalyaakegaa'na.
Devitɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyai wanganaka dɨna ‘Devitɨ a'mwe tewaanyalyɨra.’ Dɨna kyaa' Devitɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨwaara'na ‘Jaikopɨmɨre Gotɨyaigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨna ange' madɨma! “Yo,” kanyɨda'gɨzɨ madɨdeinyɨra.’
Yɨwaara'na kyaa' Gotɨyai gevwi kyawɨryaa' Gawaalɨvaanga Solomonɨ ange' gamɨnyɨna madɨna yaakelyɨ.
Sa'na kɨrɨ' a'mwera angengɨ madɨvɨsangɨ Gotɨyai Munya Ke'mwewɨnyai yuyaraavɨjɨ yuyangɨjɨ wavɨla'dei mamwaalyadelyɨ. Angengɨ mamwaalyade'na pɨropetɨyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Naangei dɨnɨkesɨ. Sɨgunya naangeba maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ.
Kingɨyare namwaalyɨsa'bɨsavɨ Sɨgunyavɨ walamwaaina yadɨnyainyɨ.
Paihɨsa'bɨta Kwaaka maalɨka davakɨ maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ.
Nɨmɨre sɨvɨla Kwaaka yuyavakɨ paihɨremwaaidɨnyainyɨ.
Nɨmɨ Naangeinyɨne ange' gara madɨvɨtaihɨlaka?
Nawɨ'nyaba kwaamu' mwaalɨdeva gava warɨka?
Yuyangɨ kaavɨlyai aaihwalaka? Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨra!
Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Ne sɨnnawɨnyarabɨsaihi Kurya Tewaanyai yɨhɨthada yuyagaa' wanganakɨna yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨnnyabwi dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyarebwi navɨka yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨnnya yawɨta Maaveraavɨre yawɨ'dɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sɨryakwalaangera Gotɨyare yagaala yuya pihadɨka yɨna yaatabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ sara yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Sarɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakade aane pwai kwarɨ yuyagaa' kayaa'na yaasara midaa'! Sara kayaa'na yaasara Gotɨyai wɨdaasaderaavɨ tamakɨna ye'. Kɨgaakuna Gotɨyarera wɨdɨna ‘Dɨvi yɨda'maraangei Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaayadei bathelyɨ.’ Sara wɨdɨna yaasaraavɨ sarɨmɨrera tamakɨna. Tamakɨna kyaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaayadei mena bɨna kya' sarɨmɨ kotɨyavɨna makuna yeva sahwarɨ kayaa'na tamakɨna yɨwa'daa'.
Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya ejelɨyara Gotɨyai wɨdaasadera kyɨhɨzaave' kɨrɨ' sabwi myɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨra,” sara wɨda' Sɨtivenɨ.
Kaajolɨyara Sɨtivenɨ wɨdadaasɨ kadɨka wɨ'nadaapɨjɨ kumɨre sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ dɨragɨnna maadɨthɨwɨ'nya ye'.

Dɨragɨnna maadɨthɨwɨ'nya kye' kɨrɨ' Sɨtivenɨ Kurya Tewaanyai yunebanna wɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨyai Sɨgunyavɨ maranganaka dara wanganake' “Gotɨyare byaannyabwi tɨnna wangamanɨge. Gotɨyare aangasɨmagɨ Jizaazai dathaavɨka!”
Mi'na daka wɨdɨna “Yɨthaanyi, Sɨgunya' baasɨnɨkevɨ wangamwa. Gotɨyare aangasɨmagɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayai daavɨkerɨ wangamwa.”
Wɨdɨna kya' sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ jaka naanga deva kadɨka mu'nya'na asa kadɨkengɨ tɨlavalɨmwaga'nyɨna yeva gamɨnyawɨnna avaaizɨmunyasɨya yuyara yarai kaanyave'na bɨna.

Kaanyave'na bɨna yeva Sɨtivenɨmɨ galalɨmwanna yɨna yeva makuna yɨna yeva anga naangeba mwasɨlaa wasɨ'na yɨna yeva sɨlyajɨ gamɨnyɨ lɨwakɨna. Kotɨyavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨjalɨkurakesara kunnya yɨvɨta taapainyɨna yeva Mɨgɨnya Solɨ wo'nɨkeryaba yarai wakɨna yeva sɨlyajɨ gamɨnyɨ lɨwakɨna.
Yarai lɨwakɨna yadaapɨjɨ Sɨtivenɨ Naangerɨ jaka wɨdɨna “Naanga Jizaazaigɨ, nɨmɨre kuryarɨ dɨmaaka!”
Wɨdɨna yaka kwadaai gɨlɨna yaka jaka naanga wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, kumɨnyɨne kayaa'na nyɨvanɨgasa'na myawɨ'dɨnnera!” Wɨdɨna yaka se balɨna ya'.
Sɨtivenɨmɨ tamakɨna kye' Solɨ yawɨra' “Yo. Tewaanyasɨra.”

Sɨtivenɨmɨ tamakesagaa' yɨrɨka sagaa' Anga Jeruzaalemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyara mwaalesaraavɨ pwara kayaa'na kayaa'na yɨna. Kayaa'na kayaa'na yɨna yadaapɨjɨ Jeruzaalemɨ Wɨdaasadera gavera kuna mwaaidapi Jizaazare pwara yuyara Kwaaka Juthɨyajɨ Kwaaka Samerɨyajɨ pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna yɨwɨnama'na ye'.
A'mwera Sɨtivenɨmɨ karamake' Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsara kale kwia' Sɨtivenɨmɨ makuna yeva lɨkyɨrakɨna yeva yɨkwaraamaya yadɨvɨ' kɨnna naanga dɨna ye'.

Solɨ dɨna “Jizaazarebwi kayaaka yɨgalɨma!” dɨna yaka kayaa'na yɨna. Angengɨ wɨlɨna yaka Jizaazare kusɨlaanyavɨya a'mweraavɨjɨ a'mwengɨjɨ wɨlamwagi'nyɨna yaka kalavuzangevɨ marɨmwaaihɨna yaka sara kayaa'na yɨna ya'.
Jizaazarɨ wɨ'nadɨvɨsara yɨwɨnama'na yevevɨdaa'nyɨ gazabazaba mwaalɨna yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwakamarina ye'.
Anga Samerɨya sawɨnna Pilipɨ wɨna yaka Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakakerɨna a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna.
Wɨdɨna yadaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nyɨna. Nayaa wɨ'nyɨna yadɨvɨ' Pilipɨ dɨragɨnya wɨjɨwaainya'nejɨ yada yuyara wanganna.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Wanganna yadaapɨjɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara yɨmakera kɨnɨnnakeraavɨre munyɨkaavɨ yɨmakera bwalyuna yadɨvɨ' jaka naange' wɨdɨna yeva kaanna wɨna. A'mwera kunnya kɨlaakejɨka kwaayakwaaya myadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ yagɨnya bainɨkeraavɨjɨ sara a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ yavada'gaina kya' tewaanyara mwaalɨna.
Tewaanyara mwaalɨna yesa' Samerɨya mwaalyara yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨ' mwaalɨna ye'.

Anga saba a'mwe pwai Saaimonɨ wo'nɨkei mwaalɨna. Sai kulakei gannya kwalya yaderɨna anga naanga sɨmagɨnya Samerɨya mwaalyara atɨka maru'na'na yesalyɨ. Saaimonɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeinyɨ. Sɨdu'nakeinyɨ,” wɨdɨna yada
anga saba mwaalyara yuyara a'mwe naangerajɨ a'mwe maalɨkerajɨ sa kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nyɨna yeva wɨdɨna “Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyasɨyalyɨra. ‘Yɨ dɨragɨnya sa' naangesɨ,’ dadaanyasɨ,” sara wɨdesalyɨ.
Naangegaa' kwalyajɨ gɨri'nyajɨ yada atɨka maru'na'na yadɨvɨsangɨna yuyara kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nyɨna yesalyɨra.

Saaimonɨ sai mwaalɨna yada sara yada kɨrɨ' Pilipɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨnajɨ Gotɨyai nemaremwaalya'najɨ sawaarɨna yagaala tewaanya' wɨdɨna kya' kumɨ wɨ'nyɨna yeva “Sabwi nemɨ mɨdɨnaana!” dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwanna kye' Pilipɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yɨna a'mweraavɨjɨ a'mwengɨjɨ sangɨ.
Bavɨtaazɨya yɨna kya' Saaimonɨ sahwai lɨmwanna kya' Pilipɨ bavɨtaazɨya' kya' Pilipɨmyaba mwaaida Pilipɨ wɨjɨwaainya naangejɨ dɨragɨnyajɨ yɨna yadaa'nyɨ Saaimonɨ atɨka maru'na'na ya'.
Anga Jeruzaalemɨ apozelɨyara Jizaazai Wɨdaasadera dara wɨ'nesa' “Samerɨya mwaalyara Gotɨyare yagaalya' dama'mwaava!” Deva kumɨnyawɨnna wɨgaimwange'na Pitarɨjɨ Jonɨmɨjɨ saraarɨ yaasɨna.
Yaasɨna yesaraai Samerɨya sabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yagɨla Jizaazarɨ wɨ'nadɨvɨsaraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyaigɨ, a'mwe yuya dara gɨnnya Kurya Tewaanyarɨ maapɨka!”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sagaa' Pilipɨ Naanga Jizaazarɨ yayavɨna bavɨtaazɨya' yakegaa' Kurya Tewaanyai yuyaraavɨna mabwalawɨminaawi yakerera.
Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraai Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna yagɨla kumɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ ata dathɨwanna kyagi Kurya Tewaanyarɨ maarɨna ye'.
Saaimonɨ dara wanganake' “Nɨwaava, wɨdaasadisaraai ata kadathɨwamwaai Kurya Tewaanyarɨ kumɨ maarɨna jɨwaava!” Sara daka gannya nɨgwia maaraka Pitarɨjɨ Jonɨmɨjɨ wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre nɨgwia yɨhɨmubɨma!
Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Sai a'mwe pwai kwarɨ ata kadathɨwagozɨ sahwai Kurya Tewaanyarɨ maarana!’ dakɨri sare dɨragɨnya' dɨnyɨjaayɨla!”
Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Pitai wɨdɨna “ ‘Nɨnnya nɨgwianna Gotɨyare yange' mubɨma!’ yawɨ'mwaanya'na gɨmɨjɨ gɨnnya nɨgwiajɨ Dɨkebanna dɨwodeigɨnyɨra. Yawɨta sa' kayaa'nanaangesɨra.
Yɨwolya'na nemɨre wawɨnya' gɨmɨre' daaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai gɨmɨre sɨmunya yawɨsavɨ gwangamwa'. Sɨmunya kayaa'nanyavɨ gwangamwakeigɨnyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨnnyabwi kayaa'nanyabwi dasɨka! Mudɨkebwi jawɨramaaka! Wasɨ'na'gɨzɨ Naangerɨ duthana! ‘Nɨmɨ sɨmunya yawɨ'mwe'na nɨmɨre kayaa'nanya' dɨmarasɨ'na! Nayaa mwaalɨma!’
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨna dara wangamwe' ‘O, a'mwe dai wabarɨnna dɨragɨnna yadei daaka! A'mwe sɨmunya kayaa'na yawɨ'dei daaka!’ Dena gɨthɨwa,” wɨdɨna.
Pitai wɨdɨna kya' Saaimonɨ saraarɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘Nyɨdɨwaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna nanyɨma'nadɨka!’ dena yɨhɨthɨwe'na dakɨlyɨ Naangerɨ duzɨla!” wɨdɨna ya' Saaimonɨ.

Jizaazai yake'na tɨnna wanganagɨlya'na Pitalyɨ Jonɨjɨ saraai yuyaraavɨ wɨjalɨkurakɨna, yɨ, Naangere yagaalya' wɨdɨna yagɨla dɨnyɨna “Jeruzaalemɨ sawɨnna ayɨna wawakadera,” dɨnyɨna yagɨla kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yadi' Kwaaka Samerɨya anga mannɨkeba yagaala tewaanya' damarina yagɨla Jeruzaalemɨna wawagi.
Naangere mamaayai ejelɨyai Pilipɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Yovɨrava'gɨzɨ tusa' Jeruzaalemɨdaasɨ Anga Gaazanevɨ dalaawa!” Tuta sa' a'mwe maayaba makwalaawɨnɨkesɨra. Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pilipɨ sara yɨna.

Sara yɨna yadaasɨ, yɨthaa, Kwaaka Yɨthɨyopɨya mwaalyai a'mwe naangei gannya angewɨnna wɨna. Kwaaka Yɨthɨyopɨya a'mwe naange' Kaadeziya' maremwaaidesɨ Kwinɨya'. A'mwe sai Kaadeziya' kwinɨya savɨre nɨgwiajɨ nɨgwɨlalaakajɨ yuya sa maremwaaidelyɨ a'mwe naangei. Anga Jeruzaalemɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya'na wiakei gannya kaarɨzɨyavɨ ayɨna wɨna.
Ayɨna wɨna yada Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaakei Pɨropetɨya Aazaayai pɨkarya yɨda'nɨke' tɨnna wanganna.
Tɨnna wanganna yadaasɨ Kurya Tewaanyai Pilipɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Kaarɨzɨya savɨna wɨrata'na'gɨzɨ avaaina dɨwila!”
Wɨdɨna kya' sawɨnna Pilipɨ kaanyave'na wɨna yaka dara dɨna “Pɨropetɨya Aazaayai yɨda'nɨke' bukuya' wanganaka dɨvanɨka.” Sara dɨna yaka yɨwaara'na “A'mweigɨ, yagaala sa' dangamanɨgɨnya' jawɨ'mwaana?”

Yɨwaara'na kya' “Aawa, pwai mujɨwaainyɨ nyaja' gara yawɨrɨjɨwana?” A'mwe naangei sara wɨdaka Pilipɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Davɨna yɨlaaba'gɨzɨ nɨmɨnyaba mwaala'gɨzɨ sarevɨna dɨnyɨjɨwaakya!” Wɨdɨna kya' kaarɨzɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaina.
Gotɨyare bukuya' wanganake' dare' dɨnɨkesɨ.
Sipɨzipɨya pwarɨ tamya'na makwodɨvɨtabaaibɨ'
A'mwera tamakya'na makuna yesalyɨ.
Dɨwɨnyare arɨla wɨrɨ'deryaba jaka majadevaaibɨ'
Kayaa'na kye' sai yagaala majake'nanyɨra.
Bɨrala wɨdeva kotɨyavɨ sarɨna kwaasɨ wɨdesalyɨ.
Karame' Kwaaka davakɨ gamɨre gaalyabwi maaresa'
Gamɨreba sara yesaraavɨre kayaa'nanyabwi aai wɨ'nadelaka?
Pɨropetɨya Aazaayai sara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Dɨnɨke'na a'mwe naangei Pilipɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Pɨropetɨyai dɨnɨke' aarɨna dɨnɨkavaka? Gamɨ sahwarɨna dɨngaka? A'mwe pwarɨna dɨngaka? Dɨnyɨdana!”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pilipɨ Aazaayare yagaala savɨdaa'nyɨ nayaa wɨdaka Jizaazarɨna yuya yagaala tewaanya' nayaa wɨdɨna.
Wɨdɨna kya' tuta pɨba wɨna yadi' aalɨbunya maalɨke' dɨ'nɨkewɨnna yɨ'mavaawɨna kyagi a'mwe naangei wɨdɨna ya' “Yɨthaa, dava aalya' dɨ'nɨ'. Aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya dɨnyajɨwaana? Nɨmɨ wi'na daaka?”
Pilipɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨnnya sɨmunya yuya' Jizaazarɨna kalɨmwaga'gɨzɨ bavɨtaazɨya gyɨdeigɨnyɨ.” Wɨdɨna kya' wɨda' “Sara lɨmwamanɨge. ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨra,’ sara yawɨ'mweinyɨ.”
Wɨdɨna yaka a'mwe naangei gannya wɨdaayaderɨ wɨdɨna “Kaarɨzɨya' muda'na yana!” Wɨdɨna kya' aalyavɨ a'mwe naangelyɨ Pilipɨjɨ saraai bwalaawɨna kyagi Pilipɨ bavɨtaazɨya wina.
Bavɨtaazɨya wina kya' aalyavɨdaasɨ wɨlaabɨna kyagi Kurya Tewaanyai Pilipɨmɨ yarai galamakuna. A'mwe naangei Pilipɨmɨ tɨnna ayɨna mwanganyɨ yada yɨlaaya naanga yada gannya angewɨnna wɨna yakelyɨ.

Kurya Tewaanyai Pilipɨmɨ makuna kya' Pilipɨ dara wanganake' “O, Anga Aazɨthothɨ damwaaihena!” Daka anga yuyangɨ kaanya yamaryada yagaala tewaanya' Jizaazarɨna wɨdada kaanna wɨna yada anga Sizaarɨyana yɨ'mavaawɨna yakegaa'nanyɨ.
Sagaa' Solɨ Naangere mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨna sɨnna tɨka naanga kuna wɨda'daasɨ dɨnyɨna “Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ tamakɨma!”

Dɨnyɨna yaka Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangerɨ wɨdɨna “Anga Damaazɨkazɨ Juyainaavɨre lotuangengɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨne pɨkarya jɨthaka! ‘A'mwe Solɨ Jizaazarebwi lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨ bɨramaaraja' asangɨ wɨla pwɨyojɨ Jeruzaalemɨ davanna a'mweraavɨjɨ a'mwengɨjɨ sangɨ ayɨna makabana!’ da'gɨzɨ pɨkarya sara kanyɨdaya'gɨzɨ kotɨya'na maraawɨdeinyɨra,” sara wɨdɨna ya' Solɨ.
Anga Damaazɨkazɨ sawɨnnei tutaanyavɨ kaanya woda ange' aya kɨba mannadɨ'nyɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ baaka naange' gamɨnyabanna yarai yɨme'nya'bɨ' wannaabɨna ya'.
Yarai wannaabɨna yadaa'nyɨ kwaakewɨnna Solɨ wala'na yaka maanguraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna “Solɨ, Solɨ, kayaa'na be'na nyɨvanɨgɨna?”
“Naangeigɨ, aaihwaigɨnaka?” kyɨwaarava' wɨdɨna “Jizaazainyɨ kayaa'na nyɨvanɨgɨnyainyɨra.
Sahwainyɨ kɨrɨ' daava'gɨzɨ anga naanga davɨna kulaawa'gɨzɨ gɨmɨ yɨnnenna pwai gɨthathe'nanyɨra.”
A'mwera Solɨjɨ wawesara daaveva yagaala majara maanguraaya' kadɨka wɨ'neva kɨrɨ' pwarɨ tɨnna mwanganyesare.

Naangei mena wɨdɨna kya' kwaakevɨdaasɨ Solɨ daavaka gannya tɨnnyaraai yenaka dara yawɨrake' “We', nɨmɨ tɨbaryainyɨ daaka!” Sara daka aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' tɨnna mwanganyɨ kya' pwara gamɨre asɨrɨ lɨmwanna yeva Anga Damaazɨkazɨ sawɨnna jɨvwaramakuna.
Jɨvwaramakuna kye' saba mwaalaka yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ yada sagaa' tɨka manyɨ yada aalya manyɨ ya'.

Damaazɨkazɨ saba Jizaazare pwai Ananaayazai wo'nɨkelyɨ. Sai mwaalaka a'mabaaitɨnna baihana'na yadaasɨ Naangei wɨdɨna “Ananaayazaigɨno!” Wɨdɨna kya' sai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, yɨthaa, gɨmɨnyɨ gyemwaaihena.”
Wɨdɨna kya' Naangei wɨdɨna “Daava'gɨzɨ Aduta Yɨda'nanya' wo'nɨkevɨna wawa'gɨzɨ Juthaazare angevɨ Solɨ Anga Taazazɨ mwaalyarɨna dɨvɨramaaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨthaa, Gotɨyarɨ dada
a'mabaaitɨnna dara wangamwake' ‘Nɨmɨre tɨnnyaraarɨna “Tewaanyaraai yɨma'nana!” dozɨ a'mwei Ananaayazai wo'nɨkei wɨlaabaka gannya asɨraai nɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ dathathɨwamanɨka!’ ”

Naangei sara wɨdɨna kya' Ananaayazai wɨdɨna “Ai, Naangeigɨ, a'mwe darɨna a'mwe kwalaalyara mena nyɨdɨwaa'. Anga Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyara gɨmɨre tewaanyaraavɨ kayaa'nanya yɨna yɨna yawalyaadɨkerɨna nyɨdɨwaa'.
Sara yada Damaazɨkazɨ dawɨnna gɨmɨnyɨ yagaala gɨthadaanyainaavɨ wɨla pwɨya'na bɨwakelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera pɨkarya kalavuza'na sara yɨdaveva kujawa'daa' bɨwakelyɨra.”

Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' Naangei wɨdɨna “Sai nyɨdaayaderɨ dahɨlakɨweryawɨnna dɨwona! Sai nɨmɨnyɨne yaya' ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨjɨ a'mwe naanga Kingɨyaraavɨjɨ Yɨzɨrelɨya yɨsavaakɨyaraavɨjɨ wɨjɨwaakade'na dahɨlakɨwana.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sai nɨmɨnyɨne yaya'na naange' sara yade'na gamɨnyɨ daanga wɨvɨnaja'na wɨjɨwaainɨdelyɨra.”

Ananaayazai kaanna wɨna yaka angevɨ wɨlɨna yaka Solɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ ata dathɨwanna yaka wɨdɨna “Nya'mweigɨ, Solɨgɨ, gɨmɨnyawɨnna Naangei nyɨdasɨwaabɨkeinyɨ. Tusavɨ kaanya badɨ Jizaazai sahwarɨ tɨnna wangamwa'dɨnyai nyɨdasɨwaabɨ'. ‘Gannya tɨnnyaraai tewaanyaraai wanganna yana! Gamɨre munyɨkɨ yunebanna Kurya Tewaanyai wɨlamwaalana!’ daka nyɨdasɨwaabɨ'.”

Wɨdɨna kya' sagaa' yɨme'nya'bɨ' Solɨmɨre tɨnnyaraarɨdaasɨ jawɨpadasa'bɨsa bwala'na kya' gamɨre tɨnnyaraai tewaanyaraai yenyɨna ya'. Tewaanya yenyɨna kya' Solɨ daavɨna kya' Ananaayazai bavɨtaazɨya yɨna ya'.
Bavɨtaazɨya yɨna yaka Solɨ wapaaya nyɨna yaka gannya kɨlaaka dɨragɨnya' ayɨna maarɨna ya'.
Yɨrɨka pɨnɨngɨ wavɨla'daa'nyɨ Anga Damaazɨkazɨ mwaalyara Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraayaba Solɨ mwaalɨna.
Mwaalɨna yaka yɨme'nya'bɨ' Juyaraavɨre lotuangengɨ wɨna yaka Jizaazarɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna “Sahwai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨra.”

Wɨjɨwaakɨna kya' yuyara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva nɨ'nɨka yeva dɨnyɨna “Jeruzaalemɨ saba a'mwe dai yaya davɨna yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsaraavɨ kayaa'na yakei daaka! ‘Kumɨnyɨ wɨla pwɨya'mujɨ Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsaraayawɨnna makwɨma!’ daka dava davɨwaka? A'mwe dale!” sara dɨnyɨna ye'.

Solɨ kuna wɨjɨwaakɨna yaka dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakɨna yada Gotɨyare bukuyavɨdaasɨ dɨragɨnaanga wɨdɨna “Kɨgaakuna Jizaazarɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakei Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨra.” Dɨragɨnaanga sara wɨdɨna kya' yagaala nebulya'nanya Juyara Damaazɨkazɨ mwaalyara yagaala pɨnɨ murɨvɨkɨri ye'.
Sawɨta pɨjaakuna kwavɨlava' Juyara yɨkabɨna yeva jamungajakɨna “Solɨmɨ tamakya'na nemɨ dara yaadera.”

Mena jamungajakɨna kye' pwai Solɨmɨ sare'na wɨdɨna kya' nayaa wanganna yada mwaalɨna. Sara mwaalɨna kya' Juyara dɨnyɨna “Solɨmɨ tamakaana!” dɨnyɨna yeva sawɨsagaasɨ yɨrɨkegaasɨ adɨkuryangɨ damera tɨnna baihanarya'neraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna.

Sahwara baihana'na yɨna yadɨvɨ' sawɨta pɨgaa' Solɨmɨrera gamɨnyɨ makuna yeva amaangebaarɨ sikurɨka saamɨnyavɨ daavɨna yeva soigɨlyavɨ Solɨmɨ yɨlawɨmwaaihɨna yeva sikurɨka lo'masavɨ kavena marala'mwagaasɨna kye' Solɨ kaanna wɨna ya'.

Anga Jeruzaalemɨna Solɨ yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka yawɨ'na “Naangere mɨdɨdɨvɨsarajɨ ye'mwannamwalaana!” Yawɨ'na yaka yaamɨjɨ yɨna kya', aawano. Kumɨ “Solɨ mɨdɨdelyɨ,” yawɨ'na myeva yuyara lɨka yɨna kye' Solɨjɨ mye'mwannamwaalyɨ ye'.

Mye'mwannamwaalyɨ kye' kɨrɨ' A'mwe Baanavaazai Wɨdaasaderaayawɨnna makuna yaka wɨdɨna “Tusavɨ Solɨ Naangerɨ kwangana' Naangei gannya yagaalya' wɨda'. Sai Naangerelyɨra. Nebulyasɨra. Damaazɨkazɨ saba Solɨ Jizaazarɨ yaya'na dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakɨna. Dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakɨna yada lɨka myakelyɨ Solɨ.”
Baanavaazai wɨdɨna kya' Solɨ nayaa mwaalɨna yaka Jeruzaalemɨ yuneba kaanya yamaryada Naangere yaya'na dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakɨna.
Jizaazarɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna yada Juyara Gɨrikɨyagaala dadɨvɨsarajɨ dɨnyɨna. Dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨ' Solɨ nayaa wɨdɨna kya' Juya sahwara yawɨ'na “Solɨ kayaa'nanyabwi nedɨwakelyɨ. Sarɨ tamakaana!”
Yawɨ'na kye' gya'mwera kadɨka dara wɨ'nesa' “O, Juyara sara dathɨmanɨgava!” Deva Anga Sizaarɨya saalaalyavɨ mannɨkebanna Solɨmɨ makwalyuna yeva gamɨre anga Taazazɨna yaasɨna ye'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sagaa' Jizaazare kusɨlaanyangɨyara Juthɨya yuyabajɨ Galɨli yuyabajɨ Samerɨya yuyabajɨ saba kwaamu'na mwaalɨna ye'. Pwara kayaa'na myɨ kye' tewaanna mwaalɨna ye'. Naangerɨ nayaa wɨ'nadɨvɨ' Kurya Tewaanyai gannya dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavada sahwara dɨragɨnyara yɨma'nyɨna ye'. Tewaanna mwaalɨna yadɨvɨ' dɨragɨnyara yɨma'nadɨvɨ' a'mwe pwara kwala naangera ye'mwannamwaaina ye'.
Gazabazaba Pitai kaanya yamaryada Anga Litha mwaalesara Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨ angyɨrɨ'maata yɨna.
Saba a'mwe pwai Anɨyaazai wo'nɨkei mwaalakelyɨ. Sai yagɨnya bainɨkei nalabwaryavɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ kwarame pɨjaakuna (8) wavɨla'na yakelyɨ.

Pitai angyɨrɨ'maata yada Anɨyaazarɨ wanganaka wɨdɨna ya' “Anɨyaazaigɨ, Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazai gɨmɨnyɨ gyavada'gaimanɨka! Dɨkaava'gɨzɨ gɨnnya nalabwarya' nayaa javada'galakya?” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Anɨyaazai dɨkaa'na.
Wi'na dɨkaa'na yaka tewaanyai mwaaida Anga Litha mwaalyarajɨ Waraata Seronɨ mwaalyarajɨ yuyara gamɨnyɨ wanganeva Naangerɨ lɨmwageva gamɨrera yɨma'nyɨna ye'.
Anga Jopa saba a'mwe' Taavita' wo'nɨke' Naangerɨ mɨdɨnaka mwaalɨna. Gannya yaya' Gɨrikɨyagaala Dokaaza' dɨnɨkesɨ. A'mwe sa' tewaanyanna yada nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna wɨgaimwadesɨ.
A'mwe' mwaalɨna yaka sagaa' nabalɨnake' yɨma'naka balɨna. Mena balɨna kya' gɨlaayavɨ aalya' yeva ku'dɨke' munyabanna gɨlaaya' makilaawɨna yeva kave wakɨna.

Anga Litha sabadaasɨ Anga Jopa etabera. Maalɨkeba warɨke'na Jopa mwaalyara mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kale wiadaa'nyɨ dara wɨ'nesa' “O, Anga Litha Pitai damwaalɨka!” Sara deva a'mweraarɨ wɨdɨna “Pitarɨ duzɨla! ‘Myemwaaidɨnnera! Yarai, nemɨnyawɨnna dɨvama!’ ” Wɨdɨna yeva wɨdaasɨna.

Mi'na wɨdaasɨna kye' savɨ Pitai kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yaka yovɨrawakɨna yaka saraalyɨ kaanna wɨna. Kaanna wɨna yaka sabanna yɨ'ma'na kye' munyaba ku'dɨkevɨna jɨvwaramakuna yɨna. Jɨvwaramakuna yɨna kye' yaanyɨwaaka yuya mwaaleva kale wiadaa'nyɨ kɨnna dadɨvɨ' Dokaaza' baazɨ'ma'nyangɨjɨ kwaabɨyɨvɨsangɨjɨ sazangɨ yavɨkaryakengɨ Pitarɨ wɨjɨwaainyɨna yeva “A'mwe tewaanyasɨ,” wɨdɨna.

Sara wɨdɨna kye' ku'dɨkevɨ mwasawɨnna Pitai maryaasɨna yaka kwadaai gɨlaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaka gɨlaayayabanna gɨnyɨwanna yaka wɨdɨna “Taavita', dɨthɨkaaka!” Sara wɨdɨna kya' a'mwe' gannya tɨnnyaraai yenyɨna yaka Pitarɨ tɨnna wanganaka dɨkavamwaaina.
Wi'na dɨkavamwaaina kya' sai gamɨre asa' maarɨna yaka yɨdɨkaa'na yaka yaanyɨwaakengɨjɨ Naangere tewaanyaraavɨjɨ jaka wɨdɨna yaka a'mwe' kwaihwaainakevɨ wɨjɨwaainyɨna.
Savɨna Jopa yuneba yagaala dɨwɨna yadɨvɨ' a'mwe kwala naangera Naangerɨ lɨmwanna yesarera.
Pitai mena yaka Anga Jopa saba a'mwe pwai Saaimonɨmɨre angevɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨ yɨrɨka pɨjaakuna wavɨla'na ya'. Saaimonɨ sai bulɨmakaawoyangɨre kɨlaake yadelyɨra.
Anga Sizaarɨya a'mwe pwai Konilɨyaazai mwaalɨna. Sai aawɨlata maremwaaidei Romɨya aawɨlatara Yɨtaali aamiyaraavɨ maremwaaidelyɨ Romɨyai.
Sai Gotɨyarɨna nayaa yawɨ'na, nabaai gamɨjɨ gamɨre angevɨ mwaaidɨvɨsajɨ Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsangɨra. Juyara nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨ yanga wɨjaavadelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadelyɨ.
Konilɨyaazai sai mwaalɨna yada pɨgaa' tɨri kɨlokɨyagaa' a'mabaaitɨnna wanganna yada Gotɨyare mamaayai bwina yaka wɨdɨna “Konilɨyaazaigɨ!” Wɨdɨna yake' tɨnna wanganna.

A'mabaaitɨnna wanganna yada mamaayarɨ baihana'na yada lɨka yada wɨdɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ, baa'na bahɨneka?” Wɨdɨna kya' mamaayai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadɨnya' Gotɨyai kadɨka gu'nɨwa'. Nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨ wɨjaavadɨnya' tɨnna gwangamwa'. Sare'na Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨna gyawɨ'deigɨnyɨ.
Dahaa' Anga Jopa sawɨnna a'mweraavɨ a'mwe pwai Saaimonɨ Pitai wo'nɨkerɨna duthaasa!
Sai saalaalyayaba pware angevɨ angyɨrɨ'maata yɨvanɨ'. A'mwe pwai Saaimonɨ gɨryawo'nyai bulɨmakaawoyangɨre kɨlaakengɨ yavɨkaryadei. Yɨ sare angevɨ mwaalɨ'.”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka mamaayai wɨna kya' Konilɨyaazai gannya angevɨ wɨdaayadisaraarɨjɨ aawɨlata pwarɨjɨ jaka wɨdɨna. Aawɨlata sai Konilɨyaazaryaba mwaaida Gotɨyarɨ yawɨ'dei.
Jaka wɨdɨna yaka kumɨnyɨ yuya yɨma'nake' wɨdaka Anga Jopana a'mwe saraavɨ wɨdaasɨna ya'.
Yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ tusavɨ kaanna wɨna yadɨvɨ' Anga Jopa aya kɨbanna yɨ'ma'na yadaapɨjɨ Pitai yawɨ'na “Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨma!” Daka sɨrɨgwajahaa' anga munyawɨ kwavɨta waraasavɨ yɨlamwaaina.
Yɨlamwaaina kya' sagaa' Pitarɨ mɨjɨka wiadaasɨ wapaaya yovɨra'na yadaapɨjɨ tɨka munnenna yawɨ'da a'mabaalyavɨ tɨnna wanganna.
Tɨnna wanganna yada Sɨgunya' basɨnadaa'na yadaa'nyɨ kwaabɨyɨvɨta dɨvanɨgɨnya'bɨsajɨkɨ makwalaabɨna. Kwaakewɨ Pitaryawɨ mamaayara kwaabɨyɨvɨsa'bɨ' kwaraka dawaai dawaalyangɨ lɨmwageva makwalaabɨna.
Mena makwalaabɨna kye' Pitai dara wanganake' “Ai, yɨkurɨyaawia ge gejɨ malakayaawarya ge gejɨ kamaala ge gejɨ yuta ge gejɨ daminarɨka!”
Sara kada' maanguraaya' wɨdɨna “Pitai, daava'gɨzɨ sa dɨramanana!”
Wɨdɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Pitai wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨ, arɨkewɨnyɨra. Juyainaavɨre kɨwɨnya' dɨnɨke' ‘Kɨmaakengɨ manɨnnera!’ Sara dɨnɨke'na gɨrɨka kɨnɨnnaka aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' manyɨ yadɨnyainyɨra.”
Sagaa' pɨgasaai maanguraaya' wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai ‘Sa tewaanyangɨra,’ dɨnɨkengɨna gɨmɨ ‘Sa gɨrɨkita'nanyangɨra,’ madɨnnera!”
Tɨnna wangadaa'nyɨ dahasaai dahaa' kwaabɨyɨvɨsa'bɨ' makwalaabɨna yeva yagaala mena wɨdakegaa' munyaba Sɨgunyavɨna ayɨna makɨlaawɨna ye'.

Pitai yawɨ'na “A'mabaaitɨnna sa' wangamwe' berɨvɨ wangamwana?” Yawɨ'na yaka sɨmunya ayahi ayahi yawɨ'na yadaa'nyɨ Konilɨyaazai wɨdaasakeraavɨ Saaimonɨmɨre angevɨna jɨvwarɨdaakuna yesara tɨkuryaba daavɨna.
Tɨkuryaba daavɨna yeva jaka wɨdɨna “Angyɨrɨ'maasa'nei Saaimonɨ Pitai damwaalɨka?”
Jaka wɨdɨna yadaapɨjɨ Pitai kuna yawɨ'na “Berɨvɨ wangamwana?” yawɨ'na yadaa'nyɨ Kuryai wɨdɨna “Kadɨka dɨnyu'nana! Dava gwangabɨ'de'na a'mwe daraai dalyara mwaaihava.
Daava'gɨzɨ walaawa'gɨzɨ lɨka myadɨ nɨmɨ wɨdasɨwaabe'na kumɨjɨ dɨwodeigɨnyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' Pitai walaawɨna yaka a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “A'mwerɨna jaka wɨdɨvanɨgasai nɨmɨnyɨra. Be'na bɨwaataihɨlaka?”

Wɨdɨna kya' sahwara wɨdɨna “Aawɨlata maremwaaidei Konilɨyaazai nedasɨwaabɨkeinera. Sai a'mwe tewaanyai Gotɨyarɨna yɨlaaya yadelyɨ. Anga naangengɨya Juya yuyara dara jalɨkurakadɨvɨkɨ ‘A'mwe tewaanyalyɨ.’ Gotɨyare ejelɨya tewaanya pwai wɨdɨna ‘Pitai yagaala gɨthathe'na gɨnnya angevɨna wɨlaabathe'na Pitarɨna duthaasa!’ Wɨdɨna yɨwa'dɨkerɨna bɨwoinera.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Pitai wɨdɨna “Dava se wa'mwaraana!” Wɨdɨna kya' se wa'mwa'na ye'.
Mwanyavɨ yovɨrawakɨna yɨna yaka kumɨjɨ wɨna ya'. Nabaai Jopa mwaalyara Naangere pwara gamɨjɨ kaanna wɨna.
Kaanna kaanna wɨna yaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ Anga Sizaarɨyana yɨ'mavaawɨna. Konilɨyaazai gamɨreraavɨjɨ gya'mwe pwaraavɨjɨ jaka wɨjɨvwaramaa'na kya' gamɨre angevɨ yuyara Pitarɨna yemwaaina.
Yemwaaina yadaapɨjɨ Pitai yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka yawɨ'na “Angevɨ wɨlaawɨma!” Yawɨ'na kya' Konilɨyaazai wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yaka “Naangelyɨra,” yawɨ'na yaka gamɨre sɨvɨlyaraaryaba walaraka kwadaai gɨlɨna.
Kwadaai gɨlɨna kya' kɨrɨ' Pitai gamɨnyɨ yɨrɨ'bwa'na yaka wɨdɨna “Aawa, sarebwi minna! Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ a'mwe gaveinyɨra.”
Wɨdɨna yaka angevɨ wɨlɨna yaka Konilɨyaazarɨ kuna wɨdaka dara wanganake' “O, a'mwe kwalaalya damwaaihava!”

Sara daka wɨdɨna “Juyainyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Menyaihɨlyɨra. Sahwaihi nayaa dara yawɨ'mwaava ‘Juyaraavɨrebwi dɨnyɨna “Menyaraavɨ angyɨrɨ'maata minnera! Sahwaraayaba tɨka munne manɨnnera!” ’ Dɨnɨke'na kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai dara nyɨjɨwaainɨwa'dɨ' ‘Menyara Juyaraavɨrebwi myadɨvɨsaraavɨna “Gerera!” madɨnna! A'mwe yuyara kumɨ avaalyarera.’
Sara kanyɨjɨwaainɨwa'dɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna kudasɨwa'daavadɨ yarai bɨweinyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yarai bena yɨwaara'manɨge. Nɨmɨnyɨna be'na wɨdasɨwa'daavadɨna?”

Konilɨyaazai wɨdɨna “Mwa'nɨga tɨri kɨlokɨyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨjahaa' dahaa'bɨsagaa' nɨnnya angevɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨwa'de. Wɨdadaazɨ, yɨthaa, a'mwei baazɨ'ma'nya wɨvɨtɨratabɨsa' baazɨ'ma'nɨkei nɨmɨnyaba daavaka
nyɨdɨwa'dɨ' ‘Konilɨyaazaigɨ, gɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadɨnya' Gotɨyai kadɨka gu'nɨwaka. Nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna yanga wɨjaavadɨnya' mena gyawɨ'deigɨnyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Anga Jopana a'mwe pwai Saaimonɨ Pitai wo'nɨkerɨna duthaasa! Saalaalya maangebaarɨ Saaimonɨ pwai bulɨmakaawoyangɨre kɨlaaka yavɨkaryadere angevɨ angyɨrɨ'maata mwalaawaka sai.’
Sara wɨdɨna kanyɨwa'dɨ' yarai wɨdasɨwa'daavade'na gɨmɨ bɨwaa. Tewaanyasɨ. Kaimala! Su! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dava nemɨnyaba Gotɨyai mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Naangei gɨthɨwaka yagaalya' kadɨka gu'naade'na yemwaaimanɨgo.”
Pitai yarai wɨdɨna “Mena nayaa yawɨ'mwa. Gotɨyai yuyaraavɨ avaaina wiadelyɨ Juyaraavɨjɨ pwaraavɨjɨ. Nebulyasɨ.
Gotɨyai ajɨmya yuyangɨya gazavasavakɨyarɨ nayaa yawɨ'delyɨra. A'mwe sai Gotɨyarɨna ‘Tewaanyalyɨ. Naangelyɨ,’ dada yɨda'maraangebwi yade'na Gotɨyai maarɨna yɨvanɨkelyɨ.

Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨ nedasaabaka yagaalya yawɨ'mwaava. Yagaala tewaanya sa' dɨnɨ' ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai tewaanna yaka Gotɨyarɨnajɨ a'mweraavɨnajɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi waka'.’ Sahwai a'mwe yuyaraavɨre Naangelyɨra.
Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei wɨdakegaa'daasɨ Kwaaka Galɨlidaasɨ Kwaaka Juthɨya yunebanne yagaala sa' dɨnesa'na yawɨ'mwaava.

Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyarɨna yawɨ'mwaava. Gamɨnyɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka Kurya Tewaanyarɨjɨ gannya dɨragɨnyavɨjɨ wɨjaava'. Wɨjaavaka gamɨjɨ Gotɨyai mwaalake'na gazabazaba sahwai tewaanna yada Kayaa'nanyai Saataanɨ kayaa'na wiadera tewaanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaiha'.
Sara yada Kwaaka Juthɨya Anga Jeruzaalemɨ yuya Jizaazai yake tɨnna wanganona yuyaraavɨ wɨjalɨkurakadaanyaine. Yɨsavɨri nilɨya wɨrameva karamake' balɨna.
Mena balɨna kya' kɨrɨ' yɨrɨka daryaai darɨkɨ Gotɨyai baryarɨ yɨdɨkaavaka gamɨreinaayaba wɨjɨwaaina'.
Yuyara gamɨnyɨ mwanganyɨ ye'. Aawa. Gotɨyai nedahɨlakakeina wɨjalɨkurakya'ne gaveinaavɨ nejɨwaaina'. Bainɨkeraayawɨ Naangei kadɨkaava' gamɨjɨ aalya nona gamɨjɨ wapaaya noinera.

Dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna neya' ‘Nɨmɨre yagaala tewaanya' a'mweraavɨ duzɨla! Dara nebwina duzalɨkurakyɨla! “Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ dahɨlaka'. A'mwera mwaaihasaraavɨnajɨ a'mwera mena bainɨkeraavɨnajɨ kotɨya' yawɨbwarya'nerɨ wɨmwaaiha' Gotɨyai.” ’ Sara neda'.

Nabaai, Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasara gamɨnyɨna jalɨkurakɨnɨkelyɨ. Sahwarɨna dara yɨda'nɨkesɨ. Gazaizai sahwarɨ ku'nojɨ Gotɨyai gamɨre kayaa'nanyangɨ marasɨ'nadelyɨ. Sahwarɨne yayavɨna marasɨ'nya'nebwi maaradelyɨra.”
Pitai kuna wɨdadaasɨ Kurya Tewaanyai yuyara yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nesaraavɨ walaabɨna yaka kumɨre munyɨkaavɨ wɨlamwaaina.
Wi'na wɨlamwaaina kya' Anga Jopadaasara Juyara Jizaazarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsara dara wanganesa' “O, Gotɨyai gannya Kurya Tewaanyarɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨna yanga mena duzaawaka!” Sara deva nɨ'nɨka yɨna ye'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Menyara yagaala ge ge wɨdeva Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yadɨvɨ' wɨdɨna “Gotɨyai dɨragɨnaangelyɨ.” Wɨdɨna kye' nɨ'nɨka yɨna ye'.
Nɨ'nɨka yɨna kye' Pitai wɨdɨna “Kurya Tewaanyai nemɨnyɨ wɨlanemwaalakabaaibɨ' dahwaraavɨ Kuryai wɨlamwaaimwa'. Sare'na pwara ‘Aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya myaannera!’ dɨnɨpɨnera daaka!
Aawa, kumɨnyɨ Jizaazarɨ yaya'na bavɨtaazɨya jɨla!” Wɨdɨna kya' sara kye' sahwara Pitarɨ wɨdɨna “Yɨrɨka pɨnɨjɨ nemɨnyaba angyɨrɨ'maata ja!” Menyara sara wɨdɨna kye' saba angyɨrɨ'maata ya'.
Wɨdaasaderajɨ kuya'mwera Kwaaka Juthɨya yuneba mwaalyarajɨ dara wɨ'nesa' “Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Gotɨyare yagaala wɨ'neva dalɨmwagakava!”
Mi'na kade' Jeruzaalemɨna Pitai yɨlaawɨna kya' kɨlaakevɨ da'dɨvɨsara Juyaraavɨrebwi dɨragɨnna yadɨvɨsara maanga wɨde'
“A'mwera kɨlaakevɨ madayadɨvɨsaraavɨ angyɨrɨ'maata yɨwa'dɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Nabaai, sahwarajɨ wapaaya nɨwa'daasaigɨnyɨ. Be'na yɨwaana!”
Sara kude' Pitai aayawɨdaasɨ sara yake' sara wɨjɨwaaka'.

Dara wɨjɨwaaka' “Anga Jopa mwaalena Gotɨyarɨ wɨdena a'mabaaitɨnna wanganyawalyaade. Yɨ daresɨ. Gotɨyareba mwaalyara kwaabɨyɨvɨta naangevakɨ dawaai dawaalyangɨ lɨmwageva Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨnyabanna makwalaabɨna yawalyaadaasa' wanganyawalyaade.
Makwalaabɨna kyawalyaadaa' kwaabɨyɨvɨta kusawɨ malakayaawaryarajɨ yɨkurɨyaawiarajɨ kamaalyarajɨ yuta yɨhusavɨnerajɨ gera gerajɨ wɨlamwaaidapi nayaa yɨwaryawalyaade.
Mena wanganena maanguraaya' wɨ'nyawalyaade. Pitai, dɨthaaka! Saraavɨ tama'gɨzɨ yarai dɨnana!
Sara wɨ'nena wɨdɨna ‘Naangeigɨ, arɨkawɨnyɨra. Mɨwɨta kɨmaaka aane pɨrɨ' gɨrɨkita'nanya aane kɨrɨ' manyadɨnyainyɨ.’
Wɨdɨna kyawalyaade Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ maanguraaya sa' ja'nanyɨjawalyaadɨ' ‘Yuya Gotɨyai tewaanya wakɨwake “Kayaa'nanyangɨra,” madɨnnera!’
Kanyɨjawalyaadɨ' pɨgasaai pɨgaa' sara kadɨnyawalyaadoi Sɨgunyavɨ ayɨna makɨlaawɨna yawalyaadaasa' wanganyawalyaade.
Tɨnna wangadaazɨ yɨthaanyi, nɨmɨnyawɨnna a'mwe daraai dalyaraavɨ Sizaarɨya mwaalyai wɨdasawalyaadɨkera angevɨ wɨlamwalyawalyaadevɨna yɨ'mayawalyaadaa'.

Gotɨyare Kuryai nyɨjawalyaadɨ' ‘Sɨmunya myawɨ'dɨnnera! Sarajɨ dɨwona!’ Mi'na kanyɨjawalyaadɨ' Anga Jopana neya'mwera a'mwe atina ata purɨdaasɨ pwalyara mwaaihasarajɨ wiawalyaade. Kaanna kaanna kaanna a'mwe sare angevɨ wɨlɨna yɨwa'do.

Wɨlɨna kyɨwa'do sahwai nedɨwa'dɨ' ‘Nɨmɨ dara wangamwa'de' “Ai, nɨmɨre angevɨ Gotɨyare mamaayai davuladaavɨka!” Kadɨwa'de ejelɨyai nyɨdɨwa'dɨ' “Anga Jopana duthaasa! ‘Saaimonɨ Pitai wo'nɨkerɨna yarai dɨmaaryɨla!’
Davanna bozɨ yɨhɨthathera. Yagaala sa' Gotɨyai gɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨjɨyarajɨ saihɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nojɨ yɨhɨvadaihasamaaradeihɨlyɨra,” nyɨdɨwa'dɨ' ejelɨyai,’ a'mwe sai sara nyɨdɨwa'dɨ'.
Nɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaala gaai wɨdadaari Kurya Tewaanyai walaabaka kumɨre munyɨkaavɨ bulamwaaimwa'dɨ' sɨnnawɨ nemɨre munyɨkaavɨ bulanemwaalakabaaibɨ'.

Sara wanganena dara yawɨ'mwa'de ‘Naangei Jizaazai neda' “Jonɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yake' kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ munyɨkaavɨ yunebanna Gotɨyare Kuryai wɨlayɨhɨmwaaladeihɨlyɨra.” ’ Naangei sara nedake' sara yawɨ'mwa'de.

Sɨnnawɨ Naangei Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwagohaa' Gotɨyai gannya Kuryarɨ nejaavakabaai sara Menyaraavɨ avaainanya' wɨjaawa'dɨ'. Sa'na yawɨ'na ‘Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨ be'na tihɨ'muneinyaka! Aawa. A'mweinyɨra.’ Sara yawɨrena kaanya' marihɨrye,” wɨda'.

Sahwara Pitarɨ sara wɨ'neva “Yagaala wikɨra,” deva maanga aaya' wɨdesa' majara Gotɨyarɨ byaannyabwina yɨleyagaala wɨdeva dɨna “Nebulya', Gotɨyai ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨna kale wiwaka. Kumɨre sɨmunyabwi mudɨkeburɨ kyawɨramaarapɨri Gotɨyai gaalyaburɨ tewaanna wɨmwaaihɨna yaderera. Tewaanna wɨmwaaihɨna neyadevaaibɨ' sahwaraavɨ tewaanna yaderera.”

Sɨtivenɨmɨ tamakesagaa' Jizaazare yagaala wɨ'nadɨvɨsaraavɨ kayaa'na yadɨvɨ' pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna yɨwɨnama'na. Pɨwɨnna pɨwɨnna yɨwɨnama'na yadɨvɨ' pwara Kwaaka Pɨnɨzɨya menyabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna, pwara Ahu'manna Saaipɨraazɨ menyabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna, pwara Angeba Aadɨyokɨ menyabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yeva Juya gaveraavɨ Gotɨyare yagaala wɨdeva a'mwe kwara pwaraavɨ mujɨna.
Sara mujɨ kye' pwara Saaipɨraazɨ mwaalyarajɨ Saairini mwaalyarajɨ sara Aadɨyokɨna waweva Menyaraavɨjɨ yagaala tewaanya' Naanga Jizaazarɨna wɨjɨwaake'.
Sara wɨjɨwakadaapɨjɨ Naangei gannya dɨragɨnya' kujaava' a'mwe kwalaalyara a'mwe kwalaalya sahwarɨ lɨmwanna, gamɨnyɨ gɨnyɨma'nyɨna, mɨdɨnna ye'.
Jeruzaalemɨ Jizaazare kusɨlaanyavɨyara kadɨka dara wɨ'nesa' “Ai, Menyara Jizaazarɨ wɨ'nadɨvɨsara daaka!” Sara deva Aadɨyokɨna Baanavaazarɨ wɨdaasɨna ye'.

Wɨdaasɨna kye' Baanavaazai Aadɨyokɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka dara wanganake' “Su! Su! Gotɨyai a'mwe tewaanyaraavɨ damwaaihɨvanɨka!” Sara daka yɨlaaya ya'. Yɨlaaya yaka yɨvaimwange'na wɨda' “Gotɨyare yagaalya' nayaa jawɨka! Gamɨrebwi nayaa dɨlɨmwana! Yuyagaa' Naangeryawɨ dɨmwaala!”
Sara wɨdakei a'mwe tewaanyalyɨ. Gotɨyare Kuryai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna wɨlamwaalakelyɨ. Naangerɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadei wɨjɨwaakada a'mwe kwala naangera Naangerɨ mɨdɨne'.
Sagaa' “Solɨmɨ bɨramaarɨma!” daka Baanavaazai Angeba Taazazɨna wɨna ya'.

Mi'na wɨna yaka bɨramaa'na yaka Aadɨyokɨna ayahi makabɨna ya'. Makabɨna kya' kwarame pɨrɨ' kwavɨlava' saraai kusɨlaanyavɨyarajɨ mwaalagɨla a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi. Wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaakɨlyɨ Aadɨyokɨ saba pwara Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyarera,” gaai wɨdɨna ye'. Dɨvidaasɨ pwara nemɨnyɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyarera,” dadɨvɨkɨ.
Yɨrɨka sarɨkaavɨ Aadɨyokɨ sawɨnna Jeruzaalemɨdaasara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsara bɨna ye'.

Wi'na bɨna kye' pwai Aahavaazai wo'nɨkei daavɨna yaka Gotɨyare Kuryai dɨragɨnya wɨjaavakei wɨda' “Dɨvi Kwaaka yuyavakɨ mɨjɨka naange' yɨma'nadesɨra.” Sara wɨdake' dɨvi A'mwe Kɨlothɨyaazai Romɨyaraavɨ maremwaalakegaa' mɨjɨka yɨma'nyɨna yakesɨ.

Mɨdɨdɨvɨsara Aadɨyokɨ mwaalyara yagaala sa' wɨ'neva dɨnyɨna ye' “Nemɨreba wikɨra. Pwaraavɨ wɨgaimwagaana! Kwaaka Juthɨya mwaalyara neya'mwera mɨjɨka nuyadɨka! Nemɨ gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakeina nɨgwia naanga wɨjavaana! Gɨlyɨvɨta maalɨkajɨyaina nɨgwia maalɨka wɨjavaana!”
Sara dɨnyɨna yeva nɨgwia wakɨna yeva Baanavaazalyɨ Solɨjɨ saraarɨ wɨde' “Nɨgwia da mɨjɨke'na Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨre naangeraayawɨnna dɨmakwila Jeruzaalemɨna!” wɨde'.
Sagaa' Kingɨya Erotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨya pwaraavɨ kayaa'na yɨna ya'.
Erotɨyai gannya aawɨlasaraavɨ wɨdaasɨna kya' Jemɨzai Jonɨmɨ gya'mwerɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnyasɨ dawakɨna ye'.
Erotɨyai sara yaka dara wanganake' “Ai, savɨne' Juyara yɨlaaya jɨvanɨga'!”

Sara daka nabaai Munne Gɨrɨkula lɨwɨnya pamidakɨna myadehaa' Pitarɨ wɨla pwɨyɨna ya'. Mi'na pwɨyɨna yaka kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yaka dameraavɨ wɨda' “Lɨka nawodɨka! Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe daraai daraalyaihi dɨvaihanaryɨla! Dɨvi daraai daraalyaihi dɨvaihanaryɨla! Dɨvi pwaihi sara jɨla! Dɨvi pwaihi sara jɨla! Yuyagaa' sana sana jideihɨlyɨra.” Erotɨyai dara yawɨra' “Pari'ma'munne' mena kyawaajɨ balya'na Juyaraayaba wɨmwaaihɨma Pitarɨ!”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kalavuzangevɨ Pitai mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyara Gotɨyarɨ yagaala dɨragɨnna wɨde' Pitarɨna.

Munne aaya' yɨma'nadaa'nyɨ Erotɨyai yawɨ'na “Mwanyagaa' Pitarɨ kotɨya' yɨdera.” Sara yawɨ'na kya' sagaa' sawɨsavɨ Pitarɨ senɨyabaraalyɨ wɨla pwɨyɨna yagɨla se warɨna yadɨsɨ dameraai kwaryaba mwaalɨna. Kwaryaba mwaalɨna yadakɨlyɨ kalavuzangevɨre kaanyavɨ dame pwaraai daavɨna yagi.

Daavɨna kyagi, yɨthaa, angevɨ Naangere mamaayai buladaa'na yakegaa' baake' wannyɨna ya'. Wannyɨna kya' ejelɨyai “Dɨkaavana!” daka Pitare egwevɨ tamɨna yaka wɨda' “Yarai, dɨthɨkaaka!” Sara kuda' senɨyabaraai Pitare asɨraarɨdaasɨ bwalaraawɨna ya'.
Bwalaraawɨna kya' mamaayai wɨda' “Munnaanya' padathɨvaina'gɨzɨ kwaabɨzɨvɨla dɨvaazɨ'makuna!” Sara kuda' Pitai sara yɨna kya' wɨda' “Gɨnnya yɨvɨsa' marabwaaya'gɨzɨ dɨnyɨmɨdɨnaama!”
Kuda' kalavuzangevɨdaasɨ Pitai mɨdɨnaabɨna ya'. Mɨdɨnaabɨna yakegaa' Pitai dɨna ya' “Nebwina mɨka. Mamaayai yɨvanɨke'na waja ya'nɨvanɨge.”

Sara dadaa'nyɨ kalavuzɨkurɨta gavinyawaarɨ wavɨla'na yagɨla kwaari'makaanyavɨna yɨ'ma'na kyagi kaanya' gamɨ sa' kabaasɨna' mwasawɨnna walyuna yagi. Mwasawɨnna walyuna yagɨla tuta pɨrɨvɨ wodisagaa' yɨthaa, mamaayai Pitaryawɨdaa'nyɨ yɨmaanyɨna ya'.
