Sagaa' Pitai yawɨraka dɨna “Nebulya'nanyasɨra. Naangei gannya ejelɨyarɨ kudasɨwaabɨ' Erotɨyare kalavuzangevɨdaa'nyɨ nyɨmaa'mwaka. Juyarajɨ Erotɨyalyɨ saraavɨre kayaa'nanya' nɨmɨnyɨna myɨma'nyɨ yadesɨ.”
Nayaa yawɨ'na yakegaa' Maakɨyai Jonɨmɨre ganaange' Maarɨyaavɨre angewɨnna wɨna ya'. Anga savɨ a'mwe kwalaalya mwaaleva Pitarɨna Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdesangɨra.
Pitai wɨna yaka kaanyavɨ mala tamɨna kya' wɨdaayade' Rotha' wo'nɨke' wɨ'naka “Kaanya baasɨma!” daka walyuna ya'.
Mi'na walyuna yaka Pitare maanguraaya' wɨ'naka yɨlaaya naanga yɨna yaka navɨka yada kaanya' mabaasɨ yaka ayɨna kaanyave'na wɨlaabɨna yaka wɨda' “Mwasawɨ Pitai daavɨka.”
Pwara wɨde' “Gɨmɨre sɨmunya kayaa'nanaangesɨra,” Taaya' wɨda' “A'a. Nebulya'na mena bɨwaka.” Pwara wɨde' “Pitai mamwaalyɨ'. Gamɨre ejelɨyai mwaalɨ'.”
Dɨdaapi Pitai kaanyavɨ mala kuna tamɨna ya'. Tadaa'nyɨ kaanyavɨ baasɨna yeva Pitarɨ wanganeva atɨka maru'na'na ye'.

Atɨka maru'na'na kye' Pitai daka “Kadɨka nyu'nɨpɨka!” gannya asa' bamakilaawɨna kya' yagaala mi'na kude' Pitai wɨjɨwaakɨna “Naangei kalavuzangevɨ nyɨmaa'mwa'.” Sana sana wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna yaka wɨda' “Yagaala da' Jemɨzarɨjɨ neya'mwe pwaraavɨjɨ duzɨla!” Mi'na wɨdaka mwasawɨ walyuna yaka pɨwɨnna wɨna ya'.
Mwanyagaa' nyɨla bilyɨrɨ'daa'nyɨ damera dara wanganesa' “Akai, Pitai mamwaalyɨjɨka!” Sara deva lɨka yeva atɨka maru'na'na yeva dɨnyɨna ye' “Pitai gawɨ mwaalɨka?”

Sara dɨnyɨna kye' Erotɨyai wɨda' “Yarai dɨvɨramaarila!” Wi'na kuda' bɨrɨna bɨrɨna yeva aawa. Mamaari kye' Erotɨyai dameraavɨ kotɨya' yaka saraavɨna wɨda' “Kayaa'na yɨwaasara baibɨ'derera.” Sara kuda' yuyaraavɨ tamakɨna ye'.
Sagaa' Erotɨyai Kwaaka Juthɨya ya'ma'na yaka Anga Sizaarɨyana walaawɨna yaka mwaalɨna ya'.

Anga Taayaa mwaalyaraavɨnajɨ Saaithonɨ mwaalyaraavɨnajɨ pɨbwina Erotɨyare sɨnna tɨka naanga wɨda'daa'nyɨ sahwara dɨnyɨna ye' “Nemɨnyɨna Erotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'manɨke'na gamɨrebadaasa tɨka wapaaya gara mubaatheinaavaka? Erotɨyaryawɨnna wawaajɨ narya' wakaana!” Dɨnyɨna yeva kaanna waweva a'mwe Bɨlaazɨtazai Erotɨyare angevɨ maremwaaiderɨ wɨdɨna kye' Bɨlaazɨtazai ye'mwanna ya'. Ye'mwanna kya' yuyara Erotɨyaryawɨnna wɨna yeva wɨde'. Kude' Erotɨyai wɨdɨna ya' “Pɨgaa' yɨnagaavaihagaa' yɨhɨthɨdeinyɨ.”
Sagaa' Erotɨyai wɨdakegaa' kyɨma'na' kingɨyaraavɨre baazɨ'ma'nya nawɨ'nyasɨ yɨvɨta nawɨ'nyasɨ bwaayaka namwaalyɨta tewaanyavɨ walamwaalaka a'mweraavɨ kɨwɨnya naanga wɨdɨna ya'.
Mi'na wɨdɨna kya' a'mwera jaka wɨde' “Nedɨvanɨkei a'mwei mɨka! Gotɨya pwalyɨra.”

Sara jaka kude' jaahwasa'bɨ' Erotɨyai yɨlaaya yaka yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyaibɨsainyɨ,” yawɨ'na ya'. “Sabwi mipɨnera! A'mweihi Gotɨyai gaverɨ byaannakerɨ yɨlaaya dumaryɨla!” sara majarɨna Naangere mamaayai yarai walaabɨna yaka Erotɨyarɨ tamɨna ya'. Tamɨna kya' gumɨlɨkera Erotɨyare kɨlaakejɨkɨ nyɨna kye' Erotɨyai balɨna ya'.
Kɨrɨ' Naangere yagaala pɨwɨnna pɨwnna kujɨwaake' a'mwe kwalaalyarajɨ a'mwe kwalaalyajɨ sahwarɨ lɨmwanna ye'.
Baanavaazalyɨ Solɨjɨ saraai nɨgwia mena wɨjaavagɨla Jeruzaalemɨdaasɨ Maakɨyai Jonɨmɨ ayɨna makabɨna yagi Anga Aadɨyokɨna.

Aadɨyokɨ mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨya pwara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsara. Pwara Gotɨyare yagaala wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsarera. Sahwara pwai Baanavaazai, pwai Sɨmɨyonɨ Dɨkwaagɨlyai, pwai Luzɨyaazai Anga Saairini mwaalyai, pwai Maanayanɨ maalɨkelyɨyagaa' Naanga Erotɨyalyɨ mwaalagɨlyai, pwai Solɨ.

Sahwara kamwaale' Kɨraazɨtɨyarera yɨkabeva wapaaya manyara Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadaapɨjɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai wɨda' “ ‘Wawɨnya mudɨke' saraai yɨka!’ dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨnyɨne Baanavaazalyɨ Solɨjɨ saraarɨ kadahɨlakapɨjɨ yɨkaderaalyɨ.”
Sara kuda' wapaaya kuna manyeva Gotɨyarɨ wɨdeva “Sahwaraai yɨkadesɨra,” deva saraare mɨnyagɨnyawaarɨ ata dathɨwanna yeva wɨdaasɨna ye'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai wɨdaasɨna kya' Baanavaazalyɨ Solɨjɨ saraai Anga Seluzɨyana kaanna walyuna yagɨla sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kyagi Ahu'manna Saaipɨraazɨna sɨpɨya' makuna ya'.
Makuna kya' Anga Saalamɨzɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yagɨla Juyaraavɨre lotuangengɨ Gotɨyare yagaala wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi. Saraare wɨdaayadei Maakɨyai Jonɨ wɨgaimwagakelyɨ saraalyɨ kaanya yamarye'.

Ahu'manna savɨ yuneba wɨjalotaveva Anga Paipozɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna ye'. Saba Juyai mwaalɨna. Baajizaazai wo'nɨkei mwaalɨna yakelyɨ. A'mwe sai gɨri'nyajɨ kwalyajɨ yunebanna lɨmwagarɨkelyɨra. “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'na'mujɨ yagaala tewaanna yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨnyainyɨ,” kwaasɨ dadei mwaalɨna yakelyɨra.

Ahu'manna savɨ maremwaaidei Ga'maanɨyaryaba Baajizaazai mwaalɨna. Maremwaaidei Sezɨyaazai Polaazai wo'nɨkei sɨdu'nakelyɨra. Sɨdu'nakei “Gotɨyare yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nɨma!” daka Baanavaazalyɨ Solɨjɨ saraarɨna wɨdasaabɨna ya'.
Wɨdasaabɨna kya' saraai wɨlamwaaina kyagi Kulakei Baajizaazai saraarɨ bɨrala yɨna yaka a'mwe naangerɨ wɨda' “Jizaazareburɨne yagaalya' mu'nɨnna!” Kulaka sai Gɨrikɨyagaala yaya' Elimaazai wo'nɨkelyɨ.

Gɨrikɨyagaala Solɨmɨna yaya' Polɨ wo'nɨkelyɨ. Elimaazai kayaa'na kuda' Kurya Tewaanyai Polɨmɨ yunebanna wɨlamwaaida gannya dɨragɨnyasɨ yawɨta tewaanyasɨ sahwarɨ wɨjaavɨna kya' Polɨ kulakerɨ baihana'na yaka

wɨda' “Kotɨya Maryadere kaimɨraayaigɨ, yuya yɨda'maraangebwina yɨkamaangeigɨnyɨ. Kwaasɨ yagaalyasɨ kayaa'nanaangebulyɨ sazangɨ gyakwalaangeigɨnyɨ. ‘Naangere yagaala tewaanyavɨna kwaasɨ yagaala yɨma'nana!’ dadɨ kayaa'nanyabwina mamarasɨ'nyɨ be'na jɨtheigɨnaka?

Yɨthaa, dahaasagaa' Gotɨyare asa' dɨragɨnna gɨramana! Tɨbɨnyaigɨ yɨma'na'gɨzɨ nyɨlyarɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Dɨvidaasɨ dangadeigɨnyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' Elimaazare tɨnnyaraarɨ yɨraayasɨ jɨhɨnyasɨ jaahwasa'bɨ' bwalaraawɨna kya' tɨnna mwanganyɨ ya'. Tɨnna mwanganyɨ yaka “Pwai nɨmɨre asɨrɨ nyɨlɨmwagozɨ nyɨbwaramakwona!” daka kaanna kaanna yamarina ya'.
Kaanna kaanna yamaryɨna yadaa'nyɨ maremwaaidei dɨragɨnya' tɨnna wanganna yaka Polɨ Naangere yagaala wɨjɨwaakake'na nɨ'nɨka yaka Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwanna ya'.

Polɨjɨ gamɨjɨyaraalyɨ Anga Paipozɨ ya'ma'na yeva sɨpɨyavɨ kaanna waweva kwaaka pɨva' Paabɨlɨya Anga Pehaana yɨ'mavaawɨna ye'. Yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' Maakɨyai Jonɨ kɨrɨmɨnyɨ yagalya'mavaka Jeruzaalemɨna ayɨna wɨna ya'.
Ayɨna wɨna kya' pwaraai Pehaadaasɨ Anga Aadɨyokɨ Kwaaka Pɨzɨthɨya mannɨkebanna kaanna wɨna yagɨla Kwazaakegaa' Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ wɨlɨna yagɨla walamwaaina yagi.

Walamwaaina kyagi Kɨwɨnya Ne Mozɨzai yavɨkarinɨkevɨjɨ Pɨropetɨyara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasara yavɨkarinɨkevɨjɨ tɨnna wanganna yadɨvɨ' yagaala sa wɨdɨna ye'. Wɨdɨna kye' lotuangevɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta naangera Polɨmɨjɨ yagaala wɨdaase' “Neya'mweraaihi nemɨnyɨne yagaala yɨvaimwagya'ne' waraja' a'mweraavɨ dujɨwaakyɨla!”
Sara kudaase' Polɨ daavaka asa' makɨlaka wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, Yɨzɨrelɨyaihɨlyɨ Menyaihi Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya maryadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ saihi dɨnyu'nyɨla! Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨre Gotɨyalyɨra.

Gotɨyai nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ dahɨlaka Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ Mwaalyaraavɨreba Menyaraavɨreba mwalyaata Yɨzɨrelɨyara kwala naanga wɨmwaihyaa' Gotɨyai. Dɨragɨnna yaka Yɨzɨpɨdaasɨ Gotɨyai Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ makabɨna kya'
a'mwamaayaba kwarame a'mweraare atɨzɨvɨlɨraalya wavɨla'daa'nyɨ kumɨ sara kayaa'na yadaapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ kale wia'.
Kale kwia' Kwaaka Kenaanɨ anga naanga pimagɨnya atina ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalya yɨrawaasɨna yaka kumɨre kwaaka yanga wɨjaavɨna kya' kwaakevɨ kwɨyakwara kwarame naanga naanga 450 mwaale'.
Sagaa' a'mweraavɨna sɨdu'nakera yagaala yawɨbwa'dɨvɨsaraavɨ dahɨlakaka dahɨlakaka kadahɨlaka' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei Saamyɨwelɨ mwaalɨna ya'.

Mwaalɨna yadɨ'nyɨ a'mwera Gotɨyarɨ wɨde' ‘Nemɨnyɨne Kingɨyai nemaremwaaladerɨ dɨnejaama!’ Sara kude' Gotɨyai Kɨzɨyare gawaalɨvaangei, Ne sɨnnawɨnya Bejaminɨmɨrei, Solɨmɨ wɨjaavɨna kya' kwarame 40 wavɨla'daa'nyɨ Solɨ kingɨyai maremwaaina.

Maremwaaina kya' dɨvi Gotɨyai sarɨ wasɨ'nyɨna yaka Kingɨyai Devitɨmɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ya'. Sahwarɨna Gotɨyai wɨda' ‘Devitɨ, nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨnei Jeziyare gawaalɨvɨ yɨlaaya wɨmariwelyɨra. Nɨmɨ sɨmunyavɨ wɨdadaari gamɨzai yadelyɨra.’

Sara wɨdaka pɨgaa' Devitɨmɨ wɨda' ‘Dɨvi Dɨragɨnyai Yɨzɨrelɨyaihɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nadelyɨra.’ Yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdaka savɨne'na Naanga Devitɨmɨrei Jizaazai nevadaihasamaa'derɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨna dɨragɨnna wɨmwaaihɨna ya' Gotɨyai.

Sɨnnawɨ Jizaazai mabyahaa' Jonɨ Bavɨtaazɨya Yadei Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaaka' ‘Gɨnnya kayaa'nanya minnera! Gotɨyarɨnajɨ gamɨreburɨnajɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi nayaa kyawɨramaara'gɨzɨ bavɨtaazɨya gyɨdeigɨnyɨra.’

Jonɨ gannya wawɨnya' aaya yakegaa' a'mweraavɨ wɨda' ‘Sarɨmɨre yawɨsa'na bewainyaka? Yemwaaihata sainyɨ sahwainyɨ mɨka! Aawa. Yɨthaanyi, sahwai yarai bathelyɨ. Nɨmɨ a'mwe maalɨkeinyɨna gamɨre kwaabɨzɨvɨlyawaarɨ myaari yɨdeinyɨ. Savɨna maalɨkeinyɨ balɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka?’ wɨda' Jonɨ.
Nɨmɨreihi, Evɨraamɨjɨyaihɨlyɨ Menyaihi Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya maryadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ saihi, nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyai wɨjaake', a'mwe pwai nevadaihasamaaraderɨne yagaalya' nemɨnyɨnesɨ.

Sare dare'nesɨ. A'mwe sarɨna Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyarajɨ kumɨre naangerajɨ myawɨri ye'. ‘Sahwai pwainaavɨre kayaa'nanyanna nevadaihasamaaradelyɨ,’ myawɨri yeva, nabaai, Kwazaakegaa' yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨre yagaaipɨkarya tɨnna wanganeva kɨrɨ' myawɨri ye'. Yagaala sa' yɨda'nɨke'na myawɨryesara sahwarɨ jɨda'na kye' yunebanna nebulya'na yɨma'naka Pɨropetɨyaraavɨre yagaala sa'.
Kumɨre yawɨta ‘Gamɨre kayaa'nanyabwi bɨramarawaajɨ tamakaana!’ yawɨreva bɨrɨna bɨrɨna yeva aawa. Mabɨramaari yeva Paailatɨmɨ yaasɨwa'na wɨde' ‘Yɨsavɨri tamakya'na sahwarɨ nilɨya dɨrama!’
Sahwarɨna Gotɨyare bukuya' yuya yɨda'nɨke sara wina kye' sai balɨna kya' yɨsavɨdaasɨ makwalaabeva simaangevɨ wakɨna ye'.
Sara wakɨna kye' bainɨkeraayabadaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai ayɨna yɨdɨkaava' baryarɨ.
Yɨdɨkaa'na kya' yɨrɨka kwalaalya Galɨlidaasara sahwalyɨ Jeruzaalemɨna yɨlaawɨna yesara sahwarɨ nayaa tɨnna wanganna ye'. Nayaa tɨnna wanganna yesara dahaa' sarɨna a'mweraavɨ wɨjalɨkurakadɨvɨsare.

Nabaai, naarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨthɨvanɨgoi. Gotɨyai Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake' Jizaazarɨ yɨdɨkaavake' dahaasagaa' nemɨnyɨna, sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨreinaavɨna ya' Gotɨyai. Savɨne'na Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ Saamɨya daraarɨ Gotɨyai yɨda'nɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Gɨmɨ nyɨbwaalɨvaangeigɨ
Dahaa' dɨragɨnya' gɨzaaweigɨ
A'mwera yawɨ'na gyɨpɨ'deigɨ
Gotɨyainyɨ gɨmaamaangeinyɨ.
Bainɨkeraayawɨ sahwarɨ yɨdɨkaavake'na yuyagaa' ayɨna mabalyɨ yojɨ bwia maburi yaderɨna Gotɨyai wɨda'
‘Devitɨ lɨmwaga'derɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdahe
Yuya tewaanya gɨrɨ'maaya gɨzaavɨma!’
Sarevɨ nabaai, Saamɨya pɨrɨvɨ yɨda'nɨ' ‘Wɨdaayade nawɨ'nyarɨ gɨrɨ'maayarɨ tewaanna kamaremwaala'gɨzɨ sai bwia maburi yadelyɨra.’
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Devitɨmɨna yawɨ'mwo. Mwalyaakegaa' Gotɨyare sɨmunya yawɨsaburɨ mɨdɨnaka kabala' sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre wakyaba kwake' gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' bwia burake' sara yawɨ'mwo.
Devitɨ bwia kabura' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yɨdɨkaavakei dɨkaavaka Naangei bwia maburya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nya'mweihi, dara jawɨryide' ‘ “O, a'mwe dai nemɨre kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'nakelyɨ,” saraai danedɨvanɨgɨla! Jizaazai dɨragɨnyai wɨdasɨwaabɨkei daaka!’
Ne Mozɨzare kɨwɨnya gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya mamarasɨ'nyɨ yɨnɨke' kɨrɨ' gazaigɨzaigɨ a'mwe darɨ ku'nalɨmwaga'gɨzɨ yuya marasɨ'nadelyɨra. A'mwe yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ gɨmwaaihadelyɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ mala nayaa jɨwannana! Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasa' gɨmɨnyɨna nyɨma'nadɨka! Dara wɨjaa'
‘Yɨthaanyi, bɨrala yadɨvɨsaihi wanganapi dɨvalyide
Mwaaidapɨjɨyagaa' nɨmɨre wawɨnya naange' yɨvanɨge'nanyɨ.
Kwai nayaa yɨhɨzɨwaakaja' kɨrɨ' mu'nalɨmwagi jideihɨlyɨ.’ ”
Polɨ sara wɨdɨna ya'.
Lotuangevɨdaasɨ Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ walyuna yadaakɨlyɨ a'mwera wɨde' “Kwazaakegaa' pɨgaa' yagalaawakɨlyɨ nedɨwaala yagaala pɨnɨjɨ dɨnejideihɨlyɨra.”

Wɨdɨna kye' mwasawɨnna a'mwera walyaabɨna kye' Juya pwarajɨ Menyara Juyaraavɨrebwi yadɨvɨta pwarajɨ sara “Polɨmɨre yagaalya' tewaanyasɨ,” deva Polɨmɨjɨ Baanavaazarɨjɨ kaanna mɨdɨnna ye'. Apozelɨyaraai “Dɨragɨnna mwaaibɨka!” dahɨla dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwange'na wɨdɨna yagi “Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwamanɨgasaihi dara jawɨrila ‘Gotɨyai gannya yanga gaimwangeburɨ tewaanna kuna nemaremwaaladelyɨra.’ ”
Dɨvi Kwazaaka pɨrɨvɨ angeba mwaalyara kwala bwa'naanya naangevaakɨyara “Polɨ Gotɨyare yagaala nedadaawori kadɨka wɨ'naana!” deva Lotuangevɨ yɨkabɨna yɨna ye'.
Yɨkabɨna yɨna kye' Juyara pwara kwala bwa'naanyangɨ tɨnna wanganna kye' jɨkurya yɨna yeva wɨde' “Polɨ nedɨvanɨke' kayaa'nanaangesɨ.” Wɨdeva Polɨmɨ bɨrala yɨna ye'.

Bɨrala yɨna kye' Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ lɨka myagɨla dɨragɨnna wɨdahi “Juyaihi, Gotɨyai nehɨtha' ‘Sɨnnawɨ Juyaraavɨ yagaala da' duzɨwaakyi!’ Sara kanehɨtha' sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' kyɨhɨthɨwa'doi ‘Aalo,’ dɨneva ‘Yuyagaa' nemɨre kuryara tewaanna mamwaaibɨnera!’ navɨka kyawɨ'mwaa' sarɨmɨnyɨ yagalya'ma'na yakwoihɨjɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ wɨdakadeinaalyɨra.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai kɨwɨnya nejaa'
‘Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨne baakeigɨ gɨmwaaihɨwa.
Kwaaka yunewɨnyaraavɨne padaihasamaasabwi dɨmakwona!’
Yuyara gɨmɨnyɨna tewaanna mwaaibɨ'dera.’ ”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' ajɨmya yuyangɨyara yɨlaaya yeva “Naangere yagaala sa' tewaanyasɨ,” dɨnyɨna kye' Gotɨyai “Sahwara tewaanyara yɨma'nɨpɨka!” dahɨlakyaakera Naangerɨ lɨmwanna ye'.
Kwaaka saba yunebanna Naangere yagaalya' dɨwɨna ye'.
Dɨwɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Juyara Menya naange Lotuangevɨ wodɨvɨsangɨjɨ Anga mwaalyara naangeraavɨjɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna kye' Polɨmɨjɨ Baanavaazarɨjɨ kayaa'na yeva kunnya kwaakevɨdaasɨ wɨdaasɨna ye'.
Wɨdaasɨna kye' Apozelɨyaraai a'mweraavɨ kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwi wɨjɨwaainya'na tɨrya sɨvɨlyangɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨya purakɨrasɨ'nagɨla Anga Aadɨyokɨdaasɨ Anga Aaikonɨyaamɨna wɨna yagi.
Aadɨyokɨ mwaalyara Naangerɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsara Gotɨyare yagaala nayaa lɨmwanna yadɨvɨ' yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' kumɨre munyɨkaavɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai wɨlamwaaidera dɨragɨnna mwaalɨna ye'.

Aadɨyokɨ Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ sara yagɨlya' Anga Aaikonɨyaamɨ ayɨna yagi. Juyaraavɨre Lotuangevɨ wɨlɨna yagɨla tewaanna wɨjɨwaakɨna kyagi Juya pwarajɨ Gɨrikɨya pwarajɨ kwala bwa'naanya naange' wɨ'nalɨmwanna ye'.
Wɨ'nalɨmwanna kye' kɨrɨ' Juya pwara malɨmwagi yevera kwaasɨ kude' ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwaraavɨ nedaa'negwaaravaavɨna sɨnna tɨka davɨna wia'.

Sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ naangegaa' Aaikonɨyaamɨ saraai mwaalɨna yagɨla lɨka mi yagɨla Naangerɨna dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna yagi. Dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna kyagi Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “A'mwera nayaa yawɨpɨka! ‘Gotɨyareraai “Gotɨyai yange'na tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwagathe'nanyɨ,” nejalɨkurakɨvanɨgɨlya' nebulyasɨ,’ sara yawɨpɨka!” Gotɨyai daka gannya dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavɨna kya' saraai wɨjɨwaainya tewaanyajɨ atɨka maru'nasajɨ yɨna yagi.
Sara tewaanna yɨna kyagi Angeba mwaalyara jaapaina yesa' pwara wɨdaasaderaarɨna gaidaa'na yesa' pwara Juyaraavɨ gaimwanna ye'.
Dɨvi ajɨmya yuyangɨyarajɨ Juyarajɨ kunnya a'mwe naangerajɨ dɨnyɨna ye' “A'mwe saraarɨ kayaa'na yawaajɨ sɨlyajɨ lɨwakaana!”
Dɨnyɨna kye' sa'na Wɨdaasaderaai kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yagɨla Anga Lɨzɨtɨraajɨ Anga Devijɨ Kwaaka Lɨkɨyonɨya mannɨkebanyaalyɨ kwaaka avaalyavɨ angengɨjɨ lɨkaanya wɨna yagi.
Lɨkaanya wɨna yagɨla yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi.
Anga Lɨzɨtɨraa a'mwei sɨvɨlyɨraai bainɨkei mwaalɨna ya'. Sai mudangegaa' ganaange' sɨvɨla kayaa'nanyarɨ kamaara' yuyagaa' kaanya myamaryadei mwaalɨna ya'.

Mwaalɨna yakei Polɨmɨre yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna ya'. Kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna kya' Polɨ dara wanganake' “A'mwe sai Naangerɨ mena wɨ'nalɨmwamwaka savɨne'na Gotɨyai a'mwe tewaanyarɨ wɨmwaaihathei daaka!” Daka baihana'na yaka
naanna wɨda' “Sɨvɨlyi dɨthaaka!” Mi'na kuda' a'mwei yarai yɨladɨkwosɨ'naka saba kaanya yamarina ya'.
Kaanya yamaryadaa'nyɨ kwala bwa'naanya Polɨ yakevɨ tɨnna wanganeva kunnya Lɨkɨyonɨyagaalyavɨ jaka dɨnyɨna ye' “Gotɨyara mwaaihasaraavɨdaasɨ daraai a'mweraaibɨsaraai nemɨnyawɨnna waimanaabɨhɨle!”
Jaka dɨnyɨna yeva kumɨre gotɨyaraare yaya' Baanavaazarɨjɨ Polɨmɨjɨ yaya wɨde'. Baanavaazarɨna Suzai wɨdeva Polɨmɨna yagaala wɨdaderɨna Emizai wɨde' yaya'.

Sara kude' Suzare yɨleanga angeba maangebaarɨ madakevɨdaasɨ Suzare yɨleanga maremwaaidei bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨjɨ purɨryangɨjɨ adɨkuryabanna makwalyuna ya'. Maremwaaide salyɨ kwala bwa'naanyajɨ yawɨ'na “Bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨ tamawaajɨ gotɨyaraarɨ yɨkunaabudɨke'na wɨjavaana!”

Sara yawɨ'na kye' savɨna Baanavaazalyɨ Polɨjɨ saraai wɨ'nyɨna yagɨla “Sabwi kayaa'nanaangebulyɨ,” dahɨla kɨrɨnnya baazɨ'ma'nyawaarɨ lihɨvaina yagɨla kwala bwa'naanyavɨ tɨnnyawɨnna kaanyave'na wɨna yagɨla

jaka wɨdahi “A'mweihi, sabwi baa'na yɨvanɨgava! Naarɨmɨ a'mweinaalyɨra. Sarɨmɨbɨsainaalyɨra. Yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨzɨwaakya'na bɨwolyainaalyɨra. Yɨhɨthɨvanɨgoi. Waryaanya da marasɨ'napi Gotɨya nebulyai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwalɨbainya'nerɨ duzɨla! Gotɨya nebulyai sɨgunyasɨ Kwaakevasɨ saalaalyajɨ yuya sangɨ mwaaidɨvɨsajɨ wakyaakelyɨra Gotɨyai.
Kɨgaa' a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyara kunnyabwi yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyai wanganakɨna yaka ‘Dahaa' a'mwera kunnyabwi yagalya'mavapi nɨmɨrebwi yɨpɨka!’ da'.

Kɨgaasɨ dahaasɨ yuna lɨka yulya'na myada yuyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanna yadelyɨra. Sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ burɨka yɨhɨzaavaka tɨka munne tewaanya yɨrɨya'ne wakɨvanɨ'. Wapaaya sarɨmɨre munyɨkaavɨna yɨhɨzaavanɨke'na munya yɨhyɨdaasɨ sarɨmɨre sɨduta yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Yuya daza gamɨnyɨna nayaa yɨhɨzalɨkurakadelyɨra.”

Yagaalya' sara kudahi kuna yaamɨjɨ wɨdɨna wɨdɨna “Sahwaraaihɨrɨna yɨkunaabudɨke' yɨravaana!” wɨdɨna kye' saraai wɨdɨna wɨdɨna “Aalo! Aalo!” wɨdahi. Saamɨnyagaa' wɨdɨna wɨdɨna kyagi a'mwera navɨka mwaalɨna ye'.

Dɨvi Juya pwara Aadɨyokɨ Kwaaka Pɨzɨthɨya mannɨkebadaasarajɨ Anga Aaikonɨyaamɨdaasarajɨ bɨna yeva Wɨdaasaderaarɨna bɨrala wɨdɨna kye' a'mweraavɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ a'mwera Polɨmɨ sɨlaangejɨ lɨwakɨna ye'. Lɨwakɨna yeva “Mena baimwaka,” dɨna yeva angeba mwasɨlaa mwagi'namakwalyuna yɨna yeva yagalya'ma'na yɨna ye'.

Yagalya'ma'na yɨna kye' Naangerɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsara kale wiadaa'nyɨ gamɨnyabanna yɨkabɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Polɨ daavɨna yaka angebanna ayɨna wɨlaawɨna ya'. Ayɨna wɨlaawɨna yaka sawɨ se wa'mwa'na yagɨla mwanyavɨ dɨkaa'na yagɨla Anga Devina kaanna wɨna yagi Baanavaazalyɨ.

Anga Devi saraai yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna kyagi a'mwe kwalaalyara mɨdɨdɨvɨsara yɨma'nyɨna ye'. Yɨma'nyɨna kye' Anga Lɨzɨtɨraana ayɨna wɨna yagɨla Anga Aaikonɨyaamɨna wɨna yagɨla, Kwaaka Pɨzɨthɨya Anga Aadɨyokɨ mannɨkewɨnna ayɨna wɨna yagi.

“Yuyaba mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ nayaa mwaaibɨka!” dahɨla kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi “Gotɨyare yagaalya' nayaa dɨlɨmwana! Naangerɨ kuna dɨlɨmwagaka! Gamɨre dɨragɨnya' nayaa dɨlɨmwagaka! Kwaaka davakɨ mwaaida'gɨzɨ daanga pɨnya'nejɨ kale ya'nejɨ kagyozɨ sare'na kɨrɨ' dɨvi Gotɨyai maremwaaidevɨ nawɨ'nyabanna dɨmwalaawɨdeigɨnyɨra,” sara yɨvaimwanna yagi.

Yɨvaimwanna yagɨla anga yuyangɨ a'mwe sɨdu'nakeraavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya gazasavɨne a'mwe naangeraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna. Mi'na wɨmwaaihɨna yagɨla “Gotɨyai yuyaraavɨ dɨragɨnyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihana!” dahɨla tɨka munne manyɨ yagɨla a'mweraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdɨna yagi “Naangeigɨ, a'mwe dara gɨlɨmwamanɨgasaigɨ, nayaa dɨmaremwaala!” sara wɨdɨna yagi.
Kwaaka Pɨzɨthɨya kaanna yamaryadi' Kwaaka Paabɨlɨyana yɨ'mavaawɨna yagɨla
Anga Pehaana yɨ'mavagɨlegaa' saba mwaalyaraavɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨdɨna yagi. Wi'na wɨdɨna yagɨla Anga Atelɨyana walaawɨna yagi.

Walaawɨna yagɨla sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina yagɨla Aadɨyokɨna kaanna wɨna yagi. Kɨgaa' Anga Aadɨyokɨ sawɨdaa'nyɨ Naangerera saraarɨ dara wɨdaase' “Neya'mweraaihi Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨdadaakɨlyɨ Gotɨyai yɨlaaya yadei yanga nayaa yɨhɨgaimwagana!” Sara wɨdaasesa' sara yagi.

Aadɨyokɨna yɨ'ma'na kyagi Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyara yɨkabɨna kye' Gotɨyai kɨrɨmɨnyɨna sara wiake' sara wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi. “Gotɨyai kaanya' tihɨ'nɨke' kabaasa' ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Naangerɨ wɨ'nalɨmwagesa'nesɨra,” sara wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi.
Wɨjɨwaakɨna yagɨla Aadɨyokɨ saba naangegaa' mɨdɨdɨvɨsarajɨ mwaalɨna ye'.
A'mwe Juya pwara Kwaaka Juthɨyadaasara Aadɨyokɨna bɨna yeva neya'mweraavɨ dana wɨjɨwaakɨna ye' “Ne Mozɨzai kɨlaaka daya'na kɨwɨnya wɨjaakevɨ mi yɨpɨja' Gotɨyai mavadaihasamaari yɨhyannelyɨra.”

Sara wɨjɨwaakɨna kye' Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ saraai maanga wɨdɨna kyagi maanga wɨdadaapɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarera dɨnyɨna ye' “Jeruzaalemɨna Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ nemɨre Aadɨyokɨ mwaalya pwarajɨ kwawapɨjɨ Wɨdaasaderajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ yɨwaarata da' nayaa dɨzavada'galyideihɨlyɨra.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyara kudaase' kaanna wɨna yeva tɨnnyaba Kwaaka Pɨnɨzɨyajɨ Kwaaka Samerɨyajɨ sabanyaai neya'mweraavɨ wɨdɨna “Pɨba pɨba ajɨmya yuyangɨyara sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrebwi bikwalyɨna yeva Naangerɨ lɨmwamanɨga'.” Sara wɨdɨna kye' a'mwera yɨlaaya naanga yɨna ye'.

Yɨlaaya naanga yɨna yadaapɨjɨ Jeruzaalemɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' kumɨjɨ Jeruzaalemɨna mwaalya Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyarajɨ Apozelɨyarajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yeva ata bwa'nyɨna kye' Aadɨyokɨdaasara “Gotɨyai wɨgaimwanna kaneya' sana sana yoinera,” wɨjɨwaakɨna ye'.
Wi'na wɨjɨwaakɨna kye' Perɨzɨyara Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsara pwara daavɨna yeva wɨdɨna ye' “Menyara kɨlaaka da'nɨpɨjaraavɨ ‘Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya' jɨla!’ duzidesɨra.”
Savɨne'na pɨgaa' Wɨdaasaderajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ yagaala savɨ yawɨbwata'nera yɨkabɨna ye'.

Yɨkabɨna yeva yɨwaara'nyɨna yɨwaara'nyɨna yeva kuna dɨdaapi Pitai daavɨna yaka wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨdaasɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' kude sahwara kadɨka wɨ'neva Naangerɨ lɨmwagesa'na Gotɨyai nyɨdahɨlakake' yawɨ'mwaava.
Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ yawɨrangadei ‘Ajɨmya yuyangɨya kwaraavɨjɨ maarɨdeinyɨ,’ daka gannya Kurya Tewaanyarɨ nejaavakabaaibɨ' Menyaraavɨna yanga wɨjaava'.
Nemɨnyɨna ge' myake' kumɨnyɨna ge' mya'. Aawa, kumɨ sara Gotɨyarɨ ku'nalɨmwage' Gotɨyai kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ gɨrɨkita duimwagasɨ'na'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ kale wiwaka. Sahwarɨ yaamɨjɨ be'na yɨvanɨgava? ‘Kɨwɨnya naange jɨla!’ dadɨvɨ' taanga Menyaraavɨre egweyaba wakɨna wakɨna yadɨvɨtabaaibɨsasɨra. Kɨgaa' taanga sa' Ne sɨnnawɨnyarajɨ nemɨjɨ nayaa mamakwɨyɨ yaawoinera. Mudɨkeraavɨna be'na wakɨvanɨgava! Sa' aawa.

Nemɨ dara yawɨralɨmwamanɨgo. Naangei Jizaazai nemɨ yuyainaavɨna yanga negaimwagakevɨ nevadaihasamaara'. Savɨne nayaa wɨ'nɨvanɨgo' Gotɨyai nemaa'mwakeine. Nabaai Menyara yanga wɨgaimwanga saburɨna Gotɨyai avaaina wɨvadaihasamaa'manɨkere.”

Sagaa' kwala bwa'naanya' kave mwaaidapɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ Polɨjɨ saraai wɨjɨwaakɨna, Gotɨyai gannya dɨragɨnya' kujaava' wɨjɨwaainya'nejɨ atɨka maru'nasajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨreba yagɨlya'na wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi. Wɨjɨwaakɨna yadaakɨlyɨ yuyara kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nyɨna ye'.
Kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna kye' dɨvidaa'nyɨ Jemɨzai yuyaraavɨ wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, nɨmɨre dɨwɨja' dɨnyu'nyɨla!
Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Gotɨyai ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨna kale kwia' sahwaraavɨ gamɨre yaya' kɨnɨnnakera yɨma'nya'neraavɨ gamɨnyɨneraavɨ maarake'na Saaimonɨ Pitai mena nejɨwaakɨwa'.
Sara nejɨwaakɨwake' pɨropetɨyara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasara sara yɨdayaa'. Savɨna Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Naangei nedɨwa' ‘Dɨvi yagalaawɨna ya'mujɨ
Ne Devitɨmɨre selɨ angevɨyaraavɨna dɨragɨnya wɨjaavɨdeinyɨra.
Sahwara bwalaraawesara yɨma'nyɨna kye'
Sahwainyɨ nawɨ'nyaraavɨ nayaa wɨmwaaihɨdeinyɨra.
“Dahaa' a'mwe yɨvainera Naangeinyɨ nyɨbɨramaapɨka!
Ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwaraavɨna nɨmɨre yaya' dahɨlakɨwera!
Sahwara nyɨbɨramaapɨka!” dena nayaa wɨmwaaihɨdeinyɨ.
Nɨmɨnyɨnera ajɨmya yuyangɨyara pwara nyɨbɨramaapɨ'deinyɨra.’
Sara nedɨwa' Naangei kɨgaakuna danejɨwaainakela.”

Jemɨzai yagaala pɨrɨ' wɨda' “Sa' dɨnɨkevɨna da' yawɨ'manɨgesɨra. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrebwi mipɨjara Gotɨyarebwi lɨmwagapɨjɨ sahwara navɨka mwaaibɨka! ‘Juyainaavɨne Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya jɨla!’ madaannera!

Aawa. Pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ dara yavɨkaryaana! Sarɨmɨ tewaanna yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Yagaala maalɨke' yɨhɨthaana! A'mwera yɨkunaabudɨke'na jɨlɨkyaawaryaraavɨ karamapɨjɨ mɨwɨta kɨmaaka sa manɨnna! Nabaai, Nyɨlyarɨjɨ Lawerɨjɨ yɨsaraavɨjɨ sazangɨne mɨwɨta manɨnnera! Ata maralɨmwanna minna! Jɨlɨkyaawaryaraavɨ gɨraa'dɨwannɨke tawanake manɨnna! Tawe manɨnnera! Gave'na sara yavɨkaryaana!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨgaakuna Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakegaa' yuyagaa' Lotuangengɨ Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya wɨjɨwaakɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna yadɨvɨ' dahaasagaa' anga yuyangɨ gamɨre yagaalya' wɨdadɨvɨsa'ne'na yavɨkaryaana!” wɨda' Jemɨzai.

Sagaa' Wɨdaasaderajɨ naangerajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨya yuyarajɨ dɨnyɨna “Tewaanyasɨ. Aadɨyokɨna nemɨjɨyaraarɨ dahɨlakawaajɨ Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ wɨdasaana!” Dɨnyɨna yeva Juthaazai yaya pɨrɨ' Baazavaazai wo'nɨkelyɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraarɨ dahɨlakɨna ye'. Dahɨlakɨna yesaraarɨna neya'mwera wɨdadɨvɨ' “A'mwe nemaremwaaidisaraai tewaanyaraalyɨra.” Dahɨlakɨna yeva pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ yavɨkarina yɨna yeva wɨdaasɨna ye'.
Yɨkwia sa' yɨda'nɨ'

“Nedaasadeinajɨ a'mwe naangeinajɨ sɨrya'mweina pɨkarɨyɨkwia davɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yavɨkarivanɨgona. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaihi neya'mweihi Aadɨyokɨ mwaalyaihɨlyɨ Kwaaka Sɨrɨya mwaalyaihɨlyɨ Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨya mwaalyaihɨlyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo ‘Neya'mweihi!’

Dara wɨ'nɨvanɨgo. Nemɨrera pwara kaanna waweva Menyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨtheta yagaala sanna Menyaihi sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'na kye' kale yɨhya'. Sara wɨ'nona yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Yagaala sa' yɨhɨthɨwa'daasaraavɨ mudaasɨwa'do.

Dahaasagaa' yɨkabɨna yona yagaala da' jawɨbwarakɨwo, yuyaina. ‘Tewaanyasɨ,’ dona a'mwe sɨdu'nakeraarɨ dahɨlakona sarɨmɨnyawɨnna saraarɨ wɨdasaade. Saraalyɨ Baanavaazalyɨ Polɨjɨ saraavɨ wɨdasaadera. Baanavaazalyɨ Polɨjɨ saraarɨna yɨlaaya nevu'nɨvanɨkeraalyɨra.
Anga yuyangɨ Baanavaazalyɨ Polɨjɨ saraai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai Naangere yagaala wɨjɨwaakagɨlyaraai balya'na lɨka myadisaraalyɨ. Saraarɨ wɨdasaadera.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nabaai, sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Juthaazalyɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraarɨ, sɨdu'nakeraarɨna yɨhɨthɨworaarɨ wɨdasaadera. Saraai yagaala avaalya' jɨthawakɨwo' yɨhɨzɨwaakikaderaalyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kurya Tewaanyalyɨ nemɨjɨ mena yawɨ'na yobwi taangayabwi mɨ'. Aawa. Daazabwi davwi dɨmɨdɨnyɨla!

‘A'mwera yɨkunaabudɨke'na jɨlɨkyaawaryaraavɨ karamapɨjɨ mɨwɨta sa manɨnna! Nyɨlyarɨjɨ Lawerɨjɨ yɨsaraavɨjɨ dazangɨne wapaaya manɨnna! Tawe manɨnna! Jɨlɨkyaawarya gɨraa'dɨwanna yɨpɨja manɨnna! Ata malɨmwadɨnna! Kayaa'nanya sangɨ mya'gɨzɨ tewaanya jɨtheigɨnyɨ.’ Mi'na yɨhɨthɨwo.” Pɨkarɨyɨkwia' sara yavɨkarinɨkesɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wɨdaasesara kaanna wɨna yeva Anga Aadɨyokɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' Naangerera kwala bwa'naanya yuyarajɨ yɨkabɨna kye' pɨkarɨyɨkwia' wɨjaavɨna ye'.
Wi'na wɨjaavɨna kye' a'mwera paazɨya' tɨnna maranganna yeva yagaala nawɨ'nya'na yɨlaaya yɨna ye'.
Yɨlaaya yɨna kye' Juthaazalyɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadisaraai kuna wɨjɨwaakɨna yagɨla kɨrya'mweraavɨ sɨmunya dɨragɨnya' wivaimwanna yagi.
Wivaimwanna yagɨla mwaalɨna mwaalɨna kyagi kɨrya'mwera kɨrɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yeva wɨde' “Ayahi kwaamu'nanyaburɨ yɨhɨthaasesaraayawɨnna dɨwideihɨlyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kye' Saailaazai yawɨraka “Dava mwaalɨdeinyɨ,” mwaalɨna kya' Juthaazai gavei ayɨna wɨna ya'.
Anga Aadɨyokɨ Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ mwaaidakɨlyɨ saraalyɨ pwara kwalaalyarajɨ Naangere yagaala wɨdeva wɨjɨwaakɨna ye'.
Dɨvi yɨrɨka pɨnɨngɨ Polɨ Baanavaazarɨ wɨda' “Anga yuya gazabazaba Naangere yagaalya' wɨdolyabanna Neya'mweraavɨ angyɨrɨ'maata yakadera. Tewaanna dahamwaaihava? Wanganakadera.”
Sara kuda' Baanavaazai wɨda' “Maakɨyai Jonɨjɨ wawaadera.”
Polɨ wɨda' “Aawa, kɨgaa' Maakɨyai Jonɨjɨ kwawo yunewɨnna wawɨnya yuya myada Kwaaka Paabɨlɨya saba naarɨmɨnyɨ nehyagalya'mava'. Nehyagalya'mavake'na dahaa' sahwai kaanya mwawannelyɨra.”
Sara kuda' sa'na maanga dɨnyɨna yagɨla yosɨnna yagi. Baanavaazai Maakɨyai Jonɨmɨ maaraka sɨpɨyavɨ Ahu'manna Saaipɨraazɨna wɨna ya'.
Wɨna yadaasɨ Polɨ Saailaazarɨ dakɨlakɨna kya' kɨrya'mwera wɨde' “Gotɨyai kɨrɨmɨjɨ wawojɨ yanga yɨhɨgaimwagori kave maremwaaina yɨhyathelyɨra.”
Mi'na kude' Kwaaka Sɨrɨyanajɨ Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨyanajɨ wawaka Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yada sɨmunya dɨragɨnya wɨjɨwakadaasɨ dɨragɨnya maaresare.
Angeba Devinajɨ Angeba Lɨzɨtɨraanajɨ Polɨ yɨ'mavaawɨna ya'. Saba Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨdei Timoti wo'nɨkei mwaalɨna yakelyɨ. Ganaange' Naangerɨ wɨ'nade' Juya' mwaalaka kɨrɨ' ganɨmaangei Gɨrikɨyalyɨra.
Neya'mwera Lɨzɨtɨraa mwaalyarajɨ Aaikonɨyaamɨ mwaalyarajɨ Timotirɨna jalɨkurakɨna ye' “A'mwe tewaanyalyɨra.”

Polɨ sɨmunyavɨ da' yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨjɨ Timoti wawana!” yawɨ'na yaka Juyaraavɨrebwi Timotire kɨlaakejɨ' davɨna ya'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Juya yuyara saba mwaalyara yawɨre' “Timotirɨ ganɨmaangei Juyai mɨka. Aawa, Gɨrikɨyalyɨ. Gawaalɨvaangere kɨlaakejɨ' mada'nyɨkelyɨ.”

Wi'na davɨna kya' Polɨjɨ Saailaazalyɨ Timotilyɨ anga yuyangɨna wɨna yeva Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ yagaalya' Jeruzaalemɨ Wɨdaasaderajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ jamungajakesa'na wɨjɨwaakɨna ye'. Wɨjɨwaakɨna yeva wɨde' “Yagaala sa' sara jideihɨlyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya sara yeva lɨmwangebwina dɨragɨnna mwaalesa' yɨrɨka yuyagaa' a'mwe kwalaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarera yɨma'nyɨna ye'.
Kaanna kaanna wɨna yeva Kwaaka Pɨrɨzɨya Kwaaka Galezɨya sabanyaai yamarina yadaapɨjɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai wɨda' “Dahaa' Pɨrovijɨ Ezɨya Gotɨyare yagaalya' mujɨwaakɨpɨna!”
Mi'na kuda' Kwaaka Mɨzɨya maangebaarɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yeva yawɨ'na ye' “Pɨrovijɨ Bɨthinɨya wawaana!” Sara yawɨ'na kye' Jizaazare Kuryai kaanya tihɨ'na yake'na “Sawɨnna mupɨnera!” wɨdɨna ya'.
Wɨdɨna kya' Kwaaka Mɨzɨya yuneba lota'na yeva Anga Tɨrawaazɨna walaabɨna ye'.
Walaabɨna kye' sawɨsavɨ Polɨ a'mabaaitɨnna wanganna yake' a'mwei Pɨrovijɨ Maazathonɨya mwaalyai daavɨkei naanga yɨdaangana' “Polɨgɨ, Kwaaka Maazathonɨya ga'mava'gɨzɨ nemɨnyɨna dɨnegaimwana!”

A'mabaaitɨnna mi'na wanganna yaka dara yawɨro' “Gotɨyai ‘Maazathonɨya mwaalyaraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' duzɨwakaawila!’ danedɨwaka!” Mi'na dona Maazathonɨya sawɨnneina gɨlyɨvɨsa yɨme'nya'bɨ' yovɨrawakɨna yo.
Anga Tɨrawaazɨ sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo sɨpɨya' Ahu'manna Saamothɨrezɨna yɨda'na makuna neyaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Anga Nɨyapolɨzɨ sabanna makuna neya'.

Makuna kaneya' kaanna wɨlaawɨna yona Anga Pilipaaina yɨ'mavaawɨna yo. Anga sa' Kwaaka Maazathonɨya mwaalyaraavɨre anga naangebanyɨra. Anga Romɨdaasara kwala naange' mwaaihasabanyɨ. Sabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yona yɨrɨka pɨjaa' mwaalɨna yo.

Mwaalɨna yona Juyaraavɨre Kwazaakegaa' “Aalɨmaangebaarɨ Juyara Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsaba dɨngaka?” dɨna yona aalɨmaangebaarɨna wɨna yo. Wɨna yona dara wangano' “A'mwe damwaaihava!” Sara dona walamwaaina yɨna yona a'mwe yɨ'bwa'nemwaalesangɨ wɨdɨna yo.

Wɨdɨna yo' a'mwe pɨrɨ' Lɨthɨya' Anga Taayataairadaasasɨra. A'mwe sa' gɨlyajɨ baazɨ'ma'nyajɨ kwaabɨhannyajɨ saza wangwaija'bɨsa' wanya'ne' dɨvaina yada yaasadesɨra. Lɨthɨya' Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadesɨ. Polɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨdadaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai sɨduta tewaanya wɨjaavɨna kya' Lɨthɨya' nayaa wɨ'nyɨna ya'.

Nayaa wɨ'nyɨna yaka Naangerɨ lɨmwanna kya' gamɨnyɨjɨ gamɨjɨyaraavɨjɨ bavɨtaazɨya yɨna yo. Bavɨtaazɨya yɨna kyo neda' “Nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Naangere' sahwarɨ nebulya'na wɨlɨmwaga'manɨkesɨ,’ dɨnapɨjɨ nɨmɨre angevɨ dɨmwaalyɨla!” Sara naanga kaneda' gamɨre angevɨ wɨlamwaaina yo.

Pɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsawɨnna wodaawojɨ tusavɨ sɨdɨraaya' yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yade' jɨmaata'na neya'. Sɨdɨraaya sa' kamaala naanga pwai kɨnɨnnake' dɨvi yɨma'nadengɨna dadesɨra. Sara dada gamɨre maremwaaidɨvɨsara nɨgwia naanga maarɨna yesasɨra.
Jɨmaata'na neyaka Polɨjɨ sainaavɨ mɨdɨda jaka wɨdadesɨ. “A'mwe sara Gotɨya Mena Ke'mwewɨnyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyare. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyanna yɨhɨvadaihasamaaradevwina yɨhɨthɨvanɨgasarera.”

A'mwe' dada yɨrɨka pɨjaakuna jaka dada Polɨ maa'na kwina' gɨnyɨma'nyɨna yaka yɨmakerɨ wɨda' “Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨne yayavɨna naanga gɨthɨma! A'mwevɨre munyɨkɨdaasɨ dalyona!” Sara kuda' sagaasagaa' yɨmakei yarai bwalyuna ya'.

Yarai bwalyuna kya' sɨdɨraayavɨre maremwaaidɨvɨsara dara wanganesa' “Nɨwaava, dɨvi yɨma'nya'nenna yagaala majɨ kyojɨ nɨgwia mamaari yaadeina daaka!” Deva Polɨmɨjɨ Saailaazarɨjɨ galalɨmwanna yeva a'mwe naangeraayaba yɨkabadɨvɨsabanna mwagi'namaa'na ye'.
Sara yeva saba naangera kotɨya' yawɨbwa'dɨvɨsaraayabanna makuna yeva wɨde' “A'mwe daraai Juyaraalyɨ. Nemɨre anga davɨ kayaa'na yɨvanɨgɨlyaraalyɨ.
Daraai nemɨrebwi kayaaka neyɨgaimwaalya' mudɨkebwi yaasɨwa'na nejɨwaakɨvanɨgi. Romɨyaina sabwi myaanneinera!”
Sara kude' kwala bwa'naanya' maanga jaka kude' naangera Polɨjɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraare baazɨ'ma'nyangɨ maralihɨvalasɨ'na yeva pɨlɨzɨmaanɨyaraavɨ wɨde' “Bajɨngɨsajɨ dɨramyɨla!”
Sara kude' tamɨna tamɨna yeva kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yeva kalavuzangevɨ maremwaaiderɨ naanga wɨde' “Nayaa dangana! Lɨkaanya nabwalyuikadɨka!”
Naanga mi'na kude' kalavuzangevɨ maremwaaidei yagaala naanga sa' maaraka ku'dɨka tɨnnyabanyavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yaka kɨrɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ yɨsavakaarɨ tɨnnyawɨ dɨragɨnna yagɨlakurakɨna ya'.
Sawɨsavɨ kalawawegaa' Polɨjɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraai Gotɨyarɨna yagaalyasɨ yɨledaatasɨ wɨdadaakɨlyɨ kalavuzara pwara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna ye'.

Wɨ'nyɨna yadaapɨjɨ sagaa' wɨnɨnya naange' yɨna kya' kurɨkejɨ sidɨhɨbyajɨ yonyɨ yonyɨ naanna yɨnyɨna ya'. Yonyɨ yonyɨ naanna yɨnyɨna kya' kaanya yuya baasɨnyɨna yake kalavuzaraavɨre senɨyabara pwinɨkebara bwalaraawɨna ya'.

Bwalaraawɨna kya' kalavuzangevɨ maremwaaidei dɨkaa'na yaka kaanya yuya baasɨnɨke tɨnna wanganna yaka dara yawɨrake' “Aakai, kalavuzara lɨka mena duwaava!” Sara daka “Sare'na wagɨla namaa'mudɨka! Nɨmɨ sainyɨ dabɨra'nɨma,” daka gannya kwaari'masɨramɨnya' maralɨmwanna ya'.
Maralɨmwanna kya' kɨrɨ' Polɨ jaka naanga wɨda' “Maramakɨnɨnnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ yuyaina tɨhu'na mwaaihona.”

Jaka naanga kuda' kalavuzangevɨ maremwaaidei yɨ'baake'na jaka wɨdɨna yaka kaanyave'na bwina yaka lɨka naanga yɨna yaka bɨ'bɨta yada “A'mwe naangeraai nyɨgaimwagikajɨ dahayɨwaai?” daka Polɨjɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraaryabanna bula'na ya'.
Bula'na yakei daavɨna yaka mwasawɨnna saraarɨ makuna yaka yɨwaara'na “A'mwe naangeraaihi, nɨmɨ gara kya'mujɨ nyɨvadaihasamaaradeinyaka?”
Sara yɨwaara'na kya' saraai wɨdahi “Naanga Jizaazarɨ kalɨmwaga'gɨzɨ tewaanya dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ. Nabaai, Naangei gɨmɨre angevɨyaraavɨjɨ wɨvadaihasamaaradeihɨlyɨ.”
Wɨdahɨla Naangere yagaalya' gamɨnyɨjɨ gamɨre angevɨ mwaalesaraavɨjɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yagi.
Wɨjɨwaakɨna kyagi sawɨsavɨ sagaa' kalavuzangevɨ maremwaaidei bajɨngɨsajɨ tameta ga'bwaralyangɨ aalya yɨna ya'. Aalya yɨna kya' sagaasagaa' gamɨnyɨjɨ gamɨreraavɨjɨ aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yarai yɨna yagi.
Bavɨtaazɨya yɨna kyagi a'mwei Polɨmɨjɨ Saailaazarɨjɨ gannya angevɨna makwina yaka wapaaya wɨjaavɨna ya'. Salyɨ gamɨrerajɨ Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagesa'na yɨlaaya yeva tewaanna mwaaidɨvɨ' mwaalɨna ye'.
Mwanyavɨ Romɨyaraavɨ naangera pɨlɨzɨmaanɨyaraavɨ wɨdaasɨna kye' sahwara wɨna yeva kalavuzangevɨ maremwaaiderɨ wɨde' “A'mwe saraarɨ yɨ'daala'gɨzɨ duthaasa!”
Kude' kalavuzangevɨ maremwaaidei Polɨmɨ wɨda' “Naangera gɨmɨnyɨnajɨ Saailaazarɨnajɨ wɨdasɨwaa' ‘Saraarɨ duthaaso!’ Sara kudasɨwaa' kalavuzangevɨdaasɨ yagalya'mavakɨlyɨ kave dɨwila!”

Kuda' Polɨ pɨlɨzɨmaanɨyaraavɨ wɨda' “Aawa, nedɨwaata sabwi kayaa'nanyabulyɨ. Naarɨmɨ Romɨyainaalyɨ. Wona kayaa'na mi kyawaaihoi yuyara tɨnna nehwangadaapɨjɨyaba nehɨramyawaaiha'. Yagaala majɨdayɨ yeva kalavuzangevɨ yaasɨwa'na wɨmwaaihɨna nehyawaaiha'. Dahaasagaa' nehɨthɨwaa' ‘Lɨka yulya'na kave dɨwila!’ Be'nana! Romɨyaraavɨ naangera sahwara bɨpɨjara mwasawɨnna kanehɨmakwalyopɨjɨ wawakadeinaalyɨ.”

Naanga kuda' pɨlɨzɨmaanɨyara ayɨna wɨna yeva Polɨ wɨdake'na Romɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna ye'. Polɨmɨnajɨ Saailaazarɨnajɨ “Saraai Romɨyaraalyɨ,” wɨ'nyɨna yeva “ ‘A'mwe naangeraai mɨka!’ dona tamyawaaihoraalyɨ,” deva lɨka naanga ye'.
Lɨka naanga yesara bɨna yeva wɨde' “Kayaa'na yɨhyawaaiho'na kale neyɨwaka.” Wɨdeva kalavuzangevɨdaasɨ kave makwalyuna yeva yɨwaara'na ye' “A'mweraaihi, nemɨre angeba yagalya'mavakɨlyɨ dɨwijɨwaala?”

Yɨwaara'na kye' Polɨjɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraai kalavuzangevɨdaasɨ yagalya'ma'na yagɨla Lɨthɨyavɨre angevɨ wɨlɨna yagi. Wɨlɨna yagɨla neya'mwera yɨkabɨna yesagaa' kumɨnyɨ dɨhaa'bwasabwi yɨvaimwanna yagɨla kaanna wɨna yagi.
Kaanna wɨna yagɨla Anga Aabɨpolɨzɨ wavɨla'na yagɨla Anga Apolonɨya wavɨla'na yagɨla Anga Tezalonaaikana yɨ'mavaawɨna yagi. Anga saba Juyaraavɨre lotuange' mannɨkeba.
Yɨ'mavaawɨna kyagi Kwazaakegaa' lotuangengɨ Polɨ wɨdɨna yadei lotuanga savɨ sara wɨlɨna ya'. Sara wɨlɨna yaka Kwazaaka dawaai dasangɨ Gotɨyare bukuya'na wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'.

Aangyagaalya' wɨda' “Gotɨyare yagaalya' nedɨnɨke' ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai Juyara yemwaaidɨvɨsai daanga naanga kuvɨnojɨ mena balojɨ ayɨna dɨkaavadelyɨra.’ Sara nedɨnɨke' Jizaazai sara ya'. Sara yakei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨgelyɨra Jizaazai.”

Sa'na kuda' Juya pwara Polɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨ'nyɨna yeva Polɨjɨ Saailaazalyɨ saraarɨ ye'mwannyɨna ye'. Nabaai Gɨrikɨyara Gotɨyarɨ dadɨvɨta kwala naangerajɨ a'mwe sɨmunya nayaa yadɨvɨsajɨ sa ye'mwannyɨna ye'.

Juyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyesara tɨganaarya yeva jɨkurya yeva a'mwe kayaa'nanyara adusangɨ kaanya' yaasɨwa'na yamaryadɨvɨsaraavɨ makabɨna kye' kwala bwa'naanya jaka naanga dadɨvɨ' kayaa'na yɨna ye'. Kayaa'na sara yɨna kye' angaba mwaalyaraavɨ sɨnna tɨka davɨna kya' a'mwe kayaa'nanyara Jaizonɨmɨre angevɨ kaanya' yɨpalabaasɨna yeva “Polɨmɨjɨ Saailaazarɨjɨ a'mweraayabanna kotɨya'na makwalyawaana!” deva bɨreva bɨreva yɨna ye'.

Nyɨnna bɨrɨna yeva mabɨramaari ye'. Mabɨramaari yeva Jaizonɨmɨjɨ neya'mwe pwaraavɨjɨ angeba a'mwe naangeraayabanna dɨragɨnna mwagi'namaa'na yeva jaka wɨde' “A'mwe Kwaaka yuneva' maragɨnyɨwagakagɨleraai nemɨreba davanna byɨ'ma'mwaalyaraai.

Dahaa' nemɨre angebanna kabahi Jaizonɨ gannya angevɨ maremwaalɨka. A'mwe saraai A'mwe Naanga Sizaare kɨwɨnya kayaaka yɨgaimanɨgi. Dara kwaasɨya' nedɨvanɨgi ‘Kwaakevakɨ maremwaaidei Sizaai mɨka. Kingɨya pwai Jizaazai wo'nɨkei maremwaaidelyɨra.’ ”
Yagaala sa' kude' kwala bwa'naanyasɨ anga sabanya a'mwe naangerajɨ sɨnna tɨka naanga wɨda'daa'nyɨ “Kayaa'nanyasɨ,” deva jaka naanga wɨde'.
Jaka naanga sara kude' a'mwe naangera Jaizonɨmɨjɨ pwaraavɨjɨ saraavɨ kotɨya'najɨ kwaamu'mwaalya'najɨ nɨgwia mena maareva wɨde' “Wawapɨjaihi dɨwila!”
Sawɨta kajɨnna' Anga Beriya neya'mwera Polɨmɨjɨ Saailaazarɨjɨ saraarɨ lɨka marulyakaasɨna ye'. Lɨka marulyakaasɨna kye' pɨgaa' anga sabanna yɨ'mavaawɨna yagɨla Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ wɨlɨna yagi.

Anga Beriya mwaalyara sɨdu'nakera pwaraavɨre yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨsarera. Anga Tezalonaaika mwaalyarabɨsara mɨka. A'mwe sara Naangere yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nadɨvɨ' “Polɨmɨre yagaalya' nebulya'na dɨngaka?” deva Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' nayaa yawɨresare.
Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ tɨnna wangadɨvɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwagesa', nabaai a'mwe Gɨrikɨya naangejɨ a'mwe Gɨrikɨyarajɨ lɨmwanna ye'.

Nayaa lɨmwanna kye' Anga Tezalonaaika mwaalyara Juyara dara wɨ'nesa' “O, Anga Beriya Polɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' duthɨwaka!” Sara deva sabanna bɨna yeva kwaasɨ yagaalya wɨdadaapi kwala bwa'naanya' yɨkabɨna yeva Polɨmɨvaavɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨyara jaka naanga wɨde'.
Sara kye' sagaa' yɨme'nya'bɨ' saalaalyavɨ maangebaarɨna neya'mwera Polɨmɨ waasɨna ye'. Waasɨna kye' kɨrɨ' Anga Beriya Saailaazalyɨ Timotilyɨ mwaalɨna yagi.

Saba mwaalɨna kyagi a'mwera Polɨmɨ makwalyuna yadaapi Anga Aathenɨzɨna wɨna yeva yɨ'mavaawɨna ye'. Yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' Polɨ wɨdɨna “ ‘Saailaazai, Timoti saraaihi yɨhɨthɨwa'de' mena yakɨlyɨ yarai dɨvila!’ duzideihɨlyɨra.” Sara wɨdaasɨna yɨna kya' a'mwera Anga Beriya kunnya angebanna ayɨna wɨna yeva yagaala sa' wɨde'.
Anga Aathenɨzɨ Polɨ Saailaazarɨjɨ Timotirɨjɨ yemwaaida dara wanganake' “O, anga dava yuneba a'mwa'mwe a'mwera yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasa daaka!” Sara kada' kale naanga naanga wia'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kwazaakegaa' Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ wɨlɨna kya' Juyarajɨ Menyara Gotɨyarɨ dadɨvɨsarajɨ Polɨjɨ dɨnyɨna ye'. Dɨnyɨna yesa' yɨrɨka yuyagaa' a'mwera yɨkabadɨvɨsabanna a'mwe pwara bɨna kye' Polɨjɨ dɨnyɨna ye'.

Nabaai Epikuriyaazarebwi dadɨvɨsarajɨ Sɨtoyɨkɨyagaala dadɨvɨsarajɨ sɨdu'nakerajɨ Polɨjɨ dɨnyɨna ye'. Dɨnyɨna yeva pwara maanga wɨde' “Sɨdu'maayai yagaala pɨjaakuna dadei be yagaala nedɨvanɨka?” Polɨ Jizaazarɨnajɨ dɨkaasavɨnajɨ wɨjɨwaakake'na a'mwe pwara wɨde' “Menyaraavɨre kulakejɨ a'mwa'mwewaalyɨ wɨdɨvanɨkei dɨngaka?”
Sara yawɨ'na yeva Aarɨyopahaazɨ sawɨ kaajolɨyara mwaaihasabanna Polɨmɨ makuna yeva Polɨmɨ wɨde' “Yagaala mudɨka da' nedɨvanɨgɨnya'na yawɨraana!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨre yawɨta mudɨka pɨnɨ kadɨka wɨ'nona myawɨrivanɨgona. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sabwine dɨnejɨwaakya!” wɨde'.
Yuyagaa' Anga Aathenɨzɨ mwaalyarajɨ Menyara saba mwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ sara yagaala ge ge kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadɨvɨ' yagaala mudɨka sa dɨnyɨna yadɨvɨsare. Sarera yadɨvɨ' yɨlaaya yadɨvɨkɨ.
Aarɨyopahaazɨ kaajolɨyara mwaaidapiyaba Polɨ daavɨna yaka wɨda' “Aathenɨzɨ mwaalyaihi, a'mwa'mwe kwalaalyangɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhwangamwa.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨre angeba kaanya yamaryena a'mwa'mwengɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsabannengɨ tɨnna wanganena dara bɨ'mwa'de' ‘O, kwaraanyaba pɨkarya “Naangerɨ myawɨrivanɨgo'nesɨra,” yɨda'nɨke' daaka!’ Sara dena Naangerɨ myawɨrivanɨgasarɨ yaasɨwa'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasa'na yɨhɨzɨwaakɨma!

Naangei Gotɨyai Kwaaka davakɨjɨ yunebanna mwaaihasarajɨ kwaakevɨ yuya yɨ'naanya kurɨvaarɨya yuya wakakelyɨra. Sɨgunyasɨ Kwaakesɨ yuyangɨ maremwaaidelyɨ Naangei. A'mwera yɨleange madɨna yadɨvɨsangɨ mamwaalyɨka. Aawa.
Naangei sahwai a'mwe yuyaraavɨne mwaalya'nebulyɨ sɨmudɨnyasɨ yuyajɨ sangɨ wɨjaavade'na a'mwera gamɨnyɨne gara yapɨjɨ wɨjaavɨpɨ'delaka! Aawa, Naangei yuyangɨ wakakengɨra.

Yuyangɨ wakaka sɨnnawɨnyarɨ yavɨkaryaakerɨdaa'nyɨ anga naanga pimagɨnya gazavasava' Kwaaka yunebanna wɨmwaaihɨna ya'. A'mwera maayagaa' Naangei a'mwe yuyainaavɨna yawɨ'na ‘A'mwe gabinyaraavɨre kumɨre bwaibwalyajɨ kwaakejɨ kumɨregaasɨ wakɨma!’ yawɨ'na yaka dɨvi wɨmwaaihɨna ya'.

‘A'mwera nɨmɨnyɨ yawɨrapɨjɨ yaamɨjɨ nyanganapɨri nyɨbɨramaapɨ'deinyɨ daaka?’ sara daka sara wɨmwaaihɨna yaa'. Sara yaake' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ maavewɨ mamwaalyɨka. Aawa, a'mwe yuyainaayaba mwaaidelyɨ.
Savɨne'na pwai pɨkarya yɨdava'
‘Sahwarɨna kwaihwaainakeina kurɨnakeina mwaaiho nemɨre kaavɨlyai.
Sai mamwaalyɨ yadori kwajɨ nemɨ mamwaalyɨ kyaadɨ'.’
Sarɨmɨre sɨdu'nakera sara kyɨhɨzaa' yɨda'nɨkesɨ
‘Nemɨjɨ gamɨre kaimɨraayainera.’

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ, gamɨre kaimɨraayaina mwaaiho'na dara myawɨraanna! ‘Gotɨyai a'mwa'mwe golɨya'bɨsalyɨ. A'mwa'mwe sɨlɨvaaya'bɨsalyɨ. A'mwa'mwe sɨlaange'bɨsalyɨ. A'mwa'mwengɨ a'mwera nayaa yawɨreva yavɨkarigasangɨra. Sara myawɨraannera!’

Kɨgaa' a'mwera Gotɨyarɨna navɨka mwaalesara kayaa'na kye' sagaa' Gotɨyai yagaala yarai majai mwaala'. Yagaala majai mwaalake' kɨrɨ' dahaasagaa' yunebanna yuyaina mwaaihoinaavɨ nedɨvanɨ' ‘Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi mudɨkebwi jawɨramaaryɨla! (Nayaa dɨnyɨmɨdɨnyɨla!)’

Gotɨyai sara nedɨvanɨke' a'mwe yuyainaavɨna kotɨya naange' yɨda'maraangebwina nayaa yade yɨrɨka sagaa' wakɨkelyɨra. Nabaai, a'mwe yawɨbwa'derɨ dahɨlakakei kotɨya'na mena wɨmwaaiha'. A'mwe sai mena kabala' Gotɨyai ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. Sare' nemɨ tɨnna wanganona yawɨ'na ‘Ai, nebulyasɨ. Sai kotɨya' neyawɨbwaradelyɨ,’ yawɨ'na yɨvanɨgo,” Polɨ sara wɨda' Jizaazarɨna.

Sagaa' baryaraavɨ yɨdɨkaasabwine yagaalya'na pwara kadɨka wɨ'neva “Kwaasɨya'nesɨ,” deva bɨrala wɨdesa' kɨrɨ' pwara “Nebulya' dɨngaka?” deva wɨde' “Pɨgaa' sa'na ayawɨ kaneda'gɨzɨ kadɨka gu'naadeinera.”
Sara kude' pwara Polɨmɨre yagaalya' ku'ne' Polɨ yɨkabesaraavɨ ya'ma'na ya'.

Polɨmɨ wɨ'nesara ye'mwannamwaaina yeva Naangerɨ lɨmwagevera yɨma'nyɨna ye'. A'mwe pwai Daayonɨzɨyaazai kaajolɨyai Aarɨyopahaazɨ saba yadelyɨ a'mwe pɨrɨ' Damaarɨza' wo'nɨkesɨ pwarajɨ Naangerera yɨma'nyɨna yesarera.
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ Aathenɨzɨna ya'ma'na yaka Anga Koridɨna wɨna ya'.

Koridɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka Juyai Aakwilaa wo'nɨkerɨ wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna ya'. Aakwilaamɨ ganaange' Anga Podaazɨ maarakelyɨra. Sagaa' A'mwe Naangei Kɨlothɨyaazai wɨda' “Juyara yuyara nɨmɨre Angeba Romɨdaasɨ wɨpɨka!” Sara kuda' Kwaaka Yɨtaalidaasayoi Aakwilaajɨ gamɨre balaange' Pɨrɨzɨlasɨ Anga Koridɨ gaai mwaalɨna yagi. Gaai mwaalɨna yagɨlyayorɨ Polɨ tɨnna wanganna yaka angyɨrɨ'maata yɨna ya'.
Sai kwaabɨyɨvɨkange yavɨkaryamaryada nɨgwia yaasadelyɨra. Sayoi avaaiwawɨnya yadisa'na Polɨ sayoryaba mwaalɨna kya' sayolyɨ gamɨjɨ kwaabɨyɨvɨkange yavɨkarina ye'.
Yavɨkarina kye' Kwazaakegaa' yuyagaa' Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ pwarajɨ dɨnyɨna ye'. Sai yawɨ'na “Juyarajɨ Gɨrikɨyarajɨ Jizaazarɨ wɨ'nɨpɨka!” yawɨ'na kya' pwarajɨ dɨnyɨna ye'.

Kwaaka Maazathonɨyadaasaraai Saailaazalyɨ Timotilyɨ bamwaaina yagɨlyagaa' gamɨre kuryarɨ yɨbwakɨnaka yuyagaa' Polɨ Juyaraavɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'. Dara wɨjalɨkurakɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyai kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai dahɨlakakei Jizaazalyɨra.”

Kuna wɨjalɨkurakɨna yadaa'nyɨ Juya pwara gamɨnyɨna gaidaa'na yeva Polɨmɨ bɨrala yɨna kye' yawɨ'na yaka “Gotɨyare yagaala mu'nyɨ kyɨwaa' nɨmɨjɨ pwarajɨ yosɨnaade'nanyɨra.” Sara yawɨ'na yaka gannya kwaabɨhannyavɨre tɨrya purakɨrasɨ'na yaka wɨda' “Sarɨnnya kuryarajɨ tawesɨ wasɨ'nɨvanɨgasa'na sarɨmɨ saihi sara yɨvanɨga'. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sara myɨvanɨge. Gotɨyare yagaala nayaa yɨhɨthɨwa. Dahaa' sarɨmɨnyɨ mena yɨhya'mava'mujɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨdeinyɨra.”

Sara wɨdɨna yaka ya'ma'na yaka Tɨzɨyaazai Jaazɨtazare angevɨna wɨna yaka saba wɨjɨwaakya'na mwaalɨna ya'. A'mwe sare ange' Juyaraavɨre lotuangeyaba mannɨkebanyɨ. A'mwe sai Menyai Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yadelyɨra.

Gamɨre angevɨ Polɨ mwaalɨna kya' Kɨrɨzɨpaazai lotuangevɨ maremwaaidei Polɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨ'naka gamɨjɨyarajɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwanna ye'. Wi'na lɨmwanna kye' Koridɨ mwaalya kwalaalyara gamɨnyɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva sara lɨmwanna kye' Kɨraazɨtɨyarera aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yɨna ye'.
Sawɨta pɨgaa' Polɨ a'mabaaitɨnna wanganna ya'. Tɨnna wanganna yadaa'nyɨ Naangei wɨda' “Nɨmɨre yagaalya'na jɨkurya yɨvanɨgasaraavɨna lɨka minnera! Aawa. Kuna duthana! Maadɨnna minna!
Gɨmɨjɨ mwaaida' kagɨhaimwaga'mujɨ a'mwera kayaa'na mi gyɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. Anga dava nɨmɨrera kwalaalyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. Sare'na yawɨra'gɨzɨ gɨnnya wawɨnya' dɨragɨnna kuna jɨtheigɨnyɨ.”
Naangei sara kuda' kwarame pɨrɨ' lawe atina ata purɨdaasɨ pu'na wavɨla'daa'nyɨ anga savɨ mwaalaka a'mweraavɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'.
Romɨ mwaalyai Gaalɨyo Kwaaka Gɨriza maremwaaidei Ga'maanɨyai yɨma'nakegaa' Juyara yɨkabɨna yeva “Sarɨ kotɨya yaana!” dɨneva Polɨmɨ kotɨangebanna makuna ye'.
Makuna yeva Gaalɨyomɨ wɨde' “A'mwe dai a'mweraavɨ wɨdada ‘Mudɨkebwi Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya jɨla!’ wɨdadelyɨra. Sara yaaja' nemɨre Kɨwɨnya' kayaaka nyaadɨ'de'nanyɨ.”
Wi'na wɨdɨna kye' Polɨ “Savɨna wɨdɨma!” daka yakelyɨ. Gaalɨyo Juyaraavɨ yarai wɨda' “Juyaihi, sai kuka yajɨ kwajɨ kayaa'nanya yajɨ kwajɨ sarɨmɨre kotɨya' nɨmɨ nayaa kajawɨbwarakɨwɨdɨka.
Aawa, kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre yagaalyanna, yayanna, sarɨmɨre kɨwɨnyanna sarɨmɨ saihi dɨzawɨbwarakyɨla! Nɨmɨre wawɨnya' daaka! Sare majawɨbwarakɨwɨneinyɨ.”
Sara wɨdɨna yaka kotɨangevɨdaasɨ wɨdaasɨna ya'.

Wɨdaasɨna kya' a'mwera Sozɨthenɨzai Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ maremwaaiderɨ galalɨmwanna yeva kotɨangeyaba asajɨ mala tamɨna ye'. Mala tamɨna yadaapɨjɨ Gaalɨyo Ga'maanɨyai “Kumɨresɨ,” daka navɨka mwaalɨna ya'.

Sawɨta kwalaalya jɨnnadaa'nyɨ Anga Koridɨ Polɨjɨ neya'mwerajɨ mwaalɨna kye' sabadaasai ya'ma'na kya' Kwaaka Sɨrɨya sawɨnna sɨpɨya' gamɨjɨ Pɨrɨzɨlavɨjɨ Aakwilaamɨjɨ makuna ya'. Gotɨyarɨ yagaalya' sara wɨdake'na Anga Segɨrɨya Polɨ gannya mɨjata da'nyɨna yakelyɨra.
Kwaaka Ezɨya Anga Epazaazɨ sawɨnna yɨ'mavaawɨna kye' saba Pɨrɨzɨlavɨjɨ Aakwilaamɨjɨ mwaalɨna yagi. Mwaalɨna kyagi sai saba Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ wɨlɨna yaka Juyarajɨ Naangerɨna dɨnyɨna ye'.
Dɨnyɨna kye' Juyara yɨdaanganna “Naangegaa' gɨmɨjɨ mwalaadeina daaka?” Sara kye' kɨrɨ' “Aala!” wɨdaka
wɨda' “Gotɨyai kanyɨdaasojɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna bɨdeinyɨra.” Wɨdaka saba ya'ma'na kya' sɨpɨya' Anga Epazaazɨdaasɨ makuna ya'.
Kwaaka Juthɨya Anga Sizaarɨyana yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka Anga Jeruzaalemɨna yɨlaawɨna yaka Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨ wɨdɨna yaka Anga Aadɨyokɨna kaanna wɨna ya'.

Kaanna wɨna yaka saba saamɨnyagaa' mwaalɨna yaka pɨgaa' ya'ma'na yaka Kwaaka Galezɨya Kwaaka Pɨrɨzɨya kaanya yamarina yada Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ yagaala dɨragɨnna yɨvaimwanna kya' sahwara tewaanna mwaalɨna ye'.
Juya pwai Aapolɨzai wo'nɨkelyɨ. Anga Alekɨzaadɨrɨya ganaange' mudanga maarakelyɨra. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ nayaa yawɨ'dei Gotɨyarɨna yagaala nawɨ'nya' wɨdadelyɨ.

Pwara Naangereburɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yesai yɨlaaya naanga yada Jizaazarɨne sara yawɨ'da sara nayaa wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'. Nabaai Jonɨ a'mweraavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yakebwi yawɨ'da Jizaazarɨna yuyabwi myawɨri yadei wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'.

A'mwe sai Anga Epazaazɨna bɨna yaka Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ yagaala sa' dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna ya'. Wɨdɨna kya' Pɨrɨzɨlasɨ Aakwilaajɨ kadɨka wɨ'nagɨla kɨrɨnnya angevɨna a'mwe sarɨ yɨbwaramakuna yagɨla Gotɨyarebwi yuyabwi wɨjɨwaainyɨna yagi.

Dɨvi sagaa' “Kwaaka Gɨrizana wɨdera,” dɨna kya' neya'mwera Epazaazɨ mwaalyara “Aapolɨzai nayaa yamaryade'nanyɨ,” deva Kwaaka Gɨriza mwaalyara mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ paazɨya' yavɨkarina ye'. Ada' yavɨkarina yesa' “A'mwe dai Aapolɨzarɨ duzɨla ‘Nɨmɨre angevɨ angyɨrɨ'maata ja!’ ” Sara yavɨkarina kye' Aapolɨzai kaanna wɨna yaka yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka a'mwe saraavɨna Gotɨyai yanga wɨgaimwagakevɨna Naangerɨ lɨmwagesaraavɨ dɨragɨnna gaimwanna ya'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dɨragɨnna gaimwanna yakelyɨ Juyara malɨmwagyesarajɨ a'mweraayaba dɨnyɨna ye'. Sara dɨnyɨna yadaapɨjɨ Aapolɨzai dɨragɨnna yawɨraka kumɨre yawɨta sangɨ wavɨla'na ya'. Gotɨyare bukuya' wɨjɨwaainyɨna yaka wɨda' “Bukuya' yɨda'nɨke'na Gotɨyai dahɨlakakei Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazalyɨra,” sara dɨragɨnna wɨda'.

Kwaaka Gɨriza Anga Koridɨ Aapolɨzai mwaaidɨ'nyɨyagaa' Ezɨya kwaakevakɨ mugunyaba Polɨ lo'mavamaryɨna yaka Anga Epazaazɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna ya'. Yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨta pwaraavɨ wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna yaka
yɨwaara'na ya' “Naangerɨna lɨmwagesagaa' Gotɨyare Kuryarɨ damaarage'?” Yɨwaara'na kya' “Aawa, Gotɨyare Kuryarɨna nedɨwaanyai aaihwalaka? Kadɨka mu'nyadaanyainera,” wɨde'.
“Sahɨrɨ'na aaihware yɨhyetavaka bavɨtaazɨya sava?” yɨwaara'na ya' Polɨ. Yɨwaara'na kya' wɨde' “Jonɨmɨre bavɨtaazɨyabwi neye'.”

Sara kude' Polɨ wɨda' “Kɨgaa' Jonɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yada a'mwera mudɨkebwi yawɨramaa'dɨvɨ' bavɨtaazɨya wiada Yɨzɨrelɨyareraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna ya' ‘Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ batherɨna jawɨralɨmwagyɨla!’ Jonɨ sara wɨjɨwaakakei Jizaazalyɨra.”
A'mwera kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna kye' Naanga Jizaazare yaya'na bavɨtaazɨya yɨna wia'.
Bavɨtaazɨya mena yɨna wiaka Polɨ kumɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ ata dathɨwanna kya' Kuryai Tewaanyai bulamwaaina kya' yagaala ge gengɨ wɨdɨna yeva, nabaai, Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaake'.
Wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakesara yuyara sɨvɨlyɨraai ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyarera yɨlaaya yesara.
Juyaraavɨre lotuangevɨ Polɨ wɨlɨna yada lawe dɨkaai dɨkɨ dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakɨna yadei “Juyarajɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨvɨsarajɨ Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaiderɨna wɨ'nɨpɨka!” daka wɨjɨwaakɨna ya'.

Wɨjɨwaakɨna kya' kɨrɨ' pwara myawɨri yadɨvɨ' mu'nyɨ yeva yuyaraayaba Naangerebwina bɨrala ye'. Bɨrala yɨna kye' Polɨ saraavɨre lotuangevɨ ya'ma'na yaka Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ makuna. Makuna yaka yɨrɨka yuyagaa' Tiraanazare wɨjɨwaakɨangevɨ Jizaazare yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨna yakelyɨ.
Wɨjɨwaakɨna yada naangegaa' kwarame pɨrɨwaai wavɨla'daa'nyɨ sagaa' Kwaaka Ezɨya mwaalyara yuyara Juyarajɨ Menyarajɨ sara Naangere yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna ye'.
Gotɨyai gannya dɨragɨnya' Polɨmɨna wɨjaavɨna kya' Polɨ nawɨ'nya kya' a'mwera atɨka maru'na'na yadɨvɨkɨ.

Pwara aagɨzipɨyajɨ kwaabɨhannyajɨ Polɨmɨre kɨlaakevɨ yewaa'bwa'nakengɨ makuna yeva nabalɨnakeraavɨ dathɨvalakɨna kye' nabalɨnakera tewaanya mwaalɨna ye'. Nalaaya mena yɨwɨna kya' nabaai pwaraavɨre munyɨkaavɨdaasɨ yɨmakera bwalyuna ye'.

Polɨ sara yadaa'nyɨyagaa' Juyara kaanya yamaryadɨvɨ' yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdaasadɨvɨsara pwara yawɨ'na “Naanga Jizaazare yaya'na yɨmakeraavɨ wɨdasaana!” Sara yawɨ'na yesara yɨmakeraavɨ wɨde' “Polɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkei Jizaazarɨne yaya'ne'na dɨragɨnna gɨthaasɨma! ‘Dalyona!’ ”
Sara wɨdesara Juyai Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'de naangei Sivaayare gawaalɨvaanga ata yuyi ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyarera.
Sahwara sara kude' yɨmakei wɨda' “Jizaazarɨ yawɨ'mwe' Polɨmɨna yawɨ'mwe' kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ bewaihɨlaka?”

Mi'na kuda' a'mwei yɨmaka widei sahwaraavɨ yarai pɨlawasɨ'naabɨna yaka dɨragɨnna tamɨna yaka kayaaka yɨgalaka dathɨwanna ya'. Dathɨwanna kya' gamɨre angevɨ yarai bwalyuna yeva wa'wenakera kannyɨmaayara lɨkaanya wɨna ye'.

Lɨkaanya sara wɨna kye' sa'na Juyarajɨ Menyarajɨ Epazaazɨ mwaalyara yuyara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva lɨka dɨkwosɨ'na yeva “Jizaazai Naangelyɨra. Gamɨre yaya' naangesɨ. Gamɨre yaya' nayaa kavena daana!” dɨnyɨna ye'.
Nabaai savɨne'na Jizaazarɨ lɨmwagesara kayaa'nanyabwi yesa'na a'mweraayaba kunnya kayaa'nanyabwina wɨdɨna ye'.

Pwara bulaasangɨjɨ kwalyangɨjɨ gɨri'nyangɨjɨ yadɨvɨsara kunnya pɨkarɨyɨkwiajɨ kunnya bukuyajɨ sangɨnebwi yɨda'nɨkengɨ makabɨna makabɨna yeva a'mweraayaba dɨka marira'na ye'. Bukuya sangɨne nɨgwia ata gɨleva pwara dɨnyɨna ye' “Nɨwaava, kɨgaa' a'mwera kinaaya 50,000 mubesarera. Nɨwaava.”
Kɨraazɨtɨyarera sara tewaanna kye' Naangere yagaalya' dɨragɨnya' yɨma'nyɨna kya' saba yunebanna a'mwe yuyara kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadɨvɨ' a'mwe kwalaalyara Naangerera yɨma'nyɨna ye'.

Sa yɨma'nakegaa' Kurya Tewaanyai Polɨmɨ nayaa kyɨwɨrya' Polɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'na “Pɨrovijɨ Maazathonɨya Pɨrovijɨ Gɨriza kaanya yamarya'mujɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨna wɨdeinyɨra.” Yawɨ'na yaka da' “Savɨna wawa'mujɨ Anga Romɨna wanganaawɨdera.”
Mi'na daka Timotilyɨ Yɨrazɨtaazalyɨ saraai Gotɨyare wawɨnya'na wɨdaayadɨvɨsarajɨyaraarɨ wɨdɨna “Maazathonɨyana bwaanyɨla!” wɨdaasɨna yaka Kwaaka Ezɨya pɨzɨ'gwa mwaalɨna ya'.
Sagaa' Epazaazɨ mwaalya pwara Naangerebwina gamɨreraavɨ kayaa'na ye'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai Dɨmitɨrɨyaazai sɨlɨvaaya yavɨkarina yadelyɨ gamɨjɨyarajɨ sara Kwaasɨ Naanga Aatemizavɨre ange'bɨta maalɨkengɨ yavɨkaryadɨvɨsarera. Pwara dara wanganesa' “Ai, sɨlɨvaaya anga nawɨ'nya darɨka!” Deva nɨgwia naangejɨ mubɨna ye'.
Nɨgwia naangejɨ mubadaapɨjɨ Dɨmitɨrɨyaazai gamɨjɨyaraavɨjɨ avaaiwawɨnya yadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ wɨda' “Jɨkabyɨla!” Wi'na kuda' yɨkabɨna kye' wɨda' “A'mweihi, nemɨre wawɨnyavɨna nɨgwia naanga ma'daanyasɨra.

Nayaa yawɨ'manɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Polɨ yɨvanɨke' tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Dara wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨ' ‘Naangeraavɨ sarɨnnya asajɨ yavɨkaryesara gotɨyara mɨka. Sabwi kwaasɨyasɨ.’ Wɨjɨwaakada anga davɨjɨ Kwaaka Ezɨya yunebajɨ a'mwe kwala bwa'naanya naange' kadɨka wɨ'neva nemɨrebwi yagalya'maveva sabwi mɨdɨmanɨga'.

Kwalaalyara sara yadaapɨjɨ Polɨ ayɨna wɨdɨna wɨdɨna kyojɨ a'mwe pwara nemɨre wawɨnya'na dɨnyɨna ‘A'mwera sa yavɨkaryadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanaangesɨ,’ dɨnɨpɨ'desɨ. Nabaai sa' gave' mɨka. Nemɨre Naanga Aatemizavɨre yɨleanga' yaasɨwakanga' yɨma'nade' dɨngaka? Naangevɨre dɨragɨnya' waryaanya yɨma'nade' daaka? Naange' Kwaaka Ezɨya mwaalyarajɨ Kwaaka yuyavakɨ mwaalyarajɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasa' waryaanya' yɨma'nade' midaaka Aatemiza'!”
Kwala bwa'naanya' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' “Aala!” dɨdɨvɨ' sɨnna tɨka davɨna kwia' jaka naanga wɨde' “Aawa! Epazaazɨ mwaalyainaavɨre Aatemiza' dɨragɨnyasɨra.”

Jaka naanga sara dɨwɨna kye' pwara anga yuneba jaka sara wɨde'. Jaka wɨdadɨvɨ' Gaayaazalyɨ Aarɨzɨtaakazalyɨ saraarɨ galalɨmwanna ye'. A'mwe saraai Kwaaka Maazathonɨya mwaalyaraalyɨ. Polɨjɨ kaanya yamaryadisaraalyɨ. Saraarɨ galalɨmwanna yeva yɨkabadɨvɨsabanna yarai makuna ye'.
Makuna kye' Polɨ yawɨ'na “Kaanna wawa'mujɨ kwala bwa'naanyavɨ wɨdaawɨma!” Yawɨ'na kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara lɨmwanna yeva wɨde' “Arɨkawɨnyɨ. Nagɨrabɨthɨka! Dava mwaaidɨnneigɨ kave dɨmwaala!”
Nabaai, kwaaka savɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta pwara Polɨmɨ gya'mwera gamɨnyɨ yagaalya' wɨdaase' “Polɨ, naange' gɨthɨvanɨgo. Yɨkabadɨvɨsabanna mwidɨnnera!”
Kudaase' sagaa' kwala bwa'naanya sɨdu'maayara jaka kuna wɨdɨna ye'. A'mwe kwalaalyara “Sasare'na mwaaihosɨra,” majara yaasɨwa'na mwaalɨna kye' pwara jaka ge' wɨdadaapɨjɨ pwara jaka ge' dɨna dɨna ye'.

Jaka dɨna dɨna kye' Juyara Alekɨzaadarɨ yagaala wɨjɨwaakya'na wɨrɨvɨta'na kye' pwara kwaasɨ yawɨ'na ye' “Sarɨna jaka naanga dɨvanɨgo.” Yawɨ'na yadaapɨjɨ Alekɨzaadai yawɨ'na “A'mweraavɨ Juyainaavɨna ‘Nemɨ kayaa'na myadaanyainera,’ wɨjɨwaakɨma!” Yawɨ'na yaka a'mweraavɨ ata wɨdathɨwaga'.

Ata dathɨwanna yadaa'nyɨ dara wanganesa' “Ai, a'mwe sai Juyai daaka! Saibɨsara nemɨre Naangevɨ kayaa'na dadɨvɨsara daaka!” Sara deva yuyara jaka naanga dɨna “Epazaazɨ mwaalyainaavɨre Aatemiza' Naangesɨra,” dɨna yadaapɨjɨ jaka naanga bazɨwawesara naangegaa' (tu aawaaya) wavɨla'na ya'.

Dɨvi a'mwe naangei Anga Epazaazɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwia yavɨkaryadei kwala bwa'naanyavɨ kuda' “Yagaala madɨpɨna!” a'mwera kave mwaaidapɨjɨ wɨda' “Epazaazɨ mwaalyaihi, a'mwe yuyara yawɨ'manɨgasa' ‘Epazaazɨ mwaalyara Naanga Aatemizavɨre yɨleangesɨ sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ sɨlaanga dɨragɨnya' bwalaryaakesɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsarera,’ sara yawɨ'manɨga' yuyara.
‘Savɨ nebulya'na mɨka,’ majɨvanɨgasare. Arɨkewɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kave dɨmwaalyɨla! Sɨdu'nakeihi kayaa'na mipɨnera!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe daraarɨ makabɨwaasaraai Aatemizavɨre yɨleangevɨ kuka mipalamaryɨwaala. Nemɨre Naangevɨna bɨrala myɨwaala!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Dɨmitɨrɨyaazalyɨ gamɨjɨyarajɨ dɨnyɨna ‘A'mwe pwarɨ kotɨya'na wɨdaana!’ dɨnyɨna yɨpɨja' kotɨyagaa' a'mwe naangeraayawɨnna kwawapɨjɨ yagaainaka salyɨ sahwarajɨ kamwaalapɨjɨ jawɨbwarakɨpɨ'dera.
Yagaala pɨrɨ' warɨke' daakajɨ a'mwera nayaa kyɨkabapɨjɨ, sagaa' dɨzɨla!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dahaa' sara yɨvanɨgasa'na ga'maanɨyara ‘A'mwera kayaa'na yɨvanɨgasara daaka!’ dɨnɨpɨ'jɨwaava? Jaka naange' wɨdɨvanɨgasaihɨrɨna naangera kanedapɨjɨ ‘Baa'na dɨvanɨgasaihɨlaka?’ nemɨ gara wɨdaazɨwona! Aawano, nemɨ yagaala mujɨ yaadeinera.”
Sara wɨdaka wɨda' “A'mweihi sarɨnnya angengɨ dɨwila!” Kuda' kaanna wɨna ye'.

A'mwera kayaa'na yesagaa' wavɨla'na kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara yɨkabya'na Polɨ pwaraavɨ wɨdaasɨna ya'. Wɨdaasɨna kya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsara yɨkabɨna kye' yɨvaimwagya'najɨ dɨhaa'bwasa'najɨ yagaala wɨdaka wɨda' “Kaanya wɨdera. Tewaanya dɨmwaalyɨla!” Mi'na wɨdaka Maazathonɨya sawɨnnei ya'ma'na ya'.
Ya'ma'na yaka kwaaka sangɨ yagaala naanga a'mweraavɨ dɨragɨnya' dɨhaa'bwasa'na wɨjɨwaakada kaanya yamarina ya'. Kaanya yamarina yaka Kwaaka Gɨrizana yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka

saba lawe dɨkaai dɨsa wavɨla'daasɨ mwaalɨna ya'. Mwaalɨna yaka “Sɨpɨya' Kwaaka Sɨrɨyana nyɨmakwodera,” yawɨraka dara wɨ'nake' “O, Juyara Polɨnyɨ nyɨramakɨpɨ'dera daaka!” Sara daka “Maazathonɨyana ayɨna wɨlaawɨdeinyɨra.”

Yawɨ'na kya' gamɨjɨ Sopaatai Pɨraazare gawaalɨ' Beriya mwaalyalyɨ Tezalonaaika mwaalyaraai Arɨzɨtaakazalyɨ Sekaadazalyɨ saraalyɨ Devi mwaalyai Gaayaazalyɨ Timotilyɨ Kwaaka Ezɨya mwaalyaraai Tɨkikaazalyɨ Tɨropimaazalyɨ saraalyɨ wɨna ye'.
A'mwe ati ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyara sɨnnawɨ waanyɨna yeva Anga Tɨrawaazɨ nemɨnyɨna yemwaaina neye'.

Yemwaaina neyadaapɨjɨ Munne Gɨrɨkula lɨwɨnya pamidakɨna myadehaa' mena wavɨla'na kya' sagaa' Anga Pilipaai sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo sawɨta atina wavɨla'daa'nyɨ sɨpɨya' nemakwawa'. Mi'na kanemakwawa' Anga Tɨrawaazɨ yemwaalesaraavɨ wɨjɨma'naawɨna yona yɨrɨka ati ata purɨdaasɨ pɨrɨkaai kanevɨlava' mwaalɨna yo.

Sagaa' wikɨya mudɨke' yɨma'nyɨna kya' Naangerɨ dɨnya'nerajɨ yɨkabɨna yona gɨrɨkula gunyɨna, nyɨna yo. Wapaaya tɨvɨ nyɨna kyo Polɨ a'mweinaavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna neya'. “Mwanyavɨ kaanya wɨdera,” daka wɨjɨwaakɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna kya' kalawawe' yɨma'nyɨna ya'.
Anga sa' mɨnye dawaai dasa' laannɨkevɨ ku'dɨka munyabanyavɨ wɨlamwaaloba dɨ'baaka naanga warakeba.

Dɨ'baaka naanga warake'najɨ Polɨ yagaala naanga kuna wɨdake'najɨ Mɨgɨnya Yutɨkaazai widɨwaayaba yɨlamwaaina yaka se'na naanga winyɨna kya' amamaze waraka munya ke'bevadaasɨ kwaakevɨna bwalabaihɨ'nyɨna ya'. Bwalabaihɨ'nyɨna kya' pwara yarai walaawɨna yeva dara wanganesa' “O, baryai daaka!”
Sara kade' kɨrɨ' Polɨ walaawɨna yɨna yaka gamɨnyɨ maramujɨre'na yaka pwaraavɨ wɨda' “Kɨnna madɨpɨnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwaihwaainakei mwaalɨ'. Mabaihɨ'nyɨwa'.”
Wɨdaka anga munyabanyavɨna ayɨna yɨlaawaka wapaaya gunyɨna yaka nyɨna ya'. Mi'na nyɨna yaka yagaala pɨnɨ wɨdɨna yaka yɨrɨka mi'na purakegaa'na ya'ma'na ya'.
Ya'ma'na kya' pwara mɨgɨnyai balaka ayɨna dɨkaavakerɨ gamɨre angevɨ mare'na yeva yɨlaaya yɨna yeva mwaalɨna ye'.
Polɨ neda' “Sɨpɨyavɨ kwawapɨjɨ kwaakaanya wawa'mujɨ Anga Aazozɨna yɨhɨzɨma'naabɨdeinyɨ.” Nedakei wɨna kya' sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo Anga Aazozɨna sɨpɨya' makuna neya'.
Makuna kaneya' Anga Aazozɨ Polɨ newɨra'nɨjɨmaa'naka sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kya' Anga Mitɨlinina nemakwawa'.
Sabadaa'nyɨ nemakwawaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Ahu'manna Kaayozɨ wavɨlavaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Ahu'manna Semozɨna nemakwawaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Anga Maalitaazɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna ya'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Polɨ neda' “Jeruzaalemɨ yarai wawa'mujɨ Munne Pedikozɨyagaa' saba mwaalɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Pɨrovijɨ Ezɨya naangegaa' mwaalɨna mwaalɨna myɨwɨjainyɨ Anga Epazaazɨ wavɨlavaadera.” Nedakei Maalitaazɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yo.
Maalitaazɨdaasɨ Epazaazɨna yagaalya' wɨdaasɨna ya' “Naangeihi, Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyara Epazaazɨ mwaaihasaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaihi jɨkabyɨla!”
Sarɨ wɨdaasɨna kya' a'mwe sara bɨna kye' wɨda' “Yɨrɨka aayagaa' Pɨrovijɨ Ezɨyana gaai bena yuyagaa' saba mwaaideriyagaa' sarɨmɨjɨ mwaalena yuya sabwi yeinyɨna yawɨ'mwaava.

Nabaai, Naangere wawɨnya' wɨdaayadɨnyainyɨ dɨragɨnna yena ‘Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨ,’ dadɨ a'mwera kayaa'na kanye' nɨmɨ kɨnna daheinyɨra taanga nyadaasɨna. Juyara yawɨ'na ‘Polɨmɨ tamakaana!’ yawɨ'na yeva kayaa'na kanye' taanga naanga nyake'na yawɨ'mwaava.
Yuya kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨja'na sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨgaimwanga yuya sara yɨhɨzɨwaake. Yagaala pɨnɨ mwarika. A'mweraayaba yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨ sarɨnnya angengɨ yɨhɨzɨwaake'na yawɨ'mwaava.
Juyaraavɨjɨ Menyaraavɨjɨ avaaina nayaa wɨjalɨkurake. Sarɨnnya kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'napɨjɨ Gotɨyarebwi yawɨramaarapɨjɨ Naanga Jizaazarɨ dɨlɨmwagyɨla! Sara myɨ yapɨjɨ Dɨkevɨ namwaaibɨthɨka!
Sara kude dahaa' Kuryai Tewaanyai sara kanyɨdɨwa'dɨ' ‘Jeruzaalemɨna dɨwona!’ yɨthaanyi, wɨla nyɨvwɨyɨnɨkeinyɨ sara yɨvanɨge saba nɨmɨnyɨna pwara nyɨpɨ'de'na myawɨryɨvanɨgeinyɨra.
Gave pɨrɨ'na yawɨ'mwa. Anga yuyangɨ wa'mwa'dezɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai dɨragɨnna nyɨda' ‘Kalavuzangevɨ gɨmwaaihɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨna kayaa'na yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ,’ sara yawɨ'mwa.

Dara wangamanɨge' ‘Mwaaihe'na maalɨke' daaka!’ Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ'na myawɨrivanɨge. Naanga Jizaazai nyɨdaasake'najɨ Naangei gannya wawɨnya' kanyɨjaava' sa' yuya yɨde'najɨ yawɨ'manɨge. Wawɨnya sa' yagaala tewaanya' jalɨkurakya'ne' ‘Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ yange'na wɨgaimwagathelyɨ,’ wɨdadɨnya'ne' nɨmɨre wawɨnya sasaresɨra.
Sarɨmɨnyaba kaanya yamaryegaa' Gotɨyai nemaremwaaide'na tewaanyabwina yɨhɨzɨwaakage. Yɨthaanyi, dahaa' dara yawɨ'mwa. Dɨvidaasɨ aane pwaigɨ kwaigɨ tɨnna manyanganyɨ jɨtheigɨnyɨ.
Sarevɨ dahaasagaa' nebulya'na yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨma! Gɨnnya kuryarɨ marasɨ'naja' gɨmɨre tawevɨna nɨmɨre' mɨ'. Aawa. Gɨmɨresɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai yade yuyangɨnajɨ gamɨre sɨmunyavɨnajɨ yɨhɨtheinyɨ. Yagaala pɨrɨ' lɨka myulyakye.

Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sarɨnnya kuryaraavɨ nayaa maremwaaina jɨla! Nabaai, Kuryai Tewaanyai sarɨmɨre wawɨnya' kyɨhɨzaava' sare'na Naangereraavɨ sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaalyɨla! Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara maremwaaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaalyɨla! Jizaazai gannya gawaalɨ' kabala' Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ mubɨna ya'. Naangere tawesɨ mubɨna ya'.
Dara yawɨ'mwa. Kaanya kwawa'mujɨ sarɨmɨnyabanna a'mwera kavɨjɨlɨkerabɨsara bapɨjɨ sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ kayaa'na wipɨ'derera.
Dɨvi sarɨmɨjɨya pwara yawɨ'na ‘Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsara gevwina nyɨmɨdɨbɨka! Mwagi'namaarɨma!’ Yawɨ'na yapɨjɨ daavɨna yapɨjɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Savɨne'na nyɨpɨdɨka! Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Dara jawɨrila! ‘Kwarame dawaai dasa wavɨla'daasɨ yɨrɨkejɨ sawɨsajɨ Polɨ nɨmɨre kuryarɨna kɨnna daka nemɨjɨya pwarɨ kwarɨ nayaa nejɨwaaka'.’

Dahaa' Gotɨyare asɨrɨna yɨhɨmwaaihɨvanɨge. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨna yange'na wɨgaimwadere yagaalya'na tewaanya yɨhɨmwaaihɨvanɨge. Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyai dɨragɨnyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihade'na sarɨmɨjɨ pwaraavɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakakeraavɨ kayaa'nanyanna duimwagasɨ'nakerajɨ gannya yuya tewaanaanga yɨhɨzaavadengɨra.
Aane pware kware nɨgwiajɨ kwaabɨhannya baazɨ'ma'nya sazajɨ wabarɨnna mwanganyeinyɨra.
Arɨkewɨ, sarɨmɨ saihi mi'na nyawɨ'mwaava. Nɨnnya asɨlyɨ yɨna yɨna yena nɨgwia maarena nɨmɨnyɨnejɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnya yadaanyaraavɨnejɨ mube'na nyawɨ'mwaava.

Yuyagaa' sara ye'na yɨhɨzɨwainyawaaiheinyɨ. Nɨmɨ sara yebwina jɨla! Dɨragɨnna yapɨjɨ nɨgwiajɨ asɨlyɨ a'mwe waryaanyaraavɨ duhaimwagyideihɨlyɨ. Savɨna sɨnnawɨ Naanga Jizaazai neda' ‘Pwara daapɨna yɨpɨ'de'na yɨlaaya maalɨka yadɨvɨ' tewaanya winadere. Pwara yanga wɨjaavɨpɨ'de'na yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winade'nanyɨ.’ Sara nedake'na nayaa jawɨrila!”
Polɨ mena wɨdakegaa' kumɨjɨ gamɨjɨ kwadaai gɨlɨna kye' Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨda'.
Mi'na kuda' kɨnna deva galamujɨ'na yeva yɨlaaya marina ye'.
Gannya yagaalya' “Dɨvidaasɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ dɨnyideihɨlyɨ,” wɨdake'na kale wia'. Kale wiadaa'nyɨ sɨpɨyavɨna gamɨnyɨ yenaasɨna yesare.

A'mwe naangeraavɨ ya'ma'na yona sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo sɨpɨya' makuna neyaka Ahu'manna Kozɨna yɨda'na nayaa makuna neya'. Makuna neyaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Anga Rozɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yaka sabadaasɨ Anga Pataarana makuna neya'.
Makuna kaneya' dara wangano' “Kwaaka Pɨnɨzɨyana sɨpɨya pɨrɨ' wawade' daaka!” Sara dona sɨpɨya savɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo makuna neya'.

Makuna neyadaasɨ Ahu'manna Saaipɨraazɨ tɨnna wanganna kyo pimagɨ kwanaamimagɨ wavɨla'na yaka Kwaaka Sɨrɨyana makuna neya'. Anga Taayaa saba gɨlyɨvɨta yuya sɨpɨyavɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨya wakya'na sabanna makuna neya'. Makuna kaneya' Anga Taayaa sɨpɨyavɨdaasɨ bwalaawɨna yo.

Bwalaawɨna yona Jizaazarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨta pwaraavɨ bɨrɨna yona kumɨnyaba wikɨya pɨrɨ' mwaalɨna yo. Saba mwaalɨna yadozɨ Kuryai Tewaanyai Taayaa mwaalyaraavɨ Polɨmɨna pwara kayaa'na yɨpɨ'de'na wɨjɨwaainyɨna kya' sahwara Polɨmɨ wɨde' “Jeruzaalemɨna yɨlaawɨna minnera!”

Sara kude' kɨrɨ' kaanyagaa' wikɨya' mena wavɨla'na kya' ya'ma'na yoinera. Angaba mwasabanna Kɨraazɨtɨyarera a'mwerajɨ kunnya a'mwejɨ kunnya kaimɨraayajɨ yuya makuna neye'. Makuna kaneye' aalɨmaangebaarɨ kwadaai gɨlona Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna yo.
Mi'na wɨdɨna yona dɨnyɨna “Nemɨreihi tewaanna dɨwila!” Dɨnyɨna kyo sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo kunnya angengɨna wɨna ye'.
Anga Taayaa sɨpɨya' ya'ma'na yaka Anga Tolɨmezɨna kuna makuna kaneya' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne neya'mweraavɨ ata bwa'nona kumɨnyawɨ sawɨta pɨrɨvɨ se wa'mwa'na yo.

Se wa'mwa'na yona sɨpɨyavɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo saba ya'ma'na yaka Anga Sizaarɨyana yɨ'mavaawɨna ya'. Yɨ'mavaawɨna kya' Jizaazarɨna yagaala tewaanya' wɨdadei Pilipɨmɨre angevɨ wawona saba wa'mwa'na yo. Jeruzaalemɨ a'mwe atina ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ dahɨlakesalyɨ Pilipɨ.
Gamɨre sɨdɨraaya dawaai dawaalyangɨ kwala mamaa'nya Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakesangɨra.
Saba mwaaidozɨ yɨrɨka pɨnɨ wavɨla'na kya' Aahavaazai wo'nɨkei Kwaaka Juthɨyadaasai walaabɨna ya'. Walaabɨna yakei Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadelyɨ.

Walaabɨna yaka nemɨnyawɨnna bɨna yaka Polɨmɨre munnaanya' maarɨna yaka gannya asɨraalyɨ gannya sɨvɨlyɨraalyɨ sangɨ marayegipwɨyɨnyɨna yaka wɨda' “Kuryai Tewaanyai kanedɨwakɨra ‘Munnaanya davɨre gyakwarɨ Jeruzaalemɨ Juyara dara marayegipwɨyapɨjɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨre asɨraavɨ marɨmwangɨpɨ'delyɨra.’ ”
Sara kuda' kadɨka wɨ'nona nemɨjɨ saba mwaalyarajɨ saina kɨnna dona Polɨmɨ wɨdo, “Jeruzaalemɨna milaawɨnnera!”

Sara kudo sai neda' “Be'na yɨvanɨgataihɨlaka? Kɨnna sara kanyɨmaredɨwaa' kale naanga nyɨwake'na be'na dɨvanɨgava? Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jeruzaalemɨ kalavuza pwɨyɨna nyɨpɨ'de'na nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna mwaaihe. Sa' wikɨra. Nabaai Naanga Jizaazarɨne yayavɨna nyɨramakɨpɨ'de'na dɨragɨnna mwaaiheinyɨra.”
Sara nedaka kuna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'na kya' yagaala pɨnɨ ayɨna mujɨ yona wɨdɨna yo, “Gotɨyai sɨmunyavɨ yawɨrade' sara yɨma'nana!”
Sizaarɨya saba mi'na mwaalɨna yona nemɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa yovɨrawakɨna yona Jeruzaalemɨneina ya'ma'na yo.

Kɨraazɨtɨyare mɨdɨdɨvɨsara Sizaarɨya mwaalya pwarajɨ yɨlaawɨna yona Mɨnezonɨmɨre angevɨna makwina kaneye' mwaalɨna yo. A'mwe Mɨnezonɨ Ahu'manna Saaipɨraazɨdaasai sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨnyaakelyɨra.
Jeruzaalemɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna kyo neya'mwera tɨnna wanganna neyeva yɨlaaya nemarye'.
Yɨlaaya kanemarye' yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Polɨjɨ nemɨjɨ Jemɨzarɨ tɨnna wanganya'na wɨna kyo Jemɨzai mwaalakeba Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨre a'mwe naangerajɨ mwaalɨna ye'.
Mwaalɨna kye' Polɨ “Nya'mweihi!” wɨdaka gannya wawɨnyavɨna ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraayaba Gotɨyai yake yuyanna wɨda'. Mi'na kuda' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva Gotɨyarɨna “Byaannakeigɨ!” yɨlaaya yɨna ye'.
Yɨlaaya yɨna yeva Polɨmɨ wɨde' “Neya'mweigɨ, davanna nayaa yawɨ'manɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Juyara kwala naange' Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨ' nabaai, Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya dɨragɨnna lɨmwamanɨgasare.

Sahwaraavɨ pwara gɨmɨnyɨna kwaasɨ wɨde' ‘Polɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨreba Juya yuyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaaka' “Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya' dasɨ'nyɨla! Sarɨmɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨre kɨlaakejɨ' madapɨnera! Juyaraavɨrebwi mipɨnera!” ’
Sara kwaasɨ kude' dara wɨ'nɨpɨ'de' ‘Davanna Polɨ jɨ'ma'mwaabɨka!’ Sara dapɨjɨyavɨdaa'nyɨ gara yaadeinaavaka?
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨthaade' ja! Nemɨrera daraai daraalyara Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna wɨja' kɨnɨnnakera kɨgaa' wɨdesa' sara yɨpɨ'derera.

A'mwe saraavɨ makwo'gɨzɨ kumɨjɨ Juyainaavɨrebwina gɨrɨka maayaigɨ yɨma'nya'na baaka mwadana! Kumɨnyɨne nɨgwia kwaka'gɨzɨ kunnya mɨjata da'nɨpɨ'dengɨra. Sara kya'gɨzɨ a'mwera tɨnna gwanganapɨjɨ dara yawɨpɨ'de' ‘O, pwara Polɨmɨna yuya nedeta kwaasɨ yagaalya' daaka! Gamɨ sahwai Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya' nayaa yɨvanɨkei damwaalɨka!’

Sara wɨdɨpɨ'de' kɨrɨ' ajɨmya yuyangɨyara lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨna paazɨya' mena wɨdaaso. Pɨkarya dara yavɨkarinɨke' ‘Nemɨ mi'na yawɨ'mwo' “Nyɨlyarɨjɨ Lawerɨjɨ pwaraavɨjɨ wɨjaavɨpɨja mɨwɨta wapaaya manɨnna! Yɨsaraavɨne wapaa yɨlaaya'ne manɨnna! Tawe manɨnna! Yɨkurɨyaawia gɨraabimwannɨke tawanake mavɨrenɨnna! Ata lɨmwagya'nebwi minnera!” sara wɨdo,’ ” wɨde'.

Mi'na kude' yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Polɨ a'mweraavɨ makuna kya' kumɨjɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya wasɨ'nya'ne yɨna ye'. Mi'na kye' Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlaka Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨda' “Wikɨya mena kwavɨlavojɨ a'mwe dara gɨrɨkita'nanya wasɨ'nya'ne yuna kyɨma'nojɨ sagaa' pwai sipɨzipɨya pɨrɨ' wakɨna. Pwai pɨrɨ' wakɨna, yuyaina Gotɨyarɨna wakaadengɨra.”

Yɨrɨka atina yaka ata purɨdaasɨ pɨrɨwaalyagaa' aya kɨgaa' mena kwavɨlava' Gotɨyare Angevɨ Juya pwara Kwaaka Ezɨyadaasara Polɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna ye'. Tɨnna wanganna yeva “Aakai, aakai,” kude' kwala bwa'naanya' yarai yɨkabɨna yeva yuyara jaka dɨna yeva gamɨnyɨ asajɨ galalɨmwanna ye'.

Gamɨnyɨ galalɨmwanna yeva jaka wɨde' “Yɨzɨrelɨyaihi, dɨnegaidaayɨla! A'mwe dai yuyaba kaanya yamaryada yuyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna ‘Yɨzɨrelɨyara kayaa'nanyarera. Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya' waryaanya'nesɨ. Gotɨyare Ange' tewaanya' mɨka,’ sara wɨjɨwaakadelyɨ. Nabaai, dahaa' Gotɨyare Angevɨ kayaa'nanaangei Menyara pwaraavɨ makulaabɨna yaka sara kayaa'na kyɨwa' nemɨre Anga tewaanya' gɨrɨkita'nanya' yɨma'nɨwakesɨ.”
Wɨdesa' dare'nesɨ. Pɨgaa' angeba Jeruzaalemɨ sahwara Polɨmɨjɨ Tɨropimaazai Anga Epazaazɨ mwaalyarɨjɨ tɨnna wanganesara kwaasɨ dara yawɨresa' “O, Gotɨyare Angevɨ Polɨ Menyarɨ bamakwimwakei daaka!”

Sara kude' Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyara yuyara jaka dɨna yeva yarai yɨkabɨna yeva gɨla'mwannemwaaina yeva gamɨnyɨ galalɨmwanna yeva Gotɨyare Angevɨdaasɨ mwasawɨnna mwagi'namaa'na ye'. Mwagi'namaa'na kye' sagaa' kaanyangɨ yarai tihɨ'na ye'.

Yarai tihɨ'na kye' kwala bwa'naanya' tamakya'na sahwarɨ tamɨna yadaapɨjɨ pwara Romɨya aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangerɨ yagaala wɨdaase' “Yarala! Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalya yuyara jaka dɨna, mala tannɨvanɨgava.”

Sara kudaase' maremwaaide naangei gannya aawɨlata maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ aawɨlata kwalaalyarajɨ yarai makuna yaka kwala naangeyawɨnna yarai walaawɨna ya'. Walaawɨna kya' a'mwera gamɨjɨ gamɨre aawɨlasarajɨ saraavɨ tɨnna wanganna yeva sahwarɨ ayɨna muramyɨ ye'.

Ayɨna muramyɨ kye' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangei Polɨmyawɨnna wɨna yaka lɨmwanna yaka gannyaraavɨ wɨda' “Senɨyabaraalyɨ dɨvwɨyɨla!” Wɨdaka kwala bwa'naanyavɨ wɨda' “A'mwe dai aaihwalaka? Berɨ' yɨwakalaka?”

Kwala bwa'naanyavɨ pwara yagaala pɨrɨ' jaka kude' pwara yagaala ge' ge' jaka wɨdɨna yesare. Avaalyagaa' jaka dɨna dɨna yadaapɨjɨ Polɨ yake'na naangei kadɨka mu'nyɨ yaka gannyaraavɨ wɨda' “Nemɨre aawɨlasainaavɨre angevɨna a'mwe darɨ dɨmakilaawila!”
Kuda' yɨtaavakulayaba makuna yeva a'mwera Polɨmɨ tamya'na besa'na aawɨlasara Polɨmɨ marikwavalɨmwanna yeva makuna ye'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kwala naanga yuya' mɨdɨnaabɨna yeva jaka naanga wɨde' “Tamakaana!”
Aawɨlasaraavɨre angevɨna Polɨmɨ makwodaapɨjɨ tɨkuryayaba sai aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangerɨ wɨda' “Gɨthɨwɨjainyɨ daaka?”
“O, Gɨrikɨyagaala dadɨnyaigɨ daa?” naangei yɨwaaravaka
wɨda' “ ‘Kɨgaa' Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalya sai “A'mwera kwaaka maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ yɨrawasaana!” daka a'mwamaayawɨnna yɨkamaanga kwalaalyara (4,000) kɨlɨ'nakeraavɨ makuna yakei daaka!’ sara yawɨ'mwana.”
Polɨ wɨda' “Aawa, Juyainyɨ sahwainyɨ Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨya Anga Taazazɨ mudanga nyɨmaarakeinyɨ. Anga naangeba mwaalyainyɨra. Nya'mweigɨ, ‘A'mwe daraavɨ duthana!’ kanyɨda'gɨri wɨdɨdeinyɨra.”
A'mwe naangei “Wikɨra,” kuda' sahwai yɨtaavakulyayaba yɨladaa'na yaka gannya asi a'mweraavɨna bathamakina kya' a'mwera yagaala majara kave mwaalɨna kye' Yɨvɨruyagaalya' wɨda'.
“A'mweihi, nya'mweihɨlyɨ nɨmaamaangeihɨlyɨ, yadɨnyainyɨrebwi yɨhɨthɨde' kadɨka dɨnyu'nyɨla!”
Yɨvɨruyagaalya' wɨdakevɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nabala'na yɨna yadaapɨjɨ pɨnɨjɨ wɨda'

“A'mweinyɨ Juyainyɨ. Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨya Anga Taazazɨ mudanga nyɨnaange' nyɨmaarake' kɨrɨ' Jeruzaalemɨ davanna yɨlaabena gɨryadaaveinyɨra. Dava a'mwe sɨdu'nakei Gamelɨyalɨ wo'nɨkei nyɨjɨwaaka'. Nyɨjɨwaakada nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre kɨwɨnya dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakɨna. Wɨjɨwaakɨna kanya' dahaa' dava mwaaihasaihi Gotɨyare yagaalya' nayaa lɨmwadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sahwainyɨ lɨmwanna ye.
Sareinyɨ a'mwera sabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ kayaa'na yɨna ye. Kayaa'na yɨna kye pwara balɨna ye'. Pwaraavɨjɨ pɨnɨngɨjɨ ata pwɨyɨna yena kalavuzangevɨ yarai wɨmarɨmwangɨna ye.

Nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangelyɨ Kaajolɨya yuyarajɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge' nyɨjalɨkurakyɨpɨnera. Nɨmɨ saraavɨ kude naangera nyɨgaimwagesara Juya neya'mweraavɨ Damaazɨkazɨ mwaalyaraavɨna paazɨya' yavɨkarina yeva nyɨjaave'. Sara yeva nɨmɨ yebwi yɨhɨthɨpɨ'desɨra. Paazɨya' kanyɨjaave' ‘Sawɨnna a'mwe dara sabwi lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsaraavɨ senɨyabarajɨ pwɨya'mujɨ “Daanga naanga wɨvɨnana!” da'mujɨ Jeruzaalemɨ ayɨna makabɨdeinyɨ,’ dena sawɨnna wɨna ye.”
Polɨ wɨda' “Kuna wodɨnyagaa' sɨrɨgwajahaa' Anga Damaazɨkazɨ aya kɨbanna badaazɨ sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ baaka naange' yarai mwadɨna nya'.
Yarai mwadɨna kanya' kwaakevakɨna wala'na kye maanguraaya' nya' ‘Solɨgɨ, Solɨgɨ, kayaa'na be'na nyɨvanɨgɨna?’
‘Naangeigɨ, aaihwaigɨnaka?’ ‘Jizaazainyɨ Naazaretɨ mwaalyainyɨ kayaa'na nyɨvanɨgɨnyainyɨ,’ nyɨda'.
A'mwera nɨmɨjɨ wawesara baaka naange' tɨnna wanganeva maanguraaya' nyakevɨ myu'nyesarera.
Nɨmɨ yɨwaara'na ye, “Naangeigɨ, berɨ' yɨjɨwana?” Sara yɨwaara'na kye Naangei nyɨda' ‘Daava'gɨzɨ Damaazɨkazɨna dɨwona! Saba pwai Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨna gyawɨ'mwake' yuya' gɨthathera.’
Kanyɨda' baaka naange'na tɨbaryainyɨ pwarajɨ wawora nɨmɨre asɨrɨ nyɨmaareva Damaazɨkazɨna yɨbwaramakuna nye'.
Saba a'mwei Ananaayazai wo'nɨkei mwaala'. Sai nemɨ Juyainaavɨre Kɨwɨnya mɨdɨdelyɨra. Juyara Damaazɨkazɨ mwaalya yuyara sarɨna jalɨkurakɨdɨvɨkɨ ‘A'mwe tewaanaangelyɨra.’
Mwaalakei nɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨna yaka nɨmɨnyaba daavɨna yaka nyɨda' ‘Nya'mwe Solɨgɨ, tɨnna ayɨna dangana!’ Sara kanyɨda' sagaa' tɨnna tewaanyaraai yarai yenyɨna yena sarɨ tɨnna wanganna ye.

Tɨnna wanganna kye Ananaayazai nyɨda' ‘Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨna jawɨ'de'na Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨ sɨnnawɨ dahɨlaka'. Gannya Yɨda'maraangerɨ tɨnna dangade'najɨ gannya maanguraayavɨ gɨthathe' kadɨka du'nade'najɨ sɨnnawɨ gɨthahɨlaka'.
Dɨvi gamɨre yagaalya' duthatheigɨnyɨ. A'mwe yuyaraavɨ tɨnna wangamwaanyajɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwaanyajɨ sa duzalɨkurakɨdeigɨnyɨra.
Sare'na dahaa' be'na jemwaaijɨwaana? Gɨmɨ daava'gɨzɨ gɨmɨnyɨ bavɨtaazɨya gyɨdeigɨnyɨ. Jizaazarɨne yaya' kuda'gɨzɨ gɨmɨre kayaa'nanyangɨ marasɨ'nadelyɨra,’ nyɨda' Ananaayazai.
Jeruzaalemɨna ayɨna bɨna yena Gotɨyare Angevɨ Gotɨyarɨ dadɨ a'mabaaitɨnna dara wangane' ‘Naangerɨ dangamwana!’
Sara kade a'mabaalyavɨ Naangei nyɨda' ‘Yarala, nɨmɨnyɨna duzalɨkurakɨde' dava mwaalyara mamaari gyɨpɨ'de'na Jeruzaalemɨdaasɨ jahalya'maka!’
Nɨmɨ wɨde. Naangeigɨ, mena nyawɨ'mwaava. Lotuangengɨ wawena gɨlɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨ kalavuzangevɨ marawɨmwaaihena naanna wɨramenna sara yawɨ'mwaava.
Nabaai, Sɨtivenɨ gɨmɨnyɨna wɨjalɨkurakaderɨ tamakadaapɨjɨ saba nɨmɨ sainyɨ mwaalena tamakya'na yɨlaaya yadɨ wɨramesaraavɨre yɨvɨsangɨ maredaavena.
Sara kude Naangei nyɨda' ‘Dɨwona! Nɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakya'na gɨthaasɨdera ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨna.’ ”

Polɨ wɨdadaasɨ a'mwera kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nyɨna kye' yagaala Menyaraavɨne' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yeva jaka naanga dɨna ye' “Tamakaana! Kwaaka davakɨ a'mwei sarerɨ marasɨ'nannelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gaala mwaalannei mwaalade' tewaanya'na mɨ'.”
Jaka sara dadɨvɨ' kunnya yɨvɨsajɨ purakɨ'na yeva tɨrya asa maarɨna yeva yɨlamarasɨ'naawɨna ye'.

Yɨlamarasɨ'naawɨna kye' Romɨyai aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangei yawɨ'na “Juyara a'mwe sarɨne jaka kayaa'nanya' be'na dɨvanɨgava? Sare'na sarɨ tamaana!” daka gamɨreraavɨ naanga wɨda' “Kaavɨlya' be'na dɨvanɨgava jakeva? Angevɨna yarai makwopɨjɨ wɨlyabaalyɨ duramyɨla sare'na!”
Kuda' aawɨlasara Polɨmɨ tamya'na pwɨyɨna kye' sai aawɨlata maremwaaidei daavakerɨ wɨda' “Sarɨmɨre kɨwɨnyabwi jɨvanɨgava? Romɨyarɨ kotɨya' myɨvanɨgasarɨ wɨlyabaalyɨ duramyide'na sarɨmɨrebwina daaka?”
Sara kuda' aawɨlata maremwaaidei yarai wɨna yaka aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangerɨ yɨwaarava' “Be'na yɨvanɨgɨna? Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sai a'mwemɨlɨ' mɨka! A'mwe sai Romɨyala!”
Maremwaaide naangei kadɨka sara wɨ'nyɨna yaka Polɨmyawɨnna yarai wɨna yaka yɨwaara'na ya', “Nyɨdana! ‘Romɨyaigɨ daaka?’ ” Yɨwaara'na kya' “Yayo,” wɨda' Polɨ.
Sara kuda' maremwaaide naangei wɨda' “Nɨgwia naanga naanga wakena Romɨyainyɨ yɨma'ne.” Sai wɨda' “Nɨmɨ sainyɨre nɨmaamaangei Romɨyai kyɨma'na' nɨmɨre mudangegaa' Romɨyainyɨ yɨma'nyɨna ye.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' a'mwera yawɨ'na “Polɨmɨ tamaana!” yesara gamɨnyawɨdaasɨ ayɨna sara wɨna kye' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangei yawɨ'na “Polɨ, a'mwe Romɨyalyɨ. Sa'na myawɨriwe tamya'na nɨmɨ sahwarɨ pwɨyɨwa. Aakai!” yawɨ'na yaka lɨka yɨna ya'.

Aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangei yawɨ'na “Juyara Polɨmɨna ‘Sai kayaa'na sara yɨwakelyɨ,’ nyɨdɨpɨ'devwi kayaa'nanyabwi yawɨrɨma!” Yawɨ'na yaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Polɨmɨ senɨyabaraai yaarɨna yaka yagaalya' Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Kaajolɨya yuyarajɨ saraavɨ “Jɨkabyɨla!” wɨdaasa'. Sara wɨdaasaka gamɨnyɨ makwalaawaka kumɨnyabanna walamaredavaawɨna ya'.

Polɨ Kaajolɨyaraavɨ tɨnna dɨragɨnna baihanaraka wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, kɨgaasɨ dahaasɨ yuyagaa' Gotɨyai nyangadaasɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya padaihɨrakyavɨ dara yawɨ'dɨ ‘Gotɨyarɨna nɨmɨrebwi tewaanyabulyɨ,’ sara yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ.”
Mena kuda' Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangei Ananaayazai Polɨmyaba daavesaraavɨ wɨda' “Gamɨre maangeburɨ dɨramyɨla!”
Polɨ wɨda' “Kwaasɨ yadɨnyaigɨ kurɨka kayaa'nanya pewɨnakeigɨ Gotɨyai gɨramadeigɨnyɨ. Saba Kɨwɨnyabwina kotɨya walamwaalagɨna nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Dɨramyɨla!’ dɨwaanya'na Kɨwɨnyaburɨ kayaaka yɨgaimwaana.”
Sara kuda' a'mwera gamɨnyaba daavesara wɨde' “Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei Gotɨyarerɨ bɨrala yɨwaana!”
Sai wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei mwaalɨkerɨna myawɨriwe sa'na wɨdɨwa. Dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨke' ‘Yagaala kayaa'nanya' gɨmɨre a'mweraavɨ maremwaaiderɨna madɨnnera!’ ” wɨda'.

Sahwai dara wanganake' “Ai, Kaajolɨya pwara Perɨzɨyara mwaaidapɨjɨ pwara Sazuzɨyara damwaaihava!” Sara daka Kaajolɨyaraayaba jaka wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, Perɨzɨyainyɨ. Perɨzɨyaraavɨ kuvɨbwaalɨvaangeinyɨra. A'mwe baryara dɨvi dɨkaapɨ'devwina yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨna dava kotɨya' nyawɨbwa'manɨgasainyɨra.”
Sara kuda' Perɨzɨyarajɨ Sazuzɨyarajɨ maanga dɨneva Kaajolɨyara jaapainyɨna ye'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe Sazuzɨyara dadɨvɨkɨ “Baryara kwaihwaainakera madɨkaayɨ yɨpɨ'derera. Ejelɨyara mamwaalyɨga'. Kuryara mamwaalyɨga'.” Sara dadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' Perɨzɨyara dɨkaasa'najɨ ejelɨyaraavɨnajɨ kuryaraavɨnajɨ wɨdadɨvɨsarera.

Sare'na maanga dɨnyɨna ye'. Maanga kuna dɨnyɨna yeva jaka naanga dɨnyɨna dɨnyɨna kye' pwara Perɨzɨyaraavɨ Kɨwɨjara daavɨna yeva dɨragɨnna wɨde' “A'mwe dai kayaa'nanyai mɨka! Kuryai dahawɨdaka? Ejelɨyai dahawɨdaka?”

Maanga naange' yɨma'nyɨna kya' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangei “Akai, Polɨmɨ nagalapɨripalakɨpɨdɨka!” daka Polɨmɨna lɨka yaka aawɨlasaraavɨ dɨragɨnna wɨda' “Yarala, a'mweraayabanna walaawapɨjɨ kumɨnyɨdaasɨ sahwarɨ maarapɨjɨ aawɨlasaraavɨre angevɨna dɨmakilaawila!”
Sagaa' sawɨsavɨ Polɨmyaba Naangei daavaka wɨda' “Dɨragɨnyaigɨ jɨma'nana! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jeruzaalemɨ dava nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa wɨjalɨkurakagɨnyabaaibɨ' Anga Romɨ menyaba avaaina duthatheigɨnyɨra.”

Mwanyavɨ Juya pwara yɨkabeva jamungajakɨna yeva dɨne' “Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna dɨvanɨgo. Polɨ mwaaidori nemɨ wapaayajɨ aalyasɨ manyɨ yaadeinera. A'mwe sarɨ mi'na tamakawaajɨ dɨvidaasɨ naadeinera. Sara mi kyawaajɨ Gotɨyai Dɨkevɨ nemarasɨ'nanneinera.”
A'mwera sara dɨnesara a'mweraare ata sɨvɨlyɨraalyarajɨ (40) pwarajɨ mwaalesarera.

Mi'na dɨneva Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ saraayawɨnna waweva wɨde' “A'mwe yuya daina Gotɨyai kadɨka newɨ'nadaasɨ dɨwo. Wapaaya manaanneina Polɨmɨ tamakaadeinera. Sare' ‘Gotɨyai Dɨkevɨ nanemarasɨ'nadɨka!’ dɨragɨnna dona nebulya'na yɨhɨthɨwo.

Sara dovɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨjɨ Kaajolɨya pwarajɨ Romɨyai aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangerɨ kwaasɨ yagaalya' duthaasɨla! ‘Polɨmɨ yagaala pɨnɨ wɨdaathe'na nemɨnyawɨnna dɨmakwalaabidelyɨra.’ Kɨrɨ' makwaidavadaapɨjɨ lɨka yulyarawaajɨ sahwarɨ karamakawaajɨ davanna mwalaabi yadelyɨra,” wɨde'.
Polɨmɨ gya'mwevɨre gawaalɨ' kadɨka dara wɨ'nake' “O, Juyara aapyarɨ tamakɨpɨ'dei daaka!” Daka wawaka aawɨlasaraavɨre angevɨ wɨlaka savɨna Polɨmɨ wɨdɨthaakuna.
Sara wɨdɨthaakuna kya' sai aawɨlata maremwaaide pwarɨ jaka wɨda' “Kaajo!” wɨdaka wɨda' “Gɨnnya maremwaaide naangeryawɨnna mɨgɨnya darɨ dɨmakwona! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yagaala pɨrɨ' wɨdɨthaakwadelyɨra.”
