Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aawɨlata maremwaaidei aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangeryawɨnna jɨvwaramakuna yaka wɨda' “Polɨ, kalavuzai jaka nyɨdaka nyɨdɨwa' ‘Mɨgɨnya dai yagaalyavɨ wɨdathe'na gɨnnya maremwaaideryawɨnna dɨmakwona!’ ”
Sara kuda' maremwaaide naangei mɨgɨnyare asɨrɨ maaraka saraai gaveraai mwaaidakɨlyɨyabanna jɨvwaramakuna yaka yɨwaara'na ya' “Be yagaala dɨnyɨdɨthaakwɨdevaka?”
Mɨgɨnyai wɨda' “Juyara mena yawɨreva mwanyagaa' yaamɨjɨ gyɨwaarapɨ'de ‘Kaajolɨyara Polɨmɨ yagaala pɨnɨ nayaa wɨ'nɨpɨ'de'na Kaajolɨyaraayawɨnna dɨmakwalaawa!’

Sara gyɨwaarapɨ'de' kɨrɨ' kadɨka mu'nɨnnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera a'mweraare sɨvɨlatɨraalyara lɨka yulyarapɨjɨ gamɨnyɨna yemwaaibɨ'derera. Sahwara yuyara Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna wɨdɨwaa' ‘Wapaayajɨ aalyasɨ manaanneina mwaidaa Polɨmɨ mena tamakawaajɨ dɨvidaasɨ naadeinera. Sara myɨ yaaja' Dɨkevɨ dɨnemarasɨka!’ Gɨmɨ kuda'gɨzɨ ‘Yo, Polɨmɨ waasɨma!’ tusavɨ tamakya'nera tavaravana yemwaaimanɨga'.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ maremwaaide naangei wɨda' “Sa' nyɨdɨwaa'na pwaraavɨ mudɨnna!” Sara daka pɨwɨnna mɨgɨnyarɨ wɨdaasɨna ya'.

Sagaa' maremwaaide naangei aawɨlata maremwaaideraarɨ jaka wɨdaka wɨda' “Anga Sizaarɨyana aawɨlata kwala naangesɨ (200) yovɨrawakapɨjɨ ozɨyaraavɨ yɨlamwaaidɨvɨta pɨjaakuna (70) sɨramɨnya saamɨnya lɨmwadɨvɨta kwala naangesɨ (200) yovɨrawakapɨjɨ sawɨsavɨ naainɨ kɨlokɨyagaa' dava ja'mayɨla!
Nabaai ‘Ozɨya pwara Polɨ yɨlamwaaladeraavɨ yovɨrawakakwoihɨjɨ Ga'maanɨyai Pilɨkɨzaryawɨnna a'mwe sarɨ nayaa makwalaawaka!’ dakɨlyɨ sara jɨla!”
Sara wɨdaka paazɨya' yavɨkarina ya'. Dara yavɨkarina yakesɨ.
Lɨzɨyaazai Kɨlothɨyaazainyɨ paazɨya da' tewaanyai Ga'maanɨya naangei Pilɨkɨzaigɨnyɨne' yavɨkarivanɨge. “Nɨnnya Pilɨkɨzai naangeigɨ!” gɨthɨwa.

Juyara a'mwe darɨ galalɨmwanna yeva tamakya'na “Tamaana!” de'. Sara dadaapɨjɨ dara wɨ'nɨwa'de' “A'mwe sai Romɨyai daaka!” Dena nɨmɨre aawɨlasarajɨ walaawena kumɨnyɨ walayɨpalamaa'na yena padaihasamaa'na yɨwa'de.
Nɨmɨ yawɨ'na ‘Juyara a'mwe darɨna be'na dɨvanɨgava? Kayaa'nanya' be'na dɨvanɨgava?’ Yawɨ'na yena Kaajolɨyaraayabanna sarɨ makwaimwa'daawade.
Makwalaawena kadɨka dara wɨ'nɨwa'de' “Ai, tamakya'najɨ kalavuzangevɨ wɨmwaaihya'najɨ kayaa'nanyabwi myawaalɨkei daaka! Kumɨre kɨwɨnyabwina gamɨnyɨ maanga duthɨvanɨgava!”

Sara yawɨ'mwa'deinyɨ yagaala pɨrɨ' pwai nyɨdɨwaka “Juyara sarɨ tamakɨpɨ'derera.” Saburɨ kadɨka wɨ'nena gɨmɨnyawɨnna waasɨvanɨge. Gamɨnyɨ maanga wɨdɨvanɨgasaraavɨ wɨdɨwa “Gamɨre kayaa'nanyangɨ Ga'maanɨya naangeryabanna duzideihɨlyɨ.” Pɨkarya sara yavɨkarina ya'.
Aawɨlasara kadɨka sara wɨ'neva sara ye'. Sawɨta savɨ Anga Adipaatɨrɨzɨna Polɨmɨ makwalaawɨna ye'.
Makwalaawɨna kye' yɨrɨkevɨ aawɨlasara kwaakaanya kunnya angevɨna ayɨna wɨna kye' Anga Sizaarɨyana ozɨyaraavɨ yɨlamwaalesara aawɨlata pwara gamɨnyɨ makwalaawɨna ye'.
Sizaarɨyana makwalaawɨna yeva Ga'maanɨya naangerɨ paazɨya' wɨjaavɨna yeva nabaai, Polɨmɨ gamɨnyabanna wɨmwaaihɨna ye'.
Wi'na wɨmwaaihɨna kye' Ga'maanɨya naangei paazɨya' tɨnna wanganaka gamɨnyɨ yɨwaara'na ya' “Gɨmɨre pɨrovijɨ gavanaka?” Sai wɨda' “Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨya.”
Sara kuda' “Gɨmɨnyɨna yagaainakera kwalyaabapɨjɨ kotɨya' yɨhu'nɨdeinyɨra.” Wɨdaka gamɨjɨyaraavɨ wɨda' “Erotɨyare anga naangevɨ wɨmwaaihapɨjɨ kalavuzangevɨ dameihi dɨmwaalyɨla!”

Sawɨta atina kajɨnna' Anga Sizaarɨya Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangei Ananaayazalyɨ a'mwe naanga pwarajɨ pwai kotɨyagaala dadei Tetalaazalyɨ walaawɨna ye'. Walaawɨna yeva Pilɨkɨzai Ga'maanɨya naangeryaba daavɨna yeva Polɨmɨna wɨde'.
Sara kude' Ga'maanɨyai gamɨnyɨna jaka kuda' sai wɨlaabɨna kya' Tetalaazai Polɨmɨna kotɨya' wɨda'
“A'mwe naangeigɨ Pilɨkɨzaigɨ, gɨmɨ nemaremwaaidɨnyagaa' narya tewaanyagaa' dahaakɨra. Gɨmɨre sɨduta sara yawɨragɨna sara yadaa'gi nemɨre anga naanga dimagɨnya' tewaanya yɨma'nɨvanɨ'.
Yuyagaa' yunebanna sangɨne'na yɨlaaya yona yɨvanɨgɨnyanna ‘Su! Su!’ dɨragɨnna dɨvanɨgoinera.
Naangegaa' nadɨnaadɨka! Dahaa' kave mwaala'gɨzɨ nemɨre yagaala maalɨka kadɨka wɨ'nya'na dɨragɨnna githanganaana!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe dai Juyainaavɨna kayaa'na yadelyɨra. Kwaaka yuyavakɨ Juyara mwaaihasabanna dai kwawa' maanga dɨneva mala tannyɨna yesalyɨra. Naazaretɨ mwaalyarerajɨya naangelyɨ, a'mwe dala.
Nemɨre Yɨleange'na ‘Gɨrɨka yɨma'nana!’ kada' saba nayaa galalɨmwanna yo. ‘Sarɨ nemɨre Kɨwɨnyabwina kotɨya' yaana!’ yawɨ'na kyo
aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangei Lɨzɨyaazai bɨna yaka nemɨnyabadaasɨ a'mwe darɨ dɨragɨnna yɨpalamakuna ya'.

Yɨpalamakuna yaka naanga neda' ‘Yagaainakeihi Ga'maanɨya naangeryabanna kotɨya' jɨla!’ neda'. A'mwe darɨ yɨwaarava'gɨzɨ gɨmɨ saigɨ dara yawɨ'na jɨthesɨ ‘Juyara sara nyɨdɨvanɨgasa yune nebulyangɨra.’ ”
Tetalaazai mi'na kuda' Juyara avaaina yawɨreva wɨde' “Gɨthɨwake yuya sasarengɨra.”
Sagaa' Ga'maanɨya naangei Polɨ yagaala wɨja'na ata yɨda'na kya' sai wɨda'
“ ‘Kwarame pɨjaakuna yawɨbwa'dɨnyaigɨ nemɨre anga naanga dimagɨnyainaavɨ yagaala jawɨbwarakɨna yadɨnyaigɨnyɨ,’ yawɨ'mwe'na yagaala gɨthɨde'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge.
Jeruzaalemɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya'na gaai kyɨlaawe sagaa'daasɨ sawɨta atɨraai sɨvɨla purɨdaasɨ pɨrɨwaalya nejɨnna'. Sare'na gɨmɨ saigɨ dara wangadɨza' ‘O, Polɨ sara nyɨdɨwake' nebulya'na daaka!’
Gotɨyare Angevɨ pwarajɨ maanga madɨnyɨ yadaawojɨ Juyara nyangane'. Nabaai, Juyaraavɨre lotuangengɨjɨ Jeruzaalemɨ adusangɨjɨ kwala bwa'naanya mumwaaihye.
Tewaanya gavebwi yeinyɨ Juyara nyangane'. Nɨmɨ myeinyɨna kwaasɨ yagaalya' gɨthɨwaasa' nebulya'na magɨzɨwaa'. Aawa.

Yagaala pɨrɨ' gɨthɨwaasa' nebulyasɨ. Gotɨyarɨ nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrerɨ yɨlaaya yadɨ kumɨ mudɨkebwi kwaasɨyaburɨ dɨmanɨgasabwi mɨdɨdɨnyainyɨra. Sara yadɨnya' kɨrɨ' Ne Mozɨzare kɨwɨnya yuya yɨda'nɨkejɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasaraavɨre yagaala yɨda'nɨkejɨ lɨmwadɨnyainyɨra.
Gotɨyarɨna kumɨ sahwara sara yawɨ'manɨgasa' yemwaalyabwi sara yawɨ'manɨge. A'mwe yuyara a'mwe yɨda'maraangerajɨ a'mwe yɨda'na myadɨvɨsarajɨ sara baryara dɨkaapɨ'de'na sara yawɨ'daa yemwaaimanɨgo.
Sare'na Gotɨyalyɨ a'mwerajɨ tɨnna nyangadɨvɨ' yuyagaa' tewaanna mwaaidɨnya'na ‘Nɨmɨre sɨmunya padaihɨrakya' tewaanyabwi daaka?’ sɨduta sara yawɨ'dɨ yɨvanɨgeinyɨra.

Jeruzaalemɨ ya'ma'na yena pɨba pɨba kaanya yamaryadaazɨ kwarame kwalaalya kanyavɨlava' nɨnnya anga naanga dimagɨnyaraavɨne nɨgwia makwɨya'najɨ Gotɨyarɨ sipɨzipɨya wɨjaaya'najɨ Jeruzaalemɨna ayɨna yimwa'daawade.

Yɨlaawena gɨrɨkita'nanya wasɨ'nya'ne mena yena Gotɨyarɨ wɨjavadaazɨ Gotɨyare Yɨleangevɨ nyangamwa'daa'. Nyangamwa'daasagaa' kwala bwa'naanya' mamwaalyɨwa'daa'. Jakejɨ malyasɨ sa myɨwa'do. Nɨmɨ sa myadaazɨ Juya pwara Kwaaka Ezɨya mwaalyara mwaimwa'daa'.
Sahwara nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Yagaainakeina daaka!’ yawɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ davanna mulaabi be'na yeva gɨmɨnyaba madaayeva yagaala sa' manyɨjɨvanɨga'?
Davanna mulaabi kyɨwaa' Kaajolɨyaraayaba daa'dezɨ Kaajolɨyara nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Sai kayaa'nanya sara ya',’ berɨva dɨmwa'daava? A'mwe dara nyɨdɨpɨka! Nɨmɨ kayaa'na yeinyɨ daaka?
Yagaala gave da' dɨngaka? Kumɨnyaba daa'dɨ jaka dara wɨdɨwa'de. ‘A'mwera balyaasara dɨkaapɨ'derera,’ lɨmwamanɨge'na dahaa' kotɨya' nyɨjɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨra. Sara wɨdɨwa'de'na maanga dahanyɨdɨvanɨgava?”

Sagaa' Pilɨkɨzai Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨrebwi sɨduta yawɨrakei Juyaraavɨ wɨda' “Wikɨra. Jemwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaide naangei Lɨzɨyaazai kwalyaabozɨ sarɨmɨre yagaala jawɨbwarakɨna yɨdeinyɨra.”
Sara wɨdaka aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaiderɨ Polɨmɨna wɨda' “Polɨmɨ damera wangabɨka! Kalavuza' dɨragɨnna nujaavɨpɨdɨka! Gamɨre gya'mwera angyɨrɨ'maata yapɨjɨ wɨjaavɨpɨka! Sare'na tewaanyasɨra.”

Sawɨta pɨnɨ kajɨnna' Pilɨkɨzai gannya balaange' Dɨruzɨlasɨ bɨna ya'. A'mwe Dɨruzɨla' sa' Juyasɨra. Mi'na bɨna yaka Polɨmɨna kudaasa' a'mwera Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwangebwina Polɨ wɨdadaasɨ Pilɨkɨzai kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna ya'.

Kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna kya' kɨrɨ' yɨda'maraangeburɨnajɨ nayaa maremwaainyaburɨnajɨ Gotɨyai kotɨya nejɨdavade' yɨma'nadevurɨnajɨ kuda' Pilɨkɨzai lɨka yaka ja'nawɨdɨna “Wikɨra. Dahaa' ja'mavadera. Pɨgaa' navɨka kamwaala'mujɨ yagaala pɨnɨ dakadera.”
Wɨdaka yawɨ'na ya' “Polɨ dɨna ‘Pilɨkɨzai nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanna yana!’ dɨna yojɨ nɨgwia yanga nyɨjaavadei dɨngaka?” Sara yawɨ'da kwalaalyagaa' Polɨmɨna wɨdaasaka saraai dɨnyɨna yagi.

Kwarame pɨrɨwaai kwavɨlava' Ga'maanɨya naanga mudɨkei Pezɨtaazai Pozɨyaazai bɨna yaka a'mwe Pilɨkɨzare kwaakevɨ maremwaaideryaba maremwaaina ya'. Pilɨkɨzai wawakegaa' sai yawɨ'na ya' “Juyara nɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yɨpɨka!” Yawɨ'na yaka kalavuzangevɨ Polɨmɨ kuna wɨmwaihɨwɨna ya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kwaaka savakɨna Pezɨtaazai bi'ma'na kya' yɨrɨka dawaai dasa wavɨla'na kya' Sizaarɨyadaasɨ Jeruzaalemɨna yɨlaawɨna ya'.
Jeruzaalemɨna yɨlaawɨna kya' Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ Juyara a'mwe naangerajɨ sara Polɨmɨna yagaala wɨde'.

A'mwe sara yawɨ'na “Tusavɨ Polɨmɨ kɨwale lɨvaramaadera,” yawɨ'na yesara Pezɨtaazarɨ kwaasɨ yagaala dɨragɨnna widaangane' “Neya'mweigɨ, nemɨnyɨna kale kagyozɨ Jeruzaalemɨna Polɨmɨna duthasaadeigɨnyɨra.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Pezɨtaazai wɨda' “Aalo. Anga Sizaarɨya kalavuzangevɨ Polɨ kamwaaimwa' maalɨkegaa' nɨmɨ sainyɨ ayɨna walaawɨdeinyɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ‘A'mwe sai kayaa'na yakerɨnera,’ dɨpɨja' Sizaarɨyana nɨmɨjɨ sarɨmɨre a'mwe naangera walaawapɨjɨ kotɨyaba gamɨre kayaa'nanya'na nyɨdɨpɨ'de'nanyɨra.”

Yɨrɨka pɨjaa' (8 dɨngako? 10 dɨngako?) Jeruzaalemɨ kumɨnyaba Pezɨtaazai mwaalɨna yaka Sizaarɨyana walaawɨna ya'. Walaawɨna yaka mwanya pɨrɨvɨ kotɨnamwaalɨsaba walamwaaina yaka wɨda' “Polɨmɨ dɨmakabyɨla!”

Kuda' sai bi'ma'na kya' Juyara Jeruzaalemɨdaasara gamɨnyaba daavɨna yeva gamɨnyɨna wɨde' “A'mwe sai kayaa'nanya naanga kwalaalya ya'. Sana sana yɨna ya'.” Sara yesara yagaala nebulya'na Pezɨtaazarɨ mujɨwaaki ye'.

Mujɨwaaki kye' sahwai kumɨre yagaalya'na wɨrɨvɨkɨra' “Nɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabwi myadɨnyainyɨra. Juya Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre Kɨwɨnya kayaaka migalye. Gotɨyare Angevɨ gɨrɨka myɨgalakye. Romɨ maremwaaidei a'mwe naanga Sizaarɨna kayaa'na migalye.”
Sara kuda' Pezɨtaazai yawɨ'na “Juyara yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'de'na!” Yawɨ'na yaka Polɨmɨ yɨwaara'na ya' “Jeruzaalemɨna wawa'gɨzɨ saba nɨmɨnyaba kotɨya dɨnaadeigɨ daaka?”
Sai wɨda' “Romɨyaihɨre kotɨyaba daa'manɨge. Kotɨya da' daana! Gɨmɨ saigɨ nayaa yawɨ'mwaana ‘Juyaraavɨna Polɨ kayaa'na migalyakelyɨra.’

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Romɨyaraavɨre kɨwɨnya kayaaka yɨgaimujɨ kwajɨ ‘Gɨnnya kayaa'nanya'na gɨramakaanneigɨ,’ nyɨdɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ yagaala mujainyɨ kabaimudɨkeinyɨra. Sa'na kɨrɨ' kumɨre yagaala nɨmɨnyɨna kwaasɨ yagaala dɨmanɨgasa'na manyɨjaavɨnnera! Kwaaka yuyangɨ maremwaaidei Sizaai nɨmɨre yagaala wɨ'nana!”
Sara kuda' Pezɨtaazalyɨ gamɨre sɨdu'nakerajɨ dɨnyɨna kye' Pezɨtaazai wɨda' “ ‘Sizaai nɨmɨre yagaala wɨ'nana!’ nedɨwaanya'na Sizaaryawɨnna kagɨthaasa'mujɨ dɨwodeigɨnyɨra.”
Dɨvi pɨgaa' Anga Sizaarɨyana Kingɨya Aahɨripaajɨ a'mwe Benaazasɨ Ga'maanɨya Pezɨtaazarɨ angyɨrɨ'maasa'na yɨ'ma'na yagi.
Yɨ'ma'na kyagi sawɨta pɨnɨ jɨnnadaasɨ Pezɨtaazai Kingɨyarɨ Polɨmɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna ya' “Dava Ga'maanɨya Pilɨkɨzai a'mwei kalavuzarɨ ya'ma'na kya' sai mwaalɨ'.
Jeruzaalemɨ yɨlaawegaa' Juyara Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta naangerajɨ a'mwe naangerajɨ sarɨna nyɨdeva nyɨde' ‘A'mwe kayaa'nanyarɨ duthathera “Kayaa'na yɨgalagɨnya'na gɨramakaadeigɨnyɨ.” ’

Sara kanyɨde' kɨrɨ' wɨde, ‘Romɨyaina sara myadaanyainera. Pwara kotɨya' pwarɨna dɨnapɨjɨ a'mweryaba madaayapɨjɨ kotɨyagaala sa' mujɨ kyapɨjɨ a'mwe sarɨ yaasɨwatamya myaanneinera! Aawa, a'mwerajɨ a'mwelyɨ kotɨya' nayaa dɨnapɨjɨ tewaanyabwi yɨma'nadevulyɨra’. Sara wɨde.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ davanna walaabesagaa' myemwaalyɨ yena kɨrɨ' yɨrɨka gave pɨrɨvɨ kotɨnamwaalɨsaba yarai walamwaaina yena aawɨlasaraavɨ wɨdɨwa'de, ‘A'mwerɨ dɨmakabyɨla!’
Sara wɨdena ‘Gamɨre kayaa'nanya naangenna kotɨya' wɨdɨpɨ'dera,’ yawɨ'muneinyɨ kamwaaimwa'de gamɨnyɨ maanga wɨdɨvanɨgasara daaveva kayaa'nanaange'na manyɨjɨwa'daava.

Aawa, kumɨrebwina maanga wɨdɨwa'daava. Sai kumɨ sahwaraavɨre Gotɨyarɨna yɨlaaya gevwi yɨvanɨ'. A'mwe pwai baryai Jizaazai wo'nɨkerɨna maanga wɨdɨwa'daava. Sarɨna Polɨ ‘Jizaazai mwaalɨkelyɨra,’ dadelyɨra.
Yuya dangɨna yawɨ'na ye, ‘Yagaala nebulya' garane' dɨngaka?’ Yawɨ'na yena Polɨmɨ yɨwaara'na yɨwa'de, ‘Jeruzaalemɨna kwawakwoihɨjɨ yagaala savɨna kotɨya' yɨhu'nɨdeinyɨ daaka?’

Sara yɨwaara'na kyɨwa'de kɨrɨ' sai nyɨdɨwa'dɨ' ‘Aalo, sawɨnna muwɨneinyɨ. Kwaaka yuyangɨ maremwaaidei Sizaai nɨmɨre kotɨya' wɨ'nana!’ Sare'na kalavuzangevɨ wothaayaraavɨ wɨdɨwa'de, ‘Kalavuzangevɨ darɨ nayaa dumwaaihyɨla! Dɨvi Sizaaryawɨnna waasɨdehaa'nanyɨra.’ ”
Kuda' Aahɨripaa Pezɨtaazarɨ wɨda' “Nɨmɨre sɨmunya' daresɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ a'mwe nyɨdɨwaanyarɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨma!” Pezɨtaazai wɨda' “Mwanyavɨ kamakaba'mujɨ kadɨka du'nadeigɨnyɨra.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ Aahɨripaajɨ Benaazasɨ sawaai baazɨ'ma'nya nawɨ'nya marabaazɨ'ma'nyɨna yagɨla nɨgwɨlalaaka nawɨ'nya mararɨnna yagɨla yagaala wɨ'nya'nebanna wɨna kyagi aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta naangerajɨ angaba mwaalya naangerajɨ sawaarɨna yɨlaaya marina wieva angevɨna nayaa jɨvwaramakuna ye'. Jɨvwaramakuna kye' Pezɨtaazai sara kuda' pwara Polɨmɨ makabɨna ye'.

Makabɨna kye' Pezɨtaazai wɨda' “Kingɨya Aahɨripaagɨ, pwaihi dava mwaaihasaihi a'mwe darɨ dangamanɨgava! Juya yuyara dava mwaalyarajɨ Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyarajɨ sara gamɨnyɨna kotɨya' nyɨdɨwa'daa'. Jaka naanga nyɨdɨwa'daa' ‘Sai mamwaalannera!’

Jaka sara kanyɨdɨwa'daa' dara bɨ'mwa'de' ‘Ai, a'mwe dai tamakya'na kayaa'na migalyawalyaadɨkei daaka!’ Kadɨwa'de sahwai nyɨdɨwa'dɨ' ‘Kotɨya' Sizaai wɨ'nana!’ Sare'na mena yawɨ'mwa'de. Sizaaryawɨnna waasɨdeinyɨra.

Sara yawɨ'mwa'de kɨrɨ' gamɨnyɨna Sizaarɨ pɨkarya gara yavɨkaridelaka? Savɨna Kingɨya Aahɨripaagɨjɨ yuyaihɨlyɨ saihɨryabanna sarɨ makabɨna yɨwana. Gamɨre yagaalyavɨ kadɨka wɨ'napɨjɨ nyɨjɨla! ‘Sana sana Sizaarɨ pɨkarya javɨkarya!’
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ dɨwa ‘Kalavuzarɨna gamɨre kayaa'nanyabwi myavɨkari yɨde' yaasɨwa'na yaasɨde'na tewaanya' mɨka!’ sara dɨwana,” wɨda'.
Aahɨripaa Polɨmɨ wɨda' “Gɨmɨnyɨne yagaala dɨnedana!” Kuda' sai gannya asi makina yaka gannya yagaala wɨda'
“Kingɨya Aahɨripaagɨ, dahaa' nɨnnya yagaalya' gɨthɨde'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge. Juyara nɨmɨnyɨna kotɨya' wɨdadɨvɨsa'na gɨthɨde'nanyɨ.
Juyainaavɨrebulyɨ Juyainaavɨre yawɨta ge gejɨ sangɨna sɨdu'nakeigɨnyɨ. ‘Sara yawɨ'dɨnyavɨ nɨmɨre yagaala naanga nayaa du'nana!’ dɨragɨnna githaangamanɨge.
Maalɨkeinyɨ mwaalegaasɨ yuyagaasɨ dahaasɨ mwaaidɨnya'na Juya yuyara nyawɨ'mwaava. Anga Jeruzaalemɨ nɨmɨre anga naanga pimagɨnyaraayawɨ mwaaleinyɨ.
Sareinyɨ yawɨ'mwaava. Nabaai ‘Wɨdaana!’ dɨpɨja' dara nedɨpɨka! ‘Sɨnnawɨdaa'nyɨ Polɨ Perɨzɨyaraavɨrebwi dɨragɨnna mɨdɨdelyɨ.’ Perɨzɨyaraavɨrebwi naangebulyɨ. Pɨbura maalɨkeburera.
Gotɨyai Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake'na yemwaaimanɨge'na dahaa' kotɨya' nyɨdɨvanɨgasa'na daa'manɨge. Sarevɨ Juya yuyaina yemwaaimanɨgo.

Sawɨtagaa' yɨrɨkagaa' Ne sɨnnawɨnya sɨvɨlɨraai ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyaraavɨreina Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yadaanyainera. Yadaanya'na Gotɨyai Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ wɨjaake nebulya'na yɨma'nya'na yemwaaimanɨgo. Nabaai, nɨmɨ sara yemwaaimanɨge'na, Kingɨyaigɨ, Juyara kotɨya be'na nyɨmarivanɨgava! Kumɨrebwina!
Juyaihi, Gotɨyai baryara yɨdɨkaavade'na be'na yɨvanɨgava myawɨrinanyava! (Naange' daaka!)
Kɨgaa' dara yawɨ'na ye, ‘Jizaazai Naazaretɨ mwaalyare yayavɨjɨ gamɨreraavɨjɨ kayaa'na yuyanna wima!’ Sara yawɨ'na yena Jeruzaalemɨ sara yɨna ye.

Sara yɨna kye Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'de naangera wɨdaasɨna kanye' kalavuzangevɨ Gotɨyare tewaanya kwalaalyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna ye. Pɨgaa' pwara dɨnyɨna ‘Jizaazarera baibɨzara,’ dɨnyɨna kye' nabaai nɨmɨ ‘Baibɨ'derera,’ wɨde.

Sara wɨdena naangegaa' Juyainaavɨre Lotuanga yuyangɨ pwara saraavɨna wɨdɨna ‘Dɨramyɨla!’ Jizaazareraavɨ wɨde ‘Jizaazarɨ bɨrala wɨdapɨjɨ gamɨre lɨmwangebwi dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla!’ Dɨvi sahwaraavɨna nɨmɨre sɨnna tɨka nyɨda'daa'nyɨ Menyaraavɨre angebanna yɨwɨnama'na kyapɨjɨ sabanna kumɨnyɨna kayaa'na yɨgalya'na kaanna wɨna ye.”
Polɨ kuna wɨda' “ ‘Jizaazareraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalɨma!’ dena sare'na kude Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta naangera paazɨya' nyɨjaaveva Anga Damaazɨkazɨna kumɨre wawɨnya'na wɨdaasɨna nye'.

Wɨdaasɨna kanye' Kingɨyaigɨ, sɨrɨgwajahaa' tusavɨ dara wanganage' ‘O, sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ baaka naange' nɨmɨjɨ a'mwera ye'mwannɨgwodaanyarajɨ sainaayaba damwadɨwaka!’ Nyɨlyai maalɨkelyɨ. Baaka sa' naangesɨra.

Sara kade kwaakevɨna yuyaina wala'na kyo Yɨvɨruyagaala maanguraayavɨ wɨ'ne, ‘Solɨgɨ, Solɨgɨ, kayaa'na be'na nyɨgaimanɨgɨna? Bulɨmakaawoyai “Aala!” dɨna yaka gyakware yɨta yesa yɨnɨke' sɨvɨlyasɨ tamɨna kyɨwa' daanga wɨvɨmwakabaaibɨ' gɨmɨre Gotɨyarɨ kayaa'na kyɨwaa gɨmɨnyɨna daanga gɨvɨmanɨka.’
Wɨ'nena yɨwaara'na ye ‘Naangeigɨ, aaihwaigɨnaka?’
‘Kayaaka nyɨgaimanɨgɨnyainyɨ Jizaazainyɨra.

Sahwainyɨ kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ dɨthaaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. “Nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨdaayɨdeigɨ nyɨjalɨkurakɨdeigɨ jɨma'nana!” dena gɨthahɨlakɨde'na bɨweinyɨra. Wawa'gɨzɨ dahaa' nɨmɨnyɨne dɨragɨnya' wangamwaanya'na pwaraavɨ duzalɨkurakɨdeigɨnyɨra. Sara ya'gɨzɨ dɨvi pɨnɨnna gɨzɨwaainɨde'na duthatheigɨnyɨ.
Yɨzɨrelɨyarajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyarajɨ saraayawɨnna kagɨthaasa'mujɨ gɨmɨnyɨ kayaaka kagyapi gɨvadaihasamaarɨdeigɨnyɨ.

Wɨdaasɨna kagya'mujɨ gɨmɨ wawa'gɨzɨ pwaraavɨre sɨduta mudɨke duzaadeigɨnyɨra. Saataanɨmɨre jɨhɨnyavɨ mwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ nɨmɨre baaka nawɨ'nyavɨna yɨbwaramakuna jɨtheigɨnyɨra. Saataanɨmɨre kwaasɨdɨragɨnya wasɨ'napɨjɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnaanga lɨmwabɨ'derera. Nɨmɨnyɨ kanyɨlɨmwagapɨjɨ kumɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nɨderera. Kamarasɨ'na'mujɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakakeraayabanna sahwaraavɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨra,’ Naangei sara nyɨda'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Aahɨripaa Kingɨyaigɨ, sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ sara wɨ'ne' sara mɨdɨmweinyɨra. Sabwi mamarasɨ'nyɨwa.

Aawa. Sɨnnawɨ Anga Damaazɨkazɨjɨ Anga Jeruzaalemɨjɨ sabanna wɨjɨwaakɨna ye. Dɨvi Kwaaka Juthɨya yuyabajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨrebajɨ avaaina wɨjɨwaakɨna ye. Ayabwi wasɨ'nadɨvɨ' mudɨkebwi Gotɨyarebwi jawɨramaarila! Sara yapɨjɨ ‘Mudɨkebulyɨyaina sare yaana!’ dapɨjɨ a'mwera tɨnna wanganya'na nayaa sara jɨla!
Sareinyɨ ye'na Gotɨyare Angevɨ Juyara galalɨmwanna nyeva nyɨrame'.

Kɨgaa' yuyagaasɨ dahaasɨ Gotɨyai nyɨvainadevɨdaa'nyɨ dava daavɨna yena a'mwe naangeihɨrɨjɨ a'mwe maalɨkeihɨrɨjɨ yuya sahwaihɨrɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Yagaala sa' mudɨke' daaka! Aawa, Ne Mozɨzalyɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsarajɨ sara avaaina mena nejaasasɨra.

Dara nejaa' ‘Gotɨyai dahɨlakakei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ daanga naanga kuvɨnojɨ balojɨ sɨnnawɨnyai kwaihwaainakei dɨkaavadelyɨra. Dɨvi a'mwe yuyara dɨkaapɨ'derera. Dɨkaavojɨ a'mwe sainaavɨnajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨnajɨ sainaavɨna nedathe' “A'mwera Gotɨyare nawɨ'nyaba baakeba mwaaibɨ'derera.” Yɨ sahwai baaka naange' a'mweraavɨna wɨjɨwaainadelyɨ.’ ” Polɨ sara wɨda'.
Polɨ kotɨya'na sara wɨdadaa'nyɨyagaa' Pezɨtaazai jaka wɨda' “Polɨgɨ aa'neigɨnyɨ. Bukuya naanga wanganagɨla naanga yawɨragɨla sɨdu'maayaigɨ dahayɨma'nɨvanɨgɨna?”
Sai wɨda' “A'mwe naangeigɨ, Pezɨtaazaigɨ, aa'neinyɨ mɨka! Aawa. Yagaala yɨhɨthɨwe nebulyasɨra. Yagaala sɨdu'nakenna yɨhɨthɨwa.

Kingɨya Aahɨripaagɨ, sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahɨnɨnna yawɨ'mwaanya'na dɨragɨnna gɨthɨwa. Yuya, yɨhɨthɨwe dara yawɨ'mwaanya' ‘O, sara sara daaka!’ Lɨka myulyaryakengɨra. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera tɨnna wanganyaba ku'maayaba yakengɨra.
Kingɨya Aahɨripaagɨ, Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjaasaraavɨre yagaala dɨlɨmwamanɨgɨna? Sare'na dara yawɨ'mwe' ‘Aahɨripaa kumɨre yagaalya' mena wɨ'nɨvanɨkei daaka!’ ”
Kujaa' Aahɨripaa sahwarɨ yarai wɨda' “O, nyɨdɨwaanya'na Kɨraazɨtɨyareinyɨ yarai yɨma'nɨjɨwana!”

Polɨ wɨda' “Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨvanɨge. Maalɨkegaa' dɨngaka? Naangegaa' dɨngaka? Aahɨripaajɨ pwara kadɨka nyu'nɨvanɨgasarajɨ sara nɨmɨbɨsara yɨma'nɨpɨka! Sara kɨrɨ' senɨyabarajɨ nyɨvwɨyɨnɨkeinyɨra. Sahwara senɨmaayara Kɨraazɨtɨyarera yɨma'nɨpɨka!”
Sagaa' Kingɨyalyɨ Ga'maanɨya naangelyɨ Benaazasɨ pwara yuyarajɨ daavɨna yeva
ya'ma'na yeva dɨnyɨna ye' “Tamakya'najɨ kalavuzangevɨ mwaalya'najɨ a'mwe dai kayaa'na myadelyɨra.”
Sara dɨnyɨna kye' Aahɨripaa Pezɨtaazarɨ wɨda' “Pezɨtaazaigɨ, a'mwe dai ‘Sizaai nɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨ'nana!’ mujazɨ kwajɨ ‘Gɨnnya angevɨna dɨwona!’ kudɨthɨka!” wɨda'.
Ga'maanɨya naangei nemɨnyɨna dɨna “Kwaaka Yɨtaalina sahwara wɨpɨka!” Dɨna yaka Julɨyaazarɨ Polɨmɨjɨ kalavuzaraavɨjɨ marɨmwangɨna neya'. A'mwe Julɨyaazai Ohazɨtaazare Aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidelyɨra.

Wɨjaavɨna kaneya' sɨpɨya' Anga Athɨraamitɨyaamɨdaasavɨ yɨlamwaaina yo. Yɨlamwaaina kyo Kwaaka Ezɨya maangebaarɨne sɨpɨya sa' nemakwawo'. A'mwe pwai Arɨzɨtaakazai Kwaaka Maazathonɨya Anga Tezalonaaika mwaalyai nemɨjɨyalyɨ nemakwawo'.

Nemakwodaasɨ Anga Saaithonɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna yo. Yɨ'mavaawɨna kyo Julɨyaazai Polɨmɨna kale kwia' bwiwanna wɨdɨna ya' “Dava mwaalyara gya'mweraayawɨ angyɨrɨ'maata ja!” Kuda' Polɨ kwawa' gya'mwera wapaayajɨ pɨnɨjɨ wɨjaavɨna ye'.
Wɨjaavɨna kye' dɨvi sabadaasɨ sɨpɨya' kaanna wɨna yaka Ahu'manna Saaipɨraazɨ pimagɨ yɨhuta naange' yake'na sɨna mwɨyɨ yaka Saaipɨraazɨ pimagɨ yɨhuta maalɨke' yakeba wavɨla'na ya'.
Wavɨla'na yaka Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨya Kwaaka Paabɨlɨya saalaalyavɨ ga'ma'na yaka Kwaaka Lɨzɨya Anga Maaira mannɨkebanna makuna neya'.
Makuna kaneya' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidei dara wanganake' “Ai, sɨpɨya pɨrɨ' Anga Alekɨzaadɨrɨyadaasa' Kwaaka Yɨtaaline' daaka!” Sara daka sɨpɨya savɨ yɨlawɨmwaaihɨna neya'.

Sawɨta pɨjaa' yɨhuta'na sɨpɨya sa' kave kave makuna neyaka sɨpɨyavɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara wawɨnya naanga yɨna yɨna kye' Anga Naaithaazɨ sabanna kave makuna neya'. Kave makuna neyaka sɨmagɨ yɨhuta naanga'na mamakwɨyɨ neyaka pimagɨ Ahu'manna Kɨritɨna yɨhuta naanga maayaba makuna neyaka kwaaka maalɨka Saalɨmoni wavɨla'na ya'.

Wavɨla'na yaka saalaalyavɨ maangebaarɨ maalɨkeba wavɨla'na kya' sɨpɨyavɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara wawɨnya naanga yɨna yɨna kye' Sɨpɨya Wɨla'de Nawɨ'nyaangebanna kavena yɨ'ma'na ya'. Sɨpɨya Wɨla'de Nawɨ'nyaangeba Laazɨya aya kɨba warɨkebanyɨra.
Saba yemwaaina yemwaaina kyo Juyara wapaaya manyadɨvɨsagaa' mena wavɨla'na kaneya' yɨraaya wanangegaa' yɨma'nyɨna ya'. Wanangegaa' yɨma'nyɨna kya' sɨpɨya yarai kayaakegaa'na Polɨ wɨda'

“A'mweihi, dara wangamwe' ‘O, dahaasagaa' sɨpɨya kayaaka yadehaa' mena jɨwaka! Nabaai, nemɨre sɨpɨyasɨ sɨpɨyavɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa wɨla'dɨ'nyɨyajɨ sa gave kayaaka yade mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ a'mweinaavɨjɨ kayaaka neyade'na daaka!’ Sara dena mwawaannera!”
Sara kuda' kɨrɨ' aawɨlata maremwaaidei sɨpɨya' maremwaaide naangelyɨ sɨpɨyavɨ gyakwalyɨ saraai wɨdahɨlya' wɨ'nyɨna ya'. Polɨmɨre yagaalya' mu'nyɨ ya'.

Saba burɨkevɨjɨ yɨhusavɨjɨ sagaa' sɨpɨya' warya' kayaa'nanyasɨra. Sa'ne' sɨpɨyavɨyara naangevaakɨyara yawɨ'na ye' “Kayaaka naneyɨgaladɨka! Sɨpɨya' saalaalyavɨ wawaka anga nawɨ'nya' Pinɨkɨzɨna nemakwona! Saba yɨhusagaa' mwalaadeinera.” Anga saba yɨhusanna lɨka yulyarɨkebera. Nyɨla walakadimagɨ warɨkeba.
Dɨvi saalaalyavɨdaasɨ yɨhuta maalɨke' yadaa'nyɨ a'mwera yawɨ'na “Tewaanyasɨ. Dɨmwo'na kaanyaana!” Yawɨ'na yeva wɨla yaarɨna kye' Ahu'manna Kɨritɨ maangebaarɨ sɨpɨya' makuna neya'.
Maalɨkegaa' makuna neyadaa'nyɨ sagaa' yɨhu'maanarya' Notizɨta wo'nɨke' ahu'mannyavɨdaasɨ yarai yɨna.
Yarai yɨna yaka sɨpɨyavɨ yɨtavamakuna kya' sɨpɨya' sɨna yɨna mwɨyɨ kya' nemɨ yawɨ'na “Yɨhuta naange'na sɨpɨya' yɨtavamakwawana!” Yawɨ'na kyo yɨhusa' yɨtavamakuna ya'.
Yɨtavamakuna kya' Ahu'manna maalɨka Kothaa yɨhuta kɨbaweyaba a'mwera “Botɨya maalɨke' kayaaka nyadɨka!” deva botɨya maalɨke' dusɨmagɨ warake'na wawɨnya naange' yona yɨlamaarakɨna yo.

Nemɨjɨyara botɨya maalɨke' mwagi'namaa'na yeva sɨpɨya naangevɨ yɨlamarakɨna ye'. Yɨlamarakɨna yeva “Sɨpɨya' dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwagaana!” deva wɨlyajɨ yunebanna pwɨyɨna ye'. Pwɨyɨna yeva “We', siwekeyaba Kwaaka Lɨvya (Kwaaka Apɨrika) nemɨre sɨpɨya' kayaaka nyadɨka!” deva sɨpɨzelɨya' yɨvɨta naangeva'bɨsa' marapwɨyɨna kye' yɨhuta sa' sɨpɨya' yɨtavamakuna ya'.
Yɨtavamakuna yaka yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ yɨhuta naange' kuna kya' “Sɨpɨya' tewaanya warade'nanyɨ,” deva saalaalyavɨna sɨpɨyavɨ wɨla'dɨ'nyɨya gaai marasɨ'na marasɨ'na yeva
yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ kunnya asajɨ sɨpɨyavɨre gɨlyɨvɨta taanga marasɨ'na ye'.

Marasɨ'na kye' kayaa'nanyagaa' yɨrɨka pɨnɨngɨ nyɨlyalyɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyarɨkajɨ saraavɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ mwanganyɨ kyo yuyagaa' yɨhuta naange' kuna yɨna yɨna ya'. Kuna yɨna yɨna kya' nemɨ yawɨ'na “We', yuyaina mwalaadeina mɨka! Balaadeinera nemɨ, we'.”

Sawɨta pɨjaakuna a'mwera manyadaapɨjɨ kumɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba Polɨ daavɨna yaka wɨdɨna “Nya'mweihi, yɨhɨthɨwɨja' wɨ'napɨjɨ kwajɨ Ahu'manna Kɨritɨ mya'mayɨ kyɨpɨdɨka. Sara yɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ kayaaka kaneyadɨ' mɨ'. Sara yɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ sɨpɨyavɨya gɨlyɨvɨsa mamarasɨ'nyɨ kyaadɨka!
Sa'na kɨrɨ' naanga yɨhɨthɨma! Lɨka mipɨnera! A'mwe yuyaina mabalyɨ yaadeinera. Sɨpɨya gave' kayaaka yɨnadesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ Gotɨyareinyɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yadɨnyalyɨ. Sawɨsavɨ Gotɨyai sare ejelɨyai nɨmɨnyawɨnna baka

nyɨjawaalɨ' ‘Polɨgɨ, lɨka minna! Kayaaka gyatheigɨ mɨ'. A'mwe naangei Sizaaryaba dɨthaa'deigɨnyɨra. Nabaai, Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨna yange'na yɨhɨgaimwamanɨke'na sɨpɨyavɨ wɨlamwaaihata yuyarajɨ tewaanna dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨra.’
Sara nyɨjawaalɨke'na lɨka mipɨnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. ‘Gotɨyai nyɨjawaalɨke' nebulya'na yɨma'nadesɨra,’ sara lɨmwaga'manɨge.
Sa'na kɨrɨ' ahu'manna pɨrɨvɨ nemɨre sɨpɨya' kayaaka yɨnadesɨra,” wɨda' Polɨ.

Yɨhu'maanarya' kuna yadaasɨ sawɨta kwalaalya (14) nevɨlavakegaa' sawɨta savɨ saalaalya Methɨtɨranɨyanɨ sabanna yɨhusa' nemɨre sɨpɨya' yɨtavamakuna ya'. Yɨtavamakuna yadaa'nyɨ sawɨta kalawawegaa' sɨpɨyavɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsara sɨmunya dara yawɨresa' “Ai, aya kɨba kwaakeva' darɨka!”

Sara deva aalyavɨ wɨlyabaai taanginya pwɨyɨnɨkebaai makwaasɨna yeva yaamɨjɨ wanganeva aalya damwineba saamɨnaanga mitaaya 36 tɨnna wanganna ye'. Tɨnna wanganna yeva dɨvi maalɨkegaa' wɨlyabaai ayawɨ makwaasɨna yeva aalya damwineba saamɨnya kɨbawe mitaaya 27 tɨnna wanganna ye'.

Tɨnna wanganna yeva lɨka yɨna yeva “Sɨlaangengɨ nemɨre sɨpɨya' kayaaka nyadɨka! Dava sɨpɨya' warade'nanyɨ. Sɨpɨya' nawodɨka!” deva sɨpɨyavɨ dusɨmagɨ kwaari'mayagɨnya nadɨya dawaai dawaalyangɨ makwaasɨna ye'. Makwaasɨna yeva “We', yɨrɨke' yarai purana!” deva tɨbarɨyagaala dɨna dɨna ye'.

Tɨbarɨyagaala dɨna dɨna yeva sɨpɨyavɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara dɨnyɨna ye' “Nabalaadɨka! Davɨdaasɨ kaanyaana!” Dɨnyɨna yeva pwaraavɨ kwaasɨ wɨdɨna “Sɨpɨya sɨnnyɨmagɨ kwaari'mayagɨnya nadɨyangɨ wakaana!” Kwaasɨ wɨdɨna yeva aalyavɨ botɨyavɨ lɨka yulya'na walakɨna yadɨvɨ' yadaapɨjɨ
Polɨ tɨnna wanganaka aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidelyɨ aawɨlasarajɨ saraavɨ wɨdɨna ya' “Sɨpɨyavɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨta dara milamwaalyɨpɨja' tewaanya myɨvainyɨ jideihɨlyɨra.”
Sara wɨdɨna kya' aawɨlasara botɨya' pwɨyɨnɨke wɨlyangɨ yarai yesɨwɨ'na kye' aalyavɨna gamɨ sa' wɨna ya' botɨya'.
Yɨrɨkunyagaa' wapaaya tɨka nya'na Polɨ yuyaraavɨ naanga widaangana' “Yɨrɨka atɨraai sɨvɨla purɨdaasɨ dawaai dawaai nevɨla'daasɨ sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dɨvɨ' wapaaya manyadɨvɨ' mwaaimanɨgasaihɨlyɨra.
Naange'nanyabwi yɨhɨthɨma! Wapaaya dɨnyɨla! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Napɨjɨ dɨragɨnya dɨmwaalyidera. Yuyaihi, kayaaka jɨnyideihi mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨre mɨjata aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kayaaka yade' mɨ'.”
Wɨdɨna yaka Polɨ gɨrɨkula maarɨna yaka kumɨnyaba Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨna yaka gɨrɨkula gunyɨna yaka nyɨna ya'.
Nyɨna yadaasɨ yuyara pwara Polɨ yakabaaibɨ' dɨragɨnna yɨna yeva wapaaya nyɨna ye'.
Sɨpɨyavɨ nemɨ yuyaina a'mwe 276 mwaaloinera.
Yuyara wapaaya mena neva “Sɨpɨya taanginya' daaka!” dɨneva aalyavɨ witɨzɨla yuya marasɨ'na marasɨ'na ye'.

Yɨrɨka mena purɨna kya' sɨpɨyavɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara kwaakeva' tɨnna wanganeva dɨnyɨna “Kwaaka be kwaakavakaka?” Dɨnyɨna yeva dara wanganesa' “Keiba tewaanyaba daaka! Siweka gaveba daaka!” Deva “Maangebaarɨ nawɨ'nyabanna sɨpɨya' wɨlaawana!” dɨnyɨna ye'.

Dɨnyɨna yeva kwaari'mayagɨnya nadɨya pwɨyɨnɨkebara yesɨwɨ'na kye' aalyavɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨ palaanɨya saamɨnyawaai sɨpɨya' gɨnyɨwannakewaai pwɨyɨnɨkebaraavɨ yaarɨna. Mena yaarɨna yeva “Yɨhusa' nemakwawana!” dɨna yeva sɨnnyɨmagɨ selɨya maalɨke' tɨmudaakuna kye' maangebaarɨna sɨpɨya' wɨna ya'.

Wɨna yadaasɨ aalya amwinevɨ ahu'manna wekejɨkɨ tamaka pɨbanna mwɨyɨ yɨna ya'. Sɨpɨya sɨnnya' dɨragɨnna warɨna yadɨ'nyɨ dusɨmagɨnya' aalyasɨ yɨhusasɨ dɨragɨnna dɨragɨnna tamɨna yɨna kya' sɨpɨya dusɨmagɨnya' kayaaka yɨnyɨna yaka warɨna ya'.
Aawɨlasara yawɨ'na “Maangebaarɨna kalavuzara lɨ'napɨjɨ lɨkaanya nupɨdɨka! Tamakaana!”

Yawɨ'na kye' kɨrɨ' aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidei yawɨ'na “Polɨmɨ yɨvainɨma!” Yawɨ'na yaka “Saraavɨ maramakɨpɨnera!” Wɨdaka yuyainaavɨ neda' “A'mwe pwaihi lɨ'nadɨvɨsaihi, aalyavɨ dɨkwosɨ'napɨjɨ maangebaarɨna dɨlɨ'nɨgulaawila!
Pwaihi, palaanɨyajɨ yɨsajɨ kalɨmwagapɨjɨ maangebaarɨna yɨhusa' yɨhitawaasadera.” Sara wɨdɨna kya' sara yona maangebaarɨna yuyaina tewaanna yɨ'ma'na yo.
Kwaakevakɨ tewaanya mwaalogaa' dara yawɨro' “O, ahu'manna da' Molɨta wo'nɨke' daaka!”
Burɨka nevadaa'nyɨ yɨrɨla nedadaa'nyɨ saba mwaalyara a'mwe tewaanyara nemɨnyɨna kale maalɨ'na muya'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwara dɨka yɨra'na yeva “Yuyaihi, dɨkevɨ jɨmwannyɨla!” nede'.
Kanede' dɨka savɨ kamwaalo Polɨ dɨkewaka marikwa'na yaka dɨkevɨ bulyɨra'na yadaasɨ naawɨnaanyai dɨka kwi'na' dɨkewakɨdaasɨ bwalyuna yaka Polɨmɨre asavɨ tɨka bwalyada'na ya'.

Tɨka bwalyada'daasɨ naawɨnaanyai gamɨre asavɨ lɨngwɨre'na kya' Maavera saba mwaalyara tɨnna wanganeva dɨne' “A'mwe dai a'mwe pwarɨ tamakakei kɨrɨ' naawɨnaanyai kada'mwa' kayaa'nanyai balannelyɨra. Saalaalyavɨ balanne kwai yɨwakei baladelyɨra.”
Kadɨne' Polɨ naawɨnaanyarɨ dɨkevɨ marirɨkurasɨ'na yaka kayaa'na myɨma'nyɨ yaka tewaanyai mwaalɨna ya'.

Tewaanyai mwaalaka mwaalaka kya' “Sare asa' mɨlamakina yade' dɨngaka? Yarai balɨna yadei dɨngaka?” Sara deva yemwaaina ye'. Yemwaaina yemwaaina yeva dara wanganesa' “Ai, tewaanyai kuna damwaalɨka!” Deva sɨduta pɨbwi yawɨ'na yeva dɨnyɨna ye' “A'mwe dai Gotɨyaibɨsalyɨra.”

Sabadaasɨ aya kɨba wawɨnya pɨnɨ warɨna ya'. Wawɨnya sangɨ gyakwai Pavɨlaazai ahu'manna savɨ maremwaaidelyɨra. A'mwe sai kale wiadaa'nyɨ neda' “Nɨmɨre angevɨ angyɨrɨ'maata nyɨla!” Kaneda' sawɨta dawaai dasavɨ wa'mwa'na yo.
Pavɨlaazare ganɨmaangei kɨlaakejɨ' dɨ'mudɨnakei lɨkulya tɨnakei warɨna ya'. Gannya yɨ'bɨnyavɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨ ku'dɨkevɨ Polɨ wɨlaka gamɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaka asawaai kadathɨwaga' nabalya yarai yɨwɨna ya'.
Sara kya' ahu'manna savɨ mwaalyara nabalɨnakera kadɨka wɨ'neva nemɨnyawɨnna bɨna kye' Polɨ tewaanna yɨna ya'.
Savɨdaasɨ yanga naanga wɨjaavɨna neyeva dɨvi sɨpɨya' nemakwawakegaa' sɨpɨyavɨ nemɨnyɨne wapaayajɨ aalyasɨ yɨvɨsajɨ saza wɨlakɨna ye'.

Lawe dɨkaai dɨ' ahu'manna savɨ mwaalona sɨpɨya pɨrɨvɨ yɨlamwaaina kyo makuna neya'. Sɨpɨya sa' Anga Alekɨzaadɨrɨyadaasa' burɨkegaa' ahu'mannyavɨ warakesɨra. Sɨpɨya sa' yaya' Kaazɨtojɨ Polaakɨzalyɨ gɨra'mɨraalyaraalya' wo'nɨkesɨra.
Makuna neyaka anga Saairakyuzɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna kya' saba sawɨta dawaai dasavɨ mwaalɨna yo.
Mwaalɨna kyo sɨpɨya' makuna neyaka anga Rɨzɨyaamɨna yɨ'ma'na ya'. Yɨ'ma'na kya' yɨrɨka pɨrɨvɨ dusɨdaasɨ yɨhusa' yɨna kya' sawɨta dawaai kajɨnna' anga Pyutɨyolaaina sɨpɨya' yarai makuna neya'.

Makuna kaneya' dara wangano' “Anga davɨ mwaalyara pwara neya'mwera daaka!” Sara kado sahwara yɨwaara'na neye' “Wikɨya pɨrɨ' dava dɨmwaalyideihi daaka?” Yɨwaara'na kaneye' saba mwaalɨna yo. Mena mwaalɨna yona Romɨneina kwaakaanya wɨna yo.

Kwaakaanya wɨna yadaawojɨ Romɨ mwaalyara neya'mwera nemɨnyɨna kadɨka dara wɨ'nesa' “Polɨjɨ pwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarerajɨ jɨnɨgava!” Sara deva pwara Maaketɨya Aapɨyaazɨna wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna kaneye' pwara anga Se Warya Dawaai Dasabanna wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna neye'. Wɨjɨmaa'nyɨna kaneye' Polɨ kumɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganaka Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨna yaka gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨvaimwangebwi maaraka yɨlaaya yɨna ya'.
Romɨna yɨ'mavaawɨna kyo ga'maanɨyara nede' “Polɨ kalavuzangevɨ mamwaalyɨ yade'na ange'na bɨrojɨ savɨ mwaaladelyɨra. Aawɨlata pwai damelyɨ mwaaladelyɨra.”

Yɨrɨka dawaai dasa kavura' Polɨ Juya naanga mɨnyagɨnyaraavɨna yɨkabya'na yagaala wɨdaasɨna ya'. Wɨdaasɨna kya' a'mwera yɨkabɨna kye' wɨda' “Nya'mweihi, nemɨre Juyaraavɨna kayaa'na myeinyɨra. Nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrebwi kayaa'na myeinyɨra. Sara mi kye kɨrɨ' Jeruzaalemɨ nyɨvwɨyeva kalavuzainyɨ Romɨyaraavɨ nyɨmarɨmwange'.
Kanyɨmarɨmwange' Romɨyara nyɨwaaraveva dara yawɨresa' ‘O, a'mwe dai balya'na kayaa'na myakei daaka!’ Sara deva dɨnyɨna ‘Kalavuzangevɨdaasɨ yune'na wɨdasaana!’

Dɨnyɨna sara kye' Juyara wɨde' ‘Arɨkawɨnyɨ.’ Sara kude' nɨmɨre anga naanga sɨmagɨnya sahwaraavɨna ‘Kotɨya' yagaainakeinyɨ yɨderera,’ mujena ‘Gave pɨbwina darɨka?’ dena wɨde ‘A'mwe Naanga Sizaai kadɨka nyu'nana!’
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨhwanganɨde'najɨ yɨhɨthɨde'najɨ ‘Jɨkabyɨla,’ sara wɨdasaabɨwa. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨzɨrelɨyaina pwai sɨgunyavɨdaasarɨna yemwaidaanyarɨna senɨya nyɨvwɨyɨnɨkeinyɨ mwaaihe.”
Kumɨ wɨde' “Gɨmɨnyɨna Kwaaka Juthɨyadaasa paazɨya mamaaryona. Sabadaasara neya'mwera gɨmɨnyɨna maneje'. Gɨmɨnyɨne kayaa'nanyanna sahwara maneje'.
Manejesaina gɨmɨre yawɨsa' kadɨka wɨ'naanneinera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuyaba a'mwera gɨmɨre Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨna kayaa'na wɨdadɨvɨ', nabaai, kaneda'gɨzɨ kadɨka wɨ'naadeinera.”

Pɨgaa' Polɨjɨ Juyarajɨ dahɨlakesagaa' yɨma'nyɨna kya' gamɨnyawɨnna a'mwe kwala naangera bɨna ye'. Mena bɨna kye' sagaa' mwanyavɨdaa'nyɨ sawɨtɨrɨnyagaa'na Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna nemaremwaaide'na Polɨ wɨjalɨkurakɨna wɨjalɨkurakɨna ya'. Sana yada Ne Mozɨzare kɨwɨnyangɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasaraavɨre yagaalyangɨjɨ Jizaazarɨ nayaa lɨmwagasa'na wɨjɨwaaka'.
Kujɨwaaka' pwara gamɨre yagaalya' wɨ'nesa' kɨrɨ' pwara mu'nye'.

Sara yeva yagaala kwalaalya dɨnyɨna kye' yagaala pɨrɨ' Polɨ wɨda' “Kɨgaakuna Kuryai Tewaanyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaakei Pɨropetɨya Aazaayarɨ nebwina kujaa' sarɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨna Aazaayai sara wɨjaa'.
Wɨjaake' dara dɨnɨke'
‘Wawa'gɨzɨ a'mwe daraavɨ duthathera
“Kadɨke'na wɨ'nyɨna yapɨjɨ
myawɨramaari jideihɨlyɨra.
Tɨnna wanganna wanganna yapɨjɨ myawɨranganyɨ jideihɨlyɨra.”
A'mwe daraavɨre sɨduta kayaaka yɨnɨke'na
Kunnya kadɨka taanga tɨla'nyɨna yesara
Kunnya tɨnnya tɨbarya ya'na yesarera.
Sara myesa' kunnya tɨnna kwangabɨthɨka!
Sara myesa' kunnya kadɨka ku'nɨpɨdɨka!
Sara myesa' kunnya sɨduta kyawɨpɨdɨka!’
Gotɨyai dɨnɨka
‘Kunnyabwi yagalya'mapɨjɨ kwajɨ
Nɨmɨnyawɨnna gɨnyɨwannɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ
Kumɨnyɨ nayaa kyavada'gaimudɨka!’ ”

Yagaala pɨrɨsɨ Polɨ wɨda' “Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara jawɨryide' ‘O, Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨne padaihasamaasabwine yagaala ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ duthaasɨwaka!’ Yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sahwara Gotɨyare yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨ'derera.”
Polɨ sara kuda' Juyara pwara “Polɨ nebulya'na nedɨwaka,” dadɨvɨ' pwara “Sai kwaasɨ nedɨwaka,” dadɨvɨ' maanga kuna dɨdɨvɨ' ya'ma'na ye'.
Kwarame pɨrɨwaai wavɨla'daasɨ Anga Romɨ Polɨ ange'na mubada saba mwaaida pwara angyɨrɨ'maata yadɨvɨsa'na Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨ'nya'ne'na Polɨ yɨlaaya yadelyɨra.
Yɨlaaya yada Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaide'na wɨdada Naanga Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazarɨna wɨjɨwaakadelyɨra. Dɨragɨnna wɨdada pwara gamɨnyɨ mujadɨvɨkɨ “Yagaala sa madɨnna!” Mujɨ yadɨvɨkɨra.
Nya'mweihi, Romɨ mwaalyaihi,

Polɨnyɨ nɨmɨre paazɨya' yɨhyasɨwaabe. Yuneinyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazareinyɨ gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai jaka nyɨjɨvwaramaaraka nyɨdahɨlakakeinyɨ nyɨdaasakeinyɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ. Sareinyɨ Gotɨyai yagaala tewaanya' maryasaabake' wɨjɨwaakya'neinyɨ nyakakeinyɨ.
Yagaala tewaanya daza'na sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na kujaa' gamɨnyɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya'nera pɨropetɨyara pɨkarya nawɨ'nya gɨrɨ'maaya yɨdayaasasɨ.
Sa' yagaala tewaanya' gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangerɨnesɨ. Sahwai yɨ, kɨlaa'nakei yɨma'nakevɨna, Ne Devitɨmɨre yɨsiwialyɨra. (Devitɨmɨre yɨta savaakɨdaasalyɨra.)

Yɨ gamɨre kurya tewaanyarɨna, Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangerɨnera. Sarei bainɨkeraayabadaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai yɨdɨkaavake'na dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaainyɨna “Sahwai Gotɨyainyɨre Nyɨbwaalɨvaangelyɨra.” Sahwai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre Naangelyɨra.
Gotɨyai sara yawɨrakevɨ sahwarɨ yanga gaimwangebulyɨ wɨdaasakebulyɨ maaroine. Gamɨnyɨneba ya'neina ajɨmya yuyangɨya yuyara gamɨnyɨ lɨmwabɨzavɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨ wɨmɨdɨnya'ne'na sara maaroine.
Nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaihɨrɨjɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakeihɨlyɨ.

Yɨ sasareihi, Romɨ mwaalyaihi Gotɨyarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨvu'nadeihi Gotɨyai jaka dara yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakeihɨlyɨ “Nɨmɨreihi, gɨrɨ'maayaihi jɨma'nyɨla!” Yɨ yuya saihɨrɨ Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ sanɨdaai yange'na nayaa yɨhɨgaimwagyɨka! Nabaai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi tewaanya yɨhwakyɨka!
Sɨnnawɨ davɨdaasɨ “Sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nayaa lɨmwamanɨgasa'na Kwaaka yuyɨmagɨ mwaalyara dɨwɨna yesaihɨlyɨ,” dena Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna, nɨmɨre Gotɨyarɨ suya wɨdɨvanɨge.

Sa' nebulya' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna “Nebulyasɨ,” jalɨkurakannelyɨ. Sahware Gawaalɨvaangerɨne yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakadɨ nɨmɨre kuryarɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨdaayadɨnyalyɨ. Yɨ sahwai dara jalɨkurakɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨja'ne gazagaasagaa' Polɨ Romɨ mwaalyaraavɨna nyɨdadelyɨ.”

Yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨnyagaa' dara wɨdɨna “Gotɨyaigɨ sɨmunyavɨ sara yawɨ'dɨzaigɨ ‘Romɨna wawana!’ nɨmɨnne tusa' kyavada'gala'gɨzɨ sagaa' sahwaraayawɨnna yɨlekaanya wɨdeinyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨna yadɨnyainyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhwanganɨde'na nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Sarɨmɨnyɨna “Kuryaraavɨ dɨragɨnya pada'galayɨvaimwagɨma!” dada Gotɨyare Kuryai yanga kanyɨjaavojɨ nawɨ'nya sa' yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨ.

Sa' da'dare'na “Nɨmɨ dara yawɨ'manɨge. Nɨmɨnyɨjɨ Romɨ mwaalyaraavɨjɨ yuyainaavɨ negaimwadaawori nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨnyabulyɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsabulyɨ nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnya pada'galayɨvaimwanga neyadesɨ.”

Nabaai da'mujɨyainyɨ “A'mwe nya'mweihi dara nyawɨpɨdɨka! ‘Polɨmɨ dara muvu'nyɨvanɨ' “Romɨ mwaalyaraayawɨnna wɨlaawɨma!” ’ ” Nɨmɨ sainyɨ kwalaalyagaa' “Romɨna wɨlaawɨma!” wɨdɨ wɨja yena yɨweinyɨra. Yɨsɨla mari'bwarakadɨvɨsabwibɨ' ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwaraavɨ kujɨwaake sahwara wɨlɨmwagetabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨlaawa'mujɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨka!” dena Romɨyavaakɨdaa'nya pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨdeinyɨ.

A'mwe kunya yawɨ'nɨka kwaraavɨnajɨ kunya myawɨrya kwaraavɨnajɨ yɨ yɨwɨridɨvɨsaraavɨnajɨ miwɨrinyadɨvɨsaraavɨnajɨ nɨmɨ tɨvɨkɨta kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Tɨvɨkɨta sa' Gotɨyai “Pwaraavɨ duzɨwaakya!” nyɨdakevɨne tɨvɨkɨsasɨ.
Nabaai sasare savɨdaasɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ yawɨsabwi mɨdɨnya'neinyɨ yɨ Romɨ mwaalya saihɨlyɨyaraavɨjɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakya'ne saburɨ sɨmunya kuna naanga yawɨ'manɨge.

Yo, sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ yagaala tewaanyavɨna wagɨla manyɨvwa'nyadeinyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yagaala tewaanya sa' gazarazara lɨmwaga'bɨzaraavɨ Gotɨyai wɨvadaihasamaarya'ne sa' Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya dɨ'nakesɨ. Dɨragɨnya Juyaraavɨdaasɨ nabaai Juyara mamwaalyɨgasaraavɨjɨ wɨvadaihasamaarya'nesɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yagaala tewaanya sahɨrɨsavɨ Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨna a'mwe yɨda'maraangeinaavɨ nemwaaihya'neburɨ yoima'desɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagawaari nemɨre sɨmunyarɨ yavada'galakade'nanyɨ. Lɨmwangebwi gave sabwine'nanyɨ. Aayawɨdaa'nyɨ yunegaa'nannevɨ lɨmwangebwine'nanyɨ. Sare' Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨ'nanyɨ “Pwai Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwade sarerɨna ‘Yɨda'maraangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa,’ dozɨyai yuyagaa' gaala mwaaladelyɨ.”

Sare' yuya dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ myawɨryaraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ kayaa'nanyabwi wɨla'dennajɨ yɨda'maraangebwi maayanna yadɨvɨsannajɨ Gotɨyai gamɨrebadaasɨ, Sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ gamɨre sɨnna tɨkebwi daanga wɨjaaya'nebwi yoima'devulyɨ. A'mwe sarera kumɨre saburajɨ Gotɨyare nebula sabwi dathɨvaina yadɨvɨsarera.
Daanga wɨjaaya'nebwinanya'na yɨhɨthɨma! A'mwera Gotɨyarɨ yawɨramaata sabura lɨka yulyarɨka' mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ sɨmunyavɨ mena yɨbwarɨdaakwakengɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Gotɨyai yuya sa wakyaakegaa'daasɨ a'mwera Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya dɨ'nake' waragothevɨjɨ gamɨ sahwai Gotɨyare aaya kaavɨlya' a'mweraavɨre'bɨsa' mwarikevɨjɨ yawɨramaapɨnerera. “Sahwai Gotɨyalyɨra,” yawɨpɨnerera. Sarewaarɨ tɨnna wangadaanyawaai mɨ'. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yuyangɨ wakyaakenna tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' yawɨramaapɨnewaalyɨ. Sasare savɨdaasɨ “Nɨmɨ myawɨriwa,” dɨpɨnera mɨka! Kumɨresɨra. Yagaainakera mɨka!

Daanga wɨjaaya'nebwinanya'na pɨrɨ' yɨhɨthɨma! Gotɨyarɨna yawɨrangadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' “Sai nebwina Gotɨya naangelyɨra,” yawɨrangadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Sara yadɨvɨ' gamɨnne yaya' munya ke'ba makidɨvɨtara mɨ'. “Su! Su!” dadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Aawaawa. Kumɨre yawɨta sabwi wana navɨ'navɨka wiadere. Sara yada kumɨre sɨmunya sa' kayaa'na yɨma'nyɨna yada jɨhɨnya' yɨma'nyɨna yadere.
Kumɨ kayaa'na yadɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna dɨna “Nemɨ sɨdu'nakeinera.” Sara yadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' sare'na sɨdu'maayara mwaalɨna.

Sasarera Gotɨyai mabalyɨ yaderɨ, byaanna naanga kɨnɨnnakerɨ yaya' makina yadɨvɨsabwi bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨ' yɨvanɨga'. Sara yadɨvɨsagaa' yɨlaaya'ne a'mwa'mwe, a'mwe balya'ne saraavɨjɨ yusaraavɨjɨ yɨkurɨyaawiaraavɨjɨ kamaala saraavɨjɨ a'mwa'mwengɨ yaya makina yadɨvɨsare.

Sasare savɨ yawɨbwa'dei yɨ'naraderɨ pɨlɨzɨmaanɨyaraavɨ marɨmwangɨna yadevaaibɨ' Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨre kayaa'nanya kaavɨlyaburɨ yɨ'dɨvalamwaaihɨna kya' kunnya sɨmunya kayaa'nanya saburɨ mwagi'namakabada gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi wagɨla wɨvwa'nadevwi marɨmwangɨna yadɨvɨsare. Sare yadɨvɨ' kumɨ sara pwaraavɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yɨdɨvɨ' kunnya kɨlaakejɨkɨ kwaakeba makwaidaawadɨvɨsare.

Sasarera Gotɨyarɨne nebulyabwi yagalya'ma'na yadɨvɨ' kwaasɨyabwi maralɨmwanna yadɨvɨsare. Gotɨyai yuyangɨ wakyaakerɨ yaya' mamakɨlyɨ yadɨvɨ' Aaya Kaavɨlyarɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Aawa. Wakyaaka yuya sangɨna yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsare. Wakyaaka sahwai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gamɨnne yaya sa' munya ke'banna nemɨ makɨlya'nei nawɨ'nya naangelyɨra. Naanga nebulyasɨ.

Nabaai kayaa'nanya sarevɨ Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ kayaa'nanya kaavɨlyaburɨ yɨ'dɨvalamwaaihɨna. Sara kya' wagɨla wɨvwa'nya'nera kayaa'nanyabwina dɨka widevwi yadɨvɨsarera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨ kumɨre a'mwe samɨlɨka a'mweraavɨrebwina marasɨ'na yeva pɨmɨlɨkajɨ kwaiyagaala dɨdɨvɨsamɨlɨke.

Nabaai sabaaibɨ' kumɨre a'mwe kwara a'mwengɨ ya'nebwi yagalya'ma'na yadɨvɨ' kumɨre munya sɨ' kumɨre pwaraavɨna dɨka naange' widada kwala sara kwala pwarajɨ gevwi kayaa'nanyabwina wagɨla kɨnɨnnaka sa pwarajɨ yadɨvɨsare. Nabaai kumɨ saraavɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyabwina Gotɨyai wɨrɨvɨkɨrya'ne daanga kayaa'nanya maa'dɨvɨsara.

Sareraavɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'nanya kaavɨlyaburɨ yɨ'dɨvalamwaaihɨna. Kunnya sɨmunyaburɨ Gotɨyarɨna “Nayaa yawɨralɨmwagaana!” myawɨri yadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyai “Sahwara sɨmunya pinabɨsa' maapɨka!” dada yɨ'dɨvalamwaaihɨna. Sara kya' a'mwe sara mya'ne yuya kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna yadɨvɨsangɨ.

Yɨ dara yadɨvɨsangɨ. Kumɨ yuya kayaa'nanya sa, yuya gɨrɨkita'nanya sa, yuya tɨganaarya sa, yuya wana kayaa'nanaanga sa yadɨvɨsare. Gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakeraavɨna munyɨ' kayaa'na wiadere. A'mweraavɨ tamakɨna, mayagaala yaasɨwa' damarina, kwaasɨya dɨnyɨna, pwaraavɨna kayaa'na yawɨ'na. Yuya sasare kayaa'nanya sa kumɨnyɨ yunebanna warɨkengɨ. Yɨ bulayagaala dadɨvɨsara,

“A'mwe pwaraavɨre yaya kayaaka yɨgalaana!” dɨna, ku'maayaba wɨdadɨvɨsara, Gotɨyarɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaidera, yagaaibɨraizɨka wɨdadɨvɨsara, “Nɨmɨ pwarabɨtainyɨ mɨ',” yawɨ'dɨvɨsara, kumɨnne yaya' munya ke'banna makinyɨna yadɨvɨsara, kayaa'nanya mudɨka sabwi wakɨna yadɨvɨsara, kuvɨnɨmaangeyuraavɨre yagaala sangɨ galazekɨvaina yadɨvɨsara,
sɨmunya maayara, kunnya yune naanga nebulyava'nanyangɨ nayaa mamɨdɨnyadɨvɨsara, kunnya avaaitawanakeraavɨ nayaa myadɨvɨsara, a'mwe pwaraavɨna kale mwiaderera.

Sasarera Gotɨyare yagaalya' dakɨnɨke' nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Dara dɨnɨ' “A'mwe sasare sabwi yadɨvɨsara tɨvɨkɨsa'na yuna naanga baibɨka! Daanga maapɨka!” Sara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' kayaa'nanya sabwi sara yadɨvɨta gavenna mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe kayaa'nanya sasara yadɨvɨta kwaraavɨ “Tewaanna yɨvanɨga'. Kuna sana jɨla!” wɨdadɨvɨsare.

A'mweigɨ, sasare savɨdaasɨ kayaa'nanya sasarebaaibɨ' yɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨ nyawɨbwa'dɨka! Pwaraavɨ jɨda'dɨnyaigɨ Gotɨyai gyawɨbwaradehaa' be yagaala duthatheigɨnaka! Aawa. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ pwaraavɨ jɨda'dɨnyagaa' gɨmɨ kwaigɨnyɨne'na jɨda'nɨnneigɨnyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ saigɨ jɨda'dɨnyaigɨ avaala sasare sabwi yadɨnyaigɨnyɨne'nanyɨ.
Nemɨ yuyaina yawɨ'manɨgo. A'mwe sara yuya kayaa'nanya sara yɨpɨja sabwina Gotɨyai daanga wɨjaavɨna yadevwina Gotɨyai nebulyaburɨna sara yawɨbwa'devulyɨ.

A'mweigɨ, a'mwe sara sasarebwi yadɨvɨsaraavɨ jɨdata yɨvanɨgɨnya gɨmɨ kwaigɨ avaala sara yɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨ kunya gara yawɨ'mwaa! Gotɨyai yawɨbwata savɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wavɨla'na yɨja' lɨkaanya yɨnɨga wɨna yɨnneigɨ daa!

Gotɨyai yange'na tewaanna bwiwanna gyada saamɨnyagaa' gyemwali'maa'da tɨvɨkɨsa'na yɨme'nya'bɨ' gɨzaavadei mɨ'. Sasara gyade'na “Yaasɨwakengɨra,” jawɨ'manɨgɨ! Gotɨyai “Sɨmunya mudɨkebwi jawɨramaaka!” yawɨ'manɨke' myawɨrijɨvanɨgɨ! Yɨ sarevɨdaasɨ tewaanya nawɨ'nyabwi gyɨvanɨke'nanyɨ.

Gɨmɨre sɨmunya' gɨmɨre kayaa'nanyanna kaanya tihɨremwaaina yagɨna gɨmɨ myawɨramaarivanɨgɨnyavɨna Yɨrɨka Pɨrɨkɨna sasareigɨnyɨne'na gɨrɨvɨkɨrya'ne marayɨngakingɨla yɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨrɨka sagaa' Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨke' ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathe', yɨda'maraangebwina yawɨbwarade savɨ daanga kayaa'nanya sasɨ pɨnɨjɨ dɨmaa'dengɨ.
Gotɨyai a'mwe gazarɨzarɨ gamɨre yade sabwina wɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Pwara Gotɨyai kumɨnyɨna byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨ kumɨre yaya makɨlade'nesɨ gaala kayaaka minya'ne sabulyɨ sa wɨjaaya'ne bɨ'dɨvɨ' tewaanya saburɨ dɨragɨnna kuna mwaalɨna yadɨvɨta saraavɨ gaala yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaalya'ne sabwi wɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Pwara yune kumɨnyɨne'na yawɨ'dɨvɨ' nebulyabwi galazekɨvaina yadɨvɨ' yɨda'maraanga myabwinanya savɨ mɨdɨmanɨgata saraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨke' wɨdavadesɨ daanga kayaa'nanya sabulyɨ wɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ.

Yɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanya' yadɨvɨta yuya saraavɨre kuryaraavɨ taanginaangebulyɨ daanga naangebulyɨ dathɨwaaladevulyɨ. Sare' Juyaraavɨdaasɨ yɨ kumɨ Anga Pimagɨnya (Gɨrikɨya) pwara kwaraavɨjɨ dathɨwaaladevulyɨ.
Yɨ a'mwe gazarazara nawɨ'nyabwina yadɨvɨta saraavɨna Gotɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨ yaya makɨlyasɨ munyɨ' kwaamu' kave warɨna yadevulyɨ wɨjaavadelyɨ. Yɨ Juyaraavɨdaasɨ Anga Pimagɨnyaraavɨna yɨna.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai kunya dara yawɨ'dei mɨ' “A'mwe Juyarɨ nayaa maryawɨbwarɨma! A'mwe Anga Pimagɨnyarɨ kayaa'na maryawɨbwarɨma!” Aawa. Sara majai a'mwe sara yadɨvɨta sabwina avaaina maryawɨbwa'delyɨ.

Yɨ sare' da'dare'nesɨ. A'mwe yuya sara Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya' kunera pɨvakaavɨyara kayaa'nanya wagɨla sabura yadɨvɨ' yɨ sahwaraavɨna Kɨwɨnya sa' Gotɨyai myawɨri yada kyawɨbwarojɨ sahwara yɨwɨpɨ'dere. Nabaai a'mwe yuya sara Kɨwɨnya sa' kɨnɨnnakera Juyara kayaa'nanya wagɨla sabura yadɨvɨ' yɨ sahwaraavɨna Kɨwɨnya sa' yawɨ'na yada saburɨna maryawɨbwaradere.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe sara Kɨwɨnya sabwi kadɨka yaasɨwa' wɨ'nadɨvɨsara Gotɨyarɨna yɨda'maraangera Gotɨyarera yɨma'nadɨvɨ' mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwera yune Kɨwɨnyabwi mɨdɨbɨzɨ kwajɨ a'mwe dazaraavɨna Gotɨyai kudathɨkere “A'mwe yɨda'maraangelyɨ. Nɨmɨrelyɨ.” Kɨrɨ' sarera mamwaalyɨgasare.

Nabaai sare' dare'nesɨ. Ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwara Kɨwɨnya sa' maayara kunnya sɨmunya sabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨ' Kɨwɨnya pimagɨnya sa' dɨnɨke' mɨdɨnapɨjɨyagaa' yɨ Kɨwɨnya sa' maayara sara yadɨvɨsa'na kumɨre sɨmunyai gamɨ sai kumɨre Kɨwɨnyabulyɨ.

Sahwara kumɨre mwaalyabwina dara wɨjɨwaainadesɨ. Kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ Gotɨyai Kɨwɨnya' dɨnɨke'ne yɨdavakengɨ sɨmunyavɨ wakakengɨ. Yɨ kumɨre sɨmunyai tewaanyai wɨvadaihɨrakya' jalɨkurakaderera. Yɨ pɨgaa' kumɨre yawɨsa kumɨre yadɨvɨta sabwina “Kayaa'na yɨwaa,” jɨda'nadengɨ. Pɨgaa' kumɨre yawɨsa kumɨre yadɨvɨta sabwina “Tewaanya yɨwaa,” wɨdathengɨ.

Gotɨyai dɨvi yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ yawɨbwarya'nerɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ kumwaaihojɨ sasarebaaibɨ' sahwai yuya lɨka yulya'de sabura a'mwera sara yawɨ'dɨvɨsanna maryawɨbwaradelyɨ. Nɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' dadɨnya' yagaala sa' kɨnɨnnakevɨnyɨ.
Nabaai gɨmɨ, “Juyai,” wo'nɨkeigɨ daaka! Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya sabwi kɨnɨnnakeigɨ Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna daa'dɨnyaigɨ daaka! Saigɨnyɨna yaya' munyaba ke'banna makidɨ “Nemɨ Gotɨyareinera,” dadɨnyaigɨ daaka!
Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya saburɨdaa'nyɨ gɨzɨwaakesa'na yawɨrangadɨnya'na Gotɨyare sɨmunya' sɨdu'nakeigɨ, nabaai yɨda'nanya sabwina pɨburaavɨ wavɨla'devwina gima'nadeigɨ daaka!

Gɨmɨ Juyaigɨ dɨragɨnna dara yawɨ'dɨnyɨ “Sɨmunya sabwi tɨvi'na maa'mwa. Gotɨyarɨ myawɨryaraavɨ tɨbɨnyaraavɨ tuta tewaanyarɨ' wi'na yɨbwarɨdaakwɨdeinyɨ. A'mwe jɨhɨnyavɨ mwaaihasaraavɨna nɨmɨ kumɨre dɨ'baakeinyɨ.

Gotɨyarɨna a'mwe sɨmunya maayaraavɨ yɨwɨryamaryadɨnyainyɨ. Nɨmɨ Kɨwɨnyaburɨne kaimɨraaya maalɨkebɨsaraavɨre wɨjɨwaakadɨnyainyɨ. Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya saburɨ aaya kaavɨla kunya yawɨta sasɨ yɨ nebulya'nanyasɨ kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ mwaaihe'ne'nanyɨra.” Sara dadɨnyaigɨ daaka!
Sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ sasareigɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨnyaigɨ gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨ yɨjɨwaakɨdɨnyaigɨ midaaka! “A'mwe sara kuka nyɨpɨka!” dadɨnyaigɨ gɨmɨ kwaigɨ kuka myadɨnyaigɨ daa!

“A'mwera a'mwengɨ ata nalɨmwabɨthɨka!” dadɨnyaigɨ nabaai gɨmɨ kwaigɨ ata malɨmwagyadɨnyaigɨ daa! Gɨmɨ gotɨya kwaasɨyaraavɨna a'mwa'mweraavɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaihɨnyaigɨ gɨmɨ saigɨ a'mwa'mwa-angengɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kuka myɨjɨvanɨgɨ? Sare'na gɨrɨkita'nanya kɨnɨnnakeigɨ midaaka!

Gɨnnya yaya' munyaba ke'banna makinadɨ yɨlaaya'na “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨra,” dɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨ Kɨwɨnya sabwi sekɨvalapari'ma'manɨgɨnya sasare saburɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' kwaakeba bamakwalaawia myɨjɨvanɨgɨ?
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ sara yɨvanɨgasa'na Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨkɨ “Sarɨnnyaburɨna ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Gotɨyarɨne yayavɨ yagaaibɨraizɨka yɨvanɨga'.”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ Juyaigɨ Kɨwɨnyaburɨ mɨdɨdɨzaigɨ “Gotɨyarelyɨra,” yɨbwarɨdaakwia'ne' gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gurya daya sabwi nawɨ'nyabulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ Kɨwɨnyabwi sekɨvalapari'ma'dɨzaigɨ gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gurya madaya yɨnɨkejɨ'bɨta sajɨ' yɨma'nadezɨkɨra.
Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwarɨ kɨlaakejɨ' gurya madaya yɨpɨjai, sai Kɨwɨnya tewaanya sabura mɨdɨnajai yɨ Gotɨyai “Sahwai kɨlaakejɨ' gurya da'nɨkerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa!” dathei midaaka!

Gɨmɨ Kɨwɨnyavɨne pɨkarya' kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ. Nabaai gɨmɨnyɨ kɨlaakejɨ' gurya gɨthavesaigɨnyɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨ Kɨwɨnyabwi pari'ma'dɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ savɨdaasɨ a'mwe pwarɨ kɨlaakejɨ' gurya madaya yɨpɨja' gamɨ sai Kɨwɨnya sa' nayaa pada'galamɨdɨnajai gɨmɨnyɨ jɨdata gyatheigɨnyɨra.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai Yɨta Juya savaakɨdaasai kɨlaakejɨ'na ku'maayaba Juya mwaaide sai Juya nebulai mɨ'. Yɨ ku'maayaba kɨlaaka gurya daya yadɨvɨta sai Juya nebulai mɨ'.

Aawa. A'mwei sɨmunyavɨna kɨma'nyawɨ Juya mwaalajai, sai Juya nebulya'nanyalyɨ. Yɨ nabaai kɨlaaka gurya daya sabwi sɨmunyavɨnebulyɨ. Gotɨyai pware sɨmunya' wanganaka “Nɨmɨrelyɨ,” yawɨ'dei kɨlaakevɨna mɨ'. Sa' yune pɨkarya yɨda'nɨka saburɨna mɨ'. Sa' Gotɨyare Kuryarɨnanyɨra. A'mwei sara yojɨyarɨ a'mwera yɨlaaya mwi yɨpɨ'de kɨrɨ' sarɨ Gotɨyai yɨlaaya wiadelyɨra.
Sarevɨdaasɨ Juyara a'mwe pwaraavɨ gareburɨdaasɨ wavɨla'manɨgava? Kɨlaaka gurya daya sangɨ nawɨ'nya berɨ' yɨma'nadengaka?
Akai! Nawɨ'nya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya warɨkengɨ. Aaya pɨrɨ'nanya' daresɨ. Juyara kumɨ sara maremwaalya'ne Gotɨyai gamɨre yagaalya wɨjayaakengɨ.

Sare' gatha'darevɨnaka? Juya pwara malɨmwagyara yagaala dangɨ mamɨdɨnye'. Sasare'na kumɨre kayaa'nanya dazabwi Gotɨyare nebulya'nanya' dathɨwagathevwi daaka! Gotɨyai nebulya'nanya' dɨragɨnna kuna malɨmwagi yadei daaka!
Arɨkewɨnyɨ. A'mwe gazaizai kwaasɨ dazai kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai nebulya'nanyalyɨ. Sabaaibɨ' gamɨnyɨna Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨ'
“Gɨmɨ wɨda'gɨzɨyagaa' ‘Yɨda'maraangelyɨ,’
A'mwe yuya sara yawɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Gɨmɨre yawɨbwasa'negaa'
Yɨnɨga davɨla'deigɨnyɨ.”

Nemɨre kayaa'nanya sabwi Gotɨyare nawɨ'nya yɨda'maraanga saburɨ ku'maayaba marima'naabazabwine'na berɨ' gara daazɨwona! Nɨmɨ a'mweinaavɨre kunya nemɨre saburɨna mɨdɨdɨ dara dɨdeinyɨ daaka! Sare'na Gotɨyai nerɨvɨkɨrya'nei nemɨre kayaa'nanya sabwina sɨnna tɨka wɨdasa'ne daanga be'na nejaavadelaka? Sahwai yɨda'maraangei mɨka!
Sasarebwi arɨkewɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai yɨda'maraangebwi mya yajɨ kwajɨ Kwaaka davakɨyaraavɨ sasara myai gara yawɨrannelaka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pwara dara dɨna “Nɨmɨre kwaasɨ yagaala sa' Gotɨyare yagaala nebulya'nanya' ku'maayaba marima'naabathesɨ. Yɨ daza' sara yojɨ gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨladesɨ. Sare'na ga'dareburɨ nyɨdɨvanɨ'? ‘Gɨmɨ waginakeigɨnyɨra.’ Sara jɨdavaka nɨmɨnyɨ daanga nyɨjaavanɨke' be'neka?”

Sara dɨpɨja' sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwaasɨ yawɨta dara dɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ “Yarala, nemɨ kayaa'nanya sabwi yaana! Yɨ savɨ tewaanya sabwi yɨma'nade'na kayaa'nanya sara yaana!” Nabaai sasare sabwi nawɨ'nya' daa! A'mwera pwara nemɨnyɨna bɨraiyagaala kwaasɨ dara nedɨvanɨga' “Yagaala Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨre' yɨ sasaresɨ.” Sasareraavɨ Gotɨyai daanga wɨjaavadelyɨ. Nabaai tɨvɨkɨta sa' yɨdasasɨ.

Yɨ gatha'darevɨnaka! Nemɨ Juyaina a'mwe pwaraavɨ wavɨlavaanneina dɨngaka! Aawa nebulyasɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ jɨdasa'na tɨvi'na dɨwo “Yɨ yuyaina wagɨlyavɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaihoinera Juyainajɨ Anga Pimagɨnya (Gɨrikɨya) kwarajɨ.”
Sabaaibɨ' dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Gotɨyaryaba yɨda'maraanga aane pwai kwai mɨ'.
Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Aane pwai kwai mamwaalyɨ'.
A'mwe pwai sɨmunya wɨwarɨkei mɨ'.
Gotɨyarɨna pwai bɨrɨbɨrya yɨvanɨkei mɨ'.
Yɨ yuyara Gotɨyarɨ yagalya'ma'mwaasare.
Yuyara yɨrakureva waryaanyara yɨma'nɨwaasare.
Nawɨ'nyabwi yade aane pwai mɨ'.
Sasarei aane pwai kwai mamwaalyɨ'.
Taalɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ gɨlebutɨrɨnya'bɨ' newinɨvanɨka wɨdadɨvɨsare.
Taalɨsasɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsare.
Naawɨnaanyare kwaamɨnya' a'mweraavɨ tamakadevaaibɨ'
Yagaala nabinabinya kayaaka yɨgalya'ne wɨdadɨvɨsare.
A'mweraavɨ kayaaka dɨragɨnna yɨgalya'ne
Yagaala kayaa'nanyanna paasiyagaala wɨdadɨvɨsare.
Yɨhukaannakera a'mwe tamya'nera
Yarai kaanyave'na yamaryadɨvɨsare.
Kayaaka yɨgalakya'nera wɨna yadɨvɨ'
Taanginya kwalaalya wɨjaaya'nera wodɨvɨsare.
Kwaamu'nanyaburɨne tusa' yawɨramaa'dɨvɨtara mɨ'.
Pwarajɨ avaaizɨmunyabwi ye'mwannamwaaidɨvɨtara mɨ'.
“Gotɨyai Naangelyɨra,” myawɨri yadɨvɨ'
Kumɨre tɨnnyaraavɨ Gotɨyarɨne lɨkebwi mwarika.
Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ sara dɨnɨkengɨ.

Nabaai sara dɨnɨkenna nemɨ yawɨ'mwo. Yuya Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke nemɨ Juyaina saburɨ dalaangewɨ wɨla'nata yɨgoina sara ya'ne dɨnɨkengɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' Juyainaavɨna dazabwi yɨhɨthɨwebwi yɨwetawakya warɨkesɨ. Sarevɨdaasɨ Gotɨyai yawɨbwata'negaa' nemɨrebwina “Juyarajɨ maanga bɨpaina yɨpɨka! Nabaai a'mwe yuyawɨnyara nɨmɨnyɨna yɨwetawakya sabwi kɨnɨnnakera mwaaibɨka!” daka Kɨwɨnya kɨnɨnnakeinaavɨ dalaangewɨ nemarulawakakeine.

Sare'na darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare yawɨbwata'nebwina Kɨwɨnya sabwi mɨdɨnyavɨna “A'mwe yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨreigɨnyɨ,” Gotɨyai kɨlaa'naka aane pwarɨ kwarɨ wɨdathe' mɨ'. Aawa. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Kɨwɨnya sabwi nemɨre wagɨla saburɨ yune'na neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨkesɨ sahɨrɨ'na.

Nabaai dahaa' Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ gamɨre yɨda'maraanga sabwi gamɨnyɨ yɨda'maraangeraavɨ wɨmwaaihya'nebwi mi'na neyɨbwarɨdaakwakebulyɨ. Sa' kɨwɨnyabura mɨdɨnya'nevɨdaa'nyɨ mima'nyakesɨ. Aawa. Sa' pɨrɨvɨ yɨma'nakesɨ. Kɨrɨ' pɨkarya Kɨwɨnyasɨ Wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasaraavɨre dɨnɨkesɨ nawɨ'nya yɨda'maraanga dazabwina jalɨkurakɨnɨkesɨ.

Yɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨzaraavɨna Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeraavɨ nɨmɨreraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma!” dathelyɨ. Yɨ lɨmwabɨza yuyaraavɨnesɨ. Sare' padaihasamaasabwi dare'nesɨ. A'mwe Juyarebwi nabinyabwi mɨ'. Anga naanga pimagɨnya pwai kwarebwi nabinyabwi mɨ'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuya a'mwera Juyarajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyarajɨ wagɨlya'nebwi yadɨvɨsare. Gotɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨyaryaba menyaba mwaaihasare.

Sasareraavɨ Gotɨyai yange'na tewaanna wɨgaimwada Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ kamaryasaaba' sahwai ayahi mubya yamaarya'nei sara kya' Gotɨyai “A'mwe yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨra. Nɨmɨreihɨlyɨra,” wɨdɨna. Sa'na sahwara mamubyadɨvɨsare. Sa'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ sɨhumalesɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dahɨlakakei balaka gamɨre tawe' a'mweraavɨre wagɨla sa' mubya'ne' walaabakesɨ. Gotɨyarɨ a'mweraavɨre wagɨlyabwina sɨnna tɨka wɨda'devulyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨzaraavɨna sɨnna tɨka sabwi mubamarasɨ'nya'nei balakelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai sasare saburɨ Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨ yɨda'maraangeinyɨ yɨda'na yadɨnyainyɨ,” neyɨbwarɨdaakwakebulyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨgaa' Gotɨyai kwaamu' kave yemwaaida a'mweraavɨre kayaa'nanyanna yeta sabwina wanganakɨna.

Kɨrɨ' “ ‘Gotɨyai yɨda'maraangei mɨka!’ nadɨpɨdɨka!” daka dathahaasagaa' Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨ yɨda'maraangeinyɨ yɨda'na yadɨnyainyɨ,” daka sara neyɨbwarɨdaakwia'nei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ maryasaabakelyɨ. Sasare saburɨ Gotɨyai gamɨ sai yɨda'maraangerɨna neyɨbwarɨdaakwada yɨ a'mwe yuyara, Jizaazarɨ lɨmwagazarɨna “A'mwe yɨda'maraangelyɨ. Nɨmɨrelyɨra,” dadelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaasɨ Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” nedake'na yɨ tusa' a'mweraavɨne yaya' makɨlya'nebwi gava warɨka! Yɨ wana aawaawa. Tuta sarɨ' kaanya mena tihɨ'nɨkesɨ. Tuta dazarɨkɨ berɨ' daharihɨ'narɨ'? Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyabwi mɨdɨnya savɨ dɨngaka? Aawa, savɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwanga saburɨ sahɨrɨ' tuta sarɨkɨ galalɨmwamanɨ'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ dɨragɨnna dara dadaanyɨ “Gotɨyai a'mwei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagazarɨ dɨvanɨkelyɨ ‘A'mwe sai yɨda'maraangelyɨ. Nɨmɨrelyɨra.’ ” A'mwe Kɨwɨnyaburɨna yaamɨjɨ yune mɨdɨnajarɨna Gotɨyai sara majadelyɨ.

A'mweraavɨne yaya mamakɨlya'ne' pɨbwi darɨka? Dare' jawɨrila! Gotɨyai sai Gotɨyai Juyaraavɨnannei daaka! Ajɨmya yuyangɨyarajɨyaraavɨne Gotɨyai midaaka! Yayo! Gotɨyai sai ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwara kwaraavɨjɨnelyɨra.

Gotɨyai gave pwaina naangelyɨ. Sarevɨ Juyara kɨlaakejɨ' gurya da'dɨvɨsara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨzaraavɨna “Yɨda'maraangerera,” dada nabaai ajɨmya yuyangɨyara kɨlaakejɨ' gurya madayadɨvɨsara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨzaraavɨnajɨ avaaina dɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaasɨ lɨmwanga dazavɨ yɨda'maraangeina yɨma'nadaanya'na Kɨwɨnya sabwi dathathɨvaimanɨgona? Arɨkewɨnyɨra. Aawa. Kɨwɨnyabwi nebulya'na yɨda'na marɨdaakwia yɨvanɨgo.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kɨlaa'naka Juyainaavɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyai Evɨraamɨmɨ “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨreigɨnyɨ,” wɨjaakebwina gara daazɨwona?
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ne Evɨraamɨ tewaanya yaakenna Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨra,” dazɨ kwajɨ Evɨraamɨ gannya yaya' munyaba kamakɨladɨka! Sare' mɨka! Aawa. Yɨ Gotɨyarɨna aawa.
Sare' Gotɨyare bukuya' gara dɨnɨkavaka? Sa' dara dɨnɨ' “Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nalɨmwanna kya' yɨ Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨna yawɨrakelyɨ ‘Sare'na sahwai yɨda'maraangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa.’ ”
Nemɨ yawɨ'daanyɨ “A'mwei pware wawɨnya yada nɨgwia maa'de tɨvɨkɨta sa'na nemɨ ‘Sɨhumalesɨra,’ yawɨ'daa mɨ'. Aawa. ‘Sa' wawɨnya yadɨvɨsabanna wɨjaavadɨvɨkɨ,’ yawɨ'daanyɨ.”

Yɨ nabaai a'mwei Gotɨyai yɨlaaya wia'nei yɨda'maraangei yɨma'nya'nei kɨwɨnyaburɨna wawɨnya mi yajai sai, gamɨ Gotɨyarɨ yawɨralɨmwanna “Kɨwɨnyaburɨna yuna navɨkerɨna Gotɨyai ‘Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ gɨmwaaihɨma!’ dannelyɨ.” Sahwai sara yawɨralɨmwagaza'na Gotɨyai yawɨ'delyɨ “Yawɨralɨmwamwake'na sahwai yɨda'maraangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwana.” (Sare' sɨhumalesɨra.)
Nabaai Ne Devitɨ kwalyɨ a'mwei wawɨnya yakenna myawɨryarɨna Gotɨyai “A'mwe yɨda'maraangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa,” yawɨ'derɨna “A'mwe sai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkelyɨra,” jaakabaaibɨsasɨ.
Dara dɨnɨ'
“A'mwe datha'darera yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasare.
‘Gotɨyai kumɨre yɨwetawakya marasɨ'nakere.
Kumɨre wagɨlyangɨ duimwagasɨ'na yakere.’
Naangei ‘Wagɨlyabwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ,’ dɨragɨnna myawɨryajai
Yɨ sare'na a'mwe dazai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkelyɨ.”
Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Sarevɨdaasɨ yɨlaaya sasarebwi a'mwe kɨlaaka gurya da'nadɨvɨta gaveraavɨne' daaka! Nabaai kɨlaaka gurya madayɨnɨka sara kwaraavɨne' midaaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ dara dadaanyɨ “Evɨraamɨ lɨmwagaryaake'na Gotɨyai jaakelyɨ ‘Yawɨralɨmwamwake'na yɨda'maraangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwana.’ ”

Gotɨyai sara jaakegaa' Evɨraamɨ ga'dara mwalyaakelaka? Kɨlaakejɨ' gurya mena da'nɨkerɨ dɨngaka? Kɨlaakejɨ' gurya madayarɨ dɨngaka? Yɨ kɨlaakejɨ' gurya da'nɨkerɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Kɨlaakejɨ' gurya madayarɨnyɨra.

Kɨlaakejɨ' gurya madayavɨ Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ yawɨralɨmwagake'na “Yɨda'maraangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa,” jaakevɨne dakya'ne', yɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaainya'ne' sahwai kɨlaaka gurya daya'nebwi maryaake'nanyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe yuyara, lɨmwabɨzara kɨlaaka gurya mada'nyaraavɨne aaya mudɨ'nanyai aatalyɨ. Sahwara Evɨraamɨ yaakabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨzara Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihɨma!” wɨdatherera.

Nabaai a'mwe kɨlaaka gurya da'nadɨvɨsaraavɨ pwaraavɨ kwɨyakwalaangelyɨ. Yɨ kumɨ kɨlaaka gurya yaasɨwa'na da'nadɨvɨtaraavɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Gurya da'nɨkera Evɨraamɨmɨre sɨvikwajɨkevɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨ' yɨ neyakwalaanga sahwai gurya madayavɨ Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagyaakabaaibɨ' yɨ sahwara dɨragɨnna lɨmwamanɨgasaraavɨnanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnyaburɨna mɨ'. Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na Evɨraamɨmɨjɨ gamɨre yɨsiwiaraavɨjɨ dara wɨdɨna “Kwaaka yuyava' yɨhɨzaavɨdeinyɨ.” Yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja' kɨwɨnyabwi mɨdɨnyavɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨ yawɨralɨmwanna yada Gotɨyai “A'mwe yɨda'maraangelyɨ. Nɨmɨrelyɨ,” dake'na yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake'nanyɨ.

Yɨ sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnyabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨsara dazahwarana yuya sa Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya wɨja maapɨjɨ kwajɨ lɨmwange'ne' yaasɨwa' warɨna yadesɨ. Nabaai yune naanga nebulya'nanya daza' kayaaka kyɨgaladɨka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya' galazekɨvaibɨzaraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨke' wɨda'da daanga wɨjaaya'ne' Kɨwɨnyasɨ. Nabaai kɨwɨnya pɨnɨ maaya savɨ yɨ nabaai kɨwɨnya galazekɨvalyabwi mwarika.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera Gotɨyarɨ yawɨralɨmwangebwi yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdadelyɨ. Gotɨyai “Yange'na gaimwanna yɨma!” daka Evɨraamɨmɨ gyakwalaanga yuyaraavɨna sɨhumale' wɨjaaya'ne'na yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja' dɨragɨnna wa'de'nanyɨ. Sahwara lɨmwabɨzara maapɨ'dere. Daza' Evɨraamɨmɨre yɨsiwiara Kɨwɨnyabwi kɨnɨnnaka gaveraavɨne'na mɨ'. Aawa. Evɨraamɨ sara yaakabaaibɨ' yuyara lɨmwabɨza'na Evɨraamɨmɨrera yɨma'nɨgata kumɨ sara kwarajɨ maapɨ'dere. Evɨraamɨ sai aaya mudɨ'nanyai lɨmwagaazaina yuyainaavɨ aatalyɨ.

Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ anga naanga pimagɨnya kwalaalyangɨna kwɨyakwalaanga'neigɨnyɨ gɨthakɨwa. Sare' Gotɨyai dara yawɨrakelyɨ “Lɨmwabɨzaraavɨne kwɨyakwalaangelyɨra.” Gotɨya sarɨ Evɨraamɨ yawɨralɨmwagakelyɨ. Dɨragɨnya sahwai a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ gaala sabwi wɨjaavadelyɨ. Nabaai sahwai dɨviya'nengɨna dahaa' tɨvi'na yɨma'nɨwakabaaibɨsangɨna dɨragɨnna dadelyɨ. Yɨ sasarerɨ Evɨraamɨ yawɨralɨmwagakelyɨ.

Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'naka sare' a'mwe gazarazara myemwaalyadapi kɨrɨ' sahwai yemwaaida yawɨralɨmwagakevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe anga naanga pimagɨnya kwalaalyangɨyaraavɨre kwɨyakwalaangei yɨma'nyɨna. Yɨ sarevɨ Gotɨyai sɨlɨngaamɨnyangɨna mena dakesɨ. Sabɨ' gɨmɨre jakwarava kumɨ sara yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera. Sara dɨnɨkevɨna sara yɨma'nyɨna yakesɨ.

Evɨraamɨ gamɨre kwarame waanɨ aadɨretɨya aya kɨgaa'na gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' bwaranya yawakɨnya'ne buwikɨ'nɨkejɨ' yawɨ'na. Yɨ Seraavɨre kɨlaakajɨ' kaimɨraaya mamaari yannejɨ' yawɨ'na yaka kɨrɨ' lɨmwanga sabwina makwaasa myakelyɨ.

Lɨmwangebwi yagalya'mavakei mɨka. Sarevɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja' sahɨrɨ'na yawɨraka sɨmunya pɨrɨwaai yawɨrakai mɨ'. Aawa. Dɨragɨnna lɨmwagakelyɨ. Sarevɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwannyai mwaalaka “Gotɨyai byaannakelyɨ,” dakelyɨ.
Yɨ dara dɨragɨnna mena yawɨrakelyɨ “Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na nyɨdɨwake' yɨnɨga yannelyɨ. (Sare'na kaimɨraayarɨ yawakɨna'mujɨ kwalaalyaraavɨre kwɨyakwalaangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨdeinyɨ.)”
Nabaai dɨragɨnna lɨmwagakevɨdaasɨ Gotɨyai dakelyɨ “Yɨda'maraangei nɨmɨrerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa.”
Yagaala daza' “Yɨda'maraangei nɨmɨrerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa,” gamɨ gaverɨne'na yɨda'nɨka'na mɨ'.

Aawa. Gamɨ kwarɨnajɨ nemɨ kwainaavɨnajɨ yɨda'nɨke'nanyɨ. Nemɨ saina Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ nemɨre Naangerɨ mena baryarɨ ayahi yɨdɨkaavakerɨ lɨmwagaazainaavɨna Gotɨyai dannelyɨra “Yɨda'maraangeraavɨ nɨmɨreraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa.”
Jizaazai sahwai nemɨre wagɨla sa marasɨ'nya'nerɨ balya'nerɨ maryasaabakei bwalabalakelyɨ. Yaka Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨlyɨra,” neja'nerɨ ayahi yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mena lɨmwagovɨ Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Yɨda'maraangeihɨrɨ nɨmɨreihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihɨwa,” nedakevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyare kwaamu'nanyavɨ avaaizɨmunya Gotɨyalyɨ ye'mwannamwaaiho. Yɨ nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nayaa yakevɨ avaaizɨmunya Gotɨyarɨjɨ neye'mwamanɨ'.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagovɨ sahwai yange'na gaimwanga sɨhumalevɨ nemɨ daako savɨ gave pwainanyai nemɨre tusa' basamakulakelyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ nayaa pada'galaye'mwannamwaala yaade'na yɨlaaya yadaa Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna yemwaaimanɨgo. Sarevɨ nemɨnyɨ yɨlaaya neyɨgaimanɨ'.

Nabaai nemɨ yune savɨnanna yɨlaaya myɨ yaanneinera. Aawa. Nemɨnyɨ taanga neyɨma'nɨvanɨka sabwi kɨbwinajɨ yaanne'na nemɨ yɨlaaya yɨna. Nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Taanga maa'manɨgo daza nemɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwanga neyɨvanɨkengɨ.

Yɨ nabaai nemɨ dɨragɨnya dara mwalaaja' yɨ nabaai Gotɨyai dara wanganannelyɨ “Yaamɨjɨya saburɨ yɨnɨga wi'nanyara midaaka!” Yɨ nabaai Gotɨyai “Yaamɨjɨya saburɨ yɨnɨga wi'nanyarera,” dɨna yaja' yɨ Gotɨyaibɨsaina yɨma'nya'neina yemwaala yadaanyɨ.

Nabaai nemɨ yemwalaaja' yɨ nemɨre sɨmunya savɨna wagɨla nevwa'nadeina mɨ'. Kurya Tewaanyai, Gotɨyai yanga nejaavadei dara neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨ' “Gotɨyai gamɨre kale nawɨ'nyabwi nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ neyekuramwaaihɨvanɨ'.” Sare'na yemwalaaja sɨmunya sa' wagɨla nevwa'nade' mɨ'. Sara yɨma'nadesɨ.
Nemɨ tewaanya ya'neina dɨragɨnya maayaina kuna mwaaidori Gotɨyai sara dahɨlakaka dazahɨgaasagaa' nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ bule'na wɨjavadaanyainaavɨna ayahi nemaarya'nei nemɨnyɨneba Kɨraazɨtɨyai balakelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pwai kwai a'mwe Kɨwɨnya mɨdɨderɨneba baladei dɨngaka! Naangaangesɨ. Dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwaina pwainanyai a'mwe nawɨ'nyarɨna pwaraavɨ yɨnɨga wɨgaimwaderɨna sai sɨmunya dɨragɨnna yojɨ padaihasamaarya'nei sahwarɨneba baladei dɨngaka?
Sare' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai gamɨre kale wia'nebwi nemɨnyɨnebwina dara neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨkesɨ. Sahwara kayaa'nanyanna yadɨvɨsara kuna mwaaidapi yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai kumɨnyɨneba balakelyɨ.

Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare tawe' dɨma'nakevɨ Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Yɨda'maraangera nɨmɨreraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa,” dakevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ dɨragɨnna nebulya'na yawɨ'manɨgo. Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨke' yawɨbwata'nerɨkɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai nevadaihasamaarade'nanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨkamaanga mwaaidori gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangei balakevɨ, yɨkamaanga sabwi aaya wo'dalasɨ'na yaka yɨ nemɨnyɨ Gotɨyalyɨ avaaizɨmunya' ye'mwagakya neya'. Avaaizɨmunya' ye'mwagakya neyakevɨdaa'nyɨ dɨragɨnna nebulya'na yawɨ'manɨgo. Kɨraazɨtɨyai gaalyai mwaalɨkevɨ Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨkevɨna kuna nevadaihasamaaradelyɨ.
Nabaai yune sahɨrɨ'nanna mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨnyɨ Gotɨyarɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya mena neye'mwagaka sarevɨ dahaa' nemɨ a'mweraayaba Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgo.

Sarevɨ nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. A'mwe pwai kayaa'nanyabwi yaaka sasare saburɨna Kwaakevakɨyainaavɨre sɨmunyavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yɨma'nakesɨ. Nabaai kayaa'nanyabwi balyaburɨ makabakesɨ. Sabaaibɨ' a'mwe yuyara kayaa'nanya yadɨvɨsavɨ balyabwi a'mwe yuyaraavɨ maa'desɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai Kɨwɨnya' mujaayadɨ'nyɨyagaa'na yɨ dazagaa' Kwaakevakɨ kayaa'nanyabwi waryaakesɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya' maayavɨ, yɨ kumɨ kayaa'nanya yadɨvɨsanna Kɨwɨnya' jɨda'da mɨ'.

Aawa. Sare' kɨrɨ' balyabwi Aataamɨmɨregaa'daa'nyɨ waraka Mozɨzaregaa'na kuna bwarakesɨ. Yɨ balyabwi a'mwe yuyaraavɨ galavɨla'nɨkesɨ. Yuyaraavɨ maremwaainɨkesɨ. Aataamɨ Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna wɨja' pari'mavakabaaibɨsavɨ ne sɨnnawɨnya kutabanya mavari'mayɨ yaata sara kwaraavɨjɨ balyabwi galavɨla'na yaakere. Aataamɨ sahwai a'mwe dazai dɨvidaasɨ yɨma'naabyarɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna ke'ba'nanya'bɨsalyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' yɨ Aataamɨmɨ yaaka yɨwetata sasɨ yɨ Gotɨyai gaimwanga yade sɨhumale sa' yange' Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihɨwa,” nedadesɨ avaainanyawaai mɨ'. Aawa nebulyasɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe gave sare wagɨlyavɨ yɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara baidɨvɨkɨ. Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga tewaanyasɨ sɨhumale' yanga wɨjaayasɨ balya saburɨ naanna wavɨlavɨkewaalyɨ. Yada a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ naangaanga yɨma'nɨgodesɨ. Gaimwanga yada sɨhumale' yanga wɨjaaya sa' a'mwe gave pwainanya Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwarevɨ maa'manɨgo.

Nabaai a'mwe gave sare wagɨlya' yaake'bɨ' sɨhumale' wɨjaaya sa' avaainanya' mɨ'. Aawa nebulyasɨ. Sare' dare'newaalyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. A'mwe dazai yɨwetata pɨrɨ'na yaakevɨ yawɨbwasa'na Gotɨyai jɨdata dakɨna. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. A'mwera yɨwetata kwalaalya yadaapiyangɨ Gotɨyai gaimwanga yade sɨhumale'na marasɨ'nada “A'mwe yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” wɨdɨvanɨ'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe gave sare yɨwetasavɨ yɨ gave sarɨna balyabwi yɨma'naabaka gaai maremwaaida yɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨ galavɨlawakɨvanɨ'. Kɨrɨ' nemɨ dɨragɨnna nebulya'na yawɨ'manɨgo. Yanga gaimwanga tewaanya naangaangevɨjɨ sɨhumale' savɨ Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” nedɨvanɨkevɨjɨ a'mwera maapɨjara gaala mwaaidɨvɨsavɨ a'mwe gave pwainanyai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna kingɨya mwaaibɨ'dere. Yɨ daza' balyaburɨ wavɨla'da yɨ naangaangesɨ.

Yɨ sarevɨdaasɨ yɨwetata gave sa' yaakevɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨ Gotɨyai jɨdata dakɨna. Sarebaaibɨ' yɨda'maraanga gave sa' yakevɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨ Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨlyɨ,” dakɨna yada gaala mwaaihasare.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe gave sai yagaalya' galazekɨvalyaakevɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara kayaa'nanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihake'nanyɨ. Sarebaaibɨ' a'mwe pwai Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨnakevɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara yɨda'maraangeraavɨ wɨmwaaihade'nanyɨ.

A'mwera kumɨre kayaa'nanyanna “Yɨwetata naangaanga naanna yadaanyaine. We'!” dɨnya'ne'na Gotɨyai Kɨwɨnyabwi dakɨna. Sara dakɨna kyaa' kayaa'nanya naangaanga yɨma'nakevɨ yɨ Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga tewaanyabwi sasarengɨ naanna wavɨlavɨkebulyɨ.

Kayaa'nanyabwi balyaburɨ marima'naabada yɨ dazavɨ a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevaaibɨ' Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga tewaanya sa' Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” yawɨsa' marima'naabada yɨ dazavɨ sa' maremwaalannesɨ. 'mɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nemɨ gaalyabwi ma'daa yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwalaade'na yanga gaimwanga sa' maremwaala'nesɨ. Sara ya'ne' yanga gaimwanga tewaanya sabwi sasarengɨ wavɨlavɨkebulyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ be yagaala daathevaka? “ ‘Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga tewaanya' naangaanga yɨma'nana!’ dawaajɨ nemɨ kayaa'nanyabwi kuna yaade'nanyɨ,” daathe' daaka!
Arɨkewɨnyɨra! Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagona kayaa'nanya saburɨne dɨragɨnyavɨna baloina navɨka myawɨryadaa pɨzɨ'gwa sareburɨ kuna gatha'dara mwalaadeinaavaka!

Dara myawɨranganyadɨvɨtaihi daa! Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ bavɨtaazɨya mena neyeta saina, sahwalyɨ mena ye'mwannayɨrakuro saina yɨ sasare sabwi yuyaina bavɨtaazɨya ma'daa gamɨre balyabwi mena yɨrakuroinera.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ bavɨtaazɨyavɨ nemɨ gamɨjɨ ye'mwannabaidaa yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ ye'mwannayɨrakuralɨkirakya neya'. Nɨmware byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨ kavi'nɨnnyavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yɨdɨkaavakabaaibɨ' “Gaala mudɨkevɨ kaanya yamaryɨpɨka!” daka neye'mwannayɨrakuraneyɨdɨkaavakeinera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ gamɨjɨ yɨraku'daa gamɨ balakabaaibɨ' ye'mwannayɨrakurabaloina yɨ nabaai gamɨnyɨ yɨdɨkaavakabaaibɨ' nebwina neyɨdɨkaavadeinera.

Sare' nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Kumɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ kayaa'nanyabure dɨragɨnya' kayaaka yɨwawana!” kada' nemɨre sɨmunya aya yawaka sa' yɨsavɨri Jizaazarɨ tamesalyɨ ye'mwannabalakesɨ. Sarevɨ yɨ nemɨ kayaa'nanyabure wɨdayadaanyaina ayahi mamwalaanne'nanyɨ. Kayaa'nanyaburɨne dɨragɨnya' ayahi manemaremwaalanne'nanyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwei mena balojɨyai kayaa'nanyabwi mamuwɨ'ma'nyɨ yadelyɨ. (Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagabalojɨyarɨ kayaa'nanyabwi ayɨna mamaremwaalyɨ yannelyɨ).
Yɨ nemɨ kayaa'nanyaburɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ mena yɨraku'na, baloina mwalaajaina dara yawɨralɨmwadaanyainera “Nemɨ gamɨ kwalyɨ gaala yɨraku'na, mwalaadeine.”
Sare' nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨ mena yɨdɨkaavakei ayahi mabalyɨ yadelyɨ. Gamɨnyɨna balya' dɨragɨnya maayasɨ. Ayahi galavɨlavadei mɨ'. Gamɨnyɨ maremwaaladei mɨ'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwai balakevɨ nemɨre kayaa'nanyabwine'na gave pɨgaa' mena yune'na balakelyɨ. Yɨ balya dazavɨ gamɨ kayaa'nanyabure dɨragɨnyavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakelyɨ. Nabaai gaala mwaalɨkevɨ, Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'nei gaala mwaaidelyɨ.

Sarebaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ kwaihi sarɨmɨnyɨne'na nayaa dara jawɨrila! “Kayaa'nanyabure dɨragɨnyavɨna nemɨ bainɨkeinera. Dɨragɨnya savɨ kwaakewɨ mula'naraanneine. Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaidaa Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'neina gaala mwalaadeine.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi mɨdɨnya'neihi kayaa'nanya sabwi sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' baladezɨ' mamareyɨhɨmwaalanna! Kayaa'nanya sabwi nayɨhimwagi'nadɨka!

Nabaai sarɨmɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨkɨya sa kayaa'nanya saburɨna wana kayaa'na ya'ne sangɨ kuna mujaavɨpɨna! Aawa. Sarɨmɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨkɨya sa yɨda'maraanga saburɨna wana nawɨ'nya ya'ne sangɨ duzaavɨnyɨla! Yɨ mena bainɨkeihi kuna mamwaalyeva ayɨna gaala mwaaihasarabɨsaihi Gotɨyarɨna sarɨmɨnyɨ nayaa duzaavɨnyɨla!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kayaa'nanyabwi sarɨmɨre naangebwi mwaranna! Ayahi mamareyɨhɨmwaalannera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dahaa' sarɨmɨ Kɨwɨnyaburɨ kwaakewɨ mamwaalyɨga'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga tewaanyaburɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaiha'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gara yaanneka? Nemɨ Kɨwɨnyaburɨ kwaakewɨ mamwaalyɨgo. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨ yanga gaimwanga tewaanyaburɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaiho. Yɨ sare'na kayaa'nanyabwi yaadeina dɨngaka! Arɨkewɨnyɨ.

Sare' dara myawɨrijɨvanɨgava! Sarɨmɨnyɨ a'mwe pware yagaalya' mɨdɨnya'neihi yaasɨwa'wawɨnya'neihi wɨjaavɨnapɨjɨ yɨ sahwarɨ mɨdɨbɨzaihi sahware yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ. Kayaa'nanya sabwi mɨdɨbɨzaihi sahɨrɨvɨ balyabwi yuna naanga dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨbɨzaihi sahɨrɨvɨ “Yɨda'maraangeigɨ nɨmɨreigɨnyɨ,” wɨja' dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ.

“Su! Su!” Gotɨyarɨ dare'na wɨdaana! Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabure yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihi mwaalesaihɨlyɨ. Kayaa'nanyaburɨne dɨragɨnya' yɨhɨmaremwaalakeihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' yagaala nebulya' yɨhɨzɨwaakesa' sarɨnnya sɨmunyavɨ wakadɨvɨsavɨ nayaa pada'galamɨdɨdɨvɨkɨ.
Gotɨyai kayaa'nanyaburɨne kalavuzɨwawɨnya sabwi yɨhyarasɨ'naka “Yɨda'maraanga sabure kalavuzɨwawɨnyavɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsaihi dɨmwaalyɨla!” yɨhɨthakeihɨlyɨ.

A'mweihɨre sɨduta yawɨta sabwi dɨragɨnya nayaa myasɨ. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare yawɨta yarai myawɨranganyaihi mɨ'. Sarevɨna a'mweinaavɨre kunya yawɨta sabwi mɨdɨdɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨreburɨne ke'ba'nanya' yɨhɨthɨwesɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya sa kɨwɨnya galazekɨvala yɨma'nya'neihi gɨrɨkita'nanya saburajɨ kɨwɨnya galazekɨvala saburajɨ saburɨne yaasɨwa'wawɨnyajɨka wakesaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ dahaa' sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya sa tewaanya nawɨ'nyaanga yɨma'nya'neihi Gotɨyareihi, yɨda'maraangeburɨne yaasɨwa'wawɨnyajɨka nayaa dakyɨla!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kayaa'nanyabure yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihi mwaalesagaa' yɨda'maraangeburɨne yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihi mamwaalyesaihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kayaa'na yesagaa' sarɨmɨ yɨsɨlya'bɨ' berɨ' maaretavaka! Dahaa' yeta sa' yawɨreva wagɨla yɨhɨvwa'nɨvanɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dazabwi yune naanga balya'nebwina marima'naabadevulyɨ.

Dahaa' kayaa'nanyabure kalavuzɨkurɨsavɨ Gotɨyai mena yɨhyaramaarakeihɨlyɨ. Sara yada gamɨ sare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihɨrɨ mena yɨhɨmwaaihakeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sasareihi tewaanya nawɨ'nya' yɨsɨlya'bɨ' dara dɨmaaryide “Tewaanya nawɨ'nyaanga yɨma'nya'neihi Gotɨyareihi mwaaidɨvɨsasɨ. Yɨ dazabwi yune yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwina marima'naabadevulyɨ.”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kayaa'nanya' gannya yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨ kumɨre wawɨnya'ne tɨvɨkɨta wɨjaavadesɨ. Tɨvɨkɨta sa' yune naanga balya sahɨrɨ'na. Nabaai Gotɨyare gaimwanga tewaanya' yange' wɨjaavɨna neyadelyɨ. Sa' gaala yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaalya'ne'na. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨre Naangerɨ wɨlamwaalajavɨ gaala daza' nejaavade'nanyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, a'mweinaavɨre kɨwɨnyabwi yawɨ'manɨgasaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sasareihi, dara jawɨrila! “A'mwe kwai gaala kuna mwaaidehaa' yɨ dazahɨgaasagaa' gamɨ a'mweinaavɨre kɨwɨnyaburɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaidelyɨ.”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe' kwala maa'nojɨ gannya a'mwei gaala kuna mwaaidozɨ yɨ kɨwɨnya sabwi gamɨre a'mwei kwarɨjɨ galalɨmwagathesɨ. Nabaai gamɨre a'mwei balajai yɨ kɨwɨnya sabwi a'mwerɨjɨ ye'mwannalɨmwagathe' gamɨnyɨ ayahi lɨmwagathe' mɨ'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwei gaala kuna mwaaidozɨ a'mwe' a'mwe pwarɨ maa'naja' gamɨnyɨ wɨdɨpɨ'desɨ. Akai! Pwarɨ tidaakumanɨkesɨ. Nabaai a'mwei mena balaja' kɨwɨnya sabwi gamɨnyɨ ayahi lɨmwagathe' mɨ'. Yɨ savɨdaasɨ a'mwe pwarɨ kwala maa'naja' yɨ gamɨnyɨ “Pwarɨ tidaakumanɨkesɨ,” wɨdɨpɨ'de' mɨ'.

Sarevɨ, nɨnnya nya'mweihi Kɨraazɨtɨyareihi, sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨsɨ mena ye'mwannayɨrakure'. Yɨ sahɨrɨvɨ balakegaa' sarɨmɨjɨ mena bale'. Yɨ sare'na Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyabwi sarɨmɨnyɨ ayahi yɨhɨlɨmwagatheihi mɨ'. Yɨ sarɨmɨ gaala mudɨke' maareva A'mwe pwai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ kwala maa'nya'ne'bɨsaihi ye'mwannamwaalya'neihɨlyɨ. Yɨ A'mwe dazai mena kabala' ayahi yɨdɨkaavakerɨnyɨ. Nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨnyɨne yɨsɨlya yɨrɨpɨka!” kada' nawɨ'nyabulyɨyaina yuna yɨma'nya'neina mena ye'mwannamwaalo'nanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyaburɨ kuna mwaaidori Kɨwɨnyabwi nemɨre kɨlaakevɨ wabahɨlaaka ya'ne kayaa'nanyajɨkɨya yawɨta neyɨdɨkaava'. Sara neyadaasɨ nemɨ yɨsɨlyabɨ' kayaa'na yadaa mwaaloinera. Yɨ balyabure sasareina kayaa'nanyabulyɨyaina yune naanga balya'neina yɨma'nya'neina mwaalo'nanyɨ.

Sarevɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ mena baidaa baryaina Kɨwɨnyabwi nelɨmwagarake' mena kyagalya'mavo Kɨwɨnyabwi ayahi nelɨmwagathe' mɨ'. Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dahaasagaa' kɨwɨnya sabwi pɨkarya yɨda'nɨka ayangɨ mɨdɨnya'neburɨ myona Kurya Tewaanyarɨ gaalyaburɨne yaasɨwa'wawɨnya'neina mwaaihoinera.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ be yagaala daathevaka? Dara daathe' daaka! “Kɨwɨnyabwi gamɨ sabwi kayaa'nanyabulyɨra.” Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Aawa. Kɨrɨ' kɨwɨnyabwi nɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'nanya' manyɨbwarɨdaakwia nyaja' “Nɨmɨ yadɨnya' kayaa'nanyabulyɨ,” yawɨrangadɨnyainyɨ mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnya' dara dɨnɨ' “Gɨmɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ tɨganaarya minnera!” Sara dɨnɨka sa' mwaryaja' yɨ “Tɨganaarya ya sabwi kayaa'nanyabulyɨ,” yawɨrangamuneinyɨ mɨ'.

Nabaai kayaa'nanyabwi Kɨwɨnyavɨre tusarɨkɨ bɨ'desɨ. Sara yada yuya tɨganaarya pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya sa nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nyɨdɨkavemwaaihadeinyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnyabwi mwaryajɨ kwajɨ kayaa'nanyabwi navɨka warɨna kyadɨ'.

Sɨnnawɨ maalɨkegaa' kɨwɨnya “Sana minna!” dɨnɨkebwi maayainyɨ mwaale dazagaa' navɨka mwaalageinyɨ. Nabaai dɨvidaasɨ Kɨwɨnya' yawɨ'na yadɨnyainyɨ yɨ sare' kayaa'nanyabwi dɨkaa'na kya' “Kayaa'nanya yɨma!” dɨragɨnna yawɨrena

dara yawɨre, “We', Gotɨyarɨna nɨmɨre kuryai baimwakelyɨ.” A'mwera kɨwɨnya' yune' mɨdɨbɨzara gaala kamaapɨdɨ'. Kɨrɨ' a'mwera sara mi. Gotɨyai Kɨwɨnya' gaala wɨjaaya'ne'na dakake' nɨmɨ dara bɨramaa'mwe' “O, sara myɨ yɨwɨneinyɨ balya', Gotɨyarɨna kɨmata yɨremwaalya' maarya'neinyɨ dɨngaka!”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kayaa'nanyabwi Kɨwɨnyavɨre tusarɨkɨ bɨrɨna yada yɨ nɨmɨnyɨ kwaasɨ nyakesɨ. Yɨ sasare saburɨ kayaa'nanyabwi kɨwɨnyavɨ maaraka dara nyɨbwarɨdaakwada “Gɨmɨnyɨ gɨzɨda'mwakeigɨnyɨ,” nyɨramakakesɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Kɨwɨnyabwi gamɨ sabwi tewaanya nawɨ'nyabulyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyare yagaaikɨwɨnya gazasa' yɨ sa' kɨrɨsɨ tewaanya' gɨrɨka maaya' yaka yɨda'maraange' yaka nawɨ'nyasɨra.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nawɨ'nya dazahɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ dahanyɨramaka'! Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Aawa. Kayaa'nanya sahɨbwi sabwi nyɨramaka'. Yɨ kayaa'nanyabwi ku'maayaba yɨma'naabya'nebwina nemɨnyɨna “ ‘Kayaa'nanyabwi wana kayaa'nanaangebwi warɨ',’ yawɨpɨka!” kada' kayaa'nanyabwi nawɨ'nya daza' maa'da yɨ dazavɨ balyabwi, Gotɨyarɨna kɨmata yɨremwaalyaburɨ marima'naabɨnɨkesɨ. Yɨ dazasare saburɨ kɨwɨnya daza' wibwarɨdaakwia'nesɨ. Kayaa'nanyabure aaya kaavɨlya', gamɨ wana kayaa'nanaangesɨ. Nemɨnyɨna “Sara yawɨpɨka!” daka Kɨwɨnya' wakakesɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Kɨwɨnyavɨ Kuryai Gotɨyare sabwi neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨ'. Sare' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sɨmunya sɨnnawɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsa nyɨmaremwaalɨkeinyɨ. Gotɨyare sabwi mamɨdɨnyainyɨ. Kayaa'nanyabwi nɨmɨnyɨ wɨla galanyɨ'daa'nyɨ gamɨre wawɨnya' yɨvanɨge.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Aaya kaavɨla nɨmɨ yadɨnya sabwina myawɨrivanɨge. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nabaai pɨbwi nɨmɨnyɨ kuna yɨgunna nyadevwi sa' nayaa myadɨnyainyɨ. Aawa. Pɨbwi nɨmɨnyɨ sɨmɨlɨka nyuimwaaidevwi sabwi yuyagaa' yɨna yadɨnyainyɨ.
Nɨmɨ sabura “Aala,” dadɨnya sara yadɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨre sasare saburɨ sa' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ sɨmunyavɨ dara dɨvanɨge. Yo, Kɨwɨnyabwi tewaanyabulyɨ.
Sarevɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ kayaa'nanya daza mivanɨge. Aawa. Kayaa'nanyabwi nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlanyarɨkebwi gamɨ sahɨbwi sabwi nyɨvanɨkebulyɨ. Sare'na wɨla galanyɨ'daa'nyɨ yɨvanɨge.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya' nayaa nawɨ'nya' ya'ne' mulanyari'. Nɨmɨnyɨ kɨlaa'nakeinyɨ a'mwe gaveinyɨna dɨvanɨge. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ “Tewaanyabwi yɨma!” dena yɨweinyɨ. Tewaanya sa' mi yɨwɨneinyɨra.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ “Nawɨ'nyabwi yɨma!” dadɨ yɨvanɨge', sabwi mivanɨge. Aawa. Nɨmɨ “Wagɨlyabwi myɨwɨnera!” dadɨ yɨvanɨge', yɨ sabwi yɨna yadɨnyainyɨ.
Nabaai “Aala,” dadɨ yɨvanɨgevwi, yɨ sabwi yɨvanɨge sarevɨ yɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ mɨ'. Daza' mivanɨge. Aawa. Kayaa'nanyabwi nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlanyarɨka gamɨ sahɨrɨsa' nyɨvanɨkesɨ.
Sarevɨdaasɨ nɨmɨ davwi yabwi bɨramaa'dɨnyainyɨ “Nɨmɨ ‘Tewaanyabwi yɨma!’ dadɨ yadaari wagɨlyabwi nyarɨkebwi nɨmɨre tusa' kaanya nyɨrihɨ'manɨ'.”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨ Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya'na nɨmɨnyɨ tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'.

Nabaai nɨmɨ dara yawɨrangamanɨge, “Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨyangɨ pɨbwi wɨlanyarɨkebulyɨ.” Yɨ sabwi dazabwi Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya' nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nyarɨkevɨ mala tadevulyɨ. Yada kayaa'nanyabure sabwi nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨyangɨ nyarɨkevɨ, yɨ sabwi nɨmɨnyɨ wɨla galyɨralɨmwagata nyɨvanɨ'.
Ako! Nɨmɨ a'mwe kayaaka nyɨgaideinyɨra. Kɨlaaka nɨmɨre dazɨ' balyabwi Gotɨyarɨna kɨmata yɨremwaalyaburɨna yɨvanɨkenna aaihwai nyɨvadaihasamaaradeinyaka?
Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨvanɨge! Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre Naangerɨ gamɨ sahwai nyɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ.
Sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Nɨmɨ dareinyɨre sɨmunyabulyɨ Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyabwi wɨdaayɨvanɨge yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ yawɨsasɨ kayaa'nanyaburɨ sabwi wɨdaayɨvanɨge.
Sarevɨdaasɨ yɨ dahaasagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasaraavɨna yagaala yawɨbwata'ne jɨdata'ne mwari'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai yakevɨ Kuryai gaala gɨzaavaderebwi kayaa'nanyabulyɨ yune naanga balyabulyɨ saburaarɨ mena wɨla gyɨ'dalamaara'.

Yɨ sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mweraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta savɨna kɨwɨnyabwi ya'neina waryaanyaina mwaaiho'na Kɨwɨnyabwi kayaa'nanyaburɨ padaihasamaa'na neyannebwi mɨ'. Sara mi yade' Gotɨyai sara yakesɨ. Gotɨyai gannya Gawaalɨvaangerɨ maryasaabakelyɨ. Sarei a'mwe kayaa'nanyaibɨ' kɨlaa'nakei yɨma'nakelyɨ. Gamɨ a'mweraavɨre kayaa'nanya bwalamarasɨ'nya'nei walaabakelyɨ. Yɨ a'mweraavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi wɨlarɨkeburɨ Gotɨyai jɨda'na kya' Kɨraazɨtɨyai a'mweraavɨneba kayaa'nanyanne tɨvɨkɨta'na balakelyɨ.
