Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Sahwara kɨwɨnyabwi dakɨnɨka yɨda'maraangengɨ yuna yadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma!” kada' sara balakelyɨ. Sareina a'mweraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta savɨ kaanya myamaryadaanyɨ. Aawa. Nemɨ Kurya Tewaanya sarɨ kaanya yamaryadaanyainaavɨnesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera a'mweraavɨre kɨlaakejɨsɨyara kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨyanna yawɨrirɨkɨ'dɨvɨsare. Nabaai Kuryalyɨyara kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ Kuryarenna yawɨrirɨkɨ'dɨvɨsare.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunyavɨ a'mwe sara yune naanga balyabwi Gotɨyarɨna kɨmata yɨremwaalyabwi maa'manɨgasare. Yɨ nabaai Kurya Tewaanyare sɨmunyavɨ a'mwe sara gaalyasɨ sɨmunya kwaamu'nanyasɨ maa'manɨgasare.

Sarevɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta sa' sɨmunyangɨ maremwaalajara Gotɨyare yɨkamaangera yɨma'nɨwaasare. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunya' Gotɨyarɨna yɨkamaangesɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahɨrɨ' Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyavɨ wɨla'na'de' mɨ'. Dare'nesɨ. Yɨ nabaai sahɨrɨ' sara yɨnɨga yanne' mɨ'.
Kɨlaakejɨkɨyangɨ mwaaidɨvɨ' a'mwe sarera Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wigalya'nera mamwaalyɨ yɨpɨnere.

Sarɨmɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨyangɨ mamwaalyɨga'. Aawa. Gotɨyare Kurya Tewaanyai sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaaidori Kurya Tewaanyarɨ wɨlamwaaihasaihɨlyɨ. Nabaai, yɨ pwai kwai Kɨraazɨtɨyare Kurya Tewaanyai maayai a'mwe sai Kɨraazɨtɨyarei mɨ'.

Nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaalajai yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kayaa'nanyabwine'na sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' baladezɨkɨra. Yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨlyɨ,” mena yɨhɨthake'na Kuryai gaala mena yɨhɨmwaaihakeihɨlyɨ.

Gotɨyai Jizaazarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨ yɨdɨkaavakere Kuryai sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaaidori Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ baryarɨ yɨdɨkaavakei sarɨmɨ balapɨjɨyagaa' sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gaala yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ. Kuryai sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaaidevɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨ gaala yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ.

Yɨ sarevɨdaasɨ, nya'mweihi, nemɨ tɨvɨkɨta wɨjaaya'ne kɨnɨnnakeine. Tɨvɨkɨta sa' Kurya Tewaanyarɨ mwaalya'nesɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsangɨna tɨvɨkɨta aawa. Nemɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsangɨna mwaalya'ne tɨvɨkɨta mwari'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsangɨna mwaaibɨza' yɨ sarɨmɨ yune naanga dɨvalyɨla! Kɨrɨ' Kuryare dɨragɨnyavɨ sarɨmɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsa ya tamakɨpɨja' yɨ gaala dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare Kurya Tewaanyai gazarazaraavɨ wibwarɨdaakuvanɨkera yɨ sahwara Gotɨyare gawaalɨvaangere.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna lɨka ayahi ya'ne' kalavuzɨwawɨnyavɨ yɨgidɨwagamaremwaala yɨhyade Kuryarɨ mamaaryesalyɨ. Aawa. Gawaalɨvaangeihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihaka Kuryarɨ maaresalyɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨ, nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ jaka dadaanyɨ “Tataala! Nɨmwala!”
Kuryai gamɨ sahwai nemɨre kuryarajɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyainaavɨna dara jalɨkurakɨvanɨ' “Gotɨyare kaimɨraayaihɨlyɨ.”

Nabaai Gotɨyare kaimɨraayaina mwalaaja' Nɨmwai sare yuya tewaanya maraadeinera. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Gotɨyare yuya tewaanya maraadeinera. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. “Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ byaanna dɨragɨnya' maraana!” dawaajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ taanginya ye'mwannamaraaja' Kɨraazɨtɨyai yuya tewaanya maarade ye'mwannamaraadeinera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨge. Dɨvi sagaa'ne Gotɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ ku'maayaba wakaabozɨ nejaavade' naangaangesɨ. Dahaasa'ne taanga sa' maa'manɨgo datha' wana maalɨkesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuya Gotɨyai wakyaaka a'mwerabɨsa yemwaaidɨvɨ' “Gotɨyai gamɨre gawaalɨvaangeraavɨ ku'maayaba wɨmwaihaabya'ne' tɨlɨjaaya baihanaraana!” dadɨvɨsangɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuya wakyaaka sa dɨvidaa'nyɨ waryaanyabwi maremwaalya'ne wakyaakengɨ. Kumɨre kunyaburɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai kumɨnyɨ ya'nenna nawɨ'nyanna maarya'ne yemwaalya'nengɨna waryaanyabwi maremwaalya'nengɨ wakyaakengɨ.

Yemwaalya sa' daresɨ. Yuya wakyaaka kumɨ sa dahaasa bwia burya'ne kalavuzɨwawɨnyavɨ yɨrɨka pɨrɨkɨ Gotɨyai kyarakojɨ ayɨna bwia burya'nebwi dɨragɨnya mwarina. Nabaai wakyaaka sa nemɨ Gotɨyare kaimɨraayainaavɨre byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ tewaanya ye'mwannayarakadesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Dahaa' kɨgaasɨ yuya Gotɨyai wakyaaka daza a'mwe' kaimɨraaya maarya'negaa' daanga wɨvɨdevaaibɨ' daanga wɨvɨdaawori sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'mwaainadɨvɨsangɨ.

Nabaai yuya gave dahɨnɨnnanna mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ Gotɨyai yɨsɨlyabɨta sɨnnawɨnya sɨhumale nejaavaka Kuryai kɨnɨnnakeina nemɨ kwainajɨ daanga nevɨdaasɨ sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'daa yemwaidaanyɨ. “Gotɨyai sasare sabwi yasɨ'nana!” dadaa “Yune gamɨre gawaalɨvaangeinaavɨ nemwaaihya'ne' yɨ nemɨre kɨlaakejɨ' ayɨna nemubya'nevɨ tɨlɨjaaya baihanaraana! Nemɨre kɨlaakejɨ' mudɨkejɨ' yɨma'nana!” dadaanyaine.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai nemɨre kɨlaakejɨka nawɨ'nyajɨka wakadevɨna yemwaalya'neinaavɨ nevadaihasamaarakelyɨ. Dahaa' nemɨre kɨlaaka nawɨ'nyajɨka yɨma'nya'nejɨkaavɨna yemwaidaa dɨvidaasɨ mena wanganawaajɨyajɨkaavɨna yemwaalya' mɨka! Sare' daresɨ. Pwai kwai pɨrɨ' mena wanganaka ayahi yemwaalɨka' mɨ'.
Nabaai pɨrɨ' tɨnna mwanganyadaanya' yemwalaaja' yɨ “Sahɨrɨ'na tɨlɨjaaya baihanaraana!” dadaa dɨragɨnna yemwaaimanɨgo.

Sasare sabwibɨsavɨ Kuryai dɨragɨnya maayainaavɨ negaimwadelyɨ. Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'nengɨna myawɨryadaanya'na dadaanyɨ “Nayaa Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaaza'na gara wɨdaazɨhyɨwona!” Sare' sɨmumaayainera. Aawa. Sasare saburɨ Kuryai gamɨ sai yune sɨmunyavɨna sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'da nemɨnyɨna marewɨdada negaimwadelyɨ.
Nabaai Nɨmwai a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ tɨnna nebulya'na yawɨrangadei Kuryare sɨmunya dazaburɨ yawɨrangadelyɨ. Kuryai Gotɨyare sɨmunyaburɨ mɨdɨdevɨna Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨna nayaa marewɨdadelyɨ.

Nabaai nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Taanga gazaza Gotɨyarɨna wɨvu'naderaavɨ yɨma'nyangɨ Gotɨyai nawɨ'nya ya'ne yadelyɨ. Da kumɨ Gotɨyai kumɨnyɨne yawɨsa' yɨma'nya'nevɨna Gotɨyai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakere. Yɨ sahwaraavɨnyɨ.

Sa' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai kumɨnyɨ sɨnnawɨ mena yawɨranganaka nabaai sɨnnawɨ mena dahɨlakyaakerera. Yɨ gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangeibɨ' avaaina yɨma'nya'neraavɨ dahɨlakɨna. Yɨ Gawaalɨvaangere gya'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ aaya kuvɨdaakaanga yɨ aaya sɨraanga Naangei yɨma'nya'ne'na yɨ sahwaraavɨ dahɨlakɨna.

Nabaai a'mwe sara sɨnnawɨ mena dahɨlakakera yɨ sahwaraavɨ jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakere. Nabaai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakera yɨ sahwaraavɨ “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨlyɨra,” wɨdakere. Yɨ nabaai sara wɨdakera yɨ sahwaraavɨna gamɨ sare gannya byaanna dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavakere.
Sarevɨdaasɨ yuya dazanna be yagaala daathevaka? Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ negaimwagazavɨ, yɨ Gotɨyarɨna nemɨnyɨ yɨkamaanga gazaizai nevɨlavadeina daaka!

Gotɨyai gannya Gawaalɨvaangerɨ lɨka sangina maribwaayakai mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ yuyainaavɨna sahwarɨ nemɨnyɨneba balya'nerɨ maryasaabakelyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨ gamɨ kwarɨjɨ yanga nejaaya'ne yuya pɨnɨ kɨnɨjɨ yanga nejaavadei midaaka!
A'mweraavɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka gamɨnneraavɨ yɨ saraavɨ kotɨya' aaihwai jatheraava'! Gotɨyai gamɨ sai nedɨvanɨkelyɨ “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨlyɨ.”

Aaihwai jɨda'na yadelaka! Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨnyɨneba balake'nanyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨ dare' wavɨla'desɨ. Barya sahwarɨ yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai dɨragɨnyaba Gotɨyare aangasɨrɨ yɨlamwalaawakelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai sahwai nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ marewɨdadelyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyare kale savɨ nemɨnyɨjɨ gewɨ gewɨ yɨnɨga jaapalya'ne benɨ warɨka! Nemɨnyɨ taanginya kaneyɨma'nojɨ dɨngaka! Daanga kanevɨnojɨ dɨngaka! A'mwera kayaa'na kaneyapɨjɨ dɨngaka! Nemɨnyɨ mɨjɨka naanga kaneyojɨ dɨngaka! Baazɨ'ma'nya kannya sazanna kanegainojɨ dɨngaka! Kayaa'nanaanga nemɨnyɨna “Kayaaka yɨgalɨma!” dozɨ yaamɨjɨ lɨka kaneyɨrɨ'galojɨ dɨngaka! Kwaari'masɨramɨnya mala kaneramakapɨjɨ dɨngaka! Kumɨ dazasare sabwi Kɨraazɨtɨyare kale savɨ nemɨnyɨjɨ gewɨ gewɨ nejaapaladevwi daaka!
Sare sabura neyɨma'najanna Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
“Gɨmɨnyɨne'na yɨrɨka yunegaa' neramakɨvanɨgasaine.
‘Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ tamaana!’ dadɨvɨ' nemwaihɨwaasaine.”
Sara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.

Sasare sabura Kɨraazɨtɨyare kale savɨ nemɨnyɨjɨ gewɨ gewɨ nejaapaladevura mɨ'. Aawa. Dazasare yuyaburaavɨ nemɨ dɨragɨnaangeina yɨma'naanneine. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nemɨnyɨna wɨvu'nakerɨ dɨragɨnaangeina yɨma'nɨvanɨgo.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ nebulya' dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kale savɨ nemɨnyɨjɨ gewɨ gewɨ yɨnɨga nejaapalanne aane pɨnɨ kɨnɨ aawa. Pɨnɨ mɨ'. Balyabwi aawa. Gaalyabwi aawa. Yɨmakera aawa. Gɨlaayara aawa. Dahaasanna aawa. Dɨvinenna yɨma'nade aawa. Kulatɨka aawa. Gɨri'nya aawa. Kulaa'nya aawa.

Munya ke'mwewɨnyanna aawa. Kwaaka kewewɨnɨnyanna aawa. Yuya wakyaaka pɨnɨ aawa. Aane pɨnɨ kɨnɨ Gotɨyare kale sa' nemɨnyɨjɨ gewɨ gewɨ yɨnɨga nejaapalanne mɨ'. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨre Naangei yakevɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ kale dɨragɨnna wiadaa'nyɨ nemɨnyɨna wɨvu'nadelyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaiheinyɨ sareinyɨ yagaala nebulya'na dɨvanɨge. Kwaasɨ majɨvanɨge. Nabaai nɨmɨre sɨmunyai padaihɨrakyai nebulya'na dɨvanɨgevɨna avaaina jalɨkurakɨvanɨkelyɨ. Yɨ Kurya Tewaanyai sara maremwaaidɨsɨ nɨmɨnyɨna sara jalɨkurakɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Sare'na nebulya'na dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nɨnnya yɨsavaakɨyara avaaitawera Kɨraazɨtɨyarera mamwaalyɨgasa'na taanga nebulya'na nyada yuyagaa' sɨmunyavɨ daanga yɨbwakɨdɨnyainyɨ.

Sahwaraavɨ wɨgaimwagya'neinyɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ Gotɨyarɨ yagɨnna dara wɨdɨvanɨge “Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ Dɨkevɨ nyɨmarasɨ'nɨja', Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nɨmɨnyɨjɨ gewɨ gewɨ jaapaidɨza' nya'mweraavɨ avaaitaweraavɨ dɨvadaihasamaa'de' nawɨ'nyasɨ.”

Kumɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaaka yɨta savaakɨyara Yɨzɨrelɨyarera. Kumɨnyɨne'na Gotɨyai nawɨ'nya kwalaalya kwia' kɨrɨ' kwalaalya sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagye'. Gotɨyai gamɨre gawaalɨvaangeraavɨ wɨmwaihyaakere. Gamɨre byaanna dɨragɨnya' wɨjɨwaainakera, yagaala wɨlɨmwagakenna ye'mwannawɨdakera, gamɨre Kɨwɨnya' wɨjaavakera, Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya nebwina wiesara, yune naanga nebulya'ne yagaalya maaresara,

Ne sɨnnawɨnyara kwɨyakwalaanga naangera kɨnɨnnakera, nabaai kɨlaakevɨna Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakei Kɨraazɨtɨyai kɨlaakevɨna sahwaraavɨre sahɨvaakɨdaasɨ yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ gamɨ sahwai yuyangɨ maremwaalɨkelyɨ. Sai Gotɨyai nebulya'nanyalyɨ. Sahwarɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' nemɨ yɨlaaya kuna maryaana! Naanga nebulyasɨra.
Nabaai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨna Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'ne yagaalya' yaasɨwa' mena yɨwɨya myakevɨnera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨzɨrelɨyarɨdaa'nya yuyara Yɨzɨrelɨyara mɨ'.
Nabaai Evɨraamɨmɨdaa'nyara gamɨre yɨsiwiara yɨma'neta yuyara Gotɨyare kaimɨraayara mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai dara wɨdakelyɨ “Aazakɨmɨ gɨmɨre yɨta savaakɨyara yɨsiwiara yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere.”
Sare' daresɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya kaimɨraayara dazara Gotɨyare kaimɨraayara mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na dakera yɨma'nɨpɨjara dazara “Evɨraamɨmɨdaa'nyara yɨsiwiara nɨmɨrere,” yawɨrakere.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yune naanga nebulya'ne yagaala dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Dathagaa' ayahi yɨma'nadehaa' ayɨna bɨdeinyɨ. Sara kya'muri Seraa' jɨwaalɨvaangei maaradesɨ.
Nabaai yune sahɨrɨ'nanya' mɨ'. Aawa. Rɨvekaa' bwaramunya' maryaakevɨnyɨ. Nemɨre neyakwalaangei Aazakɨ gave pwainanyai munya makuna yakelyɨ.
Kaimɨraayaraai kɨrɨnaange' mamaaryakegaa' nabaai saraai tewaanya pɨnɨ kɨnɨ myadisaraai kayaa'nanya pɨnɨ kɨnɨ myadisaraai mima'nyadakɨlyɨyagaa'

kɨrɨnaangevɨ dara wɨdakesɨ, “Sarɨmɨre sɨraangei dɨviyaraavɨ maremwaaide kɨrɨ' gɨmɨre sɨraangei aaya dɨviyarɨ wɨdaayadei yɨma'nadelyɨ.” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai “Sara dahɨlakyabwina nɨmɨre yawɨsa' waragwona!” daka sara wɨdakesɨ. A'mwei wawɨnya nayaa yadevwina sara yɨma'naka' mɨ'. Aawa. Gamɨ sai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarake'na sara yɨma'nakesɨ.
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨ Jaikopɨmɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Yɨzorɨna tewaanya manyɨvu'nyɨvanɨ'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ be yagaala daathevaka? Nemɨ dara daanne' daaka! Gotɨyai yɨda'maraangebwi yadei mɨ'. Arɨkewɨnyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwai Ne Mozɨzarɨ wɨdakesɨ. Nɨmɨ yawɨra'mujɨ “A'mwe sarɨ kale'na wɨgaimwagɨma!” yɨ sahwarɨ kale'na wɨgaimwagɨdeinyɨ. Nabaai “A'mwe pwarɨna kale nyana!” da'mujɨ yɨ sahwarɨna kale nyadeinyɨ.
Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai a'mwerɨ dahɨlakadevwi a'mweraavɨre yawɨsaburɨ mɨ'. Nabaai a'mwera yagɨyagɨnyaburɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Sai tewaanya kale'na wɨgaimwangei Gotɨyai dahɨlakadevurɨnyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai Peroyarɨ wɨdake' dara dɨnɨ' “Gɨmɨ nɨmɨjɨ mala je'mwannabwa'dehaa' ‘Nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' yuyaraavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwana!’ dena, nabaai, ‘Kwaaka yuyawɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' wɨdamaryɨpɨka!’ dena gyathɨkaavena kingɨya gɨmwaaiheinyɨ.”
Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwai yawɨraka “Sarɨ tewaanya kale'na wɨgaimwagɨma!” yɨ sara yɨna. Nabaai yawɨraka “Pwai pihadɨka yadere sɨmunya' tihɨrɨma!” yɨ sara yɨna yadelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ yaamɨjɨ dɨnyɨdatheigɨnyɨ “Sarevɨ gazaizai Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨna yɨnɨga magalazekɨvalyɨ yɨpɨne'na a'mweraavɨna ‘Kayaa'nanyaburɨ yɨwetawakadɨvɨsarera,’ kuna be'na dadelaka!”

Nabaai, a'mweigɨ, Gotɨyarɨ ayɨna yɨnɨga aaigɨ dɨza'nawɨdatheigɨnaka! Gyavɨkaryakeigɨ midaaka! Kwadɨka kwaaka lɨvagɨrɨ'mwannɨkei a'mwe kwadɨka sahwai yavɨkarinɨkerɨ dara wɨdannei dɨnga'! “Berɨ' garevɨ nyavɨkariwaana?”

A'mwe kwadɨka yavɨkaryadei yasaaka maremwaaidei midaaka! Yɨ sahwai kwaaka pɨjɨ' maarojɨ yɨ kwadɨka pwarɨna tewaanya ya'nei yavɨkarina. Yɨ kwadɨka pwarɨna yaasɨwa' waramarya'nei yavɨkarina. Nabaai daza' maremwaalya' kɨnɨnnakei midaaka!

Gotɨyai kwalyɨ sa'bɨ' yɨvanɨ'. Sahwai kayaa'nanyanna gamɨre sɨnna tɨke' “Ku'maayaba marima'naabɨma!” dazai nabaai “A'mwe yuyara nɨmɨre yɨwɨnevɨ yawɨrangabɨka!” dazai kɨrɨ' sara mi. Kwadɨka waryaanyara, yɨ kumɨre kayaa'nanyangɨna Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨke'na dɨragɨnna yawɨbwarya'nera kayaaka dɨlamwivalya'neraavɨna yarai maramyɨ yada saamɨnyagaa' yemwaaina. Sare' yagaainakeigɨ daa!

Nabaai kwadɨka tewaanyara, Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨre byaanna dɨragɨnya' naangaange' nɨmɨrera yawɨrangabɨka!” daka sara wiemwaaina. Byaanna dɨragɨnya sa' kwadɨka Gotɨyai tewaanya kale'na wɨgaimwangeina sɨnnawɨ nemɨnyɨ mena yovɨrawakakeinaavɨ nejaaya'nesɨ.
Yɨ nemɨnyɨ jaka nejɨvwaramaarakeine. Yune Juya yɨta savaakɨnanna mɨ'. Aawa. Ajɨmya yuyangɨya kwaraavɨjɨ jaka nejɨvwaramaarakeine. Sare' yagaainakeigɨ daa!
Wozayare pɨkarya kɨrɨvɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨna dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
A'mwe nɨmɨrera mamwaalyɨgasaraavɨna
“Nɨmɨrera,” sahwaraavɨna dɨdeinyɨra.
Yɨsavaakɨna tewaanya manyɨvu'nyɨwakevaakɨna
“Tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨwakevaa'gɨnyɨ,” dɨdeinyɨra.
“ Nɨmɨreihi mɨ',” wɨdeva sahɨbeva
“Gotɨyainyɨ gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨre nyɨbwaalɨvaangeihɨlyɨ,”
Kumɨnyɨna yange'na sara dɨdeinyɨra.
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨna sara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Nabaai Aazaayai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨna jaka dake' dara dɨnɨ' “Yɨzɨrelɨyarera kwalaalyara saalaalyavɨre siwekamɨlɨkabɨ' mwaaibɨza' kɨrɨ' a'mwe yɨvainojɨyara maalɨkejɨkɨyaraavɨ Gotɨyai padaihasamaaradelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Naangei a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨna yagaalya' yarai yesɨmavojɨ gamɨre yawɨbwasa'na yuneba yɨme'nya'bɨ' yadelyɨra.”
Nabaai sɨnnawɨ Aazaayai dahɨrɨvɨna dake' dara dɨnɨ'
“Naangei Dɨragɨnaangei mivainyɨ neyajɨ kwajɨ
Nemɨnyɨne yɨsiwia pwaraavɨ maneyɨvainyajɨ kwajɨ
Sothomɨ mwaalyarabɨsaina kayaaka kaneyɨgaladɨka!
Gomora mwaalyarabɨsaina yune kabalaadɨka!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ be yagaala daathevaka? Nemɨ dara daana! Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara “Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna ‘Yɨda'maraangerera,’ dana!” maja'nera yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya myadɨvɨsara yɨ, Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨlyɨ,” mena wɨdɨvanɨkere. Yɨ daza' yɨdata sabwi Naangerɨ lɨmwange'nebulyɨ.
Nabaai Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakera Yɨzɨrelɨyara yɨda'maraangebwi maarya'nevɨ Kɨwɨnyavɨ yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' Kɨwɨnyavɨyaburɨ yunebanna yɨ'ma'dɨvɨ' mɨ'.

Sare' berɨvɨnaka? Yɨda'maraanga sabwi maarya'nevɨna Naangerɨ malɨmwagi kyɨpɨdɨke'nanyɨ. Sara mi. Aawa. “Wawɨnya kwalaalya sara yadaanya'na maraadeinera,” kwaasɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'nanyɨ. Sɨlaanga sɨvɨlyangɨ muda'dei kumɨre sɨvɨlyangɨ muda'daasɨ yɨ kumɨ kayaaka ya'nera wala'dɨvɨkɨ.
Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Yɨthaa! Saayonɨ Sɨlaangei wakɨwelyɨ.
A'mweraavɨre sɨvɨlyarɨ mudavayɨdɨhwakɨ'narya'nei wakɨwelyɨ.
Sɨlaanga walamudavamaarya'nerɨ nɨmɨ wakɨwelyɨ.
Nabaai sahwarɨ lɨmwagozɨya dahwai
Savɨna sɨmunyavɨ jɨkurɨtɨnna yannei mɨ'.
Savɨna wagɨla wɨvwa'nadei mɨ'.
Nya'mweihi, nɨmɨre sɨmunya' tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨvanɨke', Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨnya' yɨ daresɨ. Gotɨyaigɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyara lɨmwabɨza' dɨvadaihasamaaka!

Malɨmwagivanɨgata sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨnyɨna dara jalɨkurakɨvanɨge. “Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yaana! Sare'na Gotɨyare saburɨ yaamɨjɨ dɨragɨnna mɨdɨnaana!” dadɨvɨsarera. Kɨrɨ' sare kɨrɨvɨ kumɨ sɨmunya yawɨta maayara yɨvanɨga'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai yɨvanɨka sabwi “Yɨda'maraangerera,” neja'nevɨ navɨ'navɨka yadɨvɨ' kunnya yɨda'maraanga saburana kwaasɨya'bɨ' yɨvanɨga'. Yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyai “A'mwe yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨra,” wɨdannevɨ dalaangewɨ wɨla'nadɨvɨtara mɨ'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnya' yɨda'maraangeburɨne' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna mena yɨwɨnɨkesɨ. Yɨ a'mwe yuyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨza'na sahwaraavɨ Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” wɨdathelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ne Mozɨzai Kɨwɨnya' mɨdɨnya'ne' “Yɨda'maraangerera,” ja'nevɨna dara yɨdavakesɨ. A'mwei yuya dathavura yajai nabaai gaalyabwi maaradelyɨra.

Sare' kɨrɨ' a'mwera yuya myadɨvɨsa'na a'mwei Naangerɨ lɨmwada dazarɨna Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangelyɨra,” dathelyɨ. Sasare sabwina dara dɨnɨ' “Gɨnnya sɨmunyavɨna dara madɨnna! ‘Sɨgunyavɨna aai yɨlaawadevaka?’ Yagaala sa' daresɨ. Kɨnaraazɨtɨyarɨ makwalaabya'nesɨ.
Nabaai pɨrɨ' dara madɨnna! ‘Kewewɨnɨ bainɨkeraavɨrebanna aai walaawadevaka?’ Yagaala sa' daresɨ. Kɨraazɨtnnaɨyarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna makɨlaabya'nesɨ.

Sare' madɨnna! Aawa. Dare' midaaka! Yagaalya' gɨmɨnyaba gidɨkuta nebulya' warɨ'. Gɨmɨre maangikɨ wɨlaraka gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ wɨlarɨkesɨ.” Yɨ yagaala daza' nemɨ wɨdadaanya' Naangerɨ lɨmwangebwine yagaalyasɨ.

Gɨmɨre maangisɨ ku'maayaba “Jizaazai sai Naangelyɨ,” jalɨkurakya yɨja'najɨ nabaai gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ dara lɨmwadɨza'najɨ “Gotɨyai sahwarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ,” Gotɨyai gɨvadaihasamaaradeigɨnyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gazaizai gannya sɨmunyasɨ kalɨmwagozɨ Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeigɨ nɨmɨreigɨnyɨ gɨmwaaihɨwa,” wɨdathelyɨ. Yɨ gannya maangisɨ kajalɨkurakojɨ Gotɨyai wɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨ' “Gazaizai sahwarɨ lɨmwagozɨya dahwai yɨ savɨna sɨmunyavɨ jɨkurɨtɨnna yannei mɨ'.”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarevɨ padaihasamaata'nebwi Juya kwaraavɨne pɨbwi mwari'. Sarevɨ Anga Pimagɨnya (Gɨrikɨya) kwaraavɨne pɨbwi mwari'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuyaraavɨre Naangei gave pwainanyai mwaalɨkei gamɨnyɨ jaka wɨdɨpɨja yuyaraavɨ tewaanaanga wiadelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Gazaizai Naangerɨ jaka wɨdazai yɨ sahwarɨ wɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwarɨ malɨmwagyesarɨ jake' ga'dara wɨdɨpɨneraavaka? Nabaai gamɨnyɨna kadɨka mu'nyesarɨ ga'dara lɨmwabɨneraavaka? Nabaai pwai yagaala sa' wɨdaawadei maayara ga'dara wɨ'namaapɨneraavaka?

Nabaai Gotɨyai a'mwe yagaala wɨja'neraavɨ mamaryasaabya yaja' ga'dara wɨdaawɨpɨneraavaka? Wɨdaawadɨvɨsaraavɨna dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. A'mwera yagaala tewaanya' makabɨvanɨgasaraavɨre sɨvɨla tewaanya nawɨ'nyaraave!
Sare' kɨrɨ' Juyara yagaala tewaanya sa' kadɨka wɨ'neta kwalaalyara mɨdɨneta' mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Aazaayai dara dakesɨ. Naangeigɨ, newɨ'nɨvanɨgata davɨ aai lɨmwamanɨka!
Sarevɨ “Yagaala tewaanya' wɨ'nadɨvɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨkɨ. Nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaalya' wɨdadɨvɨsavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨkɨ.”
Sare' kɨrɨ' dara dɨwa. Sahwara yagaala tewaanya da' kadɨka mu'nyɨjɨhyeva! Kɨrɨ' dare' warɨkesɨ. Mena wɨ'nesare. Nabaai Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Kwaaka yuyawɨnna kumɨre yagaaikunya' mena wɨdaawakesɨ.
Anga yuyawɨ yunebanna kumɨre yagaalya' wɨdaawakesɨ.
Pɨgasaai dara dɨwa. Yɨzɨrelɨyara yagaala tewaanya da' myawɨranganyetara daaka! Aayagaa' wɨrɨvɨkɨrya'nei Mozɨzare yagaala Gotɨyarɨna dara dɨnɨ'
“Anga naanga pimagɨnyara mamwaalyɨgasaraavɨ ya'mujɨ
Sarɨmɨ sahwaraavɨna tɨmakɨrɨkɨrya jideihɨlyɨ.
Sɨmagɨnyara sɨmunya maayavaakɨyaraavɨ ya'mujɨ
Sahwaraavɨna sɨnna tɨkesɨyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihɨdeinyɨ.”
Nabaai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei Aazaayai yagaala jalɨkurakya'na lɨka yakai mɨ'. Sai Gotɨyarɨneba dara dakelyɨ
“A'mwera nɨmɨnyɨna bɨrɨbɨrya manyadɨvɨtara
Sahwara nɨmɨnyɨ mena nyɨbɨrama'mwaasare.
A'mwera nɨmɨnyɨ yɨdaanganya manyadɨvɨtara
Sahwaraavɨ nɨmɨ ku'maayaba yɨma'naabɨweinyɨ.”

Kɨrɨ' Yɨzɨrelɨya sahwaraavɨna Gotɨyarɨneba dara dakelyɨ “Yuna saamɨnya naangegaa' nɨmɨ a'mwe sahwaraavɨ jaka wɨdadaazɨ nɨmɨre yagaalya' galazekɨvaidɨvɨ' yɨ yagaala kayaa'nanya ja'nanyɨdadɨvɨsara nɨmɨnyawɨnna mabyɨwaasare.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara dɨvanɨge. Gotɨyai gannyaraavɨ gewɨ mena marakakei dɨngaka! Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ kwainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨnyainyɨ a'mwe Yɨzɨrelɨyainyɨra. Nɨmɨ Evɨraamɨmɨre yɨsiwiainyɨ avaaitawejɨ'nyɨ. Bejaminɨmɨre yɨsavaa'nyɨ.

Gotɨyai sɨnnawɨ a'mwe sahwaraavɨ mena yawɨranganakeraavɨ gewɨ mena marakakera mɨ'. Yagaala Yɨlaajare' Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dɨnɨke' sarɨmɨ myawɨryadɨvɨ' daa! Yɨlaajai Gotɨyarɨ Yɨzɨrelɨya sahwaraavɨna kotɨya ja'neraavɨ wɨdakelyɨ. Dara dɨnɨ'

“Naangeigɨ, pɨropetɨya gɨmɨnyɨ gu'neva wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨ sahwara mena tamake'. Gɨmɨre kwaraanya kayaa'nanyanna bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨ dɨka nasɨ'nya'nengɨ kayaaka mena lɨkayɨgalasɨ'ne'. Sarevɨ gɨmɨreinyɨ gaveinyɨ kuna mwaaihe. Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Tamakaana!’ dadɨvɨ' bɨrɨbɨrya' kuna yɨvanɨga'.”

Sara wɨdaka kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai be yagaala ja'nawɨdakavaka! Sai dara da' “Nɨmɨ nɨnnyara pwarana pwarana a'mwe sevenɨ taawɨzanɨyaraavɨ (7,000) yɨvaineinyɨ nyɨlɨmwadɨvɨsare. Sahwara gotɨya kwaasɨya Baa'aalɨyarɨ kwadaai gɨlɨna myeva mɨdɨdɨvɨtara mɨ'. Pwara kwalaalya kwalaalyara sara mi.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nabaai dahaakɨgaasɨ Juya yɨta pimagɨnya maalɨkevaa' lɨmwadɨvɨ' mwaaiha'. Sahwaraavɨ Gotɨyai gannya yanga gaimwangeburɨ dahɨlakakera mena yɨma'nesare.

Gannya yanga gaimwangeburɨna Jizaazarɨ lɨmwangeburɨna sahwaraavɨ dahɨlaka'. “Sahwara wawɨnya yadɨvɨsanna,” kunya myawɨryaka dahɨlaka'. Yɨ kumɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨ' yadaapi Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ dahɨlakajɨ kwajɨ yɨ yanga gaimwange' wana yuna yanga gaimwanga nebulya' mima'nyɨ kyadɨka!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nabaai nemɨ gara daazɨwo? Yɨzɨrelɨya kwalaalyara dɨragɨnna bɨrɨbɨrya yɨvanɨgata sa', yɨ sa' mamaaryesasɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai a'mwe pwaraavɨ dahɨlakaka sarera maaresasɨ. Yuya pwara Gotɨyai kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ tihɨralɨmwagarakere.
Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Gotɨyai kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ kɨrɨbɨbɨnya wakakelyɨ.
Kumɨre tɨnnyarɨ myawɨranganya'na wiakelyɨ.
Kumɨre kadɨka mu'nya'na wiakelyɨ.
Sɨnnawɨjɨ dahaasɨ avaaina mwaaihasare.
Yɨ Devitɨ kwalyɨ Gotɨyarɨ sahɨrɨ'na dara wɨdakelyɨ
“Kumɨre tɨka munne mwa'dainaanya'bɨ' yɨma'nana!
Kumɨre tɨlɨnnyangɨ naanya sa' lɨvapana!
Nabaai kumɨre sɨvɨlya dahe paakupɨka!
Sare' kumɨre kayaa'nanyaburɨ tɨvɨkɨta maapɨka!
Kumɨre tɨnnyarɨ jɨhɨnya' dɨvwaakya!
Sahwara tɨnna mwanganyɨ yɨpɨka!
Sahwaraavɨre bule' lɨngwɨla'nata yana!
Yawɨta kwalaalya taange'na winarana!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ dɨvanɨge. Gotɨyai “Sahwara yɨnahu walayɨdɨhwakɨ'naraawɨpɨka!” kada' mudavesara daaka! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ “Aala,” dɨvanɨgasara yunegaa'nannera daaka! Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Aawa. Sahwara tuta tewaanyavɨ kyagalya'mave' yɨ dazahɨrɨvɨ Gotɨyai ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwaraavɨ padaihasamaa'manɨkelyɨ. “Yɨzɨrelɨyara tewaanya davwi wangabɨka! A'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨna wabarɨnna yapɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨka!” yawɨraka sara ya'.

Sahwara tusa' yagalya'maveta sahɨrɨvɨ Gotɨyai Kwaakevakɨya pwaraavɨ yuna kuna naanga naanga wɨgaimwadelyɨ. Yɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyeta sahɨrɨvɨ Gotɨyai ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ yuna kuna naanga naanga wɨgaimwadelyɨ. Sare' naangesɨ. Yɨ sara yajai Yɨzɨrelɨya yuyabanyara Gotɨyaryawɨnna ayɨna kabapi Kɨraazɨtɨyare yuyara tewaanna nawɨ'nyaanga mwaaibɨnere. Yɨ sare' naanga wavɨlavadesɨ.

A'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyarajɨyaihi, dahaa' sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwaihɨrɨne wawɨnya ya'neinyɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ Gotɨyai nyɨmaryasaabakeinyɨ. Sarevɨ yadɨnya davɨne yaya' munyaba makidɨ yɨvanɨge.

Wawɨnya dazavɨ nɨmɨre avaaikwaa'nakera Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ dɨhaa'bwarɨde'na sarɨmɨnyɨ wabarɨnna yamaarya'nevɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Sarevɨ Gotɨyalyɨ tewaanya ye'mwannamwaaihata savɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨdaa'nya pwara Naangerɨ lɨmwabɨzara sahwaraavɨ padaihasamaarade'na wawɨnya daza' munyaba makidɨnyainyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ marasɨ'naka, yɨ dazavɨ sahwai a'mwe Kwaaka yuyawɨ pɨvakaavɨyaraavɨdaa'nyara gamɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya'na ye'mwannayɨma'ne'. Yɨ nabaai Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ ayahi maaraja' yɨ daza' kwalaalyara baryara ayɨna dɨkaasa'bɨsa' daaka!

Bɨretɨya naanga yavɨkaryeva gɨrɨkula maalɨkejɨ' Gotɨyarɨ wɨjaave'. Yɨ gɨrɨkula maalɨka sajɨ' Gotɨyarejɨ' warajazɨ' yɨ gɨrɨkula naanga kɨrɨsɨ Gotɨyaresɨ. Nabaai yɨsare pwipula sa Gotɨyare waraja yɨ yɨtaanya kɨnɨjɨ sa avaala Gotɨyarengɨ. (Yɨ sare' daresɨ. Juyaraavɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara Gotɨyarera mwalyaasavɨ, yɨ sahwaraavɨna dɨvi kwɨyakwalaangera Gotɨyarera mwaaibɨnerera.)

Gotɨyai wawɨnyavɨya yɨta wolivɨyare yɨtaanya pɨnɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyarabɨsangɨ lɨvɨ'mwagaka yɨ marasɨ'naka gɨmɨnyɨ pɨvaakɨyaigɨnyɨ yɨ'daryawɨnya wolivɨya yɨtaanya'gɨnyɨ gɨmaaraka yɨtaanya pɨnɨngɨ tɨnnyawɨ gɨmɨnyɨ kagye'mwagaka' dahaa' gɨmɨ tewaanya mwaaihɨ. Sarevɨ wolivɨya mɨnarya' wolivɨyare yɨpwipulyavɨre' maa'manɨgɨ.

Sarevɨ yɨtaanya nebulya'nanyangɨna gɨmɨre yaya' munyaba mamakɨlyadɨ bɨraiyagaala madangadɨnna! Yɨ gɨmɨ bɨrala dangadɨza' nayaa pada'galayawɨ'na ja! Gɨmɨ yɨpwipulyavɨ mɨnarya' wɨjaavadɨnya' mɨ'. Aawa. Pwipula sahɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨ gɨzaavadeigɨnyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨ dara dɨthathe' “Yɨtaanya daza Gotɨyai lɨvɨ'mwagakengɨ. Nabaai sahwai ‘Kumɨreba pɨvaakɨyarɨ ye'mwagakɨma!’ daka nɨmɨnyɨna lɨvɨ'mwaga'.”

Yo, nawɨ'nyasɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨ Yɨzɨrelɨya sahwara Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Yɨ da sahɨrɨsavɨ mena lɨvɨ'mwagasɨ'nadengɨ. Yɨ gɨmɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨnya'na sare'na nayaa daa'manɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨ mala nayaa jɨwannana! Gɨmɨ pihadɨka minna! Aawa. Gɨmɨ lɨka nayaa jɨ!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai yɨtaanya nebulya'nanya kunnya kaavɨlyavɨ mɨwɨ'nɨkengɨ yɨvainyɨna yakai mɨ'. Yɨ sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' gɨmɨ kwaigɨnyɨjɨ yɨvainadei mɨ'.

Yɨthaa! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai tewaanna bwiwanga gyazavɨjɨ gamɨre sɨnna tɨka saburɨjɨ nayaa dɨvada'galangana! Pwaraavɨne' daresɨ. Gamɨrebwi mena yagalya'mavesaraavɨ sahwai sɨnna tɨka wɨda'delyɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨne' daresɨ. Gɨmɨ gamɨre tewaanna bwiwanna gyazavɨ kuna mwaaidɨzaigɨ, Gotɨyai tewaanna gɨvwiwamanɨ'. Gamɨre tewaanna bwiwanga gyazavɨ mamwaalyɨ yɨja' gɨmɨ kwaigɨnyɨjɨ gɨthawaasadelyɨ.

Nabaai yɨtaanya sɨnnawɨnya pɨnɨ daza, yɨ kumɨ malɨmwagyaburɨ kuna mamwaalyɨ yɨpɨja' yɨ Gotɨyai wawɨnyavɨya yɨsavɨ ayɨna marye'mwagathengɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai dɨragɨnnakei sahwaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na ayɨna marye'mwagannelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ kwaigɨ yɨ'daryawɨnyare wolivɨya yɨtaanyaigɨ mwaalagɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai gɨthawaasaka wawɨnyavɨya wolivɨya nawɨ'nyɨkɨ gɨmarye'mwaga'. Yɨta sɨ' yune gɨmɨri'na mɨ'. Sare' nebulya'nanya' warɨke' yɨ nabaai pɨbwi naanga nebulya'nanya' waradesɨ. Wolivɨya nawɨ'nyɨkɨre yɨtaanya daza ayɨna maarɨna yajai kunnya yɨta sɨkɨ ayɨna marye'mwagakannelyɨ.

Nya'mweihi ajɨmya pɨnɨngɨyaihi, sare' dare'nesɨ. “Gotɨyai nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya davɨ sarɨmɨ sɨmumaayaihi kuna mamwaaibɨnera!” yawɨrena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'nadɨvɨ' dara nadɨpɨka! “Nemɨ sɨmunya kɨnɨnnakeinera. Juyara sɨmumaayarera.” Gotɨyai nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya daza' yɨ daresɨ. Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ yunegaa' sɨmunya' tihɨralɨmwagata yadera mɨ'. Yunegaa' “Naangerɨ malɨmwagaanna!” dɨpɨ'dera mɨ'. Yɨ a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Naangeryawɨnna mena wɨlaabapɨjɨ wɨlaabɨpɨjara yuyaraavɨ Gotɨyai yawɨrakera kalɨmwagapɨjɨ
yɨ sare saburɨ dazagaa' Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨya yuyaraavɨ padaihasamaaradere. Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨkabaaibɨ'
“Saayonɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨdaa'nyai
Padaihasamaa'dei walaabathelyɨ.
Sahwai Jaikopɨmɨreraavɨ galazekɨvalyabwi marasɨ'nadelyɨ.
Sara kyojɨ nayaa Gotɨyainyɨ yɨdeinyɨ.
Sahwaraavɨ yagaala wɨlɨmwagarɨkebwi ye'mwannawɨdɨdeinyɨ.
Kumɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'na'mujɨ yɨdeinyɨ.”
Sara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.

Yagaala tewaanya' bule wɨjaavanɨgasavɨna sahwaraavɨna Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨre yɨkamaangera mwaaiha'.” Sare' sarɨmɨnyɨ mena yɨhɨgaimwagake'nanyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai dahɨlakakevɨna sɨnnawɨnya kwɨyakwalaangeraavɨna yawɨrake'na Gotɨyarɨ sahwaraavɨna kale wivanɨkerera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨre wɨgaimwanga yanga wɨjaayangɨnajɨ gamɨre jaka wɨjɨvwaramaasavɨnajɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaaradei mɨ'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ galazekɨvaleva nabaai dahaa' Yɨzɨrelɨyara galazekɨvaimanɨgasavɨ sarɨmɨ kale'na gaimwanga tewaanya' ma'mwaatabaaibɨ'
sarɨmɨ kale'na gaimwanga tewaanya' maa'manɨgasavɨ nabaai dahaa' kumɨ kale'na gaimwanga tewaanya' maarya'nera sahwarajɨ mena galazekɨvalesare.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Galazekɨvala saburɨ kalavuza' Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ Juyarajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyarajɨ saraavɨ yɨrakere. Gamɨre kale'na gaimwanga tewaanya' wɨjaaya'ne yuya kwaraavɨ sara yakere.

Ai! Gotɨyai yuyaraavɨ yange'na wiadele! Gotɨyai sɨmunya naangaanga kɨnɨnnakele! Yuyangɨne yunebanna yawɨrakadele! Yɨ saalaalyavɨ kewewɨnɨ yɨnɨgwalaawɨkebɨsalyɨ. Gamɨ yawɨbwasaburɨ kaavɨlya' a'mweina mabɨramaari yaanneine. Gamɨre ya saburaavɨ kaavɨlya' myawɨranganyɨ yaanneine. Wana yuna aawa nebulyasɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨ'
“Naangere sɨmunyavɨ aaihwai yawɨramaa'nɨkelaka!
Sahwarɨ sɨmunya' aaihwai wɨjaavadelaka!”
“A'mwerɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa ayahi wɨrɨvɨkɨrya'nenna
Gotɨyarɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuyangɨne gyakwarɨna
Gotɨyarɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa aaihwaidaasɨ wɨjaavakalaka!”

Aawa. Sai yuyangɨne'na aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Yɨ sahwai yuyangɨ wakyaakengɨ. Gamɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ yuya yɨnɨkengɨ. Gamɨnyɨ yɨlaaya ya'ne yuya yɨma'nakengɨ. Nemɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gamɨnne yaya' munyaba naanga nayaa makɨlaana! “Byaannakeigɨ!” wɨdaana! Naanga sahɨrɨsɨra.

Nya'mweihi, yuya sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyare kale naange'na yawɨ'dɨvɨsavɨ kavena dɨragɨnna nayaa dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Juyara Gotɨyarɨna sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ tamira'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gaalyajɨ' Gotɨyarɨ nayaa duzaavɨnyɨla! Yɨ sarɨmɨ saihi Gotɨyarɨneihi sahwarɨ yɨlaaya ya'neihi tewaanna duzaavɨnyɨla! Yɨ sarɨmɨ sara wɨjaavɨdɨvɨsavɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨlaaya nebulya'nanya' nayaa jideihɨlyɨ.

Yɨ dahaasara sara ya'ne kumɨrebwi sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nayɨhwɨlakɨpɨdɨka! Aawa. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ mudɨke yɨhwakajavɨ yɨ sarɨmɨre kɨbwi mudɨkebwi yɨhyɨma'nade'nanyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨ Gotɨyai sɨmunya' yawɨ'devwi yɨnɨga nebulya'na yawɨramaapɨneihɨlyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyarɨne tewaanya nawɨ'nyabulyɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wigalya'ne sabulyɨ Gotɨyai nemɨ ya'ne yawɨ'de tewaanya naanga yune nebulya'nanyabulyɨ jawɨranganyideihɨlyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨ yanga gaimwanga nyɨjaavakeburɨ, sarɨmɨjɨya gazaigɨzaigɨnyɨ dara gɨthɨma! Gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨna nayaa yawɨ'dɨza' yɨ sara jawɨka! Yɨ gɨmɨ kwaasɨ dara nyawɨ'dɨ'! “Nɨmɨ sainyɨ naanga nebulya'nanyainyɨ.” Aawa. Gɨmɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwagahɨnya'na Gotɨyare wawɨnyangɨne dɨragɨnya' sara gɨzaavakabaaibɨ' yune sabanna gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨna nayaa sara dɨvada'galayawɨka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya kwalaalya warɨkejɨkɨra. Sare kɨrɨvɨ yuya sa wawɨnya' avaaina mivanɨ'.
Sasarebaaibɨ' nemɨ a'mwe kwalaalyaina Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaidaanyaina gaimwannya'neina gamɨre kɨlaaka pɨjɨkɨyainera. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya gazaizai kɨlaakejɨkɨya pwaraavɨnelyɨ.

Sareina nemɨnyɨ Gotɨyai yanga gaimwanga sabwi nejaavakevɨna gamɨre yanga sɨhumale dala pɨnɨnna dala pɨnɨnnanya kɨnɨnnakeinera. Nemɨnyɨdaa'nya gazaizai gamɨre yanga sɨhumale' pwaraavɨna yana! Sarevɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nanejɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨne sɨhumale' a'mwe pwarɨ wɨjaavada yɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwadevɨne yune sabanna sara wɨdana!
Nabaai pwai kwɨya'mweraavɨ wɨdaaya'ne sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ nayaa sara wɨdaayana! Nabaai pwai wɨjɨwaakya'ne sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ nayaa sara wɨjɨwaakana!

Nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨre kunya yawɨsangɨ maradɨhaa'bwarya'ne sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ nayaa sara maradɨhaa'bwarana! Gya'mwerɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa wɨjaaya'ne sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ yange'na nayaa wɨjaavana! Wawɨnya pɨrɨvɨ maremwaalya'ne sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ yɨnɨga sara yana! Taangesɨya pwaraavɨna wɨgaimwanga kale ya'ne sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ yɨlaaya yada sara yana!
Yɨ yuyangɨ ya'ne gɨmɨ pwaraavɨna kale kwaasɨ gyadeigɨ mɨ'. Kale naanga nebulya'na gyana! Nabaai kayaa'nanya saburɨna sɨmɨlɨka gulana! Tewaanyabwi nayaa nebulya'na dɨlɨmwagaka!
Gazaigɨzaigɨ ja'mwe pwaina pwainanyaraavɨna gathaakaangei gahwaalaangeraavɨna kale wiajavaaibɨ' kale tewaanya gyana! Gɨmɨdaa'nyɨ gazarɨzarɨne yaya' munyaba nayaa dɨmakɨla!
Naangere wawɨnya' ya'na maa'na maginanna! Aawa. Yuyagaa' dɨragɨnna nayaa ja! Gotɨyare Kuryai gɨmɨre kuryarɨ kagithɨkaavojɨ dɨ'nakeigɨ gɨmɨre sɨmunyasɨ ja!
Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨ sahwarɨna yemwaaimanɨgɨnyavɨ, yɨ yɨlaaya nayaa jɨ! Gɨmɨnyɨ taanginya pɨrɨ' kagima'nojɨ yɨ savɨ dɨragɨnna dɨthaaka! Yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ nayaa jɨthaangana!
Gotɨyare a'mwe pwara gɨlyɨvɨsanna kugainojɨ yɨ gɨmɨ nayaa ye'mwannawɨjaavɨna jɨ! A'mwe anga pɨwɨnyara gɨmɨnyabanna kabi'mavapɨri yɨ sahwaraavɨ nayaa pada'galamaremwaaina jɨ!
Gɨmɨnyɨ a'mwera kayaa'na kagyapi Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ tewaanna wiade'na sahwarɨ nayaa duthana! Sahwaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalya'nenna mudɨnna! Aawa. Sahwaraavɨ nawɨ'nya wiade'na Gotɨyarɨ nayaa duthana!
A'mwera yɨlaaya yadaapi gɨmɨ sahwaraavɨjɨ yɨlaaya nayaa je'mwannayɨ! Sahwara kɨnna kadapɨjɨ nabaai sahwarajɨ kɨnna nayaa je'mwannadana!

Pwaigɨ ja'mwe pwarɨna pwaigɨ ja'mwe pwarɨna avaaizɨmunya jawɨ'nyɨla! Gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨne'na yawɨ'nadɨnyabaaibɨ' jawɨka! Gɨmɨ “Naangeinyɨ a'mwe naanga gaverajɨ mwaalɨma!” kunya myawɨ'dɨnna! Aawa. A'mwe yaasɨwakerajɨ nayaa je'mwannayamarya! Gɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨne'na nadɨthɨka! “Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sɨmunya' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨra.”
Gɨmɨnyɨ a'mwe gazaizai kayaa'nanya kagyozɨ yɨ sahwarɨ kayaa'nanya mɨnya maarya nyɨdɨ'! “A'mwe yuyaraavɨre tɨnnyaryaba nayaa nawɨ'nyabwina yɨma!” dadɨ jɨ!
Gɨmɨ saigɨ malyabwina sɨmunya myawɨ'dɨnna! Nabaai gɨmɨnyɨne tusa' yɨdori yɨ gɨmɨ yuya a'mwerajɨ avaaimunyɨ'na yadɨ nayaa pada'galaye'mwannemwaaina jɨ!

Nya'mwe nebulya'nanyaigɨ a'mwei kayaa'na givanɨke ayahi tɨvɨkɨta nyɨdɨ'! Aawa. Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨke' sahwarɨ yadaawori gɨmɨ kave baihana'na jɨ! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. “Kayaa'nanyaburɨ ayahi dɨlarɨvɨkɨta sabwi yɨ sa' wawɨnya' nɨmɨresɨra. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sahwaraavɨ kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨrɨdeinyɨ,” Naangei sara dɨvanɨ'.

Tɨvɨkɨta minna! Aawa. Gɨmɨre yɨkamaangei mɨjɨka yajai, yɨ sarɨ wapaaya nayaa duzaama! Gamɨre kulalya' yaalɨka wihɨrajai yɨ sarɨ aalya' nayaa duzaama! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ sara yɨja' yɨ gamɨre yade sabwina wagɨla nebulya'na duzaadelyɨ.
Gɨmɨ tɨvɨkɨrya'neigɨ gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya sabwi mwanganakɨnna! Kayaa'nanyabwi gɨmɨnyɨ nagwavɨlavadɨ'! Aawa. Gɨmɨ tewaanyabwina nayaa pada'galayadɨ yɨ kayaa'nanyabwi dɨthathɨwadeigɨnyɨ.

Gazaizai ga'maanɨyaraavɨ kwaakewɨ nayaa wɨla'narana! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ga'maanɨyai saba sana yaasɨwa' yɨma'nyɨna yɨkai mɨ'. Aawa. Yuya wawɨnya ga'maanɨyare sa Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ yɨma'nadengɨ. Nabaai yuya ga'maanɨyara mwaaihata sahwaraavɨ Gotɨyai gamɨ sai wɨmwaaihakera sarera mwaaiha'.
Sarevɨ yɨ a'mwe ga'maanɨyare yagaalya' galazekɨvalajai, sai Gotɨyare kɨbulyɨ galazekɨvaimwa'. Yɨ a'mwera dazavɨ galazekɨvaibɨzara kumɨre yɨpɨja saburɨ tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya maapɨ'dere.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe nawɨ'nyabwi yadaapiyaraavɨ ga'maanɨyara lɨka yɨrɨ'galya'nera mamwaalyɨga'. Aawa. A'mwera kayaa'na yadaapiyaraavɨ lɨka yɨrɨ'galya'nera mwaaiha'. Gɨmɨ “Ga'maanɨyarɨna lɨka myɨ yɨdeinyɨ,” jawɨ'manɨgɨ! Yɨ sarevɨ yune nayaa nawɨ'nyabwina kya'gɨzɨ yɨ gamɨ gɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba gɨmakɨladelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ tewaanyavɨ gɨhaimwagya'nei Gotɨyare wɨdaayadei mwaalɨ'. Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yɨja' yɨ lɨka nayaa jɨ! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ga'maanɨya sahwai kwaari'masɨramɨnya' tɨvɨkɨrya'ne' gazare lɨmwagɨkei mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nabaai sai a'mwe kayaa'na yaderɨ Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨke'ne tɨvɨkɨrya'ne' wɨjaaya'nei Gotɨyare wɨdaayadei mwaalɨ'.
Sarevɨ sahwarɨ kwaakewɨ nayaa dɨmwaala! Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨke' tɨvɨkɨsa'na kwaakewɨ nayaa dɨmwaaide gave'na mɨ'. Aawa. Gɨmɨre sɨmunyai padaihɨrakyai sara gɨthathe'na kwaakewɨ dɨmwaala!
Sahɨrɨvɨne'na taakɨzɨya kɨrɨsɨ dakya! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare wɨdaayadɨvɨsara yune wawɨnya dazavɨna dɨragɨnna maremwaaidɨvɨsa'na dakya!

Gɨmɨ a'mwe saraavɨna dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna wɨjaavɨja kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ. Sareigɨ sahwaraavɨna gɨmɨ nayaa duzaama! A'mwe taakɨzɨya maa'derɨna yɨ sahwarɨna taakɨzɨya' nayaa duzaama! Taakɨzɨya pɨnɨngɨne maa'derɨna nayaa duzaama! A'mwe pwarɨ “Gɨmɨ a'mwe naangeigɨnyɨ,” wɨdɨzaigɨ mwaala'gɨzɨ yɨ “A'mwe naangeigɨnyɨ,” nayaa duthana! A'mwe pwarɨne yaya' munyabanna makidɨzaigɨ mwaala'gɨzɨ yɨ sahwarɨne yaya' munyabanna nayaa dɨmakɨla!

A'mwe aane pwai kwarɨna gɨlyɨvɨta tɨvɨkɨrya'ne aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' wɨjaavɨja' malɨmwaga'dɨnna! Wɨjaavɨja' tɨvɨkɨta gave dahɨrɨ'na warɨbainagothesɨ. Yɨ daresɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyare gazaizarɨna kale gyana! Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwei a'mwe pwarɨna kale wiajai yɨ Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyavɨ yunebanna nayaa mɨdɨmwakelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya' dara dɨnɨ' “Gɨmɨ pware a'mwevɨ ata malɨmwadɨnna! A'mwe pwaraavɨ maramakɨnna! Kuka mamaa'dɨnna! Tɨganaarya myɨnna!” Kɨwɨnya daza, yɨ kɨwɨnya yuya pɨnɨjɨ yuya sanna yɨ kɨwɨnya gave pɨrɨ'nanya' avaaina dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨna tewaanya gima'nadevaaibɨ' yɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨna tewaanya nayaa gima'nana!
A'mwe pwaraavɨna kale tewaanya wiadei sai sahwaraavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yadei mɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwei pwaraavɨna kale tewaanya wiadei, sahwai yune Kɨwɨnya' pada'galamɨdɨdelyɨ.

Dathahaasagaa' dahaa' mwaaihoya da'na mena yawɨ'manɨgasa'na yɨhɨthɨwe yɨhɨvu'nade sasarebwi nayaa jɨla! Dahaa' sarɨmɨregaa' se waryabwi yagalya'ma'dɨvɨ' jathɨkaavɨnyidehaakɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nemɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwagohaa' yɨ sagaa'daasɨ yune nevadaihasamaaradehaa' saamɨnyagaakɨ. Yɨ dahaa', maalɨkegaakɨ.

Sawɨsa' mena yɨwawojɨ mena yɨrɨke purya'negaa' kɨbawegaa' yɨma'nɨwa'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuya sawɨtavɨya sa yagalya'mavaana! Yɨrɨkevɨya sabwina lɨmwagaraana! Sare'na Kayaa'nanyalyɨ mala bwa'nya'ne sɨramɨnyasɨ kɨlɨkesɨ pɨnɨjɨ maraana!

A'mwera nyɨlyavɨ yamaryadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' nemɨ kaanya nayaa yɨda'na yamaryaana! Yaasɨwa'na kayaa'na myamaryɨ yadaa yɨmaka kayaa'na mulaanna! A'mwe pɨnɨngɨ kayaa'nanya dathɨwangebwi myaanna! Yɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya saburɨjɨ yaasɨwa' avaanna mulamaryaanna! Yaasɨwa' yagaaikɨwɨnyanna jarinadaata myaanna! A'mwe pwaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ tɨganaarya myaanna!
Aawa. Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨvaazɨ'ma'na! Kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunya kayaa'nanya sangɨna dɨka yɨdade sangɨna mɨdɨnya'na sɨmunya myawɨ'dɨnna!

Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwara, yɨ sahwara lɨmwangevɨne yawɨsa' yune sɨdu'nakara mɨ'. Sareraavɨdaa'nyai Naangerɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwada kɨrɨ' pɨburaavɨna yawɨta kwalaalya yɨvanɨkelyɨ. Yɨ sarerɨ kave maara'gɨzɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareraayabanna Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya'na dɨmakulaama! Nabaai salyɨ gamɨre yawɨta sangɨna maanga nye'mwannadɨthɨka!

A'mwe pwai lɨmwangevɨne yawɨsa' yune sɨdu'nakei yɨ sahwai yuya dala pɨnɨnnanya sa nadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' pwai lɨmwangevɨne yawɨsa' sɨdu'nakai mɨ'. Sare'na sahwai dara yawɨ'delyɨ “Aawapaaya, sɨgya nɨma! Gotɨyai nɨmɨ mɨwɨta nya'neinyɨ kɨmaaka nyɨdakɨwakeinyɨ.”

Yɨ a'mwei yuya nadei a'mwe mɨwɨta manyaderɨna sɨmunya kayaa'na nyawɨradɨka! Yɨ a'mwe mɨwɨta manyadei dara najɨdavadɨ'! “Sai wagɨla kayaa'na yɨwaka!” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai a'mwe nade sarɨjɨ mena maarakelyɨ.

A'mweigɨ, pware wɨdaayaderɨ aaihwaigɨ dɨzɨda'deigɨna'! Yɨ gannya Naangei gamɨre wawɨnyavɨna wɨdɨna “Yo, tewaanna yɨwaa.” Nabaai wɨdɨna “Aawa, kayaa'na yɨwaa.” Gannya Naangeresɨra. Nabaai nade sahwai dɨragɨnna daavadelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Naangei gamɨ sai sahwarɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwagazai yɨ dɨragɨnna daavadelyɨ.

A'mwe pwai Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya'ne yɨrɨka kɨrɨ'na yawɨ'manɨ' “Sa' naangesɨra. Yɨrɨka pɨrɨkaavɨ wavɨla'desɨra.” Nabaai sare' a'mwe pwai yawɨ'manɨ' “Yuya yɨrɨkerɨka avaainanyangɨra.” Sarebwina a'mwe gazaizai gannya sɨmunyavɨ nayaa pada'galayɨbwakɨda nayaa yɨwɨryɨnɨnana!

A'mwei “Yɨrɨka pɨrɨ'na sarɨ' aaya mudɨ'na nawɨ'nyaangerɨkɨra,” yawɨ'manɨkei yɨ sai Naangerɨna yawɨ'da Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya sara yɨvanɨ'. Nabaai a'mwei yuya tɨka wapaaya sa nadei, yɨ sai Naangerɨna yawɨ'da sara nadelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sai Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadehaa' yɨ nadelyɨ. A'mwei yuya sa manyadei, yɨ sai Naangerɨna yawɨ'da tɨka wapaaya pɨnɨ kɨmaaka dakadelyɨ. Sai kwalyɨ wapaaya pɨnɨngɨna Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨnyɨdaa'nya aane pwai kwai gannya yawɨta gavevɨna mamwaalannelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai aane pwai kwai gannya yawɨta gavevɨna mabalannelyɨ.

Aawa. Nemɨ gaala mwalaaja', sa' Naangere sɨmunyavɨ mwalaana! Nemɨ balaaja', sa' Naangere sɨmunyavɨ balaana! Sarevɨ gaala mwalaajavɨ, nabaai balaajavɨ yɨ nemɨ yuna Naangereinera. Yɨ gamɨre sɨmunya' mɨdɨnaana!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai balaka gaala ayahi mwaalake' dare'nesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai “Nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨlɨmwadɨvɨsara mena bainɨka sahwaraavɨne Naangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma! Nabaai a'mwe gaala kuna mwaaihata kwaraavɨjɨ Naangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!” daka balaka ayahi mwaalakelyɨ.

Yɨ manyadɨnyaigɨ gɨnnya ja'mwerɨ berɨvɨ jɨda'manɨgɨnyaigɨnaka! Yɨ nadɨnyaigɨ gɨnnya ja'mwerɨna sɨmunya kayaa'na be'na yawɨ'manɨgɨnyaigɨnaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ yuyaina Gotɨyare kotɨyavɨ davaadeinera. Yuyainaavɨ nemaryawɨbwaradeinera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨ'
“Naangei dara da' ‘Gaala mwaaihevɨ,
Yuyara kwadaai gidɨvɨ' “Naangeigɨ!” nyɨdɨpɨ'derera.
Yuyara yɨvanɨgasaburɨna Gotɨyainyɨ nyɨjalɨkurakɨpɨ'dere.’ ”
Sara dɨnɨ'.
Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨnyɨdaa'nya gazaizai gamɨre yade aaya kaavɨla yuya saburana Gotɨyarɨ nayaa jalɨkurakadelyɨ.

Jalɨkurakaadevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ neya'mwe pware sabwina kuna majɨdavaanna! Aawa. Nemɨ sɨmunyavɨ nayaa dara yawɨraana! Neya'mwei bwalaraawia'nei, kayaa'nanya yaamɨjɨ ya'nerɨna yɨ kayaa'na ya'ne pɨbura nyaadɨka!

Naanga Jizaazai sahwarɨ wɨlamwaaihe'na nayaa dathavɨna yawɨ'manɨge. Yɨ aawa. Nya'ne aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' gamɨ sa' kɨmaake' gave pɨrɨ' mɨ'. Kɨrɨ' a'mwei “Kɨmaake' kɨnɨnnakesɨ,” yawɨ'daasɨ yune gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨ daza' kɨmaake' yɨma'nɨwakesɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ tɨka wapaaya pɨrɨ' nɨja' yɨ ja'mwei gɨmɨnyɨ gwanganojɨ sɨmunyavɨ “Sa' kɨmaakesɨra,” yawɨ'da kɨrɨ' najai gamɨre sɨmunyarɨ kayaaka jɨhaide'nanyɨ. Yɨ sara yɨma'naja' gɨmɨre ja'mwerɨna kale gyadevɨna myɨvanɨgɨ. Neya'mwe dazarɨneba Kɨraazɨtɨyai mena balaka a'mwerɨ gɨmɨre wapaayayaba kayaaka migaidɨnna!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨ nadɨnyaigɨ dara yawɨ'dɨnya' “Sa' tewaanyasɨ,” yɨ savɨna ja'mwei kayaa'na yaja'na a'mwera bɨraiyagaala nadɨpɨdɨka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Tɨka wapaaya nyabulyɨ aalya pɨnɨ nyabulyɨ dazabwi Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maremwaaidevwina mɨ'. Aawa. Davurananyɨ. Yɨ yɨda'maraangebulyɨ, kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ, yɨlaayabulyɨ sabwinanyɨ. Sabwina Kurya Tewaanyai neyade dazabulyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwei dazaburɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨdaayajarɨ gamɨre sabwina Gotɨyai yɨlaaya wigaladelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwerajɨ yawɨpɨ'delyɨ “Sahwai a'mwe tewaanyalyɨra.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨnyɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi neyade sangɨjɨ pwai gya'mwe pwarɨ pwai gya'mwe pwarɨ yɨvaimwannadɨvɨta sangɨjɨ yuya sabura nayaa pada'galamɨdɨnaana!

Gɨmɨ wapaanna ja'mwerɨ myawɨri yaasɨwa'na nya'neigɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnya' lɨmwangebwi kayaaka nyɨgaidɨ'! Nebulya' daresɨ. Yuya sa tɨka tewaanya nya'nengɨ. Kɨrɨ' gave pɨnɨ kana'gɨzɨ yɨ a'mwe pwai gwanganojɨ sarevɨ “Kɨmaakesɨ,” yawɨ'da kɨrɨ' kayaa'na yaja' yɨ sabwina gɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabwi jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Sare' kayaa'nanyasɨ.
Mɨwɨta manyasɨ waainɨya' manyasɨ ja'mwerɨ walamarakya'ne pɨbura kayaa'nanya ya'ne pɨbura myasɨ sare tewaanyangɨ.

Gɨmɨ yuya tɨka wapaaya nya'nebwi lɨmwadɨ kɨmaakebwi maayaigɨ Gotɨyaryaba gɨmɨ saigɨ gaveigɨ nayaa ja! A'mwei “Sa' nawɨ'nyasɨ,” yawɨ'dei sara yajarɨ gya'mwei manyadei wanganaja' sɨmunyai kayaaka nyɨgaladɨkajɨ sɨnnawɨnyai gamɨ sai “We'! Kayaa'na yɨwa,” myawɨri yajai yɨ sahwai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnana!

Nabaai a'mwei sɨmunya pɨrɨwaai yɨma'nojɨ tɨka najai sahwai yɨwetawakɨwa'. Gamɨ sarɨna jɨda'nɨwa'. Yɨ sai dɨragɨnna malɨmwagaryada tɨka sa' nɨwake'na gamɨ sarɨna jɨda'nɨwa'. Yuya sabura a'mwei dɨragɨnna malɨmwagaryada yade sa yɨ kayaa'nanyabulyɨ.

Nemɨ a'mwe lɨmwangevɨne yawɨsa' yune sɨdu'nakeina a'mwe lɨmwangevɨne yune yawɨsa' sɨdu'maayaraavɨ gaimwagya'neina wawɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeine. Yɨ sahwaraavɨ nayaa gaimwadaa kumɨre kɨmaakebwine taanginya maraana! Nemɨ sainaavɨna yune myɨgainaanna!
Nemɨnyɨdaa'nya gazaizai Kɨraazɨtɨyarerɨ nemɨnyaba mwaalɨkerɨ gaimwangebwi nayaa yaana! Sarerɨ wigalaana! Nabaai sareburɨ sahwarɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwagaana!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai kwai gamɨ sarɨna yune yɨgainakai mɨ'. Aawa. “Gotɨyarɨna a'mwera bɨrala nyɨja'ne' wikɨra,” yawɨ'na kya' sara wie'. Sahwarɨ yɨma'nakebwi yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨdake' Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨkɨ “A'mwera bɨraizɨka gɨthadɨvɨta yagaala daza yɨ nɨmɨnyɨ bilanya'dengɨ.”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ yuya yagaala sɨnnawɨ yɨdaveta sa, yɨ nemɨnyɨ yɨwɨrya'ne yɨda'nɨkengɨ. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Yagaala daza yɨ kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnya wivaimwagana! Nabaai wɨmaredaa'dori kumɨ kuna dɨragɨnya daa'dɨvɨ' yɨ nɨmɨ yune wɨmaara'mujɨyarɨne dɨragɨnna yemwaalyabwi maapɨka!” kada' yagaala sa yɨda'nɨkengɨ.

Gotɨyai dɨragɨnya daaya'ne aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Nabaai nemɨnyɨ neyɨvaimwadelyɨ. Yɨ sasarei Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazai sara yakeburɨ pada'galamɨdɨnya nebulya'na sarɨmɨnyɨ gazaihizaihɨrɨna avaaizɨmunya' yanga yɨhɨzaavana!
Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna “Avaaizɨmunya'na mwaalyara avaaimaangi'na jara nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Byaannakeigɨne!’ dɨpɨka!” daka yanga yɨhɨzaavana! Sai Gotɨyalyɨ. Sai nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ Ganɨmaangelyɨ.
Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihi sɨrya'mwe pwaraavɨ nayaa maarapi yɨ sahwarajɨ avaaimunyɨ'na je'mwannemwaalyɨla! “Gotɨyai byaanna kɨnɨnnakelyɨ,” dɨnya'neinaavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemaarakabaaibɨ' nayaa dɨmaaryɨla!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara dɨvanɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyai kɨlaaka gurya da'nadɨvɨsara Juyaraavɨ gaimwagya'nei wɨdaayadei yɨma'nakelyɨ. Sara yaka sa' Gotɨyare yagaala nebulyavɨ sara dɨnɨke'nesɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai kwɨyakwalaangeraavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake yunebanna ya'nennanyɨ.
Nabaai ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Gotɨyare kale'na gaimwangebwi wangadɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨna “Byaannakelyɨ,” ja'neraavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨma'nake'nanyɨ. Yɨ sare' Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨkɨ
“Sarevɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ gɨmɨnyɨna jalɨkurakɨdeinyɨ.
Yɨledaasavɨ gɨmɨnne yaya' munyabanna makɨlɨdeinyɨ.”
Nabaai yagaala pɨrɨ' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨkɨ “Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaihi Gotɨyarera Yɨzɨrelɨyarajɨ yɨlaaya je'mwannayideihɨlyɨ.”
Nabaai pimagɨnyavɨ dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
“Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaihi Naangerɨne yaya' munyaba dɨmakɨlyɨla!
Nabaai a'mwe yuyarajɨyaihi gamɨnne yaya' munyaba dɨmakɨlyɨla!”
Nabaai Aazaayai kwalyɨ dakesɨ.
“Devitɨmɨre ganɨmaangei Jeziyarevaakɨdaa'nyai yɨma'nadelyɨra.
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ maremwaalya'nerɨ dahɨlakadelyɨra.
Wɨgaimwagya'ne sahwarɨna ajɨmyangɨyara yemwaaibɨ'derera.”
Sara dakesɨ.

Gotɨyai nemɨre yemwaalyabwine aaya kaavɨlyai sarɨmɨ gamɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsavɨ yɨlaaya naangejɨ kwaamu'nanya naangejɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yɨhyana! Yɨ sarɨmɨ Kurya Tewaanyare dɨragɨnya' maarapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ yemwaalyabwi, yɨ daza' sarɨmɨnyɨ yunebanna naange' yɨhwarade'na sara yɨhyana!

Nya'mweihi, nɨmɨ sainyɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nebwina yawɨ'manɨge. Sarɨmɨ saihi yuyagaa' tewaanyabwina yunebanna yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Nabaai yuya yawɨta dala pɨnɨnnanya kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨ sɨmunya tewaanyabwi yɨnɨga wi'na wivaimwabɨneihɨlyɨ.
Sare' kɨrɨ' yagaala dɨragɨkɨbawenna paazɨya davɨ yagaala pɨnɨ sarɨmɨnne yɨda'mwengɨ. Nabaai pɨkarya yɨda'mwe'na lɨka miwa. Gotɨyai yanga gaimwangeburɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya dɨhaa'bwata yɨhide'nanyɨ.

Gotɨyai tewaanna sara nyada ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ ya'neinyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨdaayadɨnyainyɨ nyɨmwaaihakelyɨ. Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'deibɨsainyɨ Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ wɨdɨvanɨge. “Gotɨyaryawɨnna ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ makulaabɨma!” dadɨ Kurya Tewaanyai sahwaraavɨ nawɨ'nyaraavɨ kumwaaihojɨ “Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨna ‘Nɨmɨnyɨna mubɨthɨka tamiraya'ne sipɨzipɨya nawɨ'nyarabɨsara ajɨmya yuyangɨyara nawɨ'nyaraavɨ maarɨma!’ yawɨrya'nerɨ yanga wɨjaavɨde'nanyɨ,” dadɨ yɨvanɨge.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihe'na Gotɨyarɨne yɨvanɨgengɨna yɨlaaya yɨnɨga wi'na yɨwɨneinyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yagaala dɨragɨkɨbawenna yɨhɨthɨma! Lɨka myɨwɨna! Pwaraavɨre wawɨnyanna nɨmɨ myenenna majalɨkurakɨwɨna! Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨre dɨragɨnya' nɨmɨnyɨ kanya' sara yadenna jalɨkurakɨma! Kɨraazɨtɨyai sara kanya' nɨmɨ yagaala sannajɨ yadɨnya sannajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨnya'nera lɨmwagya'neraavɨ sara sara yadɨnyainyɨ.

Yɨ nɨmɨre yagaalyangɨ dɨragɨnya nyɨgaimwada nɨmɨre wawɨnyangɨ dɨragɨnya nyɨvaimwada yɨ yɨjɨwaainya atɨka maru'narya'ne dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyanna yadennajɨ Kurya Tewaanya kwalyɨ dɨragɨnya nyadennajɨ sahwara Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' tɨnna wanganna. Sareinyɨ aaya mudɨ'na yamaasaba anga Jeruzaalemɨdaasɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yagaala tewaanya' nɨmɨ yuna wɨjɨwaake. Sareinyɨ anga yuyawɨ yunebanna yamaryena aaya'nanya' Pɨrovijɨ Yɨlɨrikaamɨ saba yɨdaakwe.

Yɨ sarevɨ anga pɨwɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yaya' mu'nyadɨvɨsaraavɨrewɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakyavɨna nawɨ'nyɨna nyɨvu'nadeinyɨ. A'mwe pwai a'mwe kware lɨkɨlaja' milamajɨ yadevaaibɨ' nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna pwai mi'na wɨjɨwaakaja' saba mujɨwaaki yɨdeinyɨ.
Aawa. Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ dara nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'
“Gamɨnne yagaalya' mujɨwaakyesara wangabɨ'delyɨ.
Gamɨre yagaalya' mu'nyesara yawɨrangabɨ'delyɨ.”
Sarevɨ wawɨnya daza' kwalaalyagaa' nɨmɨre tusa' wɨla nyɨralɨmwaga'daasɨ yɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna mabi yɨwɨneinyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' dahaa' dimagɨ sara wɨjɨwaakena ayahi wawɨnya' maayainyɨ. Nabaai kwarame kwalaalya nɨmɨ sainyɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨya'na tewaanya nyɨvu'nada

sarevɨ dɨvi sagaa' Pɨrovijɨ Sɨpenɨna wɨde dazagaa' sarɨmɨnyabanna wɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ sare' dara yawɨ'manɨge. Sarɨmɨnyabanna bi'mava'muri yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ mena yɨhwangana'muriyagaa' yɨ sagaa' wɨdeinyɨ. Sarɨmɨjɨ maalɨ'na pɨjɨ' yɨhye'mwannamwaala'muri nɨmɨre sɨmunya' nawɨ'nya mena kanyɨma'nojɨ yɨ sagaa' sarɨmɨ Sɨpenɨne tusavɨne gɨlyɨvɨta tɨka wapaa dɨnyɨgaimwagamakwideinyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' dahaasagaa' Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalya tewaanyara Gotɨyare a'mweraavɨna nɨgwia makulaawia'neinyɨ Jeruzaalemɨna wɨde'nanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pɨrovijɨ Maazathonɨya mwaalyarajɨ Pɨrovijɨ Gɨriza mwaalya kwarajɨ yeva yagaalya' mena wi'na jovɨrawakɨna yevegaa' kumɨre nɨgwia Jeruzaalemɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨ gɨlyɨvɨsanna wɨgainaderaavɨna maryaasa'ne avaala pɨba yɨ'bwaramadakɨna yɨwa'daa'. Sarengɨ makulaawɨdengɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨre sɨmunya' nawɨ'nya wiadaasɨ sara yɨvanɨga'. Nabaai sahwara Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyaraavɨ wɨjaaya'ne tɨvɨkɨta kɨnɨnnakerera. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai Juyaraavɨna kumɨre kuryaraavɨne yanga wɨjaavaka sa ajɨmya yuyangɨyara ye'mwannamaare'. Yɨ sarevɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyara kɨlaakejɨkɨya gɨlyɨvɨsa Juyaraavɨ gaimwagya'ne yanga wɨjaaya' tɨvɨkɨsa' kɨnɨnnakere.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ wawɨnya sa' yune'na yɨ'mwanna'mujɨ, yɨ nɨgwia nawɨ'nya yuya yɨsɨlyabɨ' dadɨvɨ' yɨ'bwaramadakɨwa'daasa sahwaraavɨna wɨjaava'mujɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna kaanya wɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ Sɨpenɨne tusavɨ ya'mujɨyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨ yune'na yɨhwanganɨdeinyɨ.
Nabaai mena yawɨ'manɨge. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨwɨja', yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare nawɨ'nyabwi sarɨmɨnyɨjɨ yunebanna neya'nevɨ bɨdeinyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ Kurya Tewaanyai wɨvu'nya saburɨ neyɨmavɨdaakuvanɨkevɨjɨ sarevɨ kavena dɨragɨnna yɨhithaangamanɨge. Nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨgaimwagathe'na, nɨmɨjɨ yagɨyagɨ ye'mwannawɨdaathevɨ Gotɨyarɨ duzɨla!

“A'mwe Juthɨya mwaalyara Naangerɨ galazekɨvaidɨvɨsaraavɨre asɨrɨ duvadaihasamaaka! Nabaai gɨnnya Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalya a'mwera tewaanyara Polɨmɨre wawɨnya yɨvanɨka dathavɨna ‘Yɨ negainadeinaavɨne' tewaanyabulyɨ,’ yawɨpɨka!” dapɨjɨ duzɨla!
Nabaai “Gotɨyai sɨmunyavɨ sara yawɨrajavɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bathehaa' gamɨ yɨlaaya yada nemɨnyaba gamɨre kuryarɨ gaala wivaimwada ye'mwannamwalaana!” dapɨjɨ sara duzɨla!
Gotɨyai kwaamu'nanyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyai sarɨmɨjɨ yɨnahu yɨhye'mwannamwaalana! Naanga sahɨrɨsɨ.
Nɨmɨ dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Neya'mwe' Piviya' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bathevɨna yɨhɨthɨma! Sare' Segɨrɨya Naangere kusɨlaanyaraavɨ wɨdaayade' yɨ daza' a'mwe tewaanyasɨ.

“Gotɨyare tewaanyara kwɨya'mwerɨ maapɨjavaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ Naangerɨna a'mwe sarevɨ dɨmaaryɨla! Sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannemwaalana! Nabaai pɨnɨnna kugainojɨ, taanga kwiojɨ sahɨrɨvɨ nayaa dɨhaimwagila!” dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahɨrɨ' a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ gaimwadesɨ. Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨnyɨ kwainyɨjɨ nyɨgaimwamwa'dɨkesɨ.
Pɨrɨzɨlavɨjɨ Aakwilaamɨjɨ sayorɨ “Nya'mweyoihi!” nɨmɨnyɨna duzɨla! Sahɨyoi nɨmɨjɨ wawɨnya Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarevɨ avaaiwawɨnyayolyɨ.

Kɨrɨmɨ sayoi nyɨvadaihasamaarya'neyoi balyabɨsayoi karamakɨpɨdɨkeyolyɨ. Sarevɨ suya' yune nɨmɨnna mivanɨge. Aawa. Yuya Naangere kusɨlaanya ajɨmya yuyangɨya kwarajɨ yuya sahwara sayorɨna suya' wɨdadɨvɨsarera.

Nabaai sahɨyore angevɨ Naangere kusɨlaanyaraavɨ “Nya'mweigɨ! Nya'mwe'gɨ!” nɨmɨnyɨna duzɨla! Epanitaazai Pɨrovijɨ Ezɨya saba yɨsɨla aaya mudɨ'nanyai sɨnnawɨ gamɨdaasɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨnei yɨma'nakerɨna nyɨvu'nadelyɨ. Yɨ sasarerɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweigɨ!” duzɨla!
Maarɨyaa' sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na wawɨnya kwalaalya naanga yakevɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mwe'gɨ!” duzɨla!

Aadɨronikaazalyɨ Junɨyaazalyɨ saraai nɨmɨjɨ avaaitawejɨkɨyaraalyɨ. Kɨgaa' nɨmɨjɨ kalavuzavɨ ye'mwannayɨ'naroraalyɨ. Apozelɨyaraavɨ naanga sɨnnawɨnya sahwaraarɨna kwala naangera yawɨ'manɨgasaraalyɨ. Yɨ sahwaraai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ sɨnnawɨ kyɨma'nagi sahwaraarɨ dɨviyainyɨ. Sareraarɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweraaihi!” duzɨla!
Aabɨlɨyataazarɨna Naangerɨ nyɨvu'naderɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweigɨ!” duzɨla!
Wɨrɨvanaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nemɨre avaaiwawɨnyalyɨ Sɨtaakɨzai kwarɨna nyɨvu'nadelyɨ saraarɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweraaihi!” duzɨla!
Aapelɨzarɨ kayaa'na kyare' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwagakerɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweigɨ!” duzɨla! Aarɨzɨtovyulaazarɨ angevɨyaraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweihi!” duzɨla!
Erothɨyonɨ nɨmɨjɨ avaaitawejɨkɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweigɨ!” duzɨla! Naazɨzaazare angevɨyara Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihasaraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweihi!” duzɨla!

Tɨraaipanaasɨ Tɨraaipozasɨ sanadaai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wawɨnya mɨraagɨkɨ'disawaarɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mwewaaihi!” duzɨla! Pezɨza' sahɨrɨvɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nade' Naangerɨ wawɨnya kwalaalya mɨraagɨkɨrakevɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mwe'gɨ!” duzɨla!
Rupaazai Naangerɨ a'mwe tewaanaangei, dahɨlakɨnɨkei yɨ sahwarɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mwei!” duzɨla! Nabaai sahware ganaange', yɨ sahɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ tewaanya nyade'na nyɨnaange' yɨma'nakevɨ “Nɨwaava!” duzɨla!
Aazɨgɨritaazalyɨ Pɨlihonɨjɨ Emizalyɨ Patɨrovaazalyɨ Emaazalyɨ sarajɨ nabaai saraavɨ kwɨya'mwe yɨlaaya ye'mwannayɨvanɨgasarajɨ saraavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Nya'mweihi!” duzɨla!
Pilolohaazalyɨ Julɨyaasɨ Nerɨyaazalyɨ gamɨre ganyaabulaangesɨ Wolibaazalyɨ sarajɨ nabaai Gotɨyare tewaanyara yɨlaaya ye'mwannayɨvanɨgasarajɨ saraavɨ “Nya'mweihi!” duzɨla!
Sarɨmɨ gazaihizaihi sɨrya'mweraavɨ “Nya'mwei!” wɨdadɨvɨ' tewaanyaihi maangwɨdaayɨlaaya dɨmarinyɨla! Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya yuyaba mwaaihasara sarɨmɨnyɨ “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'.

Nya'mweihi, dɨhaa'bwata yɨhide'na dɨragɨnna yɨhithaangamanɨge. Naangereraavɨ tangɨvalya'nera Naangerɨ lɨmwangebwi kayaaka yɨgaidɨvɨsara kwaasɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨna mala nayaa yɨwannadɨvɨ' dɨmwaalyɨla! Yɨ sahwara sarɨmɨnyɨ yagaala nayaa mi'na yɨhɨzɨwaaketa nawɨ'nya savɨ galazekɨvaleva yagaala pɨnɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨvɨsarera. Sasare saraavɨna sarɨmɨ gɨnyɨra'nyɨna jɨla!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe sasarera nemɨre Naangei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwara kunnya yune kɨlaakejɨkɨne sangɨna mɨdɨdɨvɨsare. Yɨ wabwiwayagaalyajɨ nawɨ'nyabɨsajɨ a'mwe sɨmunya kayaa'nanyabwina myawɨryadɨvɨsaraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsare.

Dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsaburɨna a'mwe yuyara mena wɨ'nɨvanɨga'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya naanga yɨhɨmarivanɨge. Nabaai sare kɨrɨvɨ sɨmunya dara yawɨ'manɨge. Sarɨmɨ nawɨ'nya sabwina ya'ne sɨmunya kɨnɨnnakeihi dɨmwaalyɨla! Kayaa'nanyabwina ya'ne sɨmunya maayaihi dɨmwaalyɨla!

Yɨ sareihɨrɨna Gotɨyai kwaamu'nanyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyai maalɨkegaa' yadehaa' Saataanɨmɨ yɨlapaihɨrojɨ sarɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨrɨ kwaakewɨ wakadevaaibɨ' Saataanɨmɨrera kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨ dɨthathɨwagyideihɨlyɨ. Nemɨre Naangei Jizaazare yanga gaimwangebwi sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannarana!
Timoti, nɨmɨre avaaiwawɨnyai yɨhɨthɨvanɨ' “Nya'mweihi!” Nabaai Luzɨyaazalyɨ Jaizonɨjɨ Sozɨpaatalyɨ sara nɨmɨjɨ avaaitawejɨkɨyara “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'.
Nɨmɨ Tetɨyaazainyɨ Polɨmɨre maangikɨ yagaalya' maarena pɨkarya da' yɨda'mweinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaiheinyɨ “Nya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.

Gaayaazai, gamɨre angevɨ nawɨ'nya nyɨmaremwaaimanɨ'. Yɨ nɨmɨnyɨ, Naangere kusɨlaanya yuyaraavɨjɨ nayaa sara maremwaaidelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai “Nya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨ'. Yɨrazɨtaazai anga naanga davanya kaajolɨyaraavɨre wawɨnya ya'ne nɨgwia maremwaaidelyɨ Kwaataazai neya'mwelyɨ saraai “Nehɨrya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨgi.
Nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare yanga gaimwangebwi sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨlyɨ yɨhye'mwannarana! Sara kuna yɨma'nana!

Gotɨyai, sai yagaala tewaanya' dadɨnya savɨne dɨragɨnyasɨ wi'na yɨvaimwagannerɨne yaya' munyaba nayaa pada'galamakɨlaana! Yɨ yagaala tewaanya sa' Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne wɨjɨwaakyasɨ. Yoimavajalɨkurakya' yuya sɨnnawɨ kɨgaasɨ lɨka yulyaryaake' Gotɨyai ku'maayaba mena wɨjalangasakɨwaabɨkesɨ.

Kɨgaakuna lɨka yulyaryaaka kɨrɨ' dahaasagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsara pɨkarya yɨdavesavɨ nebulya'nanya sa' ku'maayaba yɨma'nɨwaabɨkesɨ. Naangerɨ yawɨralɨmwadɨvɨta yuyara sahwarɨ mɨdɨnya'nei Gotɨyai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaaidei “Gazabazaba a'mwera wɨ'nɨpɨka!” sara wɨdakevɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨya kwalaalyara sahwarɨna sɨdu'nakeraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨvanɨ'.
Gotɨyai dazai sɨmunya yuya yawɨta yuya aaya kaavɨla sa nebulya'na kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨ sarei gave pwainanaangerɨna Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' “Byaannakela!” daana! Naanga sahɨrɨsɨra.
Nya'mweihi, Koridɨ mwaalyaihi,

Polɨnyɨ paazɨya' yɨhyasɨwaabe. Gotɨyai sɨmunya sara yawɨrakevɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nyɨdaasadeinyɨ apozelɨyainyɨ yɨma'nya'neinyɨ nyɨjɨvwaramaarakeinyɨ. Nabaai Sozɨthenɨzai neya'mwei nɨmɨjɨ mwaalɨkelyɨ.

Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaihi Koridɨ mwaalyaihɨrɨna yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ sarɨmɨre gɨrɨkita'nanya duimwagasɨ'nɨkeihɨrɨ Gotɨyai yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarake'na Gotɨyareihi yuna tewaanyaihi yɨma'nesaihɨlyɨ. Nabaai anga yuyabanya yuyara nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yayavɨ yɨlaaya wɨdadɨvɨsara Gotɨyare tewaanyara yɨma'nesare. Yɨ sahwai kumɨnyɨ Naangei yaka nemɨnyɨ Naangelyɨ.
Nemɨre Nenɨmaangei Gotɨyalyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai kwalyɨ tewaanya yange'na yɨhɨgaimwagika! Kɨrɨmɨre kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhwarana!
Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'na Gotɨyai gamɨre tewaanya yangebwi sɨhumale yɨhɨzaavakelyɨ. Sarevɨ yuyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaalesavɨ Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨne yuya yunebanna yɨhyakelyɨ. Yɨ yuya yagaala wɨjɨwaakya sajɨ yuya kunya yawɨta sajɨ kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨhɨzalɨkurakobaaibɨ' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ mena dɨragɨnya yɨhwarake'na sahɨnɨ kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathe' sarɨmɨ yemwaaihasagaa' Kurya Tewaanyare sɨhumale aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yɨhɨgainadeihi mɨ'.

Nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwanga yɨhyathelyɨ. Sara kuna kihyojɨ aayagaa'nanyɨ. Yɨ sagaa' Yɨrɨka Naangegaa' sahwai walaabathehaa' Gotɨyai yɨhyɨvaimwade'na sarɨmɨ kayaa'na yɨwetawakya maayaihɨrɨ Gotɨyai yɨhɨzɨdavadei mɨ'.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre Naangelyɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalya'neihɨrɨ jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai sara dake' “Sara yɨdeinyɨ,” yɨ sara neyɨvanɨkelyɨ. Nebulya'nanyalyɨ. Sare'na dɨragɨnna yɨhivaimwannɨkeihi, yɨ, yɨwetawakya maayaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare dɨragɨnya' nyɨjaavake'na dɨragɨnna dara yɨhɨthɨma! Sarɨmɨ yuyaihi yagaala avaainanyanna nayaa dɨzɨla! Sarɨmɨ kuna jaapainadɨvɨ' yagaala ge ge madɨbɨnera! Sɨmunya avaainanyaburɨjɨ yawɨbwarya'ne avaainanyaburɨjɨ je'mwannamwaalyɨla!
Nya'mweihi sara yɨhɨthɨwe' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨlowiyavɨrera sarɨmɨnyɨna dara nyɨdɨwa'daa' “Sahwaraavɨ mayagaalya kuna warɨka.”

Nyɨdɨwa'daata yuyangɨna dɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨjɨya gazarazara ge gengɨ dara dɨvanɨga'. Pwara dɨna “Yɨ, nɨmɨ Polɨmɨreinyɨra.” Nabaai pwara dɨna “Yɨ, nɨmɨ Aapolɨzareinyɨra.” Nabaai pwara dɨna “Yɨ, nɨmɨ Pitareinyɨra.” Nabaai pwara dɨna “Yɨ, nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareinyɨra.”
Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨma! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ japalaannei daaka! Sarevɨ be'na jaapainɨwaa'! Polɨnyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨneba yɨsavɨri maratamarɨmwesainyɨ daa! Polɨnyɨne yayavɨ bavɨtaazɨyabwi maaresavɨ daaka!
Sarɨmɨnyawɨ nɨmɨ Kɨrɨzɨpaazalyɨ Gaayaazalyɨ yune saraarɨna bavɨtaazɨya' ye. Yɨ a'mwe pwara aawa. Daza'na Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su! Sare' tewaanna ye,” wɨdɨvanɨge.
Sarevɨ yɨ aane pwai kwai yagaala yɨnɨga wi'na dara nadathɨka! “Polɨmɨne yayavɨ bavɨtaazɨya' nyake'na sahwareinyɨ.” Sara majɨ ya'ne'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge.
O, navɨka nyɨwaka! Nabaai Sɨtepaanazare angevɨya pwaraavɨjɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yeinyɨ. Yena ayahi pwarɨjɨ kwaraarɨjɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yeinyɨ dɨngaka? Sa' nɨmɨ myawɨriwa.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ a'mweraavɨ bavɨtaazɨya' ya'neinyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai nyɨmaryasaabakeinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Gamɨre yagaala tewaanya wɨjɨwaakya'neinyɨ nyɨmaryasaabakeinyɨ. Yagaala sa' wɨdadɨnyavɨna a'mwe sɨmunnakera Kwaaka davakɨyangɨna dadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' nɨmɨ sara majɨwana. “Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨsavɨ balake' saba sana yaasɨwaka nyɨma'nadɨka!” dena a'mweraavɨre yawɨsabwi sara madɨwɨneinyɨ.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. A'mwe pwara, Dɨkevɨnera kayaaka yɨnɨkevɨ tusavɨ wɨvanɨgasara Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ balakevɨne yagaalya'na dara yawɨ'dɨvɨsare “Yagaala sa' sɨmumaayasɨ.” Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Nemɨ a'mweina, Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ nevadaihasamaa'manɨkeina dara yawɨ'daanyaine “Yagaala sa' Gotɨyare dɨragɨnaange' neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨkesɨ.”
Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai jaake' dara dɨnɨ'
“Sɨmunnakeraavɨre sɨmunyabwi kayaaka yɨgalɨdeinyɨ.
Sɨmunya yawɨ'nɨkeraavɨre sɨdusabwi yaasɨwa'nanya yɨbwarɨdaakudeinyɨ.”

Sarevɨ dahaasara sɨmunnakeraavɨna gatha'darevaka! Bukuyangɨ pada'galayawɨrangadɨvɨta sɨdu'nakeraavɨna gatha'darevaka! A'mwe dathahaasara gavamarasɨ'nyɨyagaala dɨdɨvɨsaraavɨna gatha'darevaka! A'mwe Kwaaka davakɨyaraavɨre sɨmunya' Gotɨyai sɨmumaaya' wakake' midaaka!

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai sɨmunya nebulya' kɨnɨnnakei dara yawɨ'na “A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara yune sɨmunya kunyabwina nɨmɨnyɨ myawɨramaari yɨpɨnere.” Sara yawɨ'na yakevɨ, Gotɨyarɨ dara wɨvu'nakesɨ. Nɨmɨrera nɨmɨre yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakɨpɨ'devɨ pwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨ'deraavɨ padaihasamaarɨdeinyɨ. Kwaakevakɨyara wɨjɨwaakya dazavɨna kwaasɨ dara yawɨ'manɨga' “Yagaala sa' sɨmumaayasɨ.”

Juyara yɨjɨwaainya atɨka maru'nasangɨ yɨdaangadɨvɨ' yawɨ'dɨvɨsare “Sahɨnɨ tɨnna wanganawaajɨ yagaalya' lɨmwagaraadera.” Gɨrikɨyara sɨmunya' bɨ'dɨvɨ' “Sarɨmɨre yagaalyavɨ aaya kaavɨlya' nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ yawɨramarawaajɨ ‘Nebulya' dɨngaka? Nebulya' midɨngaka?’ yɨhɨthaadera.”

Nabaai sare kɨrɨwaarɨ nemɨ saina Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ maratamarɨmwesarɨne yagaalya' wɨjɨwakadaanyaine. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yagaala daza' Juyara kayaasɨmunya wima'naderera. Nabaai pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara yawɨ'dɨvɨsare “Sɨmumaayasɨra.”
Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwara Gotɨyai jaka jɨvwaramaa'nɨkera sahwara Juyarajɨ Gɨrikɨyarajɨ saraavɨne Kɨraazɨtɨyai sai Gotɨyare dɨragɨnaangei yaka Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Yagaala daza' “Sɨmumaayasɨreva,” Gotɨyare yagaala sa' sɨmunya naange' kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Yɨ a'mweraavɨre sɨmunya savɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Nabaai “Waryaanyasɨreva,” Gotɨyare yagaala sa' dɨragɨnya naange' kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Yɨ a'mweraavɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨ.

Sare' aaya kaavɨla daresɨ. Nya'mweihi, Gotɨyai jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakegaa' sarɨmɨre mwaalyabwine'na ayɨna jawɨranganyɨla! Sarɨmɨjɨya a'mweraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunyabwi kɨnɨnnakera a'mwe kwalaalyara mwaalesara daaka! A'mwe naangera dɨragɨnnakera sarɨmɨjɨya sara a'mwe kwalaalyara daaka! Yaya munyaba yɨnɨkera sarɨmɨjɨya sara kwalaalyara daaka!

Aawa. “Sɨmunnakeraavɨna makinyaburɨ bwalawiekɨrakɨma!” daka Gotɨyai a'mwe Kwaaka davakɨyara sarɨmɨnyɨna “Sɨmumaayarera,” dadɨvɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthahɨlakakelyɨ. Nabaai “Dɨragɨnyaraavɨna makinyaburɨ bwalawiekɨrakɨma!” daka Gotɨyai a'mwe Kwaaka davakɨyara sarɨmɨnyɨna “Waryaanyare,” dadɨvɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthahɨlakakelyɨ.
“A'mwe naangeraavɨ kuneraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma!” daka Gotɨyai a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara sarɨmɨnyɨna “Yaya kwaakebanyara yaasɨwakere,” yɨ “A'mwe angwangwere,” yɨ “Kunerera,” dadɨvɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthahɨlakakelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyaryaba a'mwe kɨlaa'naka yuyarajɨya aane pwai kwai gamɨnne yaya' munyabanna mamakɨlyɨ yannelyɨra gamɨre sɨmunya pɨburɨna, gamɨre dɨragɨnya kɨburɨna.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihya'neihɨrɨ Gotɨyai yɨhɨmwaaihakelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ nemɨnyɨne'na Kɨraazɨtɨyai Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ aaya kaavɨlyai yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨ nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyai dadelyɨ “Yɨda'maraangeihi nɨmɨreihɨlyɨ.” Yɨ sahwarɨ nemɨ a'mwe tewaanyaina Gotɨyareina yɨma'nya'neinaavɨ nemwaaihakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨ nemɨre kayaa'nanyangɨna ayahi nemubamaarakelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ “Sara yaana!” daanneinaavɨna Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
A'mwe gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makidei
Naangerɨna gaverɨna nayaa sara makɨlana!

Nabaai, nya'mweihi, nɨmɨ kwainyɨ sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wawegaa' Gotɨyarɨne jalɨkurakya' yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨ yagaala sɨmunya yawɨrirɨkɨsajɨ mamakabyeinyɨ. Sarɨmɨ “ ‘Ai, a'mwe sai sɨmunyavɨ nemɨnyɨ newavɨla'delyɨ,’ nadɨpɨdɨka!” dena sara mihɨzɨwaakyeinyɨ.

Sare' aaya kaavɨla daresɨ. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna mwɨyagaa' nɨmɨ mena dara yawɨbwarayawɨramarake, “Sahwaraayaba Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna sɨmunya' yune sahwarɨne'na nayaa yawɨrɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ mararamarɨmwesarɨna nayaa yawɨrɨdeinyɨ. Sɨmunya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yawɨrɨdeinyɨ mɨ'.”

Yɨ nɨmɨ sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨnyaba yɨhye'mwannamwaalegaa' nɨmɨ sainyɨ waryaanyainyɨ. Nɨmɨ “Gotɨyare wawɨnya naange' nayaa yɨwɨneinyɨ dɨngaka?” dadɨ wawɨnya sa'na lɨka naanga yadɨ bɨ'bɨta yadɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakeinyɨ.

Nabaai yagaalya' yɨhɨthadɨnyasɨ nɨmɨre yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨnyasɨ yɨ dazawaai a'mwe sɨmunya yawɨ'nɨkeraavɨre yagaalyaburɨ mihɨzɨwaakye. Nɨmɨre sɨmunya savɨ sarɨmɨre sabwi marima'nya ya'nevɨ mihɨzɨwaakye. Aawa. Kurya Tewaanyai gannya dɨragɨnyavɨ yɨhibwarɨdaakwakesɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagya'neihɨrɨna waryaanyaibɨsainyɨ mwaale. Yɨ nɨmɨ “A'mweraavɨre sɨmunya saburɨ sarɨmɨ nebulya'na lɨmwagata nyɨpɨdɨka! Aawa. Yune Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨna lɨmwabɨka!” dena sara yɨhyeinyɨ.

Sara yɨhɨthɨwe kɨrɨ' a'mweraavɨ Gotɨyare sabwi dɨragɨnya mena yɨvaimwannɨkeraavɨ nemɨ sɨmunya yawɨ'nɨke' wɨjɨwakadaanyaine. Sare kɨrɨ' sa' a'mwe dahaasɨyaraavɨre sɨmunya yawɨta' mɨ'. Nabaai dahaasara maremwaaidɨvɨta sahwaraavɨre sɨmunya yawɨta' mɨ'. Dahaasara yɨwɨya'nere.

Aawa. Nemɨ Gotɨyare sɨmunya' wɨjɨwakadaanyasɨ. Yagaala daza' Gotɨyai lɨka yulyaryaakesɨ. Daza' nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakyavɨnanyasɨ. Gotɨyai Kwaakeva' mwakyaakegaa' yɨ sahwai sɨmunya daza' mena dahɨlakakelyɨ. Nemɨ byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ nawɨ'nyavɨ mwaalya'ne'na sara dahɨlakɨna yakelyɨ.

A'mwe dahaasaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta sarajɨya aane pwai kwai sɨmunya savɨ aaya kaavɨla dazavɨ yawɨramaa'nɨkei mɨ'. Sare' dɨwevɨ aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Sɨmunya sa' yawɨ'nɨkara mwaaibɨzɨ kwajɨ yɨ sahwara Naangei Sɨgunyavɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakerɨ yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ mamararamarɨmwi kipɨdɨka!
Aawa. Sahwara savɨna myawɨryesara yeta dazanna Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ sanna dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Pɨnɨngɨ tɨnnyai mwanganyaja
Nabaai kadɨki' mu'nyaja
A'mweraavɨ sɨmunyangɨ mima'nyaja
Gamɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'naderaavɨne
Nabaai sahwaraavɨ wɨgaimwagya'neraavɨne
Gotɨyai mena yovɨrawakakengɨ.

Sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Yɨ gamɨre Kuryarɨ nevu'nadeinaavɨna Gotɨyai lɨka yulyaryaake neyɨbwarɨdaakwakengɨ. Sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Kurya Tewaanyai kaavɨla yuya sangɨ wɨjalangasakadelyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyare sabwi nemɨnyɨ lɨka mena yulya'de sangɨjɨ Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ wɨjalangasakɨwaidaawadelyɨra.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe pware sɨmunyaburɨ be a'mwei yawɨrangadelaka! Aawa. A'mwe dazare gannya kuryaina, sai gamɨnyɨ kusawɨ wɨlamwaaide sarei yawɨrangadelyɨ. Sabaaibɨ' Gotɨyare sɨmunyabwi yawɨrangadei a'mwe pwai mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyare gannya Kuryaina gave sahwaina yawɨrangadelyɨ.

Yɨ nemɨ Kwaaka davakɨya sɨmunya mamaaryo. Aawa. Gotɨyaryawɨdaa'nya sɨmunya Kuryarɨ maarolyɨra. Yɨ Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Sahwaraavɨna yange'na wɨjaave yuya gaimwanga sanna yawɨrangabɨka!” daka kaneya' Kurya sahwarɨ maarolyɨra.

Yɨ gaimwanga dazangɨ nemɨ yagaalya' wɨdadaanyɨ. A'mweraavɨre sɨmunyabwine yagaalya neyɨwɨryadɨvɨsangɨ wɨdadaanya mɨ'. Aawa. Kuryare sɨmunyabwine yagaalya neyɨwɨryadengɨ wɨdadaanyangɨra. Kurya Tewaanyai yagaalya nejaavadejɨ Kuryare nebulyanna wɨjɨwakadaanyaine.

A'mwe kwai, Kurya Tewaanyai maayai Gotɨyare Kuryare yagaalya maa'dei mɨ'. Sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Sai dara yawɨ'delyɨ “Daza'na yagaala sɨmumaayasɨra.” Yune Gotɨyare Kuryai negaimwada nayaa yawɨbwarama'daanya'na dazai Kurya Tewaanyai maayai dazavɨre aaya kaavɨlya' myawɨranganyɨ yannelyɨ. Myawɨranganyɨ yanne'na “Sɨmumaayasɨra,” sara yawɨ'dei.
Kɨrɨ', pɨrɨ' daresɨ. A'mwei Kurya Tewaanyai kɨnɨnnakei sai yuyangɨ nayaa yawɨbwarangadelyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. A'mwe aane pwai kwai Kurya Tewaanyai kɨnɨnnakerɨna yɨnɨga wi'na yawɨbwarangadei mɨ'.
Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨkɨ
“Naangere sɨmunya' aaihwai yawɨrangadelaka!
Yɨnɨga wi'na yawɨrayannei aaihwalaka!”
Nabaai sare kɨrɨvɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare sɨmunya' kɨnɨnnakeine.

Nya'mweihi, nabaai nɨmɨ a'mwe Kurya Tewaanyai kɨnɨnnakeraavɨ wɨdadɨnyabaaibɨ' mihɨzɨ yɨwɨneinyɨ. Aawa. Sɨmunya sɨnnawɨnya' kɨnɨnnakera kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsa maremwaalɨkeraavɨ wɨdadɨnyabaaibɨ' yɨhɨthɨweinyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihata bwaranyarabɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthɨweinyɨ.

Nya'ne aamunya yɨhɨzaaveinyɨ. Wapaaya dɨragɨnya mihɨzaayeinyɨ. Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Dazagaa' wapaaya dɨragɨnya tɨka pi'maanganya ye'. Yune sare'na mɨ'. Aawa. Dahaa' kɨgaasɨ sarɨmɨ kuna mi yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsajɨyaihi kuna mwaaiha'. Darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai gya'mwerɨna tɨganaarya sabulyɨ yɨ nabaai maimaangebulyɨ sasare sabwi kuna yɨhwarɨ'. Sareyaba kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsajɨyaihi midaaka! A'mweraavɨreburɨna kaanya yamaryadɨvɨsaihi midaaka!

Yɨhɨthɨwe sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨjɨya pwai dara dɨna “Nɨmɨ Polɨmɨreinyɨ.” Yɨ pwai dɨna “Nɨmɨ Aapolɨzareinyɨ.” Sana sana yɨvanɨga'. Yɨ sasare dazaburɨ sarɨmɨ Kwaaka davakɨyaihi kuna damwaaihava!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Aapolɨzai sai bewalaka! Polɨnyɨ sainyɨ bewainyaka! Naarɨmɨ sainaai yuna wɨdaayadasainaalyɨ. Naangei naarɨmɨnyɨ wawɨnya' sarɨ pɨrɨ'na pwainyɨ pɨrɨ'na nehɨzaavakabaaibɨ' wɨdaayadasainaai sara kyagoi naarɨmɨre yagolyavɨ sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagaresaihɨlyɨ.
Nɨmɨ tɨka wapaayavɨre wia burɨdeinyɨ. Aapolɨzai wia sangɨ aalya' wɨjaavakelyɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨ Gotɨyaina yadaasɨ arɨwɨnya bilyadengɨ.

Sarevɨ a'mwei tɨka wapaayavɨre wia burɨdei sai maalɨkelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwei aalya wɨjaavadei sai kwalyɨ maalɨkelyɨ. Naangeraai mɨ'. Aawa. Sai yadaasɨ arɨwɨnya bilyadei Gotɨyai sai gave sahwainanyai naangelyɨra.

Yɨ a'mwei wia burɨdelyɨ yɨ a'mwei aalya wɨjaavadelyɨ saraai kɨrɨmɨre wawɨnyavɨna yune avaainanyaraalyɨ. Saraarɨdaa'nyɨ pwai tɨvɨkɨta pɨrɨ'na pwai pɨrɨ'na saraare wawɨnya yadisawaarɨna maarikaderaalyɨ.
Sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Naarɨmɨ sainaai Gotɨyare avaaiwawɨnyainaalyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnyaihɨlyɨ. Sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Nabaai Gotɨyare anga mannɨkeihɨlyɨ. Sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmadɨthaakwadelyɨ.

Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna yanga gaimwangebwi nyɨjaavakevɨna anga majavɨne maremwaaide sɨdu'nakei yadevaaibɨ' nɨmɨ tɨvi'na lɨkɨleinyɨ. Sara lɨkɨlevɨ a'ba a'mwe pwara ye'mwannayɨlamadɨvɨsare. Sarevɨ nabaai sahwaraavɨ gazaizai mala nayaa yɨwannada nayaa ye'mwannayɨlamadana! Yagaala nawɨ'nya wɨjɨwaakana!
Sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Angevɨya lɨkɨlya nebulya'nanyai mena warɨ'. Sai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Nabaai lɨkɨlya pɨnɨ a'mwe aane pwai kwai yɨnɨga wi'na lɨkɨlannei mɨ'.

Yɨ nabaai a'mwe pwai lɨkɨlya dazarɨ “Ange' munyawɨ yɨlamadɨma!” dazai golɨyajɨ madathei dɨngaka? Sɨlɨvaayajɨ madathei dɨngaka? Sɨla nawɨ'nya mubya naanga yadɨvɨsajɨ madathei dɨngaka? Nabaai yɨsajɨ madathei dɨngaka? Yannyajɨ dɨngaka? Kwavɨsajɨ dɨngaka? Kaabinnyajɨ dɨngaka?

Yɨ a'mwera sara mabɨza' dɨvi gazarezare wawɨnya' ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathesɨ. Sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Kotɨya ya'negaa' yɨrɨkerɨ' yɨjɨwaainadesɨ. Yɨ dɨkevɨ wɨjalangasakade'nanyɨ. Dɨka daza' yawɨranganya'ne' a'mwe gazarezare wawɨnya' sara kanojɨ dara wɨjalangasakade' “O, ange' madakegaa' wawɨnya savɨne dɨragɨnya' sasare' daaka!”
A'mwe pwai kwai lɨkɨlya dazarɨ nayaa madazavɨ dɨka manyɨ kyojɨ yɨ gamɨre wawɨnya'na tɨvɨkɨta nawɨ'nya' maaradelyɨ.

A'mwe pwai gamɨre wawɨnyavɨ dɨka sa' kanasɨ'nojɨ yɨ sarei tɨvɨkɨta sa' mamaari yadelyɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' anga made gamɨ sarɨ Gotɨyai padaihasamaaradelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' angadɨkevɨ pwarɨ magiropalama'daanyabaaibɨ' dɨkevɨ kusawɨ Gotɨyai sarɨ padaihasamaaradelyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare anga tewaanyasɨra. Yɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨkeihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ daza'na myawɨrijɨwaa'!
A'mwe pwai kwai Gotɨyare anga tewaanya' kayaaka yɨgalajai yɨ a'mwe dazarɨ Gotɨyai kayaaka yɨgalakadelyɨ. Gotɨyare ange', sa' tewaanaange'nanyɨ. Gamɨresɨra. Daza' yɨ sarɨmɨ saihɨlyɨra.

Aka, a'mwe aane pwai kwai gamɨ sarɨne'na kwaasɨ madɨnanna! A'mwe pwai sarɨmɨnyɨ tɨnnyabanyai dahaasa saburɨ mɨdɨnajai yɨ gannya sɨmunyavɨ “Nɨmɨ sɨmunya naangebwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!” dozɨ sahwai gɨnyɨwanna yojɨ Kwaakevakɨyaburɨna sɨmumaayai yɨma'nana!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyaryaba Kwaaka davakɨya sɨmunya yawɨta sabwi yɨ sa' sɨduta maaya navɨ'navɨkebulyɨ. Daza'na Gotɨyare bukuya' Gotɨyarɨna dara dɨnɨkevɨnyɨ.
“A'mwe sɨduta yawɨ'nɨkeinera,” dadɨvɨsara kwaasɨya yadaapɨjɨ
Kwaasɨya sabwi yɨnahunyabulyɨ Gotɨyai kayaaka yɨgaladelyɨ.
Nabaai yagaala dare kɨrɨsɨ dɨnɨ'
“Naangei nayaa dara yawɨ'manɨ'
‘Sɨduta yawɨ'nɨkeraavɨre sɨmunya
Yɨ sa yaasɨwa'nanyangɨ.’”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe aane pwai kwai a'mweraavɨne yaya namakɨladɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuya yuya yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨnengɨ.

Yɨ Polɨnyɨ dɨngaka? Yɨ Aapolɨzai dɨngaka? Yɨ Pitai dɨngaka? Yɨ Kwaaka datha' dɨngaka? Yɨ gaalyabwi dɨngaka? Yɨ baryabwi dɨngaka? Yɨ dahaa' warɨke dɨngaka? Yɨ dɨvi yɨma'nade dɨngaka? Ai, yuya sa, yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨnengɨ.
Nabaai sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareihɨlyɨ. Sabaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai sai Gotɨyarelyɨ.

Sare'na nemɨnyɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yadaanyainaavɨna a'mwei dara yawɨrana! “Sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyare wɨdaayadɨvɨsare. Yɨ Gotɨyare yagaala kuku'nya, nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya maremwaaidɨvɨ' wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsare.”
Sarevɨ maremwaaide wawɨnyavɨ kɨwɨnya' kɨnɨnnake' dara warɨkesɨ. Gyakwai maremwaala dare pwai kwarɨ bɨ'delyɨ “Maremwaalyabwina nayaa pada'galalɨmwaga'dei daaka!”

Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨ sarɨmɨ kwaihi a'mwe pwara a'mweraavɨre kotɨya' maryawɨbwarya'neinyɨ yɨ nɨmɨ daza'na yawɨrɨdeinyɨ “Sa' maalɨtaayasɨra.” Nabaai nɨmɨ kwainyɨ nɨnnya sabwi maryawɨbwa'dɨ “Tewaanyasɨra,” dadɨnyainyɨ mɨ'.

Sare' aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Nɨmɨre wawɨnya'na yɨwetawakya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' myawɨ'nyainyɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ wi'na dara madɨwɨna! Nɨmɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraangeinyɨra. Nɨmɨnyɨna maryawɨbwarya'neinyɨ daaka! Aawa. Sabwi sa' wawɨnya yune Naangeresɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Naangei walaabathehaa'na sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mamaryawɨbwapɨna! Walaabathehaa' sahwai sawɨsavɨ lɨka kɨma'nyawɨ yulyarɨke yɨ baakebanna marakadengɨ. Yojɨ sahwai yuyaraavɨre sɨmunyabwi ku'maayabanna marima'naabathelyɨ. Yɨ dazagaa' sarɨkɨ Gotɨyarɨ gazaizai yakevɨne tɨvɨkɨta maaradelyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨna yagaala dazangɨ ke'ba'na dɨwengɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨjɨ Aapolɨzalyɨ sainaarɨna ke'ba'na dɨwa. Sarɨmɨ saihi naarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yɨ yagaala gavenna dɨnɨke mwavɨlapɨna! Nawɨ'nya yɨdasabwi dɨmɨdɨnyide'nanyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' pihadɨka nyɨpɨka! Wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsarajɨya yaya pwarɨne'na makina, pwarɨne yaya' walamarakɨna yadɨvɨsa'na pihadɨka jideihi dɨngaka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ a'mwe naangei aaihwai gwakakaigɨnaka! Gotɨyarɨ mamaaryagɨnya kɨnɨnnakeigɨre benɨngaka! Yɨ yuya sanna “Gotɨyai yanga nyɨjaavadeinyɨ daakajɨ,” yune gɨmɨnne yaya'na makimanɨgɨnya' be'na yɨvanɨgɨ! Gotɨyarɨ mamaaryadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' be'na yɨvanɨgɨ!

Dahaa' sarɨmɨre kuryaraavɨ yunebanna tɨvi'na mena yɨhiwakeihi daaka! Dahaa' Gotɨyare yuya kɨnɨnnakeihɨrɨ kwaala pɨnɨngɨna mena mihɨmudaasɨwakeihi daaka! Nemɨ Apozelɨyainajɨ maneye'mwannyadɨvɨ' kingɨyaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨna maremwaaimanɨgasaihi daaka! Aka! Nɨmɨ sahɨrɨ'na nyɨvu'nɨwa'. Sarɨmɨ kingɨyaibɨsaihi maremwaaibɨzɨ kwajɨ “Apozelɨyaina sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannamaremwalaana!” dona sara kamwalaadɨka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ dara yawɨ'manɨge. Gotɨyai nemɨ Apozelɨyainaavɨ maalɨkeinaavɨ nemwaaiha'. A'mwe pwaraavɨ kwaakewɨ nemwaaihakeine. Nemɨ dareinabɨsaine. A'mwera kotɨya' mena yadɨvɨ' yɨ nemɨ nayaa balaade'na nejɨdavesaine. Sarevɨ yɨ sahwara neramakɨpɨ'de'na avaangwaasavɨ yuyaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ ejelɨya kwaraavɨrerɨjɨ a'mwe kwaraavɨrerɨjɨ sara nemwaaihake'nanyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna wɨjɨwakadaanya'na “Sɨmumaayarera,” nedadɨvɨsaine. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna kunnakeinera,” dɨdɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Nemɨ waryaanyaina, yɨ sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnaangeihi. Sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya makidɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ nemɨnyɨne yaya mamakɨlyadɨvɨsaine.

Yune dathahaa'na nemɨ wawɨnya yɨvanɨgo'na mɨjɨka mwaaimanɨgo. Yadaa nemɨre kulalyangɨ wana yaalɨka neyɨhɨrasɨ'manɨ'. Nabaai nemɨnyɨ kwaabɨhannyanna negainɨvanɨ'. Asa gwaamwadɨvɨ' nemɨnyɨ yaasɨwa' maina neramamarivanɨgasaine. Yɨ sara neyadaapi nemɨ anga nayaa mwaalya'neba pɨba aawa.

Nemɨ saina pwaraavɨ nemɨre wapaayanna myɨdaanganyadaa yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya nebulya'na yune nennya asɨrajɨna yadaanyaine. A'mwera paasiyagaala nedangadaapɨjɨ yagaala nawɨ'nyanna ja'nawɨdadaanyaine. Sahwara nemɨnyɨ wana kayaa'na neyɨgaidaapɨri nemɨ kave nayaa tɨnnaina wanganna yadaanyaine.

A'mwera walapapalakya yagaala kayaa'nanya yɨnahunya sawɨnne saza nedadaapɨjɨ nemɨ yagaalya kave wɨdadaanyɨ. Kwaaka yuyawɨnna nemɨ wana yaaye tɨrita'nanya nebulya' yɨma'nadaanyaine. Yuyaraavɨre gɨrɨkita'nanyaina mwaaiho. Nemɨ Apozelɨyainaavɨre wawɨnya yadaanyavɨ sara kuna mwaaiho yɨmabaka nabaai dahaa'nanyɨra.
Yagaala daza sarɨmɨnyɨ wagɨla yɨhɨzaaya'ne' yɨda'mwe mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayaihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨvanɨke'na yɨ “Kumɨre sɨmunya nɨmɨ yawɨrarɨlaaya yɨma!” dena yɨda'mwengɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihasavɨ nebulya'na sɨrɨgihɨvaanga kwala naanga naangera kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaibɨzaihi kɨrɨ' sɨrɨnɨmaanga kwalaalyara maayaihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Gave pwalyɨ. Darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨzɨwaakevɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨsaihɨrɨne sɨrɨnɨmaangeinyɨ yɨma'neinyɨ gaveinyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara dɨhaa'bwata yɨhima! Sarɨmɨnyɨne ke'ba'nanyainyɨ nɨmɨre sabwina lɨmwadɨvɨ' jamarila!

Yɨ dazahɨrɨsavɨna sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Timotirɨ marayɨhyasaabɨwelyɨ. Sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne nɨmɨre kaimɨraayarɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadelyɨ. Naangerɨna lɨmwannɨkelyɨ. Sahwai nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaiheinyɨre tuta mɨdɨdɨnyangɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ ayahi maradɨhaa'bwata yɨhyathelyɨ. Anga yuyabanya yuya Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨya gazasavɨ nɨmɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨnyabaaibɨ' nɨmɨre sasare dazabwina yɨhɨthathelyɨ.
Sarɨmɨjɨya pwara “Nemɨnyawɨnna Polɨ mabi yaka maneyavada'galyɨ yadelyɨra,” yawɨ'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' pihadɨka yeva kunnya yaya munyaba makinyɨna yɨwaasare.

Kɨrɨ' Naangei sɨmunyavɨ sara yawɨraja' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna maalɨkegaa' bɨdeinyɨ. Bi'mava'mujɨ pihadɨka yadɨvɨsaraavɨre yagaala sannanɨku' yaamɨjɨ wɨ'nɨde' gave' mɨ'. Aawa. Kumɨre dɨragɨnya' yɨdakwasanganɨdeinyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai nemaremwaaidevɨ yune yagaala gave' kadɨka mu'nyadaanyɨ. Aawa. Dɨragɨnaange' yadengɨjɨ tɨnna wangadaanyaine.

Sarɨmɨ be yaawiabwina yɨhɨvu'nɨvanɨ'? Dare da'na dahayɨhɨvu'nɨwa'? “Yɨsarɨ' nemɨnyɨ yavada'gala neya'nerɨ' lɨmwagozɨ nemɨnyawɨnna bathe'nanyɨ.” Dara dahayawɨ'mwaa'? “Nemɨ saina kyavada'gainawaajɨ sahwai tɨnna nengada kale yada kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ nemɨnyawɨnna bathe'nanyɨ.”

Nɨmɨ nebwina dara wɨ'nɨwa. Koridɨ mwaalyara lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi warɨkesɨ. Yɨ nabaai gɨrɨkita'nanya sa' nabinyabulyɨ. Yɨ sasare sabwi ajɨmya yuyangɨyara mu'nyadɨvɨsara “Aala!” dadɨvɨ' yadɨvɨtabwi mɨ'. Sa' daresɨ. A'mwe pwai sarɨmɨjɨyai ganɨmaangere a'mwe' maarɨna.

Sarelyɨyaihi mwaalɨna yadɨvɨta kɨrɨ' “Nemɨrebwi tewaanya gavesɨra,” dadɨvɨ' pihadɨka yadɨvɨ' sarɨnnya yaya munyaba yaasɨwa'na makinadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sare' mipɨna! Aawa. Kayaa'nanya sabwi yagalya'ma'na yapi sarɨmɨ kɨnna dɨzɨla! Yɨ “Nemɨ sasare sabwi yade sarɨ nemɨnyawɨdaasɨ wɨdasaana!” dapɨjɨ kɨnna dɨzɨla!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ menyaba mwaaideri kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre sɨmunya'na sarɨmɨjɨ mwaaidɨnyainyɨ mena maryawɨbwa'mwesɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨnyaba mwaaihebaaibɨ' yɨ a'mwei sarei dazabwina “Sai kayaa'na wagɨla yadelyɨ,” dena tɨvi'na maryawɨbwa'mwesɨ.

Nɨmɨ tɨvi'na dara dɨwa. Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne dɨragɨnyavɨ a'mwe dazarɨ Saataanɨmɨna marɨmwangɨna jɨla! Yɨ sarɨmɨ yɨ'bwa'nawɨ'nadaapiyagaa' nɨmɨre kuryalyɨ nemɨre Naangei Jizaazare dɨragɨnyasɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaaladeihi

Saataanɨmɨre maremwaalyabanna a'mwe dazarɨ marɨmwangɨna jɨla! “Gamɨre yawɨsa' yavada'galakojɨ Naangere yɨrɨkerɨkɨ Gotɨyai a'mwe dazare kuryarɨ padaihasamaarana!” dapɨjɨ dɨmarɨmwangyɨla! Saataanɨ daanga wɨjaavadevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsangɨ kayaaka yɨgalade'na duthaasɨla!

Sarɨmɨ Koridɨ mwaalyaihi sarɨnnya yaya munyaba makinadɨvɨ' “Nemɨ yɨda'nanyainera,” dadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨra. Kɨrɨ' yaasɨwa'na sasara dadɨvɨsa' nawɨ'nyabwi mɨ'. A'mwe dadɨvɨta dare'na myawɨrijɨvanɨga'! “Yɨzɨya maalɨke' gɨrɨkula yuyavɨna lɨwɨnya mimwadesɨ.” Nabaai, sabaaibɨ' kayaa'nanya wanganakɨpɨja sarɨmɨnyɨ yunebanna nayɨhɨladawaradɨka!

Sarɨmɨ “Bɨretɨya gaala mudɨke'na yɨzɨya maaya'neina mwalaana!” dapɨjɨ yɨzɨya aya kɨgaasa nayaa dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla! Yɨ yɨzɨya maayaihi mwaaihatabaaibɨ' sara dɨmwaalyɨla! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨnyɨne Pari'ma'munnevɨre sipɨzipɨyai nemɨre kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'nya'nei balya'nerɨ tamiravetabaaibɨ' nemɨnyɨne'na mena balakevɨ mudɨkeihi dɨmwaalyɨla!
