Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ munnevɨ bɨretɨya yɨzɨya aya kɨgaasa maaya tɨka naana! Yɨ yɨzɨya sɨmɨlɨka wɨlya'nesɨ yɨzɨya wana kayaa'nanyasɨ tɨka manaanna! Aawa. Bɨretɨya mamimwannyɨke' nayaa naana! Yɨ daresɨ. Nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨda'nanyabwi yunebanna newarana! Nemɨ yagaala nebulya'nanyanna nayaa daana!
Pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhithave. Dara de. A'mwe a'mwengɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨsarajɨ nya'mwana madɨnyadɨvɨ' mye'mwannamwaaibɨnera!

Nɨmɨ yuyaraavɨ wana yune nebulya' yagalya'mata'na majɨvanɨge. Yɨ a'mwe yuya Kwaaka davakɨyara a'mwengɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨna dɨngaka? Tɨganaaryarajɨ kuka yɨpalamaa'dɨvɨsarajɨ saraavɨna dɨngaka? A'mwera kwaasɨya gotɨya yɨta, sɨla saraavɨrebwi mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨna dɨngaka? Yɨ sarɨmɨ “Sasare saraavɨ nebulya'na yagalya'mavaana!” dɨpɨja' yɨ sarɨmɨ Kwaakevakɨdaasɨ nayaa jahalya'mayideihi daaka! Yuya saraavɨna myɨhɨzɨvanɨge.

Nabaai kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ yagaalyavɨ aaya kaavɨlya' yɨhithave' yɨ sa' daresɨ. A'mwe pwai kwai sarɨmɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne neya'mwela!” dadɨvɨsarɨ jahalya'mayɨla! Yɨ sarɨna a'mwengɨ ata lɨmwadei dɨngaka? Sai tɨganaaryai dɨngaka? Sai kwaasɨya gotɨya yɨta, sɨla saraavɨrebwi mɨdɨdei dɨngaka? Sai bɨraiyagaala dadei dɨngaka? Sai nada yɨmaka widei dɨngaka? Sai gɨlyɨvɨta a'mwe pwaraavɨrengɨ mwagi'nadei dɨngaka? Yɨ sasarebura yajai salyɨ sarɨmɨ nya'mwana mye'mwannayɨpɨna! Tɨka wapaaya a'mwe sasarelyɨ mye'mwannanɨpɨna!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe mwasɨlaanyaraavɨ maryawɨbwarya'neinyɨ nɨmɨre wawɨnya' daaka! Sahwaraavɨ yune Gotɨyaina maryawɨbwaradere. Kusɨlaanyaraavɨ sarɨmɨ maryawɨbwa'dɨvɨsara midaaka! Yɨ sarɨmɨresɨ. Dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨ' jɨla! “Sarɨmɨ saihɨrɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi yaderɨ dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla!”

Sarɨmɨjɨya pwai kwai sarɨmɨjɨya pwarɨ wɨja'na yagaalya' kɨnɨnnakei Gotɨyare tewaanyara yawɨbwarya'neraavɨ pari'ma'dei dɨngaka! A'mwe Gotɨyarɨna yɨda'maraangera mamwaalyɨgasara mu'nyadɨvɨsaraayabanna kotɨya' yaawadelyɨ. Sai sasare sabwina wagɨla muvwa'nyadei dɨngaka!

“Gotɨyare tewaanyara a'mwe Kwaakevakɨya yuyaraavɨre sabwi maryawɨbwaranganya'neraavɨ sahwai wɨmwaaihaderera,” sarɨmɨ daza'na myawɨrijɨhivanɨga'! Nabaai dɨvi sarɨmɨ a'mwe yuya Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ maryawɨbwapɨja' dahaa' yagaala maalɨka sarɨmɨjɨyaremɨlɨ' dazasare samɨlɨ'na sarɨmɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maryawɨbwapɨneihi daaka!

Yɨ “Nemɨ lɨmwaga'daanyaina ejelɨyaraavɨre sabwi kɨbulyɨ maryawɨbwaraadeinera,” sarɨmɨ dazavɨ myawɨryɨvanɨgasaihi daa! Yɨ sarevɨ dahaasagaa' nemɨre mwaalya davurɨya yagaalyangɨna nemɨ wi'na nebulya'na maryawɨbwaraanneine.

Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ mwaalya davurɨya yagaalya' kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaibɨzaihi yagaala savɨ mwasɨlaanyara maryawɨbwarya'neraavɨ nadahɨlakɨpɨdɨka! Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaihi yawɨ'na “Sahwaraavɨre kuryara bainɨkera waryaanyarera.” Yɨ sahwaraavɨ sarɨmɨre kotɨya'na be'na wɨmwaaihɨvanɨgataraavaka!

Yagaala dɨwe daza' kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨja' sarɨmɨrebwina wagɨla yɨhɨvwa'naja' yɨ sa' tewaanyasɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ sɨrya'mwe saraarɨ yagaalyavɨ yɨnɨga maryawɨbwarannei aane pwai kwai midaaka! Sɨmunnakei sarɨmɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba mwaalɨkei pwai kwai midaaka!

Sarɨmɨ yɨda'nanyabwina mamɨdɨnyɨvanɨga'. Aawa. Neya'mwe pwai neya'mwe pwarɨ kotɨya maryadelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadɨvɨsara kotɨya maryawɨbwarya'neraayaba sara yadelyɨ. Tewaanyabwi daaka!

Sarɨmɨ saihi kotɨya marinadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sasare saburɨdaa'nyɨ Saataanɨ yune yɨhɨthathɨwamanɨkeihɨlyɨ. “Nemɨ kave baihana'na yadawaari kayaa'nanya' neya'mwe pwai kwai gamɨnna neyana!” majɨ baa'na yɨvanɨga'! “Baihana'na yadawaari nemɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa neya'mwei nemwagi'nana!” majɨ be'na yɨvanɨga'!

Sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mwerɨna yavada'galya'nebwi mabɨramaarivanɨga'. Aawa. Yune sarɨmɨ saihina kayaa'nanya' yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Pwaraavɨ kayaa'na yɨbwaakya' yadɨvɨ' gɨlyɨvɨsa wɨmwagi'nadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sasare sabwi sarɨmɨjɨya sɨrya'mweraavɨ dazahwaraavɨ yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ dathavɨna myawɨrijɨwaa'! “A'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsara Gotɨyare maremwaaide' sa' maapɨ'dera mɨ'.” Akai, sarɨmɨ yune sarɨnnya sɨmunyangɨna kwaasɨ nadakɨnɨpɨdɨka! Yɨ darebulyɨ. A'mwe yaasɨwa'na marɨdaakunadɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ a'mwe kwaasɨ gotɨya yɨta, sɨla saraavɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨre a'mwengɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ a'mwera kayaa'nanya wagɨla wɨvwa'nya'ne a'mwe pwarajɨ ye'mwannayadɨvɨsarajɨ

yɨ kukerajɨ yɨ tɨganaarya yadɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ biyaaya pɨnɨ nadɨvɨ' yɨmaka widɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ a'mwera a'mwe pwaraavɨ yagaaibɨraizɨka wɨdangadɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ kuka yɨpalamaa'dɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe sasare yuya dazara Gotɨyai maremwaaide' maapɨ'dera mɨ'.

Nabaai sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨjɨya pwara dazabwi sasara mwaalesaihɨlyɨ. Kuna kayaa'nanya sangɨ mamwaaipɨneihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yayavɨjɨ nemɨre Gotɨyare Kuryai kwarɨjɨ Gotɨyai aalya mena yɨhyada gamɨnne tewaanyaihɨrɨ mena yɨhɨmwaaihada gamɨnyɨne yɨda'maraangeihɨrɨ mena yɨhɨthahɨlakakeihɨlyɨ.

“Yuya yɨwɨja nɨmɨ ya'neinyɨ kɨmaakɨya madakɨnyɨkengɨ.” Kɨrɨ' nabaai nyɨmaremwaalojɨ yuya sa a'mweraavɨ wɨgaimwade mɨ'. “Yuya ya nɨmɨ ya'neinyɨ kɨmaakɨya madakɨnyɨkengɨreva.” Kɨrɨ' nabaai nɨmɨnyɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yɨwɨja' dɨvi wɨla nanyɨradɨka!

“Tɨka wapaaya sa yɨ munyɨkɨnengɨ. Yɨ munyɨ' wapaaya maarya'nikɨ.” Sare kɨrɨvɨ nabaai Gotɨyai wapaayasɨ nemɨre kɨlaakejɨsɨ yuyawaai yasɨ'nadelyɨ. Kɨlaaka sajɨ'na yɨhɨthɨma! Kɨlaakejɨ' yaasɨwa'na marɨdaakunyɨna ya'nejɨ' mɨ'. Aawa. Sajɨ' yune Naangerɨna wɨdaaya'nejɨkɨ. Yɨ Naangei sai kɨlaakejɨkɨna maremwaalya'nelyɨ.
Gotɨyai bainɨkeraayawɨdaa'nyɨ Naangerɨ yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai dɨragɨnya' yune gannyavɨna nemɨre kɨlaakejɨka baidezɨkaavɨjɨ avaala sasara neyɨdɨkaavadelyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ dara myawɨrijɨwaa'! “Sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨka yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨkɨya pimagɨnyajɨkera.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaaka pimagɨnya pɨjɨ' maara'mujɨ a'mwe kwalawa' ganaangevɨne kɨlaaka pimagɨnyajɨ' mɨwɨrɨdezɨ' daaka! Arɨkewɨnyɨ.

Aawa. Sarɨmɨ davɨna myawɨrijɨvanɨga'! “A'mwei a'mwe yaarɨdaa'ne sasɨ yɨraku'nemwaalojɨ yɨ sai a'mwe savɨjɨ avaaikɨlaaka yɨma'nadelyɨ.” Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai sare sa'na mena dara dakelyɨ “A'mwelyɨ a'mwesɨ sawaai kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'na yɨma'nyɨkadezɨkɨra.”
Nabaai a'mwe pwai Naangelyɨ yɨraku'nemwaalojɨyai yɨ sai kuryai gave pwainanyai yɨma'nyɨkadelyɨra.

Kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi sarɨmɨ yagalya'ma'na yapɨjɨ lɨkaanya dɨwila! Wagɨla yuya pɨnɨ a'mwera yɨpɨja, sa kɨlaakejɨkɨ mwasɨmagɨnyangɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe yaasɨwa'na marɨdaakunyɨna yadei yɨ sai gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨ kusawɨnyavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi wɨjaavɨnadelyɨ. Sare'na sabwi mipɨnera!
Sarɨmɨ da'na myawɨrijɨwaa'! “Sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' yɨ Kurya Tewaanyai wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨkere anga nawɨ'nyasɨ.” Gotɨyarɨneba Kurya sai kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ sahwaihi yune sarɨmɨnyɨneihi mɨ'.
Aawa. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai nɨgwia naangesɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ ayahi yɨhɨmubamaarakelyɨ. Sare'na sarɨnnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba nayaa dɨmakɨlyɨla!
Dahaa' pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ sarɨmɨ yɨda'mwa'daata a'mweraavɨre mwaalyabwina nɨmɨ dara ja'nayɨhɨthɨde'nanyɨ. A'mwei a'mwevɨ kwala mamaarya'ne' sa' yaasɨwa' mwaalyabwi tewaanyasɨra.

Sare kɨrɨvɨ dala pɨburana pɨburananya yaasɨwa'na marɨdaakunanyɨnyabura a'mweraavɨ kayaaka ya'nebura warɨke'na gazaizai gamɨ sarɨne gannya balaange' kɨnɨnnakeinanyai mwaalana! Yɨ nabaai a'mwe gazasa' gannya a'mwei kɨnɨnnake'nanya' mwaalana!
Gamɨre a'mwevɨ kwala maaryabwine tɨvɨkɨsa' kwalaangei nayaa wɨjaavana! Sasarebaaibɨ' gamɨre kwalaangerɨ tɨvɨkɨta sa' balaange' nayaa wɨjaavana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe' yune gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨna maremwaaidezɨ' mɨ'. Aawa. Kwalaangei maremwaalɨ'. Yɨ sasarebaaibɨ' kwalaangei gannya yune kɨlaakejɨkɨna mamaremwaalyɨ'. Aawa. Gamɨre a'mwe' maremwaalɨ'.

Kɨrɨmɨ sayoihi kwaiyagaala dadisabwi nawɨ'nyabulyɨ. A'mweigɨ gɨnnya a'mwevɨ “Aala!” madɨnna! A'mwe'gɨ gɨnnya a'mwerɨ “Aala!” madɨnna! Sara yɨkajavwi yɨ sa' kukebulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' pɨgaa'na pɨrɨ' yɨma'nadehaa' dɨngaka? Kɨrɨmɨ sawaaihi avaaizɨmunya'na yakɨlyɨ kɨbawegaa' kɨrɨnnya kɨlaakejɨ' yɨtaata jɨ'nakɨlyɨ “Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'negaa' yune mwaalaka!” dakɨlyɨ geva geva dɨmwaalyideyoihɨlyɨ. Sa' wikɨra. Nabaai sara yakɨlyɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ sayoihi kɨrɨnnya kɨlaakejɨ' ayahi jɨraku'nemwaalyideyoihɨlyɨ. Akai, sara mi yakɨlyɨ kɨrɨnnya kɨlaakejɨkɨ wi'na nayaa mamaremwaalyɨ yɨkaja' Saataanɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaala nayɨhyadɨka! Nabaai sarevɨ ata lɨmwangebwi nyɨkadɨka! Sare'na Gotɨyarɨ mi'na wɨdakɨlyɨ ayahi jɨraku'nemwaalyideyoihɨlyɨ.
Dɨwe sa' kɨwɨnya'bɨta' mɨ'. “Sara jɨla!” madakyɨvanɨge.

Kɨrɨ' “A'mwe yuyara nɨmɨ yadɨnyabaaibɨ' mwaaibɨ'de' tewaanyasɨ,” sɨmunya yawɨ'manɨge. Sara nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Sare kɨrɨvɨ Gotɨyai tewaanya sɨhumale dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya yanga wɨjaavakengɨ. A'mwe gazaizai Gotɨyarɨna gannya sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Pwarɨna a'mwe' kɨnɨnnakei mwaalya'nebwi wɨjaavakesɨ. Pwarɨna a'mwe' maayai mwaalya'nebwi wɨjaavakesɨ.
Kwala mamaaryarajɨ yɨ a'mwe yaanyɨwaakemɨlɨkajɨ sangɨ nɨmɨ dara dɨwa. Sangihi nɨmɨbɨ' kwala mamaaryaihi mwaaibɨza' yɨ sa' tewaanyasɨ.

Kɨrɨ' kunnya kɨlaakejɨsɨ sɨmunyasɨ nayaa mamaremwaalyɨpɨja' yɨ kwala maarɨna yɨpɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yaasɨwa' mwaalɨna yapɨjɨ kumɨre munyɨ' dɨka widathe' kayaa'nanyasɨ. Yɨ kwala maapɨja' sa' nawɨ'nyasɨ.
Kwala maaryarajɨ kwala maa'nyajɨ sangɨna nɨmɨ kɨwɨnya datha' wɨjaavɨma! Kɨwɨnya sa' nɨmɨre'na mɨ'. Aawa. Kɨwɨnya sa' Naangeresɨra. Sa' yɨ dare'na “A'mwe' gannya kwalaangerɨ myagalya'mavanna!”

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe sa' gannya a'mwerɨ mena yagalya'mavaja' yɨ daza' yaasɨwa' mwaalɨna yade' dɨngaka? Gannya a'mweryawɨnna ayɨna wawojɨ kwalaangelyɨ avaaimunyɨ'na ayɨna ye'mwannamwaalyɨkade' dɨngaka? Pɨbwi aawa. Nabaai kwalaanga kwalyɨ gannya balaangevɨ mudaasanna!

Nabaai kwaala pɨyuraavɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ dara dɨwa. Yagaala sa' Naangei wɨdaka' mɨ'. Nɨmɨresɨra. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne neya'mwe pwai kwai, yɨ gannya balaange' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyade' kɨnɨnnakei mwaalajai yɨ a'mwe sa' “A'mwe salyɨ kuna ye'mwannemwaalɨma!” daza' yɨ neya'mwe dazai a'mwe sa' malɨmwagya'na savɨ myagalya'mavanna!

Nabaai a'mwe pɨrɨ' gannya kwalaangei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadei kɨnɨnnake' mwaalaja' yɨ a'mwe sai “A'mwe sasɨ kuna ye'mwannemwaalɨma!” dazai yɨ neya'mwe daza' a'mwe sai malɨmwagya'na myagalya'mavanna!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwei Naangerɨ malɨmwagyada gannya balaangesɨ ye'mwannemwaalajarɨna balaanga sa' Gotɨyare tewaanya' mwaalake sasare savɨ kɨrɨmɨre mwaalyabwi tewaanyabwi yɨma'nake' Gotɨyai tɨnna wangadelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwe' Naangerɨ malɨmwagyada gannya kwalaangelyɨ ye'mwannemwaalajavɨna neya'mwe sai Gotɨyare tewaanyai mwaalake sasare savɨ kɨrɨmɨre mwaalyabwi sabwi tewaanyabwi yɨma'nake' Gotɨyai tɨnna wangadelyɨ. Sare' mi warajɨ kwajɨ yɨ sarɨmɨre kaimɨraaya gɨrɨkita'nanyara kamwaaibɨthɨ'. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' tewaanyara Gotɨyareraavɨ wɨmwaaihaderera.

Sare kɨrɨvɨ a'mwe pwai a'mwe kɨrɨ' Naangerɨ malɨmwagyada gannya a'mwe pɨrɨvɨ a'mwe kwarɨ yagalya'mavaja' yɨ sa' wikɨra. Yagalya'mavana! Sasarebwi yɨma'najavɨ neya'mwe pwai neya'mwe kɨrɨ' yaasɨwa'wawɨnya'bɨsavɨ mamwaalyɨ'. Aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' wɨla myɨryɨnɨkesɨ. Kwaamu'nanyaburɨ mwaalya'neihɨrɨ Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakevɨnyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarere balaange'gɨ, nebulya'na gara yawɨ'manɨgɨ! “Nɨnnya kwalaangerɨ yɨnɨga padaihasamaarɨde'nyɨ dɨngaka?” Sa' myawɨrivanɨgɨ. Nabaai kwalaangeigɨ, nebulya'na gara yawɨ'manɨgɨ! “Nɨnnya balaangevɨ yɨnɨga padaihasamaarɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka?” Sa' myawɨrivanɨgɨ. Sare'na madahalalɨmwadɨnna!

Sare' kɨrɨ' Naangei gazarɨzarɨ yanga mudakabaaibɨ' yɨ sahwai sara mwaaidɨ'nyɨyavɨ Gotɨyai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakegaa' mwaalakeburɨ yɨ sai yune sahɨrɨsavɨna kuna yamaryana! Yuya Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyaraavɨ nɨmɨ kɨwɨnya sara wakadɨnyainyɨ.

Dara dɨwa. A'mwe pwai kwai kɨlaakejɨ' gurya davesarɨna Gotɨyai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakei dɨngaka? Sahwai gannya kɨlaakejɨ' ayahi mamariwɨbwa'nanna! A'mwe pwai kɨlaaka gurya mada'nyɨnɨkerɨ Gotɨyai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakei dɨngaka? Sahwai gurya da'nɨkei mima'nanna!
Kɨlaaka gurya daya sabwi, yɨ sabwi gevulyɨ. Yɨ kɨlaaka gurya madaya sabwi, yɨ sabwi kɨbulyɨ gevulyɨ. Aawa. Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yagaala wakake mɨdɨnyabwi yɨ sa' naangaangebulyɨ.
A'mwe gazaizai wawɨnya pɨrɨvɨ mwaaiderɨ yɨ Gotɨyai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakegaa' sai sahɨrɨvɨ yɨnahu nayaa mwalɨbainyɨna yana!

Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨnyaigɨ mwaaida'gɨzɨ Gotɨyai jaka gɨzɨvwaramaarakeigɨ daaka? Dazavɨna gɨmɨ sɨmunya' taanga maginanna! Aawa. Kɨrɨ' yaasɨwa'wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨnya' yagalya'maya'ne' tusa' kɨnɨnnakeigɨ yɨma'nɨja' yɨ tuta dazavɨ mɨdɨnna jɨ!

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. A'mwei yaasɨwa'wawɨnya wɨdaayaderɨ Naangei jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakei yɨ dahaa' Naangere tewaanya mwaaidelyɨ. Yɨ Naangerɨ tɨnnyarɨ sai kayaa'nanyabwine yaasɨwa'wawɨnya ayahi wɨdaayadei mɨ'. Sasarebaaibɨ' a'mwei tewaanya mwaalɨna, yaasɨwa'wawɨnya mudayadaawori Naangei jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakei yɨ dahaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnya wɨdaayadelyɨ.
Gotɨyai nɨgwia naangesɨ ayahi mena yɨhɨmubamaarakeihɨlyɨ. A'mweraavɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨtaihi mima'nɨpɨna!
Nya'mweihi, gazaizai wawɨnya pɨrɨvɨ mwaaiderɨ jaka wɨjɨvwaramaarakei yɨ sai wawɨnya' yune sahɨrɨvɨna Gotɨyalyɨ mwaalana!

Nabaai sɨdɨraaya kwala mamaa'nyangɨne' nyɨda'mwa'daasa'na dɨma! Nɨmɨ Naangere kɨwɨnya sarevɨne' kuneinyɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨna yawɨbwarɨde'nanyɨ. Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ kale tewaanya nyada yɨ nɨmɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na nyada nebulyabwi lɨmwaga'dɨnyainyɨre yagaala nyu'nɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara yawɨ'mwa. Dahaa' dathahaasagaa' taanginya warɨkevɨ kwala mamaarya sare sabwi tewaanyabulyɨra. Yɨ dahaa' sarɨmɨ mwaaihatabaaibɨ' kuna dɨmwaalyɨla!
Yɨ gɨmɨ a'mwe' kwala tɨvi'na maaragɨnyaigɨ a'mwevɨ yagalya'maya'ne'na tusa'na bɨrɨbɨrya minna! Yɨ gɨmɨ kwala mamaaryaigɨ a'mwe' kwala maarya'na myawɨ'dɨnna!

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ a'mwe' kwala maa'dɨza' sa' kayaa'nanyabwi jɨtheigɨ mɨ'. Nabaai sɨdɨraaya' kwala maa'naja' sa' kayaa'nanyabwi yade' mɨ'. Sare kɨrɨvɨ “A'mwe kwala maa'napɨjɨ yɨ sahɨyuraavɨ Kwaaka davakɨ taanginya nyɨma'nadɨka!” dena sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhivainya'neinyɨ dɨwa.

Nya'mweihi, sarevɨna nɨmɨ dara dɨwa. Yɨrɨkerɨ' yɨma'nadehaa' maalɨkegaa' yesɨma'nɨkegaakɨ. Yɨrɨka dathahaa' kuna warɨ'. A'mwe pwara a'mwe kɨnɨnnakera kumɨ a'mwe maayarabɨ' Gotɨyarɨna sɨmunyavɨ yuneba nayaa yɨpɨka!

Nabaai a'mwe kɨnna dɨvanɨgasara kɨnna majɨvanɨgasarabɨ' Gotɨyarɨna nayaa wɨdaayɨpɨka! Nabaai a'mwe yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasara yɨlaaya myɨvanɨgasarabɨ' Gotɨyarɨ nayaa wɨdaayɨpɨka! Nabaai a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨta mubamaa'manɨgasara kumɨ gɨlyɨvɨta maayarabɨ' Gotɨyarɨna nayaa mwaaibɨka!

Yɨ a'mwe sahwara Kwaakevakɨneburana yadɨvɨsara yuya sahɨnɨngɨ yune'na mamarayɨpɨna! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kwaaka dathavakɨne yuya warɨke daza yɨwɨvanɨkengɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yawɨta kwalaalya yawɨ'dɨvɨsaihi mamwaaibɨna!

Nɨmɨre sɨmunya sarɨmɨnyɨne yɨ darengɨra. Yuyangɨna sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨryadɨvɨsaihi dɨmwaalyɨla! A'mwe kwala mamaaryai sai Naangere sabwina sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'delyɨ. “Naangerɨ wɨvu'nɨvanɨka sabwi yɨma!” dadelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' a'mwe kwala tɨvɨ maarakei sai Kwaaka davakɨne saburana sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'delyɨ. Yɨ “Nɨmɨre a'mwevɨjɨ wɨvu'nɨvanɨka sabwi yɨma!” dadelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre sɨmunyabwi mɨlɨkita yadewaalyɨ. Yɨ Naangerɨnajɨ gamɨre a'mwevɨnajɨ yuyawaarɨna yawɨ'delyɨ. Nabaai a'mwe' kwala mamaa'nyasɨ sɨdɨraayasɨ Naangere sabwina sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'disawaalyɨ. “Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨjɨ nɨmɨre kurya kwarɨjɨ tewaanya' Gotɨyare' yuna mwaalya'ne' sara yɨma'nana!” dadi' sara yawɨ'disawaalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe kwala tɨvɨ maa'nɨke' sa' Kwaaka davakɨne saburana sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'desɨ. Yɨ “Nɨmɨre kwalaangerɨjɨ wɨvu'nɨvanɨka sabwi yɨma!” dadesɨ.

Nɨmɨ yagaala dɨvanɨge datha' yɨ sarɨmɨ tewaanya mwaalya'nevɨ yɨhɨgaimwagya'nesɨ. “Kwala maaryabwina sarɨmɨnyɨ nyɨgidɨravemwaaimudɨka!” dena yɨhɨthɨwa. Aawa. Sarɨmɨ nayaa yɨda'na mwaalya'nesɨ. Yadɨvɨ' yuyagaa' Naangerɨ duthaayide'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ pɨnɨjɨ pɨburajɨ yaasɨwa' mwagi'namarya yɨhyadeihi mɨ'.

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwai gamɨre sɨdɨraayavɨna dara yawɨraja' “Nɨmɨ kwainyɨne sɨdɨraaya' dahɨlakɨnɨkevɨ yɨda'nanyabwi mivanɨgeinyɨ. Yaasɨwa'na mwaaiheinyɨ,” nabaai sahwai yune mɨgɨnya naangei mena yɨma'naja' yɨ tusa' gamɨnyɨne pɨrɨ' minyadori gamɨ sara wanganaja' yɨ sai gannya sɨmunyaburɨ mɨdɨnana! Sarevɨ gamɨnyɨ kayaa'nanyabwi mɨ'. Kwala maa'nyɨna yɨka!

Kɨrɨ' a'mwei gannya sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'da sahwarɨ “Yarala! Sara ja!” wɨja'ne mwari yada gannya sɨmunyaburɨ gamɨ sai yɨnɨga wi'na maremwaalannei mwaaida yɨ sai gannya sɨmunyavɨ tɨvi'na dara yawɨramihakada “A'mwazɨdɨraaya nɨmɨnne dahɨlakɨnɨka sa' yaasɨwa' saba kuna mwaalana!” yɨ sa' tewaanyasɨra.
Sarevɨ a'mwei gannya a'mwazɨdɨraaya' maaraja' yɨ sai tewaanyabwi yadelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwei kwala mamaaryajai yɨ taanginanyagaa'na sai tewaanaangebwi yadelyɨra.

A'mwe kɨrɨvɨre kwalaangei gaala kuna mwaaidori yɨ sagaa' a'mwe sa' gannya a'mwelyɨ yɨraku'nemwaaidesɨ. Kɨrɨ' gannya kwalaangei se kabalojɨ a'mwe' ayahi pɨrɨ' yɨraku'nemwaalanne' mɨ'. Sa' “A'mwe pwarɨ kwala maa'nɨma!” dozɨ yɨ sa' kwala maa'nyɨna yade'na mwaaladesɨ. Nabaai sare kɨrɨ' mwasɨlaanyarɨ mamaa'nanna! Naangerɨnerɨ kwala maa'nana!

Kɨrɨ' sabwina nɨmɨ sainyɨ dara yawɨ'manɨge. Taanginya neyɨvanɨke'na sa' yaasɨwa' kuna mwaalɨna yaja' yɨ gamɨ yɨlaaya naanga yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨke' mwaaladesɨ. Nɨmɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ Kurya Tewaanyai wɨlanyɨmwaalɨkeinyɨ dɨwa.

Kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨna mubɨthɨka tamira'dɨvɨta mɨwɨta pimagɨnyangɨna, nyɨda'mwa'daasangɨna, ja'nawɨdɨma! “Nemɨ yuyaina sɨmunya' kɨnɨnnakeinera,” yawɨ'daanyɨreva. Yɨ sɨmunyabwina pihadɨkebwi yada yaya munyaba makinyaburɨ neyɨdɨkaa'desɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai kale neyabwina kuryaraavɨ yɨvaimwadesɨ.

A'mwe pwai kwai gannya yaya' munyaba makinada dara yawɨrajai “Yɨ pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sɨmunya mena yawɨ'nɨkeinyɨra,” yɨ a'mwe sare sɨmunya yawɨsa nayaa yawɨrya'nei Gotɨyai sara dakadevaaibɨ'na myawɨryadelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwai kwai Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'najai yɨ sarɨna Gotɨyai dara yawɨ'nɨkelyɨ “A'mwe sai wavɨla'dei nɨmɨrelyɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sasare mɨwɨta tɨka nya'ne sabwina yɨ kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨna tamira'dɨvɨta mɨwɨta pimagɨnya tɨka nyabwina nɨmɨ dɨma! Nemɨ dara yawɨ'daanyɨ. Kwaakevakɨ kwaasɨgotɨya aane pwai kwai mamwaalyɨ'. Sa' yaasɨwa' saba sana yavɨkaridaakwia yaasɨwa'nanyangɨ. Sarevɨ yɨ gotɨya kwalaalyara mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai gave pwainanyaina mwaalɨ'. Pwara mɨ'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨgunya pɨrɨvɨ Kwaaka kɨvakɨ kwalaalyanna Gotɨyarɨ mu'nyadɨvɨsara “Yɨ sahwara gotɨyarera,” dadɨvɨsa mwaaidɨvɨsangɨra. Yɨ gotɨya kwalaalyarajɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta kwalaalyarajɨ mwaaihata

kɨrɨ' nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareina dara yawɨ'daanyɨ. Nemɨnyɨne Nɨmwai Gotɨya yune gave pwainanyai mwaalɨ'. Sahwai yuyangɨna aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Yɨ nemɨ gamɨnyɨneina mwaaiho. Nabaai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Naanga yune gave pwainanyai mwaalɨ'. Sahwai yuyangɨ wakyaakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai nevadaihasamaarakeinera. Yɨ sahwarɨ nemɨ gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakeinera.

Kɨrɨ' nabaai a'mwe yuyara pwaraavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨne sɨmunya daza' muwarikesɨ. Pwara kɨgaa' mwalyaasaburɨna sɨnnawɨnya kwaasɨgotɨyareburɨ mɨdɨnɨbainesare. Sarevɨ sahwara kuna yawɨ'dɨvɨsare “Mɨwɨta da' kwaasɨgotɨyarɨne yɨdɨka yɨvanɨgasa' nebulya'nanyasɨra.” Sara dadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' mɨwɨta sa tɨka nyɨna yɨvanɨgasare. Kumɨre sɨmunya waryaanya' yune nayaa myawɨryada sara nadɨvɨ' sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kumɨre sɨmunyai dada “Kwaasɨgotɨyarɨne mɨwɨsa' gɨmɨre yɨwetawakya sanna yɨwaa,” kumɨre sɨmunyai gɨrɨkebwi maa'manɨkerera.

Kɨrɨ' tɨka wapaaya nya'neina nemɨnyɨ Gotɨyarɨna gidɨkusaba nemakwode mɨ'. Tɨka wapaaya sa nemɨ nya'na Gotɨyai sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dei mɨ'. Nabaai nemɨ tɨka manyaaja' yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ kayaa'na mwalaadeina mɨ'. Yɨ nemɨ tɨka naaja' yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ nawɨ'nya mwalaadeina mɨ'.

Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Akai, sasare sabwi sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' waryaanyaraavɨ nyadɨ'de'na sa' a'mweraavɨre sɨvɨlyangɨ wɨrinadaasɨ dɨragɨnya mi yadɨvɨ' yɨ sahwara wagɨlyavɨna walaraawɨna nyɨpɨdɨka! Sare'na mala nayaa jɨwannyi!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mweigɨ sɨmunya' kɨnɨnnakeigɨ, yɨ gɨmɨ kwaasɨgotɨyarɨna yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidɨvɨsabanna mwalaawɨja' mɨwɨta nadaa'gɨzɨ yɨ a'mwe pwai kwai gamɨre sɨmunyai waryaanyalyɨyai sai gɨmɨnyɨ gwanganaja' yɨ sare sa' kwaasɨgotɨyarɨne tɨka sa nɨja savɨ gamɨre sɨmunyarɨ yɨdɨkaata jɨthei daaka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarei pɨbwi yawɨ'dei kɨrɨ' tɨka naja'na yɨ gɨmɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnya sa' a'mwe sarɨ, dɨragɨnya maayarɨ kayaaka jɨhaidelyɨ. Yɨ sai neya'mwe dazarɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai mena balakelyɨ. Yɨ dazahwarɨ padaihasamaarya'nei mena balakelyɨ.
Neya'mweraavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi dazara yapɨjɨ yɨ kumɨre sɨmunya waryaanyai yaderɨ jɨnga tamajɨrakapɨjɨ yɨ sasare saburɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ kayaa'nanyabwi sara jidelyɨ.

Sasare'na tɨka wapaaya nya'nebwi nɨmɨnyɨ nya'mwerɨ wagɨlyavɨ walamarakaja' yuyagaa' aaya yɨwawajahaa'na mɨwɨta sa tɨka manɨwɨna! Arɨkewɨ. Akai, nɨmɨnyɨ nya'mwerɨ mi yɨwɨja' sai wagɨlyavɨ nalaraawadɨka!

Sareinyɨ Polɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' wɨla nyɨpwɨyadeinyɨ daaka! Nɨmɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ midaaka! Jizaazarɨ nemɨre Naangerɨ tɨnna mena wanganeneinyɨ midaaka! Naangerɨ, nɨmɨ wawɨnya yevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ sarɨmɨ gamɨreihi midaaka! Sare'na a'mwera nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨde' madahalanyɨlɨmwabɨneinyɨ.

A'mwe pwara nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨkɨ “Sai Apozelɨyai mɨka!” Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ dɨwa “Gesɨra.” Aawa. Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨ Apozelɨyainyɨna tɨvi'na nyawɨramaa'dɨvɨkɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihasa' yɨ sa' dɨragɨnna dara wɨjɨwaainyasɨ. Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨne' Apozelɨyaraavɨre yavɨkwajɨkesɨyaihɨlyɨra. Yɨ “Naangei nyɨdasaawadeinyɨ,” nebulya'nanyaihɨlyɨ.
A'mwe pwara nɨmɨre wawɨnya'na kotɨya maanga dɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ nɨmɨ kumɨre yagaalyangɨna ja'nawɨdadɨnya' daresɨra.
Nemɨ Apozelɨyaina nemɨnyɨne wawɨnya'na a'mwera nerɨvɨkɨrya'neraavɨ wapaayajɨ aalyajɨ maraannenna yɨdaanganya'ne dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeina midaaka!
Apozelɨya pwarajɨ Naangere gahwaalaangerajɨ Pitalyɨ sara kumɨre balaange neya'mwe Kɨraazɨtɨyarejɨ ye'mwannayamarivanɨgatabaaibɨ' dɨnegaimwagyide'na nemɨ sara yaanne' dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeina midaaka!
Nɨmɨ gaveinyɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ sainaai asasɨ wawɨnya' yagalya'mavakwoihɨjɨ sarɨmɨre nɨgwia maarakane' dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeinaai midaaka!

Aamiyavɨ mwaaidehaa' aawɨlasai gannya nɨgwiajɨ gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ bɨramaa'de bewalaka! Pwai wapewawɨnya burɨda gannya tɨka wapaaya pimagɨnya mamaranyade be a'mwelaka! Pwai bulɨmakaawoyangɨ maremwaaida gannya maremwaaidengɨre aamunya pimagɨnya manyade be a'mwelaka! Sabaaibɨ' nɨmɨre wawɨnya'na maa'mujavwi nawɨ'nyabulyɨ.
Sarengɨna nɨmɨ a'mweraavɨreburaavɨna mɨdɨdɨ dahathɨvanɨgena. Yɨ nabaai Kɨwɨnya kɨrɨ' sara madɨnyɨke' dɨngaka!

Yɨ sare' darevɨnyɨ. Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnyavɨ dara yɨda'nɨkesɨ. Bulɨmakaawoyara witɨzɨla bwalaraawɨna ya'nera witɨyangɨ sɨvɨla lɨlɨvɨvainada'daapi tɨka manya'neraavɨ maangevɨ wɨla mavwɨyɨnnera! Sare' jaakegaa' sɨmunya' yune bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨna yawɨryaakei daa'!

Aawa. Yɨ nemɨ kwainaavɨnajɨ yune dɨragɨnna dakakei daaka! Yo, nemɨnyɨne'nanyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Pɨkarya sa' dɨnɨke' nemɨ dara yawɨranganya'nanyɨ. A'mwei wawɨnyavɨ lɨkɨlɨkya yadaaworiyalyɨ yɨ a'mwei tɨka wapaaya mya mena yɨnnɨke maarojɨyalyɨ saraai dara yawɨrikaja' “Nɨnnya wapaaya pimagɨnya nɨmɨnyɨne maarya'neinyɨ wawɨnya yɨma!”

Nemɨnyɨne' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ Kuryarenna yɨhɨburɨdovaaibɨ' kuryaraavɨya tewaanyanna yɨhɨmakabyo. Sarevɨ tɨvɨkɨsa'na sarɨmɨ nemɨnyɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya negaimwagya'neihi mari'bwarakaajavaaibɨ' gɨlyɨvɨsa nejaavɨpɨne' naange' daaka!
A'mwe pwara gɨlyɨvɨsanna sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhyɨdaangadɨvɨta dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakera mwaaihasa'na nemɨ sareina sɨnnawɨ yɨhyoina naanga yɨnɨga maraanneina daaka!

Sare kɨrɨ' gɨlyɨvɨta daza nemɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maraannengɨ sare nemɨ mamaaryagongɨ. Aawa. Nemɨ dara do. Nemɨnyɨna pwai kwai nyawɨradɨka! “Polɨmɨva nɨgwia mwagi'namaarya'nera Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaala tewaanya' nyɨdadɨvɨsarera.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala sa'na “Aala!” dɨma! “Yɨ yawɨta savɨ tusa' kaanya tihɨraana!” dona negainadennajɨ taanginya pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyannajɨ dɨragɨnna daako.

Ayɨna yɨhɨthɨma! A'mwera Gotɨyare Angevɨ wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara Gotɨyare Angevɨya wapaaya maa'dɨvɨsare. Kwaraanyaba Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsavɨre wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara savɨya mɨwɨta pimagɨnya maranadɨvɨsare. Yɨ sarɨmɨ dazavɨna myawɨrijɨvanɨga'!
Sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ, nabaai Naangei kɨwɨnya da' wakakesɨ. A'mwera yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsarajɨ yagaala sa' maa'manɨgasaraavɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kɨlaakejɨkɨ gaimwagya'ne maapɨka!

Sare kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' marayadɨnyainyɨ mɨ'. Sarɨmɨnyɨ myɨhidaanganye. Yɨ nabaai “Dahaakɨgaasɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ pɨnɨ sara maarɨma!” dena yagaala daza pɨkarya midayɨwa. Aawa. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ mamaarya'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgeinyɨ. “A'mwe pwai nɨmɨre yɨlaaya yadɨnyavɨre aaya kaavɨlya' namarasɨ'nadɨka!” dadɨ mɨjɨke'na mena balɨde' yɨ sa' nawɨ'nyasɨ. Kɨrɨ' yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaake'na tɨvɨkɨta maa'mujɨ kwajɨ sa' nɨmɨre yaya munyaba makinyabwi kayaaka kigaladɨke' yɨ sa' kayaa'nanyasɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakadɨnya'na nɨmɨre yaya' munyaba makimujavɨre aaya kaavɨlya' mwari'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sa' mujɨwaakya'ne' tusa' pɨrɨ' minyɨ'. Aawa. Naangei wawɨnya sa' nyakakeinyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. We'! Yagaala tewaanya' mujɨwaakiwɨja' kale nyadeinyɨ. Yɨ sara myɨwɨja' wana kayaa'na mwaalɨdeinyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨdaasɨ wawɨnya daza' yɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ yɨ nɨmɨ tɨvɨkɨta maarya'neinyɨ kyɨdaangamudɨka! Kɨrɨ' wawɨnya daza' nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨdaasɨ mivanɨgeinyɨ. Wawɨnya sa' ya'neinyɨ Naangei kanyɨdahɨlaka' sara yɨvanɨgeinyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨre tɨvɨkɨta berɨvaka! Nɨmɨre sɨmunya' “Gɨmɨ yadɨnya' tewaanyasɨ,” dɨvanɨke tɨvɨkɨta daresɨ. Yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakadɨnyavɨne gɨlyɨvɨsa yɨnɨga wi'na maa'muneinyɨ yɨ sa mamaari yadɨnyainyɨ. Yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakadɨnyavɨre dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ kɨrɨ' sare' “Aala!” dena “A'mweraavɨ yagaala sa' yanga wɨjaavɨdeinyɨ,” dena sara yɨwa. Yɨ sara yadɨnyavɨne yawɨta daza' nɨmɨre kuryarɨne tɨvɨkɨsasɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ tewaanya mwaaiheinyɨ. A'mwe aane pwai kwareinyɨ mɨ'. Sareinyɨ kɨrɨ' yuyaraavɨne yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ sara wakɨneinyɨ. “Yɨ a'mwe Gotɨyarɨne kwalaalyaraavɨ naanga mɨjama'muma!” dadɨ sara yadɨnyainyɨ.

Sarevɨ yɨ “Juyaraavɨ maarɨma!” dadɨ Juyaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ kumɨrebwina Juyainyɨbɨ' mwaale. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnyavɨ kwaakewɨ mula'narige kɨrɨ' “Kɨwɨnyavɨ kwaakevɨ mwaaihasaraavɨ maarɨma?” dadɨ sahwaraayaba Kɨwɨnyavɨ kwaakewɨ wɨlamwaaiheinyɨbɨ' yɨma'nɨweinyɨ.

Sabaaibɨ' nɨmɨ Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya' maayainyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨwɨnyavɨ kwaakewɨ wɨla'na'dɨnyainyɨ. Sareinyɨ kɨrɨ' a'mwe Kɨwɨnya' maayaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ mwaaidɨ “A'mwe Kɨwɨnya' maayaraavɨ maarɨma!” dena nɨmɨ sainyɨ a'mwe Kɨwɨnya' maayainyɨbɨ' yɨma'neinyɨ.

“Nabaai a'mwe dɨragɨnya maayaraavɨ maarɨma!” dena sahwaraayaba nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya maayainyɨ yɨma'nɨweinyɨ. Nɨmɨ a'mwe yuyaraayaba sahwaraavɨrebura yadɨ “Pwaraavɨ padaihasamaarɨma!” dena tutaanya yuyangɨ yaamɨjɨ yadɨnyainyɨ.
“Yagaala tewaanyavɨya nawɨ'nyaburaavɨ a'mwe pwarajɨ ye'mwannamaarɨma!” dadɨ yagaala tewaanya savɨna yuya daza yadɨnyainyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ davɨna myawɨrijɨvanɨga'! Gavamarasɨ'nyɨkaanyabanna a'mwe yuyara sara kaanyave'na wodɨvɨta kɨrɨ' gave pwaina wavɨla'nɨkere' maa'delyɨ. Kaanyave'na wodei kaanyave'na nayaa dɨragɨnna wodevaaibɨ' “Gotɨyarɨ wavɨla'nɨkere tewaanya' maraana!” dapɨjɨ kaanyave'na dɨwila!

Yɨ a'mwe gazaizai gavamarasɨ'nyɨkaanyangɨna “Wavɨlavɨma!” dada kɨlaaka dɨragɨnyajɨ' yɨma'nya'nei yuya kɨlaakejɨkɨya sabwi walamarakadelyɨ. A'mwe dazai tɨvɨkɨta kayaaka yɨgainade'na “Maarɨma!” dada sasara yadelyɨ. Nabaai kɨrɨ' nemɨ tewaanaange' kayaaka minyade' maarya'neina kwaasɨ kwaasɨ yaadeina daaka!
Sarevɨna nɨmɨ sainyɨ yaasɨwa' maranganamarya myadɨ kaanyave'na wodɨnyainyɨra. Gavamarasɨ'nyɨramyavɨ asa gwaamwada asa yɨhusavɨ yaasɨwa' malɨvaramamaryadevaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna yadɨnyainyɨ.

Sara yaasɨwa'na myadɨnyainyɨ. Aawa. Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' nayaa dɨragɨnna ya'nejɨsɨ malya' nebulya'na tadɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' nɨmɨre kuryare yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yadei yɨma'nya'nejɨkɨ dɨragɨnna walamarakadɨnyainyɨ. Akai, a'mwe pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyareihi yunebanna dɨragɨnna lɨmwagarapɨjɨ wavɨla'nɨkere tewaanya' Gotɨyare' dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ,” wɨjɨwaakadɨnya kɨrɨ' kanyawɨranganojɨ mamaari nyɨwɨdɨ'de'na nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' dɨragɨnna walamarakadɨnyainyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nya'mweihi, yagaala dangɨ sarɨmɨ navɨka ya'na nɨmɨ sɨmunyavɨ “Aala!” dɨwa. Yuya nemɨre aataravaavɨ Ne Mozɨzai Kwaaka Yɨzɨpɨdaasɨ makabadaa'nyɨ sahwara yɨraaya' maremwaalakevɨ kwaakewɨ wɨla'dɨvɨ' kaanya yamaryesare. Yadɨvɨ' yuyara yune sɨvɨlyajɨna saalaalyavɨ tewaanna wɨlaawesare.
Sara yadɨvɨ' yuyara sahwara bavɨtaazɨya' maaresare. Yɨraaya savɨjɨ saalaalya savɨjɨ sawaarɨ yɨ bavɨtaazɨya daza' Mozɨzalyɨ ye'mwannamwaalya'ne' wakɨnɨkesɨ.
Yɨ yuyara sahwara wapaaya Gotɨyare Kuryai wɨjavadaasɨya nesare.

Yɨ yuyara sahwara aalya Gotɨyare Kuryai wɨjavadaasɨya nesare. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sahwara Kuryare aalya' sɨlaangerɨ nyɨna. Sɨlaanga sahwarɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai wɨjavadaasɨya sɨlaanga sai kumɨnyɨ mɨdɨnna yada yɨ sai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨra.
Gotɨyai nawɨ'nya yada sare kɨrɨ' kumɨrebwina sahwai kumɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ kwala naangevaakɨ yɨlaaya mwigalya'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kwaaka a'mwera maayavɨ saba gazabazaba balesare.
Yɨ yuya daza nemɨnyɨne ke'ba'nanya yɨma'nakengɨ. Kumɨnyɨ kayaa'nanyabwina sara wɨvu'nakabaaibɨ' nemɨnyɨ kayaa'nanyabwina nevu'nadeina kyɨma'naadɨkevɨ ke'ba'nanya yɨma'nakengɨ.

Sahwaraavɨ tɨnnyabanya pwara yetabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ kwaasɨgotɨyare sabwi mamɨdɨbɨna! Yɨ sahwaraavɨna dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. A'mwera tɨka munne wapeyɨdɨka naanga savɨ walamwaaidɨvɨ' tɨka wapaaya aalya nadɨvɨ' kwaasɨgotɨyarɨne yɨlaaya'na kwarame avaanna gɨrya'nera daavesarera.

Sahwaraavɨ tɨnnyabanya pwara yetabaaibɨ' nemɨ kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanya sabwi myaanna! Yɨ Gotɨyai sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ yɨrɨka gave pɨrɨkɨ sarera kwala naangera 23,000 saba sana balaramarina yesarera.

Nabaai sahwaraavɨ pwara “Kwaamu'na kuna mwaaladei dɨngaka!” deva Naanga kwarɨ yɨjɨwaaletabaaibɨ' sarɨ yune yɨjɨwaala myaanna! Sareraavɨ kamaalyara tɨka davɨna kye' sahwara saba sana yu'daramarina yesa'nanyɨ.
Nabaai sahwaraavɨ pwara kɨnɨmyagaala detabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna maamayagaala madɨpɨna! Sareraavɨ ejelɨya a'mweraavɨ tamakadei karamaka' yɨ sahwara saba sana yu'daramarina yesa'nanyɨ.

Yuya daza ke'ba'nanya yawɨrya'neinaavɨna kɨgaakuna a'mwe sahwaraavɨ yɨma'nakengɨ. Kayaa'nanya avaalya nyaadɨ'de'na nemɨnyɨ sɨmunya nejaaya'ne yagaala daza Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ yɨda'nɨkengɨ. Yɨ yuya kɨgaasa mi'nanyɨ. Nemɨnyɨna dɨvidaa'nyainaavɨna dahaa' mwaaihoinaavɨ dazagaasa aaya kaavɨlya neyɨma'nakeinera.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwei gamɨ sai yawɨ'manɨkei “Nɨmɨ sainyɨ dɨragɨnaangeinyɨ. Dɨragɨnya nayaa yadɨnyainyɨ daa'dɨnyainyɨ.” Sai kayaa'nanyaburɨ nalaraawadɨka! Sai nayaa mala yɨwannana!

Yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaalyabwi yɨhima'naabadevwi yɨ sa' mudɨka pɨrɨ'bɨta' mɨ'. Aawa. Sa' avaainanya' a'mwe yuyaraavɨ yɨma'nadevaaibɨsasɨ yɨjɨwaalya'. Yɨ yɨjɨwaala savɨna Gotɨyai gannya nebulya'nanya dɨragɨnya' mɨdɨdelyɨ. Sahwai lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sahwai sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ nayɨhwavɨlavadɨ'de'na yɨjɨwaala pɨrɨ' wanganakadei mɨ'. Aawa. Yɨjɨwaalyabwi sarɨmɨnyɨ kayɨhima'naabozɨ yɨ sarɨmɨ savɨna dɨthathɨvalyide'na gaimwanga yɨhya'ne tusa' Gotɨyai bɨryakadelyɨ. Tuta daza' yɨ sa' dare'na. Sahwai dɨragɨnya pada'galayɨvaimwanga yɨhyadelyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ yɨjɨwaalyaburɨ dɨragɨnya yɨnɨga wi'na dɨthaayideihɨlyɨ.
Nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwaasɨgotɨyare sabwina lɨkaanya dɨwila! Bule'na duzaayɨla!
Sarɨmɨ sɨmunya' kɨnɨnnakeihɨrɨ dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sareihi nɨmɨre yagaala kwaasɨgotɨyare yɨlaayavɨna nayaa dɨmarayawɨbwarila!

Naangere yɨ'bɨnyavɨ nadaanyagaa' kaapɨya tewaanya naanga yanga kɨnɨnnakerɨna nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su! Gɨmɨre yaya' makimanɨgo,” wɨdadaawori yɨ kaapɨya sai Kɨraazɨtɨyare tawesɨ nemɨnyɨ maraneyɨ'bwarayɨrakurakadei midaaka! Yɨ bɨretɨya gunyanadaanya daza' nemɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨsɨ ye'mwannaneyɨ'bwarakade' midaaka!
Bɨretɨya sa' gave pɨrɨ'nanya' warɨke'na nemɨ a'mwe kwalaalyaina yune kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'na mwaaihoinera. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ yuyaina bɨretɨya gave pɨrɨ'nanya sahɨrɨvɨna nadaanyainera.
Sarɨmɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyare Kɨlaakejɨkɨdaa'nyaraavɨna jawɨranganyɨla! Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsara kwaraanyabanne mɨwɨta nadɨvɨsara yɨ sahwara Gotɨyalyɨ ye'mwannemwaaidɨvɨsara midaaka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ yagaala gara dɨvanɨge? “Kwaasɨgotɨyare tɨka wapaaya sa' nebulya pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' dɨngaka? Ge' dɨngaka?” nabaai “Kwaasɨgotɨyai gamɨ sai nebulya'nanyai pwai kwai dɨngaka?”

Aawa. Nɨmɨ dara dɨvanɨge. Naangerɨna mu'nyadɨvɨsara ajɨmya yuyangɨyara yɨdɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta tɨka munne sa yɨ Saataanɨmɨre yɨmakeraavɨna yɨra'dɨvɨtangɨ. Gotɨya nebulya'nanyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨta mɨ'. Yɨmakerajɨ sarɨmɨ ye'mwannemwaalya'neihi jɨma'nyide'na nɨmɨ sɨmunyavɨ “Aala!” dɨwa. Sareihi nyɨma'nɨpɨdɨka!

Naangere kaapɨyarɨjɨ yɨmakere kaapɨyarɨjɨ aalya ye'mwannanya'na sarɨmɨ yɨnɨga wi'na nɨpɨneihi mɨ'. Aawaawa. Nabaai Naangere wapeyɨ'bɨnyavɨjɨ yɨmakere wapeyɨ'bɨnyavɨjɨ wapaaya ye'mwannanya'na yɨnɨga wi'na nɨpɨneihi mɨ'. Aawa.
Yɨ sara yaaja' nemɨnyɨna Naangei sɨmɨlɨka wɨlade' yaade'na daa! Nemɨre dɨragɨnya' gamɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ wavɨlavade' dɨngaka?
“Yuya ya kɨmaakɨya madakɨnyɨkengɨreva,” kɨrɨ' yuya sa a'mweraavɨ wɨgaimwade mɨ'. “Yuya ya kɨmaakɨya madakɨnyɨkengɨreva,” kɨrɨ' yuya ya sa dɨragɨnya pada'galayɨvaimwange' neyade mɨ'.
Sarevɨna a'mwe aane pwai kwai nayaa pada'galamaremwaainya' yune gamɨ sarɨna myanna! Aawa. “Nɨmɨ sara yɨwɨjavɨ a'mwe pwarajɨ nayaa mwaaibɨkajɨ,” a'mwe yuyara nayaa pada'galamaremwaainɨpɨka!
Yuya mɨwɨta sa sɨtɨwaayavɨ mubadɨvɨta sa sarɨmɨ navɨ'na nyɨna jɨla! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyara padaihɨrakaderaavɨna yɨdaanganya aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' mipɨna! Yuya sa dɨnyɨla!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Kwaaka dathavasɨ yuya yunewɨnna waraka yunebanna mɨlemwaalɨkejɨ sa yune Naangerennanyangɨ. Sare'na yuya naanne' wikɨra.

Nabaai a'mwe pwai kwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadei “Wapaaya naade'nana!” dazai kagɨthozɨ yɨ gɨmɨ sarɨ kadɨka yɨna ya'gɨzɨ wɨna yaja' gɨmɨnyɨ gɨzaavaja gazasa' tɨka wapaaya mɨwɨta sa' navɨ'na nyɨna ja! Gɨmɨre sɨmunya padaihɨrakaderɨna “Mɨwɨta da' gawɨdaa'nyavaka?” yɨdaanganya minna! Yuya sa dɨnana!

Sare kɨrɨvɨ a'mwe pwai kwai dara yɨhɨthaza' “Mɨwɨta da' nemɨ naade' davanyaraavɨre gotɨyaraavɨ wɨjawaasasɨ,” yɨ sare sa'na yɨhɨthathe a'mwe dazarɨnajɨ sɨmunyai padaihɨrakyarɨnajɨ sarɨmɨ tɨka sare' manɨpɨna!

Nɨmɨ yune gɨmɨre sɨmunyai padaihɨrakyarɨna majɨvanɨge. Aawa. A'mwe sahwai gɨthazai yɨ dazarerɨna dɨvanɨge. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyareinyɨ yuya yɨnɨga wi'na nɨwɨneinyɨ kɨrɨ' a'mwe pware sɨmunyarɨ kayaaka nyɨgaimudɨkajɨ sagaa' manɨnna! Sare'na nɨmɨre dɨragɨnyabwi yɨwɨja' pwara sɨmunyai maranyawɨbwaraja' tewaanya berɨ'na maarɨdeinyaka!
Yɨ nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨda'mujɨ nɨwɨne' tewaanyasɨ. Kɨrɨ' “Su! Su!” wɨdɨwɨja daza'na pwara bɨraiyagaala nyɨdɨpɨ'de' tewaanya' berɨ'nanaka!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ tɨka wapaaya nadaapɨjɨ dɨngaka? Aalyajɨ nadaapɨjɨ dɨngaka? Nabaai pɨnɨ yadaapɨjɨ dɨngaka? Yɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'ne'na yuya sa jɨla! Sarɨmɨ pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yɨpɨja'na Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaja' gave' sara jɨla!

Yɨ Juyaraavɨnajɨ Gɨrikɨyaraavɨnajɨ Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨnajɨ kave jɨla! Sahwara kayaa'nanyaburɨ walarya'nebwi kɨnɨnnakeihi nyɨma'nɨpɨdɨka! Sahwara kayaa'nanyabwi yawɨrya'neraavɨ numwaaihɨpɨdɨka! Sahwara Gotɨyarera yɨma'nya'neraavɨna sarɨmɨ sasarebwi nyɨpɨdɨka!

Nɨmɨ kwainyɨ a'mwe yuyara yɨnɨga wi'na yuya sabwina tewaanya wɨvu'nade yuya sara yadɨnyainyɨ. Yune nɨmɨ sainyɨna gaimwannya'ne yadɨnyainyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmɨ “Gotɨyai a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ padaihasamaarana!” dadɨ sahwaraavɨna gaimwagya'ne yadɨnyainyɨ.
Nɨmɨ kwainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yawɨrangadɨ ke'ba'nanya sahwarɨ wɨmɨdɨdɨnyainyɨ. Sasarebaaibɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ nyawɨrangadɨvɨ' ke'ba'nanya sahwainyɨ dɨnyɨmɨdɨnyɨla!
Sarɨmɨ yuyagaa' nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yuya yagaala daza maa'dɨ yɨhɨzaavadɨnyabaaibɨ' nayaa lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsa'na yɨ nɨmɨ dɨwa. Sarɨmɨ tewaanya nebulya'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Nabaai sare kɨrɨvɨ “Sarɨmɨ yagaala datha' yawɨpɨka!” sɨmunyavɨ yawɨ'manɨge. A'mwe gazaizare mɨnyagɨnya sai yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Yɨ a'mwevɨre mɨnyagɨnyai yɨ gannya a'mwelyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare mɨnyagɨnyai yɨ Gotɨyalyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwe gazaizai gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ bwakɨnarojɨ pɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdazai, yɨ pɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨne yagaalya' wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakajai, a'mwe dazai gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ wagɨla wɨjaawa'. Aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Sara yajai gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bwakakaja'na pwarɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaladelyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaladei mɨ'.

Nabaai a'mwe gazasa' gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ mabwakaki yaja' pɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨ yagaala wɨdaza', yɨ pɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakaja', sa' kɨrɨsɨ gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨna (gannya kwalaangerɨna) wagɨla wɨjaawa'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe sare' a'mwe kayaa'nanyavɨna wagɨla wɨjaaya'ne'na mɨjata yuya davakwikwiryadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' avaaina yɨwa'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdathehaa' gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ mabwakakya yaja' yɨ nabaai savɨ gamɨre mɨjasa' tu'na dawasɨ'nɨpɨka! Kɨrɨ' a'mwevɨre mɨjasa' tu'na dawasɨ'nya pɨrɨ' davakwikwirya kɨrɨ' yɨpɨja'na wagɨla nuvwa'nadɨ'de'na yɨ sa' gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ bwakɨnarana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ a'mwei gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ mabwakakanna! Sarei Gotɨyare ke'ba'nanya nawɨ'nyɨmaraangelyɨ. Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya' yɨjɨwaainadelyɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' a'mwe' a'mwere byaanna dɨragɨnya' yɨjɨwaainadesɨ. Sare' a'mwe' gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ bwakakana!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai a'mwerɨ a'mwevɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨdaa'nyɨ myavɨkaryaa'. Aawa. A'mwevɨ a'mwere kɨlaakejɨkɨdaa'nyɨ yavɨkaryaakesɨ.
Nabaai sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai a'mwevɨna yawɨraka yavɨkaryaakai mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwerɨna “Sahwarɨ wɨgaimwagatheva!” daka yavɨkaryaakesɨ.
Sarevɨ ejelɨyara tɨnna wanganya'ne' a'mwevɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnake' mwaalana! Sa' a'mwerɨ dalaangewɨ mwaalɨkesɨ.
Sare kɨrɨ' Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihovɨ a'mwenna mwaaidɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨne maaya mɨ'. Yɨ a'mwerana mwaaidɨvɨ' a'mwengɨne maayara mɨ'.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai a'mwevɨ a'mwere kɨlaakejɨsɨ yavɨkaryaakabaaibɨ' Gotɨyai sara dakakevɨna dahaa' a'mwevɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ a'mwerɨ maa'desɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai sai a'mwerajɨ a'mwejɨ pɨnɨjɨ sa yuyangɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ saihi yagaala daza' nayaa dɨmaryawɨbwaryɨla! Yɨ yɨlaayagaa' a'mwe' gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ mabwakaki yojɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaza', yɨ sa' nawɨ'nyabwi daaka!
Nabaai nemɨ Kwaaka davakɨne a'mweinaavɨre sabwi yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ dara yɨhibwarɨdaakuvanɨ' “Nabaai a'mwei mɨjata saamɨnyasɨyai yɨda'nanyai daaka! Wagɨla wɨvwa'manɨkei midaaka!”
Nabaai a'mwe' mɨjata saamɨnyasɨya' yɨ mɨjata daza' gannya byaanna dɨragɨnya' midaaka! Gotɨyai gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ bwakɨnarya'ne' mɨjata saamɨnaange' nayaa wɨjaavakesɨ.

A'mwe pwai kwai a'mwe mabwakɨnarya'ne sahɨrɨ'na “Gavamarasɨ'nyɨyagaala dɨma!” dazai, yɨ nɨmɨ dara wɨdɨdeinyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yaadehaa' nemɨ sasare sabwi kuneine. Nabaai Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyarajɨ sasare sabwi kunerera.

Sɨnnawɨ yɨhɨthɨwa. Tewaanya nebulya'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba yɨhɨmakimwa. Kɨrɨ' dare'na sara myɨhɨzɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨre yɨ'bwa'nawɨ'nya savɨna tewaanya kwalaalya mima'nyadengɨ. Aawa. Kayaa'nanya kwalaalya yɨma'nadengɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Aayagaa' nɨmɨ savɨdaasɨ da'mujɨyainyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Naangere kusɨlaanyavɨyaihi yɨrakuramwaaaidɨvɨ' yaasɨwa' mɨlɨkasamarya yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ yagaala daza' sara wɨ'nɨvanɨge. Sara wɨ'nena yagaala dazavɨna maalɨ'na lɨmwamwa.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai “Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwaraavɨ nɨmɨ yawɨradahɨlakyara ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabɨpɨka!” kadozɨ sarɨmɨre tɨnnyarɨ sahwara tewaanyara mwaaibɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihi Naangerɨ yɨlaaya'na avaalyaba yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidɨvɨsagaa' Naangere wapaaya dɨnyide'ne wapaaya mɨ'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨrɨ gazaizai yɨme'nya'bɨ' yada yɨ gannya wapaaya maa'da tɨka nadelyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' mye'mwannanyadɨvɨ' pwai mɨjɨ'na mwaidaasɨ yɨ pwai wapaayajɨ aalya waainɨya nyɨna yada yɨmaka widelyɨ.

Gatha'darevɨnaka! Yɨ sarɨmɨ wapaaya aalya nya'ne ange kuneihi dɨngaka! Sarɨmɨ dara dahayawɨ'manɨga'! “Gotɨyare kusɨlaanya sa' yaasɨwa'nanyasɨra.” Yadɨvɨ' neya'mwe pwara wapaaya maayaraavɨna sarɨmɨ wagɨla wɨjaavanɨgasaihi daaka! Sa'na nɨmɨ yagaalya' gara yɨhɨthɨjɨwana! Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnne yaya' munyabanna yɨhɨmakɨlɨjɨhyɨwa! Aawa! Yuya dazanna yadɨvɨsa'na sarɨmɨnne yaya' makɨlɨdeinyɨ mɨ'. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨzɨdavɨdeinyɨ.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ Naangerɨ yagaala da' maarena sarɨmɨnyɨ mena yɨhɨzaave. Yagaala daza' yɨ daresɨ. Yɨ sawɨsavɨ Juthaazai Jizaazarɨ yɨkamaangeraavɨre asɨrɨ marɨmwangakegaa' yɨ dazagaa' Naanga Jizaazai bɨretɨya' maaraka
Gotɨyarɨ, suya wɨdakegaa' gunyɨna yaka dara wɨda' “Datha' yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨneba nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨra. Nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨrya'neihi kuna sara jidevulyɨ.”

Aya sahɨbaaibɨ'na kumɨ tɨvi'na nevegaa' yɨ sai kaapɨyai maarɨna yaka wɨda' “Kaapɨya dathai yɨ nɨnnya tawe' yagaala yɨhɨlɨmwagarɨka mudɨkesɨ. Gazagaasagaa' sarɨmɨ sahwarɨya' dɨnyidehaa' nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨrya'neihi nayaa sara jidevulyɨ.”

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gazagaasagaa' nɨpɨjahaa' sarɨmɨ bɨretɨya daza' nadɨvɨ' yɨ kaapɨya dazarɨjɨ nadɨvɨ' yɨ dazagaasagaa' Naangei mena balake'na wibwarɨdaakwadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ sana sana yɨwɨna yapɨjɨ yune gamɨ bya'negaa'nanyɨ.

Sarevɨ yɨ nabaai a'mwe sɨmunya' nayaa myawɨryojɨyai Naangere bɨretɨya daza' yaasɨwa' tɨka maranajai Naangere kaapɨya dazarɨjɨ yaasɨwa' maranya yajai sai sa' dara yadelyɨ. Naangere kɨlaakejɨkɨnajɨ tawejɨkɨnajɨ kayaa'na yadelyɨ. Sara yaja dazavɨna yɨ gamɨ yɨwetawakya kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
A'mwei gannya sɨmunyavɨ nayaa yawɨramaarana! Tewaanya yavada'galayawɨrojɨ bɨretɨya daza' sai yɨnɨga wi'na nana! Yojɨ kaapɨyarɨjɨ wi'na nyɨna yana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Naangere kɨlaakejɨ'na nayaa mamaryawɨbwari yaja'na, “Sa' naangaangesɨra,” myawɨri yaja'na sai wapaayasɨ aalyasɨ tɨka yaasɨwa'na nyɨna yada sarei yɨwetawakya' maaradelyɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨ jɨdavadelyɨ.
Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara wɨrɨta mwaaidɨvɨ' nalaaya kɨnɨnnakere. Nabaai pwara baryavɨ se mena wakasare.
Tɨka manyagaa' nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ nayaa maryawɨbwaraaja' yɨ yɨwetawakya sa' neyɨma'nade' mɨ'. Nejɨdavade' mɨ'.

Yɨ Naangei nemɨre sabwi maryawɨbwa'da yɨ kayaa'nanya' nerɨvɨkɨraja' yɨ daza' sai nemɨnyɨ marayɨda'mata neyɨvanɨkelyɨ. Sara neyaja sa' “A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyabulyɨyaraavɨjɨ maneye'mwannajɨdaya'nei nye'mwannajɨdavadɨka!” dozɨ sara neyavada'galadelyɨra.
Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, sarevɨ yɨ sarɨmɨ “Tɨka naajɨ,” yɨ'bwa'nemwaalapɨjɨ yuya pwaraavɨna nayaa pɨzɨ'gwa jemwaalyɨla!
Nabaai pwarɨ mɨjɨka wɨyaja' sai gannya angevɨ nadelyɨ. “Nemɨnyɨ nanemaryawɨbwaradɨka!” dapɨjɨ sarɨnnya yɨ'bwa'nemwaalyagaa' nayaa sara jɨla!
Yagaala pimagɨnya kuna warɨkenna dɨvidaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mava'mujɨ yɨ nɨmɨ yɨda'mawakɨdeinyɨ.
Nya'mweihi, nyɨda'mwa'daasa'na Kurya Tewaanyai yanga nejaavade sanna sarɨmɨ navɨka ya'na sɨmunyavɨ nɨmɨ “Aala!” dɨwa.

Sarɨmɨ mena dara yawɨ'manɨga'. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaihi mu'nyadɨvɨsaihi kuna mwaaleva yɨ dazagaa' Saataanɨ kwaasɨgotɨyaraayawɨnna yagaala majadɨvɨsaraayawɨnna yɨhɨmwagi'namakwawakeihɨlyɨ. Sara yɨhyadaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ lɨkadɨke' galarɨlavɨmwaaihɨnɨkeihi mɨdɨnna yesaihɨlyɨ.

Sarevɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunya' dara yɨhɨzaavanɨge. Aane pwai kwai Gotɨyare Kuryai wɨlamwaaidei yagaala wɨdadei dara dannei mɨ' “Jizaazarɨ Dɨkevɨ Gotɨyai wɨmarasɨ'nya'nelyɨra.” Nabaai a'mwe aane pwai kwai dara majɨ yannelyɨra “Jizaazai Naangei.” Aawa. Kurya Tewaanyarɨ wɨlamwaalajai yɨ sai sara dannelyɨra.
Kurya Tewaanyare sɨhumale dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya jaapainya'ne warɨkengɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨ sɨhumale sa yanga nejaavadei Kurya gave pwainanyalyɨra.
Yɨ wɨdaaya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya jaapainya'ne warɨkengɨ. Naangei gave pwainanyarɨ yuya sa wɨdayadaanyalyɨ.

Wawɨnya ya'ne dɨragɨnya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya jaapainya'ne warɨkengɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai gave pwainanyai a'mwe yuyaraavɨna dɨragɨnya sa wɨjaavadelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai yuya saraavɨ yuya wawɨnya sa yɨnɨga wi'na yannelyɨra.
Yuyaraavɨ gaimwagya'ne'na Gotɨyai gazarɨzarɨ Kuryare dɨragɨnya' marima'naabadelyɨ. Yange wɨjaavake ku'maayabanna yɨbwarɨdaakwadelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe kwarɨna Kurya Tewaanyai a'mweraavɨna sɨmunya tewaanyabwi yɨbwarɨdaakwia'ne dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavadelyɨ. Nabaai a'mwe kwarɨna Kurya gave pwainanya dazai yagaala wɨjɨwaakya'ne dɨragɨnya' Gotɨyare sabwina a'mwera nayaa yawɨramaapɨ'de'na sa' wɨjaavadelyɨ.

Nabaai Kurya gave pwainanya dazarɨ a'mwe kwai dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi maaradelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai “Sasare' ya Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨ yaanneinera,” dada sara yadelyɨ. Nabaai gave pwainanya Kurya dazarɨ a'mwe kwai nalaavɨnakeraavɨ nawɨ'nya yavada'galya'ne dɨragɨnya sɨhumale maaradelyɨ.

A'mwe kwarɨna dɨragɨnyangɨ wawɨnya ya'ne wɨjaavɨna. A'mwe kwarɨna Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya'ne dɨragɨnya' yanga wɨjaavɨna. Gotɨyare Kuryai yagaala wɨjaaya nedadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ yɨmakera yagaala wɨjaaya nedadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ sɨduta maryawɨbwaranganya'ne' a'mwe kwarɨna wɨjaavɨna. Yagaala ge gengɨ aaya kaavɨlya myawɨryade wɨja'ne' a'mwe kwarɨna wɨjaavɨna. Yagaala ge gengɨ aaya kaavɨlya myawɨryade marija'ne' a'mwe kwarɨna wɨjaavɨna.

Yune Kurya gave pwainanya dazai sɨhumale yuya daza marima'naabya'nei yadelyɨ. Yune gannya sɨmunyavɨna mɨdɨdehaa' yanga pɨrɨ' a'mwe pwarɨna yɨ yanga pɨrɨ' a'mwe pwarɨna sana sana maryawɨbwa'devaaibɨ' jaapaidelyɨ.

Gotɨyare Kuryai dɨragɨnya yanga nejaavade sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨne ke'ba'nanya' daresɨ. Kɨlaaka sajɨ' gave pɨjɨ'nanyajɨ' yaka kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwarɨ kwalaalya warɨkejɨkɨ. Yɨ kwalaalya warɨka kɨrɨ' sa yuya kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'na warɨkejɨkɨ. Sasarebaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai kwai kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'nanyai kwai kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakei mwaalɨkelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kurya gave pwainanyai bavɨtaazɨya' neyakevɨdaa'nyɨ kɨlaaka sajɨ'na gave pɨjɨ'na yɨma'noinera. Yɨ Juya pwara Gɨrikɨya kwara, yɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnya pwara kumɨre wawɨnya maremwaaidɨvɨta kwara, yɨ nemɨ geina geina kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'na yɨma'noinera. Nabaai Kurya gave pwainanyarɨ aalya'bɨsarɨ yuna nya'neinaavɨna sahwarɨ nejaavakeinera.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨlaakejɨ' sajɨ' gave pimagɨnya'nanyajɨ' mɨ'. Aawa. Kwalaalyɨmagɨnya kɨnɨnnakejɨkɨra.
Yɨ sɨvɨlya' dara daza' “Nɨmɨ ata'nyɨ mɨ'. Sarevɨ yɨ nɨmɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya pimagɨnya'nyɨ mɨ',” yɨ sarevɨna daza' kɨrɨ' sa' kɨlaaka pimagɨnya' kuna waradesɨ. Yagaala sare' daza'na mɨ'.
Nabaai kadɨki' dara daza' “Nɨmɨ tɨnnainyɨ mɨ'. Sarevɨdaasɨ nɨmɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya pimagɨnyainyɨ mɨ',” yɨ sarevɨna daza' kɨrɨ' sɨ' kɨlaaka pimagɨnyɨ' kuna waradikɨ. Yagaala sarevɨna mɨ'.
Kɨlaaka yuyajɨ' sajɨ' yune tɨnnyainanyai warajɨ kwajɨ kadɨka gatha'dara ku'nadɨkejɨkaka! Kɨlaaka yuyajɨ' yune kadɨki'na yɨma'najɨ kwajɨ tɨrɨnyavɨ gatha'dara kwinnadɨkejɨkaka!
Kɨlaakejɨ' sasarejɨ' mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai sɨmunyavɨ sara yawɨrakabaaibɨ' kɨlaakejɨkɨ pimagɨnya gazarɨzarɨ nayaa wakaka yuya kumɨ sangɨ kumɨrebanna wakakejɨkɨ.
Nabaai kɨlaaka yuyajɨ' yuyɨmagɨnya avaala pimagɨnya' yɨma'najɨ kwajɨ yɨ kɨlaaka nebulyajɨ' gawɨ warɨkejɨkaka!
Kɨrɨ' sasare' mɨ'. Aawa. Kɨlaaka pimagɨnya kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakejɨkɨ. Sara yaka kɨrɨ' kɨlaaka gave pɨjɨ'nanyajɨkɨ.
Nabaai tɨnnyai asɨrɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wɨdannei mɨ' “Yɨ gɨmɨ mwarija' gaveinyɨ warɨdeinyɨ wikɨra.” Nabaai mɨnyagɨnya kɨrɨ' sɨvɨlyavɨ wɨdanne' mɨ' “Gɨmɨ mwarija' nɨmɨ gave'nyɨ warɨde'nyɨ wikɨra.”
Aawa. Kɨlaaka pimagɨnyanna nemɨ yawɨ'daanya “Kumɨ dɨragɨnya mɨ',” daza mwaryadori yɨ kɨlaakejɨ' nawɨ'nya waradezɨ' mɨ'. Aawa nebulyasɨ.

Yɨ nemɨre kɨlaaka pimagɨnya nemɨ yawɨ'daanya “Kumɨ waryaanyangɨ. Maalɨkengɨ,” nemɨ yɨwaala naanga nayaa baazɨ'ma'nadaanyɨ. Nabaai kɨlaaka pimagɨnya “Nawɨ'nya mɨ'. Sangɨna majadaanyangɨ,” wagɨla mamaarya'neina nemɨ yuyagaa' yulyakadaa nawɨ'nya maremwaidaanyaine.

Nemɨre kɨlaaka pimagɨnya nawɨ'nyangɨna sarebwina mugainyadengɨ sara myadaanyangɨ. Aawa. Gotɨyai yuya kɨlaakejɨ' ye'mwagakya yakelyɨ. Yɨ kɨlaaka pimagɨnya' yɨ savɨne yaya' kwaakebanna warɨke' yɨ savɨne yaya' munyaba naanga makidelyɨ.
Sara yade sa' yɨ kɨlaakejɨ' pimagɨ pimagɨ najaapainadɨ'de'nanyɨ. Aawa. Yuya kɨlaaka pimagɨnya yuya kɨlaaka pimagɨnyangɨne'na avaaina nayaa maremwaaibɨza sara yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.

Nabaai kɨlaaka pimagɨnya' daanga wɨvɨnaja' kɨlaaka yuyajɨ' daanga yunewɨnna bavɨnɨgulɨna yadezɨkɨ. Nabaai kɨlaaka pimagɨnyavɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaja' kɨlaaka yuya pimagɨnya sa yɨlaaya ye'mwannamaaradezɨkɨ.
Yɨ sarɨmɨ saihi Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨkɨra. Yɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨre gazaigɨzaigɨ gamɨre kɨlaaka pimagɨnyajɨ'gɨnyɨ. Yɨ yuyaihi pimagɨnyajɨkɨ.

Nabaai Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨ pwaraavɨ wakakelyɨ. Aaya munyabanyara Apozelɨyara Naangei Wɨdaasadera, ayawɨdaasara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nadɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakya'nera, dahasaai dahaasara wɨjɨwɨrya'nere. Sahwaraavɨ dɨvidaasara dɨragɨnyangɨ ya'nera, ayahi dɨvidaasɨ nalaavɨnakeraavɨ tewaanya yavada'galya'nera, yɨ a'mweraavɨ gaimwanga ya'nera, yɨ wawɨnya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyangɨ maremwaalya'nera, yɨ yagaala nabinabinya myawɨryadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' ja'nera.
Gatha'darevaka! Yuyara Apozelɨyara daaka! Yuyara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsara daaka! Yuyara wɨjɨwɨryadɨvɨsara daaka! Yuyara dɨragɨnya ya'ne dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakera daaka!
Yuyara nalaavɨnakeraavɨ nawɨ'nya yavada'galya'ne yanga kɨnɨnnakera daa! Yuyara yagaala myawɨryara dadɨvɨsara daa! Yuyara yagaala sa yɨnɨga wi'na maridadɨvɨsara daa! Aawa.
Sare kɨrɨ' yanga naanga sanna “Dɨragɨnna yawɨramaraana!” dadɨvɨ' dɨmwaalyɨla!
Yɨ dahaa' gave pɨrɨ'nanyabwi nebulya'nanya nawɨ'nyaangebwi sɨnnawɨnyabwi davwi yɨhibwarɨdaakuma!

Nɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' a'mweraavɨre yagaala dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyangɨjɨ yɨ ejelɨyaraavɨre yagaala kɨnɨngɨjɨ myawɨryadɨnyangɨna a'mweraavɨ wɨdɨwɨja' kɨrɨ' sahwaraavɨna tewaanya manyɨvu'nyaja' yɨ nɨmɨ sareinyɨ beloya gɨrɨngɨ'devaaibɨsainyɨ. Gwarewa' jaka yaasɨwa'na yɨnnɨgodevaaibɨ' aaya kaavɨlya maayainyɨ waryaanyainyɨ wɨdɨdevaaibɨsainyɨ.

Nabaai nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nadɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakya'ne yange kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ mwaaimuja', yɨ yuya sɨmunya Gotɨyare nebulya, yagaala kuku'nya yoimavajalɨkurakya sa yawɨ'muja', yɨ yuya yawɨta pɨnɨ kɨnɨjɨ kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ mwaaimuja', yɨ nɨmɨ yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai mugunya sa makwannelyɨ,” sara wɨja'ne dɨragɨnaanga lɨmwanga nebulya'nanya' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ mwaaimuja', sare kɨrɨ' a'mweraavɨna tewaanya manyɨvu'nyaja' yɨ sarevɨ saba sana yaasɨwa'nanyainyɨra.

Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ “Nɨmɨre yaya' munyaba makinɨma!” da'mujɨ nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨna yanga mudɨna yɨwɨja', yɨ nɨmɨ nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ'na “Gotɨyare yɨkamaangera dɨkevɨ maranyɨrapɨka!” dɨwɨja' marɨmwangɨnyɨna yɨwɨja', sare kɨrɨ' a'mweraavɨna tewaanya manyɨvu'nyaja' yɨ sarevɨ aane pɨrɨ' aane kɨrɨ' yɨnɨga wi'na nyɨgaimwagatheinyɨ mɨ'.

A'mwe pwai pwaraavɨna wɨvu'nadei sai kwaamu'nanyabwi wiadelyɨ. Yɨ wɨvu'nade sai pwaraavɨ bwiwanna wɨgaimwadelyɨ. Yɨ sai pwaraavɨrennajɨ pwaraavɨreburanajɨ tɨganaarya myadelyɨ. Yɨ wɨvu'nade sai gamɨnne yaya' makinadei mɨ'. Yɨ sai pihadɨka yadei mɨ'.

Yɨ sai kayaa'na mi, wagɨlyabwina yadei mɨ'. Yɨ sai yune gannyanna, gannyabwina sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dei mɨ'. Yɨ sai sɨmɨlɨka yarai widei mɨ'. Yɨ sai gamɨnyɨ kayaa'na wiadɨvɨta sanna ata magɨlyada sanna kuna yawɨ'dei mɨ'.
Yɨ sai pwara kayaa'nanyajɨ yɨwetawakyajɨ yadɨvɨsanna yɨlaaya yadei mɨ'. Aawa. Nebulya'nanya yadɨvɨsanna yɨlaaya yadelyɨ.

Yɨ sai gamɨnyɨ yuya kayaa'na wiadɨvɨta sabwi yarai tɨvɨkɨ'dei mɨ'. Yuyagaa' sai dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨna “Nyɨgaimwagana!” dada kave yemwaaidelyɨ. Yuya taanginya sangɨ dɨragɨnna daa'delyɨ.

Gotɨyarɨnajɨ pwaraavɨnajɨ wɨvu'nya dazabwi yɨwawodevwi mɨ'. Aawa nebulyasɨ. Sabwi kuna waragodevulyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsabwi Gotɨyai kunebwi wakadevulyɨ. Yɨ yagaala nabinabinyangɨ myawɨryadɨvɨ' dadɨvɨsabwi jɨ'mwannadevulyɨ. Yɨ sɨmunya tewaanyabwi yawɨramaa'dɨvɨsabwi Gotɨyai kunebwi wakadevulyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dahaa' nemɨ pɨmɨlɨ'na maalɨ'na yawɨrangamanɨgo. Nabaai Gotɨyarɨna pɨmɨlɨ'na maalɨ'na wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨvanɨgo.
Sare' kɨrɨ' dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨnɨga wi'nanyabwi yɨma'naabathehaa' yɨ dazagaa' Gotɨyai yuya pɨmɨlɨ'na maalɨ'nanya kune wakadelyɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ kaimɨraaya maalɨkeinyɨ kuna mwaalena yɨ dazagaa' kaimɨraayai dadevaaibɨ'na yagaalya' daheinyɨ. Nɨmɨ kaimɨraayai yɨbwakɨdevaaibɨ'na sara yɨbwakɨneinyɨ. Nɨmɨ kaimɨraayai sɨmunya' yawɨ'devaaibɨ'na sara yawɨreinyɨ. Yɨ nabaai a'mwe naanga mena yɨma'nena kaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨre sabwi mena yagalya'maveinyɨ. Yɨ sabwi kunebwi wakeinyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dahaa' Gotɨyarebura nayaa myawɨranganyɨvanɨgo. Yɨ sɨnɨmwavananya kayaa'nanyavɨ nemɨre sɨnnyɨ' kayaa'na yennadaanyabaaibɨ' nayaa myawɨranganyadaanyɨ. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ aayagaa' yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨ nebulya'na wanganaadehaa' Gotɨyarebura nebwina yawɨranganaadelyɨ. Dahaa' nɨmɨ pɨmɨlɨ'na maalɨ'na yawɨ'manɨge. Dɨvi gamɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nebulya'na nyawɨranganakabaaibɨ' nɨmɨ nebulya'na yawɨranganɨdeinyɨ.

Dahaa' dɨvi dɨragɨnna lɨmwagasabulyɨ, Gotɨyarɨna yemwaalyabulyɨ Gotɨyarɨnajɨ pwaraavɨnajɨ wɨvu'nyabulyɨ dawaai data daza yuyagaa' waragothengɨ. Nabaai dawaai data sangɨya wana naangebwinanyabwi sa' yɨ Gotɨyarɨnajɨ pwaraavɨnajɨ nevu'nadevulyɨ.

Pwaraavɨna tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nyabwi yuyagaa' kuna dɨragɨnna dɨmɨdɨnyɨla! Nabaai sarɨmɨ Kurya Tewaanyare sɨhumalenna maarya'na “Dɨragɨnna yawɨramaraana!” dadɨvɨ' dɨmwaalyɨla! Nabaai sare kɨrɨ' yanga naange' “Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawaajɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakya'neina yɨma'naana!” dɨragɨnna dadɨvɨ' dɨmwaalyɨla!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe yagaala nabinabinyavɨ sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei dadei sai a'mweraavɨ yagaalya' mujadelyɨ. Aawa. Sai yune Gotɨyarɨna wɨdɨvanɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yagaala dazavɨ a'mwe aane pwai aane kwai mu'namaaryadɨvɨsasɨ. Gamɨre kuryarɨ nebulya'nanya kuku'nya yulyakaja dadelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei sai a'mweraavɨ wɨdadelyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe dazare yagaalya' sa' dɨragɨnya pada'galayɨvaimwadesɨ. A'mwera tewaanya ya'ne sabwina dɨhaa'bwa'desɨ. Kale wiadaa'nyɨyaraavɨjɨ taanginya wiadaa'nyɨyaraavɨjɨ wɨgaimwadesɨ.

A'mwe yagaala nabinabinyavɨ sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakei gamɨ sarɨ dɨragɨnya pada'galayɨvaimwannadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei sai aangyagaala Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya yuyavɨ dɨragɨnya pada'galayɨvaimwadelyɨ.

Nɨmɨ sɨmunyavɨ dare'na yawɨ'manɨge. Sarɨmɨ yuyaihi yagaala nabinabinya wɨja'neihi jɨma'nyide' tewaanyasɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai dɨragɨnna dare'na yawɨ'manɨge. Sarɨmɨ yuyaihi “Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakaana!” dapɨjɨ jɨma'nyide' nawɨ'nya tewaanaangesɨ. “Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyara pada'galayɨvaimwangebwi maapɨka!” dozɨ a'mwe yagaala nabinabinya dadei yagaala daza maridazai yɨnɨga wi'na yadelyɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' yagaala daza pwaraavɨne'na mamarijɨ yajai yɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadeibɨsai yɨnɨga wi'na yadei mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadei sai gave pwainanaanga nawɨ'nyaangelyɨ.

Nya'mweihi yagaala datha'na nayaa jawɨrila! Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨwɨjainyɨ yagaala nabinabinya yɨhɨthɨwɨja' gatha'darevɨ yɨhɨgaimwagɨdeinyɨ! Aawa. Gotɨyai nyɨbwarɨdaakwade pɨrɨ', sɨmunya nawɨ'nya' yawɨranganya'ne kɨrɨ', Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nayɨhɨzɨwaakya pɨrɨ', yɨhɨzɨwaakya kɨrɨ' yɨhɨthɨwɨja' nayaa yɨhɨgaimwagɨdeinyɨ.

Darebaaibɨsasɨ. Gaala maaya, gware pɨrɨ' pɨradaza kɨrɨ' nabaai sa kɨnɨjɨ avaala sasarengɨ. Nabaai a'mwei gware pɨrɨ' pɨradaza kɨrɨ' kayaa'na dɨna yada sa' yagaala yaasɨwa'na dɨna yadengɨna “Akai, savɨre yagaalya' nemɨ kadɨka nayaa pada'galawɨ'nya' gatha'darevaka!” dadaanyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ nabaai pwara jaka ge'bɨ' kayaa'na danganna “Yarala! Mala pɨnaana!” yɨpɨja' kadɨka wɨ'nojɨ malya'na maryovɨravalɨmwagata yadei aaihwalaka!

Sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ sasarebaaibɨsasɨ. Sarɨmɨ taalɨsasɨ yagaala nawɨ'nya yɨda'na mujɨ yɨpɨja' sarɨmɨre yagaala dazavɨre aaya kaavɨlyavɨ gatha'dara yawɨrangabɨ'deraavaka! Aawa. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sara mi yɨpɨja' sarɨmɨre yagaalya' yɨhusavɨ saba sana yaasɨwa' yɨwɨna yadevaaibɨsasɨ.
Nebulyasɨ. “Kwaakevakɨ yagaala kwalaalya ge ge dahawarɨkajɨnyɨra.” Yagaala aane pɨrɨ' aane kɨrɨ' yaasɨwa'nanya' mɨ'. Yagaala yuya sangɨna aaya kaavɨlya' kɨnɨnnakengɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pware yagaala aaya kaavɨlya' nɨmɨ myawɨranganyɨ yɨwɨja' yɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨna dara yawɨradelyɨ “A'mwe maa'maataalɨ'minnyalyɨra.” Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ kwainyɨ yawɨrɨdeinyɨ. A'mwe yagaala dɨwaka dazai sai maa'maataalɨ'minnyalyɨra.

Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ yagaala pwara nayaa yɨhu'nɨpɨja' tewaanyasɨra. Sarɨmɨnyɨ Kurya Tewaanyare sɨhumale yanga maarya'neihɨrɨ nawɨ'nya yɨhɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Yɨ sareihi “Nawɨ'nya nebulya'nanya sa naanna yaana!” dapɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨ dɨragɨnya dɨvada'galayɨvaimwagyidevɨna kyɨhɨvu'nojɨ Kurya Tewaanyarɨ sara jɨthaanganyɨla!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ a'mwe yagaala nabinabinya' wɨdazai sai “Yagaala sa' maridɨma!” dozɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnya savɨna nayaa wɨdana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ yagaala nabinabinya' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨwɨja' yɨ nɨmɨre kuryai sai Gotɨyarɨ wɨdathelyɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre sɨmunya' sa' kune' yaasɨwa' warɨna yadesɨ. Pwaraavɨ wɨgaimwagya'ne' yɨma'nade' mɨ'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ gara yɨjɨwana? Nɨmɨre kuryalyɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨma! Nabaai kɨrɨ' sɨmunyasɨ Gotɨyarɨ kaavinake' nayaa wɨdɨma! Nɨmɨre kuryalyɨ Gotɨyarɨ daata dɨma! Nabaai kɨrɨ' sɨmunyasɨ daata kaavinake' nayaa dɨma!

Sarevɨ yɨ'bwa'namwaaidɨvɨsagaa' gɨmɨ sara mi yɨja' yune gɨnnya kuryalyɨ kaavimaaya' Gotɨyarɨ suya wɨdɨza' a'mwe pwai angwangwei mwaalojɨ yagaala daza' myawɨranganyɨ yadei gɨmɨre suya daza'na “Naanga nebulya' sahɨrɨsɨ,” gatha'darevɨ dathelaka! Sai yagaala wɨdɨza daza' myawɨranganyɨ yade'na sa' yɨnɨga wi'na yade' mɨ'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ suya' tewaanna wɨdɨwaanya' kɨrɨ' wɨdɨwaanyavɨna a'mwe kware sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya mavada'galayɨvaimwagi yɨwaa.
Kwalaalyagaa' yagaala nabinabinyangɨ dadɨnyainyɨ. Pɨgaa'na pɨgaa'na sarɨmɨ yagaala sangɨ dadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨ nɨmɨ Gotɨyai nyɨgaimwadaa'nyɨ sahwarɨ suya wɨdɨwa.

Sare kɨrɨvɨ dara yawɨ'manɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨ “A'mwe kwaraavɨ wɨjɨwɨrima!” da'mujɨ yagaala sɨmunyavɨnanya ata pwinanya dɨde'na “Yo,” dɨwa. Yagaala nabinabinyavɨya kwala naanga naanga (10,000) dɨde'na “Aala!” dɨwa.

Nya'mweihi, yagaala nabinabinya dadɨvɨsavɨna sarɨmɨ sarɨnnya sɨmunyangɨ kaimɨraayamɨlɨkabɨ' kuna mamwaaibɨna! Aawa. Kayaa'nanyaburɨna yadɨvɨsa'na sarɨmɨ bwaranyamɨlɨkabɨ' nayaa dɨmwaalyɨla! Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨna a'mwe naangerabɨ' yuneihi nayaa jɨma'nyɨla!
Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ, Kɨwɨnyavɨ, dara jɨda'nɨkesɨ.
Naangei dara dɨvanɨ'
“A'mwe yagaala pɨnɨjɨyaraavɨre maangevɨdaasɨ
Menyaraavɨre maangevɨdaasɨ nɨmɨ wɨdɨdeinyɨ.
Davanya datharaavɨ nɨmɨ wɨdɨdeinyɨ.
Sarevɨ kɨrɨ' sahwara nyɨmɨdɨbɨ'dera mɨ'.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala nabinabinya ja sabwi yɨnɨga wi'na yɨjɨwaainya daza' Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨna mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe dɨragɨnna malɨmwagyadɨvɨsaraavɨne yakesɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'napɨjɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakya sabwi yɨnɨga wi'na yɨjɨwaainya daza' Gotɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadɨvɨsaraavɨna yaka' mɨ'. Aawa. Sa' yune lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨne yakesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨya yuyaihi yɨkabɨna yapɨjɨ yɨraku'nemwaaibɨza' yɨ yuyaihi yagaala nabinabinyangɨ dɨpɨja' a'mwera angwangwe pwara malɨmwagyadɨvɨta kwara wɨlaabɨpɨjara kadɨka yɨhu'nɨpɨja' dara dɨpɨ'de' midaaka! Sarɨmɨ yɨmakyagaala dɨvanɨgava!

Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ yuyaihi Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨpɨja' a'mwe malɨmwagyade pwai angwangwe kwai kusawɨnna kulaabozɨ yuyaihɨre yagaalya a'mwe dazare sɨmunyavɨ wɨlojɨ yɨ yuyaihɨre yagaalya sarɨ kotɨya maryadaa'nyɨ sahwai gannya kayaa'nanyanna yawɨradelyɨ.

Sahware sɨmunyavɨ yuya lɨka yulyarɨke yɨ ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathe sarɨmɨre yagaalya'. Yɨ nabaai sarevɨ sai gannya sɨnnyɨkɨ kwadaai gɨlojɨ yɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨladelyɨ. Yɨ dara jalɨkurakadelyɨ “Naanga nebulyasɨ. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba mwaalɨka!”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ, nya'mweihi, nayaa gara jijɨwaava? Sarɨmɨ yɨ'bwa'namwaaidɨvɨsagaa' gazaigɨzaigɨ ya'ne pɨrɨ' kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ. Pwai yɨledaata kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨ pwai yɨhɨzɨwɨrya'ne yagaalya' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨ pwai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nojɨ yagaalya' yɨhɨzɨwaakya'ne' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨ pwai yagaala nabinabinya' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨ pwai yagaala dazavɨ marija'ne' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yuya sa kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨ pada'galayɨvaimwagya'neihi nayaa sara jɨla!

A'mwe pwai kwai “Yagaala nabinabinya' myawɨryadɨnya' dɨjɨ,” yɨ “A'mwe pwaraai daakajɨ,” “A'mwe pwaraai pwai daakajɨ,” sara yɨnɨga wi'na dɨpɨ'dere. Sa' wi'nanyɨ. Pwarajɨ aawa. Yɨ yuyara yagaala ye'mwannadɨwɨlaawia mipɨna! Pwai yagaalya' mena tɨvi'na kadozɨ yɨ pwai dɨvidaasɨ dathelyɨ. Nabaai yuyagaa' a'mwe pwai yagaalya' nayaa maridana!

Yɨ nabaai a'mwe yagaala marija'nei maayawɨ, yɨ a'mwe yagaala nabinabinya' dadei sai gannya maangi' nayaa bɨpalemwaaina yojɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨ kave mwaalana! Sai gavei yagaalya' yune Gotɨyalyɨna ye'mwannadathelyɨ.
Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyara, yɨ pwaraaina daraai dainanya kwara wɨdɨpɨka! Yɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya pwara yagaala sa' maryawɨbwapɨka!
Yɨ nabaai pwai mwaalɨna yadori yɨ Gotɨyai sarɨ yagaala pɨrɨ' wibwarɨdaakwaja' yɨ a'mwei aayagaa' daavojɨ yagaala gamɨdaasɨ dathei, sai gamɨre yagaalya' yarai jɨ'mwannana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. “Yɨ nemɨre a'mwe yuyara sɨmunya' nayaa yawɨramaapɨka! Yuyara kumɨre kuryaraavɨne dɨragɨnya' maapɨka!” dapɨjɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihi Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'napɨjɨ yagaala sa' pwaigɨdaasɨ pwaigɨdaasɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wɨjɨwaakɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.
A'mwe Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨre yanga sɨhumale sanna sahwara maremwaainadɨvɨsare. Pɨgaa' dɨna, pɨgaa' jɨ'mwannyɨna yadɨvɨsare.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai gavamarasɨ'nyɨyagaala, maihurɨ'nyɨyagaala kɨnɨnnakei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai kwaamu'nanyabwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Sare'na yawɨ'daa nemɨre yɨ'bwa'namwaidaanyanna nayaa maremwainaade'nanyɨ.
Yuyaba Gotɨyare tewaanyara Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya yuyangɨ yadɨvɨtabaaibɨ'
kusɨlaanyangɨ a'mwe yagaalya' madɨpɨna! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sahɨnɨ maange' bɨpalemwaaina yɨpɨka! Yagaala madɨpɨna! Aawa. Gotɨyare kɨwɨnyavɨ dɨnɨkabaaibɨ' sahɨnɨ dalaangewɨ nayaa mwaaibɨka!

Nabaai sahɨnɨ yagaala wɨ'nadɨvɨ' “Yagaala savɨre aaya kaavɨlya' yawɨranganaana!” dɨpɨja' yɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ kunnya angengɨ kunnya kwalaangeraavɨ yɨdaangabɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kusɨlaanya savɨ yagaala daza' nawɨ'nya yɨda'nanyabwi mɨ'. Wagɨla kɨnɨnnakebulyɨ.
Gatha'darevaka! Gotɨyare yagaalya' sarɨmɨnyawɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'nake' daa! Sarɨmɨ gaveihɨryawɨ yɨ'mavake' daa! “A'mwe pwaraayawɨ aawa,” sara dɨmanɨgasaihi daa! Yɨda'nanyabwi mamɨdɨnyɨ be'na yɨvanɨga'!

A'mwe pwai gamɨ sarɨna “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨnyainyɨ.” Sai “Kurya Tewaanyare yanga sɨhumale' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ.” Yɨ sai yawɨrajai nayaa dara yawɨramaarana! “Yɨlaaya yadaanyabwi nemɨnyɨna Polɨ yɨda'mwake' yɨ sabwi Naangere kɨwɨnyasɨ.”
Yɨ nabaai a'mwe pwai kwai sasara mibwakɨnyɨ yajai, yɨ sarɨna “Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadelyɨ,” nemɨ yɨbwakɨnaadei mɨ'. Sarɨ kadɨka mu'naanna!
Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, sarevɨ “Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawaajɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwakaana!” dɨragɨnna dadɨvɨ' dɨmwaalyɨla! Nabaai yagaala nabinabinyangɨ ja sabwina kɨmaakɨya madakɨpɨna!
Yɨ yɨ'bwa'nawɨ'nadɨvɨsagaa' nayaa yɨda'na jɨla! Pɨrɨ' mena yapi pɨrɨ' jɨla! Sarevɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya nawɨ'nyaanga nebulya'nanya' yɨma'nana!
Nya'mweihi, yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨzɨwaake' sarɨmɨre sɨmunya ayɨna maradɨhaa'bwata yɨhima! Yagaala tewaanya sa' sarɨmɨ mena maaresasɨ. Yɨ dazavɨ dɨragɨnna daa'dɨvɨsasɨ.

Yɨ yagaala tewaanya dazahɨrɨvɨna Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨvadaihasamaa'desɨ. Yɨ yagaala yɨhɨzɨwaake' sarɨmɨ yaasɨwa' lɨmwagapɨja' yɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna kuna mwakyɨpɨja' myɨhɨvadaihasamaari yadesɨ. Aawa. Kɨrɨ' yaasɨwa' malɨmwagari yɨpɨja' sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna kuna wakɨpɨja' yɨhɨvadaihasamaa'desɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yagaala aaya mudɨ'nanya' nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmarɨmwange', yɨ sɨnnawɨ yagaala daza' maarageva. Yɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya sa' daresɨ. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dɨnɨkevɨna nemɨre kayaa'nanyanna marasɨ'nya'nei Kɨraazɨtɨyai balakelyɨ.
Yɨ simaangevɨ pwara sahwarɨ wɨlakesalyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dɨnɨkevɨna yɨrɨka darɨkaai darɨkɨ Gotɨyai sarerɨ gaalyarɨ yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ.
Yɨ sarei dɨvidaasɨ Pitarɨ yɨjɨwaainnyɨna ya'. Yɨ sarei ayahi dɨvidaasɨ gamɨre atɨraai sɨvɨla purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyaraavɨ yɨjɨwaainnyɨna ya'.

Nabaai dɨvidaasɨ gave pɨgaa' neya'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ yɨjɨwaainnyɨna. Sahwara paaivɨ aadɨretɨyarajɨ pwarajɨ mwaalesare. Yɨ neya'mwe dazaraavɨya kwalaalya naangera sara kuna mwaaiha'. Mwaaihasara yɨhɨthɨpɨnere. Kɨrɨ' pwara se mena bale'.
Yɨ nabaai dɨvidaasɨ sahwai Jemɨzarɨ yɨjɨwaainnyɨna. Nabaai dɨvidaasɨ yuya Apozelɨyaraavɨ yɨjɨwaainnyɨna.
Yɨ wana sahwaraavɨ dɨvidaasɨ saamɨnyagaa' bwaranyarɨ ganaange' kayaa'na maarakabaaibɨ' sahwai nɨmɨnyɨ yɨjɨwaainnyɨna nyakeinyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Apozelɨya yuyaraavɨdaa'nya nɨmɨ wana maalɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalake'na nɨmɨnyɨna yɨnɨga wi'na nyɨdɨpɨneinyɨ mɨ' “Sai Apozelɨyalyɨra.”

Sare kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yanga gaimwanga nyadevɨ nɨmɨ mwaaiheinyɨ yɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ sareinyɨra. Yɨ gamɨre yanga gaimwange' nɨmɨnyɨne' yɨ sa' kune' mɨ'. Aawa nebulyasɨ. Sai nyɨgaimwadaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ wawɨnya dɨragɨnna mɨraagɨkɨreneinyɨ. Nabaai Apozelɨya pwaraavɨre wawɨnya mena wavɨlaveneinyɨ. Sare kɨrɨvɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ myɨvanɨge. Aawa. Gotɨyare yanga gaimwange' nɨmɨjɨ nye'mwannamwaaida sa' sahɨrɨsa' yɨvanɨkesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ yɨhye kwainyɨ dɨngaka? Apozelɨya pwara yɨhyeta pwara dɨngaka? Dazavɨna yagaala maayasɨ. Nemɨ yuyaina Gotɨyare yagaala sahɨrɨsa'na wɨjɨwakadaanyaine. Yɨ sarɨmɨ yagaala sahɨrɨvɨna dɨragɨnna sara lɨmwagaresaihɨlyɨ.

Yuyagaa' nemɨ yagaalya' dara yɨhɨzɨwakadaanyaine. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bainɨkeraayaba Gotɨyai yɨdɨkaavake'nanyɨ. Sare'na sarɨmɨnyɨ pwara dara gatha'dara yɨhɨthadɨvɨka'! “A'mwe mena bainɨkera, sara ayahi ayɨna yɨnɨga wi'na dɨkaapɨ'devwi mwarika!”
Nabaai yɨ nebulya'nanya' warajɨ kwajɨ yɨ a'mwe bainɨkera ayɨna yɨnɨga wi'na madɨkaayɨ yapɨjɨ kwajɨ Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavake' nebulya'nanya' mwari kyadɨka!

Nabaai Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ ayɨna midɨkaayɨ yajɨ kwajɨ yɨ savɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ wɨjɨwakadaanya yagaala daza kune saba sananya kwaradɨka! Yɨ sarɨmɨre Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwanga sa' kɨrɨsɨ kune saba sananya kwaradɨka!

Yɨ nabaai sara yajɨ kwajɨ yɨ nemɨnyɨna dara kabɨramaapɨdɨke' “O, Apozelɨyara Gotɨyarɨna kwaasɨ jalɨkurakadɨvɨtara daaka!” Nemɨ ku'maayaba dara jalɨkurakadaanyaine. Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. Sare'na Gotɨyai a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ midɨkaayɨ yade' nebulya'nanya' warajɨ kwajɨ yɨ sai Kɨraazɨtɨyai kwarɨjɨ midɨkaayɨ kyadɨke'na nemɨ kwaasɨ kyɨhɨzalɨkurakaadɨka!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. “Dɨvi sagaa' bainɨkeraavɨ midɨkaayɨ yadelyɨra,” daaza' nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ midɨkaayɨ kyadɨka!
Nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ midɨkaayɨ yajɨ kwajɨ yɨ sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi waryaanyabwi kyɨma'nadɨka! Yɨ sarɨmɨ sarɨnnya kayaa'nanyangɨ kuna kamwaaibɨthɨka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨ' se mena baidɨvɨsara sara kwarajɨ kayaaka mena kyɨgainɨpɨdɨka!

Yune nemɨ Kwaaka davakɨ gaala mwaidaanyagaa' gavegaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaa dahaa'ne sahwarɨna yemwalaajɨ kwajɨ dɨvi balya'negaa' manegaimwagyɨ yojɨ kwajɨ yɨ a'mwera nemɨnyɨna kale naanga wiadeina kamwalaadɨka! Yɨ a'mwe yuya pwaraavɨna kale maalɨka wia' kwaradɨkesɨ. Nemɨnyɨna kale naanga naanga wia' kwaradɨkesɨ.

Kɨrɨ' sasare' mɨ'. Kɨraazɨtɨyai mena balakerɨ yɨ Gotɨyai ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. Yɨ tɨka munne yabwarya'negaa' nanyɨne tɨvi'na wa'da mala wa'devaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne a'mwe se bainɨkeraavɨ sai aaya yɨbwaradɨkaata yakei yuyagaa' mwaaidelyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwei, Aataamɨ, yaakevɨ balyabwi wakyaa'. Yɨ a'mwei Jizaazai yakevɨ a'mwe bainɨkera ayɨna dɨkaaya'nebwi waka'.
Yɨ daresɨ. Aataamɨre yɨta savaakɨre yuyara sahwara baidɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨta yuyara sahwara gaalyabwi maapɨ'dere.

Nabaai gazaizai yune gannya sagaa' ayɨna dɨkaa'na, yɨ gaalya' maaradelyɨ. Aaya mudɨ'nanyai tɨka munne mya gaai yadebɨsai sai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Gaalya' mena ayɨna maarakelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ sai ayɨna walaabathevɨ nemɨ yuya Kɨraazɨtɨyare saina yɨ nemɨ gaalya' maraadeine.

Yɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ aayagaakɨra. Yɨ maremwaaide gazarɨzarɨjɨ marahuzɨ'bwaremwaaide gazarɨzarɨjɨ dɨragɨnnaka gazarɨzarɨjɨ saraavɨre dɨragɨnya' Kɨraazɨtɨyai mari'mwagasɨ'nojɨ sai Gotɨyarɨ Nɨmwarɨ gannya maremwaaide' marɨmwangadelyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai kuna maremwaaladelyɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraaryaba galawɨlawakadehaa'na kuna maremwaaladelyɨ.
Gotɨyai yuya yɨkamaanga pwaraavɨ mena marasɨ'nojɨ yɨ nabaai yɨkamaanga aayaangebwi barya kɨbulyɨ yasɨ'nadelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dara dɨnɨ' “Gotɨyai yuya sahwaryawɨ kwaakewɨ marulawakakengɨ.” Sara dɨnɨka kɨrɨ' yɨ nemɨ mena yawɨ'manɨgo. Gotɨyai yuya, yuyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dalaangewɨ marulawakakei gamɨ sai dalaangewɨ sahɨnɨjɨ mye'mwannamwaalyɨkelyɨ. Arɨkewɨ.

Nabaai dɨvi Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dalaangewɨ yuya yɨnɨga wi'na marulawakɨna kyojɨ yɨ sagaa' Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei gamɨ sai Gotɨyarɨ sahwai yuya marulawakakerɨ dalaangewɨ wɨlawakɨnadelyɨ. Yɨ “Gotɨyai yuyangɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maremwaaide nebulya'nanyai mwaalana!” dozɨ dalaangewɨ sara wɨlawakɨnadelyɨ.

Nabaai yagaala yɨdɨkaasaburɨne daza' nebulya'na mi yajɨ kwajɨ a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ gaimwagya'ne' a'mwe pwara bavɨtaazɨya' maa'manɨgasara berɨ' yɨpɨ'devaka! A'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ nebulya'na midɨkaayɨ yanne' kwajɨ sahwara a'mwe baimwa'daasaraavɨ gaimwagya'ne' bavɨtaazɨya' be'na maa'manɨgataraavaka!

Yɨ nemɨ kwainajɨ gazagaasagaa' a'mwe pwara nemɨnyɨna “Kayaaka yɨgalakaana!” dadɨvɨ' yaamɨjɨ neyadɨvɨsaine. Nabaai a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ ayɨna midɨkaayɨ yanne' kwajɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨdaanyaina sara be'na mwaaiho!

Nya'mweihi, yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ nɨmɨ taanginya maa'dɨ mena bainɨkeinyɨbɨsainyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba makimunebaaibɨ' daza' nebulya'na dadɨnyɨ. Nebulyasɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai sai nemɨre Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihevɨ yaya munyaba makɨla sa' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨ a'mweraavɨrebwina dɨde'nanyɨ. Anga Epazaazɨ nɨmɨ sɨgyaawaryarajɨ mala tanneinyɨ. Yɨ dazavɨ nɨmɨ tewaanya benɨ maa'mune'na! Nabaai yɨ a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ ayahi midɨkaayɨ yanne' kwajɨ pwara dara dɨpɨ'de' tewaanya' berɨ' kwaradɨkaka! “Baa'nana! Nemɨ tɨka wapaaya naana! Aalya naana! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Mwanyagaa' nemɨ balaadeina dɨngaka? Nemɨ yune menanyaina yɨma'naadeina dɨngaka?”
Akai, sahwara kwaasɨ kuna nayɨhɨthɨpɨdɨka! Dara jawɨrila! “Nemɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyarajɨ ye'mwannayamaryadawaari yɨ sahwara nemɨre tewaanyabwi kayaaka nyɨgalakɨpɨdɨka!”

Sarɨmɨ navɨ'navɨkebwi nayaa yagalya'ma'na jɨla! Yapɨjɨ yɨdasabwina jawɨrila! Sarɨmɨ kayaa'nanya' aya kɨrɨ' ayawɨ nyɨpɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwara sahwara Gotɨyarɨna wana myawɨryadɨvɨsare. Sarɨmɨ wagɨla maarya'ne'na yagaala daza'na yɨhɨthɨwa.
Kɨrɨ' nabaai a'mwe pwai dara yɨdaanganadelyɨ “A'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ gatha'dara yɨdɨkaavaderaavaka? Yɨ sahwara be kɨlaakejɨ' maarapɨjɨ ayɨna yɨma'naabɨpɨ'deraavaka?”
Ai, navɨka dara yɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨ dɨngaka! Gɨmɨ kwaigɨ sɨlya' mena burɨdɨnya' gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' mabalyɨ yaja' yɨ sa' Gotɨyai gaala marakade' mɨ'.
Nabaai gɨmɨ burɨdɨza daza' dɨvidaasɨ kɨlaake' yɨma'naabathe avaala' mɨ'. Aawa. Gɨmɨ yune wiaina burɨdɨnyɨ. Witɨzɨla dɨnga'? Tɨka wapaa pɨnɨngɨre sɨlya dɨnga'?

Yɨ Gotɨyai gannya sɨmunyavɨ mena yawɨraka gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ', yɨ yagɨnya kɨwata saza wɨjaavadezɨkɨra. Yɨ sai wia gazaizai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gɨryadezɨ' wɨjaavadezɨkɨ. Pwarɨ gannya kɨlaakejɨ' pwarɨ gannya kɨlaakejɨ' wɨjaavadezɨkera.

Mɨwɨta gazasa' avaainanya' mɨ'. Aawa. A'mweraavɨre' gave nabinanyasɨ. Yɨ jɨlɨkyaawaryaraavɨre kumɨre mɨwɨta nabinyangɨ. Yɨ yɨkurɨyaawiangɨre kumɨre mɨwɨta nabinanyangɨ. Yɨ yusaraavɨre kumɨre' nabinanyasɨ. Yɨ jawɨnyaraavɨre' nabinanyasɨ.
Nabaai sɨgunyavɨ yɨlarɨka sa kɨlaaka kɨnɨnnakengɨ. Yɨ Kwaakevakɨ warɨka sa kɨlaaka kɨnɨnnakengɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' sɨgunyavɨya byaanna dɨragɨnya' ge' warɨ'. Yɨ Kwaakevakɨya byaanna dɨragɨnya' ge' warɨ'.

Yɨ sɨgunyavɨyangɨna nyɨlyare byaanna dɨragɨnya' pɨrɨsɨ. Lawere byaanna dɨragɨnya' pɨrɨsɨ. Sɨlɨngaamɨnyarɨkaavɨre byaanna dɨragɨnya' pɨrɨsɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨlɨngaamɨnya pɨrɨkɨre byaanna dɨragɨnya' nabinyasɨ. Sɨlɨngaamɨnya pɨrɨkɨre byaanna dɨragɨnya' nabinyasɨ. Sana sana yadengɨra.

A'mwe bainɨkeraavɨre dɨkaasabwi sa' avaaina sasaresɨ. Kɨlaaka nemɨ lɨkirakadaanyajɨ', sajɨ' sɨla burɨdaanyabaaibɨ' bwia bu'dezɨkɨ. Kɨlaaka Gotɨyai ayɨna yɨdɨkaavadezɨ', mudɨka sajɨ' bwia buradezɨ' mɨ'.

Kɨlaaka nemɨ lɨkirakadaanyajɨ', sajɨ' yaya munyaba makɨlya'nejɨ' mɨ'. Kɨlaaka Gotɨyai ayɨna yɨdɨkaavadezɨ', sajɨ' byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakejɨkɨ. Kɨlaaka lɨkirakadaanyajɨ', sajɨ' wɨrɨsajɨkɨ. Kɨlaaka yɨdɨkaavadezɨ', sajɨ' dɨragɨnaange' kɨnɨnnakejɨkɨ.

Kɨlaaka lɨkirakadaanyajɨ', sajɨ' yɨ kwaakevɨnejɨkɨ. Aagɨlaakejɨkɨ. Kɨlaaka yɨdɨkaavadezɨ', sajɨ' Kuryai maremwaaladezɨkɨ. Yɨ kwaakevakɨne kɨlaakejɨ' a'mweraavɨrejɨ' waraja' yɨ Kuryarɨne kɨlaaka kɨjɨ' waradezɨkɨra.

Sarevɨ Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨ' “A'mwe aaya mudɨ'nanyai, Aataamɨ, a'mwei Kwaakevakɨnei yɨma'naka gaalya' kɨnɨnnakei.” Yɨ Aataamɨ aaya dɨviyai a'mweraavɨre kuryaraavɨ gaala wɨjaaya'nei sai kuryai kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sɨnnawɨ kuryare kɨlaakejɨkɨ wɨlamwaalyajɨ' gamɨdaasɨ yɨma'naka' mɨ'. Aawa. Kwaaka dathavakɨya kɨlaakejɨ' sɨnnawɨ gamɨdaasɨ yɨma'nakesɨ. Yɨ kuryare kɨlaakejɨ' sa' dɨvidaasɨ yɨma'nakesɨ.
A'mwe aaya mudɨ'nanyai sai kwaakevakɨyalyɨ. Sarɨ Gotɨyai yune kwaakesɨna yavɨkaryaakelyɨ. A'mwe ayawɨdaa'nyai sai Sɨgunyavɨyalyɨ.

A'mwe kwaaka dazavakɨya dazaibɨ' nemɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'nadaa yuya Kwaakevakɨya a'mweina avaainanyaine. A'mwe Sɨgunyavɨya dazaibɨ' nemɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'nadaa Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna a'mwe Sɨgunyavɨyaina yɨ nemɨ avaaina yɨma'naadeine.
A'mwe Kwaaka dazavakɨyare ke'ba'nanyasɨyaina mwaaihobaaibɨ' yɨ nabaai dɨvi a'mwe Sɨgunyavɨyare ke'ba'nanyasɨyaina mwalaadeine.

Nya'mweihi, nɨmɨ yagaala yɨda'nanya' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe mɨwɨsasɨ tawesɨ kɨnɨnnakei Gotɨyare maremwaalade' yɨnɨga wi'na maarannei mɨ' Nɨmware'. Nabaai bwia burya'ne sa' bwia maburyade savɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maaranne' mɨ' Nɨmware'.

Yɨthaanyi, sare'na Gotɨyare nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya' yɨhɨzɨwaakɨma! Yɨ nemɨ a'mwe yuyaina neina yɨma'nadaa balaadeina mɨ'. Nabaai kɨrɨ' yɨ nemɨ gaainakeinajɨ bainɨkerajɨ yuyaina, mudɨkeinaavɨ Gotɨyai nemwaaihadeine.

Yɨme'nya'bɨ'na, yune tɨbaalɨku'nya pɨva'na yadehaa', aayagaa'ne gware' jaka dathehaa' sara yadelyɨ. Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Gware' jaka wɨdɨna kyojɨ a'mwe mena bainɨkeraavɨ bwia maburya'neraavɨ yɨdɨkaa'na yojɨ nemɨ gaainakeinajɨ yuyainaavɨ mudɨkeinaavɨ nemwaaihadeine.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Dare' Gotɨyai dakakesɨ. Kɨlaaka bwia bu'de dazajɨ', sajɨ' yade nayaa yaraaibwa'nojɨ yuyagaa' bwia maburya'nejɨ' nebaazɨ'makwadezɨkɨ. Kɨlaaka baide dazajɨ', sajɨ' nayaa yade yaraaibwa'nojɨ yuyagaa' gaala mwaalagothezɨ' nebaazɨ'makwadezɨkɨ.

Yɨ kɨlaaka bwia bu'dezɨ' sajɨ' yade nayaa yaraaibwa'nojɨ yuyagaa'ne bwia maburya'nejɨ' kanebaazɨ'makwojɨ yɨ kɨlaaka sajɨ' baidezɨ' nayaa yaraaibwa'nojɨ yuyagaa'ne gaala mwaalagothezɨ' kanebaazɨ'makwojɨ yɨ sagaa' Gotɨyare yagaalya' yunebanna yɨma'naabathesɨ. Dara dɨnɨ' “Gotɨyai malyavɨ wavɨlavaka baryaburɨ galavɨlawakakelyɨ. Yaka yuya yunebanna yɨ'mwagasɨ'nakelyɨ.”
Yagaala pɨrɨ' dara dɨnɨ'
“Balyabwigɨ gɨmɨre sɨke' gava warɨka!
Balyabwigɨ gɨmɨre tamakya'ne lɨsɨnnyarɨ' gavanaka!”

Baryabure lɨsɨnnyarɨ' sa' kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsasɨ. (Yɨ daresɨ. A'mwera kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsa'na baryabwi naawɨnaanyaibɨsabwi yuna da'devulyɨ.) Nabaai kayaa'nanyabure dɨragɨnya' sa' Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyasɨra. (Yɨ daresɨ. Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya' a'mwera kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsabwi wibwarɨdaakwada kumɨrebwina kumɨnyɨne yɨwetawakya' dɨragɨnna wɨjalɨkurakadesɨ.)

Sare kɨrɨ' nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdaana! Yɨ sahwai nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ neyavada'galanemwaaihaka nemɨnyɨne'na baryaburɨjɨ kayaa'nanyaburɨjɨ galavɨlawakakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai sɨka sa' yanga nejaavanɨkelyɨ.

Nɨnnya nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, sarevɨ sarɨmɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna dɨthaayɨla! Yɨ sangina maalɨ'na yɨbwaaya kɨrɨ' nyɨpɨdɨka! Sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ wawɨnya naange' yadɨvɨsa', sa' Naangerɨna kune' saba sana yɨwɨna yade' mɨ'. Aawa. Dɨragɨnya' waragothesɨ. Sarɨmɨ sara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yuyagaa' Naangere wawɨnya sa' naanga naanga dɨragɨnna nayaa jɨla!

Dahaa' sarɨmɨ yɨda'mwa'daasavɨna Gotɨyare tewaanyara Juthɨya mwaalyaraavɨne nɨgwia dazanna wɨjaaya'ne dɨmari'bwarakyidevɨna yɨhɨthɨma! Nɨmɨ Galezɨya mwaalyaraavɨre Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨ mena wɨdakagevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ nayaa sasara jɨla!

Yuya Saadehasa sarɨmɨjɨya gazaizai wikɨya pɨrɨkɨne nɨgwia maa'denna nayaa yawɨrana! “Gotɨyai nayaa nyɨgaimwade'na aawawɨnya nayaa yena nɨgwia naanga maa'mweinyɨ dɨngaka!” yawɨ'da kwaala naanga marajaapalojɨ gave pɨba nayaa pada'galakana! Yɨ “Gotɨyai nayaa nyɨgaimwade'na aawawɨnya'ne nɨgwia maalɨka maa'mweinyɨ dɨngaka!” yɨ kwaala maalɨka nayaa pada'galakana! Sarevɨ dɨvi “Polɨ bi'mavojɨyagaa' sahwaraavɨna wɨjaaya'ne nɨgwia yarai namari'bwarakaadɨka!” dapɨjɨ sara jɨla! Yɨ sarevɨna mi'na jide'nanyɨra.

Dɨvi nɨmɨ kabi'mava'mujɨ yɨ sagaa' sarɨmɨ saihi a'mwe pwara Anga Jeruzaalemɨna sarɨmɨre yanga daza' makulya'neraavɨ nayaa dɨthahɨlakyideihɨlyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ sahwaraavɨne paazɨya' “Yɨ dahwara nɨgwia makabɨwaasara a'mwe tewaanyarera,” dɨnɨke' wɨjaava'mujɨ maryaasɨwɨjara wɨpɨ'dere.
Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ dara yawɨ'mujainyɨ “Nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ wɨwɨneinyɨ dɨngaka!” yɨ sahwara nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannɨgwawaaderera.
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ kaanya wawa'mujɨ Maazathonɨya sɨmagɨdaasɨ yalotakudehaa' yɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mavɨdeinyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ Maazathonɨya saba kaanya tɨvi'na yamarya'mujɨ

yɨ sarɨmɨjɨ pɨgaa'na yɨhye'mwannamwaalɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Yɨ sarɨmɨjɨ kuna mwaaida'mujɨ aalɨmavajɨnaake' mena yɨwawojɨyagaa'neinyɨ dɨngaka? Nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ anga pɨbanna wɨdehaa' yɨ sarɨmɨ “Nemɨ tusavɨne wɨmakwawaana!” dɨpɨja' nɨmɨnyɨna sara jideihɨlyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ daresɨ. Maalɨkegaa' nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yune tusagaa'na wanganya'na “Aala!” dɨwa. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Naangei avaaina yawɨraja' nɨmɨre sɨmunya' daresɨ. Nɨmɨ saamɨnyagaa' sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalɨdeinyɨ.
Nabaai “Nɨmɨ dava anga Epazaazɨ kuna mwaalɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ yune Juyaraavɨre Munne Pedikozɨya' mena kyojɨ kaanya wɨdeinyɨ,” yawɨ'manɨge.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai tuta naange' nɨmɨnyɨne' mena baasɨwa'. Yɨ nɨmɨ wawɨnya yɨnɨga wi'na ya'ne' warɨ'. “Naangerera yɨma'nɨpɨka!” dena nabaai dava Naangerɨne yɨkamaanga kwalaalya kwarajɨ mwaalɨna yɨgasa'na wawɨnya sa' maremwaalɨdeinyɨ.

Dɨvidaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Timoti bi'mavajai “Gamɨre munyɨ' kave mwaalana! Nemɨreba lɨka myanna!” dapɨjɨ tewaanya nayaa duwila! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ yɨvanɨgevaaibɨ' sai Naangere wawɨnya' yadelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ pwai kwai sarɨna dara nyawɨradɨ'! “A'mwe mɨgɨnyalyɨ. Yaasɨwa'nanyalyɨ. Sarɨ wanganakɨma!” Yɨ sahwarɨ nayaa maarapɨjɨ “Polɨmyawɨnna nayaa yagalaawana!” dapɨjɨ sarɨmɨ nayaa kwaamu'na yadɨvɨ' dɨvidaa'nyɨ sahwarɨ tusavɨ dɨmakwidelyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sahwarɨna neya'mwe kwaraavɨnajɨ yemwaalɨdelyɨ.

Neya'mwei Aapolɨzarɨna yɨda'mwa'daasa' daresɨ. Nɨmɨ sahwarɨ yagaala dɨragɨnna wɨdeinyɨ. Saihwaigɨ nya'mwe pwarajɨ saraayawɨnna dɨwia! Dena kɨrɨ' sahwai dahaa' kaanya wɨya'na “Aala!” dɨwa'dɨ'. Sai “Dɨvi sagaaku' nabaai nayaannanyagaa' wangamuneinyɨ dɨngaka!” dozɨ yɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna sai kaanna wɨna yadelyɨ.

“Kayaaka nyɨgainaadɨka!” dadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ mala nayaa yɨwannadɨvɨ' sarɨnnya Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwangevɨ dɨragɨnna dɨthaayɨla! Sarɨmɨ a'mwe nebulya'nanyaihi nayaa dɨmwaalyɨla! Nayaa yɨhivaimwadaa'nyɨ dɨragɨnna dɨmwaalyɨla!
Gazaza yadɨvɨ' yɨ Gotɨyarɨnajɨ a'mwe kwaraavɨnajɨ tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nadevɨ sara jɨla!

Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨ mena dara yawɨ'manɨga'. Sɨtepaanazalyɨ gamɨre angevɨyarajɨ aayagaa' kumɨdaasɨ yuya Gɨriza mwaalyaraavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarera yɨma'nesare. Yevera nabaai kunnya yune sɨmunyangɨna a'mwe Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨ wɨdaaya'nera mwaaihasare. Yɨ sahwaraavɨna dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨde'nanyɨ.
“Dazaraavɨjɨ yɨ a'mwe yuya sahwaraavɨ gaimwadɨvɨ' wawɨnya dazavɨ mɨraagɨkɨ'dɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ dalaangewɨ mwalaana!” dapɨjɨ sara jɨla!

Sɨtepaanazalyɨ Posunaatazalyɨ Aakaaikazalyɨ sara nɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨwa'daasare. Yɨ daza'na nɨmɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨvanɨge. Davanna yɨbwa'nadɨvɨsaihɨrɨneba sarɨmɨjɨya sahwara bama'mwa'daasa'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sahwara nɨmɨre kuryarɨ gaalya'na nyɨgaimwamanɨgasare. Yɨ kɨgaa' sarɨmɨre kurya kwaraavɨjɨ wɨgaimwamwaa'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ sasareraavɨ yaya' munyaba makɨlya'ne' tewaanyasɨ.
Pɨrovijɨ Ezɨya mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyara “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨwaa'. Aakwilaajɨ Pɨrɨzɨlasɨ sayolyɨ sayore angevɨ kusɨlaanyavɨyarajɨ Naangerɨna “Neya'mweihi!” dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨwaa'.
Davanya neya'mwe yuyara “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨwaa'. Gotɨyare saburɨ yuyaihi pwai pwarɨ pwai pwarɨ tewaanya'na maangwɨdaayɨlaaya dɨmarinyɨla!
Nɨmɨ Polɨnyɨ pɨkarya nyɨdayɨvanɨkerɨ pɨkarɨyɨsarɨ' maarena nɨnnya asɨlyɨ dara yɨda'mwesɨ. Nya'mweihi!
A'mwe pwai Naangerɨna tewaanya muvu'nyɨ yajai Dɨkevɨ Gotɨyai wɨmarasɨ'nadelyɨ. Nemɨre Naangei nemɨnyawɨnna walaabana!
Naanga Jizaazare kale'na gaimwange' sa' sarɨmɨjɨ yanga yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!
Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasaihi yuyaihɨrɨna nyɨvu'nadevwi yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!
Koridɨ Mwaalyaihi, nya'mweihi

Polɨnyɨ Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai gamɨnyɨneba nyɨdaasadeinyɨ nyɨdahɨlakakeinyɨ pɨkarya da' yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Nɨmɨjɨ neya'mwei Timotilyɨ sainaai Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaihi anga Koridɨ mwaaihasaihɨlyɨ Pɨrovijɨ Gɨriza yuneba Gotɨyare tewaanyara mwaaihasarajɨ saihɨrɨna yɨhɨthɨwoi.
Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨya kwalyɨ yanga gaimwange'na tewaanna yɨhika! Yakɨlyɨyagaa' kwaamu'nanyaburɨ tewaanna yɨhɨmwaaihika!

Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya nayaa maryaana! Sai Gotɨyai nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ Ganɨmaangelyɨ. Yɨ sai Nɨmwai kale'na gaimwanga naange'na aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Yɨ sai Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyaraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ taanginya yuyanna yɨvaimwadelyɨ.

Sahwai yuya taanginya neyɨma'nadengɨna nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ nayaa neyɨvaimwadelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ neyɨvaimwadevaaibɨsavɨ yɨ nemɨ sareina a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ taanginya gazasa' kɨnɨnnakeraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yɨvaimwagaanneine.

Neyɨvaimwade sa' dare'nanyɨ. Daanga naange' Kɨraazɨtɨyai maarakesɨ. Nabaai nemɨ kwainajɨ ma'daanyasɨ. Yɨ daange' yune naanga neyɨma'nadevaaibɨ' yɨ nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨvaimwangebwi yune naanga neyɨma'nade'nanyɨ.
