Nabaai nemɨ taanginya' maraaja daza' Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨne sɨmunyavɨ yɨhivaimwagya'nesɨ sahwai yɨhɨvadaihasamaarya'nesɨ sara yɨma'nade'nanyɨ. Yɨ nabaai Gotɨyai nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ neyɨvaimwagaza' yɨ sa' sarɨmɨre sɨmunya kɨrɨvɨjɨ yɨvaimwagathesɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ kave kihyojɨ yɨ nemɨ daanga ma'daanyabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ sasare maapɨja' dɨragɨnna daavapɨjɨ nayaa jide'nanyɨ.

Nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Sarɨmɨ daange' nemɨjɨ ye'mwannamaa'manɨgatabaaibɨ' nabaai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nemɨnyɨjɨ yɨvaimwangebwi dɨneye'mwannamaaryideihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sare'na nemɨ dɨragɨnna dara yemwaidaanyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna dɨthaayideihɨlyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nya'mweihi, nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Nemɨnyɨ Pɨrovijɨ Ezɨya dazavɨ neyɨma'nake' taanginya dazavɨna sarɨmɨ jawɨranganyɨla! Taanginya naanga sa' nemarulawakakesɨ. Yada yɨ nemɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ nebulya'na wavɨlava'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nemɨ dara yawɨro. Nemɨ gaalyaina mwalaadeina daaka! Nemɨ balaadeinera.

Naanga nebulya'nanyasɨ. Nemɨ saina taanginya' yɨbwakɨmanɨgo. Yawɨbwa'dei mena dakabaaibɨ' nemɨ balaade'na. Yɨ Gotɨyai “Kumɨ kunnya dɨragɨnya sabwina nyawɨralɨmwagapɨdɨka! Aawa. Nɨmɨ a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ ayahi yɨdɨkaa'dɨnyainyɨ nayaa yawɨralɨmwagapɨka!” kada' sasare sa' yɨma'nakesɨ.

Kayaa'nanaanga daza nemɨnyɨ kayaa'na neramakadaasɨ Gotɨyai sahwai nemɨnyɨ ayɨna nevadaihasamaarakelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai dahaa' sahwai kuna nevadaihasamaa'manɨkelyɨ. Yɨ nemɨ sahwarɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaa nayaa dara yemwaaimanɨgoinera “Yɨ nabaai dɨvi kɨgaasɨ sahwai ayɨna nevadaihasamaaradelyɨ.”

Yɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'na nemɨnyɨ nayaa ye'mwannanegaimwadaapɨjɨ sara nevadaihasamaaradelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨre yɨdaanganya' kadɨka wɨ'nada yɨ sahwai yanga tewaanna neyaja'na yɨ yuya kwalaalya dazara wɨ'napɨjɨ yɨ nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨpɨ'derera kwala naangera. Yɨ “Sare' yɨma'nana!” dona yɨhɨthɨwo.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ nemɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba makinya' yaasɨwa'na mɨ'. Aawa. Sare' daresɨ. Nemɨre sɨmunyai padaihɨrakyai dara jalɨkurakadelyɨ. Kwaaka davakɨ mwaalyaraayawɨ nemɨ kaanya yamaryadaanyanna nawɨ'nya yagoinera. Yɨ nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨ nawɨ'nya naanga yagoinera. Yɨ daresɨ. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ tewaanaanga sabwinajɨ yɨda'nanya nebulya'nanyabwinajɨ nejaavadevurɨ sara yagovulyɨ. A'mwe kɨlaakejɨkɨyabulyɨyaraavɨre sɨdusabwi nemarima'naabadevwi mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyare yune yanga gaimwange'na negaimwadaasɨ nemɨ kaanya sasara yamaryoinera.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yagaala ge' yɨda'daanyaina mɨ'. Aawa. Yagaalya' sarɨmɨ yɨnɨga wi'na dangadɨvɨsagaa' yagaala savɨre aaya kaavɨlyavɨ jawɨranganyideihɨlyɨ sa' sahɨrɨ'na. Yunegaa' sarɨmɨ nemɨnyɨna nebulya'na jawɨryideihɨlyɨreva dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨ yemwaaihe.

Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' nemɨnyɨna maalɨ'na yawɨretabaaibɨ' yɨ yunegaa' nebulya'na jawɨryideihɨlyɨ. Yɨ daresɨ. Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazare Yɨrɨkerɨkɨ sarɨmɨre nayaa dɨmwaalyide'na nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaadevaaibɨ' yɨ sarɨmɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' makaboinaavɨne yaya' munyaba dɨmakɨlyideihɨlyɨ.
Yɨ sɨmunya dazasarevɨ dɨragɨnna dara yawɨrakɨwa'de. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨdaasɨ wɨdeinyɨra. “Yɨ pɨgasaai yanga gaimwange' maapɨka!” da'mujɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna wɨdeinyɨra.

Yɨ saba nɨmɨ mwaala'mujɨ yɨhyahalya'mava'mujɨ Maazathonɨyana kaanya yamarya'na wɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ Maazathonɨya yagalya'mava'mujɨ pɨgasaai sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayahi bɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'manɨge. Nɨmɨnyɨ kamaranyaasapɨjɨ nɨmɨ Juthɨyana wɨde'nanyɨ. Sara yawɨrakɨwa'de.

Gatha'darevaka! Sara yawɨrakɨwa'de kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna mabiwa'de. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ yagaalya' gazare dɨwa'deinyɨ daaka! Aawa. “Sara yɨdeinyɨ,” nebwina dadɨnyainyɨ. A'mweraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨyabwina yawɨrakadɨnya “Nɨmɨ yagaala dadɨ ‘Yo! Yo!’ kɨrɨ' ‘Aawa! Aawa!’ sɨmunyavɨ yawɨrɨma!” dadɨ yawɨrakadɨnyainyɨ daa! Aawa. “Sara yɨdeinyɨ,” dena yɨwa'deinyɨ.
Gotɨyai nebulyabwi lɨmwaga'devɨ nemɨ kwainajɨ nebulya'na wɨdadaanyainera. Yɨ yagaala sa' sarɨmɨnyɨne' yɨhɨthadaanya' maangevɨ “Yo!” wa'dori kɨrɨ' sɨmunyavɨ “Aawa!” yawɨ'manɨgo' mɨ'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai nebulya'na yadere Gawaalɨvaangei Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨna sarɨmɨnyaba nemɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakolyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨjɨ Saailaazalyɨ Timotilyɨ saina yɨhɨzɨwaakoi sahwai pɨgaa' “Yayo!” pɨgaa' “Aawano!” kɨnɨnnakei mɨ'. Aawa. Yuyagaa' sahwai gamɨre yune naanga nebulya'na daka yuya sangɨna “Yayo!” kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yuyagaa' nebulyabwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake gazasa' yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai “Yayo!” daka yunebanna sara yakelyɨ. Sahwarɨ kumɨre “Yayo!” wɨwarɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake yunebanna yɨma'nake'na Gotɨyarɨne yaya' makɨlya'neina Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaanyɨ. Nebulyasɨ. Sara yɨma'nana!
Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihovɨ nemɨnyɨ yɨ sarɨmɨ kwaihɨrɨjɨ dɨragɨnya neyɨvaimwadei yɨ yune gamɨ sai Gotɨyalyɨ. Yɨ sai nemɨnyɨ dahɨlakya'nei gannya Kuryarɨ nemɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ dɨngakelyɨ.

Sahwai nemɨnyɨna yawɨ'na “Sahwara dɨragɨnna dara yawɨpɨka! ‘Nebulyasɨ. Nemɨ Gotɨyareinera. Nemɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna nemaredaa'deinera.’ ” Sara yawɨ'na yaka gamɨre yavɨkwajɨke' nejaavada nemɨ sara yɨma'nya'neinaavɨna gannya Kuryarɨ yanga nejaavakelyɨ. Nabaai nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ sɨnnawɨnya'bɨsai Kurya Tewaanyarɨ nejaavakelyɨ. Gotɨyai gannya yuya nejaaya'nenna Kurya Tewaanyai pimagɨnya naangeva' mena nejaavakelyɨ. Yɨ nemɨ dara yawɨ'daanyɨ. Naanga nebulya'nanyasɨ. Gotɨyai gannya Kurya Tewaanyarɨ nejaavake'na dɨvi yuya nejaavadelyɨ.

Nabaai nɨmɨ sainyɨ Gotɨyai sasarei nɨmɨnyɨne jalɨkurakya'nerɨ jaka wɨdɨwa. Yɨ nɨmɨ kwaasɨ dɨwɨja' nɨmɨre gaalyabwi yɨwawadesɨ. Kɨrɨ' aawa. Nɨmɨ naanga nebulya'na dɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yavada'gaidɨ taanginya ayɨna wɨjaaya'na “Aala!” dɨwa'de. Sarevɨdaasɨ “Sarɨmɨnyawɨ Koridɨna bɨdeinyɨ,” dɨwa'de kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ yarai wɨwa'deinyɨ mɨ'.

Sare kɨrɨvɨ nemɨ sarɨmɨre lɨmwangeburɨ dɨragɨnna mamareyɨhɨmwaalyɨgo. Aawa. Sarɨmɨre yɨlaayabwi marima'naabya'na nemɨ yɨhye'mwannayɨhɨvaimwadaanyaine. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨ sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna mena daa'manɨgasaihɨlyɨ.
Yɨ nɨnnya yune sɨmunyavɨnanya' mena wi'na dara dɨwa. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna sarɨmɨnyɨ munyɨ' taanga yɨvalakya'na ayahi mwɨyɨ yɨdeinyɨ. Dena mwɨyɨwa'de.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ munyɨ' taanginya yɨhɨzaavɨwɨja' yɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya' yɨlaaya ya'na yɨnɨga wi'na aaihwai yannelaka! Aawa. Sarɨmɨre munyɨ' taanga mena yɨhivalakɨwɨja' yɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya' yɨlaaya nyɨvalya'nera a'mwera pwara mɨ'.

Sarɨmɨ a'mweihi nɨmɨnyɨ yɨlaaya nyɨgaibɨneihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanya' wanganaawɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna nɨmɨre munyɨ' taanga kamaa'mudɨka! “Mi'na kyavada'galapɨri wɨdeinyɨ,” dena sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨwa'deinyɨ mɨ'. Sahɨrɨsavɨne'na kɨgaa' paazɨya' nɨmɨ yɨhithave. Yɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨrɨna dɨragɨnna dara lɨmwamwa'de. Nɨmɨ pɨnɨnna yɨlaaya yɨwɨja' yɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihi yɨlaaya avaaina yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sagaa' sarɨmɨre mwaalyabwina nɨmɨre munyɨ' taanginya naangesɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya' daanga naangesɨ kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ nabaai kɨdalaalya kwalaalyangɨ pɨkarya yɨhithave. Paazɨya daza' “Sarɨmɨnyɨ munyɨ' yune taanga wivalakɨma!” majena yɨhithave'na mɨ'. Aawa. “Sarɨmɨ ‘O Polɨmɨ nemɨnyɨna tewaanya naanga wɨvu'nɨvanɨkelyɨ,’ yawɨrangabɨka!” dena yɨhithayesɨ.

A'mwe akwai gamɨrebwina kya' kale neyadaa'nyɨ sai yune nɨmɨ gaveinyɨ kale sa' manyɨvanɨ'. Aawa. Sahwarɨna kale kɨbawenna yuyaihɨrɨ yɨhivanɨ'. Nɨmɨ “Savɨna taanginya naanga nujaavɨwɨdɨka!” yagaala dena “Kɨbawenna,” yɨhɨthɨwe'nanyɨ.
A'mwe dazarerɨ a'mwe kwalaalyaihi mi'na yeve' yɨ sa' sarɨ wi'nanne' tɨvɨkɨ'mwa'daasasɨ.

Sarevɨdaasɨ yɨ dahaa' sarɨmɨ mudɨka pɨrɨ' pɨbwi jɨla! Yɨ sahwai gannya kayaa'nanyaburɨna kale nayaa wiadaa'nyɨ gamɨre kayaa'nanya sa' yange'na marasɨ'napɨjɨ sahware sɨmunyavɨ kave nayaa jɨvaimwagila! Munyɨ' taanga naanga naange' nebulya'na nagalavɨlawakadɨka a'mwe dazarɨ!
Sarevɨdaasɨ yɨ nɨmɨ yaamɨjɨ dɨragɨnna dara dɨvanɨge. Sahwarɨ sarɨmɨre kale ya sabwi ayɨna jɨvwarɨdaakwila!
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. “Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨre yagaalya' yuna mɨdɨbɨzaihi daaka?” dena sarɨmɨnyɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaalya'ne' “Yawɨranganɨde'nanyɨ,” dena sɨnnawɨ pɨkarya pɨrɨ' a'mwe sarɨnajɨ nɨmɨ yɨdavesɨ.

Yɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ a'mwe sarɨ wagɨlya' marasɨ'nɨwa'daasa' yɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨ marasɨ'nɨweinyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ wagɨlya marasɨ'nya'ne kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ daakajɨ yɨ sa Kɨraazɨtɨyare tɨnnyarɨ gaimwanga yɨhya'neinyɨ nɨmɨ marasɨ'nɨwengɨ.

Nemɨ nayaa sara yaana! “Saataanɨ nemɨnyɨ kwaasɨ neyojɨ nanevɨlawakadɨka!” dawaajɨ sara yaana! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sahware sɨmunya kayaa'nanyabwi mena yawɨ'daanyaine. Sare'na taanga naanga sarɨne nayaa marasɨ'naana!
Pɨgaasagaa' anga Tɨrawaazɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakya'neinyɨ bi'mavena yɨ Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ tusa' yɨnɨga wi'na wɨjɨwaakya'na kanyɨbaasɨwa'dɨ' wɨjɨwaakɨwa'de.

Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre sɨmunya' kave mwariwa'dɨ'. Nɨmɨnyɨ nya'mwei Taaitazai anga sabanna sarɨmɨnyɨne yagaala mamakabyakerɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨwa'de. Aawa. Sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dɨ Tɨrawaazɨ mwaalyaraavɨ nayaa yagalya'ma'na yena Pɨrovijɨ Maazathonɨyana bena bi'ma'mwa'de.

Kɨrɨ' saba Taaitazarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa'de'na Gotɨyarɨ nɨmɨ suya wɨdɨvanɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyai yuya kayaa'nanyangɨjɨ yuya kayaa'nanyaraavɨjɨ malyavɨ mena dathɨwagakevɨdaa'nyɨ yuyagaa' Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ yaaraya neyadaa'nyɨ yɨlaaya yɨwadaanyaine. Yɨ sahwai gamɨre yagaalya' nejɨwaakada yɨ yuya pimagɨ wɨjɨwakamaryadaawojɨ a'mweraavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wibwarɨdaakwadelyɨ. Yawɨta daza' sa' wabatɨrɨnya' yuneba winɨgode'bɨsasɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna wɨjɨwakamaryadaanya' wabatɨrɨnya' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yɨma'naabada yɨ Gotɨyaryawɨnna wawode'bɨsaine. Nemɨ wɨjɨwakamaryadaanyagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai wɨvadaihasamaa'manɨkeraavɨjɨ pwara kayaaka yɨgainɨvanɨgasaraavɨjɨ saraayawɨnna tɨrɨnya' wawodesɨ.

Yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sahwara kayaaka yɨgainɨvanɨgasaraavɨ yɨ sa' barya'ne tɨrɨnyasɨ. Yɨ sa' baryabwi sahwaraavɨ marima'naabathesɨ. Yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Pwara wɨvadaihasamaa'manɨkeraavɨ sa' gaalyabwine tɨrɨnyasɨ. Yɨ sa' sahwaraavɨ gaalyabwi marima'naabathesɨ. We'! Wawɨnya daza' gannya dɨragɨnyavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na aaihwai yannelaka!

Sare kɨrɨ' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe kwalaalyara nɨgwia maa'nya'nera Gotɨyare yagaalya' yaasɨwa' wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨtabaaibɨtaina mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnya daza' ma'daa yɨ nemɨ yaasɨwa' kwaasɨ yagaala damaryadaanyaina mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ gamɨre yagaala yuya yɨda'na mɨjɨwodaanyangɨ. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihoina yɨ Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ Gotɨyarɨne jalɨkurakadaa wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨgo.

Nemɨ ayahi yamaasa' yadaa yune nemɨnne yaya'na munyaba dahamakimanɨgo! A'mwe pwara paazɨya' kumɨnne yaya' makɨlya'ne' lɨmwamanɨgatabaaibɨ' a'mwera paazɨya sabɨsa' nemɨnyɨne' yɨhidavesa' negainɨnɨkeina dɨngaka! Sarɨmɨ sasare pɨkarya nemɨnyɨne' nayaa jɨthavide' negainɨnɨkeina dɨngaka!

Paazɨya nemɨnne yayavɨ munyaba makɨlya'ne sa' yɨ sarɨmɨ sahwaihɨlyɨra. Yɨ paazɨya dazavɨre pɨkarya sa' yɨ nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ wɨlarɨ'. Yɨ dara yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yɨvanɨgasabwi paazɨya'bɨsabwina dara dɨnɨ' “Polɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnya' nayaa yadelyɨra.” A'mwe yuyara paazɨya daza' yawɨrangadɨvɨ' yɨ sahwara dangadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Sarɨmɨnyawɨ nemɨ nayaa yɨhɨthaayo saihi Kɨraazɨtɨyai pɨkarya yɨdavakeihi ku'maayaba marima'naabahesasɨ. Yɨ paazɨya daza' sahwai yɨgɨyasɨ yɨdavaka' mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai gaalya' kɨnɨnnakere Kuryalyɨ sahwai pɨkarya yɨdavakesɨ. Sahwai sipadasɨkaarɨ Gotɨyai yɨdayaakabaaibɨ' pwaipwairiramaaraka yɨdavaka' mɨ'. Aawa. Gannya yɨkwia' kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunyangɨ yɨdavakesɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ yɨdavakesɨ.

Aaya kaavɨla dazavɨre yagaalya' yɨ daresɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai negaimwagya'nei gannya dɨragɨnya' nejaavanɨ'. Sare'na lɨka mi yadaa Gotɨyarɨ nebulya'na lɨmwadaa sara nayaa yoinera. Nemɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnya' sasarevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ.

Nebulyasɨ. Yune nemɨ sainana yɨnɨga wi'na yaanneina mɨ'. Sarevɨ yɨ “Yune nemɨ sainaavɨdaa'nyɨ nawɨ'nya pɨnɨ marima'naabadeinera!” madaanna! Aawa. Gotɨyai gave pwainanyai sahwai nemɨnyɨne yɨnɨga wi'na yaanne' wakadelyɨ.

Yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare yagaala nelɨmwagarɨka mudɨkevɨ wɨdayadaanyaina yɨnɨga wi'na yaanneinaavɨ nayaa neyɨmavɨmwaaihadelyɨ sahwai. Yagaala nelɨmwagarɨka daza' Kɨwɨnyavɨne pɨkarya yɨda'nɨka sa'bɨta' mɨ'. Aawa. Sa' yune Kurya Tewaanya sarengɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨwɨnyavɨre pɨkarya a'mweraavɨ dara wibwarɨdaakwadesɨ. Galazekɨvaimwaana! Dɨvaideigɨnyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Kurya Tewaanyai yagaala tewaanyavɨna a'mweraavɨna gaalyabwi wɨjaavadelyɨ.

Yɨ Kɨwɨnya dazavɨne' Gotɨyai sɨlyarɨ yɨdayaake' yɨ dazavɨre wawɨnya' baryabwi marima'naabakebulyɨ. Nabaai wawɨnya daza' Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya kɨrɨsɨ yɨma'nakesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Ne Mozɨzare sɨnnyɨ' byaanna dɨragɨnya' wannakikɨ. Yɨzɨrelɨyara byaanna dɨragɨnya dazavɨna sahware sɨnnyɨkɨ yɨnɨga wi'na baihanareta' mɨ'. Byaanna dɨragɨnya daza' maalɨka wannyɨna yaka dɨvi yɨwawaka, kɨrɨ' yɨnɨga wi'na baihanareta' mɨ'.
Yɨ kɨgaa' wawɨnya sare' byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai Kurya Tewaanyarɨ a'mweraavɨna wɨjaaya'ne wawɨnya' yɨ sa' dazavɨ wavɨla'da Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya' naanga naanga maa'de' daaka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨwɨnya dazavɨre wawɨnya' dɨragɨnna nejɨda'daa'nyɨ nemɨ dɨna “Kayaa'nanyabwina nemɨ baryabwi maraanneinera.” Yɨ sare' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala mudɨka dazavɨre wawɨnya' dade' “Kurya Tewaanyarɨna sahwara yɨda'maraangerera,” yɨ daza' Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya naange' kɨnɨnnake' wawɨnya pɨrɨvɨ naanna wavɨla'desɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ Kɨwɨnyavɨre wawɨnya' byaanna dɨragɨnya' maryaakesɨ. Yɨ sare' dahaa' kunesɨra. Wawɨnya mudɨka daza' yɨ savɨ yune dɨragɨnna wavɨla'da nemɨ yawɨ'daanyɨ. Yagaala mudɨkevɨre byaanna dɨragɨnya yune naange' warɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨwɨnyavɨre' mwarika!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨwɨnyavɨ wawɨnya daza' Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨ yɨma'nake' mena yɨwia'nesɨ. Kɨrɨ' Kuryarɨne wawɨnya daza' Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnake' yuyagaa' waragwothesɨ. Sare'na sahɨrɨ' ayavɨ yune naanga naanga wavɨla'desɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala sare' kɨnɨnnakeina “Byaanna sa' waragode'nana,” dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaa nemɨ lɨka mi yadaa ku'maayaba yagaala sa' nayaa yɨda'na jalɨkurakadaanyaine.

Nemɨ Mozɨzaibɨ' yadaanyaina mɨ'. Sahwai gannya sɨnnyɨkɨ kwaabɨhannyabaalyɨ kawaaka yɨrakɨnakelyɨ. Yɨ byaanna dɨragɨnya daza' maalɨ'na yɨwɨna yaka yɨnahu naanga yuya' yɨwɨna yaake'na “Yɨzɨrelɨyara sa' tɨnna nanyangabɨthɨka!” daka kawaaka yɨrakɨnakelyɨ.

Yɨ Mozɨzare wawɨnya' sahwara nayaa myawɨri. Aawa. Kumɨre sɨmunya nebulya'na bɨpale'na yakengɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuyagaa' sahwara Gotɨyare yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka ayavɨre yagaalya' dangadɨvɨ' yɨ yagaala savɨ kwaabɨhannya daza' kuna warɨ'. Yɨ dahaakɨgaasɨ kuna mu'nyadɨvɨkɨ. Sahwara kwaabɨhannya sa' mamarasɨ'nyasɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai gave pwainanyarɨ sahwarɨna Gotɨyai daza' marasɨ'delyɨ.
Aawa. Gazagaasagaa' sahwara Mozɨzare yagaalya' dangadɨvɨ' kwaabɨhannyabaai kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ bwakalɨmwagarɨ'. Sahwara myawɨryadɨvɨkɨ. Yɨ dahaakɨgaasɨ kunanyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' gazagaasagaa' pwai kwai Naangeryawɨnna kagɨnyɨwagozɨ yɨ sahwarɨ sɨmunyavɨ kwaabɨhannya daza' marasɨ'nadelyɨ.
Yɨ Naangei sai Kuryalyɨra. Nabaai Naangere Kuryai a'mwe pwarɨ mwaalɨ'. Yɨ aawa, yuya pɨnɨ yagaala wɨjɨmwagaraka ayavɨ a'mwe sahwarɨ wɨla yɨrakɨvanɨkai mɨ'. Aawa. Sai sahɨbanna tewaanna mwaalɨ'.

Yɨ nemɨ yuyaina nemɨre sɨnnyɨkaavɨ lɨka yulyakya'ne maayaina mwaaihoinera. A'mwera sɨnɨmwavananya yennadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' nemɨ Naangere byaanna dɨragɨnya' wangadaa Naangere a'mabaalyaina yɨma'nɨvanɨgo. Yɨ Naanga sahwai, Kuryai gannya byaanna dɨragɨnya daza' nayaa marima'naabya neyadaa'nyɨ yuyagaa' nemɨ byaanna dɨragɨnya' naanga naanga ma'daanyaine. Yɨ Naangere a'mabaalyaina kuna yɨma'nadaanyaine.
Sarevɨ Gotɨyai kale'na negaimwagakabaaibɨ' wawɨnya nawɨ'nya daza' wɨdayadaanyainaavɨna nejaavakesɨ. Savɨ yɨ nemɨ wawɨnya daza'na dɨragɨnna dadaa maa'na neyɨdeina mɨ'.

Aawa. Nemɨ wagɨla kɨnɨnnakebwi lɨka yulyarɨkeburɨ bule'nanya' mena wɨjavadaanyaine. Nemɨ kwaasɨya saburɨ yamaryadaanyaina mɨ'. Sara myadaa yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' maravɨla'nya yadaanyaina mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ tɨnnyarɨ yagaala nebulya'nanya' ku'maayabanna marima'naabya yadaanya' yɨ a'mweraavɨre sɨmunya gazarɨzarɨ dara yɨbwakɨdɨvɨsasɨ. Yɨ apozelɨyara sareraavɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaana!
Kɨrɨ' nemɨ yagaala tewaanya daza' wɨjɨwakadaanya savɨ kawaaka yɨrakɨnaja' yɨ sa' a'mwe saba sana yɨwɨna ya'neraavɨna kawaaka yɨrakɨvanɨkesɨ.

Yɨ dathahaasaraavɨre gotɨyai Saataanɨ a'mwe sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadɨvɨta dazaraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ gidɨravalɨmwagata yadelyɨ. Yɨ yagaala tewaanyavɨne' Kɨraazɨtɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨre baake' kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wannade' mɨ'. Yɨ sarevɨ tihɨralɨmwagata yadelyɨ. Yɨ sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ tɨnna mwanganyadɨvɨsalyɨ. Yɨ sai Gotɨyare a'mabaala nebulya'nanyalyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ yagaalya' yune nemɨnyɨne' wɨjɨwakadaanyaina mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ yagaalya' dara jalɨkurakadaanyaine. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai sai Naangelyɨ. Yɨ Jizaazarɨna nemɨ sarɨmɨre yɨhɨthayadaanyainera.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai mena jaakelyɨ “Jɨhɨnyavɨdaasɨ baake' mwadana!” Yɨ Gotɨyai sarei gamɨre baake' nemɨnyɨne sɨmunyangɨ banemwadakesɨ. Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya' Kɨraazɨtɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨ warɨke' nemɨ yawɨranganya'neinaavɨna baaka sa' banemwadakesɨ.

Nabaai kɨrɨ' nawɨ'nya daza' kɨnɨnnakeina, kwadɨka yaasɨwa'nanyaraavɨ Gotɨyai nawɨ'nya daza' maradɨngikakabaaibɨsaine. Gotɨyai “A'mwe yuyara dɨragɨnya nawɨ'nyaange' yawɨrangabɨka!” kada' dara yɨma'nakesɨ. Dɨragɨnya naanga daza' yune nawɨ'nya' yɨ sa' Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyasɨ. Sa' yɨ nemɨre' mɨ'.

Yɨ nemɨre wawɨnya' yadaa yuyanna nemɨnyɨ taange' neyɨma'nadeine. Sare kɨrɨ' sa' kayaaka nebulya'na neyɨgalakadeina mɨ'. Yawɨta kwalaalya nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ nerihɨralɨmwaga'dengɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' nemɨre sɨmunya yunebanna yɨwɨya yada mɨ'.

A'mwera “Sahwaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalaana!” dadɨvɨ' nega'mɨjamakwodɨvɨsaine. Sara neyadaapɨri kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ neyagalya'ma'dei mɨ'. Sahwara nemɨnyɨ mala neradaapɨri wala'daanyaine. Sare kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai negaimwadaa'nyɨ nemɨ kayaaka nebulya'na yɨdaanyaina mɨ'.

Yuyagaa' nennya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ Jizaazare baryabwi ma'daanyaine. Yadaa kaanya yamaryadaanyaine. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Jizaazare gaala sabwi kɨbulyɨ kumɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabana!” kada' sareina kaanya yamaryadaanyaine.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuyagaa' gaala mwaidaanyainaavɨ Jizaazarɨna a'mwera a'mwatamakya saza baryaburɨ nemarɨmwangadɨvɨsaine. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Jizaazare gaala kɨbwi yɨ kumɨre kɨlaakejɨ' balya'nejɨkɨ ku'maayaba marima'naabana!” kada' nemarɨmwangadɨvɨsaine.
Sarevɨ barya sabwi nemɨnyɨ neyadesɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai gaalyabwina sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhyadevulyɨ.

Nemɨnyɨna Kuryai dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi nejaavakeine. Yɨ sasare dazabwi Gotɨyare bukuya' yɨda'nɨkabaaibɨsarɨ avaaina wɨjayaakesɨ. Yɨ dara dɨnɨ' “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna mena lɨmwagevɨ yɨ yagaalya' wɨdeinyɨ.” Lɨmwanga avaalyabwi maaroina kwainajɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaanyavɨ yagaalya' wɨdadaanyaine.

Yɨ nemɨ mena dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨgo. Gotɨyai Naanga Jizaazarɨ yɨdɨkaavakei yɨ sahwai nemɨ Jizaazalyɨya kwainaavɨ neyɨdɨkaavadelyɨ. Yɨ nemɨnyɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyɨjɨ sainaavɨ nemakwawojɨ gamɨnyaba gidɨhusaba nemwaaihadelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuya daza sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwagya'ne neyɨma'nɨvanɨkengɨ. Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨre yanga gaimwangebwi a'mwe kwalaalya naanga naangeraavɨ yunebanna wɨwarana!” kada' sara neyɨma'nɨvanɨkengɨ. Yɨ yuya sahwara Gotɨyarɨ suya naanga naange yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨne yaya' munyabanna makibɨ'dere.
Dazahɨrɨvɨ yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' dɨragɨnna dadaa maa'na neyɨdeina mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨre kɨlaakejɨ' kayaaka kuna yade kɨrɨ' yuya yɨrɨka sarɨkɨ yuyagaa' nemɨre kuryai mudɨkei dɨragɨnyai yɨma'nadelyɨ.

Yɨ daresɨ. Gotɨyarɨna nemɨ dara yawɨ'daanyɨ. Taanga nemɨnyɨ neyɨma'nade daza' wana maalɨkesɨ. Yɨ sa' wana kɨbawe maalɨkegaa' waradesɨ. Nabaai taanga wana maalɨka sa' dɨvi sagaa' nemɨnyɨne wana nawɨ'nya' byaanna dɨragɨnya naange' kɨnɨnnake' marima'naabathesɨ. Nabaai wana nawɨ'nya' taanginya maalɨtaaya savɨ yuna wavɨla'de' yɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nesɨ.

Yɨ nemɨ Kwaaka davakɨyangɨ taanginyangɨjɨ tɨnnyalyɨ wangadaanyangɨ dɨragɨnna myawɨranganyadaanyaine. Aawa. Sɨgunyavɨyangɨ tɨnnyalyɨ mwanganyadaanyangɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨrangadaanyaine. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuya nemɨ tɨnnyalyɨ wangadaanya sa yune maalɨkegaa'na waradengɨ. Yɨ daza tɨnnyalyɨ mwanganyadaanya sa, sa yuyagaa' yuyagaa' waradengɨ. Sara yawɨ'daa dɨragɨnna dadaa maa'na neyɨdeina mɨ'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ Apozelɨyaina mena dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Kwaaka davakɨya kɨlaakejɨ' sɨmɨnangebɨta savɨ wɨlamwaaiho. Nabaai sa' wo'dalasɨ'na yɨnaja' yɨ nemɨ ange' pɨrɨ' kɨnɨnnakeine. Yɨ sa' Gotɨyai nejaavadesɨ. Anga daza' a'mwera asajɨ mannɨka'na mɨ'. Sa' Sɨgunyavɨ warɨke'na yada yuyagaa' yuyagaa' waragwothe'na.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dahaa' nemɨ anga davɨ sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'mwaainɨvanɨgo. Nemɨ tewaanya dɨragɨnna dara nevu'nɨvanɨke'nanyɨ. Nemɨre anga daza' Sɨgunyavɨ warɨka daza'na sara wa'da nemɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ baazɨ'ma'nya'bɨ' bwakalɨmwagata neya'ne'na sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'mwaainɨvanɨgo.
Nebulyasɨ. Dɨvi anga daza' Gotɨyai tɨvi'na bwakalɨmwagata neyaja' nemɨre kuryara kunera yaasɨwa'na mwaaibɨnera mɨ'.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Nebulyasɨ. Nemɨ sɨmɨnanga dazavɨ kuna mwaaihoina Sɨgunyavɨyavɨna taanginya yɨbwakɨdaa sɨmuyɨwaala yawɨ'mwaainɨvanɨgo. “Nemɨ kɨlaaka sɨnnawɨnyajɨ' yagalya'mavaana!” myawɨrivanɨgo. Aawa. Sa' maalɨkesɨ. Nemɨ “Kɨlaaka gaala nebulya'nanya dazajɨ' kɨlaaka barya ya'ne dazajɨkɨ naanga naanga galawɨlawakana!” dawaajɨ baazɨ'ma'nya mudɨke'bɨ' baazɨ'ma'naade'nanyɨ. Yɨ sare' naangesɨ.

Gotɨyai gamɨ sai nemɨnyɨ gaala dazahɨrɨ' maarya'neinaavɨ mena neyovɨravamwaaihakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai Kurya Tewaanyarɨ mena nejaavakelyɨ. Kurya Tewaanya sai dɨvi Gotɨyai yuya nejaaya'ne pimagɨnya aaya mudɨ'nanya sa'bɨsalyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai sahwarɨ mena nejaavake'na nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Naanga nebulyasɨ. Sahwai gamɨre yuya nayaa nejaavadelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nemɨre kɨlaaka mudɨkejɨ' nejaavade daza' yuyagaa' nemɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya neyɨvaimwadesɨ. Nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Dahaa' nemɨre kɨlaakejɨ' ange'bɨsavɨ mwaaiho'na Naangerɨ yɨbwa'nona sahwalyɨ gamɨre angeba mye'mwannamwaalyɨgo.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dahaa' nemɨ gamɨnyɨ lɨmwaga'daa yamarivanɨgo. Nemɨ sahwarɨ tɨnna mwanganyadaa yamarivanɨgo.

Yɨ nemɨ dɨragɨnya neyɨvaimwannɨkeine. Sara tɨvi'na dɨwo. Nabaai nemɨnyɨ tewaanya dara nevu'nɨvanɨ' “Kɨlaaka dathazɨkɨdaasɨ yɨbwa'nawaajɨ Naangeryawɨnna gamɨre angebanna sahwalyɨ tewaanna ye'mwannamwalaade'nanyɨ. Yɨ sa' tewaanyasɨ.”

Sarevɨ nemɨ sɨmunya dɨragɨnna yawɨ'daanyaine. Yɨ nabaai nemɨ sahwalyɨ ye'mwannemwalaaja' yɨ nemɨre anga nebulya'nanyavɨ yɨbwa'naaja' Naangerɨna yuya sabura ya'na sahwarɨ yɨlaaya wigalaade' naangesɨra.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai yawɨbwarya'ne namwaalyɨsavɨ nemɨ yuyaina ku'maayabanna nayaa yɨma'nabaatheine. Yɨ nabaai nemɨjɨya gazaizarɨna Gotɨyai “Tewaanyabwina yadei yɨ sai kɨlaakejɨkɨ wɨlamwaaida yakebwina tɨvɨkɨta nawɨ'nya maarana! Nabaai pwai sagaa' kayaa'nanyabwi yadei yɨ gannyabwina tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya maarana!” kadozɨ sahɨba davaadeine.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Naangere dɨragɨnyavɨna lɨka yabwi yawɨ'daa a'mweraavɨre sɨmunya dɨhaa'bwata yadaanyaine. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨ'de'na wɨdadaanyaine. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ nemɨre tewaanyabwi ku'maayabanna mena yɨma'naaba'. Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ dara lɨmwamanɨge. Sarɨmɨ kwaihɨre sɨmunyara padaihɨrakyaraavɨ sabwi ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabake' dɨngaka?

Yagaala dazavɨ sarɨmɨ nemɨnyɨna “A'mwe nawɨ'nyarera,” dɨneyawɨryide'na mihɨzɨvanɨgo. Aawa. Yɨ daza' sarɨmɨ nemɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'neihɨre tusa' baasɨvanɨgo. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ saihɨrɨna mɨ'. A'mwe pwaraavɨnanyɨ. Yɨ sahwara yune kunnya sɨnna mwasɨmagɨnyavɨna kumɨre yaya' munyaba yaasɨwa' makinadɨvɨsare. Sahwara sɨmunyavɨna yaya' munyaba nayaa mamakinyadɨvɨsaraavɨnanyɨ. Yɨ sahwaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wɨrɨvɨkɨpɨne'nanyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Pwara nemɨnyɨna dara yawɨpɨja' “Sahwara sɨduta maaya navɨ'navɨkera sara yɨvanɨga',” kɨrɨ' nemɨ Gotɨyarɨne'na yadaanyaine. Kɨrɨ' nemɨ sɨmunya yɨda'na yawɨ'daa nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na yɨvanɨgo.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kale Kɨraazɨtɨyare yune sa'na wawɨnyavɨ neyɨdɨkaa'bwa'desɨ. Yɨ nemɨ mena dara yawɨbwa'manɨgo. Pwai kumɨnyɨneba yunebanna wɨvadaihasamaarya'nei mena balɨna yakevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ dazavɨ kumɨ yuyara mena bainɨkerabɨsare.

Gotɨyai “A'mwe gaala mwaaihata sara yune kumɨ saraavɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' mamwaaibɨna! Aawa. Yune sahwai kumɨnyɨne'na mena balakerɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavei yune sahwarɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨ yadɨvɨsa'na mwaaibɨka!” kada' yuyaraavɨne'na mena balɨna yakelyɨ.

Sarevɨ sagaa'daasɨ nemɨ kɨlaakebulyɨya sɨmunya savɨre saburɨna a'mwe aane pwarɨ kwarɨ mamaryawɨbwarivanɨgo. Nebulyasɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nemɨ sɨmunya savɨre saburɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ sara maryawɨbwaroina dɨngaka? Kɨrɨ' dahaa' sahwarɨ nemɨ sasara kuna mamarayawɨbwarivanɨgo. Aawa. Gamɨre nawɨ'nyabwina nayaa yawɨrangamanɨgo.

Sarevɨ yɨ nabaai a'mwe kwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaalajai yɨ Gotɨyai a'mwe sahwarɨ yuna mudɨka tewaanyarɨ mena wɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Gamɨnyɨna sɨnnawɨnya ayabwi yuya yɨwɨya yadengɨ. Yɨthaanyi! Gamɨnyɨna yuya mudɨkebwi mena yɨma'naabadengɨ.

Yuya dazangɨ aaya kaavɨlyai Gotɨyalyɨ. Yɨ sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna kɨgaa' yɨkamaangeina mwaaloinajɨ gamɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya'na neye'mwannamwaaihakelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai sahwarɨ gaimwagya'ne' gamɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨ sahwarɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya'na ye'mwannayɨma'nya'ne wawɨnya' mena nejaavakelyɨ.

Nemɨre yagaalya' daresɨ. Gotɨyai a'mwe Kwaaka davakɨyara yɨkamaangeraavɨne yuya yɨwetawakya yɨkamaangerajɨ avaaizɨmunya'na ye'mwannayɨma'nakesɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ sahwai yuya yɨwetawakya sahwara yeta sanna sɨmunya ayahi yawɨrakai mɨ'. Yaka sai nemɨnyɨ gamɨre yagaala daza' wɨjɨwaakya'ne', yɨkamaanga sara gamɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya'na ye'mwannayɨma'nya'ne' newakakesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare maangi' ma'daa sahwarɨneba a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwakawadaanyaine. Yɨ dare'. Gotɨyai gamɨ sai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ nemɨre maangisɨ wɨjɨvwaramaa'manɨ'. Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨ sarɨne'na sahwaraavɨ dara yɨdangadaanyɨ. Akai, sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨkamaanga sabwi yagalya'mavapi Gotɨyalyɨ avaaizɨmunya'na yɨma'napɨjɨ je'mwannamwaalyɨla!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai kayaa'nanyabwi maayai kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yuya kayaa'nanya nemɨre sa mari'bwaraka yune sarɨna munyaba yɨlakaka yɨ sahwarɨ kayaa'a'mwe nebulya'nanyarɨ wɨmwaaihakelyɨ. Nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyai “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaalya'nera nɨmɨre yɨda'maraangebwi kɨnɨnnakera yɨma'nɨpɨka!” daka nemɨnyɨneba sara wɨmwaaihakelyɨ.
Nemɨ Gotɨyalyɨ wawɨnya ye'mwannayadaanyaina sarɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Gotɨyare yanga gaimwangebwi mena daape'. Akai, gaimwanga sa' sarɨmɨ yaasɨwa' saba sana yagalya'ma'na nyɨpɨdɨka!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai jaa'. Dara dɨnɨ'
“Nɨmɨre nawɨ'nyagaa' kadɨka gu'neinyɨ.
Yɨrɨka wɨvadaihasamaasa'nerɨkɨ gɨhaimwageinyɨ.”
Nɨmɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yɨthaanyi! Dathahaasagaa' gamɨ nawɨ'nyaangegaakɨ. Yɨthaanyi! Dahaa' yɨrɨka wɨvadaihasamaarya'nerɨkɨ.

Yɨ a'mweraavɨre sɨvɨlyangɨ kurinojɨ sahwara walarya'ne nemɨ kayaa'nanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yadaanyaina mɨ'. “Nemɨ kayaa'na yaaja' a'mwera tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ nemɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨjɨwakadaanya wawɨnya dazavɨna sahwara yagaala kayaa'nanya' nadɨpɨdɨka!” dona kayaa'nanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' yadaanyaina mɨ'.

Aawa. Yuyangɨ Gotɨyare wɨdaayadɨvɨsara nayaa yadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' nemɨ yuyaraavɨna Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨdadaanyavɨna tewaanyabwi wibwarɨdakwadaanyaine. Yɨ yuyangɨ dara yadaanyaine. Kwalaalyagaa' kayaa'nanyangɨ dɨragɨnna nebulya'na da'daanyɨ. Yɨ taanga neyɨma'nadaasɨ, yɨ taanginya neyɨma'nada, yɨ kayaaka yɨnɨgɨrasaina mwaidaanyɨ.

A'mwera nemɨnyɨ malyajɨ neradɨvɨ' kalavuza neyɨrakadɨvɨsaine. Yɨkamaangera nega'mɨjamakwodɨvɨ' jaka kayaa'nanya nedadɨvɨsaine. Nemɨ yagɨyagɨ wawɨnyavɨ nebulya'na marulawakɨdaanyaine. Sawɨta kwalaalyangɨ se mwaryadaanyaine. Nemɨ mɨjɨ'na mwaidaanyaine. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pwara dara yawɨranganya'nanyɨ “Taanginya wiadaa'nyɨ kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare wawɨnya' kuna yadɨvɨta sahwara Gotɨyare wɨdaayadɨvɨta nebulya'nanyarera.”

Nemɨ tewaanya yɨda'nanyabwina yadaanyaine. Yadaanyagaa' yawɨta nawɨ'nyabwi lɨmwaga'daa mayagaala yarai dadaanyaina mɨ'. Nemɨ a'mweraavɨ tewaanya nawɨ'nya pada'galayadaanyaine. Nemɨ Kurya Tewaanyare yange kɨnɨnnakeine. A'mwe Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨna tewaanya nevu'nya sabwi yune maangi'nanya'na mɨ'.

Nemɨ yagaala nebulya'nanya' wɨjɨwakadaanyaine. Nemɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨ gamɨre wawɨnya' yadaanyaine. Sareinaavɨna pwara nayaa dara yawɨpɨne'na “O, sahwara Gotɨyare wɨdaayadɨvɨta tewaanyara daaka!” yɨ nemɨ sara yadaanyaine. Nabaai tewaanya yɨda'maraangebwi lɨmwaga'daa, aangasɨrɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnya' wa'da kwanaamirɨ saabya' wa'devaaibɨ' kayaa'nanyabulyɨ nemɨ mala tannadaanyaine.

Nemɨnyɨne wawɨnya'na a'mwe pwara nemɨnne yaya munyaba makidɨvɨsaine. Yɨ pwara nemɨnne yaya kwaakewɨ marulawakadɨvɨsaine. Nemɨnyɨna pwara yagaala kayaa'nanyajɨ bulayagaalyajɨ dadɨvɨsaine. Yɨ pwara a'mwe pwaraavɨ nemɨnyɨna wɨdadɨvɨsaine “Sahwara wawɨnya' tewaanya yadɨvɨsarera.” Apozelɨyaina Gotɨyare wawɨnya' kuna nayaa yadaanyaine. Yɨ a'mwe pwara nemɨnyɨna yagaala ge dɨpɨja' nayaa yadaanyaine. Pwara nemɨnyɨna dara yawɨ'dɨvɨsaine “A'mwe sara kwaasɨ yagaala dadɨvɨsare.” Kɨrɨ' aawa. Nemɨ yagaalya' nebulya'na dadaanyaine.

Pwara neyawɨrangadɨvɨtaina mɨ'. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe kwalaalyara neyawɨranganamaa'dɨvɨsaine. Nemɨ baidaa kɨrɨ', yɨthaanyi, nemɨ gaala kuna mwaaiho. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ yavada'gala ya'nei tamamwaaihaderabɨsaine. Kɨrɨ' sahwai yuna maneramakyadeine.

Nemɨnyɨ kale neyɨvanɨ'. Kɨrɨ' yuyagaa' nemɨ yɨlaaya yadaanyaine. A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨta maayainabɨ' mwaidaanyaine. Kɨrɨ' nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakeina nebulya'nanya a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨna wɨjavadaanyaine. Nemɨ gɨlyɨvɨta aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' kɨnɨnnakeina mɨ'. Kɨrɨ' yuya nawɨ'nya gazaza lɨmwagakoine. Yɨ yuya sanna yadaa dara wibwarɨdaakwɨvanɨgo. Sahwaina Gotɨyare wɨdayadaanya nebulya'nanyaine.
Sarɨmɨ Koridɨ mwaalyaihi, nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yagaalya' ku'maayaba jalɨkurakya'neina maanga naangeva'na tavadɨwo. Nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ maarya'neba nemɨre kale naanga yɨma'nɨwa'.

Nemɨre sɨmunya' sarɨmɨnyɨna tihɨrakamaremwaala miwo. Aawa. Nemɨnyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nevu'nɨvanɨ'. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ saihi sarɨnnya sɨmunya' tihɨrakamaremwaaiha'. Yɨ nemɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya nebulya'na mamwaalyɨga'.
Ganɨmaangei gannya kaimɨraayangɨ wɨdadevaaibɨ' dahaa' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nemɨre dazabwina ayɨna tɨvɨkɨrya'ne' nemɨnyɨ maarya'neba sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ sarɨmɨre kale naanga yɨma'nana!

Mu'nyadɨvɨsara sahwara yɨ pwarabɨsare. Sarɨmɨ kumɨrebwina mye'mwannayamaripɨna! Yadɨvɨ' kunnya sahwaraavɨre saburɨ gaimwanga mipɨna! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨda'maraanga sabulyɨ kɨwɨnyavɨ galazekɨvala sabulyɨ sawaai gatha'dara ye'mwannayɨkadewaalaka! Baakesɨ jɨhɨnyasɨ gatha'dara ye'mwannayɨrakurikadewaalaka!
Nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Kamaalyalyɨ avaaizɨmunya'na ye'mwannadathei dɨngaka! A'mwe Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadelyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadelyɨ saraai sɨmunya gave pɨrɨ'na lɨmwagikaderaai daa!
Gotɨyare anga tewaanyasɨ kwaasɨgotɨyarajɨ marirakurakɨpɨ'de' daaka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareina Gotɨyai gaala kɨnɨnnakere anga tewaanyasɨra. Gotɨyai jaakabaaibɨsasɨ. Yɨ dara dɨnɨ'
“Nɨmɨ sahwaraavɨ wɨlamwaalɨdeinyɨ.
Sahwaraayaba kaanya yamarideinyɨ.
Kumɨre Gotɨyainyɨ mwaalɨdeinyɨ
Nɨmɨnyɨne a'mwera mwaaibɨ'dere.”
Sarevɨ Naangei ayahi pɨrɨsɨ jaa'
“Pwaraavɨ tɨnnyaba nayaa jahalya'mayɨla!
Sahwaraavɨ menyawɨ sarɨmɨ dɨmwaalyɨla!
Gɨrɨkita'nanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' malɨmwabɨna!
Nɨmɨ sainyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmaarɨdeinyɨ.”
“ ‘Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ Sɨrɨnɨmaangeinyɨ mwaalɨdeinyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ nyɨgwaalaangeihɨlyɨ nyɨraavaangengihɨlyɨ dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ!’
Naangei dɨragɨnya yuya kɨnɨnnakei sasara dadelyɨ.”

Sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, yuya daza, Gotɨyare yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja daza mena kɨnɨnnakeine. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nemɨ yuya gɨrɨkita'nanya kɨlaakejɨkɨyajɨ kuryarɨyajɨ duimwagasɨ'naana! Sara yawaajɨ tewaanya yɨda'maraangeina mwalaana! Sare' nemɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨna lɨka yadaa nawɨ'nya gɨrɨ'maayabwi yuyagaa' yunebanna neyɨma'nade'nanyɨ.

Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyai nemɨnyɨneba dɨnebasamarɨmwaaihila! Nemɨ sarɨmɨjɨya a'mwe aane pwarɨ kwarɨ yɨwetawakya pɨrɨ' myadaanyaine. Nemɨ aane pwai kwarɨ kayaaka migalakyadaanyaine. Nemɨ aane pwai kwarɨ kwaasɨ wɨdadaa gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa mamwagi'nyadaanyaine.

Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yaasɨwa' yagaala yɨhɨzɨdaya'ne' majɨvanɨge. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ mena dara dɨwa. Nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ sarɨmɨ wɨlamwaaiha'. Sarevɨ yɨhɨgaimwagya'neina sarɨmɨ kabalapi nemɨ sarɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannabaina yaade' tewaanyasɨ. Yɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ gaala kuna kamwaalapi nemɨ sarɨmɨjɨ gaala ye'mwannamwaaina yaade' tewaanyasɨ.

Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yadɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨ ku'maayaba yɨhɨzalɨkurakyɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨ'nena sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba makimanɨge. Yuya taanginya neyɨma'nade sangɨ sarɨmɨ yɨwa'daasa'na nɨmɨre kuryarɨ yunebanna nyɨvaimwamanɨ'. Nabaai yɨlaaya naange' nɨmɨnyɨ yuneba yeku'nawɨresɨ'manɨ'.

Taanginya sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Pɨrovijɨ Maazathonɨyana bi'ma'mwa'dohaa' dazɨmagɨ kimagɨjɨ nemɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ kwaamu'na mamwaalyɨwa'do. Aawa. Taanginya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya neyɨma'nɨwa'dɨkengɨ. Yɨ mwasɨmagɨ nemɨnyɨ maiyagaalyajɨ maangejɨ warɨna. Yɨ kusɨmagɨ nemɨ lɨka yɨna.
Sare' kɨrɨ' taanginya kɨnɨnnakeraavɨ yɨvaimwadei Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ neyɨvaimwamwa'. Yɨ sai Taaitazarɨ maryasaabakei nemɨnyabanna bi'ma'mwakevɨ sai nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ neyɨvaimwamwa'.

Taaitazai nemɨnyabanna bi'ma'mwake'na yune dazahɨrɨvɨna Gotɨyai neyɨvaimwamwake' mi yɨwa'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨ Taaitazare sɨmunyavɨ yɨvaimwanna kiwa'daa' sahwai yagaala datha' makabɨwakevɨ Gotɨyai nemɨ kwainaavɨre sɨmunyavɨ neyɨvaimwamwa'. Taaitazai dara nedɨwa'. Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganya'na tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nada yɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' kɨnna dɨvanɨ'. Sara yadɨvɨ' nɨmɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya'na ye'mwannamwaalya'na sarɨmɨ sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'manɨga'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ yɨlaaya naanga naanga yɨvanɨge.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Nɨmɨre pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya' sarɨmɨre kale yɨhigaimwa'dɨka kɨrɨ' yɨ nɨmɨ yagaala dazavɨna nɨmɨre sɨmunya' taanga manyɨvanɨ'. Nebulyasɨ. Kɨgaa' sagaa' sɨmunya' taanga nyakeinyɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' aawa. Nɨmɨ dara yawɨrangamanɨge. Paazɨya daza' sarɨmɨnyɨ sɨmunya' kale yɨhigaimwa'dɨkesɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai sa' maalɨkegaa'nesɨ.

Dahaa' nɨmɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kale yɨhigaimwa'de'na yɨlaaya mivanɨge. Aawa. Sɨmunya' kale yɨhigaimwa'de' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ mudɨkebwi yawɨramaa'mwa'daasa'nanyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ sɨmunyavɨ kale daza' Gotɨyai marayɨhima'nɨwa'daavadɨkesɨ. “Nemɨre paazɨyavɨya yagaalya' Koridɨ mwaalyaraavɨ kayaaka aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' nyɨgalakadɨka!” kado Gotɨyai sara yɨwa'dɨkesɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kale daza' Gotɨyai marima'naabade daza' yɨ nemɨ a'mweinaavɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi neyadesɨ. Yɨ sasare dazaburɨ Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ nevadaihasamaa'delyɨ. Sarevɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwina nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ taanga maneyanna! Kɨrɨ' kale wiabwi yaasɨwa'nanyabwi a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨrebwi yɨ daza' baryabwi gavebwi marima'naabadesɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨthaanyi, Gotɨyare kale daza' yɨ dazahɨrɨsa' sarɨmɨnyɨ dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya tewaanya nawɨ'nyabura yɨhɨmarima'nɨwa'daavadɨkesɨ. Yavada'galya'na sarɨmɨnyɨ mwolavalɨmwagata yɨhiwa'dɨkesɨ. Yɨ yagaainakeihi sarɨmɨre yagaalya yavada'gaimwa'daasange! Yɨ Gotɨyai yɨhidɨkaa'bwa'de' yɨ sarɨmɨre yɨwetawakya'na wagɨla maa'mwa'daasave! Yɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨna lɨka naanga yɨwa'daasave! Nemɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganya'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' sɨmuyɨwaala yɨwa'dɨkeve! Yɨ tewaanya'na dɨragɨnna yadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanya'na dɨragɨnna nayaa yɨwa'daasave! A'mwe dazai yɨwetawakya'na tɨvɨkɨta naange' yɨwa'daasave! Yuya sangɨ sarɨmɨre sabwi gamɨre yɨwetawakya savɨna ku'maayaba dara yɨma'nɨvanɨ' “Sarɨmɨ yɨwetawakya' maayaihɨlyɨ.”

Sarevɨ, sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ paazɨya' yɨdave' daza', yɨ a'mwe dazai yɨwetawakya mena yaka gave sarɨna yawɨrena yɨdave' mɨ'. Nabaai sahwai a'mwe pwarɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yɨngakakerɨna gaverɨna yawɨreinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnyabwi ku'maayabanna marima'naabya'na yɨdavesɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ sarɨmɨ tewaanya nawɨ'nyabura neya'neihi nemɨnyɨna tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nɨvanɨke'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨ sara yawɨramaata'ne' yɨdave'nanyɨ.

Sarevɨ nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ tewaanya neyɨvaimwadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' neyɨvaimwange' gave' mɨ'. Nemɨ yɨlaaya naanga yuna yɨvanɨgo. Sarɨmɨ yuyaihi tewaanna yadɨvɨ' Taaitazare kuryai kave mena yɨmwaaihɨvanɨgasa'na sahwai yɨlaaya yɨvanɨ'. Gamɨre yɨlaaya sasare dazabwi wangadaa yɨ nemɨjɨ yɨlaaya naanga yuna yɨvanɨgo.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ Taaitazarɨ wɨdadɨ sarɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨle daza'na, yɨwetawakya mye'na, nɨmɨre yagaala dazavɨ wagɨla mamaariwa. Aawa. Yuya yagaala nemɨ yɨhɨtho daza yɨ naanga nebulya'nanya warɨkabaaibɨ' yɨ savɨ Taaitazaryaba sarɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlo yagaala daza' yagaala naanga nebulya'nanyasɨ.

Taaitazai sarɨmɨnyawɨnna kabi'mava' yɨ sarɨmɨ “Yɨwetawakya nyaadɨkajɨ,” lɨka yɨwaaineva sahwarɨ maaresalyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihi sahware yagaalya' mɨdɨnna yesaihɨlyɨ. Sahwai yune dazahɨbwina yawɨ'da yɨ gamɨre sɨmunyai yawɨrirɨkɨrakyai sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yuna wa'daawadelyɨ.
Dahaa' nɨmɨ nebulya' dɨragɨnna dara lɨmwamwa. Sarɨmɨ saihi yuya yɨdata sabura nayaa nebulya'na jideihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sasare saburɨ nɨmɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge.
Nya'mweihi, dahaa' nemɨ dara yɨhɨzɨwɨryaana! Pɨrovijɨ Maazathonɨya Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyaraavɨ Gotɨyai yanga wɨgaimwadaa'nyɨ sahwara nawɨ'nyɨna yɨwaasare.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna sahwaraavɨ taanga naange' kima'na' yɨ sahwaraavɨre sɨmunyavɨ taanginya sabwi yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaala yakebulyɨ. Yɨjɨwaala dazaburɨ sahwara kayaa'na nebulya'na mwaalesare. Kɨrɨ' sahwara yune yɨlaaya naanga nebulya'nanya' kɨnɨnnakere. Nabaai sahwara yune kewewɨnɨ gɨlyɨvɨta maayare. Yɨ sarevɨ dazahwara pɨwɨnya kwɨya'mweraavɨ gaimwagya'ne sɨmunya dɨragɨnna nayaa yawɨramaa'dɨvɨsare.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Nɨmɨ nayaa wangadɨ jalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Kumɨre nɨgwia maalɨkengɨ nɨgwia yanga wɨjaaya'ne kɨnɨnnakera yune sara wɨjaavadɨvɨsare. Yo, sahɨburɨ wavɨla'dɨvɨ' nɨgwia pɨnɨjɨ wɨjaavadɨvɨsare. Kunnya sɨmunyaburɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨ' nɨgwia daza wakadɨvɨsangɨ.

Yɨ sahwara nemɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna nedadɨvɨ' yɨdaanganna “Wawɨnya Gotɨyare tewaanyara Juthɨya mwaalyaraavɨne yanga gaimwange' nemɨ wɨjaaya'neinaavɨ dɨnejɨla! ‘Naanga sabwi mi nyaadɨka!’ dona yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Kave mwaaihasa' aawa! Kusɨlaanyangɨya pwarajɨ sara yɨrakurayaana!”

Sɨnnawɨ nemɨ dara lɨmwagaro. Sahwara nɨgwia pɨnɨ pwaraavɨna wɨjaavɨpɨ'derera. Sare kɨrɨ' yune sasare yɨpɨne'na mɨ'. Aawa. Aayagaa' Naangerɨna kumɨnyɨdaasɨ wɨjaavɨneva Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨ' yɨ sara ya'nera nemɨ kwainaavɨnajɨ kumɨnyɨ wɨjaavɨnɨwaa'.

Maazathonɨya mwaalyaraavɨne sare' nemɨ Taaitazarɨ yaamɨjɨ wɨdɨwo. “Yɨ sɨnnawɨ sagaa' sahwai pwaraavɨ nɨgwianna wawɨnya wɨgaimwanga daza' Koridɨ mwaalyara ya'neraavɨ gaai wɨdakabaaibɨ' wɨdɨhaa'bwarana! Sarevɨ sahwaraayaba yanga gaimwanga nawɨ'nya sa' nayaa yɨ'mwannana!” yawɨrona sara yaamɨjɨ wɨdɨwo.

Yuyaburaavɨ sarɨmɨ yunebanna tewaanna yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna yunebanna lɨmwadɨvɨ', yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yagaala yuna dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨ' yɨ yune sɨmunya nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnya ya sabwina yunebanna nebulya'na dɨkaa'dɨvɨ' yɨ nemɨnyɨna yunebanna nebulya'na yɨhɨvu'nadeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sasare saihi yunebanna tewaanna yadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' dahaa' “Yanga gaimwanga nawɨ'nya dazabwi yɨ, yunebanna wɨjaayabwi yaana!” dapɨjɨ sara jɨla!

Savɨna nɨmɨ kɨwɨnya dakya'ne' mihɨzɨvanɨge. Aawa. Maazathonɨya mwaalyara a'mwe pwaraavɨna nebulya'na dɨkaa'dɨvɨ' tewaanya yadɨvɨsanna jalɨkurakena sarɨmɨre kale saburɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨhivanɨge. Sa' nemɨ yawɨraade'na sarɨmɨre kale sabwi sa' naanga nebulya'nanya' sahwaraavɨre'bɨsasɨra.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ mena dara yawɨ'manɨga'. Nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare yanga gaimwanga nawɨ'nyaange'na yake'nanyɨ. Yɨ sahwai nawɨ'nya naangengɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwanga yɨhya'nei gɨlyɨvɨta maayai yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna “Waryaanya sabwi lɨmwadɨnyavɨ nawɨ'nya naange kɨnɨnnakera yɨma'nɨpɨka!” daka sarei yɨma'nakelyɨra. Sara mena yawɨ'manɨga'.

Yɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge' kɨwɨnya'na mɨ'. Dahaa' daza' nɨmɨre sɨmunya' yɨhɨzɨwaakɨvanɨge. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ dare' sarɨmɨnyɨne tewaanyasɨra. Kwarame menanyarɨkɨ sarɨmɨ wawɨnya daza' mena dɨhaa'bwareta gave'na mɨ'. Aawa. Sareihi sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ wawɨnya ya'na tewaanya kuna yɨhɨvu'nakeihɨlyɨ.

Yɨ nabaai dahaa' wawɨnya daza' ya'ne' sarɨmɨ nayaa yɨ'mwannyɨna jideihɨlyɨ. Kɨgaa' daza'na sɨmunyavɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' dɨhaa'bwaretabaaibɨ' sarɨnnya gɨlyɨvɨsangɨna yɨnɨgevanna wi'nanya'na sarɨmɨ yunebanna yɨme'nya'bɨ' jɨwagyɨla!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwei nɨgwia wɨjaaya'na tewaanna wɨvu'najai yɨ Gotɨyai dazare sabwina tewaanya wima'nadelyɨ. Gotɨyai yuya a'mwe dazarɨ wɨwarajanna kunya yawɨ'da yɨ sahware wɨjaavade sanna maryawɨbwa'delyɨ. Sahwarɨ nɨgwia naanga muwarikenna marayawɨbwa'dei mɨ'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. “Sarɨmɨnyɨ taanginya yɨhyana! Pwaraavɨ wɨvwa'bwarakana!” dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge' mɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨjɨ pwaraavɨjɨ avaaina yɨma'nya'ne'nanyɨ.

Yɨ dathahaasagaa' sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya yɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨsanna yɨnahune yɨma'nadɨvɨsaraavɨ yunebanna wiadengɨ. “Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dɨvi sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨsanna kune yɨma'nɨpɨja' yɨ sahwaraavɨ kwalaalya naanga wɨwaradera sarɨmɨnyɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa yunebanna yɨhipɨka!” dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yɨ sasare dazabwina sarɨmɨnyɨjɨ sahwaraavɨjɨ avaaina yɨma'nade'nanyɨ.

Sara yapɨjɨ yɨ dare' Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ. A'mwei wapaaya manaaya kwalaalya maaraka sai kwalaalya naange kɨnɨnnakai mɨ'. Nabaai a'mwei maalɨ'na maaraka sai wɨgainadei mɨ'. Yɨ sasarebaaibɨ' naange kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaibɨzaihi wɨgainaderaavɨna yanga duzaayɨla!
Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ suya wɨdɨvanɨge. Sahwai Taaitazare sɨmunyavɨ yɨdɨkaa'manɨkelyɨ. Sara yadaa'nyɨ Taaitazai nemɨbɨ' avaaina yawɨ'manɨ'. Yɨ sai kwalyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne'na tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨ'.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sai nemɨre yɨvaimwange' maa'mwa'. Nabaai sai kwalyɨ wawɨnya savɨna tewaanya yagɨnna wɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yune gannya saburɨnanya' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨwaka.
Yɨ nemɨ neya'mwe pwai maryaasɨwoyai salyɨ ye'mwannɨguwaai. Yuya kusɨlaanya sangɨ neya'mwe dazai yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakyarɨne yaya' munyaba makimanɨgasalyɨ.

Nabaai yune sasare'nanya' mɨ'. Aawa. Kusɨlaanyangɨne a'mwera wɨdahɨlakɨwa'daata sai dɨvi nemɨjɨ ye'mwannayamarya'nelyɨ yanga gaimwanga daza' Jeruzaalemɨne Kɨraazɨtɨyaraavɨna makwawaade'nanyɨ. Yɨ nemɨ wawɨnya wɨdayadaanya daza' yɨ Naangerɨne byaanna dɨragɨnya' a'mweraavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia'nesɨ. Nabaai nemɨre sɨmunya' gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨ wɨgaimwagya'ne daza' ya'na neyɨwɨrivanɨke' yɨbwarɨdaakwia'nesɨ.

Nemɨ yanga naanga maremwaala'na yɨvanɨgo savɨne yɨwetawakya'na nyɨma'nadɨka! Sare' a'mwe aane pwai kwai yagaala kayaa'nanya' nadathɨka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nemɨ neya'mwe dazai ye'mwannɨgwikade'na maryaasɨwo.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Tewaanya nawɨ'nya yade sabwina nemɨ yawɨrona yune Naangere tɨnna sarɨnanna mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe kwaraavɨre tɨnna kwarɨjɨ nayaa yɨvanɨgo.

Nabaai nemɨ neya'mwe pwai maryaasɨwoyai sarei saraalyɨ ye'mwannɨguwa'. Kwalaalya saamɨnyagaa' nemɨ sarɨ wawɨnya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyangɨ yɨdakwasangadaanyalyɨ. Yɨ nemɨ sarɨ tɨnna wangadaawojɨ Naangere wawɨnya ya'na dɨragɨnna yadelyɨ. Dahaa' sai “Sarɨmɨ Koridɨ mwaalyaihi yune nawɨ'nyaangebwina jide'na,” dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'manɨkei wawɨnya daza' ya'na dɨkaa'da dɨragɨnya yagɨnna yɨvanɨkelyɨ.

Taaitazarɨna sarɨmɨ dara jawɨranganyidelyɨ. Sai nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannayadasalyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨne'na nɨmɨjɨ avaaiwawɨnyalyɨ. Yɨ neya'mwe pwaraai saraarɨna sarɨmɨ dara jawɨranganyide. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨne yawɨsanna yadisaraalyɨ. Yɨ saraai kɨrɨnnya wawɨnya savɨna pwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yaya' byaannake' munyaba makidɨvɨsaraalyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨre kale' saraavɨ nayaa jɨvwarɨdaakwila! Nabaai sarɨmɨ nawɨ'nya ya'ne' sarɨmɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba makimwo sa' nebulya'nanya' jɨvwarɨdaakwila! Yɨ sahwarajɨ kusɨlaanya anga geva gevanya a'mwerajɨ naanga nebulya'na yɨhyawɨrangabɨ'de'na sara jɨla!
Sare' da'darevɨnyɨ. Yanga wɨjaaya' Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨ wɨdaaya'ne'na sarɨmɨ mena yawɨ'manɨga'. Savɨna yɨ nɨmɨ yagaala saamɨnya' mida'muna! Sarevɨna manyɨgainyadesɨra.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' yɨhɨthɨkaa'manɨke' tɨvi'na yawɨ'manɨge. Yɨ Maazathonɨya mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ sarɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makidɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ dara wɨdɨvanɨge. Kwarame sɨnnawɨnyavɨ Pɨrovijɨ Gɨriza mwaalyara daza' aaya mudɨ'na yamaasa'na mena yovɨravalɨmwagata yesare. Yɨ sahwara sarɨmɨnyɨna kadɨka wɨ'neva wawɨnya dazahɨrɨ' ya'na dɨragɨnya yadaapi yɨ daza' sahwara kwalaalya kwaraavɨ yɨdɨkaavakesɨ.

Sare kɨrɨ' yanga wɨjaaya'ne wawɨnya savɨna sarɨmɨnyɨna yaya' munyaba makɨlya'na sa' yaasɨwa'nanya' nyɨma'nadɨka! Sare'na sarɨmɨnyawɨnna nya'mweraavɨ maryasɨwaabe. Yɨ sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ wɨdevaaibɨ' yɨ sarɨmɨ nayaa sara yovɨravalɨmwagata jemwaalyide'na maryasɨwaabe.

Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Maazathonɨya mwaalyara nɨmɨjɨ nye'mwannɨgupɨjara sarɨmɨ nayaa yemwaala myadapi tɨnna yɨhwangabɨza'na yɨ nemɨ wagɨla namaraadɨka! Yɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ wagɨla yɨhye'mwannamaraadeihi dɨngaka! Nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna nebulya'na yawɨrakadaa sarɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna sara wɨdo.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ dara yawɨ'mwa. Nya'mwe saraavɨ nɨmɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna wɨdɨma! Kumɨ sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨnyɨ waanapɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mapɨ'de'nanyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ tewaanya naanga yanga wia'neihi mena dahesa' nayaa tɨvi'na yovɨrawakapɨjɨ ba'mujɨyagaa' nɨgwɨmaaya saraavɨna maryasaabya'ne' mena waradesɨ. Yɨ yanga daza' tewaanya naanga yanga wia'bɨ' yɨ yemwaala yadesɨ. Nemɨ yɨhɨmwagi'nadaanya' nɨgwiabɨta' mɨ'.

Yɨ pwaraavɨna yanga wɨjaayabwi daresɨ. A'mwei tɨka munne maalɨ'na burɨdei, nabaai sai yune tɨka munne maalɨkenna maaradelyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe tewaanya naanga yange'na burɨdei, nabaai sai kwalaalya naanga yange'na maaradelyɨ.

Sabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya gazaizai gannya sɨmunyavɨ mena yawɨrakojɨ yɨ yune sahɨburɨna mɨdɨnojɨ sara wɨjaavana! Yɨ sai yanga wɨjaaya'na sɨmunya' taanga nuyadɨka! Sahwai dara yawɨ'da “A'mwera dɨragɨnna nyɨvanɨgasa'na yɨ sasare sahɨburɨ wɨjaavanɨgeinyɨ,” nujaavadɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨgwɨyange'na a'mwei yɨlaaya yaderɨna yɨ Gotɨyarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨke'nanyɨ.

Yɨ Gotɨyai sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨne'na yɨnɨga wi'na yannelyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yanga gaimwanga yuya wɨjaavada yɨ sarɨmɨ nebulya' yunebanna yɨhyadeihɨlyɨ. Sahwai “Yuyagaa' yuyangɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuyanna kɨnɨnnakeihi myɨhɨgainyadeihi yɨnɨga nebulya' wi'nanyaihi yuna mwaalɨna jɨla! Yɨ wawɨnya tewaanya yuya sa ya'neihi dɨmwaalyɨla!” dada yunebanna yɨhyadeihɨlyɨ.
Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ yangeraavɨna dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
A'mwera wia burɨja'ne pɨraihɨrayɨwɨnasɨ'namaryadɨvɨtabaaibɨ'
A'mwei gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨna naanga yanga wɨjaavakelyɨ.
Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' sahware yɨda'maraangebwi waragothelyɨ.

Gotɨyai wia burɨja'ne a'mweraavɨna yanga wɨjaavadei yɨ sahwai wapaaya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna nya'ne yɨhɨzavadaawori sareihi yuyaihi tɨka nayaa dɨnyideihɨlyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ (wiangɨ) sarɨmɨ yɨnɨga wi'nanya pwaraavɨna wɨjaaya'neihɨrɨna yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ. Yɨ a'mwera tɨka wapaaya wia burɨdɨvɨsa yɨ sare naanga yɨma'nadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa naanga (sɨla naanga, wapaaya naanga) yɨma'nadaa'nyɨ yanga nawɨ'nyabwi yɨda'maraangebwi naanna kuna jideihɨlyɨ.

Yɨ gazazangɨ sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya yunebanna yɨhwakadeihɨlyɨ. Gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalyangɨdaa'nya pwaraavɨ yanga yɨnɨga wi'na wɨjaaya'ne yɨhwakadeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ nemɨre wawɨnya savɨ sɨhumale sarɨmɨre daza' neya'mweraavɨ gaimwagathe'na Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨpɨ'dere.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyare a'mwe tewaanyaraavɨ gaimwanga ya'ne' jide wawɨnya', sasare saburɨ sahwaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨsanna mudaasaderaavɨ yunebanna yɨvanɨ'. Nabaai yune sasare' mɨ'. Aawa. Sasare dazaburɨ kwalaalyara yadaapiya'na yɨlaayasɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨjasɨ maanga yuneba wɨresɨ'nawɨdihɨta yade'nanyɨ.

Yɨ sarɨmɨ wawɨnya yɨvanɨgata daza' sarɨmɨre yadɨvɨta sabwi ku'maayaba marima'naabathesɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaala tewaanya' nayaa jalɨkurakadɨvɨsaburɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaihasa'najɨ yɨ nabaai Juthɨya mwaalyaraavɨna yanga naange' nayaa wɨjavadaapi sahwarajɨ a'mwe yuya pwara kwarajɨ sarɨmɨre ye'mwannayɨvanɨgasa' wangabɨ'de'najɨ yɨ sahwara Gotɨyarɨne yaya' byaannake' munyaba makibɨ'dere.

Nabaai sahwara yawɨpɨ'de'na “Gotɨyare yanga gaimwange' wavɨla'nɨke' yɨhwaradesɨ.” Sarevɨ yɨ nabaai sahwara sarɨmɨnyɨ wanganya'nera sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'naderera. Yɨ sara yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadɨvɨ' yɨdaanganna kyapɨjɨ sahwai tewaanya yɨhyatheihɨlyɨ.
Gotɨyai gannya Gawaalɨkɨ yanga nejaavakelyɨ. Yanga sa' naangaangesɨ. Nemɨ daza' yɨnɨga wi'na yunebanna yawɨ'daa daathe' mɨ'. Yɨ yanga daza'na nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” dɨragɨnna wɨdaana!

A'mwe pwara nɨmɨnyɨna kwaasɨ yagaalya' dara dadɨvɨkɨ “Sahwai nemɨjɨ neye'mwannemwaaida gamɨ sarɨne yaya' kwaakewɨ marima'nadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai gamɨ menyaba mwaaida sahwai yagaala dɨragɨnaange nedasaabadelyɨ.” Polɨnyɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ bwiwanna maremwaalyabulyɨ nayaa mɨdɨdɨ sareinyɨ kave dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.

Yɨ dara yɨhidaangamanɨge. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna kabi'mava'mujɨ yɨ a'mwe sahwara mala nayaa yɨwannɨpɨka! Akai, a'mwe sahwaraavɨ nɨmɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya' nudɨwɨka! Sahwara nemɨnyɨna dara yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'na “Kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta saburɨ yamaryadɨvɨkɨra,” nayaa dɨragɨnna wɨdɨde'nanyɨ. Sara dɨragɨnna yawɨrangamanɨge' kɨrɨ' baa'nana! Sɨmunya yarai kyavada'galayawɨrapɨjɨ sara myavada'galyɨ yɨhyɨwɨneinyɨ.
Kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta saburɨ myamaryadaanyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨ yamaryadaa kɨrɨ' kayaa'nanya neyɨma'nadaa'nyɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta saburɨna kayaa'nanya dathɨwadaanyaine.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuyajɨ mala tannya'ne sa nemɨ lɨmwagako sa kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta saburɨyanna mɨ'. Aawa. Sa Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakenna yɨkamaangeraavɨre maihurɨta dɨragɨnya yɨnɨga wi'na wo'dalasɨ'nade'na.

Nemɨ sahwaraavɨre sɨmunya wo'daidaanyaine. Nabaai yuya sabura munya ke'beva daa'da a'mwera “Gotɨyarɨ yawɨranganaana!” dadɨvɨ' yadɨvɨsaraavɨne tusa' kaanya tihɨ'devura, sabura kɨburajɨ wo'daidaanyasɨ. Yɨ sara yadaa nemɨ a'mweinaavɨre yawɨta yuya sa Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨnya'nengɨna kalavuza yɨralɨmwaga'daanyaine.

Yɨ nemɨ mena yawɨbwa'nona sarɨmɨnyɨna yemwaala yɨgo. Sarɨmɨ nemɨre yuya yagaala sa dɨnemɨdɨnyidehaa' yɨ nabaai nemɨ yagaalya' galazekɨvaidɨvɨta a'mwe yuyaraavɨ kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwina wɨrɨvɨkɨraadeine. Sareina yawɨralɨmwagata yɨvanɨgoinera.

Sarɨmɨre tɨnnyangɨ yɨhwarɨka dazanna Apozelɨyainaavɨnenna nayaa jawɨranganyɨla! Yɨ a'mwe pwai kwai yune gamɨ sarɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'da “Nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareinyɨ mwaaihe,” yɨ sai sɨmunya' ayahi yawɨrana! Gannya sɨmunyavɨne'na yojɨ dara yawɨrana! “Yɨ nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareinyɨ mwaaihebaaibɨ' Polɨjɨ Apozelɨya pwarajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarera.”

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Naangei nemɨnyɨna sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi dɨragɨnya yɨhiwagaathe'na gannya dɨragɨnya' nejaavakeine. Sa' sarɨmɨnyɨ kayaaka yɨhigalakaade'na mɨ'. Yɨ dɨragɨnya sa'na nɨmɨ yune nemɨnne yaya sanna makɨlaaja' yɨ sa'na wagɨla maarɨdeinyɨ mɨ'.
Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ “Aala!” dɨwa. Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna dara yawɨ'manɨga' “Gamɨre paazɨyangɨ nemɨnyɨ lɨka dahaneyɨrɨ'gaimanɨ'.” Sare' sarɨmɨ yawɨsa'na “Aala!” dadɨ mi'na yɨhɨthɨwa.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mwe pwara nɨmɨnyɨna dara dadɨvɨsare “Yo, gamɨre paazɨya naanga kɨnɨnnake yɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakengɨ. Kɨrɨ' gamɨ sai kabi'mavojɨ nemɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ tɨnna wangadaawori dɨragɨnya maayalyɨ. Yɨ sagaa' gamɨre yagaalya' yaasɨwa'nanyasɨ.”

Sasarera nayaa dara yawɨpɨka! Nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ menya keibeva yɨbwa'nadozɨ yune yagaalya' sarɨmɨnyɨna pɨkarya yɨda'daanya' yɨ nabaai nemɨ sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannamwalaaja' nemɨ avaainanyabwi yagaala sa' sara yɨhyadaanyasɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'manɨgo. Yɨ “A'mwe pwarabɨ' avaainanyainera!” nemɨ yɨnɨga wi'na daanneina mɨ'. Sahwara yune kumɨnne yayanna munyaba makinadɨvɨsare. Yɨ nemɨre sabulyɨ akwaraavɨre sabulyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maryawɨbwaraanneina mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe dazara yune kumɨre saburɨne yaamɨjɨta wakadɨvɨ' “Tewaanyainera,” maryawɨbwa'dɨvɨsare. Sahwara kumɨre yawɨsangɨna maryawɨbwa'nadɨvɨsare. Yɨ sarera sɨmunya maayare. Kwaakevakɨyara kunnya yawɨsabwina nayaa maryawɨbwa'nadɨvɨsara mɨ'.

Sahwara sara yadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' Apozelɨyaina nemɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlyavɨna nemɨre yɨtaasavɨ wavɨlavaadeina mɨ'. Aawa. Yɨtaata savɨ Gotɨyai yaamɨjɨta wakada yɨtaasa' maryawɨbwaraka yanga nejaava'. Nemɨ yɨtaata yune dazahɨrɨvɨna mɨdɨdaanyaine. Nemɨ sahɨrɨvɨ kusawɨ mɨdɨnona sarɨmɨ kwaihɨryawɨnna bi'mavoine.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna mabi'mayɨ yaajɨ kwajɨ nemɨre yɨtaasavɨ kavari'mavaadɨkebaaibɨ' pilaanna nemɨ saina dɨragɨnna wavɨla'manɨgoina mɨ'. Aawa. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mavona sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨmakabovɨna sarɨmɨ nemɨre yɨtaasavɨ mwaaiha'.

Wawɨnya pɨnɨngɨ a'mwe pwara gaalyagaa' mɨraagɨkɨresangɨna nemɨnne yaya' mamakɨlyɨvanɨgo. Nemɨre yɨtaasavɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka wawɨnya savɨ mavari'mayona sara mi. Aawa. Nemɨ sɨmunya dɨragɨnya dara yawɨrakɨvanɨgo. Sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnaanga mena kima'nojɨ nemɨre yɨtaasavɨ yɨnɨgeva wawɨnya sa' yunebanna yɨ'mwannaade'nanyɨ.

Yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ bulyɨmagɨ mwaaihata kwaaka pimagɨnna Naangerɨna kadɨka mu'nyadɨvɨsaraayawɨnna nemɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwakamaryaade'nanyɨ. Nemɨre yɨtaasavɨ pari'makwɨya yaadeina mɨ'. A'mwe pware yaamɨjɨta wakɨnɨkeba mena yakengɨna nemɨnne yaya' yaasɨwa' makɨlaanneina mɨ'. “Wawɨnya sa' nemɨ saina yagosɨra,” majadaanyainera.
Aawa. “A'mwe gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makidei yɨ Naangerɨna gaverɨna nayaa sara makɨlana!”
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe yune gannya yaya'na munyaba makɨlajai yɨ dazarɨ Gotɨyai yawɨramaaradei mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe Naangei gamɨre yaya' makɨlajai yune a'mwe sahwarɨ yawɨramaaradelyɨ.
Akai, dara nyɨvu'nɨvanɨkeinyɨ. Nɨmɨ sɨmumaaya maalɨ'nanya yagaala kave du'nyɨla! Maanga yarai manyɨdɨpɨnera! Kɨrɨ' yɨhɨthɨwe' baa'neka! Sarɨmɨ maanga majɨ, nayaa kave nyu'nadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyarɨdaa'nya wɨvu'nyabwina sarɨmɨnyɨne tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨna “Nɨnnya'neraavɨ dahɨlakɨma!” dada yɨ sasare dazahɨburɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨge. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gave pwarɨna kwala maa'nya'na sarɨmɨnyɨ mena yɨhɨthahɨlakɨweihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Yɨ sahwaihi a'mwazɨdɨraaya tewaanya' mwaaide'bɨsaihɨrɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨhɨmaakɨdeihɨlyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' nabaai nɨmɨ lɨka dara yɨwa. Kamaala sai kwaasɨya sabwina sɨmunya naanga yawɨ'dei sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Yɨvavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala sa' wɨjaakabaaibɨ' sasare sabwi nayɨhima'nadɨka! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ yune Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yawɨta dazabulyɨ yune gamɨnyɨna tewaanna yɨda'na yɨhɨvu'nya dazabulyɨ yɨhwarɨkebulyɨ. Akai, sarevɨna sarɨmɨre sɨmunya sa kayaaka nayɨhigalakadɨka! Nɨmɨ daza'na lɨka yɨvanɨge.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe kwai sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨma'naabada Jizaaza pwarɨna yɨhɨzɨwaakadei. Nemɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakoyai yɨ Jizaazai sahwarɨna mɨ'. Yɨ sasare dazaburɨ sarɨmɨ kurya nabinanyai maa'dɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨ maareta Kurya Tewaanya dazaina mɨ'. Yɨ sarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya nabinanya' maa'manɨga'. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya maareta daza'na mɨ'. A'mwe sai sarɨmɨnyɨ tɨnnyaba sasare sabwi yadei yɨ sahwarɨ kave wɨ'nɨvanɨgasaihɨle!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ dara yawɨ'manɨge. Mudɨkera sara yɨhɨthadɨvɨ' nabaai, “Apozelɨya nawɨ'nyaanga wavɨla'nɨkeine,” dadɨvɨsaraavɨ dalaangewɨ aane pɨburɨna kɨburɨna maalɨ'na wɨla'nata mijɨvanɨgena!

Kɨrɨ' yagaala wɨjavɨ nɨmɨ nayaa miwɨrinɨkeinyɨ dahamwaaihe? Baa'nana! Sare kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sɨmunya yawɨsa'na kuna manyɨmudaasɨvanɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨna yuya sɨmunya yawɨta yuya sa nemɨ yadaanya yuya saburana yɨhibwarɨdaakwo.

Nɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' yange'na yɨhɨzɨwaakeinyɨ. Yɨ sara yadɨ nɨmɨ savɨna nɨgwia maareinyɨ mɨ'. “Yagaala nebulya' yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ munyaba makɨlɨma!” dena nɨgwia mamaarya dazaburɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ walamarake. Sara yene'na nɨmɨ dazabwi ye' yɨwetawakyabwi dɨngaka?

Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya pɨnɨngɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨthaaya'nevɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨgaimwagya'ne nɨgwia maareinyɨ. Yɨ sasare saburɨ sahwaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa nɨmɨ yaasɨwa' mwagi'nya'bɨsasɨ. Kumɨre wɨdaayavɨna mɨ'. Sarɨmɨnyɨne'nanyɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannemwaalena yɨ nɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨsanna nyɨgainakegaa' yɨ dazagaa' sarɨmɨjɨya a'mwe aane pwarɨna kwarɨna taanga wɨjaaveinyɨ mɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Neya'mwerana Maazathonɨyadaa'nyara anga Koridɨna yɨ'maveva gɨlyɨvɨta nyɨgainadaasɨya sahwara yunebanna ye'. Yɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuya nɨmɨ nayaa yavada'gainadɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna nɨmɨ taanga pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' mayɨhɨzaaye. Nabaai dɨvi yuyagaa' yɨ nɨmɨ nayaa kuna sara yɨdeinyɨ.

Yagaala nebulya'nanya Kɨraazɨtɨyare' sa' nɨmɨnyɨ sahwainyɨ nyarɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuya Pɨrovijɨ Gɨriza sɨmagɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makidɨ yadɨnya dazabwina a'mwe aane pwai nɨmɨre tusa' yaya' makɨlya'ne' kaanya yɨnɨga wi'na tihɨradei mɨ'.
Nɨmɨ sasare sa' baarɨ'na yɨvanɨgena? Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya manyɨvu'nyɨvanɨkeinyɨ dɨngaka! Aawa. Gotɨyai mena nyawɨ'manɨ'. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ nyɨvu'nadeinyɨ.

Sare kɨrɨ' “Pwara kumɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'ne tusa'na ‘Polɨmɨva avaaina yadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sabwina bɨraana!’ dadɨvɨ' yaamɨjɨ yɨna yadaapi ‘Tuta sa' kaanya tihɨrɨma!’ dena sarɨmɨre nɨgwia maa'dɨnyainyɨ mɨ'. Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ yune sasara yɨdeinyɨ.”
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe dazara kwaasɨya apozelɨyare. Sahwara kwaasɨ yadɨvɨsare. Sahwara kumɨrebwi marovinya yadɨvɨ' yune kɨlaakejɨkɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyare Apozelɨyainera,” dahɨlakɨmanɨga'.
Yɨ dazavɨne'na sarɨmɨ atɨka mamaru'napɨna! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Saataanɨ gamɨ sai gannya kwaasɨyabwi marovinada yune kɨlaakejɨkɨnanya' sai baakevɨya ejelɨyaibɨ' yɨma'nadelyɨ.

Sasare savɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨta a'mwera kwarajɨ kumɨrebwi kwaasɨ marovinya yadɨvɨ' a'mwe yɨda'maraangebwi yadɨvɨsarabɨsara kwaasɨ yɨma'nadɨvɨsa' naange' daaka! Yɨ a'mwe sahwara dɨvidaa'nyɨ kumɨre kwaasɨ yadɨvɨta sabwina tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya maapɨ'dere. Kumɨre aayagaa'ne' kayaa'nanya sahɨrɨ' warɨ'.

Sɨnnawɨ mena yɨhɨthɨwe' nɨmɨ ayahi yɨhɨthɨma! A'mwe pwai kwai nɨmɨnyɨna dara nyawɨradɨ' “Sai a'mwe sɨmumaayalyɨ.” Kɨrɨ' sare' yawɨrya'neihɨrɨ yɨhɨvu'naja' “Nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ sɨmumaayaibɨsainyɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlɨma!” kada'mujɨ kave dɨnyu'naabyɨla!
Nɨmɨ Naangei yakebwi mamɨdɨnyadɨ yagaala dara majɨvanɨge. Aawa. Sɨmumaayaibɨ' yagaalya' yaya' munyaba makɨlya'na nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna yɨvanɨge' dara dahathɨvanɨge.
A'mwe kwalaalyara kɨlaakejɨkɨyabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨ' yɨ kumɨnne yune yaya sangɨna munyaba makimanɨgasavɨ yɨ dahaa' nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ yaya' munyaba maalɨ'na makɨlɨdeinyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ a'mwe sɨmumaayaraavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨ yɨlaaya'na kave wɨ'nɨvanɨga'. Sarevɨ sɨmunya tewaanya' kɨnɨnnakeihi daa!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe pwai kwai gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnya'na yɨhɨmwagi'namakabaza' yɨ sai sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya yunebanna yaja' yɨ sai gamɨre kwaasɨya'na yɨhigalaja' yɨ sai kayaa'na yɨhibwaakaja' yɨ sai sarɨmɨre sɨdalengɨ mala yɨhɨramaja' yɨ sara yɨhyadaawori sare sarɨ kave nayaa wɨ'nɨvanɨgasaihɨle!
We'! Sasare kayaa'nanya sabwi ya'ne sahwara yadɨvɨsanna nemɨ dɨragɨnya maayaine. Sarevɨ yɨ nɨmɨ savɨna jalɨkurakɨwe' yɨ nɨmɨ wagɨlya' nyɨvwa'nanneinye!
Nabaai a'mwe pwai kwai dɨragɨnna yada gannya sabwina jalɨkurakadevurɨna yɨ dazahɨburɨna nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ dɨragɨnya yadɨ jalɨkurakɨdeinyɨ. Sara dɨwe' a'mwe sɨmumaayainyɨbɨ' dɨwebaaibɨsasɨ.
Sahwara Yɨvɨruyara dɨngaka? Yɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨnyɨ. Ne Jaikopɨmɨdaa'nyara Yɨzɨrelɨyara dɨngaka? Yɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ. Ne Evɨraamɨmɨre yɨsiwiara dɨngaka? Yɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨtara dɨngaka? A'mwe wana sɨdu'maaya yune navɨ'navɨka nebulya'nanyaibɨsainyɨ dara dɨma! Yɨ nɨmɨ wavɨla'dɨnyainyɨ. Yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya kwalaalya naangengɨna wavɨla'na. Nɨmɨre wawɨnya'na kalavuza kwalaalya naangengɨ yɨrakesangɨna wavɨla'na. A'mwera nɨmɨnyɨ mala naange nyɨradaapɨri yɨ dazavɨ sahwaraavɨ nebulya'na wavɨla'na. Kwalaalyagaa' nebawa kabaimudɨkeinye!
Yɨ yɨrɨka dahasaai dahasaai dahaa' sarevɨ Juyara wɨla kayaa'nanyabaalyɨ nyɨlɨ'bware'. Kuna nyɨlɨ'bwa'dɨvɨ' aaya' teti naainɨyavɨ (39) tamɨdaakuna nyadɨvɨkɨ. Sarevɨ aya kɨba nɨmɨ balɨgɨrasainyɨ.

Yɨrɨka dahasaai dahaa' Romɨyara yɨsarɨkajɨ nyɨrame'. Gave pɨgaa' a'mwe pwara sɨlyajɨ lɨwakɨna nye'. Gotɨyare wawɨnya'na wodɨ yɨrɨka dahasaai dahaa' sɨpɨya' kayaaka yɨnyɨna kya' nɨmɨ saalaalyavɨ yɨwɨna kyɨwɨdɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pɨgaa' sawɨta pɨrɨ' yɨrɨte pɨrɨ' saalaalya naangevɨ a'ba yɨlaramaryeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨre wɨdaayaburɨ kwalaalyagaa' nɨmɨ tuta saamɨnyavɨ waweinyɨ. Aalya yarai bwalyawodaa'nyɨ yɨwɨna kiwɨdɨkeinyɨ sara yeinyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe kuka yɨpalamaa'dɨvɨsaraavɨre asɨrɨ saba sana yɨwɨna kiwɨdɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Kayaaka yɨgalaana!” deva sara kanyɨramakɨpɨdɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe ajɨmya pɨnɨngɨya pwara sara kwarajɨ “Kayaaka yɨgalaana!” deva sara kanyɨramakɨpɨdɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ anga naangeba sara yɨwɨna kiwɨdɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ kwaaka a'mwamaayavɨ sara yɨwɨna kiwɨdɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ saalaalyavɨ sara yɨwɨna kiwɨdɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe “Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareinera. Ja'mweinera,” kwaasɨ dadɨvɨsaraavɨre asɨrɨ sara yɨwɨna kiwɨdɨkeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨ wawɨnya kwalaalya yagɨyagɨ sara yeinyɨ. Dɨragɨnna mɨraagɨkɨreinyɨ. Kwalaalyagaa' sawɨ'wawɨnya yadɨ se wareinyɨ mɨ'. Mɨjɨ'na mwaalɨna yadɨ aalya'na baleinyɨ. Kwalaalyagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyare wawɨnya'na tɨka wapaaya yagalya'maveinyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨ yɨrɨla nyadaa'nyɨ baazɨ'ma'nyanna kune nyɨma'nakeinyɨ.

Nabaai yune sahɨnɨnanna mɨ'. Pɨnɨ warɨke wavɨla'nɨkeinyɨna wibwarɨdaakuvanɨkengɨ. Yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya yuya sangɨ maremwaalya'na sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ daza' taanginya naanga nebulya'nanya' nyakɨvanɨ'.

Yɨ a'mwei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadei gamɨre kuryai dɨragɨnya maayai yojɨya'na yɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨ gamɨbɨ'na najɨnanyainyɨ ye'mwannamwaalɨdeinyɨ midaaka! Yɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyavɨ yɨdɨhwakɨ'naraawajai yɨ daza'na nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kale dusɨna, daanga naanga dɨke'bɨ' nyɨgɨnyɨwannaradeinyɨ midaaka!
Nabaai nɨmɨ yevɨna “Kwalaalyanna dɨjɨ,” yawɨ'mujainyɨ yɨ nɨmɨ dara dɨdeinyɨ. Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya maayainyɨra. Yɨ dazavɨna nɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba nayaa makɨlɨdeinyɨ.
Gotɨyai, Naanga Jizaazarɨ Ganɨmaangei sahwai nɨmɨnyɨna dara yawɨ'delyɨ “Sai kwaasɨ majɨwa'.” Nemɨ yuyagaa'na sahwarɨne yaya' munyaba makidaanyai sara yawɨ'delyɨ.

Yɨ sarɨmɨ nayaa yawɨranganya'neihɨrɨ “Polɨ dɨragɨnya maayalyɨ,” yɨhɨthɨma! Damaazɨkazɨ saba Aaretazai Kingɨyai mwaala'. Sarei kɨyaapɨya naangerɨ anga naanga Damaazɨkazɨ tɨkuryavɨ maremwaalya'nerɨ dahɨlakakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai dame daaya'nei nɨmɨnyɨna “Kalavuza yɨrɨma!” daka nyakelyɨ.

Sara kanya' nya'mwe pwara soigɨlya naangevɨ lɨka wɨlanyɨmarulakeva angebanya sikurɨkevɨ munyaba dabu'nɨkevɨ nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlyabaarɨ makwasaabɨna nye'. Yɨthaa, sara kanye' nɨmɨ walaabɨna yɨna yena lɨkaanya wɨna ye. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nɨmɨ kɨyaapɨyare asɨrɨ makwasakena yɨ nɨmɨ lɨkaanya wɨna ye. Saza yadɨnyainyɨ wɨrɨsainyɨ.

Tusarɨ' pɨrɨ' mɨ'. Nɨmɨ yune nɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makimujainyɨ. “Nebulyasɨ, sasare dazabwi negaimwagathe' mɨ',” yawɨ'daanyɨ. Sarevɨ kɨrɨ' a'mabaaitɨnna pɨnɨnnajɨ lɨka yulyakya pɨnɨjɨ Naangei marima'naabadennajɨ dɨde'nanyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaalɨka pwarɨ nɨmɨ mena yawɨrangadɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨ kwarame potinɨya (14) kɨgaa' Gotɨyai gamɨreba Sɨgunyavɨ menya ke'mwewɨnna yarai yɨpalamakɨlaawa'. Ai, sai kɨlaa'nakei dahamwaala'? Nɨmɨ myawɨriwa. Sai kɨlaakejɨ' yagalya'mata dahaya'? Nɨmɨ myawɨriwa. Gotɨyai yune gave sahwaina yawɨ'dei.

Yɨ nɨmɨ a'mwe dazarɨna yawɨrangadɨnyainyɨ sahwarɨ Gotɨyai nawɨ'nyabanna Parathaazɨ wo'nɨkebanna makɨlaawakerɨna. Sai kɨlaa'nakei dahamwaala'? Sai kɨlaakejɨ' yagalya'mata dahaya'? Nɨmɨ myawɨriwa. Gotɨyai yawɨ'dei.
Sɨgunyaba sai kadɨka wɨ'naka yagaala sangɨ a'mwei yɨnɨga wi'na dannei mɨ'. Yɨ Gotɨyai daza kɨrɨ'najɨ kɨmaakɨya dakɨna.

Sasarerɨ yɨma'nakevɨna nɨmɨ gamɨnne yaya' munya ke'ba makɨlya'neinyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨne'na nɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba mamakimuna! Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna gave pɨrɨ'na dara dɨde'na “Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya maayainyɨra,” nɨmɨnne yaya' yɨnɨga wi'na makɨlɨdeinyɨ.

Sara yɨwɨneinyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. “Nɨmɨnne yaya' makɨlɨma!” dɨwɨja' a'mwe navɨ'navɨkeinyɨbɨ' yɨdeinyɨ mɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ yagaala nebulya'na dɨwɨneinyɨ. Kɨrɨ' yune nɨmɨnne yaya'na mamakɨlyɨvanɨge. A'mwe pwai nɨmɨnyɨna dara nyawɨradɨka! “Polɨ a'mwe wana nawɨ'nyaangelyɨra.” Nɨmɨ yɨvanɨge sabwi sahwai tɨnna wanganannejɨ nɨmɨ yagaala dɨvanɨgengɨ kadɨka wɨ'nannejɨ sasare sahɨnɨngɨ sɨmunya nayaa yɨda'na yawɨrade'na tewaanyasɨ. Nebulya' dɨngaka? Kwaasɨya' dɨngakajɨ?

Yɨ yuya daza Gotɨyai nyɨbwarɨdaakwake wana naanga nebulya'nanyanna “Yɨ gamɨnne yaya' gamɨ saina naanna namakɨladɨka!” daka sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai lange'bɨsa' daange' nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ nyɨmulya'ne' nyɨjaava'. Yɨ daza' “Saataanɨmɨre ejelɨyai Polɨmɨ mala wɨramana!” daka nyɨjaava'. Nɨmɨ yune nɨmɨnyɨne'na naanna namakimudɨ'de'na nɨmɨnyɨ marulawakya nya'nei daanga nyɨvɨdelyɨ.
Dazavɨna “Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ marasɨ'nana!” dena yɨrɨka dahasaai dahaa' dɨragɨnna yɨdaangane'nanyɨ. “Tewaanya mwaalɨma!” dena yɨdaangane.

Kɨrɨ' nabaai sahwai dara nyɨda' “Nɨmɨre yanga gaimwanga naangebwi gɨmɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'nannebulyɨ. Darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' a'mwe dɨragɨnya maayaraavɨ wawɨnya yuna nebwina wiadesɨ.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ “Taanga nanyadɨka!” madɨwɨna! Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya maayainyɨre wɨrɨta savɨne yaya' munyaba makidɨnyainyɨ. “Kɨraazɨtɨyare dɨragɨnya' yune nɨmɨnyɨ nyarana!” dadɨ sara yɨde'nanyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne'na wɨrɨsangɨjɨ bɨraiyagaalyangɨjɨ nyɨgainyangɨjɨ kayaaka nyɨgaidengɨjɨ taanga dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyangɨjɨ nɨmɨ wikɨra. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnya maayainyɨ mwaala'mujɨyagaa' yɨ dazagaa' sagaa'na dɨragɨnya nebulya'nanya' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨ navɨ'navɨkeinyɨ yɨma'nɨwa. Kɨrɨ' nabaai nɨmɨ yadɨnyabwi nayaa myawɨranganyɨwaasavɨ sarɨmɨ kyanyɨdɨka'mwa'daa' yɨ nɨmɨ sara yɨma'nena yagaala sa dɨwa. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makibɨza' sa' yɨda'nanyabulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ sasara yadɨvɨtaihi mɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ geinyɨra. Kɨrɨ' mudɨkera “Apozelɨya nawɨ'nyaanga wavɨla'nɨkeine,” dadɨvɨta dazaraavɨ dalaangewɨ nɨmɨ mula'narige. Aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' manyɨmudaasadeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya yuya yɨvaimwannadɨ sarɨmɨnyaba Gotɨyare wawɨnya' yadɨ apozelɨya kware wɨjɨwaainya nebulya nɨmɨ marima'naabe. Sa yɨ darengɨ. Yɨjɨwaainya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyajɨ atɨka maru'nasajɨ dɨragɨnya yajɨ sa yɨma'nɨkengɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ yɨhye'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya pɨnɨngɨ naanga ya'. Nemɨnyɨ maalɨka ya'.” Sara yawɨ'manɨgasaihi daaka! Nɨmɨ yadɨnya'na sarɨmɨnyɨne pɨnɨnna yɨhɨmudaasade dɨngaka! Yɨ yɨhɨmudaasade' gave pɨrɨ'nanya' daresɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ gaveinyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ taanga yɨhɨzaaveinyɨ mɨ'. Sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa yɨhɨmwagi'neinyɨ mɨ'. Nɨmɨre yɨwetawakya dazawaai sarɨmɨ nayaa dɨmarasɨ'nyideihɨle!

Yɨthaanyi, dahaa' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna dahasaai darɨkɨ bɨde'na nɨmɨ yemwaala yɨwa. Yɨ nabaai taanga mihɨzaayadɨ sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa yɨhɨmwagi'nɨdeinyɨ mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa maarya'na nɨmɨ mabɨramaariwa. Aawa. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨ sahwaihɨrɨ maarya'na nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kaimɨraayara sahwara kuvɨnɨmaangeyuraavɨ gaimwagya'neyuraavɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa mari'bwarakya'nera wawɨnya maayarera. Aawa. Yune kuvɨnɨmaangeyura kaimɨraayaraavɨ gaimwagya'neyura mari'bwarakya wawɨnya sa' kɨnɨnnakeyurera. Nɨmɨ sɨrɨnɨmaangeibɨsainyɨ sara yɨhɨthɨwa.

Yɨ yɨhɨgaimwagya'neinyɨ nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yuya wasɨsa'na, nɨmɨre gaala kɨbulyɨ wasɨsa'na. Yɨ sarevɨna nɨmɨ “Wikɨra,” dadɨnyainyɨ. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya naanga naanga nyɨvu'naja sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahɨrɨvɨ tɨvɨkɨta ya'ne' nɨmɨnyɨna sarɨmɨre yɨhɨvu'nyabwi yune maalɨ'nanya' jɨvanɨka!

Kɨrɨ' nabaai pwara sahwara nɨmɨnyɨna dara dɨvanɨga' “Nebulyasɨ. Sai sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa ku'maayaba maarakei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai a'mwe nyɨlɨ'nyɨlɨka dadelyɨ. Yɨ kwaasɨyaburɨ sai sarɨmɨre sɨnnyɨkaavɨ lɨka yulya'mwagakya yada sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmwagi'namaara'.”
Mena maryasaabera a'mwe pwara sarɨmɨnyawɨnna besaraavɨdaa'nyɨ kwaraavɨre asɨrɨ nɨmɨ kwaasɨ yena sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa dahayɨhɨmwagi'ne!

Nɨmɨ Taaitazarɨ kyadɨkaave yɨ sahwai sarɨmɨnyawnna bakei, yɨ nɨmɨ neya'mwe pwai dazai maryasaabei salyɨ ye'mwannɨgwawa'. Taaitazai sai kwaasɨ yaka sarɨmɨrenna mwagi'nakei daaka! Gamɨjɨ sainaai sɨmunya gave avaainanyavɨ kaanya yamaryolyainaai midaaka! Tuta yune gave pɨrɨvɨna yɨbwaramakwadasainaai midaaka!

Yagaala yuya dazangɨ sarɨmɨ danganapɨjɨ yɨ nemɨnyɨna jawɨryideihi dɨngaka? “Nemɨre tɨnnyarɨ Polɨmɨvaavɨ marida'maya'ne' yɨda'mwakelyɨ.” Kɨrɨ' aawa. Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihoina yagaala daza dɨvanɨgo. Kɨrɨ', sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, nemɨ yɨvanɨgo yuya sa, yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨnenna dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwanga yɨhyadennanyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ lɨka dara yɨvanɨge nayɨhwangamudɨka! Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mava'mujɨ “O, sahwaraavɨna sɨmunya nayaa yawɨrɨma!” dɨwɨja' kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ nayaa mamwaalyɨ yadɨvɨ' sareihɨrɨ nayɨhwangamudɨka! Nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaihi “Polɨ nemɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yana!” yawɨpɨja' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sainyɨ maanga yɨhɨza'neinyɨ sareinyɨ nanyangabɨthɨka! Akai, sarɨmɨnyaba kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya dare naradɨka! Maanga dɨnyɨna, tɨganaarya yawɨ'na, sɨnna tɨka davɨna, pimagɨnyavakaavɨ maiyagaala dɨna, kayaakyagaala dɨna, bulayagaala dɨna, pihadɨka yɨbwaakɨna, gavamarasɨ'nyɨyagaala dadɨvɨ' yɨna. Nɨmɨ dazanna yɨpɨja'na lɨka yɨvanɨge.

Akai, sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayahi kaba'mujɨ yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna nɨmɨre Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨ nanyɨmarulawakadɨka! Yɨ a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨ yavada'gaidɨ sahwaraavɨna kɨnna nadɨwɨdɨka! Sahwara sɨnnawɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yesara sɨmunya mudɨkebwi myawɨramaariwaa'. Yɨ sahwara kayaa'nanya gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yɨna, ata lɨmwangebwi yɨna, dɨka widadaasɨ yɨna, yɨ sara yadɨvɨsaraavɨna kɨnna nadɨwɨdɨka!

Dahaa' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna nɨmɨ bɨde dahasaai dahaakɨra. Mi'na bi'mava'mujɨ yavada'galya'na dɨnɨke'na dara yɨdeinyɨ. A'mwe pwaraai a'mwe kwaraai kwai avaaimaangi'na kajalɨkurakapɨjɨ yagaala daza' dɨragɨnya wa'da yagaainakeraavɨ yawɨbwarɨdeinyɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' yɨwetawakya yesaraavɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ a'mwe yuya pwara kwara sara yɨwa'daasaraavɨjɨ yɨ pɨgasaalyagaa' sagaa' nɨmɨ sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalena “Sarɨmɨre yɨwetawakyangɨne tɨvɨkɨsa'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!” yɨhɨthevaaibɨ' yɨbwa'nɨweinyɨ ya'ne sabwina ayahi dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayahi ba'muri yɨwetawakya yadɨvɨsaraavɨ yaasɨwa' wanganakɨna yɨdeinyɨ mɨ'.

Sare' dathare'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨ “Naanga nebulya'na yawɨranganaajɨ ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai Polɨmɨre maangevɨ dathei dɨngakajɨ,’ ” jawɨranganyide. Kɨraazɨtɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨ yɨhyɨdeinyɨ. Sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨrɨsa'na yadei mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnaangelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨgaa' sahwai wɨrɨta kɨnɨnnakerɨ pwara yɨsavɨri nilɨya wɨramesalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakei gaalyai mwaalɨ'. Sare' datharevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ sahwarɨ wɨlamwaaihovɨ nemɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ kwainajɨ dɨragɨnya maayaine. Aawa. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨ nemɨ sahwalyɨ gaala gamɨreina ye'mwannamwalaadeine. Yɨ nabaai nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhyavada'galya'neina dɨragɨnya daza' marima'nabaatheine.

Sarɨmɨ nayaa jawɨryide'na “Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwaga'manɨgoina daaka?” sarɨnnya sɨmunyangɨ yaamɨjɨ jɨla! Sarɨmɨ saihi sahwaihɨrɨ nayaa jawɨranganyɨla! “Nemɨnyɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai wɨlanemwaalɨ',” myawɨrivanɨgasaihi daa! Nabaai aawana. Yɨ savɨna sarɨmɨ kwaasɨyaihɨrɨ jawɨrangannyideihi dɨngaka?
Yɨ nɨmɨre yawɨta yɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ nemɨnyɨna dɨneyawɨranganyide yawɨbwata dazavɨ yɨnɨgeva. Kwaasɨyaina mɨ'.

Yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨdangadaanyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ kayaa'nanya aane pɨbwi kɨbwi mi jideihɨlyɨ. “Nemɨ yavada'galya'neina yɨnɨga mi'nanyaina ku'maayaba nayaa yɨma'nabaana!” dona sara yɨdangadaanyaina mɨ'. Aawa. “Yɨ sarɨmɨ tewaanyabwi jɨla!” dona yɨdangadaanyɨ. Sare' nevu'nɨvanɨ'. Nemɨ yɨnɨga wi'nanyaina ku'maayaba yɨma'nabaadeinaavɨ myawɨranganya'ne'na wikɨra. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bawaajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare dɨragɨnyasɨ yɨhyavada'galaade' wikɨra.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nebulya' marulawakya'neina yɨnɨga wi'na yaanneina mɨ'. Aawa. Nebulya' gaimwagya'neina yɨnɨga wi'na yaanneinera.

Nabaai sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ wɨrɨta kɨnɨnnakeibɨsaina mwalaaja gazagaasagaa' nabaai sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaibɨzagaa' nemɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yadaanyainera. Nabaai sarɨmɨ yavada'gainya'neihi tewaanya yɨda'maraanga nawɨ'nyaihi yɨma'nya'na yuyagaa' nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaanyɨ.

Savɨdaa'nyɨ “Nɨmɨ yɨbwa'nɨweinyɨ sarɨmɨjɨ bihye'mwannamwaala'mujɨ Naangere dɨragɨnyasɨ yarai davanganasa'na mihɨzɨ yɨma!” dena pɨkarya datha' yɨda'mwa. Dɨragɨnya daza' Naangei nyɨjaavake', yɨ daza' dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨ dɨragɨnya yɨwagya'nesɨ. Sa' yawɨsangɨ kayaaka wo'dalasɨ'nya'ne' mɨ'.

Nya'mweihi, dahaa' yagaala aaya' dɨma! Tewaanya dɨmwaalyɨla! Tewaanya yɨda'maraanga nawɨ'nyaihi yɨma'nya'neihi yavada'gainyɨna jɨla! Nɨmɨre yagaalya' nayaa wɨ'namɨdɨnapɨjɨ sarɨnnya sɨmunyangɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwannyɨna jɨla! Sɨmunya avaainanya' jawɨramaarila! Kwaamu'nanyaburɨ dɨmwaalyɨla! Sara yadɨvɨ' yɨ Gotɨyai tewaanya wɨvu'nyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyai, kwaamu'nanyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyai, yɨ sai sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaaladelyɨ.
Sarɨmɨnyɨ gazaizai gya'mwe pwarɨ “Nya'mwei!” dada maangwɨdaayɨlaaya tewaanya' yana!
Dava Gotɨyare tewaanya yuyara sarɨmɨnyɨ “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'.
Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨrɨ yanga gaimwange' kuna yɨhwakana! Gotɨyarɨ sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨrɨna tewaanya kuna wɨvu'nana! Kurya Tewaanyai sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨlyɨ kuna yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!

Nyɨdasaabadeinyɨ Polɨnyɨ yɨkwia da' yavɨkarivanɨge. A'mwera nyɨdasaabadɨvɨtainyɨ mɨ'. A'mwe pwarɨ Gotɨyai kuda' “Polɨmɨ wɨdaasaderɨ dumwaaihya!” kuda' sai nyɨdahɨlakakainyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ “Apozelɨyaigɨnyɨ gɨthaasakadeigɨnyɨ,” nyɨdahɨla nyɨdahɨlakagɨlyainyɨ. Gotɨya sai Kɨraazɨtɨyai balakerɨ yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ.
Nɨmɨjɨ neya'mwera Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨ'nya'nera dava mwaaihasarajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo “Neya'mweihi!” Kwaaka Galezɨya pɨwɨ pɨwɨ mwaaihasaihɨrɨ “Neya'mweihi,” yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo.
Nabaai, Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ yanga gaimwangebwina yɨhyɨka! Sanɨdaare kwaamu'nanyaburɨ kuna tewaanya yɨhɨmwaaihyɨka!
Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai nemɨre kayaa'nanyanne'na wɨjaavɨnaka bala'. Dahaasa kayaa'nanyaraavɨre kayaa'nanyabwina “Padaihasamaarɨma!” daka bala'. Nemɨre Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangere sɨmunyavɨna bala'.
Gotɨyai tewaanyabwi sara kya' gamɨre yaya' munyaba makɨlaana! “Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' byaannakeigɨ!” wɨdaana! Naanga sahɨrɨsɨra!

Akai. Sarɨmɨnyɨna atɨka maru'na'manɨge. Gotɨyai kyɨhɨthahɨlaka' Kɨraazɨtɨyai yange'na yɨhɨgaimwaga'. Sara kyɨhɨhaimwaga' maalɨkegaa' “Sahwarɨ yagalya'mavaadeina dɨngaka?” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yagaala tewaanya ge' mɨdɨnya'na yawɨ'manɨgasaihi daa!
Sare' yagaala tewaanya ge' mwari'. Aawa. A'mwe pwara sarɨmɨre sɨmunya kwalaalya yɨhɨzaavanɨgava. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yagaala tewaanya'na “Nayaa yavada'galaana!” yawɨreva kɨrɨ' maragɨnyɨwamanɨgava.

Sɨnnawɨ yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨtho gavesɨra. Nemɨ saina “Yagaala tewaanya aya' waramaryana!” daaza' yagaala tewaanya mudɨke' yɨhɨthaaza' Dɨkevɨ nemarasɨ'nana! Sɨgunyavɨdaasa ejelɨyai mamaayai yagaala tewaanya mudɨke' yɨhɨthaza' Dɨkevɨ wɨmarasɨ'nana!

Kɨgaa' mi'na yɨhɨtho kɨrɨ' dahaa' ayahi nayaa yɨhɨthɨma! Sɨnnawɨ yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨtho' mi'na yawɨ'mwaa'. Nabaai dahaa' a'mwe pwai “Yagaala aya' waramaryana!” daza' yagaala ge' yɨhɨthɨvanɨkerɨ Dɨkevɨ wɨmarasɨ'nana!

Sare' yagaala yɨhɨthɨwe'na dɨna “A'mwera ‘Polɨ tewaanyalyɨ,’ yawɨpɨka!” dadɨ dɨvanɨgeinyɨ daaka! Arɨkawɨ. Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna “ ‘Nebulya' dadelyɨ,’ yawɨrana!” dadɨ dɨvanɨgeinyɨ. “A'mwera nɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yɨpɨka!” yawɨ'mujɨ kwajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ kamwaaimudɨka.
Nya'mweihi, sare' nayaa yɨhɨthɨma! Yagaala tewaanya' wɨdadɨnya' a'mweraavɨre yagaala' mɨka.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwarɨ mamaarye. A'mwe pwai manyɨjɨwaakya'. Arɨkawɨ. Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai nyɨbwarɨdaakwakelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨgaa' yeinyɨrebwi mi'na wɨ'ne'. Juyaraavɨ Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrebwi dɨragɨnna mɨdɨdɨ Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyaraavɨ naanna kayaa'na yadɨ “Sahwaraavɨrebwi yuna kayaaka yɨgalɨma!” dadɨ dɨragɨnna sara ye.
Juyainaavɨrebwi dɨragɨnna yadɨ nɨmɨre Yɨsavaakɨyara nyɨnyakwalaangeraavɨ wavɨla'na ye. Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨre kɨwɨnya sahwara maalɨ'na mɨdɨdaapɨjɨ sahwainyɨ naanna mɨdɨneinyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai gevwi yawɨraka nyɨnaangevɨre munyɨkɨ kuna mwaalegaa' “Polɨmɨ yange'na wɨgaimwagɨdeinyɨ,” yawɨraka nabaai, “Nyɨdaayadei yɨma'nana!” daka nyɨjɨvwaramaarya'nei mena nyɨdahɨlakyaa'.

Sara nyɨdahɨlakaka gamɨregaa' a'mweinyɨ Gawaalɨvaangerɨna nyɨbwarɨdaakwa'. “Nɨmɨnyɨna navɨka yawɨ'dɨvɨsaraavɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne' wɨdana!” daka nyɨbwarɨdaakwa'. Mi'na kanyɨbwarɨdaakwa' sagaa' Naangere yagaalya'na yɨwaarasa'na a'mwe pwaraayawɨnna mwɨye.

Sagaa' pwara Wɨdaasadera mi'na yɨma'nyaasarera. Dɨvidaasɨ Nyɨdaasakeinyɨ yɨma'neinyɨ. Sagaa' Jeruzaalemɨna Wɨdaasade sahwaraavɨ yɨwaarasa'na myɨlaawie. Aawa. Kwaaka Arevɨya a'mwamaayabanna wawena dɨvi Anga Damaazɨkazɨna ayɨna yagalaawena bahe.
Naangerɨ kanyɨbwarɨdaakwa' kwarame dawaai da' kanyavɨlava' sagaa' Jeruzaalemɨna Pitarɨ wɨja'neinyɨ angyɨrɨ'maasa'neinyɨ yɨlaawena wikɨya gave dawaai gamɨnyawɨ mwaale.
Sareinyɨ Wɨdaasade kwalaalyara tɨnna mwanganyena Jemɨzai Naangere gahwaalaangerɨjɨ Pitarɨjɨ saraarɨ tɨnna wangane.
Sareinyɨ yagaala da' yɨhɨthɨvanɨge' nebulyasɨ. Gotɨyai kadɨka yuya nyu'nadaa'nyɨ “Kwaasɨ yagaala myɨhɨzɨvanɨgeinyɨ. (Daaina!)” yavɨkaryɨweinyɨ.
Kwaaka Juthɨya Jeruzaalemɨdaasɨ Kwaaka Sɨrɨya Kwaaka Sɨlɨzɨya anga mannɨkebanna wawe.
Sagaa' Kwaaka Juthɨya mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsara kusɨlaanyangɨyara nɨmɨre sɨnnyɨkɨ manyanganye'.
Sarera pwaraavɨre yagaala dara wɨ'nesa' “O, a'mwei kayaa'na neyakei ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨneihɨlyɨ,’ wɨdɨvanɨkei daaka! Sai ‘Sabwi kayaaka yɨgalɨma!’ dakei yagaala tewaanya' duthɨvanɨka!”
Sara wɨ'nesa'na nɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ “Byaannakeigɨnyɨra,” wɨdɨna ye'.
Kwarame pɨjaakuna (14) kanyavɨlava' nɨmɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ sainaai Taaitazarɨ maarola Jeruzaalemɨna ayɨna yɨlaawo.

Gotɨyai sara kanyɨbwarɨdaakwa' yɨlaawe. Yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨre wawɨnya yagesɨ wawɨnya kuna yɨvanɨgesɨ yaasɨwa'na nyɨma'nadɨka! Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨtara daakajɨ gaveraayaba kave wɨdɨma! Sahwara ‘Polɨ wɨdade' kayaa'nanyasɨ,’ dɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mu'nyɨ yɨpɨ'derera,” sara yawɨ'na yena a'mwe naanga gaveraavɨ wɨde “Maaveraayawɨ sana sana wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.”
Sareinyɨjɨyai Taaitazai Gɨrikɨyai mwaalaka kɨrɨ' Juyara Kɨraazɨtɨyare naangera dɨragɨnna mujɨna “Nemɨre Kɨwɨnya' sara dɨnɨke'na gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' davaana!” mujɨ nehye'.

Mujɨ nehyeta kɨrɨ' pwara kwaasɨ neya'mwera nemɨnyawɨnna kɨma'nyɨkaanya kave bahe' dame maa'dɨvɨsarabɨsara. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai Juyaraavɨreburɨdaa'nyɨ kanevadaihasamaara' tewaanya mwaaiho. Damerabɨsara yawɨ'na “Kumɨrebwi tɨnna wanganawaajɨ Juyainaavɨrebwi ayɨna pwɨyaana!” yawɨ'na yeva kave bahe'.
Kave bahesaraavɨre yagaala kadɨka dɨragɨnna mu'nyo. Nemɨ yawɨ'na “Juyaraavɨre kɨwɨnya Maaveraavɨ nurihɨradɨka! Naangere yagaala nebulya warana sahwaraavɨna!” yawɨ'na yona dɨragɨnna mamɨdɨnyo.

Yɨ, “A'mwe naangera Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨ'nadaanyainaavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara,” dadɨvɨsara nɨmɨre yagaala tewaanya' aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨsɨ mye'mwagye'. Nabaai sahwaraavɨna nɨmɨ lɨka myage. Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyaraavɨre sɨnnyavɨna avaaina yade'na nɨmɨ yuyaraavɨna avaaina yawɨ'dɨnya'na lɨka myage.

Sahwara yagaala mudɨka manyɨje'. Aawa. Kɨrɨ' dara wanganesasɨ. Gotɨyai Pitarɨ “Juyaraavɨ kɨlaaka daya'neraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' duthatheigɨnyɨ,” wɨdaasakabaaibɨ' Polɨ Maaveraavɨ kɨlaaka madaya'neraavɨ wɨja'nerɨ dahɨlakakelyɨra.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai Pitarɨ gannya dɨragɨnya' kujaava' Wɨdaasadei Apozelɨyare wawɨnya yada kɨlaaka dayaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakadevaaibɨ' sahwai gannya dɨragɨnya' kanyɨjaava' Apozelɨyainyɨre wawɨnya yadɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨnyainyɨ.

Jeruzaalemɨ mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarera yawɨ'na “Jemɨzai, Sipaazai (Pitai), Jonɨ nemɨre a'mwe naangere. Sɨmyarera.” Yawɨ'na kye' sahwara mwaaidɨvɨ' dara yawɨresasɨ. Ya, Gotɨyai Polɨmɨ Apozelɨyare wawɨnya' dahɨlakya'na yange'na wɨgaimwagakela! Sara deva “Nemɨ avaaiwawɨnya yadaanyainera,” deva Baanavaazalyɨ sainaarɨ ata bwa'nyɨna nehye'. Nabaai dɨnyɨna “Yo, Polɨjɨ Baanavaazalyɨ saraai ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraayawɨnna kuna wika! Nemɨ kɨlaaka dayaraayawɨ wawɨnya yaana!” Dɨnyɨna kyo naarɨmɨ “Tewaanyasɨ,” wɨdɨna yoi.
Yagaala pɨrɨ' nehɨthe' “Nemɨjɨyara nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨna wɨgaimwange'na jawɨrila!” Nɨmɨ sara yadɨnyainyɨ wɨde “Sare'na yɨlaaya yɨwana.”
Pɨgaa' Anga Aadɨyokɨna Sipaazai (Pitai) bɨna yaka kayaa'nanya' yake'na a'mweraayaba sahwarɨ maanga wɨde.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Jemɨzaryabadaasɨ pwara mabyesagaa' sai Kɨraazɨtɨyarera ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraayaba wapaaya nyɨna. Wapaaya nyɨna yaka kɨrɨ' sahwara bɨna kye' sai Maaveraayaba wapaaya manyɨna. Sai yawɨ'na “Sahwara dɨragɨnna dadɨvɨsare ‘Maavera kunnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ mada'nyadɨvɨsaraayaba tɨka manaannera!’ ” yawɨ'na yaka lɨka yɨna yaka wapaaya manyɨna.
Wapaaya manyɨ kya' Juyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarera pwara yawɨta kayaa'nanya yeva avaaina manyɨna. Avaaina manyɨ kye', nabaai, Baanavaazai tɨnna wanganna yaka dɨragɨnna mi yaka manyɨ yakelyɨ.

Manyɨ kye' tɨnna dara wangane' “O, sahwara yagaala tewaanyavɨ nebulya' myadɨvɨ' nayaa yɨda'na myɨvanɨgasara daaka!” Sara dena a'mweraayaba Pitarɨ wɨde “Juyaigɨnyɨra. Juyaigɨ kɨrɨ' Maaveraavɨrebwina tewaanna mwaimwaana. Juyaraavɨrebwina mamwalyɨwaana. Sareigɨ dahaa' ayɨna Juyaraavɨrebwi yɨwaanya'na ‘Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaihi, Juyaraavɨrebwina dɨmwaalyɨla!’ sara dɨvanɨgɨ. Sara be'na yɨvanɨgɨ!” wɨde.
Nenɨmaangera Juyara mwaaidapɨjɨ mudangegaa' Juyaina yɨma'no. Juyara dɨna “Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya myadɨvɨsara kayaa'nanyarera.” Sare' Juyaina mwaidaa ajɨmya yuyangɨyaina kayaa'nanyaina mamwaalyɨgoina

kɨrɨ' dara yawɨ'mwosɨ. O, pwai Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyabwi yada Gotɨyai mujɨna “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,” mujɨna. Aawa. Pwai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwaga'da Gotɨyai wɨdɨna “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,” wɨdɨvanɨkelyɨra.
