Sare' nemɨ saina Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwamwo. “Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkebwi mɨdɨdaa Gotɨyai ‘Yɨda'maraangeigɨ,’ manejadelyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaa Gotɨyai ‘Yɨda'maraangeigɨ,’ nedana!” dona sara lɨmwamwo. Kɨlaa'naka aane pwai kwai Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya mɨdɨda Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeigɨ,” mujɨnɨke'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwamwo.

Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaidaanya'na tewaanyaina nemwaaihɨvanɨkeinera. Sara yadaasɨ Juyara nenganeva nedɨvanɨga' “Juyaihi kɨwɨnya' navɨka yadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanyaihi Maaverabɨsaihi yɨma'nɨwaa'. Sare' sarɨmɨre Kɨraazɨtɨyai kayaa'nanyabwi wakadelyɨ.” Sara nedɨvanɨgasa' Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Arɨkewɨnyɨra. (Kɨraazɨtɨyai nɨmɨrebwi yadelyɨ.)”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnya'na Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,” mujɨ neyake'na Kɨwɨnyabwi wa'dɨ'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaa Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangesɨ,” nedadelyɨ. Nɨmɨ ayɨna Kɨwɨnyabwi yɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨnyainyɨ kyɨma'nɨwɨdɨka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnya'na baimweinyɨ. “Yɨda'maraangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!” dena Kɨwɨnyabwi yaamɨjɨ yaamɨjɨ yena aawano. Tewaanyainyɨ myɨma'nyɨwe'na “Kɨwɨnyabwi aalo,” dena sabwina baimweinyɨ. “Gotɨyarɨna gaala mwaalɨma!” dena sabwina baimweinyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaiheinyɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨsavɨ balakegaa' nɨmɨ bainɨkeinyɨ. Sare' nɨmɨ sainyɨ mamwaalyɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai wɨlanyɨmwaalɨkeinyɨ. Dahaa' kɨlaa'nakeinyɨ mwaaiheinyɨ. Gotɨyare Gawaalɨkɨ lɨmwadɨ mwaaiheinyɨ. Sai nɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nakelyɨ. Gamɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨneba marɨmwangɨnaka yarai balakelyɨ.

Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨna yange'na wɨgaimwangebwi wanganakɨna myɨwɨnera! (Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ.) Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai Kɨwɨnyabwina nayaa yada Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangelyɨ,” wɨdazɨ kwajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai yaasɨwa'na kabaladɨka! (Kɨwɨnyabwina Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,” mujɨ yanne'na Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨnyɨna bala'.)

Galezɨya mwaalyaihi sɨdu'maayaihi! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunya gɨnyɨwange' gara yɨma'nɨwaka! Sareihɨrɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨsavɨ baimwake' nɨmɨ kave yɨhɨthe' sarɨmɨ dara desa' “O, sahwai baimanɨkerɨ tɨnna dangamanɨgo!”
Gave pɨrɨ' yɨhu'nɨma! Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' sara yesa'na Gotɨyare Kuryarɨ maaresaihi daa! Aawa, yagaala tewaanya' kadɨka wɨ'neva Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwaga'dɨvɨ' gannya Kuryarɨ yɨhɨzaava'.

Sare' sɨdu'maayaihi daaka! Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai gannya Kuryarɨ yanga kyɨhɨzaava' sarɨmɨ tewaanna mwaalesaihɨlyɨ. Dahaa' “Nɨnnya kɨlaakevɨ dɨragɨnyasɨ naanga yune nebulya'nanyainyɨ yɨma'nɨdeinyɨ,” dathɨvanɨga'!
Taanga naanga yɨhyake' dɨragɨnna mwaalesa' yaasɨwa' jɨma'nɨwaka! “Aawa, yaasɨwa'na mɨka!” yawɨ'manɨge.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna yɨhɨthɨma! Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkevɨne wawɨnyanna sara yesa'na Gotɨyai gannya Kuryarɨ wɨjaavaka sarɨmɨnyaba atɨka dɨragɨnya wɨ'narya'ne yakei daa! Aawa, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagasaburɨne wɨ'nya'na Gotɨyai sara ya'.

Nabaai, Ne Evɨraamɨ avaalyabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagyaakelyɨ. Da' dɨnɨke' “Sai yawɨ'na ‘Gotɨyai nebulya' nyɨdɨwa',’ yawɨ'na yaka Gotɨyai dɨna ‘Nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨlɨmwamwake'na a'mwe yɨda'maraangei wɨmwaaihɨwe'na dɨwana,’ dɨna ya'.”
Sarevɨdaasɨ sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na “Ne Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagyaakeibɨsaina Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagya'neina Ne Evɨraamɨmɨre gawaalɨvaangeina nebwina mwaaiho,” sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.

Nabaai Gotɨyare bukuya' sɨnnawɨ sagaa' dɨnɨke' ajɨmya yuyangɨyara lɨmwabɨ'de'na “ ‘Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,’ wɨdɨdeinyɨ.” Sare'na sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyare bukuya' Evɨraamɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' dɨnɨke' “Nyɨlɨmwamwaanya'na ajɨmya yuyangɨya yuyaraavɨna tewaanya naanga yanga wideinyɨ. Maarɨderera,” sara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Sare' Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagyaakerɨjɨ nemɨ a'mwe Gotɨyarɨ avaaina lɨmwamwoinaavɨna Gotɨyai tewaanya naanga yanga nejaawakeinera.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨwɨnyaburɨne wawɨnyangɨnera yɨ sahwara Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nya'nevɨ dalaangewɨ mwaaiha'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara dɨnɨ' “Gazaigɨzaigɨ yuyagaa' Kɨwɨnyavɨya bukuyavɨ dɨnɨka yuya sa kuna myadɨnyaigɨnyɨ Gotɨyai Dɨkevɨ gɨmarasɨ'nadelyɨ.” Sara dɨnɨke'na yuyara sara myadɨvɨ' Dɨkevɨnerera.

Nabaai, Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨke' “Pwai Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwade sarerɨna Gotɨyai ‘Yɨda'maraangelyɨ,’ dozɨyai yuyagaa' gaala mwaaladelyɨ.” Sara dɨnɨke'na nemɨ tɨnna dara dɨragɨnna wangamanɨgo' “O, Kɨwɨnya yɨvanɨke aane pwai kwarɨna Gotɨyai ‘Yɨda'maraangelyɨ,’ majɨ yɨvanɨkei daaka!”
Kɨwɨnyabwi pɨbulyɨ. Lɨmwagasa'nebwi pɨbulyɨ. Avaalyaburaai mɨka. Aawa. Dɨnɨke' “Kɨwɨnya yuya ya'gɨzɨ gaala dɨmwaaide'nengɨra mubya'bɨ'.”

Nemɨ Kɨwɨnya yuya myadaanya'na yuyainaavɨ Dɨkevɨ nemarasɨ'nya'neina mwaaiho. Sareinaavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai ayɨna nemuba'. Sare' dara dɨnɨke' “Gazaizarɨ yɨsavɨ maratamarɨmwɨdaakwɨpɨ'derɨ Gotɨyai Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nadelyɨ.” Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yɨsavɨ nemɨnyɨneba kamaratamarɨmwɨdaakwe' Gotɨyai Dɨkevɨ marasɨta'neba sai yɨma'naabaka ayɨna nemaarakelyɨ.

Gotɨyai “Ne Evɨraamɨmɨ tewaanya naanga yanga wiaanya' Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨne' yɨma'nana!” daka, nabaai nemɨnyɨna “Sahwara, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kalɨmwagapɨjɨ Kuryai Tewaanyarɨne yune naanga nebulya'na wɨde sarɨ maapɨka!” kada' Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nya'nei yɨma'naka ayɨna nemubakelyɨ.
Nya'mweihi, a'mweinaavɨrebwinanya' yɨhɨzɨwaakɨma! A'mwei yawɨraka wɨlɨmwagarɨke sare' yɨkwiavɨ yavɨkaryaka gannya yaya yavɨkaryake' pwara magalazekɨvalyɨ yɨpɨnere. Yagaala pɨnɨjɨ mye'mwagyɨ yɨpɨnere.

Nemɨrebwi yɨgovaaibɨ' Gotɨyai yagaalya Evɨraamɨmɨjɨ gamɨre dɨviya'nei yɨsiwiarɨjɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake kuna warɨ' tewaanya'na. Gotɨyare bukuya' majɨnyɨ' “Dɨviya'neraava.” Kwalaalyaraavɨna majɨnyɨkesɨ. Aawa. Dara dɨnɨ' “Dɨviya'nela,” gave pwarɨna dɨnɨkesɨ. Nabaai, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna dɨnɨkesɨ.

Kuna warɨke' dara dɨvanɨge. Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yagaalya' yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdaka wɨjaa' “Sara gɨthɨwe' sara yɨdeinyɨ.” Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' wɨlɨmwagarake sa' wɨdaka kwarame dɨviyajɨ kwarame naanga naanga (430) wavɨlayaakegaa' dɨvidaa'nyɨ Ne Mozɨzarɨ Kɨwɨnya' wɨjayaa'. Dɨvidaa'nya' sɨnnawɨnyavɨ magalazekɨvalyɨnɨkesɨ. Yaasɨwa'nanya' mwakyɨnɨkesɨ. Aawa. Sɨnnawɨnya' Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake' kuna warɨkesɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Evɨraamɨ Kɨwɨnya' yaakevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai wɨjaake' wɨjaavajɨ kwajɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaakevɨdaa'nyɨ myɨma'nyɨ kyadɨka! Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake'na wɨjaavakesɨ.

Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake' kuna warɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai Kɨwɨnya' be'na wɨjayaa'? Da'na yɨnɨkesɨ. A'mwera kunnya kayaa'nanya wangadɨvɨ' dɨna “O, sareburɨ kayaaka galazekɨvaina yɨvanɨgoine. We'.” Sare'na Kɨwɨnya' wɨjayaake'nanyɨ. Evɨraamɨmɨre yɨsiwiai Jizaazarɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaakei bakegaa'nanyɨ. Nabaai, Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna wɨjaake' naangesɨ. Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyabwi maalɨkesɨ. Kɨwɨnya sa' Gotɨyai ejelɨyaraavɨ kujayaa' a'mwe pwai Mozɨzai tɨnnyaba mwalyaakerɨ mamaayara kujayaa' sai a'mweraavɨna wɨjayaakesɨ.
Tɨnnyabanyai gave pwarɨna mɨ'. Gotɨyai gave pwalyɨra. Yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake' Evɨraamɨmɨ Gotɨyai gavei wɨjaakesɨ. Tɨnnyabanyai mamwalyaakesɨ. Sare'na yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake' naangesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaakengɨ Kɨwɨnya' kayaaka yɨgaimanɨke' daaka! Arɨkawɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake' gevɨnesɨ. Kɨwɨnya' gevɨnesɨ. A'mwera gaala mwaaibɨ'de'na kɨwɨnya wɨjaavajɨ kwajɨ kɨwɨnya sa kyaadɨke' Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,” kanedathɨka! Sare' mɨ'. Kɨwɨnya sa mwarikengɨ.

Aawa. Gotɨyare bukuya' dɨnɨ' “A'mwe yuya kwara kayaa'nanyaburɨ kwaakevɨ wɨla pwɨyɨnɨkerera.” Gotɨyai “Evɨraamɨmɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaanya' a'mwe Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨzaraavɨna wɨjaavɨma! ‘Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,’ wɨdɨma!” daka kayaa'nanyaburɨ marulawaka'.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwange'negaa' myɨma'nyakegaa' Kɨwɨnya' nevwɨyɨnɨke' Juyainaavɨ kalavuzavɨ nemaremwaala'. Kɨwɨnya' wothaayaibɨsa' nemaremwaaidɨsɨ Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagaaza' kaneyɨbwarɨdaakwa' sagaa' nemaremwaalake' mi'nanyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai mabyahaa' Gotɨyai Kɨwɨnya' kanejaava' Kɨwɨnya' neyɨgɨvaangeibɨsa' dɨragɨnna nemaremwaalakesɨ. Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨ'de'na ‘Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,’ wɨdɨma!” daka neyɨgɨvaangeibɨsa' wakakesɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagaazahaa' mi'na kyɨma'na' neyɨgɨvaangeibɨsa' manemaremwaalyɨkesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yuyaihi Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwamwaasavɨna Gotɨyare gawaalɨvaangeihi mwaaihasaihɨlyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sareihɨrɨ Gotɨyai tewaanna yɨhyake'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bavɨtaazɨya wɨlayɨhɨmwaaihaka yuyaihi yɨ sahwaihi Kɨraazɨtɨyai kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'na Gotɨyai yuyaihɨrɨ avaaina yɨhɨmaara'. Gotɨyai myawɨri “Sai Juyai, sai Gɨrikɨyalyɨ. Sai yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai, sai maremwaainadelyɨ. Sai kwalyai, sa' balyasɨ.” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dazaraavɨna myawɨri yada yawɨ'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨna sai nɨmɨrei yɨma'nana!” yuya saihi gave pwaihɨlyɨ.
Sare'na Kɨraazɨtɨyareihi mwaaihasavɨdaa'nyɨ Evɨraamɨmɨ gawaalɨvaangeihi, yɨsiwiaihi mwaaiha'. Sare'na Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaake' yɨhɨzaavadelyɨ.

Yagaalya' yɨhɨthɨwe da'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kaimale pwai ganɨmaangere gɨlyɨvɨta yuya maaradelyɨ. Gamɨre yuya wa'dɨ'nyɨ kɨrɨ' kaimalei kuna mwaalɨke'na mamaaryɨvanɨkelyɨ. Sare'na kaimalegaa' yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaibɨsai mamaremwaalyɨkelyɨ.

Kaimalei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ ganɨmaangei sara wɨdake'na pwara gamɨnyɨ maremwaaina yadapɨjɨ nabaai, pwara gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ maremwaaiha'. Dɨvi ganɨmaangei wɨdakegaa' yɨma'nadehaa'na sagaa' gawaalɨvaangei sahwai maremwaaladelyɨ.
Sabaaibɨ' mwaalosɨra. Kaimaleina mwaalogaa' Kwaakevakɨyabwina mwaidaa “Sa' kɨmaakesɨra. Da' minna! Sa' minna!” yawɨ'daa sana sana yadaa saburaavɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainera.

Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaakegaa' yuna yɨma'nakegaa' Kwaakevakɨna gannya gawaalɨvaangerɨ wɨdasaabɨna. Wɨdasaabɨna kya' a'mwe' maarakei yɨma'nakelyɨ. Nabaai, Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnyavɨ dalaangewɨ marulavemwaaidei yɨma'nakelyɨ.

Kɨwɨnya' yaamɨjɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsara “Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨrana! ‘Sai yɨda'maraangelyɨ.’ Yawɨrade'na Kɨwɨnyabwi yɨma!” dadɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. Yɨ nemɨnyɨna “Nɨmɨ maryaavɨma! Nɨmɨre nyɨbwaalɨvaangera yɨma'nɨpɨka!” daka Kɨwɨnyavɨ dalaangewɨnyaraavɨna “Nyɨbwaalɨvaangei ayɨna wɨmubana!” kada' sahwai Kɨwɨnyavɨ dalaangewɨnyai yɨma'nakelyɨ.

Yɨ sarɨmɨ gawaalɨvaangeihi mwaaihasa'na Gotɨyai Gawaalɨvaangere Kuryai Tewaanyarɨ nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ wɨdasaaba'. Kurya sai wɨlanemwaalaka nejɨwɨryadaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdɨvanɨgo “Tataai! Nɨmwai!”
Sare' yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaigɨ kuna mamwaalyɨgɨ. Aawa. Gawaalɨvaangeigɨ mwaaihɨ. Gotɨyai sara yake'na gawaalɨvaangeigɨ mwaaidɨ Gotɨyai gawaalɨvaangeraavɨ wɨjaaya'ne dɨmaa'deigɨnyɨ.
Kɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨ myawɨryesa'na kwaasɨ dɨragɨnyara (kwaasɨgotɨyara) mamwaalyesara wɨla yɨhɨvwɨyadɨvɨ' yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihi wɨdaayadɨvɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmaremwaalesaihɨlyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' dahaa' Gotɨyarɨ yawɨrangamanɨgasa'na, nabaai, dɨwɨja' pɨrɨ', dahaa' Gotɨyai yɨhyawɨrangamanɨke'na Gotɨyarɨ be'na yagalya'ma'manɨga'! Sara yɨvanɨgasa' “Yɨmakera ayɨna nemaremwaaibɨka! Kwaakevakɨyabwi yaana!” dɨmanɨgatabaaibɨsasɨ. Sahwara dɨragɨnya maayarera. Waryaanyarera. “Sahwaraavɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaina ayɨna yɨma'naana!” be'na dɨmanɨga'!

Sareihi ayabaaibɨ' yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'na ‘Yɨda'maraangelyɨ,’ yawɨrade'na Kɨwɨnya' yɨma!” yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' yɨrɨkengɨjɨ lawengɨjɨ kwaramengɨjɨ kɨmaaka mwaaimanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sɨmunya dazabwi nawɨ'nyabwi mɨka!
Sareihɨrɨna sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'manɨge. Mi'na yage'na tewaanyaihi mwaalɨna yesaihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨ yuya sarɨmɨnyɨna yage yaasɨwa'na nyɨma'nadɨka!
Nya'mweihi, dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kɨwɨnya'na nɨmɨbɨsaihi yɨma'nɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Kɨwɨnya' majesaihibɨsainyɨ yɨma'neinyɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Kɨgaa' aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kayaa'na manyesaihɨlyɨ.
Nabalɨnakeinyɨ mwaale'na sɨnnawɨ sagaa' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wawena yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨthe yawɨ'mwaa'.

Dara wanganesa' “Akai, Polɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ nalaaya naanga wivanɨkei daaka!” Sara deva kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna majɨ “Waryaanyalyɨ,” majɨ yadɨvɨ' nabaai, bule'na manyɨjaaye'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ejelɨyai bazarɨ tewaanna wipɨnebaaibɨ' tewaanna nyesaihɨlyɨ. Nabaai, Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai bazarɨ tewaanna wipɨnebaaibɨ' tewaanna nyesaihɨlyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya naanga ye'. Dahaa' yɨlaaya sa' gava warɨkavaka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨna dara jalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Ai, sahwara nɨmɨnyɨna yuya yɨpɨjara daa! “Wɨgaimwange'na nennya tɨnnyangɨ jɨwa'mwanna yawaajɨ Polɨmɨna wɨjavaajainaava,” sabaaibɨ' yawɨreva.
Nebulyabwi yɨhɨthɨwe'na jawɨ'manɨga'! “Polɨ nemɨre yɨkamaangei mwaalɨ'.” (Yawɨta sasare sa' “Aala!” dɨwa.)

Pwara yɨlaaya yɨhɨmarivanɨgasara tewaanya'na myɨhɨzɨvanɨga'. Wabwiwayagaala yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'. Sahwara yawɨ'na “Nemɨnyɨ yɨlaaya neyɨpɨka! Polɨmɨre yagaala mu'nɨpɨnera!” deva sara yɨwaasa'na wabwiwayagaala yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'.
Tewaanya'na a'mwera yɨlaaya wɨmaryadɨvɨsa' yuyagaa' tewaanyasɨ. Sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya nyesa' tewaanyasɨ. Dahaa' sarɨmɨnyawɨ mamwaalyɨgehaa' yɨlaaya nyɨpɨja' tewaanyasɨ.

Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayaihi, a'mwe' bwaranyarɨ maa'dehaa' daanga naanga wɨvɨdevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨna ayɨna daanga naanga nyɨvɨmanɨ'. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ sarɨmɨre munyangɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai yunebanna wɨlayɨhɨmwaaladehaa'na taanga sa' mi'na mwi nyadesɨ.
Sarɨmɨnyaba mwaaimujainyɨ! Pɨkarya myavɨkarya'na nɨmɨre maanguraaya' yɨhɨthɨde'na sarɨmɨnyaba mwaaimujainyɨ. “Gara wɨdɨjɨwana!” yawɨ'dɨ taanga nyɨvanɨkeinyɨ.
Dɨnyɨjɨla! Sahwaihi dɨna “Kɨwɨnya' nemaremwaalana!” dɨna yɨvanɨgasaihi dɨnyɨjɨla! “Kɨwɨnya sa' dɨnɨke' mu'nyɨwaasaihi daa!”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara dɨnɨke'. Evɨraamɨ gawaalɨvaangeraai kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Pwai Yɨzɨmelɨ, pwai Aazakɨ. Wɨdaayade' Ehaa' Yɨzɨmelɨmɨ maryaa'. Gamɨre balaange' Seraa' Aazakɨmɨ maryaa'. Seraa' wɨdaayade' mɨ'.
Kɨrɨ' a'mweinaavɨreburɨne wɨdaayade' Yɨzɨmelɨmɨ maryaa'. Gamɨre balaange', a'mwe ne' mwaaidɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yune naanga nebulya'na kujaa' Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagyaake'na Aazakɨmɨ maryaa'.

Yagaala sa' ke'ba'na dɨnɨkesɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe sawaai yagaala wɨlɨmwagarɨkewaalyɨ. Ehaa' Mugunya Saainaayavɨ Gotɨyai Kɨwɨnya' wɨjayaake' sahɨrɨsɨ. Ehaa' wɨdaayade' yaasɨwa'wawɨnya'bɨsa' mwalyaake'na savɨrera yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara mwalyaasarera. Nabaai, Mugunya Saainaayavɨya Kɨwɨnya' a'mweraavɨ pwɨyɨnɨkera yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara mwaaihasarera.

Mugunya Saainaaya sa' Kwaaka Arevɨya warɨke' yɨ Ehaa'. Nabaai, Ehaa' Anga Jeruzaalemɨ dahaa' mannɨke' sahɨrɨsɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Juyara dɨnyɨna “Jeruzaalemɨ nemɨre anga naangebera,” dɨnyɨna yɨvanɨgasara Kɨwɨnya' mɨdɨdɨvɨsa'na Kɨwɨnya sa' pwɨyɨnɨkesɨ. Davakɨ Jeruzaalemɨjɨyara yaasɨwa'wawɨnyarera.

Sarera dɨragɨnna mamwaalyɨga'. Aawa. Jeruzaalemɨ munyaba Gotɨyarebanyaina Kɨraazɨtɨyareina dɨragɨnna mwaaiho. Sabajɨyaina yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaina mɨ'. Aawa. Nenaange' Seraavɨreinera. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna yune naanga nebulya'na dɨnɨkeina Aazakɨbɨsaina mwaaiho. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyaina tewaanna mwaaiho Jeruzaalemɨ munyabajɨyaina.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jeruzaalemɨ sabanyaaina ke'ba'na dɨnɨkesɨ. Jeruzaalemɨ munyabanya'na dɨnɨke'
“Kaimɨraaya maaya'gɨ yɨlaaya ja!
Jakajɨ jɨkajɨ ‘Su!’ dɨnyɨdangana!
Mamaaryadɨnya'gɨ yɨlaaya naanga ja!
Gɨthaasake'gɨre kaimɨraaya naanga mwaaibɨ'dera.”
Gotɨyarɨna munyabajɨyaina tewaanya dɨragɨnna mwaaiho'na dɨnɨke'nesɨ. Jeruzaalemɨ davakɨya'na dɨnɨke'
“A'mwanakevɨre pwai pwai mwaaibɨ'demɨlɨkera.”
Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Nya'mweihi, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsaihi Aazakɨbɨsaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaakei yɨma'nyaakabaaibɨ' yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjaaka sa' maa'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyai dɨna “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ. Nɨmɨreihɨlyɨ,” dɨna yakeihɨlyɨ.

Ehaa' kɨlaa'naka a'mweinaavɨrebwina maryaakei Yɨzɨmelɨ Aazakɨmɨ kayaa'na yɨna yaa'. Yɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai sara yaake'na maryaakerɨ kayaa'na yɨna yaa'. Sabaaibɨ' Kɨwɨnyabwi yɨvanɨgasara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyainaavɨ kayaa'na neyɨvanɨga'.

Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare bukuya' berɨ' dɨnɨ'? Dara dɨnɨke' “Wɨdaayadesɨ gawaalɨvaangelyɨ sanaarɨ duthaaso! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ganɨmaangere yuyangɨ wɨdaayadevɨrei mamaarannera! Arɨkewɨ. Gamɨre balaangevɨrei gavei maarade'na duthaaso!” sara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Sarevɨ, nya'mweihi, yaasɨwa'wawɨnyavɨreina mɨ'. Aawa. Balaangevɨreinera. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwamwaasara nɨmɨrere. Nɨmɨre tewaanya yuya maapɨ'dere,” dɨnɨkeinera.

Nemɨ tewaanya dɨragɨnna mwaalya'neinaavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai bala'. “Yuyabura pwɨyɨnɨkeraavɨ yaarɨma!” daka nevadaihasamaara'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kuna dɨragɨnna dɨthaaka! “Yaasɨwa'wawɨnyabulyainyɨ ayɨna nyɨma'nɨwɨdɨka!” da'gɨzɨ Kɨwɨnyabwi myawɨ'dɨnna!

Du'nana! Polɨnyɨ kave dara gɨthɨvanɨge. Gɨmɨ yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai nɨmɨnyɨna ‘Yɨda'maraangelyɨra,’ dana! Sare'na nɨmɨ Kɨwɨnya' yadɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨ nyɨdapɨka!” Sara yɨja' Kɨraazɨtɨyai yake'na gɨmɨnyɨna gɨhaimwagake' yaasɨwa'nanya' yɨma'nade'nanyɨ.
Ayɨna dɨragɨnna gɨzalɨkurakɨma! Gazaizai yawɨ'na “Yɨda'maraangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma! Pwara nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' nyɨdapɨ'de'nanyɨ,” yawɨ'na yojɨ sai Kɨwɨnya yuneba yannei tɨvɨkɨsa'nei yɨma'nade'nanyɨ.
Gɨmɨ yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai nyɨdana! ‘Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ.’ Nyɨdathe'na Kɨwɨnyabwi yɨma!” Sara yawɨ'na, yɨna yɨwaanya'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yagalya'ma'mwaa. Gotɨyai yange'na gɨhaimwagakevɨ bwala'mwaawɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaa Gotɨyare Kuryai gannya dɨragɨnya' nejaavada yɨlaaya yadaa yemwaaiho. Aayagaa' Gotɨyai yuyaraayaba “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” nedathe'na yemwaaiho.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaiho'na kɨlaakejɨ' daya'nebwi yaasɨwa'nanyasɨ. Nabaai kɨlaakejɨ' madaya'nebwi yaasɨwa'nanyasɨ. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyabwi pwaraavɨna tewaanya nevu'nadevɨna wawɨnya yadevwi naangaangesɨ.
Sɨnnawɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna kaanyave'na nayaa wawagɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ aai galagɨrihɨ'mwaka! Sare' nebulya' mamɨdɨnyɨ be'na yɨvanɨgɨna!
Mɨdɨnya saburɨna Gotɨyai givwaramaa'manɨkei sara magɨzɨwaakyɨwa'.
Dadaanya' “Pamidakade yɨzɨya maalɨkemɨlɨ' bɨretɨya naange' pamidakadesɨra.”

Sare' kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihe'na dɨragɨnna yawɨ'mwa “Sara yawɨ'manɨge Galezɨya mwaalyara sara yawɨpɨ'dera. Aane pɨbwi kɨbwi myawɨri, avaaina yɨpɨ'dera.” Nabaai, a'mwei gɨmɨnyɨna taanga gɨzaavanɨkerɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'na wiadelyɨ. A'mwe naangei dɨngaka? A'mwe maalɨkei dɨngaka? Sarerɨ Gotɨyai wɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ.

Nya'mweigɨ, pwara nɨmɨnyɨna kwaasɨ wɨdɨna “Sai wɨdɨna ‘A'mwera kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ da'nyɨna kyapɨjɨ Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” ’ wɨdathelyɨ.” Sara wɨdɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ kayaa'na kuna mi kanyɨpɨdɨka! Savɨdaa'nyɨ nebulya' warajɨ kwajɨ yɨsavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai balakevɨne wagɨla wɨvwa'nyabwi mena kyɨma'nadɨka!
A'mwera “Kɨlaaka dɨtha'nyɨla!” dadɨvɨ' gɨmɨre sɨmunya kayaaka yɨvanɨgasara kunnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ yune'na da'nɨpɨka!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nya'mweigɨ, sahwaigɨnyɨ Gotɨyai gɨthahɨlaka' “Wɨla pwɨyɨnɨkerɨ yaarɨma!” Sara gɨthahɨlakaka sara kagɨzɨvwaramaara' tewaanna mwaaihɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Mi'na gɨthɨwe'na dara myawɨ'dɨnna! “O, Kɨwɨnya' manevwɨyɨnyɨka. Su! Su! Kɨlaakejɨkɨne yuya tewaanyajɨ kayaa'nanyajɨ yɨma!” Sara myawɨ'dɨnna! Sara myɨnna! Aawa. Gyaarakeigɨ ja'mweraavɨna kale gyada yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaigɨ wɨgaimwanna ja!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya yuyavɨ aaya kaavɨlya' dara dɨnɨke' “Gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨna kale gyadevaaibɨ' pwaraavɨna kale gyana! Duhaimwana!” Yɨ yagaala sahɨrɨsɨ.
Sɨwaaka, malakayaaryarabɨsaihi myɨma'nɨpɨna! Maanga, sɨnna tɨka daya, mala sazabwi myɨpɨna! Sara yapɨjɨ, yɨthaanyi, gazaihizaihɨrɨ kayaaka yuna nyɨgainɨpɨdɨka!
Da'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gotɨyare Kuryai sara kagɨthozɨ kuna sara ja! Sara ya'gɨzɨ gɨmɨre sɨmunya ayabwi mi jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Arɨkawɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mweina sɨmunya yawɨ'daanya' Gotɨyare Kuryai yawɨ'de' yaamɨjɨ dathɨwanna. Nabaai, Gotɨyare Kuryai yawɨ'de' a'mweinaavɨre sɨmunya' dathɨwanna yannesɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare Kuryare sɨmunyasɨ a'mweinaavɨre sɨmunyasɨ yɨkamaangewaalyɨ. Sare'na Kuryai gɨthada gɨnnya sɨmunya' “Pɨbwi ja!” kagɨthozɨ sarebwi minneigɨnyɨ.
Sare'na Kuryai kuna gɨmaremwaalajaigɨ Kɨwɨnya' mamaremwaalyɨ gyatheigɨnyɨ.

A'mweraavɨre sɨmunyabwi yuyaina yawɨ'manɨgovulyɨ. A'mweraavɨrebulyɨyara dara yadɨvɨsangɨ. Ata lɨmwangebwi yɨna. Yaawaryaraavɨrebwi yɨna. Gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yɨna. A'mweraavɨ a'mwengɨ yaasɨwa'na kayaa'na lɨmwangebwi yɨna.

Yɨsaraavɨ, sɨlaangeraavɨ, nyɨlyarɨ, lawerɨ, sɨlɨngaamɨnyaraavɨ a'mwa'mweraavɨ yɨlaayabwi yɨna, kulaka maarya'nebwi yɨna. Gɨri'nya, lakya, kwalya dazabwi yɨna. Yɨkamaangebwi yɨna. Maangebwi yɨna. Pwaraavɨre tɨganaarya yadɨvɨ' “Maa'mujainyɨ,” dɨna. Sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya'nebwi yɨna. Kunnya yaya makinyɨna yadɨvɨ', pwaraavɨna kale mwia'nebwi yɨna. Jaapaina yadɨvɨ' pwaraavɨ wanganakɨna. Kumɨjɨyaraavɨ bɨrala yadɨvɨ' “Nemɨ tewaanyaine,” dɨna.

Pwaraavɨre naangengɨna “Maa'mujainyɨ,” dɨzabwi yɨna. Pwaraavɨ tamakɨna. Bɨyaaya saza nadɨvɨ' yɨmaka wɨlɨna. Nabaai bɨyaaya nyɨna kwarame kayaa'nanyabwi yɨna, avaanna kayaa'nanyabwi yɨna. Sara yadɨvɨsangɨ. Nabaai, sasarebura pɨburajɨ yadɨvɨsangɨ. Kɨgaa' gɨthevaaibɨ' dɨragɨnna ayɨna gɨthɨvanɨge. Sasare sabwi minna! Pwara saza yadɨvɨsaraavɨ Gotɨyai nayaa mamaremwaalyɨ yadera Gotɨyare yuyanna mamaari yɨpɨ'derera.

A'mweraavɨre sɨmunyabwina kayaa'na yadɨvɨta kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare Kuryai nemɨre sɨmunyanna maremwaaida yɨsɨla nawɨ'nyabɨsanna tewaanyainaavɨ nemwaaihɨvanɨkelyɨ. Sare' dara yadaanyasɨra. Pwaraavɨna kale neyada, sɨmunyangɨ yɨlaaya yadaa, kwaamu'nanyabwi yadaa, pwara kayaa'na neyadaapɨjɨ sɨnna tɨka yarai madayɨ neyade'na dɨragɨnyaina mwaidaa, bwiwanna yabwi yadaa, pwaraavɨ tewaanna wiadaa, sara wɨdadaanya yuyagaa' sara yadaa,
kave yɨgoina nennya yaya mamakinyadaa, sɨmunya kayaa'nanya' “Aala,” dɨvanɨgoina dɨragɨnna maremwainadaa Kuryai nemwaaihadelyɨ. Sara yadaanyainaavɨ Kɨwɨnya yagaalyasɨ manejɨnɨkengɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazareina dara yawɨ'manɨgo. A'mweinaavɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnya myaannebwi Kɨraazɨtɨyare yɨsavɨri mi'na yeramwo. Sare'na kayaa'nanyabwi manemaremwaalyɨkeinera. Yɨ sɨmunya kayaa'na dɨka widadejɨ wima'nadejɨ yɨsavɨri mena yeramwo. Yuya dazabwi dɨvanɨgo. Aala! Sarebwi Kɨraazɨtɨyai balake'nanyɨ.
Sare' “Kuryarɨ mwaaiho,” daaza' yɨ nabaai Kuryarɨ kaanya yamaryaana! Gamɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨnaana!
“Nɨmɨ tewaanyainyɨ. Pwara kayaa'nanyarera,” madaanna! Pwara sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨpɨ'de'na myaanna! Pwara kanevɨlavapɨjɨ bɨrala myaanna! Aawa. Kuryare dɨragɨnyavɨ mwalaana!

Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨ dara yennɨpɨja' “O, nemɨjɨyarɨ yɨwetawakya' jɨma'nɨwaka!” Gotɨyare Kuryarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaihi sarɨ nayaa yavada'gaina jɨla! Bɨrala, maanga nudɨpɨdɨka! Aawa. Kave bwiwanna wɨdɨna jɨla! Gɨnnya mwaalyabwi nayaa jawɨka! “Nɨmɨ kave mwaala'mujɨ Saataanɨ avaalyabwi yɨde'na nanyɨmwaaihadɨka!” da'gɨzɨ Kuryarɨ dɨragɨnyavɨ dɨmwaala!
Da'na yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Gazaizarɨ taanga widaa'nyɨ wɨgaimwange'na taanga sa dɨmakama! Duhaimwana! Sara ya'gɨzɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨwɨnya' mi'na jɨthesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Pwai myawɨranna! “Pwara kayaa'na yɨvanɨgasara maalɨkera, nɨmɨ naangeinyɨ. Dazabwi myɨ yɨdeinyɨ.” Sara yawɨ'de sa' kwaasɨ yawɨ'devulyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' gazaizai gannya yɨvanɨkengɨ nayaa yawɨbwata yannelyɨ. “Tewaanyasɨ,” dozɨ sare'na yɨlaaya yannelyɨ. Sai myawɨrina “Pwai kayaa'na yɨvanɨke', sainyɨ tewaanna yɨvanɨgeinyɨ,” sabwi myawɨrannelyɨ.
Aawa. Gazaizai gannya yɨvanɨkengɨna Gotɨyai yawɨbwata yadelyɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaala yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨ pwaihi kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨsaihi tewaanya yuya jaapaina yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.
Sɨmunya kayaa'nanya' myawɨpɨna! Gotɨyarɨ kwaasɨyara pihadɨka yɨpɨjaraavɨna Gotɨyai yuna yawɨ'manɨkelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe pwai burɨdaza yɨ sahɨnɨ maaradelyɨ.

Sai kayaa'nanya burɨdazai kayaa'nanya maaradevaaibɨ' pwai a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyabwina gamɨre kɨlaakevɨ yajai kayaaka yɨgainadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' pwai tewaanya burɨdazai tewaanya maaradevaaibɨ' pwai gamɨre kuryarɨ tewaanya burɨdazai yɨ Kuryai Tewaanyarɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maaradelyɨ.
Nemɨ tewaanyabwi yadaa sɨmunya waryaanya myawɨraanna! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kuryarɨ dɨragɨnna kuna yaajaina Gotɨyai dahɨlakakegaa' tewaanyanna maraadeinera. Sare'na nayaanna yadawaajɨ maa'na maneyɨnanna!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuya'na yaajahaa' yuyaraavɨ tewaanna wiaana! Yɨ, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsabulyɨyaraavɨ kɨnɨdakaavɨ dɨragɨnna tewaanna wiaana!

Pwai nɨmɨre yagaalya' kyavɨkaryɨwa' dahaa' pɨkarɨyɨsarɨ' maarena nɨnnya atasɨ pɨkarya yɨhyavɨkarivanɨge. Nɨmɨre pɨkarya naanga danganyɨla! Pɨkarya sa tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ “O, Polɨ nebwina neyavɨkariwaka!” dɨthɨnyide'nanyɨ.

A'mwera kɨlaaka mwasɨmagɨnna yawɨ'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyarera yawɨ'manɨga' ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨsavɨ kabala' kɨlaaka daya'nebwi maalɨkebwi yɨma'nɨwaka!’ Sare'na sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daawojɨ Juyara kayaa'na naneyɨpɨdɨka!” Nabaai “Sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨne yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨna maanga nanedɨpɨdɨka!” deva “Sarɨnnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ dɨtha'nyɨla!” wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨhyɨvanɨgasare.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨlaaka daya'nebulyɨyara Kɨwɨnya yuya' navɨka yadɨvɨ' myadɨvɨsare. Aawa. Sahwara yawɨ'na “Juyara nemɨnyɨna dɨnyɨna ‘Kɨraazɨtɨyarera sahwara kɨlaaka daya'nebwi Galezɨya mwaalyaraavɨ yɨvanɨgasara tewaanyarera!’ dɨnyɨna yɨpɨka!” Sara yawɨ'na yadɨvɨsa'na yɨhɨzɨwaakɨvanɨga' kunnya yaya makimanɨgasara.

Sabaaibɨ' nɨnnya yaya' makina myɨwɨneinyɨ. Arɨkawɨ. Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨsavɨ balakere yaya' makimanɨgesɨ. Yɨ, balake'na Kwaakevakɨyabura kadathɨwaga' sabura manyɨmaremwaalɨke'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai baidaa'nyɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya aya' balakesɨ. “Kwaakevakɨyaburaavɨna mamwaalyɨ yɨdeinyɨ,” yawɨkeinyɨ, Naangei yɨsavɨ sara balake'na.
Kɨlaakejɨ' daya'ne' yaasɨwa'nanya', kɨlaalejɨ' madaya'ne' yaasɨwa'nanyasɨ. Gotɨyai mudɨkeinaavɨ nemwaaihade' naangesɨ. Sare'na, Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨsavɨ balakerɨ yaya' makimanɨgesɨ.
Yɨhɨthɨwe' yɨvanɨgasaihi Kɨraazɨtɨyareihi, Gotɨyare Yɨzɨrelɨya nebulyaihɨrɨ Gotɨyai gannya kwaamu'nanyaburɨ tewaanya yɨhɨmwaaihana! Gotɨyai kale'na yɨhɨgaimwagana!

Aaya' yɨhɨthɨma! Aane pwai kwai taanga manyɨjaavanna! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jizaazarɨ wɨdaayadɨnyainyɨna pwara kayaa'na nyesa'na nɨmɨre kɨlaakevɨ yɨwihwaarya naange warɨkengɨ. Sare'na Apozelɨyainyɨ Kɨwɨnyabulyɨyara taanga manyɨjaavɨpɨna!
Nya'mweihi, nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yuyaihɨre kuryaraavɨ yange'na yɨhɨgaimwagana! Sahɨrɨsɨ. Nebula naangesɨ.

Polɨnyɨ yɨkwia da' pɨkarya yavɨkarivanɨgeinyɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ mena kanyɨdahɨlaka' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai Nyɨdaasadeinyɨ yɨma'ne Apozelɨyainyɨ. Gotɨyare tewaanyaihɨrɨ Gotɨyai yɨhɨthahɨlakakeihi Anga Epazaazɨ mwaalyaihɨrɨna yavɨkarivanɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsaihɨrɨna yavɨkarivanɨgeihɨlyɨ.
Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ sanɨdaai yanga tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwagika! Kɨrɨmɨre kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhwarana!

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlanemwaaihake'na Sɨgunyavɨya tewaanya naanga yuya nemɨre kuryaraavɨna yanga nejaavakengɨ. Sare'na Gotɨyarɨ nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare Ganɨmaangerɨ tewaanya yɨlaaya maryaana!

Sare' kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai Kwaakeva' mwakyaakegaa' nemɨnyɨna yawɨ'na “Sahwara nɨmɨrera yɨma'nɨpɨka! Nyɨbwaalɨvɨ wɨlamwaaibɨ'de'na sahwara tewaanyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere. Nɨmɨnyaba yɨwetawakya maayara yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere.” Nemɨnyɨna sara yawɨ'na yakabaaibɨ' mi'na nedahɨlakyaa'.

Sarei kale wiada tewaanya wɨvu'nada sɨnnawɨ nemɨnyɨna yawɨ'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai balade'na nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨbwaalɨvaangera wɨmwaaihɨdeinyɨ!” Gotɨyai nayaa yawɨ'na “Tewaanyabwi yɨma! Sara yɨdeinyɨ,” sara yawɨ'na yadei sara nedahɨlakyaa'.
Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨlaaya wɨvu'naderɨna Gotɨyai yange'na tewaanna negaimwagakelyɨ. Yɨ sasarei sare yanga gaimwanga byaannakevɨna sahwarɨ yɨlaaya naanga wiaana!
Kɨraazɨtɨyai sai balaka gannya tawevɨna wɨla nevwɨyɨnɨkeinaavɨ nemubake', nemɨre yɨwetawakyanna marasɨ'nɨkesɨ. Sare'na Gotɨyare yanga gaimwangebwine aaya kaavɨlyanna sara neyakengɨ.
Sai yanga yanga tewaanna naanga negaimwagakengɨ. Gotɨyai sɨmunya nawɨ'nyavɨjɨ sɨduta tewaanyaburɨjɨ gamɨre yanga gaimwanga sabwi nejaava'.
Sarei gannya sɨmunyavɨ yawɨ'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna tewaanna yɨma!” daka sɨnnawɨ sagaa' lɨka yulyasa' wa'dɨ'nyɨ dahaasagaa' gamɨre yoimavajalɨkurakya sa' ku'maayaba neyɨbwarɨdaakwa'.

Pɨgasa yuyagasa mi'na yaka nawɨ'nyagaa' dahɨlakyaakegaa' sɨnnawɨ yawɨ'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyai balade'na yuyangɨ Sɨgunyavɨyajɨ Kwaakevakɨyajɨ sangɨ kye'mwannemwaaiha'mujɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Mɨnyagɨnyai maremwaalana!” Sara yawɨ'na yaakebwina dahaa' yuyangɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai Naangei mwaalɨ'. Sare' neyɨbwarɨdaakwa'.

Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Sara yɨdeinyɨ. Sɨmunya nayaa yawɨra'mujɨ yɨdeinyɨ.” Sara yawɨ'na yake'na yuya yadelyɨ. Sare'na Gotɨyai aayawɨdaa'nyɨ mena yawɨrake'na sare'na nedahɨlakyaa' “Sahwara nɨmɨre tewaanya maapɨka! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kwɨlamwaaiha'mujɨ nɨmɨrera mwaaibɨka!”
Sare'na nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨ'nona dahaa' sɨnnawɨnyaina Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nayaa yemwaaihoine. Gotɨyai yuya sara tewaanna yaka byaannyavɨna Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya naanga wiaana!

Nabaai, sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'na avaaina yɨhya'. Sarɨmɨ yagaala nebulya' kadɨka wɨ'ne'. Sa' yagaala tewaanya' Gotɨyai yɨhɨvadaihasamaarakesɨ yagaala sa'. Sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kalɨmwagare' Kuryai Tewaanyarɨ yɨ gamɨre yavɨkwajɨkerɨ yɨhɨzaava'. Yɨhɨzaavake'na “Gamɨreinera,” wɨdɨvanɨga'. Kurya sarɨna Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdakelyɨra.

Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Dahaa' sɨnnawɨnyai Kuryai Tewaanyarɨ wɨjaawe'na nɨmɨrera dara yawɨpɨka! ‘O, Gotɨyai nedake Sɨgunyavɨ naanga tewaanya yuya nejaavadelyɨ.’ ” Gamɨreinaavɨ yuna neyaarojɨyagaa'na yuya daza nejaavadelyɨ. Sare' gamɨre byaannya'na yɨlaaya naanga wiaana!
Yuya sarevɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ wɨ'nyɨna “Anga Epazaazɨ mwaalyara Naanga Jizaazarɨ nayaa lɨmwamanɨga'. Gotɨyare tewaanya yuyaraavɨna tewaanya wɨvu'naderera,” wɨ'nyɨna yena
kwadɨka mwamujainyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wiadɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadɨnyainyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨnyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨ wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.

Sarɨmɨnyɨna “Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare Gotɨyai, Nenɨmaanga byaannakei sahwaraavɨre kuryaraavɨna sɨmunya nawɨ'nya' wɨjaavana! Sahwaraavɨna gamɨ sahwarɨ yunebanna wɨjalangasakɨnana!” dena wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.

Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ gamɨre baake' kwakojɨ gamɨre nebulya' nayaa danganyide'nanyɨ. Yɨ dara jawɨranganyide'nanyɨ. Sahwai yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakevɨna yemwaaidɨvɨsabule! Yemwaalya sabwi yawɨramaapɨkajɨ! Nabaai, Gotɨyare byaannyavɨne nawɨ'nyannanya gamɨrenna gannyaihɨrɨna yɨhɨzaavadenge!
Nemɨ lɨmwange'neinaavɨ gamɨre dɨragɨnya naange' neyɨvanɨkevɨna gannya dɨ'naka naangaange' yuya wavɨla'de' wɨjɨwaainana! Dɨragɨnya sa' naange'
Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yake' avaalyasɨ. Dɨragɨnya sasɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨ yɨdɨkaavaka Sɨgunyavɨ dɨragɨnyaba gamɨre aangasɨmagɨ walamwaaiha'.

Saba munya ke'beva Kɨraazɨtɨyai Naangei maremwaalɨ'. Kɨraazɨtɨyare dɨragɨnya' maremwaaidɨvɨta yuyarajɨ ga'maanɨya yuyarajɨ dɨragɨnya yuyarajɨ naanga yuyarajɨ saraavɨre dɨragɨnyangɨ wavɨla'desɨ. Nabaai, yaya makinɨkeraavɨ kekyɨrɨ' munyaba maremwaalɨkelyɨ. Dahaasara, Kwaakevakɨya yaya naangejɨyara gaveraavɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Sɨgunyavɨ mwalaadehaasa yaya naangejɨyaraaavɨ Naangei maremwaalɨkelyɨ.

Dahaasara, Kɨraazɨtɨyai maremwaaideva Gotɨyai yuyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihada Kɨraazɨtɨyare sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ amwi yuyara mwaaiha' maalɨkera. Nabaai, Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyainaavɨna nemɨre Naangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa' yuyanna. Sai nemɨre Mɨnyagɨnyarɨ wɨmwaaihɨwa'.

Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanya' yɨ sa' gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ. Sare' nemɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨkɨyainaavɨ nemwaaihɨwakesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai sara nedada gannya dɨragɨnya' nejaavada gannya sɨmunya'na yɨvanɨgoinera. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Sɨgunyavɨ, Kwaakevakɨ yuyangɨ yuneba wɨlamwaaiderɨ gamɨreina yuna wɨlamwaaihoinera.
Kɨgaa' Gotɨyarɨna sarɨnnya kuryara balesaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wanganakɨna yeva kayaa'nanyanna, yɨwetawakyanna balesaihɨlyɨ.

Saregaa' Kwaakevakɨyabwi kayaa'nanyaburɨ kaanya yamaryadɨvɨ' yɨmakeraavɨjɨ kulakengɨjɨ maremwaaidei yɨhusavɨ mwaaide sarebwi lɨmwadɨvɨ' mwaalesaihɨlyɨ. A'mwera Gotɨyarɨ galyekɨvaimanɨgasaraavɨ maremwaalɨ' kurya kayaa'nanya sai.

Sara galazekɨvalesaraayaba nemɨ yuyaina kayaa'na mwaalo. Nemɨre kɨlaakevɨne dɨka neyɨdada nemɨre kɨlaakejɨka “Sara tewaanya' nyɨwaka,” nemɨre yawɨta “Sara yɨdeinyɨ,” yawɨ'daa yagoinera. Sareina sara yago'na Gotɨyarɨ a'mwera kayaa'na mwaaidɨvɨta yuyaraavɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daasɨ tadevaaibɨ' kayaa'na yoinaavɨ kaneramadɨkeinera.
Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai kale gaimwanga naangaangevɨ aaya kaavɨlyai gamɨre tewaanya wɨvu'nya naangebwi nemɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nakeburɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ gaala nemwaaiha'.

Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨwetawakadaawojɨyavɨna Gotɨyarɨna nemɨre kuryara kuna baidɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yɨdɨkaaverɨ wɨlamwaaihɨma!” dake'na Gotɨyai neyɨdɨkavamwaaiha'. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ yange'na tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwadevɨna yɨhɨvadaihasamaarakeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ yuyainaavɨ gaala nemwaaiha'.
Gotɨyai neyɨdɨkavamwaaihaka nabaai, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihoinaavɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨjɨ Sɨgunyavɨ maranemwaaihɨwake'na maremwaaimanɨgoinera.

Gotɨyai “Dɨvi sagaa' yuyagaa' gazagaasagaa' yɨma'nadehaa' nɨmɨre yanga wɨgaimwangeburɨne aaya kaavɨlya naangaange yuyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaainɨma!” daka maranemwaaiha'. Sahwai yanga gaimwangebwina Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨna bwiwanna neyakebulyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ yange'na tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwadevɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsa'na yɨhɨvadaihasamaarakeihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ wawɨnya yɨna yadɨvɨsa'na yɨhɨvadaihasamaarakeihi mɨ'. Aawa. Sahware sɨhumalesɨra.
Sare' Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “A'mwe pwai kwai dara nadathɨka! ‘Wawɨnya dɨragɨnna kye Gotɨyai nyɨvadaihasamaarakeinyɨ. Tewaanyainyɨ,’ yawɨ'na yaka sahwai yange'na nevadaihasamaarakesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai mwaaihoinaavɨ mudɨkeinaavɨ newaka'. “Sahwara mi'na wakengɨ sana sana yamaripɨka!” daka Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlanemwaaihaka tewaanya yaadeinaavɨ mudɨkeinaavɨ nemwaaiha'.

Sarevɨna yɨhɨthɨma! Sarɨmɨ Juyaraavɨdaa'nyaihi mɨ'. Aawa. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaihɨlyɨ. Juyara kunnya asajɨ kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ da'nyɨna yadɨvɨsara sarɨmɨnyɨna dɨna “Sahwara kunnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ mada'nyadɨvɨsarera. Maaverera.” Kɨgaa' mwaalesaihɨrɨna ayɨna jawɨrila!

Sagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai maayaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ dahɨlakyaaka Yɨzɨrelɨya yɨta savaakɨ menyaba mwaalesaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨreraavɨne yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjavurɨne wɨlɨmwagarakejɨyaihi mɨka. Angavaayaihɨlyɨ. Kwaaka davakɨ Gotɨyamaayaihi mwaale'. Nabaai yemwaalyabwi maayaihɨlyɨ. “Gotɨyaryaba mwalaadeinera,” majaihɨlyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' dahaasagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasaihi Gotɨyaryawɨnna yɨhɨmakabɨwakeihɨlyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai balaka gamɨre tawe' bwalaravake'na menya keimwɨ mwaalesaihi Gotɨyaryaba aya kɨbanna yɨma'naabɨwaasaihɨlyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai narya' wakɨnɨkelyɨ. Nabaai, Juyainajɨ Menyaihɨlyɨ avaalyainaavɨ kanemwaaiha' nemɨre munya yɨrɨla nedɨwagakelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Juyara keiba mwaalesa' Menyara aagaiba mwaalesa' tɨnnyaba yɨkamaangebwi kaanya tinɨke' warakesɨ. Sare'na sɨnna tɨka wɨdavakerera. Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' yɨsavɨ balake'na kaanya tinɨke' wo'dalasɨ'nakelyɨ.

Juyainaavɨre Kɨwɨnya', kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkejɨ kɨmaaka dɨnɨkejɨ yaasɨwa'nanyabwi wakaka kaanya tinɨkebwi wo'dalasɨ'nakelyɨ. “Nɨmɨ narya' waka'mujɨ yɨta pɨvakaai warɨkeraavɨ yɨta gavevakɨyara nɨmɨnyɨ wɨlamwaaihɨma!” daka wo'dalasɨ'nakelyɨ. Avaalyaina mwaaiho.

“Nɨmɨnyɨ kaanya tinɨke', yɨkamaangebwi tamaka'mujɨ, yɨ, nɨmɨre yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨna yuyavakaalyɨ Gotɨyalyɨ yɨrakuramwaaihɨma! Yɨ nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨsɨyara avaalyara yɨma'nɨpɨka!” daka wo'dalasɨ'nakelyɨ.
Sare' Kɨraazɨtɨyai baka yuyaraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' narya'ne' wɨdakesɨ. Menyaba Maaveihi Gotɨyarɨ myawɨryaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthake' aya kɨba Juyaina Gotɨyarɨ yawɨ'daanyainaavɨ nedakesɨ narya'.
Sare' Kɨraazɨtɨyai neyake'na Kuryarɨ Juyainaavɨnajɨ Maaveihɨrɨnajɨ nejaava'. Sare'na Nenɨmaangeryawɨnna wawaajɨ dɨnaade'nanyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ Juya mamwaalyɨgasaihi Gotɨyarɨna kuna Maavera angavaayara mɨ'. Wa'mwa'dɨvɨsaihi kuna mamwaalyɨga'. Kuna gabinyaihi mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyare angeba mwaalyaihi Gotɨyare tewaanyarajɨ mwaaihasaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyarenɨdakihɨlyɨra.

Nabaai sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare ange'bɨsaihɨlyɨ. Nedaasadeinajɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsarajɨ mɨnye laannɨkeinaavɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare angesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai sahwai munyaba mɨjamaange' pwɨyɨnɨkelyɨ Naangei.
Sahwai anga yuya' pwɨyɨnɨka nemɨ yuyainaavɨ nelɨmwaga'delyɨ. Naangere anga tewaanya'na mannɨkeinaavɨ nemwaaihadelyɨ. Sara neyada yuyagaa' tewaanyaina yɨma'nadaanyainera.
Sahwarɨ wɨlamwaaihasaihɨlyɨ nemɨjɨ pwarajɨ sainaavɨ mannɨka angevɨ Kuryai wɨlanemwaalɨ' Gotɨyare angevɨ.

Yuya sa'na Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨvanɨge. Sainyɨ Polɨnyɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaihɨrɨ wɨdɨna “Kɨwɨnya maayaihɨrɨ Gotɨyai yɨhɨmaaranneihɨlyɨ,” wɨdɨna yɨhye'na sɨnna tɨka wɨdavakera kalavuzangevɨ nyɨmwaaihe'. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazare kalavuzainyɨ.
Kadɨka mi'na wɨ'nɨpɨja' “Gotɨyai Polɨmɨ wɨdɨna ‘Maaveraavɨne' nɨmɨre yanga gaimwangeburɨne wawɨnya' ja!’ wɨdɨna yakei daaka!”
Gotɨyai kɨgaa' yawɨ'na “Maaverajɨ nɨmɨrera yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera,” yawɨ'na yake' lɨka yulya'dɨ'nyɨ Gotɨyai nyɨbwarɨdaakwa'. Yoimavajalɨkurakya sabwi pɨkarya maalɨ'na mi'na yavɨkariwa.
Sarɨmɨ yagaala sa' tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ dara danganyide' “O, Kɨraazɨtɨyai a'mweraavɨna yake' yoimavajalɨkurakya'ne' Polɨ mi'na yawɨ'manɨkei daaka!”
Dahaa' lɨka yulyarya'ne' gamɨre Wɨdaasade gɨrɨ'maayaraavɨjɨ gamɨnyɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ Kuryai wɨjalangasakakabaaibɨ' kɨgaa' mɨjɨyɨma'nɨgavya pɨnɨngɨ a'mweraavɨ sara myɨbwarɨdaakwia'.

Yoimavajalɨkurakya' dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara yagaala tewaanya' wɨ'nadɨvɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨ' sahwarɨ wɨlawɨmwaaihade'na sahwarajɨ Juyarajɨ Gotɨyare tewaanya yuyanna ye'mwannamaapɨ'dere. Nabaai kɨlaaka gavejɨkɨyara ye'mwannamwaaibɨ'de. Nabaai Gotɨyare yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja' ye'mwannajapalamaapɨ'dere. Sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Yagaala tewaanya sa' wɨdadɨnyainyɨ. Gotɨyai yange'na tewaanna nyɨgaimwada yange' nyɨjaavada gamɨre wɨdaayadɨnyainyɨ nyɨmwaaiha'. Sai dɨragɨnna yaka wawɨnya sa' kanyɨjaava' yagaala tewaanya' dɨragɨnna wɨdadɨnyainyɨ. Nɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨge.

Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyare tewaanya pwara naangerera. Maalɨkeinyɨ kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yange'na tewaanna nyɨgaimwada nyɨda' “Kɨraazɨtɨyare tewaanaanga naangenna ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ duthathe'na gɨthaasɨwa.
Nɨmɨ tewaanyabwi sɨnnawɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨnyɨ lɨka yulyakyenya' dahaa' yoimavajalɨkurakyabwi yuyara wangabɨ'de'na gɨthaasɨwa.” Gotɨyai yuyangɨ wakyaakei sara yakelyɨ.

Lɨka yulyaryaake' dahaa' ku'maayaba warɨ'. Gotɨyai “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨ'nya'nera kusɨlaanyara mi'na maaresabwina Sɨgunyavɨya naangerajɨ dɨragɨnyarajɨ dara wangabɨka! ‘Gazarazaraavɨ Gotɨyai tewaanna yadelyɨ. Sɨmunnakei yawɨta tewaanaanga yawɨ'dela!’ ” daka gannya yanga gaimwangebwi nyɨjaava'.
Nabaai, Gotɨyai kwaaka mwakyaakegaa' mi'na yawɨryaake'na sara yake'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai sara kyawɨryaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨre Naangei sara yake'nanyɨ.
Sarevɨ lɨmwadaa gamɨnyɨ wɨlamwaaiho'na nemɨ lɨka myadaa Gotɨyai mwaalɨkewɨ gazagaasagaa' wɨdadaanya'nanyɨ.

Sare'na dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨma! Maaveihɨrɨ yɨhɨgaimwamanɨge'na pwara kayaa'na nyɨvanɨga'. Sare'na yawɨta kwalaalya myawɨpɨna! “Kɨraazɨtɨyarebwi yagalya'mavaana!” myawɨpɨna! Sarɨmɨ tewaanna dɨmwaalyide'na daanga nyɨvɨmanɨke' yɨ sa' sarɨmɨre byaannyasɨ.
Gotɨyai tewaanna yaka sare'na kwadaai gɨlena Nenɨmaangerɨ wɨdɨvanɨge.
Sai Nenɨmaangei mwaalɨke'na Sɨgunyavɨya yuya kuvɨnɨmaangerajɨ Kwaakevakɨya yuya kuvɨnɨmaangerajɨ saraavɨne aaya kaavɨlyabwi wo'nɨkesɨ.

Sarɨmɨnyɨna “Sarei gamɨre dɨragɨnya yuyangɨ gamɨre byaannyaburɨne aaya kaavɨlyanna sarɨmɨre kurya kusawɨnyara dɨragɨnna yɨvaimwannemwaaibɨka! Sarɨmɨre munyɨkaavɨ gamɨre Kuryai dɨragɨnya sa' yɨhɨzaavojɨ sarɨmɨre kuryaraavɨ dɨragɨnyaraavɨ yɨhɨmwaaihana!” dena wɨdɨvanɨge.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nayaa lɨmwadɨvɨsavɨna sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai kuna wɨlayɨhɨmwaalana! Yɨsare pwipula kwaakevɨ dɨragɨnna waayɨkabaaibɨ', nabaai, ange' dɨragɨnna wɨdaakunɨkabaaibɨ' kale nayaa yɨhyada dɨragɨnna jawɨramwaalyɨla!

Sara yapɨjɨ Gotɨyare tewaanya yuyarajɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' maa'dɨvɨ' dara jawɨramaarila! “Ai, nemɨnyɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nade naange' daaka!” Yuya bwakulaawɨka bwakulaawɨka aagangɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨra. Naangaangesɨ kale sa'. Sare'na sarɨmɨnyɨna “Gotɨyai gannya dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavana!” dena sahwarɨ wɨdɨvanɨge.
Kale yada yuya' yɨnahu myawɨri yɨpɨne' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kale yade' jawɨramaarila! “Gotɨyare yuya gamɨ sarɨ yuneba warɨkenna nemɨre munyɨkaavɨ, sɨmunyangɨ yuneba wɨlanewarana!” dapɨjɨ sara jawɨramaarila!
Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' nemɨre munyɨkaavɨ yade'na nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ widanganaaja yuyangɨjɨ yawɨraaja yuyangɨjɨ wavɨlavade naanga naanga yadelyɨ Gotɨyai.

Sarerɨ “Byaannakeigɨ!” wɨdaana! Gotɨyai kuda' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai yuyaraavɨna balake'na Gotɨyarɨ “Byaannakeigɨ!” wɨdaana! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwange'nera kusɨlaanya yuyara “Byaannakeigɨ!” wɨdɨpɨka! Dɨvi yuyagaa' gazagaasagaa' waragothehaa' yuyaina sara wɨdaana! Naanga sahɨrɨsɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ Naangerɨ wɨdaayadɨnya'na kalavuzangevɨ nyɨmwaaihesainyɨ yɨhithaanganɨma! Gotɨyai kagɨthahɨlaka' jɨvwaramaata sareburɨ kaanya nayaa jamarya!
Gɨnnya yaya' mamakɨlyadɨ kave yawɨkɨnyaigɨ kave yadɨ pwara kayaa'na gyadaapɨjɨ sɨnna tɨka yarai madayɨ gyada tewaanna dɨmwaala! Pwaraavɨna kale gyada kumɨre yagaala wɨ'nadɨ nayaa duhaimwana kale'na!
Gotɨyai narya' wakɨnɨke'na kwaamu'nanyaburɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarerajɨ je'mwannamwaala! Kuryai yuyaihɨrɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaaihake'na kɨlaaka gavejɨkɨyaihi dɨragɨnna kuna dɨmwaalyɨla!

Kɨraazɨtɨyareina gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gave pɨjɨ'na mwaaiho. Gotɨyare Kurya gave pwai nemɨjɨyai mwaalɨ'. Nabaai, Gotɨyai yɨhɨthahɨlakake'na yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakabaaibɨ' nawɨ'nyaba tewaanyaihi dɨmwaalyide' yemwaaimanɨgata gavebwi warɨ'.
Naanga gave pwai mwaalɨ'. Naangerɨ lɨmwadaanya gavebwi warɨ'. Bavɨtaazɨyabwi gavebwi warɨ'.

Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyainaavɨ Nenɨmaanga gave pwai mwaalɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyareinaavɨna. Sai yuyainaavɨ munyaba mwaalɨkelyɨ. Sai yuyainaavɨ dɨragɨnyainaavɨ nemwaaihada gamɨre wawɨnya yɨvanɨgo sahwarɨnera. Sai yuyainaavɨre munyangɨ wɨlanemwaalɨkelyɨ.
Gannya wawɨnya'na Kɨraazɨtɨyai yawɨ'na “A'mwerɨna sara wɨjaavɨma! Pwarɨna dara wɨjaavɨma!” yawɨ'na yada gazainyɨnazainyɨa yanga gaimwangeburɨne nejaawa'.
Sarevɨ Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Ke'mwewɨnna yɨlaawɨna yaka
Wɨla pwɨyɨnɨkeraavɨ makɨlaawa'.
A'mweraavɨna sɨhumale yanga wɨjaava'.
Sara dɨnɨke' yagaala “Yɨlaawɨna yaka,” be yagaalyavaka? Dara dɨnɨ' “Sɨnnawɨ walaaba'. Kwaaka kewewɨnɨna walaaba',” sara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Sai walaabakei avaalyai yɨlaawa'. Sai sɨgunyangɨna yɨlaawaka ke'mwewɨnna Sɨgunyavɨna yɨlaawaka “Yuya yuyangɨ wɨlamwaalɨma!” daka yɨlaawa'.

Sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyai “A'mweraavɨna sɨhumale yanga wɨjaavakelyɨ.” Sare'na gannya dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavada pwaraavɨ “Nɨmɨre yɨhɨthaasadɨnyaihi,” dahɨlakɨna. Pwaraavɨ “Gotɨyare wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaihi,” dahɨlakɨna. Pwaraavɨ “Yagaala tewaanya' mudɨkeraavɨ wɨdadɨvɨsaihi,” dahɨlakɨna. Pwaraavɨ “Sipɨzipɨya nɨmɨreraavɨ maremwaaina, wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaihi,” dahɨlakɨna yakerera.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarera tewaanyara naanga yune nebulya'nanyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'de'na sara dahɨlakɨna. Wɨdaayabwina gaimwannɨpɨ'de'na sara dahɨlakɨna. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨkɨyaina gamɨreina dɨragɨnyaina sɨmunnakeina yɨma'naade'na sara dahɨlakɨna ya'. (Anga nayaa mannɨkabaaibɨsaine.)

Nemɨnyɨne'na dahɨlakɨna yakera kunnya wawɨnya nayaa yadɨvɨ' kɨlaaka gavejɨkɨyaina yuyaina Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvɨ avaaina lɨmwagaraatheine. Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvɨ avaaizɨmunya yawɨraade'nanyɨ. Nemɨ a'mwe naanga yune nebulya'nanyaibɨsaina Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna mwalaadeine gamɨ kwaibɨ'. Kɨraazɨtɨyai tewaanyai sɨmunnakei sahwai mwaalɨkabaaibɨ' a'mweina avaalyaina yɨnahu mwalaadehaa'nanyɨ.

Sareinaavɨna “Kaimɨraayara kuna namwaaibɨthɨka!” daka negaimwadɨvɨsaraavɨ nejaava'. Kwaasɨyara kwaasɨ yagaala pɨnɨ yɨhusa' pina pina do'mwadevaaibɨ' nedadaapɨjɨ kaimɨraayaina namwalaadɨka! Kwaasɨyara kayaa'nanyabwi yawɨ'dɨvɨsara wabwiwayagaala dadɨvɨ' kwaasɨya gevwi gevwi wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsare.

Kaimɨraayaina kuna mamwalaanna! Aawa. Kale neyadaawojɨ nebulya' wɨdadaa tewaanna mwalaadeine! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yuna wɨlamwalaajaina yuya tewaanyabwina gɨryaadeine. Nabaai, Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai nemɨre Mɨnyagɨnyalyɨ.

Sai nemaremwaalɨkei nayaa nedada sara yaade'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaake' yakabaaibɨ' sara yaade'nanyɨ. Sɨvɨla, ata, kɨhɨta, kadɨka saza mɨwɨ'nɨka, dahaala yuya ye'mwannɨka, yuya sa tewaanna yɨnɨkejɨkɨra. Kɨlaaka yuyajɨ' nayaa yɨna yada gɨrinɨkabaaibɨ' nemɨ gamɨre dɨragɨnya' ma'daa Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwaraavɨ wɨgaimwadaa “Dɨragɨnyara tewaanyara mwaaibɨka!” dadaa nayaa wɨjɨwakadaa Kɨraazɨtɨyare yuyaina kale neyada tewaanna mwalaade'nanyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaiheinyɨ Naangei dare nyɨdake'na dɨragɨnna dara yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨma! Nayaa kadɨka dɨnyu'nyɨla! Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨrebwina mwaaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ' kuna mamwaaibɨna! Sahwaraavɨre yawɨta waryaanya warɨ'.
Kumɨre yawɨramaata jɨhɨnya'bɨ' warɨ'. Kumɨre sɨmunya mi'na sɨlaange wɨlarɨkevɨna kumɨnyɨ sɨdu'maayabwi wɨlarɨkevɨna Gotɨyai gaalyabwi wɨmwaaihadevurɨ menyaba mwaaihasare.
Kumɨrebwina myawɨri “Kayaa'na yɨvanɨgeinyɨ. Sabwi myɨwɨneinyɨ.” Naangegaa' sara myawɨryadɨvɨsara wagɨla muvwa'nyadera ata lɨmwangebwi dɨragɨnna yɨna. Gɨrɨkita'nanyabwina mɨjɨke'bɨ' wiadere.
Kɨraazɨtɨyarera sabwi myɨhɨzɨwaakesaihɨlyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ ma'mwaasaihi gevwi yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.
Sahwarɨna kadɨka mi'na wɨ'ne'. Sahwarɨ wɨlamwaaihasaihɨrɨ yɨhɨzɨwaake'. Jizaazarɨ nebulya' wɨwarɨkabaaibɨ' yɨhɨzɨwaakesaihɨlyɨ.

Sareihi, ayabulyɨyaihi kɨgaa' sarɨnnya sɨmunya yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kayaa'na mwaalesabwi marasɨ'nɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Sɨmunya sa kayaa'nanyanna kwaasɨ yawɨ'na “Wabahɨlaake'nesɨ. Tewaanyasɨ. Yɨlaaya'nesɨ,” kwaasɨ yawɨ'na yada kayaaka yɨhyɨgaidaasɨ sɨmunya sa marasɨ'nɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.
Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyajɨ yawɨsajɨ kuryajɨ mudɨke yuna yɨhwakanneihɨlyɨ.

Gotɨyai mudɨkeihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihaka gamɨbɨsaihi sɨmunya nawɨ'nya' yawɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Sɨmunya sara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' nebwina mwaaidɨvɨsavɨ nayaa yɨda'maraangebwi yɨna, gɨrɨ'maayabwi tewaanna yɨna yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareihi.
Sarevɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨja'nebwi dasɨ'nana! Wasɨ'na'gɨzɨ gazaigɨzaigɨ nebulya' ja'mwerɨ duthana! Yuyaina Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨkɨyaina mwaaiho'na nebulya' duthana!

Pwai kayaa'na kyojɨ gɨmɨre sɨnna tɨka kagɨthavojɨ kɨrɨ' sɨmunya nayaa maremwaala'gɨzɨ saigɨ kayaa'na myɨnna! Naangegaa' sɨnna tɨka magɨthavanna! Sɨnna tɨka kuna kagɨthavojɨ nyɨlyai gaai waidaawojɨyagaa' sare' kayaa'nanyasɨ. Sɨnna tɨka sabwi yarai dɨmarasɨ'nana!
Naangegaa' sɨnna tɨka kagɨthavojɨ Saataanɨ gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ yawɨta kayaa'nanya nakadɨka! Sabwi myɨnnera!
Kukei maarakei kuna mamaaranna! Aawa. Sai wawɨnya nayaa yana! “Wawɨnya tewaanya' asɨraalyɨ ya'mujɨ nɨgwɨmaayaraavɨ wɨjaapalyɨma!” dozɨ nayaa yana!

Gɨnnya maangevɨ yagaala kayaa'nanya mudɨnna! “Pwara yagaala nawɨ'nya' nyu'napɨjɨ yanga gaimwangebwi maapɨka!” da'gɨzɨ yagaala sa duthana! Sara kuda'gɨzɨ yagaala sa' wɨgainɨkeraavɨ, kadɨka wɨ'nya'neraavɨ dɨragɨnna wivaimwagathe'nanyɨ.

Pwaraavɨ kayaa'nanya kuda'gɨzɨ Gotɨyare Tewaanyai Kuryarɨ taanga nuyadɨka! Gotɨyai dɨna “Nɨnnya Kuryarɨ kujaava'mujɨ nɨmɨrera yɨma'nɨpɨka!” dɨna yaka gɨthahɨlaka'. Kuryarɨ wɨlamwaaihɨnya'na dɨragɨnna yawɨ'na “Sagaa' yuna neyaarojɨyagaa'na gamɨre yavɨkwajɨke' nejaava'.” Yawɨ'na yɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨ nayaa dɨmwaala!
Jɨkurya myɨnna! “Pwara kayaa'nanyarera,” myawɨ'dɨnna! Sɨnna tɨka yaasɨwa'na magɨthavanna! Maanga, maiyagaala mudɨnna! Bɨrala mudɨnna! Yuya sabwi dɨmarasɨ'nana! Nabaai kayaa'nanyabwi myɨnna!
Aawa. Ja'mwerɨ bwiwanna yɨna ja! Sarɨna kale gyana! Kɨraazɨtɨyai balake'na Gotɨyai gɨmɨre kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'nɨkabaaibɨ' pware kayaa'nanya gazaigɨzaigɨ mɨnya mamaa'dɨnna!
Gotɨyare kaimɨraayaigɨnyɨ yɨlaaya gɨvu'nadeigɨ mwaaihɨnyabaaibɨ' gamɨre mwaalyabwi ja! Gotɨyarɨ dɨmɨdɨna!

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nemɨnyɨneba kale wiakei nemɨnyɨna balakabaaibɨ' kale gyada dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨra. Juyaraavɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara sipɨzipɨyarɨ yanga wɨjaaya'ne' dɨka nasɨ'nadaasɨ Gotɨyai wabatɨrɨnya' winada yɨlaaya yakabaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai tewaanyabwina yuna balake'na yɨlaaya yakelyɨ.
Gotɨyare tewaanyaihi mwaaihatabaaibɨ' ata lɨmwangebulyɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya yuyabulyɨ wabarɨnnyabulyɨ sare sabwina yɨleyagaala madɨbɨna! Sarebwina pwara nyawɨpɨdɨka! “O, kayaa'na jɨvanɨga'.”

Yagaala kayaa'nanyajɨ yɨmaka widɨvɨsaraavɨre yɨmakyagaalyajɨ kayaa'nanyabwina yɨpaa'nyɨ yagaalyajɨ madɨpɨna! Gotɨyareihi wɨja'ne sabwi madɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya'na “Su! Su!” wɨdɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dɨragɨnna dara yawɨ'manɨgasasɨ. A'mwera ata lɨmwangebwi yadɨvɨsarajɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsarajɨ pwaraavɨrengɨ wabarɨnnya yadɨvɨsarajɨ saraavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ Gotɨyalyɨ mamaremwaalyɨ yɨkadera. Kɨrɨmɨre yovɨrawakɨwaalya mamaari yɨpɨ'derera. Pwaraavɨrengɨ wabarɨnnyabwi sabwi a'mwa'mwe, nyɨlyai, yɨta naangera, sɨlaanga sazangɨna yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsabulyɨ. Sare avaalyabwi wabarɨnnyabwina pwaraavɨrengɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya myadɨvɨsare.

Aane pwai kwai yaasɨwa'nanyanna wɨdɨna “Sara ya'gɨzɨ tewaanna dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ,” kwaasɨ sara nagɨthathɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kayaa'nanya dazanna yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ galyekɨvaidɨvɨsaraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'da wɨramadelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sara yadɨvɨsarajɨ myɨnnera! Saraayawɨdaasɨ jahalya'makwodeigɨnyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨgaa' sahwaigɨ jɨhɨnyasɨyaigɨ kayaa'na mwaalagɨnya kɨrɨ' dahaa' Naangere baakesɨyaigɨ tewaanna mwaaihɨ. Sareigɨ baakesɨyara yɨgatabaaibɨ' kuna nayaa dɨmwaala!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gamɨre baakebwina mwaaidɨ tewaanya yuyajɨ nayaa yɨda'maraanga yuyajɨ nebula yuyajɨ sangɨneigɨnyɨ gɨmwaaihatheigɨnyɨ.
Naangei Baakei sabwi yɨlaaya wigaidevwi yawɨramaa'na ja! “Sai ‘Tewaanyabulyɨ,’ nyɨdathevwi yɨma!” sara yawɨra'gɨzɨ sara ja!
Jɨhɨnyasɨya, yaasɨwa'nanya yadɨvɨsa sara mye'mwannayɨnna! Aawa. Baakebwi nayaa ya'gɨzɨ kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwi jɨvwarɨdaakwia!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jɨhɨnyavɨ kayaa'nanya lɨka yulya'dɨvɨ' yadɨvɨsanna waginaka yagaala madɨpɨnengɨ.
Baakevɨ yuya kyɨbwarɨdaakwa'gɨzɨ yuyara dara wangabɨ'de' “O, aaya kaavɨlya' sasare' daaka!” Sare' dare'nesɨ. Baake' pu'daawojɨ a'mwera sabwi yagalya'mavapɨjɨ yɨrɨkebwi yɨpɨnerera.
Sarevɨ dɨnɨke'
“Se wakɨnyaigɨ dɨthɨkaaka!
Bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna dɨthɨkaaka!
Kɨraazɨtɨyare baake' gɨvuradesɨ.
Dɨkaava'gɨzɨyaigɨnyɨna sɨmunya gɨzaavadelyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨnnya mwaalyabwi nayaa jawɨka! Sɨmumaayaigɨ mamwaaidɨnna! Aawa. Sɨmunnakeigɨ dɨmwaala!
Yɨrɨka kayaa'nanyagasa warɨke'na “Dahaa' tewaanna yɨjɨhyɨwana?” da'gɨzɨ nayaa sara ja! Yɨrɨka sa yaasɨwa'na nabothɨka!
Sarevɨ sɨdu'maayaigɨ mamwaaidɨnna! Aawa. Naangei gɨmɨnyɨna “Sai sare' yana!” kyawɨrojɨ sare' ja!

Aalya waainɨya biyaaya'bɨta naanga manɨnna! Sare' yɨmaka nuyɨdɨka! Sarebwi ya'gɨzɨ kayaaka jɨhainade'nanyɨ. Saza manɨnna! Aawa. Kuryai gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ yuneba wɨlagɨmwaalana! (Sai sɨmunya' nayaa yuna gɨmaremwaalana!)
Sareigɨ ja'mwerɨ Gotɨyare yagaaidaata, Gotɨyarɨna yɨledaata daata wɨja'nejɨ duthana! Gɨnnya sɨmunyavɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya naanga yadɨ Naangerɨ daata, yɨledaata duthana!
Yuyagaa' yuyanna Gotɨyarɨ Nenɨmaangerɨ “Su! Su!” duthana! Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yawɨra'gɨzɨ sara duthana!

Yuna wɨlagɨmwaalanneigɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yawɨ'na “Naangelyɨ. Kave yawɨrɨma!” yawɨ'na yɨvanɨgɨnya'na ja'mweraavɨ kwaakewɨ dula'naka! “Dara yawɨ'mwa. Nɨmɨ maalɨkeinyɨ. Nya'mweraavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨma!” Sara dɨnneigɨnyɨ.
Balaange'gɨ, nemɨ Naangerɨ mɨdɨnna yɨvanɨgovaaibɨ' gɨnnya kwalaangerɨ kwaakewɨ dula'naka!

Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨre kusɨlaanyainaavɨ nemaremwaaide Mɨnyagɨnyai mwaalɨkabaaibɨ' kwalaangei gannya balaangevɨ wɨmaremwaaide Mɨnyagɨnyai mwaalɨ'. Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwai kusɨlaanyainaavɨ nevadaihasamaarakelyɨ. Gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨyainera nemɨ.
Sare'na kusɨlaanyaina Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kwaakeba walamwaaina yɨvanɨgovaaibɨ' balaange'gɨ yuyangɨ gɨnnya kwalaangerɨ kwaakewɨ wɨla'na'na jɨthe'gɨnyɨ.
Kwalaangeigɨ, Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyainaavɨneba kale wiada gannya tawe' nemubya'nei wɨjaaya'nei balakabaaibɨ' gɨnnya balaangevɨna kale gyana!
“Kumɨre kɨlaakengɨ aalya wiadɨnyabaaibɨ' Gotɨyare yagaalya' kumɨre sɨmunyangɨjɨ munyɨkaavɨjɨ kyavada'galojɨ Gotɨyarɨna tewaanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma!” daka Kɨraazɨtɨyai bala'.

“Aayagaa' nɨmɨnyaba kusɨlaanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma! Sagaa' byaannakeraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma! Kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ munyɨkaavɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya, nawɨ'nya mya'ne saza mwari yana! Aawa. Gotɨyarera tewaanyara, gɨrɨkita'nanya maayara mwaaibɨka!” daka balake'nanyɨ.

Sare'na gɨnnya kɨlaakejɨkɨna kale gyada nayaa maremwaaidɨnyabaaibɨ' gɨnnya balaangevɨna kale gyana! A'mwei gannya balaangevɨna kale wiadei, yɨthaa, a'mwei gamɨ sarɨna kale wiadelyɨ. A'mwei balaangevɨna yawɨ'na “A'mwe sa' nɨnnya kɨlaakejɨkɨra.”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera kunnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨna sɨnna tɨka mudayaderera. Aawa. Wapaaya nayaa wɨjaavadɨvɨ' yuyagaa' kave maremwaaidɨvɨsajɨkera. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨlaakejɨkɨyaina mwaaiho'na kusɨlaanyainaavɨ kave nemaremwaalɨkelyɨ avaalyabaaibɨ'.
Sare'na dara dɨnɨke' “Sarevɨ a'mwei gamɨre ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ sayorɨ yagalya'mavojɨ gannya balaangesɨ ye'mwannemwaaladelyɨ. Sara kyojɨ sawaai kɨlaaka pɨjɨ'nanyayoi yɨma'nyɨkadeyolyɨ.”
Sara gave dɨnɨke' nebulya' naange' nemɨnyɨna dɨnɨkesɨ yoimavajalɨkurakya sa'. Sare' dara yawɨ'manɨge' “Yo, Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ kusɨlaanyainajɨ sara dɨnɨke' daaka!”

Sara dɨnɨke' kɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨna dɨnɨkesɨ. Kwalaanga gazaigɨzaigɨnyɨna kale gyadevaaibɨ' gɨnnya balaangevɨna kale gyana! Balaanga gaza'gɨza'gɨ gɨnnya kwalaangerɨna yawɨ'na “Sai nɨmɨnyɨna a'mwe naangelyɨ,” yawɨ'na jɨthe'gɨnyɨ.
Kaimɨraaya kwaigɨ, Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihɨnya'na gɨmaamaangelyɨ gwaangesɨ sayorɨ dɨmɨdɨna! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sabwi yɨja' yɨda'nanyasɨ.
Dɨnɨke' “Gɨnnya gɨmaamaangelyɨ gwaangesɨ sayore yaya dɨmakɨla!” Kɨwɨnya sa', kɨwɨnya naange', yagaala yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja'ne' kɨnɨnnake' sɨnnawɨnya' dɨnɨkesɨra.
Yagaala yune naanga nebula sa' dara dɨnɨ' “Sare'na gɨmɨnyɨna ‘Yuyangɨna tewaanna wima'nana! Kwaaka davakɨ saamɨnyagaa' mwaalana!’ daka gɨthɨwa'.”

Kuvɨnɨmaangeigɨ, gɨmɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨ yaasɨwa'na karama'gɨzɨ yaasɨwa'na sɨnna tɨka nudavadɨka! Aawa, kayaa'na kyapɨjɨ Naangerebwi nayaa yawɨra'gɨzɨ nayaanna dɨrama! Nayaanna duthana! Naangerebwina duzɨwaakya!

Wɨdaayadɨnyaigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨnei gɨmaremwaaidei sara kagɨthozɨ Gotɨyarɨna lɨka yadɨ nayaa sara dɨmɨdɨna! Gɨmɨre sɨmunya' gave pɨrɨ'na nayaa yawɨ'dɨ nayaa sara dɨmɨdɨna! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ duthaayɨdevaaibɨ' nayaa sara ja!

Gavegaa' maremwaaidei tɨnna gwangadaawojɨ “Wawɨnya tewaanya'na yɨlaaya nyɨmaryana!” da'gɨzɨ gavegaa' nayaa yɨjɨwaala nyɨdɨka! Aawa. Yuyagaa' nayaa ja! Kɨraazɨtɨyare wɨdaayadɨnyaigɨ mwaaihɨnya'na Gotɨyare sɨmunya' gɨnnya kuryai nayaa yana! Sare' maremwaaiderɨna nayaa ja!
Sareigɨ wɨdaayadɨnyaigɨ sɨmunyavɨ “Nɨmɨ tewaanna yɨma!” yawɨ'dɨ yɨlaaya'na nayaa ja! A'mwe gaveraavɨ duthaayɨdeigɨ mɨka! Aawa. Naangerɨjɨ duthaayɨdevaaibɨ' nayaa ja!
Dara jawɨ'desɨ. Wawɨnya tewaanya'na Naangei gazai gazarɨna tewaanya ayɨna wɨjaavadelyɨ. Nɨgwɨwawɨnyarɨnajɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnyarɨnajɨ wawɨnya' avaaina wɨjaavadelyɨ.

Maremwaaidɨnyaigɨ, avaalyabaaibɨ' gɨnnya gɨthaayaderɨ nayaa ja! Maiyagaala kuna madɨnna! Nayaa dara yawɨ'mwaa. Sɨgunyavɨ Nemaremwaaide gavelyɨ. Gɨmɨjɨ gɨthaayadɨvɨsarajɨ saihɨrɨ avaaina yɨhɨmaremwaalɨkelyɨ. Sai a'mwerɨ sɨnnyasɨ yayasɨ yawɨsasɨ yawɨ'da myɨkelyɨ. Aawa. Yuyaraavɨna avaaina yɨkelyɨ. Sara yawɨ'mwaa. Sare'na nayaa ja!
Yagaala pɨnɨ yɨhɨthɨma! Naangerɨ kuna dɨragɨnna wɨlamwaaida'gɨzɨ gannya dɨragɨnya' gɨzaavada dɨragɨnnakeigɨ gɨmwaaihana!
Kotɨya Maryadei yawɨ'na “Sai kayaa'nanya kuna yana!” yawɨ'na yojɨ kwaasɨya gyathehaa' dɨragɨnyaigɨ dɨmwaaide'na mwasaabya, pɨnɨ Gotɨyai gɨzaavade yuyajɨyaigɨ dɨragɨnna ja!

A'mwera kɨlaa'nakera tawanakerajɨ mala mabwa'nyɨvanɨgo. Aawa. Kurya kayaa'nanyara maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ dɨragɨnyarajɨ jɨhɨnya dahaa' yɨmakera Kwaakeva' kayaa'nanyava' maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ saraavɨ sɨgunyavɨ kurya kayaa'nanyara mwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ sarajɨ mala bwa'nɨvanɨgo.

Sarevɨ Gotɨyai saabya sasɨ gɨzaavade yuyajɨyaigɨ malya'na maarɨna ja! “Kayaa'nanyagaa' malyagaa' yɨma'nadehaa' yɨkamaangei kanyɨramojɨ dɨragɨnna daavɨma! Mala bwara'mujɨ aayagaa' dɨragɨnna dathɨwagɨma!” da'gɨzɨ maarɨna ja!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ malya'na yovɨrawaka'gɨzɨ Romɨyai aawɨlasaibɨsaigɨ gaidaa'na ja! Munnaanya' Nebulya' dɨvadathɨvainana! Yɨda'maraangebwi kɨhɨsavɨ yuna dɨragɨnya'na dɨvaazɨ'ma'nana!
Gotɨyare narya'na yagaala tewaanya' yarai wɨdadaanya' sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ dɨvaazɨ'ma'nana!
Nabaai, Naangerɨ lɨmwadaanyabwi yuna saabya dɨragɨnya' dɨmaryɨvɨla! Yɨkamaangei mwasaagala dɨka nadaawojɨya padaawojɨ gɨmɨre saabya' gɨmarulyakedaavadesɨ.
Naangei nevadaihasamaarakebwi mɨnyagɨnyavɨ dɨmwaaihɨ'nana! Gotɨyare yagaalya' Kuryai nejaavake' kwaari'masɨramɨnya' gurɨmaanga yuneba woinɨke' dɨlɨmwana!

Yuya sanna Gotɨyarɨ wɨja ja! Kuryai gɨhaimwadaawojɨ yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna duthana! Jɨthaangana! Dameigɨ nayaa tɨnna wangadɨ yuyagaa' Naangerɨ yuyanna dɨragɨnna duthana! Yuyagaa' Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨna dɨragɨnna jɨthaangana!

Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ duthana! “Gotɨyaigɨ, ‘Polɨmɨna yagaalya' kujaava'mujɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna wɨdana! Sahwai lɨka mi yada yagaala tewaanya' yoimavajalɨkurakya' nayaa dɨragɨnna wɨjɨwaakana!’ da'gɨzɨ yanga duzaama!” Sara duthana nɨmɨnyɨna!

Yagaala tewaanya'na Kingɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nyɨdaasadere wawɨnya' yɨvanɨgeinyɨ. Kɨgaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna wɨdahe'na wɨla nyɨvwɨyeta kɨrɨ' Kingɨyare wawɨnya' yɨvanɨgeinyɨ. “Lɨka nyɨwɨdɨka! Nɨmɨre dɨwɨja' dɨragɨnna wɨdɨma!” dadɨ gɨthɨvanɨge. Sareinyɨna Gotɨyarɨ duthana!

Tɨkikaazai neya'mwei sahwarɨna nevu'nadei tewaanyai Naangere wawɨnya' dɨragɨnna wɨdaayadelyɨ. Sarei nɨmɨnyɨna yuya yɨhɨthathelyɨ. “Sahwara nɨmɨnyɨnejɨ nɨmɨ yɨvanɨgejɨ yawɨpɨka!” dena sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨdasɨwaabe.
“Sarɨmɨ nemɨnyɨnenna jawɨrila! Sara yawɨrapɨjɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnya jɨvaimwannyɨla!” dena wɨdasɨwaabelyɨ.
Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ sanɨdaai neya'mweihɨrɨ kɨrɨnnya kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhɨmwaaihika! Kale yɨhyadevwi Naangerɨ lɨmwangebulyɨ dɨragɨnna yɨhɨzaayɨka!
Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna sarɨnnya tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nada, nabaai kuna dɨragɨnna sara yɨhyada, yɨ saihɨrɨ yanga tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwagika!
Pilipaai mwaalyaihi nya'mweihi,

Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'neihi Gotɨyare tewaanyaihi, Polɨnyɨjɨ Timotilyɨ sainaai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainaai pɨkarɨyɨkwia da' yɨhyasɨvanaabɨholyainaalyɨ. A'mweihɨrɨna, kusɨlaanyavɨyaihɨre maremwaalyaihɨrɨnajɨ wɨdaayaihɨrɨnajɨ saihɨrɨ yɨhyasɨvanaabɨholyainaalyɨ.
Nemɨre Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ yanga gaimwangebwi yɨhika! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kave kwaamu'nanya' yɨhwakika!
Sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨnyagaa' gazagaasagaa' nɨmɨre Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.
Yuya wɨdadɨnya sangɨ, sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwanga yɨhya'ne wɨdadɨnyangɨ yɨlaaya yadɨ Naangerɨ yɨdaangadɨnyainyɨ.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' yamaaresagaa'daasɨ dahaa'nanneihi nɨmɨjɨ yagaala sa' a'mwera maarya'na mena nye'mwannayɨvanɨgasa'nanyɨ.
Nɨmɨ mena dara yawɨ'manɨge. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ wawɨnya nawɨ'nya' mena yɨhivanɨ'. Sai wawɨnya' kuna kuna yɨwawojɨ wawɨnya sa' yɨ'mwannyɨna yade Yɨrɨka yune Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazaregaa'na.

Yo, sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨrɨna sɨmunya sara yɨbwakɨnna yɨvanɨge daza' yɨda'nanyasɨ. Sa' dare'na. Yuyagaa' nɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨlɨmwaga'dɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨvanɨke'nanyɨ. Nabaai yuyaihi yanga gaimwanga naangebwi nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannamaa'manɨga'. Yɨ yagaala tewaanya' a'mwera maarya'na yanga sabwi nye'mwannayɨvanɨgasa'nanyɨ. Nɨmɨ kalavuzavɨ mwaaidɨnyagaasɨ yagaala tewaanya sa' nebulya'na warya'ne' jalɨkurakegaasɨ a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ yagaala tewaanya sa' dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwagehaasɨ yuya sagaa' sara yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanaanga wɨvu'nɨvanɨkabaai sahwarɨ yuyaihɨrɨna tewaanaanga nyɨvu'nɨvanɨke' Gotɨyai nayaa jalɨkurakanneinyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨhwanganaawɨde'na yɨhɨthɨwa.
“Sarɨmɨre tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nyabwi naanga naanga kuna yɨma'nana! Nebulya'na jawɨranganyidesɨ yuya sɨmunya tewaanya naangejɨ naanga kuna yɨhɨmaremwaalana!” dena nɨmɨ Naangerɨ sara yɨdaangadɨnyainyɨ.
Nabaai gevwi gevwi nayaa yawɨranganya'neihɨrɨ yɨhɨmaremwaaladengɨ. “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne Yɨrɨkerɨkɨ sarɨmɨ nawɨ'nya tewaanyaihi yɨwetawakya maayaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨra,” dena Naangerɨ wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.

Yɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yɨsɨ' yɨsɨla nawɨ'nya yɨ'nadevaaibɨ' yɨda'maraangebwi sarɨmɨnyɨ yunebanna kuna yɨhwaradevulyɨ. Yɨ sasare sabwi yadaapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'najɨ “Byaannakei!” dadaa Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wɨmarya'najɨ sara wɨdadɨnya'nanyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨ yawɨramaasavɨna dara nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Nɨmɨnyɨ taanga nyɨma'nade datha kɨrɨ' yagaala tewaanya' yawɨranganya'na marihɨri. Aawa. A'mwe kwaala kwalaalyara yagaala sa' kadɨka kuna wɨ'nɨvanɨgasasɨ.
Yɨ sare'na dame maredaata yuyara Sizaare angevɨna dame daa'dɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe pwara kwarajɨ sara “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna wɨdake'na kalavuzavɨ mwaaidelyɨ,” nɨmɨnyɨna mena nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨsare.

Nabaai kalavuzavɨ mwaaideri Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ nayaa nyɨgaimwade' Naangerɨne neya'mwe kwalaalyara tɨnna wangadɨvɨsa'na kumɨnyɨ wɨgaimwange'na yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kumɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya maa'dɨvɨsa'na lɨka yabwi yagalya'ma'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakya'na dɨragɨnna yadɨvɨsare.

Dare' nebulyasɨ. Pwara nɨmɨre wawɨnya Gotɨyarɨne'na tɨganaarya yadɨvɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna “Sai kalavuzavɨna nayaa mujadei. Sahwarɨ wavɨlavaana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨta dazavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsasɨ. Kɨrɨ' pwara nɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunya nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakera wɨjɨwaakɨna.
A'mwe dazara nɨmɨnyɨna wɨvu'nɨvanɨke'najɨ yagaala tewaanya' nebulya'na warya'ne wawɨnya naange' nyɨjaavakevɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'najɨ sara wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨgasare.

Kɨrɨ' pwara sara “Polɨmɨna nemɨnne yaya naangenna yaana!” deva Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sahwara sɨmunya tewaanya kɨnɨnnakera yawɨta gɨrɨkita'nanya maayara sara wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsara mɨka! Aawa. Nɨmɨre kalavuzɨwawɨnyavɨ “Taanginya pɨnɨjɨ yɨbwa'mwagaana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sara wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' maajɨmunya myawɨriwana! Baa'nana! Yuya saburaavɨ, nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨta kayaa'nanyangɨnajɨ nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨta tewaanyangɨnajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsare. Dazavɨ nɨmɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge. Yo, nɨmɨ yɨlaaya naanga kuna yɨdeinyɨ.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ mena yawɨ'manɨge. Nɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ wɨdadɨvɨsavɨjɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare Kuryai nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya nyɨvaimwadevɨjɨ dahaa' nyɨma'nɨwaka daza sa kayaaka nyɨgalade mɨ'. Naangei nyɨvadaihasamaaradeinyɨ.

Yɨ “Yɨma'nadenna tɨlɨjaaya baihanarɨma!” yawɨ'dɨ dazanna yemwaaimanɨge. Dare' yemwaaimanɨgeinyɨ. Nɨmɨ wagɨla maalɨka aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' maarɨdeinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Yuyagaa' sara yadɨnyabaaibɨ' dahaa' yuya nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ yɨdevɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yaya' makɨlya'neinyɨ dɨragɨnna daa'dɨ nayaa jalɨkurakɨma! “Nɨmɨ gaala mwaaimujainyɨ sara yɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Nɨmɨ baimuja kwainyɨ sara yɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka?” dena nayaa yɨvanɨge.

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ gaala mwaala'mujɨyainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ ye'mwannamwaaihe. Nabaai nɨmɨ bala'mujɨyainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yaya' dɨragɨnna makɨlɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ sa' nɨmɨre mwaalyabwi wavɨlavade nɨmɨnyɨne'nanyɨ.

Nabaai nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ kuna mwaaimujainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne'na tewaanya nawɨ'nyaanga yɨsɨlyabɨta yɨdeinyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ be tutarɨkɨ mɨdɨnɨdeinyaka? “Balɨma!” yawɨrɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? “Mwaalɨma!” yawɨrɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Nɨmɨ myawɨriwa.
Yɨ savɨna nɨmɨ sɨmunya pɨrɨwaai yawɨ'manɨge. Kwaaka davakɨ yagalya'ma'mujainyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ ye'mwannamwaaimuja'. Darevɨnyɨ. Sa' tewaanya naangesɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sara yɨwɨjainyɨ gara yɨhɨgaimwagɨdeinyaka! Sare' kɨlaakejɨkɨ sarɨmɨnyɨne'na yɨhɨmudaasɨvanɨke'na kuna mwaalɨma!

Sare' dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨgevɨdaa'nyɨ dara yawɨramaa'manɨge. Nɨmɨ kuna mwaaidɨ sarɨmɨjɨ wawɨnya yɨhye'mwannayɨdeinyɨ. Naangerɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi naanga yɨma'nya'najɨ dɨragɨnaanga lɨmwadɨvɨ' yɨlaaya yɨhya'najɨ yɨhɨgaimwagɨde'nanyɨ.
Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna mwaalɨdevɨ sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' “Nemɨnyawɨ mena mwaalɨke'na Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨne yaya' munyaba naanna makɨlaana!” dɨzide' yɨhye'mwannamwaalɨde'nanyɨ.

Yuya yɨma'nadengɨ sarɨmɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaala tewaanyavɨ lɨmwadaanyainera,” dadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarera yɨpɨnebwi nayaa yɨda'maraangebwina jɨla! Sarevɨ nɨmɨ yɨhwanganaawɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Sarɨmɨnyɨ kuna yɨbwa'nɨdeinyɨ dɨngaka? Yɨ sareinyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna kadɨka sara wɨ'nya'ne'na sara jɨla! Dara wɨ'nya'neinyɨ nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'! Sahwara avaaizɨmunya'na daa'dɨvɨ' yagaala tewaanya' lɨmwaga'manɨgasarera. Yɨ yuyara, yagaala tewaanya'na kwɨya'mwera dɨragɨnna lɨmwange'na dɨhaa'bwata yɨmanɨgasarera. Malyavɨ ye'mwannadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' yuyara sara yɨvanɨgasarera.

Sahwaraavɨna taanga wɨjaavadɨvɨsara aane pɨrɨvɨ kɨrɨvɨ sahwaraavɨ lɨka wirɨ'gaimanɨgasara mɨka! Sahwara saraavɨna lɨka myɨvanɨgasara. Nabaai sarɨmɨ lɨka mi yɨpɨja' daza' yɨkamaangeraavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia dara yadesɨ. Sahwara kayaaka yɨnɨpɨ'dere. Nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨ dara yɨhibwarɨdaakuvanɨ'. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨ tewaanya mwaalya'na yɨhɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyɨjɨ sara yɨhyadelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyare wawɨnya ya'ne'na Gotɨyai tewaanyabwi yɨhɨzaavanɨkelyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwagya'ne gavebwina yɨhɨzaavada mɨ'. Aawa. Gamɨnyɨ daanga maarya'ne kɨbulyɨ yɨhɨzaavanɨkelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala tewaanya' kuna dɨlɨmwagarila!

Yɨ sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨne mala bwa'daazɨya' sarɨmɨ tɨnna wangane'. Nabaai dahaakɨgaa' nɨmɨ mala kuna bwa'manɨge'na sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨgasasɨ. Mala yune gave savɨna avaainanyavɨna sarɨmɨ bwa'nɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre sɨmunya' neyɨvaimwadei daakajɨ, Nemɨnyɨna gamɨre wɨvu'nyabwi nemɨre munyɨ' nayaa newa'devwi daakajɨ, Kurya Tewaanyalyɨ ye'mwannamwaaihoina daakajɨ, Nemɨjɨya pwaraavɨna kale neyada tewaanaanga nevu'nadeina daakajɨ,

yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨre yɨlaaya naangebwi yuna naanga jɨla! Yɨ avaaizɨmunya'na jawɨryidevɨjɨ wɨvu'nya avaala saburɨ jidevɨjɨ kurya avaala gave pɨbwina dɨlɨmwagaryidevɨjɨ gave pɨbwi jawɨryidevɨjɨ yuneba yɨlaaya dɨnyɨgalyɨla!

Sarɨmɨ yune sarɨmɨnyɨne'na sɨmunya yawɨ'dɨvɨ' aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' mipɨnera! Sarɨnnya yaya munyaba makɨlya'na aane pɨbwi kɨbwi mipɨnera! Aawa. A'mwe pwaraavɨ dalaangewɨ mwaaidɨvɨ' “Sahwara nemɨnyɨ nevɨlapɨka!” jawɨrila!
Gazaigɨzaigɨ gɨnnya yunenna mamaremwaaidɨnnera! Aawa. Gazaigɨzaigɨ pwaraavɨre sa kɨnɨngɨjɨ dɨmaremwaala!
Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ sɨmunya pɨbwi wɨwarakabaaibɨ' sɨmunya avaainanya dɨlɨmwagarila! Darebulyɨ.
Sahwai Gotɨya nebulyai mwaalaka kɨrɨ' Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyalyɨ avaaina mwaalya sabwina kuna lɨmwange'na yawɨrakai mɨ'.
Aawa. Sai sasare sabwi yagalya'ma'na yaka kunei yɨma'naka a'mwe yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨrebwibɨ' maarɨna yakei yɨ a'mwei yɨma'nyɨna. A'mwei a'mweraavɨne avaainanyai yɨma'nyɨna yada

gamɨ sarɨ kwaakewɨ walamarakɨnyɨna. Sara yada Gotɨyarɨ yagaalya mɨdɨnakelyɨ. Nabaai kuna sara yada yune gamɨ balakegaa'na. Yo, yune yɨsavɨri kamaratamarɨmwe' wagɨlyavɨne yɨsavɨ balakegaa'na. Yɨ sarevɨ kwaakewɨ walamarakɨnakelyɨ.
Sare'na Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨne yaya' munya ke'ba makɨlaka sahwarɨ munya ke'beva mwaaihakelyɨ. Sara yaka Gotɨyai yaya nawɨ'nya' yaya pɨnɨ wavɨlavɨke' wɨjaavakelyɨ.
“Sɨgunyavɨ mwaaihata yuyarajɨ Kwaakevakɨyarajɨ kwaakevɨ amwihɨlyarajɨ Jizaazarɨne yaya sa' dadɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨ kwadaai gibɨka!” daka yaya nawɨ'nya sa' wɨjaavake'nanyɨ.
Nabaai a'mwe yuyara kunnya maangisɨ dara jalɨkurakɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ “Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sai Naangelyɨra.” Sare'na “Gotɨyai byaannakela!” dadɨvɨ' Nɨmwarɨne yaya' munyaba makibɨ'de'nanyɨ.

Nɨmɨre nyɨvu'nɨvanɨkeihi, Kɨraazɨtɨyai Gotɨyarɨ sara mɨdɨda sarɨmɨnyɨne'na ke'ba'nanya' yakabaaibɨ' “Gotɨyai sara nevadaihasamaarakei daakajɨ,” yɨpɨ'dengɨ jɨla! Yɨ sɨnnawɨ yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨnesaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannemwaaidɨnya yune sagaa'na mɨdɨnetabaaibɨ'na myɨhɨzɨvanɨge. Aawa. Dahaa' menyawɨ nɨmɨ mwaaida'mwi sarɨmɨ naanga kuna dɨmɨdɨnyɨla! Gotɨyarɨna dara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Sahwai naangaangei mena ke'ba mwaalɨkelyɨ,” lɨka nayaa yɨwainɨgulɨna yadɨvɨ' dahaakɨgaa' yɨhɨvadaihasamaarakeihi sareihi sara yɨpɨnengɨ jɨla!

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ kusawɨ yɨhyadelyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨ gamɨ sai yɨhidɨkaa'bwa'delyɨ. Nabaai gamɨ sare sɨmunya nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakebwina wɨvu'nadevaaibɨsanna ya'neihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨ.
Yuya yɨpɨja sa sarɨmɨ kɨnɨmyagaalyajɨ maiyagaalyajɨ nayaa makwasakɨna yadɨvɨ' jɨla!

“Yɨwetawakya maayaina mwalaana! Nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ kayaa'nanyabwi mwaranna!” dapɨjɨ sara jɨla! Yɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraangebwi yagalya'ma'dɨvɨ' kumɨre sɨmunya naadɨya' yɨnɨkera kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsaraavɨ tɨnnyaba mwaalyaihi sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare kaimɨraayaihi kayaa'nanya maayaihi sara jɨla!

Sarɨmɨ yagaala gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnake' maguzaavadɨvɨ' sahwaraavɨ tewaanya sa' wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsavɨ sarɨmɨ a'mwe Kwaaka jɨhɨnya davakɨyaraayaba baakeihi lɨvamwaaidɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sara yɨpɨjaihɨrɨna Yɨrɨka Kɨraazɨtɨyaregaa' yɨlaaya yɨdeinyɨ. Nɨmɨre yaya' makibɨ'de'nanyɨ. Dara yawɨrɨdeinyɨ. Kumɨnyawɨ nɨmɨ kaanyave'na gazare myadɨ nɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' yaasɨwa' mɨraagɨkɨ'na myeneinyɨ.

Aawa. Sarɨmɨre Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi yɨ sabwi Gotɨyarɨ wabatɨrɨnya yɨravayɨhu'dɨvɨtabaaibɨsabulyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨ baimuja' nɨmɨre tawe' dɨmapɨja' waainɨya'bɨ' Naangerɨna wabatɨrɨnya yɨravayɨhu'dɨvɨsavɨ dɨma'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' yɨ sarevɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨde'nanyɨ. Yo, nɨmɨ sarɨmɨjɨ yɨlaaya yɨhye'mwannayɨdeinyɨ.
Sasare savɨ sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya avaaina jɨla! Yo, nɨmɨjɨ yɨlaaya dɨnye'mwannayɨla!
Nabaai Naanga Jizaazai kyawɨrojɨ maalɨkegaa' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Timotirɨ maryasaabɨdelyɨ. Sai ayɨna kabozɨ “Sarɨmɨnyɨnenna yawɨramaara'mujɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya' yɨlaaya naanga yɨma!” da'mujɨ maryasaabɨdelyɨ.
Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨra. A'mwe pwai kwai, Timoti nɨmɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya'na yadeibɨsai kuneinyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na nebulya'na maremwaalya'ne pwai kuneinyɨ. Sarevɨ Timotirɨ dahɨlakɨwelyɨ.
Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. A'mwe yuya pwara kunnya yune yawɨsannenna bɨramaa'dɨvɨsare. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarenna maremwaaidɨvɨtara mɨ'.

Nabaai sarɨmɨ Timotirɨna sɨmunyabwi mena yawɨ'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sai a'mwe tewaanyalyɨ. Kaimɨraayai ganɨmaangerɨ gaimwadevaaibɨ' yagaala tewaanyavɨna nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannawɨdaayolyalyɨ. Sarevɨ sahwarɨ dahɨlakɨwelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨma'nadevɨ mena yawɨra'mujɨ sahwarɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' sara maryasaabɨdelyɨ.
Nabaai Naangerɨ nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna dara yawɨ'mwa. Maalɨkegaa' nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bɨdeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨge. A'mwe Epapɨrothaaitazarɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨme'nya'bɨ' ayɨna maryasaabɨma! Sai nemɨre neya'mwelyɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨ avaaiwawɨnyalyɨ. Mala dazavɨna nɨmɨjɨ nyɨgaidaa'delyɨ. Sarɨmɨ kɨgaa' sahwarɨ nɨmɨnyawɨnna nyɨmaryasaabesai sarei nyɨmudaasakenna nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨgaimwagakelyɨ.

Gamɨre sɨmunya' sarɨmɨnyɨ wanganya'na wabahɨlaaka wiadevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ “Nalaaya kɨnɨnnakelyɨra,” kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa'daasa'na sahwai “Yawɨta kwalaalya nyɨpɨdɨka!” kadɨwa' sarɨmɨnyɨna taanginya wɨwa'manɨ'.

Yɨ nebulyasɨ. Kɨgaa' nalaaya waraka kɨbawa mena kabaladɨkelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sahwarɨna Gotɨyai kale wiaka tewaanya yavada'galakelyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyai kale yune gave sarɨna yakai mɨ'. Aawa. Sai nɨmɨ kwainyɨnajɨ kale wiakelyɨ. Nɨmɨ gamɨre nalaaya'na kale nyakeinyɨ sahwai balajɨ kwajɨ taanginya naange' nɨmɨnyɨ yɨlasa'na kanyadɨka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarebwi “Aala!” yawɨraka gamɨnyɨ yɨvainɨmwaaihakelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨ kamaryaasa'mujɨ sarɨmɨ tɨnna ayɨna kwanganapɨjɨ “Yɨlaaya jɨla! Nabaai sai sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunya kwalaalya yawɨ'manɨke' mi'na yɨma'nade'na nɨmɨre taanginya kɨrɨsɨ myɨma'nanna!” da'mujɨ nɨmɨnyɨ tewaanya dɨragɨnna nyɨvu'nɨwa'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kabi'mavojɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsara kunnya lɨmwaga'dɨvɨta pwaraavɨ maapɨnebaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya naanga yadɨvɨ' sahwarɨ nayaa dɨmaaryɨla! A'mwe sasare saibɨsaraavɨne yaya' munyaba dɨmakɨlyɨla! Kuna sara jɨla!

Kɨbawa mena kabaladɨkei Kɨraazɨtɨyare wawɨnyavɨ sai gaala kuna mwaalya'na yawɨ'dei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai wawɨnya' sarɨmɨ yɨnɨga manyɨgaimwagi yɨpɨne'na yawɨ'da “Polɨmɨ wɨgainɨwakevɨ yunebanna yɨ'mwannɨma!” yawɨ'da nyɨgaimwagakelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwarɨ nayaa dɨmaaryɨla!
Nya'mweihi, yɨ nabaai Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'na yɨlaaya naanga jɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨna nɨmɨ yagaala da' pɨkarya ayɨna yɨdasa'na nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ “Aala!” majɨwa. Taanga manyɨvanɨ'. Sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwanga'nesɨ.

Kavɨjɨlɨkerabɨsaraavɨna mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sahwara wawɨnya kayaa'na yadɨvɨsaraavɨna mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sahwara sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ gurya kayaa'na daya'neraavɨna (Juyaraavɨna) mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨra. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna neyawɨ'delyɨ nemɨre kɨlaaka gurya madayainaavɨna “ ‘Kɨlaakejɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna gurya nebwina da'nɨkerera,’ yawɨ'manɨge.” Sareinaavɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai nemwaaihake'na Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya nebulya'na yadaanyɨ. Sareinaavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai yune yake'na gamɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba makidaanyɨ. Nemɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨ yɨnɨga negaimwagya'ne sanna dɨragɨnna malɨmwagivanɨgo. Yɨ nemɨre mwaalyabwina myawɨri, nemɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨna myawɨri yadaa Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeihɨlyɨ,” nedadeina yune Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna lɨmwamanɨgoinera.

Sare kɨrɨ' “Nɨmɨ yɨma!” dɨwɨjɨ kwajɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨne saburana dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨnya sa' nɨmɨnyɨ yɨnɨga nyɨgaimwagya'ne'na nɨmɨnne tusa' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. A'mwe pwara kwara kɨlaakejɨkɨne saburana dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨ' “Sanna nɨmɨnyɨ yɨnɨga nyɨgaimwaganneinyɨ,” yawɨpɨjaraavɨ, yɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨne sabwina nɨmɨ sahwaraavɨ wavɨla'manɨgeinyɨ.

Yɨ dareinyɨ. Yɨrɨka ati ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daryaai darɨkɨ nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gurya nyɨdavesainyɨ. Nɨmɨ a'mwe Yɨzɨrelɨyainyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ Bejaminɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨdaasainyɨ. Nɨmɨ Yɨvɨruyainyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara yuya sara Yɨvɨruyarera. Nɨmɨ Yɨvɨruyaraavɨdaa'nyɨ avaaitawejɨ'nyɨ. Ne Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnyavɨna Perɨzɨyara nayaa maremwaaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Perɨzɨyainyɨ nayaa mɨdɨneinyɨ.

“Juyainaavɨrebwi Gotɨyarebulyɨ,” yawɨ'dɨ dɨragɨnna yɨna ye. Yɨ sareinyɨ “Gotɨyai sara yawɨ'delyɨ,” dadɨ Naangere kusɨlaanyaraavɨ kayaa'na yeinyɨ. Nabaai a'mwera nɨmɨnyɨ nyawɨbwapɨjɨ kwajɨ Kɨwɨnyabwi mɨdɨnya'na, sare' nɨmɨ yɨda'maraangeinyɨra.
Kɨrɨ' yuya sa kɨgaa' “Sa nɨmɨnne sa naangengɨra,” yawɨre yuya daza dahaa' dara yawɨ'mwa. Sa kune yaasɨwa'nanyangɨ. Yɨ nemɨnyɨna yune Kɨraazɨtɨyai yake' sa' naangaanga gavesɨra.

Yune Juyaraavɨre gave sanne'na majɨvanɨge. Aawa. Nabaai nɨmɨ yuya pɨnɨngɨna “Sa yune yaasɨwa'nanyangɨ,” yawɨ'manɨgeinyɨ. Nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nɨmɨre Naangerɨ yawɨrangadɨ, yawɨta sa'na nɨmɨ yɨbwakɨdɨ sa yune naangesɨra. Sahwarɨna yuya sa mena yagalya'maveinyɨ. Nɨmɨ yuya sanna yawɨ'manɨge' mena yaayewɨ lɨvarannɨkebɨsangɨ. “Nɨmɨ yune Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ maa'dɨ Nawɨ'nyɨnaangereinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!” dadɨ sara ye.

Sahwarɨ nɨmɨ wɨlamwaalya'neinyɨ sara yeinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkebwi mɨdɨne'na Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,” manyɨja'. Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨnya'na yɨda'maraangebwi kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwaga'manɨgevɨ Gotɨyai “Yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ,” nyɨdadelyɨ.

“Nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nebulya'na yawɨranganɨma!” dadɨ mwaaiheinyɨ. “Yɨ ayɨna dɨkaavake dɨragɨnyavɨ yɨbwakɨdevaaibɨ' dɨragɨnya savɨ yɨbwakɨnɨma! Gamɨ daanga maarya saburɨ gamɨjɨ avaaina ye'mwannamaarɨma! Sai sara balakabaaibɨ'na avaaizɨmunya yawɨ'dɨ nɨmɨnyɨna myawɨ'nyadɨ balɨdeinyɨ!
Sareinyɨ mwaaimujainyɨ Gotɨyai bainɨkeraavɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ ayɨna nyɨdɨkaavana!” jemwaaidɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nebulya'na dɨragɨnna yawɨrangamanɨgeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨ dara majɨvanɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nebulya'na mena yawɨrangamweinyɨ. Mena maa'mweinyɨ. Nɨmɨ mena wi'nanyɨra. Gotɨyai mena naanga yune nebulya'nanyainyɨ nyɨmwaaihɨwakeinyɨ. Sara majɨvanɨge. Sare kɨrɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai gamɨnyɨneinyɨ nyɨmaarakabaaibɨ' sara yɨma'nya'neinyɨ maa'mujainyɨ kaanyave'na dɨragɨnna wɨvanɨgeinyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, nɨmɨ sainyɨ myawɨrivanɨge. Nɨmɨ mena maa'mweinyɨ dɨngaka! Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ sɨmunya yune gave pɨrɨ'nanyainyɨ “Yuya sɨnnawɨ kɨgaasa sangɨna nɨmɨ mena navɨka yadɨnyangɨ. Sara yadɨ dɨvidaa'nya yuyabwi maarya'na yɨbwa'mwagayɨwɨbwata yadɨnyainyɨ.

Wɨjaaya'ne' maarya'neinyɨ daza' lɨmwaderyawɨ tɨyawɨnna kaanyave'na dɨragɨnna wɨvanɨgeinyɨ. Wɨjaaya'ne daza' yɨ dare'na. Naangerɨ nebulya'na yawɨranganya'neinaavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨna nemɨ yɨlaawia'ne jaka Gotɨyai nejɨvwaramaa'manɨkesɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨre sɨmunyabwi Gotɨyarɨnebwi a'mwe nebulyaina yɨma'nɨvanɨgoina yagaala dɨvanɨge daza'na sara yawɨraana! Nabaai pwaihi sɨmunya pɨbwi kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaibɨzaihi yɨ Gotɨyai nayaa yɨhɨzɨwaainada sɨmunya dazabwi kɨbwi yavada'gala yɨhyathelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' yuyaina sɨmunya mena maa'manɨgovwi, saburɨ sasara nayaa yamaryaana!
Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunya saburɨ dɨnye'mwannanyɨmɨdɨnyɨla! Nabaai nemɨre saburɨ sara yamarivanɨgasara nemɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ nayaa baihana'dɨvɨ' sabaaibɨ' jɨla!

Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨra. Kwalaalyagaa' sara myamarivanɨgasaraavɨna mena yɨhɨtheinyɨ. Nabaai dahaakɨgaa' kale nyadaa'nyɨ kɨdalaala purata'dɨ ayɨna yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. A'mwe kwalaalyara “Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareinera,” dadɨvɨsara kayaa'na yɨvanɨgasavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ balakevɨne yagaalya' tihɨ'manɨgasarera. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yɨkamaangerera.

Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yadaanyabaaibɨ' kunnya kɨlaakejɨkɨne sabwi “Naangengɨra,” dadɨvɨsarera. Kumɨre gotɨyaibɨsangɨ. Sahwara yadɨvɨsangɨna kunnya yaya' makinadɨvɨsare. Kɨrɨ' sahɨnɨngɨna wagɨla wɨvwa'nɨvanɨ'. Yune Kwaakevakɨya sabwina yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Sareraavɨ Gotɨyai kayaaka yɨgaladerera. Kayaa'nanyaba mwaaibɨ'dere.

Nɨmɨre sɨmunya sabwi je'mwannanyɨmɨdɨnyide' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Nemɨ Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalya'neinera. Nabaai sahɨbadaa'nyɨ yune nevadaihasamaaraderɨna yɨlaaya'na yemwaaimanɨgoinera. Sahwai Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ.

Sahwai nemɨre kɨlaaka nagaazazɨ' barya'nejɨ' gamɨre kɨlaaka byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakejɨ' neyɨmavadelyɨ. Sai yuyaraavɨjɨ yuyangɨjɨ maremwaalya'nei gamɨnyɨ kwaakewɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wakade dɨragɨnya dazavɨ sasara yadelyɨ.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, sarɨmɨnyɨna nyɨma'nadeihi, sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya naanga yadɨnyaihi, nɨmɨre kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya wavɨla'nɨkei maa'de'bɨsaihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ dɨwebaaibɨ' Naangerɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna dɨthaayɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi dɨragɨnna dɨthaayɨla!
Yuwothɨyaa'gɨ nayaa dɨnyu'nana! Sɨdikɨya'gɨ nayaa dɨnyu'nana! Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihɨlyavɨ avaaizɨmunyabwina ayɨna jawɨrila!

Yo, nabaai Sɨzɨhaazaigɨ nebulyaigɨ, githaangamanɨge. A'mwe dazawaarɨ avaaizɨmunya'na mwaalya'newaarɨ nayaa dɨhaimwana! Sahɨrɨwaai yagaala tewaanyavɨna nɨmɨjɨ nyɨgaidaa'disawaalyɨ. Nabaai Kɨlemenɨjɨ nɨmɨre avaaiwawɨnya pwarajɨ sawaalyɨ nye'mwannayadɨvɨsangɨ. Yɨ kumɨnyɨne yaya yuya Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ mwaalɨkengɨ. Bukuya savɨ Gotɨyai yuyara yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakeraavɨre yaya yɨda'nɨkengɨ.
Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihasavɨ yuyagaa' yɨlaaya jɨla! Nɨmɨ ayɨna dɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya naanga jɨla!
Naangei nebawa mɨ'. Yarai bathevɨ sarɨmɨ a'mwe yuyaraayaba bwiwangebwi yadaapiya sareihɨrɨ sahwara nayaa yɨhyawɨrangabɨ'deihɨlyɨ.
Aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' yawɨta kwalaalya myawɨpɨnera! Aawa. Yuya sanna Gotɨyarɨ nayaa duzɨla! Yɨ yuyangɨna yɨhɨgainɨvanɨkenna Gotɨyarɨ jɨthaanganyɨla! Sara yadɨvɨ' sahwai yɨhu'nade'na “Su! Su!” duzɨla!

Sareihɨrɨ Gotɨyai kwaamu'nanyabwi nejaavadevwi nayaa yɨhɨmaremwaaladeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasavɨ dazabwi sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨjɨ sarɨmɨre yawɨsangɨjɨ nayaa yɨhɨmaremwaaladevulyɨ. Kwaamu'nanya dazabwi nemɨ yune'na yawɨramaraanneburaavɨ wavɨla'nɨkebulyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, yagaala pɨnɨjɨ dɨde'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨ sɨduta nayaa da'dare davwina jawɨralɨmwagarila! Yuya nawɨ'nya nebulyabulyɨ, kumɨnyɨne yaya nemɨ yuneba makɨlya'ne sabulyɨ dazabura. Yɨ yuya sabura nebulyaburajɨ yuya sɨmunya nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakeburajɨ yuya yɨda'maraangeburajɨ yuya tewaanyabura gɨrɨka maayaburajɨ yuya wɨvu'nadevurajɨ yuya “Sa tewaanaangengɨ,” dɨdɨvɨsaburajɨ

sabura jawɨralɨmwagarila! Yuya dazabwi nɨmɨ yɨhɨzɨwakadaari yɨ sarɨmɨ mena maaresabulyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ kadɨka nyu'nadɨvɨ' nɨmɨ sara yadaariyainyɨ tɨnna nyanganeta yuya sabwi dazabwi yuyagaa' sarɨmɨ jɨwila! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai kwaamu'nanyabwi nejaavadei sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaaladelyɨ.

Dahaa' nɨmɨnyɨna ayɨna dɨhaa'bwata yadɨvɨ' mena nyawɨ'manɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sare'na nɨmɨ Naangerɨna yɨlaaya naanga yɨvanɨgeinyɨ. Nebulyasɨ. Kɨgaa' sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna sɨmunya kuna yawɨresaihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' kɨgaa' sarɨmɨ tuta maayaihi nyɨgaimwagya'neihɨlyɨ.

Nɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨsanna nyɨgainɨvanɨka majɨvanɨge. Aawa. Sare' darevɨdaa'nyɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ sɨmunya dara mena maa'manɨge. Dala pɨbwina pɨbwinanyabwi kanyɨma'nojɨ yɨ wi'nanyainyɨ. Yuya dazanna nɨmɨre sɨmunya' tewaanya nyɨma'nadesɨ.

Dara yawɨrangamwa. Nɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta maayainyɨ yɨnɨga mwaaimuneinyɨ. Nabaai dara yawɨrangamwa. Gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya yɨnɨga lɨmwaga'dɨ sara yɨwɨneinyɨ. Gazazangɨjɨ yuya kɨnɨngɨjɨ yuya sanna yawɨ'nɨkeinyɨ. Yɨ munya nyɨdevɨjɨ mɨjɨka nyɨdevɨjɨ sawaarɨna “Wikɨra,” dadɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya lɨmwagasabwinajɨ gɨlyɨvɨta wɨgainya sabwinajɨ “Wikɨra,” dadɨnyainyɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyai nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya nyɨvaimwadere dɨragɨnyavɨ yuya kɨnɨ sa yɨnɨga wi'na yɨwɨneinyɨ.
Nyɨgainɨwakenna yawɨta kwalaalya myɨvanɨge kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre taanginyaburɨ gaimwagya'neihi nye'mwannadɨvɨ' nawɨ'nya tewaanyabwi nyɨwa'daasaihɨlyɨ.

Pilipaai mwaalyaihi, nɨmɨnyɨna dara yawɨrangadɨvɨkɨ “Yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨzɨwaakaka nemɨre Pɨrovijɨ Maazathonɨya yagalya'mavakegaa' yune nemɨ saina wɨjaayabwine gamɨnyɨ ye'mwagakoinera. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨya aane pɨba kɨbanyara sara myesare.”
Nabaai sasareihi nɨmɨ yɨhyagalya'mavena anga Tezalonaaika mwaaideriyagaa' nɨmɨnyɨ nɨmɨre nyɨgainake'na pɨgasaai maryasaabesaihɨlyɨ.
Yanga wɨjaaya'na nɨmɨ jaka yɨhɨthadaarina mɨ'. Aawa. Nɨmɨ yawɨ'na “Sarevɨne tɨvɨkɨta sarɨmɨre tewaanya naangebwi naanga kuna yɨma'nana! Gotɨyai tewaanya yɨhyade' tɨvɨkɨsasɨ,” dena yɨhɨthɨwa.

Dahaa' yuya kɨnɨ maa'mwejɨyainyɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya lɨmwaga'manɨgeinyɨ. Sare'na nɨmɨ mena yunebannanyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨre yange yasɨwaabaasa Epapɨrothaaitazarɨ mena maa'mwengɨ. Yanga nawɨ'nya daza Gotɨyarɨ dɨka wabatɨrɨnya kɨnɨnnake' yɨravayɨhu'dɨvɨta dazabaaibɨsangɨ. Yɨ nyɨjawa'daasa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨjawa'daa'. Gotɨyarɨ wɨjaaya'ne yɨravadɨngɨ'dɨvɨsabɨsangɨ. Yɨ dazahɨnɨnna maa'da sahwarɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨgaidelyɨ.

Nɨmɨre Gotɨyai gɨlyɨvɨta yuya tewaanyanna tewaanyannanyangɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sarei gɨlyɨvɨta sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨnengɨna yɨhɨgainɨvanɨkenna yanga yuya yunebanna yɨhyadelyɨ. Sare'na a'mwera “Gotɨyai byaannakei,” dadɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨne yaya' makibɨ'delyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasavɨ sara yadelyɨ.
Gotɨyai sai nemɨre Nenɨmaangerɨne yaya' yuyagaa' yuyagaa' munyaba makɨlaana! Nebula sahɨrɨsɨ.
