Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaihasara Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨ “Nya'mweihi!” nɨmɨnyɨna duzɨla! Nɨmɨjɨya nya'mwera “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'.
Gotɨyare tewaanya pwara “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'. Sahwarajɨyara yunebanne maremwaalɨkei Sizaare angevɨyara dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨvanɨga' “Neya'mweihi!”
Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare gaimwangevɨne yange' sarɨmɨre kuryarajɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!
Kolozi mwaalyaihi nya'mweihi,

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'ne sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyaihi, neya'mwe Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna lɨmwaga'manɨgasaihi. Sasareihɨrɨ nɨmɨjɨ neya'mwe Timotilyɨ sainaai yɨhɨthaka! Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangei yanga naange'na yɨhɨgaimwagana! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kave kwaamu'nanya' yɨhwakana! Polɨnyɨ yune gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yawɨraka Gotɨyai kada' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai Apozelɨyainyɨ nyɨdahɨlakakeinyɨ. Sareinyɨ pɨkarya da' yɨhyasɨvanaabɨheinyɨ.
Sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ yɨdaangada' yuyagaa' naarɨmɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadasainaalyɨ. Sahwai nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ Ganɨmaangelyɨ.

Naarɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna kadɨka mena dara wɨ'nɨwa'dolya'nanyɨ. Kolozi mwaalya sara Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨ' Gotɨyare tewaanya yuyaraavɨna tewaanya wɨvu'naderera. Sare'na suya wɨdadasainaalyɨ.

Sasareihɨrɨna Gotɨyai mena yovɨrawakake Sɨgunyavɨya yɨhyemwaalɨkennanyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ yagaala tewaanyavɨya nebulya' sarɨmɨnyɨ kihima'na' sarɨmɨ kadɨka mena wɨ'ne'. Yɨ sagaa' nayaa yemwaalya' kadɨka mena wɨ'nesasɨ.

Yagaala tewaanya daza' Kwaaka yuyavakɨ yuneba naanga yɨma'nadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨma'nakesɨ. Daza' a'mwera lɨmwagaresa'na tewaanya nawɨ'nyabwi marima'naabada a'mwe kwalaalyarajɨ kwalaalya pwarajɨ daza' lɨmwaga'manɨgasa' sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhivanɨkebaaibɨsasɨ. Sa' aayagaa'daasɨ yɨhyamaaraka sarɨmɨnyɨ aayagaa' yagaala tewaanya savɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva Gotɨyare yanga gaimwangebwi nayaa nebulya'na yawɨranganna yeva sara yɨhivanɨkesɨ.

Yagaala tewaanya daza' Epapɨraazai yɨhɨzɨwaakakabaaibɨ' yɨ nebulya'na yawɨranganesasɨ. Sarɨna naarɨmɨnyɨ nehɨvu'nadelyɨ. Sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ naarɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannewɨdaayadelyɨ. Sarei sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dei kuna nayaa wɨdaayadelyɨ.
Nabaai sai nehɨthɨwakelyɨ “Kurya Tewaanyai Kolozi mwaalyaraavɨna sara wɨjaavade'na Gotɨyareraavɨna tewaanya wɨvu'naderera.” Yuya sare'na Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadasainaalyɨ.

Sarevɨ aayagaa' naarɨmɨ kwainaai yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa'dola yɨrɨka dazarɨkɨdaasɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨna. Naarɨmɨ yɨdaangayɨdaanganya yada' yagalya'mata myadasainaalyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna. “Sahwara gɨmɨre sɨmunya' nebulya'na yawɨrangabɨka! Yɨ kumɨ sara yune sɨdu'nakera yɨma'nɨpɨka! Yɨ Kurya Tewaanyai yawɨta nawɨ'nya pɨnɨjɨ sɨmunya yawɨramarakya'nejɨ wɨjaavana! Dazabwi kumɨnyɨ yunebanna nebulya'na wɨlamɨlelɨmwagarana!” dola sara wɨdadasainaalyɨ.

Naangere a'mwe nebulyara nayaa yɨnɨga wi'na yamaripɨnebaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ sara yamarya'na wɨdadasainaalyɨ. Sara yɨpɨjavɨ Naangerɨ yɨlaaya wigalade'nanyɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ tewaanya gazangɨzangɨ yadɨvɨ' yɨsɨla yɨ'nadevaaibɨ' tewaanya nawɨ'nyabwi marima'naabathe'nanyɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ nebulya'na yawɨrangadɨvɨ' yawɨta daza' naanga yɨhima'nade'nanyɨ.

Gotɨyarɨ byaanna nawɨ'nyavɨna Gotɨyai dɨragɨnya yuya wɨjaavada dɨragɨnna yɨhivaimwagathe'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yɨnɨga dɨragɨnna maredaa'dɨvɨ' taanginya yuyangɨ maredaapɨneihi sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' yɨwa'nadɨkaata yade' mɨ'. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya jide'nanyɨ.

Nɨmwarɨ “Su! Su!” duzide'nanyɨ. Sai sarɨmɨnyɨne yɨhɨthahɨlakaka gamɨre sa sarɨmɨnyɨne kuryaraavɨne sa maarya'na yɨnɨga wi'na yɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Sarevɨ Baaka naangevɨ mwaalya'nera Gotɨyare tewaanyarajɨ je'mwannamaaryideihɨlyɨ.
Gotɨyai Saataanɨmɨre jɨhɨnyavɨya dɨragɨnyavɨ ayɨna nemaaraka gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangerɨne maremwaaidevɨ yɨsava'naavɨ nemwaaihakelyɨ. Gawaalɨvaanga dazai gamɨnyɨ tewaanna mena wima'nakelyɨ.

Sahwai nemɨnyɨne'na yakevɨ Gotɨyai mena neyatavamaarakeinera. Nemɨre kayaa'nanya mena nemarasɨ'nakeinera. Yɨ sare' Gawaalɨvaangerɨnyɨ. (Gawaalɨvaangerɨna Gotɨyai ayɨna nemubya'nebwi kɨnɨnnakeinera. Gotɨyai nemɨre kayaa'nanya nemarasɨ'nya'nebwi kɨnɨnnakeinera. Yɨ sare' Gawaalɨvaangei yakevɨnyɨra.)

Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei Gotɨya nemɨ tɨnna mwanganyadaanya saibɨsai avaainanyalyɨ. Sahwarɨ tɨnna wangadaa yɨ dazagaasagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wangadaanyɨ. Yuya wakyaaka gazasavɨ sahwai munyaba mwaalɨkelyɨ. Yɨ sangɨne aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ mwalɨbainyaakelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai sara kyawɨryaa' Gawaalɨvaangei sɨgunyavɨjɨ Kwaakevakɨjɨ yuya sa wakyaakengɨ. Nemɨ tɨnna wangadaanyajɨ tɨnna mwanganyadaanyajɨ yuya sa wakyaakengɨ. Mwanganyadaanyaraavɨdaa'nyara ejelɨyara maremwaaidɨvɨsara dɨngaka? Dɨragɨnnakera dɨngaka? Ejelɨya naangera dɨngaka? Ai yuyaraavɨ wakyaakere. Yɨ Gotɨyai sara kyawɨryaa' gamɨre yuya dazahɨnɨ wakaka gamɨnyɨ yɨlaaya yɨgalya'ne wakyaakengɨ.
Nabaai sɨnnawɨ gamɨ salyɨ. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ yuya dazahɨnɨngɨra. Sahwarɨ yuya yɨnya'ne warɨkengɨ. Yuya sa lɨmwadaa'nyɨ kumɨ sa kumɨreba warɨkengɨ. Sarenna yuyangɨ munyaba mwaalɨkelyɨ.

Gamɨ sai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ Mɨnyagɨnyalyɨ. Gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' gamɨre kusɨlaanyavɨyajɨkɨra. Yɨ sahwareraavɨna aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sai aaya mudɨ'nanyai bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. “Sahwai yuyaraavɨ yuna wavɨlavana! Yuyaraavɨne sɨnnawɨnyai yuna yɨma'nana!” daka ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. Sarevɨ yuyangɨ munyaba mwaalɨkelyɨ.
Gotɨyai dara wigalake' “Nɨmɨ yuneinyɨ Nyɨbwaalɨvaanga dazarɨ kuna wɨmwaalɨma!” Daka sahwarɨ yunebanna wɨmwaalakelyɨ. Sare'na sahwai Gotɨyare kɨma'bwa'nya ke'ba'nanyalyɨ.

Yunebanna wɨmwaalaka sahwarɨ Kwaakevakɨya sajɨ Sɨgunyavɨya kɨnɨjɨ yuya sangɨna yune avaaimunyɨ'na wie'mwannakelyɨ. Gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangere tawe' yɨsavɨri walaabakevɨ Ganɨmaangei yuya sangɨna narya wakakelyɨ. Sarevɨ Gotɨyai ayɨna nemaaraka gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangerɨne maremwaaidevɨ yɨsava'naavɨ nemwaaihakelyɨ.
Nabaai sarɨmɨ sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Gotɨyarɨ menyaba kengirɨ' mwaalesaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi yada gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yesavɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ sahwarɨ yɨkamaangeihi mwaalesaihɨlyɨ.

Sasareihi kɨrɨ' dahaa' Gawaalɨvaangei kɨlaa'nakei yɨsavɨri mena balakevɨ avaaizɨmunyabwina yɨhɨmwaaiha'. Sai sasara yaka sa' gamɨnyawɨnna makabya yɨhya'negaa' sarɨmɨ nawɨ'nya tewaanyaihi gɨrɨkita maayaihi gamɨnyaba yɨwetawakya maayaihi saihi mwaalya'neihɨrɨ avaaizɨmunyabwina yɨhɨmwaaiha'.

Yɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi nayaa kuna pada'galalɨmwaga'na yɨpɨjaihi nawɨ'nya tewaanyaihi dɨmwaalyide'nanyɨ. Nabaai sɨmunya kuna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna nebwina dɨthaayɨla! Kwaasɨya pɨnɨ nayɨhɨmwagi'nadɨka! Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya savɨne yemwaalya'nebwi nyagalya'mapɨka! Yagaala tewaanya sa' sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nesasɨ. Nabaai a'mwe yuyara Kwaakevakɨ yuneba mwaaihasaraavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarera wɨjɨwakamarivanɨgasasɨ. Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ Polɨnyɨ yagaala tewaanya dazavɨna wɨdaayadɨnya tewaanyainyɨ yɨma'nageinyɨra.

Dahaa' nɨmɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨgaimwange'na daangebwi maa'dɨnya'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨge. Nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyaraavɨ gaimwanga ya'neinyɨ. Sahwara gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨra. Kusɨlaanyara sahwaraavɨ gaimwagya'neinyɨna daanga pɨnɨ kuna warɨ'. “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨdaayadɨnya'na daanga dazabwi yunebanna yɨ'mwannɨma!” dadɨ daanga yune nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ kuna maa'manɨge.

Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ Naangere kusɨlaanyaraavɨ wɨdaaya'neinyɨ yɨma'neinyɨ. Sare' darevɨnanyɨ. Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨne maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ nyɨdahɨlakakeinyɨ. Gotɨyarɨne yagaalya' sarɨmɨnyɨ yune'na yɨhibwarɨdaakwia'neinyɨ yuna wɨdaayadɨnyainyɨ yɨma'neinyɨ.

Gotɨyarɨ yagaala sa' nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakyasɨ. Yuya sɨnnawɨ kɨgaasɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨ mwalɨbainyaasaraavɨ nebula sa' lɨka yulyarakesɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' ku'maayaba Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨ mena wɨjɨwaaina'.

Gotɨyai dara yawɨrakesɨ. Sahwaraavɨ nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya savɨne sɨdusabwi wɨjaavɨma! Nebula daza' daresɨ. Ajɨmya yuyangɨya a'mweraavɨ wana nawɨ'nyaanga yanga yɨnɨga yadesɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨnyɨra. Sare'na Gotɨyaryaba byaanna nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakeihi je'mwannamwalaawide'na sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna yemwaaimanɨga'.

Kɨraazɨtɨya sahwarɨna wɨjɨwakamaryadaanyaine. A'mwe yuya kwaraavɨ “Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!” dadaa pada'galemwaihadaanyɨ. Nabaai nemɨ yawɨta dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyanna yawɨ'daa a'mwe yuya kwaraavɨ wɨjɨwɨryadaanyaine. “Gotɨyaryawɨnna a'mwe yuya kwaraavɨ makabya yaadehaa' sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihasara gamɨre a'mwe yune nebulya'nanyara yuna mwaaibɨka!” dona sara wɨjɨwakamaryadaanyaine.
Sara yɨma'nya'neinyɨ nabaai yagɨyagɨ naanga yadɨnyainyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨre dɨragɨnya naangevɨ nyɨdɨkaa'bwa'devɨ dɨragɨnya daza' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨ yagɨyagɨ naanga yadɨnyainyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna “Dara yawɨpɨka!” nyɨvu'nɨvanɨkeinyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨgaimwange'najɨ a'mwe anga Layothɨzɨya mwaalyaraavɨjɨ nɨmɨnyɨna wɨ'nesara nɨmɨre sɨnnyɨkɨ manyanganyadɨvɨta a'mwe yuyaraavɨjɨ saihɨrɨna nyɨdɨkaa'bwa'deinyɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨ yagɨyagɨ naanga yadɨnyainyɨ.

Sareihɨrɨna “Sahwara kale yaburɨ ye'mwannamwaaibɨ'devɨ kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ Gotɨyai dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwagana!” dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Nabaai nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakyavɨne tewaanya nawɨ'nyaanga yuyangɨna aaya kaavɨlyavɨna sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ jawɨramarakɨnyide'nanyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyare nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakyavɨ yune'na jawɨranganyideihɨlyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨ sai nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya savɨna aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ.
Sahwarɨ yunebanna yawɨta dala yuya pɨnɨnnanyajɨ sɨmunya kɨma'nyawɨ wa'dejɨ yuya sa wɨwarɨkelyɨ. Nɨgwia wakadɨvɨta bengɨyavɨ nɨgwia yunebanna wa'devaaibɨ' wɨwarɨkelyɨ yuya sa.
Sare' “A'mwe aane pwara kwara sarɨmɨnyɨ kwaasɨ wabwiwayagaalyabwina wɨja'na kwaasɨyavɨ namarulawakɨpɨdɨka!” dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ sarɨmɨjɨ mihye'mwannamwaalyɨge. Aawa. Nɨmɨre kuryai sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalɨka. Sareinyɨ yɨlaaya yadɨ dara wangamanɨge' “Ai, avaaizɨmunya ye'mwannamwaaidɨvɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna kuna lɨmwaga'manɨgasaihi daaka!” Sara dadɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yagɨyagɨ naanga yadɨnyainyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai Naangerɨ mena maaretabaai sahwarɨ nayaa kuna jamarila!

Yɨ yɨsai kwaakevakɨ dɨragɨnna yɨnɨgɨdavadaa'devaai sahwarɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna kuna dɨthaayɨla! Yɨ ange' kutayɨta dɨragɨnyaraavɨ a'ba dɨragɨnna maredaa'devaai sahwarɨ naanga jɨvaimwannyɨla! Yɨ sɨnnawɨ Epapɨraazai yagaala yuya' yɨhɨzɨwaakakabaaibɨ' yagaala daza' dɨragɨnna kuna dana jawɨrila! “Naanga nebulyasɨ.” Gotɨyarɨ yuyagaa' “Su! Su!” kuna dɨragɨnna wɨdɨ wɨja jɨla!

Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! A'mwe aane pwai kwai gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨnya'neihɨrɨ wɨla nyɨhiramwaaihadɨka! Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhusɨnna yagaala yawɨsabwi yɨhɨzɨwaakade' kwaasɨ nayɨhɨthathɨka! Yawɨta sabwi kunebulyɨ. Kwaasɨyabulyɨ. Kune sare' darevɨnyɨ. Aanga'mwe gaveraavɨrebulyɨ. Kwaakevakɨya dala pɨbwina pɨbwinanyajɨ kɨmaakɨyaburajɨ sabwi wɨjɨwaakyabulyɨ. Kwaasɨya sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne majadɨvɨsabulyɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ Gotɨyai yunebanna wɨmwaalake'na kwaasɨya sa wɨla nayɨhiramwaaihadɨka!
Sahwarɨ wɨlamwaaihasa'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna yɨhɨmwaalɨke'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai maremwaaidɨvɨta yuyarajɨ dɨragɨnya yuyarajɨ saraavɨ munyaba mwaalɨkelyɨ.

Sahwarɨ wɨlamwaaihasavɨ sarɨmɨre kɨlaaka gurya da'nɨkerabɨsaihi yɨma'ne'. Sa aagɨlaakajɨkɨne mɨka! Asasɨ gurya yɨhɨthavetaihi mɨka! Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨta yuyabwi sɨmunya yawakevɨne sabwi mena yuna dawasɨ'nakelyɨ. Yɨ sɨmunya dazabwi kuna mihɨmaremwaalyɨkeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ daza' kɨlaaka gurya daya nebulyabulyɨ.

Sarɨmɨre bavɨtaazɨyavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ ye'mwannabaleva sahwalyɨ ye'mwannayɨhilɨkyɨrakaka sahwalyɨ ye'mwannayɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya yɨhyakeihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna yake' lɨmwagaresavɨ sara yɨhya'. Yɨ sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavake' lɨmwagaresavɨnyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ sɨnnawɨ yɨwetawakya yesavɨjɨ sarɨmɨre kɨlaaka gurya da'nɨkeihi mamwaalyadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya yawɨsabwi yɨhɨmaremwaalakevɨjɨ sarɨmɨre kuryara bainɨkeihɨlyɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ gaala ye'mwannamwaalya'neihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihakeihɨlyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai nemɨre yɨwetawakya yuya nemarasɨ'nadelyɨ.

Kɨwɨnya yuya dɨnɨkengɨya nemɨnyɨ “Walamarakɨma!” dada pɨkarɨyɨkwia nemɨnyɨne tɨvɨkɨsa' kotɨyavɨ wɨlagalapwelɨmwagata sa' neduimwagasɨ'nakesɨ. Pɨkarɨyɨkwia sa' nemɨnyɨjɨ gamɨnyɨjɨ tɨnnyaba wa'dɨsɨya' makwokesɨ. Sahɨrɨ' yɨsavɨri maratamarɨmwia neyakesɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨsavɨ balakevɨ yunebanna yɨ'mwannakesɨ.

Dɨragɨnya maremwaaidɨvɨta kayaa'nanyaraavɨrejɨ ejelɨya naangera kayaa'nanyaraavɨrejɨ marasɨ'nakelyɨ. Nabaai yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwaraavɨ wavɨlavaka yuyaraayaba maalɨkeraavɨ wɨmwaaihakere.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai kwai yaasɨwa'na kuna yɨhɨzɨdavaja' sahwarɨ kadɨka mu'nɨpɨna! Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka wapaaya tɨka nyabwinajɨ aalya pɨnɨjɨ nyabwinajɨ kwarame munnegaa'najɨ lawe mudɨkikɨnajɨ kwazaakegaa'najɨ dɨhɨnyɨrayɨla!

Yuya daza Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne dɨviya'ne nawɨ'nya yɨma'nya'nenna a'mabaalyangɨ. A'mwere kɨlaakejɨ' widavadaa'nyɨ gamɨre a'mabaala saamɨnya' sɨnnawɨ waamanɨke'bɨsasɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai kɨlaakejɨkɨra. Sahwai nawɨ'nya nebulya'nanya aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ.

Nabaai pwai kwai yaasɨwa'na kuna yɨhɨzɨdavaja' dɨhɨnyɨrayɨla! Gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yawɨ'da sarɨmɨnyɨ marulawakya'na “Ejelɨyaraavɨ yɨlaaya jɨla!” yɨhɨthazarɨ dɨhɨnyɨrayɨla! Sare sai wajavɨ tɨnna bangana'de pɨnɨnna dazavɨjɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunya yawakeburɨ sara yawɨ'de'na yaasɨwa'na pihadɨka yajavɨjɨ sahwarɨ dɨhɨnyɨrayɨla!

Sahwai sara yada Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre Mɨnyagɨnya nebulyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'derɨ yagalya'mavakelyɨ. Mɨnyagɨnya kumɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨkaavɨna wɨgaimwada dahaalyajɨ wɨrɨlyajɨ kɨlaakejɨkaavɨya yunebanna yɨ'nɨkengɨ yunebanna nayaa yadevaaibɨ' Gotɨyare sɨmunyavɨ nemɨre Mɨnyagɨnyai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ'na gamɨnyɨ kusɨlaanyainaavɨ kuryara naanga yɨma'nɨpɨ'de'na sara nemwaaihadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Mɨnyagɨnya sarɨ yagalya'mavakelyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ mena ye'mwannabalesavɨdaa'nyɨ Kwaaka davakɨya kɨmaakɨyabwi mɨdɨnya'neihi mamwaalyɨgasaihɨlyɨ. A'mwe bainɨkei gamɨre tɨvɨkɨta yuyanna yagalya'mavakabaaibɨ' mamwaalyɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe Kwaaka davakɨyara mwaaihatabaaibɨ' mamwaaibɨnera! Kɨwɨnya sasara dɨnɨkengɨ dalaangewɨ dula'naride' be'nanaka!
Pwai dara kwaasɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨ' “Sare malɨmwadɨnna! Sare aalya' sare tɨka wapaaya managaangadɨnna! Asi mime'nɨnna!” Sasara yɨhɨthɨvanɨka kɨmaakɨya ya'neihi mamwaaibɨnera!
Yuya daza nemɨ nadaawori mena yɨmaanyɨna yadengɨra. Sɨwalɨkevɨnengɨ. Kuryaraavɨne mɨka! Yuya kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka daza yune a'mwerana yadɨvɨ' yune a'mweraavɨre wɨjɨwaakyangɨra. Gotɨyare mɨka!

“Kɨwɨnya sasara dɨnɨka sa wawɨnya dɨragɨnna yade, yɨ yune a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyaburɨ lotuyavɨna nemɨnyɨ yɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya'najɨ yɨ nemɨ saina kwaakewɨ mwaalya'najɨ yɨ nemɨnyɨ marulawakya'neina nemɨre kɨlaakejɨ' mala tannya'najɨ sare'na a'mwera ‘Sabwi sɨmunya tewaanya kɨnɨnnakesɨ,’ ” yawɨpɨkajɨnyɨra. Sare' kɨrɨ' sɨmunya yawakeburɨya saburɨ walamarakya'na sabwi nemɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na negaimwagathevwi mɨ'. Aawa. Sabwi kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunya yawakeburɨ yɨdɨkavɨmwaaida pihadɨkebwi yɨma'naabadevulyɨ. Sare'na kadɨka mu'nɨpɨnera!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ mena kihye'mwannayɨdɨkaava' sarɨmɨ gaala mwaaihasavɨ munya ke'banyanna dɨvɨrila! Munya dazaba Kɨraazɨtɨyai mwaalɨkelyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyare aangasɨryaba nawɨ'nyaba dɨragɨnnakeba mwaalɨkelyɨ.
Yuyagaa' munya ke'banyanna kuna jawɨrila! Kwaaka davakɨya gavengɨna sɨmunya kuna myawɨpɨna!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ mena bainɨkeihi, yawakebwi yagalya'mavesaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨre gaalyabwi Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ Gotɨyaryaba kɨma'nyawɨ ye'mwannarɨkesɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨre gaalyabwina aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Dɨvi sagaa' ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathehaa' sarɨmɨ sahwalyɨ Gotɨyare byaanna naangevɨna je'mwannayɨma'naabyideihɨlyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya sɨmunyavɨ Kwaaka davakɨyaburɨne yuya yɨhwarɨka sabwi yɨnahu dɨramakyɨla! Nɨmɨ dare sabwina dɨvanɨge. Kayaa'nanya gɨrɨkita'nanya yabulyɨ, jɨlɨkera yabulyɨ, sɨmunya' dɨkaa'da kayaa'nanyannebulyɨ, kayaa'nanyangɨna wɨvu'nya'nebulyɨ gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ nɨgwiajɨ sangɨ tɨganaarya dɨragɨnna yabulyɨ, sarengɨra. Tɨganaarya dɨragɨnya sa' kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨ yɨlaaya maryabulyɨ.
Yuya sarenna yadɨvɨsaraavɨna Gotɨyai gamɨre sɨnna tɨkebwi tɨvɨkɨsa'ne daanga wɨjaavadelyɨ. Sarevɨ sasare sabwi mipɨna!
Nabaai sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' sarɨmɨ kwaihi a'mwe sasare dazarajɨ ye'mwannamwaaidɨvɨsagaa' sasare saburɨ yamaryesaihɨlyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' dahaa' sarɨmɨ yuya darebwi nayaa dɨmarakyɨla! Sɨnna tɨkebulyɨ mayagaala yarai javulyɨ sɨmunya' kayaa'na yabulyɨ bɨraiyagaala javulyɨ sarɨmɨre maangevɨ maa'maayagaala javulyɨ.
Sarɨmɨre sɨrya'mweraavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala mudɨpɨnera! A'mwe yawakeburɨyaihɨre yawɨsabulyɨ nabaai sasare yabulyɨ

mena yɨraipurakeva a'mwe mudɨkeburɨyaihɨre yawɨsabwi mena baazɨ'ma'nesavɨ yuya sabwi mipɨnera! Gotɨyai a'mwe mudɨka dazarɨ wɨmwaaidelyɨ. Sahware sɨmunya mudɨke' wakada mudɨkerɨ kuna wɨmwaaidelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ nebulya'na yawɨranganya'nerɨ Gotɨyare kɨma'bwa'nya ke'ba'nanyaibɨ' avaaina wɨmwaaihadelyɨ.

Sareyaba yuyara mudɨkera yɨma'nyɨna. Gɨrikɨyai (Anga Pimagɨnyai) dɨngaka? Juyai dɨngaka? Yɨ kɨlaaka gurya da'nyabulyɨyai dɨngaka? Kɨlaaka gurya mada'nyabulyɨyai dɨngaka? Yɨ sɨkulɨya miwɨrinyakei dɨngaka? Yaalasabwi yadei dɨngaka? Yɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yadei dɨngaka? A'mwe tewaanna mwaaidei dɨngaka? Yuya sare saraavɨ Gotɨyai maa'derera. Naange'na daaka! Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyai yuya maremwaaida yuyaraavɨna sabwi avaainanyabwi wiakelyɨ. Sarevɨne'na a'mwe dala nabinya yuya sareraavɨ wɨlamwaalɨkelyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ mena yɨhɨthahɨlakakeihi, gamɨnne tewaanyaihi sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨkevɨ darebura dɨvaazɨ'ma'nyɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwaraavɨna kale nayaa yɨhyana! Nayaa bwiwanna jɨla! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi kwaakeba walamarakɨna jɨla! Kave yadɨvɨ' sarɨnnya yaya mamakinyɨ jɨla! Sarɨmɨjɨya pwaraavɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi jɨla!

Kumɨre yagaala nayaa wɨ'nadɨvɨ' kave jɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwai kwai gannya gya'mwerɨ kayaa'nanya yaja pɨrɨ'na yagaala kɨnɨnnakei yɨwetawakya daza' wɨmarasɨ'nana! Yuyaihi sara jɨla! Naangei Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨre yɨwetawakya mena yɨhɨmarasɨ'nakabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ kwaihi nayaa sara jɨla!
Yuya saburaavɨ wɨvu'nya'nebwi wavɨla'devulyɨ. Wɨvu'nya'ne sabwi sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨvaazɨ'makwana! Sara yɨhyade'na nawɨ'nya sabwi yuneba yɨ'mwannada avaaizɨmunya yuyaihɨrɨ goya marirakurakya yɨhyathesɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨna narya wakakevɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ nayaa nebwina mareyɨhɨmwaalana! Sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyaihi kɨlaaka avaala pɨjɨ'na yɨma'nya'neihɨrɨ Gotɨyai kwaamu'nanyabwi maarya'neihɨrɨ jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarake'nanyɨ. Sare'na yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” duzideihɨlyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaalya' sarɨmɨnyɨ nayaa nebwina yuna wɨlayɨhwarana! Sarɨmɨ yawɨta pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya tewaanya yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sarɨnnya sɨrya'mweraavɨ nayaa wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsavɨjɨ “Nayaa kave jɨla!” javada'gaidɨvɨsavɨjɨ yuna wɨlayɨhwarana! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ daata Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” yange'na nayaa wɨdadɨvɨ' daata Saamɨjɨ yɨledaasajɨ kuryaraavɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwagya'ne daasajɨ sajɨ dɨzavada'galyɨla!
Gazasa' daazajɨ gazasa' yaajajɨ sa Naanga Jizaazarɨnevɨ nayaa jɨla! Gamɨnyɨ, Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangerɨ “Su! Su!” nayaa wɨdadɨvɨ' sara nayaa jɨla!
Balaangengihi, sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihasavɨ Gotɨyare yɨda'maraangebwi yɨpɨnevɨ sarɨnnya a'mweraayawɨ dalaangewɨ nayaa dula'narila!
Kwalaangeihi, sarɨnnya a'mwengɨna kale yɨhyana! Yɨ sahɨnɨngɨ kayaa'na yadɨvɨ' kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ kayaa'na nyuigaibɨthɨka!
Kaimɨraayamɨlɨki, sɨrɨnɨmaanga sɨrɨnaangengɨre yagaalyangɨ yuya sangɨna nayaa dɨmɨdɨnyɨla! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihasavɨ sare' Gotɨyarɨ wigaidevɨnyɨ.
Kuvɨnɨmaangeihi, maiyagaala mudɨpɨna! Sara kyapɨjɨ nayaa mamɨdɨnyɨ nyɨpɨka! Nyagalya'mapɨdɨka!

Yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaihi wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨsaihi, sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya maremwaalyaraavɨre yagaalya yuya sangɨna nayaa dɨmɨdɨnyɨla! “Wawɨnya nawɨ'nya yɨvanɨkelyɨra,” yawɨranganya'nenna kumɨre tɨnnyarɨna kwaasɨkuna nyɨpɨka! Aawa. Naangerɨna lɨka nayaa yadɨvɨsavɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi wawɨnya'na nayaa yɨda'na warana! Sareihi nayaa dɨmɨdɨnyɨla!
Wawɨnya gazasa' yaaja sahɨnɨ wawɨnya ya'na sarɨmɨre kuryarajɨ dɨragɨnna jɨla! A'mweraavɨ wɨdaaya'nebaaibɨ'na mɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ wɨdaaya'neihi jɨla!

Sarɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨga' “Dɨvi sagaa' Naangei nemɨnyɨ tɨvɨkɨta nejaavadelyɨ.” Tɨvɨkɨta sarɨmɨ maarya'ne daza' Gotɨyai mena dahɨlakakesɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai, sarɨmɨre Naangerɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Wɨdaayadei yɨwetawakya yadei, sai gamɨre kayaa'nanya yade dazabwine tɨvɨkɨta maaradelyɨ. A'mwe sara yadɨvɨta sabwina avaaina maryawɨbwa'delyɨ. Pwaraavɨ gevwi maryawɨbwa'dei mɨ'.

Maremwaalyaihi, wawɨnya yɨhɨthaayadɨvɨta yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨ tewaanya nayaa yɨda'maraangebwinajɨ tɨvɨkɨta avaainanyajɨ jɨla! Dara jawɨrila! “Nabaai nemɨ Naangerɨ kwaakewɨ mwaidaa sahwaraavɨ nayaa maremwalaana! Nemɨnyɨjɨ Naangei nemɨre marenemwaaidei Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨka!” Sarevɨ nayaa sara jɨla!
Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨjavurɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwagarila! Naangerɨ yɨdaanganyavɨ nayaa pada'galayawɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” duzɨla!

Nabaai Gotɨyarɨ wɨjahaa' nemɨ sainaavɨ dara negaimwagathe'na jɨthaanganyɨla! “Gotɨyare yagaalya' Apozelɨyara wɨjɨwaakya'neraavɨne kaadihɨsa' wɨbaasana! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya' wɨdɨpɨka!” dapɨjɨ sara jɨthaanganyɨla! Nebula daza' wɨdevɨna kalavuzavɨ wɨla nyɨrakesavɨ sara duzɨla!
Nebula daza' wɨdɨwɨjavaaibɨ' nɨmɨ ku'maayaba nayaa jalɨkurakɨdeinyɨna Gotɨyarɨ jɨthaanganyɨla!
Sarɨmɨ sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨ' a'mwe mwasɨlaanyaraavɨ Naangerɨ malɨmwagarigasaraayaba kaanya nayaa jamarila! Yuyagaa' sara jɨla! Yɨrɨkerɨka yaasɨwa'na nabothɨka!

Sarɨmɨre yagaalya yuyagaa' yanga'ne tewaanaange wɨdadaapi saaiyɨkunaabwia'bɨ' waburya kuna wima'nana! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨre lɨmwangebwina a'mwe gazarɨzarɨ yagaalya ayɨna ja'nawɨja' sarɨmɨ kuna yɨnɨga wi'na yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ.

Nɨmɨnyɨna nyɨma'naabade yuya sanna Tɨkikaazai sarɨmɨnyɨna bayɨhɨzɨwaakadelyɨ. Sahwarɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadelyɨ. Sai nemɨnyɨne negaimwadevwi dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sarei nemɨjɨ Naangerɨ ye'mwannawɨdaayadelyɨ.

Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna nɨmɨ maryasɨvanaabɨhe yune dathahɨrɨwaai ya'nei. Yɨ “Apozelɨyara gatha'dara dahamwaaihava!” dapɨjɨ dɨneyawɨranganyide'na. Yɨ sahwai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwanga yɨhyade'nanyɨ.
Sahwarɨjɨ Wonɨzɨmaazarɨ maryasɨvanaabɨhelyɨ. Sahwai neya'mwe nebulyalyɨ. Sarɨna nevu'nadelyɨ. Sahwai sarɨmɨnyawɨdaa'nyalyɨ. Sahwaraai adava yɨma'nɨwaka yuya sanna sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨzɨkaderaalyɨ.

Aarɨzɨtaakazai nɨmɨjɨ kalavuzavɨ nye'mwannamwaalɨkei sarɨmɨnyɨ “Nya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨ'. Nabaai Maakɨyai Baanavaazare gahimɨlaangei “Nya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨ'. Sahwarɨna yagaala yɨhɨthasaabevɨ, sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mavajarɨ nayaa dɨmaaryidelyɨ.

Jizaazai, Jaazɨtazai wo'nɨkei kwalyɨ “Nya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨ'. Juyaraavɨre yɨsavaakɨdaa'nyɨ dazahwarana nɨmɨjɨ Gotɨyare maremwaaide' naanga gɨriwange'na ye'mwannayadaanyarera. Sara nyadɨvɨ' nyɨvaimwadɨvɨsainyɨ.

Epapɨraazai sarɨmɨnyawɨdaa'nyai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨne yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai “Nya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨ'. Yuyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨ gaimwange'na Naangerɨ yɨdaanganya'na yagɨyagɨ naanga yadelyɨ. Sai Gotɨyarɨ “Sahwara a'mwe nebulyara dɨragɨnna daaya'na wɨmwaaihana! Sarevɨ kumɨre sɨmunyabwi yuya Gotɨyare yawɨta sangɨ nayaa nebwina yawɨranganya'na wɨmwaaihana!” dada yɨdaangadelyɨra.
Sahwarɨ mena wangadɨnyainyɨ dara jalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Sai sarɨmɨnyɨne'najɨ Layothɨzɨya mwaalyaraavɨnajɨ Yɨyaraapolɨzɨ mwaalyaraavɨnajɨ yuna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'da yagɨyagɨ yadelyɨ.
Lukɨyai, dotarɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadelyɨ Dimaazalyɨ saraai “Nehɨrya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨgi.
Nɨmɨnyɨna neya'mweraavɨ Layothɨzɨya mwaalyaraavɨ “Nya'mweihi!” duthaawila! Nabaai Nibaavɨjɨ gamɨre angevɨ Naangere kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨjɨ “Nya'mweihi!” nɨmɨnyɨna duthaawila!

Nabaai pɨkarɨyɨkwia daza' sarɨmɨnyaba mena danganapɨjɨ Layothɨzɨya mwaalyara Naangere kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨna sara kwarajɨ dangabɨ'de'na jaasidesɨ. Nabaai pɨkarɨyɨkwia Layothɨzɨyaraavɨne' yaasɨvanɨge' sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ nayaa dɨthanganyɨla!
Nabaai Aakipaazarɨ dara duzɨla! “Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaihɨnyavɨ wawɨnya' maaragɨnya' nayaa javada'gainana! ‘Yune'na nayaa nebwina yɨma!’ da'gɨzɨ sara ja!”

Polɨnyɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ “Nya'mweihi!” yɨda'manɨgesɨ. “Pɨkarɨyɨkwia daza' Polɨ neyasɨwaabɨka!” yawɨsa'na nɨmɨre asasɨ yɨda'manɨge. Kalavuzangevɨ kuna mwaaiheinyɨna nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ duzɨla! Naangere yanga gaimwangebwi sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannarana!

Polɨnyɨ Saailaazalyɨ Timotilyɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwia da' yavɨkariwa. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwange'neihi kusɨlaanyavɨyaihɨrɨna yavɨkariwa. Gotɨyai Nɨmwarɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨ' Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨsaihɨrɨna yavɨkariwesɨ.
Gotɨyai yange'na tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwagana! Gotɨyare kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhwarana!
Yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaanyagaa' “Su! Tezalonaaika mwaalyara gɨmɨreraavɨna yɨlaaya gɨmarivanɨgo,” wɨdadaanyɨ. Nabaai, yuyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaanyɨ.

Sareina nemɨre Gotɨyai Nɨmwarɨ wɨdadaa “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ sara lɨmwadɨvɨsa'na tewaanyabwi sara yɨvanɨgava. Gɨmɨnyɨ yɨlaaya yadaapɨjɨ a'mweraavɨna kale wiadaa'nyɨya'na tewaanya mɨraagɨkɨ'manɨgava. ‘Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai walaabathelyɨ,’ dadɨvɨ' yemwaaidɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna daa'manɨgava. Su! Su!” Gotɨyarɨ sara wɨdadaanyɨ.
Sare' neya'mweihi nayaa dara yawɨ'mwo. “Gotɨyarɨ Tezalonaaika mwaalyaraavɨna kale wiadelyɨ. Nabaai sahwaraavɨna ‘Nɨnnyarera,’ dahɨlakɨwakelyɨ,” sara yawɨ'mwo.

Sare'na Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨthonegaa' yaasɨwa' yagaalya'na mɨ'. Aawa. Kurya Tewaanyai dɨragɨnaangei dɨragɨnyainaavɨ kanemwaaiha' dɨragɨnna kyɨhɨtho “Yagaala nebulya yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo,” sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwage'. Sagaa' sarɨmɨ dara yawɨre', “Wɨdasaabadera nemɨjɨ mwaaleva tewaanna negaimwamanɨga'. Sarera nemɨnyɨna neyɨvanɨgasare.”

Sareina yadaawojɨ sarɨmɨ avaaina yage'. Nabaai, Naangei yakabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ avaaina yage'. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' maaresa'na kayaa'nanaanga yɨhye'. Sare' kɨrɨ' sarɨnnya munyɨkaavɨ Kurya Tewaanyai wɨlayɨhɨmwaaidɨsɨ gamɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' yagaala sa' maaresaihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ tewaanna yadɨvɨ' Kwaaka Maazathonɨya mwaalyarajɨ Kwaaka Gɨriza mwaalyarajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ sarɨmɨ tewaanna dara wɨjɨwaainesa' “O, Kɨraazɨtɨyareina sana sana yaanneina daaka!”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Naangere yagaala wɨdadaapɨjɨ sarɨmɨreba Maazathonɨya yagaala sa' dɨwɨna yaka Kwaaka Gɨriza dɨwɨna. Gavebanyaaina dɨwɨya'ne'na mɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨna a'mwera kadɨka wɨ'neta yuyaba dara wɨ'nesasɨ. “Tezalonaaika mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwamanɨgasare.” Sara deva savɨna nemɨ yagaala pɨnɨ wɨja'ne wawɨnya' mwari'.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨ sara nemɨnyɨ nedɨvanɨga' “Sarɨmɨ Tezalonaaika mwaalyaraavɨ angyɨrɨ'maata kye' tewaanna yɨhɨma'mwa'daa'. Yɨhɨma'mwa'daasara kumɨre kulaka ge gengɨjɨ kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨjɨ yagalya'maveva Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨmwa'daa'. ‘Gotɨya Nebulyarɨ wɨdayaadelyɨ yuyagaa' gaala mwaaidei.

Sɨgunyavɨdaasɨ Gotɨyare Gawaalɨ' walaabathe'na yemwalaana!’ sara dadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨmwa'daa'. Gotɨyare Gawaalɨ' Jizaazalyɨ. Sai kabala' Gotɨyai yɨdɨkaava'. Yɨdɨkaavakei ‘Dɨvi Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨna sɨmɨlɨka nuladɨka!’ daka padaihasamaara'.” Yuyara sara nedɨvanɨga'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Neya'mweihi, sahwaihi dara yawɨ'mwaa' “Nemɨnyawɨnna Wɨdasaabadera Apozelɨyara angyɨrɨ'maata beva yagaala dɨragɨnya kanede' dɨnona ‘Yagaala kune' mɨ'. Nemɨ mɨdɨnaana!’ ”

Nabaai dara yawɨ'mwaa' “Anga Pilipaai a'mwera Apozelɨyaraavɨ kayaa'na yeva bɨrala wiesarera.” Sagaa' daanga kanevɨna' kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bona nemɨre Gotɨyai dɨragɨnya nemwaaihakeina lɨka myɨ yona Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨtho. Pwara nede' “Sabwi mujɨwaakɨpɨna! Mala nayɨhɨramaadɨka!” Sa'na yawɨrona kɨrɨ' lɨka myona dɨragɨnna yɨhɨtho.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sareina yawɨta kayaa'nanya' malɨmwagyadaa gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi myadaa kwaasɨ myɨhɨzadaa Gotɨyarɨna yɨhɨzɨwaako.

Nemɨ kayaa'na myo. Aawa. Gotɨyai dɨna “Sahwaraavɨ yaamɨjɨ mi'na a'mwe sara nɨmɨre wawɨnya' tewaanna yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ,” dakabaaibɨ' gamɨre yagaalya' damaarya'neina nemwaaiha'. Sare'na damaryadaa myawɨri “A'mweraavɨ yɨlaaya wigalaana!” Aawa. “Gotɨyai nemɨre sɨmunya wangaderɨ yɨlaaya wigalaana!” dadaa wɨjɨwakadaanyaine.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna wabwiwayagaalyasɨ mabyo. Yuyagaa' wabwiwayagaala myɨhɨzo. Sara yawɨ'mwaava. Sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa maarya'na kwaasɨ yɨhɨthoina mɨ'. Wabarɨnnya' lɨka yulyarya'na yɨhɨthoina mɨ'. Sare' Gotɨyai jalɨkurakɨvanɨkelyɨ.

Nabaai, majɨna “Tezalonaaika mwaalyara yawɨpɨka! ‘Wɨdasaabadera byaannakera.’ A'mwe pwarajɨ sara yawɨpɨka!” sara majɨ yona yɨhɨtho. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare Nedasaabadeinaavɨna “A'mwe naangere,” wɨja' tewaanyasɨ Naangereinaavɨne'na.
Sara mwaaihoina kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyawɨ mwaalona nayaa kave yɨhyo. Kuvɨnaange' gannya kaimɨraayangɨ maremwaaidevaaibɨ' nayaa kave yɨhyo.
Sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya sara nevu'nade'na Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨtho. Sare' gave'na mɨ'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nevu'nade'na dara do. Tezalonaaika mwaalyaraavɨ wɨgaimwagaaza'na balaade'nanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Neya'mweihi, nemɨ yawɨ'na “Tezalonaaika mwaalyaraavɨre wapaaya saza nagainadɨka! Aane pwai kwarɨ taanga nujavaadɨka! Nemɨnyɨne wapaaya sazanne nɨgwianna wawɨnya yaana!” Sara yawɨ'na yona Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' yɨhɨthadaawojɨ tɨnna dara wanganesa' “O, Wɨdasaabadera, Apozelɨyara wawɨnya naanga mɨraagɨkɨ'manɨgasara daaka! Sawɨsagaa' yɨrɨkegaa' yɨvanɨgasara daaka!”
Sarɨmɨ tɨnna nengadɨvɨ' Gotɨyalyɨ dara jalɨkurake' “Nemɨnyɨna Wɨdasaabadera tewaanyabwi yadɨvɨ' yɨda'maraangebwi nayaa yadɨvɨ' yɨwetawakyabwi myɨvanɨgasarera.”

Sareina kyo yɨ, ganɨmaanga pwai gannya kaimɨraayangɨ nayaa yadevaaibɨ' nemɨ sarɨmɨjɨya gazarɨzarɨ nayaa yɨhyo'na yawɨ'mwaa'. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunya tewaanna yɨhivaimwagona sarɨmɨre kuryara dɨragɨnna mwaalya'na yɨhɨthadaa dɨragɨnna dara yɨhɨzalɨkurako.

Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Sahwaraavɨ maremwaalɨdeinyɨ,” yawɨ'na yaka sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakelyɨ. “Nɨnnya byaannyavɨjɨ nawɨ'nyaba maremwaaidɨnyavɨjɨ wɨmwaaihɨma!” Gotɨyai sara yɨhɨthahɨlakakerɨna sarɨmɨ nayaa jamarila! Dɨragɨnna sara yɨhɨtho.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Gotɨyare yagaala kyɨhɨtho newɨ'neva myawɨrina “Yagaala a'mweraavɨnesɨ.” Aawa. Yagaala sa' sarɨmɨ maarɨna yeva yawɨ'na “Gotɨyare yagaala nebulyasɨ.” Sara deva Gotɨyare yagaala nebulya' warɨke'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna yɨhɨzɨwaakɨvanɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsaihi. Sara yesa'na yɨlaaya yona yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaanyɨ. Su! Su!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Neya'mweihi, Kwaaka Juthɨya mwaalyara Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyaraavɨne mɨdɨdɨvɨsaihi yɨma'ne'. Yɨ sahwaraavɨ kayaa'na yetabaaibɨ' pwara kayaa'na sara yɨhyesaihɨlyɨ. Juyara kumɨreba Kɨraazɨtɨya Jizaazareraavɨ kayaa'na yetabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨre kwaakevɨ mwaaidɨvɨsara kayaa'na yɨhyesaihɨlyɨ.

Juya sahwara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasara pɨropetɨyaraavɨ tamakeva Naanga Jizaazarɨ tamakeva nabaai nemɨnyɨ neramaase'. Sare'na kumɨrebwi Gotɨyai tɨnna wanganaka yɨlaaya mya'. Yɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨne yɨkamaangere.

Sahwara yawɨ'na “Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ Apozelɨyara nudɨpɨdɨka! Gotɨyai Maaveraavɨ navadaihasamaaradɨka!” deva nede' “Dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨwo ‘Yagaala sa' mujɨ jideihɨlyɨ. Nayɨhɨramaadɨka!’ ” Sara yadɨvɨ' a'mwe yuyaraavɨna yɨkamaangera yɨma'nesare. Sarera kunnya kayaa'nanya yune'na yesarera. Kɨrɨ' sareraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ yune'na sɨnna tɨka wɨda'mwakerera.

Neya'mweihi, nemɨ yɨhyagalya'mavona maalɨkegaa' sarɨmɨjɨ mamwaalyo'na sɨgɨraayarabɨsaina yɨma'noinera. Nemɨ maavewɨ mwaidaa kɨrɨ' nemɨre sɨmunya sarɨmɨnyaba yuyagaa' warɨ'. “Sahwaraavɨ tɨnna wanganaana!” dona savɨna nevu'nada dɨragɨnna yaamɨjɨ yaamɨjɨ yo. Maavewɨ mwaaihasa'na kale neyada
sarɨmɨnyɨna byɨrɨ'maasa'na dɨragɨnna yaamɨjɨ yaamɨjɨ yoine. Nabaai, sarevɨna Polɨnyɨ gazagaasagaa' “Tezalonaaikana wɨma!” dena yaamɨjɨ kyo Saataanɨ kaanya nerihɨ'daa'nyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ myɨhwanganyɨwo.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dɨvi Naanga Jizaazai walaabathehaa' gamɨnyawɨ daavɨna yadaa nemɨ yɨlaaya berɨ'na yaadevaka? Be yagaalya' wɨdaathevaka? Naangerɨ yemwaaimanɨgohaa' yɨlaaya aaihwaravaavɨne'na yɨvanɨgona? Sarɨmɨnyɨnanyɨra.
Yo, sare' dare'nesɨ. Gamɨnyawɨ sarɨmɨ daavɨna yadaapɨjɨ nemɨ yɨlaaya yaade'nanyɨ. Nabaai, “Nemɨ sara kyo dahaa' dava mwaaiha',” yawɨrawaajɨ byaannakeina yɨma'naadeihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'daa dɨna “Pɨzɨ'gwa mamwalaanna!” dɨna yona naarɨmɨ yɨlaaya'na dɨna “Anga Aathenɨzɨ gaveinaai mwaalaka!”

Dɨna yola sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Timotirɨ wɨdasaabɨna. Sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarei neya'mwei mwaalaka Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaayadei Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaala tewaanyavɨne avaaiwawɨnyalyɨ. “Tezalonaaika mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨ' kumɨre kuryara nayaa mwaaibɨ'de'najɨ jɨvaimwade'najɨ duzɨwaakya!” wɨdasaabɨna yoi.

“ ‘A'mwera kayaa'na kyɨhyapɨjɨ nyagalya'mapɨdɨka! Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' nayaa dɨlɨmwagyɨla!’ duzɨwaakya!” wɨdasaabɨna yolyainaalyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ dara yawɨ'mwaasa' “Kayaa'na kaneyapɨjɨ nemɨ ‘Wikɨra,’ daaza'na Gotɨyai nedahɨlakakei daaka!”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨ mwaalonegaa' dara yɨhɨtho, “Naangerɨna pwara kayaa'na neyɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.” Sara kyɨhɨtho sara kayaa'na yɨhyɨwaasa' sarɨmɨ yawɨ'mwaa'.

Kayaa'na yɨhyɨwaasavɨ nɨmɨ dɨna “Pɨzɨ'gwa sara mamwaaimuna!” dɨna yena Timotirɨ wɨdasaabɨna. “Tezalonaaika mwaalyara Gotɨyare yagaalya' nayaa dalɨmwamanɨgava?” dɨna. “Yaamɨjɨ yadei Saataanɨ sahwaraavɨ yaamɨjɨ yada kwaasɨ kudɨwa' kayaa'na yɨpɨja'na daaka? Nemɨre wawɨnya yaasɨwa'wawɨnya nyɨma'nadɨka!” dena wɨdasɨwaabe.

Dahaasagaa' sarɨmɨnyawɨdaa'nyɨ Timoti nemɨnyawɨnna baka sarɨmɨnyɨna yagaala tewaanya' makabɨna. “Sahwara Naangerɨ nayaa lɨmwadɨvɨ' pwaraavɨna kale wiadere,” makabɨna yɨwa'. Nabaai nedɨwa' “Nemɨ byɨrɨ'maaro'na yawɨ'dɨvɨ' nemɨnyɨna yɨlaaya kuna yɨvanɨga'. Nemɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'na ‘Tezalonaaika mwaalyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganaana!’ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨgovaaibɨ' sahwara dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨga' ‘Apozelɨyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganaana!’ ” Sara nedɨwa'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dava a'mwera kayaa'na kaneye' taanga neyɨvanɨkesɨ. Taanga neyadaasɨ kɨrɨ' neya'mweihi, sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ nayaa lɨmwamanɨgasa'na yɨvaimwannadaa mwaaiho.
Naangerɨ sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna wɨlamwaaibɨza'na nemɨ dɨragɨnna mwaaiho'nanyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨna kadɨka sara wɨ'nona nemɨre Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨvanɨgo. Sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya naanga yɨvanɨgo'na “Su! Su! Yɨlaaya naanga naanga gɨmarivanɨgo,” Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdadaanyaine.

Sawɨsavɨ yɨrɨkevɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdadaa “Tewaanyaraavɨ tɨnna wanganya'na sawɨnna dɨnemakwona! Nemɨ tɨnna dara wanganaade' ‘O, Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsabwi maalɨ'na yɨvanɨgasabwi daaka!’ Sara dawaajɨ yavada'galya'na dɨnemakwona!” Sara wɨdadaanyainera.
Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangei gamɨ salyɨ nemɨre Naanga Jizaazalyɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna kaanya basamakwika! Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna nemakwika!

Naangei dɨragɨnna yɨhɨgaimwagozɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ yunebanna kale'ne sabwi dɨragɨnna wakana! Sara kyojɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna nemɨnyɨ kale naanga neyɨvanɨkabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwaraavɨnajɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨnajɨ kale naanga yɨhyana! Nabaai, naangave'na kale kuna yɨhyana!

Sara yojɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnna wakɨna kyojɨ dɨvi Naangei Jizaazai gannya tewaanyarajɨ walaabathehaa' Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangeryaba sarɨmɨ nayaa daavɨna jideihɨlyɨ. Sara kyojɨ yɨwetawakya maayaihi tewaanaangeihi nayaa daavɨna jideihɨlyɨ.

Neya'mweihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala pɨnɨ dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthaana! Nemɨ Naanga Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaalona kɨwɨnya dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' dara yɨhɨzɨwaako. Sara mwaalapɨjɨ sana yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wigaibɨ'delyɨ. Sara yɨhɨzɨwaakobaaibɨ' sara yɨvanɨga'. Sara yɨvanɨgasaihi naanga sana sana jɨla!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Naanga Jizaazai kanejɨwaaka' yɨhɨthonna sarɨmɨ yawɨ'mwaa'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare sɨmunyabwi dara yawɨ'manɨ' “Gɨmɨ nɨmɨreigɨ tewaanyaigɨ dɨmwaala! Ata lɨmwangebwi minna!”
Sara yawɨrapɨjɨ gazaigɨzaigɨ gɨnnya balaangevɨ tewaanna dɨmaaka! Yawɨta tewaanyajɨyaigɨ kwala dɨmaaka! “Nɨmɨre a'mwe kwala maake mwaalɨka nawɨ'nya' gave dasɨ mwaalɨma!” da'gɨzɨ dɨmaaka!
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Gotɨyarɨ myawɨryara dɨka widadaa'nyɨyara yaalɨvɨna maa'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' kwala mamaa'dɨnna!
Tewaanyabwi mamarasɨ'nɨnna! Ja'mwerevɨ kuka mamaa'dɨnna! Sabwina sɨnnawɨ jalɨkurakya' naanga yɨhɨtho. Sabura pwara kyapɨjɨ Naangei wɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai myawɨri “Sahwara ata lɨmwangebwi yɨpɨka!” myawɨrya'. Aawa. “Sahwara nɨmɨrera tewaanyara nayaa mwaaibɨka!” yawɨraka nejɨvwaramaarakelyɨ.

Sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ pwai yagaala da' marasɨ'najai a'mweraavɨre yagaalya' mamarasɨ'nyɨvanɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyare yagaalya' marasɨ'nɨvanɨ'. Gotɨyai sahwai gannya Tewaanyai Kuryarɨ yanga nejaavanɨkerevɨ yagaalya' marasɨ'nɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Kale wia'nebwina Gotɨyai sahwaihɨrɨ yɨhɨzɨwaaka' “Saigɨ ja'mwerɨna kale gyana!” Sara kyɨhɨzɨwaaka' sare'na nɨmɨ myavɨkariwɨna!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨreba Kwaaka Maazathonɨya yuneba sɨrya'mweraavɨ yuyaraavɨna kale yɨhyɨvanɨ'. Sareihɨrɨ dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Gazaigɨzaigɨ kale naanga naanga gyana!
Dɨragɨnna dara jawɨka! “Nɨmɨ kave mwaalɨma! Nɨmɨre wawɨnya' kuna maremwaalɨma! Pwaraavɨre wawɨnya kuna mamaremwaaimuna! Wɨdaasadera dɨragɨnna nyɨdetabaaibɨ' nɨnnya asasɨ aawawɨnya yɨma!”
“Pwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne mwasawɨnyaraavɨna wɨjɨwaainya'na kaanya nayaa yamarima! Nabaai aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨvɨna nanyɨgainadɨka!” da'gɨzɨ gɨnnya asasɨ ja! Sara jawɨ'deigɨnyɨ.

Neya'mweihi, nemɨ sɨmunyavɨ yawɨ'na “Kɨraazɨtɨyarera sɨdu'maayara namwaaibɨthɨka! Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwara baimwa'daasaraavɨna wɨjɨwakaana! Naangerɨ mu'nyadɨvɨsara dɨvi Naangei baryaraavɨ yɨdɨkaasa'na myemwaalyadɨvɨsaraavɨ kunnya baryaraavɨna kale wiadevaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ kale nyadɨka!” Yawɨ'na yona sare' yavɨkarivanɨgo.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ dara lɨmwadaanyɨ. Jizaazai balaka ayɨna dɨkaavakelyɨra. “Nebulyasɨ,” dovɨdaa'nyɨ dara dɨna “A'mwera Jizaazarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨ' bainɨkeraavɨjɨ Jizaazarɨjɨ Gotɨyai makwalaabathere!”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Naangei kanejɨwaaka' yagaala sa' dɨragɨnna dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Naangei walaabathehaa' nemɨ kwaihwaainakeina mwalaajaina baryara wa'dapɨri myagalya'mayɨ yawaajɨ sɨnnawɨ myɨlaawi yaadeine. Arɨkawɨ. Baryara dɨkaavapɨjɨ sɨnnawɨ yɨlaawɨpɨ'derera.

Sare'na Naanga sahwai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ waidaavada jaka naanga danganadelyɨ “Jɨkabyɨla!” Sagaa' ejelɨya naangei jaka kudozɨ Gotɨyare gware' makuradesɨra. Naangei jaka naanga kadanganojɨ sɨnnawɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarera baryara dɨkaapɨ'dere.

Nabaai, nemɨ kwaihwaainakeina mwalaadeinajɨ sahwarajɨ sainaavɨ yarai nemakɨlaawadeinera. Sɨgunyavɨ nemɨ Naangerɨ wɨjɨmaata'na yɨraayangɨ nemakɨlaawadeinera. Sara kyojɨ yuyagaa' Naangeryaba mwalaade'nanyɨ.
Sare'na pwaihɨlyɨyarɨ gamɨre baryarɨna kale wiadaa'nyɨ wɨgaimwange'na yagaala da' kave duzɨla!
Neya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨ myavɨkaryaanna! “Sagaa' yɨma'nadehaakɨ. Sana yɨma'nadengɨ.” Sara yawɨsaburɨna mihihainyɨwa'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwaihi mena dara yawɨ'mwaa' “Sawɨsavɨ kukeibɨsai Naangei yarai walaabathehaa' yɨma'nadehaakɨ.”

Pwara yawɨ'na “Dahaa' naryagaa' kwaamu'nanyagaa' tewaanyagaakɨra.” Yawɨ'na yapɨjɨ navɨka mwaalapɨjɨyagaa' kayaaka yarai wigaladerera. Yarai wigalade'na a'mwe sara lɨkaanya mwɨyɨ yɨpɨ'derera. Arɨkawɨ. Mudangegaa' a'mwe' daanga yarai wɨvɨdevaaibɨ' a'mwe saraavɨ kayaaka yarai wigaladerera.

Sa'na kɨrɨ' neya'mweihi, sagaa' yɨma'nadehaa' sarɨmɨ maryaanga myɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Jɨhɨnyawɨ mamwaalyɨgasa'na sɨdu'nakeihi maryaanga myɨ jideihɨlyɨ. Kukei bada a'mweraavɨ maryaanga bivalakadevaaibɨ' sagaa' sɨdu'nakeihɨrɨ maryaanga myɨhyanneihɨlyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨ Baakeihi Yɨrɨkevɨyaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Naangeregaasaihɨlyɨ. Nemɨ jɨhɨnyavɨyaina mɨ'. Nemɨ sawɨsavɨyaina mɨ'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pwarabɨ' se wakatabaaibɨ' naraadɨka! Aawa. Tɨnna nayaa baihanaraana! Sɨmunya nayaa yawɨraana!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwera se wa'dɨvɨsara sawɨsagaa' se wakasare. A'mwera biyaaya nadɨvɨ' yɨmaka widɨvɨsara sawɨsavɨ yɨmaka widɨvɨsagaakɨ.

Sare' nemɨ Naangeregaasaina mwaaihovɨna sɨmunya nayaa yawɨraana! Sareina Romɨyara aawɨlasara saabya yɨvidɨvɨ' mwaaihɨ'nya dɨragɨnya mwaaihɨ'nadɨvɨ' malyagaa' tewaanna mwaaidɨvɨsarabɨsaina mwalaadeinera. Nemɨre saabya' Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyabulyɨ. Nabaai, a'mweraavɨna kale wiadevulyɨ. Sahɨrɨsɨra. Nemɨre mwaaihɨ'nya dɨragɨnya' nemɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai nevadaihasamaaradelyɨ,” yawɨ'na yadaa yemwaaiho.
Gotɨyai majɨ “Saraavɨ maanga wɨdɨma! Mala wɨramɨma!” majɨ yaka newakakelyɨ. Aawa. Gotɨyai dɨna “Sahwaraavɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai padaihasamaaraderera,” dɨna yaka sabwi nejaavake'nanyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨya sahwai nemɨnyɨna balakelyɨ. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna yawɨ'na “Sagaa' walaabathehaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwara baihana'dɨvɨsarajɨ kwaihwaainakerajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwara se baidɨvɨsarajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ mwaaibɨka!” kada' bala'.
Sarevɨna gazaigɨzaigɨ yawɨta nawɨ'nya sa ja'mwerɨ dɨragɨnna jɨvaimwana! Kɨraazɨtɨyarerɨ dɨragɨnyarɨ dɨvada'galayɨvaimwana! Dahaa' yɨvanɨgɨnyabaaibɨ' sara kuna ja!

Neya'mweihi, kɨwɨnya dɨragɨnna yɨhithanganaana! Naangei sarɨmɨjɨyaraavɨ dahɨlaka' “Nɨmɨreraavɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaala!” Sara kadahɨlaka' sahwara yɨhɨzɨwaakadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨre sɨmunya yavada'gaidɨvɨsare. Sahwara sarɨmɨnyawɨ Naangere wawɨnya yadɨvɨsa'na nayaa dara jawɨka! “A'mwe naangere. Nemɨ nayaa wɨdaana!”
Wawɨnya yadɨvɨsa' yawɨra'gɨzɨ kumɨnyɨna yɨlaaya yadɨ dɨmaryawɨka! “Sahwara nemaremwaaidɨvɨsa' tewaanyasɨ.” Sareigɨ Naangereraavɨna avaaizɨmunya'na dɨmwaala!

Neya'mweihi, kɨwɨnya naanga yɨhɨthaana! Sarɨmɨjɨyara wawɨnya myadɨvɨsaraavɨ duzɨwaakya! “Yaasɨwa'na namwaaidɨka! Wawɨnya ja!” Pwaraavɨre kuryara dɨragɨnya maayara lɨka yadɨvɨsaraavɨre kurya dɨragɨnyara dumwaaihya! Pwara sɨmunya dɨragɨnna myawɨryadɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨgaimwange'na nayaa dɨmaremwaala! Yuyaraavɨ kave ja! Nayaa duthana!
Da' jawɨka! Pwai sarɨmɨjɨyarɨ kayaa'na kyojɨ mɨnya mamaaranna! Mɨnya mamaa'dɨnna! Aawa. Sa' dɨragɨnna jawɨka! Tewaanyaburɨ dɨmɨdɨna! Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ tewaanna ja! Yuyaraavɨ tewaanna ja!
Gazagaasagaa' yɨlaaya ja!
Yuyagaa' Gotɨyarɨ duthana!

Pwara kayaa'na gyɨpɨjahaa' pwara tewaanna gyɨpɨjahaa' yɨ yuyangɨ “Su! Su!” Gotɨyarɨ duthana! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sasareigɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai gannya dɨragɨnya' kagɨzaavojɨ Gotɨyai sɨmunya sara gyawɨ'daa'nyɨ “Nɨmɨrera nayaa yɨpɨka!” gɨmɨ sana sana ja!
Kurya Tewaanyarɨ myɨgaa'mwadɨnna!
Sare' Kuryai kudozɨ a'mwera Gotɨyare yagaala kagɨzɨwaakapɨjɨ yaasɨwa'na “Waryaanyasɨ,” madɨnna!
Aawa. Yuyangɨ kadɨka wɨ'na'gɨzɨ nayaa dɨmaryawɨbwaka! “Tewaanyasɨ,” da'gɨzɨ dɨlɨmwagaka!
“Kayaa'nanya gazasa',” da'gɨzɨ dasɨ'nana!

Gotɨyai gamɨ sai kwaamu'nanyabwi kɨnɨnnakei gamɨreihi tewaanyaihɨrɨ yuneba yɨhɨmwaaihana! Sarɨmɨre kuryaraavɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ nayaa maremwaalana! Yuyagaa' sara maremwaaida nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai walaabathehaa' dara wanganade “Ya, nawɨ'nyarera. Yɨwetawakya maayarera.”
Sare' Gotɨyai yɨhɨthahɨlakɨvanɨkei gazagaasagaa' tewaanyabwi yadei sana yɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨ.
Neya'mweihi, nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ duzɨla!
Kɨraazɨtɨyarera neya'mwera yuyaraavɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' nemɨnyɨne'na maangwɨdaayɨlaaya jɨnyɨla!
Naangere dɨragɨnya'na naanna yɨhɨthɨma! Pɨkarɨyɨkwia da' neya'mwera yuyaraavɨ duzɨla!
Yuyagaa' nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yange'na tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwagana! Gannya dɨragɨnya' yanga yɨhɨzaavana!

Polɨnyɨ, Saailaazai, Timoti saina sarɨmɨnyɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwia da' yavɨkariwo. Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaihɨrɨna yavɨkariwo. Gotɨyai nemɨre Nɨmwarɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨ' Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨsaihɨrɨna yavɨkariwo.
Gotɨyai Nɨmwalyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yange'na yɨhɨgaimwagika! Gotɨyare kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhwakika!

Neya'mweihi, Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaaza' “Yuyagaa' Tezalonaaika mwaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨna ‘Su! Su!’ gɨthaana!” Nemɨre wɨdaazabwi sabwi tewaanyabulyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ yawɨralɨmwangebwi naanna kuna yadɨvɨsa'najɨ gazaigɨzaigɨ sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyarɨ kale naanga kuna gyade'najɨ nemɨre wɨdaazabwi tewaanyabulyɨ.

Sareihɨrɨna nemɨ yɨlaaya yadaa Gotɨyare kusɨlaanya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ yarai wɨdɨna “Pwara kayaa'na yadaapɨjɨ Tezalonaaika mwaalyara Naangerɨna dɨragɨnna mwaaihasare. Sahwaraavɨ taanga wiadaa'nyɨ Naangerɨ nayaa lɨmwamanɨgasare.” Sara wɨdadaa yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgoihɨlyɨ.

Sarɨmɨjɨ nayaa dara dɨmanɨgo. Ya, Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna yɨda'maraangebwina tewaanna yadelyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yawɨ'na “Gotɨyai nayaa nemaremwaalana!” yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' pwara kayaa'na yɨhyɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sare'na Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Ya, nebulyasɨ. Sahwara nɨmɨre maremwaaidɨnyaba maapɨnera tewaanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihere.”
Pwara kayaa'na yɨhyɨvanɨgasara sahwaraavɨ Gotɨyai mɨnya maa'da kayaa'na wiadelyɨ. Sara yade'na sahwai yawɨ'na “Yɨda'nanyasɨ.”

Gotɨyai mɨnya maaradehaa' nemɨnyɨjɨ kayaa'na yɨhyɨvanɨgasaihɨrɨjɨ gannya kwazaakevɨ nemwaaihadelyɨ. Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Naanga Jizaazai gannya ejelɨya dɨragɨnyarajɨ yɨma'naabɨna yadehaa' gannya kwazaakevɨ nemwaaihadelyɨ. Yɨma'naabɨna yadehaa' dɨtaalɨta naangengɨ walaabɨna yojɨ
pwara Gotɨyarɨna “Naangelyɨ,” majaraavɨ nabaai, nemɨre Naanga Jizaazare yagaala tewaanya' malɨmwagaryaraavɨ yuna mɨnya maa'da kayaa'na wiadelyɨ.

Sahwaraavɨ yuyagaa'na Gotɨyai marajawɨbwa'na kyojɨ sahwara tɨvɨkɨta maa'dɨvɨ' Naangeryaba mamwaalyɨ yɨpɨ'dere. Naangei dɨragɨnna mwaaladevɨ byaannyavɨ tɨnna mwanganyɨ yɨpɨ'dere. (Yuyagaa' maavewɨ mwaaidɨvɨ' daanga naangevɨ mwaaibɨ'dere.)

Yɨrɨka savɨ walaabathehaa' gannya tewaanyara yɨlaaya'na wɨdɨna “Naangeigɨnyɨra. Byaannakeigɨnyɨ.” Sagaa' gamɨre dɨragɨnya' tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ gamɨre yagaala tewaanya' lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsara atɨka maru'napɨ'dere. Sahwara yɨlaaya yadaapɨjɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya jideihɨlyɨ. Nemɨre jalɨkurakya' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna lɨmwagesa'na saba yɨlaaya jideihɨlyɨ.

Sare' yawɨ'daa yuyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadaanya'nesɨ. Nemɨre Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨna dara yawɨrana! “Sahwara nɨmɨre wɨjɨvwaramaarya'ne tewaanyara mwaaibɨka! Nabaai tewaanyabwi yɨlaaya nyɨgaide gazabwizabulyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagasaburɨne wawɨnya gazasasɨ nɨmɨre dɨragɨnyavɨ yune'na yɨpɨka!” da'mujɨ sareraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma! “Sara yawɨrana!” dona wɨdadaanyɨ. Sara wɨdadaanyasɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna.

Gamɨre dɨragɨnyasɨ sarɨmɨ nayaa yapɨjɨya'na pwara dara wangabɨ'de' “O, Jizaazai Naangei daaka! Byaannakei daaka! Gannyara naangera daaka! Byaannakera daaka!” Nemɨre Gotɨyalyɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ yange'na yɨhɨgaimwadi' tewaanna yɨhyadisa'na sara yawɨpɨ'devɨnyɨra.
Neya'mweihi, nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai walaabazagaa' Naangelyɨ yuyaina yɨ'bwa'nawaajɨ yɨrakuraade'na nayaa yɨhɨthaana!

Pwai kwaasɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨ' “Naangere yɨrɨke' marajawɨbwarya'ne' mena yɨma'nɨwakegaakɨ.” Sara kwaasɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨkere yagaalya'na sarɨmɨ yarai lɨka myɨpɨna! Sɨmunya kwalaalya yarai myawɨpɨna! Sai wɨdɨna “Kuryai sara kanyɨdɨwakɨra,” yɨhɨthɨvanɨka. Sai yawɨraka yɨhɨthɨvanɨka. Sai wɨdɨna “Pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ Polɨ sara kanedɨwakɨra,” yɨhɨthɨvanɨka yuya sa kadɨka mwɨ'nɨpɨna!

Sasarebwi kwaasɨyabwi myɨhɨzɨwaakanna! Arɨkewɨ. Naangei walaabya'negaa' yarai yɨma'nadehaa' mɨ'. Aawa. Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' a'mwera Gotɨyarɨna maa'na wiada Gotɨyare yawɨsabwi marasɨ'nɨpɨ'dehaa'na yɨma'nadesɨ. Nabaai, kayaa'nanaangei a'mweraayaba yɨma'naabɨna yadesɨ. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ Naangei walaabyahaakɨ. Kayaa'nanaangei kɨwɨnya kayaaka yɨgaidelyɨ. Dɨvi sai Dɨkevɨ Kayaa'nanyaba yuyagaa' mwaaladelyɨ.

Sai dozɨ “Gaveinyɨ naangeinyɨ,” dozɨ dɨna “Nyɨlyarɨ yɨsaraavɨ sɨlyaraavɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsabwi kayaaka yɨgalɨma! Marasɨ'nɨdevulyɨ. Kwaiyɨma'nyajɨ sɨvuyajɨ kula'gɨlyajɨ saza marasɨ'nɨdengɨra. A'mwera naangeinyɨ yɨlaaya nyɨpɨka!” Dɨna yojɨ sara yojɨ nabaai Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨlɨna yojɨ wɨlamwaaina yojɨ “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyainyɨ,” wɨdathelyɨ.
Sarɨmɨnyaba kuna mwaaidɨ sare' wɨdɨwɨja yɨhye'na myawɨrijɨwaava!
Kayaa'nanaangerɨ timwaaimanɨke' yawɨ'manɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Dahaa' nyɨma'naabathɨka! Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Sagaa' yɨma'naabathehaakɨ,” kyawɨrojɨ sagaa' yɨma'naabathelyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dahaasagaa' kayaa'nanaangebwi kave lɨka yulyasa'na yɨvanɨkebulyɨ. Pwai timwaaimanɨkei dɨvi kaanna kwawojɨ

kayaa'nanaangei a'mweraayaba yɨma'naabathelyɨ. Sai mwaaidozɨ Naanga Jizaazai kayaa'nanaangerɨ maamudɨnya' tamakadelyɨ. Naangei dɨragɨnna kyɨma'naabozɨ kayaa'nanaangei dara wanganaja' “Aka, dɨragɨnaangei daaka!” Sara kadozɨ Naangei kayaaka yuna yɨgaladelyɨra.

Kayaa'nanaangei gaai yɨma'naabyahaa' sai Saataanɨmɨre dɨragɨnya' maaradei kwaasɨ dɨragɨnya yuya yadengɨra. A'mwera sɨmunya yawɨsa'ne yadengɨra. A'mwera atɨka maru'narya'ne kwaasɨ kyojɨ a'mwera “Naangelyɨ,” yawɨpɨ'dengɨra.

Sarei “Nɨmɨ kayaa'na yɨma!” dozɨ kwaasɨ yagaala naanga naanga kudozɨ a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalade sahwara “Nebulyasɨ,” dɨbɨ'de'nanyɨ. Sahwara “Gotɨyare nebulya' nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ mwarannera! Gotɨyai baa'na nevadaihasamaaradeinaavaka!” yawɨpɨ'derera.
Sahwara kayaa'na yawɨrapɨjɨyavɨna Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨnyɨna a'mwe sara ‘Aala,’ dɨdɨvɨ' kwaasɨyabwi dɨragɨnyabwi lɨmwabɨka!” kyawɨrojɨ kayaa'nanaangere kwaasɨ yagaala wɨ'nɨpɨ'desɨ.
Sara yɨna yapɨjɨ Gotɨyai “Sahwaraavɨ kotɨya' maryawɨbwarɨma!” dozɨ “Kwaasɨyabwi lɨmwabɨka!” yawɨradere. Yɨ sahwara nebulyabwina malɨmwagaryadɨvɨsare. Aawa. Yɨda'maraanga maayabwi yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsare.

Neya'mweihi, yuyagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgoihɨlyɨ. Tewaanyasɨ. Naangerɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna kale wiadeihɨlyɨ. Aayawɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakyaa' “Tezalonaaika mwaalya sahwaraavɨ yɨsɨla mudɨ'nanyaraavɨ padaihasamaarɨdeinyɨ. Kuryai nɨmɨrera tewaanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihade'nanyɨ. Sahwara nɨmɨre nebulya' lɨmwagapɨjɨ tewaanna mwaaibɨ'de'nanyɨ.” Sara dahɨlakyaake'na yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgoinera. “Su! Su!” wɨdɨvanɨgo.
Nemɨ yagaala tewaanya' kyɨhɨtho Gotɨyai yɨhɨvadaihasamaarya'nei jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaara'. Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare byaannya' dɨragɨnya' yɨhɨzaavade'na jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakelyɨ.
Neya'mweihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dɨragɨnna dɨthaayɨla! Dɨragɨnna mwaaidɨvɨ' nemɨre yagaala yuya nayaa dɨlɨmwagyɨla! Yagaala sa pɨnɨ yɨhɨzɨwaako, pɨnɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ yɨhɨzɨwaakɨwa'do nayaa dɨlɨmwagyɨla!

Nenɨmaanga Gotɨyarɨ nemɨnyɨna kale wiada yange'na tewaanna neyake'nanyɨ. Sarei yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne dɨragɨnyainaavɨ nemwaaihada yanga negaimwada sara yake'na nemɨ dara yemwaaimanɨgo' “O, Gotɨyai tewaanaanga nejaavadeina daaka!” Gotɨya sarelyɨ nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sahwalyɨ
sarɨmɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnya wakyɨka! Yuyagaa' wawɨnya tewaanya gazaza jide'najɨ yagaala tewaanya gazaza duzide'najɨ dɨragɨnyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihyɨka!

Neya'mweihi, yagaala pɨnɨ yavɨkaryaana! Nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyarɨ duzɨla! “Apozelɨyaraavɨ wɨgaimwagana! Tezalonaaika nemɨnyaba Naangere yagaalya' kanede' ‘Nebulyasɨ. Byaannakesɨ,’ dɨnona yarai maarobaaibɨ' gazabazaba pwara yarai lɨmwabɨka!” dapɨjɨ duzɨla!
Nabaai “A'mwe kayaa'nanyara, a'mwe sɨmɨlɨkasɨyara Apozelɨyaraavɨ kayaa'na nyɨpɨdɨka! Apozelɨyaraavɨ padaihasamaarana!” dapɨjɨ sara duzɨla! Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe yuyara Naangerɨ malɨmwagyɨvanɨgasare.

Pwara Naangerɨ malɨmwagyɨvanɨgata kɨrɨ' Naangei dɨna “Sasara yɨdeinyɨ,” dada sasara yadelyɨra. Lɨmwannɨkelyɨ. Sarei “Kayaa'nanyai (Saataanɨ) Tezalonaaika mwaalyaraavɨ kayaaka nyadɨka!” dozɨ dɨragɨnyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihade', dame mareyɨhɨdaavadeihɨlyɨ.
Sarɨmɨnyɨna Naangerɨ wɨlamwaaiho'na nemɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'manɨgo. Ya, Tezalonaaika mwaalyara nemɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨmwaasarera. Nemɨ wɨdaaza' mɨdɨbɨ'derera.

Naangei sarɨmɨre sɨmunya kyɨhɨbwarɨdaakwojɨ sarɨmɨ dara jawɨryide “Ya, Gotɨyarɨ nemɨnyɨna kale wiadelyɨ. Sare'na Kɨraazɨtɨyai dɨragɨnna mwaalakabaaibɨ' nemɨ dɨragɨnna mwalaadeinera.” Naangei sara yɨhibwarɨdaakwana!

Neya'mweihi, Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai gannya dɨragɨnya' mi'na kanejaava' gamɨre yayavɨ dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthaana! Ja'mwei Kɨraazɨtɨyarei nemɨre kɨwɨnya wɨdo' mamɨdɨnyɨvanɨkeryawɨ mye'mwannamwaaidɨnna! Sai wawɨnya myai yaasɨwa'na mwaalɨkeryawɨnna mwɨnnera!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyaba nemɨ yobaaibɨ' sahwaihi yɨpɨja'na nayaa yawɨ'mwaa'. Nemɨ yaasɨwa'na mwaalya myo.

Aane pwai kwai wɨgaimwange'na wapaaya saza yanga nejaavake tɨka manyo. Yaasɨwa'maarya myo. Aawa. “Pwara nemɨnyɨne'na bɨrɨrya nyɨda'gwaihɨnapɨdɨka!” dona nɨgwia wɨjaavo. Sareina wawɨnya naanga yona. Yɨrɨkevɨ yɨna, sawɨsavɨ yɨna.
Nemɨ “Tezalonaaika mwaalyara negaimwabɨka!” yawɨraajɨ kwajɨ Naangei sare'na “Wikɨra,” kadathɨka. Kɨrɨ' nemɨ yawɨ'na “Tezalonaaika mwaalyara nemɨ yɨvanɨgovaaibɨ' mɨdɨbɨka!” dona sara yoinera.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyaba mwaalonegaa' kɨwɨnya da' yɨhɨzɨwaako. Pwai dɨna “Wawɨnya myɨwɨneinyɨ. Aala,” dɨna yaja' wapaaya mujaavɨnnera!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨna kadɨka dara wɨ'nɨwo' “O, Tezalonaaika mwaalyara pwara wawɨnya myadɨvɨ' yaasɨwa'na mwaaihasara daa'! ‘Pwaraavɨre wawɨnya maremwaalɨma!’ dadɨvɨ' kumɨre wawɨnya myɨvanɨgasara daaka!” Sara dona yɨhɨthɨwo.

Sareraavɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdaana! Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai gannya dɨragɨnya' kanejaava' kɨwɨnya wɨjɨwakaana! “Sahwara kunnya wawɨnya' kave yɨpɨka! Kunnya wapaaya saza maranɨpɨka!” dona wawɨnya'na gɨthɨvanɨgoigɨnyɨ.
Neya'mweihi, tewaanya ya'nebwina maa'na myɨhyɨnanna!
Nemɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwia davɨ yavɨkaryɨwo'na pwai kwai yawɨ'na “Sabwi myɨwɨnera!” yawɨ'na yojɨ sare' myɨ kyojɨ nayaa tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ gamɨnyaba mamwaaibɨnera! “Sahwai wagɨla maarana!” dapɨjɨ mamwaaibɨna!
Sareihi dara myawɨri jɨla! “Ai, sahwai yɨkamaangelyɨ.” Aawa, dara jawɨrila! “Sahwai nya'mwei mwaalɨke'na kave yavada'galɨdeinyɨ.”
Naangei gamɨ sai kwaamu'nanyaburɨne aaya kaavɨlyai yuyagaa' yuyabwina sarɨmɨnyɨ gamɨre kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhɨzaavana! Naangei sarɨmɨjɨ kuna mwaalana!

Polɨnyɨ nɨnnya asɨlyɨ pɨkarya yɨda'manɨgesɨ “Neya'mweihi! Neya'mwengihi!” Pɨkarɨyɨkwia' yavɨkaryadɨ yuyagaa' yagaala aaya gave' nɨnnya asɨlyɨ yavɨkaryadɨnyainyɨ. Sareinyɨre pɨkarya tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ dara jawɨryide “Ya, Polɨmɨre paazɨyasɨra.”
Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ yange'na tewaanna yɨhɨgaimwagana!

Polɨnyɨ pɨkarya yɨda'manɨgeinyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nyɨdaasadeinyɨ. Gotɨyai nevadaihasamaa'delyɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yemwaidaanyalyɨ dɨragɨnna nyɨdahɨla “Apozelɨyaigɨnyɨ gɨthaasakadeigɨnyɨ,” nyɨdahɨlakagɨlyainyɨ.

Sareinyɨ Timotigɨnyɨ pɨkarya datha' githawasɨwaabe. Kagɨthe Naangereigɨ yɨma'nagɨna gamɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨdɨnya'na nɨnnya kaimɨraaya nawɨ'nyaigɨ mwaaihɨ. Sareigɨnyɨ Gotɨyai Nɨmwalyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨre Naangelyɨ yange'na tewaanya gɨhaimwagika! Kale'na gɨhaimwagika! Kɨrɨmɨre kwaamu'nanyabwi gɨzaayɨka!

Kɨgaa' “Maazathonɨyana wɨma!” dena mena gɨthe sasarevɨ nabaai dahaakɨgaa' ayahi dɨragɨnna gɨthɨvanɨge. Anga Epazaazɨ kuna mwaala'gɨzɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨ dɨragɨnna dara duthatheigɨnyɨra “Kwaasɨya ge sabwina nujɨwaakɨpɨka!”

Sahwara wajɨngyagaala yaasɨwa'na wɨjɨwaakɨna. Kumɨrebwine yaya sabwi yuyabwi wɨjɨwaakɨna. A'mwe gazaizai mɨjɨma'nɨgaveta saraavɨne yayanna wɨjɨwaakɨna. Wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨvanɨgata kɨrɨ' yaasɨwa'nanyangɨna yawɨta kwalaalya yɨvanɨga'. Gengɨra. Sasareraavɨ dɨragɨnna duthatheigɨnyɨ “Sabwina mujɨwaakɨpɨna!” Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga saburɨ wɨgaimwade mɨ'.

Sare' a'mwe pɨmɨlɨkaavɨ wɨgaimwabɨ'de'najɨ kumɨre kale wiadevwi dɨragɨnya yune'na yɨma'nade'najɨ sara dɨragɨnna duthathe'nanyɨ. Kale wia'ne sa' sɨmunya tewaanyavɨdaa'nyasɨ. Nabaai sɨmunyai padaihɨrakya nawɨ'nyarɨdaa'nyasɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nalɨmwanga nebulyavɨdaa'nyasɨ. Yagaala dɨragɨnya saburɨ yɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya yadesɨ.
A'mwe sahwara sasare sabwi yagalya'ma'na yadɨvɨ' yaasɨwa' yagaalyanna yɨraataate yamaryadɨvɨsare.
“Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨ naangeina mwalaana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna dara dadɨvɨsare “Nemɨre yagaalya' nebulyasɨ.” Kɨrɨ' kɨwɨnya yagaala sa' myawɨranganyara, aaya kaavɨlya' myawɨranganyara.
Nemɨ mi'na yawɨ'manɨgo. Gotɨyare Kɨwɨnya' tewaanna marayaaja' nawɨ'nyasɨ. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe sahwara kayaa'na dakadɨvɨsasɨ.

Kɨwɨnyangɨne' yawɨraana! Gotɨyai kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke a'mwe yɨda'maraangerɨnanne'na mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe kɨwɨnya galazekɨvaidɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yagaala mamɨdɨnyadɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. Gotɨyarɨ bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. Gotɨyarebwina “Aala!” dadɨvɨ' Kwaakevakɨyabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. Ganɨmaangerɨ tamakadɨvɨsaraavɨne', ganaangevɨ tamakadɨvɨsaraavɨne', a'mwe pwaraavɨ tamakadɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ.

A'mwengɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨne', a'mweraavɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. A'mwera a'mweraavɨjɨ a'mwengɨjɨ kuka maa'dɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. Kwaasɨ yagaala dadɨvɨsaraavɨne', kwaasɨ yagaala jalɨkurakadɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. Yɨ dazabulyɨ pɨbulyɨ yadɨvɨ' wɨjɨwaakya maamɨdaryavɨ yɨkamaangebwina yadɨvɨsaraavɨnesɨ. Sasareraavɨna kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke'nanyɨ.

Wɨjɨwaakya tewaanya daza' yagaala tewaanyavɨ warɨkesɨ. Yagaala tewaanya sa' Gotɨyai kanyɨjaava' wɨjɨwaakadɨnyasɨ. Gotɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakei yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkei yagaala tewaanya' nyɨjaavakeinyɨ.

“Su! Su!” yawɨ'dɨ wawɨnya sa' yadɨnyainyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨre Naangei nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnya kanyɨjaava' yadɨnyainyɨ. Sai nɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨre wawɨnya' kuna lɨmwadelyɨra,” sara yawɨ'na yaka wawɨnya wɨdaaya dazavɨ nyɨmwaaihakeinyɨ. Sare'na “Su! Su!” wɨdadɨ yadɨnyainyɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna kayaa'nanyanna wɨdadɨ gamɨnyɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgaidɨ bɨraiyagaala wɨdeinyɨ. Sareinyɨ kɨrɨ' Naangei nɨmɨnyɨna kale'na nyɨgaimwagakelyɨ. Nɨmɨ nayaa myawɨryainyɨ, gamɨnyɨna malɨmwagyadɨ sara ye'na kale'na nyɨgaimwaga'.
Nemɨre Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ yanga naange'na yunebanna nyɨgaimwagaka Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwangebulyɨ yɨlaaya wɨvu'nyabulyɨ yanga nyɨjaavakelyɨ.

Yagaala gɨthɨde datha' naanga nebulyasɨ. A'mwe yuya kwara kadɨka wɨ'napɨjɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨ'de'na tewaanyasɨ. Da'dare'. Kwaakevakɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai walaabakelyɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi yadaanyainaavɨ nevadaihasamaarya'nei. Kayaa'nanyabwina aaya mudɨ'nanyainyɨ nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ.

Sareinyɨ kɨrɨ' Naangei nɨmɨnyɨna kale'na nyɨgaimwadei nayaa nyakelyɨ. Sare'na Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai “Nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna nyɨlɨmwagapɨ'dera yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwina maapɨ'deraavɨne ke'ba'nanyai Polɨ yɨma'nana! Sarevɨ sɨnnawɨ Polɨmɨna sɨnna tɨka yarai manyɨdayadevwi sahwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaainɨma!” daka gamɨre kale wɨgaimwangebwi nyɨjaava'.

Gotɨyai kayaa'nanyaraavɨ padaihasamaa'derɨ maryasaabake'na sahwarɨ yɨlaaya wiaana! Kingɨyai yuyagasa maremwaaidelyɨ. Sahwai yuyagaa'nei mabalyadelyɨ. Sahwarɨ tɨnna mwanganyadaanyalyɨ. Sahwai gave pwainanyai Gotɨyalyɨ. Sahwarɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gamɨre yaya' makɨlaana! Sahwarɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' “Byaannakeigɨ!” wɨdaana! Naanga nebulyasɨ.

“Dɨragɨnna duthatheigɨnyɨra,” gɨthena wawɨnya sa' gɨzaawa nɨmɨre kaimɨraayaigɨ Timotigɨ. Kɨgaa' Gotɨyai Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ dara kujɨwaaka' “Dɨvi Timoti Gotɨyare wawɨnya' tewaanna yadelyɨ.” Gɨmɨnyɨna “Sahwai aawɨlasai yɨkamaangeraavɨ malya' dɨragɨnna bwa'devaaibɨ' mala dɨragɨnna bwarana!” dena wawɨnya sa' gɨzaawa.

Gotɨyare mala tewaanya' bwa'dɨ Naangerɨ kuna lɨmwadɨ sɨmunyai tewaanyai kuna gɨvadaihɨrakana! Pwara “Nɨmɨre sɨmunyai tewaanyai nanyɨvadaihɨrakadɨka! Waramaryana!” yawɨreva sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨre lɨmwangebwi sɨpɨya' sɨlyavɨ kayaaka mɨlɨki'devaaibɨ' kayaaka yakebulyɨ.

Sasarerajɨyaraai Aaimenaayazalyɨ Alekɨzaadelyɨ saraai sara yagɨlyaraalyɨ. “Saataanɨ yɨhɨmaremwaalanneraaihɨlyɨ,” kude Saataanɨ taanga wɨjaavanɨ'. “Taanga kujaavojɨ saraai Gotɨyarɨna kayaa'nanya majɨ yɨka!” dena saraarɨna sara wɨde.

Sɨnnawɨnya' dahaa' yagaala mudɨ'nanya' gɨthɨde' daresɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaana! “Pwaraavɨ wɨgainɨvanɨka,” dawaajɨ yɨdanganaana! Yuyaraavɨna wɨdaana! “Gotɨyai wɨgaimwagana!” dawaajɨ marewɨdaana! Yuyaraavɨna “Su!” wɨdaana!

Sara yadaa yɨ Kingɨyara maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨnajɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨnajɨ ke'munyaraavɨnajɨ wɨdaana! “Nemɨ kwaamu'na mwaidaa kave mwaidaa Gotɨyare yɨda'maraangebwi mɨdɨnaana! Yaasɨwa'na namwalaadɨka!” dawaajɨ sahwaraavɨna wɨdaana!
Pwaraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'nebwi tewaanaangebulyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyai nevadaihasamaa'dei tɨnna yawɨrangadelyɨ “Tewaanyabulyɨ. Sabwi yɨlaaya nyɨgaidevulyɨ.”
Sarei “A'mwe yuyaraavɨ wɨvadaihasamaarɨma! Sahwara yagaala nebulya' yuna yawɨrangadɨvɨ' nyɨlɨmwabɨ'dere,” yawɨ'delyɨ. Sara yawɨ'da sarevɨ wɨvu'najanna.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yagaala nebula sa' dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Yuyainaavɨne Gotɨyai gave pwainanyai mwaalɨke'nanyɨ. Nabaai yuyainaavɨne tɨnnabanya gave pwainanyai Gotɨyarɨ a'mweinaavɨ nemariraku'manɨkei mwaalɨke'nanyɨ. Dazahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai a'mwelyɨra.

Dazahwai yawɨ'na “Kayaa'nanyabwina yuyara nabaibɨthɨka! Nɨmɨ balɨdeinyɨ.” Sarei gamɨre tawe yuyaraavɨna mubakelyɨ. Gotɨyai dahɨlakakegaa' sara balakevɨdaa'nyɨ jalɨkurakɨnɨkesɨ. Gotɨyai “Yuyaraavɨ wɨvadaihasamaarɨma!” wɨvu'najanna!

Sare'na Gotɨyai gamɨre wɨja'neinyɨ Nyɨdaasadeinyɨ nyakakeinyɨ. Nebulya'na dɨvanɨge. Kwaasɨ majɨvanɨge. Nyakakeinyɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Naangerɨ lɨmwabɨ'de'najɨ yagaala nebulya' yawɨrangabɨ'de'najɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨnyainyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara nyɨvu'najainyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya ya'negaa' a'mwera yuya angebanyara Naangerɨ wɨdɨpɨka! Kunnya asɨra Gotɨyarɨ makibɨza asɨrajɨ kayaa'nanyanna myadɨvɨsara wɨdɨpɨka! Sahwara sɨnna tɨka mudayara, Gotɨyarɨ sɨmunyangɨ nayaa lɨmwadɨvɨsara Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨpɨka!

Nabaai sareinyɨ dara nyɨvu'najainyɨ. Sabaaibɨ' a'mwe kannya tewaanya' kunnya yunebaainanya yɨra'nɨpɨka! Baazɨ'ma'nya mubya naangejɨ mabaazɨ'ma'nɨpɨnera! “A'mwera nyawɨrangabɨka!” dapi mɨjasangɨ yɨwaala miwannɨpɨnera! Kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ nɨgwɨlalaaka dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyajɨ paida paide yɨ'dejɨ miwannɨpɨnera!

Aawa. Kumɨre nɨgwɨlalaaka da'daresɨ. Wɨgaimwange'na nawɨ'nya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya nayaa yɨpɨnengɨra. A'mwe “Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyannera,” yawɨ'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sara yɨpɨnengɨra. Tewaanyasɨ. Dazabwi kumɨre yɨwaala nawɨ'nyabulyɨ.
A'mwe' kave mwaalɨna yada Gotɨyare yagaala kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nadesɨ. Yagaala madanna! “Kwaakewɨ mwaalɨma! Nayaa yɨwɨrinɨma!” dada nayaa wɨ'nadesɨ.
Davwi gɨthɨde' manyɨvu'nyajavulyɨ. A'mwe' a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakajavwi. A'mwe' a'mweraavɨ maremwaalajavwi. Sabwi aawano! A'mwe' maanga bɨpaina yada kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yannesɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Aayagaa' Gotɨyai Ataamɨmɨ yavɨkarina yɨna yaka, dɨvidaa'nyɨ Yɨvavɨ yavɨkarina. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe a'mweraavɨ kwaakewɨ mwaaihasangɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ maanga bɨpaina yɨpɨka!
Pɨrɨ' darevɨdaa'nyasɨ. Ataamɨ Saataanɨmɨre kwaasɨ yagaalya' “Yayo,” wɨjaakei mɨ'. A'mwe' kwaasɨ yagaalya' “Yayo,” wɨdake'na Gotɨyai wɨjaakevɨne yɨwetawakyaakesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ maanga bɨpaina yɨpɨka!

A'mwe sare' kɨrɨ' a'mwe kaimɨraaya maapɨ'devɨ Gotɨyare wawɨnya' nayaa yɨpɨ'dengɨ. Sahwai nayaa wɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ kuna lɨmwadɨvɨ' kale wiade Gotɨyare kaimɨraaya tewaanna mwaaidɨvɨ' “Maalɨkennera,” yawɨpɨja Gotɨyare wawɨnya kumɨnyɨne' yɨpɨ'dengɨra.
Yagaala datha' lɨmwagaathe' gɨthɨde' nebulyasɨ. A'mwe pwai kwai “Naangereraavɨ maremwaaidɨnyainyɨ mwaalɨma!” yawɨrajai wawɨnya nawɨ'nya'na wɨvu'nadelyɨ.

Wawɨnya nawɨ'nya' warɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨna dara yawɨ'na. Naangereraavɨ maremwaaidei nawɨ'nyabwi yadelyɨra. Nayaa yɨda'na mwaaiderɨ a'mwera gamɨre yɨwetawakya pɨnɨngɨ mwanganyadɨvɨ' bɨrala wɨdɨpɨ'dei mɨka. Sai a'mwe gave pɨrɨvɨna mwaaidelyɨ. Sɨmunya nayaa yavada'galayawɨ'delyɨ. Sai sɨmunya nawɨ'nyabwi mɨdɨdelyɨ. A'mwera dara wangadɨvɨsalyɨ “Sahwai tewaanyalyɨ.” Pɨwɨdaa'nyaraavɨ wapaaya wɨmaarina, se warya'nebajɨ wɨjaavɨna yadelyɨ. Nayaa wɨjɨwaakadelyɨ.

Biyaaya nada yɨmaka mulannelyɨ. Sai sɨmɨlɨka yarai mudayada mala yaasɨwa' maramamaryadelyɨ. Aawa. Sai a'mweraavɨ kave yadelyɨ. Kumɨre munyɨkaavɨ yɨrɨla wɨdɨwadelyɨ. Sai nɨgwianna sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨryadelyɨ.
Sai gannya jɨlɨkaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨ nayaa maremwaaidelyɨ. Kaimɨraayamɨlɨka gamɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨbɨ'delyɨ. Gamɨnyɨna “Nɨmwai naangelyɨ,” yawɨpɨnelyɨ.
A'mwei gannya jɨlɨkaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨ nayaa mamaremwaalyɨ yadei daaka! Sai sara yaja'na Gotɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨna gara yojɨ maremwaalannelaka!

Gotɨyarɨ gaai lɨmwade mudɨkei maremwaalyarɨ namwaaihɨpɨka! Mudɨkei a'mwe naangei mwaalajai “Pwara nɨmɨbɨtara mɨka!” yawɨrajai Gotɨyarɨna yagaainakei nyɨma'nadɨka! Kamaalyai sara yawɨryaakei Gotɨyarɨna yagaainakei yɨma'nakabaai nyɨma'nadɨka!
Maremwaalajarɨna Gotɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadɨvɨsara mwasɨlaanyara “Sarei a'mwe tewaanyalyɨra,” jalɨkurakɨpɨnelyɨ. Nayaa yɨda'na mamwaalyajarɨ yɨwetawakya pɨnɨngɨ wanganapɨjɨ bɨrala nyɨpɨdɨka!
Sara yajai Kamaalyare naanyavɨ nalɨvavwaradɨka! Sara yajai maremwaalyai mima'nannelyɨ.

Sasarebaaibɨ', Naangereraavɨ wɨgaimwadɨvɨsara nayaa yɨda'na mwaaidɨvɨsarera. Yagaala pɨrɨwaai gɨra'mwagadadɨvɨsara mamwaaibɨna! Waainɨya yɨmakaalya kwalaalya manyadɨvɨsare. “A'mweraavɨre nɨgwia gɨlyɨvɨsa sazangɨ maa'muneinyɨ,” majadɨvɨsare.
Sɨmunyai tewaanyai wɨvadaihɨrakadelyɨyara sahwara Gotɨyai nebulya' yoimavajalɨkurakya' lɨmwadɨvɨsara wɨgaimwangera yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera.
Aayagaa' “Gamɨrebwi tewaanyabwi daaka? Nayaa yadei daaka?” yɨbwakɨnapɨjɨ “Yo, sarei tewaanyalyɨ. Yuyara sara yawɨrangadɨvɨsalyɨ,” dɨnɨpɨjaraavɨ wɨgaimwangeraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨpɨ'dere.
Sasarebaaibɨ' kumɨre a'mwe nayaa yɨda'na mwaaidɨvɨsangɨra. Bulayagaala madɨpɨnengɨ. Aawa, sahɨnɨ sɨmunya nayaa yawɨpɨnengɨra. Yuyagaa' kumɨre wawɨnyanna tewaanna lɨmwabɨnengɨra.
Naangereraavɨne wɨgaimwangera a'mwe gave pɨrɨvɨnannera mwaaidɨvɨsare. Kunnya jɨlɨkaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨjɨ kumɨre angengɨ mwaaihasamɨlɨkaavɨjɨ nayaa maremwaaidɨvɨsare.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Wɨgaimwangera nayaa wɨdaayɨpɨjaraavɨ a'mwera tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ “Sai a'mwe naangelyɨ. Tewaanyalyɨ,” dɨnɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. Wɨgaimwangera nayaa yadɨvɨta sarera lɨka myadɨvɨ' lɨmwangebwina Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwangebwina dɨragɨnna kujɨwaakapɨjɨ nayaa wɨ'nɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
“Maalɨkegaa' gɨmɨnyawɨnna wɨdeinyɨ,” dɨwe kɨrɨ' yagaala daza' pɨkarya githawasɨvanaabɨhe.

Gɨmɨnyawɨnna yarai mabi'mayɨ yɨwɨjahaa' “Gotɨyarera gamɨre angevɨyaraavɨne yabwina yawɨranganɨma!” da'gɨzɨ yagaala daza' dangade'nanyɨ. Gamɨre angevɨyara Gotɨyai yuyagaa' mwaaidere kusɨlaanyarera. Kusɨlaanya' Gotɨyare angevaakɨra. Nabaai sɨmyai ange' yɨlarya'nei dɨragɨnna wɨdaakunɨkabaaibɨ' “Gotɨyare yagaalya' nebulyasɨ,” dɨragɨnna wɨdadɨvɨsavaakɨra. Nebulyavɨ pesavaakɨra.
Nebula sa' Gotɨyare sabwina yagaala aaya kaavɨlya' naangaangesɨ. Nebula sa' Gotɨyai yoimavajalɨkurakyasɨ. Naangerɨna aaya kaavɨlyarɨna yoimavajalɨkurakya'na naangaangesɨ. Sa' daresɨ.
Sai a'mwei kɨlaa'nakei yɨma'naabɨwakerɨnera.
Kurya Tewaanyai neyɨbwarɨdaakuwakerɨnera
“Sahwai tewaanyalyɨ. Yɨda'maraangelyɨ.”
Sarɨ ejelɨyara tɨnna yawɨrangamwaasarɨnera.
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraayawɨnna sarɨna dɨwɨwaasalyɨ.
A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara dɨragɨnna lɨmwamwaasalyɨ.
Gotɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ makimwaawɨkerɨnera.

Kurya Tewaanyai dara jalɨkurakɨvanɨ' “Dɨvi sagaa' aayagasana pwara dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨne yagaala yagalya'mapɨ'derera. Sahwara aa'neraavɨ kwaasɨyaraavɨ wɨ'nɨpɨ'dere. Yɨmakera wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨre yagaalya mɨdɨbɨ'dere.”

Kwaasɨ yagaala sa a'mwe kwaasɨ yadɨvɨsara maarapɨjɨ sahwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨpɨ'dera. Dɨke' kɨlaakejɨkɨ kayaaka wigaidevaaibɨ' a'mwe kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakya'neraavɨre sɨmunya tewaanyai padaihɨrakyai kayaaka yɨgainɨkere. Wagɨlyabwina yɨbwakɨdɨvɨtara mɨ'.

A'mwe dazara kwala maaryabwina kɨmaakɨya dakadɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨne tɨka wapaayangɨna kɨmaakɨya dakɨpɨ'derera. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai wakaka daza a'mweina dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaa nebulya'na yawɨrangadaanyaina Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadaa sa dapaade'nanyɨ.
Gotɨyai yuya wakyaake tewaanyannanyangɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuya maraadengɨra. Sangɨna dɨmaaryidehaa' Gotɨyarɨ “Su!” wɨdɨpɨja aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nalɨvarabɨthɨka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai yagaala “Nawɨ'nyasɨ,” dɨnɨke'najɨ “Da' Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna wɨjaavɨnɨkesɨ. Tewaanyasɨ,” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ “Su!” duzide'najɨ nawɨ'nyaange' dɨmaaryidesɨra.

Yagaala daza' nehɨrya'mwera Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ duzɨwaakya! Sara wɨjɨwaakɨjaigɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazare wɨdaayadɨnya tewaanyaigɨ dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ. A'mwei wapaaya nada gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' dɨragɨnyajɨ' wa'devaaibɨ' yagaala Naangerɨ lɨmwangebulyɨyangɨjɨ wɨjɨwaakya tewaanyabwi mɨdɨmanɨgɨnyavɨjɨ yawɨrangadɨ gɨmɨre kuryai dɨragɨnyai gɨmwaaladeigɨnyɨ. Sareigɨ duzɨwaakya!
Wajɨngyagaala navɨ'navɨkyagaala myawɨ'dɨnna! Yagaala sa Gotɨyarɨna yawɨramaarya'ne mɨka. Aawa. Gotɨyare saburɨ nayaa kuna yawɨramaa'dɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna dɨmɨdɨdeigɨnyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwei Kwaaka davakɨ mwaaidehaa' wawɨnya yade'na yagɨnya kɨlaaka dɨragɨnya yɨma'nadevwi tewaanyabulyɨ. Gotɨyarɨna yawɨramaa'de'na kuryai dɨragɨnya yɨma'nadevwi tewaanaangebulyɨ. Kwaakevakɨ mwaaiho dahaa' Gotɨyarebwi negaimwagathevulyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyaryaba kuna mwalaaja dɨvi kɨgaa' sahɨbwi kuna negaimwagathevulyɨ. Sahɨburɨdaa'nyɨ tewaanaangebulyɨ.
Yagaala daza' naanga nebulyasɨ. Daza' a'mwe yuyara yɨnɨga wɨ'napɨjɨ yunebanna dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨ'de'nesɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare wawɨnya yagɨyagɨ mɨraagɨkɨ'manɨgo'nanyɨ. “Gotɨyai nemɨre kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'naka nayaa nemaremwaalɨkelyɨ,” yawɨ'daa sahwarɨ yemwaidaa mɨraagɨkɨ'manɨgo'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai sahwai yuyagaa' mwaaidelyɨ. A'mwe yuyaraavɨ padaihasamaa'delyɨ. Yɨ nabaai Naangerɨ lɨmwagaanneinaavɨ nebulya'na nevadaihasamaa'mwakelyɨ.
Yagaala daza' a'mweraavɨ dɨragɨnna duthana! Nayaa mɨdɨbɨ'de'na duzɨwaakya!

Aane pwai kwai gɨmɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganna gyada mɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ kɨrɨ' “Maalɨkelyɨ,” nyawɨradɨka! Aawa. Tewaanyabwi nayaa yɨnnebaaibɨ' Naangerɨna lɨmwadɨvɨsara gwanganapɨjɨ sara yɨpɨneigɨ dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ. Yagaala nawɨ'nya dɨnneigɨnyɨ. Nawɨ'nyanna yɨnneigɨnyɨ. Kale gyada nayaa wɨgaimwadɨnneigɨnyɨ. Naangerɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨnneigɨnyɨ. Yɨda'maraangebwina yawɨ'dɨ yɨnneigɨnyɨ. Sara ya'gɨzɨ gɨmɨnyɨna “Maalɨkelyɨ,” myawɨri yɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Dazagaa' kuna nyemwaaidɨ a'mweraayaba Gotɨyai dɨnɨke' nayaa wangadɨ duthatheigɨnyɨ. Kumɨre yɨpɨjavwi dɨhaa'bwata jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Nayaa duzɨwaakɨdeigɨnyɨ.

Sare' Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' sɨhumalevɨna navɨka nagyathɨka! Kɨgaa' Gotɨyai kuda' pwara gɨmɨnyɨna “Gotɨyare wawɨnya yannelyɨra,” wɨdesagaa' Naangereraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsara asa yɨlagwakadaapi Gotɨyai gannya wawɨnya'ne dɨragɨnya' gɨzaava'. Dɨragɨnya' gɨzaavake' ayɨna yawɨralɨmwadɨ dɨragɨnyasɨ kuna jɨtheigɨnyɨ.
Sana dɨragɨnna yɨya yadɨ yuya dazangɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaaideigɨnyɨ. “A'mwe yuyara nɨmɨnyɨna ‘O, yuyagaa' gamɨ naangei, tewaanyai kuna yɨma'naabɨvanɨkei daaka!’ yawɨpɨka!” da'gɨzɨ nayaa sara jɨtheigɨnyɨ.

Nabaai mwaaimanɨgɨnya saburɨjɨ a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨgɨnya saburɨjɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaala! Yuyagaa' dazahɨrɨvɨna kuna dɨragɨnna jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sara yɨja' nayaa yavada'gaina gyathesɨ. Nabaai a'mwe kadɨka gu'nɨpɨjaraavɨjɨ yava'da'gaina wiadesɨ. Sagaa' tewaanyaihi dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨra. Dɨvadaihasamaa'nyideihɨlyɨ.

A'mwe nera kayaa'na yɨpɨjaraavɨ mayagaala mudɨnna! Aawa. Gɨnnya gɨmaamaangerɨ yavada'gaidɨnyabaaibɨ' dɨhaa'bwasa'na kave duthana! Nabaai gɨnnya ja'mweraavɨ yavada'gaidɨnyabaaibɨ' mɨgɨnyaraavɨ kumɨre yɨpɨjavwi kave duthana!
Nabaai nemɨlɨkaavɨ gwaange'bɨsamɨlɨkaavɨ yavada'gaina ja! Yɨ mɨgɨnyangɨ gɨnnya ja'mwebɨsangɨna yɨda'maraangebwina yawɨ'dɨ kave yavada'gaina ja!
Yaanyɨwaaka nemɨlɨ' mwaalɨke'na “A'mwe naangesɨ,” dɨnneigɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaala! Nayaa duhaimwana!

Yaanyɨwaaka pɨrɨ' gannya kaimɨraayajɨ gyakaangejɨ gyakwalaangerajɨ kɨnɨnnake' mwaalajavɨna sahɨnɨ nayaa dara yawɨpɨka! “Nemɨre neyorɨ wɨmaremwalaana! Kɨgaa' maalɨkennaavɨ wapaaya saza yanga nejaavagɨlyayolyɨ. Sare'na wɨrɨvɨkɨraana!” Sara yawɨrapɨjɨ sara yadɨvɨ' kumɨre jɨlɨkaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨna Gotɨyarebwi yawɨramaapɨ'de'nanyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sara yɨpɨ'de sabwina Gotɨyai yawɨrangamanɨ' “Tewaanyasɨ.”

Nabaai yaanyɨwaaka nemɨlɨ' kaimɨraavɨmaaya' gyakaangejɨ gyakwalaangerajɨ sa maaya' yuna gave' mwaalaka yɨ a'mwe daza' dara yɨvanɨkesɨ. Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwada sahwarɨ nayaa yemwaaida yuyagaa' yɨrɨkevɨjɨ sawɨsavɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨgainya'ne kuna yɨdaangada kuna wɨdɨvanɨkesɨ.
Sare' kɨrɨ' yaanyɨwaaka pɨrɨ' wabahɨlaaka sabwi mɨdɨda mena bainɨkesɨ. Kuna mwaalɨka kɨrɨ' Gotɨyarɨna gannya kuryai mena bainɨkesɨ.
Yagaala daza' mɨdɨnya'na a'mwemɨlɨkaavɨ dɨthɨhaa'bwaka! “Nayaa yɨda'na kamwaalapɨjɨ pwara tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' ‘Samɨlɨka kayaa'na yadɨvɨsamɨlɨke.’ nadɨpɨdɨka!” da'gɨzɨ dɨthɨhaa'bwaka!

A'mwe pwai kwai Naangerei gannyamɨlɨkaavɨ nayaa mamaremwaalyɨ yajai, yɨ nabaai gɨthɨdei gannya jɨlɨkaimɨraayamɨlɨkaavɨ nayaa mamaremwaalyɨ yajai Naangerɨ lɨmwangebwina gɨnyɨra'mwakelyɨ. A'mwe malɨmwagyadei gannya neyorɨ wɨgaimwagaza' yɨ sasarebwi Naangerɨ lɨmwadei sara mugaimwagyɨvanɨka kayaa'nanyai malɨmwagyaderɨ wavɨlavɨkelyɨ.

Bukuyavɨ yaanyɨwaaka nemɨlɨkaavɨna Naangerera wɨgaimwange'na nɨgwia wɨjaaya'nemɨlɨkaavɨre yaya pɨkarya yɨda'na ja! Yaanyɨwaaka da'daremɨlɨkaavɨre yaya yɨda'na ja! Yaanyɨwaakemɨlɨkɨ kwarame 60 (a'mwe daraai dalyaraavɨre sɨvɨlatɨraalya) mena wavɨla'nɨke', a'mwe gave pware' mwaainɨkesɨ.

A'mwemɨlɨka samɨlɨkɨna jalɨkurakadɨvɨ' “Tewaanya yadesɨ,” yɨ gannya kaimɨraayangɨ tewaanya maremwaalakesɨ. Yɨ anga pɨbadaa'nyaraavɨna tɨka wapaaya yanga wɨjaavakesɨ. Wɨdaaya'ne' Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨta tewaanyaraavɨre sɨvɨla aalya yaka dazabwina yakesɨ. Yɨ a'mwemɨlɨkaavɨ taanga wiadaa'nyɨ nawɨ'nya wɨgaimwagakesɨ. Sasare' yuya tewaanya saza yakevɨre yaya' yɨda'na ja!
Yaanyɨwaaka a'mwe mɨgɨnyangɨna yaya' mida'dɨnnera! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨre munyɨ' kwala maa'nya'na ayɨna kwima'nojɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ gɨnyɨrapɨ'dengɨra.
Sahɨnɨ sɨnnawɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdesa' yesɨmapɨ'de'na yɨwetawakya kɨnɨnnakengɨra.

Nabaai sasare pɨbulyɨ yadɨvɨsangɨ. Sahɨnɨngɨ maa'na widaasɨ anga yuyangɨ yamaryadɨvɨsa'na aangaa'na yɨbainyɨna yadɨvɨsangɨ. Nabaai a'mwe maa'na widengɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Pwaraavɨre yagaalya kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' yaasɨwa' wɨdamarya yadɨvɨ' pwaraavɨre wawɨnyanna yaasɨwa'na jɨwɨryadɨvɨ' yagaala madɨpɨne wɨdadɨvɨsangɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨthɨwɨja' nayaa kadɨka dɨnyu'nana! A'mwe mɨgɨnya kwala ayahi maa'napi kaimɨraaya maa'dɨvɨ' kunnya angengɨ mwaaidɨvɨsamɨlɨkaavɨ nayaa maremwaaibɨ'dengɨra. Nabaai sara kyapɨjɨ yɨkamaanga kwai tɨnna nenganojɨ nemɨre kayaa'nanyabwina bɨraiyagaala mujɨ neyade'nanyɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yaanyɨwaaka pɨnɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mena mamɨdɨnyeva Saataanɨmɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsa'na sara gɨthɨwe'nanyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwe Naangerɨ lɨmwade pɨrɨ' kɨrɨvɨre angevɨ mwaaidɨvɨta yaanyɨwaakengɨ gamɨre jɨlɨkaimɨraayajɨ kwalaangere jɨlɨkaimɨraayajɨ sangɨ wɨgaimwagana! “Naangere kusɨlaanyavɨyara yaanyɨwaaka yune gave mwaaibɨza samɨlɨkaavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maremwaaibɨka!” dozɨ maremwaaladesɨ. Yɨ kusɨlaanyavɨyara yaasɨwa'na namaremwaaibɨthɨka!

Naangereraavɨne a'mwe naangera wawɨnya nawɨ'nya'na maremwaaidapiyaraavɨre yaya makidɨvɨ' nɨgwia tewaanya'na duzaayɨla! Sahwara maarya'nera Gotɨyare yagaalya' yagɨyagɨ nayaa wɨdadɨvɨ' yagɨyagɨ nayaa wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨna naanga duzaayɨla!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨ' “Bulɨmakaawoyai witɨya lɨlɨvainadaaya'nerɨ maangevɨ majɨbwɨyɨnnera! (Sai nana!)” Nabaai dara dɨnɨ' “Gɨmɨre aawawɨnya yakei gannya nɨgwia wɨrɨvɨkɨrya'nei yɨnɨga wi'na maarana!” (Sara dɨnɨke'na sabaaibɨ' a'mwe naangeraavɨre yaya makidaapɨjɨ nɨgwia maapɨka!)

Nabaai a'mwe gave pwai wɨdɨna “Nɨmɨre naanga dazai kayaa'na yɨwakelyɨ.” Gavei wɨdɨna yajare yagaala daza' mu'nɨnnera! Pwaraai daraai dala kwara kagɨzalɨkurakapɨjɨ yagaala daza' kadɨka du'nadeigɨnyɨra.
A'mwe naanga pwara kayaa'nanyabwi kuna kyapɨjɨ yuyaraayaba maanga duthatheigɨnyɨ. “A'mwe naanga pwarajɨ kayaa'nanyabwina lɨka yɨpɨka!” da'gɨzɨ ku'maaya maanga sara duthatheigɨnyɨ.

Gotɨyalyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazalyɨ Gotɨyare mamaayara ejelɨyaraavɨ dahɨlakɨnɨkerajɨ saraayaba dɨragɨnna gɨthɨma! Yagaala dazangɨ nayaa pada'galamaremwaala jɨtheigɨnyɨ. “Sɨmunyavɨ a'mwe naangerɨna yarai madɨwɨna! ‘Nebulyasɨ. Sai kayaa'nanya' yɨwakelyɨ.’ Nabaai yarai madɨwɨna! ‘Aawa, sai kayaa'nanya' mi yaja'na,’ ” da'gɨzɨ pada'galamaremwaaina ja! Aaya kaavɨlya' bɨramaa'na ya'gɨzɨ nayaa jawɨbwaka! Aane pwai kwarɨ maanga yarai wɨdadɨ aane pwai kwarɨ wabwiwayagaala yarai wɨdadɨnyabwina minna! Yuyaraavɨ nayaa avaaina jawɨbwaka!

A'mwe pwai kwarɨ maara'gɨzɨ “Naangereraavɨna maremwaaladela!” da'gɨzɨ yarai madahɨlakɨnna! Yɨme'nya'bɨ' ata madathɨwadɨnna! Sara yɨjaigɨ sahwai kayaa'nanyabwi kyojɨ taanga naginaradɨka! Pwarebwina nayaa yɨwa'dɨnneigɨ ata dakɨdeigɨnyɨ. Sara yadɨ yɨda'maraangeigɨ kuna dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ.
Gɨmɨre munyɨkɨ daanga gɨvɨmanɨke' ayabaaibɨ' aalya gavesɨ manɨnna! Aawa. Waainɨya maalɨkemɨlɨsɨ dɨnana! Sara kya'gɨzɨ gaimwanga gyathe' nalaaya yuyagaa' gima'nade gɨmarasɨ'nadesɨ.

A'mwe naangeraavɨ wɨmwaaihya'ne yagaala gɨthɨwe'na gɨthɨma! A'mwe pwaraavɨre kayaa'nanya ku'maayaba wa'dengɨ. Sara kayaa'na yadɨvɨ' yɨme'nya'bɨ' maryawɨbwa'daanyangɨ. Pwara kumɨre kayaa'nanya lɨka yulya'dengɨ. Sareraavɨre kayaa'nanya dɨvidaa'nyɨ ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathengɨ. Sare'na nayaa jɨwa'deigɨnyɨ.

Kayaa'nanya sara yɨvanɨgatabaaibɨ' pwara tewaanya yɨvanɨgasare. Pwaraavɨre tewaanya ku'maayaba wa'dengɨ. Tewaanna sara yadɨvɨ' yɨme'nya'bɨ' yawɨrangadaanyangɨ. Pwara kumɨre tewaanya lɨka yulya'dengɨ. Sareraavɨre tewaanya dɨvidaa'nyɨ ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathengɨ.

Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara nɨgwia mamaarya'nera pwaraavɨre wawɨnya yaasɨwa'na yadɨvɨsaraavɨna. Sahwara Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨta yuyara dara yawɨpɨka! “Nɨmɨre maremwaalyai sai a'mwe naangelyɨ. Sare'na gamɨnne yaya' makɨlɨma!” Sara myawɨri yɨpɨjaraavɨ pwara tɨnna wanganna yadɨvɨ' dara nyawɨpɨdɨka! “Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsabwi ‘Yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara sana sana yɨpɨka!’ maja'na daaka! Kumɨre Gotɨyai kayaa'nanyalyɨ. Gotɨyarebwina yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara yabwi wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨke' daaka!” Sara nyawɨpɨdɨka!

Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya pwara kumɨre maremwaalyara Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsara mwaaihasa'na yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara dara nyawɨpɨdɨka! “Sai neya'mwelyɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwarɨ galazekɨvalɨdeinyɨ. Malɨmwagyaderɨ mɨdɨmujavaaibɨ' sara mi yɨdeinyɨ.” Sara nyawɨpɨka! Aawa. Sahwara nayaa dara yawɨpɨka! “Nyɨmaremwaaidei Naangerɨ lɨmwadelyɨ. Sarerɨna tewaanya nyɨma'nɨvanɨka. Nabaai sahwarɨna wɨdaayɨvanɨge'na gɨlyɨvɨta tewaanya maarade'nanyɨ. Sa' tewaanyasɨ.” Sɨmunya sasarebwi nayaa yawɨrapɨjɨ wawɨnya nebulyabwi yɨpɨka!
Pwaraavɨnejɨ pɨmɨlɨkaavɨnejɨ yuyangɨnebwi yɨpɨ'de'na yuyagaa' a'mweraavɨ duzɨwaakya! Yɨ nabaai sara yɨpɨ'de'na dɨhaa'bwata jɨtheigɨnyɨ.
Kwaasɨya ge sabwina wɨjɨwaakajai pwai kwai sɨdu'maayalyɨ. Sasarei nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaala maamɨdarya nemwaaihannejɨ Gotɨyare sabwine wɨjɨwaakya tewaanyasɨ daza mujɨwaakyadelyɨ.

Sahwai “A'mwe tewaanyainyɨ nɨmɨnyɨra,” dadei gannya yaya' makinadelyɨ. Gotɨyarebwina waryaabaasalyɨ. Sabwine aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' sɨdu'maayalyɨ. Aawa. Sɨmunyavɨ nabalɨnakelyɨ. Sai yagaala ge ge yaasɨwa'na maanga wɨdada maihurɨ'nyɨyagaala javwinajɨ nawɨ'nyɨna wɨvu'nadelyɨ. Sare'na sɨmunyavɨ nabalɨnakelyɨ. Yagaala sasarebwi da'darebwi yɨma'nadengɨ. Tɨganaarya yɨna, pwaraavɨna munyɨ' kayaa'na yɨna, maanga dɨnyɨna, bɨraiyagaala dɨna, kwaasɨ yawɨ'na “Sai kayaa'na yɨwakelyɨ,”

yuyagaa' yaasɨwa' maiyagaala bathɨwɨna. Sasarebwi yɨma'nadengɨ. Kwaasɨya wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta sahwaraavɨre sɨmunya kayaa'nanya yɨma'nakera yagaala nebulya' lɨmwagesa' yɨpalamaa'nɨkere. Sahwara kwaasɨ yawɨ'na “Gotɨyare sabwi mɨdɨnaajaina gɨlyɨvɨta maarya'nebulyɨ.”
Nebulyasɨ. A'mwei Gotɨyare sabwi mɨdɨnajai tewaanaanga kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Gotɨyarebwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Gannya kuryai yawɨ'na “Naangerɨna yuya maa'mweinyɨ. Nɨmɨ yɨnɨga wikɨra.”

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nenaange kanemaa'nɨ' sagaa' gɨlyɨvɨta aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mamakabyo. Nabaai dɨvi Kwaakevakɨ yagalya'mavawaajɨ dazagaa' gɨlyɨvɨta aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' makwawaadeina mɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨlyɨvɨsanna yawɨrɨbainyɨna myaannera!
Aawa. Nemɨ wapaayajɨ baazɨ'ma'nyajɨ kɨnɨnnakeina dara daana! Sa nɨmɨnyɨ yɨnɨga nyadengɨra.

Pwara gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya maarya'na yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Sahwara yɨkurɨyaawia wapetɨrɨnya' mwagi'namaa'da naanyavɨ lɨvapadevaaibɨ' gɨlyɨvɨsa maarya'nebwi mwagi'namaa'da kayaa'nanya kwalaalya navɨ'navɨka galawiada kayaa'nanyabwi munyɨkɨdaa'nyɨ yɨdɨkaavaderera. Aalya' mihaasadevaaibɨ' sasarebwi sahwaraavɨ kayaaka kigalojɨ yuna yɨwɨpɨ'derera.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨgwianna tewaanya wɨvu'nya sabwi yuya kayaa'nanya saburɨne kaavɨlyavɨnyɨra. Pwara nɨgwianna tewaanna wɨvu'nadera sasare sabwi wɨmwagi'nadaa'nyɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwangebwi yagalya'ma'dɨvɨ' kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ yuneba daanga naanga yɨbwakɨdɨvɨsare.

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ Gotɨyare a'mweigɨ yuya dazangɨna bule'na wɨjaava'gɨzɨ lɨkaanya jenada'makwona! Sara ya'gɨzɨ yɨda'maraangebwina mɨjamakuna ja! Nabaai Gotɨyare sabulyɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwangebulyɨ kale yabulyɨ taanginya gyadaa'nyɨ dɨragɨnna kuna daayabulyɨ kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ sabwina mɨjamakuna ja!

Naangerɨ lɨmwangebwine mala tewaanya' dɨragɨnna tamarɨvaatawakɨna ja! Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maarya'neigɨnyɨ Gotɨyai jaka gɨzɨvwaramaarakebulyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe kwalaalya yawɨranganyaraayaba “Naangerɨ lɨmwamweinyɨ. Gamɨre yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi maa'mweinyɨ,” nayaa jalɨkurakagɨnyabulyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sasarebwi kuna nayaa dɨlɨmwagaka!
Dɨragɨnna gɨthɨma! Gotɨyai yuyangɨne gaalyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyaryabajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai kotɨyagaa' Podɨyaazai Paailatɨmyaba gamɨnyɨna tewaanna jalɨkurakɨnakeryabajɨ dɨragɨnna gɨthɨma!

Gotɨyare yagaalyavɨ yunebanna nayaa maremwaaidɨ daza' nayaa dɨmɨdɨna! Galazekɨvaidɨzaigɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyaigɨ nyɨma'nɨdɨka! Nayaa yɨja' a'mwera yagaala savɨna kayaakyagaala dɨpɨ'dera mɨka. Nayaa dara maremwaaida'gɨzɨ yunegaa' ku'maayaba nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨma'naabathehaa'nanyɨ.

Sagaa'ne Gotɨyai mena dahɨlakake dazahɨgaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ ku'maayaba marima'naabathelyɨ. Gotɨyai sahwai yɨlaaya ya'ne aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Yuya dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakei gave sahwalyɨ. Kingɨyaraavɨne Kingɨyalyɨ. Naangeraavɨne Naangelyɨ.

Mabalyɨ ya'ne aaya kaavɨlyai gavelyɨ. Sahwai baaka naangeba mwaalɨ'. Baaka sayaba nemɨ aya kɨba mwɨyɨ yaannesɨ. Sahwarɨ wangadei a'mwe aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Sahwarɨ wanganadei a'mwe aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Sahwarɨna yɨlaaya wiaana! Gamɨre yaya' munyaba makɨlaana! “Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakelyɨ,” wɨdaana! Naanga nebulyasɨ.

Kwaaka davakɨya gɨlyɨvɨta naangejɨyaraavɨ dɨragɨnna dara duthana! “ ‘Nɨmɨ naangeinyɨra. Sɨdu'nakeinyɨra,’ nyawɨ'dɨka! Pihadɨka nyɨdɨka! Gɨlyɨvɨta kayaaka yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨma'nade yuya sanna gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna nyawɨra'nɨdɨka! Aawa. Gotɨyarɨna nayaa dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwana! Gamɨ sai gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya nawɨ'nya nemɨnyɨne wabahɨlaaka'na naanga nejaavadelyɨ.
Nabaai tewaanna ja! Yuya tewaanya yɨnne naanga kɨnɨnnakeigɨ dɨmwaala! Yanga yarai duzaama! Gɨlyɨvɨsa wapaaya jaapaidɨ duhaimwana!” Sara duthana!

Nabaai sara yɨpɨja', Gotɨyarɨna gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya mari'bwarakɨpɨ'dere. Sa aaya kaavɨlya' wɨgaimwagathesɨ. “Gaala nebulyabwi yɨnɨga ma'daa nawɨ'nyaba tewaanya mwalaana!” dapɨjɨ sarenna mari'bwarakɨpɨ'dera.
