Timotigɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' maremwaaidɨnnevɨna dameigɨ dɨthaaka! Yagaala yaasɨwakengɨ bule'na duzaama! Yagaala sa Gotɨyarebwine mɨ'. Nabaai yagaalya kwaasɨ dara dadɨvɨkɨ “Sɨmunya yawɨsa'nesɨ.” Sasare yagaala daza Gotɨyare yagaalyavɨne'na yɨkamaangengɨ.
A'mwe pwara yagaala yaasɨwakengɨna kwaasɨ dɨna “Nemɨ sɨdu'nakeinera.” Sara yadɨvɨ' Naangerɨ lɨmwanga nebulyavɨna menyaba sɨkwa yɨ'mwamwaasarera. Naangerɨ lɨmwangebwi yagalya'ma'mwaasarera.
Gotɨyare yanga naange' wɨgaimwangebwi sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!
Timoti,

Polɨnyɨ pɨkarya da' yɨda'manɨgeinyɨ. Gotɨyai gannya sɨmunyavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazare Nyɨdaasadeinyɨ yɨma'nya'neinyɨna yawɨraka nyɨdahɨlakakeinyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdake'na a'mwera Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaibɨza' yune gaalyabwi wɨjaaya'nei Apozelɨyainyɨ nyɨdahɨlakakeinyɨ.

Yɨ sareinyɨ Timotigɨnyɨ gɨmɨnyɨna nyɨvu'nadeigɨ nɨmɨre kaimɨraayaigɨnyɨ githawasɨwaabeigɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨre Naangelyɨ yanga gaimwange'na gika! Kale'na gaimwange'na gika! Kwaamu'nanyabwi tewaanya gwakika!

Gɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ nayaa nebulya'na lɨmwaga'dɨnyavɨna nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdadɨnyainyɨ. Sahwarɨ nɨmɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyara yɨlaaya yamaryaatabaaibɨ' nɨmɨ kwainyɨ yɨlaaya yamaryadɨnyainyɨ. Nɨmɨre sɨmunyai padaihɨrakyarɨ yɨbwakɨmanɨge. Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨvanɨge dazabwi nebwina yɨda'maraangebwi midaaka! Nabaai nɨmɨre Naangerɨ yɨdaangadɨnyagaa' sawɨsavɨjɨ yɨrɨkegaasɨ yuyagaa' gɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨ Gotɨyarɨ “Su!” wɨdadɨnyainyɨ.
Nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨ yagalya'mavegaa' gɨmɨre tɨnnyarɨ kɨdalaalyai gwalaabake'na yawɨ'dɨnyavɨna “Nɨmɨ yɨlaaya yune nebwina yɨma!” dadɨ gɨmɨnyɨ tɨnna wanganya'na tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeinyɨ.

Nɨmɨ ayɨna gyawɨ'manɨge. Gɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwagasa' nebwina lɨmwaga'dɨnyɨ. Dɨragɨnna lɨmwagata sasare sabwi aayagaa' gɨmɨre Ne jakaanga Loyɨzɨyavɨ gɨmɨre gwaanga Yunɨzɨya' kɨrɨvɨjɨ warakabaaibɨsasɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨ nebwina yawɨ'manɨge. Dɨragɨnna lɨmwagata dazabwi gɨmɨ kwaigɨnyɨ gwarɨkesɨ.

Sare'na nɨmɨ “Gɨmɨre sɨmunya' dɨhaa'bwarɨma!” dadɨ yɨvanɨge. Yɨ Gotɨyare yanga daza' sɨhumale' gwarɨke'na jawɨ'de'nanyɨ. Kɨgaa' nɨmɨ gɨmɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ asɨraai kilagwake Gotɨyarɨ yanga daza' maaragɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Dahaa' gɨmɨ a'mwei dɨke' pwa'nyɨ ya'daa'nyɨ naanga yɨdamakidevaaibɨ' Gotɨyare wawɨnya ya'neigɨ gɨnnya yanga daza' naanga gɨrya'ne' yawɨradɨkaa'na ja!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨre Kurya Tewaanyarɨ yanga nejaavakelyɨ. Kurya sai nemɨnyɨ lɨka ya'neinaavɨ nemwaaihadei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai dɨragɨnya mwaalya'neinaavɨ, nevu'nya'neinaavɨ, sɨmunya nayaa pada'galayawɨ'daa maremwaainya'neinaavɨ nemwaaihadelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨre Naangerɨna jalɨkurakya'na gɨmɨ wagɨla magɨvwa'nannera! Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨnajɨ sahwarɨna kalavuzangevɨ nyɨrakesainyɨna wagɨla magɨvwa'nannera! Aawa. Gɨmɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' maara'gɨzɨya'na yagaala tewaanya' wɨgaimwagya'neigɨ nɨmɨjɨ taanga dɨnye'mwannamaaka!

Gotɨyai sai mena nevadaihasamaarakei nemɨ tewaanyaina yɨma'nya'neinaavɨ jaka mena nejɨvwaramaarakelyɨ. Yɨ nemɨ tewaanya yagongɨna myawɨryada jaka sara nejɨvwaramaarakenna mɨ'. Aawa. Yune gamɨre yawɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨnyɨ yanga gaimwange'na neyada nemɨnyɨ jaka sara nejɨvwaramaarakelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna, Gotɨyai Kwaakeva' mwakyaakegaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨna yanga gaimwanga daza' nemɨnyɨna nejaaya'neinaavɨ nedahɨlakyaakelyɨ.

Dazagaa' dahɨlakake' kɨrɨ' dathahaasagaa' nemɨre nevadaihasamaa'dei Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai walaabakevɨ yanga daza' ku'maayaba mena yɨma'nɨwaabɨ'. Yɨ sarevɨna pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai balya'ne dɨragɨnya' wavɨla'nɨkelyɨ. Yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yagaala tewaanyavɨ gaalyabwi kayaaka minyɨ ya'ne' marima'naabakelyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai sara yoimavakesɨ.
Yagaala tewaanya dazavɨne wawɨnyavɨ nɨmɨ wɨjɨwakamarya'neinyɨ mwaaidɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ wɨjɨwɨryainyɨ nyɨdaasa'neinyɨ nyakakeinyɨ.

Sare'na nabaai taanginya daza' a'mwera nyɨjaavadɨvɨsainyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ dazavɨna wagɨla nyɨvwa'nadeinyɨ mɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨnya dazarɨna mena yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ. Nabaai yagaala tewaanya nɨmɨre asɨrɨ nyakaka dazavɨ sai dame yɨnɨga wi'na daavannei midaaka! Yɨ nebwina sara yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ nabaai daza' yuyagaa' nayaa warɨbainada yune Yɨrɨka naanga yɨma'naabathe sagaa'na. Warɨbainadesɨ.

Timoti, yagaala tewaanya maamɨdarya' nɨmɨre maangikɨ kadɨka nyu'nagɨnya yɨ sa a'mweraavɨ avaaina wɨjɨwaakya'ne kuna dɨlɨmwagaka! Yɨ gɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨ Gotɨyarɨnajɨ a'mweraavɨnajɨ gɨvu'nada nabaai sasare sabwi yagaala sangɨ dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwagaka!
Gotɨyai yagaala daza' gɨmɨre asɨrɨ gwakake' dameigɨ nayaa dɨthaaka! Nabaai Kurya Tewaanyai nemɨnyɨ wɨlanemwaalɨkei wawɨnya dazavɨna yɨnɨga wi'na gɨhaimwagathelyɨ.
Dare' mena yawɨ'manɨgɨ. A'mwe lɨmwadɨvɨta yuya Pɨrovijɨ Ezɨya mwaalyara sahwarajɨya Pɨzelaazalyɨ Emozenɨzalyɨ saraai kwaraalyɨ kalavuzainyɨna mena nyagalya'mavesainyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' pɨgasa Wonezɨporaazai nɨmɨre kuryarɨ nyɨvaimwadelyɨ. Nabaai sai nɨmɨre kalavuzangevɨ mwaaidɨnya sa'na wagɨla wɨvwa'nadei mɨ'. Yɨ sare'na Naangei Wonezɨporaazarɨjɨ gamɨre angevɨyaraavɨjɨ kale'na gaimwanga wiana! A'mwe sahwai nɨmɨnyɨna wagɨla wɨvwa'nadei mɨ'.
Aawa. Sai Anga Romɨ davanna bi'ma'na yaka bɨramaasa'na yagɨyagɨ bɨ'da dɨvidaa'nyɨna nyɨbɨramaarakelyɨ.
Yɨrɨka naangegaa'na sahwai Naangerɨ kale'na gaimwange' bɨramaarana! Nabaai Anga Epazaazɨ sahwai kwalaalyanna nyɨdaayada nyɨgaimwagake daza' gɨmɨ saigɨ nayaa mena yawɨ'manɨgɨnyarɨnera.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ, nɨmɨre kaimɨraayaigɨ, gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai yanga gaimwanga gyakevɨ Gotɨyai dɨragɨnya givaimwagatheigɨnyɨ. Dɨragɨnya sa' dɨmaaka!

Nabaai yagaala gɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nadɨnya sa a'mwe jalɨkurakya'ne kwalaalyaraayaba nɨmɨ wɨjɨwakadaari yɨ daza a'mwe pwara nayaa maremwaaibɨ'deraavɨ nayaa jawɨrawɨjaama! Yɨ sahwara dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsara dɨvi a'mwe pwaraavɨjɨ nayaa wɨjɨwɨripɨnerera.
Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazare aawɨlata tewaanyaigɨ kwaamu' mwaala'gɨzɨ taanginya nemɨ aawɨlata pwainaavɨ ma'daanyabaaibɨ' wawɨnya yɨja dazavɨna taanginya dɨnye'mwannamaaka!

Sare' daresɨ. Aawɨlata aane pwai kwai wawɨnya dala nabinabinya pɨnɨjɨ lɨmwagathei mɨ'. Sai “Aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaalyarɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨdahɨlakakerɨ nɨmɨre wawɨnya yɨwɨjanna tewaanya wigalɨma!” dozɨ yune aawɨlasaraavɨre tewaanya sabwina lɨmwagaradelyɨ.

Nabaai ke'ba'nanya pɨrɨ' daresɨ. A'mwei gavamarasɨ'nyɨya yada dazabwina kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' mamɨdɨnyɨ yaja' yɨ sai gamɨdaasɨ wavɨlavajare' mamaari yadelyɨ. Aawa. Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' nayaa mɨdɨnajai yɨ sai maaradelyɨ.
Nabaai ke'ba'nanya aaya' daresɨ. A'mwei wawɨnya yagɨyagɨ yada wia burɨdehaa' maremwaalajai wawɨnya yaja sangɨ aayagaa' gamɨdaasɨ tɨka munne yabwaryagaa' sɨnnawɨ maarana!
Nɨmɨ yagaala dɨwe dazavɨna gɨmɨ sɨmunya' nayaa jawɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Naangei gɨmɨre yawɨsavɨ giwɨryadelyɨra. Sarevɨ nabaai gɨmɨ yagaala yuyangɨya aaya kaavɨlya' jawɨrangadeigɨnyɨra.

Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna sɨmunya nayaa jawɨka! Sai balakerɨ yɨdɨkaavakerɨna, sare sai Kingɨya Devitɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨdaasarɨna nɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' dadɨnyarɨnera. Nayaa yawɨ'dɨ dɨragɨnna kuna dɨthaaka!

Nɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya daza' wɨjɨwaake'na yune dazahɨrɨvɨna a'mwera kayaa'nanyabwi yaderɨna taanginya wɨjaavadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' taanginya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya nyɨjaavadɨvɨsare. Yo, kalavuza kɨrɨvɨjɨ wɨla nyɨrakesare. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare yagaalya' kalavuza yɨ'narade' mɨka! Sa' yuneba kaanya kuna yamaryadesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwannadɨ taanginya yuya daza maa'manɨgeinyɨ. “Gotɨyai yune gamɨnne dahɨlakɨnɨkeraavɨna gaimwagɨma!” dadɨ yɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ yawɨ'dɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai yuna wɨvadaihasamaata sa' gannya gaalyabwi sahwara kwarajɨ maapɨka! Sara yɨpɨjara yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ nawɨ'nyavɨ mwaaibɨka!” yawɨ'dɨ dɨragɨnna daa'manɨge.
Nabaai dɨragɨnna dɨthaaka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yagaala datha' dɨragɨnna nebwina lɨmwaga'daanya'nanyɨ. Yɨ dara dɨnɨ'
“Nemɨ gamɨjɨ ye'mwannabaloina mwalaaja'
Nabaai sahwalyɨ gaala ye'mwannamwalaadeinera.
Taanginya yuya sabwi maarya'na
Nemɨ dɨragɨnna mwaaihoina mwalaaja'
Nabaai sahwalyɨ kingɨya ye'mwannemwalaadeinera.
Kɨrɨ' ‘Gamɨreina mɨ',’ daatheina mwalaaja'
Nabaai nemɨnyɨna ‘Nɨmɨrera mɨ',’ dathelyɨra.
Gamɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna kuna malɨmwagaryaaja'
Sahwai gannya yagaalya lɨmwaga'dei mwaaladelyɨ.
Darevɨnyɨ. Gamɨ sarɨne ayɨna yawɨradannei mɨ'.”

Yuyagaa' gɨmɨre a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyangɨna yagaala dazangɨ yɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya ja! Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ yagaala dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyanna mala jɨhurayɨ'nya nyɨpɨdɨ'de'na yagaala dɨragɨnna dɨzalɨkurakɨdeigɨnyɨ. Sasare sabwi a'mwe aane pwai kwarɨ yɨnɨga wi'na gaimwagathe' mɨ'. A'mwera yagaala sasarengɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨjaraavɨ sɨmunyangɨ yuna kayaaka yɨgalakɨna yadesɨ.

“Wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨnya nebulyainyɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavɨnɨma!” yawɨ'dɨ dɨragɨnna nayaa ja! Sara kya'gɨzɨ Gotɨyai gɨmɨre wawɨnya yɨjaigɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nadelyɨ. Sarevɨ yagaala nebulya'na nayaa yɨda'nanya'na duzɨwaakya! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ “Gotɨyaryaba wagɨla mamaari yɨvanɨgeinyɨra. Sabwina yɨlaaya nyadelyɨra,” jawɨ'deigɨnyɨ.

Yagaala waramarina yanne dala pɨnɨnnanyajɨ madɨnna! Gotɨyarebwi maayanna madɨnna! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yagaala sasare sa Gotɨyarɨ bule'na wɨjaaya'ne tuta sarɨkɨ a'mwera sara dadɨvɨsaraavɨ kuna makwodengɨ.

Sarevɨ nabaai kumɨre yagaalya wa'waaya bwia bu'de tɨka da'de kɨlaakejɨ' kayaaka yɨgaide sabɨsangɨ. Sara yada naanga yɨma'nadengɨ. Sara kayaa'na dadɨvɨta yɨta savaakɨdaasaraai yɨ Aaimenaayazalyɨ Paailitazalyɨ saraalyɨra.

Sahwaraai sɨkwa yɨrawakɨwaai. Yagaala nebulyavɨ yɨwetawakya yɨwaalyaraalyɨ. Saraai kwaasɨ dara dadisaraalyɨ “Gotɨyai bainɨkeinaavɨ kuryaraavɨ mena neyɨdɨkaa'mwakesɨ. Dɨvi kɨlaaka mudɨkejɨsɨ madɨkaayɨ yaadeinera.” Yagaala sasare dazavɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨre yawɨta Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨnevɨ kayaaka yɨgaimanɨgɨlyaraalyɨ.

Sare' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai sɨmya dɨragɨnya naangerɨ mena wɨdaakwakabaaibɨ' gamɨre a'mweraavɨ wivaimwadelyɨ. Sara wɨdaakwakei dɨragɨnna daavɨ'. Sɨmya dazarɨ yavɨkwajɨke'bɨ' pɨkarya' dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Naangei gannya yune a'mweraavɨ nayaa yawɨrangamanɨkelyɨ. Nabaai pɨkarya pɨrɨ' daresɨ. A'mwe yuya gazarazara “Naangerɨneinyɨ,” dadɨvɨsara kayaa'nanyabwi yɨda'maraanga mya sabwina bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨka!

Anga naangevɨ maa'gula pɨnɨ golɨyajɨ sɨlɨvaayajɨ wana nawɨ'nya yavɨkarinɨke kɨnɨnnake gave daaka! Aawa. Pɨnɨ yɨsangɨ yavɨkaryadɨvɨsajɨ pɨnɨ kwaakengɨ yavɨkaryadɨvɨsajɨ warɨkengɨ. Yɨ pɨnɨ wawɨnya nawɨ'nya ya'ne, pɨnɨ wawɨnya waryaanya dala nabinabinya ya'ne.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai gamɨ sarɨ sasare kayaa'nanya sabwi duimwagasɨ'nɨnojɨ nawɨ'nya gɨrɨ'maayai mwaalajai wawɨnya nawɨ'nya ya'nei mwaaladelyɨ. Nabaai sai gamɨre Naangerɨ yɨnɨga wi'na gaimwagannelyɨ. Yuya wawɨnya tewaanya sanna yavutavemwaala yannelyɨ.

Sare'na gɨmɨ yuya kayaa'nanya yawɨta sabwi mɨgɨnyaraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ yɨma'nade dɨragɨnya sabwina lɨkaanya jenadakwona! Sara yadɨ yɨda'maraangebulyɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebulyɨ pwaraavɨna gɨvu'nyabulyɨ kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ dɨmɨjamakwona! A'mwera sɨmunya yɨda'maraangebwi kɨnɨnnakera Naangerɨ jaka wɨdadɨvɨsarajɨ sabwi dɨmɨjamakwona!
Yaasɨwaka yagaala dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya a'mwe navɨ'navɨka sɨmunya muwarikerajɨ gavamarasɨ'nyɨyagaalyangɨna “Aala!” dɨthana! Gɨmɨ mena yawɨ'manɨgɨ. Sasare yagaala sa' malyabwi marima'naabadesɨ.

Kɨrɨ' Naangere yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai mala tamamarya'nei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ bwiwanna mwaalana! Sai wɨjɨwaakya'nei nawɨ'nyai mwaalana! Sɨnna tɨka daya sabwi myada a'mwera gamɨnyɨ kayaa'na wigaidaapi baihana'na wiana!

Yɨ sai kwaamu'nanyabwi nayaa yada a'mwe yagaala galazekɨvaidɨvɨsaraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ yavada'galana! Sai sasara yaja' Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaasabwi wɨjaavadera dɨngaka? Yɨ sara yapɨjɨ yagaala nebulya' nayaa yawɨrangabɨ'derera.

Sɨnnawɨ Kayaa'nanyare naanyavɨ gamɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨnya'neraavɨ wɨla yɨrakakere. Nabaai gɨmɨ kave wɨjɨwaakya'ne sahwara yagaala nebulya' yawɨrangabɨza' naanyavɨ yagalya'mapɨ'devaaibɨ' kumɨre sɨmunyai ayɨna nayaa yawɨpɨ'dere.
Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ nayaa dara jawɨka! Yɨrɨka aaya'nerɨkaavɨ taanginya kwalaalya kayaa'nanya yɨma'nadengɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sagaa' a'mwera yune kumɨ saraavɨna wɨvu'nadere. Nɨgwianna tewaanya wɨvu'nadere. Yune kumɨnyɨne yayanna makidɨvɨsare. Pihadɨka yadɨvɨsara yaasɨwa' yamarina, Gotɨyarɨnajɨ bɨraiyagaala wɨdɨna. Kuvɨnɨmaangeyuraavɨre yagaalya galazekɨvaina. “Su! Su!” mujadɨvɨsara. Yuya tewaanya nawɨ'nyabwi maayara.

Kumɨre avaaitaweraavɨna nayaa muvu'nyadera. Mayagaala javwi makwasakɨpɨ'dera mɨ'. Pwaraavɨ kwaasɨ dɨragɨnna jɨda'dɨvɨtara. Kwaamu'nanyabwi maayara sɨmunyabwi nayaa mamaremwaainyadɨvɨtara. A'mweraavɨ yaasɨwa' kayaaka yɨgalamarina. Tewaanya yuya saburɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaidera.

Kumɨre kwɨya'mwera yɨkamaangeraavɨre asɨrɨ marɨmwangɨna. Kumɨre sɨmunya yuya kayaa'nanya sabwi yɨme'nya'bɨ' mɨdɨnna. Pihadɨkebwi yadɨvɨ' “Nemɨ a'mwe naangeine,” yawɨ'na. Gotɨyarɨna “Aala!’ dadɨvɨ' muvu'nyaderera. Aawa. Wabahɨlaakeburɨna wɨvu'nadera.
Gotɨyarɨ kwaasɨ yune kɨlaakejɨkɨna mɨdɨdɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare saburɨya dɨragɨnya sabwina bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨ'. A'mwe sasare saraavɨ yagalya'ma'na ja!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe sasare saraavɨdaa'nya pwara “A'mwe sangɨ kwaasɨ kave wabwiwayagaala wɨdaana!” dadɨvɨ' sɨmunya nawɨ'nya myawɨryadɨvɨta sangɨre angengɨ kave widɨvɨ' kumɨre sɨmunya wɨla galyɨrakɨdɨvɨsangɨ. A'mwe sasare kayaa'nanya yɨngakɨnɨke kɨnɨnnake kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ taanginya wa'demɨlɨke. Kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnnanyanna mwagi'namarya'na kumɨre sɨmunya' dɨkaa'demɨlɨke.
A'mwe daza yuyagaa' yagaalya maa'dɨvɨta kɨnɨ kɨrɨ' yagaala nebulya' yawɨrangadɨvɨta mɨka. Yɨ sahɨnɨngɨre angengɨ bwidɨvɨ' kayaa'na wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsare.

Kɨgaa' Jaanɨzalyɨ Jaabɨrɨzalyɨ saraai Ne Mozɨzarɨna yɨkamaanga yɨma'nagɨla yelyabaaibɨ' a'mwe dazara kwaasɨ dɨvanɨgasara yagaala nebulyavɨ yɨkamaange' yɨvanɨga'. Kumɨre sɨmunyabwi Saataanɨ sɨmunya kayaa'nanyarɨ mena wakakera kayaa'na yawɨ'dɨvɨsara. Sarevɨ sahwaraavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwangebwi kwaasɨyabwi yɨma'nakesɨ. Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨna yaamɨjɨ yɨdakwasanganaka gamɨre bule'na wɨjaavɨna. “Aala!” dɨna.

Kɨrɨ' kumɨre dazabwi naanga yɨma'nadevwi mɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' a'mwera Jaanɨzalyɨ Jaabɨrɨzalyɨ saraare navɨ'navɨkebwi tɨnna wanganyaatabaaibɨ' a'mwe yuyara kumɨre navɨ'navɨka sabwi tɨnna nayaa wangabɨ'dere.

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ saigɨ nɨmɨjɨ nye'mwannayamaryadɨ gɨmɨ nɨmɨrebwi mena yawɨrangadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨre wɨjɨwɨryabulyɨ, nɨmɨre mwaalyabulyɨ, nɨmɨre yuya saburɨ aaya kaavɨlyajɨ, Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwagasabulyɨ, kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ, a'mweraavɨna wɨvu'nyabulyɨ, taanginya maa'dɨ dɨragɨnna mwaalyabulyɨ. Yuya sa nyawɨrangadɨnyaigɨnyɨ.

Kayaa'nanya yuya sa a'mwera nyadaapi nabaai yuya daanga sa maa'dɨnyainyɨ Anga Aadɨyokɨjɨ Anga Aaikonɨyamɨjɨ Anga Lɨzɨtɨraajɨ mena nyawɨranganagɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ kayaa'nanyajɨ daangejɨ sa nyɨjavadaapi dɨragɨnna daa'dɨ maa'dɨnyainyɨ. Nabaai sara kayaa'na nyadaapi Naangei taanginya yuya dazangɨ nyɨvadaihasamaarakeinyɨ.
Yo, a'mwe yuyara Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ wɨlamwaaidɨvɨsa'na “Gotɨyarebwi mɨdɨnaana!” dapi yɨpɨjaraavɨ yɨkamaangera kayaa'na wigaibɨ'dere.

A'mwe kayaa'nanyarajɨ kwaasɨyarajɨ kumɨrebwi kayaa'nanya naanga yɨma'nadesɨ. A'mweraavɨ kwaasɨyabwina kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakɨpɨ'dere. Nabaai sahwaraavɨ kumɨ kwaraavɨ Saataanɨ Kayaa'nanyai kwaasɨyabwina wɨjɨwaakadelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ saigɨ maaragɨnya yagaala dazasɨ mena lɨmwagahɨnya dazasɨ nayaa kuna dɨlɨmwagaka! Nemɨ a'mwe yagaala dazavɨna gɨzɨwakadaanyainaavɨna nemɨre tewaanyabulyɨyainaavɨna nayaa neyawɨrangadɨnya'na dɨragɨnna kuna dɨlɨmwagaka!

Nabaai datha' kɨrɨsɨ yawɨrangadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ gɨmɨ kaimɨraaya maalɨkeigɨ kuna mwaalagɨna Bukuya Tewaanyavɨ sɨmunya gaai yawɨramaaragɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Bukuya dazi sɨmunya tewaanya' yɨnɨga wi'na gɨzaavannilyɨ. Sara kagyozɨ Gotɨyai gɨvadaihasamaarya'neigɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨ lɨmwadɨnneigɨnyɨ.

Gotɨyare Kuryai Bukuyavɨya yagaala yuya marima'naabakelyɨ. Nabaai yagaala daza' nemɨnyɨ sɨmunya wɨjaaya'ne tewaanaangesɨ. Sara yada nemɨre kayaa'nanya yadaanya sabwina neyɨbwarɨdaakwada maanga nedade'nanyɨ. Nabaai nemɨre mwaalyaburɨ neyavada'gaide'nanyɨ. Sara neyada yɨda'maraangebwina neyɨwɨryade'nanyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe Gotɨyarerɨ wɨmwaaihada dɨragɨnya yunebanna yɨnɨga wi'nanyarɨ. Sare'na wawɨnya yuya tewaanya sa ya'na yemwaala yɨvanɨkelyɨra.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ, gaala mwaaihasaraavɨjɨ bainɨkeraavɨjɨ maryawɨbwaradelyɨ. Yɨ sahwalyɨ Gotɨyalyɨ saraaryaba yagaala dɨragɨnna dara gɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai a'mwe yuyaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ yɨma'naabozɨ Kingɨya yuyagaa' yuyagaa' maremwaaladelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gɨmɨ dazahɨrɨ'na yawɨ'dɨ gamɨre yagaalya' duzɨwaakya! A'mwera yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nya'na yɨlaaya yɨpɨjahaasɨ yɨlaaya mipɨjahaasɨ yuyagaa' yawɨralɨmwagarya'neigɨ dɨragɨnna ja! Kumɨre yɨwetawakya'na maanga duthana! Kumɨre sɨmunyarɨ wɨdɨhaa'bwata ja! Gotɨyarebwi mɨdɨbɨ'de'na kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨvaimwagawɨmwaaihɨna ja! Sare'na ya'ne yuyagaa' gɨmɨ kwaamu'na yadɨ sahwaraavɨ nayaa jɨwɨrideigɨnyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dɨvi sagaa' a'mwera yagaala maamɨdarya mamaari yɨpɨ'dere. Aawa. Yune kumɨre yawɨta kayaa'nanya saburɨna mɨdɨdɨvɨ' kumɨre wɨjɨwɨrya ya'ne kwalaalyaraavɨ maramadakɨpɨ'dere. Sarevɨ wɨjɨwaakyara kumɨre kadɨkikaavɨ sɨka mwagi'nadɨvɨ' yagaala pɨnɨ kumɨnyɨ tewaanya wɨvu'najanna maapɨ'dere.
Yɨ sare' pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yagaala nebulya' kadɨka wɨ'nya'nevɨna gɨnyɨra'na yɨpɨ'desɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yagaala yaasɨwaka genna wajɨngyagaala dala pɨnɨnna kadɨki' wakamaremwaaibɨ'dere.

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ saigɨ yuyagaa' yuyangɨ sɨmunya nayaa pada'gaina jawɨka! Naangerɨna taanginya dɨmaaka! A'mweraavɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakya'ne wawɨnya nayaa ja! A'mweraavɨ wɨdaaya'na, gaimwange'na wawɨnya' kɨnɨnnake'neigɨnyɨ. Wawɨnya daza' gɨmɨ nayaa yunebanna pada'gala ya ja!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwera kwaraanyaba Gotɨyarɨne waainɨya dɨngadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' tamakya'neinyɨ nɨmɨre tawe' mena dɨma'nade'nanyɨ. Nɨmɨregaa' mena kɨbawa yɨwawode'na yɨwakegaakɨ.

Mala nawɨ'nyavɨ Naangerɨna gaidaa'mweinyɨ. Naangerɨne wawɨnya'na gavamarasɨ'nyɨkaanya kaanyave'na mena nayaa wɨweinyɨ. Dahaa' aayawɨnyavɨna mena yɨ'maveneinyɨ. Dɨragɨnna lɨmwagasabwi mena dɨragɨnna lɨmwamweinyɨ.

Nabaai dahaa' a'mwe gavamarasɨ'nyɨkaanya' wavɨla'dɨvɨsaraavɨne tɨvɨkɨsa' yemwaala nyɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna. Tɨvɨkɨta daza' dare'na. Yɨrɨka Naanga dazarɨkɨ Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ “Yɨda'maraangebwi yadɨnyaigɨnyɨra,” nyɨdathesɨ. Naangei sahwai yawɨbwata'ne yɨda'maraangelyɨ. Yɨ naangegaa' tɨvɨkɨta daza' nyɨjaavadelyɨ. Nabaai kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna gaveinyɨna nyɨjaavadeinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe gamɨnyɨ ku'maayabanna kima'naabozɨ tɨnna wanganya'na mena wɨvu'naderaavɨ yuya sahwaraavɨ wɨjaavadelyɨ.
Gɨmɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' ya'gɨzɨ maalɨkegaa' nɨmɨnyawɨnna yarai dɨvadeigɨnyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dimaazai dahaasa sabwina tewaanya wɨvu'nade', nɨmɨnyɨ mena nyagalya'mavaka Anga Tezalonaaikana wɨwakerɨna. Nabaai Kɨrezanɨ Pɨrovijɨ Galezɨyana wɨwa'. Taaitazai Pɨrovijɨ Dalɨmezɨyana wɨwa'.
Lukɨyai gave sahwainanyai nɨmɨjɨ nye'mwannamwaalɨ'. Gɨmɨ Maakɨyarɨ maara'gɨzɨ dɨmakadelyɨra. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sai nɨmɨre wawɨnyavɨ gaimwange'na tewaanya nyadelyɨ. Sare'na dɨmakadelyɨ.
Nabaai Tɨkikaazarɨ Anga Epazaazɨna mena maryaasɨwa. Sarenna yarai dɨvadeigɨnyɨ.

Gɨmɨ “Wɨma!” da'gɨzɨyagaa' nɨmɨre yɨvɨta yɨrɨlyagaa'ne saamɨnya daza' dɨnyɨmaa'deigɨnyɨ. Yɨvɨta sa' anga Tɨrawaazɨ A'mwe Kaapazare angevɨ wakesɨ. Nabaai bukuya kɨnɨjɨ maara'gɨzɨ nabaai navɨka nyɨwɨdɨ'de'na sipɨzipɨyangɨre kɨlaakengɨ yavɨkarinɨkejɨ dɨnyɨmaa'deigɨnyɨ.
Alekɨzaadai, kwaari'mata bɨraazɨya yavɨkaryadei, sai nɨmɨnyɨ wana kayaa'na nyɨgalakelyɨ. Sara nyake sarɨ dɨvi yɨnɨga gamɨ yake sabwina Naangei kayaa'nanya wɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ.
Nabaai gɨmɨ kwaigɨ a'mwe dazarɨna nayaa mala jɨwannadeigɨnyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dazahwai nemɨre yagaalya marulawakya neyɨbainadelyɨ.

Aaya mudɨ'nanyagaa' kotɨyavɨ yagaalya wɨdadaari nɨmɨjɨ nyɨgaidaavaka nyɨgaimwagakei a'mwe pwai kwai mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe yuyara yagalya'makuna nyesare. Sare'na nabaai nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨdaangadɨnyainyɨ “Kumɨre kayaa'nanya yɨvanɨgata sanna myawɨ'dɨnnera!”

Sare' kɨrɨ' Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ yuyagaa' nyangada gamɨre dɨragɨnya' nyɨjaavakelyɨ. Sarevɨ “Nɨmɨ yagaala tewaanya' yɨnɨga wi'nanya' wɨjɨwaakɨma! Sara wɨjɨwakadaa'muri ajɨmya yuyangɨyara yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨka!” dena sara wɨde. Nabaai Gotɨyai kavɨjɨlɨkere (laayonɨyare) maangevɨ nyurakasamaarakelyɨ.

Yuya kayaa'nanya sabura nɨmɨnyɨna “Kayaaka yaana!” dadɨvɨ' nyadaapi Naangei nayaa nyurakasamaaradelyɨ. Sare'na nabaai gamɨre maremwaaide naangevɨ Sɨgunyavɨna nyɨmakwia'neinyɨ nyɨvadaihasamaaradelyɨ. Sahwarɨna “Byaannakelyɨ,” dadaa gamɨnne yaya' yuyagaa' yuyagaa' nemɨ munya ke'ba makɨlaana! Naanga nebulyasɨ.
Nɨmɨnyɨna Pɨrɨzɨlavɨjɨ Aakwilaamɨjɨ Wonezɨporaazare angevɨyaraavɨjɨ duthana! “Polɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨ' ‘Nya'mweihi!’ ”
Anga Koridɨ Erazɨtaazai kuna mwaalɨ'. Nabaai Tɨropimaazai nalaavɨnakei mwaalakevɨ anga Maalitaazɨ saba kuna mwaalya'nerɨ wɨmwaaihena yagalya'mave.
Gɨmɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' ya'gɨzɨ dɨvadeigɨnyɨ. Yɨhuta kayaa'nanya pɨgaa'na nyemwaaidɨka! Yuvyulaazalyɨ Pyuthenɨzalyɨ Laainazalyɨ Kɨlothɨyaasɨ neya'mwe yuya pwarajɨ gɨmɨnyɨna “Neya'mweigɨ!” gyasɨwaabaa'.
Naangei gɨmɨre kuryalyɨ gye'mwannemwaalana! Gamɨre yanga gaimwange' sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannarana!
Taaitazai,

Polɨnyɨ pɨkarya da' yɨda'manɨgeinyɨ. Gotɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ, Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Nyɨdaasadeinyɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ mwaaihe. Gotɨyai yune gamɨnne dahɨlakake a'mwera kwalaalyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagya'neraavɨna nyɨmaryaasadeinyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyarebwi mɨdɨbɨ'devɨna yagaala nebulya' yawɨramaarya'nevɨnajɨ gaimwanga ya'neinyɨ nyɨmaryaasadeinyɨ.

Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwina sahwara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' yemwaaibɨ'de'na wɨgaimwadɨnyainyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai Kwaakeva' mwakyaakegaa' gaala daza' nemɨnyɨ wɨjaaya'na yune naanga nebulya'na mena wɨjaakelyɨ. Sai kwaasɨya dadei mɨ'. Sa' yanga nejaavadelyɨ.

Nabaai dɨvi, dazagaa' gamɨ sai dahɨlakajahaa' gaala dazavɨne yagaalya' ku'maayaba yɨma'naabakesɨ. Yɨ yagaala sa' a'mwera wɨjɨwaakya'neraavɨ wɨdakesɨ. Sahwai nemɨnyɨne padaihasamaasai Gotɨyai kɨwɨnya dakaka yagaala sa' lɨmwagarawɨjɨwaakya'neinyɨna nyɨjaavadelyɨ.

Taaitazaigɨ, gɨmɨnyɨ kagɨzɨwaake nɨmɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwagarebaaibɨ' gɨmɨ lɨmwagaragɨ. Sare' nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya tewaanyaigɨ yɨma'nagɨ. Yɨ sasareigɨnyɨ Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai nemɨre nevadaihasamaa'delyɨ yanga gaimwange'na gyakɨlyɨ gɨmɨnyɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi tewaanya gwakika!

Ahu'manna Kɨritɨ kuna mwaaidɨnyaigɨnyɨ gyahalya'maveigɨnyɨ “Wawɨnya pɨnɨ nɨmɨ myengɨ ja! Nabaai anga gazabazaba Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨ maremwaala'ne a'mwe naanga pwaraavɨ dakya!” dena sɨnnawɨ gɨthevaaibɨ' jɨtheigɨnyɨ.

Dara gɨthe. A'mwe pwai a'mweraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ yɨwetawakya pɨnɨ myaderɨ wangana'gɨzɨ sai a'mwe yune gave pɨrɨ'nanyarɨ nabaai gamɨre kaimɨraaya kɨmɨlɨkajɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsamɨlɨkaavɨ, kayaa'nanya sabwi ya'na yagaala pɨnɨ maayamɨlɨkaavɨ, kuvɨnɨmaangeyuraavɨ galazekɨvala myadɨvɨsamɨlɨkaavɨ, yɨ a'mwe sasare dazarɨ maremwaala'nerɨ dɨthahɨlakɨdeigɨnyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare wawɨnyavɨ maremwaala ya'ne mwaalɨkabaaibɨ' Naangereraavɨ maremwaaidei nayaa yɨda'na yamaryadelyɨ. Sara yadaawori a'mwera yɨwetawakya pɨrɨ' kɨrɨvɨ mabɨramaari yɨpɨ'delyɨ. Sarei mwaalana! Sai pihadɨka mi yadelyɨ. Sai sɨnna tɨka yarai mudayɨ yadelyɨ. Sai biyaaya nada yɨmaka widei mɨ'. Sarei mwaalana! Sai a'mweraavɨ mala yaasɨwa'na maramamaryadelyɨ. Sai nɨgwia gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalyanna tɨganaarya myadelyɨ.

Aawa. Sai a'mwe anga pɨbadaa'nyɨ angyɨrɨ'maakaanya bɨpɨjaraavɨ maa'da nayaa maremwaaidelyɨ. Sai yuya tewaanya nawɨ'nya sabwina yada sɨmunya yune nawɨ'nyaburɨna mɨdɨnadelyɨ. Sai nayaa yɨda'na nebwina mwaaida Gotɨyare yuya sabwi mɨdɨnadelyɨ. Gɨrɨka maayalyɨ. Sai nabaai gannya sabwina nayaa maremwaainadelyɨ.

Sai yagaala nebula tewaanya' gamɨnyɨ wɨjɨwaakɨnɨke' nayaa dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Gotɨyai “Sai a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakya yagaala maamɨdaryavɨna yɨvaimwagannei mwaalana! Sara yada a'mwe yagaalya galazekɨvaidɨvɨsaraavɨ dɨragɨnna yɨnɨga wɨdannei mwaalana!” kada' yagaala sa' lɨmwaga'delyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe kwalaalyara yagaala tewaamaraange galazekɨvaidɨvɨsara mwaaiha'. Sahwara yagaala yaasɨwa'na dadɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyangɨna kwaasɨ wɨdadɨvɨsare. A'mwe kwalaalya sasarera “Kɨlaaka gurya dɨtha'nyɨla!” dadɨvɨsare Juyara.

A'mwe sasarera “A'mweraavɨre nɨgwia mwagi'nya'neina sasarebura wɨjɨwɨryaana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨsara nemɨ myaanne sabwina nɨgwia wagɨla wɨjaaya'nenna wɨjɨwɨryadɨvɨsare. Sasare sabwi pwaraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ mwagi'nadaapi jɨlɨkaimɨraaya yuyangɨre kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨwɨna yɨvanɨkere. A'mwe sasare saraavɨre maangengɨ bɨpaibɨka!

Ahu'manna Kɨritɨ mwaaida'gɨzɨyaba mwaalyai dazahɨbadaa'nyai sɨdu'naka akwai sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' gamɨreraavɨna dara dɨna “A'mwe Ahu'manna Kɨritɨ mwaalyara yuyagaa' kwaasɨyabwina dadɨvɨsarera. Malakayaawarya kayaa'nanyare. Sahwara tɨka kwalaalya nadɨvɨ' wana maa'na widere.”
Jalɨkurakya daza' nebulyasɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ “Kumɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨ maamɨdaryara mwaaibɨka!” da'gɨzɨ sahwaraavɨ maanga dɨragɨnna duthana!
Nabaai sahwara Juyaraavɨre wajɨngyagaalyajɨ a'mwe yagaala nebulya' bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨsaraavɨre yagaaikɨwɨnya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyajɨ kadɨki' wakamaremwaala nyɨpɨka!

A'mwe Gotɨyai sɨmunyavɨ nawɨ'nyabwi yavada'galawakakera nawɨ'nyabwi kɨnɨnnakeraavɨna yuya sa tewaanya gɨrɨka maayangɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ sɨmunya gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi kɨnɨnnakera “Kɨraazɨtɨyai yuya sa kɨmaakɨya dakɨnɨkebwi wasɨ'nakebulyɨ,” myawɨralɨmwagyadɨvɨsaraavɨna tewaanya aane pɨnɨ kɨnɨ mi. Aawa. Kumɨre sɨmunyasɨ sɨmunya padaihɨrakyalyɨ yuyawaai yuna gɨrɨkita'nanyawaalyɨ.

Kumɨre maangengɨdaa'nyɨ ku'maayaba dara dadɨvɨsare “Nɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨna yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨra.” Kɨrɨ' kumɨre yamaryabwina Gotɨyarɨna bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨsare. Sare sabwina Gotɨyarɨ yuna maa'na wima'nadelyɨ. A'mwe yagaala nawɨ'nya' galazekɨvaidɨvɨsare. Nabaai wawɨnya tewaanya ya yuya ya'nera yɨnɨga wi'na yɨpɨnera mɨ'. Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ yawɨramaaradera mɨ'.
Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ saigɨ gɨmɨre wɨjɨwaakya maamɨdarya sasɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yadevwina a'mweraavɨ nayaa duthana!

Yɨ neraavɨ nayaa dara duthana! “A'mwe neihi waainɨya nadɨvɨ' yɨmaka muibɨnera!” Sahwara tewaanya yɨda'maraangebwina sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kumɨre sɨmunya nayaa maremwaaibɨka! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨ maamɨdaryara pada'galemwaaibɨka! Pwaraavɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nyaburɨjɨ taanginya yuyangɨne'na dɨragɨnna daayaburɨjɨ tewaanya pada'galemwaaibɨka!
Sabaaibɨ' a'mwe ne kɨmɨlɨkajɨ tewaanna nawɨ'nya pada'gainyɨna yamaripɨka! Bulayagaalyajɨ nadɨpɨdɨka! Kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ aalya waainɨya dɨragɨnya' numaremwaaladɨka! Tewaanyabura wɨjɨwɨripɨka!
“A'mwe mɨgɨnyɨkɨbawemɨlɨkaavɨ tewaanyabwina yɨbwarɨdaakupɨka!” dena gɨthɨwa. Dare yabwina nayaa wɨjɨwɨripɨ'demɨlɨke. Kunnya a'mweraavɨna kunnya kaimɨraaya kɨnɨngɨnajɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nyɨna wiade'na.

Nabaai kunnya sɨmunyarɨjɨ nayaa maremwaainyɨna yadɨvɨ' gɨrɨka maaya nebwina mwaaibɨ'demɨlɨke. Sara yadɨvɨ' nabaai kunnya angengɨjɨ tewaanna maremwaaina yɨpɨ'demɨlɨke. Sara yapi a'mweraavɨjɨ kunnya kaimɨraayangɨjɨ nayaa pada'galagaimwanna yɨpɨ'demɨlɨke. Saremɨlɨka kunnya a'mweraavɨ dalaangewɨ mwaaibɨ'demɨlɨke. “Nemɨrebwina a'mwera Gotɨyare yagaalya'na bɨraiyagaala nadɨpɨdɨka!” dadɨvɨ' a'mwe tewaanyamɨlɨka sara mwaaibɨ'demɨlɨke.
Sasare'bɨ' a'mwe mɨgɨnyɨkɨbaweraavɨ dɨhaa'bwata jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Nabaai sare kwarajɨ kumɨre sɨmunya nayaa maremwaainɨpɨ'dere.

Gɨmɨ tewaanya yɨja yuya sabwi gɨmɨ saigɨ ke'ba'nanyaigɨ dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ. A'mwera gɨmɨ tewaanya yɨjaigɨnyɨ gɨmɨdɨdɨvɨ' dala pɨbwinanya tewaanyabwina yɨpɨ'dere. A'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwɨrya sabwina nɨgwia mwagi'nya'na myawɨ'dɨnna! Nawɨ'nyabwi yawɨ'dɨ nayaa ja! Yuyagaa' nayaa pada'galayawɨ'dɨ nebulyabwina jɨwɨrya!

Yagaala maamɨdarya yavada'galya'ne' a'mwera yɨwetawakya majɨdaya'ne' nayaa duthatheigɨnyɨ. “Nemɨre yɨkamaangera nemɨnyɨ kayaakyagaala aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' nedɨpɨnevɨna ‘O, yɨwetawakya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mwari'. We'! Sɨmunya' neyekɨ'mwaka!’ yawɨpɨka!” dadɨ sara duthatheigɨnyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarera yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ gɨmɨ nayaa dara duthana! Yuyangɨne'na kunnya maremwaalyaraavɨ dalaangewɨ mwaaibɨka! Sahwara kunnya maremwaalyaraavɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨke wawɨnya dala pɨnɨnnanya tewaanya nayaa yɨpɨka! Yagaala kayaa'nanya kunnya maremwaalyaraavɨ ayɨna naja'nawɨdɨpɨka!

Sahwaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨta pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' yuina numaapɨka! Aawa. Kumɨre yagaalya lɨmwaga'dɨvɨ' kunnya yɨda'nanyabwi wibwarɨdaakupɨka! “A'mwera yɨwaala yɨwannadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' nemɨre wawɨnyavɨna Gotɨyai nevadaihasamaa'derɨne yagaala wɨjɨwɨrinɨke' savɨne yaya naange' a'mwera munyaba makibɨka!” dapɨri nayaa sara yɨpɨka!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyare yanga gaimwange' a'mwe yuyaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na padaihasamaaranne' ku'maayabanna mena neyɨma'naabakesɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai baka nawɨ'nyɨna yakesɨ.

Gotɨyare yanga daza' Gotɨyarɨna bule'na wɨjaaya saburɨjɨ Kwaakevakɨya yuya sɨmunya kayaa'nanya saburɨjɨ makwasakaade'na wɨjɨwɨrya neyɨvanɨ'. “Dahaasavɨ nemɨ sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'na yadaa yɨda'maraangeburɨ nayaa yamaryadaa Gotɨyarɨna nayaa yavada'galayawɨ'na yadaa mwalaana!” dawaajɨ wɨjɨwɨrya sa' mɨdɨnaade'nanyɨ.

Nemɨ sara mwaidaa yɨlaaya yadaa tewaanaanga yɨnɨke' dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaa yemwaaimanɨgo. Yɨ, Gotɨya Naangei nemɨre nevadaihasamaa'dei Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨna yemwaidaa “Sahwai Sɨgunyavɨya byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨ ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathelyɨ,” yawɨ'daa yemwaaiholyɨra.

Sahwai nemɨnyɨ gamɨre gaalyabwi yagalya'mavakelyɨ. Nemɨnyɨna “Ayahi mubya yamaarya'neinyɨ kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka galazekɨvala yuya sangɨna wɨvadaihasamaarɨma! Aalya ya'mujɨ gɨrɨka duimwagasɨ'na'mujɨ nɨmɨnyɨne'na nɨmɨre tewaanyara wɨmwaaihɨwɨjara nɨmɨre yunera mwaaibɨka!” daka gamɨre gaalyabwi yagalya'ma'na. Sare' wawɨnya dɨragɨnna yadɨvɨ' yuya tewaanyabwina yɨpɨka!

Yuyagaa' yagaala daza a'mweraavɨ duzɨwaakya! Yagaala daza mɨdɨbɨ'de'na gɨmɨ dɨhaa'bwata ja! Sara yadɨ gɨmɨ maanga dɨragɨnna wɨdadɨ Naangere dɨragɨnya' maara'gɨzɨ mamɨdɨnyadɨvɨsaraavɨrebwi dɨrɨvɨpalasɨka! A'mwe aane pwai kwai gɨmɨnyɨna “A'mwe yaasɨwakelyɨra,” nagyawɨradɨka! Aawa. Naangere dɨragɨnyavɨ kuna ja!

Gɨmɨ a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyai kuna dɨha'bwarɨmwaaihya jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Yɨ ga'maanɨyarajɨ a'mwe maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ saraavɨ dalaangewɨ mwaaibɨka! Sahwaraavɨre yagaalya nayaa mɨdɨbɨ'derera. Wawɨnya yuya sa tewaanya ya'na tavaravana mwaaibɨ'derera.
A'mwe aane pwai kwarɨ bɨraiyagaala nudɨpɨdɨka! Mala narannɨpɨka! Pwara kumɨnyɨ kayaa'na kyapɨjɨ bwiwanga yabwi yɨpɨ'dere. Yuyaraavɨ kwaamu'nanya yuyabwi wipɨka!

Sare' yuyainaavɨne darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nabaai nemɨ kwainajɨ sɨmunya nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnaka maayaine. Nemɨ yagaalya galazekɨvaina yadaanyaina, Saataanɨ Kayaa'nanyai kwaasɨyabwina nedadaa'nyɨ yɨraataate yamaryagoine. Nemɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yadaa munyɨ' dɨkaata ya'ne dala pɨnɨnnanyangɨjɨ wabahɨlaaka ya'ne dala pɨnɨnnanyangɨjɨ mwaaloine. Kayaa'nanyaburɨjɨ tɨganaaryaburɨjɨ yamaryoina. A'mwera nemɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaalakeina, nabaai nemɨ kwainaavɨnajɨ sɨmɨlɨka wimwaalakeine.

Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai nemɨre nevadaihasamaa'dei a'mweinaavɨ tewaanya nayaa bwiwanna neyaka yanga naange'na neyɨvanɨkelyɨ. Sahwarɨ a'mweinaavɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nadelyɨ. Yɨ sasare sabwi ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabakebulyɨ.

Sahwai nevadaihasamaarakelyɨ. Dare'na mɨ'. Nemɨ yuna yɨda'maraanga yadaanya sabwina yawɨ'dana mɨ'. Aawa. Gamɨre nemɨnyɨna kale gaimwange'na sa'na nevadaihasamaarakelyɨ. Kurya Tewaanyai nemɨnyɨ aalya neyakeine. Yɨ aalya ya sabwi neyake' nawɨ'nya mudɨkeinaavɨ nemwaaihada nemɨre sɨmunyavɨjɨ kuryarɨjɨ mudɨkewaarɨ wɨmwaaihakelyɨ. Kurya Tewaanyai gaala mudɨkebwi nejaavakelyɨ. Sarevɨ Gotɨyai nevadaihasamaarakelyɨ.
Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre nevadaihasamaa'dei yakevɨ Gotɨyai Kurya Tewaanyarɨ yanga naange'na naanna newakakelyɨ.

Sai gamɨre yanga gaimwangevɨna nemɨnyɨna “A'mwe yɨda'maraangere. Nɨmɨrerera,” nedakevɨ “Gaala yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaalya'ne daza' yemwaaibɨ'dera Kuvɨnɨmaangeinyɨre yuya'na maarya'nera yɨma'nɨpɨka!” daka sara nemwaaihakelyɨ. Sare'na naanna nejaavakelyɨ.
Yagaala daza' lɨmwagasa'ne' naanga nebulyasɨ.

Nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ gɨmɨnyɨna dara yawɨ'manɨge. Dazahɨnɨngɨna gɨmɨ dɨragɨnna duthana! Sarevɨ nabaai a'mwe Gotɨyarɨ mena wɨ'nalɨmwagesaraavɨna “Kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ wawɨnya tewaanya dɨragɨnna ya'nengɨ wakɨnɨpɨka! Tewaanya saburɨna dɨragɨnna daapɨka!” da'gɨzɨ sara duthana! Dazahɨnɨ nawɨ'nya yaka a'mweraavɨ gaimwadengɨ.

Kɨrɨ' dala pɨnɨnnanya yagaala sɨmumaaya pinabɨsa yaasɨwa' yɨdaanganyajɨ Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨne yayajɨ maanga dɨnyajɨ Mozɨzare Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkenna maihurɨ'nyɨyagaala bathɨwiajɨ sasare dazangɨ davɨla'deigɨnyɨra. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Daza waryaanyangɨra. Daza kune nemɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na negaimwagathe mɨ'.

Gotɨyare yɨ'bwa'nawɨ'nadɨvɨsaraavɨ jaapalawɨmwaaihya'nere sɨmunyai nayaa javada'gala! Gave pɨgaa'na “Gɨmɨrebwina mala nayaa jɨwanna!” wɨda'gɨzɨ ayɨna sara yaja' pɨgasaai “Mala nayaa jɨwanna!” duthatheigɨnyɨra. Nabaai sai kadɨka mu'nyɨ kyojɨ sarɨna bule'na duzaadelyɨ.
Gɨmɨ dara jawɨka! A'mwe sasarei tuta nawɨ'nya' mena yagalya'mavaka gannya kayaa'nanya yadevwi gamɨ sarɨ jɨda'nya'nelyɨ.

Dɨvi nabaai nɨmɨ Aatemazai pwarɨ Tɨkikaazai kwarɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna kadamaryaasa'mujɨ gɨmɨ Nikopolɨzɨna nɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨme'nya'bɨ' dɨvadeigɨnyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ mena dɨweinyɨ. Aalyavɨ yɨhuta naangegaa'na anga Nikopolɨzɨ mwaalɨdeinyɨra.

Sinaazai kɨwɨnyangɨna sɨdu'nakelyɨ Aapolɨzalyɨ saraarɨ tusavɨne gaimwange'na yɨme'nya'bɨ'na nayaa dumakwodeigɨnyɨ. “Yɨ saraarɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kaanya yamarikade aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' numudaasadɨka!” da'gɨzɨ dɨhaimwadeigɨnyɨ.

Nabaai nemɨre a'mwera dɨragɨnna daaya'na a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨsanna dɨragɨnna wɨmudaasɨvanɨkeraavɨ tewaanya gaimwange'na sɨmunya nayaa yawɨramaapɨka! “Sahwara yaasɨwa'na mwaaibɨza' Gotɨyare saburɨne nawɨ'nya mima'naabi naneyadɨka!” dapɨjɨ sara yawɨramaapɨka!
Nɨmɨjɨ nye'mwannemwaaihata a'mwe yuyara gɨmɨnyɨna “Neya'mweigɨ!” gɨthasɨwaabaa'. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwangeburɨ nemɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'naderaavɨ “Neya'mweihi!” duthana!
Yanga gaimwange' sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨrɨjɨ kuna yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!
Paailimonɨ, neya'mweigɨ,

Kwaamu'nanyabwi gwarana! Gɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nevu'nadeigɨnyɨ. Nemɨjɨ avaaiwawɨnyaigɨnyɨ. A'mwe Aapɨya', gɨmɨre balaangevɨ wɨdɨma! Neya'mwe'gɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi gwarana! Nabaai “Aakipaazaigɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi gwarana! Gɨmɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare aawɨlasainera.” Nabaai “Paailimonɨgɨre angevɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyaihi kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhwarana!”
Nɨmɨ Polɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazare yagaalya wɨde'na kalavuzangevɨ mwaalena pɨkarya githawasɨwaabe. Neya'mwei Timoti nɨmɨjɨ mwaalɨkelyɨ.
Naarɨmɨre yawɨta “Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangelyɨ Naanga Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazai kwalyɨ yange'na pada'galagaimwanna yɨhika! Yɨ nabaai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhwarana!”

Nɨmɨ kadɨka dara wɨ'nadɨnyɨ. Paailimonɨ sai Naanga Jizaazarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'manɨkei daaka! Paailimonɨmɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨna kale naanga wivanɨkei daaka! Sara wɨ'nena saburɨdaasɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨnyagaa' dara wɨdɨna “Paailimonɨ tewaanna yɨvanɨke'na yuyagaa' ‘Su! Su!’ gɨthadɨ nɨnnya Gotɨyaigɨ tewaanna wɨgaimwamanɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yuya nawɨ'nya naanga kɨnɨnnakeina nawɨ'nya sa kuna yawɨramaraana! Nabaai Paailimonɨ yuya sa yawɨramaa'da Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kuna lɨmwaga'devɨ pwaraavɨ sara wɨdada sahwara nawɨ'nya sa wanganapɨjɨ gamɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna je'mwannemwaaibɨka!”

Wɨdadɨnya' dare'nesɨ. Nya'mweigɨ, Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ munyɨkaavɨ gaala pada'galawɨmwaaihadɨnya'na gɨmɨre wɨvu'nyaburɨna wɨ'nadɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨwa. Sarevɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nyɨvaimwamwaanyaigɨnyɨ.
Sarevɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnnakeinyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na dɨragɨnna gɨthɨwɨja' yɨ nabaai nayaa jɨthe'na kɨrɨ'
yagaala dɨragɨnya sara majɨwa. Aawa. Tewaanya wɨvu'nya sabwi savɨna nɨmɨ kave yagaala githaangamanɨge gɨmɨnyɨ. Yɨ dareinyɨ, nɨmɨ a'mwe neinyɨ, yɨ nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazarɨne kalavuza sahwainyɨ.
Sareinyɨ nɨmɨre kaimɨraayarɨna nayaa kave githaangamanɨge. Kalavuzanga davɨ kuna mwaalena sahwarɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna kujɨwaake lɨmwagaka nɨmɨre kaimɨraayaibɨ' yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai Wonɨzɨmaazai.
Kɨgaa' sahwai gɨmɨnyɨne waryaanyalyɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ gaimwanga ya'ne wawɨnya tewaanya yaakai mɨ'. Sarevɨ dahaa' sai wawɨnya tewaanya mi'na yannelyɨ gɨmɨnyɨjɨ nɨmɨnyɨjɨ sainaarɨ gaimwange'na.
Sahwarɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna ayɨna maragyasɨwaabe. Sahwarɨna tewaanya naanga nyɨvu'nɨvanɨke'na gyasaabena kale naanga nyɨvanɨkeinyɨ.
Sareinyɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ “Yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwakadaari yɨ kumɨ nɨmɨnyɨ kalavuzangevɨ marakɨna. Sarevɨ Paailimonɨmɨneba Wonɨzɨmaazai nyɨdaaya'nei nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannamwaalakerɨ dalɨmwaga'na kyɨwɨdɨkeinyɨ.”

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ davɨna “Ya,” nyɨdɨza' kadɨka mu'nyena nabaai dalɨmwaga'manɨgei mɨ'. “Gɨnnya tewaanya dazaburɨna mɨdɨnya'neigɨnyɨ nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna yɨma!” dena kɨrɨ' myɨwa. Aawa. Gɨmɨ sɨmunyavɨ sara yawɨra'gɨzɨ sara jɨthe' nawɨ'nyabulyɨ.
Sare' dare'ne' dɨngaka? Sahwarɨ Gotɨyai yaka “Paailimonɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'na ayɨna maarana!” kada' gɨmɨnyɨ kɨbawegaa' gyahalya'mavake'nanyɨ.

Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yadei gɨmɨjɨ kuna mwaaladevaaibɨsai mɨka! Aawa. Sai dazasare sabwi mi'na wavɨla'mwakelyɨ. Dahaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne neya'mwei gamɨ sarɨna nevu'nɨvanɨkelyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ sainyɨ dɨragɨnna sara yawɨ'dɨnyalyɨ. Sareinyɨ kɨrɨ' dazasare saburɨna gɨmɨ naanga nyavɨla'dɨnneigɨnyɨ. Yɨ gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨna sai nayaa gɨthaayadelyɨ. Kɨlaakejɨkɨna gavevɨne'na mɨ'. Yɨ nabaai Naangerɨna sai ja'mwei gye'mwannamwaaladelyɨ. Dazasarerɨna tewaanya naanga gɨvu'nadeigɨnyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna Polɨ nyɨnyakwalaangelyɨ,” yawɨ'dɨza' gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨmaa'dɨnnebaaibɨ' Wonɨzɨmaazarɨ nayaa dɨmaaka!
Nabaai “Sahwai nɨmɨnyɨna yɨwetawakya dahawarɨka! Nabaai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨrɨvɨkɨradei dɨngaka!” yawɨ'dɨza' yɨ gamɨnne yaya' maravɨla'nya ya'gɨzɨ sarɨne' yɨ nɨmɨnne' yaya' sahɨrɨ' dakɨ!

Nɨmɨ Polɨnyɨ yɨda'mwesɨ. Yagaala da' nɨmɨre ata dathasɨ dara yɨda'mwesɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ tɨvɨkɨta daza' yɨdesɨ. “ ‘Nabaai gɨmɨ saigɨ dɨnyɨrɨvɨkɨ'de. Yagaala tewaanya' kagɨzɨwaake gaala mwaalyabwi yanga maaragɨnya'nanyɨ,’ nagɨthɨwɨdɨka!” dena tɨvɨkɨta sa' yɨdesɨ.
Yo, nya'mweigɨ, sareinyɨ Naangerɨna yɨlaaya dara dɨnyɨgala! Wonɨzɨmaazarɨ nayaa dɨmaaka! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nɨmɨre sɨmunyasɨ munyɨsɨ gaala dɨnyɨvada'galamwaaihya!

Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna dara yawɨralɨmwagena “Sarevɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare sabwi mɨdɨnadelyɨ,” pɨkarya githawasɨwaabesɨ. Nabaai tɨvi'na dara yawɨ'manɨge. Gɨthɨwebwi sara jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Sare' gave' mɨ'. Sabwi wavɨlavɨkebwi tewaanaanga jɨtheigɨnyɨ.

Sasareigɨ nabaai avaalyagaa' ku'dɨka pɨrɨ' nayaa kyovɨrawaka'gɨzɨ gɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannamwaalɨde'nanyɨ. Yɨ sare' dare'nesɨ. Nɨmɨ yawɨ'dɨ dara yemwaaiheinyɨ “Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre yɨdaanganyangɨ yɨhu'naka kalavuzangevɨ nyɨmaaraka nɨmɨnyɨ yanga ayahi yɨhɨzaavadeinyɨ.”
Epapɨraazai gɨmɨnyɨ gɨthɨvanɨ' “Nya'mweigɨ!” Sai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Jizaazare yagaala wɨjɨwakamaryake'na kalavuzangevɨ nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannamwaaidasalyɨ.
Nabaai nɨmɨre avaaiwawɨnyara anga dava nɨmɨjɨ mwaaihasara Maakɨyalyɨ Aarɨzɨtaakazalyɨ Dimaazalyɨ Lukɨyalyɨ sara kwarajɨ avaaina gɨthɨvanɨga' “Neya'mweigɨ!”
Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare yanga wɨgaimwangebwi sarɨmɨre kuryarajɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!

Kɨgaakuna kwala naangegaa' Gotɨyai gamɨnyɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyaraavɨ sɨmunya pɨnɨnna pɨrɨ' wɨdɨna, pɨnɨnna pɨrɨ' wɨdɨna. Yɨ sara kujaa' sahwara nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨ sɨmunya nabinabinya pɨbura wɨjaasara kwalaalyare.

Kɨrɨ' nabaai dahaa' aayagasa Gotɨyai yagaala nedake' gamɨre Gawaalɨvaangei nedakesɨ. Sahwarɨ Ganɨmaangere yuya maarya'nerɨ Gotɨyai mena dahɨlakakelyɨ. Nabaai Gawaalɨvaanga sahwarɨ Kwaaka dasɨ sɨgunya kɨrɨsɨ Gotɨyai yavɨkaryaakengɨ.

Gawaalɨvaangei sahwai Gotɨyare byaanna dɨragɨnya' lɨvamwaja naangelyɨ. Yɨ nemɨnyɨ Baaka naanga nemwadadelyɨ. Sahwai Gotɨyarɨ avaaina nebulya'nanyalyɨ. Gamɨre yagaala dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnake' dada yuyangɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwada yuya sarengɨ lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Kayaa'nanyangɨne tɨvɨkɨsa duimwagasɨta ya'ne' sahwai wawɨnya yunebanna yɨ'mwannaka Kingɨya Naangei munya ke'beva mwaalɨkere aangasɨmagɨ dɨragɨnnakeba mwaala'.

Gawaalɨvaangei Ganɨmaangerɨ yaya tewaanya nawɨ'nyaange' mena maarake' yɨ mamaayaraavɨre yayavɨ wavɨlavakabaaibɨ' yɨ sasare sahɨrɨvɨ gamɨ sai mamaayaraavɨna naanga nebulya'na yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwara sarɨ kwaakewɨ wɨla'nakasalyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sagaa' Gotɨyai mamaayarajɨya aane pwai kwarɨ dara muja'
“Gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨbwaalɨvaangeigɨnyɨra.
Dahaa' gɨmaamaangeinyɨ gɨmwaaihɨweigɨnyɨ.”
Kɨrɨ' Gawaalɨvaangerɨ sara wɨda'. Yɨ sahwai mamaayarɨna ayahi muja'
“Gamɨnyɨ ganɨmaangeinyɨ yɨma'nɨdeinyɨ.
Nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨbwaalɨvaangei yɨma'nadelyɨ.”
Kɨrɨ' Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraayawɨnna sahwai gamɨre aaya mudɨkaimɨraayarɨ makwalaabakegaa' sarei da' “Mamaaya yuya Gotɨyainyɨrera sahwarɨ yɨlaaya nayaa maripɨka!”
Nabaai sahwai mamaayaraavɨna dara wɨda'
“Gamɨre mamaayaraavɨ yɨhusa'bɨsaraavɨ wɨmwaaihadere.
Gamɨre wɨdaayadɨvɨsaraavɨ dɨtaalɨsa'bɨsaraavɨ wɨmwaaihadere.”
Kɨrɨ' Gawaalɨvaangerɨna dara wɨda'
“Gotɨyaigɨ, yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ dɨmaremwaaideigɨnyɨ.
Gɨmɨre a'mweraavɨ kingɨyɨsarɨsɨ yɨda'nanyabwina yawɨbwaramaremwaaidɨnyaigɨnyɨ.
Gɨmɨnyɨ yɨda'maraanga sabwina tewaanya gɨvu'nadeigɨnyɨ.
Kɨwɨnyangɨ galazekɨvalyabwina sɨmɨlɨka gwimwaalɨkeigɨnyɨ.
Mɨdɨnagɨnyavɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyainyɨ gɨmɨre Gotɨyainyɨ yɨlewelivananya' gɨthɨngeigɨnyɨ.
Yɨ welivananya daza' gɨmɨnyɨ yɨlaaya gihalakeigɨnyɨ.
Ja'mwera yɨvanɨgɨnyabaaibɨ' yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgatara mɨ'.”
Nabaai Gawaalɨvaangerɨna dara wɨda'
“Naangeigɨ sɨnnawɨ Kwaaka datha' wakyeigɨnyɨ.
Nabaai sɨgunya' gɨnnya asɨraalyɨ yavɨkaryeigɨnyɨ.
Yuyawaai yɨnahu kayaaka yɨnyɨna yadewaalyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ aawa. Yuyagaa' mwaaidɨnyaigɨnyɨ.
Yuyawaalyɨ yuya pɨnɨjɨ aya yɨma'nadengɨ.
Baazɨ'ma'nya pɨrɨ' aya yɨma'nadevaaibɨsangɨ.
Yɨ yɨvɨta aya' gɨ'mwagakɨna yadevaaibɨ'
Gɨmɨ yuya sangɨ dɨhɨ'mwagakɨdeigɨnyɨ.
A'mwei baazɨ'ma'nya yadaihamaa'na yadevaaibɨ'
Gɨmɨ yuya sangɨ yadaihamaata jɨthengɨ.
Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ yuna sana dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ.
Gɨmɨre kwaramegasa mi'na yɨwawade mɨ'.”
Pɨgaa' kɨgaa' Gotɨyai mamaaya darajɨya bewarɨ wɨdakelaka! Aawa. Gawaalɨvaangerɨna dara dɨnɨ'
“Gɨmɨ nɨmɨre aangasɨrɨ dɨragɨnyaba dɨmwaala!
Gɨmɨnyɨ dalaangewɨ wɨla'narya'negaa'na yɨkamaangeraavɨ gwakɨdehaa'nanyɨ.”
Aawa. Mamaayara yɨ sahwara kuryarera. Yɨ kurya sahwara Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsare. Gotɨyai a'mwera gamɨre yuna padaihasamaarya'neraavɨna gaimwagya'ne mamaayaraavɨ maryaasadere.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala nemɨ mena wɨ'no' nemɨ nayaa kuna lɨmwagaraana! Nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ dɨragɨnna yawɨ'daa mɨdɨnaana! Yagaala daza'na dɨragɨnna mi nyaadɨka! Yɨ sara yawaajɨ yɨnahu nyagalya'mavaadɨka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai mamaayaraavɨre maangikɨdaa'nyɨ Juyainaavɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨne kɨwɨnya' jaakelyɨ. Yɨ yagaala daza' nebulya'nanya' dɨragɨnna daavɨkesɨ. Yɨ yagaala savɨne yɨwetawakya gazasavɨnajɨ yagaala savɨ galazekɨvala gazasavɨnajɨ tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya' maryaasa'nanyɨ. Kumɨre kayaa'nanya yadɨvɨta sabwina yɨnɨgeva tɨvɨkɨta yɨda'maraange' warɨ'. Yɨ mamaayaraavɨre maangikɨdaa'nyanna tɨvɨkɨta sara maryaasa'na

dahaa' nevadaihasamaata naanga nebulya'nanyavɨne' navɨka mwalaaja' yɨ nemɨ lɨkaanya wawaajɨ kayaa'nanaangevɨ gatha'dara wavɨlavaadevaka! Yuna wana aawa nebulya'na. Sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨne tɨvɨkɨta sa' maalɨkesɨ. Dahaa' nemɨnyɨne' tɨvɨkɨta naangesɨ. Yɨ mamaayara nedetara mɨ'. Sɨnnawɨ Naangei gamɨ sai yagaala daza' mena wɨdakesɨ. Nabaai a'mwera gamɨnyɨ kadɨka wɨ'neva sahwara nemɨnyɨ dara nejɨwaake' “Yagaala daza' yuna wana naanga nebulya'nanyasɨ.”

Sara nedadaapi Gotɨyai sahwarajɨ ye'mwannajalɨkuraka'. Yɨ sahwai yɨjɨwaainyajɨ atɨka maru'nasajɨ dɨragɨnya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyajɨ yada ye'mwannajalɨkurakɨna. Nabaai sahwai gannya sɨmunyavɨ nayaa yawɨ'da Kurya Tewaanyare sɨhumale a'mweraavɨna yanga wɨjaavada ye'mwannajalɨkurakɨna. Yɨ sarengɨ ye'mwannajalɨkurakakelyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Dɨvi yɨma'nade pɨbwina dɨvanɨgo'nanyɨ. Gawaalɨvaangei maremwaaidelyɨ. Gotɨyai mamaayaraavɨ dazahɨrɨvɨ maremwaalya'neraavɨ dahɨlakakera mɨ'.
Aawa. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ pɨkarya pɨrɨvɨ a'mwe pwai nayaa dara jalɨkurakɨnɨ'
“A'mwe kwara bewaraavaka!
Gotɨyaigɨ sahwaraavɨna yawɨ'dɨnyaigɨ daa!
A'mweraavɨne kaimɨraayai bewalaka!
Yɨ gɨmɨ nayaa be'na maremwaaidɨnyaigɨnaka!
Yune tusagaa'nana gɨmɨ wakagɨnyalyɨ.
Sahwai mamaayaraavɨ dalaangewɨ wɨla'narɨ'.
Byaannyavɨ sahwarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlagɨ.
Yɨ sahwarɨ yaya naange' wɨjaavagɨnyalyɨ.
Sahware sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ kwaaka dalaangewɨ yuya wakagɨ.
Sahwai yuya sa dɨragɨnna maremwaalɨkelyɨ.”

Sara dɨnɨke' Gotɨyai yuya a'mwe kwaraavɨ kwaaka dalaangewɨ wakakengɨ. Yɨ sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kumɨnyɨ dalaangewɨ mula'narya'. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' kumɨnyɨ dalaangewɨ yuya warɨke nemɨ mwanganyɨnanyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' nemɨ a'mwe pwai Jizaazarɨ yawɨrangamanɨgolyɨ. Kɨgaa' maalɨkegaa' a'mwe sahwarɨ mamaayaraavɨna maalɨkɨbawei wɨmwaaihakelyɨ. Yɨ a'mweraavɨna gaimwagya'nei balya'ne'na Gotɨyare yanga gaimwange' marima'naaba'. Sahwai daanga dazahɨrɨ' maa'da yɨ bala'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ Gotɨyai sahwarɨne yaya' munyaba makida byaanna dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavakelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuya Gotɨyarɨnengɨra. Sarei yuya yavɨkaryaka yuyangɨna dɨragɨnya kuna wɨjaavadelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai yawɨraka “A'mwera nɨmɨre kaimɨraayara yɨma'nɨpɨka!” gannya kaimɨraaya kwalaalyaraavɨna byaanna dɨragɨnyavɨ makwia'nerɨ Jizaazarɨ daange' wɨjaava'. Yɨ daanga dazavɨ Jizaazai sahwaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na padaihasamaarya'nei sahwai a'mwe naanga yune nebulya'nanyai yɨma'na'. Daanga wɨjaaya sasare sabwi Gotɨyai yake' yɨ sa' yɨda'nanyasɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe dazai a'mwe yuyara Gotɨyarera tewaanya nawɨ'nya yɨma'nya'neraavɨna ya'nelyɨ yɨ a'mwe dazarajɨ yuyaraavɨ kuvɨnɨmaangei yune gave pwainanyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gawaalɨvaangei sahwaraavɨna dara wɨdɨvanɨ' “Nya'mweihɨlyɨra.” Saraavɨna sasara ja'na gamɨnyɨ wagɨla muvwa'nyakelyɨ.
Sai Gotɨyarɨ wɨda'. Dara dɨnɨ'
“Gɨmɨnyɨna nya'mweraavɨ ‘Sasarelyɨra. Nawɨ'nyaangelyɨra,’ wɨdɨdeinyɨ.
Gɨmɨnne yaya' makɨlya'ne' kusɨlaanyavɨyaraayaba daata dɨdeinyɨ.”
Nabaai ayahi dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Nɨmɨ sarajɨ sahwarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwagarɨdelyɨ.
Nabaai dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Yɨthaa, nɨmɨjɨ kaimɨraaya Gotɨyai nyɨjaavakera nye'mwannemwaaihasare.

Kaimɨraaya dazara a'mwera mwaaiha'. Yɨ tawanakera yaka mɨwɨ'nakere. Sarevɨ yɨ Jizaazai kwalyɨ sahwarabɨ' avaaina a'mwei yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ sarei balakelyɨ. Nabaai “Balya dazavɨ balyaburɨne dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakerɨ kayaa'nanyarɨ kayaaka yɨgalakɨma!” daka a'mwei yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ balyaburɨne dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ sai Yuyaraavɨ Kotɨya Maryadei, Saataanɨ.

Nabaai dare'nesɨ. A'mwerajɨ a'mwejɨ balya'na lɨka yadɨvɨsarera. Nabaai yuyagaa' Kwaakevakɨ sahwara mwaaidapiyaraavɨ lɨka daza' yaasɨwa'wawɨnyavɨ galyɨralɨmwaga'desɨ. Sahwai balaka daza' yɨ sahwaraavɨ kalavuza sahɨrɨvɨ wo'dalamarasɨta ya'nelyɨ.
Naanga nebulya'nanyasɨ. Sahwai mamaayaraavɨ gaimwanga ya'nei sara myakelyɨ. Aawa. Sahwai yaka sa' yɨ Evɨraamɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨyaraavɨ gaimwagya'ne' yakelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yuyangɨ gamɨre gya'mwerabɨ' sai nayaa avaaina nebulya'na yɨma'nya'ne' tɨvɨkɨta warakesɨ. Yɨ daresɨ. “Yɨ a'mweraavɨ Gotɨyareraavɨ kale gaimwanga wia'neinyɨ yɨma'nɨma! Yɨ Gotɨyarɨnengɨ gamɨre wawɨnya' nayaa lɨmwaga'dɨ Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangeinyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na mwaalɨma! Sareinyɨ a'mweraavɨ wagɨlyangɨ marasɨta'neinyɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨdayabwina mubɨnɨma!” daka gya'mwerabɨ' nayaa avaaina nebulya'na yɨma'nakelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wɨjaavɨnya' yɨnɨga wi'na yannelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarei taange' yuya taanga gamɨnyɨ yɨma'naka sangɨ maarakelyɨ. Nabaai Kamaalyai yɨjɨwaala yaamɨjɨ wiaka kɨrɨ' dɨragɨnna daavakelyɨ. Yɨ sarei a'mweraavɨ yɨma'nakengɨna sara yɨbwakɨnakevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwaraavɨ taanginyabwi kima'nojɨ sahwaraavɨ gaimwange' yɨ yuyagaa' sarei yɨnɨga wi'na yadelyɨ.

Nya'mweihi Gotɨyare tewaanyaihi Gotɨyai Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei kwaihɨrɨjɨ jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakeihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazarɨna sɨmunya nayaa dara dɨvada'galayawɨrila! Sahwai nemɨnyɨna Gotɨyai Wɨdasaabakelyɨ (Apozelɨyalyɨ). Nabaai sahwai Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangerɨ nemɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwamanɨgolyɨ. Yɨ gamɨnne yaya' jalɨkurakɨvanɨgolyɨ.

Sahwarɨ wawɨnya dazavɨna Gotɨyai dahɨlakakei yɨ sarei Gotɨyarɨ naanga nebulya'na lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Ne Mozɨzai Gotɨyare a'mweraavɨ (Gotɨyare angevɨyaraavɨ) yaakevɨna Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwagyaakabaaibɨ' sara yakelyɨ.

Sarerɨna da'darevɨnyɨ. Jizaazarɨna Gotɨyai yawɨ'daasɨ sai angevɨ madei mwaalɨ'. Ne Mozɨzai angevɨyai mwaala'. A'mwei ange' madɨna yaderɨne yaya naange' sa' yune angevɨne yaya naangevɨ wavɨla'devaaibɨ' Jizaazare yaya byaannaka naange' yɨnɨga wi'na maarakere yaya sa' Mozɨzare yaya naangevɨ angevɨyarɨnevɨ wavɨla'delyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Anga gazasa' yune a'mwerana madɨvɨsasɨ. Kɨrɨ' yuyangɨjɨ yuyaraavɨjɨ yavɨkaryaakei sai Gotɨyalyɨ. Sai Mozɨzarɨjɨ Gotɨyare pwaraavɨjɨ wɨmwaaihadelyɨ.

Mozɨzarɨne' daresɨ. Sahwai Gotɨyare yuyaraavɨ (Gotɨyare angevɨyaraavɨ) wɨgaimwagya'nei Gotɨyarɨ wɨdayaakei dɨragɨnna lɨmwagyaakelyɨ. Sara yada Gotɨyai dɨvi Gawaalɨvaangerɨna neja'ne' jalɨkurakyaake'nanyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne' daresɨ. Sahwai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei mwaaida Gotɨyare a'mweraavɨ (Gotɨyare angevɨyaraavɨ) munyaba mwaalya'nei sahwaraavɨ maremwaalɨkelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai yuyagaa' nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaaza' yɨ nemɨ yɨlaayasɨ yadaa Naangerɨna kuna dɨragɨnna yemwalaaja' nemɨ kwainajɨ Gotɨyareina (Gotɨyare anga savɨyaina) mwaaihoina.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kurya Tewaanyai dake' dara dɨnɨkabaaibɨsasɨ.
Dahaa' Gotɨyare maangwɨraayavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨja'
Sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' kaanya wana dɨragɨnna marihɨremwaaibɨna!
Ne sɨnnawɨnyara galazekɨvala nyaatabaaibɨ' mipɨnera!
Sahwara kayaa'na yaasagaa' a'mwamaayɨmagɨ mwaaleva
Gotɨyainyɨ yaamɨjɨ dɨragɨnna yɨjɨwaala nyadɨvɨ'
“Navɨka mwaaladei dɨngaka!” deva nyaasare.
Sarɨmɨre sɨryakwalaangera nyawɨranganya'nera yɨjɨwaala nyaasare.
Kwarame potiyangɨ nɨmɨ yaangɨ wanganyaata kɨrɨ'
Nɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'na yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaala nyaasare.
Sarevɨdaa'nyi davaakɨna sɨmɨlɨke' nyulyaake'na
Yɨ nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna dara jaainyɨ
“Yuyagaa' kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ nyagalya'ma'dɨvɨsare.
Nɨmɨre saburɨ kaanya myamarya'nera manyawɨryadɨvɨsare.”
Sare'na nɨmɨnyɨ sɨmɨlɨka nyuidaa'nyɨyavɨ
Yagaala dɨragɨnya' dara jalɨkurakyaa
“Kwaaka kave kwaamu' kujaavɨwɨdɨkeba
Sahwara kusawɨ bwibɨ'dera mɨka!”
“Sa' wana naanga nebulya'nanyasɨ.”

Nya'mweihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwai kwai Gotɨya gaalyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyarɨ yagalya'masa'na gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna malɨmwagarya kayaa'nanyabwi nularadɨka!

Aawa. Yɨrɨka gazagaasagaa', Gotɨyai kuna dɨvanɨkegaa' “Dahaaka!” sa' kuna warɨkegaa' sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ dɨhaa'bwata jɨla! Yɨ kwaasɨya wagɨlyabwi sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya pwarɨ kwarɨ kwaasɨ nudathɨka! Yojɨ gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna narihɨremwaaihadɨka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaa dɨragɨnyaina daavɨna yadaa yune nemɨ balaajahaa'na kuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaragwawaaja' yɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ ye'mwannamwaaihoina yɨma'naadeinera.
Dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaragwokwia'neina Gotɨyare yagaala dɨnɨka sa' yawɨramaraade'nanyɨ. Yɨ dara dɨnɨ'
“Dahaa' Gotɨyare maangwɨraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨja'
Sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' kaanya wana dɨragɨnna marihɨremwaaibɨna!
Ne sɨnnawɨnyara galazekɨvala nyaatabaaibɨ' mipɨnera!
‘Navɨka mwaaladei dɨngaka!’ deva nyaasare.”

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyare maangikɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyaata kwara kɨrɨ' sahwara kayaa'na yɨna yadɨvɨ' gamɨre yagaalya' galazekɨvaina yaasara aaihwaravaavaka? Ne Mozɨzai makwiaakera Yɨzɨrelɨyara Yɨzɨpɨ saba yagalya'mayaata yuyara sasare dazabwi yaasara daaka!

Kwarame potiyangɨ (40) Gotɨyai sɨmɨlɨke' aaihwaravaavɨna wɨlyaakalaka? A'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsa'na sahwara baidɨvɨ' kumɨre kɨlaakejɨ' a'mwamaayɨmagɨ bwalaraawɨna yaakera daaka! Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨna sɨnna tɨke' wɨlyaakere.

Gotɨyai yagaala dɨragɨnya' naanga nebulya'na dara jalɨkurakyaa' “Kwaaka nɨmɨ kwaamu' kujaavɨwɨdɨkeba sahwara kusawɨ bwibɨ'dera mɨka!” Wana naanga nebulya'nanya' sara dakyaake' aaihwaravaavɨna jaakava'? Da a'mwe dazara gamɨre yagaalya' galazekɨvalyaasara daaka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ dara yawɨrangamanɨgo. Kumɨ dɨragɨnna malɨmwagaryadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ. “Aala!” dadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ. Yɨ dazahɨrɨsavɨna sahwara Gotɨyare kwaamusabanna bwɨlyaatara mɨ'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nayaa jawɨrila! Gotɨyare yune naanga nebulya'na yagaala dakɨnɨke' nemɨnyɨne' kuna warɨ'. Yɨ sai dara dɨvanɨ' “Sarɨmɨnɨku' nɨmɨre kwaamusaba wibɨneihɨlyɨ.” Sare' kɨrɨ' nemɨ lɨka dara yaana! O, Gotɨyai tɨnna nengada nemɨnyɨdaa'nya kwai pwarɨna dara najɨdavadɨka! “Sahwai menyawɨ yalawakada dazavɨ yɨ yɨwɨna yɨvanɨkelyɨ.”

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ a'mwamaayaba mwalyaasara Gotɨyare yagaala kwaamusa'ne' wɨ'nyaatabaaibɨ' nemɨ yagaala tewaanya sa' kadɨka wɨ'noinera. Kɨrɨ' nabaai sahwara kadɨka yaasɨwa' wɨ'nyɨna yeva dɨragɨnna malɨmwagi yaa'. Yagaala daza' wɨ'neva dɨragɨnna mye'mwannalɨmwagaryaasare. Sarevɨ yagaala daza' sahwara kadɨka wɨ'nesa', sa' yɨ sahwaraavɨ gaimwanga mwiaa'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'manɨgoina kave kwaamu' mwaalya'ne dazaba wɨlaadeine. Yɨ sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai malɨmwagyadɨvɨsaraavɨna dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Sare'na nɨmɨnyɨ sɨmɨlɨka nyuidaa'nyɨyavɨ
Yagaala dɨragɨnya' dara jalɨkurakyaa
“Kwaaka kave kwaamu' kujaavɨwɨdɨkeba
Sahwara kusawɨ bwibɨ'dera mika!”
“Sa' wana naanga nebulya'nanyasɨ.”
Sahwai sara daka kɨrɨ' nabaai sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai Kwaake' mena wakyaakegaa' kwaamusabwine' mena dakɨnɨkesɨ. Sagaa' kwaamusavɨ mwaaida nemɨnyɨna yemwaaidelyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare Bukuyavɨ yɨrɨka asi ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daryaalyarɨkɨna dara dɨnɨ' “Gotɨyai gamɨre wawɨnya yuya sa mena yaka yɨrɨka asi ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daryaalyarɨkɨ kave kwaamu' mwaala'.”
Sɨnnawɨ mi'na yɨhɨthɨwevɨ (3:11,4:3) Gotɨyai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨna dara wɨda'
“Kwaaka kave kwaamu' kujaavɨwɨdɨkeba
Sahwara kusawɨ bwibɨ'dera mɨka!”
Yagaala daza' “Pwara gamɨre kave kwaamu' mwaalyaba wibɨ'dere,” kuna warɨ'. Nabaai sɨnnawɨ yagaala tewaanya' kwaamusaburɨne' wɨ'neta sahwara yagaala sa' galazekɨvala yesa'na kusawɨ wɨletagaa' mɨ'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ Gotɨyai yɨrɨka pɨrɨ' ayahi dahɨlaka'. Sahwai yaya da' yɨrɨka dazarɨ'na “Dahaaka.” Sɨnnawɨnyara galazekɨvala kye' kwarame kwalaalya mena kabwawa' Gotɨyai Devitɨmɨre maangikɨ yagaalya' da'. Mi'na yɨhɨthɨwe' dara dɨnɨ'
“Dahaa' Gotɨyare maangwɨraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nɨpɨja'
Sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' kaanya wana dɨragɨnna marihɨremwaaibɨna!”
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Jozuwaa' saraavɨ kwaamu' mwaalyabwi wɨjaavajɨ kwajɨ sagaa'daa'nyɨ yɨrɨka pɨrɨ'na Gotɨyai mujɨ kyadɨka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai yuya wakaka yɨrɨka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daryaalyarɨkɨ kwaamu' mwalyaakabaaibɨ' Gotɨyare a'mweraavɨne kave kwaamu' mwaalya' kuna warɨ'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwei Gotɨyare kave kwaamu' mwaalyaburɨ wɨlajai sai gannya wawɨnya' mena yɨ'mwannojɨ kwaamu' mwaaladelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai yune gannya wawɨnya' mena yɨ'mwannaka kave kwaamu' mwalyaakabaaibɨ' a'mwe sai kwaamu' mwaaladelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwaamu' mwaalya dazaba kusawɨ wɨlya'nevɨ nemɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna yuyanna yawɨrayaana! Yɨ kɨgaa' sahwara ke'ba'nanya'na yetabaaibɨ' a'mwe pwai kwai galazekɨvala ya'ne sabwi mɨdɨda yɨ sai kayaa'nanyaburɨ walaraawojɨ yɨ yɨwɨna nyadɨka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare yagaalya' nemɨrebwina bɨranemaaranne'nanyɨ. Yagaala sa' gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Yɨ sa' wawɨnya dɨragɨnya yɨnɨga wi'na yadesɨ. Sa' gurɨmaanga dɨ'bwa'nɨke' yɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnya gurɨmaanga pimagɨnyaala gazavɨzavɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Yɨ sa' a'mweraavɨ dabɨra'nɨgwida yune kuta ke'mwewɨ nebulya'na widesɨ. Sa' tɨnnyawɨ wɨlyɨ'ma'da gaalyavɨjɨ kuryarɨjɨ yɨ sawaarɨ mɨdaaihɨ'desɨ. Yɨ sa' dahaalyangɨjɨ yagɨdɨlyangɨjɨ tɨnnyaba wɨlyɨ'ma'da yuya sangɨ dabɨra'desɨ. Yɨ sa' yuya sɨmunya sangɨjɨ nemɨ ya'nengɨjɨ yune'na maryawɨbwa'desɨ.

Gotɨyai wakyaaka aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' gamɨre sɨnnyɨkɨ lɨka yɨnɨga wi'na yulyaranne' mɨ'. Aawa. Yuya kaanya yuya basɨnadaa'na yaka yɨ Gotɨyarɨ tɨnnyarɨ wana ku'maayaba warɨkengɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai yune sahwaina nemɨ yadaanya sabwi maryawɨbwaradengɨra. Nemɨnyɨ Gotɨyai yagaainakelyɨra.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara yaana! Nemɨre Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangaangei Sɨgunyavɨ ke'mwewɨnyavɨ Gotɨyaryabanna yɨlayɨ'mavakei sai Jizaazai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei kɨnɨnnakeina mwaaihovɨ yɨ nemɨ sahwarɨne jalɨkurakyabwi nayaa dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaraana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ saina wagɨlyavɨ walamarakya'neina dɨragɨnya maayaine. Nemɨre wɨrɨsangɨna Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naangei yawɨ'daa'nyɨ nemɨnyɨna kale mwi yannei mɨ'. Aawa. Yuya yɨjɨwaala sa nemɨnyɨ neyɨma'nadevaaibɨ' yuya daza gamɨ kwarɨ yɨjɨwaala ya'ne mena yɨma'nakengɨ. Sare kɨrɨ' sahwai wagɨlya myakelyɨ. Sarei nemɨnyɨna yɨbwakɨdevɨna neyɨvaimwagannelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ lɨka myadaa Gotɨyaryawɨ gamɨre kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨna gaimakunna wɨlaana! Sahwai yɨ yanga gaimwangebwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Nemɨ gamɨre kale gaimwangebwi maarya'neina nabaai taanginya neyɨma'nadaaworiyagaa' gamɨre yanga gaimwangebwi nemɨnyɨ neya'neina sahwaryawɨnna wawaana!

Gotɨyarɨna Yɨra'de Naanga gazarɨzarɨ dahɨlakyabwi sa' daresɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraayawɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwarɨ dahɨlakada Gotɨyare wawɨnyangɨnei wɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Gotɨyareraavɨ gaimwagya'nei Gotɨyaryaba sahwaraavɨna marewɨdadelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai Gotɨyarɨ yanga dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna wɨjaaya'nejɨ wagɨla marasɨ'nya'ne'na Gotɨyarɨne tamiravawɨjaaya'nejɨ wawɨnya kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
Gamɨ sai pɨburaavɨna dɨragɨnya maayai mwaaidevɨna a'mwe sɨmunya maayara Gotɨyare tusavɨ yagalya'ma'dɨvɨsaraavɨna yɨbwakɨda kave yɨnɨga wi'na bwiwanna wɨdannelyɨ.
Sahwai yune dɨragɨnyai mamwaalyadevɨ a'mweraavɨre wagɨlya marasɨ'nya'nei Gotɨyarɨ tamiravawɨjaavadevaaibɨ' gamɨ kwarɨnajɨ tamiravawɨjaaya'ne tɨvɨkɨta warɨ'.

Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangere wawɨnya daza' yaya naange' kɨnɨnnakesɨ. A'mwe aane pwai kwai yune gamɨre saburɨdaasɨ wawɨnya daza' maa'dei mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai Ne Eronɨmɨ Yɨra'de Naanga sɨnnawɨnyarɨ jaka wɨjaakabaaibɨ' a'mwe sarɨ jaka wɨdadaasɨyagaa' sahwai wawɨnya daza' lɨmwadelyɨ.

Sarebaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai kwalyɨ sarelyɨ. Sahwai byaannyavɨ yune gamɨnne yaya'na munyaba mamakɨlyada Yɨra'de Naangei yɨma'nakai mɨ'. Aawa. Gotɨyai gamɨ sai sahwarɨ wawɨnya daza' ya'nerɨ dahɨlakakelyɨ. Sarevɨna sahwarɨ dara wɨda'
“Gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ Nyɨbwaalɨvaangeigɨnyɨra.
Dahaa' Gɨmaamaangeinyɨ gɨmwaaihɨweigɨnyɨ.”
Nabaai sabaaibɨ' pimagɨnyavɨ dara da'
“Yɨra'dɨnya yuyagaa' yuyagaa'neigɨnyɨ.
Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨvaavɨrebwina avaainanyaigɨnyɨ gɨmwaaihɨweigɨnyɨ.”

Kɨgaa' Jizaazai Kwaakevakɨna kɨlaa'nakei mwaalakegaa' sahwai Gotɨyarɨ wɨdada yɨdaanganakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai jaka naangesɨ kɨdaraalyajɨ Gotɨyai balyavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na maarannerɨ wɨdakelyɨ. Sahwai gannyabwi kwaakewɨ marulawakada yɨ Gotɨyarɨ dalaangewɨ wɨla'na'da sarevɨ yɨ Gotɨyai gamɨre yagaala wɨdakevɨ kadɨka wɨ'nakelyɨ.
Sahwai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei kwai kɨrɨ' sahwai daange' maarakevɨ Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨnya'na sasare sabwina gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ nebulya'na yɨwɨryakelyɨ.
Daza' yɨ Gotɨyarɨne yune nebulya'nanyarɨ marima'na'. Sarevɨ sahwai a'mwe yuyara gamɨnyɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ yuyagaa'na wɨvadaihasamaarannelyɨ.
Yɨ Gotɨyai sahwarɨ dahɨlakaka dɨragɨnna wɨda' “ ‘Gɨmɨ Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'dɨnya Naangeigɨ,’ gɨthɨwa! Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨvaavɨ avaainanyaigɨnyɨra.”

Melɨkɨzathekɨ ke'ba'nanyarɨne yagaala kwalaalya warɨ'. Yɨ nemɨ sanna yɨhɨthaathe'nanyɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' sarɨmɨre sɨmunya kaanya tihɨ'nɨka yɨ sɨmunya yɨme'nya'bɨ' yawɨrarɨlaaya myaihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia'ne yagaala dazavɨre aaya kaavɨlyavɨ yɨ nemɨ yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeine.

Sare' daresɨ. Kɨgaakuna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagesaihɨlyɨ. Yɨrɨkerɨ' sarɨmɨ wɨjɨwaakyaihi mwaalya'na yɨnɨga wi'na yɨwaa'. Kɨrɨ' aawa. Yɨ a'mwei pwai sarɨmɨnyɨ mudɨ'nanya aaya kaavɨla Gotɨyare yagaalya' ayahi nayaa yɨhɨzɨwaakya'nerɨna sarɨmɨnyɨ sɨmunya'na tuta yɨhɨmudaasɨvanɨ'. Yɨ bwaranyai yune aamunya' maarya'nerɨ wɨmudaasadevaaibɨ' mudɨ'nanyanna yɨhɨmudaasɨvanɨ'. A'mwera wapaaya dɨragɨnya nya'neraavɨ wɨmudaasadevaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ yagaala naangenna yɨnɨga wi'na wɨ'namaapɨneihi mɨ'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gazaizai mudɨ'nanyanna kuna yaamɨjɨ yawɨ'dei sɨmunya yɨda'maraangebwina nayaa yawɨ'dei mɨ'. Yɨ bwaranyai yune aamunya' nadevaaibɨsa'nanyɨ.

Nabaai kɨrɨ' wapaaya dɨragɨnya a'mwe naangera nadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨne aayanna a'mwe sɨdu'nakeraavɨnengɨra. Sahwara nawɨ'nyanna yadɨvɨsare. A'mwe sasarera yɨ kwalaalyagaa' kunnya sɨmunyangɨ yɨwɨrinya yadɨvɨsare. Yɨ sahwara nawɨ'nyabulyɨ kayaa'nanyabulyɨ mena wi'na maryawɨbwarya'nera kuna nayaa yadɨvɨ' yɨwɨrinya yadɨvɨsare. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ aawa.

Kaimɨraayarabɨsaihi kuna namwaaibɨthɨka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yune yagaala mudɨ'nanya sasare savɨna mamwalaanna! Aawa. Nemɨ kuna wawaajɨ a'mwe naanga mena yɨnɨkerabɨ' yagaala naangebwina daana! Yɨ kwalaalyagaa' nemɨ angevɨne lɨkɨla ayɨna, ayɨna yadaanyabaaibɨ' yagaala yune mudɨ'nanyanna madaanna! Mudɨ'nanya darengɨ. A'mwera kayaa'nanyabwi balya'bɨsabwina yagalya'maya'nera sɨmunya mudɨka nayaa yawɨramaapɨka! Yɨ sara yapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ nayaa lɨmwabɨka!

Nabaai pwara sahwaraavɨ dara wiwɨripɨka! Yɨ aalya yɨnya'ne dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya nayaa yawɨbwapɨ'de'nanyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨ wɨlya'nesɨ Kurya Tewaanyarɨ maarya'nesɨ sahwaraavɨ ata dathɨwabɨ'de'nanyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai a'mwe yuya bainɨkeraavɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavade'nanyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maryawɨbwarojɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne tɨvɨkɨsabwi wɨjaavade'nanyɨ. Sara wiwɨripɨ'desɨ.
Nabaai Gotɨyai “Ya!” daza' yɨ nemɨ mudɨ'nanya sasarenna mujɨ yawaajɨ naangenna yɨhɨthaana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Jizaazarɨna nayaa jawɨranganyɨla! A'mwera Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨja' sahwara sɨmunya mudɨke' maarya'neraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na ayɨna gara wɨmwaihaanneraavaka! Sahwara pɨgaa' Gotɨyare baake' kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ mena wannakera. Yɨ sahwara Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walaabake yange' mena nagaanganesare. Yɨ Kurya Tewaanyarɨ sahwara ye'mwannamaaresara.
Yɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' yaamɨjɨ yadɨvɨ' dara yawɨresare “Yɨ sa' tewaanya nawɨ'nyaange'.” Yɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya nawɨ'nya dɨvi yɨma'nya'ne'na mena yɨbwakɨnesara.

Yɨ sarera sara mwaaibɨza' kɨrɨ' wala'daawadɨvɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨja' kumɨre tusa' sɨmunya mudɨkebwi ayɨna yawɨramaarya'ne' yɨ aawa. Yɨ sasare dazabwi kumɨ kwara Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangerɨ yɨsavɨri ayɨna tamarɨmupɨ'devaaibɨsasɨ. Sahwara tamarɨmupɨjarɨ ku'maayaba a'mwera bɨrala dangabɨ'delyɨra. Sare'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwera darerera. Kwaaka kwalaalyagaa' burɨke' waidaavadevɨ tɨka munne maranya'ne nawɨ'nya yɨrɨ'devakɨ Gotɨyai tewaanya naanga yanga yadevakɨra. Yɨ a'mwe Gotɨyai nawɨ'nyangɨ wɨjaavadera nawɨ'nyabura nayaa yadɨvɨsaraavɨ sahwai tewaanya naanga yanga yaderera.

Kɨrɨ', nabaai pwara nawɨ'nya myadɨvɨsara darerera. Kwaaka yune wɨla langa kɨnɨnnaka dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyajɨ kurɨvaarɨya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyajɨ yɨrɨ'deva' kayaa'nanyavakɨ. Sava' Gotɨyai kayaaka yadevɨna yɨ nebawa mɨ'. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨ dɨke' nakadevakɨra.

Sarɨmɨnyɨna nyɨvu'nadeihi, dahaa' nemɨ yagaala taanginya daza' dɨwo. Kɨrɨ' nemɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna nebulya' yawɨramaa'manɨgo. Yɨ sarɨmɨ sasare sabwi wavɨla'dɨvɨ' kayaaka sasara jideihi mɨ'. Aawa. “Gotɨyai padaihasamaarakeina mwalaaja' nemɨ sareina nawɨ'nyabwina yaadeinera,” dɨthɨnyideihɨlyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai yɨda'na myadei midaa'! Sahwai wawɨnya yuya sarɨmɨ yeta sanna sɨmunya navɨka yadei midaa'! Sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨhɨvu'nadaa'nyɨ gamɨre a'mwe tewaanyaraavɨ gaimwange'na wɨdaayesaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sasare sara kuna yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ daza' sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨhɨvu'nadevwi wibwarɨdaakwadesɨ. Sare' sahwai yɨda'nanyai sarɨmɨnyɨna navɨka yadei mɨ'.

Yɨ nemɨnyɨ tewaanya dara nevu'nɨvanɨ'. Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya gazaizai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadevwi avaainanya' kuna wibwarɨdaakwana! Yɨ pada'galalɨmwanga yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyai nedakenna kwaamu' jemwaalyɨla! Kuna yɨwawagopɨjaihi yune yɨwɨya yaja sarɨmɨregaa'na sasara yune dɨragɨnna jɨla!

Sarɨmɨ maa'na nayɨhinadɨka! Aawa. A'mwera nebulya'na dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsara maa'na yarai mwinyakera mwaaidɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna daa'dɨvɨ' sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na dake gamɨreraavɨ wɨjaaya'na yuya kuna maa'dɨvɨsaraavɨrebwi sarɨmɨ nayaa pada'galamɨdɨnya jɨla!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja' yagaala dɨragɨnya' wɨjaa'. A'mwei naangei yaka Gotɨyarɨ wavɨlavɨkei aawa. Yɨ a'mwei pwai mɨ'. Pwarɨne yayavɨ Gotɨyai yagaala dɨragɨnya' wɨja'nei mamwaalyɨ'. Aawa. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ Gotɨyai yagaala dɨragɨnya' gamɨnne yayavɨna wɨjaakelyɨ.
Sahwai dara wɨjaa' “Nɨmɨ yagaala nebulyava'na dɨwa. Yɨ nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨ tewaanya naanga yanga yune'na gideinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ gɨmɨre dɨviya jakwalaangeraavɨ kwalaalya kwalaalyaraavɨ gimavɨgɨmwaaihidere.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Evɨraamɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'da maa'na winyaakei mamwaalyada yemwaaina yaakevɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ “Sara gideinyɨ,” wɨjaakabaaibɨ' sahwai sara maryaakebulyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yagaala dɨragɨnya' nebulya'na javwi yɨ sa' daresɨ. A'mwera yagaala dɨragɨnya' ja'negaa' sahwaraavɨne wavɨla'dere yayavɨ nebulya'na dadɨvɨsare. Nabaai yagaala dɨragɨnya sa' yuya yagaainakeburaavɨna yɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨre maangengɨ kaanya tihɨralɨmwagata ya'nesɨra. Yɨ dazasa' yagaala sangɨ aaya kaavɨlya' tɨvi'nanyasɨ.

Sarevɨ Gotɨyai gamɨre kaimɨraayainaavɨ gaimwange'na “Nɨmɨre yagaala dazavɨ maravɨla'nya ya'neinyɨ mɨ'. Sahɨrɨ' wana ku'maayaba yɨbwarɨdaakuma!” dakelyɨ. Sara dada yɨ sahwai yune gannya yagaalyavɨ dɨragɨnya yɨwagya'ne'na yagaala dɨragɨnya' nebulya'na dakelyɨ.

Nabaai sawaai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjasɨ yagaala dɨragɨnyasɨ sawaai maravɨla'nya mi ya'newaai kɨnɨnnakeine. Yɨ pɨrɨwaala daza'na Gotɨyai kwaasɨ dannei mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ. Yɨ dazawaai nebulya'na dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwanga neyadewaalyɨ. Nemɨ a'mweinaavɨre sɨmunyangɨ lɨkaanya wodaa Gotɨyarɨ gidɨkusaba lɨka yulya'daanyainaavɨ. Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna yune naanga nebulya'na dake'na nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ nayaa pada'galalɨmwagata yadaa nemɨ sahɨrɨ' kuna yemwaalyabwina maarya'neina sahwaryawɨ lɨka yulya'daanyaine.

Sɨpɨya' wɨla naangevasɨ yɨ'dɨvaidevaaibɨ' nemɨre Jizaazarɨ yemwaalyabwi sahwarɨ nevwɨyadevaaibɨ' sahwarɨ dɨragɨnaanga lɨmwaga'daanyaine. Gotɨyarɨna Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'dɨvɨta Naangera Gotɨyare angevɨ kusawɨnya jannevɨ wɨlaaweva kusawɨ yunewɨnna widɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Jizaazai Sɨgunyavɨyavɨ wɨla'. Nabaai Jizaazarɨ yemwaalyabwi Gotɨyaryabanna nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ marima'naabadesɨ.

Yɨ sahɨbanna Sɨgunyavɨ ku'dɨka yarinɨka dazavɨ sɨnnawɨ Jizaazai gamɨdaasɨ nemɨnyɨ negaimwange'na wɨlakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai nemɨnyɨne'na Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangei yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nei Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨvaavɨ avaainanyai yɨma'nakelyɨ.

Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨna daresɨ. Sahwai Anga Selemɨ kingɨyai maremwalyaa'. Yɨ sahwai Gotɨya Munya Ke'banya Nebulya'nanyare mubɨthɨka yɨra'delyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ Evɨraamɨmɨva kingɨyaraavɨ mala mena dathɨwanna yaka yɨ angebanna ayɨna yagalaawɨna yadaa'nyɨ yɨ tusavɨ Melɨkɨzathekɨ sai sahwarɨ wɨrata'nyɨna yaka tewaanya naanga yanga wɨdakelyɨ.

Yɨ Evɨraamɨ gɨlyɨvɨta yuya kingɨyaraavɨ maarake jaapalaka ata yuyɨraalya pimagɨnya pɨrɨ' Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨ wɨjaavakelyɨ. Nemɨ Melɨkɨzathekɨma yaya maridaana! Daza' daresɨ. Tewaanya yɨda'maraangeburɨya kingɨyalyɨ. Sai kingɨya Selemɨne kwalyɨ. Selemɨ aaya kaavɨla dazavɨre' daresɨ. Kwaamu'nanyaburɨya kingɨyalyɨ.

Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ ganɨmaangelyɨ ganaangesɨ sayorɨna madɨnyɨkesɨ. Nabaai sahwarɨ gyakwalaangeraavɨna madɨnyɨke'na sahwara kuneibɨsalyɨ. Nabaai avaainanya'na ganaange' maaraka yɨrɨkerɨ' kunelyɨ. Nabaai gamɨ balya'ne yɨrɨkerɨ' kunelyɨ. Sarenna sahwai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangeibɨsalyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dei yuyagaa' yuyagaa' kuna mwaalɨ'.

Melɨkɨzathekɨ dazarɨna nayaa jawɨrila! Sai yaya naanga nebulya'na yɨma'nakelyɨ. Nemɨre neyakwalaanga aaya mudɨ'nanyai Evɨraamɨ yuya gɨlyɨvɨta malyavɨ maarake yanga muda'. Yɨ sahwai Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨna ata yuyɨraai jaapalaka yɨ atɨraalya pimagɨnya tewaanyanna tewaanyannanya wɨjaava' aaya mudɨ'nanyai. Sarevɨ “Yɨ Melɨkɨzathekɨ a'mwe sai naangaangelyɨreva,” dadaanyɨ.

Nabaai pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Livaayarɨdaa'nya gyakwalaangera mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsare. Sahwaraavɨne kɨwɨnya' dɨnɨkesɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyare kɨwɨnyavɨ dara dɨnɨ' “Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨta mudɨka yuya atɨraalya pimagɨnya' maapɨka!” Yɨzɨrelɨyara sahwaraavɨ kwɨya'mwe nebulya'nanyara yɨ Evɨraamɨmɨre saanyavaakɨdaa'nyara mwaaleta kɨrɨ' Livaayara sahwara kwɨya'mweraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨta atɨraalya pimagɨnya' maa'dɨvɨsare.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Melɨkɨzathekɨ sahwai sahwaraavɨre yɨsavaakɨdaasɨ yɨma'nakai mɨ'. Menyalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sai Evɨraamɨmɨna gɨlyɨvɨsa atɨraalya pimagɨnya' maarakelyɨ. Nabaai Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyare yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja kɨnɨnnakerɨ Melɨkɨzathekɨ sahwai yagaala tewaanya naanga yanga wɨdakelyɨ.
Nemɨ mena yawɨ'manɨgo. A'mwe yagaala tewaanya naanga yanga yadei sai munyabanyɨ. Yɨ a'mwei sahware yagaala tewaanya naanga yanga wɨdade' maa'dei, yɨ sai kwaakewɨnyɨ. Sareburɨna yagaainake' mwari'.

Nabaai pɨburaai warɨ'. Yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Livaayara atɨraalya pimagɨnya maa'dɨvɨtara sahwara a'mwe balya'nere. Yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Melɨkɨzathekɨ atɨraalya pimagɨnya maarakerɨna dara jalɨkurakɨnɨ' “Sai gaala mwaalɨ'.”

Yɨ nemɨ yɨnɨga dara daanneine. Nebulyasɨ. Livaayai sai yɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨta atɨraalya pimagɨnya sa' maa'delyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sɨnnawɨ Melɨkɨzathekɨ atɨraalya pimagɨnya' Evɨraamɨmɨre maara'. Yɨ dazarevɨ sai atɨraalya pimagɨnya' Livaayai kwarejɨ maara'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Melɨkɨzathekɨ Evɨraamɨmɨ tusavɨ wɨrata'nagɨla Livaayai gannya gyakwalaangere saanyavaakɨ kuna yɨ'nadɨ'nyɨ Evɨraamɨ wɨjaavaka kɨrɨ' Livaayai wɨjaava'. Sarevɨ Evɨraamɨmɨjɨ Livaayarevaakɨyaraavɨjɨ wavɨla'delyɨ Melɨkɨzathekɨ.

Sare'na dara jawɨrila! Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨna Gotɨyai gamɨre kɨwɨnya' wɨjaayaburɨ aaya kaavɨlya' yɨ sa' Livaayara Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsabulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Livaayaraavɨrebwi sabwi Gotɨyarɨna a'mweraavɨ yɨda'maraangeraavɨ nebulya'na wɨmwaaihajɨ kwajɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naanga geibɨ' yɨma'nakerɨna a'mweraavɨ be'na wɨmudaasanneraavaka! Gawaalɨvaangei Yɨra'de Naangei sai Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨvaavɨne avaainanyai. Yɨ sai Livaayarevaakɨdaasa Eronɨmɨrevaakɨdaasaraavɨ avaainanyaina mɨ'.
Sare' dara yɨma'nakesɨ. Mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsaraavɨre savaa' wavɨla'nya yake'na tɨvɨkɨta dare' warɨ'. Yɨ nabaai kɨwɨnya kɨrɨsɨ nayaa wavɨla'nakesɨ. Yagaala mudɨke' yɨma'naabakesɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dɨnɨka dazai Yɨra'de Naanga mudɨkei yɨ sai yɨta pɨvaakɨyalyɨ. Eronɨmɨrevaakɨyai mɨ'. Sɨnnawɨ kwaraanyaba yɨra'dɨvɨsavɨ wɨdaayakei gamɨre yɨta savaakɨ a'mwei aane pwai kwai mɨ'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ mena yawɨ'manɨgo. Nemɨre Naangei sai Juthare yɨta savaakɨdaasɨ yɨma'nakelyɨ. Yɨ Mozɨzai yɨta dazavaakɨna yɨra'dɨvɨsaraavɨne yagaala aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' majaa'.
Nabaai tamira'de dazai pwai yɨma'naka yɨ sai Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨvaavɨ avaainanyarɨna nemɨ mena yawɨrangamanɨgo. Yagaala dazavɨre aaya kaavɨlya' wana ku'maayaba warɨ'.
Sahwai Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'dei yɨma'na'. Gamɨre kɨlaakevɨne kɨwɨnya'nanya' mɨ'. Gamɨre yɨsavaakɨre'na mɨ'. Aawa. Gaalya' yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nevɨre dɨragɨnya yune sahɨrɨsa' yakelyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara jalɨkurakɨnɨkesɨ.
Gɨmɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne Yɨra'dɨnyaigɨ
Yɨ Melɨkɨzathekɨmɨvaavɨ avaainanyaigɨ mwaaidɨnyaigɨnyɨra.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yɨra'dɨvɨsaraavɨrevaakɨne dakɨnɨke' sɨnnawɨnya' Gotɨyai mena marasɨ'nakesɨ. Yɨ kɨwɨnya daza' dɨragɨnya maaya' nemɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na manegaimwagyade'na marasɨ'nakesɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Ne Mozɨzare kɨwɨnya' Gotɨyarɨna yɨda'maraanga aane pwarɨ kɨrɨvɨ yune nebulya'na yɨma'naabaka' mɨ'. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Gotɨyai pɨbwi dara yɨma'naabakesɨ. Gotɨyare kɨwɨnyavɨna maalɨke yemwaalya'nengɨ. Gawaalɨvaangei Yɨra'derɨna naangaange yemwaalya'nengɨra. Yɨ sahwarɨna nemɨ Gotɨyaryaba gidɨkusabanna wawaanneinera.

Nabaai sahwarɨ Yɨra'derɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakakegaa' sai yaasɨwa' dahɨlakya mya'. Aawa. Sai yagaala dɨragɨnya' gamɨnne yayavɨna daka yɨ sahwarɨ dahɨlaka'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sɨnnawɨnya yɨra'dɨvɨta sahwara Livaayaraavɨ sara mya'. Yagaalya' yune'na dɨragɨnya' nebulya'na dake'na Livaayara sahwara yɨra'dɨvɨsara yɨma'nya'neraavɨna aane pwai kwarɨ sara madahɨlakya'.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨ sai Gawaalɨvaangerɨ yɨra'dei yɨma'nya'nerɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya' gamɨnne yayavɨna dakelyɨ. “Daaina! Nyɨgɨvɨna!” wɨdadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' dɨragɨnna sara dakakelyɨ. Sahwarɨ dara wɨdakelyɨ
“Naangeinyɨ nɨmɨnne yayavɨna nebulya'na mena dena,
Yɨ sahwainyɨ sɨmunya' ayahi maravɨla'nya mye.
‘Yɨra'dɨnya yuyagaa' yuyagaa'neigɨ dɨmwaalago'deigɨnyɨ.’ ”
Yuya sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo'nanyɨ. Jizaazarɨna yagaala wɨlɨmwagarɨkebwi yɨ sa' tewaanaangesɨ. Sa' yɨ kɨwɨnya' dakɨnɨka sɨnnawɨnyavɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨ.
Nabaai pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara yɨra'dɨvɨtara mwaalesare. Yɨ yuyara balya ya'nera yuyagaa' mamwaalyɨ yɨpɨnere. Gazaizai wawɨnya sa' maaraka balake'na yagalya'mavakelyɨ.
Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Jizaazai Yɨra'de yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nei kuna mwaaide'na wawɨnya sa' yagalya'mavadei mɨ'. Yuyagaa' sa' lɨmwagaradelyɨ. Sa' makwasakade' mɨ'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ sahwai a'mwera gamɨnyɨne'na Gotɨyaryabanna gidɨku' badɨvɨsaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na padaihasamaarannelyɨ. Yɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gaalyabulyɨyai mwaaida sahwaraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ marewɨdadevɨ sahwaraavɨ yune'na padaihasamaa'delyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naanga sasare dazai nemɨnyɨ negaimwagya'nelyɨ. Yunebannanyalyɨ. Sai Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wigaidei gɨrɨ'maayai nawɨ'nyalyɨ. Yɨ dazarɨ kayaa'nanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' warɨka' mɨ'. Yunebanna yune nawɨ'nyaangelyɨ. Yɨ yɨwetawakya maayalyɨ. Yɨ kayaa'nanyara yadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sai yadei mɨ'. Sai nebulya'nanyai nabinyalyɨ. Sarɨ Sɨgunyavɨ munya ke'bevanya'na Gotɨyai makɨlaawakelyɨ.

Sahwai Yɨra'dɨvɨta Naanga pwarabɨsai mɨka! Sai kayaa'nanyabwi myadevɨna gamɨre yɨwetawakya'na marasɨ'nya'nei kwaraanyaba sipɨzipɨyarɨ yɨrasa'na wɨmudaasadei mɨka. Sɨnnawɨnyara yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ aayagaa' kumɨre wagɨlya marasɨ'nya'na kwaraanyaba sipɨzipɨyarɨ kumɨnnedaasɨ yɨra'na yadɨvɨsare. Yɨ nabaai ayahi dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mweraavɨre wagɨlyanna avaaina yadɨvɨsare. Sarei mɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mweraavɨre wagɨlyanna sai wɨjaavɨnya'nei gamɨ sarɨ yuyagaa'ne gave pɨgaa'na yakelyɨ. Sahwai gamɨre gaalya' Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavakelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Mozɨzare kɨwɨnya' a'mwe yɨra'dɨvɨtara yɨma'nya'nera dɨragɨnya maayara mwaaidɨvɨta kɨrɨ' sahwaraavɨ dahɨlakadesɨ kɨwɨnya'. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare yagaalya' gamɨre yayavɨna yagaala dɨragɨnyasɨ kɨwɨnyavɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'nake' yɨ sa' Gawaalɨvaangerɨ dahɨlakakesɨ. Yɨ Gawaalɨvaanga sahwai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne yune nebulya'nanyai yune yɨda'maraangei mwaaidelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai nemɨnyɨna yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne Yɨra'de Naangelyɨ.

Yɨ, yagaala dazavɨya mɨnyagɨnya' nemɨ dɨvanɨgo', sa' yɨ daresɨ. Dazai nemɨnyɨne Yɨra'de Naanga sarei kɨnɨnnakeine. Yɨ naangeba namwaalyɨsarɨ aangasɨmagɨ Kingɨya Aaya Mudɨ'nanya Sɨgunyavɨyarevɨ sai mena walamwaalakelyɨ.

Sai Yɨra'de Naangei Gotɨyare anga gɨrɨ'maaya nawɨ'nyavɨ wɨdaayadelyɨ. Yɨ Selɨ anga daza' yɨleanga nebulya'nanyasɨ. Daza' a'mwe kwai marɨdaakwaka' mɨ'. Aawa. Yune Naangei Gotɨyai daakwakesɨ. Yɨ sahɨbanne wɨdaayadelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨra'de Naanga gazaizai a'mweraavɨna Gotɨyarɨ yanga dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna wɨjaaya'nejɨ yɨwetawakyanna Gotɨyarɨne tamiravawɨjaaya'nejɨ wawɨnya'na dahɨlakɨnɨkelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nabaai nemɨnyɨnei dazai wɨjaaya'ne' kɨnɨnnakerɨne wawɨnya' warɨkelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kwaaka davakɨ kuna mwaaidori kwajɨ sai yɨra'dei mamwaalyɨ kyadɨka! Yɨ Kɨwɨnyavɨ dɨnɨkabaaibɨ' pwara Gotɨyarɨ yanga dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna wɨjaaya'nera yɨra'dɨvɨsara mwaaihasa'nanyɨ.

Sahwara Kwaakevakɨya Gotɨyare Anga dazavɨ wawɨnya yɨra'dɨvɨsa' lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsare. Anga sa' anga nawɨ'nya nebulya'nanya Sɨgunyavɨ mannɨkevɨ ke'ba'nanya' a'mabaalyɨnanya' warɨkesɨ. Ne Mozɨzai Gotɨyare selɨ ange' marɨdaakwakegaa' Gotɨyai anga savɨna sahwarɨ dɨragɨnna wɨdakebɨsasɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sai dara da' “Gɨmɨ mala nayaa jɨwannana! Yɨnɨga nebulya'na avaala daza' nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨ mugunyavɨ givwarɨdaakwebaaibɨ' yɨ anga savɨya yuyangɨ sara javɨkarideigɨnyɨra.” Yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ nebulya'nanya daza' warɨkesɨ.

Nabaai dahaa' saba Kɨraazɨtɨyai Yɨra'de Naangere wawɨnya' mena maarakelyɨ. Yɨ wawɨnya daza' Yɨra'dɨvɨta Naanga pwaraavɨrevɨ nebulya'na wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Yɨ sai Gotɨyarɨjɨ a'mweraavɨjɨ mariraku'dere yagaala wɨlɨmwagarɨka sa' yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka sɨnnawɨnyavɨ wavɨlavɨkabaaibɨ' Yɨra'dɨvɨta Naanga pwaraavɨrevɨ nebulya'na wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Nabaai yagaala wɨlɨmwagarɨkebwi Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne savɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja yɨ kɨwɨnyavɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨjangɨ wavɨlavɨke nawɨ'nya naanga warɨkesɨ. Yagaala wɨlɨmwagarɨka daza' yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja dazangɨ Gotɨyai yɨma'naabakesɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka sɨnnawɨnya' yɨwetawakya yune maaya' warajɨ kwajɨ yɨ Gotɨyai “Yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka dazavɨneba dɨviya pɨrɨ' wakɨdeinyɨra,” myawɨri kyadɨ'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨzɨrelɨyara gamɨre kɨwɨnyavɨ galazekɨvalesaraavɨre yɨwetawakyanna yawɨraka Gotɨyai gamɨre bukuyavɨ da'. Yɨ dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Naangeinyɨ dɨwa “Yɨthaa! Dɨvi yɨrɨkerɨka yɨma'naabathegaa'
Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨre yɨsavaasɨ Juthɨyaraavɨre yɨsavaasɨ saraavɨna
Yɨ nɨmɨ yagaala wɨlɨmwagarade mudɨke' dakɨdeinyɨ.
Mudɨka daza' sɨnnawɨnya' dakage sa'bɨta' mɨ'.
Kwɨyakwalaangeraavɨ nɨmɨre asɨlyɨ wibwarɨdaakwia'neinyɨ
Yɨzɨpɨ Kwaakevɨ yagalya'mavesaraavɨ makwawegaa'
Kwɨyakwalaangeraavɨ yagaala sa' dake sa'bɨta' mɨ'.
Nɨmɨre yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka kuna mamɨdɨnyesa'na
Nɨmɨ sahwaraavɨ wanganake,” Naangeinyɨ dɨweinyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala wɨlɨmwagarade mudɨke' yɨdeinyɨ.
“Sare' yɨrɨka sarɨka mena kyojɨ
Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨre yɨsavaasɨ mudɨka daza' ye'mwannayɨdeinyɨ.”
Naangeinyɨ dɨwa. Yagaala wɨlɨmwagarade sa' daresɨ.
Kumɨre yawɨsavɨna nɨmɨre kɨwɨnyangɨ wɨlakɨdengɨ.
Kumɨre sɨmunyavɨna dazangɨ pɨkarya yɨdavɨdengɨ.
Nabaai nɨmɨ kumɨnyɨ Gotɨyainyɨ mwaalɨdeinyɨ.
Nabaai kumɨ nɨmɨnyɨ a'mwera mwaaibɨ'dere.
Sarevɨdaa' nyɨ gazaizai gamɨre angebanyarɨ wɨjɨwaakadei mɨ'.
Nabaai gazaizai gathaa'gahwaarɨ wɨjɨwaakya'ne' mwari'.
“Naangerɨ nayaa jawɨrangana!” wɨdathei mɨ'.
Yɨ dazagaa' nɨmɨre a'mwe yuyara nayaa nyawɨrangabɨ'dere.
Maalɨkerajɨ a'mwe naanga kwarajɨ nyawɨrangadaapiya'na
Sara wɨjɨwaakya'ne wawɨnya wɨmudaasadera mɨ'.
Sahwaraavɨ nɨmɨ kale gaimwanga wide'
Kumɨre yɨwetawakyangɨne tɨvɨkɨta marasɨ'nɨde'nanyɨ.
Yɨ kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwina sɨduta ayahi yawɨrɨdeinyɨ mɨ'.
Sareinyɨ yɨde sare'na yuyara nyawɨrangabɨ'deinyɨ.
Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Dɨnɨkevɨna “Mudɨkeva!” dakevɨ yɨ sɨnnawɨnya' aya mena dakɨnɨkesɨ. “Yarai yɨmaannadesɨ,” yawɨrakesɨ. Yɨ yuya aya yɨma'nɨvanɨke yɨ neibɨsangɨ. Sa yune maalɨkegaa'na waradengɨ. Yɨ yɨnahu yuya yɨwɨna yadengɨ. Sarebaaibɨ' yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka sɨnnawɨnya' sara yadesɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka aaya mudɨ'nanyavɨ Gotɨyai yɨlaaya'na ya'ne kɨwɨnya pɨnɨ dakakesɨ. Nabaai yagaala savɨne ange' Kwaaka dathavakɨya' mannɨkesɨ.

Sare' daresɨ. Anga selɨ anga sa' marɨdaakwesa'. Yɨ aaya ku'dɨka yarinɨka pimagɨnya mudɨ'nanyavɨ laamuyalyɨ yɨ'bɨnya Gotɨyarɨ wɨjaaya'ne gɨrɨkula daza kɨnɨnnakesɨ sawaai warɨ'. Ku'dɨka yarinɨka dazavɨna “Ku'dɨka Tewaanyava. (Gɨrɨkita'nanya maayava),” wo'nɨkesɨ.
Kusawɨnya janne naange' kurɨke'bɨ' tɨmudaakunɨka bulyɨmagɨdaasɨ janne ayahidaasɨ ku'dɨka pɨrɨ' “Ku'dɨka Tewaanya Nebulya'nanyava,” wo'nɨkesɨ.

Jɨta wabatɨrɨnya yɨravayɨhurya'ne' dɨ'bɨnya golɨya yavɨkarinɨke' ku'dɨka dazavɨ sɨmagɨnyavɨ wa'desɨ. Nabaai kusawɨ bukuta yagaala wɨlɨmwagarakebwi kɨrɨ' warɨkesɨ. Yunewɨnna bwakakɨnɨke' bukuta sare yuya sɨmagɨnya yune golɨyasɨna. Bukusavɨ kusawɨ maa'gula golɨyavɨ wapaaya manaaya' wɨla'dɨ'nyɨya' warɨ'. Nabaai bukusavɨ kusawɨ Eronɨmɨre yadisarɨ' yaalɨka mena yɨnɨkerɨ' kɨrɨ' kwaraka yɨrɨvakerɨ' warɨ'. Nabaai sɨla pwaraai sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai yagaala wɨlɨmwagarakeburɨya sɨlyaraarɨ pɨkarya yɨdavakeraai warɨ'. Yɨ yuya sa bukusavɨ wɨlakakengɨ.

Bukuta savɨ Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'devwi munyaba ejelɨyaraaibɨ' pɨvɨnakeraai byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨyaraai yɨlamwaalɨ'. Yɨ saraare pɨyangɨ kwaakewɨ bukusavɨ bwakakya savɨ Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'devwi marasɨ'nya'ne tawe lɨvirɨkurya'nebe. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' yuya dazangɨre aaya kaavɨlya' nɨmɨ tɨvi'nanya'na marima'naabɨdehaa' mɨ'. Kunegaakɨ.
Yuya daza mena kwara' yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ ku'dɨka aaya mudɨ'nanyavɨ mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsara kunnya wawɨnya Gotɨyarɨne ya'nera widaawadɨvɨsare.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kwarame gazasavɨ yune gave pɨgaa'na ku'dɨka ayahidaasavɨ Yɨra'de Naangei gave pwainanyai wɨlakelyɨ. Nabaai sai yaasɨwa'wɨlya yakai mɨ'. Aawa. Sai tamira'dɨvɨsavɨ tawe' maa'da wɨlakelyɨ. Yɨ tawe pɨrɨvɨ gamɨnne wagɨlya myawɨryade yake marasɨ'nya'nenna yɨ tawe pɨrɨvɨ wagɨlya a'mwera nayaa myawɨryadɨvɨ' yesa marasɨ'nya'nenna Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavakelyɨ.

Sasare dazaburɨ Kurya Tewaanyai dara neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨ'. Yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka sɨnnawɨnyavɨya angevɨre wawɨnya kuna warakegaa' janne' kuna tɨmudaakwakegaa' yɨ nemɨre tuta Gotɨyare Ku'dɨka Tewaanya Nebulya'nanyavɨna yɨnɨgulɨke' sa' yɨ ku'maayaba mima'naabyakesɨ.

Yɨ anga sɨnnawɨnya sa' yɨ dathahaa'nabɨ' dahɨlakake' ke'ba'nanyasɨ. Sɨnnawɨ anga dazavɨ a'mwera Gotɨyarɨna yanga dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyajɨ yɨra'dɨvɨta sajɨ wɨjaavadɨvɨsare. Kɨrɨ' yuya sa wɨjaavadɨvɨta sa Gotɨyarɨ ya'ne pware sɨmunyai padaihɨrakyarɨ yune nebulya'na yavada'galanne mɨ'. Yɨ sahwai gannya sɨmunyarɨ kuna yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨre yɨwetawakya' kuna warɨ'.” Sareibɨsara Gotɨyare angevɨ wɨlaawetara mɨ'.

Yɨ sasare sabwi dara dɨnɨ' “Wapaaya sa dɨnana! Sa kɨmaakɨya manɨnna! Aalya sa dɨnana! Aalya pɨnɨ kɨmaakɨyangɨ. Aalya yɨnya'nebwina sana sana ja!” Yɨ yuya sa kɨlaaka mwasɨmagɨnyavɨ duimwagasɨ'nya'nebulyɨ. Gotɨyai dakake kɨwɨnya yuya daza yɨ sahwara mɨdɨnya'neraavɨna yune aaya mudɨkebwi sahwai nayaa yɨma'naabazahaa'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yagaala nelɨmwagarɨka mudɨke' dakajahaa'nanyɨ.

Sare' kɨrɨ' dahaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai mena yɨma'naaba'. Yɨ sahwai yuya nawɨ'nya yɨma'nakenna nemɨ yɨbwakɨmanɨgongɨne Mubɨthɨka Yɨra'de Naangelyɨ. Sahwai Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyaryabanna yɨ selɨ anga naangaange' yɨda'nanya naangevɨ kusawɨ wɨlaawakelyɨ. Selɨ anga daza' Kwaakevakɨya sɨnnawɨnyavɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Daza' a'mwera asɨrajɨ yavɨkarya madeta' mɨ'. Yuya Gotɨyai wakyaakejɨya' sa' mɨ'.
