Kɨraazɨtɨyai anga dazavɨ wɨlya'nei yɨra'dɨvɨsara yetabaaibɨ' memeyavɨre tawesɨ bulɨmakaawoya dɨwɨnyaresɨ maaraka' mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwai balakegaa' tamiraya'ne gannya yune tawevɨna yakelyɨ. Yaka sai anga tewaanyavɨ yuyagaa'ne gave pɨgaa'na wɨla'. Yɨ sai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne nemɨnyɨ ayahi mubya yanemaarake'nanyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe pwaraavɨre kɨlaakejɨ' Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya yɨma'nadaasɨ yɨ yɨra'dɨvɨsara sahwaraavɨ pɨgaa' memeyavɨre tawesɨ pɨgaa' bulɨmakaawoya kwalyare tawesɨ lɨvirɨkureva nabaai pɨgaa' bulɨmakaawoya balya' yune' dɨka yɨra'dɨvɨ' kwaagɨta yovɨrawakadɨvɨsasɨ aalyasɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyaraavɨ lɨvirɨku'dɨvɨkɨ. Sara yadaapi yɨ kumɨre kɨlaakejɨ' tewaanyajɨ' yɨma'naderera. Sara yanne' waraja'

yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare tawe' ya'ne' dazahɨrɨvɨ yune naanga wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne Kurya Tewaanyai wɨgaimwagakei Gotɨyarɨna tamira'dɨvɨsa'bɨsa' gamɨre gaalya' wɨjaavɨnakelyɨ. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai sarɨ kayaa'nanya aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' wɨwarɨkai mɨ'. Sarei wɨjaavɨnaka sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre tawe' nemɨnyɨ kɨlaaka gavejɨ'na miwaipɨwagi yannesɨ. Aawa. Sai nemɨre sɨmunyarɨ negaida yɨ dala pɨnɨnnanya balyaburɨ mɨdɨnya'nebwi nemarasɨ'nannesɨ. Gotɨyai gaalyavɨ aaya kaavɨlyarɨ wɨdayaade'na tawe sa' neduimwagasɨ'nannesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai yagaala nelɨmwagarɨka mudɨkevɨ yɨwagya'nei nemɨnyɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨjɨ nemariraku'dei mwaalɨ'. Yɨ sahwai yɨwetawakya a'mwera yeta yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka mudɨ'nanya' kuna marerakegaa' yuya sa marasɨ'nya'nei sahwaraavɨ ayahi mubya yamaarya'nei gannya tawesɨ mena balakelyɨ. Sarevɨ yɨ a'mwera sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai gannyanna yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nenna wɨjaaya'ne kaimɨraayaraavɨ jaka wɨjɨvwaramaa'dera yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja' yɨ gaala daza' maapɨ'derera.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwera kumɨ balya'negaa' kumɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa maarya'neraavɨna “Yagaalya' yune'na darɨgusakɨma!” dadɨvɨ' pɨkarɨyɨkwirɨ yagaala daza' yɨda'dɨvɨsasɨ. Nabaai kaimɨraayara yagaala dɨragɨnya dazavɨne kuvɨnɨmaangere gɨlyɨvɨsa maarya'negaa' yɨ tɨvɨkɨta daregaakɨ. A'mwera nayaa mena dara kyawɨranganapɨjɨ “Ganɨmaangei pɨkarɨyɨkwirɨ yɨdavakei nebulya'na baimwaka!” sagaa' kuvɨbwaalɨvaangera maa'dɨvɨsagaakɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Balya'negaa'ne pɨkarɨyɨkwirɨ yɨdavakei gaala kuna mwaalajai yɨ gamɨre yagaala dɨragɨnya' yaasɨwa' warɨna yadevɨnyɨ. Yɨ sahwai mena kabalojɨ yɨ yagaala savɨre dɨragɨnya' yɨma'nadesɨ. Sara dɨnɨke' sara yɨpɨ'desɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyare pɨkarɨyɨkwirɨ yɨdavake' yɨ gamɨre yagaala wɨlɨmwagaraka sɨnnawɨnya' yɨ sa' dɨragɨnya' yɨma'naabya'ne'na arɨnga tameve gamɨre tawe' dɨmave'. Yɨ aane pwai kwai mabalyɨ yajɨ kwajɨ yagaala sa' dɨragɨnnake' myɨma'nyɨ kyadɨ'.

Sare' daresɨ. Aayagaa' Ne Mozɨzai yuya kɨwɨnyavɨya yagaala gazasa' a'mwe yuyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakakelyɨ. Yɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ sai tawe bulɨmakaawoya dɨwɨnyaresɨ memeyavɨresɨ maaraka aalyasɨ yegɨrɨlaka sipɨzipɨyavɨre arɨla wayaake' yɨta yɨzopɨyavɨya taanya maalɨkengɨ yewaa'bwaraka yɨ tawe' kɨwɨnyavɨya bukuyavɨ yɨrɨkuraka dɨvidaa'nyɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨ yɨrɨkurakelyɨ.
Sara yada dara da' “Tawe da' Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨnya'neihɨrɨ yɨhɨthakɨwake' gamɨre yagaala yɨhɨlɨmwagarɨka dazavɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwanga ya'nesɨ.”
Sarebaaibɨ' selɨ angevɨjɨ yuya dazavɨya wɨdaayadɨvɨta yɨlaaya ya'ne sangɨ tawe' yɨrɨkurakengɨ.

Kɨwɨnyavɨre saburɨne nebawa yuya sa tewaanya nawɨ'nya yɨma'nya'nenna yune tawe savɨna yɨma'nadengɨ. Gɨrɨkita'nanya duimwagasɨ'nadengɨ. Yɨ nabaai tawe' mwalaabi yaja' yɨ Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨre wagɨlya marasɨ'dei mɨ'.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yuya dazabura Sɨgunyavɨne warɨkebanya ke'ba'nanya dazangɨ, yɨ Kwaakevakɨ angesɨ angevɨya yuyajɨ sangɨ yɨwaipɨwagasɨ'nya'ne yɨra'dɨvɨta dazanna wawɨnya' warɨ'. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sɨgunya gamɨ savɨya tusavɨ yɨwaipɨwagasɨ'nya'ne yɨra'de tewaanya nebulya'nanya' Kwaakevakɨya dazangɨ wavɨlavɨke' ya'nevɨna tɨvɨkɨta naange' warɨ'. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai Sɨgunyavɨya tusavɨ duimwagasɨ'nya'nei gamɨre gaalya' wɨjaavɨnake'nanyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Anga tewaanya nebulya'nanya' a'mwera kunnya asɨrajɨ madesavɨ sahwai wɨlakai mɨ'. Yɨ anga sa' Gotɨyare anga nebulya'nanyavɨne yune kwaasɨ kwaasɨ ange'. Yɨ Kwaakevakɨya anga savɨ wɨlakai mɨ'. Aawa. Yune Sɨgunya kɨbeva wɨlakelyɨ. Sahɨbanna dahaa' nemɨnyɨ gaimwagya'nei Gotɨyaryabanna bi'mavamwaalaka nemɨnyɨneba marewɨdadelyɨ.

Yuya kwarame sangɨna Ku'dɨka Tewaanya Nebulya'nanyavɨ Yɨra'de Naanga kwai tawe gamɨre' mwaryade' wɨjaaya'nei wɨlakabaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai kwalaalyagaa' gamɨ sarɨ wɨjaavɨnya'nei Gotɨyaryaba widaawadei mɨ'.

Nabaai sai kwalaalyagaa' sara yajɨ kwajɨ aaya Gotɨyai Kwaaka wakyaaka dazagaa'daasɨ yaka yɨ dahaasɨ yɨ sai kwalaalyagaa' daange' kamaaradɨ'. Kɨrɨ' aawa. Yuyagaa'ne gave pɨgaa'na yɨrɨka aaya darɨkaavɨ sahwai wagɨlyangɨ tɨvɨkɨsa' sahwai tɨvi'na mubya'nei gamɨ sarɨ tamira'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavɨnya'nei Kwaaka davakɨ ku'maayaba yɨma'naabakelyɨ.
Yɨ a'mweraavɨna gave pɨgaa'na balya'nebwi warɨ'. Nabaai kabalapɨri dɨvidaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ maryawɨbwaradevaaibɨ'

Kɨraazɨtɨyai yune gave pɨgaa'na a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨre kayaa'nanyanna makwɨya'nei gamɨ sarɨ yɨra'dɨvɨsa'bɨsarɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavɨnakelyɨ. Nabaai dɨvi pɨgasaai sahwai bwalyɨ'mavadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sai sagaa' kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nya'nei ayɨna baladei mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwera “Sahwai walaabana!” dadɨvɨ' yemwaaimanɨgasaraavɨ nebulya'na yune'na padaihasamaarya'nei ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Mozɨzare kɨwɨnya' yuya tewaanya yɨma'nya'nenna a'mabaalyai kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Sa' dazanna ke'ba'nanya nebula' mɨ'. Kɨraazɨtɨyai ke'ba'nanya nebulyalyɨ. Kwarame gazasavɨ kɨwɨnyavɨya a'mabaalyaibɨsa yɨrayɨrata yadɨvɨta avaainanyangɨ aane pɨgaa' kɨgaa' a'mwe yune nebulya'nanyaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yavada'galanne mɨ'. Yɨ yɨra'dɨvɨta avaainanya sangɨna Kɨwɨnya sa' Gotɨyaryawɨnna bɨpɨjaraavɨ tewaanya yune nebulya'nanyaraavɨ wɨmwaaihade' mɨ'.

Sa' sahwaraavɨ yavada'galawɨmwaaihajɨ kwajɨ yɨ yɨra'dɨvɨsangɨ ayahi mujaayɨ kipɨdɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨ a'mwera Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wɨmaryadɨvɨ' gave pɨgaa'na yune yɨrasa'ne pɨrɨvɨna kumɨre kayaa'nanyangɨ tɨvi'na duimwagasɨ'nɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ yɨ sahwara kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ wagɨlya' ayahi pɨrɨsɨ mibwakɨnyɨ kipɨdɨka! Sare' midaaka!
Kɨrɨ' aawa. Kwarame gazasavɨ yɨrata daza' “Yɨ sahwaraavɨ ayahi yawɨpɨka!” dada kumɨre kayaa'nanyanna yadesɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨra'dɨvɨta bulɨmakaawoya kwalyaraavɨre tawejɨ memeyangɨrejɨ sa kayaa'nanya yɨnɨga wi'na nebulya'na marasɨ'nanne mɨ'. Aawaawa. Kuna yawɨ'dɨvɨsare.
Sarevɨ Kwaakevakɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai dɨvi yɨsavɨ balya'nei walaabakegaa' aya kɨgaa' sai Gotɨyarɨ dara wɨda'
“Bulɨmakaawoyaraavɨ yɨrasa'najɨ wɨjaaya'najɨ gɨmɨ ‘Aala!’ yawɨ'mwaa.
Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨ mɨdɨnya'neinyɨ kɨlaakejɨ' yovɨrawakɨwaanyaigɨnyɨ.
Dɨkevɨ yuya nasɨ'nya'ne yɨra'dɨvɨsajɨ
Kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nya'nejɨ yɨlaaya gihaimwakeigɨ mɨ'.
Sagaa' dara gɨthɨwa. Yɨthaa! Gotɨyaigɨ,
Sɨnnawɨ bukuyavɨ nɨmɨnyɨna yɨda'nɨkabaaibɨ'
Gɨmɨrebwi mɨdɨnya'neinyɨ mena bɨwa!”

Daza' sɨnnawɨnya' wɨdake' “Gɨmɨnyɨne yɨrasa'nejɨ wɨjaaya'nejɨ sangɨna nebwina gɨvu'nadeigɨ mɨ'. Nabaai dɨka yuya nasɨ'nya'ne yɨra'dɨvɨsajɨ kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nya'ne pɨnɨjɨ yɨlaaya gihaideigɨ mɨ'.” Yɨ yuya dazangɨ kɨwɨnya savɨre saburɨna wɨjaavadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' sara wɨdakesɨ.

Mena sara wɨdaka sagaa' Gawaalɨvaangei wɨda' “Yɨthaa, gɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi mɨdɨnya'neinyɨ a'mweraavɨre kayaa'nanyanna sahwaraavɨjɨ gɨmɨnyɨjɨ marirakurɨde'na mena bɨwa.” Sarevɨ yɨ sai “Ayawɨdaasa' dazabwi dɨragɨnna marɨdaakwɨma!” daka sɨnnawɨnya sabwi marasɨ'nakelyɨ.

Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Gotɨyare sɨmunya dazabwi mɨdɨda yɨ sɨmunya avaalya' kɨnɨnnakei gannya yune kɨlaakejɨ' yɨrasa'nejɨ' wɨjaava' yune gave pɨgaa'na. Wɨjaavakevɨ aalya neyaka Gotɨyarɨ sɨmunya dazavɨna nemɨnyɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyainaavɨ neyavada'galakelyɨ.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ yɨra'de gazaizai daa'da gannya wawɨnya yadelyɨ. Yɨ kwalaalya naangegaa' yɨrata sasare sa'na yadelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' yɨrata daza kayaa'nanya yɨnɨga wi'na nebulya'na marasɨ'nanne mɨ'. Sɨnnawɨnya yɨra'de gazaizai sara daavɨna yada sara yadelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ', pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨra'de sai yuyagaa'ne yune yɨrata gave pɨrɨ'na kayaa'nanyanna wɨjaavɨnaka yɨ sai Gotɨyare aangasɨrɨ dɨragɨnnakeba walamwaaina yakei mwaalɨ'.
Sai kuna sara mwaalojɨ Gotɨyaregaa' gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ dalaangewɨnna gamɨre yɨkamaangeraavɨ wakadehaa' yɨ yɨrɨka sagaa'na yemwaalɨ'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yune yɨrata gave pwaina wɨjaavɨnakevɨ nemɨnyɨ tewaanyainaavɨ neyɨma'manɨkeinaavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mena lɨmwaga'daanyainaavɨ yuyagaa'ne yune nebulya'nanyainaavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yavada'galanemwaaihakevɨnyɨra.
Kurya Tewaanya kwalyɨ nemɨnyɨ dara nejalɨkurakɨvanɨ'. Yɨ sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Kɨwɨnyavɨya yɨrɨka sarɨka mena kwavɨlavojɨ
Yagaala wɨlɨmwagarade dare' sahwarajɨ ye'mwannayɨdeinyɨ.
Naangeinyɨ dɨwa. Yagaala daza' daresɨ.
Kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ nɨmɨre kɨwɨnyangɨ wɨlakɨdengɨ.
Kumɨre yawɨsavɨ dazangɨ pɨkarya yɨdavɨdengɨ.
Dɨvidaa'nyɨ yagaala jɨvwa'mwange' dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Nabaai kumɨre kayaa'nanyajɨ yɨwetawakyajɨ tɨvɨkɨta
Sɨmunya ayahi yawɨrɨdeinyɨ mɨka. Arɨkewɨ.
Yɨ Gotɨyai wagɨla daza mena marasɨ'nyabwi warɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ kayaa'nanyanne tɨvɨkɨsa' yɨrasa'ne wawɨnya' ayahi pɨrɨ' mɨ'. Tɨvi'nanyɨ.
Yuya sarevɨdaa'nyɨ, nya'mweihi, Jizaazare tawe nemɨnyɨnevɨ Gotɨyaryabanna gamɨre Ku'dɨka Tewaanya Nebulya'nanyavɨ nemɨ dɨragɨnna da'daanyaina yɨnɨga wi'na wɨlaanneine.

Yɨ daresɨ. Nemɨ wɨlaanne dazaryabanne tuta dɨragɨnnaka mudɨke' Jizaazai gamɨ sai baasa'. Yɨ tuta daza' gamɨ sahwai gaalyavɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sahwai nemɨ wɨlya'neinaavɨna janne naange' kaadihɨsa'bɨsa' tɨmunadaa'dɨsɨyavɨ wɨlakelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai janne daza' gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ. A'mwera Ku'dɨka Tewaanya Nebulya'nanyavɨ wɨlya'neraavɨ janne naange' tihɨ'nɨke' baasakabaaibɨ' gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' mubɨthɨka yɨrasa'nejɨ' kayaaka yɨgaina'.
Nemɨ Gotɨyare angevɨyainaavɨ gamɨreinaavɨ nemaremwaaideina Yɨra'de Naangei munyawɨnyai kɨnɨnnakeine.

Daza nebwina warɨkevɨ nemɨ yuya kwaasɨya marasɨ'nadaa sɨmunya nebulya'nanya' kɨnɨnnakeina yɨ nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna nebulya'na lɨmwaga'daa yɨ sahwaryabanna nayaa gaimakunna wawaana! Jizaazai gamɨre tawejɨ' nemɨre sɨmunyai yuya yɨwetawakya yɨbwakɨnɨkerɨ yɨwaipɨwagasɨ'nya'na yɨrɨkuraka nemɨre kɨlaakejɨ' aalya nawɨ'nyaangesɨ aalya neya'najɨ neyakeina. Yɨ sareina Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'na sara wawaana!

Nemɨ yuya tewaanya yemwaidaanyabwi ku'maayaba jalɨkurakya' dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaraana! Nemɨ lɨka sangina myaanna! Sa' nemɨ nayaa pada'galalɨmwagaraana! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yuya yune naanga nebulya'na Gotɨyai mena dɨnɨkengɨ ya'nenna sai yadelyɨ.
Nemɨ nemɨre neya'mwe kwaraavɨnajɨ sɨmunya nayaa yawɨraana! Yɨ sɨmunya yawɨsa'na saraavɨ yɨdɨkaasa' pwaraavɨna wɨvu'nade'najɨ wawɨnya nawɨ'nya wɨgaimwabɨ'de'najɨ sara yaana!

A'mwe pwara yadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' neya'mwerajɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya ya'na kwaiyɨ'bwa'nya sabwi myagalya'mavaanna! Aawa. Neya'mwerajɨ sɨmunya yɨwange'na dɨha'bwa'naana! “Yɨrɨka aayarɨ' mena nebawa mɨka!” yawɨranganawaajɨ sarevɨ yɨ nemɨ wawɨnya sa' dɨragɨnna nayaa yaana!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ yagaala nebulya'nanya Naangerevɨ mena yawɨramaarona yɨ dɨvi yune nennya saburɨ nemɨ kayaa'nanyaburɨ yamaryadaanya'na kayaa'nanya daza' marasɨ'nya'ne yɨra'dɨvɨsa' aane pɨrɨ' kuna mwari'.

Aawa. Sara yɨpɨjaraavɨ yune yawɨbwasa' lɨka yɨrɨ'galya'ne' yemwaaibɨ'dera mwaaibɨ'de'nanyɨ. Yɨ wana dɨkange'na na'nade' kayaaka yɨgaidevaaibɨ' yɨ Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ gamɨre yɨkamaangera sara yɨma'nɨpɨjaraavɨ yɨgalade'nanyɨ.

A'mwe pwai kwai Mozɨzare kɨwɨnya' mɨdɨnya'na “Arɨkewɨ!” yawɨralɨmwanna yajai, yɨ a'mwe pwaraaina a'mwe kwaraai kwainanyara gamɨre yɨwetawakyabwi tɨnna wanganeva sara jalɨkurakɨpɨja'na a'mwe naangera a'mwe dazarɨna kale mwiannera tamakadɨvɨsalyɨ.

Yɨ sarɨmɨ a'mwe Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangerɨ bule'na wɨjaavajarɨna gara yawɨ'mwaava? A'mwe dazai yɨ taanga naanga Mozɨzarevɨ pari'mavajare tɨvɨkɨsa wavɨlavɨke maaradei midaaka! Yɨ dazai yagaala dɨragɨnya' Gotɨyai nemɨjɨ nelɨmwagarɨkevɨne tawe' sahwarɨ tewaanyarɨ wɨmwaaihya'ne' kɨrɨ' sahwai “Yaasɨwa'nanyasɨ,” yawɨrakelyɨ. Yɨ sai kale gaimwange'ne Kuryarɨ bɨraizɨke' wana kayaa'nanya nebulya'nanyabwi yakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨna be tɨvɨkɨta' maaradelaka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ Gotɨyai dakerɨna mena yawɨ'manɨgo. Dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Kayaa'nanyaburɨ tɨvɨkɨsabwi yɨ sa' wawɨnya' nɨmɨresɨ. Nɨmɨ sainyɨ kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨrɨdeinyɨ. Nabaai sai yagaala pɨrɨ' da' “Yune Naangeinyɨ nɨnnya a'mweraavɨ maryawɨbwarɨderera.”
Nabaai Gotɨyai gaalyavɨ aaya kaavɨlyai nemɨnyɨ kayaa'nanyanna nerɨvɨkɨrya'nevɨ gamɨre asɨrɨ galalɨmwagata neyaja' yɨ sa' wana lɨka neyɨrɨ'galade' naangaangesɨ.

Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨne sɨnnawɨ sagaa'na sɨmunya ayɨna nayaa jawɨrila! Yɨ Gotɨyare baake' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ yɨhwannakegaa' yɨ dazagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagesa'na daanga kwalaalya maareva sahwarɨ myagalya'mayeva kuna dɨragɨnna daaya'neihi yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya naange' yesaihɨlyɨ.

Yɨ pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Pɨgasa a'mwera sarɨmɨnyɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ marayɨhɨdaakwadɨvɨsare. Yɨ sahwara navaruyagaalya yɨhɨthadɨvɨsare. Yɨ taanginya yɨhɨzaavadɨvɨsare. Nabaai pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Pɨgasa sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mwe taanginya sara maa'dɨvɨsarajɨ avaaina ye'mwannamwaala yadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ gaimwanga yadɨvɨkɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwagesa'na kalavuzangevɨ mwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨna kale yɨhyadaa'nyɨ gaimwagya'neihi sahwaraavɨre taanginyangɨ sahwarajɨ ye'mwannamwaalesaihɨlyɨ. Nabaai “Nemɨre nebulya'nanya Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja kuna warɨ'. Nabaai sa yuyagaa' waradengɨ,” mena yawɨreva a'mwera Kɨraazɨtɨyareihɨre gɨlyɨvɨta yɨhipalamaareta kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yadɨvɨ' yɨ wanganakɨna yesaihɨlyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga dɨragɨnaanga dazaburɨ kuna daa'dɨvɨ' myagalya'mapɨna! Aawa. Sa' yɨ gannya tɨvɨkɨta naange' kɨnɨnnakesɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare sɨmunya' mɨdɨnapɨjɨ sahwai sɨnnawɨ yune naanga nebulya'na yɨhɨthake' maarya'neihi kwaamu'nanyaburɨ dɨragɨnna nayaa dɨthaayidevwina dɨmaaryɨla!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Maalɨkegaa'na, nebawana mɨ'.
Dazai nebwina walaabathelyɨ.
Sai yemwaala yadei mɨ'.
Nɨmɨre yɨda' maraangei nyɨlɨmwaga'devɨ mwaaladelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sai lɨka sangina yaja'
Sarɨna nɨmɨre Kuryai yɨlaaya nyɨgaladei mɨ'.
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨjɨ saina a'mwe lɨka sangina myadaa Gotɨyarɨ magɨnyɨrayadaa yɨwɨya yadaanyaina mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ a'mwe dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaa gaalyabwi ma'daanyaine nemɨ.

Dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi yɨ sabwi darebulyɨ. Nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnna mena lɨmwagaraaja' yɨ sa' yuya nemɨ yemwaaimanɨgonna Gotɨyai nejaaya'nenne aaya kaavɨlyasɨ. Yɨ daza nemɨre tɨnnyai tɨnna mwanganyɨvanɨgo sa yɨ nemɨre sɨmunya' lɨmwangebwi nebulya'na yawɨrangamanɨ'.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe sɨnnawɨnyara sahwara dɨragɨnna kalɨmwage', sare' yɨ Gotɨyai da' “Sahwara yɨ nawɨ'nyarera.”

Nemɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadaa sarevɨ yɨ nemɨ mena yawɨramaa'manɨgo. Gotɨyai yagaalya' wɨjaakevɨ sɨgunyasɨ Kwaakesɨ yavɨkaryaa'. Yuya nemɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgo sanna Gotɨyai pɨnɨngɨ tɨnna yɨnɨga wi'na mwanganyɨ yaannengɨ maaraka yuya sa yavɨkaryaakengɨ.

Aivelɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sara yada yɨ sahwarɨna yɨrata tewaanya' wɨjayaa'. Yɨ yɨrata daza' gathaakaangei Kenɨmɨre yɨrasavɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Yɨ tewaanya nebulyasɨ. Yo, Aivelɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaka dazavɨna Gotɨyai “A'mwe yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨra,” wɨjalɨkurakakelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨna yanga Aivelɨ wɨjayaakenna Gotɨyai nawɨ'nya wɨvu'nakelyɨ. Yɨ Aivelɨ mena kabala' kɨrɨ' gamɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga dazavɨ sa' yagaala kuna dɨvanɨkesɨ.

Yɨnokɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai sahwarɨna daka “Mabalanna!” sahwarɨ maaraka Sɨgunyavɨna makɨlaawa'. Gotɨyai mena maarake'na a'mwera sahwarɨna bɨramaarya'nera yeva kɨrɨ' mwanganyɨ ye'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai Yɨnokɨmɨ mamaaryadɨ'nyɨ yɨ dazagaa'na Gotɨyare Bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Yɨnokɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya naanga wigalakelyɨreva.

A'mwei Gotɨyarɨ malɨmwagya sai Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wigalannei mɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe pwai Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya ya'nei sahwaryaba gaimakuwɨlya'nei yɨ sahwai dara yawɨrana! Yɨ Gotɨyai mwaalɨ'. Sahwai a'mwera sahwarɨna bɨ'dɨvɨsaraavɨ tɨvɨkɨta nawɨ'nya' wɨjaavadelyɨ. Sara yawɨrana!

Nowaai Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sara yada yɨ Gotɨyai yune'na wɨdakevɨ “Mala nayaa jɨwannana!” sahwai dɨvi yɨma'nadevɨna kuna mwanganyada Gotɨyare yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'namaa'na yaka sɨpɨya pɨrɨ' yavɨkarina ya'. Sarevɨ yɨ gamɨjɨ gamɨre a'mwakaimɨraayamɨlɨkajɨ sɨpɨyavɨ kusawɨ yɨkwina yeva wɨlamwaaina yesa'na nawɨ'nya yɨvainakenɨdake. Gannya dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga dazavɨ Nowaai Kwaakevakɨya a'mwe yuya pwaraavɨ kotɨya mena jɨdavakesɨ. Sahwai Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwaga'daa'nyɨ pwara aawa. Yɨ gamɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangevɨ Gotɨyai Nowaarɨ “A'mwe yɨda'maraangeigɨnyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨre kaimɨraayaigɨ yɨma'nɨwaa,” wɨda'. Yɨ Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyara gamɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsaraavɨ yadevaaibɨsasɨ.

Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai jaka wɨjɨvwaramaa'na kya' Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' mɨdɨnna yakelyɨ. Sai gannya angeba yagalya'mavaka yɨ kwaaka pɨbanna Gotɨyai gannya yɨnahunya' wɨjaaya'nebanna wawa'. Evɨraamɨ myawɨrya' “Nɨmɨ gawɨnna wɨdeinyaka?” Kɨrɨ' sai dɨragɨnna lɨmwada wawa'.

Sai dɨragɨnna lɨmwada kwaaka dazavɨ sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai sarɨ yune naanga nebulya'na “Gɨzaavɨdesɨra,” daka savɨ mwalaawa'. Yɨ sai kwaaka savɨyaibɨ' kwaaka dazavɨ maaveibɨ' mwaala'. Sai selɨ anga sɨmɨnangebɨsangɨ Aazakɨ gawaalɨvaangelyɨ Jaikopɨ gyakwalaangelyɨ mwaalagɨlabaaibɨ' mwaaidelyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe dazaraai kwaaka daza' sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai dakabaaibɨ' salyɨ yagaala yune naanga wɨja sa' ye'mwannamaaragɨlyaraalyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Anga naange' Gotɨyai gave sahwaina anga naangeba majavwina yawɨramaa'na yaka gamɨ sai mada'. Yɨ anga naanga daza' yuyagaa'ne' mannɨgunɨkesɨ. Evɨraamɨ anga naanga dazaba kusawɨ wɨlya'ne gannya sagaa'na yemwaala yakelyɨ.

Nabaai Seraa' Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'devɨ gamɨ sa' yagɨnya' mwaaida kɨrɨ' nabaai a'mwe ne' mena mwaaida kɨrɨ' kaimɨraayarɨna munya wannya'ne dɨragɨnya' wi'na maarakesɨ. Seraa' sɨmunya dara yawɨramaarakevɨnyɨ “Yɨ Gotɨyai yagaala yuna nebulya'na dadelyɨ. Sahwai lɨmwangebwi yɨnɨkelyɨ. Sahwai nɨmɨ kaimɨraayarɨna munya wannya'ne'nyɨ mena nyɨdakɨwake' yɨnɨga wi'na yadelyɨ.”

Sarevɨ yɨ a'mwe gave dazai nabaai sai yuna nei balya'neba kɨbawa yada sai gyakwalaanga kwalaalya naangeraavɨna kwɨyakwalaangei yɨma'nakei. Nabaai sahwara sɨlɨngaamɨnya sɨgunyavɨ yɨlarɨka sabɨ', saalaalyavɨ maangebaarɨ siweka warɨka sabɨ' kwalaalya naanga yɨma'nɨguvanɨga'. A'mwera ata yɨnɨga wi'na gibɨnera mɨ' sahwaraavɨ.

Yuya dazara kuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨ' mena bale'. Sahwara Kwaakevakɨ mwaalesagaa' nawɨ'nya daza sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ yune naanga nebulya'na dake maaretara mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwara nawɨ'nya daza menya saamɨnyaba kuna daa'dɨvɨ' sahɨnɨ tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' yɨlaaya ye'. Yɨ ku'maayaba dara jalɨkurake' “Nemɨ Kwaaka dathavakɨ mwaaihoina a'mwe anga pɨwɨdaasarabɨsaine. Nemɨ angavaayaina maalɨkegaa' Kwaaka dathavakɨ bamwaaiho.”
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwera yagaala sasare sa' dadɨvɨsara dara neyɨbwarɨdaakwe' “Nennya kwaaka Gotɨyai nenɨmaangei mwaaideva nebulya'na bɨramaraana!”
Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Anga dazaba sɨnnawɨ yagalya'maveva besaba kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ kuna warajɨ kwajɨ sahwara ayɨna wɨya'nera yɨ tusa' kɨnɨnnakera kamwaaibɨthɨka!

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kumɨre sɨmunyavɨ kwaaka pɨbanna yɨ sa' kumɨre abwaibwalaasavɨ wavɨlavaka yɨ tewaanya nawɨ'nyaangevɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nakesɨ. Sa' yɨ yune Sɨgunyabanna. Sarevɨ a'mwe dazarera dara desa'na “Gɨmɨ nemɨre Gotɨyaigɨnyɨ,” Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya wigaidɨvɨsalyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ sahwaraavɨna wagɨla muvwa'nyakelyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sai anga naanga pɨba a'mwe dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨta dazara mwaaibɨ'deva mena yovɨrawakakere.

Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaalakegaa' sara kuda' yɨ Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'da “Nɨnnya Aazakɨmɨ tamiraya'nerɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavɨma!” dakelyɨ. Gotɨyai sahwarɨ yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdakei sahwai kaimɨraaya gave pwainanya dazarɨ tamirasa'nei sara daka yakelyɨ.
Yɨ kaimɨraaya dazai Aazakɨmɨna Gotɨyai Evɨraamɨmɨ wɨda' “Yɨta yune Aazakɨmɨre savaa'na gɨmɨre yɨta savaa' yaya maapɨ'dere.”

Evɨraamɨ dara yawɨraka “Nyɨbwaalɨ' mena kabalojɨ baa'nana! Gotɨyai ayahi yɨnɨga wi'na yɨdɨkaavannelyɨ.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ke'ba'na yagaalya' daza'na sasare' nemɨ yɨnɨga daanneine “Evɨraamɨ gannya kaimɨraayarɨ ayahi maara' kavi'nɨnnyavɨdaasaibɨsarɨ.”

Aazakɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sara yadevɨ sahwai Jaikopɨjɨ Yɨzolyɨ saraarɨ yagaala tewaanya naanga yanga ya'ne' wɨdakelyɨ. Yɨ yagaala dazavɨ sahwai sahwaraarɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'nya'nenna dakelyɨ.

Jaikopɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sara yadevɨ yɨ gamɨ balya'ne kɨbawegaa' Jozepɨyare a'mwakaimɨraayaraarɨna Gotɨyai tewaanya naanga yanga yɨma'naabya'ne yagaala wɨda'. Yɨ sai yadisarɨkɨ yademavemwaaina yaka Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yakelyɨ.

Jozepɨyai Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sara yadevɨ yɨ yɨrɨka gamɨ balya ya'negaa'ne yagaala daka'. Yɨ dɨvina Yɨzɨrelɨyara Yɨzɨpɨ yagalya'mavapɨri wɨpɨ'dehaa' gamɨre yagɨnyarɨ' kwaaka Gotɨyai wɨjaavadevɨna makabapi lɨkirakya'na sahwaraavɨ wɨda'.

Mozɨzare ganɨmaangeyoi Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'disawaalyɨ. Sara yadisavɨ ganaange' Mozɨzarɨ mudanga kya' yɨ sawaai kaimɨraaya tewaanya nawɨ'nyarɨ wanganna yagɨlya'najɨ kingɨyare yagaala dakɨnɨke'na sawaai lɨka myagɨlya'najɨ lawe dɨkaai dɨ'nannela dahɨla sahwarɨ lɨka yulyakɨna yagɨlyawaalyɨ.

Mozɨzai Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'delyɨ. Sara yadevɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ sai naanga mena yɨma'naka “Aala!” da'. “ ‘Sahwai Yɨzɨpɨ maremwaaidei Peroyare garaavaanga savɨrelyɨra,’ nanyɨdɨpɨka! Peroyare dɨragɨnya' maarya'neinyɨ mɨka! ‘Aala!’ dɨwa.” Sara dakelyɨ.
Gamɨ sai “Gotɨyarerajɨ taange' ye'mwannamaarɨma!” daka kayaa'nanya savɨre sabwi mɨdɨnya'ne maalɨkegaa'ne wabahɨlaaka bɨramaarya'na “Aala! Sara yɨwɨja' naangegaa' savɨre wagɨla nanyɨvwa'nadɨka!” da'.

Sai sara yawɨraka nabaai sai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bɨrala wɨdɨpɨ'devaaibɨ' wagɨla maarya'ne' daza' yɨ gɨlyɨvɨta nɨgwɨlalaaka Yɨzɨpɨ mwaalyaraavɨrengɨ nebulya'na wavɨla'desɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai sahwarɨ wɨjaaya'ne tɨvɨkɨta nawɨ'nya' yuyagaa'ne' yawɨranganake'nanyɨ.

Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'devɨ yɨ sai dɨkaavaka Yɨzɨpɨ yagalya'mava'. Sai kingɨya dazare sɨnna tɨka wɨdavake'na lɨka myaka yagalya'mava'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mweina Gotɨyarɨ tɨnnyalyɨ wangadaanyaina mɨ'. Kɨrɨ' Mozɨzai Gotɨyarɨ tɨnna wanganya'bɨ' yakevɨna sai dɨragɨnna mwaalakelyɨ.

Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'devɨ Pari'ma'munne' yɨmavɨdaakwa'. Ejelɨya tamakadei Yɨzɨrelɨyainaavɨre sɨraangeraayaba gidɨkusabanna nabathɨkajɨ, Mozɨzare yagaala mɨdɨneva sipɨzipɨyare tawe' kaadihɨsavɨ yɨrɨkuresa'nanyɨ.
Yɨzɨrelɨyara Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsavɨ yɨ Saalaalya Wayaakevɨ kwaaka yaalɨkɨryavakɨ wɨlaawe'. Nabaai Yɨzɨpɨyara sahɨrɨvɨ yaamɨjɨ sara yesa' yɨ aalya' maramina kwia' mena balɨna ye'.
Yɨzɨrelɨyara Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsavɨ sikurɨka Jerikonyavɨ yɨrɨka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya gazarɨsarɨ' wavɨlavakegaa' kaanya gɨ'mave'. Yɨ sara kye' sikurɨke' wala'na yakesɨ.

Rayaa' sɨnnawɨ yaasɨwa' yamaryade' Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'devɨ a'mwe pwaraarɨ gaimwaga'. Saraai Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨne dameraai angeba Jerikona badi' kutɨnna byadaakɨlyɨyaraarɨ. Sarevɨ yɨ sa' a'mwe Gotɨyarɨ galazekɨvalesarajɨ kayaaka mye'mwannayɨnya'.

Kɨrɨ' dahaa' nɨmɨ ayahi be yagaala je'mwagɨjɨwana? Aawa. Dahaa' yɨnɨgehaa' mɨ'. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ yagaaikɨwɨnya dɨwɨne' Gɨthɨyonɨnna, yɨ Baraakɨnajɨ yɨ Saamɨzonɨmɨnajɨ yɨ Jepɨtaazarɨnajɨ yɨ Devitɨjɨ Saamyɨwelɨjɨ saraarɨnajɨ yɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨnajɨ.

A'mwe dazara Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsare. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ pwara malyavɨ wavɨla'dɨvɨ' kingɨya pwaraavɨre kwalaalyaraavɨ aamiyaraavɨ walamarakadɨvɨsare. Pwara tewaanya yɨda'maraangebwina yadɨvɨsare. Pwara Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na dake maaresare. Pwara kavɨjɨlɨka laayonɨyaraavɨre maangengɨ galabu'mwanna ye'.

Pwara dɨka naange' kyɨda' yɨgaapalesare. Pwara lɨkaanya wodɨvɨ' kwaari'masɨramɨnya maramakya'. Pwara arakɨjara mwaaleva yɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ dɨragɨnya maare'. Pwara malyavɨ a'mwe dɨragɨnaangera nebulya'na yɨma'ne'. Yɨ sahwara menyaraavɨre aawɨlata naangeraavɨ mɨjamakwawe'.

A'mwe Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsangɨ. Kumɨre mena bainɨkera ayɨna kidɨkaava' sahɨnɨ ayɨna maare'. Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwara kalavuzavɨ mwaaidapi yɨkamaangera kumɨre kɨlaakejɨ' kayaaka nebulya'na yɨgalake' kumɨre yune balya'negaa'na. Sahwara Gotɨyarɨ bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ yɨ nabaai yɨkamaangera sahwaraavɨ makwaasɨna kyɨpɨdɨka! Kwipɨdɨka! Kɨrɨ' sahwara yɨkamaangeraavɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨnetara mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Kavi'nɨnnyavɨ Gotɨyai neyɨdɨkaavadeinera. Yɨ gaala nawɨ'nyaange' yuyagaa'ne' maraadeinera,” dɨragɨnyara bale'.
Pwara taanga maarɨna ye'. Yɨkamaangera sahwaraavɨ yagaaibɨraizɨka wiadaapi, mala dɨka wɨgɨda'dɨvɨ' senɨyabarajɨ wɨla galyɨrakadɨvɨ' yɨ kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihɨna yadɨvɨsare.

Yɨkamaangera pwaraavɨ sɨlyajɨ lɨwakɨna. Pwaraavɨ kisɨkisɨlyasɨ yune woripu'na. Pwaraavɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnyasɨ dabaina kye' bale'. Pwaraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨne yuya sanna wɨmudaasakera kɨlaaka sipɨzipɨyangɨrejɨ memeyangɨrejɨ kumɨre kwaabɨhannya yɨra'ne'. Yeva kaanya yamarye'. Pwaraavɨ taanga wɨjaavesare. Pwaraavɨ wana kayaa'nanya wiadɨvɨsare.

Sarevɨ yɨ kaanya yɨwɨnama'na kwaakevɨ a'mwera maayabajɨ mugunyangɨjɨ lɨka yulya'na yadɨvɨkɨ. Yɨ sɨlyangɨya lɨnnyangɨjɨ yɨ kwaakevɨ yɨrorɨlyangɨjɨ wɨlamwaale'. Sarera tewaanyarera. A'mwe dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨta dazara sahwaraavɨ tɨnnyawɨ mwaalya'nera a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara yɨnɨga wi'na yɨpɨnera mɨ'.
A'mwe yuya dazara Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsaraavɨna Gotɨyai da' “Sahwara yɨ nawɨ'nyarera.” Kɨrɨ' nawɨ'nya daza' sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na dake maaretara mɨ'.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai yawɨta pɨrɨ' yawɨta sɨnnawɨnyavɨ wavɨlavɨke' nemɨnyɨne' yovɨrawaka'. Sɨnnawɨnyara yɨbwaramakwaanya' nemɨnyɨ ya'nera yɨnɨga wi'na waanya'nera mɨ'. Aawa. Nemɨ sahwarajɨ yuyagaa'ne yune nebulya'nanyainaavɨ nebulya'na yavada'galanemwaaihadeinera.

Dathazarevɨdaa'nyɨ dara yaana! A'mwe sɨnnawɨnya dazara gɨhɨpaledaaveva nemɨnyawɨ yɨraayanga naange'bɨsara dɨragɨnna lɨmwagasabwi neyɨbwarɨdaakwe' nemɨnyɨ. Yɨ yuya taanginaanga gazasasɨ yuya kayaa'nanya nemɨwɨ'nɨka gazasasɨ nemɨ nayaa yagalya'mavaana! Yɨ nemɨre sɨmunya' nayaa dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwadaa Gotɨyai nemɨ kaanyave'na ya'ne' dahɨlakake' gavamarasɨ'nyɨkaanya daza' kaanyave'na dɨragɨnna yaana!

Sara yadaa nemɨre tɨnnyai nayaa banganaraa Jizaazarɨ! Sai nemɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangevɨ aaya kaavɨlyai yɨ dɨvi nabaai sai lɨmwanga savɨ yunebanna nebulya'na yadelyɨ. Sahwai yɨlaaya' dahɨlakɨnɨke' dɨvi maarya'ne'na sɨmunya yawɨ'da dɨragɨnya mwaalaka yɨsavɨri tamarɨmwesavɨne daange' maaraka balakelyɨ. A'mwera yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ balya'na wagɨla naanga wɨvwa'nade' kɨrɨ' sahwai “Gesɨra,” yawɨraka balya savɨ yakelyɨ. Sarei dahaa' naangeba Gotɨyare maremwaaidere namwaalyɨsavɨ aangasɨmagɨ mwaalɨ'.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsara yɨkamaanga kayaa'na yesare Jizaazarɨ. Kɨrɨ' sai kuna dɨragɨnna mwaala'. Sasare'na nayaa jawɨrila! Sarɨmɨre kuryaraavɨ maa'na nayɨhinadɨka! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ maalɨka nayɨhima'nadɨka!
A'mwera sarɨmɨre lɨmwangebwi walamarakya'na kayaa'na yɨhyadɨvɨ' mala tannadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna mwaaiha'. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' dazavɨ sarɨmɨre tawe' mwalaabi yɨwa'. Mabalyɨ yɨwaa'.
Yagaala Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwange'na yɨhɨthake' ganɨmaangei gawaalɨvaangeraavɨ wɨdakabaaibɨsa' navɨka mena dahayɨvanɨga'! Dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Nyɨbwaalɨ', Naangei gɨmɨnyɨ yavada'gala ya'ne'na
Pɨbura gyaza' daza'na “Yaasɨwa'nanyasɨra,” myawɨ'dɨnna!
Taanginya gɨzaavaja' gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ maalɨka magima'nanna!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Naangei a'mwe pwarɨna kuvu'nojɨ
Yɨ nabaai sai gamɨre sabwi yavada'gaidelyɨ.
Sai gawaalɨvaanga gazarɨzarɨ “Nɨmɨreigɨnyɨ,” wɨdamaarojɨ
Nabaai sai yɨsarɨ' kɨrɨsɨ dɨka lɨ'bwaradelyɨ.

Gotɨyai yɨhyavada'galya'neihi nayaa dɨragɨnya mwaaidɨvɨ' dɨvaihanaryɨla! Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhyaja sabwi yɨ gamɨre gawaalɨvaangeihɨrɨnyɨ. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kaimɨraayai mwaaidɨ'nyɨ gannya ganɨmaangei nayaa myavada'galyadei bewalaka!

Aawa. Yuya kuvɨnɨmaanga nawɨ'nya sara kunnya kaimɨraaya yuyaraavɨ nayaa yavada'gaidɨvɨsare. Nabaai Nɨmwai gamɨre kaimɨraaya yuya pwaraavɨ yavada'gaide kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ yavada'gala mayɨhyaja' yɨ gamɨre kaimɨraaya nebulya'nanyaihi mɨ'. Sarɨmɨ yaasɨwa' sɨgɨpwakɨsamɨlɨ'bɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ daza' kɨrɨ'najɨ nayaa jawɨrila! Nennya nenɨmaanga Kwaakevakɨyara sahwara nayaa yavada'gala neyadɨvɨkɨ. Yɨ nemɨ kumɨnne yaya munyaba makidaanyɨ. Yɨ dare' yune naanga wavɨlavɨke' midaaka! Nemɨ kuryaraavɨ Ganɨmaangerɨ kwaaka dalaangewɨ nayaa kuna wɨla'naraana! Yɨ nemɨ gaalya' maraadeine.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nennya nenɨmaanga Kwaakevakɨyara kumɨre yɨnɨge saburɨna nemɨre sabwina yune maalɨkegaa'na neyavada'gaidɨvɨkɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai sai nemɨnyɨ neyavada'gaide' yɨ nemɨnyɨ nebulya'na negaimwagya'nesɨ. Yɨ nemɨ gamɨre nawɨ'nya tewaanaanga sabwi maraade'nanyɨ. Yɨ gamɨbɨ' yɨma'naade'nanyɨ.

Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Nɨmwai nemɨnyɨ yavada'gala neya'nei taanginya nejaavanɨke' yɨ dazagaa' nemɨ yɨlaaya myadaanyɨ. Aawa. Nemɨre sɨmunya' yune taange'na yɨbwakɨdaanyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sai nemɨnyɨ mena neyavada'galojɨ yɨ dɨvi nawɨ'nya tewaanya dara yɨma'nadengɨ. Nemɨ tewaanya yɨda'maraangebulyɨyaina yɨma'nadaanyaine. Yɨ nemɨre sɨmunya' kwaamu'na waradesɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nabaai sarɨmɨre asɨra dɨragɨnya maaya sɨra yaasɨwa' tɨmunadaa'na nyadɨka! Sarɨmɨ wɨrɨlya yagɨnya nayaa wɨdɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyare wawɨnya kuna jɨla! Yɨ nabaai kwannya' mena barya'bɨ' warɨka kɨrɨ' dɨragɨnna nayaa dɨthaayɨla!

Sarɨmɨ kaanya sarɨmɨre sɨvɨlyajɨ nayaa yɨda'na jamarila! Sɨvɨla pimagɨnyi kayaa'nanyi yɨrota yunebanna yuya yakabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nya dɨragɨnya maayai Gotɨyarɨ nyagalya'mavadɨka! Aawa. Sai yɨ tewaanya ayɨna nawɨ'nya yavada'galayɨma'nade'nanyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ a'mwe yuya kwaraavɨjɨ munyɨ' kwaamu'nanya saburɨ mɨdɨnya'na jɨla! Nawɨ'nyabwi gɨrɨkita'nanya maayaburɨ dɨmɨdɨnyɨla! A'mwei nawɨ'nya sabwi maayai yɨ sai Naangerɨ wanganadei mɨ'.

Sarɨmɨ nayaa dɨvada'galemwaalyɨla! Neya'mwe pwai walaraawojɨ Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga sabwi nyagalya'mavadɨka! Nabaai kayaa'nanya neya'mwe pwai sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyare sɨmunyavɨ yɨma'naabozɨ kayaa'nanya sa yɨ sai yɨsarɨ yɨsɨla yɨrɨka yade yɨ'nadevaaibɨ' nyadɨka! Yɨ sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ taanga yɨhɨzaavaja' yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya nayɨhyadɨ'!

Yɨ Yɨzoi yaasɨwa' pɨnamaryabwi mɨdɨda sai yakabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨjɨya pwai Gotɨyarɨ bule'na nujaavadɨ'! Yɨzoi sɨraangei mwaalaka kɨrɨ' wapaaya yune gave pɨgaa'na yaasa'ne' sɨraangerebwina yakabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarebadaa'nyabwi wasɨ'nakelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ mena yawɨ'manɨga'. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ sai “Dɨragɨnya dazabwi ayɨna maarɨma!” daka yake, kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai da' “Aawana.” Yɨzoi sai dɨragɨnya' maarya'na kɨnna kwalaalya da'. Kɨrɨ' sɨmunya ayɨna yawɨramaarya'ne' gamɨnne tusa' pɨrɨ' mɨ'. Aawa. Sare'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kuna dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwagarila!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyaryawɨnna sarɨmɨ bi'ma'manɨgasagaa' Yɨzɨrelɨyara yetabaaibɨ' mivanɨga'. Yɨ sahwara Mugunya Saainaaya a'mwera asa' yɨnɨga wi'na dathɨwanga yɨpɨnevɨ nabaai mugunya dɨka naangeyaba bi'mave'. Yɨ sagaa' wana sawɨsasɨ wana jɨhɨnyaanga nebulya'nanyasɨ jɨnnadaa'nyɨ yɨ yɨhuta gwavaaigwavaalya' yadaa'nyɨ

yɨ Gotɨyare gware' naangave'na maku'na, yɨ Gotɨyare maangwɨraaya' yagaalyangɨ wɨdake wɨ'nyɨna. Yagaala sa kadɨka wɨ'neva lɨka naanga yeva Mozɨzarɨ dɨragɨnna dara wɨde' “Yagaala dazanna nemɨ kadɨka ayahi mu'naannera! Nabalaadɨka!”

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai yagaala sa' dara daka' “A'mwe pwai asa' wakojɨ mugunya dazavɨ ata lɨmwagaza' sɨla nayaa dɨlɨwakyɨla! Nabaai bulɨmakaawoya pwai sipɨzipɨya kwai yaja' avaala sasaresɨ.” Yɨ yagaala daza' sahwara lɨka naanga nebulya'na ye'.
Nabaai Mozɨzai kwalyɨ yuya daza tɨnna wanganaka da' “We'! Nɨmɨ lɨka naanga yadɨ bɨ'bɨta kayaa'na yɨwaainɨwa.” Dazagaa' sahwara sara ye'.

Sarɨmɨ sasarengɨ mi'mayɨvanɨga'. Aawa. Sarɨmɨ Sɨgunyavɨyangɨna mena yɨ'ma'mwaa'. Yɨ Mugunya Saayonɨ, yɨ Gotɨyai gaalyavɨ aaya kaavɨlyare anga naange' mannɨkevɨ Jeruzaalemɨ Sɨgunyavɨ warɨkebanna, yɨ ejelɨyara taawɨzanɨya kwalaalyara yɨ'bwa'neva yɨlaaya yemwaaihasabanna mena yɨ'ma'mwaa'.

Yɨ kwaiyɨ'bwa'nyavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨ, Gotɨyare kaimɨraayara sɨraangeraavɨrevɨ Gotɨyai kumɨnne yaya' mena yɨda'nɨke' Sɨgunyavɨ warɨkevɨyaraayawɨnna yɨ'ma'mwaa'. Yɨ Gotɨyaryabanna a'mwe yuyaraavɨre maryawɨbwarya'neryabanna yɨ'ma'mwaa'. Yɨ Gotɨyarera yɨda'maraangebwi yadɨvɨ' balesaraavɨre kuryaraavɨ yuyagaa'ne yune nebulya'nanyaraavɨ mena yavada'galawɨmwaaihakeraayawɨnna yɨ'ma'mwaa'.

Yɨ Jizaazaryabanna sai yagaala nelɨmwagarɨka mudɨkevɨ yɨwagya'nei a'mweraavɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨjɨ marirakurakeryabanna yɨ'ma'mwaa'. Yɨ gamɨre tawevɨ a'mwera sarɨ tamakesa' tawe sa' yɨrɨku'nɨkeyabanna yɨ'ma'mwaa'. Tawe daza' yagaala nawɨ'nya dakesɨ. Sa' sɨnnawɨ Aivelɨmɨre tawe' dakabaaibɨ' avaainanya'na mɨ'. Aawa. Sa' Aivelɨmɨre tawe' wavɨlavaka yɨ nawɨ'nyaange' dakesɨ.

Sarɨmɨ nayaa javada'gainyɨla! A'mwe dazai dahaa' dɨvanɨkerɨ sarɨmɨre kadɨke tɨla'narapi gamɨre yagaalyavɨna “Aala!” nadɨpɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨgaakuna Mozɨzaregaa' Kwaaka dathavakɨ a'mweraavɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavakelyɨ. Kɨrɨ' gamɨre yagaalya' galazekɨvala yesare. Nabaai sahwara lɨkaanya yɨnɨga wi'na wawetara mɨ'. Yɨ kumɨre wagɨlyavɨ tɨvɨkɨta yuna maare'. Dahaa' pwai Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalaka yɨ yagaala dɨragɨnaange' nejaavanɨ'. Nabaai nemɨ gamɨnyɨ bule'na wɨjavaaja' nemɨ wagɨlyavɨre tɨvɨkɨsavɨ lɨkaanya wawaajɨ yɨnɨga wavɨlavaanneina dɨngaka! Aawa nebulyasɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ Mugunya Saainaaya Gotɨyare maangi' kada' yɨ kwaake' wɨnɨnya yakesɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' sai nemɨnyɨ yune naanga nebulya'na nedɨwa' “Yɨ nɨmɨ Kwaakevɨ ayahi pɨgaasɨ tɨvɨpalɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ nabaai yune Kwaake'nanya'na mɨ'. Aawa. Yɨ nɨmɨ Kwaakesɨ sɨgunyasɨ sawaarɨ tɨvɨpalɨdeinyɨ.”

Yagaala daza' “Ayahi pɨgaasɨ,” nemɨnyɨ dara neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨ' “Yuya sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai yavɨkaryaake yɨ dahaa' sai tɨvɨpalasɨ'nadengɨ. Yɨ daza sai marasɨ'nadengɨ. Yɨ ayahi pɨnɨ warade mɨ'. ‘Yuya Sɨgunyavɨya sa marɨvɨpalasɨ'nyɨ yɨwɨne yɨ sa warana!’ dozɨ tɨvɨpalasɨ'nadengɨ.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ ma'daanya nemaremwaaide' daza' marɨvɨpalasɨ'nyɨ yannevɨna nemɨ nayaa suya suya wɨdaana! Yɨ yanga gaimwanga daza' lɨmwadaa yɨ Gotɨyarɨ wigalya'neina gamɨnyɨ yɨlaaya nayaa maryaana! Gamɨnne yaya' munyaba nayaa makidaa yɨ gamɨnyɨna lɨka yaana! “Sahwai Naangelyɨ. Dɨragɨnaangelyɨ,” yawɨraana!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨre Gotɨyai wɨdayadaanyai dɨka naangelyɨ. Yuya kayaa'nanyajɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyajɨ dazangɨ dɨka nasɨ'na yadelyɨ.
Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyaina daakajɨ yuyagaa' sɨrya'mweraavɨna kuna yɨhɨvu'nana!

Sarɨmɨre angengɨna badaapiyaraavɨ gaimwange'na sɨmunya navɨka myagalya'mapɨna! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe pwara sasara yaasara yɨ sahwara a'mweraavɨ makabadɨvɨ' kunnya angengɨ yadɨvɨ' saraavɨ maremwaaina yesare. Kɨrɨ' aanga'mwera mɨ'. Navɨka mwaaidɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare mamaayaraavɨ maremwaaina yesare.

Sarɨmɨ neya'mwe kalavuzavɨ mwaaihasaraavɨna sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila! Sarɨmɨ saihi kalavuzavɨ sarajɨ ye'mwannamwaaihasaihibɨ' dɨhaimwagila! Nabaai neya'mwe kunnya kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ taanginya maa'manɨgasaraavɨna sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila! Yɨ sarɨmɨ saihi kɨlaa'nakeihi kumɨre taanginya ye'mwannamaa'manɨgasaihibɨ' nayaa jɨla!

Kwala maaryabwi yɨ sa' nawɨ'nyaangesɨ. Dazaburɨ yaya' yuyaihi munyaba nayaa dɨmakɨlyɨla! Sayoihi kwala maaryabwinebwi nayaa jɨla! Wana nebulya'na tɨrɨmaaya' warana! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwera pwaraavɨre a'mwengɨ ata lɨmwabɨzaraavɨjɨ a'mwera a'mwe yaasɨwa' pɨnamarya yadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya wɨjaaya'nei jɨdavadelyɨ Gotɨyai.

Nɨgwiangɨ wabarɨnna ya saburɨ mamɨdɨbɨna! Gɨlyɨvɨta sarɨmɨ lɨmwamanɨgasa, sa yɨ nayaa dara jawɨrila! “Sa yɨ nawɨ'nyangɨra. Sa yɨnɨga wi'na neyadengɨra.” Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai mena dɨvanɨ' “Yɨ nɨmɨ gɨmakwaasɨdeinyɨ mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ bule'na gɨzaavɨdeinyɨ mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ.”
Sarevɨ nemɨ nennya sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya yɨwadaa dara daana!
Naangei nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨgaimwadelyɨ.
Nɨmɨ lɨka miwɨna!
A'mwera berɨ' nyɨpɨ'deinyaka!
Yɨnɨga wi'na gara nyɨpɨneinyaka!
Sara yawɨ'daa dɨragɨnya neyɨvaimwadeinera.

Sarɨmɨre Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨna sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila! Sɨnnawɨ sahwara sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne' yɨhɨzɨwaake'. Sahwaraavɨre kaanya yamaryabulyɨ balyabulyɨ sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila! Yɨ sahwaraavɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwagasabwina dɨmɨdɨnyɨla!
Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨ sai kuna avaainanyalyɨ. Yɨ wonajɨ yɨ dahaa' kɨgaasɨ yɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaasɨ avaaina mwaaidelyɨ. Sahware sabwi avaainanyasɨ.

Sare'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ yagaala dala nabinabinya nabulayɨhɨmwagi'nadɨ'! Yɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyare tusavɨ nyagalya'mapɨka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨre sɨmunya' Gotɨyare yanga gaimwangevɨ dɨragɨnya' maarake' sa' yɨ nawɨ'nyasɨ. Nemɨre sɨmunya' wapaayangɨre kɨwɨnya nabinabinya dɨragɨnya' maarade' mɨ'. Sasare dazabwi saburɨ kaanya yamaryadɨvɨsaraavɨ gaimwadevwi mɨ'.

Nemɨ Jizaazai kwaraanyaba mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsa'bɨsai kɨnɨnnakeine. Yɨ yɨra'dɨvɨta sarɨ Juyaraavɨre yɨra'dɨvɨsara Kwaakevakɨya Gotɨyare Angevɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsara tɨka nya'nera dɨragɨnya sa' maayarera. Sai balake'na nawɨ'nyabwi maa'manɨgo. Sahwara ayabwi kuna yɨvanɨgasa'na aawa.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyare Angevɨ Ku'dɨka Tewaanya Nebulya'nanyavɨ Yɨra'de Naangei tawe bulɨmakaawoyaresɨ memeyaresɨ kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nya'ne' makwide tawe sawaare kɨlaaka mɨwɨta tɨka nadɨvɨ' mɨ'. Yɨ sajɨkaarɨ angeba mwasɨlaa makwalyuna kye' dɨkevɨ yuna nasɨ'na'.
Nabaai mwasɨlaanyavɨne sarevɨ Jizaazai kwalyɨ “Nɨnnya tawevɨ a'mwera nawɨ'nya tewaanya yɨma'nɨpɨka!” daka angabanne kaadihɨta mwasɨlaanyavɨ daange' maarakelyɨ.

Sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ nemɨ kwainajɨ gamɨnyawɨnna angeba mwasɨlaabɨ' nayaa wawaana! Yɨ Juyaraavɨre ayabwina yadɨvɨsaraavɨrebwi yagalya'ma'na yawaajɨ sahwaraavɨ wagɨlya' sai maarakabaaibɨ' gamɨnyɨna nemɨ wagɨla sa' nayaa maraana! Sahwarɨ kuna lɨmwaga'daa sahwara yɨkamaangeraavɨna dɨragɨnna davaana!
Mwasɨlaanyavɨne sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kwaaka dathavakɨ anga naanga pɨba yuyagaa' mwaalya'neba maayaine. Aawa. Anga naanga dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'naabatheva Sɨgunyavɨya nawɨ'nyaba nemɨ bɨramaraade'nanyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Jizaazai negaimwadevɨ nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya nayaa yaana! Yɨ yuyagaa' yɨlaaya daza' yɨra'dɨvɨsa'bɨ' sahwarɨ wɨjavaana! Yo, daresɨ. Nemɨre maangi' sahwarɨ nayaa dara wɨjavaana! “Gotɨyai nawɨ'nyalyɨ. Sahwarɨ Jizaazarɨna nemɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'manɨgoine.”

Nawɨ'nya tewaanyabwi a'mweraavɨ ya'najɨ sarɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa nayaa jaapaidɨvɨ' kuneraavɨ wɨjaaya'najɨ sarɨmɨ sɨmunya navɨka myagalya'mapɨna! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Yɨra'dɨvɨsabɨ' sasare sa'na Gotɨyarɨ wigaimanɨ'.

Sarɨmɨre maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨre yagaala nayaa dɨvada'galamɨdɨnyɨla! Yɨ sahwaraavɨ dalaangevɨ dula'narila! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyarɨna kumɨre wawɨnya yuyangɨ aaya kaavɨlyavɨna dɨvi yagaalya' dɨpɨ'dera sarɨmɨre kuryaraavɨ maremwaala yɨhyadɨvɨkɨ. Sara kyapɨri yɨ nabaai sahwara “Nennya wawɨnyanna yɨlaaya yadaa sara yaana!” dadɨvɨ' lɨmwagapɨ'dere. Yɨ saraavɨ sɨmunya' taanga mwinanna! Sahwara sɨmuyɨwaala myɨpɨna! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ maremwaalya'na taanga winaja' yɨ daza' sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨgaimwagathe' mɨ'.
Sarɨmɨ negaimwagathe'na Gotɨyarɨ nayaa duzɨla! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ dara yɨbwakɨmanɨgo. Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ nemɨre sɨmunyai yɨda'maraangelyɨ. Yɨ yuyangɨ nemɨ nayaa tewaanya yamaryaana!
Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨja'na nyɨgaimwagathe'na yɨ nɨmɨ dara yɨhɨthɨhaa'bwa'manɨge. “Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨme'nya'bɨ' ayɨna bɨma!” dena yɨhɨthɨvanɨge.

Gotɨyai kwaamu'nanyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sahwai nemɨre Naangei Jizaazarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨdaa'nyɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakelyɨ. Jizaazai gamɨre sipɨzipɨyainaavɨ Maremwaala Naangei yɨma'nya'nei gamɨre tawe' kabwalaraawa' yagaala nelɨmwagarɨkebwi yuyagaa'ne' dɨragɨnna dakake'nanyɨ. Yɨ sarevɨ Gotɨyai gamɨre a'mweinaavɨ tewaanyainaavɨ tɨvi'nanyaina yɨma'nya'neinaavɨ yakelyɨ.

Sahwai gamɨre sɨmunya sabwi yɨnɨga wi'na dɨmɨdɨnyide'na yuya nawɨ'nya tewaanya gazabwizabwi yɨhɨzaavana! Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai negaimwagathevɨ Gotɨyai gamɨ sarɨ wigaimanɨkebwi nemɨ yuyainaavɨre sɨmunyavɨ marima'naabathelyɨ. Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakei mwaalana! Sahwarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaana! Sahɨrɨsɨra!

Nya'mweihi, nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨhaa'bwa'manɨge. Yagaala dazavɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya yɨwagya'ne nɨmɨ dɨvanɨgevɨ sarɨmɨre kadɨkikɨ nayaa dakyɨla! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Pɨkarɨyɨkwia daza' nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨda'mwe' yɨ sa' tu'nanyasɨ.

Sarɨmɨ dara jawɨranganyɨla! Nemɨre neya'mwe Timotirɨ kalavuzavɨ mena makwasɨwaa'. Nabaai sai nɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨme'nya'bɨ' bi'mavaja' yɨ naarɨmɨ yuyainaai yakwoihɨlyɨ yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ tɨnna yɨhwanganaawakadeinaalyɨ.
Nɨmɨnyɨna sarɨmɨre maremwaaidɨvɨta yuyaraavɨ “Nya'mweihi!” duzɨla! Gotɨyare tewaanya yuyaraavɨ “Nya'mweihi!” duzɨla! Kwaaka Yɨtaali mwaalyara Naangerɨnera “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'.
Yanga gaimwangebwi sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨlyɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!
Yɨzɨrelɨdaa'nya sɨvɨlɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala yɨsavaakɨdaa'nyaihi,

Jemɨzainyɨ Gotɨyarɨjɨ Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨjɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ yɨda'mwesɨ. Sarɨmɨ sarɨnnya anga naangeba yagalya'ma'dɨvɨ' kwaaka maave pɨwɨ pɨwɨ mwaimanaawɨgasaihɨrɨnesɨ. Sareihɨrɨ yɨhɨthɨma! “Nya'mweihi!”
Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaala dala pɨnɨnnanyabwi kayɨhima'nojɨ yɨ sarɨmɨ dara yawɨpɨja “Sa nemɨ yune yɨlaaya ya'nennanyangɨra.”

Sare' sarɨmɨ dara yawɨ'manɨga'. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨjɨwaala ya'ne yɨma'naabada sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi yaamɨjɨ yɨhyade. Sara yɨhyaja sabwi “Taanginya yuyangɨne'na dɨragɨnna daavɨna yɨwaava!” nejɨwɨrya'nebulyɨ.

Nabaai Gotɨyai “Sarɨmɨ naanga yune nebulya'nanyaihi jɨma'nyɨla! Sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna pada'galemwaalya'neihi yuyagaa' dɨragɨnna daayabwi tewaanna tɨvi'na yɨhɨmwaaihana!” kada' sara yɨma'nɨvanɨ'. Yɨ dɨragɨnyaihi mwaaibɨza' sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyare aane pɨbwina aane kɨbwina yɨhɨmudaasadeihi mɨ'.

Nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai kwarɨ sɨmunya nawɨ'nyabwina wɨmudaasaja' sai sɨmunya wɨjaavade'na Gotɨyarɨ yɨdaanganana! Sara yɨdaanganaja' Gotɨyai sahwarɨ wɨjaavadelyɨ. Gotɨyai sai yuyaraavɨna yanga kwalaalya nayaa wɨjaavadei, nabaai sai a'mwe wɨmudaasaderaavɨna mayagaala dadei mɨ'.

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe dazai Gotɨyarɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna lɨmwada yɨdaanganana! Dara nyawɨralɨmwagathɨka! “Nɨmɨ yɨdaangamwe daza' Gotɨyai nyɨjaavadeinyɨ dɨngaka? Aawa!” Sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mwei sɨmunya pɨrɨwaai kɨnɨnnakei, saalaalyavɨ yɨhusa' pwaladɨkaa'da aalɨmavajɨnaake' akinamuna yadevaaibɨ' gamɨre sɨmunya' sasarelyɨ. Sahwai taabɨrɨwaizɨmunyasɨyai.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe sasarei kwaasɨ dara myawɨranna! “Naangei nawɨ'nya pɨnɨ nyɨjaavadeinyɨra.”
Aawa. A'mwe dazare sɨmunya' yaasɨwa' yɨwɨnakamarya yadesɨ. Yuya gamɨ yade saburɨ sai tuta yune gave pɨrɨvɨna mɨdɨdei mɨ'.
Neya'mwei gɨlyɨvɨta maayai dalaangevɨ mwaalɨkei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨlaaya yadelyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna Gotɨyai sahwarɨ munyaba makimwake'na yɨlaaya yana!

Nabaai neya'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨlaaya yadelyɨ. Gotɨyai sahwarɨ gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨsanna dalaangevɨ marulawakaka kɨrɨ' sahwarɨ maa'mwake'na yɨlaaya yana! Kurɨvaarɨyangɨre pwata yɨ'nade bwalapɨraihɨra'na yadevaaibɨ' gamɨre gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ yɨwawade'nanyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'daa'nyɨ dɨ'daanya naanga wi'nadaa'nyɨ kurɨvaarɨya daza yɨnahu yawaka balasɨ'na yadengɨ. Gamɨre pwata kɨnɨjɨ bwalaraawɨna yada gamɨre tewaanya wannade sajɨ yɨnahu kayaaka yɨma'nyɨna. Sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalyajɨyai sai tɨnnyaba gamɨre wawɨnya yade yuya sangɨ yɨwawadelyɨ.

A'mwei yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaala yuya sangɨ taanginya maarajai kwai dɨragɨnna daa'dei yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkelyɨ. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Yɨjɨwaala yuya mena wavɨlavojɨyai kuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwagarojɨyai, sarɨna Gotɨyai gaalyabwi wɨjaavadelyɨ. A'mwe gavamarasɨ'nyɨkaanya' wavɨla'dɨvɨsaraavɨne tɨvɨkɨsa' wɨjaavadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyai mena yawɨramaa'dei gaala sa' wɨjaavadelyɨ. Yɨ sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai gaala daza' a'mwe yuyara gamɨnyɨna wɨvu'naderaavɨna wɨjaaya'na yune naanga nebulya'na wɨdakelyɨ.

Nabaai yɨjɨwaala sa a'mwe pwai kware sɨmunyavɨ yɨdɨkaavojɨ kayaa'nanyabwi ya'na kumwagi'nojɨ aane pwai kwai dara madanna! “Dazabwi ya'na Gotɨyai nyɨmwagi'nɨwake'nanyɨ.” Aawa. Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kayaa'nanyabwi Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyɨ mwagi'nadevwi mɨ'. Nabaai Gotɨyai a'mwei kayaa'nanya yajarɨ mwagi'nadei mɨ'.

Aawa. Nemɨnyɨdaa'nya gazaizare sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ dɨkaa'da wɨmwagi'nadelyɨ. Yune nennya yawɨta kayaa'nanya dazabwi nemɨnyɨ wabwiwanga neyadevulyɨ. Sara yada nemɨnyɨ kwaasɨ nedada kayaa'nanyabwi ya'na nedɨhaa'bwa'devulyɨ.

Nabaai sɨmunya' dɨkaata dazabwi, kaimɨraavɨmunyabɨ' wannada dɨvidaa'nyɨ gamɨre kaimɨraavɨbwaranyabɨ' kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnnanya maa'desɨ. Dɨvidaa'nyɨ kayaa'nanyabwi naanga yɨma'nada barya ya'nebwi marima'naabadevulyɨ.
Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, kwaasɨya sabwi sarɨmɨ wanganakɨna yadaapi sarɨmɨnyɨ kwaasɨ nayɨhɨthathɨka! Gotɨyai kayaa'nanya ya'na mwagi'nadei mɨ'.

Yuya tewaanya yanga wɨjaaya sabulyɨ yuya sɨhumale naanga yune nebulya'nanya sabulyɨ yuya daza Gotɨyai Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkeryawɨdaa'nyɨ waidaavadengɨra. Baaka yuya, yɨ nyɨlyalyɨ lawelyɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyajɨ yuyaraavɨne Gyakwalaangei daza nemɨnyawɨnna maryasaabadengɨra. Nenɨmaanga dazai gamɨre sabwi yaasɨwa' maroyɨmaa'nya yadei mɨ'. Sai pɨnɨ nyɨlyayaba a'mabaala yɨ'devaaibɨtai mɨ'. Saamɨnaanga wannada ayɨna tuta yɨbwa'mwadevaaibɨtai mɨ'.
Sai yune gannya sɨmunya saburɨna mɨdɨda gamɨre yagaala nebulyavɨ neyɨma'naabakelyɨ. A'mwe yuya gamɨ wɨmwaaihade saraavɨna aaya mudɨ'nanyaina mwaalya'neinaavɨ neyɨma'naabakeine.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, darengɨ nayaa jawɨramaarila! Gazaigɨzaigɨ yagaalya' kadɨka wɨ'nya'na yarai yemwaala ja! Kɨrɨ' yagaala ja'na yɨme'nya'bɨ' nadɨthɨka! Nabaai mayagaalya' yɨme'nya'bɨ' nadɨthɨka!
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwere sɨnna tɨke' Gotɨyare yɨda'maraangebwi sahwarɨ wɨvu'nadevwi marima'naabade' mɨka.

Sarevɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya yuya sabulyɨ kayaa'nanya kwalaalya naanga yɨma'nade sabulyɨ sasare daza dasɨ'nyɨla! Nabaai sarɨmɨ saihi kwaamu'nanyabwi nayaa mɨdɨdɨvɨ' yagaala Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ wia yɨhɨburɨmanɨke nayaa dɨmaaryɨla! Yagaala daza' sarɨmɨre kuryaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yɨhɨvadaihasamaaradesɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ yagaala daza' nayaa jɨla! Sarɨmɨ yune kadɨki'na mu'nakɨpɨnera! Kadɨki'na wɨ'nakɨpɨja' sarɨmɨ saihɨrɨna kwaasɨ yɨmanɨgava.
Dare'nanyɨ. A'mwe pwai Gotɨyare yagaalya' yaasɨwa'na wɨ'nakajai sai nayaa mamɨdɨnyajai sai dare'bɨsalyɨ. A'mwei gannya sɨnnyɨkɨ sɨnɨmwavananyavɨ yennadevaaibɨsalyɨ.
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sai gannya sɨnnyɨkɨ yennaka sangirɨ' kɨbawebanna woda yɨme'nya'bɨ' navɨka yɨwannyɨna yakelyɨ “Sɨnnyɨ' nɨmɨ gatha'dareinyɨ dɨngaka?” Sabaaibɨ' sai Gotɨyare wɨja navɨka yarai yadelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' kɨwɨnya daza' kayaa'nanyabure kalavuzɨwawɨnyavɨ ayɨna nemaa'de' sa' yune yɨda'maraange' yɨ dɨnɨka dazavɨre aaya kaavɨlya' a'mwei nayaa yawɨranganojɨ kuna mɨdɨnajai yɨ a'mwe dazai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga yɨnɨkei mwaaladelyɨ. Sai yaasɨwa' kadɨke'na mu'nakyada navɨka myanna! Aawa. Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' sara yana! Yɨ dazarerɨ Gotɨyai tewaanya wiadelyɨ.

A'mwe pwai kwai dara yawɨ'na “Nɨmɨ yɨda'maraanga tewaanyainyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya nebwina yadɨnyainyɨra,” kɨrɨ' gamɨre maangevɨ nayaa mamaremwaainyai sare sai gannya sɨmunyavɨ kwaasɨ dɨdelyɨ. A'mwe dazare dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi, yɨlaaya maryabwi yaasɨwakebulyɨra.

Yɨda'maraangebwi nawɨ'nya gɨrɨ'maaya mwaalyabwi Gotɨyai Nenɨmaangere tɨnnyarɨ yɨwetawakya maaya yɨma'nya' daresɨ. Sɨgɨraayaraavɨjɨ yaanyɨwaakengɨjɨ sare samɨlɨka taanginya maa'manɨgasamɨlɨkaavɨna nemɨ nayaa gaimwagaatheine. Nabaai nemɨre kaanya yamaryabwi nayaa maremwainaana! Kwaaka davakɨya dazabwi nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ gɨrɨkita naneyɨgaladɨka! Sasaresɨ.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakerɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsavɨ sarɨmɨ a'mwe yaya kɨnɨnnakeraavɨna nayaa yɨna, a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨna bule'na wɨjaavɨna nyɨpɨdɨka!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨre yɨ'bwa'nemwaalɨangevɨ a'mwei baazɨ'ma'nya nawɨ'nya' kɨnɨnnakei nabaai nɨgwɨlalaaka nawɨ'nya kɨnɨnnakei wɨlaabɨna yajai, nabaai a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayai baazɨ'ma'nya yune kayaa'nanya' kɨnɨnnakei sai kwalyɨ wɨlaabɨna yajai,

sarɨmɨ a'mwe baazɨ'ma'nyajɨ kannyasɨ nawɨ'nya yɨra'nojɨya sarɨna nawɨ'nya yɨna yapɨjɨ sahwarɨ duzide “A'mweigɨ, namwaalyɨta nawɨ'nya darɨ bilamwaala!” Kɨrɨ' a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayarɨ dara duzide “Gɨmɨnyɨneba pɨba mɨ'. Gɨmɨ aagaiba dɨthaa'deigɨ dɨngaka? Mɨnyevɨ nɨmɨre sɨvigɨ'nyɨryaba saba dɨmwalaadeigɨ dɨngaka?”

Yɨ sarɨmɨ sasare sabwi yɨpɨja' sarɨnnya sɨrya'mweraavɨna dɨnyɨna “Kumɨre nɨgwɨlalaaka danganyɨla! Pwara naangerera. Pwara waryaanyarera.” Sara yɨpɨja' sahwaraavɨ jaapaina jideihi midaaka! Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨdaa'nyɨ kayaa'na myawɨbwapɨna! Sara yɨpɨja' avaaina yadɨvɨtaihi mɨ'.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, nayaa dara du'nyɨla! Gotɨyai mena dathareraavɨ dahɨlakakera midaaka! Yɨ a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyabulyɨyara “Gɨlyɨvɨ'maayarera,” dɨdɨvɨsara yɨ sahwaraavɨna Gotɨyai dɨna “Nɨmɨrerera.” Sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsavɨna Gotɨyarɨne kwalaalya naanga kɨnɨnnakere. Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai gamɨre maremwaaide' wɨjaavade' gamɨre kaimɨraayaraavɨna yune naanga nebulya'na dakelyɨ. Yɨ sahwara gamɨnyɨna wɨvu'naderaavɨna sara dahɨlakakelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maaya dazaraavɨ wagɨla wɨjawaasarera. A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakera sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmarulawakadɨvɨ' taanginya yɨhwakɨvanɨgatara midaaka! Yune sahwarana sarɨmɨnyɨ kotɨyavɨna yɨhɨmakwodɨvɨtara midaaka!

Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yaya' sarɨmɨnyɨ Gotɨyai yaya tewaanya' yɨhwakakelyɨ. A'mwe dazazara yaya tewaanya dazavɨna bɨraiyagaala dadɨvɨtara midaaka! Sare' yawɨrapɨjɨ gɨlyɨvɨ'nakeraavɨne yaya yaasɨwa'na mamakibɨna!

Nemɨre Kingɨyai Bukuyavɨ kɨwɨnya pɨrɨ' dakelyɨ. Dara dɨnɨ' “Yune gɨmɨ saigɨnyɨna gɨvu'nadevaaibɨ' sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' gɨmɨnyɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨna nayaa nebwina gɨvu'nana!” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka dazavɨ nayaa nebwina mɨdɨbɨza' yɨ sarɨmɨ nawɨ'nyabwi yɨvanɨga'.

Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ a'mwe yaya kɨnɨnnakeraavɨna nayaa yɨpɨja' a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨna bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨja' sabwi kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarevɨ kɨwɨnya daza' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ maanga dara yɨhɨzɨdavadeihɨlyɨ “Sarɨmɨ a'mwe kɨwɨnya' galazekɨvaimwaasaihɨlyɨra.”
Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwei kɨwɨnya yuya pɨnɨngɨjɨ mɨdɨnajai kɨrɨ' kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka pɨrɨvɨna pari'ma'mwakei sai Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ yuya kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨna yɨwetawakya yɨwakelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai dara dɨnɨ' “Pwarevɨ ata malɨmwadɨnna! Pɨrɨvɨrerɨ ata malɨmwadɨnnera!” Sara dɨnɨka sai nabaai pɨrɨsɨ dara dɨnɨ' “A'mwerɨ maramakɨnna! A'mwevɨ maramakɨnna!” Sare' gɨmɨ a'mwevɨ ata malɨmwagi yɨja' kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwarɨ tamakɨja' yɨ gɨmɨ kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' mena pari'ma'mwaanyaigɨnyɨ.

Kɨwɨnya kayaa'nanyabure yaasɨwa'wawɨnya' ayɨna nemaa'de' yɨ dazavɨna Gotɨyai marayɨhyawɨbwaradevaaibɨ' yuyagaa' sarɨmɨ yagaala pɨnɨjɨ yɨnɨga wi'na dɨzɨla! Yɨ yuyaburaavɨ nayaa yɨnɨga wi'na jɨ'mwannyɨla!

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe pwai a'mwe pwarɨna kale'na gaimwanga mwiade sarɨ nabaai Gotɨyai kotɨya' wiawɨbwaradehaa' sarɨna kale'na gaimwanga wiadei mɨ'. Kɨrɨ' a'mwei a'mwe pwarɨna kale'na gaimwanga wiade kale'na gaimwanga sa' kotɨya savɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wavɨlavadesɨ. Gotɨyai sahwarɨ jɨdavadei mɨ'.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, a'mwe pwai kwai dara dazai “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨnyainyɨ,” kɨrɨ' sai wana nawɨ'nyabwi myade a'mwe dazare dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi yaasɨwa'nanya' midaaka! Dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga sasare sabwi sahwarɨ yɨnɨga mi'na padaihasamaarannei dɨngaka! Aawa.
Yɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨhɨthɨma! Neya'mwe pwai neya'mwe kɨrɨ' kannya waryaanya' kɨnɨnnake' mwaalaja' nabaai wapaaya tɨka nya'ne mwari yaja'

sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ pwai samɨlɨkɨ wɨdɨna “Kwaamu'nanyaburɨ yɨlaaya dɨmwaala! Gɨmɨ wawa'gɨzɨ baazɨ'ma'nya' gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ dɨ'mudɨnya yɨnya'ne' dɨmarakaawa! Nabaai wapaayajɨ maraawa'gɨzɨ gɨmɨre munyɨkɨ munya' yunebanna ginana!” Sara dɨpɨjaihi kɨrɨ' baazɨ'ma'nya pɨnɨjɨ wapaaya pɨnɨjɨ gaimwanga ya'ne mujaayɨ yɨpɨja' yagaala daza' gaimwange' gatha'dara yannevaka!
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga kɨbwi nawɨ'nyaburɨ mima'naabi yajavwi kɨrɨ' gave' waraja' yɨ sa' bainɨkesɨ. Yɨ dazabwi gevulyɨra.

Sare kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwai dɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwara dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨsare. Pwara wawɨnya tewaanyabwina yadɨvɨsare.” Sare'na nɨmɨ dara wɨrɨvɨkɨ'mwa. Gɨmɨ gɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga dazabwi dɨnyɨbwarɨdaakwia! Yɨ sabwi nawɨ'nya pɨburaavɨ yɨma'naabya'nebwi gavebwina dɨnyɨbwarɨdaakude' daaka! Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ tewaanya sabwi yadɨnyangɨna nɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi givwarɨdaakudeinyɨ.

Gɨmɨ dɨragɨnna dara lɨmwadɨnyaigɨnyɨ “Gotɨyai yune gave pwainanyai mwaalɨka.” Sa' tewaanya' midaaka! Kɨrɨ' Saataanɨmɨrera yɨmakera kwarajɨ dɨragɨnna avaaina yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Sahwara Gotɨyarɨ mamɨdɨnyadɨvɨsa'na lɨka yɨwaainadɨvɨsare. Sahwaraavɨ wavɨla'mwaaigɨ daaka!
A'mwe sɨdu'maayaigɨ, gɨmɨ nawɨ'nya pɨburajɨ myadɨ yune dɨragɨnna lɨmwange'na lɨmwadɨnya' sabwi kuzɨ'nyabulyɨ. Yaasɨwakesɨ. “Sare dazavɨre kaavɨlya' yawɨranganɨma!” dahɨneigɨ daaka!

Nayaa du'nana! Kɨgaakuna nemɨre Ne sɨnnawɨnyai Evɨraamɨ gannya gawaalɨvaangei Aazakɨmɨ kwaraanya lɨvalaannɨkevɨ yɨlamarakakelyɨ. “Gotɨyarɨne dɨka nasɨ'nana!” daka dɨka yɨra'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yaamɨjɨ wɨmaarya'nei mwaala'. Yɨ dazahaa' sara yake'na Gotɨyai gamɨre dazabwi wanganaka “A'mwe yɨda'maraangelyɨ,” dakei midaaka!
Gɨmɨ yawɨrangamanɨgɨ. Gamɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi gamɨre tewaanya yaka sabulyɨ ye'mwannayakelyɨ. Sasare dazabwi gamɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨ naanga yune nebulya'nanyaburɨ yunebanna yakebulyɨ.

Nabaai sare' Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dɨnɨke' yunebanna yɨma'nake'nanyɨ. Dara dɨnɨ' “Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaka sarevɨ Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna yawɨrawɨmwaaiha' ‘Sahwai yɨda'maraangelyɨ.’ ” Sare'na nabaai pimagɨnyavɨ dara dɨnɨ' “Evɨraamɨ Gotɨyare gya'mwelyɨra.” Evɨraamɨmɨna sara dɨnɨkesɨ.

Nabaai sare' dahaa' sarɨmɨ yawɨrangamanɨga'. Yune dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨna gaveburɨna Gotɨyai “A'mwe yɨda'maraangelyɨra,” dadei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai yawɨ'da “A'mwei dɨragɨnna lɨmwade sasare dazavɨ nawɨ'nyabwina yaderɨna yɨ dazahwarɨna ‘A'mwe yɨda'maraangelyɨ,’ ” dadelyɨ.

Sahɨbaaibɨ' nabaai a'mwe yaasɨwa'na maradakunamaryake' Rayaa' nawɨ'nyabwina yakevɨna Gotɨyai “A'mwe yɨda'maraangesɨra,” dakei midaaka! Sare' daresɨ. Yɨ a'mwe sa' Jozuwaa' a'mweraarɨ maryasaabakeraarɨna “Nuramakɨpɨdɨka!” daka tuta pɨrɨvɨ nayaa ayɨna maryaasakeraalyɨ.

Yuya sare' darevɨnyɨ. Kɨlaakejɨ' kuryalyɨ maayajɨ' sajɨ' mena bainɨkabaaibɨ' a'mwei yaasɨwa'na dɨragɨnna lɨmwagazai kɨrɨ' nawɨ'nya kɨbulyɨ myadei, a'mwe dazare dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi mena bainɨkebulyɨ.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara “Nemɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨjɨwakadaanyaina yɨma'naana!” nyawɨpɨdɨka! Darevɨnyɨ. Dɨvi sagaa' Gotɨyai nemɨ wɨjɨwaakyainaavɨ maryawɨbwasa' yawɨ'na “Sahwara sɨdu'nakera midaakajɨ, dɨragɨnna maryawɨbwarɨdeinyɨ sahwaraavɨ. A'mwe pɨmɨlɨkaavɨ kɨbawana yɨdeinyɨ.”

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Nemɨ yuyaina dala pɨnɨnnanyangɨ yɨwetawakya kwalaalya yadaanyaine. A'mwe pwai kwai gamɨre yagaalya' yɨwetawakya myajai sai a'mwe tewaanya naanga yune nebulya'nanyalyɨ. Nabaai sasarei gamɨre kɨlaaka yuya kɨjɨ' yɨnɨga wi'na maremwaainannelyɨ.

Nemɨ a'mweina kwaari'mayagɨnya maalɨkemɨlɨ' ozɨyare maangevɨ nemɨre saburɨ mɨdɨda kaanya yamarya'nebwina wakadaanyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨ' naangejɨ' warɨka kɨrɨ' yuya kɨlaaka sajɨ' tutaanya pɨrɨvɨ kwawojɨ nemɨ gɨnyɨwadaanyɨ.

Nabaai sɨpɨya kɨrɨvɨnajɨ jawɨrila! Sɨpɨya sa naangengɨra. Nabaai yɨhuta dɨragɨnya naange' yɨhu'maanarya wiadaa'nyɨ saalaalyavɨ a'ba ga'nɨgwodengɨ. Sɨpɨyavɨya' a'mwei gɨnyɨwagɨnyɨwange' yune maalɨkesɨ. Kɨrɨ' sɨpɨyavɨ maremwaaidei “Pimagɨnna wɨma!” dozɨ gɨnyɨwagɨnyɨwange' gɨnyɨwadaa'nyɨ sɨpɨya' sawɨnna wɨna yadesɨ.

Sasare sahɨbaaibɨ' taalɨsa' kɨlaakejɨkɨna pimagɨnya maalɨkejɨkɨ. Kɨrɨ' sa' gamɨ savɨna yaya' munyaba makida naangenna naangenna dadesɨ. Yɨthaanyi, dɨka maalɨke' naanga bidamakɨlojɨ kurɨdarya naangevɨ yɨ'naadarya yuyavɨ dɨka yuya nasɨ'na yadesɨ.

Nabaai taalɨsa' dɨka sahɨrɨsasɨ. Yuya kɨlaakejɨkɨne'na kusaba warɨke' Kwaakevakɨya kayaa'nanya dala pɨbwina pɨbwinanyabwi marima'naabadesɨ. Sara yada kɨlaaka yuyajɨkɨ gɨrɨkita yɨgalakadesɨ. Sarevɨ kɨlaakejɨkɨya saburɨ dɨka naanga yɨdade sabɨ' dɨhaa'bwa'devulyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨre kaanya yamarya sabwi kayaa'nanyabwi yɨma'nadevulyɨ. Yɨ Saataanɨ Kayaa'nanyare dɨka daza' dɨka sahɨrɨvɨ yewɨtawakadesɨ. Dɨka naangebanne yɨmakera nemɨre taalɨsa' dɨhaa'bwa'dɨvɨsavɨna taalɨta sa' a'mwe Kwaaka yuyavakɨyaraavɨ taanginya dɨke'bɨ' marima'naabadesɨ.

A'mwera malakayaawaryarajɨ yɨkurɨyaawiarajɨ yusarajɨ kamaalyarajɨ saalaalyavɨ wɨla'derajɨ yɨ yuya dala pɨnɨnnanyaraavɨ nayaa yɨnɨga wi'na maremwaaibɨnerera. Sahwaraavɨ dalaangewɨ wɨla'nadɨvɨsara. Nabaai kɨgaasɨ dahaa' mena sara yadɨvɨsare.

Kɨrɨ' gamɨre taalɨsa' yɨnɨga wi'na maremwaaladei a'mwe pwai kwai mɨ'. Aane pwai kwai sara myadelyɨ. Yuyagaa' taalɨta sa' dɨkebɨ' yɨdamaryada yagaala kayaa'nanya yɨnɨgidaavadesɨ. Naawɨnaanyara kumɨre kwaamɨnya a'mweraavɨ tamakya'ne da'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' taalɨsa a'mweraavɨre sɨmunyangɨ kayaaka yuna yɨgaidɨvɨsangɨ.

Taalɨsasɨ Naangei Nenɨmaangerɨne yaya munyaba makɨlya'ne dadaa “Su! Su!” dadaanyaine. Nabaai taalɨta sasɨ Gotɨyai yune gamɨbɨsaraavɨ yavɨkaryaakeraavɨ nemɨ paasiyagaala sahwaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalya'ne yagaala kayaa'nanya dadaanyaine.

Yagaala Gotɨyarɨna yaya munyaba makɨlya'nejɨ paasiyagaala kɨnɨjɨ yagaala pɨrɨwaala sasare sa yune maanga gave pukɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'nadengɨ. Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, nemɨ sasare sabwi sara nyaadɨka! Nawɨ'nyabwi mɨ'.
Aalɨyɨmɨnya pɨrɨ' pɨgaa' aangaalyasɨ yaka pɨgaa' aalya yɨrɨkesɨ ye'mwannayɨrɨ'daavade' daaka!

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, yɨta pihɨya pɨrɨ' yɨsɨla wolivɨyavɨre yɨnɨga tinade' dɨngaka! Nabaai wɨla gɨraipɨyabaai yɨsɨla pihɨya yɨ'nadevaai dɨngaka! Yɨ saalaalɨyɨmɨnya' aangaalya nawɨ'nya' mirɨyɨ yannesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨre maangikɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨ yɨleyagaalyajɨ a'mweraavɨ paasiyagaalyajɨ sara nadaathɨka!

Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe kwai sɨmunya nawɨ'nyajɨ yawɨta tewaanyajɨ kɨnɨnnakei dɨngaka? Sasare sai gamɨre kaanya yamarya sabwi tewaanya yɨma'nana! Sɨdusabwine kwaamu'na yajai tewaanyabwina yojɨyabwi a'mweraavɨ sɨmunya nawɨ'nyaburɨna yɨbwarɨdaakwana!

Pwaraavɨreburana sarɨmɨ tɨganaarya dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeihi mwaaibɨza' nabaai sarɨmɨre yaya yuya sangɨna dɨhaa'bwasabwina yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ “Pwaraavɨ wavɨlavɨma!” yawɨpɨja' sarɨmɨre yawɨta sabwina yɨlaaya mipɨnera! “Nɨmɨ sɨdu'nakeinyɨ,” kwaasɨ nadɨpɨdɨka! Sarɨmɨ pihadɨkebwi yɨpɨja' nebulyaburɨ kayaa'na yɨpɨja' pwara “Sɨdu'nakeinyɨ midaakajɨ, gamɨrebwina ‘Kwaasɨyalyɨ,’ neyɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨ',” nadɨbɨthɨka!

Sɨmunya sasare sabwi Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ waidaavadevwi mɨ'. Gotɨyare' mɨ'. Aawa. Yune Kwaaka dathavakɨyabulyɨ. Sɨmunya yawakeburɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'nadevulyɨ. Kurya Tewaanyarɨnebwi mɨ'. Sare sahɨrɨvɨne'na Saataanɨ Kayaa'nanyai gyakwalaangelyɨ.

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe pwara a'mwe pwaraavɨreburana tɨganaarya yadɨvɨ' kumɨre yaya makɨlya'nera dɨhaa'bwasabwina yawɨ'daapiya'na a'mwe sasare sara nayaa pada'galemwaaidɨvɨtara mɨ'. Gavamarasɨ'nyɨyagaala dɨdɨvɨsare. Nabaai sahwara kayaa'nanya yuya dala pɨbwinanyabwi yadɨvɨsare.

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwara sɨmunya munyabadaa'nya' Gotɨyarɨ maa'dɨvɨsara darebwi yadɨvɨsare. Aaya mudɨ'nanya', sɨmunya yɨda'maraangebwi mɨdɨnna. Nabaai ayawɨdaasa', a'mwerajɨ avaaimunyɨ'na mwaalɨna, sara yadɨvɨ' kwaamu'na yɨna, pwaraavɨre yagaala dɨpɨja kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nyɨna. Kale'na gaimwanga naanga yɨna, tewaanyabwina yɨsɨla nawɨ'nyabɨsabwina yadɨvɨsare. Sahwara yuyaraavɨ sɨmunya avaainanyabwina yadɨvɨ' nabaai kwaasɨ myadɨvɨ' kwaasɨ majadɨvɨsabulyɨ.

Nabaai sahwara avaaimunyɨ'na yɨpɨja' “Pwaraavɨ munya yɨrɨla dɨwangeburɨ wɨmwaaihɨma!” yawɨpɨjara tɨka munne wia burɨjabɨ' yɨpɨnere. Kwaamu'nanya ya sasare sabwi yɨda'maraanga saburɨ tɨka munne tewaanya yɨ'bwaramadakya yɨma'nadevulyɨ.

Maimayagaala sarɨmɨnyaba yɨhima'nɨvanɨka sangɨne aaya kaavɨlya' berɨvaka? Yɨ munyɨ' dɨkaata sabwi yɨhwa'devulyɨ. Sara yada sarɨmɨre kɨlaaka yuyajɨkɨ mala yɨhyadezɨkɨ. Nabaai sasare dazahɨbwi maimayagaala sabwi dɨhaa'bwa'desɨ. Sasare mi yadevwi dɨngaka!

Sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨta dala nabinabinya maarya'neihɨrɨ tewaanya yɨhɨvu'nadeihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ mamaari yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ a'mweraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨta maarya'neihi sahwaraavɨ tamakya'na yawɨ'dɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨsangɨna tɨganaarya yadɨvɨta sare sangɨ sarɨmɨ mamaaryadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sare savɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ maimayagaala kayaa'na dadɨvɨ' mala tannadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa maarya'na yɨdaangadɨvɨtaihi mɨ'. Sara yadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ mamaaryadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ.

Pɨgaa' sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨsa maarya'na yɨdaangadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ mamaaryadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Gatha'darevɨnaka? Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi nayaa yɨda'na myadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨ yɨdangadaapi “Nemɨ yune wabahɨlaaka ya'neina gɨlyɨvɨta sa maraana!” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yɨdaangadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ a'mwe pwaraavɨrengɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨta sarabɨsaihɨlyɨ. Kwaa'nyɨ-a'mwebɨsaihɨlyɨ. Dara myawɨrijɨvanɨga'! A'mwei Kwaaka davakɨyabwina yɨlaaya yajai, sai Gotɨyarɨ yɨkamaangei yɨma'nɨwakelyɨ. Dazavɨ myawɨranganyɨvanɨgasaihi daaka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai kwai Kwaakevakɨya sabwi “Nya'mwana wɨdɨma!” dozɨ yajai, yɨ sai Gotɨyarɨna yɨkamaangei yɨma'nadelyɨ.

Gotɨyare Bukuya' dara dɨnɨ' “Kuryai dazai Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨ kusawɨ nemwaaihadei yune gamɨre saburɨna dɨragɨnna yawɨ'da yune dɨragɨnaangelyɨ. Pɨburaavɨ ya'nejɨ pwaraavɨ yɨlaaya marya'nejɨ ‘Arɨkewɨ!’ yawɨrɨbainyɨna yada ‘Gotɨyai gave pwainanyarɨ yɨlaaya marina jɨla!’ yawɨ'delyɨ.” Sarɨmɨ dara dahayawɨ'manɨga'? “Yagaala daza' yaasɨwa'nanya' dɨngaka!” Woi! Naangesɨ. Sare'na kayaa'nanya dazabura jahalya'mayɨla!

Kɨrɨ' nemɨ kayaa'nanyabwi dathɨwagya'neinaavɨ Gotɨyai yanga gaimwanga naange' nejaavadelyɨ. Sarevɨ Bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨ' “Gotɨyai a'mwe pihadɨka yadɨvɨsaraavɨ tɨvɨpalasɨ'delyɨra. Sara yada kɨrɨ' a'mwe kumɨre sɨmunya' walamarakya yadɨvɨsaraavɨ yanga gaimwange' wiadelyɨ.”
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' walamarakya yapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ dalaangewɨ dɨmwaalyɨla! Sarɨmɨ Saataanɨ Kayaa'nanyarɨ dɨrɨvɨpalasɨ'nyɨla! Sara kyapɨjɨ yɨhyagalya'mavojɨ lɨkaanya wawodelyɨra.

Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyaryaba aya kɨbanna nayaa dulaawila! Nabaai sahwai sarɨmɨnyaba aya kɨbanna bathelyɨ. A'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsaihi, a'mweigɨ gɨnnya asɨraai aalya jɨnana! Taabɨrɨwaizɨmunya kɨnɨnnakeigɨ nawɨ'nya tewaanya wannadevaaibɨ' gɨrɨkita kayaa'nanya gɨnnya sɨmunyavɨ dɨthuimwagasɨ'nana!

Sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyanna sarɨmɨ sɨmunya' taanga maa'dɨvɨ' kale yɨhyadeihi kɨnna kwalaalya dɨzɨla! Sarɨmɨ jɨka givanɨgasaihi sarɨmɨre jɨka gyavwi maroyɨmaa'napɨjɨ kɨnna dɨzɨla! Sarɨmɨ a'mwe dahaa' yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasaihi yɨlaaya ya sabwi maroyɨmaa'nya kyapɨjɨ kale naange' yɨhyana!
Nabaai Naangere tɨnnyarɨ sarɨmɨ saihi kwaakewɨ dɨmarulawakɨnyɨla! Nabaai sara yɨpɨja' Naangei sarɨmɨnyɨ munyaba yɨhɨmakɨladelyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨ yagaala kayaa'nanya mudɨpɨnera! A'mwei gya'mwe pwarɨ yagaala kayaa'nanya, yaasɨwakyagaala wɨdazai gannya gya'mwerɨ jɨdavajai sai kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkevɨna yagaala kayaa'nanya wɨdozɨ Kɨwɨnya' jɨdavadelyɨ. Nabaai kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' jɨda'na yɨja' yɨ gɨmɨ Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' nayaa mɨdɨdɨnyaigɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Yawɨbwa'dɨnyaigɨ wɨjɨda'dɨnyaigɨnyɨ.

Gotɨyai yune gave pwainanyai kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka daza wakadengɨ. Sai sara yada yawɨbwarya'nei mwaaidelyɨ. Sai yune gave sahwai a'mweraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na padaihasamaarannei, a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakannei mwaalɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwarɨ wɨjɨdaya'neigɨ aai gɨmwaaihakaigɨnaka!

Dara dɨdɨvɨsaihi nayaa dɨnyu'nyɨla! “Dahaa' pɨgaa', mwanyagaa' kɨgaa' anga naanga pɨba wawaajɨ kwarame pɨrɨvɨ yɨnɨga wi'nanne' mubya'neina wawɨnya yaadeinera. Sarevɨ nabaai nemɨ nɨgwia kwalaalya naanga maraadeinera.” Yɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ dara yɨhɨthɨma!

Sarɨmɨ myawɨrivanɨga'. Yɨrɨta mwanyagaa' benɨ yɨma'nade dɨngaka? Sarɨmɨre gaala mwaalyabwi gatha'darebulaka! Sare' darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ jɨta yide sa'bɨsaihɨlyɨ. Jɨsa' yidehaa' kɨbawa maalɨ'na wa'da yarai yɨmaanyɨna yadevaaibɨta sarɨmɨre gaala mwaalyabulyɨ.
Pɨgaa'na sara dahɨlakya'na madɨpɨnera! Aawa. Dara dɨpɨjaihɨlyɨ “Naangei gannya sɨmunyaburɨ sara yawɨraja' nemɨ gaala kuna mwalawaajɨ wawɨnya pɨrɨ' wawɨnya kɨrɨ' yaadeine.”
Sare kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨre wawɨnya'na yaasɨwa' yagaala naanga damaryadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨnne yaya munyaba makinadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sasare yuya pihadɨka yuya sa, kayaa'nanyangɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe nawɨ'nya ya sabwina Gotɨyai wibwarɨdaakwojɨyabwina yawɨ'dei, sasare sabwi mi yajai pɨbwi yajai yɨ a'mwe dazai wana kayaa'nanyabwi yadelyɨ.
A'mwe gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakeihi, dahaa' nayaa dɨnyu'nyɨla! Sarɨmɨnyɨna “Taanginya yuya yɨma'nɨma!” dada yɨhivanɨka sanna sarɨmɨ sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila! Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ kɨnna dadɨvɨ' jakɨnna dɨthanganyɨla!
Sarɨmɨre yuya gɨlyɨvɨkɨrayajɨ yɨwaala yuyajɨ mena bwia bu'nɨkengɨra. Nabaai yuya sarɨmɨre kwaabɨhannya yuya sa maa'nyaannyara mena dabu'dɨvɨsangɨ.

Sarɨmɨre golɨyajɨ sɨlɨvaayajɨ mena napolɨka yɨnɨkengɨ. Napolɨka daza sarɨmɨre kayaa'na yadɨvɨsabwi sarɨmɨre nɨgwia nayaa mamaremwaalyadɨvɨsabwi ku'maayaba marima'naabathengɨ. Sara yojɨ napolɨka sa' sarɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' dɨke'bɨ' nadezɨkɨ. Sarɨmɨ gɨlyɨvɨsajɨ nɨgwiajɨ kwalaalya yɨ'bwarakɨpɨja' kɨrɨ' yɨrɨka aaya'negaa' yarai yɨma'nadehaakɨ. Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨ maryawɨbwaradehaakɨ.

Kadɨka nayaa du'nyɨla! Wawɨnya yadɨvɨsara sarɨmɨre wawɨnyangɨ tɨka wapaaya yabwaryadɨvɨta sare'na sarɨmɨ sahwaraavɨ kwaasɨ wɨdadɨvɨ' kumɨre nɨgwia pɨnɨ kaanya tihɨremwaaidɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Nɨgwia sarɨmɨ kaanya tihɨremwaaidɨvɨta daza jaka naanga dangamanɨkengɨ. Nabaai Sɨgunyavɨya Kwalaalyaraavɨre Naangei jaka sa kadɨka mena wɨ'nɨvanɨkengɨ.

Yuya sagaa' sarɨmɨ Kwaaka davakɨ mwaaidɨvɨ' gɨlyɨvɨta yuya nawɨ'nyanna nawɨ'nyanna maa'dɨvɨsa'na wabahɨlaaka naanga maa'dɨvɨ' yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' mwaaidɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ bulɨmakaawoyara tɨka kwalaalya nadɨvɨ' sɨgunnakera yɨma'nadɨvɨsarabɨsaihi yɨma'nɨwaasaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyare Yɨrɨka sarɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ tamakya ya'negaa' mena yɨma'nɨvanɨ'.

Darevɨnyɨ. Sarɨmɨ a'mwe yɨda'maraanga kwarɨ kotɨya mena maryeva jɨdaveva mena tamakɨwaasaihɨlyɨ. Sare sa'na nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨ wanganakɨna yɨhyada mala sa'na tɨvɨkɨta mihivanɨ'. Sasareihi gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakeihi Gotɨyai taanginya yɨhɨzaavade'na kɨnna dadɨvɨ' jakɨnna dɨthanganyɨla!

Nya'mweihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨ nayaa dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwadɨvɨ' yuya taanginya sangɨ dɨmaredaayɨla! Sara yapɨjɨ Naangei ayɨna bathegaa'na jemwaalyɨla! Yɨthaanyi, wawɨnyavɨ gyakwalaanga kwai tɨka munne tewaanya kima'nojɨna dada yemwaaidevaaibɨsaihɨlyɨ. Wawɨnyavɨya sai gamɨre sɨmunyaburɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwada burɨkevɨnajɨ nyɨlyavɨnajɨ burɨka dɨviyavɨnajɨ yemwaaidelyɨ. Burɨka sawaai wawɨnya' yunebanna mena kyakɨlyɨ, sagaa' tɨka munne yabwaryadelyɨ.
Nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ sɨmunyabwi dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwadɨvɨ' taanginya yuyangɨ dɨmaredaayɨla! Naangere ayɨna bathehaa' ayahɨba menanyɨra. Sare'na sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnna nayaa warana!

Nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mwe pwaraavɨna mayagaala madɨpɨnera! Bulayagaala madɨpɨnera! “Sare sa'na Yawɨbwasai kayaa'nanya nanyɨrɨvɨkɨradɨka!” dapi myɨpɨna! Yɨthaanyi! Yawɨbwata sai kaadihɨsavɨ mwasɨlaa daavɨkei yemwaaimanɨ'.

Nya'mweihi, yɨkamaangera a'mwe pwaraavɨ kayaa'na wigaidaapi kɨrɨ' sahwara kumɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwadɨvɨ' taanginya daza maredaaveta ke'ba'nanyaraavɨna nayaa jawɨrila! Yɨ sahwara Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'neva pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakesara Naangerɨne yayavɨna wɨdesare. Sarɨmɨ sasare sabwi maarapɨjɨ nabaai sahɨrɨvɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨ' jamarideihɨlyɨ.

Yɨthaanyi! Nemɨ dara dadaanyaine. A'mwera kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwannadɨvɨ' taanginya maa'dɨvɨsara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨnɨkere. Sarɨmɨ Ne Jopɨ kɨgaakuna mwalyaakerɨna yagaaikɨwɨnya dɨnɨke kadɨka mena wɨ'nadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sai gamɨre sɨmunyarɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwada gamɨnyɨ taanginya yuya sa wima'nakelyɨ. Nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ aayagaa' Naangei sahwarɨ tewaanyabwina wiakelyɨ. Sara yawɨrangamanɨga'. Sahwarɨ sara wiake'na nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Naangei nemɨnyɨna kale naanga wiada nabaai yuyagaa' kale'na gaimwanga neyadelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre nya'mweihi, aaya mudɨ'nanya sarɨmɨ jide darengɨ. Sarɨmɨ Sɨgunyavɨne yayasɨ Kwaakevakɨne yayasɨ pɨnɨngɨne yayajɨ dadɨvɨ' nebwina yagaala dɨragɨnya' yɨma'nya'ne' madɨpɨnera! Yɨ sarɨmɨ dɨna “Yayo,” nabaai “Yayo daaza sa' wi'nanyɨ.” Yɨ sarɨmɨ dɨna “Aawa,” nabaai “Aawana daaza sa' wi'nanyɨ.” Sarɨmɨ “Nebwina yagaala dɨragɨnya' yɨma'nya'ne' yaasɨwa'na mudɨwɨna! Gotɨyai nanyɨjɨdavadɨka!” dapi sara madɨpɨna!
Sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ sɨrya'mwe pwai kwai taanginya' kɨnɨnnakei dahamwaalɨka? Sai Gotɨyarɨ nayaa wɨdana! Sɨrya'mwe pwai kware sɨmunya' yɨlaaya dahayɨvanɨka? Sare'na sai Gotɨyarɨ yɨledaasa' dana!

Nabaai sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ sɨrya'mwe pwai nabalɨnakei dahamwaalɨka? Sare sai Naangere kusɨlaanyavɨyaraavɨre naangeraavɨ jaka wɨdathelyɨ. Naangerɨne yayavɨ gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ welivananya' purapɨjɨ gamɨnyaba sahwarɨ tewaanya yavada'galade'na Gotɨyarɨ wɨdɨpɨka!

Nabaai sahwarɨna Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨ' yɨdaangabɨza' Naangei nalaavɨnakerɨ tewaanna wiada ayɨna yɨdɨkaavadelyɨ. Nabaai sai kayaa'nanya pɨnɨ yajanna Naangei kayaa'nanya yuya daza duimwagasɨ'nadelyɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨ sarɨnnya kayaa'nanyanna dɨzalɨkurakyɨla! Sara yadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨ nayaa yavada'galade'na Gotɨyarɨ nayaa jɨthaanganyɨla! A'mwe yɨda'maraangeraavɨre Naangerɨ yɨdaanganyabwi sa' dɨragɨnya yɨma'naabathesɨ. Yɨ sa' a'mwerɨ yɨnɨga wi'na gaimwagathesɨ.

Yɨlaajai Gotɨyare wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakakei sai a'mwe nemɨbɨ' avaainanyalyɨ. Sai Gotɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna kidaangana' “Burɨke' nalaabathɨka!” daka sagaa' Kwaakevakɨ kwarame dawaai da' yaka lawe ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pu'na burɨke' mwalaabyakesɨ.
Nabaai sai ayɨna kidaangana' sagaa' sɨgunya' burɨkevɨ maryasaabɨna kya' yɨthaanyi, sagaa' Kwaakevakɨ tɨka munne ayɨna warɨna.
Nɨnnya nya'mweihi, sarɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwe pwai kwai Gotɨyare yagaala nebulya' yagalya'mavojɨ gya'mwei pwai kwai wɨdozɨ ayɨna makabozɨ

nabaai neya'mwe dazai dara yawɨradelyɨ. A'mwe pwai a'mwe kayaa'nanyabwi yaderɨ gaimwagozɨ sarevɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanya yadei tuta kayaa'nanya' yagalya'mavojɨ Gotɨyaryawɨnna ayɨna kabozɨ sarevɨ a'mwe dazai gannya kuryai ayɨna maaradelyɨ. Gamɨre kuryai kayaaka yuyagaa'na yɨnadei mɨ'. Sasare dazaburɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'nanya kwalaalya marasɨ'nadelyɨ.

Pitainyɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Nyɨdaasadeinyɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ pɨkarya daza' yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Anga Naanga Podaazɨ, Galezɨya, Kapaathozɨya, Ezɨya, Bɨthinɨya, sangɨ gazabazaba angavaayaihi mwaaihasaihɨrɨna yɨhithawasɨwaabe.

Kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai Nɨmwai sarɨmɨnyɨna mena yawɨraka yune gamɨ sahwarɨna yɨhɨthahɨlakakeihɨlyɨ. Kurya Tewaanyai Gotɨyareihi nawɨ'nyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihakeihɨlyɨ. Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨnya'na, nabaai gamɨre tawe' sarɨmɨnyɨ aalya yɨhya'ne'na nawɨ'nyaihi yɨma'nya'na yɨhɨthahɨlakakeihɨlyɨ. Sareihɨrɨne yange'na tewaanna wɨgaimwangebulyɨ kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ naanna yɨhɨmwaaihana!

Nemɨre Naanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare Gotɨyai Ganɨmaangerɨ yɨlaaya nayaa maryaana! Nemɨnyɨ kale naange'na negaimwagake'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyainaavɨ gaala mena nemwaaihakelyɨ. Sahwai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavakevɨ mudɨkeinaavɨ gaala mena nemwaaihakelyɨ. Nabaai sahwarɨnevɨ gaalyabwineina yɨma'nona “Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwalaade'nanyɨ,” dɨragɨnna jemwaalya'neinaavɨ mena nemwaaihakelyɨ.

Gamɨre kaimɨraayainaavɨ mena nemwaaihake'na Nenɨmaangere yuya maraadenna dɨragɨnna yemwaaimanɨgo. Sarenna yuna kayaaka yɨnadenna mɨ'. Bwia buradenna mɨ'. Sarenna gɨrɨkita'nanya yɨma'nadenna mɨ'. Waryaanya yɨma'nadenna mɨ'. Sarenna gwarakuradenna mɨ'. Yarai yɨwodenna mɨ'. Sarɨmɨnyɨne yemwaalya Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyai dame daavɨkengɨra.

Sarenna sarɨmɨnyɨnengɨ. Gotɨyare dɨragɨnyavɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna dame daavɨkeihɨlyɨ. Sahwarɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨza'na dame daavɨkelyɨ. Yɨnahu padaihasamaarya'nevɨ dɨmwaalyide'na dame daavɨkelyɨ. Padaihasamaata sa' yemwaala yɨhivanɨke' Yɨrɨka aayagaa' ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathesɨ. Sareburana yɨlaaya nayaa maryaana!
Yuya sahɨnɨngɨna yɨlaaya naanga yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Dahaa'ne' maalɨkegaa'nesɨ dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya taanginyanna yɨjɨwaalyanna taanga yɨhɨzaavanɨgata kɨrɨ' yɨlaaya yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ.

Taanga yɨhɨzaavanɨgata sare'na yawɨta kwalaalya mipɨnera! Taanga sasare sabwi dara yɨbwarɨdaakuvanɨ' “Taanga wiada kɨrɨ' Naangerɨ dɨragɨnna kuna lɨmwamanɨgasare. Sare'na kumɨre lɨmwangebwi nebulyasɨ.” Nemɨ “Golɨya tewaanya nevu'nadesɨ,” yawɨ'daa kɨrɨ' dɨkevɨ yaamɨjɨya'na marapɨraayadɨvɨ' kwaake' nade golɨya dɨragɨnya' maa'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sarɨmɨre lɨmwangebwina dɨragɨnyabwi yɨma'nade'na taanga yɨhivanɨkebulyɨ. Golɨya kayaaka yɨwode kɨrɨ' Naangerɨ lɨmwangebwi golɨya sahɨrɨ'bɨta mɨ'. Aawa. Sa' golɨyavɨ wavɨlavaka yɨ tewaanya nawɨ'nyaangesɨ. Yuyagaa' warɨbainagwodesɨ. Sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnyabwi yɨvaimwagathe'na taanga yɨhivanɨke'nanyɨ. Dɨvi Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathehaa' Gotɨyai “Lɨmwagesaraavɨ yɨlaaya naanga wima! Byaannakeraavɨ wɨmwaaihɨma! Sahwaraavɨre yaya makɨlɨma!” kada' taanga yɨhivanɨ'.

Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ tɨnna mwanganyeta kwaihi kɨrɨ' sahwarɨna yɨhɨvu'nɨvanɨkelyɨ. Dahaa' tɨnna kuna mwanganyadɨvɨta kwaihi kɨrɨ' sahwarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsalyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨlaaya naanga nebwina yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Yɨlaaya daza' naange' tewaanaange' byaannake' warɨkesɨ. Sahɨrɨ' nemɨre maangejɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wɨjɨwakaade' mɨ'. (Aawa. Naangaangesɨ.)
Sarɨmɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwanga yunevɨna dara yawɨ'mwaasaihɨlyɨ “Aayagaa' Gotɨyai nemɨre kuryaraavɨ yɨnahu nevadaihasamaaradelyɨra.” Sare'na yɨlaaya naanga daza' yɨvanɨgasaihɨlyɨ.

Padaihasamaata saburɨne' Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasara pɨropetɨyara bɨrɨna bɨrɨna yeva yawɨyawɨta yaasasɨ. Sɨnnawɨ sahwara yaata sarɨmɨnyɨne yanga wɨgaimwanga naangevɨ yɨhɨzaaya'nevɨna nemɨnyɨna dɨnɨkesɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare Kuryai pɨropetɨyaraavɨ sɨmunyangɨ wɨlaraka yɨbwarɨdaakuna, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ daanga wɨvɨnya'nesɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ byaanna dɨragɨnyajɨ maarya'nesɨ sɨnnawɨ jalɨkurakyaakelyɨ. Sahwara yawɨyawɨta “Gathɨngaa' yɨma'nadehaakaka?” Nabaai “Benɨnna yɨma'nadengaka dazagaa'?”

Sahwaraavɨ Gotɨyai mena yɨbwarɨdaakuna “Bɨrama'mwaata daza sarɨmɨnyɨnenna mɨ'. Aawa. Dɨvidaa'nyaraavɨnengɨra.” Sara yɨbwarɨdaakuna wiada pɨropetɨyara sa wɨdeve dɨnɨkengɨ. Sa sarɨmɨnyɨnengɨra. Yagaala tewaanya' Kɨraazɨtɨyai Wɨdaasakera yɨhɨzɨwaakesara daza yɨhɨthe'. Gotɨyai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya Kurya Tewaanyarɨ maryasaabɨna kya' sahware dɨragɨnyavɨ yagaala tewaanya' wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨhye'. Nabaai tewaanya daza ejelɨyara kwarajɨ yawɨramaasavɨna wɨvu'najarera.

Gotɨyai yuya sa yakeburɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨnnya sɨmunyabwi nayaa yavada'gainapi nayaa dadɨvɨ' nayaa jemwaalyɨla! Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathevɨ sahwai yanga wɨgaimwangebwi naanga daza' yɨhɨzavaabathesɨ. Sarevɨ sarɨnnya sɨmunya yunebanna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yuna jemwaalyɨla!
“Nemɨ Gotɨyare kaimɨraayainera!” dapɨjɨ nayaa dɨmɨdɨnyɨla! Kɨgaa' sarɨmɨ yagaala tewaanyavɨna sɨmunya kuneihɨrɨ yɨhɨvu'nake'na kayaa'nanya yesaihɨlyɨ. Dahaa' sasare sabwi ayɨna namɨdɨbɨthɨka!
Aawa. Nawɨ'nya dɨmwaalyɨla! Gotɨyai jaka mena yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakei sahwai nawɨ'nyaangelyɨ. Gɨrɨkita'nanyai mɨka! Sahwai nawɨ'nyaangei mwaalɨkabaaibɨ' nawɨ'nya jide'na nawɨ'nyaihi jɨma'nyɨla!
Sarevɨ Gotɨyare bukuya' dara dɨnɨkesɨ. Nɨmɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya maayainyɨ nawɨ'nyainyɨ. Sareburɨdaa'nyɨ nawɨ'nyaihi dɨmwaalyɨla! Sara dɨnɨke'nanyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨvɨkɨ “Nɨmwai.” Gotɨya dazai a'mwe naangeraavɨna tewaanyabwina marayawɨbwa'dei mɨ'. A'mwe maalɨkeraavɨna kayaa'nanyabwina marayawɨbwa'dei mɨ'. Gazaizai sara yade sabwina nayaa marayawɨbwa'delyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ “Nɨmwai,” wɨdɨpɨja' “Naangelyɨ. Dɨragɨnaangelyɨ,” yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Sɨgunyavɨneihi kwaaka dathavakɨ angavaayaihi mwaaidɨvɨsagaa' nayaa yɨda'na jɨla!

Kɨgaakuna Ne sɨnnawɨnyaraavɨrebwi yɨhɨzaaveta waryaanyabwina yesaihɨlyɨ. Sareihi yaasɨwa'na mwaaidɨvɨ' Gotɨyai yɨhɨmubaka kayaa'nanyaburɨ wɨla yɨhyaarakeihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ mena yawɨ'manɨga' “Kayaaka yɨnade nɨgwia pɨnɨjɨ golɨya kɨnɨjɨ manemubyakengɨ.

Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyare tawesɨ nemubamaarakesɨ. Tawe daza' mubya naangesɨ.” A'mwera kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwina Gotɨyarɨna sipɨzipɨya dɨwɨnya yɨwihwaarya saza muwarikerɨ tadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai nawɨ'nyaangei gɨrɨka maayai nemɨnyɨne'na balakelyɨ.
Gotɨyai Kwaakeva' mwakyagaa' wawɨnya daza' ya'nerɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ sɨnnawɨ dahɨlakyaakelyɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' aaya'ne dahasa sarɨmɨnyɨne'na gaimwanga yɨhya'nei ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabakegaakɨra.

Sahwai gamɨreihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaihadaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨya sahwai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ baryarɨ yɨdɨkaavaka byaanna dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavakelyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨhɨmwaaihaka sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨ lɨmwadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨna yemwaaihasalyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ yagaala nebula daza' mɨdɨdɨvɨsavɨ sarɨnnya kuryaraavɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya duimwagasɨ'nɨgasaihɨlyɨ. Sareihi sɨrya'mweraavɨna nebulya'na yɨma'nya'neihi sɨrya'mwe pwaihɨrɨ sɨmunya yuyangɨ dɨragɨnna yɨhɨvu'nana!

Mudɨkeihi mena yɨma'nesa'na sara jɨla! Dɨvidaa'nyɨ kayaaka yɨnya'neyuraavɨdaa'nyɨ mudɨkeihi mima'nye'. Aawa. Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' kayaaka minyaderɨdaa'nyɨ mudɨkeihi yɨma'nesaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyare yagaala yawɨralɨmwanna yeva mudɨkeihi yɨma'nesasɨ. Yagaala sa' gaalyabwi kɨnɨnnake' yuyagaa' warɨbainadesɨ.
Dara dɨnɨke'nanyɨ
“A'mwe yuyara kurɨvaarɨyarera.
Kumɨre nɨgwɨlalaaka yuya kurɨvaarɨyangɨre pwasangɨra.
Kurɨvaarɨya sa yawaka baidengɨ.
Pwasa sa bwalaraawɨna yadengɨ.
Kɨrɨ' Naangere yagaalya' baide' mɨ'.
Sa' yuyagaa' yuyagaa' warɨbainadesɨ.”
Yagaala sa' sara dɨnɨke'na “Yuyagaa' warɨbainadesɨ,” yawɨ'mwo. Yagaala daza' yɨhɨzɨwaakesa' yagaala tewaanya dazasɨ.

Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyaihi mwaaihasavɨdaa'nyɨ kayaa'nanya yuya sabura dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla! Kwaasɨ yagaala yuya sabulyɨ kwaasɨya sabulyɨ gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalyajɨyaraavɨna sɨmunya kayaa'na yawɨta sabulyɨ bulayagaala yuya sajɨ sasare sa dɨmarasɨ'nyɨla!
Bwaranyamɨlɨka aamunya'na mɨjɨka wiadevaaibɨ' Naangere yagaalyavɨna mɨjɨka yɨhyana! Sarevɨ “Yune'na nevadaihasamaarana!” kadapɨjɨ sarɨnnya kuryara dɨragɨnyara yɨma'nɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ.
Sare' dɨnɨ' “ ‘Naangei negaimwadelyɨ,’ yawɨ'manɨgasa' waburya naange'na yɨhyakesɨ.” Sara nebulya'na yɨhyanneihi gamɨre yagaalyavɨna yɨhɨvu'nana!

Kɨraazɨtɨyaryawɨnna dɨvideihɨlyɨ. Sɨlaanga gaala gamɨ sahwalyɨ. Nemɨnyɨna gaalyabwi nejaavadelyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sahwarɨna a'mwera “Waryaanyalyɨ,” deva marasɨ'nesalyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kwarɨna Gotɨyai “Nawɨ'nya nebulyalyɨ,” daka wɨdahɨlakakelyɨ.

Nabaai sarɨmɨ saihi gamɨre gaalyabwi maareva sɨlaanga gaalyai kɨnɨnnakeihɨlyɨ. A'mwera siange' maja'nera sɨlya wakadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyai gamɨreihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihaka angevɨyaihɨrɨna gannya Kurya Tewaanyarɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaaihɨvanɨkelyɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨ pɨrizɨyara Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨta tewaanyaihi gamɨnyɨna wɨdaayadɨvɨsaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihɨvanɨkelyɨ. Sareihi pɨrizɨyara Gotɨyarɨna sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ yɨravetabaaibɨ' sarɨnnya kuryara Gotɨyarɨna duzaayideihɨlyɨ. Sara nayaa yɨpɨja' Gotɨyai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yawɨ'da yɨhɨmaaradelyɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyai sɨlaanga gaala'nerɨna Gotɨyare bukuyavɨ dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Yɨthaanyi! Saayonɨ Sɨlaangerɨ wɨmwaaihɨvanɨge.
Maja'ne simɨjamaangei yɨvaimwagya'nerɨna wɨdahɨlakɨwelyɨ.
“Nawɨ'nya nebulyalyɨ,” dena wɨdahɨlakɨwelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwagazai
Wagɨla kɨnɨ maaradei mɨka! Arɨkewɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Naangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsaihɨrɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai wana nawɨ'nyalyɨ. A'mwe malɨmwagi yɨpɨjaraavɨna dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Anga madɨvɨsara sɨlaangerɨ marasɨ'nesalyɨ.
Dazai Aaya Ke'banyai yɨma'nɨwakelyɨ.
Nabaai a'mwe malɨmwagi yɨpɨjaraavɨna dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
Sɨla dazarɨ mudaya'nelyɨ.
Sɨlaangerɨ mudavamaarojɨ walaraawadelyɨ.

Sara dɨnɨkesɨ. Gotɨyare yagaalya' galazekɨvaidaapiya'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ muda'manɨgasare. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyadɨvɨ' kayaaka yɨgainɨvanɨgasare. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Gotɨyai sara dakakesɨ. Galazekɨvalyara mudapɨ'derera.

Sare' kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai mena kihɨthahɨlaka' gamɨnyɨdaa'nyaihi gamɨreihi yɨma'nesaihi sɨmya yɨsavaakɨ dahɨlakɨnɨkeihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsavaakɨyaihi Gotɨyai Maremwaaiderɨ wɨdaayadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sarɨmɨ anga naanga pimagɨnya tewaanyaihi gɨrɨkita'nanya maayaihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyare a'mweihi, Gotɨyare gɨlyɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sareihɨrɨ yɨhɨthahɨlakake'na Gotɨyai yake yuya nawɨ'nya ya sabwi duzɨwaakyide'nanyɨ. Sahwai jaka kihɨzɨvwara' jɨhɨnya' mena yagalya'ma'na kye' gamɨre baaka nawɨ'nyavɨ wɨlayɨhɨmwaaihake'nanyɨ.
Kɨgaa' a'mweihi mwaaletaihi mɨ'. Aawa. Dahaa' Gotɨyare a'mweihɨlyɨ. Kɨgaa' kale wɨgaimwangebwi maaresaihi mɨ'. Aawa. Dahaa' Gotɨyarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna kale wɨgaimwanga sabwi maakasaihɨlyɨ.

Nya'mweihi, tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi yɨhɨthɨhaa'bwarɨma! Kwaaka davakɨ angavaayaihi yɨwɨnamavesaihi mwaaihasa'na sɨmunya ayabwi “Wabahɨlaake'na kayaa'na yɨwɨneinyɨ. Maa'mujainyɨ,” yawɨresabwi mamɨdɨbɨna! Sasare sabura sarɨmɨre kuryarajɨ mala bwa'nadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨre kuryara dɨragɨnna mwaaibɨka!

Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraayaba nayaa yɨda'na jɨla! Sasarebwina sarɨmɨ yadaapɨri sahwara kwaasɨ dɨnɨpɨja' “Kɨraazɨtɨyarera kayaa'na yadɨvɨsare.” Kɨrɨvɨ sarɨmɨre tewaanyabwi dara yawɨrangabɨ'de' “O, sahwai nayaa yɨvanɨke' daaka!” Gotɨyai yawɨbwarya'nei mu'nyadɨvɨsaraayawɨnna bozɨyagaa' sarɨmɨ “Malɨmwagyadɨvɨsara Gotɨyarɨna ‘Byaannakelyɨ,’ dɨpɨka!” dapɨjɨ nayaa yɨda'na jɨla!
Naangerɨna sɨmunya nayaa yawɨ'dɨ a'mwe naangera yuyara gɨmaremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨ kwaakewɨ dɨmwaala! Kingɨya naanga Sizaai mwaalɨkerɨna sahwarɨ kwaakewɨ dɨmwaala!

Nabaai ga'maanɨya kwaraavɨjɨ kwaakewɨ dɨmwaala! Sahwaraavɨ kingɨya naangei Sizaai maryasaabakere. A'mwe kayaa'na yadɨvɨsaraavɨ kayaa'nanya tɨvɨkɨrya'ne'na kɨrɨ' nayaa yadɨvɨsaraavɨ yaya wɨmakɨlya'ne'najɨ maryasaabakere.

Sasare gɨmɨ yadaa'gɨzɨya'na Gotɨyarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨkelyɨ. Nayaa yadaa'gi sɨdu'maayara yawɨ'dɨvɨ' “Kumɨrebwi kayaa'nanyabwi tɨnna wanganawaajɨ bɨrala wɨdaatheinera,” dara wangabɨ'de' “O, tewaanna jɨvanɨga'!” Sara gɨmɨ yadɨ gɨmɨnyɨnebwina kayaa'nanya yɨnɨga wi'na majɨ yɨpɨnerera.

Nayaa dɨmwaala! Pwaraavɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaigɨ wɨdaaya'neigɨ mamwaaidɨnneigɨnyɨ. Gotɨyai neyaarakeinera. Dɨragɨnyaigɨ gɨnnya dɨragɨnyabwina kayaa'nanyabwi mabwakakɨnna!
