Sarevɨ dara myawɨ'dɨnna! “Dɨragɨnyaina mwaaiho'na kayaa'nanya yaaja' sara yaana!” Sara myawɨ'dɨnna! Aawa. Gotɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaigɨ dɨmwaala!

A'mwe yuyaraavɨre yayangɨ munyaba dɨmakɨla! Kɨraazɨtɨyare ja'mweraavɨna gɨvu'nana! Gotɨyarɨna yawɨ'dɨ “Naangelyɨ. Dɨragɨnaangelyɨ,” lɨka nayaa jɨ! Kwaaka yuyavakɨya Kingɨya Sizaarɨne yaya' munyaba dɨmakɨla!

Angevɨ wɨdaayadɨnyaigɨ gɨnnya maremwaaiderɨna “A'mwe naangelyɨ,” nayaa yawɨ'dɨ lɨka yadɨ kwaakewɨ nayaa dɨmarulawakɨnna! Pwara tewaanna gɨmaremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ nayaa kave gyadɨvɨsarajɨ gaveraavɨna mɨ'. Aawa. Kayaa'na gɨmaremwaaidɨvɨta kwaraavɨjɨ nayaa dɨmɨdɨna!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yaasɨwa'wawɨnya gazaizai tewaanya yaderɨna daange yaasɨwa'na wɨjavadaapi Gotɨyarɨna sɨmunyai tewaanyai wɨvadaihɨrakade'na sahwai murɨvɨkɨryada Gotɨyarɨ kuna mɨdɨnajavwina Gotɨyarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nadelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gɨmɨ kayaa'na yɨja'na asɨlyɨ mala kagɨramapi murɨvɨkɨri yɨja saburɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai be yɨlaaya gɨmaryadelaka! Aawa. Gɨmɨ tewaanyabwi yɨja' kɨrɨ' asɨlyɨ mala yaasɨwa'na kagɨramapi daanga maara'gɨzɨ murɨvɨkɨri yɨja dazahɨburɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nadelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sasare sabwi mɨdɨnya'neigɨnyɨ Gotɨyai jaka mena gɨzɨvwaramaarake'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai gɨmɨnyɨna gaimwange'na daanga maaraka murɨvɨkɨrya'. “Nɨmɨ sara yebaaibɨ' nɨmɨre sɨvɨla yɨbwarɨmakupɨka!” daka givwarɨdaakwa'.
Sahwai kayaa'nanyabwi yakai mɨ'. Gamɨre maangikɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨ'netai mɨ'.

Sahwarɨ bɨraiyagaalyajɨ wɨdɨna kye' bɨraiyagaala ayɨna mujakelyɨ. Sarɨ daanga wɨvɨnaka kɨrɨ' maiyagaala mujakelyɨ. Aawa. Gotɨyai yuyangɨne yɨdasava'na yawɨbwa'dei sahwaraavɨ wɨrɨvɨkɨrya'ne'na Gotɨyare asɨrɨ wɨmwangɨnakelyɨ.

Gamɨ sai gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨ nemɨre kayaa'nanya maaraka yɨsavɨ tɨmunadaavakelyɨ. Nemɨnyɨna “Sahwara kayaa'nanyanna balapɨjɨ yɨda'maraangebwina gaala mwaaibɨka!” daka balakelyɨ. Gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ ga'bwaralyajɨ kayaaka kigale' daanga maarakelyɨ. Sasara gamɨnyɨ yɨma'nake'na ayɨna tewaanya yavada'gala gyakelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨgaa' sipɨzipɨyara tusa' yagalya'mavesarabɨsaigɨ tewaanya mamwaalyagɨ. Aawa. Kɨraazɨtɨyai ayɨna mena kagɨmakaba' dahaa' gɨmɨre kuryarɨ maremwaalyai sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaideryaba tewaanya mwaalagɨ.

Sasarebaaibɨ' kwala maa'nɨke'gɨ gɨnnya a'mwerɨ kwaakewɨ dula'naka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kwalaangei Kɨraazɨtɨyare yagaalya' galazekɨvaina yajai kwai gɨmɨre nawɨ'nyaburɨ gwanganojɨ Naangerei yɨma'nannelyɨ. Yagaala duthathe'na mɨ'.
Gɨmɨ “Nɨnnya a'mwei naangelyɨ,” da'gɨzɨ nayaa wɨmɨdɨdɨnya'gɨreburɨ tɨnna gwanganade'nanyɨ.

“Nɨnnya a'mwei nawɨ'nya'nyɨ nyawɨranganana!” da'gi gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ mwasɨmagɨnna yɨwaala miwannɨnnera! Mɨjasangɨ yɨwaala yɨwannadɨnyajɨ nɨgwɨlalaaka paidapaide yɨ'dejɨ baazɨ'ma'nya dala nabinabinyajɨ miwannɨnnera!

Aawa. Kusɨmagɨnna gɨnnya sɨmunya lɨka yulyarɨkevɨ yɨwaala yɨwannɨnne'gɨnyɨ. Yɨwaala daza kayaaka yɨnadenna mɨ'. Yɨwaala sa darebulyɨ. Kuryara kwaamu'nanyara kave mwaaidɨvɨsabulyɨ. Kwaamu'na yadɨvɨ' nayaa dadɨvɨsabulyɨ. Sasare sabwi Gotɨyai tɨnna wangada “Wana nawɨ'nyaangebulyɨ,” dadevulyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kɨgaakuna a'mwe Gotɨyarɨ yemwaaidɨvɨ' nawɨ'nya mwaaleva sabwi sara yaasangɨra. A'mwe daza yɨwaala sasare sabwi kave mwaalya'nebwi maa'dɨvɨ' kunnya a'mweraavɨ kwaakewɨ nayaa wɨla'naryaasangɨra.

Seraa' sasare sabwi yaakesɨ. Evɨraamɨmɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨnna yaka sahwarɨna “A'mwe naangeigɨ,” wɨdakesɨ. Nabaai gɨmɨ nawɨ'nyabwina sara yɨja' aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨvɨna lɨka yarai mi jɨthevurɨdaa'nyɨ Seraa' nawɨ'nyabwi yaakebwi ya'gɨzɨ Seraavɨre kaimɨraaya'gɨ jɨma'nade'gɨnyɨ.

Sasarebaaibɨ' kwala maakɨnyaigɨ sɨmunya nawɨ'nya yawɨ'dɨ gɨnnya a'mwesɨ nayaa dɨmwaala! Dara yawɨ'na “A'mwevɨre kɨlaakejɨ' dɨragɨnyajɨ' mɨka! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nayaa yɨdeinyɨ.” Nabaai dare'na yawɨ'dɨ “Gaalyaburɨne Gotɨyare yanga wɨgaimwangevɨ a'mwesɨ yuna maarakade'naalyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨnnya a'mwevɨre yaya' makɨlɨma!” Sara jawɨka! Sara mi yɨja'na Gotɨyarɨ kuda'gɨzɨ magu'nyɨ nagyathɨka!

Dahaa' yagaala da' dara jɨ'mwannɨde'nanyɨ “Sarɨmɨ yuyaihi avaaizɨmunya jɨla! Pwai pwarɨna pwai pwarɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' dɨmwaalyɨla! Kɨraazɨtɨyare sɨrya'mweraavɨna yɨhɨvu'nana! Kale yɨhyana! Pwaraavɨre yaya mamakwalaawi yapɨjɨ sarɨnnya yaya mamakɨlaapɨna!”

Nabaai a'mwera kayaa'na kihyapɨjɨ kumɨre sabwina murɨvɨkɨpɨnera! Nabaai bɨraiyagaala kihɨthapɨjɨ bɨraiyagaala sanna murɨvɨkɨpɨnera! Aawa. Kumɨre yadɨvɨta sabwi darebwi dɨrɨvɨkɨryideihɨlyɨ “Gotɨyai tewaanya nejaavade'na Gotɨyarɨ wɨdaana! ‘Sahwaraavɨna tewaanya duzaama!’ ” Sasare sabwi kyapɨjɨ Gotɨyai “Nɨmɨrera yɨma'napɨjɨ tewaanya naanga maapɨka!” daka jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaara'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dara dɨnɨkesɨ.
A'mwei dara yawɨraja'
“Mwaalyabwina tewaanya nyɨvu'nana!
Yɨrɨka tewaanyangɨ wanganɨma!”
Yagaala kayaa'nanya bɨpalana!
Kwaasɨ yagaala madanna!
Kayaa'nanya' gɨnyɨra'na yana!
Tewaanyavɨ nayaa yana!
Munya yɨrɨla dɨwannana!
Sasarebwi dɨragɨnna mɨdɨnana!
Naangei yɨda'maraangeraavɨ wangamanɨke'nanyɨ.
Tɨnna wanganaka maremwaaidelyɨ.
Naangei yɨdaanganya wɨ'nɨvanɨke'nanyɨ.
Kadɨka wɨ'naka wɨgaimwadelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' kayaa'na yadaapiyaraavɨ
Jɨkurɨtɨnna dɨragɨnna yɨvanɨke'nanyɨ.
Sara dɨnɨke'nanyɨ.
Nabaai sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna nayaa yɨpɨja' tewaanya sabwi mɨdɨnya'na kayaa'na yɨhya'nei bewalaka!

Aawa. Kɨrɨ' yɨda'maraangebwina yɨpɨja' sahɨrɨvɨne'na Gotɨyarɨna taangesɨ daangesɨ damaa'manɨga'! Sare'na yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨhyɨnanneihɨlyɨ. Nabaai lɨka ya'ne pɨnɨ kihizɨwaalapɨjɨ sahɨnɨnna sarɨmɨ lɨka mipɨnera! Yawɨta kwalaalya mipɨnera!

Sarɨnnya sɨmunyangɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna jawɨranganyɨla! “Nemɨre Naangelyɨ. Tewaanyalyɨ!” Nabaai gazagaasagaa' ayɨna wɨja'na dɨragɨnna dɨmwaalyɨla! Gazaizai kihithaanganojɨ “Sarɨmɨ yemwaaimanɨgata saburɨ aaya kaavɨlya' berɨvaka?” Sarevɨ ayɨna wɨja'na nayaa jemwaalyɨla! Kɨrɨ' nayaa ja'nawɨdadɨvɨ' kwaamu'nanyaihi yagaala kaveyajɨ jideihɨlyɨ.

Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyai tewaanyai padaihɨrakya' nayaa yɨda'na warana! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ bɨraiyagaala yɨhɨthɨpɨjahaa' kayaa'nanya daza' dɨvanɨgasara dara wangabɨ'de' “O, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsara tewaanyabwi jɨvanɨgava!” Nabaai “Sahwara kunnya yagaalya'na wagɨla maapɨka!” dapi kave duzideihɨlyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyai sɨmunya yawɨraja' “Tewaanna yadaapi nɨmɨreraavɨ taanga wiana!” sarɨmɨ tewaanyabwi yadɨvɨsa'na taanga wia sa' tewaanyasɨ. Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ taangebwi maapɨja' kayaa'na yɨpɨja sabwina sa' wana kayaa'nanyasɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai tewaanna yada taanga wina yesa'na sarɨmɨ avaaina yɨpɨneihɨlyɨ. Yɨ yune gave pɨgaa'na sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanyanna Kɨraazɨtɨyai balake'nanyɨ. Sahwai a'mwe yɨda'maraangei sarɨmɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyaihɨrɨneba bala'. “Gotɨyaryawɨnna sahwaraavɨ makuma!” daka balakelyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sahwai kɨlaakevɨ a'mwei mwaaidɨ'nyɨ tamarɨmwesalyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kuryarɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkaavaka gaalyai mwaalɨkelyɨ.
Nabaai kuryarɨ kuryara kalavuzangevɨ mwaaidapiyaraavɨ wɨdaawakelyɨ.

Kɨgaakuna Nowaaregaa' Gotɨyare yagaalya' galazekɨvaina yaasaraavɨ wɨdaawakerera. Sahɨrɨ'na nabaai Gotɨyai yarai murɨvɨkɨryaka sahwaraavɨ yemwaaina ya'. Sagaa' Nowaai sɨpɨya' yavɨkarina kya' kwala maalɨkera nayaa wɨlamwaaina yɨna ye'. Sɨpɨya savɨ kusawɨ a'mwe ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraai dalyara aalyavɨ yɨvainyaakere.

Daza' bavɨtaazɨya'na ke'ba'nanya' yakesɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ bavɨtaazɨya' yɨhyada kayaa'nanyabwi marasɨ'nada yɨhɨvadaihasamaarakesɨ. Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai ayɨna mena dɨkaavakevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨhɨvadaihasamaarake'nanyɨ. Mudɨkeihi mwaaihasaihɨlyɨ. Bavɨtaazɨya' kɨlaakejɨkɨ gɨrɨka marasɨta'ne' mɨ'. Aawa. Bavɨtaazɨyagaa' Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre yɨdaanganya wɨ'naka sarɨmɨnyɨne sɨmunyara tewaanyara padaihɨrakya'neihɨrɨ tewaanyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihakesɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyai dɨkaavakei Sɨgunyavɨna mena yɨlaawaka dɨragɨnyaba Gotɨyare aangasɨrɨ yɨlamwalaawɨ'. Ejelɨyarajɨ naanga nabinabinyarajɨ dɨragɨnnakerajɨ yuyara sahwarɨ kwaakewɨ wɨla'narya'nelyɨ.

Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ daanga maarakelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwai sɨmunyabwi lɨmwagakabaaibɨ' nabaai sarɨmɨ avaaizɨmunyabwi dɨragɨnna nayaa dɨlɨmwagyɨla! Yɨ dare'na “Tewaanyabwina pwara a'mwere kɨlaakejɨkɨ daanga wɨjaavadɨvɨsa'na sahwai kayaa'nanyabwi ayɨna yadei mɨ'.”
Sarevɨ dazagaa' sahwai kɨlaakejɨkɨna kuna mwaaidehaa' dɨka widade kayaa'nanya sangɨ ayɨna mɨdɨnadei mɨ'. Aawa. Sai Gotɨyare sɨmunyaburɨ mwaaladelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyara Naangerɨ malɨmwagyadɨvɨta saraavɨre “Kuna yaana!” dadɨvɨ' yadɨvɨ' yadɨvɨta saburɨ kɨgaa' sarɨmɨ yaata sa menanyɨra. Dahaa' ayawɨ mipɨna! Sahwara da'dare sabwi darebwina mwaaidɨvɨsare. A'mweraavɨ a'mwengɨ ata lɨmwadɨvɨ' gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsare. Dɨka widadere. Biyaaya nadɨvɨ' yɨmakaanya yamarina yadɨvɨsare. Tɨka munne naangengɨ saamɨnyagaa' mwalɨbainyɨna yadɨvɨ' biyaaya dɨragɨnya kwalaalya nadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsare. Kwaasɨ gotɨyaraavɨna yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' kayaa'nanyabwi yaasɨwa'na yadɨvɨsare.
Dahaa' sarɨmɨ sasare kayaa'nanya sabulyɨ yaasɨwakebulyɨ sabwina sahwarajɨ mye'mwannayɨvanɨga'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ “Be'neka!” dadɨvɨ' lɨka yɨwaainadɨvɨ' bɨraiyagaala yɨhɨthɨvanɨga'.
Sahwara kumɨre yadɨvɨta aaya kaavɨla sa'na yawɨbwarya'nerɨ yagaala wɨdɨpɨ'delyɨ. Sai yawɨbwasa'na mena yemwaalɨkelyɨ. Sai a'mwe mwaaihata kwaraavɨjɨ barya kwaraavɨjɨ yawɨbwaradelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarevɨ sɨnnawɨ yagaala tewaanya' a'mwe mena bainɨka kwaraavɨjɨ mena wɨjɨwaakesasɨ. Gotɨyai maryawɨbwasa' mena dɨnɨkesɨ. Kɨlaakejɨ' balojɨ kwaakevɨnejɨkɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. “Yagaala tewaanya' wɨ'neta sahwaraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkana maryawɨbwarɨma!” kada' wɨjɨwaakɨna. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. “Gotɨyainyɨ kuna mwaaihebaaibɨ' kumɨre kuryarana gaalya'nera mwaaibɨka!” kada' wɨjɨwaakɨna ye'.
Yuya yɨwawodehaa' aya kɨgaa' menanyɨra. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨmunya nayaa jawɨrila! Sarɨmɨ nayaa pada'galayawɨ'na yadɨvɨsa'na yuyagaa' Naangerɨ nayaa duzideihɨlyɨ.
Yuyangɨ sɨnnawɨnya' da'daresɨ. Sɨrya'mweraavɨna yɨhɨvu'nana! Sabwi dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwagarila! Kihɨvu'nojɨ pwaraavɨre kayaa'nanya kwalaalya sarɨmɨnyɨne dɨmarasɨ'nyideihɨlyɨ.
Sarɨmɨjɨ bye'mwannamwaaibɨneraavɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨ sarɨnnya angengɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaalyɨla! Sara yapɨjɨ maajɨmunya myawɨpɨna!
Sarɨmɨjɨya gazaigɨzaigɨ Gotɨyare yangebwi maaragɨneigɨ pwaina pwainanyarɨ dɨhaimwana! Gaimwanga sasare wawɨnya yadɨnya nawɨ'nyaigɨjɨ Gotɨyare yanga pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya wɨjaapalya'na sara jɨnyɨla!

Gotɨyai yangenna dɨragɨnyanna yɨhɨzaavake'na dara jɨla! Yɨ sarɨmɨjɨya pwai yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakajai nabaai yange'na sai Gotɨyare yagaalya wɨjɨwaakana! Pwai a'mwe pwarɨ wɨdaayajai yange'na Gotɨyai wɨjaavade dɨragɨnya sasɨ sara yana! Sana sana jɨla! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ a'mwera yuya wawɨnya sa tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ “Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna a'mwera ‘Gotɨyai byaannakelyɨ,’ dɨpɨka!” dapɨjɨ sana sana jɨla! Sahwai byaannyasɨ yɨlaaya naangesɨ kɨnɨnnakei yaka dɨragɨnaangei yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nelyɨ. Nebulyasɨ.
Nyɨvu'nadeihi, sarɨmɨre lɨmwangebwi yaamɨjɨ ya'ne'na dɨke' a'mweraavɨ nadevaaibɨ' taanga kihyojɨ lɨka nyɨwaainɨpɨka! Sanna dara nyawɨpɨdɨ'! “Dala nabinya neyɨma'nɨvanɨka!”

Aawa. Daanga dazavɨna “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ daanga wɨvɨnakabaaibɨ' nevɨmanɨke'nanyɨ,” dapɨjɨ yɨlaaya jɨla! “Dɨvi gamɨnne byaanna dɨragɨnya' ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathevɨ yɨ yɨlaaya naanga kuna yadaa munyɨ' nayaa gaimakunna yaana!” dapi daangenna yɨlaaya jɨla!
Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna bɨraiyagaala yɨpɨja'na yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga yɨhyɨnanneihɨlyɨ. Gotɨyare Kuryai byaanna dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakei yɨhɨmwaalɨke'na yɨlaaya jɨla!

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sarɨmɨjɨyarɨ daanga wɨvɨnajai a'mwerɨ tamakya'nei namwaaladɨka! Yɨ kuka maarya'nei, yɨ kayaa'nanya ya'nei, yɨ pwaraavɨre yaasɨwa'na maremwaalya'nei, yɨ dazarerɨ daanga wɨjaavɨpɨ'devaaibɨ' tɨvɨkɨsa'na sarɨmɨjɨyarɨ daanga nujaavɨpɨka!
Pwai tewaanyabwi yadei Kɨraazɨtɨyarei mwaalɨke'na taanga wɨjaavɨpɨja' wagɨla mamaarannera! Yaya nawɨ'nya sa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarerɨne'na Gotɨyarɨna “Byaannakelyɨ,” dana!

Gotɨyai yawɨbwarya'negaa' yarai yɨma'nadehaakɨ. Gotɨyai gannya angevɨyainaavɨdaa'nyɨ neyawɨbwaradelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ dɨragɨnna sara kaneyojɨ Gotɨyare yagaala tewaanya' galazekɨvaidɨvɨsaraavɨ gatha'dara yannevaka! Maalɨke' mɨ'!
Dara dɨnɨke'nanyɨ
“A'mwe yɨda'maraangerɨ taanga naanga kujaavapɨjɨ
Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai gamɨre kayaa'nanyabwi padaihasamaaraja'
Gotɨyarɨ gɨnyɨra'derɨna gatha'darevaka!
Kayaa'nanyarɨ gatha'dara ya'nelaka!
Kayaa'nanyaraavɨ yɨnɨga wi'na mavadaihasamaari yaderera.”

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai sɨmunya yawɨranne daange maa'manɨgatabaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarera nayaa yɨda'na yadɨvɨ' kunnya kuryaraavɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaavɨnɨpɨka! Sahwai newakyaakelyɨ. Yuyagaa' gannya yagaala wɨdadengɨna sara yadelyɨ.

Yuya sarengɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨjɨya a'mwe naangeraavɨ wɨdɨhaa'bwarɨma! Nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ Naangereraavɨre naangeinyɨ mwaaiheinyɨ. Nabaai Kɨraazɨtɨyai daange kamaara' nɨmɨ sainyɨ tɨnnyaraalyɨ wanganerɨna jalɨkurakadɨnyainyɨ. Naangere byaanna dɨragɨnya daza' ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathe' nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ kwaihɨlyɨ maraadeine. Sareinyɨ naangeihɨrɨ dɨragɨnna yɨhɨthɨma!

Sipɨzipɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ' Gotɨyare a'mweraavɨ sarɨmɨnyabanneraavɨ nayaa dɨmaremwaalyɨla! Wawɨnya yɨvanɨgasangɨna a'mwera dɨragɨnna yɨhyadɨvɨ' saihi yaasɨwa'na nyɨpɨdɨka! Aawa. Gotɨyai sɨmunyavɨ “Sahwara nɨmɨreraavɨ maremwaaibɨka!” yawɨ'devaaibɨ' nayaa jɨla! Yune nɨgwianna maarya'nenna wawɨnya sa' mipɨnera! Aawa. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ “Nayaa wɨgaimwagɨma!” dadɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna nebwina jɨla!

Gotɨyai a'mweraavɨneihɨrɨ yɨhɨthahɨlakaka saraavɨ dathɨwanga mipɨnera! Aawa. Gotɨyarera sarɨmɨre mwaalyaburɨjɨ ya'neburɨjɨ tɨnna yɨhwanganapɨjɨ tewaanyabwina yɨbwarɨdaakwia'na sara mɨdɨbɨ'de'na tewaanyaihi dɨmwaalyɨla! Sareihi dɨmaremwaalyɨla!
Sare' sipɨzipɨyaraavɨna Maremwaala Aaya Naangei ku'maayaba yɨma'naabathehaa' yɨhɨrɨvɨkɨrya'ne' byaanna dɨragɨnya' miwɨyɨ yade' dɨmaaryideihɨlyɨ.
Sabaaibɨ' a'mwe mɨgɨnya kwaihi a'mwe naangeraavɨ nayaa dɨmɨdɨnyɨla! Sara yadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ yuyaihi nayaa kwaamu' mwaalyabwi maa'dɨvɨ' sɨrya'mweraavɨ nayaa duthaayɨla! Dara dɨnɨke'nanyɨ
“Gotɨyai pihadɨka yɨpɨjaraavɨ tihɨradelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' kwaamusaraavɨna yangebwi wɨjaavadelyɨ.”
Sara dɨnɨke'nanyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yune gannyagaa' Gotɨyai “Kumɨre yaya' munyaba makɨlɨma!” kadozɨ gamɨre ata dɨragɨnaangirɨ kwaamu' dɨmwaalyɨla!
Sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'da nayaa yɨhɨmaremwaaide'na yuya yawɨta kwalaalya gamɨre asɨrɨ dakyɨla!

Nayaa dɨvada'galayawɨrila! Tɨnna nayaa jemwaalyɨla! Sarɨmɨre yɨkamaangei Kotɨya Maryadei, kavɨjɨlɨka pwai laayonɨyai pwaka dɨragɨnna dadevaaibɨsalyɨ. Sai kaanya yamaryada a'mwe pwaraavɨ tɨka nya'neraavɨna bɨragaazɨwadelyɨ.

Naangerɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwangevɨ dɨragɨnna mwaalapɨjɨ sahwarɨ dɨrɨvɨkɨrasɨ'nyidelyɨ. Sarɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨga' “Nemɨ daanga ma'daanyabaaibɨ' neya'mwe yuyara Kɨraazɨtɨyarera Kwaaka yuyavakɨ mwaaihasara daanga maa'dɨvɨsare.” Sare'na dɨragɨnna dɨthaayɨla!

Gotɨyai yuya yanga gaimwangeburɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaaraka sahware byaanna dɨragɨnya' yuyagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ warɨbainade' yɨhɨzaavakelyɨ. Daange' maalɨkegaa'na dɨmaaryide', dɨvi gamɨ sai yavada'galayɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨ. Yɨhɨmarɨdaakwadelyɨ. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ dɨragɨnya yɨhivaimwagathelyɨ. Dɨragɨnyaihɨrɨ yɨhɨmwaaihadelyɨ.
Sahwai dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakei yuyagaa'ne yuyagaa' nemaremwaalana! Nebulyasɨ.

Saailaazare asɨrɨ yagaala tuta damɨlɨ' yɨhidawasɨwaabe. Nɨmɨ sarɨna yawɨ'na “Neya'mwei nawɨ'nyalyɨ.” Pɨkarya dazavɨ “Sarɨmɨnyɨ dɨhaa'bwarɨma!” dena mena yawɨrangadɨ yɨhɨzalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Daza' Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga naanga nebulyasɨra. Dazavɨ nayaa dɨragɨnna dɨthaayɨla!
Naangerera Bavɨlonɨ mwaaihasaraavɨjɨ mena yɨhɨthahɨlakakera “Neya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨwaa'. Nabaai nɨmɨrei Maakɨyai sai kwalyɨ “Nya'mweihi!” yɨhɨthɨwa'.
Sarɨmɨ yuyaihi sɨrya'mweraavɨna kale ya saburɨne maangwɨdaayɨlaaya dɨmarinyɨla!
Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihasaihi tewaanyaihi dɨmwaalyɨla! Gotɨyare naryavɨ dɨmwaalyɨla! Sare' nyɨvu'nɨvanɨkesɨ.
Nya'mweihi,

Saaimonɨ Pitainyɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ. Sahwai gannya yagaalya' Nyɨdasaabadeinyɨ Apozelɨyainyɨ. Sareinyɨ pɨkarya daza' yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Yɨ a'mweihɨrɨna, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga nawɨ'nyabwi mena maaresaihɨrɨna yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Sarɨnnya nawɨ'nya dazabwi nemɨ maaro dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga avaala dazabulyɨ. Lɨmwanga dazabwi nemɨre Gotɨyai nevadaihasamaarakei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare tewaanya yɨda'maraangevɨ mena yɨhɨzaavakebulyɨ.
Gotɨyalyɨ Jizaazai nemɨre Naangelyɨ saraarɨ nebulya'na yawɨramaa'dɨvɨsavɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ yanga gaimwange'na tewaanna wia'nesɨ kwaamu'nanyaburɨ tewaanya mwaalya'nesɨ naanna yɨhwarana!

Gannya dɨragɨnya Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyavɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨ gaala yɨnɨga wi'na mwaalya'nejɨ Gotɨyareburɨnejɨ sa yuya yanga nejaavakelyɨ. Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨ sarɨ nebulya'na yawɨrangadaanya'ne'na yuya daza nemɨrengɨra. Yɨ gannya byaanna dɨragɨnyasɨ gannya tewaanaangesɨ nejaaya'neinaavɨ jaka nejɨvwaramaarake'nanyɨ.

Sawaarɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨnyɨne yune naanga nebulya'na daka nawɨ'nyaangejɨ yune naangejɨ mena nejaavakengɨ. Sare' dara ya'na. “Yune naanga nebulya'na dena sangɨ yɨ munyɨ' dɨkaata sabwi a'mwe Kwaaka davakɨyaraavɨ wɨwa'deraavɨ wana kayaaka wigalakadevurɨ gɨmɨ lɨkaanya yenadaava'gɨzɨ kayaaka yɨma'nade sabwi davɨlaka!” daka naanga gɨzaavakengɨ. Nabaai sara ya'gɨzɨ gaalyasɨ yune Gotɨyare yawɨsabulyɨ je'mwannamaa'de'nanyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyaibɨsaigɨ jɨma'nade'nanyɨ. Sare'na mena nejaavakengɨ.
Sabaaibɨ' nabaai gɨmɨ dakɨnɨke dazahɨrɨvɨnajɨ nayaa yawɨ'dɨ dɨragɨnna yadɨ gɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangeburɨjɨ tewaanyabwi je'mwagakya! Nabaai tewaanyaburɨjɨ Gotɨyare sɨdu'nakebwi je'mwagakya!

Nabaai sɨdu'nakeburɨjɨ gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨne saburɨ nayaa maremwaalyabwi je'mwagakya! Nabaai maremwaainyaburɨjɨ taanga gwa'dɨ'nyɨ dɨragɨnna daayabwi je'mwagakya! Nabaai dɨragɨnna daayaburɨjɨ Gotɨyainebwi je'mwagakya!
Nabaai Gotɨyaineburɨjɨ neya'mwerajɨ nya'mwana mwaalya sabwi je'mwagakya! Nabaai neya'mweraavɨ ye'mwannemwaala saburɨjɨ pwaraavɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nada tewaanna wiabwi je'mwagakya!

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨnyɨ yuya sa kuna gwa'dɨ'nyɨ sasare sabwi kuna naanga yɨma'nadevulyɨ. Nabaai yawɨta sa' yaasɨwa'na warade' mɨ'. Savɨ tɨka munne kwalaalya yɨma'nadengɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre Naangerɨ nebulya'na yawɨranganaade'nanyɨ.

Nabaai sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mwe sasare sabura maayai yuya Sɨgunyaba warɨke tɨnna wangadei mɨ'. Sai tɨnna tɨbɨnyalyɨ. Gotɨyai gamɨre yuya kayaa'nanya sɨnnawɨ yake sa duimwagasɨ'nake' navɨka mena yadelyɨ.

Nya'mweigɨ, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sabwi minna! Aawa. Dɨragɨnaanga yadɨ dara jawɨramaaka! “Gotɨyai jaka nejɨvwaramaaraka sabulyɨ gamɨ sahwarɨneinaavɨ nedahɨlakaka sabulyɨ kuna dɨragɨnna yawɨraana! Sareina dazaburaavɨ nayaa yamaryaana!” Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨ sara yɨja' mwalaraawi jɨtheigɨnyɨ. Arɨkewɨ.

Nabaai sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨ sasare sabwi mɨdɨdɨza' nemɨre Naangei nevadaihasamaa'dei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai maremwaaidevɨ tɨkurya' yunebanna baasada nawɨ'nya sahɨrɨvɨ yanga naange'na gɨmwaaihozɨ gɨmɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'nevɨ dɨmwaaide'nanyɨ.

Sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ yuya dazangɨ mena yawɨrangadɨvɨ' mena maa'dɨvɨ' yagaala nebula dazavɨ dɨragɨnna daaveta kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ ayɨna yɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya' yuya sagaa' sa'na jawɨryide'na “Sarɨmɨnyɨ ayɨna yɨhɨthɨma!” dadɨ yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe.

Nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nyɨbwarɨdaakwake' nɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨ' sɨmɨnya'bɨsajɨ' yagalya'mavɨdehaa' maalɨkegaa' wa'dozɨ yune maalɨkegaa'na balɨdeinyɨ. Sara yawɨ'manɨge'najɨ nabaai nɨmɨ “Darebwi nawɨ'nyabulyɨ. ‘Yuyagaa' kɨlaaka sajɨkɨna nɨmɨ kuna mwaaidɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ yɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya'na ayɨna sara yɨhɨthɨdeinyɨ,’ ” yawɨ'manɨge'najɨ kuna sara yɨhɨthɨdeinyɨ. Sare' nawɨ'nyasɨ.

Sare'na sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨjɨwaakya' dɨragɨnna yɨde'nanyɨ. Nabaai dɨvi nɨmɨ mena kabala'muri yuyagaa' sarɨmɨ yagaala daza' ayɨna jawɨryide'nanyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨ tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ “O, Pitai sara nedakesɨ,” jawɨryide'na yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨ mena yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare dɨragɨnya'na, nabaai sahwai ayɨna bathevwinesɨ sarɨmɨ mena yawɨ'dɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nemɨ yaasɨwa' wajɨngyagaala sɨdu'nakebɨ' dɨnɨka mamɨdɨnyadaa gamɨre yagaala daza' mihɨzo. Aawaawa. Nemɨre tɨnnyarɨ Gotɨyare dɨragɨnya' maarakerɨ nemɨ tɨnna wanganorɨna. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ jalɨkurakɨvanɨgo.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Ganɨmaangei Gotɨyai sahwarɨne yaya' munyaba makida byaanna nawɨ'nya' wɨjaavaka gamɨre Sɨgunyavɨya byaanna naange' gamɨre maremwaalyaburɨne' savɨ mwaalakebadaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai dake yagaala datha' Jizaazarɨna yasaaba' “Dazai nɨmɨre Nyɨbwaalɨvaangelyɨ. Sahwarɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nɨvanɨ'. Sahwai yɨlaaya nyɨgaidelyɨ.”
Nemɨ gamɨjɨ mugunya nawɨ'nya' gɨrɨka maaya' savɨ ye'mwannemwaalona yagaaimaangwɨraaya daza' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ kinnɨgava' nemɨ kadɨka mena wɨ'nagovɨnera.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasaraavɨre yagaalya' dɨragɨnna naanna yawɨrama'daanyaine “Yo. Sa' naanga nebulyasɨ.” Nabaai sarɨmɨ kwaihɨlyɨ kumɨre yagaalya' dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨza', sa' naangesɨ. Mugunyavɨ tɨnna wangano sa' maalɨkesɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasaraavɨre yagaalya' wavɨla'nɨke' dɨ'baakei jɨhɨnyawɨ baaka wɨlalɨwarɨkeibɨsasɨ. Yɨ sa' kuna lɨwa'da yune Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yɨrɨkegaa'na. Sara yada yɨrɨkevakɨ bilyɨrɨ'de kaabwe' wannadevaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyai walaabathehaa' gamɨre byaanna sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ yuna wɨlayɨhɨthɨkaavadelyɨ.
Yagaala dazavɨne yawɨta sɨnnawɨnya' daresɨ. Nayaa yawɨranganna ja! “Gotɨyare Bukuyavɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaasaraavɨre yagaala gazasavɨ aaya kaavɨlyavɨna nennya yune sɨmunya gavengɨna mamɨdɨnaanna!”

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Kɨgaakuna a'mwe pwai gamɨre sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨyagaalya dakai mɨ'. Aawa. Kurya Tewaanyai a'mweraavɨ kadɨhaa'bwara' yagaala Gotɨyai wɨjaavaka sa a'mwe tewaanyara pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna yɨna yesangɨ. Sare'na Gotɨyare Kuryai negaimwadaawojɨ aaya kaavɨla sa' yawɨramaraade'nanyɨ.

Nabaai kɨgaakuna sagaa' Yɨzɨrelɨyara Gotɨyareraayaba Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya kwaasɨyara mwaalɨna. Sasare sabaaibɨ' kwaasɨ yagaala ja'ne wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta pwara sarɨmɨ kwaihɨrɨ mwaalɨna yɨhipɨ'dera. Sahwara kumɨrebwina lɨka yulya'dɨvɨ' “Nawɨ'nyainera. Kɨraazɨtɨyareina,” dadɨvɨ' kwaasɨ yagaala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakya'ne yawɨsa dɨpɨ'derera. Naangei kumɨre maremwaaidei kumɨnyɨ mubaka kwara kɨrɨ' sahwarɨna bule'na wɨjaavɨna yɨpɨ'derera. Nabaai sara yadɨvɨ' kumɨ sara kayaaka yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨma'nɨpɨ'derera.

Sahwara kwaasɨya' dadɨvɨ' gɨrɨkita'nanya yaasɨwa' avaanna wɨlamaryadaapɨjɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwara a'mwe kwalaalyara kumɨre kayaa'nanya sabura mɨdɨbɨ'derera. Sara yɨpɨ'deraavɨna a'mwe Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyara Naangere nebula nawɨ'nya sabwine tusavɨna bɨraiyagaala dɨpɨ'dere.

Kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakya dazara gɨlyɨvɨta pwaraavɨrengɨ wabarɨnna yadɨvɨta sarevɨ sarɨmɨre nɨgwianna “Mwagi'naana!” dadɨvɨ' kwaasɨ yagaala kwalaalya yɨhɨthɨpɨ'dere. Kɨrɨ' nabaai kɨgaakuna sasareraavɨna yawɨbwata ja'ne Gotɨyai mena yovɨrawakyaakelyɨ. Sahwaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakya'ne' se mwarika. Aawa. Sahwaraavɨna yemwaalɨka.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Mamaaya pwara kɨgaa' kayaa'na yaasaraavɨ, kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai mwanganakyaakere. Aawa. Yɨrorɨlyavɨ kalavuza marapweyɨrakakera mwalyaasara yɨrorɨla wana jɨhɨnyavɨ kuna mwaaiha'. Dahaa' kalavuzavɨ kuna mwaaleva yawɨbwasa'na yemwaaiha'. Sabaaibɨ' Gotɨyai kwaasɨyaraavɨ sara yadei midaaka!

Nabaai a'mwe sɨnnawɨnyara Gotɨyarɨ bule'na wɨjayaasaraavɨ sai mwanganakyaakere. Aawa. Aalyaaka naange' yɨma'naka kamaramɨlyaa' sarera aalya naangevɨ yɨwɨna yaa'. Kɨrɨ' Nowaai tewaanya yɨda'maraangebwina wɨjɨwakyaakerɨ Gotɨyai nayaa maremwaaina wiaakelyɨ. A'mwe ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara Nowaarenɨdakaavɨya sarerajɨ tewaanna mwaalɨna yaa'. Yɨ nabaai Gotɨyai sara yadei midaaka!

Sai Anga Sothomɨjɨ Anga Gomorajɨ sabanyaalyaraavɨre kayaa'na yadɨvɨsabwina sɨmunya jɨdayaakelyɨ. Anga naanga sabanyaai Gotɨyai dɨke' yɨra'na kyaa' yune kwaagɨsa'na warɨna. Sai sabanyaarɨ kayaa'nanya' sara karɨvɨkɨryaa' anga naanga sabanyaai yuna kayaaka yɨma'nyɨna yaa'. Sarevɨ nabaai dɨvi Gotɨyarɨna a'mwe bule'na wɨjaavɨpɨjara pwɨya sɨnnawɨnya daza'na yawɨrya'nesɨ. Sa' yawɨta dɨvidaa'nyɨ kumɨnyɨ yɨma'nade'na tɨnna wanganya'ne yaamɨjɨ sa' yaakesɨ. Yɨ nabaai Gotɨyai sara yadei midaaka!
Nabaai Gotɨyai a'mwe yɨda'maraanga Lotɨmɨ padaihasamaa'na kyaa' sai kayaaka minyaa'. Lotɨmɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyaraavɨre gɨrɨkita'nanya sabwina sɨmunya' taanginya winaryaakelyɨ.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. A'mwe yɨda'maraanga dazai sahwaraavɨ tɨnnyaba wɨlawɨmwalyaakei, kumɨre kayaa'nanya yadaapiya tɨnna wanganna yada yuya yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ kumɨre kayaakyagaala dadaapiya kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Gamɨre sɨmunya' yɨda'maraangebwina yadei, sai lɨka yɨwaainada gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ daanga wɨvɨdelyɨ kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨ galazekɨvala sabwi yadaapi. Kɨrɨ' nabaai Gotɨyai sara padaihasamaa'na yadei midaaka!

Yo, sara yada yaakevɨ a'mwe Gotɨyarɨ mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨ yɨjɨwaala pɨnɨ kwima'nojɨ yɨjɨwaala sabwi marasɨ'nya'na Naangei mena yawɨ'dei sara yannelyɨ. Padaihasamaarannelyɨ. Nabaai dahaakɨgaasɨ yɨrɨka yawɨbwarya'ne kɨgaasɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyaraavɨre sabwina kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨsa'najɨ mena yawɨ'delyɨ. Yɨ kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨsa'na sahwaraavɨ kuna dɨragɨnna marirakadelyɨ.

Tɨvɨkɨta naange' dareraavɨnesɨ. A'mwera munyɨ' dɨka yɨdade sabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨ' kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanya sabwi yadɨvɨsare. Sara yadɨvɨ' “Gotɨyare yagaalya'najɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨre yagaalya'najɨ yaasɨwa'nanyasɨra,” yawɨ'dɨvɨsare.
A'mwe kwaasɨ dadɨvɨta sahwara yɨ navɨka yɨbwaakadɨvɨ' yune kunnyabwina mɨdɨdɨvɨsare. Nabaai byaannaka kayaa'nanyaraavɨ bɨraiyagaala danganya'na lɨka maalɨka kɨrɨ' myadɨvɨsare.
Mamaayara dɨragɨnya naangejɨyara a'mwe dazaraavɨ wavɨla'dɨvɨsare. Kɨrɨ' sahwara Naangeryaba byaannakeraavɨ kotɨya wɨmaryadɨvɨ' bɨraiyagaala wɨdadɨvɨtara mɨ'.

A'mwe dazara yɨkurɨyaawiara yune kɨlaakejɨkɨna mɨdɨdɨvɨta saraavɨre sɨmumaaya kune sabɨsasɨyare. A'mwera yɨkurɨyaawiaraavɨ maa'dɨvɨ' tamakya'nera ganaange' maarakerabɨsare. Yɨ sahwara myawɨranganyadɨvɨsanna, sahɨnɨnna bɨraiyagaala dadɨvɨsare. Yɨkurɨyaawia bwia bura'devaaibɨ' a'mwe dazahwara kayaaka yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere.

Sahwara kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya yadɨvɨsaraavɨ kumɨre kayaa'nanyabwina kayaa'nanya daza wɨrɨvɨkɨradere. Sahwara yawɨ'na “Tɨka munne nyabulyɨ biyaaya kwalaalya nɨbainyabulyɨ sawɨta gavegaa' aala! Nemɨ nyɨlyagaa' sara yaana!” Sara yawɨ'na yadɨvɨ' sabwina yɨlaaya'na yadɨvɨsare. Sarɨmɨre tɨka munne sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannanadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨnyawɨ kwaasɨya sahwara gɨrɨkita'nanyara wɨlayɨhɨmwaaidɨvɨsare. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨwihwaaryabɨsare. Sarɨmɨnyawɨ sara yadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨnyɨ kumɨre kwaasɨya yadɨvɨta sabwina yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsare.

Kumɨre tɨnnyai yuyagaa' a'mwengɨ wangadɨvɨ' ata lɨmwangebwina ya'nera yawɨ'dɨvɨ' sarevɨ kayaa'na yabwina mwakwasakɨpɨ'dera mɨ'. Aawa nebulyasɨ. A'mwera kumɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya mwaryaderaavɨ wabwiwayagaala wɨdadɨvɨkɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' kayaa'na ya'neraavɨ makwodɨvɨkɨ. Pwaraavɨre gɨlyɨvɨsangɨ wabarɨnna yabwina sɨmunya mena maa'dɨvɨsara. Sare'na Gotɨyai yuna Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nadera mwaaihasara!

Tuta tewaanya yɨda'nanya sarɨkɨna bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨ' yaasɨwa' yɨraataatakaanya yamarivanɨgasa'na. Sahwara Beyomɨre kaimɨraayai Belaamɨmɨre tusarɨ' mɨdɨmanɨgasare. Sai kayaa'nanyabwi yade nɨgwɨtɨvɨkɨta savɨna yɨma'nya'na nawɨ'nyɨna wɨvu'nakelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' gamɨre kayaa'nanya' pari'mata yade sabwina maiyagaalya' yɨma'nyɨna. Jɨlɨkyaawarya dogiyara yagaala majadɨvɨsare. Kɨrɨ' Belaamɨmɨre dogiyai a'mweibɨ' yagaala dɨna yaka sahwarɨ maiyagaala wɨdɨna. Sasare sabwi, wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya dazai gamɨre yɨraataate yade dazabwi ayɨna ya'na dogiya dazai tusarɨ' kaanya tihɨ'na yaakelyɨ.

Kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta dazara aalɨyɨmɨnya pɨnɨ aalya mwalyuya saa'nya daa'devaaibɨsare. Nabaai kwaakewɨnne yɨraaya yɨhu'maanarya' tɨvɨpaidaa'nyɨ yɨwɨnama'na yadevaaibɨsare. Yɨ waryaanyara. Yaasɨwa'nanya wɨdadɨvɨsare. Sare'na Gotɨyai anga jɨhɨnyaanga naangeba mena yovɨrawaka'. Sahwara kayaa'nanya sahɨbanna wɨpɨ'dere.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mwe dazahwara kumɨnne yaya' jaka naanga dadɨvɨta sa' yaasɨwakebulyɨ. Yaasɨwa'na yadɨvɨ' kumɨre yagaala waryaanyabulyɨ. Sahwara a'mwe pwaraavɨ wabwiwayagaala wɨdadɨvɨ' kumɨre munyɨ' dɨka yɨdada kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanya yɨya sabwinajɨ dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya kɨlaakejɨkɨya kayaa'nanya sabwinajɨ sasare saburɨ a'mwe dazaraavɨ mwagi'namaata yɨvanɨga'. Wana dahaasagaa' dɨragɨnna malɨmwagyadɨvɨsaraavɨre kwaasɨya kayaa'nanyabwi mena yagalya'maveva Naangere tewaanyabwi gaai mɨdɨnna yɨvanɨgasaraavɨ.

A'mwe kwaasɨya wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta dazara yune naanga nebulya'na wɨja'na kwaasɨ dɨna “Sarɨmɨre yawɨta sabwi kayaa'nanya pɨnɨ yɨhɨthathɨvalade mɨ'. Kayaa'nanya sa yapɨjɨ kayaaka myɨma'nyɨ tewaanya kuna dɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨ.” Kɨrɨ' kumɨ sara kayaaka yɨnya'ne saburɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara mwaaidɨvɨkɨ. Yɨ dare'nanyɨ. Dɨragɨnya pɨnɨ a'mwerɨ mena wavɨlavojɨyangɨ, a'mwe dazai dɨragɨnya gamɨnyɨ wavɨlavaja sangɨna yaasɨwa'wawɨnyai mwaalɨna.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sahwara Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨre Naangei nevadaihasamaarya'nerɨ mena yawɨramaa'dɨvɨ' sɨduta yawɨta savɨna Kwaakevakɨ yuya gɨrɨkita'nanya warɨka sangɨ yagalya'ma'na. Nabaai aya saburɨ ayɨna lɨmwagapɨjɨ sa' wɨla yɨralɨmwaga'dori dara mwaaibɨ'dere. Aaya mudɨkegaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ malɨmwagyahaa' kayaa'na mwaalɨna. Kɨrɨ' dɨvi nabaai Naangerɨ yagalya'ma'na yɨpɨja' kayaa'nanya sabwi ayɨna maarapɨjɨ sagaa' wana kayaa'na mwaaibɨ'dere.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sahwara yɨda'maraanga saburɨne tusa' sɨmunya myawɨramaaryɨ yɨpɨjɨ kwajɨ tewaanya' dɨngaka! Dahaa' tuta sarɨkɨ mena yawɨrangadɨvɨta sara kɨwɨnya nawɨ'nyaanga dɨnɨka daza' maareva kɨrɨ' bule gɨnyɨra'dɨvɨsa' yɨ sa' kayaa'nanaangesɨ. Tɨvɨkɨta naangaange' maapɨ'dere.

Sahwaraavɨ yɨma'nɨvanɨka dazabwi, yagaaikɨwɨnya nebulya'na dɨnɨka pɨbwi dara dɨnɨ' “Jɨlɨkei gannya kwadaake' ayɨna yɨrɨ'mwannanyɨna. Nabaai yaawaryai aalya mena yɨnakei kwaaka ara'bunyabanya taaka yemannamarina.”

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, pɨkarya datha' ayawɨdaasɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna yɨda'mwesɨ. Pɨkarɨyɨkwia pɨrɨwaala dazawaarɨ sarɨmɨre sɨmunya yɨda'maraange' yɨdɨkavɨmwaaihya'ne' yɨhɨzaawesɨ. Yagaala da'na ayɨna jawɨryide'nanyɨ.

Kɨgaakuna Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwakyaata nawɨ'nyara dɨnɨkenna dɨvidaa'nyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨma'nya'nengɨna ayɨna jawɨrila! Nabaai Naangei nevadaihasamaarakerɨne kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' sarɨmɨre Nedasaabadeinaavɨre maangi' kadɨka wɨ'nesa' ayɨna jawɨrila!
Yagaala dazavɨne yawɨta sɨnnawɨnya' daresɨ. Yɨrɨka aayarɨkaavɨ a'mwe puri'nyarabɨ' bɨraiyagaala dadɨvɨsara yɨma'nyɨna yapɨjɨ kunnya sɨmunyavɨ dɨka widade kayaa'nanya sabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨ'

bɨraiyagaala dara dɨpɨ'dere “Sai yune naanga nebulya'na dake' ayɨna bathei dɨngaka! Sarei gawɨ mwaalɨka! Sai mabivanɨke'. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Ne sɨnnawɨnyara se balevegaa'daasɨ dahaakɨgaasɨ yuya sa sɨnnawɨ waryaakabaaibɨ' kuna warɨka Gotɨyai wakyaakegaa'daasɨ.”

“Sɨnnawɨ waryaakabaaibɨ' kuna warɨkeva,” ja kwaasɨya' dare'nanyɨ. Sahwara sɨmunya daza dɨragɨnna yawɨ'dɨvɨ' darevɨ kumɨre sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ yawɨrangadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Sare' kumɨnyɨna lɨka yulya'dɨ'nyɨ myawɨri. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Gotɨyai yagaalya' kajaa' sɨgunya' warɨna yaakesɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyare yagaala savɨ aalya' sara kyaa' Kwaakevakɨ aalyavɨ wɨlayɨma'nyɨna yaka aalyavɨ tɨnnyaba warɨna. Wakyaakegaa'.
Kɨrɨ' nabaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai yagaalya' kajaa' Kwaakevakɨ aalyaaka naange' yɨma'nyɨna kyaa' Kwaakeva' aalya savɨ kayaaka yɨma'nyɨna yaakevakɨ. Sare' myawɨri yɨvanɨga'.

Yune yagaala dazahɨrɨ' sɨgunyasɨ Kwaakevasɨ dahaa' warɨkewaarɨ yɨtavalɨmwagarɨ'. Sara yaka dɨke' yɨma'naabathehaa'na yemwaalɨ'. Yɨ Yɨrɨka Aayagaa' Gotɨyarɨna bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨsaraavɨ kotɨya' yawɨbwarya'na yɨtavalɨmwagarɨkesɨ. Sagaa' sahwara kayaaka yɨma'nɨpɨ'dehaa'nanyɨ.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, yawɨta pɨrɨ'na sɨmunya navɨka nyɨpɨdɨka! Naangere sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ yawɨ'manɨ' “Yɨrɨka gave pɨgaa'na kwarame waanɨ taawɨzanɨyabɨsasɨ (1,000). Kwarame waanɨ taawɨzanɨya daza yɨrɨka gave pɨgaa'bɨsangɨ.” Nemɨre yawɨ'na “Yɨrɨkerɨ' maalɨkegaakɨ. Kwarame waanɨ taawɨzanɨya saamɨnyagaakɨra.” Kɨrɨ' gamɨnyɨ aawa. Avaalyagaakɨra. Sare'na gamɨregaa' walaabathelyɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ Naangei yune naanga nebulya'na daka sa'na sai yɨma'nya'nei kave kave mivanɨ'. Sarevɨna a'mwe pwara yawɨ'dɨvɨtabaaibɨ' kave kave sabwina mivanɨ'. Aawa. Sai yawɨ'na “A'mwe kwaala pwai nyɨwawodɨka!” Aawa. Sai dɨna “A'mwe yuyara sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaapɨka! Nyɨlɨmwabɨka!” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨna yawɨ'da sai kuna yemwaalɨ'.

Sai yawɨbwarya'nei walaabozɨ kɨrɨ' Naangerɨne Yɨrɨkegaa' a'mwe kuka ya'nei badevaaibɨ' yɨma'nadehaakɨ. Yɨrɨka sarɨkɨ sagaa' sɨgunya' yɨ'munya naanga pilojɨ yɨwɨnama'na yadesɨ. Sahɨba nyɨlyalyɨ lawelyɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyajɨ sa dɨke' nasɨ'na kyojɨ aalya'bɨ' yɨma'nyɨna, yɨwɨna yadengɨ. Yuya kwaaka kɨvakɨ warɨka sajɨ sahɨvakɨ yadɨvɨta sajɨ yuya sa Gotɨyai ku'maayaba marima'naabathengɨ.
Yuya sasare sa aalya'bɨta mena sara yɨma'nadenna gatha'dareihi mwaaibɨneihɨlaka! Sarɨmɨ tewaanyaburɨna yamaryadɨvɨ' Gotɨyare yuya sabwi nayaa dɨmɨdɨnyɨla!

Sasare saburɨ Gotɨyare Yɨrɨka sagaa'na nayaa yemwaaidɨvɨ' yɨ Yɨrɨka Naanga sagaa' yaraina yɨma'nade'na sarɨmɨ Naangere wawɨnya dɨragɨnna nayaa jɨla! Naanga Yɨrɨka dazagaa' sɨgunya' dɨka nasɨ'na yadesɨ. Dɨkwara'munanga naange' gamɨre yuya warɨka saba sa dɨka nasɨ'nojɨ aalya'bɨ' yɨma'nadengɨ.
Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai yune naanga nebulya'na mena jaakevɨ sɨgunya mudɨkevasɨ kwaaka mudɨkevasɨ sawaarɨna yemwaaiho. Sahɨba yune yɨda'maraangebwina waradevera.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dazanna yemwaaidɨvɨ' Naangerɨne nayaa dɨragɨnna yadɨvɨ' nawɨ'nya yɨda'na mwaaidɨvɨ' Naangegaa' Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ yɨwetawakya pɨnɨjɨyaihi namwaaibɨthɨka! Sipɨzipɨya yɨwihwaarya maayara gɨrɨkita'nanya maayarabɨsaihi dɨmwaalyɨla! Nabaai sarɨmɨ Gotɨyalyɨ avaaizɨmunya'na dɨmwaalyɨla! Gotɨyare kwaamusaburɨ dɨmwaalyɨla! Sarɨmɨ nawɨ'nya kuna sara mwaaidapi dɨvi Gotɨyai yɨhwanganadelyɨra.

Naangei nemɨnyɨ kave neyada kuna yemwaalɨ'. Sare'na nayaa dara jawɨrila! “Sasare sabwi a'mwe kwainaavɨ kuna nevadaihasamaaradevwina.” Gotɨyai sɨmunya tewaanya' kujaava' nemɨre neya'mwerɨna tewaanya nevu'nadei Polɨ sai kwalyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna pɨkarya avaala sahɨbaaibɨ'na yɨdavakelyɨ.

Yo, gamɨre pɨkarɨyɨkwia yuyangɨ, dazahɨnɨnna dadelyɨ. Nabaai yagaala pɨnɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwia dazangɨ warɨke nayaa yawɨramaarya'na yagɨyagɨ wawɨnyasɨ. A'mwera sɨduta maayara kumɨre sɨmunya dɨragɨnya mwaryadesɨyara Polɨmɨre yagaala daza mariwɨnakadɨvɨ' Gotɨyare Bukuyavɨya yagaala yuya pɨnɨngɨjɨ mariwɨnakadɨvɨtabaaibɨsasɨ. Nabaai sasare sara yadɨvɨ' kumɨ dazahwara kayaaka yɨgainya'nerera.

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, sɨnnawɨ mi'na yɨhɨthɨwe'na yuya dazanna mena yawɨ'dɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Mi'na yɨhɨthɨwe yuya sasarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ saihi mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! A'mwe kɨwɨnya galazekɨvaidɨvɨsaraavɨre kwaasɨ yagaalya sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmwagi'nadaawori sarɨmɨ nebulyavɨ dɨragɨnna madaayɨ nyɨpɨka! Nalaraawɨpɨka!

Aawa. Sarɨmɨ Naangere yanga gaimwanga naangevɨ dɨmwaalyɨla! Sahwai nemɨre Naangei, nevadaihasamaa'dei, Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ. Sarerɨ yanga gaimwanga dazavɨjɨ sahwarɨ sɨmunya yawɨramaarya'nevɨjɨ dɨragɨnna dɨvada'galedaayɨla! Sarevɨ sarɨmɨ yanga naanga daza' ayɨna pɨnɨjɨ kuna naanna dɨmaaryɨla! Sara yadɨvɨ' sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ yawɨta sɨmunyabwi kwalaalya kuna dɨmaaryɨla! Dahaasɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne yɨrɨkesɨ gamɨre yaya' munyaba makɨlaana! Sai byaannakelyɨ. Sarei yuyagaa' yuyagaa' kuna naanga mwaalana!

Darei sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Kwaaka dava' mima'nyawɨ aayawɨdaa'nyɨ mwalyaakerɨnesɨ. Sarerɨ Nedasaabadeina wɨmɨdɨnoi kadɨka wɨ'norɨna. Sarerɨ nemɨre tɨnna wanganorɨna. Sarerɨ yawɨranganorɨna. Sarerɨ nemɨre asa mwanganorɨna. Sahwai Gotɨyare Yagaalyai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyarɨnesɨ.

Gaalyaburɨ aaya kaavɨla dazahwai ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabɨna kya' nemɨ tɨnna wanganorɨna. Tɨnna wangano'na nayaa jalɨkurakadaa yɨhɨthadaanyɨ. Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyaburɨ aaya kaavɨlyai kɨgaakuna Nɨmwalyɨ ye'mwannamwalyaakelyɨ. Sare sai ku'maayaba neyɨjɨwainnadaa'nyɨ sarɨ tɨnna wanganorɨna.

Sahwarɨ tɨnna wanganona kadɨka wɨ'no sarɨna sarɨmɨnyɨjɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. “Nemɨjɨ avaaizɨmunya ye'mwannamwalaana!” dona yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Nabaai nemɨre ye'mwannamwaalya' daresɨ. Nɨmwalyɨ gamɨre Gawaalɨ' Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ nemɨ avaaizɨmunya ye'mwannamwaaihoinera.
“Avaaizɨmunya ye'mwannamwaalya'nevɨna yɨlaaya naanga yunebanna newarana!” dona yagaala daza' yɨda'manɨgo.
Yagaala da' Kɨraazɨtɨyai kaneda' kadɨka wɨ'nona yɨhɨthɨvanɨgo. Sa' daresɨ. Gotɨyai baakevɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sahwarɨ jɨhɨnya maalɨka aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' muwarikelyɨ.
Sare'na jɨhɨnyavɨ kayaa'na mwaidaa kwaasɨ daaza' “Sahwalyɨ avaaizɨmunya ye'mwannamwaaiheinyɨ,” kwaasɨ yagaala dadaa yagaala nebwina ja'neburɨ mivanɨgo.

Aawa. Baakevɨ tewaanna mwaaidevaaibɨ' baakevɨ tewaanna mwalaaja'na Kɨraazɨtɨyare pwarajɨ avaaizɨmunya je'mwannamwaaiho. Nabaai tewaanna mwalaaja'na Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei Jizaazare tawevɨ nemɨre kayaa'nanya yuyabwi nemarasɨ'nada tawe sahɨrɨ' gɨrɨka neduimwagasɨ'nade'nanyɨ.
Nemɨ dɨnyɨna “Nɨmɨ kayaa'nanyabwi maayainyɨra,” dɨnaaja' sɨmunyangɨ kwaasɨ yawɨ'daanyainera. Sarevɨ nebulya' nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ wɨlanewa'de' mɨ'.

Nemɨre kayaa'nanyanna jalɨkurakɨnaaja' Gotɨyai “Kumɨre kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nɨma! Kumɨre gɨrɨkita'nanya yuya, yɨ yɨda'maraangebwi maaya yuyabwi duimwagasɨ'nɨma!” dozɨ “Kayaa'nanya marasɨ'nɨdeinyɨ,” dɨnɨke'na nayaa lɨmwannɨkei, yɨda'maraangei mwaalɨkei sara yadelyɨ.

Nabaai Gotɨyai nedɨnɨ' “Yuyaihi kayaa'nanya yɨgasaihɨlyɨ.” Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨ “Kayaa'nanya migeinyɨ,” dɨnaaja' Gotɨyarɨna dɨna “Sahwai kwaasɨ yagaala dadelyɨ.” Nemɨ kwaasɨ sara daaza' gamɨre yagaalya' nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ wɨlanewa'de' mɨ'.

Nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya maalɨkeihi, yagaala daza' pɨkarya yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe. Sarɨmɨ kayaa'nanya mipɨne'na “Wɨjɨwaakɨma!” dena yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe. Sare' kɨrɨ' a'mwe pwai kwai kayaa'nanya' yaja' nemɨnyɨne kayaa'nanyanna Nɨmwarɨ marewɨdadei mwaalɨ'. Sahwai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai yɨda'maraangelyɨ.
Sarei nemɨre kayaa'nanyanna Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'devwi mubamarasɨ'nya'nei balakelyɨ. Nemɨrenna gavenna mɨ'. Aawa. Kwaaka yuya davakɨyaraavɨne kayaa'nanyannanyɨra.
Naangere kɨwɨnyanna mɨdɨnaaja da'na nebulya'na nayaa dara yawɨ'daanyɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nayaa yawɨ'manɨgo. Sahwareinera.”

Nabaai pwai dɨna “Nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nayaa yawɨ'dɨnyainyɨ.” Dɨna yaja' kɨrɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyare kɨwɨnyanna mamɨdɨnya dazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna kwaasɨ yagaala dadelyɨ. Gotɨyare nebulya' gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ wɨlawa'de' mɨ'.

Aawa. A'mwe gazaizai gamɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨdere sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna Gotɨyare yɨlaaya wia'nebwi wɨlawa'devulyɨ. A'mwe pwai dɨna “Nɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaihe.” Dɨna yadei nabaai sahwai mwaalakabaaibɨ' sara mwaalana! Sara yade darevɨ nebulya'na nayaa dara yawɨ'daanyɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlamwaalɨ'.”
Nyɨvu'nadeihi, kɨwɨnya mudɨke' pɨkarya yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe' mɨ'. Aawa. Kɨwɨnya aya' sɨnnawɨ sagaa' dɨnɨke' sarɨmɨ maaresasɨ. Naangerɨ lɨmwagesagaa' yagaala daza' mena kadɨka wɨ'nesasɨ.

Kɨrɨ' kɨwɨnya sa' mudɨke' pɨkarya yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhesɨ. Sabwina Kɨraazɨtɨyai mwaalya tewaanyabulyɨ sarɨmɨ mwaalya tewaanyabulyɨ yawɨrangadaa dara dadaanyɨ “Kɨwɨnya sa' nebulyasɨ.” Nabaai dara dadaanyɨ “Yɨthaanyi, Kɨraazɨtɨyare baaka nebulya' mena wannadaa'nyɨ jɨhɨnya' yɨmaanɨvanɨ'.”
Pwai “Nɨmɨ baakevɨ mwaaiheinyɨ,” dɨna yada kɨrɨ' gannya gya'mwerɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'daa'nyɨ yɨ a'mwe dazai jɨhɨnyavɨ kuna mwaalɨkegaa'nanyɨ.
Pwai gannya gya'mwerɨna kale wiadei dazai baakevɨ mwaaidelyɨ. Sahwai tewaanna yada baakevɨ pwai midɨhwakɨ'nariwakabaaibɨ' kayaa'nanya myada kayaaka migalyadelyɨ.
Aawa. Gannya gya'mwerɨna sɨnna tɨka wɨda'dei jɨhɨnyavɨ mwaaida jɨhɨnyavɨ yamaryadelyɨ. Jɨhɨnya' gamɨre tɨnnyaraarɨ mena wɨjɨnnamaaraja'na tusavɨna yɨraataatakaanya wodelyɨ.
Nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya maalɨkeihi, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna (gamɨre yayavɨna) Gotɨyai sarɨmɨre kayaa'nanya mena marasɨ'nake'na yagaala da' pɨkarya yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe'nanyɨ.

Nɨmwaravaavihi, sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna aayawɨdaa'nyɨ Naangei mwaaida kuna mwaalɨkerɨ nayaa yawɨrangamwaasa'na yagaala da' yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe. Mɨgɨnyaihi, Kayaa'nanaangei Saataanɨmɨ mena dathɨwamwaasa'na yagaala da' yɨhithawasɨvanaabɨhe.

Kaimɨraayamɨlɨki, Nɨmwarɨ nayaa yawɨrangamwaasa'na yagaala da' yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Nɨmwaravaavihi, sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna aayawɨdaa'nyɨ mwaaida kuna mwaalɨkerɨ nayaa yawɨrangamwaasa'na yagaala da' yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Mɨgɨnyaihi, dɨragɨnyaihi mwaaidɨvɨ' Gotɨyare yagaalya' sarɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ yuna wɨlayɨhɨmwaaidɨ'nyɨ Kayaa'nanaangerɨ mena dathɨwamwaasanna yagaala da' yɨhithawasɨwaabe.
Kwaakevakɨya sabwina mihɨvu'nannera! Nabaai Kwaakevakɨya sanna mihɨvu'nannera! A'mwe pwai kwai Kwaakevakɨya sabwina wɨvu'najai gannya sɨmunyavɨ Nɨmwarɨna nayaa wɨvu'nya'ne' mularikelyɨ.

Kwaakevakɨya yuyanna, kɨlaakevɨne dɨka widadevulyɨ a'mwera tɨnna wangadɨvɨsanna “Maa'mujainyɨ,” yawɨ'dɨvɨsasɨ kunnya yaya munyaba makinadɨvɨtara “Gɨlyɨvɨsanna nɨmeinyɨra,” yawɨ'dɨvɨsasɨ yuya sazanna Gotɨyaryabadaa'nya mɨ'. Aawa. Kwaakevakɨya saburɨdaa'nyangɨra.
Kwaakevakɨya sabwi mena yɨmaanyɨna yɨvanɨkebulyɨ. Dɨka widade sabulyɨ mena yɨmaanyɨna yɨvanɨkebulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyare sɨmunyabwi mɨdɨnajai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaalagothelyɨ.

Kaimɨraayaihi aayagaa'ne' aya kɨba warɨkegaakɨ. Kɨgaa' dara wɨ'nesaihɨlyɨ “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne Yɨkamaangei yɨma'naabathelyɨ.” Sara wɨ'netabaaibɨ' dahaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yɨkamaanga kwalaalyara mena yɨma'nɨwaa'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yawɨ'mwo “Aayagaa' aya kɨba yɨma'nɨwakegaakɨ.”

Yɨkamaanga sahwara mena neyagalya'ma'mwaa'. Sarera nemɨrera mɨka! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Nemɨrera nebwina mwaaibɨzɨ kwajɨ nemɨjɨ kuna ye'mwannemwaaina kipɨdɨka! Kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna “ ‘A'mwe yuya dazara nemɨrera mɨ',’ yawɨpɨka!” kada' mena neyagalya'ma'mwaa'.
Sarɨmɨ yɨkamaangerabɨsaihi mɨ'. Saihɨre sɨmunyangɨ Gotɨyare Kuryai wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨke'na yuyaihi nebulya' sɨmunnakeihɨlyɨ.
Sare' sarɨmɨ nebulya' myawɨrivanɨgasa'na pɨkarya da' midayɨwa. Aawa. Saihi nebulya' yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'na yɨda'mwa. Nabaai “Kwaasɨ yagaalya' nebulyavɨdaa'nya' mɨka!” yawɨ'dɨvɨsa'na yɨda'mwa.

A'mwe kwaasɨ yagaala dadei aaihwalaka? A'mwe dazai yɨ, dara dadelyɨ “Jizaazarɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka maryasaabakei mɨka! Kɨraazɨtɨyai mɨka!” Yɨ dazai kwaasɨ yagaala dadelyɨ. Sara dade'na Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yɨkamaangelyɨ. Sara dadei Nɨmwarɨnajɨ Gawaalɨkɨnajɨ “Aala!” yawɨ'delyɨ.

Gazaizai Gawaalɨkɨna “Aala!” yawɨrajai Nɨmwai kwarɨnajɨ “Aala!” yawɨ'delyɨ. Nɨmwalyɨyai mɨka! Pwai a'mweraayaba Gawaalɨkɨna “Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka maryasaabakelyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨra,” dazai Nɨmwalyɨ Gawaalɨsɨ saraalyɨyalyɨra.

Saihi yagaala sɨnnawɨ sagaa' kadɨka wɨ'neve daza sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ kuna wɨlayɨhwarana! Sɨnnawɨ kadɨka wɨ'neve daza sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ kuna wɨlayɨhwaraja sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gawaalɨkɨjɨ Nɨmwarɨjɨ kuna dulawɨmwaalyideihɨlyɨra.
Nabaai dare' Kɨraazɨtɨyai yagaala yune naanga nebulya'na dara neda' “Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi yɨhɨzaavɨdeihɨlyɨ.”
Kwaasɨ yɨhɨthɨpɨjaraavɨna pɨkarya daza yɨda'mwengɨ.

Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyai gannya Kurya Tewaanyarɨ kulayɨhɨmwaaiha' kuna wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨ'. A'mwe pwara mihiwɨrivanɨga'. Myɨhɨgainyadeihɨlyɨ. Aawa. Sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ Kurya Tewaanyai wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨkei yuyanna yɨhiwɨrivanɨ'. Kurya dazahwai yɨhiwɨrivanɨke' nebulyasɨ. Kwaasɨ yagaalya' mɨ'. Kuryai wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨkei yɨhiwɨryakabaaibɨ' Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kuna dulamwaalyɨla! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sara jɨla!

Sarevɨ kaimɨraaya maalɨkeihi kuna dulamwaalyɨla! Sahwai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathehaa' “Gamɨnyaba dɨragɨnna davaana!” dapi Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ kuna dulamwaalyɨla! Yɨ'mavaabathevɨ gamɨnyɨna lɨka myadaa wagɨla mamaryadaa magwamwannaanne'na sahwarɨ kuna dulamwaalyɨla!
“Sahwai yɨda'maraangelyɨ,” yawɨ'dɨvɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ “Gazaizai yɨda'maraangebwina yajai Gotɨyare kaimɨraayai mwaalɨkelyɨ,” yawɨrangabɨneihɨlyɨra.

Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmwai nemɨnyɨne kale naanga wiwakelyɨ. “ ‘Nɨmɨre kaimɨraayara,’ dɨma!” daka Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwadaanyainaavɨna kale naanga wideine. “Gotɨyainyɨre kaimɨraayarera,” dake' nebulyasɨ. Gamɨre kaimɨraayainera. A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyabwinera Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna myawɨryesavɨna “Gamɨre kaimɨraayarera,” maneyawɨrivanɨga'.

Nyɨvu'nadeihi, dahaa' nemɨ Gotɨyare kaimɨraayaine. Dɨvi nemɨ bewarabɨsaina yɨma'nabaatheinaavaka? Sa' myawɨranganyaine. Kɨrɨ' nemɨ dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Dɨvi sagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyai ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathehaa' gamɨ sahwaibɨ' yɨma'naadeine. Sagaa' dara wanganaadesɨ. Ai, Kɨraazɨtɨyai sasarei daaka! Sara Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ nayaa yawɨranganawaajɨya'na sahwaibɨ' yɨma'naadeine.
Nabaai sai tewaanyai gɨrɨkita'nanya maayai mwaalɨkabaaibɨ' a'mwe gazaizai sahwarɨna sara yemwaalɨkei Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna tewaanyai yɨma'nɨvanɨkelyɨ.
Gazaizai kayaa'nanyabwi yadei, Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' galazekɨvaidelyɨ. Kayaa'nanya sabwi kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' galazekɨvalyabulyɨ.
Nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. “Sai kayaa'nanyabwi makwawana!” kada' sahwarɨ wɨjɨwaainakelyɨ. Sahwarɨ kayaa'nanyabwi yuna muwarikelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwarɨ gazaizai wɨlamwaaidei kayaa'nanya sabwi yadei mɨ'. Gazaizai kayaa'nanyabwi yadei sahwarɨ yawɨranganna yɨkei mɨ'. Sarɨna sɨmunnakei mɨ'.

Nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya maalɨkeihi, aane pwai kwai sarɨmɨre sɨmunyangɨ kwaasɨ nabayɨhɨthathɨka! Mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Yɨda'maraangebwina yadei sai yɨda'maraangelyɨ. Sahwai yɨda'maraangei mwaalɨkabaaibɨ' sai yɨda'maraangelyɨ.

Kayaa'nanyabwina yadei Kotɨya Maryaderelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Kotɨya Maryadei kayaa'nanyabwi yɨke'na Saataanɨmɨrebwina kayaa'nanyabwi avaaina yadei Saataanɨmɨrelyɨ. “Kotɨya Maryadei Saataanɨ kayaa'nanya yadengɨ kayaaka yɨgalasɨ'nɨma!” daka Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei ku'maayabanna walaabakelyɨ.

Gazaizai Gotɨyarei yɨma'najai kayaa'nanyabwina yadei mɨ'. Gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ Gotɨyare mwaalyabwi wɨlamwaalɨke'na sahwai kayaa'nanyabwina yadei mɨ'. Gotɨyarei mwaalɨke'na sahwai kayaa'nanyabwina kuna yannei mɨ'.

Nabaai yawɨranganaaja' “Gotɨyarei aaihwai dɨngaka? Kotɨya Maryaderei aaihwai dɨngaka?” nemɨ dara yawɨraade'nanyɨ “Gazaizai yɨda'maraangebwi mi yajai sai Gotɨyarei mɨ'. Nabaai gya'mwerɨna tewaanya kale mwiadei sai kwai Gotɨyarei mɨka!”
Sɨnnawɨ aayawɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ yagaalya' kadɨka dara wɨ'nesa'nanyɨ “Neya'mweraavɨna tewaanya kale neyadeine.

Kenɨbɨ' mamwalaannera!” Sai Kayaa'nanyarei mwaalaka gannya gahwaalaangerɨ tamakyaakelyɨ. Be'na tamakyaakalaka? Sarei kayaa'nanya' yadaa'nyɨ gahwaalaangei yɨda'maraange' yaake'na sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaina kyaa' tamakyaake'nanyɨ.
Nya'mweihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sarɨmɨ yɨda'maraangebwi yɨvanɨgasa'na Kenɨbɨtara a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyabwinera sarɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaalɨke'na atɨka mamaru'napɨna!

Nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Neya'mweraavɨna kale neyɨvanɨke'na dara yawɨ'manɨgo. Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nya'ne sabwi mena baryabwi yagalya'ma'mwona. Sara yona gaala saburɨ mena wɨlamwaaiho. Kale mwivanɨkei Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nya'neburɨ barya saburɨ kuna wɨlamwaalɨ'.
Gazaizai gya'mwerɨna sɨmɨlɨka widei sahwai a'mweraavɨ tamakadelyɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨ yawɨ'manɨga' “A'mwei pwaraavɨ tamakadei gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalyabwi wɨwa'dei mɨ'.”

Kale wia'nevɨne kaavɨlya' yawɨ'mwo daresɨ. Sai gannya mwaalyabwi yagalya'mavakelyɨ nemɨnyɨneba. Sarevɨ nemɨnyɨna kale wia'nebwina yawɨ'manɨgo. Nabaai sarevɨ nemɨ kwainajɨ neya'mweraavɨneba nennya mwaalyabwi yagalya'mavaanneinera.

Sare' kɨrɨ' pwai Kwaaka davakɨya mwaalya'ne kɨnɨnnakei mwaalajai nabaai gya'mwerɨ wɨmudasadaawori tɨnna wanganna yojɨ kɨrɨ' gya'mwerɨna sɨmunya' tihɨ'na yojɨ sahware sɨmunyavɨ Gotɨyarɨne kale wia'ne' gara wɨwarɨka!

Nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya maalɨkeihi, kale wia'ne'na neya'mweraavɨ yune yagaalyanna nudaathɨka! Yune maangi'na nudaathɨka! Aawa. Nemɨnyɨ kale neyadaawori sahwaraavɨ tewaanna yadaa wɨgaimwagaana! Nebwina wɨgaimwagaana! Wɨmudaasɨvanɨke duzaayɨla!
Sareina kale wia'neina sasare saburɨ yawɨraade “Nebulyavɨdaa'nyainyɨ. Gotɨyaryaba nɨmɨre sɨmunya' kavena waradeinyɨ. Nɨmɨre kayaa'nanyanna myawɨrivanɨgeinyɨ.”

Sa' dare'nanyɨ. Nemɨre kayaa'nanya mena marasɨ'nyagaa' nemɨre sɨmunyangɨ “Nɨmɨ kuna kayaa'nanyainyɨ,” yarai kwaasɨ yawɨraajahaa' Gotɨyai yuyangɨna yawɨrangadei nemɨre sɨmunya wavɨlawakadei yawɨ'na “Gɨmɨre kayaa'nanya sa' mi'na marasɨ'neneinyɨ.” “Marasɨ'neneinyɨ,” sara yawɨ'na yade'na nemɨre kayaa'nanyanna myawɨraanneine. Nemɨre sɨmunya kavena waradesɨ. Nabaai sara yawɨ'de'na “Nebulyavɨdaa'nyaine,” yawɨraadeine.
Nyɨvu'nadeihi, sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nemɨre sɨmunya kayaa'nanya sanna myawɨri yaaja' Gotɨyarɨna dɨragɨnna da'daanyɨ.
Nabaai gamɨre kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke kuna mɨdɨdaa yɨlaaya wɨvu'nadenna yadaanya'na yuya pɨnɨnna yɨdanganaaja' sahwai wɨjaavɨna neyadelyɨ.
Gamɨre kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' daresɨ. Nyɨbwaalɨvaangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ lɨmwabɨzaihɨlyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai sara yɨhɨthakabaaibɨ' “Sarɨmɨnyɨ pwara pwaraavɨna kale yɨhyana!” sara jɨla!

Nabaai gamɨre kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke mɨdɨmanɨkei Gotɨyarɨ kuna wɨlawɨmwaaidelyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyai a'mwe sahwarɨ kuna wɨlawɨmwaaidelyɨ. Gotɨyai gannya Kuryai nejaavake'na Kuryai neyɨbwarɨdaakwada da'na yawɨ'daanyɨ “Gotɨyai wɨlanemwaalɨkelyɨ.”

Nyɨvu'nadeihi, a'mwe kwalaalyara kwaasɨ dadɨvɨ' “Gotɨyare Kuryai sɨmunyavɨ nyɨdada yɨhɨzɨwaakɨvanɨgeinyɨ.” Sara dadɨvɨ' Kwaakevakɨ walyuna yadɨvɨ' yaasɨwa'na kwaasɨ wɨjɨwakamarivanɨgasavɨdaa'nyɨ yuyara “Kuryai kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ,” yɨhɨthadɨvɨsaraavɨ yaasɨwa'na malɨmwabɨna! Aawa. “Gotɨyai gannya Kuryarɨ wɨjaavakei dɨngaka? Kuryarɨ mujaayakei dɨngaka?” dapɨjɨ kumɨre kurya sahwaraavɨ yaamɨjɨ jawɨbwarila!
Yawɨbwata sare' daresɨ. “Gotɨyare Kuryai kɨnɨnnakei daaka?” dapɨjɨ dara jawɨranganyide. “Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai kɨlaa'nakei yɨma'naabakelyɨ,” jalɨkurakadei yɨ sahwai Gotɨyare Kuryai kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.

Gazaizai Jizaazai kɨlaa'nakerɨna sara majalɨkurakivanɨkei Gotɨyare Kuryai kɨnɨnnakei mɨ'. Sahwai yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne Yɨkamaangerelyɨ. Mi'na dara wɨ'nadɨvɨ' “Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne Yɨkamaangei yɨma'naabathelyɨ.” Dahaa' yɨmakei kɨnɨnnakera kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨtara mena mwaaleva Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ Yɨkamaangere sɨmunya yawɨ'dɨvɨsare.

Nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya maalɨkeihi, sarɨmɨ Gotɨyareihɨlyɨ. Kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta sahwaraavɨ sarɨmɨ mena dathɨwamwaava. Kuryai wɨlayɨhɨmwaalɨka dazai a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyabwineraavɨ Kayaa'nanyai wɨlamwaalɨkerɨ wavɨlavɨkelyɨ. Sare'na wavɨlavɨkere dɨragɨnya' maareva mena dathɨwamwaava.
Kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta sahwara Kwaaka dazavakɨyabwineraavɨrerera. Sarevɨ kumɨre yagaalya' yune Kwaaka savakɨyabwinesɨ. A'mwe Kwaaka savakɨyabwinera yagaala sa' kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨsare.

Nemɨ Gotɨyareinera. Gotɨyarɨ yawɨrangadei dazai kadɨka newɨ'nadelyɨ. Gotɨyarei mamwaalyɨkei kadɨka newɨ'nadei mɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ dare' yawɨ'daanyɨ “Newɨ'nadei sahwai Nebulya'ne Kuryai kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Manewɨ'nyadei sahwai Kwaasɨ Dadei Kayaa'nanyai kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.”
Nyɨvu'nadeihi, kale wia'nebwi Gotɨyarɨdaa'nya'na nemɨnyɨ pwaraavɨna kale neyana! Gazaizai gya'mweraavɨna kale wiadei sai Gotɨyarei mwaalɨkelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ nebulyava'na yawɨrangadelyɨ.
Kale mwia'nei Gotɨyarɨ myawɨranganyɨkelyɨ. Gotɨyai, kale wia'neburɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sare'na sai Gotɨyarɨ myawɨranganyɨkelyɨ.

Gotɨyai yawɨ'na “Nyɨbwaalɨkɨna a'mwera gaalyabwina mwaaibɨka!” daka gannya Gawaalɨvaangei gave pwainanyarɨ Kwaakevakɨna maryasaabɨna yakelyɨ. Sarevɨ dare' yawɨ'daanyɨ “Ai, Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna kale naanga wike' ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabakesɨ.”

Kale naanga wia'nebwi da'darebwinanyɨ. Nemɨnyɨ Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya nevu'nadevwi mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwai nemɨnyɨna kale naanga kwia' nemɨre kayaa'nanyanna Gawaalɨ' Gotɨyarɨ sɨnna tɨka wɨda'devwi mubamarasɨ'nya'nei balya'nerɨ maryasaabakebulyɨ.
Nyɨvu'nadeihi, Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna kale naanga sara wiakevɨdaa'nyɨ nabaai saina neya'mweraavɨna pwai pwarɨna kale neyanneine.

Gotɨyarɨ tɨnna wangadei a'mwei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Sare' kɨrɨ' saina neya'mweraavɨna pwai pwarɨna kale neyajainaavɨ Gotɨyai kuna wɨlanemwaalɨkelyɨ. Nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna gamɨre kale naanga wia'nebwi naanga yune nebulya'nanyabwi wɨlanewa'devulyɨ.
Gannya Kuryarɨ nejaavɨke'na dare' yawɨ'daanyɨ “Sahwarɨ kuna wɨlamwaaiho. Nemɨnyɨ kuna wɨlanemwaalɨ'.” Yɨ sasarevɨnyɨ.
Nemɨ sahwaina tɨnna wanganɨbainona jalɨkurakɨvanɨgo. Nɨmwai Gawaalɨvaangerɨ maryasaabakelyɨ Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨne padaihasamaa'derɨ.
Gazaizai jalɨkurakɨna “Jizaazai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨ,” yɨ sara jalɨkurakɨna yajarɨ Gotɨyai kuna wɨlamwaalɨ'. Nabaai Gotɨyarɨ sahwai kuna wɨlamwaalɨ'.
Sare'na yawɨralɨmwadaanyɨ “Gotɨyai kale naanga nemɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna wiadelyɨ.”
Gotɨyai kale wia'neburɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Kale wia'neburɨ wɨlamwaalɨkei Gotɨyarɨ wɨlamwaalɨkelyɨ. Nabaai sahwarɨ Gotɨyai wɨlamwaalɨkelyɨ.

Nemɨnyɨna “Wɨrɨvɨkɨrya'ne naangegaa' yɨrɨka sarɨkɨ kumɨ lɨka myadɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna daapɨka!” daka nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna Gotɨyare kale naanga wia'nebwi naanga yune nebulya'na wɨlanewa'de'nanyɨ. Kɨraazɨtɨyai Gotɨyarɨ wɨlamwaalɨkabaaibɨ' Kwaaka davakɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨlamwaaiho'na lɨka myadaa dɨragɨnna davaadeinera.

Gotɨyarɨ kale wia'neburɨ lɨka myadaanyɨ. Aawa. Kale mena wia'nebwi nemɨre sɨmunyavɨ naanga yune nebulya'na wɨlanewa'de' lɨka ya saburɨ marasɨ'desɨ. Lɨka ya'ne kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Nɨmɨre kayaa'nanyanna nyɨrɨvɨkɨrade'na lɨka yɨwana! Sarei lɨka yadere sɨmunyavɨ yunebanna Gotɨyare kale naanga wia'nebwi naanga yune nebulya'na mularyade'nanyɨ.
Sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna kale naanga wike'na nemɨ tewaanya nevu'nadeine.

A'mwe pwai kwai wɨdɨna “Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeinyɨ,” dazai nabaai gya'mwerɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaalɨkei kwaasɨ yagaala dadelyɨ. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwai gya'mwerɨ tɨnna wangaderɨna kale mwivanɨkei Gotɨyarɨ tɨnna mwanganyaderɨna tewaanya gara wɨvu'nannelaka!
Kɨwɨnya dɨnɨka da' Kɨraazɨtɨyai dare' neda' “Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nadei gya'mwe kwarɨnajɨ kale wiana!”
Gazaizai “Jizaazai sahwai Gotɨyai dahɨlakaka maryasaabakei Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ,” lɨmwadei dazai Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyalyɨ. Nabaai gazaizai ganɨmaangerɨna wɨvu'nadei gamɨre kaimɨraayarɨna wɨvu'nadelyɨ.
Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya nevu'najaina gamɨre kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke mɨdɨdaanya'na dare' yawɨ'daanyɨ “Sareina Gotɨyare kaimɨraayaraavɨna tewaanya nevu'nɨvanɨkeine.”
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Gotɨyarɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nya'nebwi da'darebwinesɨ. Gamɨre kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke mɨdɨdaanya'nanyɨ. Nabaai gamɨre kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke taanginya maayangɨra.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ gazamɨlɨsamɨlɨ' Gotɨyare kaimɨraayamɨlɨ' yɨma'najamɨlɨ' Kwaakevakɨya sabwi dathɨwamanɨkemɨlɨkɨra. Kwaakevakɨya sabwi dathɨwangebwi da'darebwina. Gawaalɨvaangerɨ lɨmwadaanya'nanyɨ.
Kwaakevakɨya sabwi dathɨwamanɨkei aaihwalaka? Dazai dare' lɨmwadelyɨ “Jizaazai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨ.” Sarei gavelyɨ.

Dazahwai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai aalyavɨ bavɨtaazɨya yavɨnesɨ gamɨre tawe' walaabaka balakevɨnesɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyai walaabake'nanyɨ. Yune aalya wɨvaihya sabwinevɨna walaabakei mɨ'. Aawa. Aalyavɨnebwinajɨ tawevɨnebwinajɨ walaabakelyɨ. Kuryai nebulyavɨ aaya kaavɨlyarɨne'na Kurya sahwai yagaala sa'na jalɨkurakadelyɨ.
Jalɨkurakya dawaai data warɨkennanyɨ.
Yɨ pwai Kuryai, yɨ pɨrɨ' aalya', yɨ pɨrɨ' tawe'. Dawaai data sa yagaala gave pɨrɨ'nanya' jalɨkurakadesɨ. Jalɨkurakya sa' daresɨ. Jizaazai Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangelyɨ.

A'mwera jalɨkurakɨpɨja' “Nebulyasɨ,” dadaanyɨ. Yɨthaanyi! Gotɨyai jalɨkurakya' a'mweraavɨrevɨ wavɨlavɨkesɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gawaalɨvaangerɨna Gotɨyai nejalɨkurakade' nebulyasɨ. Gotɨyare jalɨkurakya dare'nanyɨ. Jizaazai Nyɨbwaalɨvaangelyɨra.

Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangerɨ lɨmwadei gamɨre sɨmunyavɨ jalɨkurakya sa' wɨwarɨkelyɨ. Gotɨyarɨne' malɨmwagyadei dadelyɨ “Gotɨyai kwaasɨ yagaala dadelyɨ.” Gotɨyai Gawaalɨvaangerɨna “Nɨmɨnyɨdaa'nyalyɨ,” jalɨkurakya' malɨmwagyade'na dadelyɨ “Kwaasɨ yagaala dadelyɨ.”
Jalɨkurakya daresɨ. Gotɨyai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalya'nebwi nejaavakesɨ. Gaalya'ne saburɨ kaavɨlya' Gawaalɨvaangerɨ wɨlawɨwarɨka.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gawaalɨvaangei kɨnɨnnakei gaalya'ne sabwi kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei maayai gaalya'ne sabwi maayalyɨ.
Yagaala daza yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangerɨ lɨmwadɨvɨsaihi “ ‘Yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalya'ne sabwi kɨnɨnnakeine,’ dɨpɨka!” dena yɨhithawasɨwaabe.
Gotɨyaryaba dɨragɨnna da'daa wɨdadaanya da'daresɨ. Gotɨyai sɨmunya yawɨ'devɨna yɨdanganawaajɨya pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' kadɨka newɨ'nada sara yaderɨnera.
“Yɨdanganaanne kadɨka newɨ'nadelyɨ,” yawɨ'manɨgovɨ kɨrɨvɨnajɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Sahwarɨ yɨdangadaanya mena maa'mwona. Dɨragɨnna yawɨ'mwona. Sare' nebwina nejaavadelyɨ.

A'mwe pwai kwai dara wanganaja' “O, nya'mwei Kɨraazɨtɨyarei kayaa'nanya' jɨvanɨka! Kayaa'nanya sa' sahwarɨ Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nya'ne' daaka!” Sara wanganaja' Gotɨyarɨ kidaanganojɨ marasɨ'nojɨ gaalya'ne' tewaanna wɨjaavadelyɨ. A'mwe kayaa'nanyanna Dɨkevɨ mamarasɨ'nya'ne yɨpɨjaraavɨna yɨhɨthɨwa. Sare' kɨrɨ' kayaa'nanya pɨbwi Dɨkevɨ marasɨ'nya'nebwi warɨ'. Dazahɨrɨ'na jɨthaanganyide'na mihɨzɨvanɨge.
Yuya yɨda'maraangebwi kayaaka yɨgaide sabura sa kayaa'nanyabulyɨ. Kɨrɨ' kayaa'nanya pɨnɨ a'mweraavɨ Dɨkevɨ yuna mamarasɨ'nya'ne warɨ'.
Nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Gazaizai Gotɨyare kaimɨraayai mwaalajai kayaa'nanyabwi mɨdɨdei mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwarɨ Gotɨyarɨdaa'nyai nayaa maremwaalɨkelyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Kayaa'nanyai sahwarɨ lɨmwagathei mɨ'.
Nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Gotɨyareina mwaaiho. A'mwe Kwaaka yuyavakɨyabwinera Kayaa'nanyarɨ wɨlakasarera. Sahwai maremwaalɨkere.

Kɨrɨ' nemɨ yawɨ'manɨgo. Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei bakei sɨmunya tewaanya' nejaavɨkelyɨ. “Gotɨyai Nebulyarɨ yawɨralɨmwabɨka!” daka sɨmunya' nejaavɨkelyɨ. Nebula Sahwarɨ wɨlamwaaihoine. Gawaalɨvaanga Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨ wɨlawɨmwaaiho'nanyɨ. Sahwai Gotɨya nebulyalyɨ. Sahwai yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaalya'neburɨ aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ.
Nɨmɨre kaimɨraaya maalɨkeihi, a'mwa'mwe kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨna dameihi dɨthaayɨla! Sahwaraavɨ yɨlaaya mipɨnera!

Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ a'mwe naangeinyɨ (Jonɨnnyɨ) pɨkarɨyɨkwia daza' yɨda'mwesɨ. A'mwe'gɨnyɨ Gotɨyai gɨthahɨlakake'gɨnyɨnajɨ gɨmɨre kaimɨraayangɨnajɨ yɨda'mwesɨ. Nebulyavɨ kɨnakaavihɨrɨna nyɨvu'nadeinyɨ. Nabaai gaveinyɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Nebulya' yawɨrangadɨvɨta yuyara sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨkerera.
Nemɨnyɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne nebula sa' wɨlanewa'da nabaai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' nemɨnyɨjɨ kuna wɨlanewa'devɨna sarɨmɨnyɨna tewaanya nevu'nɨvanɨkeine.
Gotɨyai Nɨmwalyɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai Nɨmware Gawaalɨsɨ yanga gaimwangebulyɨ kale'na gaimwangebulyɨ kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ kuna nejaayɨka! Nebulyavɨjɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nya'nevɨjɨ sara neyɨka!
Nɨmɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨweinyɨ. Nɨmwai kɨwɨnya dɨnɨke' maakobaaibɨ' gɨmɨre kaimɨraaya pɨmɨlɨka tewaanya nebulyabwi sara mɨdɨmanɨgasa'nanyɨ. Sara wɨ'nadɨ yɨlaaya naanga yɨweinyɨ.
A'mwe'gɨ pɨrɨ' dɨragɨnna gɨthɨma! Kɨwɨnya mudɨke' magithawasɨvanaabɨhe. Aawa. Sɨnnawɨ aayawɨdaa'nyɨ daza' maarosɨ. Kɨwɨnya' dare' gɨthɨma! Nemɨnyɨ pwaina pwainaavɨna nevu'nana!
Kale ya sabwi darebulyɨ. Nemɨre Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya dɨnɨkengɨna mɨdɨnaanneine! Sɨnnawɨ aayawɨdaa'nyɨ kɨwɨnya daza' sarɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'netabaaibɨ' kɨwɨnya daresɨ. Kale ya saburɨ nayaa dɨmwaalyɨla!

Sare' a'mwe kwalaalyara kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdadɨvɨsara Kwaakevakɨna walyuna yeva jamarivanɨgava. Sahwara dara majalɨkurakivanɨgasare “Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai kɨlaa'nakei yɨma'naabɨkelyɨ.” Sara majadɨvɨsare. A'mwe sasara dazai kwaasɨ dadelyɨ. Sai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨne yɨkamaangelyɨ.
Sare'na nayaa yawɨ'dɨvɨ' mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Sarɨmɨ mena nayaa yesavɨne tɨvɨkɨta mamaari nyɨpɨdɨka! Aawa. Dɨvi sarɨmɨ tewaanyanna tɨvɨkɨta yuya dɨmaaryide'na mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla!
Gazaizai Kɨraazɨtɨyare wɨjɨwaakya' wavɨla'na yada wɨjɨwaakya savɨ kuna mulamwaalyɨkei sahwai Gotɨyai kɨnɨnnakei mɨka! Wɨjɨwaakya savɨ kuna wɨlamwaalɨkei sahwai Nɨmwalyɨ Gawaalɨsɨ saraai kɨnɨnnakelyɨ.
Pwai sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mavajai wɨjɨwaakya sa' mamakabi yajarɨ sarɨnnya angengɨ “Dulaama! Dava dɨmwaaideigɨnyɨ,” mudɨpɨna! “Yɨlaaya ja!” mudɨpɨna!
“Yɨlaaya ja!” wɨdazai gamɨre wawɨnya kayaa'nanyangɨ nye'mwannamwaaladɨka!

“Sarɨmɨnyɨna yagaala kwalaalya wɨdɨma!” dena kɨrɨ' “Pɨkarɨyɨkwiajɨ pɨkarɨyɨsarɨsɨ yɨhithavɨma!” majɨwa. Aawa. Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨhwanganɨde'na wawa'mujɨ sarɨmɨjɨ yagaala yuya dɨnaademɨlɨkane. “Yɨlaaya naanga yune'na yaana!” dadɨ dɨnaadesɨ.
Ja'mwevɨ Gotɨyai dahɨlakakevɨre kaimɨraayamɨlɨka gɨthɨvanɨga' “A'mwe naange'gɨ!”
Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨ a'mwe naangeinyɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwia daza' yɨda'mwesɨ. A'mwe Gaayaazaigɨnyɨna nyɨvu'nadeigɨ nɨmɨ nebulyavɨna nyɨvu'nadeinyɨ yɨda'mwesɨ.
Nyɨvu'nadeigɨ, Gotɨyai yuyangɨne tewaanya gɨmɨnyɨ nayaa yana! Maamɨdarya kuna dɨmwaala! Gɨnnya kuryarɨ tewaanya nayaa wivanɨkabaaibɨ' sara kuna dɨvada'galamwaala!
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Yɨlaaya naanga yɨweinyɨ. Nya'mwera pwara bi'maveva nebula savɨ mwaaidɨnyaigɨnyɨna jalɨkurakadɨvɨsaigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ nebulyavɨ pada'galamwaaihɨnyabaaibɨ' sara jalɨkurakadɨvɨsasɨ.
Yɨlaaya naanga nyade naange'ne' da'dare' wɨ'nadɨnyasɨ. Gɨmɨre kaimɨraayamɨlɨka nebulyavɨ mwaaihasamɨlɨke.
Nyɨvu'nadeigɨ, Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna wɨjɨwakamaryadɨvɨsaraavɨ ja'mweraavɨ gaimwanga yadɨnya yuya sa dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨnyangɨ. Nabaai a'mwe Menyara Kɨraazɨtɨyareraavɨjɨ avaala sara yadɨnyaigɨnyɨ.

Sahwara Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyavɨyainaayaba kumɨnyɨna gɨvu'nadevurɨ jalɨkurakɨwaava. Nabaai Gotɨyare wawɨnya'na nayaa yawɨ'dɨ neya'mweraavɨ tusavɨne gɨlyɨvɨsanna kuna dɨhaimwana! Sasare sa' tewaanyasɨ.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Sahwara Jizaazare yaya sa' makɨlya'ne sa'ne'na walyuna yeverera. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara malɨmwagyadɨvɨsaraavɨ nɨgwia maarya'nera mɨka.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sa' tewaanyasɨ. Sare'na nemɨ a'mwe sasare saraavɨ nayaa gaimwagaanneine. “Sasare sabwina nebula saburɨ avaaiwawɨnya ye'mwannayaana!” dawaajɨ sara yaadeine.
Yagaala pɨnɨ pɨkarya maalɨkevɨ kusɨlaanyavɨyaihɨrɨna yɨda'mwesɨ. Sare' kɨrɨ' Daayotɨrepɨzai “Kumɨre naangeinyɨ mwaalɨma!” dade'na gamɨnyɨna wabahɨlaaka wiadei nemɨre yagaalya kadɨka mu'nyalyɨ.

Sarevɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'ma'mujainyɨ gamɨre kayaa'na yade sabwina ku'maayaba jalɨkurakɨdelyɨ. Nemɨnyɨna yagaala kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanyanna yaasɨwa'na dɨvanɨke'na. Nabaai yune sa'na yɨvanɨka'na mɨ'. Aawa. Neya'mweraavɨ sahwai gamɨre angevɨna makwodei mɨ'. Nabaai pwara kunnya angengɨna “Makwawaana!” dadɨvɨ' yadaapi sara kwaraavɨjɨ dahalalɨmwanna yadelyɨ. Sara yada sahwaraavɨ kusɨlaanyavɨyaraayabadaa'nyɨ yunakaanna wɨdaasɨna yadelyɨ. Sare'na jalɨkurakɨdelyɨ.
Nyɨvu'nadeigɨ, sasarebwi mamɨdɨdɨnnera! Aawa. Tewaanyaburɨna dɨmɨdɨna! A'mwe tewaanyabwina yajai sai Gotɨyarelyɨ. A'mwe kayaa'nanyabwina yajai sai Gotɨyarɨ yawɨrangadei mɨka.

A'mwe yuyara Demitɨrɨyaazarɨna nayaa jalɨkurakadɨvɨsalyɨ. Nabaai gannya mwaalya'nebwi dara jalɨkurakɨvanɨ' “Sahwai nebulyabwi mɨdɨdelyɨ.” Nabaai nemɨ kwainajɨ nayaa jalɨkurakadaanyalyɨ. Sare' “Nemɨre jalɨkurakya nebulyasɨ,” yadaanya'na yawɨ'manɨgɨ.
“Gɨmɨnyɨna yagaala kwalaalya gɨthɨma!” dena yɨwe kɨrɨ' pɨkarɨyɨsarɨsɨ yagaala sa' yɨdasa'na “Aala,” dɨwa.
Gɨmɨnyawɨnna gwanganɨde'na yɨme'nya'bɨ' wawa'mujɨ naarɨmɨ yagaala ye'mwannadakade'nana. Sara jemwaaimanɨge.
Kwaamu'nanyaburɨ kuna gɨmwaaihade tewaanya mwaalya'neigɨ! Neya'mwera gɨthɨvanɨga' “Neya'mweigɨ!” Nɨmɨnyɨna saba mwaalya neya'mwera gazarazaraavɨ “Nya'mweihi!” duthana!
Nya'mweihi,

Juthɨyainyɨ, nɨmɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨ, Jemɨzarɨ gahwaalaangeinyɨ. Sareinyɨ pɨkarɨyɨkwia da' Gotɨyai jaka yɨhɨzɨvwaramaarakeihɨrɨ yɨhithawasɨwaabe. Gotɨyai Nɨmwai sahwarɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨvu'nada Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨ sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhɨmaredaa'manɨkelyɨ.
Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨna kale'na gaimwangebulyɨ kwaamu'nanyabulyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨvu'nyabulyɨ yɨhɨzaavana! Sasare sahɨbwi sarɨmɨnyɨ naanga kuna yɨhima'nana!

Nɨmɨre nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, aayagaa' sarɨmɨnyɨ wɨja ya'ne sɨmunya naanga yawɨrena “Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyai nemɨ yuyainaavɨ padaihasamaata sa'na pɨkarɨyɨkwia' yarai yɨdavɨma!” dena yɨweinyɨ. Dahaa' yawɨ'manɨge. Sarɨmɨnyɨna yagaala pɨrɨ' pɨkarya dara yɨdavɨdeinyɨ “Sarɨmɨ dɨragɨnna jɨla! Nemɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi maremwaalya'na yagaala tewaanyavɨne yɨkamaanga yɨma'nadɨvɨsaraavɨ nayaa tɨvɨkɨrasɨ'naana! Yune gave pɨgaa'na Gotɨyai dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga dazabwi gamɨre a'mwe tewaanyainaavɨna nejaavakebulyɨ. Sare'na yɨhɨthɨhaa'bwarɨma!”

Sare' darevɨnyɨ. A'mwe akwara Naangerɨna lɨmwaga'daanyainaayawɨnna “Nemɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareina,” dadɨvɨ' kɨma'nyɨkaanya bwina. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna Bukuyavɨ a'mwe sasare dazara Gotɨyarɨna bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨsara Gotɨyare jɨdasavɨ yɨ'mavapɨjɨyara yɨnahu yɨwɨna yɨpɨ'deraavɨna dɨnɨkesɨ. Sahwara Gotɨyare yanga gaimwanga sa' maroyɨmaa'nya yadɨvɨ' nabinya pɨbwibɨ' yadɨvɨ' yɨ kumɨre munyɨ' dɨka yɨdada kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsare. Darerera. “Gotɨyai nemɨnyɨna yanga gaimwangeburɨna nemɨre gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yaasɨwa'na nemarasɨ'nade'na sarebwi naanna yaana!” kwaasɨ dadɨvɨ' yadɨvɨsaburɨ. A'mwe sasare dazara kwaasɨ sara yadɨvɨ' nemaremwaaide gave pwai, nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna “Aala!” dadɨvɨsare. Navɨka yɨbwaakadɨvɨsare.

Sarɨmɨ yuya datha mena yawɨ'dɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' “Dazangɨ ayɨna yawɨpɨka!” dena dɨhaa'bwata yɨhide'nanyɨ. Pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Naangei gamɨre a'mweraavɨ padaihasamaaraka Anga Yɨzɨpɨ yagalya'maveveraavɨ makwiaakere. Sara yaka kɨrɨ' dɨvidaa'nyɨ gamɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna malɨmwagyesaraavɨ tamakɨna ya'. Yɨ sahwara kayaaka yɨnyɨna ye'.

Nabaai pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kɨgaakuna Gotɨyare mamaaya ejelɨya pwarajɨ kumɨre wawɨnya aaya mudɨ'nanya savɨ nayaa mwaaletara mɨ'. Aawa. Kunnya angeba yagalya'ma'na yesare. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai kwaari'mawɨlyasɨ wɨla pwɨyaka kalavuzavɨ wɨmwaaihakera yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwalɨbainɨga'. Sareraavɨ jɨhɨnya yuna kayaa'nanaangewɨ kewewɨnɨ wɨlawɨmwaaiha'. Sahwara Gotɨyare Yɨrɨka Naangerɨkɨna yawɨbwarya'negaa' daapɨ'dehaa'na yemwaaiha'.

Nabaai pɨrɨ' daresɨ. Kɨgaakuna a'mwe Sothomɨ mwaalyarajɨ Gomora mwaalyarajɨ anga naanga aya kɨba mannɨkebajɨyarajɨ sahwara avaainanyabwi yesare. Kayaa'nanya gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi mɨdɨnna. Kumɨre sɨmunyai wɨdɨka'daa'nyɨ avaanna kayaa'nanyabwi a'mwe yaasɨwaka pwarajɨ wɨlaye'mwannayamarina. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'nanya' wɨrɨvɨkɨrakera dɨka yuyagaa' mwalɨbainya'nevɨ wɨmwaaihɨna. Kayaa'nanya' wɨrɨvɨkɨta daza' nemɨ tɨnna wangadaa kumɨre sabwi mamɨdɨnyɨ yaade'na ku'maayaba sɨmunya yawɨramaarya'ne' yɨnɨkesɨ.

Sahɨbaaibɨ' a'mwe dahaa' sarɨmɨnyawɨ mwaaihata dazara da'dare sabwina yadɨvɨsare. Kumɨre waja nabinabinya saza sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨhaa'bwa'da kumɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ kayaa'nanya gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsare. Sahwara naangeraavɨ pihadɨka yadɨvɨ' mamaaya byaannakeraavɨ bɨraiyagaala wɨdangadɨvɨsare.

Kɨrɨ' kɨgaa' mamaaya aaya mudɨ'nanyai Maaikelɨ sasara mi. Sai Saataanɨjɨ tɨvɨkɨta yɨnyelyagaa' “Ne Mozɨzare kɨlaakejɨ' aaihwai maaradezɨ' dɨngaka?” dahɨla yagaaikwalaalya dɨnagɨleraalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' Maaikelɨ kayaa'na mi yaka Saataanɨmɨ bɨraiyagaala kayaa'nanya' ayɨna murɨvɨkɨryaakelyɨ. Aawa. Sai dara wɨdɨna “Yune Naangeina maiyagaalya' gɨthana!”

Kɨrɨ' a'mwe dazara kwaasɨ yagaala dadɨvɨsara bɨraiyagaala wɨdadɨvɨsare. Yɨ yuya pɨnɨngɨne aaya kaavɨlya myawɨranganyadɨvɨsangɨna bɨraiyagaala dadɨvɨsare. Nabaai yuya kumɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨta sabwi yɨkurɨyaawia sɨmunya maayaraavɨrebulyɨ. Sarera kɨlaakejɨ'na mɨdɨnna yadɨvɨ' sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sasare dazabwi yuna kayaaka wigalakadevulyɨ.

We'! Sasare sara mala nayaa yɨwannɨpɨka! Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Ne Kenɨ Gotɨyarɨ navɨka yɨbwakyaakabaaibɨ' sahwara navɨka yɨbwaakɨvanɨgasare. Yɨ Ne Kenɨmɨre saburɨ yamaryadɨvɨsare. Nabaai Ne Belaamɨ nɨgwia maarya sanne'na kwaasɨyabwi wɨjɨwakyaakabaaibɨ' dazahwara yune nɨgwia maarya'na yawɨ'dɨvɨ' Gotɨyareraavɨ kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsare. Yɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' nɨgwia'na kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakya'nera kumɨre kɨlaakejɨ' wɨjaavadɨvɨsare. Nabaai sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Ne Koraa Ne Mozɨzarɨjɨ maiyagaala wɨjaakabaaibɨ' sahwara Gotɨyarɨ pihadɨka yadɨvɨ' sasare dazaburɨ wana yɨwɨna yɨpɨ'derera.

Yuyagaa' sarɨmɨ yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidɨvɨ' tɨka munnejɨ yadɨvɨ' avaaizɨmunya yawɨsa'najɨ sɨrya'mweraavɨ gaimwagya'najɨ yadɨvɨsagaa' a'mwe dazara yɨ'bwa'nemwaala dazavɨ gɨrɨkita yɨgaidɨvɨsare. Sahwara tɨka sarɨmɨjɨ yɨhye'mwannanadɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' sahwara kumɨre tɨka wapaaya sa maremwaainya'na yadɨvɨ' lɨka aane pɨmɨlɨ' kɨmɨlɨ' yadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Yɨ pwaraavɨna myawɨryadɨvɨ' kumɨnyɨna, kumɨnyɨna yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Jarɨsagaa' yɨraaya yɨhusa' yaasɨwa' mariwɨnakamarya burɨke' mabwalari ya'ne yadevaaibɨsarera. Sahwara yagaala deva kɨrɨ' nayaa sara myadɨvɨsare. Nabaai yɨsɨka kumɨregaa' yɨsɨlya mi'nyadevaaibɨsarera. Yɨ yɨta sɨka yawaka mena bainɨkikaavɨ a'mwera kaavɨlyawɨ mena lamaipurasɨ'nɨkerabɨsare. Sasare sɨka pɨgasaai bainɨkerera.

Sahwara wagɨla wɨvwa'nya'ne kɨnɨnnaka sabwi yadɨvɨsare. Sasare daza' saalaalya' aalɨmavajɨnaaka naange' yada aalɨmaagwalya' yɨma'nadevaaibɨsabulyɨ. Nabaai sɨgunyavɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyarɨka mwaaidɨvɨ' kunnya tusa' yagalya'ma'dɨvɨ' a'mweraavɨ kayaa'na yɨbwarɨdaakwadɨvɨtabaaibɨsare. Sare'na Gotɨyai anga jɨhɨnya kayaa'nanyaba mena yovɨrawakɨvanɨkeba warɨ'. Yuna jɨhɨnya naangeba dazahɨba yuyagaa' yuyagaa' mwaaibɨ'deva.

Ataamɨmɨdaa'nyɨ mɨjɨyɨma'nɨgaveva ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyai Ne Yɨnokɨ yɨma'nakelyɨ. Sare sai a'mwe dazahwaraavɨna sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nakenna a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwakyaakelyɨ. Sai dɨna “Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmɨ tɨnna wangadaari Naangei gamɨre mamaaya tewaanya kwalaalya taawɨzanɨyarajɨ ye'mwannɨgwalaabɨpɨ'delyɨ.

Sai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ yawɨbwasagaa' kayaa'nanya' naanna wɨrɨvɨkɨradelyɨ. Sai a'mwe gamɨnyɨ bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨsara jɨdavade'na sahwara kumɨre bule wɨjaaya sabwina yadɨvɨsanna nayaa yɨbwakɨbɨ'dere. Yɨ yuya sanna bule wɨjaayabwina jawɨbwarya'negaa'. Nabaai kayaa'nanya dazara bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨsara Naangerɨ yagaala kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya mena wɨdesanna jɨdavade'na walaabathelyɨ.”

A'mwe dazara naangeraavɨ bulayagaala dadɨvɨsare. Sahwara yuya kumɨnyɨ yɨma'nade sanna jɨkurya yɨna yadɨvɨ' munyɨ' kayaa'na yadɨvɨsare. Kumɨre munyɨ' dɨkaa'da dɨkebɨ' yɨdamaryadikɨ. Sara yadɨvɨ' sahɨbwi mɨdɨdɨvɨsare. Sahwara yaasɨwa' kumɨnne yaya' jaka danganamaryadɨvɨ' kumɨnne yayanna makinadɨvɨsare. Pɨgaa' a'mwe pwaraavɨ wabwiwayagaala wɨdadɨvɨ' kumɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa mwagi'nya'nenna. Sarerera.
Kɨrɨ', nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare wɨdaasaderaavɨre yagaalya ayɨna nayaa jawɨrila! Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' wɨjɨwaakesasɨ.

Dara yɨhɨthesaihɨlyɨ “Dɨvi aaya yɨma'nadehaa' a'mwe pwara puri'nyarabɨ' Gotɨyare sabwina jɨka gyangadɨvɨ' bɨraiyagaala dɨpɨ'derera. Sara yadɨvɨ' Gotɨyarɨna bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨ' kumɨre munyɨ' yaasɨwa' dɨke'bɨ' yɨdamaryadikɨ.”
A'mwe dazara Naangereraavɨ jaapaidɨvɨsare. Sahwara a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨre sɨmunyabwi mɨdɨdɨvɨ', yɨ Kurya Tewaanyai maayara.

Kɨrɨ', nya'mweihɨrɨna tewaanya nyɨvu'nadeihi, yuyagaa' sarɨmɨre dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga yune nawɨ'nyaanga saburɨne'na yune sarɨmɨre sɨmunya' dɨragɨnya nayaa jɨvaimwagila! Yɨ lɨkɨlyavɨ a'ba madɨvɨtabaaibɨ' yagaala Gotɨyai nedake dɨragɨnya je'mwagyɨla! Sara yadɨvɨ' nabaai yuyagaa' Kurya Tewaanyai wɨlayɨhɨmwaaidori ye'mwagakɨyagaalyavɨna nayaa jɨthaanganyideihɨlyɨ.

Sarɨmɨ Gotɨyai sarɨmɨnyɨna wɨvu'nadevurɨ nayaa kuna dɨmwaalyɨla! Yuyagaa' Gotɨyare wɨvu'nya'nebwi nyagalya'mapɨdɨka! Nemɨre Naangei Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai gamɨre kale gaimwange' ku'maayaba maryalɨku'naraabathevɨna jemwaalyidehaa'na kuna sara jɨla! Sarevɨ nabaai sarɨmɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' nayaa dɨvada'galemwaalyide gaala nebulyabwi maarya'neihɨlyɨ.
Sarɨmɨ a'mwe pwara dɨragɨnna lɨmwangebwi nayaa tɨhu'na malɨmwagi, maalɨ'na yagalya'ma'dɨvɨsaraavɨna kale nayaa yɨhyana! Nayaa duhaimwagyɨla!

A'mwe pwara dɨkevɨbɨ' mwaaidapi sarevɨ sahwaraavɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' dɨvadaihasamaarila! “Nɨmɨ kayaa'nanya sa' nyɨwɨdɨka!” dɨdɨvɨ' lɨka nayaa yadɨvɨ' a'mwe saraavɨna kale nayaa yɨhyana! Kɨrɨ' mala nayaa jɨwannyɨla! Kumɨre kɨlaakevɨya sɨmunya sabwi kumɨre baazɨ'ma'nya gɨrɨkita'nanya sabɨsabulyɨ. Sahwaraavɨ wɨgaimwadɨvɨ' sasare dazaburɨna sarɨmɨ yuyagaa' menyaba dɨmwaalyɨla!

Gotɨyai sai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yɨhɨmaremwaaidori yɨ yɨhɨmaredaa'dori sarɨmɨ mwalaraawi jideihɨlyɨ. Sai sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yɨhɨmakwawojɨ gannyaba nawɨ'nya byaannakeryawɨ yɨhɨmwaaihadeihɨlyɨ. Nabaai sarɨmɨ yɨwetawakya pɨnɨ mwari yɨhyana! Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nabaai yɨlaaya naangebwi yɨhwaradeihɨlyɨ.

Gotɨyai yune gavei sahwaina mwaalɨkei. Sare sai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyare wawɨnyavɨna nemɨnyɨ nevadaihasamaarakelyɨ nemɨre Naangerɨna. Nemɨ gamɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba nayaa makɨlaana! Sai nemaremwaaide Kingɨya gavei kuna mwaalana! Sarei dɨragɨnya naange' kɨnɨnnakei kuna mwaalana! Yuya sangɨne'na aaya kaavɨlyai kuna mwaalana! Yuya sɨnnawɨ kɨgaasɨ nabaai dahaa' kɨgaasɨ nabaai dɨvi yuya kɨgaakɨgaasɨ sarei kuna mwalɨbainagwona! Sahɨrɨsɨ. Nebula naangesɨ.

Sɨnnawɨ yagaala datha' lɨka yulyarakesɨ. Yɨ Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai ku'maayaba marima'naabakesɨ. Sahwai nemɨnyɨne'na yoimavakesɨ. Gotɨyai daza' Jizaazarɨ yɨmwangakesɨ. Jizaazai gannya yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨna yɨbwarɨdaakwia'ne' yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨma'nadenna wɨjaavakesɨ. Sai nemɨnyɨna kunya, yawɨsa nejaavanɨ' yuya dazanna dare. Sai gamɨre mamaayarɨ ejelɨyarɨ Jonɨnnyawɨnna maryasaaba'. Nɨmɨ gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyainyɨna yɨ sai yagaalya' nyɨjaava'.

Nɨmɨ Jonɨnnyɨ yuya dazangɨ tɨnna mena wangamwa. Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganene yunebanna Gotɨyare yagaalya' ku'maayaba jalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Yɨ yagaala Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai nyɨjalɨkurakaka daza'na jalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Nɨmɨ dara dɨvanɨge. Yagaala daza' yɨ nebulyasɨ.

A'mwei Gotɨyare yagaala datha dɨvidaa'nya yɨma'nade wanganadadelyɨ nabaai yagaala Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨnya a'mwe yɨ'bwa'nawɨ'nadɨvɨsara kadɨka wɨ'nadɨvɨ' sahwara Gotɨyare yagaala yɨda'mwe datha' sara mɨdɨdɨvɨsarajɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winaderera. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai mena dake yɨda'manɨge datha yɨma'nadehaa' yɨ sagaa' maalɨkegaakɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyaihi anga ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya sabanyaihi!

Nɨmɨ Jonɨnnyɨ yagaala datha' sarɨmɨ Ezɨya sɨmagɨ mwaaihasaihɨrɨna yɨda'mwesɨ. Dahaa' Gotɨyai mwaalɨkei, sahwai kɨgaakuna kuna mwaalakei, dɨvidaa'nyɨ kuna yɨma'naabathei yɨ sahwai sarɨmɨnyɨ yange'na yɨhɨgaimwagana! Sarɨmɨnyɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhyana! Nabaai Kurya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara (Kurya Nawɨ'nya Naangei) Gotɨyare kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ daakasara sarɨmɨnyɨ yange'na yɨhɨgaimwabɨka! Sarɨmɨnyɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhyɨpɨka!

Nabaai Jizaazai Kɨraazɨtɨyai sai Gotɨyare yawɨta yuya nebulya'na yɨda'na jalɨkurakadei sai aaya mudɨ'nanyai a'mwe bainɨkeraayawɨ ayɨna dɨkaavakei sai kingɨya yuyara Kwaakevakɨ mwaaihasaraavɨ maremwaaidei yɨ sai sarɨmɨnyɨ yange'na yɨhɨgaimwagana! Sarɨmɨnyɨ kwaamu'nanyabwi yɨhyana!
Sai nemɨnyɨ kale yange'na neyadei, yɨ sai gamɨre tawe savɨ nemɨre kayaa'nanyanna marasɨ'nakelyɨ. Kayaa'nanya sa nevwɨyɨnɨkeina mamwaalya'ne'na balakelyɨ.

Sai nemɨnyɨ maremwaidaanyainaavɨ nemwaaihada yɨ Gotɨyarɨ gannya Ganɨmaangerɨ wɨdaaya'neina Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'daanyaina “Su! Su!” wɨdadaa yɨlaaya wiadaa gamɨnyɨ makidaa yadaanyainaavɨ nemwaaihakelyɨ. Sasarerɨne yaya naange' byaanna naangesɨ dɨragɨnna ya'nebulyɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' kuna warana! Sahɨrɨsɨra. Nebula naangesɨ.
Yɨthaanyi! “Sai yɨraayavɨ waimanaabɨko.”
Yuyaraavɨre tɨnnyaraalyɨ sahwarɨ wangabɨ'derɨnera.
A'mwata wɨlɨvadaakweta kwarajɨ wangabɨ'derɨnera.
Malɨmwagyara yɨta yuyavakaavɨyara wangabɨ'derera.
Sahwara sɨduta kwalaalya yawɨpɨ'dere.
We'! Gamɨnyɨne lɨke'na jakɨnna dɨpɨ'dere.
Yo! Sahɨrɨsɨra. Nebula naangesɨ.

Naangei Gotɨyai dara dɨvanɨ' “Nɨmɨ yune sahwainyɨ aaya sɨnnawɨnne nebulya'nanyainyɨ (A). Nabaai wana nebulya'na aaya dɨvineinyɨ (Z). Sɨnnawɨnyainyɨ. Aayaangeinyɨ.” Yɨ dazai dahaa' mwaalɨkei kɨgaakuna kuna mwaalakei dɨvidaa'nyɨ kuna yɨma'naabathei sai Dɨragɨnya Yuyangɨ Aaya Kaavɨlyalyɨ. Yuyangɨ Mɨnyagɨnyalyɨ.

Nɨmɨ Jonɨnnyɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ sɨrya'mweinyɨ. Nɨmɨ sarɨmɨjɨ Jizaazarɨ taanginyavɨjɨ Gotɨyai nemaremwaaidevɨjɨ taanga nejaavadɨvɨ' dɨragɨnna da'daanyaburɨjɨ sangɨ ye'mwannamwaaidɨnyainyɨ. Sareinyɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨjɨwakamarye'najɨ Jizaazarɨna jalɨkurakene'najɨ Ahu'manna Paatɨmozɨ wo'nɨkeba kalavuza nyɨmaaresainyɨ.

Yɨrɨka Naangeregaa' (Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨ'bwa'nawɨ'nadaanyagaa') Kuryai nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna bulamwaaina nyɨwa'. Sara nyadaa'nyɨ nɨmɨnyɨ dusɨdaasɨ nɨmɨ maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' wɨ'nyɨna. Maangwɨraaya sa' jaka dɨragɨnna dɨna pihulɨyavɨre jake'bɨsa'.

Maangwɨraaya daza' dara dɨna “Yuyangɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgɨnya, sa gɨmɨ nayaa pɨkarya jɨtha'! Pɨkarɨyɨkwiavɨ ya'gɨzɨ anga ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala dangɨne Kɨraazɨtɨyare kusɨlaanyangɨyaraavɨna jaasɨ! Yɨ Anga Epazaazɨjɨ Sɨmenaajɨ Pehamaamɨjɨ Taayataairajɨ Saathɨzɨjɨ Pilathelɨpɨyajɨ Layothɨzɨyajɨ anga sangɨna dɨmarayaasɨ!”
Nɨmɨ “A'mwe yagaala nyɨdɨvanɨka sarɨ wanganɨma!” dena gɨnyɨwannyɨna. Mena gɨnyɨwannyɨna yena yɨ laamɨvananya' yɨlakya'ne golɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala sa wa'dɨ'nyɨya tɨnna wanganna.

Yɨ a'mwe pwai laamɨvananya' yɨlakya'ne dazangɨ tɨnnyaba daa'dɨ'nyɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sai yɨ a'mweraavɨne kaimɨraayaibɨsai. Sai baazɨ'ma'nya saamɨnaange' yune sɨvɨla kedɨvɨ yalawakɨnanya' baazɨ'ma'nakei, yɨ sai munnaanya golɨya' gannya kɨhɨsavɨ pwɨyɨnakei.
Gannya mɨnyagɨnyavɨ mɨjasa' yune nebulya'na yaake'nanya', sipɨzipɨyavɨre arɨlya'bɨsa' yɨ wɨvɨtɨrata yaake'bɨsa'. Yɨ gamɨre tɨnnyai dɨtaalɨsa'bɨ' yɨdadaasɨ.

Yɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraai wana nebulya'na dɨ'baaka mwadadaasɨ, arɨnga kwaari'mata bɨraazɨya' dɨka naangevɨ yɨra'dɨvɨtabaaibɨsɨraai. Nabaai nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwe' gamɨre yagaaimaangwɨraaya' aalɨjaka naange' yɨnnadevaaibɨ' kinnɨwa' wɨ'nɨwa.

Sai aangasɨrɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya lɨmwagarɨ'. Yɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnya pɨrɨ' gurɨmaanga yuyɨmagɨnyaai yɨnɨke' sa' gamɨre maangevɨdaasɨ waraka mwasaba walyaabɨnɨke'. Nyɨlyai sɨrɨgwajahaa' nyɨla dɨragɨnna dadevaaibɨ' gamɨre sɨnnyɨ' baaka naange' wɨmwadɨwa'.

Sahwarɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganena lɨka yena gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraaryaba wala'na. Yɨ nɨmɨ wana a'mwe mena bainɨkeibɨsainyɨ. Sara kye sai nɨmɨnyɨ aangasi yɨlanyakaka dɨna “Gɨmɨ lɨka kuna minnera! Nɨmɨ aaya sɨnnawɨnya nebulya'nanyainyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ aaya dɨvidaa'nya nebulya'nanyainyɨ.

Yɨ nɨmɨ gaala mwaalya'nebwi aaya kaavɨlyainyɨ. Yɨthaa! Kɨgaa' nɨmɨ mena baleinyɨ, kɨrɨ', yɨthaa, yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne gaala mwaaiheinyɨ. Nɨmɨ barya'ne kiya' lɨmwaga'dɨ Bainɨkeraavɨre Angebanne kiya' lɨmwagake. Yɨ sareinyɨ dɨragɨnnakeinyɨ ‘Aawa,’ kada'mujɨ a'mwe pwai mabalyɨ yadelyɨ. Pwai bainɨkei bainɨkeraavɨreba yagalya'ma'na yadelyɨ. Nɨmɨ ‘Yo,’ kada'mujɨ pwai balɨna yadelyɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ gɨmɨ pɨkarya nayaa jɨtha'! Yagaala gɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwaanyangɨne' yɨ dahaa' warɨkengɨnesɨ sahɨnɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'naabathennajɨ jɨthaka!

Yɨ gɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwaanya sɨlɨngaamɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala daza nɨmɨre aangasɨrɨ wa'dɨsɨyannajɨ laamɨvananya' yɨlakya'ne golɨya kɨnɨnnaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala dazannajɨ yɨ Gotɨyai yoimavajalɨkurakya dazanne aaya kaavɨlya' daresɨ. Sɨlɨngaamɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala daza yɨ sa Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨyara anga ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyangɨ mwaalyaraavɨre mamaayara. Yɨ laamɨvananya' yɨlakya'ne golɨnaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala daza Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨyara anga ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala sangɨ mwaalyare.”
Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyavɨya Anga Epazaazɨ mwaalyaraavɨne ejelɨyai mwaalɨkerɨne pɨkarya nayaa dara jɨtha'!

Sɨlɨngaamɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya gamɨre aangasɨrɨ lɨmwaga'dei sahwai laamɨvananya' yɨlakya'ne golɨnaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyangɨ tɨnnyaba kaanya yamaryade sahwai yagaala datha gɨthasɨvanaabɨ'.

Gɨmɨ wawɨnya yadɨnya yuya sabwina mena gyawɨrangamanɨge. Yɨ gɨmɨre yagɨyagɨwawɨnyannajɨ taangegaa' gɨmɨ dɨragɨnna daaya'nebwinajɨ mena gyawɨ'manɨge. Yɨ gɨmɨ a'mwe kayaa'nanyaraavɨna “Aala!” nebulya'na dɨwaa. A'mwe dazara gɨmɨnyɨ dara gɨthadɨvɨsare “Nemɨ Apozelɨya Nedaasade kwainera.” Kɨrɨ' aawa! Sahwara Wɨdaasadera mɨ'. Yɨ kumɨre yagaalya' mena yawɨbwarangamwaa. Yɨ kumɨ yadɨvɨta saburɨ kaavɨlya' mena bɨrama'mwaa “Yɨ sahwara a'mwe yune kwaasɨyare.”
A'mwera tɨnna gwangadaapi, gɨmɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' kuna lɨmwamanɨgɨ. Yɨ sahwara wana kayaa'na gyadaapi kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ dɨragɨnna daa'dɨ taanga daza' maa'dɨnyɨ. Yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya daza'na maa'na ginnadeigɨ mɨ'.
Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨna nɨmɨ yagaalya' kɨnɨnnaka dareinyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ gɨmɨ mudɨ'na dɨragɨnna lɨmwagahɨnyagaa' yɨ dazagaa' nɨmɨnyɨnajɨ nebulya'na gɨvu'nakeigɨnyɨ. Kɨrɨ' dahaa' aawa.

Sɨnnawɨ nawɨ'nya tewaanyabwi yagɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ daza' yagalya'mavagɨnegaa' yɨ gɨmɨ mena wala'mwaawɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ ayahi sɨnnawɨ gɨmɨ yagɨnya dazabwina nayaa jawɨ'! Yɨ gɨmɨre sɨmunyabwi mudɨkebwi nayaa jawɨramaa'! Yɨ gɨmɨ aaya mudɨ'nanyagaa' yagɨnyabaaibɨsabwi jɨ! Nabaai aawana, yɨ nabaai gɨmɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi ayɨna yawɨramaata mija', yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mava'mujɨ yɨ gɨmɨre laamɨvananya' yɨlakya'ne' warɨkebadaa'nyɨ marasɨ'nɨdesɨ. Sɨmunya mudɨkebwi myawɨramaari nyɨdɨka!
Kɨrɨ' dasare dathavwi kuna gwarɨ'. Gɨmɨ Nikolaazare mɨdɨdɨvɨsaraavɨre saburɨ yɨkamaanga wiadɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Nɨmɨ kwainyɨjɨ sahwaraavɨre saburɨ yɨkamaanga wima'nadeinyɨ.

A'mwei kadɨ'nakei, sai yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana! Yɨ yagaala daza' Kurya Tewaanyai Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkesɨ. Nabaai a'mwei mala daza' wavɨlavajai, sahwarɨ yɨ nɨmɨ “Ya,” wɨdɨdelyɨ. Yɨ sahwai a'mweraavɨna gaala wɨjaaya'ne yɨta dazarɨ tɨka munne maaradelyɨ. Yɨta dazai Gotɨyare wawɨnyavɨ Parathaazɨ waayɨ'.
Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyavɨya Anga Sɨmenaa mwaalyaraavɨne ejelɨyai mwaalɨkerɨne pɨkarya nayaa dara jɨtha'!
Sahwai aaya sɨnnawɨnya nebulya'nanyai nabaai aaya dɨvidaa'nya nebulya'nanyai aayaangei kɨgaa' mena balakei kɨrɨ' gaalyai ayɨna yɨma'naabakei yɨ sarei yagaala datha gɨthasɨvanaabɨ'.

Taanginya gima'nɨvanɨkennajɨ nebulya'na gɨlyɨvɨta wana kuneigɨ mwaidaa'giyabulyɨ gyawɨrangamanɨge. Gɨlyɨvɨta kuneigɨ kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ pɨnɨ kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ. Nabaai yagaaibɨraizɨka daza'na a'mwe pwara sahwara gɨmɨnyɨ givanɨgasa'na gyawɨrangamanɨge. A'mwe dazara sahwara dɨna “Nemɨ sahwaina Juyaraavɨdaasaine.” Kɨrɨ' sahwara nebulya'na Juyaraavɨdaasarana mɨ'. Aawa. Juya kwara kɨrɨ' sahwara yune Saataanɨmɨrevaasɨyaraavɨna.

Dɨvi maalɨkegaa' gɨmɨ daange dɨmaa'dengɨna lɨka minnera! Yɨthaa! Saataanɨ sai Yuyaraavɨ Kotɨya Maryadei jɨda'daa'nyɨ sarɨmɨjɨya pwaraavɨ kalavuza wɨmwaaihɨpɨ'dere. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yaamɨjɨ yɨjɨwaala'ne' sara yɨhyɨpɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Yɨ yɨrɨka ata yuyɨraalya yɨnɨgehaa' sarɨmɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyareihɨrɨ taanginya yɨhɨzaavɨpɨ'deihɨlyɨ. Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa dɨlɨmwaga'! Kuna kuna yɨwo'gɨzɨ yune gɨmɨ baidɨzagaa'na yɨ nabaai gaalya' yɨvarula nawɨ'nyai gɨvwatavɨdeinyɨ. (Kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya' gwakɨdeinyɨ.)
