A'mwei kadɨ'nakei sai yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana! Yɨ yagaala daza' Kurya Tewaanyai Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkesɨ. A'mwei mala daza' wavɨlavajai sahwarɨ yɨ ayahi barya sa' kayaaka yɨgalakadei mɨ'. Aawa nebulyasɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyavɨya Anga Pehamaamɨ mwaalyaraavɨne ejelɨyai mwaalɨkerɨne pɨkarya nayaa dara jɨtha'!
Kwaari'masɨramɨnya pɨrɨ' gurɨmaanga yuyɨmagɨnyaai yɨnɨke' kɨnɨnnakei yagaala datha gɨthasɨvanaabɨ'.

Angeba mwaaihɨnyaba anga dazaba Saataanɨ kingɨyai maremwaalɨkebanna nɨmɨ yawɨrangamanɨge. Maremwaalɨka kɨrɨ' gɨmɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yadɨ gɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨ yɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwanga daza' lɨka yulyakadɨnyaigɨ mɨ'. Nabaai kɨgaa' a'mwe Adipaazai nɨmɨnyɨna nayaa nebulya'na jalɨkurakadei sarɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannayɨhɨmwaalaka sahwarɨ sarɨmɨnyaba tamakesagaa'na nɨmɨnyɨ kuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwagakɨnyaigɨ. Nɨmɨnyɨna “Aala!” majahɨnyaigɨ. Anga dazaba Saataanɨ mwaaida gannya wawɨnya' yɨvanɨkeba kɨrɨ' sara yadɨnyaigɨ.

Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyɨna yagaala pɨrɨ' pɨrɨ' kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Yɨ sarɨmɨjɨya pwara kwaasɨwɨ'nawɨjɨwaakya Belaamɨmɨrebwina lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsara kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ. Belaamɨmɨrebwi yɨ daresɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' Ne Mozɨzaregaa' sai maremwaaide Belaakɨmɨ dara yɨbwarɨdaakwa'. A'mwe Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ kwaasɨ yɨjɨwaalyabwi dahe'bɨsabwi kya' a'mwe sara wagɨlyavɨ walaraawe'. Yɨ Belaakɨjɨya Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ yɨdɨkaave'. Yɨ sahɨnɨ kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨ yɨdɨka yesa tɨka nya'na sahwaraavɨ yɨna yeva yaasɨwa' pamarinyabwi ya'na yɨdɨkaavesare.
Sasarebaaibɨ' gɨmɨjɨya pwara Nikolaazare wɨjɨwaakya' lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsarajɨ kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ. Baa'nana!

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ gɨmɨjɨya pwara “Sɨmunyabwi mudɨkebwi nayaa jawɨramaa'!” Nabaai aawana, sara myɨjaigɨnyawɨnna yarai bi'mavɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ a'mwe dazarajɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnya nɨmɨre maangevɨ nyarɨka dazasɨ mala barannaadeinyɨ. Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨre tewaanyabwina gyawɨrangamanɨge.

A'mwei kadɨ'nakei sai yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana! Yɨ yagaala daza' Kurya Tewaanyai Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkesɨ. A'mwei mala daza' wavɨlavajai, sahwarɨ tɨka wapaa manaaya Sɨgunyabanya pɨnɨ dahaa' kɨma'nyawɨ lɨka yulyarɨke wɨjaavɨdelyɨ. Nabaai nɨmɨ sitɨhwawɨnya yaaka pɨmɨlɨ' wɨjaavɨdelyɨ. Yɨ tɨhwawɨnya dazamɨlɨkɨ yaya mudɨke' yɨda'nɨkemɨlɨ' wɨjaavɨdelyɨ. Yɨ aawa, a'mwe pwai yaya daza' yawɨranganadei mɨ'. A'mwe tɨhwawɨnyamɨlɨ' maarajai yɨ yune sahwaina yawɨranganadelyɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyavɨya Anga Taayataaira mwaalyaraavɨne ejelɨyai mwaalɨkerɨne pɨkarya nayaa dara jɨtha'!

Gotɨyare Gawaalɨvaangei sai tɨnna dɨtaalɨsa' naanga yɨdamakida yɨdaderaai kɨnɨnnakei sɨvɨlyi wana nebulya'na dɨ'baaka mwadadaasɨ kwaari'mata bɨraazɨya' dɨka naangevɨ yɨra'dɨvɨtabaaibɨsi kɨnɨnnakei yagaala datha gɨthasɨvanaabɨ'.

Gɨmɨ yɨvanɨgɨnya yuya saburana, gɨmɨ a'mweraavɨna tewaanya gɨvu'nɨvanɨkebulyɨ nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'manɨgɨnyabulyɨ yɨ a'mweraavɨ gaimwagya'ne wɨdaayɨvanɨgɨnyabulyɨ yuya taanginya gima'nɨvanɨkengɨ dɨragɨnna daa'manɨgɨnyabulyɨ nayaa gyawɨrangamanɨge. Nabaai dala pɨbwinanya sabwi gɨmɨ aayagaa' gaai nyɨlɨmwagahɨnyagaa' yagɨnya sabwi sa' tewaanyasɨ. Yɨ dahaa' dɨviya sa' yɨ sɨnnawɨnyavɨ wavɨla'mwaka wana tewaanya nawɨ'nyaangesɨ. Sare' gyawɨrangamanɨge.

Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨna nɨmɨ yagaalya' kɨnɨnnaka dareinyɨ. Gɨmɨ a'mwe daza' Jezevelɨya' gɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannemwaaidevɨ yaasɨwa'na baihana'na yadɨnyasɨ. A'mwe daza' kwaasɨ dara dadesɨ “Nɨmɨ pɨropetɨya'nyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nadɨ a'mweraavɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨnya'nyɨ.” Sara dada nɨmɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨ kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna. Yɨ sahwara yaasɨwa' pɨnamarya sabwi mɨdɨnya'najɨ yɨ mɨwɨta kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨne yɨdɨka yadɨvɨsa tɨka nya'najɨ kwaasɨ wɨjɨwaakɨna. Sasare dazaburɨ sa' wana kwaasɨya' nɨmɨre pwara sara yadɨvɨsasɨ.

“A'mwe sa' sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaarana!” yawɨrena pɨgaa'nevɨ yaamɨjɨ yena yemwaaimanɨge. Kɨrɨ' aawa. Sa' sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaasa'na “Aala!” dɨvanɨ'. Gannya yaasɨwa' gɨrɨkita'nanya yade sangɨna bule' wɨjaaya'na “Aala!” dɨna.

Yɨthaa! Nɨmɨ nalabwaryavɨ a'mwe dazavɨna daangesɨ nalaaya naangesɨ wɨjaavɨdesɨ. Yɨ a'mwe dazara sahɨrɨsɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsara sahwara sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaata myapɨjɨ gamɨ yade sabwina bule'na mujaayɨ yɨpɨja' yɨ nɨmɨ daanga naangejɨ taanginyajɨ wɨjaavɨdere.

Gamɨre kaimɨraaya kwaraavɨjɨ yɨ nɨmɨ yuna tamakɨdere. Sarevɨ yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya yuyavaka nayaa yawɨpɨ'de'nanyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ a'mwe yuyaraavɨre munyɨkaavɨjɨ sɨmunyangɨjɨ nayaa maryawɨbwa'dɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ sarɨmɨnyɨ gazaigɨzaigɨnyɨ yɨnɨga wi'na yadɨvɨta sabwine' yɨhɨrɨvɨkɨrɨdeinyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' sarɨmɨ pwaihɨrɨ yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Sarɨmɨnyɨ kwaihi Taayataaira mwaalya pwaihi a'mwe savɨre yagaala daza' mɨdɨdɨvɨtaihi mɨ'. Yɨ sarɨmɨ sasare dazabwi dara dadɨvɨsaburɨ “Yagaala yune kusawɨ nebulya'na Saataanɨmɨre sabwi,” yawɨramaa'dɨvɨtaihi mɨ'. Yɨ sareihɨrɨ dara yɨhɨthɨvanɨge. Yɨ nɨmɨ naanga pɨrɨ' yɨhwakɨdeinyɨ mɨ'.
Aawaawa. Sarɨmɨ lɨmwaga'dɨvɨta sabwi yɨ kɨbwi nayaa dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwagyɨla! Kuna yɨwopɨjɨ yune nɨmɨ bi'mava'mujɨyagaa'na dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwagarila!

A'mwei mala daza' wavɨlavajai, a'mwe nɨmɨre wawɨnya mɨdɨnojɨ yune gamɨre aya yɨwɨya yajahaa'nei yɨ sahwarɨna nɨmɨ dɨragɨnaange' wɨjaavɨdelyɨ. Dɨragɨnya sa' daresɨ. Sai mɨnyagɨnyai ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ maremwaaladevurɨnera.
“Sai yɨta kwaari'mayagɨnyarɨ' lɨmwagozɨ
A'mwe saraavɨ dɨragɨnna maremwaaladelyɨ.
Maa'gula kwadɨke mala tadaapi
Pwakɨ'da yaaye lɨlɨya wa'devaaibɨsasɨ.”
Nɨmɨnyɨna Nɨmwai dɨragɨnya' maremwaalya'ne' nyɨjaavakabaaibɨ' dɨragɨnya sa' wɨjaavɨdelyɨ.
Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya mwanyagaa'ne kaabwe' wɨjaavɨdeinyɨ.
A'mwei kadɨ'nakei sai yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana! Yɨ yagaala daza' Kurya Tewaanyai Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkesɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyavɨya Anga Saathɨzɨ mwaalyaraavɨne ejelɨyai mwaalɨkerɨne pɨkarya nayaa dara jɨtha'!

Sahwai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala Kurya Gotɨyarerajɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala dazajɨ kɨnɨnnakei yagaala datha gɨmaryasɨvanaabɨ'. Gɨmɨ yɨvanɨgɨnya yuya saburana mena gyawɨ'manɨge. A'mwera gɨmɨnyɨne yaya' dara dadɨvɨsare “Kɨraazɨtɨyarera angeba mwaalya dazara gaalya' kɨnɨnnakera mwaaiha'.” Kɨrɨ' aawa. Mena Gotɨyarɨna bainɨkeigɨnyɨ.

Naangevaa'gɨ se warya' yagalya'mava'gɨzɨ tɨnna nayaa baihanarya'neigɨ dɨthɨkaaka! Gɨmɨre yuya sabwi kuna maalɨ'na warɨke yuna nabaladɨka! Yuya sabwi baimanɨkebwi nayaa dɨragɨnya jɨvaimwa! Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨ yadɨnya yuya sabwi pɨrɨvɨ sa' yuya yɨda'nanya' nɨmɨre Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna mwanganabɨrivanɨge.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yagaala tewaanya dazavɨ kadɨka mena wɨ'nagɨnyagaa' gɨmɨ lɨmwagasabwi maaragɨnyabaaibɨsa' gɨnnya sɨmunyavɨ nayaa ayɨna jawɨ'! Daza'na ya'gɨzɨ sabwi nayaa mɨdɨdɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi jawɨramaa'! Savɨdaa'nyɨ se' myagalya'mayɨja' tɨnna nayaa baihanarya'neigɨ madɨkaayɨ yɨja' a'mwe kukei bi'ma'devaaibɨ' nɨmɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mavɨdeinyɨ. Nabaai gɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'ma'mujahaa'na gɨmɨ jawɨ'deigɨ mɨ'. Arɨkewɨnyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' maalɨkevaa'gɨ yaya pɨnɨjɨyara Saathɨzɨ mwaaihata pwai pwai kɨnɨnnakeigɨnyɨ. Sahwara kumɨre baazɨ'ma'nya gɨrɨka yɨgalakadɨvɨsara mɨ'. Kumɨ dazara yɨ nɨmɨre baazɨ'ma'nya yaake' baazɨ'ma'napi yɨ nɨmɨjɨ ye'mwannayamaryaadere. Sahwara sahɨrɨvɨ yɨnɨga wi'nannere.

Nabaai a'mwei mala daza' sara wavɨlavajai sahwarɨ nɨmɨ avaainanya baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka dathavaaibɨsa' wakɨdelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ bukuya gaala'ne sɨrɨ gamɨnne yaya' yɨwaipɨwagɨdeinyɨ mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ. Yɨ nabaai Nɨmaamaangeryaba gamɨre ejelɨyaraayabajɨ nɨmɨ a'mwe dazarɨne yaya' jalɨkurakɨdeinyɨ. “Nɨmɨrelyɨ,” wɨdɨdelyɨ.
A'mwei kadɨ'nakei sai yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana! Yɨ yagaala daza' Kurya Tewaanyai Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkesɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyavɨya Anga Pilathelɨpɨya mwaalyaraavɨne ejelɨyai mwaalɨkerɨne pɨkarya nayaa dara jɨtha'!

Sai nawɨ'nya nebulya'nanyai, yɨ nebulya'nanya sabwina aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sahwai Kingɨya Devitɨmɨne kiya' kɨnɨnnakei kaadihɨta naange' baasadelyɨ. Basadaa'nyɨ gamɨre wawɨnya' naanna jɨthe'nanyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe aane pwai kwai kaanya sa' ayahi tihɨradei mɨ'. Yɨ kaanya' tihɨ'delyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe aane pwai kwai ayahi baasadei mɨ'. Sarei yagaala datha gɨmaryasɨvanaabɨ'.

Gɨmɨ wawɨnya yadɨnya yuya sabwina nɨmɨ mena gyawɨ'manɨge. Yɨthaa, gɨmɨre sɨnnyɨkɨ kaadihɨsa' basɨnadaavɨke' wakɨwesɨ. Yɨ a'mwe kaanya tihɨradei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Nɨmɨ dara yawɨ'manɨge. Gɨmɨ dɨragɨnya maalɨke' kɨnɨnnakeigɨ kɨrɨ' nɨmɨre yagaalya' mɨdɨdɨ yɨ nɨmɨnne yaya' lɨka yulyakadɨnyaigɨ mɨ'. “Sahwareinyɨra,” wɨdadɨnyaigɨnyɨ.

Yɨthaa, nɨmɨ Saataanɨmɨre a'mwe yɨta dathavaa' gɨmɨnyɨna gɨmwangɨdeigɨnyɨ. Sahwara dara dadɨvɨsare “Nemɨ Juyaraavɨdaasɨ yɨsavaa'nyɨ.” Kɨrɨ' sahwara Gotɨyarera mɨ'. Aawa. A'mwe kwaasɨ dadɨvɨsare. Yɨthaa! Yɨ nɨmɨ a'mwe dazara gɨmɨre sɨvɨlyɨraaryawɨ kwaakewɨ bulawɨla'napɨ'de'na yɨdeigɨnyɨ. Yɨ sahwara yawɨpɨ'de'na “Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨna tewaanya nebulya'na mena wɨvu'nɨvanɨ'.”

Nɨmɨ dɨragɨnna daavebaaibɨ' nɨmɨre yagaalya' nyɨmɨdɨdɨ yuya taanginya gima'nade sangɨ gɨmɨ dɨragɨnna daa'dɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ sare'na yɨjɨwaala daza' “Kwaaka yuyawɨ yɨma'nɨma!” dozɨ yajahaa' a'mwe yuyara Kwaaka yuyawɨnyaraavɨ yɨjɨwaalya'negaa' sa' yɨ gɨmɨnyɨ nagima'nadɨ'! Yɨ yadevɨ nayaa gɨmaremwaalɨdeinyɨ.
Yɨ gɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨme'nya'bɨ' walaabɨdeinyɨ. Yɨ aane pwai kwai kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya' gɨmɨre tɨvɨkɨsa' nagɨmarasɨ'nadɨ'! Gɨmɨ dazabwi lɨmwaga'manɨgɨnya sa kuna nayaa dɨragɨnna dɨlɨmwaga'!

Nabaai a'mwei mala daza' sara wavɨlavajai, yɨ sarɨ dɨhɨbya anga nawɨ'nya nɨmɨre Gotɨyarevɨ dɨragɨnya yɨwagya'nerɨ nɨmɨ marɨdaakudelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai sai anga nawɨ'nya savɨ myagalya'mayɨ yojɨ ayahi mwasɨlaanna walyawodei mɨ'. Arɨkewɨnyɨ. Yɨ sarɨ nɨmɨ nɨmɨre Gotɨyarɨne yaya' yɨdavɨdelyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨre Gotɨyare anga naangebanne yaya' yɨdavɨdelyɨ. Anga naanga daza' yɨ Jeruzaalemɨ mudɨkesɨ. Sa' yɨ nɨmɨre Gotɨyaryabadaasɨ walaabathesɨ. Yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ yagalya'mavojɨ walaabathesɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨnne yaya mudɨke' sa' kɨrɨsɨ yɨ sarɨ pɨkarya yɨdavɨdelyɨ.
A'mwei kadɨ'nakei yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana! Yɨ yagaala daza' Kurya Tewaanyai Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkesɨ.
Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyavɨya Anga Layothɨzɨya mwaalyaraavɨne ejelɨyai mwaalɨkerɨne pɨkarya nayaa dara jɨtha'!

Sahwai Nebula Naangei, nebulya'ne aaya kaavɨlyai, Gotɨyare yawɨta yuya nayaa lɨmwada nebulya'na yɨda'na jalɨkurakadelyɨ. Yuya Gotɨyai wakyaakengɨna aaya kaavɨlyalyɨ. Sarei yagaala datha gɨmaryasɨvanaabɨ'.

Gɨmɨ yɨvanɨgɨnya yuya sabwina nɨmɨ mena gyawɨ'manɨge. Gɨmɨ yɨrɨla majɨvanɨgɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨnyɨna “Aala!” majɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Nabaai gɨmɨ dɨka magimanɨ'. Yɨ nɨmɨnyɨna dɨragɨnna myɨvanɨgɨnyaigɨnyɨ. We'! Dara gɨthɨvanɨge. Gɨmɨ dɨ'nakeigɨ mwaaidɨzɨ kwajɨ wikɨra. Gɨmɨ yɨrijaigɨ mwaaidɨzɨ kwajɨ wikɨra.

Kɨrɨ' aawa. Gɨmɨ dɨ'naka maalɨ'na gimanɨkeigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ dɨ'naka nebulya'na maginyɨvanɨ'. Yɨ gɨmɨ yɨrija nebulya'na maginyɨvanɨ'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ aalya dɨ'mudɨnya maalɨka kɨnɨnnake'bɨ' sareigɨnyɨne'na nɨmɨre maangevɨdaa'nyɨ wɨrya gɨmudakɨdeigɨnyɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨ dara dadɨnyaigɨnyɨ “Nɨmɨ kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨre gɨlyɨvɨta kwalaalya warɨ'. Pɨnɨnna manyɨgainyɨvanɨ'.” Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨnyɨna aawa. Gɨmɨ wana kayaa'na mwaaihɨ. Yɨnɨga wi'na gɨmɨnyɨna kale nyadeigɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ wana gɨlyɨvɨ'maaya yɨnahune nebulya'nanyaigɨ mwaaihɨ. Yɨ gɨmɨ tɨnna tɨbɨnyaigɨnyɨ. Yɨ gɨmɨ kɨlaakejɨ'nanyaigɨ mwaaihɨ. Yɨ nabaai gɨmɨ saigɨ dazavɨ myawɨranganyɨvanɨgɨ.

Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ sɨmunya datha' gɨzaawa. Nɨmɨre golɨya', sa' nawɨ'nya tɨrɨmaaya yɨma'nyavɨna dɨke' nake' dɨragɨnyasɨ. Yɨ gɨmɨ golɨya daza' dɨmubɨ! “Gotɨyarɨne kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ yɨma'nɨma!” da'gɨzɨ sara dɨmubɨ! Yɨ gɨmɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ baazɨ'ma'nya'ne' nɨmɨre baazɨ'ma'nya yaake' dɨmubɨ! “Yɨ baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka sa' yewaa'bwa'nɨma! Yɨ nabaai kɨlaakejɨ'nanyainyɨ kuna mamwaalyɨ yadɨ wagɨla nanyɨvwa'nadɨka! A'mwera a'mwemɨlɨka tɨnna nanyangabɨthɨka! Yɨda'maraanga sabwi baazɨ'ma'nɨma!” da'gɨzɨ sara dɨmubɨ! Yɨ gɨmɨ nɨmɨre mɨnarɨwelivananya' gɨmɨre tɨnnyaraarɨ pu'nya'ne' dɨmubɨ! “Yɨ sareinyɨ tɨnna yɨnɨga wi'na wanganɨma!” da'gɨzɨ sara dɨmubɨ!

Nabaai nɨmɨ a'mwe nyɨvu'nadaasɨya yuya saraavɨ maanga wɨdadɨ sahwaraavɨ kumɨre yadɨvɨsabwi yavada'gaidɨnyainyɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ gɨmɨre sabwina sɨmunya mudɨkebwi jawɨramaa'! Nabaai sɨmunya nawɨ'nya' dɨke'bɨ' kuna jawɨrɨbaina!

Yɨthaa! Nɨmɨ kaadihɨsavɨ daake. Yɨ nɨmɨ mala tamɨda'nɨvanaabɨhe. Nabaai a'mwe pwai nɨmɨre maangikɨ nyu'nojɨ yɨ kaanya sa' nyɨbasamaraabazai yɨ nabaai gamɨnyɨ kusawɨ wɨla'mujɨ salyɨ wɨlye'mwannamwaalɨdelyɨ. Salyɨ tɨka ye'mwannanɨdelyɨ. Yɨ sai nɨmɨjɨ tɨka ye'mwannanadelyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwei mala daza' wavɨlavajai, sahwarɨ nɨmɨ “Ya,” wɨdɨdelyɨ. Sai namwaalyɨta kingɨyavɨ nawɨ'nyaba nɨmɨjɨ nye'mwannamwaalade'na wɨdɨdelyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ kwainyɨ malya' wavɨlavebaaibɨ', yɨ nɨmɨ Nɨmwalyɨ gamɨre namwaalyɨta kingɨyavɨ ye'mwannemwaalebaaibɨ' nye'mwannamwaaladelyɨ.
A'mwei kadɨ'nakei, sai yagaalya' kadɨka nayaa wɨ'nana! Yɨ yagaala daza' Kurya Tewaanyai Kɨraazɨtɨyainyɨre kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakɨvanɨkesɨ.

Sa' mena kya' sagaa', yɨthaanyi, Sɨgunyavɨ kaadihɨta pɨrɨ' basɨnadaata yadɨsɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwe'. Yɨ maangwɨraaya daza' sɨnnawɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'ne sa' pihulɨya'bɨ' jaka dɨwa'. Dahaa' sa' dara nyɨdɨvanɨ' “Munya davanna jɨlaama! Gɨmɨnyɨ yuya dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'nadenna givwarɨdaakudeinyɨ.”

Yɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' nɨmɨnyɨ Kurya Tewaanyai dɨragɨnna bulamwaaina nyɨwa'. Yɨthaanyi, Sɨgunyavɨ saba kingɨnamwaalyɨta pɨrɨ' daa'dɨ'nyɨya' tɨnna wanganna. Nabaai pwai yuyaraavɨ maremwaalya'nei namwaalyɨta dazavɨ yɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨ wanganna.
Sahwai sɨla nawɨ'nyai baake' yɨdada sɨla nawɨ'nya wayaakei baaka yɨdadaa'nyɨyabaaibɨsalyɨ. Kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ byaawɨla pɨrɨ' yagɨ'ma'nɨkerɨ sɨla nawɨ'nya yɨjuzai baaka yɨdadei tɨnna wanganna yɨwelyɨ.

Kingɨnamwaalyɨta dazayaba kingɨnamwaalyɨta pɨnɨ yagɨ'ma'nata yadɨ'nyɨ wanganna. Namwaalyɨta tɨwedipoya sangɨ a'mwe naanga tɨwedipoyara mwaalɨna. Sahwara baazɨ'ma'nya yaake baazɨ'ma'nevera. Yɨ kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya golɨya kumɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ kɨnɨnnakera.

Yɨ kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ yɨnamɨraasavɨre dɨ'baake mwasabɨ' lɨvapɨna yaka purinya yɨnnyɨna, yɨ pa'da yɨnnyɨna, yɨ yɨ'munya pilɨna. Nabaai kingɨnamwaalyɨta dazavɨ sɨnnyɨkɨ dɨ'baaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya dɨka yɨda'nyɨna. Dɨ'baaka daza sa Gotɨyare Kurya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyarera.
Yɨ kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨre kusɨmagɨ naanga saalaalya'bɨsa' warɨ'. Daza' yɨ sɨnɨmwavanakurɨka naangebɨsa', yɨ wana gɨrɨ'maaya nebulya'nanya' sɨgujaaka sɨrɨmya'bɨsasɨ.

Yɨ tɨnnyaba namwaalyɨsavɨ daraai daraala gaala kɨnɨnnakera daavɨna. Yɨ sahwara kingɨnamwaalyɨta dazavɨ dakwagɨ'maveva yɨ daavɨna. Daraai daraala dazara gaala mwaaleva kumɨre tɨnna kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakeraavɨ kusɨmagɨnyavɨjɨ dusɨmagɨnyavɨjɨ yunewɨnna bwakuke.

Gaala kɨnɨnnaka aaya mudɨ'nanyai yɨ sai laayonɨyaibɨsai. Yɨ sahwarɨ ayawɨdaasɨ gaala kɨnɨnnakei yɨ sai bulɨmakaawoya kwalyaibɨsai. Yɨ sahwarɨ ayawɨdaasɨ gaala kɨnɨnnakei sai a'mwere sɨnnya'bɨsa' kɨnɨnnakei. Yɨ sahwarɨ ayawɨdaasɨ gaala kɨnɨnnakei yɨ sai bwaangya pwai pɨlavamaryadaa'nyɨyaibɨsai.

Daraai daraala gaala kɨnɨnnaka dazarajɨya gazaizai pɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwainanya kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨ tɨnna kwalaalya yunewɨnna mwasɨmagɨjɨ kuta kimagɨjɨ bwamwaihukera. Yɨ yɨrɨkevɨjɨ sawɨsavɨjɨ sahwara daata dara dadɨvɨsare:
“Naangei, Gotɨya Dɨragɨnya Yuya Kɨnɨnnakei
Gɨrɨ'maayalyɨ. Gɨrɨ'maayalyɨ. Gɨrɨ'maayalyɨ.
Tewaanyalyɨ. Tewaanyalyɨ. Tewaanyalyɨ.
Gamɨnyɨ jaanna marinawaadelyɨ.
‘Gɨmɨ gaveigɨnyɨ. Nemɨbɨtaigɨ mɨ'.’
Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' sai mwalyaakelyɨ.
Yɨ dahaa' sai mwaalɨ'.
Yɨ nabaai sai yɨma'naabathelyɨ.”
Sahwara yagaala daza' ja'na kwadɨka mudɨvɨtara mɨ'.

Gaala kɨnɨnnaka dazara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsare. Gotɨyare kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaaida yɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gaala mwaaiderɨ yɨlaaya yadɨvɨsare. Yɨ sahwara sahwarɨ byaanna dɨragɨnya' wiadɨvɨ' sahwarɨne yaya' munyaba makidɨvɨ' yɨ “Su! Su!” wɨdɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ yuyagaa' gaala kɨnɨnnaka dazara sara kyapɨjɨ

yɨ a'mwe naanga (24) tɨwedipoyara dazara Gotɨyaryaba kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaalɨkere sɨnnyɨkɨ kwaakewɨ walamwaaibɨ'dere. Yɨ sahwai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gaala mwaaiderɨna sahwara lotuya yadɨvɨsare. Sahwara yawɨ'na “Nemɨre maremwaalya'nebwi gamɨresɨra,” kumɨre kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya golɨya lɨvaradɨvɨ' kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨre gidɨkusaba wala'dengɨ. Sara yapɨjɨ yɨ daata dara dɨpɨ'dere:
“Nemɨre Naangeigɨ, nemɨre Gotɨyaigɨ!
A'mwe yuyara gɨmɨnyɨna yɨlaaya gya'neigɨ
Gɨmɨ saigɨ yɨnɨga wi'na nebulya'nanyaigɨnyɨ.
Yɨ byaanna dɨragɨnyabwi gɨzaaya'na nawɨ'nyasɨ.
Yɨ gɨmɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'najɨ
Yɨ gɨmɨ dɨragɨnyabwi lɨmwaga'dɨnne'najɨ nawɨ'nyasɨ.
Sa' darevɨnyɨ. Gɨmɨ yuya wakyeigɨnyɨ.
Yune gɨmɨre sɨmunyaburɨna kwakye yɨma'nyaakeigɨ.
Gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨdaa'nyɨ yuya daza warɨkengɨ. Mwaaihasangɨ.”

Yɨ kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaaidɨ'nyɨyare aangasɨrɨ nɨmɨ bukuya pwi tɨnna wangamwa. Si pɨkarya kɨnɨnnake' kusawɨjɨ mwasɨmagɨjɨ. Yɨ murɨtavayɨ'bwa'nɨka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya kɨnɨnnaki. Yɨ yaasɨwa'nanyai marɨlaaya'na sara murɨtavayɨ'bwa'nɨkilyɨ.

Nɨmɨ ejelɨya dɨragɨnnaka pwarɨ tɨnna wangamwa. Sai gannya maangwɨraayavɨ jaka naangave'na dara dɨwa' “A'mwe tewaanyai bukuya dɨrɨ yɨnɨga wi'na tɨlaaya'nebwi kɨnɨnnakei aaihwalaka? Tewaanyai dɨragɨnnakei bukuya dɨrɨ pwɨyɨnɨka dɨrɨ yesɨvalasɨsa' ya'na aaihwalaka?”

Kɨrɨ' sasarei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Sɨgunyavɨ mwaalɨkei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Kwaakevakɨ mwaalɨkei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Kwaakevɨ amwihi wɨlarɨkei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Yɨnɨga wi'na tɨlaayojɨ bukuya sɨrɨ kusawɨ ja'na tɨnna wanganannei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ.
Sarajɨya a'mwe pwarɨ mabɨramaari. Bukuya si tɨlaayojɨ kusawɨ tɨnna wanganannei tewaanyarɨ mabɨramariwaasa'na yɨ nɨmɨ kɨnna kwalaalya dɨwa.

Kɨnna dadaazɨ a'mwe naangerajɨya pwai nyɨdɨwa' “Gɨmɨ kɨnna kuna madɨnnera! Yɨthaa! Laayonɨyai Juthare yɨta savaakɨyai Ne Devitɨmɨre yɨta savaakɨdaasai, yɨsare pwipulyavɨ kwaraka yɨdevaaibɨ' sara yɨma'nakei sai malya' wavɨlavakelyɨ. Sarevɨ yɨ sai bukuya si tɨlaaya'nei murɨtavayɨ'bwata ata purɨdaa'nyɨ saraala marapyasɨbwarakya'na yɨnɨga wi'na yannelyɨ.”

Sara kanyɨdɨwa' nɨmɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyarɨ tɨnna wangamwa. Sahwai kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraala dazaraayabajɨ a'mwe naanga dazaraayabajɨ tɨnnyaba daavɨna. Saba sai mena tamakesai ayɨna dɨkaa'nɨkabaai daa'dɨ'nyɨ wangamwa. Gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ a'ba saanya dɨragɨnnaka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya kɨnɨnnakei. Nabaai tɨnna ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara kɨnɨnnakei. Yɨ tɨnna dazara yɨ Gotɨyare Kurya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyarera. Gotɨyai kwaaka yuyawɨ yunewɨnna maryaasakere. Sipɨzipɨya sasarerɨ tɨnna wangamwa.
Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnya dazai wawaka kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaalɨkere aangasɨrɨ bukuya daza' ma'mwaawɨ'.

Bukuya mi'na kama'mwaawɨ' sagaa' gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraala dazarajɨ a'mwe naanga tɨwedipoya dazarajɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyaryaba gidɨkusaba kwaakewɨ wala'na. Sahwarajɨya gazaizai pɨradazabɨsasɨ dɨzɨya golɨya pɨrɨsɨ kɨnɨnnakelyɨ. Yɨ dɨzɨya dazangɨ jɨtɨrɨnya yɨravayɨhwia'ne' yunebanna wɨlarɨkengɨ. Wabatɨrɨnya daza' Gotɨyare a'mwe tewaanyara Gotɨyarɨ wɨdadɨvɨsangɨra.
Yɨ sahwara daata mudɨka pɨrɨ' dara dɨwaa':
“Bukuya daza' gɨmɨ maarya'neigɨ
Savɨre murɨtavayɨ'bwasa marapyasɨbwarakya'neigɨ
Yɨ yɨnɨga wi'na nebulya'nanyaigɨnyɨ.
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. A'mwera gɨramesaigɨnyɨ.
Sasareigɨre tawevɨ a'mweraavɨ mubahɨ.
Sahwara Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaaya'neraavɨ gɨmɨ.
Yɨta gazavaasavaakɨyaraavɨjɨ yagaala ge gejɨyaraavɨjɨ
A'mwe kɨlaaka dala nabinabinyajɨyaraavɨjɨ
Ajɨmya yuyangɨya gazasavɨyaraavɨjɨ mubamaaragɨ.
Nemɨre Gotɨyarɨna maremwaaidɨsaraavɨ wɨmwaaihadɨ
Wɨdaaya'nera Gotɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨsaraavɨ wɨmwaaihagɨ.
Sahwara Kwaaka yuyavakɨyaraavɨ maremwaaibɨ'derera.”

Nabaai nɨmɨ wangadɨ ejelɨya kwalaalyaraavɨre maangwɨraaya' kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa. Sahwara kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨjɨ gaala kɨnɨnnakeraayabajɨ a'mwe naangeraayabajɨ gɨhɨpaledaa'na. Sahwara kwalaalya kwalaalyara mwaaiha'. Yɨ milɨyonɨ milɨyonɨyarajɨ taawɨzanɨ taawɨzanɨyarajɨ kwalaalya naanga naangera mwaaihasare.
Sahwara jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨwaa':
“Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnya dazarɨ tamakesalyɨ.
Sai nawɨ'nya maarya'nei yɨnɨga wi'nanyalyɨ.
Yɨ dazangɨ yɨlaaya maarannei yɨda'nanyalyɨ.
Dɨragɨnna maremwaalya'nebulyɨ gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakebulyɨ
Sɨdu'nakebulyɨ dɨragɨnya naangebulyɨ gamɨrengɨ.
Gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'najɨ
Byaanna dɨragɨnya' yɨlaaya' wɨjaaya'najɨ
‘Su! Su!’ wɨja'najɨ tewaanya'nelyɨ.
Yɨ sahwai gavei yɨnɨga nebulya'nanyalyɨ.”

Yɨ nɨmɨ Gotɨyai yuya wakyaaka kwaraavɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwe'. Yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ mwaaihasaraavɨjɨ yɨ Kwaakevakɨ mwaaihasaraavɨjɨ yɨ kwaakevɨ amwihi wɨlakasaraavɨjɨ yɨ saalaalyavɨ wɨlamwaaihasaraavɨjɨ, yo, yuya sabanyaavɨ wɨlamwaaihata kwaraavɨ wɨ'nɨwe'. Sahwara dara dɨwaa':
“Kingɨnamwaalyɨta savɨ mwaalɨkelyɨ
Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnya kwalyɨ
Saraai nawɨ'nya yuyabwi maarika!
Yɨ su suyajɨ yaya makɨlyabulyɨ
Byaanna dɨragɨnyabulyɨ dɨragɨnnakebulyɨ
Saraarɨ nawɨ'nya dazabwi kuna warana!
Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' kuna warɨbainana!”
Sara kadɨwaa' gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraala dazara yɨ dara dɨwaa' “Yɨ sahɨrɨsɨ. Nebula naangesɨ.” Yɨ a'mwe naangera kwaakewɨ walaruta'neva yɨ lotuya yɨvanɨga'. Yɨlaaya wivanɨga'.

Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyai bukuyavɨre murɨtavayɨ'bwaraka ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyangɨ aaya mudɨ'nanya' marapyasɨbwarakɨna yadaa'nyɨ yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwa. Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyai marapyasɨbwarakɨna kyɨwa' gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraalyaraavɨdaa'nyɨ pwai yɨ sɨgunyavɨ yɨ'munya pidevaaibɨ' gamɨre maangwɨraaya' jaka naanga dɨna “Kaaja!”

Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna ayahi wanganna. Yɨthaanyi, ozɨya yaaka pwarɨ tɨnna wangamwa. Yɨ a'mwei yɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨ mwaryagɨnyɨsɨ lɨmwamwakei. Sahwarɨna kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya pɨrɨ' wɨjawaasa' malyavɨ wavɨlaya'ne'. Yɨ sai mala kwalaalya wavɨlaya'nei wawoka “Mala'na wavɨlavɨma!” daka wɨna yɨwa'.
Dɨwɨnyai wɨla ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya ayawɨdaasɨ bukuyavɨ pwɨyɨnɨke' pyaasɨbwa'na kyɨwa' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Yɨ gaala kɨnɨnnaka ayawɨdaasai dɨna “Kaaja!”

Yɨ ozɨya pwai yɨ'mavaabɨna. Sai wayaakei. A'mwei ozɨya dazarɨ yɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨyarɨna dɨragɨnyabwi wɨjawaasai. Sahwai dɨragɨnya sabwi maaraka tewaanyagaa' yɨ naryagaa' yɨnɨga marasɨ'nya'nelyɨ. “A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara tamakɨnɨpɨka!” daka sara yɨwa'. Sarevɨ yɨ sarɨna kwaari'masɨramɨnya naanga pɨrɨ' wɨjawaasa' wawɨnya dazahɨrɨ' ya'ne'.

Dɨwɨnyai wɨla ayawɨdaasa' bukuyavɨ pwɨyɨnɨke' pyaasɨbwa'na kyɨwa' yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Gaala kɨnɨnnaka ayawɨdaasai dɨna “Kaaja!” Yɨthaanyi, nɨmɨ ozɨya dɨkwaagɨla pwarɨ tɨnna wanganna. Yɨ a'mwe yɨlamwaalakei gamɨre asɨrɨ sɨkelɨya pɨrɨ' tɨka nya'ne maraya'ne' lɨmwamwa'.

Yɨ gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraalyara mwaaihata saraavɨ tɨnnyaba maangwɨraaya'bɨ' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Yɨ maangwɨraaya daza' dara dɨna “Mɨjɨkegaakɨra. Maalɨtaaya witɨmaa'gula pwarɨ nɨgwia yune paaivɨ kinaayavɨne'na (yɨrɨka gavevɨ wawɨnya ya'ne nɨgwia') gɨmɨ sɨkelɨya dɨmarayɨ! Yɨ maa'gula maalɨka daraai dalyangɨ baaliya (witɨyabɨ') nɨgwia yune paaivɨ kinaayavɨne'na sɨkelɨya dɨmarayɨ! Aawapaaya wɨgainajahaa' kɨrɨ' welivananya yɨdɨke'nesɨ waainɨyasɨ kayaaka migalakɨnna!”
Yɨ Dɨwɨnyai wɨla bukuyavɨ pwɨyɨnɨke' dawaai dawaalya' pyaasɨbwa'na kyɨwa' yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Yɨ gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraalyai aayai sare maangwɨraaya' dɨna “Kaaja!”

Sara kyɨwa' nɨmɨ ayahi tɨnna wanganna. Yɨthaanyi, ozɨya nabalɨkɨlaa'naka pwarɨ wanganna. Yɨ, sarɨ yɨlamwaalɨkerɨ gamɨnne yaya' “Baryabulyɨyala.” Yɨ sahwarɨ Bainɨkeraayabanya' mɨjamaridɨ'nyɨyasɨ. A'mwe yuyavakaavɨ Gotɨyai marajaapaina yaka dɨna “Dɨragɨnya dare' yɨhɨzaawa. Yuyawɨ a'mwe daraai dalyaraavɨ tamyɨvainyɨna yakɨri a'mwe gave pwarɨ dɨramakyi! Gazawɨzawɨ a'mwe daraai dalyaraavɨ tamyɨvainyɨna, gave pwarɨ tamakɨna. Sana sana jidewaaihɨlyɨ. Yɨ sare'ne dɨragɨnya' kihɨzaava'mujɨ yɨ pwaraavɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnyasɨ tamakɨna, yɨ pwaraavɨ mɨjɨka naangesɨ tamakɨna, yɨ pwaraavɨ nalaaya nabinabinyajɨ tamakɨna, yɨ pwaraavɨ laayonɨyarajɨ sɨgyaaryarajɨ dawakɨna jidewaaihɨlyɨ.”

Yɨ Dɨwɨnyai atɨlya' wɨla bukuyavɨ pwɨyɨnɨke' pyaasɨbwa'na kyɨwa' yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. A'mwe bainɨka pwaraavɨre kuryara Gotɨyare kwaraanyaba kwaakewɨ mwaaidapiyaraavɨ wanganna. Sɨnnawɨ a'mwe dazara Gotɨyare yagaalya' dɨragɨnna lɨmwagaresare. Yɨ sara yadɨvɨ' yagaala daza' jalɨkurakesare. Sare'na sahwaraavɨ Gotɨyare yɨkamaangera tamakɨna yesare.

Kurya dazara maangwɨraaya jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨwaa' “Kingɨya Naangeigɨ yuyangɨneigɨ gɨmɨ nawɨ'nya mwaaihɨ. Gɨrɨka maayaigɨ. Yɨ gɨmɨre sabwi yɨ nebulya'na yunewɨnnanyasɨ. Sareigɨ, mena gatha'daregaa' kyɨwawojɨ gɨmɨ kotɨya' a'mwe Kwaakevakɨ mwaaihasaraavɨ jɨtheigɨna'? Yɨ sahwaraavɨ nemɨre tawenna gathɨngaa' dɨrɨvɨkɨ'deigɨna'?”

Sara dɨna kyɨwaa' Gotɨyai gazarɨnazarɨna baazɨ'ma'nya yaake' saamɨnya' wɨjaavɨna. Yɨ wɨjaavɨna yaka sahwaraavɨ wɨdɨna “Sarɨmɨ maalɨkegaa' kave kwaamu' dɨmwaalyi! Dɨvi yɨkamaangera sarɨmɨre avaaiyaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨ, sɨrya'mweraavɨ tamakɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ yɨhɨramaketabaaibɨ' tamakɨpɨ'dehaa'nanyɨ. Yɨ nɨmɨ yawɨ'na yage yunegaa'nera yɨnɨga sara baibɨ'dehaa' yɨ nabaai sarɨmɨre tawejɨ'na tɨvɨkɨrɨdeinyɨ.”

Dɨwɨnyai wɨla ata purɨdaa'nyɨ dalya' bukuyavɨ pwɨyɨnɨke' pyasɨbwa'daa'nyɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna ayahi wanganna. Kwaakevakɨ wɨnɨnya naange' kyɨma'nɨwa' tɨnna wanganna. Yɨ nyɨlyai tɨnga naange' yɨma'nyɨna. Sai yɨrɨka mavuri. Yɨ lawei yuya wayaaka tawe'bɨsa' yɨma'nyɨna.
Sɨgunyavɨya sɨlɨngaamɨnya sa kwaakebanna bwala'na. Yɨsɨla yɨta pihɨyare mya milyadɨ'nyɨ yɨhuta naange' purakɨ'daa'nyɨ bwala'daawadevaaibɨ' kwaakebanna bwala'na.

Sɨgunya kɨrɨsɨ sa' mena wɨna. Yɨ lamulyɨ' pwalagɨ'mwadɨvɨ' wakadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' sɨgunya' gɨ'mwannɨwake' yɨmaanyɨna. Yɨ yuya mugunyajɨ ahu'mannyajɨ kumɨre wa'dɨvɨsaba yagalya'ma'na, yɨ sangina gɨnyɨmwaaina yɨwaa'.

Yɨ kingɨya Kwaakevakɨyarajɨ yɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ mala aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaala naangerajɨ yɨ a'mwe nɨgwɨhɨravɨnakerajɨ yɨ a'mwe dɨragɨnaangerajɨ yɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnya wɨdaayadɨvɨta gazarazarajɨ yɨ pwara kumɨre wawɨnya yadɨvɨta gazarazarajɨ yuya sahwara Kwaakevakɨya situsangɨ lɨka yulyaramaripɨ'dere. Yɨ sɨla mugunya naangengɨ kusawɨ lɨka wɨlapɨ'dere.

Yɨ sahwara yuya mugunyajɨ sɨlaangejɨ jaka dara dɨwaasare “We'! Sarɨmɨ nɨmɨnyɨ a'badaa'nyɨ jɨlanyɨlabwaraama! Gotɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨ, kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaalɨkerɨjɨ yɨ Dɨwɨnyare sɨnna tɨkevɨjɨ lɨka dɨmaraneyulakya!
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Yɨrɨka naanga dazaraare dazagaa' yɨ sɨmɨlɨka wɨladehaakɨ. Kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨrya'ne' dahaa' sa' mena yɨma'nɨwa'. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨnɨga aaihwai daavojɨ yɨ daza' wavɨlavadelaka! Aawa.”

Sa' mena kyɨwa' Kwaakevɨya tɨvimagɨnya dawaai dawaalyaba ejelɨya daraai daraalyara daa'dapi nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sahwara Kwaakevakɨya yɨhuta dawaai dawaalya dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'na. “Dahaa' yɨhuta sa yɨhu'maanarya Kwaakevakɨjɨ saalaalyavɨjɨ yɨta gazarɨzarɨjɨ nyadɨka!” deva dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'na.

Yɨ ejelɨya pwai nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'dimagɨ yidawadaa'nyɨyarɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Ejelɨya sai Gotɨya gaala mwaalɨkere yavɨkwajɨke' lɨmwagaka yɨ sai maangwɨraaya jaka dɨragɨnna naanga'na dɨna. Yɨ ejelɨya daraai daraala dazaraavɨna Gotɨyai dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavakera kwaakesɨ saalaalyasɨ kayaaka yɨgalakya'neraavɨ yɨ sahwaraavɨ jaka dɨna.

Yɨ jaka dara dɨwa' “Sarɨmɨ dahaa' Kwaakevasɨ saalaalyasɨ yɨsarajɨ kayaaka yɨme'nya'bɨ' migalakɨpɨna! Nemɨ nemɨre Gotɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨre yamengɨ gamɨre yavɨkwajɨka pɨkarya yaadehaa'nanyɨ. Sara kyawaajɨ sarɨmɨ sahwaraavɨ migalaki yapɨjɨ gave pwaraavɨ jɨhalakyideihɨlyɨ.”

Yɨ a'mwe yavɨkwajɨka pɨkarya' ma'mwaasaraavɨne ata dahɨlya' kanyɨdɨwa' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwe'. A'mwe sahwaraavɨ pɨkarya wakɨwaka kwala naanga (144,000) sara. Yɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨ yɨta gazavaasavaakɨya pwara yavɨkwajɨka pɨkarya ma'mwaasara.
Yɨ Juthare yɨsavaakɨyara kwalaalyara (12,000) pɨkarya ma'mwaasara. Yɨ Ruvenɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. Yɨ Gaatɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000.
Yɨ Aazare yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. Yɨ Napɨtalaare yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. Yɨ Manaazare yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000.
Yɨ Sɨmɨyonɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. Yɨ Livaayare yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. Yɨ Yɨzakaamɨre yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000.
Yɨ Sevyulanɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. Yɨ Jozepɨyare yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. Yɨ Bejaminɨmɨre yɨsavaakɨyara 12,000. A'mwe dazara yɨ Gotɨyare yavɨkwajɨka pɨkarya' ma'mwaasare.

Yuya daza mena kya', yɨthaanyi, a'mwe kwalaalya naanga naangera yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidapi nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Yɨ kumɨnyɨ a'mwei ata yɨnɨga wi'na gɨlanneraavɨna mɨ'. A'mwe dazara ajɨmya yuyangɨya gazasavɨyaraayawɨjɨ yɨta gazavaasavaasɨyaraayawɨjɨ kɨlaaka nabinabinyajɨyaraayawɨjɨ yagaala ge gejɨyaraayawɨjɨ yɨ sahɨbadaasare. Sahwara kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨre sɨnnyɨkɨjɨ Dɨwɨnya Sipɨzipɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨjɨ daavɨna. Baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka saamɨgwazaaya wakevera yɨ kumɨre asɨraavɨ maimunyarabɨ'ne lɨmwageva
maangwɨraaya naange' jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨwaa' “Nemɨre Gotɨyai sai kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaalɨkelyɨ yɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyalyɨ saraai mena nevadaihasama'mwaalyaraalyɨ. Naangebula!”

Yɨ ejelɨya yuyara kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨjɨ a'mwe naangeraayawɨjɨ gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraalyaraayawɨjɨ daaveva yunewɨnna bathakulaawesare. Yɨ sahwara kingɨnamwaalyɨsayaba gidɨkusaba kumɨre sɨnnyɨ' kwaakewɨ walaruta'nareva Gotɨyarɨ lotuya'na yɨlaaya yɨwaa'.
Sahwara dara dɨna:
“Sahɨrɨsɨ. Nebula naangesɨ.
Nemɨre Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaayabwi wiaana!
Byaanna dɨragɨnya' kuna warana!
Sɨdu'nakeburɨ aaya kaavɨlyala!
‘Su! Su!’ wɨdaana!
Gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makɨlaana!
Dɨragɨnna maremwaalya'nebulyɨ dɨragɨnya naangebulyɨ
Yɨ sahwarebwi kuna kuna warana!
Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' dazabura waragwona!
Sahɨrɨsɨ. Nebula naangesɨ!”
A'mwe naangerajɨya pwai ja'nanyɨdɨwa' “A'mwe baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka saamɨgwazaaya yɨra'neve dazara aaihwaravaavaka? A'mwe saraavɨ jawɨ'mwaa gawɨdaa'nyara?”

Sara kanyɨdɨwa' “Nɨmɨre naangeigɨ, bewara dɨngaka! Nɨmɨ myawɨriwa. Saigɨ yawɨ'manɨgɨ.” Yɨ sai nyɨdɨwa' “A'mwe dazara yɨkamaangeraavɨ taanginya naangejɨ daangejɨ maare'. Yɨ taanginya naanga savɨdaasare. Yɨ kumɨre baazɨ'ma'nya Dɨwɨnyare tawevɨ aalya yesa'nanyɨ. Sarevɨ baazɨ'ma'nya daza yaaka wannyɨna ya'.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sahwara Gotɨyare kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ kusɨmagɨ daa'dɨvɨsare.
Nyɨlyavɨjɨ sawɨsavɨjɨ lotuya yadɨvɨsare.
Gamɨre anga nawɨ'nyavɨ sara yadɨvɨsare.
Kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaaidei ye'mwannamwaalojɨ
Yɨ sahwaraavɨ maredaa'da kɨmata bwakedaavadelyɨ.
Sahwara mɨjɨka ayahi yɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.
Nabaai aalya'na ayahi baibɨ'dera mɨ'.
Nyɨlyai mala tamya'ne'bɨ' dɨragɨnna wɨdathera mɨ'.
Dɨka naanga gazasa' daanga wi'dathera mɨ'.
Dare' nanyɨ. Dɨwɨnya Sipɨzipɨyai wɨmaremwaaladelyɨ.
Kingɨnamwaalyɨsayaba kumɨre maremwaalyai mwaaladei.
Sahwaraavɨ aalɨyɨmɨnya nawɨ'nya yɨrijava wibwarɨdaakwadelyɨ.
Aalya gaala kɨnɨnnake' nya'neraavɨ makwawodei.
Nabaai Gotɨyai kumɨre tɨnnyaraavɨ yɨmwagathelyɨ.
Kɨdalaalya gazasa' yaalɨka kave yɨmwagathei.
Yɨ sahwara kɨnna ayahi dɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.”

Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyai wɨlya' bukuyavɨ pwɨyɨnɨke' ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya' mena marapyasɨbwa'mwa'. Yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ saba yagaala maayawɨ kuna yada nyitaka pimagɨnya'bɨ' (aapɨ-aawaaya sagaa') wavɨla'na yɨwa'.
Wavɨla'na kyɨwa' ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara Gotɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨ daa'dapi nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Yɨ sahwaraavɨna pihulɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya wɨjaavɨna yɨwa'.

Yɨ ejelɨya pwai Gotɨyare kwaraanyaba gidɨkusaba buladaa'na. Yɨ sai maa'gula golɨya' wabatɨrɨnya yɨravayɨhwia'ne' lɨmwagakei. Sahwarɨna paawɨraayana kwalaalya wabatɨrɨnya yɨravayɨhwia'ne wɨjaawakei sai a'mwe Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨre wɨja Gotɨyarɨnejɨ mari'bwarakya ya'nei. Yɨ sahwai kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ kusɨmagɨnya dɨ'bɨnya golɨya warɨka dazavɨ Gotɨyarɨna wɨja Gotɨyarɨna wɨjaaya'bɨsajɨ wabatɨrɨnya' mari'bwarakya ya'nei.
Yɨ paawɨraaya dazangɨre jɨta wabatɨrɨnyasɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨre gamɨnyɨ wɨja yagaalyajɨ ejelɨyare asɨrɨ lɨmwagakevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨlaawaka munyaba Gotɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨ yɨ'ma'mwakengɨ.

Sara yaka sai yɨkunaabɨthɨ'maa'gulya' maaraka dɨke' yɨ dɨkwaraka kwaraanyaba maaraka yɨ maa'gulyavɨ maradɨ'gwalaka yɨ sai dɨke' lɨvaramwake' Kwaakevakɨna waimwaawɨ'. Sai mena kalɨvaramwa' yɨ sagaa' yɨ'munya pilɨna, purinya yɨnnyɨna, yɨnamɨraasavɨre dɨ'baake mwasabɨ' lɨvapɨna, yɨ sagaa' Kwaakeva' wɨnɨnya' yɨna yakengɨ.
Ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala dazara pihulɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala daza lɨmwagarevera pihulɨya pwa'nyɨ makusa'na yavada'galayovɨravalɨmwanna yɨwaa'.

Yɨ ejelɨya aaya mudɨ'nanyai gamɨre pihulɨya' pwa'nyɨ maku'na kyɨwa' sɨrɨmyasɨ dɨkesɨ tawe ye'mwannayɨma'naabɨna yaka Kwaakevakɨna walaraawɨna yɨwa'. Kwaaka yuyangɨ dawaai dasɨmagɨ jaapaina yɨnɨkeba dawaalyaba tewaanya wa'dɨ'nyɨ pɨba saba dɨke' nyɨna. Nabaai yɨta yuyaraavɨ dawaai dasɨmagɨ jaapaina yɨnɨkeba dawaalyaba tewaanya wa'dɨ'nyɨ pɨba saba dɨke' nyɨna. Yɨ kurɨvaarɨya yuyangɨ yɨ sa kɨnɨngɨjɨ dɨke' baihinyɨna yɨwa'.

Yɨ ejelɨya ayawɨdaasai (2) gamɨre pihulɨya' pwa'nyɨ maku'na kyɨwa' mugunya naange' nadaasɨya'bɨsa' dɨka naange' saalaalyavɨna walaraawɨna. Yɨ saalaalya dawaai dasɨmagɨnya jaapaina yɨnɨka davanyaai tewaanya wa'dɨ'nyɨ pimagɨnyavaa' tawe' yɨma'nyɨna.

Saalaalyavɨ gaala mwaaihasaraavɨ maralɨgɨsɨvaina yɨnɨka dawaai dasɨmagɨnya yɨma'nyɨna kyɨwa' yɨ pimagɨnya pɨvaa' mena balɨna yɨwaa'. Yɨ sɨpɨyangɨna maralɨgɨsɨvainɨka dawaai dasɨmagɨnya yɨma'nyɨna kyɨwa' yɨ sɨpɨya pimagɨnya pɨvaa' kayaaka mena yɨnyɨna yɨwa'.

Yɨ ejelɨya ayawɨdaasa pwai daraai dalyai (3) gamɨre pihulɨya' pwa'nyɨ maku'na kyɨwa' sɨlɨngaamɨnya naanga pɨrɨ' dɨ'baake' wana dɨka nebulya'bɨ' yɨdɨwake' yɨ sa' sɨgunyavɨ yɨlamakwasaawaka yɨ bwala'na. Aalya yuyangɨjɨ aalɨyɨmɨnya yuyangɨjɨ sangɨ dawaai dasɨmagɨnya maralɨgɨsɨvainɨka davanyaai wa'dɨ'nyɨ aalya pimagɨnya pɨnɨngɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya' bwala'na.

Sɨlɨngaamɨnya dazavɨne yaya' dara wo'nɨke' “Yɨrɨke'. Kayaakuryava.” Aalya yuyangɨ pimagɨnya savaa' yɨrɨke' yɨma'nyɨna yɨwa'. A'mwe kwalaalyara aalya daza' neva yɨ aalya' kumɨre munyɨkɨ dɨka kubaihinnɨwa' yɨ sahwara mena baimwaa'.

Yɨ ejelɨya ayawɨdaasa pwai daraai daraalyai (4) gamɨre pihulɨya' pwa'nyɨ kamaku'mwa' yɨ nabaai nyɨlyarɨjɨ lawerɨjɨ yuya sɨlɨngaamɨnyangɨjɨ tamɨna yaka yɨ nyɨlyare dawaai dasɨmagɨdaasa pimagɨ yɨgalakɨna. Yɨ lawere dawaai dasɨmagɨdaasa pimagɨ yɨgalakɨna. Yɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnyangɨ dawaai dasɨmagɨdaasa pimagɨ yɨgalakɨna. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ kumɨre baaka pade dahasaai nayaa wa'dɨ'nyɨ baaka pade pimagɨnya' jɨhɨnya ya'na yɨna. Yɨ nyɨlyai yɨrɨkevɨ dahasaalyagaa' naangegaa' (2) nayaa purɨna yada yɨrɨkevɨ maalɨkegaa' (1) mavuri. Yɨ nabaai sawɨta pimagɨnya' sara mavuri yɨwa'.

Yɨ bwaangya naanga pwai sɨgunyavɨ tɨnnyaba pɨlavamaryadaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaazɨ sai maangwɨraaya jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨna “We'! We'! We'! A'mwe Kwaakevakɨ mwaaihata kemwaraavɨna dahasaai dahaa' kale nyɨwa'. Ejelɨya daraai dala pwara pihulɨya pwa'nyɨ kamakurapi yɨ nabaai taanginya naange' sahwaraavɨ yɨma'nadesɨ.”

Yɨ ejelɨya atɨlyai (5) gamɨre pihulɨya' pwa'nyɨ kamaku'mwa' sɨlɨngaamɨnya pwai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ Kwaakevakɨna mena bwala'mwakerɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Yɨ tɨnna kuna wanganna yadaazɨ sahwarɨna kiya' wɨjaavɨna. Kiya daza' yɨrorɨla yune kewewɨnɨ yɨnɨgwalaawaka yɨ daanga maaya dazavɨne tɨkurya' baasa'nesɨ.

Sai yɨrorɨlyavɨ tɨkurya daza' kabaasɨwa' yɨ yɨrorɨlyavɨdaa'nyɨ jɨsa' yɨlɨna. Saaidɨka naangevɨre jɨta sa'bɨ' yɨlɨna yaka nyɨlyarɨjɨ yɨhusavaakɨjɨ galabɨ'jɨ'na kyɨwa' yɨ nyɨlyalyɨ yɨhusasɨ jɨhɨnya yɨma'nyɨna yɨwa'.

Jɨhɨnya yɨma'nyɨna yadaa'nyɨ jɨta savɨdaa'nyɨ baarɨnnyara yɨma'naabɨna yeva yɨ Kwaakevakɨna walaawɨna yɨwaa'. Yɨ sahwara dɨragɨnya' dɨraavalyare dɨragɨnya'bɨ' maarɨna. Yɨ Kwaakevakɨya dɨraavalyara a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgaidɨvɨtabaaibɨ' kayaa'na ya'ne dɨragɨnya' maarɨna yɨwaa'.

Maarɨna yeva yagaalya' dara maarɨna “Sarɨmɨ kurɨvaarɨyangɨjɨ Kwaakevakɨ dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya yɨrɨ'nade sangɨjɨ yɨta gazarɨzarɨjɨ kayaaka migalakɨpɨna! Aawa. A'mwe Gotɨyare yavɨkwajɨka pɨkarya' kumɨre yamengɨ maayaraavɨ yɨ dazaraavɨ kayaaka nayaa jɨhalakyi!

Sarɨmɨ a'mwe dazahwaraavɨ daanga naanga jɨ'mwagyidere. Kuna yɨwopɨjɨ yune lawe atinanyangɨna. Kɨrɨ' sahwaraavɨ tamakya mipɨna!” Yɨ baarɨnna dazara a'mweraavɨna daanga kayaa'nanya' wɨjaavadɨvɨsara. Yɨrɨvaburyara a'mweraavɨ tɨka da'dɨvɨ' daanga wɨjaavadɨvɨtabaaibɨ' wɨjaavɨna.
Yɨ daanga dazagaa' a'mwera balya ya'ne tusa'na bɨ'dɨvɨ' kɨrɨ' sahwara tɨnna mwanganyadɨvɨsare. Arɨkawɨ. Sahwara “Balaana!” kuna yawɨ'dɨvɨsare. Kɨrɨ' baryabwi sahwaraavɨ lɨkaanya wodesɨ.
Baarɨnna dazara ozɨyara mala ya'neraayawɨnnera yawɨmwavedaa'dɨvɨtabaaibɨsare. Kumɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya golɨyabɨsa yɨlarɨkera. Yɨ kumɨre sɨnnyɨ' a'mwere sɨnnyɨ'bɨsɨ'.
Yɨ kumɨre mɨjasa saamɨnaange, a'mwe kɨnɨngɨre mɨjasabɨsa. Yɨ kumɨre maangerɨka kavɨjɨlɨkere maangebɨsa, yɨ laayonɨyare saanyabɨsa.

Kumɨre kɨhɨsangɨ baazɨ'ma'nya kaapaayabɨsa saabya' maredaa'nɨkengɨ. Yɨ kumɨre pɨya kaarɨzɨya kwalaalyabɨ' ozɨyara mwagi'namakwodaapi mala'nera pa'da pa'da yɨnnadevaaibɨ' woryaraavɨre pɨyangɨ pa'da pa'da yɨnɨkesɨ.

Kumɨre suyarɨka yɨrɨvaburyaraavɨrebaaibɨsarɨka. Yɨ suyarɨkɨ kumɨre langerɨ' kwaamɨnya daanga wɨjaaya'ne' kɨnɨnnakerɨ' warɨ'. Nabaai kumɨre langerɨkajɨ daanga naanga daza' a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalya'nera. Sahwara daanga naanga daza' wɨjaaya'ne dɨragɨnya' yune lawe atinanyangɨna maa'nɨkere.

Kumɨnyɨ munyaba kumɨre maremwaaidei yɨ sai yɨrorɨla yune kewewɨnɨ yɨnɨgwalaawɨka yɨ daanga maayavɨya ejelɨyalyɨ. Sarere yaya' Yɨvɨruyagaalyavɨ Aavathonɨ, yɨ Gɨrikɨyagaalyavɨ Aapolɨyonɨ. Yayavɨ aaya kaavɨlyasɨ, “Yuyangɨ Kayaaka Yɨgalakadei.”
Sɨnnawɨnya' taanginya naange' sa' menanyɨ. We' sɨnnawɨnya daza' menanyɨ. Yɨthaanyi, taanginya pɨrɨwaai dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨma'naabathewaai kuna warɨ'.

Yɨ ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwai (6) gamɨre pihulɨya' pwa'nyɨ kamaku'mwa' Gotɨyare sɨnnyɨkɨ dɨ'bɨnya golɨyavɨ saanya dawaai dawaalyaba tɨnnyaba maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' dɨna. Sa' dɨna yadaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwe'.
Yɨ maangwɨraaya daza' ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwai pihulɨya' lɨmwagarɨkerɨ dara wɨdɨna “Aalya naanga Yupɨretɨzɨyavɨya ejelɨya daraai daraala sara wɨla yɨ'nakasara saraavɨ dɨmakwaasa!”

Wɨdɨna kyɨwa' ejelɨya sai ejelɨya daraai daraala saraavɨ makwaasɨna kyɨwa' Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ yɨta davakaai dava'nevɨ jaapaina yada gave pɨvaa'na sahwara tamakya'neraavɨ dahɨlakɨnɨkera yovɨrawakɨgasare. Yɨ sarera aawaaya nyihaanya daza'na, yɨ yɨrɨka dazarɨkɨ, yɨ lawe dazɨkɨ, yɨ kwarame yune dazavɨna wawɨnya daza' ya'nera yovɨrawakɨnɨkere.
Yɨ ata gɨlyara aawɨlasara ozɨyaraavɨ mwaaihasara yɨ tu aadɨretɨ milɨyonɨyara. Kumɨre ata gɨlya'na nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwe'.

Yɨ nɨmɨ a'mabaaitɨnnya' ya'nena tɨnna dara wanganna. Ozɨyaraavɨjɨ ozɨyaraavɨ yɨlamwaaleveraavɨjɨ kumɨre sabwi darera. A'mwera kɨhɨsangɨ baazɨ'ma'nya kaapaaya baazɨ'ma'nevera, yɨ kumɨre kalaaya dazangɨre sa dɨkevɨya wayaaka, yɨ gwaagwaaja yɨ saalɨpaayavɨya awi'ja kɨnɨnnakera. Ozɨyaraavɨre mɨnyagɨnya yɨ kavɨjɨlɨkeibɨta laayonɨyaraavɨre mɨnyagɨnyabɨsangɨ. Yɨ kumɨre maangengɨ dɨkesɨ jɨsasɨ sɨla saalɨpaayasɨ yɨma'naka mwasabɨ' lɨvapɨna.

Kayaa'nanaanga dawaai data daza a'mwe pimagɨnya savaa' tamakɨna. Yɨ yuyaraavɨya davakaai mwaaidakɨlyɨyaraavɨ maramaki yadɨvɨ' yuyaraavɨ davaa' mwaaidɨ'nyɨyaraavɨ tamakɨna. Yɨ dɨka dazasɨ yɨ jɨsasɨ yɨ sɨla saalɨpaayasɨ sahwaraavɨ tamakɨna. Ozɨyaraavɨre maangengɨdaa'nyɨ lɨvapɨna yaka tamakɨna.

Sare' dare'nesɨ. Ozɨya dazaraavɨre dɨragɨnya' tamakya'ne dɨragɨnya' maangikɨjɨ warɨna, lɨkikɨjɨ warɨna. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Kumɨre suya kamaalyarabɨsangɨ. Yɨ kamaaimɨnyagɨnya kɨnɨnnakengɨ. Yɨ dazajɨ a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakadɨvɨsare.

A'mwe yuya pwara, kayaa'nanaanga daza tamakagihɨwakera tɨnna nayaa wanganeva kɨrɨ' kumɨre asajɨ yavɨkaryadɨvɨta sangɨna kumɨre sɨmunyabwi mudɨkebwi kuna myawɨramariwaa'. Arɨkewɨ. Yɨmakeraavɨ lotuya ya sabwi, yɨ kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨ sahwara yavɨkaryadɨvɨta golɨyajɨ sɨlɨvaayajɨ bɨraazɨyajɨ sɨlyarajɨ yɨsarajɨ saraavɨ yɨlaaya'na bule'na wɨjaavadɨvɨtara mɨ'. Yɨ kwaasɨgotɨya dazara yɨ tɨnna yɨnɨga mwanganyadɨvɨ' kadɨka yɨnɨga mu'nyadɨvɨ' kaanya yɨnɨga yamaryadɨvɨtara mɨ'.
Yɨ a'mwe dazara kumɨre a'mwe pwaraavɨ tamakyabulyɨ gɨri'nya yabulyɨ ata lɨmwangebulyɨ kukebulyɨ sasare sabwi kɨburɨna sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaa'dɨvɨtara mɨ'.

Ejelɨya pwai dɨragɨnaangei Sɨgunyabadaa'nyɨ waidavadaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sai gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨ yɨraayasɨ bwaakɨnɨkei, yɨ gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ byaawɨlya' wɨdaa'dɨ'nyɨyai, yɨ gamɨre sɨnnyɨ' nyɨlyaibɨ' yɨdadaa'nyɨ, yɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlyaraai dɨhɨbya'bɨ' dɨtaalɨta saamɨnyawa' yɨdadaasɨya'bɨsaraai.

Sarei gamɨre asɨrɨ bukuya maalɨtaaya pwi lɨmwagakei, yɨ bukuyi tɨlaayɨnaka warɨna yadɨ'nyɨyai. Sai saalaalyavɨ gamɨre sɨvɨla aangasi yɨlakadɨ'nyɨ yɨ kwaakevakɨ sɨvɨla kwanaami yɨlakɨna yaka daavɨna yɨwa'.
Daavɨna yada kavɨjɨlɨkeibɨsai laayonɨyai pwaka dadevaaibɨ' sai jaka naanga dɨragɨnna dɨna. Jaka sara dɨna kyɨwa' sagaa' yɨ'munya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraala sa kumɨre maangwɨraaya pilɨna.

Sara pilɨna kyɨwa' nɨmɨ yawɨ'na “Kumɨre yagaalya' yɨdavɨma!” yawɨ'na yena yɨwe'. Nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaazɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' dɨna “Yɨ'munya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyangɨre yagaala pimwake' sa' gɨmɨre sɨmunyavɨ nayaa marabɨpalemwaaina jɨ! Pɨkarya mida'dɨnna!”
Dɨna kyɨwa' ejelɨya dazai saalaalyavɨjɨ kwaakevakɨjɨ daa'dɨ'nyɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwei “Yagaala naange' dɨma!” daka Sɨgunyavɨ gamɨre aangasi munyaba makina yaka

dɨna “Gotɨyarɨne yayavɨ yagaala nebulya' warya'ne' dɨma! Yɨ Gotɨyai sai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gaala mwaaidei, sai Sɨgunya' wakyaakesɨ yuya Sɨgunyavɨ warɨkejɨ, yɨ kwaakesɨ yuya kwaakevɨ warɨkejɨ, yɨ saalaalya kɨrɨsɨ yuya saalaalyavɨ warɨkejɨ yuya sa wakyaakei gamɨre yayavɨ yagaala nebulya' dɨma! Yɨrɨkerɨ' mena yaja sagaa'. Gotɨyai yemwaala ayahi pɨzɨ'gwa yadei mɨ'.

Aawa. Dɨvi ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyai pihulɨya' kamakurojɨ, yɨ gamɨre jake' kinnojɨ yɨ dazagaa' sagaa' Gotɨyare yoimavajalɨkurakya sa' menanyɨ. Yɨ sa' Gotɨyai wana nebulya'na yadesɨ. Yɨ gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara, gamɨnyɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta saraavɨ nayaa sara wɨdakabaaibɨ' sara yɨma'naabakesɨ!”
Yɨ maangwɨraaya daza' sɨnnawɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ kyɨma'nɨwa' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwe' nɨmɨnyɨ ayahi dara wɨdɨna “Ejelɨya saalaalyavɨjɨ kwaakevakɨjɨ daavakere asɨrɨ bukuya dazi tɨlaayɨnɨka si dɨmaraawa!”

Sara wɨdɨna kanyɨwa' nɨmɨ ejelɨyaryawɨnna kaanna wɨna yena, yɨ sarɨ nɨmɨ wɨdɨna “Bukuya maalɨka dazi dɨnyɨjaama!” wɨdɨna kye, yɨ, sai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Di maara'gɨzɨ tɨka dɨnɨgu'na! Yɨ sa' gɨmɨre munyɨkɨ yɨrɨka gima'nadesɨ. Kɨrɨ' nabaai gɨmɨre maangikɨ kaamyoikwarakebɨ' waburya gyathesɨ.”

Sai mena kanyɨdɨwa' yɨ nɨmɨ ejelɨyare asɨrɨ bukuya maalɨka dazi maarɨna yena yɨ nɨmɨ tɨka nyɨna. Yɨ nɨmɨre maangevɨ yɨ sa' kaamyoikwarakebɨ' waburya yɨna. Kɨrɨ' nɨmɨ mena kanɨwa yɨ sa' nɨmɨre munyɨkɨ yɨrɨka nyɨwa'.

Yɨ nɨmɨnyɨ wɨja' dara dɨnɨ' “Gɨmɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' (yɨkwia' nɨwaanya') yɨma'nadenna nayaa ayahi duzɨwaakɨ! Yɨ kɨlaaka dala nabinabinya kwalaalyara, ajɨmya yuyangɨya kwalaalyara, yagaala ge gejɨya kwalaalyara, kingɨya kwalaalyarajɨ saraavɨna duzɨwaakɨ! Sara ja!”

Nɨmɨnyɨna yannyarɨ' wɨjaavɨna. Yanna sarɨ' yaamɨjɨ yunebanna ya'nerɨ', yɨta kaanya yade mavamarya ya'nerɨ'bɨsarɨ'. Yɨ wɨjaavɨna nyaka nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ wawa'gɨzɨ Gotɨyare anga nawɨ'nyavɨ Gotɨyarɨne kwaraanya kɨrɨvɨjɨ yunebanna yaamɨjɨyɨta dakya! Nabaai sahwarɨna lotuya (yɨlaaya) yadɨvɨta a'mweraavɨna ata dɨhi!

Kɨrɨ' anga nawɨ'nyavɨ kurɨta dazavɨ mwasɨlaa warɨkevɨ yaamɨjɨyɨta mwakɨnna! Sa' yɨ gɨmɨ nayaa yagalya'ma'na jɨ! Waramaryana! Mwasɨmagɨnya daza' yɨ sa' ajɨmya yuyangɨyara mu'nyadɨvɨsaraavɨre' yɨma'nɨwa'. Yɨ sahwara anga naanga nawɨ'nyaba (Jeruzaalemɨ) sɨvɨla paihɨpɨ'dere. Kuna yɨwopɨjɨ lawe 42 (yɨrɨka 1260) yɨdaakupɨ'dehaa'nanyɨ.

Yɨ nabaai nɨmɨ a'mwe pwaraala dazaraai nɨmɨnyɨ jalɨkurakya'neraarɨna maryasaabɨderaalyɨ. Yɨ saraai bekɨya kale'najɨ sɨmunya mudɨkebwi yawɨramaarya'najɨ sa' baazɨ'ma'nakɨlyɨ yɨ nɨmɨnyɨ nyu'nakɨlyɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakikaderaalyɨ. Kuna yɨwokɨlyɨ yune yɨrɨka 1260 sagaa'nanyɨ.”

Saraai yɨta wolivɨyawaalyɨ. Yɨ laamɨvananya' yɨlakya'newaalyɨ. Yɨ sareraai kwaaka yuyavaakɨne Naangere sɨnnyɨkɨ daakɨlyaraalyɨ. Wolivɨwelivananya' laamɨvananyavɨ dɨka yewɨta'dɨvɨ' baaka wannadevaaibɨ' saraai Gotɨyare Kuryare dɨragɨnyavɨ jalɨkurakikaderaalyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwe pwai kwai “Saraarɨ kayaa'na yɨgalɨma!” dozɨ yajai, yɨ nabaai saraare maangevɨdaa'nyɨ dɨke' yɨma'nojɨ sahwaraare yɨkamaangeraavɨ dɨka nakadere. Yo, a'mwei “Saraarɨ kayaa'na yɨgalɨma!” dozɨ yajai yɨ sasare dazaburɨ sai balɨna yadelyɨ.

Saraai dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeraalyɨ. Yuya sagaa' saraai Gotɨyare yagaalya' wɨ'nyɨna yakɨlyɨ pwaraavɨ wɨjɨwakadaakɨlyɨyagaa'na yɨraaya' galalɨmwagya'ne' yɨ burɨke' maya'ne dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakeraai. Yɨ saraai aalya yuya tawe yɨmawakya'neraai, yɨ a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakya'neraavɨ kayaaka dala pɨnɨnnanyajɨ tamya'ne dɨragɨnyasɨyaraalyɨ. Yuya sagaa' saraai “Sara yaka!” dakɨlyɨya' yɨ saraai yɨnɨga wi'na yɨna yɨkaderaalyɨ.

Saraai kɨrɨmɨre jalɨkurakɨwawɨnya' mena kyɨ'mwannakɨri yɨ sɨgyaarya dazai yɨ yɨrorɨla daanga maayavɨ mwaaidei savɨ yagalya'mavojɨ yɨlaabathelyɨ. Yɨ sai saraalyɨ mala bwa'nɨpɨ'delyɨ. Yɨ sai saraarɨ wavɨla'na yojɨ yɨ saraarɨ tamakɨna yaderaalyɨ.

Yɨ nabaai anga naanga dazabanya tutaanya naangevakɨ saraare kɨlaakejɨkaai waradezɨkaalyɨ. Anga naanga daza' Kuryai dadeva ke'ba'nanya'na “Sothomɨma, Yɨzɨpɨma,” wo'nɨkesɨ. Sabanyaai Gotɨyare yɨkamaangera mwalyaasabanyaarɨna sara wo'nɨkesɨ. Da anga naanga dazahɨbanna saraare Naangei yɨta yovihɨrarannɨkevɨ balake'.

A'mwe yuya kɨlaaka dala nabinyajɨ'jɨya pwarajɨ yɨ yɨta savakaavɨyarajɨ yagaala yuyangɨne pwarajɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨya pwarajɨ jalɨkurakya dazaraarɨ tɨnna wangamanɨgasare. Yɨ yɨrɨka darɨkaai darɨ' yojɨ maalɨkegaasɨ yune sagaa'na wangamanɨgasare. Yɨ sahwara a'mwe pwara saraarɨ maralɨkirakya'na “Ya. Gɨlekavi'nɨnnyavɨ wɨlakaana! Wagɨla nuvwa'nadɨka!” yɨnɨga dɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.

Saraai mena baimwaalya'na a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara sahwara yɨlaaya yɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ nabaai sahwara kwarame yadɨvɨ', yɨ tɨka wapaa nadɨvɨ' sɨhumale kwɨya'mweraavɨna wɨjaavɨpɨ'dere. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nadi' a'mwe Kwaakevakɨ mwaaihasaraavɨna wɨdɨwaalya'na dazaraai taanga kayaa'nanya' wɨjaavagɨleraalyɨ.

Yɨrɨka darɨkaai darɨsɨ maalɨkegaasɨ mena kyɨwa' yɨ nabaai Gotɨyai pwa'nyɨ maku'nya gaala ya'ne' kamaryaasɨwa' saraarɨ kwimwa' yɨ saraai dɨkaa'na yagɨla, yɨ kɨrɨmɨre sɨvɨlyi daavɨna yɨwaalyaraalyɨ. A'mwera saraarɨ tɨnna wanganna yeva lɨka naanga yɨwaa'.

Yɨ saraai maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nya' kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Yɨ saraarɨ jaka dɨragɨnna dara wɨdɨna “Kɨrɨmɨ munya davanna jɨlaabila!” Yɨ saraai kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yagɨla munyaba Sɨgunyavɨna yɨraayavɨ yɨlaawɨna. Yɨ saraare yɨkamaangera sara tɨnna wanganna yadaapi saraai yɨlaawɨna yɨwaai.

Yɨ dazagaasagaa' wɨnɨnya naange' yɨma'nyɨna kyɨwa' yɨ anga naangebanya pimagɨnya pɨvaa' yɨ savaa' kayaaka yɨma'nyɨna. Yɨ anga pimagɨnya naangeba pimagɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraai daraalyavaka kuna warɨna. Nabaai wɨnɨnya dazavɨ a'mwe kwalaalyara (7,000) sara mena balɨna. Balɨna kyɨwaa' a'mwe pwara yɨvainɨkera lɨka naanga yadɨvɨ' yɨ sahwara Gotɨya Sɨgunyavɨyarɨne yaya' munyabanna makina yɨwaasaraavɨnera.
Taanginya naanga daraalya' we' pwaraalya' sa' menanyɨ. Yɨthaanyi! Yune maalɨkegaa'na yojɨ yɨ taanginya daraai dalya' yɨ yarai yɨma'nadesɨ.

Yɨ ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyai gamɨre pihulɨya' pwa'nyɨ maku'na kyɨwa', yɨ nabaai, Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ maangwɨraaya pɨnɨ jaka naanga'na dɨragɨnna dara dɨna “Nemɨre Naangei Gotɨyai gannya Kɨraazɨtɨyai Kingɨya dahɨlakyaakerɨ maryasaabakelyɨ maremwaalya Kwaakevakɨya yuya gamɨre yɨma'nɨwakengɨ! Yuyagaa' yuyagaa' sai kingɨyai maremwaaidelyɨ.”
Sara dɨna kyɨwaa' a'mwe naanga tɨwedipoyara Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ kunnya kingɨnamwaalyɨsangɨ mwaaidapiyara kumɨre sɨnnyɨ' kwaakewɨnna walaruta'nareva Gotɨyarɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yeva
dara dɨna
“Naangeigɨ, Gotɨyaigɨ Dɨragɨnya Yuyangɨ Aaya Kaavɨlyaigɨ
Gɨmɨ dahaa' mwaaihɨnyaigɨ kɨgaakuna kuna mwaalagɨneigɨ
Gɨmɨre dɨragɨnya naange' maaragɨna kingɨyaigɨ mwaaihɨnya'na
Yɨ nemɨ gɨmɨnyɨ ‘Su! Su!’ gɨthɨvanɨgo.
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara mu'nyadɨvɨsara gɨmɨnyɨna sɨmɨlɨka wɨlakere.
Kɨrɨ' gɨmɨre sɨmɨlɨka naange' mena yɨma'nɨvanɨ'.
Dahaa' kotɨyavɨ yɨ'maya'negaa' bainɨkeraavɨna yɨma'nɨvanɨ'.
Dahaa' gɨmɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨna tɨvɨkɨta nawɨ'nya wɨjaaya'negaakɨ.
Sara yɨ Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsarajɨ, yɨ gɨmɨre tewaanyarajɨ,
Sahwara lɨka yadɨvɨ' gɨmɨnyɨ dalaangewɨ wɨla'nadɨvɨsara
Yɨ a'mwe kwaakewɨnyarajɨ yɨ a'mwe munyabanyarajɨ.
Nabaai dahaa' a'mwe Kwaakevakɨ mwaalyaraavɨ yɨgalakadɨvɨsaraavɨna,
Yɨ sahwaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakya'negaa' mena yɨma'nɨvanɨ'.”

A'mwe naangera mena devegaa' yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyare anga nawɨ'nya' baasɨna kyɨwa' baasɨnɨka kusawɨ yɨ bukuta Gotɨyare wɨlɨmwagarakevɨre' yɨ sa' ku'maayaba warɨna. Bukuta savɨ Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya ye'mwannajaake' wɨlarɨke' dara yawɨrya'nesɨ. Gotɨyai nemɨjɨ ye'mwannamwaalɨkelyɨ. Sa' ku'maayaba warɨna yadɨ'nyɨ yɨnamɨraasavɨre dɨ'baake mwasabɨ' lɨvapɨna, purinya yɨnnyɨna, yɨ'munya pilɨna, kwaakeva' wɨnɨnya' yɨna, sɨrɨmya naange' bwala'na yakengɨ.

Yɨ sɨgunyavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia naanga pɨrɨ' yɨma'nyɨna. Sa' da'dare'. A'mwe pɨrɨ' mwaalɨna. Yɨ sa' nyɨlyai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ baazɨ'ma'nɨkesɨ. Yɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraarɨ kwaaka dalaangewɨ lawei mwaalɨna. Yɨ gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya kingɨmwaaihɨ'nyangɨ.
Sa' kaimɨraavɨmunya kɨnɨnnake' yɨ kaimɨraaya maarya'ne daange' savɨ yɨma'nyɨna yɨwa'. Yɨ daanga daza' yɨ wana kayaa'nanya'. Yɨ sara wiadaa'nyɨ yɨ sa' kaimɨraaya maarya'negaa'ne jaka dɨragɨnna dɨna.

Kuna jaka dɨna yadaa'nyɨ sɨgunyavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia pɨrɨ' yɨma'nyɨna. Daza' yɨ dare'. Yɨthaanyi! Kabaraawaryaibɨta naanga pwai mwaalɨna. Sai wayaaka yaka yɨ mɨnyagɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya kɨnɨnnakei yɨ mɨnyagɨzaanya atɨraalyajɨyai. Yɨ gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya warɨna.

Yɨ gamɨre suyai sɨgunyavɨya sɨlɨngaamɨnya pɨvaa' wana pada'galabwakɨ'na yasaabɨna yaka kwaakevakɨna maralɨvaramaabɨna. Yɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya pimagɨnyaala savaa'na sɨgunyavɨ kuna warɨna. Yɨ kabaraawarya dazai a'mwe maarya'ne dazavɨre sɨdalikɨ daavɨna, “Kaimɨraayarɨ maarɨma!” dada yadaa'nyɨ. Yɨ sahwai “A'mwe kaimɨraayarɨ mena kamaarojɨya,” daka “Sagaasagaa' kaimɨraaya dazai tɨka maranɨde'na!” daka yemwaaina.

Kuna yemwaaina yadaa'nyɨ yɨ a'mwe' gawaalɨvaangei kaimɨraaya kwalyai maarɨna. Kaimɨraaya dazai dɨvidaa'nyɨ yɨta aayɨnɨyarɨ' lɨmwagozɨ yɨ sasɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨya yuyaraavɨ dɨragɨnna maremwaaladelyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe' kaimɨraayai mena maarɨna kyɨwa' yɨ Gotɨyai kaimɨraayarɨ munyabanna yarai yɨpalamakɨlaawɨna yɨwakelyɨ. Kabaraawaryai “Maranɨma!” daka yɨwakelyɨ. Yɨpalamakɨlaawɨna yaka gannya kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨna makɨlaawɨna kyɨwa' kabaraawaryai maranɨwakei mɨ'.

Mamaranyɨ kyɨwa' yɨ a'mwe daza' a'mwamaaya kunyɨmagɨnna lɨkaanya wɨna. Dazɨmagɨ Gotɨyai gamɨnnebanya' mena yovɨrawakɨnɨkeba. A'mwe savɨ yɨnɨga wi'na 1,260 yɨrɨkerɨkaavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨ' wapaajɨ wɨjaaya'nesɨ.

Sɨgunyavɨ mala naange' yɨma'naabɨna. Ejelɨya naangei Maaikelɨjɨ gamɨre ejelɨyarajɨ sara kabaraawaryalyɨ mala ye'mwannabwa'nyɨna. Yɨ kabaraawarya dazalyɨ gannya ejelɨyarajɨ yɨ sahwara kumɨre malyangɨ ayahi tɨvɨkɨ'na yɨna.
Yaamɨjɨ tɨvɨkɨ'na yɨna yeva kɨrɨ' sahwara malya' wavɨlaya'ne dɨragɨnya' maayare. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ sahwara ayahi yɨnɨga wi'na mwaaibɨ'dera mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ.

Yɨ Gotɨyare ejelɨyara sahwara kabaraawarya naanga dazarɨ kewɨnɨnna maralɨvaranna yɨwaa'. Yɨ kabaraawarya dazai yɨ wana sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' kamaalyai kunanyalyɨ. Yɨ “Yuyaraavɨ Kotɨya Maryadela,” wo'nɨkei, yɨ Saataanɨ Yɨkamaangei (Sɨwaakei) wo'nɨkelyɨ. Sai Kwaakevakɨya a'mwe mwaaihata yuyaraavɨ kwaasɨ yagaala wɨdadelyɨ. Maaikelɨjɨ gamɨre ejelɨyarajɨ Kwaakevakɨna kewɨnɨnna maralɨvaranna. Yɨ gannya ejelɨyara kwaraavɨjɨ maralɨvaramwaasara sara salyɨ ye'mwannɨgwalɨna yɨwaa'.
Yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' jaka dɨragɨnna kadɨwa' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa. Yɨ dara dɨna
“Aawi! Dahaa' nemɨre Gotɨyai yuna nevadaihasamaa'mwa'.
Yɨ ku'maayabanna gannya dɨragɨnya' mena yɨma'naabɨwa'.
Yɨ dahaa' sahwai Kingɨyai mena maremwaaimwa'.
Gannya Kɨraazɨtɨyai Kingɨya dahɨlakyaakerebwi yuna maa'mwa'.
Sare' dare'nesɨ. Dahaa' kewewɨnɨnna mena lɨvaramwaasa'nanyɨ.
Neya'mweraavɨ kotɨya marya'ne dazarɨ yuna lɨvaramwaa'.
Nyɨlyavɨjɨ sawɨsavɨjɨ nemɨre Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ neyɨdaanganaka
Sahwai nemɨnyɨ kotɨya kayaa'na dɨragɨnna maryadelyɨ.
Kɨrɨ' sasarerɨ dahaa' ejelɨyara nayaa lɨvaramwaasarɨnera.
Sara kyɨwaa' sai mena kewɨnɨnna waimwaawɨkerɨnera.
Neya'mwera Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyare tawevɨna malya' wavɨla'mwaa'.
Sahwara gamɨre yagaalya' wɨjalɨkurakevevɨ malya' wavɨla'mwaa'.
Kwaakevakɨ nawɨ'nya mwaalya'na sɨmunya kwalaalya myawɨriwaa'.
Aawa. ‘Yɨkamaangera neramakɨpɨka!’ deva baihana'na yɨwaasare.
Sasare dazaburɨ malya' wavɨlaveva yɨkamaangerɨ marasɨ'nɨwaasare.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ, Sɨgunya'gɨjɨ sahɨba mwaaihasaihɨlyɨ yɨlaaya ji!
Kɨrɨ' Kwaakeva'gɨjɨ saalaalya'gɨjɨ kɨrɨmɨnyɨ mwaaihasaraavɨna we'!
Taanginya naange' sabanyaai mwaaihasaihi sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhima'nade'nanyɨ.
Sarɨmɨnyawɨnna Yuyaraavɨ Kotɨya Maryadei mena waimwaabɨ'.
‘Yune maalɨkegaa'nanyainyɨ daakajɨ,’ sɨnna tɨke' kɨnɨnnakei
Sarɨmɨnyɨ kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna ya'nelyɨ.”
Kabaraawarya dazai tɨnna dara wangamwake' “O, Kwaakevakɨ kewɨnɨnya dawɨnna nyɨmaralɨvaramwaasainyɨ midaaka!” Sara daka a'mwe' kaimɨraaya kwalyarɨ maaraka savɨ mɨjamakuna.

Mɨjamakuna yadaa'nyɨ a'mwe dazavɨna bwaangya kware pɨya pɨrɨwaai wɨjaavɨna kyɨwa' yɨ sa' a'mwamaaya kunyɨmagɨnna yɨnɨga pɨlakwonnesɨ. Yɨ sa' Kamaala naangerɨ lɨke'na menyabanna mwaalya'ne' pɨlakwonnesɨ. Yɨ nabaai sahɨba kwarame dawaai da' yojɨ yɨ kwarame pimagɨnyasɨ kuna yɨwawojɨ wapaaya pada'galamaremwaaladelyɨ.

A'mwe' lɨkaanya kuna wodaa'nyɨ yɨ Kamaala dazai gamɨre maangevɨdaa'nyɨ aalya' kwadaaka mudaasɨya'. Aalya daza' yɨ aalyaaka naange' yada yɨ a'mwe' mɨjamakuna. Kamaalyai dara yawɨ'da “Aalyaake' a'mwe savɨ maramɨlojɨ saba yɨwɨna yana!” sara yɨna yɨwake'nanyɨ.

Aalyaaka naange' a'mwe daza' mɨjamakuna yadaa'nyɨ Kwaakeva' a'mwevɨ gaimwanna. Kwaakeva' maanga taavɨna yada aalya daza' Kamaalyai gamɨre maangevɨdaa'nyɨ kwadaaka mudakade' nɨgu'nyɨna. A'mwe' mamihaasa'na nɨgu'nyɨna.

Sara nɨgu'nyɨna kyɨwa' a'mwe' yuna lɨkaanya kyɨwa' yɨ kabaraawarya dazai a'mwe dazavɨna sɨmɨlɨka wɨlɨna wiwa'. Yɨ sai “Sahɨrɨvɨre kaimɨraaya pwarajɨ malya' mala yɨnaana!” daka kaanya wɨwa'. Kaimɨraaya dazara Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya mɨdɨdɨvɨ' yɨ sahwara Jizaazarɨna jalɨkurakadɨvɨsara mwaaihasare.
Yɨ kabaraawarya dazai saalaalyavɨ maangebaarɨ daa'delyɨ.

Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ sɨgyaarya pwai saalaalyavɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'naabɨna. Sai mɨnyagɨzaanya atɨraalya kɨnɨnnakei yaka nabaai mɨnyagɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyajɨyai. Yɨ gamɨre mɨnyagɨzaanyangɨ kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya atɨraalya warɨna. Yɨ gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyangɨ yaya pɨnɨ warɨna. Yɨ yaya dazangɨre aaya kaavɨlya' yɨ sa' dare'na “Gotɨyarɨne yagaaibɨraizɨka dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya.”

Sɨgyaarya dazai nɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwei yɨ sai lepaatɨyaibɨsai yɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlya' beyare sɨvɨlya'bɨsasɨya' yɨ gamɨre maange' kavɨjɨlɨkeibɨta laayonɨyare maange'bɨsa'. Yɨ kabaraawarya dazai sɨgyaaryarɨna gamɨre dɨragɨnya' wɨjaavɨna. Sarɨ dahɨlakɨna yaka sarɨ sarei kingɨya mwaalɨna ya'na gamɨ saibɨ'na, yɨ sara yaka sarɨna dɨragɨnya naange' wɨjaavɨna yɨwa'.

Sɨgyaaryare mɨnyagɨnya pɨrɨ' yɨ mena davaka baimwanɨke'bɨsa'. Kɨrɨ' mɨnyagɨnya dazavɨya wa'waaya' sa' yaalɨka yɨnnɨke' yaka ayɨna tewaanya yɨma'nyɨna yɨnɨkerɨnera. Yɨ a'mwe yuyara sɨgyaarya dazarɨna lɨka yɨwainɨgulɨna yadɨvɨ' sarɨ mɨdɨnna.

Sara mɨdɨnna yadɨvɨ' kabaraawarya dazai gamɨre dɨragɨnya' sɨgyaarya dazahwarɨna wɨjaawake'na a'mwera kabaraawaryarɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yadɨvɨsare. Yɨ a'mwera Gotɨyai gaverɨ yɨlaaya yɨpɨnebaaibɨ' sahwara kabaraawarya dazarɨ yɨlaaya yɨna. Yɨ sara yadɨvɨ' sɨgyaarya kwarɨjɨ yɨlaaya yɨna yadɨvɨsare. Yɨ sahwara dara dadɨvɨsare “Pwai avaainanyai sɨgyaarya dazaibɨ' aaihwalaka! Sahwalyɨ mala yɨnɨga ye'mwannarannadei aaihwalaka! Sahwarɨ wavɨlavadei daaka! Arɨkewɨ.”

Yɨ Gotɨyai sɨgyaarya dazarɨ wanganakɨna yadaa'nyɨ jaka naanga yaasɨwa' dɨna yada yamarivanɨ'. Yɨ sara yada Gotɨyarɨ yagaaibɨraizɨka yɨvanɨ'. Yɨ sai dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakei maremwaala sasare sabwi ya'ne yɨnɨga wi'na lawe a'mwe pwaraare atɨzɨvɨlɨraai yaka pɨrɨwaalyangɨ (42). Sai dare'bɨ' dɨna “Yuyaraavɨjɨ yuyaburaavɨjɨ wavɨla'dɨnyainyɨ nɨmɨ.”
Sahwai gamɨre maange' taa'da yɨ Gotɨyarɨna yagaaibɨraizɨka yɨvanɨkelyɨ. Sai Gotɨyarɨne yaya' yagaaibɨraizɨka dadelyɨ, yɨ Gotɨyare angevɨnajɨ, yɨ Gotɨyare yɨta dazavaa' Sɨgunyavɨ mwaaihata saraavɨjɨ.

Yɨ Gotɨyai dazarɨ wanganakɨna yadaa'nyɨ yɨ sai Gotɨyare a'mwe tewaanyarajɨ malya' ye'mwannabwa'manɨ'. Yɨ sara yada malya' wavɨla'da yɨ saraavɨ walamarakadere. Yɨ sai dɨragɨnya yɨnɨga wi'nanya' maaraka sai kingɨyai yɨta gazavaasavaakɨyaraavɨnajɨ yɨ kɨlaaka nabinabinyajɨyaraavɨnajɨ yɨ yagaala ge gejɨyaraavɨnajɨ yɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨya gazasavɨyaraavɨnajɨ kingɨyai mwaalɨna.

Yɨ a'mwe Kwaakevakɨ mwaaihata yuyara sɨgyaarya dazarɨ lotuya yɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ gazaizai gamɨre yaya' bukuya gaala mwaalya'nirɨ mida'nikei dazarɨ lotuya yadelyɨ. Bukuya dazi yɨ bukuya Dɨwɨnya Sipɨzipɨyarɨ sɨnnawɨ Gotɨyai Kwaakeva' mwakyaakegaa' tamakɨnɨka sahwarilyɨ.
A'mwei kadɨ'nakeinyɨ daakajɨ sai yagaala dathavɨ kadɨka nayaa pada'galawɨ'nana!
A'mwe kwai kalavuzavɨna wɨya'nei
Kalavuzavɨna nayaa wɨna yana!
A'mwe kwai kwaari'masɨramɨnyavɨ balya'nei
Kwaari'masɨramɨnyavɨ nayaa balɨna yadelyɨ.
Nabaai sasare dazabwi yɨma'naja' yɨ Gotɨyare a'mwe tewaanyara sahwara dɨragɨnna daavapɨjɨ Gotɨyarɨ gamɨre dɨragɨnyasɨ kuna dɨragɨnna lɨmwagapɨka!

Yɨ sɨgyaarya pwai kwaakevɨ kusawɨ dɨkaavaka munyaba yidavadaa'nyɨ yɨ sarɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sai mɨnyagɨzaanya pɨrɨwaai kɨnɨnnakei mɨnyagɨzaanya sipɨzipɨdɨwɨnyare'bɨsawaalyɨyai. Yɨ kabaraawaryai yagaala dadevaaibɨ' dadei.

Ayahidaasa sɨgyaarya dazai yɨ sai dɨragɨnya yuya' maremwaala sɨgyaarya aaya mudɨkere' maaraka yɨ sai aaya mudɨkere sɨnnyɨkɨ dɨragɨnya dazasɨ wawɨnya yadei. Sai wawɨnya dɨragɨnna yade'na sɨgyaarya aaya mudɨ'nanya dazarɨna Kwaakevakɨjɨ sahɨba mwaaihata saraavɨ sara lotuya yadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' wa'waaya kayaa'nanya' sahwarɨ yɨnahu tamakya'ne' sa' mena yaalɨka yɨlakerɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨna dɨragɨnna yada Kwaakevakɨyara yɨlaaya yɨna yadɨvɨsalyɨ.

Sɨgyaarya ayahidaasai yɨbwarɨdaakwia'ne, atɨka maru'narya'ne dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya naange yadelyɨ. Atɨka maru'narya'ne pɨrɨ' yɨ sa' yɨ dare'. A'mweraavɨre tɨnnyarɨ dɨke' yɨra'daa'nyɨya' sɨgunyavɨ yagalya'ma'da kwaakevakɨna walaabɨna.

Sai sɨgyaarya aaya mudɨkere tɨnnyarɨ atɨka maru'narya'ne dala nabinabinya yɨvanɨkelyɨ. Yɨ sasare dazabwi sai a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ kwaasɨ yɨjɨwaaidevulyɨ. Sai Kwaakevakɨya a'mweraavɨ dara wɨdada “Sɨgyaaryarɨ' a'mwa'mwe' sarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlya'ne' nayaa jɨla! Yɨ sɨgyaarya dazai sɨnnawɨ kɨgaa' kwaari'masɨramɨnya' dawakakei sarɨ, kɨrɨ' sai gaala ayɨna mwaalɨ'. Yɨ sarerɨ lotuya kuna nayaa jɨla!”

Yɨ Gotɨyai sarɨ wanganakɨna yadaa'nyɨ yɨ sai sɨgyaarya pware a'mwa'mwevɨna sɨmudɨnya' wɨjaavanɨ'. Yɨ a'mwa'mwe daza' yagaala ja'na wɨjaavɨna. Yɨ nabaai a'mwe pwara sɨgyaarya sare a'mwa'mwe dazavɨna lotuya mi kyapɨjɨ yɨ a'mwa'mwe sa' saraavɨna dɨna “Sareraavɨ yarai dɨramakyɨla!” yɨ sara ya'na sɨmudɨnya' wɨjaavɨna.

Yɨ sɨgyaarya ayahidaasai “Sara jɨla!” kadɨwa' yɨ pwara a'mwe yuyaraavɨ “Aangasɨrɨ midaakajɨ. Yamevɨ midaakajɨ.” deva “Sɨgyaaryarera daaka!” ja'ne baave pɨrɨ' pɨkarya yavɨkaridɨvɨsa'. Yɨ a'mwe maalɨkeraavɨjɨ a'mwe yaya' kɨnɨnnakeraavɨjɨ kwaraavɨ, yɨ a'mwe nɨgwɨnakeraavɨjɨ a'mwe gɨlyɨvɨ'maayaraavɨjɨ kwaraavɨ, yɨ a'mwe kumɨrenna yadɨvɨsaraavɨjɨ a'mwe yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨjɨ kwaraavɨ, yɨ yuya sareraavɨ baave pɨrɨ' pɨkarya yavɨkaridɨvɨsasɨ.

Sarevɨ yɨ nabaai “Kɨmaakɨya dakyɨla!” kadɨwaa' a'mwei baave daza' kunei sɨgyaarya dazarɨne yaya' pɨrɨ', gamɨnne yayavɨne ata gɨlya kɨrɨ' yɨ sai gɨlyɨvɨsa a'mweraavɨ mubathei mɨ'. Yɨ sahwara gamɨnyɨ mubɨpɨ'dei mɨ'.
Yɨ nemɨ daza'na sɨmunya nayaa yawɨraa! A'mwe sɨdu'nakei sai sɨgyaaryare nabaayavɨ ata nayaa dɨhɨla! Daza' yɨ a'mwe kwarɨne ata gɨlyasɨ. Yɨ a'mwe dazarɨne ata gɨlya' yɨ sa' 666.

Nɨmɨ tɨnna ayɨna wanganna. Yɨthaanyi! Mugunya Saayonɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyai daa'dɨ'nyɨ yɨ a'mwe kwalaalya (144,000) sara sahwalyɨ ye'mwannadaa'dapi tɨnna wanganna. Sahwara kumɨre yamengɨ Dɨwɨnyarɨne yayasɨ yɨ gannya Ganɨmaangerɨne yayasɨ yɨda'nɨkera mwaaiha'.

Yɨ purinya nawɨ'nya Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ kyɨnnɨgavɨwa' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa. Purinya sa' aalya naange aalɨjaka yɨnnadevaaibɨ', yɨ yɨ'munya pida jaka naanga yɨnnadevaaibɨsa'. Nɨmɨ purinya daza' kadɨka wɨ'nɨwe' yɨ sa' pɨradaza'bɨsavɨ. Yɨ sa' arɨnga a'mwera gitaaya tadaapi pɨradazɨyagaala yɨnnadevaaibɨsa'.

Sahwara Gotɨyare kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ kusɨmagɨjɨ yɨ daraai daraala gaala kɨnɨnnakeraavɨ tɨnnyarɨjɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨ tɨnnyarɨjɨ saba daata mudɨka pɨrɨ' dɨna yɨvanɨga'. A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ a'mwe (144,000) kwalaalya dazara ayɨna mubɨnɨkera yune sahwara daata daza' yawɨramaapɨnere. Aane pwai kwai aawa.

A'mwe dazara sahwara a'mwe sajɨ gɨrɨkita'nanya sabwi yevera mɨ'. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sahwara sɨdɨraaya nawɨ'nya mwaaidɨvɨtabaaibɨsara Gotɨyarɨ yagalya'mavetara mɨ'. Kwaakevakɨya kayaa'nanya saburaavɨ lɨmwagetara mɨ'. A'mwe dazara sahwara Dɨwɨnyai “Saburɨ kaanya wɨma!” dada yadevanyarɨ mɨdɨnna yadɨvɨsare. A'mwe dazara sahwara a'mwe pwaraayawɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai ayɨna mubakere. Gotɨyai gannyaraavɨ maarakera, Dɨwɨnyai kwarɨjɨnera. Yɨ tɨka munne aaya mudɨ'nanya Gotɨyarɨna wɨjayaatabaaibɨ' sahwara Gotɨyalyɨ Dɨwɨnya Sipɨzipɨyalyɨ saraarera aaya mudɨ'nanyara mwaaiha'.
Sahwara kumɨre maangevɨ kwaasɨ yagaala kunera. Kwaasɨ yagaala majadɨvɨsara. Sahwara yɨwetawakya maayara.

Yɨ ejelɨya pwai sɨgunyavɨ tɨnnyaba kavɨlakuwa' nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna. Sai yagaala tewaanya' yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne' kɨnɨnnakei. Yɨ sai yagaala daza' a'mwera kwaakevakɨ mwaaihasaraavɨ wɨjɨwaakya'nei. Sai ajɨmya yuyangɨya gazasavɨyaraavɨjɨ yɨta gazavaasavaakɨyaraavɨjɨ yagaala ge gejɨyaraavɨjɨ kɨlaaka nabinabinyajɨyaraavɨjɨ wɨjɨwaakya'nelyɨ.

Sai maangwɨraaya jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨna “Yɨrɨkegaa' mena yɨma'nɨwa'. Gotɨyai a'mwe yuyaraavɨ kotɨyavɨ maryawɨbwarya'ne'na sarɨna lɨka nayaa yadɨvɨ' gamɨnne yaya' munyaba dɨmakɨlyi! Byaanna kɨnɨnnakerɨ yɨlaaya ji! Sɨgunya' sasɨ kwaakesɨ saalaalyasɨ aalɨyɨmɨnya yuya kɨnɨjɨ yavɨkaryaakei Gotɨyarɨ lotuya nayaa ji!”

Ejelɨya aaya mudɨ'nanyai mena pɨlakuna wɨna kyɨwa' munyaba ejelɨya pwai mɨdɨnaabɨna yaka dɨna “Anga naanga Bavɨlonɨ sa' kayaaka yada mena bwala'mwa'. Mena bwala'mwa'. Anga naanga Bavɨlonɨ dazahɨba yadevwi a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyara gamɨre gɨrɨkita'nanya dɨragɨnyabwi mɨdɨnya'na yɨ dare'bɨsasɨ. Sa' waainɨya dɨragɨnya' wɨjavadaasɨ sahwara nyɨna. Kɨrɨ' sare'na Gotɨyai yuyaraavɨna sɨnna tɨke' wɨdaya'ne' yɨma'nɨwakesɨ.”

Yɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ ejelɨya pwai saraarɨ mɨdɨnaabɨna yaka jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨna “Nabaai a'mwe kwai sɨgyaarya aaya mudɨ'nanya dazarɨna yɨ gamɨre a'mwa'mwerɨnajɨ lotuya yajai yɨ ‘Baave' yamevɨ maarɨde' dɨngaka? Asavɨ maarɨde' dɨngaka?’ dada maarojɨ

yɨ yajai gamɨ sahwai waainɨya pɨrɨ' nadelyɨ. Waainɨya daza' yɨ Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya'na. Gotɨyai aayagaa' aalyasɨ waainɨya sasɨ ye'mwagakya yaka mɨ'. Aawa. Nabaai sai waainɨya sa' gamɨre sɨnna tɨke' yɨ kaapɨya kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨrya'nevɨ dɨmavadelyɨ. Sara dɨmavawɨjaavɨna kyojɨ a'mwe dazai sɨgyaaryare baavanakei yune nadelyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe dazai daanga kayaa'nanya' maaradelyɨ. Yɨ ejelɨya nawɨ'nyaraavɨre tɨnnyarɨjɨ yɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyare tɨnnyarɨjɨ dɨka awitalange'na warɨkevɨ sɨla saalɨpaaya nadevɨ kayaa'nanya daza' maaradelyɨ.

Yɨ jɨsa' yida dɨka dazavɨ yɨ sareraavɨna daange' wɨjaavɨna. Yɨ jɨta daza' nabaai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' yimwaainagothe'. Yɨ a'mwe dazara sɨgyaaryarɨ gamɨre a'mwa'mwerɨjɨ lotuya yadɨvɨsarajɨ baave' gamɨnne yayavɨne' maarajai gazaizalyɨ sara nyɨlyavɨjɨ sawɨsavɨjɨ kave kwaamusabwi maapɨ'dera mɨ'.”
Sasare dazabwi yɨma'najavɨ yɨ Gotɨyare a'mwe tewaanyara dɨragɨnna daapɨka! Yɨ a'mwera Gotɨyare kɨwɨnya mɨdɨnna, yɨ Jizaazarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwagapɨjara dɨragɨnna daapɨka!

Yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaazɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' dara dɨna “Pɨkarya dara jɨtha'! ‘Dahaa'daasɨ a'mwera Naangerɨ dɨragɨnna wɨlamwaaidɨvɨ' jalɨkurakadɨvɨ' yɨ balapɨjɨ a'mwe bainɨka dazara yɨ sahwara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winadere.’ ” Kurya Tewaanyai kwalyɨ dɨvanɨ' “Yo, yɨ sahwara yadɨvɨta yagɨyagɨ wawɨnya daza, daanga maa'dɨvɨta daza yagalya'mavapɨjɨ yɨ kave mwaaibɨ'dere. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sahwara yaasɨwa' wɨya yadɨvɨ' mɨ'. Aawa. Sahwara tewaanya yadɨvɨta sabwi, yɨ daza' sahwarajɨ ye'mwannɨgwɨya yade'. Yɨ kumɨre dɨragɨnyabwi ku'maayabanna yɨma'naabathesɨ.”

Nabaai nɨmɨ tɨnna ayɨna wanganna. Yɨthaanyi! Yɨraaya yaaka pɨrɨ' wa'dɨsɨ yɨ pwai yɨraayavɨ A'mweraavɨne Kaimɨraayaibɨsai yɨlamwaalɨ'. Sai gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya golɨya' kɨnɨnnakei. Yɨ sai gamɨre asɨrɨ kwaari'masɨ' wana lɨka gurɨmaanga dɨ'bwarakɨnɨki' lɨmwagakei.

Yɨ Gotɨyare Anga nawɨ'nyavɨdaa'nyɨ ejelɨya pwai walyaabɨna yaka yɨraayavɨ mwaalɨka dazarɨ jaka naanga dara dɨna “Gɨmɨre kwaari'masɨsɨ witɨya tɨka munne dɨthaka! Yuya tɨka munne Kwaakevakɨya mya mena yɨlake'na dɨthaka! Yɨ dahaa' yɨrɨka tɨka munne daza maarya'negaakɨ.”
Sara kudɨwa' a'mwe dazai yɨraayavɨ mwaalɨkei sai gannya kwaari'masɨ' lɨmwagarakisɨ tɨka munne Kwaakevakɨya mya yɨlake davɨna yaka maryɨ'bwarakɨna yɨwakelyɨ.
Yɨ ejelɨya pwai Anga nawɨ'nya Sɨgunyavɨ mannɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ walyaabɨna. Nabaai sai kwalyɨ kwaari'mata dɨ'bwarakɨnɨki' lɨmwagakerɨnera.

Yɨ nabaai ejelɨya pwai kwaraanyaba yagalya'mavaka kaanna bɨna. Yɨ ejelɨya dazai dɨkevɨ maremwaalya'ne dɨragɨnya' kɨnɨnnakei. Yɨ sai ejelɨya kwaari'mata lɨka gurɨmaanga dɨ'bwarakɨnɨki' lɨmwamwakerɨ jaka dɨragɨnna wɨdɨna mu'nyadɨvɨsaraavɨna “Gɨnnya kwaari'mata dazɨ' lɨka dɨ'bwarakɨnɨki' maara'gɨzɨ yuya tɨka munne Kwaakevakɨya gɨraipɨwɨlyabaarɨya dɨtha'! Yɨ mari'bwarakɨna yɨja warɨna ya! Gamɨre tɨka munne yuya, gɨraipɨya yuya mya mena yɨlake'na sara dɨthavamari'bwarakya!”

Sara wɨdɨna kyɨwa' ejelɨya dazai gamɨre kwaari'masɨ' lɨmwagaka yɨ Kwaakevakɨya yuya tɨka munne wɨla gɨraipɨyavɨya yɨme'nya'bɨ' kɨhɨmavamaa'na yaka yɨ mari'bwarakɨna. Yɨ sai kɨhɨmavamaa'na, sɨla naanga gɨraipɨya tɨma'mwanga ya'nevɨ kusawɨ tɨka munne daza mari'bwarakɨna. Sɨla naanga daza' yɨ Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨka wɨdayasɨ.

Yɨ anga naangeba mwasɨlaa warɨka sɨla dazavɨ pwai gɨraipɨya yuya tɨma'mwanna. Sara yadaa'nyɨ sɨla savɨ mwasɨlaa tawe' walyaabɨna. Tawe walyaabɨna yada kaanya kuna kuna wawoka yune 1,600 sɨtaathɨyamɨya (300 kilomitaayavɨna) yaka munyaba ozɨyaraavɨre maangeyabanna (a'mwe tutaayai yunebanna) yɨnɨga wi'na yɨlaabɨna yɨwakesɨ.

Yɨ nɨmɨ Sɨgunyavɨ yɨbwarɨdaakwia pɨrɨ' warɨkevɨ tɨnna wanganna. Yɨbwarɨdaakwia sa' naange', yɨ atɨka maru'nakulya'ne'. Yɨ dara wanganna. Ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyara kayaa'nanya a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalya'ne lɨmwamwaasa'. Nabaai kayaa'nanya daza mena kyɨwawojɨ kwaakevɨ ayahi pɨrɨ' yɨma'naabathe' mɨ'. Kayaa'nanya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala dazangɨ Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya' sa' mena yɨwɨna yadesɨ.

Yɨ nɨmɨ naange' saalaalya'bɨsa' tɨnna wanganna. Sa' sɨnɨmwavananya'bɨsa' dɨkesɨ ye'mwagakɨnɨkabaaibɨsa'. A'mwera malya' wavɨla'na yadɨvɨ' sɨgyaarya dazarɨ marulawakɨna yɨwaa'. Yɨ sahwarɨjɨ yɨ gamɨre a'mwa'mwerɨjɨ yɨ ata gɨlya gamɨnne yaya' dahɨlakakevɨjɨ marulawakɨna. Yɨ sahwara saburɨna “Aala!” yɨwaasara. Sahwara saalaalya aaizɨya'bɨta dazavɨ daavɨna. Sahwaraavna Gotɨyai pɨradazabɨsa mena wɨjaavake lɨmwanna.
Sahwara Mozɨzai Gotɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyare daasa', Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyarɨne daasa' dɨna. Daata daza' yɨ dare'na
“Naangeigɨ Gotɨya Dɨragɨnya Yuya Kɨnɨnnakeigɨ!
Yuya yadɨnya naangengɨ! Atɨka maru'nakuidaanyangɨ!
Kingɨyaigɨ a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ maremwaaidɨnyaigɨ!
Gɨmɨre saburaavɨ yɨda'maraangengɨ! Nebulya'na yunewɨnnanyangɨ!
Naangeigɨ nawɨ'nya gɨrɨ'maayaigɨ gave yune pwainanyaigɨnyɨne'na
Gɨmɨnyɨna yɨ lɨka mi yadei aaihwalaka!
Gɨmɨnyɨne yaya' munyaba mamakɨlyɨ yadei aaihwalaka!
Gɨmɨre yɨda'nanya nawɨ'nyabwi ku'maayaba mena yɨma'nɨwake'na
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara gɨmɨnyawɨnna lotuya bahipɨ'deigɨnyɨ.”
Dɨvidaasɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna ayɨna wanganna yadaazɨ yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ Anga nawɨ'nya' lotuanga selɨ ange' jalɨkurakya'ne' sa' baasɨnyɨna.

Yɨ baasɨnyɨna yɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraala dazara a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalya'ne kɨnɨnnakera walyaabɨna. Sahwara baazɨ'ma'nya nawɨ'nyaange wana gɨrɨ'maaya yaka lɨvamwaja yadaasɨya yɨra'nevera. Yɨ sahwara munnaanya golɨya pwɨyɨnevera, kumɨre kɨhɨsavɨ yunebanna pwɨyɨnevera.

Yɨ gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraalyaraavɨdaasai pwai ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyaraavɨna dɨzɨya golɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalya wɨjaavɨna. Yɨ Gotɨyai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' gaala mwaaidere sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya' yɨ sa' dɨzɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraala dazangɨ yunebanna maanga yeku'narɨ'.

Sagaa' Gotɨyare byaannyasɨ dɨragɨnyasɨ sawaarɨdaasɨ jɨsa' anga nawɨ'nya dazavɨ yunebanna wɨlarɨ'. Yɨ anga dazavɨ kusawɨ yɨnɨga wi'na wɨladei aane pwai kwai mɨ'. Aawa. Pwara nayaa yemwaaibɨ'dere. Ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyara kayaa'nanaanga ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalya sangɨ kumɨre wawɨnya' mena kyɨ'mwannapi sahwara Anga nawɨ'nya dazavɨ wibɨ'dehaa'nanyɨ.

Yɨ anga nawɨ'nyavɨ kusawɨ maangwɨraaya naanga pɨrɨ' kyɨma'nɨwa' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nɨwa. Sa' ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraala dazaraavɨ jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨna “Sarɨmɨ kaanya wawopɨjɨ dɨzɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraala daza Gotɨyare sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya' kɨnɨnnake dɨthɨmayɨla! Nabaai Kwaakevakɨna walaawade'na!”

Yɨ ejelɨya aaya mudɨ'nanyai gamɨre dɨzɨya' kwaakevɨna dɨmavaawɨna. Yɨ wa'waaya (sokwavaanya) dɨragɨnya wana kayaa'nanya, daanga pɨnya'ne a'mweraavɨ yɨma'nadere. Yɨ a'mwera sɨgyaaryare baave' kɨnɨnnakera, yɨ sahware a'mwa'mwerɨ lotuya yadɨvɨsara sareraavɨ yɨma'nadere.
Yɨ ejelɨya ayawɨdaasai (2) saalaalyavɨ gamɨre dɨzɨya' dɨma'na. Yɨ saalaalya' a'mwe bainɨkerabɨta tawe' yɨma'nyɨna. Yɨ yuya saalaalyavɨ gaala mwaaihasa, sa mena balɨna.
Yɨ ejelɨya daraai dalyai (3) aalyangɨjɨ aalɨyɨmɨnyangɨjɨ gamɨre dɨzɨya' dɨma'na. Yɨ yuya daza tawe' yɨma'nyɨna.
Yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaazɨ ejelɨya aalyangɨ maremwaaidei dɨna
“Gɨmɨre kotɨyavɨ kayaa'nanya dazaburaavɨ maryawɨbwa'dɨnya'na
Nawɨ'nya nebulyaigɨ! Yɨ yɨda'maraangeigɨ mwaaihɨnyaigɨnyɨnera.
Dahaa' mwaaihɨnyaigɨ, sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna mwalyeigɨ!
Kayaa'nanyara gɨmɨre tewaanyaraavɨjɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyaraavɨjɨ tamakesare.
Yɨ tamakadɨvɨ' kumɨre tawejɨ' dɨmavesare.
Sarevɨ sahwara nɨpɨ'de'na aalɨtawe' wɨjawaanyare.
Kunnya kayaa'nanya tɨvɨkɨsa' ma'mwaasa' tewaanyasɨ.”
Sara dɨna kyɨwa' yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaazɨ kwaraanyaba gamɨ sa' jaka dara dɨwa'
“Yo, Naangeigɨ Gotɨyaigɨ Dɨragɨnya Yuya Kɨnɨnnakeigɨ
Sareraavɨ maryawɨbwa'mwaanyanna nebulyabwi yunewɨnna yɨda'maraangesɨ.”
Yɨ ejelɨya daraai daraalyai (4) gamɨre dɨzɨya' nyɨlyarɨ dɨma'na kyɨwa' yɨ Gotɨyai nyɨlyarɨ wanganakɨna yadaa'nyɨ sai a'mweraavɨ dɨ'daanya wi'nɨwa'.

Nyɨlyare dɨka naanga daza' yɨ sa' dɨ'daananga kuna yada yɨ a'mwe dazaraavɨ dɨ'daananga wi'nyɨna. Yɨ sahwara Gotɨyarɨne yayavɨ bɨraiyagaala dɨna. Yɨ Gotɨyai kayaa'nanaanga dazangɨ yɨdɨkaa'devurɨne dɨragɨnya kɨnɨnnakei. Kɨrɨ' sahwara bɨraiyagaala dɨna, sɨmunya mudɨkebwi myawɨramaaryadɨvɨ' yɨ gamɨnne yaya' byaannake' makidɨvɨtara mɨ'.

Yɨ ejelɨya atɨlyai (5) gamɨre dɨzɨya' sɨgyaaryare kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ dɨma'na. Sara dɨma'na kyɨwa' jɨhɨnya' sɨgyaaryai maremwaaideraavɨ jɨnnyɨna. Sahwara daanga kayaa'nanya' kuna maarɨna yɨwaasavɨdaa'nyɨ kunnya taalɨsa tɨka da'nɨvanɨga'.

Sahwara kunnya daangennajɨ wa'waayannajɨ yawɨ'dɨvɨ' yɨ Gotɨya Sɨgunyavɨyarɨ yagaaibɨraizɨka yɨna. Kɨrɨ' sahwara sɨmunya mudɨkebwi myawɨramaaryadɨvɨ' yɨ kumɨ yadɨvɨta saburaavɨna bule'na mujaayɨ yɨwaa'.

Yɨ ejelɨya ata purɨdaasɨ pwainanyai (6) gamɨre dɨzɨya' Aalya naanga Yupɨretɨzɨyavɨ dɨma'na kyɨwa' yɨ aalya sa' yaalɨka yunewɨnna yɨlɨna yaka tusa' nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'dimagɨdaa'nya kingɨyara kaanya bya'nevɨ yawɨbwarakɨna.

Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ nyaabulyabɨsa daraai dala yɨmakera bɨna. Yɨ kabaraawaryare maangevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ sɨgyaarya sare maangevɨdaa'nyɨ yɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakade kwaasɨya sare maangevɨdaa'nyɨ daraai dalyara walyaabɨna.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Kulaka kayaa'nanya dazahɨnɨza yɨmakeraavɨre kulakengɨ. Nabaai yɨjɨwaala dala nabinabinya, atɨka maru'narya'ne yadɨvɨsare. Sahwara Kwaaka yuyavakɨ mwaaihasaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨta kingɨyaraayawɨnna kaanya wɨna yɨwaa'. Sahwaraavɨ “Mari'bwarakaana!” deva mala bwa'nya'nevɨ Gotɨya Dɨragɨnya Yuya Kɨnɨnnakere yɨrɨka naanga dazagaa'nevɨ makabɨna.

“Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmɨ a'mwe kukei bi'ma'devaaibɨ' sarɨmɨnyawɨnna bi'mavɨdeinyɨ. Sarevɨ yɨ nabaai a'mwei se mwaryojɨ, yɨ gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya kannyɨla gamɨnyaba nayaa maremwaaidei mwaalojɨyai yɨ sai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga winɨkela! Yɨ sahwai yune kɨlaakejɨ'nanyai yamaryade'na mɨ'. Yɨ a'mwera gamɨre wagɨlya' wangabɨ'de'na mɨ'.”
Yɨ yɨmaka sahwara sɨmagɨ Yɨvɨruyagaalyavɨ “Aamaahethonɨ,” wo'nɨkebanna kingɨya dazaraavɨ marirakurakɨna yɨwaa'.

Yɨ ejelɨya ata purɨdaasɨ pwaraalyai (7) gamɨre dɨzɨya' sɨgunyavɨya yɨhusavɨ dɨma'na. Yɨ Sɨgunyavɨ Gotɨyare Anga nawɨ'nyavɨ gamɨre kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ maangwɨraaya naanga pɨrɨ' jaka dɨragɨnna dada yɨ jaka daza' mwasabanna yɨnɨgwalyaabɨna. Sa' dara dɨna “Mena yɨma'nɨwaabɨ'!”

Dɨna kyɨwa' yɨ yɨnamɨraata baake mwasa'bɨ' lɨvapɨna, yɨ purinya yɨnnyɨna, yɨ yɨ'munya pilɨna, yɨ wɨnɨnya naange' yɨma'nyɨna. Wɨnɨnya daza' yɨ sa' naangaange', yɨ yuyagaa' a'mwera Kwaakevakɨ gaai mwalyaatagaa'daasɨ wɨnɨnya pɨnɨ aawa. Sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakuna wɨnɨnya pɨrɨ' daza'bɨ' naanga sasara yaka mɨ'.

Wɨnɨnya naanga daza' yɨma'nyɨna kyɨwa' anga naanga daza' davakaai dava' yɨma'nyɨna. Yɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨre anga naanga sa wala'na yada yɨ kayaaka yɨnyɨna. Yɨ Gotɨyai Anga naanga Bavɨlonɨ dazavɨna sɨmunya yawɨ'na yaka kaapɨya waainɨya' kɨnɨnnakei wɨjaavɨna kyɨwa' sa' yuneba nyɨna. Waainɨya daza' yɨ sa' Gotɨyare sɨmɨlɨka naangevɨne sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya'.
Yɨ ahu'manna yuyara lɨkaanya mena wɨna, yɨ ayahi mugunya pɨrɨ' mwaryawɨ. Mabɨramaaryawɨ.

Yɨ lɨvɨku'jɨzɨrɨmya naange walaabɨna. Yɨ yuyawɨ sɨrɨmya pwaina pwainanyara taanga saaigɨlyavɨrebɨ' yɨna yaka. Daza sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walaabaka yɨ a'mweraavɨ a'ba bwala'na. Yɨ sahwara wana kayaaka naanga yɨnyɨna sɨrɨmyangɨ. Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ sɨrɨmya daza sahwaraavɨ kayaaka naanga yɨgalakɨwakenna Gotɨyarɨ bɨraizɨka wɨdɨna.

Ejelɨya pwai, ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara dɨzɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalya kɨnɨnnakeraavɨya pwai yɨ sai baka nɨmɨnyɨ dara wɨdɨna “Kaaja! A'mwe yaasɨwa'na marapɨnamaryade naange' aalya kwalaalyangɨ yɨlamwaalɨke' gannya tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya' maaradevɨna givwarɨdaakude'nanyɨ.

A'mwe dazasɨ Kwaakevakɨya kingɨyara gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsa'. Yɨ a'mwe yuya Kwaakevakɨyara sara kwarajɨ a'mwe dazavɨre waainɨya' ye'mwannanadɨvɨsare. Yɨ waainɨya sa' gamɨre gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi. Yɨ sara yeva a'mwei biyaaya nada yɨmaka widevaaibɨ' sahwara yɨraataate lawalawe yɨma'nyɨna yesare.”

Yɨ Kurya Tewaanyai nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna bulamwaaina kanyɨwa' ejelɨya sai kwaaka a'mwera maayabanna nɨmɨnyɨ makuna. Yɨ dazɨmagɨ a'mwe pɨrɨ' sɨgyaarya wayaaka pwarɨ munyaba yɨlamwaaidɨ'nyɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwa. Sɨgyaarya dazai yɨ sai yaya kwalaalya kɨnɨnnakei gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨ. Yɨ yaya yuya daza yɨ Gotɨyarɨna bɨraiyagaala dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya. Yɨ sɨgyaaryai mɨnyagɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalya kɨnɨnnakei yaka mɨnyagɨzaanya atɨraalyajɨyai.

A'mwe daza' baazɨ'ma'nya kingɨyaresɨ wayaaka nabinnanyasɨ wakɨnɨke' yɨ dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya nɨgwɨlalaaka golɨya kɨnɨnnake', yɨ nɨgwɨlalaake sɨla nawɨ'nyaangejɨ turyaanga kwaalɨke'bɨta paidapaide yɨra'nadejɨya'. Sa' gamɨre asɨrɨ yɨ kaapɨya golɨyai lɨmwagarɨke'. Yɨ dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ wana butɨrɨnya winnɨkebwi yɨ a'mwe dazavɨre dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya gɨrɨke gɨrɨkita'nanya yadevwi kaapɨya dazarɨ yunebanna yɨ'nadɨ'nyɨ.

Yɨ gamɨnne yayavɨna gamɨre yamevɨ pɨkarya' wa'dɨ'nyɨ. Yaya daza' yulyakɨyagaalya' kɨnɨnnake', yɨ yaya yɨdasa' sa' daresɨ. Anga Naanga Bavɨlonɨ. Yaasɨwa'na marapɨnamaryadɨvɨta yuyangɨ kuvɨnaange'. Yɨ Kwaakevakɨya wana butɨrɨnya winnɨke yuyaburaavɨ aaya kaavɨlya'. Yɨ yaya saresɨ.

A'mwe daza' Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨ tamakadesɨ. Yɨ a'mwera Jizaazarɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨna yune jalɨkurakadɨvɨsaraavɨ tamakɨna. Yɨ a'mwe daza' kumɨre tawe nada (tamakada) yɨmaka widaasɨ tɨnna wangamwa.
Yɨ nɨmɨ dazavɨ tɨnna wanganena yɨ lɨka yɨwaainena atɨka naanga maru'na'na.

Atɨka naanga maru'na'na kyɨwa yɨ ejelɨyai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Atɨka be'na maru'na'mwaa? Yɨ sawaarɨne yoimavajalɨkurakyavɨ aaya kaavɨlya' givwarɨdaakudeinyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe dazavɨnajɨ yɨ sɨgyaarya mɨnyagɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalya kɨnɨnnakei yaka mɨnyagɨzaanya atɨlyajɨyai a'mwe dazavɨ kaanya makuvanɨkerɨnajɨ givwarɨdaakudeinyɨ.

Yɨ sɨgyaarya dazarɨ tɨnna mena wangamwaanyai yɨ kɨgaakuna sai mwalyaakei, yɨ dahaa' sai mamwaalyɨ'. Kɨrɨ' dɨvi yɨ sai yɨrorɨla daanga maaya dazavɨdaa'nyɨ yidaavadelyɨ. Yɨ yɨlaabathei kayaaka yuya yɨwɨna yadelyɨ. A'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara Gotɨyai Kwaakeva' wakyaakegaa' gamɨre bukuya gaala mwaalya'nirɨ kumɨnne yaya' myavɨkaryaakera. A'mwe dazara sɨgyaarya dazarɨ wanganapɨjɨ sahwara atɨka maru'na'na. Sɨnnawɨ sai mwalyaakei, yɨ dahaa' mamwaalyɨkei, yɨ dɨvi yɨma'naabathe' atɨka maru'na'na.

A'mwe sɨmunya kɨnɨnnakeinyɨ daakajɨ, datha' yɨnɨga wi'na pada'galayawɨrana! Mɨnyagɨnya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraala daza mugunya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyangɨ. Yɨ a'mwe daza' mugunya dazangɨ yɨlamwaalɨkengɨ.

Nabaai mɨnyagɨnya daza kingɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyare. Maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨya atɨlyara kayaaka mena yɨneva (bwalareva) yɨ pwai dahaa' mwaalɨkei, yɨ pwai kingɨya mima'naabyɨnanyɨ. Dɨvi sai mena yɨma'naabozɨ yɨ sai yune maalɨkegaa'na nayaa mwaaladelyɨ.

Yɨ sɨgyaarya dazai sɨnnawɨ mwalyaakei, yɨ dahaa' mamwaalyɨkei yɨ gamɨ sai kingɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraai dalyalyɨ. Kɨrɨ' sai kingɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyaraavɨne kwai yɨ nabaai sai yɨnahu yɨwɨna yadelyɨ.

Yɨ mɨnyagɨzaanya atɨraalyangɨ gɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwaanya, sa yɨ kingɨya atɨraalyara yɨma'nya'nerera. Sahwara kingɨya mamwaalyaraavɨ. Aawa. Sahwara sɨgyaarya dazalyɨ kingɨya dɨragɨnya' maapɨ'dere. Yɨ yune aawaaya pɨrɨvɨna (maalɨkegaa'na) kingɨya mwaaibɨ'dere.
Dazara kumɨ sɨmunya avaala pɨbwinanyare. Yɨ sahwara kumɨre dɨragɨnyasɨ kumɨre maremwaalya'ne dɨragɨnyabulyɨ sɨgyaaryarɨna yanga wɨjaavɨpɨ'dere.

Sahwara sɨgyaarya dazalyɨ gaidaa'na yɨpɨ'dera Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyalyɨ mala bwa'nɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ nabaai sahwaraavɨ Dɨwɨnyai malya' nebulya'na wavɨlavadelyɨ. Sai yuya naangeraavɨna Naangelyɨ. Yɨ sai yuya kingɨyaraavɨna Kingɨyalyɨ. Sare'na sahwai wavɨlavadelyɨ. Yɨ nabaai Dɨwɨnyai gannyarajɨ mala daza' wavɨlapɨ'dere. Sahwara jaka jɨvwaramaa'nɨkera, yune gannyara dahɨlakɨnɨkera, gamɨnyɨ dɨragɨnna lɨmwaga'dɨvɨsare.”

Yɨ ejelɨya sai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ tɨnna mena wangamwaanya aalya kwalaalya daza a'mwe yaasɨwa'na marapɨnamaryade' munyaba yɨlamwaalɨke, yɨ a'mwe kɨlaaka dala nabinyajɨ'jɨyarajɨ yɨ kwala bwa'naanyangɨyarajɨ yɨ ajɨmya yuyangɨyarajɨ yagaala ge gejɨyarajɨ sarera.

Yɨ mɨnyagɨzaanya atɨraala dazangɨ tɨnna mena wangamwaanya yuya dazarajɨ sɨgyaarya dazalyɨ sara a'mwe yaasɨwa'na marapɨnamaryadevɨna sɨmɨlɨka wimwaaladera gamɨnyɨ yɨkamaanga yɨma'nɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ sahwara sahɨrɨvɨ wana kayaaka yɨgalakapi yɨ gamɨre nɨgwɨlalaaka baazɨ'ma'nya marasɨpɨ'de' kannyɨmaaya mwaalade'. Yɨ nabaai gamɨre kɨlaakejɨkɨya mɨwɨsa tɨka nɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ dɨkevɨ yuyajɨ' marirapɨ'dezɨkɨ.

Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Mu'nyadɨvɨsara kwara kɨrɨ' Gotɨyai kumɨre sɨmunyangɨ gamɨre sɨmunya wɨjaavadelyɨ. Yɨ sahwara daza yɨma'nade yɨpɨ'dengɨ, sɨnnawɨ sai mena dake' sahɨrɨ'na. Yɨ sahwara sɨmunya gave pɨrɨ'na wɨwaradera, yɨ dɨragɨnya daza' sahwara kingɨya maremwaalya'ne' maaresa' yɨ yuya daza sɨgyaaryarɨna wɨjaavɨpɨ'dere. Yɨ sahwara kuna yɨwopɨjɨ Gotɨyai yuya yunebanna yajahaa'na gamɨ sai dakenna.
Yɨ a'mwe daza' gɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwaanya', yɨ anga naanga dazaba kingɨya Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨna munyawɨ mwaaidevera.”
Sangɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ ejelɨya pwai Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walaabɨna. Sai dɨragɨnya naanga nebulya' kɨnɨnnakei yɨ gamɨre byaanna Kwaakevakɨ lɨvamwaja naanga yɨwa'.
Sai maangwɨraaya naange' jaka dɨragɨnna dara dɨna
“Mena bwala'mwa'. Anga naanga Bavɨlonɨ mena bwala'mwa'.
Anga naanga Bavɨlonɨ saba kayaaka mena yɨmwa'.
Dahaa' anga saba yɨmakera mwaaidɨvɨsaba yɨma'nɨwa'.
Kulaka kayaa'nanya gazaizalyɨ saba kave mwaaidɨvɨsaba
Yuta gɨrɨkita'nanya gazaizalyɨ kayaa'nanya gazaizalyɨ mwaaidɨvɨsabane!
Dare'nanyɨ. Ajɨmya yuyangɨyara gamɨre waainɨya' nesa'nanyɨ.
Waainɨya dɨragɨnya sa' gɨrɨkita'nanya kwalaalya nadɨvɨsasɨ.
Kingɨya Kwaakevakɨyara a'mwe dazasɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi ye'mwannayadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ.
Mubɨwawɨnya Kwaakevakɨyara dazavɨ nɨgwia kwalaalya maa'dɨvɨsa'nanyɨ.
Dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya gɨrɨkita'nanya sahɨrɨvɨre saburɨ
Nɨgwɨhɨraya kɨnɨnnakera nɨgwia naangejɨyara yɨma'nadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ.”
Yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nadaazɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' yɨnyɨna. Yɨ sai dara dɨna
“Mwasɨlaanna dalyaabyi! Nɨmɨre a'mweihi dazavɨ dalyaabyi!
Gamɨre kayaa'nanyajɨ sahɨrɨsɨ ye'mwannemwaala nyɨpɨka!
Kayaa'nanyangɨre tɨvɨkɨta sahɨrɨsɨ gɨraku'nya nyɨpɨka!
Gamɨre kayaa'nanya daza yaaye naange'bɨsangɨ.
Kuna yɨma'nɨgoda yune Sɨgunyavɨna yɨvanɨ'.
Gamɨre yɨwetawakyabwina Gotɨyai mena yawɨramaa'manɨ'.”
“Pwaihi, daza' tɨvɨkɨ'devaaibɨ' yɨnɨgevwina nayaa dɨrɨvɨkɨri!
Gazabwizabwi yakenna tɨvɨkɨta pɨrɨwaalya nayaa dɨmaragɨra'mwagemwaalyi!
Sa' kaapɨyarɨ aalya kayaa'nanya dɨragɨnya' gɨnyɨwadesɨ.
Kaapɨyarɨne aalya gazasa' tɨvɨkɨta pɨrɨwaalya' dɨmaragɨra'mwagyi!
Sa' yune gamɨnne yaya' munyaba makida
Kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnnanya kwalaalyabwi yadevaaibɨ'
Sarɨmɨ a'mwe savɨna daanga kwalaalya duzaayɨla!
Yɨnɨga wi'nanya gamɨre yade kayaa'nanya dazabwina
Kale kwalaalya wɨjaaya'na sarɨmɨ nayaa dɨrɨvɨkɨrila!
Gamɨre sɨmunyavɨna a'mwe sa' dara dadesɨ.
Kwinɨya'nyɨ mwaaihe. Nɨmɨ kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ yɨlamwaaihe.
A'mwei kabalojɨ yaanyɨwaake' mwaaidevaaibɨ' sasare'nyɨ mɨ'.
Kɨnna javwi, taanginyabwi nyɨma'naabathevwi mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ yune yɨrɨka gave pɨgaa'na wima'nadevulyɨ.
Kayaa'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya sahɨrɨvɨ yɨma'nadengɨ.
