Baryabulyɨ kɨnna kayaa'na jɨnaryabulyɨ mɨjɨkebulyɨ yɨma'nadevulyɨ.
Gotɨya Naangei maryawɨbwaradei wana dɨragɨnaangei mwaalɨke'na
Dɨke' Anga naanga Bavɨlonɨ savɨ nasɨ'na yadesɨ.”

Kingɨya Kwaakevakɨyara sasɨ gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi ye'mwannayadɨvɨsara gamɨre kwalaalya wabahɨlaakebura ye'mwannayadɨvɨsara kɨnna, jakɨnna dɨpɨ'dere. Jɨsa' kyɨma'nojɨ dɨkevɨdaa'nyɨ yojɨ dɨke' savɨ wɨnadaawojɨ yɨ kingɨya dazara tɨnna wanganapɨjɨ yɨ nabaai sahwara kɨnna dadɨvɨ' yɨ kunnya kɨhɨsangɨ mala tannɨpɨ'dere.
A'mwe sahɨrɨ' daanga kayaa'nanya' kamaarojɨ sahwara lɨka naanga yɨpɨ'dere. Sare'na yɨ sahwara sahɨrɨvɨ menyaba daavapɨjɨ yɨ dara dɨna
“We'! We'! Anga Bavɨlonɨgɨnyɨna kale neyɨwa'.
Gɨmɨ anga naangebagɨ, anga naanga dɨragɨnyabagɨ!
Yune aawaaya pɨrɨvɨna gɨmɨre jɨdasa' yɨma'nɨwa'.
Gɨmɨre wagɨlyavɨna tɨvɨkɨta kayaa'nanya da' gima'nɨwa'.”

Yɨ a'mwe Kwaakevakɨyara mubya yadɨvɨsara anga naanga dazabanna sɨmunya yawɨrapɨri kɨnna dadɨvɨ' savɨna yɨ munyɨ' taanginyara mwaaibɨ'dere. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Kumɨre gɨlyɨvɨsa ayahi mubathei aane pwai kwai mɨ'.

Gɨlyɨvɨta daza yɨ golɨyasɨ sɨlɨvaayasɨ sɨla nawɨ'nyaangejɨ kwaalɨturyaangejɨ yɨ nawɨ'nyaanga kwaabɨyɨvɨta yaakejɨ kwaabɨyɨvɨta kingɨyarejɨ kwaabɨyɨvɨta paidapaide yɨ'de sɨlɨkaayajɨ kwaabɨyɨvɨta wana wayaakejɨ yɨ yuya yɨ'naanya dala pɨnɨnnanya wabatɨrɨnya kɨnɨnnakejɨ yɨ yuya tɨnna wangadɨvɨ' wabahɨlaaka yadɨvɨta elapaanɨyaraavɨre saanyaburaavɨ yavɨkaryadɨvɨsajɨ yɨta mubya naanga wakadɨvɨsa yavɨkaryadɨvɨsajɨ bɨraazɨya kwaari'mayagɨnyajɨ sɨla bwaihɨra'bwaihɨrata yɨnɨke kɨnɨnnake yavɨkaryadɨvɨsajɨ

yɨ dawaryajɨ wabatɨrɨnya aamona' mɨjata purya'nesɨ kwaagɨta wabatɨrɨnya yɨravayɨhwia'nejɨ marazɨnanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnnanya tɨrɨnya kɨnɨnnakejɨ saadaaya nawɨ'nyajɨ yɨ waainɨyajɨ welivananya nya'nejɨ pɨlawaaya gɨrɨkula ya'ne nawɨ'nyasɨ witɨyasɨ yɨ bulɨmakaawoyarajɨ sipɨzipɨyarajɨ ozɨyarajɨ ozɨyara mwagi'namarya'nejɨ kɨlaakejɨsɨyara a'mwe gaala kɨnɨnnakerajɨ. Yuya daza ayahi mubɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.

A'mwe mubya yadɨvɨsara dara dɨpɨ'dere “Tɨka munne daza maarya'na gɨmɨre sɨmunya' gɨthɨkaa'de yɨ yuya sa gɨmɨnyɨ gyahalya'mavaka kaanya mena wɨwa'. Yuya tɨka wapaaya nawɨ'nyanna nawɨ'nyannanya mubya naange kɨnɨnnakejɨ gɨmɨre yuya nɨgwɨlalaaka nawɨ'nyanna nawɨ'nyannanyajɨ yuya sa gɨmɨnyɨ mena gyahalya'ma'mwakengɨ. Nabaai gɨlyɨvɨta daza gɨmɨnyɨ ayɨna magwaryadori a'mwera tɨnna mwanganyɨ yɨpɨ'dengɨ. Aawa. Arɨkawɨ.”

Yɨ gɨlyɨvɨta dazangɨ mubya yadɨvɨta dazara mubadɨvɨ' gamɨnyɨ nɨgwia kwalaalya maa'dɨvɨsara gamɨre daanga kayaa'nanya' maaradevɨna lɨka naanga yapɨjɨ gamɨnyɨ menyaba daapɨ'dere. Yɨ sahwara kɨnna dadɨvɨ' yɨ munyɨ' taanginya mwaaibɨ'dere.
Yɨ sara yadɨvɨ' dara dɨna
“We'! We'! Anga Naangebagɨnyɨna kale neyɨwaka!
Kwaabɨyɨvɨta nawɨ'nyaangejɨ kingɨyaraavɨrejɨ wana wayaakejɨ
Yuya saza gɨmɨre kɨlaakevɨ paidapaide'na baazɨ'ma'nɨke'gɨ!
Yɨ sa'gɨ yune kɨlaakejɨkɨ yɨwaala yɨwannadɨ
Nɨgwɨlalaaka golɨyajɨ sɨla nawɨ'nyajɨ kwaalɨturyaangejɨ!
Yune aawaaya pɨrɨvɨna gɨlyɨvɨkɨravɨnakebwi gihaimwake'na we'!
Nɨgwia yuya dazajɨ nɨgwɨlalaakejɨ kayaaka yɨnyɨna!”

Yɨ sɨpɨyavɨ maremwaala gazaizalyɨ yɨ a'mwe gazaizai sɨpɨya mubada pɨwɨnna kaanya wɨya'nelyɨ yɨ yuya sɨpɨyavɨ yadɨvɨsarajɨ yɨ saalaalyavɨ a'mwe yuyara mubɨwawɨnya kɨnɨnnakerajɨ a'mwe dazara Bavɨlonɨ menyaba daaveva
dɨkevɨre jɨsavɨ sahɨrɨvɨ dɨke' wɨnadaasɨya' tɨnna wanganna yadɨvɨ' jake' dara danganna “Anga naanga dazaba avaainanyaba anga naangeba gava warɨka!”
Yɨ sahwara kwaakevɨre tɨrya' kunnya mɨnyagɨnyangɨ lɨvama'nyɨna yeva kɨnna dɨna yeva yɨ munyɨ' taanginya yɨma'nyɨna yeva mwaalɨna yadɨvɨ' jaka dɨna
“We'! We'! Anga naangebanna kale neyɨwa'.
Nɨgwia naanga anga naanga dazabanyangɨne ma'daanyaina
Saalaalyavɨ sɨpɨyangɨ kuvɨnɨmaangeina nɨgwɨhɨravɨnakeina yɨma'nadaanyainera.
Yune aawaaya pɨrɨvɨna kayaaka yɨnɨwake'na we'!”

Sɨgunya'gɨjɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyaihɨlyɨ yɨ Wɨdaasadeihɨlyɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨtaihɨlyɨ dahaa' yɨma'nɨwake'na sarɨmɨ yuyaihi yɨlaaya jɨla! Gotɨyai sahɨrɨvɨ maryawɨbwaraka kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨ'mwake'nanyɨ. Sarɨmɨnyɨ yɨhyaka sasare dazabwi tɨvɨkɨsa' wiwake'nanyɨ.

Yɨ ejelɨya dɨragɨmaraanga pwai sɨla pwai maarɨna. Arɨnga sɨla naanga witɨya gɨla'mwadeibɨsai. Ejelɨya sahwai sɨla dazai munyaba makina yaka yɨ saalaalyavɨ kewɨnɨnna maralɨvaranna yaka yɨ sai dara dɨna
“Dɨragɨnna maralɨvaramwebaaibɨ' yɨkamaangera maarɨna yapi
Anga naanga Bavɨlonɨ kewɨnɨnna dɨragɨnna lɨvarabɨ'devera.
Savɨ a'mwera tɨnna ayahi pɨrɨsɨ bɨrawangabɨ'de' mɨ'.
Gɨmɨnyaba pɨradayavɨre jakesɨ daata dadɨvɨta yagaalyasɨ
Gwarengɨrejɨ pihulɨyarejɨ kadɨka ayahi gu'nɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.
Aawa nebulyasɨ. Arɨkewɨ. Aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mu'nyɨna.
Wawɨnya dala pɨnɨnnanyangɨ sɨdu'nakeraavɨ ayahi bɨrawangabɨ'dera mɨ'.
Gɨmɨnyɨ sasarei mwaaidoriyai aane pwai kwai mamwaalyɨna.
Sɨlyare jake' witɨya gɨla'mwadaawori ayahi gu'nɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.
Gɨmɨre mɨjɨke'na tɨka wapaaya pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mwarina.
Laamɨvananyavɨre dɨ'baake' gɨmɨnyɨ ayahi pɨrɨsɨ gɨvade' mɨ'.
Maangwɨraaya kwala maarya'nere' maa'nya'nevɨre' ayahi gu'nɨpɨ'de' mɨ'.
Gɨmɨnyaba sasareyore aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' mu'nyɨna.
Dare'nanyɨ. Gɨmɨre mubɨwawɨnya kɨnɨnnakera Kwaakevakɨya naangera!
Ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ gɨmɨre gɨri'nyanna kwaasɨkuna wɨjɨwaalagɨnya'gɨ!
Gamɨnyɨ yɨwetawakyaba tawe wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyaraavɨresɨ Gotɨyareraavɨresɨ warɨ'.
Anga naanga dazaba sahwaraavɨ yune tamakadɨvɨsaba!
A'mwe Kwaakevakɨya yuyaraavɨjɨ tamakadɨvɨsaraavɨne yɨwetawakya warɨ'.”
Sahɨnɨngɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ jaka naangebɨsa' Sɨgunyavɨ kwala naangeraavɨre' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Yɨ sahwara dara dɨna
“Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaa! Aaleluya!
Nemɨre Gotɨyai yune gave sahwaina nevadaihasamaarya'nebulyɨyai!
Byaanna kɨnɨnnakei dɨragɨnyabwi kɨnɨnnakei yune mwaalɨkei!
Dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyai maryawɨbwa'denna nebulyabwi yunewɨnna yɨda'maraangesɨ.
Yaasɨwa'na maradakunamaryade naange' Kwaakevakɨyaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalakadesɨ.
Gamɨre gɨrɨkita'nanya sabulyɨ sahwaraavɨ kayaaka yɨgaidesɨ.
Sarevɨdaa'nyɨ Gotɨyai sahɨrɨvɨ daanga kayaa'nanya' tɨvɨkɨ'mwake'nanyɨ.
A'mwe daza' Gotɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnya saraavɨ tamakadesɨ.
Kumɨre tawe'na gannya yɨwetawakya daza' tɨvɨkɨ'mwakesɨ.”
Yɨ sahwara pɨgasaai jaka ayahi dara dɨna
“Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaa! Aaleluya!
Dɨkevɨre jɨsa' anga naangeba dɨke' nɨvanɨ'.
Yɨ jɨta daza' munyaba yuyagaa' yuyagaa' yimanaawɨ'!”

Yɨ a'mwe naanga atɨzɨvɨlɨraai yaka pware asɨrɨ daraai daraalyarajɨ gaala kɨnɨnnaka daraai daraalyarajɨ sara kwaakewɨnna walaruta'neva Gotɨyarɨna kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨ mwaalɨkerɨna lotuya yɨna. Lotuya yɨna yadɨvɨ' dara dɨna
“Sahɨrɨsɨ. Nebula naangesɨ.
Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaana!”
Yɨ Gotɨyare kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' jaka yɨnnɨgavɨna. Dara dɨna
“Gotɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnya yuyaihi
Gotɨyarɨna lɨka yadɨvɨsaihi
Kwaakewɨnyaihɨlyɨ munyabanyaihɨlyɨ saihi
Nemɨre Gotɨyarɨ munyaba dɨmakɨlyɨla!”
Yɨ kwala naangera yɨ'bwa'nemwaaidapiya jake'bɨ', saawɨla naange yɨdaa'nyɨya jake'bɨ', yɨ'munya naange pidaa'nyɨya jake'bɨ' yɨ nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna. Daza' jaka dɨna
“Nemɨ Gotɨyarɨne yaya' munyaba makɨlaa! Aaleluya!
Naangei nemɨre Gotɨyai Dɨragɨnya Yuya Kɨnɨnnakei
Dahaa' sai kingɨya nebulyai yuna mwaalɨke'nanyɨ.
Dahaa' nemɨre munyɨ' nawɨ'nya yɨna yawaajɨ
Yɨ nemɨ yɨlaaya naanga kuna yawaajɨ
Gamɨnne byaannya' munyabanna nayaa makɨlaa!
Yɨrɨkegaa' Dɨwɨnya Sipɨzipɨyai kwala maarya'negaa' yɨma'nɨwa'.
Yɨ gamɨre a'mwe' gamɨza' yavada'gainya yɨwa'.
Gotɨyai savɨna baazɨ'ma'nya yaake' wɨjaavɨna yɨwa'.
Baazɨ'ma'nya wana nawɨ'nya' wana lɨvamwaja yadaasɨya'
Wana tɨrɨmaaya nebulya' gannya kɨlaakejɨkɨ wakɨwa'.”
Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka nawɨ'nya daza' yɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨre wawɨnya yɨda'maraangengɨra.

Yɨ ejelɨyai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Yagaala datha' pɨkarya jɨtha'! A'mwe dazara Gotɨyai jaka jɨvwaramaarakera munne naangevɨ Dɨwɨnyai kwala maarya'nevɨna bɨwaasara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winadere.” Yɨ sai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Yagaala daza yɨ sa yagaala nebulya'nanya Gotɨyarengɨ.”

Sara wɨdɨna kanyɨwa' nɨmɨ kwaakewɨ gamɨre sɨvɨlyɨraaryaba gidɨkusaba walaruta'nyɨna. Yɨ nɨmɨ sahwarɨna “Lotuya yɨma!” dena kɨrɨ' sai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ sasara minna! Gɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨre ja'mwera kwarajɨ yaasɨwa'wawɨnya ye'mwannawɨdaayadɨnyainyɨ. Sarɨmɨ Jizaazarɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwadɨvɨ' yɨ wɨjalɨkurakadɨvɨsaihɨlyɨ. Sasareihɨre avaaiwawɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai yune gave pwainanyarɨ lotuya nayaa dɨragɨnna jɨ! Sare' dare'nesɨ. Jizaazarɨna wɨjalɨkurakyabwi yɨ Kurya Tewaanyai wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyaraavɨ yɨdɨka'daa'nyɨ wɨjɨwaakadɨvɨta sasare dazabulyɨ.”

Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wangadaazɨ Sɨgunya' kaanya basɨnadaa'na yɨnɨkevɨ, yɨthaanyi, ozɨya yaaka pwai mwaalɨna. Sarɨ a'mwei yɨlamwaaina. Gamɨnne yaya' yɨ darei. Gotɨyare yawɨta yuyangɨ nayaa lɨmwaga'dei, yɨ nebulya'ne aaya kaavɨlyai. Nabaai sai yune yɨda'maraangeburɨna pada'galamɨdɨdevɨ yɨ a'mweraavɨ kotɨyavɨ maryawɨbwa'da yɨ sai malya' bwa'delyɨ.

Gamɨre tɨnnyai dɨtaalɨsa'. Gamɨre mɨnyagɨnyavɨ kingɨmwaaihɨ'nya kwalaalya warɨke. Gamɨnne yayavɨne pɨkarya' kɨnɨnnakei. Yaya dazavɨ aaya kaavɨlya' gamɨ gave yune sahwaina yawɨ'delyɨ. Yɨ a'mwe pwara aawa.
Gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nya yunewɨnna yalawakya saamɨgwazaaya gamɨ wakɨka sa' tawevɨ jɨwɨnɨkesɨ. Yɨ sahwarɨne yaya' dara wo'nɨkesɨ. Gotɨyare gamɨnyɨna Yagaalyala!
Aamiya Sɨgunyavɨyara kunnya ozɨya yaakeraavɨ yɨlamwaaina yeva sahwarɨ dɨvidaa'nyɨ mɨdɨnna. Kumɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨ baazɨ'ma'nya yaaka wana gɨrɨ'maaya nawɨ'nyaange yɨra'nevera.

Yɨ ozɨya yaakerɨ yɨlamwaalɨka dazare maangevɨdaa'nyɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnya walyaabɨnɨke'. Kwaari'masɨramɨnya daza' saamɨgwazaaya' wana lɨka gurɨmaanga dɨ'bwarakɨnɨke'. Yɨ nabaai dazasɨ sai a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ tamakade'nanyɨ. Yɨ nabaai gamɨ sai yɨta aayɨnɨyarɨ' lɨmwagarojɨ sahwaraavɨ dɨragɨnna maremwaaladelyɨ. Nabaai gamɨ sai sɨla naanga gɨraipɨya tɨma'mwanga ya'nevɨ waainɨya' gɨla'mwagathelyɨ. Waainɨya daza' yɨ Gotɨyai Dɨragɨnya Yuya Kɨnɨnnakere sɨmɨlɨka naangevɨne sɨnna tɨka wɨdaya'.
Sai gamɨre baazɨ'ma'nyavɨ gamɨre tɨ'munyavɨ gamɨnne yaya' pɨkarya yɨda'nɨkei. Yaya daza' yɨ dare'
“Yuya kingɨyaraavɨna Kingɨyai yuya naangeraavɨna Naangela.”

Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ nyɨlyarɨ ejelɨya pwai daavɨna yada yuta yuyara yɨraayavɨ munyaba pɨlavamaryadaapiyaraavɨ maangwɨraaya jaka naange' danganna. Yɨ sai dara dɨna “Sarɨmɨ yɨkabapi Gotɨyare munne naanga dathavɨ dɨzɨ'bwa'nyi!

‘Yɨ a'mwe baimwaasaraavɨ tɨka naana! Yɨ kingɨyaraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨya mɨwɨsa, yɨ mɨwɨta aawɨlasaraavɨ maremwaaidɨvɨsaraavɨrejɨ, yɨ mɨwɨta a'mwe dɨragɨnaangeraavɨrejɨ yɨ mɨwɨta ozɨyaraavɨrejɨ a'mwe ozɨyaraavɨ yɨlamwaaihasaraavɨrejɨ tɨka naana!’ dapi dɨzɨ'bwa'nyi! ‘Yɨ nabaai a'mwe yuya pwara kwaraavɨre kɨlaakejɨkaavɨya, a'mwe kave mwaaihasaraavɨrejɨ a'mwe yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨrejɨ yɨ a'mwe maalɨkeraavɨrejɨ yɨ a'mwe naangeraavɨrejɨ mɨwɨta daza tɨka naana!’ dapi dɨzɨ'bwa'nyi!”

Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ sɨgaarya dazalyɨ yɨ kingɨya Kwaakevakɨyarajɨ kumɨre aamiya aawɨlasara kwarajɨ sahwara mena yɨ'bwa'nyɨna. Sahwara “Mala bwa'naade'nana,” deva “A'mwe ozɨyarɨ yɨlamwaalɨka dazalyɨ gamɨre aamiya aawɨlasarajɨ sahwara mala ye'mwannabwa'naade'nana,” deva mena yɨ'bwa'nyɨna.

Yɨ'bwa'nyɨna kyɨwaa' kɨrɨ' ozɨyarɨ yɨlamwaalɨkei sɨgyaaryarɨjɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakade kwaasɨ dadei sɨgyaarya dazare tɨnnyarɨ yɨjɨwaala kwalaalya yaderɨjɨ wɨla galyɨ'na yɨwa'. Yɨ kwaasɨ yɨjɨwaaide sasare dazaburɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakade kwaasɨya dazai a'mweraavɨ sɨgyaaryare baave' maarevera yɨ gamɨre a'mwa'mwe savɨ lotuya yevera saraavɨ kwaasɨ wiakebulyɨyaraai. Sɨgyaarya dazarɨjɨ kwaasɨya wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakade dazarɨjɨ sara galyɨ'na yaka saraai gaala kuna mwaaihɨlyaraarɨ dɨ'bunya naangaangevɨ dɨ'daanya naange' nɨvanɨkevɨ sɨla saalɨpaaya' nɨvanɨkevɨ kewɨnɨnna maralɨvaranna yɨwa'.

Yɨ dazai ozɨyarɨ yɨlamwaalɨka dazai a'mweraavɨ kwaari'masɨramɨnya daza' gamɨre maangevɨdaa'nyɨ walyaabɨnɨka dazasɨ tamakɨna yakere. Yɨ yuta yuya dazara a'mwe dazaraavɨre mɨwɨsa tɨka maranyɨna yeva yɨ kumɨre munyɨ' yunebanna winyɨna.
Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ ejelɨya pwai walaabɨna. Gamɨre asɨrɨ yɨrorɨla daanga maayavɨre kiya' lɨmwagarɨkei. Yɨ sai kwaari'ma'magazaawanya naange' kɨrɨsɨ lɨmwagarɨkei.

Sai kabaraawarya dazarɨ galalɨmwanna. Kabaraawarya sai kamaala wana sɨnnawɨ kɨgaakunanyai. Sai Yuyaraavɨ Kotɨya Maryadei. Yɨ sai Saataanɨ, Yɨkamaangei (Sɨwaakei). Yɨ ejelɨyai kabaraawarya dazarɨ yune kwarame 1000 waanɨ taawɨzanɨya kalavuza' yɨramwaaihya'nerɨ kwaari'ma'magazaawanyasɨ wɨla galapwɨyɨna yaka

sahwarɨ yɨrorɨla daanga maayavɨ kewɨnɨnna maralɨvaranna kyɨwa' sarei kewɨnɨnna walaawɨna. Maralɨvaranna yaka a'badaa'nyɨ kaanya' sahwarɨ yɨlarihɨ'na yaka dɨragɨnna jɨbwekɨna, baave' wakɨna. Saataanɨ kwarame 1000 bawodehaa'na ajɨmya yuyangɨya a'mweraavɨ kwaasɨ ayɨna muja'nerɨ kaanya' jɨbwekɨna. Yɨ dɨvi sagaa' kwarame 1000 mena kabwawojɨ ejelɨyai yɨralavadelyɨ. Yɨ sai yaasɨwa' yamarina yadelyɨ yune maalɨkegaa'na.

Yɨ nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ kingɨnamwaalyɨta pɨnɨ wa'dɨ'nyɨyangɨ yɨ pwara yɨlamwaaiha'. Sara kotɨyavɨ maryawɨbwarya'neraavɨ Gotɨyai sasare wawɨnyavɨne dɨragɨnya' wɨjaawakera. Nabaai nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ a'mwe kwalaalyaraavɨre kuryara. Sahwara Jizaazarɨna nayaa jalɨkurakevera, yɨ Gotɨyare yagaalya' dɨragɨnna lɨmwagarevera. Yune sahɨrɨvɨne'na yɨkamaangera sahwaraavɨ pwaraavɨre tɨlɨnnya woripuresara. Yɨ sahwaraavɨ pwaraavɨ tamakɨna yesare. Yɨ sahwara sɨgyaaryarɨ lotuya myadɨvɨ' yɨ gamɨre a'mwa'mwerɨjɨ lotuya mi. Yɨ sahwara gamɨre baave' kumɨre yamengɨjɨ kumɨre asangɨjɨ mamaaryevera. Yɨ sahwara balesara gaalya' ayɨna maareva yɨ kwarame yune 1,000 dazagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ kingɨya mwaaiha'.
Daza' yɨ a'mwera ayɨna dɨkaapɨ'dehaa' aaya mudɨ'nanyagaakɨ. Dazagaa' a'mwe bainɨka pwara gaalya' mamariwaa'. Sahwara yemwaala yɨga' kwarame 1,000 sagaa' mena kabawojɨne'na.

A'mwera ayɨna dɨkaapɨ'de aaya mudɨ'nanya dazagaa' sahwara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winadera mwaalapɨjɨ yɨ Gotɨyare tewaanyara nawɨ'nya tewaanya mwaaibɨ'dere. Yɨ nabaai baryabwi sa' pɨgasaalya' a'mwe dazaraavɨ marulawakya'ne dɨragɨnya maayasɨ. Aawa. Sahwara Gotɨyarɨna mubɨthɨka yɨra'dɨvɨsare. Yɨ Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna yɨra'dɨvɨsare. Nabaai sahwara kwarame waanɨ taawɨzanɨya sagaa' Kɨraazɨtɨyalyɨ kingɨya ye'mwannamwaaibɨ'dere.
Dɨvi kwarame 1,000 waanɨ taawɨzanɨya sagaa' mena kabwawojɨ gamɨre kalavuzɨangevɨya kaadihɨsa' kabaasojɨ Saataanɨ gamɨre kalavuzavɨ yagalya'mavadelyɨ.

Sarei mwasɨlaa walyaabozɨ a'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraayawɨnna kwaasɨ yagaala wɨja'nei wɨna. A'mwe kwaakevɨya tɨvimagɨnya dawaai dawaalyabanyara yɨ Kwaakevakɨya yunewɨnyara yɨ Gohɨyarajɨ Maahohɨyarajɨ saraayawɨnna wɨna. Saataanɨ sahwaraavɨ mala bwa'nya'neraavɨ mari'bwarɨmwaaihadere. Kumɨre ata gɨlya saalaalyavɨ maangebaarɨya siweka sabɨsangɨ.

Sarera kwaaka saba yuneba yidaawadɨvɨ' Gotɨyare tewaanyaraavɨre wa'mwaryaba, anga naangeba Gotɨyarɨ tewaanya wɨvu'nɨvanɨkeba yɨ saba yuneba kurɨta gɨhɨ'mavamwaimwaataraavɨnera. Kɨrɨ' dɨke' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ walaabozɨ mala bwa'nadaapiya saraavɨ dɨka nakɨwakeraavɨnera.

Yuyaraavɨ Kotɨya Maryadei sahwaraavɨ kwaasɨ wɨdade'na sare'na Gotɨyai dɨ'bunya naange' dɨ'munange'na yadaa'nyɨyavɨ sɨla saalɨpaayavɨ nade savɨ kewɨnɨnna maralɨvaranna. Dɨ'bunya sa' sɨgyaarya dazalyɨ kwaasɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakyabwi dade dazalyɨ saraai mena mwaaidakɨlyɨ dazahɨrɨvɨ. Sarevɨ daraai dala sara daanga naange' maapɨ'dere nyɨlyavɨjɨ sawɨsavɨjɨ yuyagaa' yuyagaa'ne'.

Nɨmɨ tɨnna wanganna yadaazɨ kingɨnamwaalyɨta naanga yaake' wa'dɨ'nyɨ nabaai namwaalyɨta savɨ pwai yɨlamwaalɨ'. Sahwarɨ Kwaakevasɨ sɨgunyavasɨ lɨkaanya yenadaa'na yaka yɨmaanyɨna. Kɨrɨmɨ sawaareba kuneba.

Nabaai nɨmɨ tɨnna wangadaazɨ yɨ a'mwe bainɨkera, kwaakewɨnyarajɨ munyabanyarajɨ sara mwaaidapiyara kingɨnamwaalyɨta dazavɨre kusɨmagɨ daavɨna. Nabaai namwaalyɨsavɨ yɨlamwaalɨkei sai bukuya pɨnɨngɨ tɨlaayɨna. Sai bukuya pɨrɨsɨ maarɨna. Bukuya si gaala mwaalya'ni. Bukuya sangɨ pɨkarya yɨda'nɨkengɨ tɨnna wanganaka kumɨre yeta yuya sabwina a'mwe bainɨkeraavɨ maryawɨbwa'mwakere.

Saalaalya' gamɨnyɨ a'mwe yuya bainɨka mwaaihasaraavɨ ayɨna wɨjaavɨna. Nabaai Baryabulyɨ Bainɨkeraavɨre Angebajɨ sawaarɨ a'mwe yuya bainɨka wɨlamwaaidapiya saraavɨ ayɨna wɨjaavɨna. Mena ayɨna wɨjaavɨna kyɨwaai bainɨka saraavɨ gazaizarɨ gamɨre yake yune sabwina maryawɨbwata yɨwakere.
Dɨ'bunya naangevɨ dɨka nɨvanɨka savɨna Baryabulyɨ Bainɨkeraavɨre Angebajɨ sawaai marasɨ'na yɨwakelyɨ. Dɨ'bunya naanga daza' barya pɨgasaalyasɨ. Ayawɨdaa'nyɨ balyasɨ daza'.
Nabaai Naanga maryawɨbwa'dei a'mwe pwarɨne kwarɨne yayavɨ bukuya gaala mwaalya'ne sɨrɨ mabɨranganyojɨ sarevɨ, yɨthaanyi, a'mwe sarɨ marasɨ'na yɨwa' dɨ'bunya naanga dɨka nɨvanɨkevɨna.
Yɨ nɨmɨ sɨgunya mudɨkevasɨ Kwaaka mudɨkevasɨ warɨkewaai wangamwa. Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Sɨgunya aayagaasɨyavasɨ Kwaaka aayagaasɨyavasɨ yunakaanna wɨna. Nabaai saalaalya' kɨrɨsɨ mwarina.

Nabaai nɨmɨ tɨnna wangamwa anga tewaanya dazaba Jeruzaalemɨ mudɨkeba. Anga naanga dazaba Gotɨyai yasaabɨna kyɨwa' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ anga daza' walaabɨna. Nɨgwɨlalaa'baaka nawɨ'nyajɨya', a'mwe' kwala maarya'ne' nɨgwɨlalaaka nawɨ'nyaange tɨda kwala maa'nya'negaa' gannya a'mwerɨna yemwaaidevaaibɨ' walaabɨna.

Sare' nɨmɨ kadɨka wɨ'nyɨna yadaazɨ kingɨnamwaalyɨsavɨdaa'nyɨ maangwɨraaya pɨrɨ' yɨnyɨna. Yɨ jaka naanga dɨragɨnna dara dɨna “Yɨthaanyi! Dahaa' Gotɨyare selɨ ange' a'mwerajɨ ye'mwannamwaalɨka! Sahwaraavɨ tɨnnyaba waradesɨ. Yɨ gamɨre byaannya' kumɨnyɨ ye'mwannarɨka! Nabaai sahwara gamɨ sahwarera mwaaibɨ'dere. Yo, Gotɨyai gamɨ kwalyɨ ye'mwannamwaaladelyɨ.

Kumɨre kɨdalaaibɨrɨka tɨnnyaraavɨ wɨwarɨke gazasa' yaalɨka yɨmwagathere. Baryabwi ayahi waradevwi mɨ'. Yɨ a'mwera ayahi baibɨ'dera mɨ'. Sɨmunya' taanga ayahi winadera mɨ'. Jakɨnna ayahi dɨpɨ'dera mɨ'. Daangejɨ maapɨ'dera mɨ'. Sɨnnawɨnya sa mena yuya yɨwɨna yɨwake'nanyɨ.”

Kingɨnamwaalyɨta dazavɨ yɨlamwaalɨke sai dɨna “Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmɨ yuya sa mudɨke yavɨkarivanɨgengɨra.” Sara daka pɨrɨsɨ dɨna “Yagaala daza pɨkarya jɨthaka! Yagaala daza yuyara dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨzannajɨ naanga nebulya'nanya warɨke'najɨ sara jɨthaka!”

Sara daka nɨmɨnyɨ ayahi wɨdɨna “Yuya sa mena yɨma'nɨwaabɨkengɨ. Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ, nɨmɨ aaya sɨnnawɨnyainyɨ (A). Aaya dɨvineinyɨ (Z). Nabaai yuya sangɨne'na aaya kaavɨlyainyɨ. Yuya dɨragɨnya sa yunebanna yɨ'mwannadɨnyainyɨ. Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ a'mwe aalya'na mɨjɨka baimanɨkerɨna aalya yanga naanga wɨjaavɨdelyɨ. Aalya sa' nade'na aalɨyɨmɨnyavɨ gaala mwaalya'ne'. Nɨmɨre yanga naanga dazabwi sɨhumale yanga wɨjaavɨdelyɨ.

Nabaai a'mwei mala bwa'nyaburɨ yunebanna wavɨlavajai yɨ nɨmɨre yanga naanga daza' maaradelyɨ. Ganɨmaangei gannya kaimɨraayaraavɨna wɨjaavadevaaibɨ' dathavwi maaradelyɨ. Nɨmɨ gamɨnyɨ Gotɨyainyɨ mwaalɨdelyɨ. Nabaai sai nɨmɨnyɨ nyɨbwaalɨvaangei wɨmwaaihɨwɨjai mwaaladelyɨ.

Kɨrɨ' a'mwera lɨka yɨna Kɨraazɨtɨyarɨna ‘Aala! Nabaimudɨka!’ dɨna ayɨna gɨnyɨra'dɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe dɨragɨnna malɨmwagaryadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe gɨrɨkita'nanya dala pɨnɨnna pɨnɨnna yadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwengɨ a'mweraavɨ tamakadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe ata lɨmwadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe gɨri'nya yadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨ lotuya yadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe yuya kwaasɨ yagaala dadɨvɨsarajɨ sara kumɨnne tɨvɨkɨta daresɨ. Dɨ'bunya naangevɨ sɨla saalɨpaayavɨ dɨ'munange'na yarɨkevɨ sahwaraavɨ marasɨ'nadere. Sa' yɨ Baryabwi Ayawɨdaasasɨ.”

Ejelɨya pwai, ejelɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyara dɨzɨya ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraalyangɨ maangengɨ a'mweraavɨ kayaaka yɨgalya'ne yeku'naka aaya kɨnɨnnakerajɨya pwai, yɨ sai baka nɨmɨnyɨ dara wɨdɨna “Kaaja! Kwala maa'nya'ne sɨdɨraaya' Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyarɨne a'mwevɨna givwarɨdaakude'nanyɨ.”

Sara wɨdɨna kanyɨwa' yɨ Kurya Tewaanyai nɨmɨnyɨ dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwanna kanyɨwa' ejelɨya sai mugunya naanga ke'mwewɨnya pɨrɨvɨna nɨmɨnyɨ makuna. Sara nyaka Anga Naange' Jeruzaalemɨ Nawɨ'nya dazaba yɨbwarɨdaakuna. Anga daza' Gotɨyai yasaabɨna kyɨwa' Sɨgunyavɨdaa'nyɨ anga daza' walaabɨna.

Gotɨyare byaanna naange' anga naanga dazaba mwadaavɨna. Savɨre baaka wanyɨwanya' yuna nabinya pɨrɨ'bɨsa' wanyɨna, sɨla nɨgwia naanga mubadɨvɨta sangɨre baaka sa'bɨ' wanyɨna. Yɨ daza' sɨnɨmwavanahurɨka naangebɨsa', yɨ wana tɨrɨmaaya nebulya'nanya' sɨgujaaka sɨrɨmya'bɨsa' wanyɨna.

Anga naanga dazaba sikurɨta naanga yɨnɨke' yune ke'mwewɨnanya'. Kurɨta savɨ tɨkurya atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya warɨna. Sare' nabaai tɨkurya pɨrɨvɨ ejelɨya pwai aya kɨba gaidaa'na. Pɨrɨvɨ pwai, pɨrɨvɨ pwai gaidaa'na. Yɨ yuyangɨ ejelɨya atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyara aya kɨba gaidaa'na. Nabaai tɨkuryangɨ Yɨzɨrelɨyaraavɨre yɨsavaakɨdaa'nya atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyavakaavɨne yaya pɨkarya yɨda'nɨkengɨra.

Sikurɨta nyɨlyai bilyɨrɨ'dimagɨ kaadihɨta dawaai dasa' daavɨna. Nabaai sikurɨta pimagɨnyavɨ kaadihɨta dawaai dasa' daavɨna. Nabaai sikurɨta pimagɨnyavɨ kaadihɨta dawaai dasa' daavɨna. Nabaai sikurɨta nyɨlyai walakadimagɨ kaadihɨta dawaai dasa' daavɨna.

Sihurɨta anga naanga dazabanne sa' kaavɨlyawɨ sɨla dɨragɨnya yɨvaimwagya'ne atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalya kɨnɨnnakesɨ. Nabaai sɨla saraavɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyare Wɨdaasade atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala saraavɨne yaya kɨnɨnnakengɨra.
Ejelɨya dazai nɨmɨjɨ yagaala ye'mwannadɨna yɨvanɨkei yɨta golɨyagɨnyarɨ' lɨmwagɨkei. Anga naanga saba kaadihɨsangɨjɨ sikurɨsavɨjɨ yaamɨjɨyɨta ya'nerɨ' lɨmwagɨkei.

Anga naanga dazaba yuna gɨrɨla'nya yɨvanɨka. Gamɨre saamɨnyavasɨ gamɨre naangevasɨ yuyavakaai avaainanyavakaalyɨ. Sahwai gamɨre yɨsarɨsɨ yaamɨjɨta yɨna kyɨwa' anga naanga sabanya saamɨnyava' sɨtethɨya tɨwelɨvɨ taawɨzanɨya yɨma'nyɨna (2,400 kilomitaaya). Saamɨnyavasɨ sikurɨsavɨya naangevasɨ anga naanga dazabanne yunebanya' munya ke'beva yɨlaawɨna yɨnɨkebajɨ yunebanya yuya sa avaainanya.

Nabaai sikurɨta kɨrɨvɨjɨ yaamɨjɨta yɨna yɨwake' sikurɨsa' yune angajɨna 144 kyuvitɨya (72 mitaaya) yɨma'nyɨna. Metaaya daza' a'mwera yuyangɨ metaayɨmɨya yadɨvɨsa' avaalyasɨ. Ejelɨyai yaamɨjɨyɨta sa' sikurɨsavɨ yune metaaya sahɨrɨsɨna yɨwakesɨ.
Anga naangebanya sikurɨsa' Gotɨyai sɨla nawɨ'nya jaazɨpaayasɨ yavɨkaryakesɨ. Nabaai anga naanga saba yune golɨyasɨna yavɨkaryakebe. Sarevɨ anga naanga saba sɨnɨmwavanahurɨke'bɨ' bwamwadɨwɨna.

Anga naanga saba sikurɨkevɨ kaavɨlyawɨ sɨla nawɨ'nya dala nabinabinya nɨgwia naanga mubadɨvɨsajɨ Gotɨyai yɨwaala yɨwagakengɨ. Aayagaasa (1) sɨla nawɨ'nya sikurɨsavɨ kaavɨlyawɨnyai jaazɨpaayai. Nabaai ayawɨdaa'nyai (2) sɨla gwaagwaaja sapaayai. Nabaai daraai dalyai (3) sɨla ahetɨyai. Nabaai daraai daraalyai (4) sɨla yɨkɨwa'ja emeralɨyai.

Nabaai atɨlyai (5) sɨla wayaakejɨsɨ yaakejɨsɨ warɨke saathonɨkɨzɨyai. Nabaai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwainanyai (6) wayaaka tawaja konyilɨyanɨyai. Nabaai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyai (7) sɨla awi'ja kɨrɨzolaaitɨyai. Nabaai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraai dalyai (8) sɨla saalaalyavɨ yɨjuza berɨlɨyai. Nabaai ata purɨdaa'nyɨ daraai daraalyai (9) sɨla nabinnanya awi'ja topaazɨyai. Nabaai atɨraalyai (10) sɨla yɨkɨwa'jajɨsɨ awi'jajɨsɨyai kɨrɨzopɨrezɨyai. Nabaai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwainanyai (11) sɨla nabinnanya gwaagwaaja aayazɨdɨyai. Nabaai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyai (12) sɨla nabinnanya wayaaka ametɨzɨyai.

Kaadihɨta atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraala sa nabaai kwaalɨturyaanga mubya naanga yadɨvɨta sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraalyangɨ. Kaadihɨta gazasa' yɨ sa' kwaalɨturyaanga naanga yune pɨrɨsɨna yavɨkarinɨkesɨ. Anga naangeba tuta yuyangɨ yune golɨya'nanyasɨ. Golɨya gɨrɨ'maaya' widɨwaayavɨre gɨlaazɨya'bɨsasɨ.

Anga naanga dazavɨ Gotɨyarɨne Anga nawɨ'nya' tɨnna mwanganyɨwa. Mamannyɨka sare' dare'nesɨ. Naangei Gotɨyai Dɨragɨnya Yuya Kɨnɨnnakei, yɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyalyɨ Gotɨyarɨne Anga nawɨ'nyasɨ. Gazabazaba yɨlaaya wiadɨvɨsa'nanyɨ.

Nabaai anga naanga dazaba wanyɨwanya ya'na nyɨlyalyɨ lawelyɨ saraarɨna wɨgainadeva mɨ'. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Wanyɨwanya yune naanga Gotɨyare'na wannadevanna anga saba. Yɨ gamɨre byaannya' wannadeva. Nabaai Dɨwɨnyai sahɨbanne wanyɨwanya dɨ'baakelyɨ.
A'mwe ajɨmya yuyangɨyara anga naanga dazabadaa'nya wanyɨwanya baakevɨ kaanya yamaripɨ'deve. Nabaai kingɨya Kwaakevakɨyara sahɨbanne kumɨre nɨgwɨlalaakejɨ byaannyajɨ makabɨpɨ'deve.
Yɨrɨkegaa' sikurɨta savɨya kaadihɨsangɨ kaanya tihɨpɨ'de mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ. Yuyagaa' basɨnadaa'na yade. Sare' dare'nesɨ. Anga naanga saba sawɨsa' jɨnnadeva mɨ'.
Sahɨbanna ajɨmya yuyangɨya byaannyajɨ yaya munyaba makɨlya yuyabulyɨ makwibɨ'dengɨ.

Gɨlyɨvɨta gɨrɨ'naka aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' wɨlade' mɨ'. Gotɨyare tɨnnyarɨ wana butɨrɨnya winnɨkebwi yade aane pwai kwai aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' wɨladei mɨ'. Kwaasɨ yagaala yade aane pɨrɨ' kɨrɨ' aane pwai kwai wɨladei mɨ'. Arɨkewɨ. A'mwe kumɨre yaya bukuya gaalya'nyɨrɨ Dɨwɨnyare bukuyɨrɨ yɨda'nɨkera, yune a'mwe dazahwarana wibɨ'dere anga naanga dazabanna.

Nabaai ejelɨya dazai aalya naange' walyɨvanɨka pɨrɨvɨna nɨmɨnyɨ yɨbwarɨdaakuna. Aalya daza' aalya gaala'ne sa' yuna sɨnɨmwavananya'bɨ' aaizɨya'bɨ' kɨmihɨta yadaa'nyɨya'. Yɨ aalya daza' Gotɨyalyɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyalyɨ sanɨdaare kingɨnamwaalyɨta savɨdaa'nyɨ yɨma'naka

anga naanga dazabanna tutaanya naangevɨ tɨnnyaba walyuna. Aalɨmaangebaarɨ dihɨrɨjɨ kengihɨrɨjɨ yɨta gaala ya'nyɨ' waayɨ'. Kwarame pɨrɨvɨ tɨka munne atɨraai sɨvɨlyɨrɨdaa'nyɨ pwaraai yɨ'nadengɨ. Yuya lawe sɨkaavɨ yɨsɨla daza yɨ'nadengɨ. Nabaai yɨta sare yɨkɨwasa ajɨmya yuyangɨyaraavɨ tewaanya nawɨ'nya yɨma'nya'nengɨ.

Nabaai Dɨkevɨ wɨmarasɨ'nya'ne gazasa' kunebe. Yuya daza ayɨna warade mɨ'. Gotɨyalyɨ Dɨwɨnyalyɨ sanɨdaare kingɨnamwaalyɨsa' anga naanga dazaba waradevanyɨ. Nabaai Gotɨyare yaasɨwa'wawɨnyara gamɨnyɨ lotuya wɨmaripɨ'devanyɨ.
Nabaai gamɨre sɨnnyɨ' wangabɨ'devanyɨ. Nabaai gamɨnne yaya' kumɨre yamengɨnyɨra.

Sawɨsa' ayahi jɨnnade' mɨ'. Sarevɨ nabaai sahwaraavɨ laamɨvananyavɨre baakesɨ nyɨlyare baakesɨ sawaarɨna ayahi wɨgainade' mɨ'. Naangei Gotɨyai sahwaraavɨ baake' wɨjaavade'nanyɨ. Nabaai yuyagaa' yuyagaa' sahwara kingɨya mwaaibɨ'devanyɨ.

Nabaai ejelɨyai nɨmɨnyɨ dara wɨdɨna “Yagaala yuya daza yuna naanga nebulyangɨra. A'mwe yuyara sahɨnɨngɨna dɨragɨnna lɨmwabɨzangɨ. Naangei Gotɨyarɨ wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsaraavɨre kuryaraavɨ dɨhaa'bwa'dei gamɨre yagaalya' wɨjɨwaakya'na gamɨre ejelɨyarɨ maryasaabakelyɨ. Gamɨre yaasɨwa'wawɨnyaraavɨ wibwarɨdaakwia'na yuya daza yɨme'nya'bɨ' yɨma'nya'nenna maryasaabakelyɨ.

‘Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' walaabɨdeinyɨreva.’ A'mwei yagaala bukuya davɨ warɨke mɨdɨnajai yɨ yagaala Gotɨyai gɨthɨwake wɨ'nama'mwaanya wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨyagaala daza mɨdɨnajai yɨ a'mwe dazai yɨlaaya yada tewaanaanga winadelyɨ.”

Jonɨnnyɨ yagaala dazahɨnɨ kadɨka wɨ'nena yuya dazahɨnɨ tɨnna wangamweinyɨ nɨmɨ. Kadɨka mena wɨ'nena tɨnna mena wanganena “Sahwarɨ lotuya yɨma!” dena kwadaai gɨlɨna yena ejelɨyare sɨvigɨ'nyɨryawɨ yuya daza nyɨbwarɨdaakwakeryawɨ walamwaaina.

Mena walamwaaina kyɨwa sahwai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gɨmɨ sasara minna! Gɨmɨjɨ gɨmɨre ja'mwera kwara wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakadɨvɨsarajɨ ye'mwannawɨdaayadɨnyainyɨ. Avaaiwawɨnyainyɨ. Nabaai a'mwe yuyara bukuya davɨre yagaalya mɨdɨdɨvɨsarajɨ avaaiwawɨnyainyɨ. Yɨ Gotɨyai yune gave pwainanyarɨ lotuya nayaa dɨragɨnna jɨ!”

Nabaai sahwai nɨmɨnyɨ wɨdɨna “Gotɨyare yagaala daza kadɨka wɨ'nama'mwaanya wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨyagaala daza bukuya dathɨrɨ warɨkengɨ mamarabɨku'dɨnnera! A'mwera wangabɨka! Sare' dare'nanyɨ. Gotɨyare daza ya'negaa' aya kɨgaa' mena yɨwaka.

‘Aayagaa' sagaa' a'mwei yɨda'maraangebwi marasɨ'nɨkei kayaa'nanyabwi yadei kayaa'nanyabwi kuna yana! A'mwei kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadei kayaa'na gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi kuna yana! Nabaai a'mwei tewaanya yɨda'maraangebwi yadei tewaanya yɨda'maraangebwi kuna yana! A'mwei nawɨ'nyai gɨrɨ'maayai mwaalajai nawɨ'nyai gɨrɨ'maayai kuna mwaalaneva!’
Yɨthaanyi! Nɨmɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' walaabɨdeinyɨra. Nɨmɨre tɨvɨkɨsabwi lɨmwaga'mujɨ walaabɨdeinyɨ. A'mwe gazarɨzarɨ gamɨre yade yune saburɨne'na wɨrɨvɨkɨrɨdeinyɨra.
Nɨmɨ aaya sɨnnawɨnyainyɨ (A). Aaya dɨvineinyɨ (Z). Yɨ nɨmɨ yuya sangɨne'na aaya kaavɨlyainyɨ. Yuya dɨragɨnya sa yunebanna yɨ'mwannadɨnyainyɨ.

A'mwera kunnya baazɨ'ma'nya aalya yɨpɨjara yɨlaaya yadɨvɨ' tewaanaanga winadere. Sarera ‘Tɨka munne yɨta gaala'nyɨkɨ yɨnɨga maranaana! Anga naanga dazabanne kaadihɨsangɨ yɨnɨga wɨlawaana!’ deva yɨpɨnerera.

Gotɨyare anga naangeba mwasɨlaa jɨlɨkerajɨ a'mwe gɨri'nya yadɨvɨsarajɨ kayaa'nanya gɨrɨkita'nanyabwi yadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mweraavɨ tamakadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe sɨlaangeraavɨjɨ yɨsaraavɨjɨ kwaasɨgotɨyaraavɨjɨ wɨdadɨvɨsarajɨ gazarazara kwaasɨyabwina wɨvu'nadera kwaasɨ yadɨvɨsarajɨ a'mwe dazara mwalɨbainyɨna yɨpɨ'dere mwasɨlaa. Anga nawɨ'nya savɨ wɨlaabɨpɨ'dera mɨ'.”

“Nɨmɨ Jizaazainyɨ nɨmɨre ejelɨyarɨ sarɨmɨnyawɨnna yɨhɨmaryasaabɨwa. Nɨmɨnyɨne kusɨlaanyangɨya anga geva gevanyaihɨrɨna yagaala daza jalɨkurakya'nerɨ yɨhɨmaryasaabɨweinyɨ. Nɨmɨ sahwainyɨ Yɨta Devitɨmɨ aaya kaavɨlyavɨ pwipulyainyɨ. Nɨmɨ gamɨre Kaimɨraayainyɨ. Nɨmɨ sɨlɨngaamɨnya yɨrɨkwinyagaa' lɨvamwaja yade' kaabwe sahɨrɨ'nyɨ.”

Kurya Tewaanyalyɨ Sipɨzipɨya Dɨwɨnyare sɨdɨraayasɨ sawaai dɨna “Kaaja!” A'mwei yagaala daza' wɨ'nojɨ sai dara dana! “Kaaja!” Nabaai a'mwei aalya'na mɨjɨka balojɨ sai bana! “Aalya' nɨma!” yawɨrojɨ aalya gaala'ne' Gotɨyare yanga naange' bamaarana!

Nɨmɨ yagaala dɨragɨnya' wɨdɨvanɨge. A'mwe gazaizai Gotɨyare wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨyagaala daza bukuya dɨrɨ warɨke kadɨka wɨ'nɨvanɨkerɨ dɨragɨnna dara jalɨkurakɨvanɨge. Saigɨ yagaala dazangɨna yagaala pɨrɨ' mɨje'mwamwɨya yɨjaigɨ bukuya dathɨrɨ wana kayaa'nanya daza kayaaka yɨgalya'nenna yɨda'nɨke sa Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨ mɨje'mwamwɨya gyatheigɨnyɨ.

Nabaai bukuya dɨrɨ Gotɨyare wɨ'nawɨjɨwaakɨyagaala dazangɨ yagaala pɨrɨ' marasɨ'nɨjaigɨ Gotɨyai gɨmɨnyɨ gamɨre nawɨ'nyaanga bukuya dathɨrɨ yɨda'nɨkenna gɨmarasɨ'nadeigɨ. Yɨ sasareigɨ gɨmɨnyɨne yɨta gaala'ne sɨkɨ tɨka munne dɨmaranadeigɨ mɨ'. Yɨ sasareigɨ anga naanga nawɨ'nya dazaba yɨnɨga wi'na dɨmwaaideigɨ mɨ'. Aawa. Dazaburɨ gɨmarasɨ'nadeigɨnyɨ.
Yuya dazanna jalɨkurakɨvanɨka dazai dahaa' dara dɨna “Yayo, nɨmɨ yɨme'nya'bɨ' walaabɨdeinyɨra!”
Sahɨrɨsɨ. Nebula naangesɨra. Naanga Jizaazai dalaama!
Yanga gaimwanga naanga Jizaazare' sarɨmɨ yuyaihɨlyɨ yɨhye'mwannamwaalana!
